[\[39b.7\]]zhes pa la/ ta skar:/ chom rkun/ br-i ha da  pa ti:zhes pa la/ pr-i ha spa ti:/ sur bu/ kun [\[]p+woHska kh+pau [\]]tsa/ ku pu dag la[\[] ska lpa[\]] dag kyang ngo / /snga ma'i mtha'i rnam bcad ni ku ste ka ste'i dang po gnyis/ pu ste pa sde'i dang po gnyis pha rol la rim pa bzhin ka la gnyis la th+ka dang pa pha ba gnyis
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]la lpa zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ ka dang pa brjod pa'i don no/ /ka:ka ro ti/ zhes pa la/ ka d+ka ro ti/ kA:ka ro ti/ na ma: khag r+b+hA ya/ zhes pa la/ na ma rbag r+g+hA ya/ nam :kha ga r+b+hA ya/ ka:  pa Tha ti/ zhes pa la/ ka rba Na ti/ ka:pa Tha ti/ ka: pha la ti/ zhes pa la/
[\[40a.2\]]ka lpa la ti/ /ka:pha ya ti/ sogs so/ sa sa dzu Sho ru:/ sa sa dzu :ro dag gi ru'o/ /tshig mtha'i sa yig dang sa/ ci byed/ dzu Sha'i Sha yig dag rung 'gyur te/ shi nam mkha'i snying po la bya ga 'tshal lo/ bas/ a r+ts+ya zhes pa la/ mdo 'dis sa/ ci glog par byed/ ru/ a to ro ra pa tA nga blu te/ ata
[\[40a.3\]]ci 'bras bu phyed/ /las ru'i p+lu ta ma yin pa las p+lu ta ma yin pa la'o/ /pU ta ma yin pa'i a ta las pha rol gyi ru ni p+lu ta ma yin pa'i a ta pha rol la ur 'gyur te/ /ru u a las yon tan nos/ yon tan/ eng las tshig mtha' las a ta la 'os snga ma'i gzugs byas pas/
[\[40a.4\]]shi bo \u0f85 rtsaM/ ha shi tsa/ ha sha la'ang ngo / /a ta las pha rol gyi du ni ha sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol la'ang ur 'gyur te/ na ma:/ bu d+d+hA ya/ zhes pa la/ na mo bu d+d+ha ya/ nam: d+ha rna r+m+tha ya zhes pa la/ na mo d+ha r+m+ma ya/ sogs so/ /b+ho b+ha go a g+ho A pU rba s+ya yo \u0f85 shi/ b+ho b+ha
[\[40a.5\]]zhi ba mchod/ go a g+ho/ A rnams sngon ma'i ya a sha la'o/ /b+ho dang b+ha go dang a g+ho dang A rnams las pha rol gyi ru ni a sha so sor bsdu ba pha rol la y+rar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bA: i ha zhes pa la/ /mdo 'dis rnam bcad ya/ shA ka l+ya
[\[40a.6\]]kyis dbyi 'os yang na sra phyis pas/ de bA yi ha/ sogs so/ bi b+hA ShA b+ha bad+b+ha ka wa tA mo ts+tsA wa s+ya/ b+ha wa tra/ b+ha ga wa tra/ a g+ha wa tra rnams kyi yang na ste a wa o ta yang ngo / /b+ha wa ta la sogs pa 'di gsum gyi bod pa'i don la ta rnams ru ru yang na 'gyur te
[\[40a.7\]]rung bsgyur ba na wa dbyangs bcas dang a/ lha rnams 'dir/ rnams ota du 'gyur te/ b+ho:/ b+he go:/ a g+ha:zhes pa grub/ b+ho:/ e hi/ mdo sngon mas rnams bcad la shA ka l+ya kyis dbyi 'os ya phyis pas/ b+ho e hi/ kye 'dir byon/ yang na b+ho ye hi/ ha yi sarba ShAM/ ha la la thams
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]cad kyi'o/ /A dang o ta las pha rol gyi ru bsgyur ba'i yu ni ha la dang po can pha rol la thams cad du dbyi ste/ bla go:nam ste/ zhes pa la/ b+ho b+ha go sogs kyi rnam bcad ya de mdo 'dis phyis pas/ /b+ha go nam ste/ de bzhin du/ ya hi zhes pa la/ /a g+ho ya hi/ /de bA:/ na
[\[40b.2\]]ma ste/ zhes pa la/ de bA na ma ste/ sogs so/ /ro \u0f85 su gi/ supa ma yin pa la ro'o/ /a ha na gyi na yig su pa kyi rnam dbye ma yin pa la ra ru 'gyur te/ a ha na/ a ha:la/ a ha ra ha:/ de bzhin du/ skal ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ a ha na/ ga Na:/ zhes pa la/ a dA rgaN/ sdig pa de bas shig
[\[40b.3\]]sogs so/ 'grel lha rnams phyag khyed/ par/ rA tri/ rU paM/ ra tha n+ta ra rnams pha rol la a ha na gyi na rung 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas na du/ ha sha la 'ang ngos ru u/ nyi ma nyi ma/ mtshams sbyar bas/ a ho rA tri:/ a hor tha n+ta ra:/ yang  nyin mo tshogs pa/ 'grel par/ a ha:/
[\[40b.4\]]gI:d+hA:rnams kyi rnam bcad ni ba ti pha rol la yang na ra ru 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ a ha rba ti:/ gI rba ti:/ gI wa ti:/ ng+hU rba ti:/ ng+hU tha ti:/ u Sha so ro bu d+d+he/ bu d+d+ha la u Sha sa'i ra'o/ nyin mtshan/ nyi ma'i gzugs/ nyin mo'i shing rta/ /bu d+d+ha pha rol/ u Sha sa'i sang ra 'gyur te/
[\[40b.5\]]u Shas/ bu d+d+h+ra:zhes pa la/ u Sha rbu d+d+ha:/ ro ri/ ra'i ra la'o/ /ra pha rol lar dbyi ste/ /nyin mo'i bdag po/ /smu ba'i bdag po/ smra ba'i bdag po/ sa bdag ste rgyal pa/ pu nar  ram te zhes pa la mdo 'dis ra phyis/ D+h+ra lo pe pU rba s+ya dI r+g+ho \u0f85 Na:/ D+ha ra phyis pa la sngon ma'i a Na gyi ring bo 'o/ /D+ha yig dang
[\[40b.6\]]ra yig phyis pa de'i snga ma sngon nas gsal ba ste me 'bar ba'i don no/ de a Na so sor bsdu ba thung ngu na ring por 'gyur te/ mdo 'dis ring por bsgyur te/ mdo 'dis na ring por bsgyur bas/ bu mA ra ma te/ ha ris/ ra mya:/ zhes pa la/ sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis ru nga'i ra la 'os ra phyis mdos ring por bsgyur bas/ /
[\[40b.7\]]ha rI ra mya:/ 'phrog byed mdzes ba/ sogs so/ bi pra ti She d+he pa raM kA r+yaM/ dgag pa dang bral ba la pha rol gyi bya ba'o/ /dgag pa dang bral ba ste mdo gnyis/ slar yang rtse bar byed/ kyi cho ga 'jug pa la pha rol te mdo phyi ma de'i bya ba 'jug pa shas che ste/ dper na ig gi a tsa la ya Na'o
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]zhes a tsa gang byung yang ya Na ra bsgyur ba thob kyang mdo phyi ma a ka 'dra ba la ring po'o zhes pa'i phyi ma'i bya ba 'jug pa lta bu'o/ /e ta t+ta do:su lo po \u0f85 kar na nya sa mA se ha yi/ e ta ta dang ta ta dag gi na nya'i tshig sdud dang ka ma yin pa'i ha la la su dbyi'o/ /e tata dang tata dag gi
[\[41a.2\]]na nya'i tshig sdud dang ka yig ma yin pa'i hal dang po can pha rol la rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su'i rjes dbyi ste/ a Sha:/ bi Sh+Nu:zhes pa la/ e Sha pi Sh+Nu:/ sa:ha ri: zhes pa la/ sa ha ri:sogs so/ /so nyi tsa lo pe ca ta t+pA da pU ra naM/ sa:a ca la dbyi la de rkang pa rdzogs pa
[\[41a.3\]]la'o/ /ta da la su byin pa'i sa:zhes pa'i rnam bcad ni a tsa pha rol la dbyi zhing spyir btang phyis pa la mtshams mi sbyor yang de tshigs bcad kyi rkang pa rdzogs par/ 'di khyab 'jug  di 'phrog byed/ byed pa la mtshams sbyor te/ sa: e Sha zhes pa la/ mdo 'dis rnam bcad phyis slar mtshams
[\[41a.4\]]sbyor bas/ sai Sha zhes pa byung ste/ 'grel bar dper brjod tshigs bcad byung ba ni/ sai Sha dA shar thI rA ma:/ se Sha rA dzA yu d+hi Sh+Thi ra:/ sai Sha ka r+Nom hA t+yA gI/ sai Sha b+hI mo ma hA ba la:/ de bod skad du/ de 'di shing rta bcu ba'i bu dga' byed/ /de 'di rgyal po g.yul ngor brtan pa'o/ /
[\[41a.5\]]de 'di gtong ba chen po rna ba can/ /de 'di 'jig pa stobs ni chen po'o/ /zhes pa ste rkang pa'i dang po rnams su/ se Sha zhes byung ba lta bu'o/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+yas n+d+he: sU drA ha pa ny+tsa sa n+d+ha ya:sa mA b+hA:/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mtshams sbyor gyi mdo las mtshams sbyor lnga ba rdzogs
[\[41a.6\]]so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las mtshams sbyor lnga ba'i btang dmigs pas la dang bcas pa rags pa rnams
[\[41a.7\]]re zhig rdzogs so// //bla ma dang 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar mtshams sbyor gyi cho ga rnams bshad zin nas/ da ni ming las tshig tu bsgrub pa su la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba rnams 'chad par bya ste/ a r+tha ba da d+hA tu ra pra t+ya ya:prA ti ba di kaM/ /byings
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]min pa rkyen med pa don dang ldan ming ngo / /byings ma yin pa ste byings la kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen sbyin pas 'gyur grub pa/ su sogs dang ti sogs kyi rnam dbyi'i rkyen med pa'i don dang ldan pa ni/ rtags sam/ ming ngam/ sgra 'am/ prA ti pa di ka zhes bya ste/ su la sogs pa rnams 'jug
[\[41b.2\]]pa'i shul lo/ /pra t+ya ya:pa ra sh+tsa  rkyen pha rol la 'ang ngo / /sub la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams ming gi pha rol tu sbyin par bya'o/ /su la sogs pa ni 'di rnams te/ su au dzas/ a ma auT shas/ TA b+h+yAM b+h+yas/ da si b+h+yam b+h+yas/ ngas o sa Am/ di os su pa/ rnam
[\[41b.3\]]dbye 'di rnams kyi dang po'i gcig tshig gi u dang / mang tshig dzas kyi dza/ gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig giT/ mang tshig gi sha/ gsum pa'i gcig tshig gi gu/ bzhi pa/ lnga pa/ drug pa/ bdun pa rnams kyi nga rnams dang / lnga pa'i nga si'i i/ bdun pa'i mang tshig gi rnams
[\[41b.4\]]don dang bcas ba'i 'gro ba'i ming can no/ /bib+ha k+ti sh+tsa/ rnam dbye'o/ /gong du bshad pa'i su la sogs pa rnams dang / 'og nas 'byung ba'i ti la sogs pa rnams la rnam dbye zhes ba'o/ /su la sogs pa nyer gcig po 'di rnams kyi'ang / su au dzas dang po don tsam brjod pa/
[\[41b.5\]]a ma auT shas gnyis pa las kyi don/ TA Sh+h+yA b+tes gsum pa byed pa po/ de b+h+ya ma b+h+yas bzhi pa ched du bya ba/ ngasi b+h+yA ma b+h+yas lnga pa byung khung / ngas os Am drug pa 'brel pa/ ngi os su pa bdun pa gnas gzhi rnams la 'jug go/ /de rnams las dper na dang po'i gcig tshig su
[\[41b.6\]]dang / gnyis tshig au/ mang tshig dzas lta bu thams cad la gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig ste gsum gsum du gnas so/ /su paH/ suba'o/ /su pa zhes smos pas so sor bsdu ba'i brda ste dang po'i gcig tshig su la bdun pa'i mang tshig gi bsgyur bas su nas pa'i bar gyi rnam
[\[41b.7\]]dbye bdun gsum nyi shu gcig po thams cad go bar byed do/ /ng+b+ye g.yo r+d+wi ba tsa nai ka ba tsa ne/ e ka dwi dag gi gcig tshig gnyis tshig dag go/ /gcig gi skad dod e ka la rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig kho na dang / gnyis kyi skad dod dwi la gnyis tshig kho na 'jug go/ /
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ba hu Sha ba hu ba tsa ni/ ba hu la mang tshig go/ /mang po'i sgra ba hu zhes pa lta bu la mang tshig kho na 'jug go/ /da ni rtags dang rnam dbye sbyor ba'i cho ga rnams ston par bya ste/ rtags de yang po rtags mo rtags ma ning gi rtags dang gsum du yod la/ rtags gsum po de la'ang
[\[42a.2\]]a tsa'i mtha' can dang hal gyi mtha' can gnyis su gnas pa las/ dang po a tsa'i mtha' can pho rtags a thung mtha' can las/ rA ma  zhes pa'i rtags sam ming la dper brjod du bya ste/ /rA ma la su/ de dbyi 'os u phyis/ sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyi mdos sar/ khar sogs kyi mdos ra
[\[42a.3\]]rnam bcad byas pas/ rAm:/ rA ma la gnyis tshig/ au pra tham yo:pU rba sa bar+Na:/ dang po dag la snga ma 'dra ba'o/ /ming a rka so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' can gyi pha rol tu rnam dbye dang po dang gnyis pa dag gi a tsa dang po can rnams byung na/ de'i snga ma rtags mtha'i a tsa di dang 'dra
[\[42a.4\]]ba'i ring bor 'gyur bas/ dga' byed skabs 'dir yang a ring por bsgyur ba thob kyang / /de'i dmigs bsal/ nA di tsi/ a ta i tsa la ma yin no/ /a ka gi nang tshan yin kyang rtags mtha' a yig la pha rol i tsa snga ma 'dra ba'i ring mi 'gyur bas a ring por mi bsgyur/ e tsa la
[\[42a.5\]]'phel ba 'os gnyis dag gis gcig 'phel bar bsgyur bas/ /rA mau/ rA ma la mang tshig dzas/ tsu Tu/ tsu Tu dag go/ /rkyen gyi thog ma'i tsu ste tsa sde dang Ta sde rnams 'gro ba'i ming can te dzra phyis/ na bi b+ha k+tau tu smA:/ rnam dbye'i tu sra mra rnams ma yin no/ /rnam dbye'i ta sde dang /
[\[42a.6\]]shas lta bu'i sa dang / a ma lta bu'i ma rnams ni 'gro ba'i ming can/ dga' byed dang / /ma yin no/ dang po dag las ma 'dra ba 'os ring po/ sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis sar/ khar sogs kyi rnams bcad byas bas/ rA mA:/ e ka pa tsa ne saM bu d+d+hi:/ gcig tshig las bu d+d+hi'o/ /bod ba'i don
[\[42a.7\]]du sbyor ba'i rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la saM bu d+d+hi zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /rA ma la bod pa'i don gyi su/ eng hra swA tAM bu d+d+hi:/ thung ngu dang eng las saM bu d+d+hi'o/ /a tsa thung ngu rnams dang / eng so sor  dga' byed rnams/ bsdu ba'i mtha' can las pha rol gyi saM bu d+d+hi dbyi bar bya ste/
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]saM bu d+d+hi phyis/ bod tshig rnam dbye byin pa'i rtags su he sngon du bzhag pas/ he rA ma/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gong gi rnam dbye dang po'i skabs ltar bsgrubs bas/ he rA mau/ he rA mA:/ rA ma la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig am/ a me pU rba:/ am la snga ma'o/
[\[42b.2\]]rtags mtha' a ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na rnam dbye gnyis pa'i am gyi  kye dga' byed/ a yig snga ma'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ rA maM/ gnyis tshig dang po'i gnyis  kye dga' byed dag kye dga' byed rnams/ tshig ltar bsgrubs pas/ rA mau/ rA ma la mang tshig shas/ la sha kwa ta d+d+hi te/
[\[42b.3\]]de phan ma yin pa la la sha ku rnams so/ /de phan gyi rkyen ma yin pa'i rnam dbye dang / byings sgrub dang / kr-i ta sogs gang la'ang  dga' byed la/ /rkyen gyi thog mar gnas pa'i la yig dang / sha yig dang / ku ste ka sde rnams 'gro/ dga' byed dga'/ /ba'i ming can te/ shra phyis/ dang po
[\[42b.4\]]dag la snga ma 'dra'o sa ring bor bsgyur/ ta smA ts+tsha so na:puM si/ de las shas kyi na skyes pa la 'o/ /skyes pa'i rtags 'dra ba'i cho ga byas zin pa'i pha rol gyi shas kyis yig ni na yig tu 'gyur te/ sa nar bsgyur bas/ rA mAn/ ra ShA b+d+yAM no Na sa mA na pa de/ ra Sha dag las na'i Na rkang pa
[\[42b.5\]]mtshungs ba la'o/ /rkang pa mtshungs ba ste tshig rkang gcig tu gnas pa'i ra yig dang Sha yig dag las pha rol gyi na yig ni Na ra 'gyur ro/ /aT ku p+wA nga nu n+b+ya pA ye \u0f85 pi/ aT ku pu Ang num rnams par na yod kyang ngo / /dga' byed rnams la/ tshu rol yig dang Sha yig dag las pha rol gyi na
[\[42b.6\]]yig ni aT so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang / ka sde dang / pa sde dang / nyer bsgyur Ang dang num A ga ma rnams bar na yod kyang Nar 'gyur bas/ spyir btang na Nar 'gyur ba thob kyang de'i yang dmigs bsal ni/ na pa dA n+ta s+ya/ tshig mtha'i ma yin no/ /rgyu mtshan gong du smros pa de
[\[42b.7\]]rnams tshang yang tshig mtha'i na srog med ni Nar mi 'gyur bas na nyid du gnas so/ /rA ma la gsum pa'i gcig tshig DA sbyin/ ya smA ta pra t+ya ya bi d+hi sta dA di pra t+ya yA ng+gaM/ gang rkyen gyi cho ga rkyen de'i snga ma la a ng+ga'o/ /gang rkyen gyi gzhi 'am snga ma ste rtags de la pha rol rkyen gyi cho ga
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]'byung ba'i phyir a ng+ga'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/ /Ta/ nga si nga sA mi nA t+s+ya:/ TA nga si ngas rnams kyi in a ta s+ya rnams so/ /rtags a yig mtha' can a ng+ga zhes brda chad byas pa de'i pha rol rnam dbye gsum pa'i gcig tshig TA ni in dang / lnga ba'i gcig tshig nga si ni
[\[43a.2\]]a ta/ drug pa'i gcig tshig ngas ni s+ya rnams su 'gyur te/ TA/ in / a las yon tan nos e/ ra Sha dag la zhes pa'i mdos/ na Na/ rA me Na/ rA ma la/ gsum pa'i b+h+yAM/ su pi tsi/ su pa la'ang ngo / /rtags a thung mtha' a ng+ga'i ming can las/ su pa la sogs pa'i rnam dbye ya nya so sor
[\[43a.3\]]bsdu ba'i yi ge byung na rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur ro/ /rA mA b+ng+yAM/ rA ma la/ gsum pa'i/ b+hi sa/ a to b+hi sa ai sa/ a ta las g+his 'i ai sa 'o/ /dga' byed cig/ rtags a thung mtha' a ng+ga'i ming can las/ rnam dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig b+hi sa ni ai sa ru bsgyur ro/ /e tsa las 'phel pa dang / /
[\[43a.4\]]sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis/ rA mai:/ rA ma la/ bzhi ba'i de/ dga' byed dag gis/ /nge:ya:/ nge ya'o/ rtags a thung mtha' can a ng+ga'i ming can las pha rol gyi nge ni ya ru 'gyur te/ nge ya ru bsgyur/ su pa la 'ang ngos ring ngo / rA mA ya/ rA ma la bzhi ba'i b+h+yaM/ su ba la 'ang ngo / /rA mA
[\[43a.5\]]g+hu/ rA ma la bzhi pa'i/ dga' byed rnams kyis/ mang tshig b+h+yas/ ba hu ba tsa ni dz+ha l+yeta/ mang tshig la dz+ha la la e ta 'o/ /rtags mtha' a thung a ng+ga'i ming can las/ rnam dbye mang tshig dz+hal gyi yi ge dang po can gang byung yang rtags/ dga' byed kyi ched du/ mja' a yig tu/ dga' byed dag gi ched du/
[\[43a.6\]]'gyur te/ rA me b+haH e ta/ zhes pa bshad pa ni ta yig da'i dus kyi'o/ /zhes pa'i don no/ rA ma la/ lnga ba'i ngasi/ DA nga si ngas rnams kyi i na a ta s+ya rnams so zhes pas/ ngasi a ta/ aka 'dra ba sogs kyis/ rA mAta/ rA ma la/ lnga pa'i b+haM dang b+h+yas/ gong gi bzhi pa'i skabs/
[\[43a.7\]]dga' byed rnams kyi ched du/ ltar bsgrubs pas/ rA mA b+h+yAM/ dga' khyad dag las/ dA me b+h+ya:/ dga' byed rnams las/ rA ma la/ drug pa'i ngas/ TA nga si sogs kyi mdos/ rA ma s+ya/ dga' byed kyi/ rA ma la/ gnyis tshig os/ dga' byed las/ o sa la'ang ngo / rnam dbye os pha rol la
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]rtags a ng+ga'i ming can de e ru 'gyur ro/ /e ca'i a ya sogs dang / sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyi mdos/ rA ma la/ drug pa'i A ma/ hra swa na byA po nuT/ thung ngu na dI A pa rnams las nuT 'o/ /rtags mtha' thung ngu rnams dang na dI ming can te bud med kyi rtags I U gnyis
[\[43b.2\]]dang A pa ste mo rtags A ring mtha' can rnams las pha rol rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig A ma la nuT A ga ma dag byed dag gi/ ster te/ Ta yig D+ki ta sogs kyi don u brjod don/ rA ma/ nA ma/ nAmi/ nA ma la'o/ nA ma pha rol la rtags mtha'i a ca gang yin kyang ring bor 'gyur te/
[\[43b.3\]]rtags mtha'i ring po aT ku pu sogs kyi mdos/ nA NA/ rA mA NAM/ rA ma la/ bdun pa'i nge / nga 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ a la yon tan nos/ rA me/ rA ma la bdun pa'i o'o/ gang drug pa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ ra ma yo:/ rA ma la bdun pa'i mang tshig su pa
[\[43b.4\]]pa so sor bsdu ba'i don yin pas byis/ dga' byed rnams kyi/ mang tshig la dz+ha la la e ta 'os/ rA me su/ A de sha bra t+ya ya yo:/ kun nas bsgyur ba dang / dga' byed la/ rkyen dag la'o/ /chu rol i Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang ka sde/ dga' byed dag la/ yod la/ pha rol Sha sar
[\[43b.5\]]bsgyur zin pa lta bu kun nas bsgyur ba dang / rkyen gyis tshig mtha' min pa rnams Sha ru 'gyur te/ rA me Shu/ tshig mtha' yin na mi 'gyur te/ ha ri sta tra/ zhes pa lta bu la tshu rol i Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge i mthong yang pha rol sa Sha ra mi 'gyur bar sa nyid du gnas pa lta ba'o/ /de
[\[43b.6\]]ltar a tsa mtha' can skyes ba'i rtags las spyir btang a thung mtha' can gyi cho ga rnams bshad dga' byed rnams/ zin nas a thung mtha' can las  'phrog byed de la/ dmigs bsal sa rba la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ sarbA dI ni sarba nA mA ni/ sarba la sogs pa rnams la sarba'i
[\[43b.7\]]ming can no/ /sarba la sogs pa ni 'di rnams te/ sarba/ thams cad/ bi shwa/ sna tshogs/ u b+ha/ gnyis/ u b+ha ya/ Da ta ra/ Da ta ma/ i ta ra/ rang ngam tha dad/ a n+ya/ gzhan/ a n+ya ta ra/ gzhan dang gzhan/ twa ta/ khyod/ twa/ rang / ne ma/ khrims/ sa ma/ mnyam pa/ si ma/ sa cha 'am mnga' zhabs/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pU R+Wa/ par/ a wa ra/ dak+Shi Na/ u t+ta ra/ a pa ra/ ad+ha ra/ /swa/ an+ta ra/ t+ya da/ ta da/ yang / e ta da/ i dam/ a das/ e ka/ dI/ yu Sh+ma da/ a smad/ b+ha/ wa ta/ ci ki ma rnams so/ /Da tar dang / Da tar dang / Da ta ma gnyis ni ming min yang rkyen de gnyis gang la sbyar
[\[44a.2\]]shar ram bdun nam sngon/ pha rol/ gzhan/ lho/ byang / gzhan zhig/ dma' ba dang mchu/ mtho ris/ bar mtshams/ de/ gang / de/ 'di/ 'di/ gcig/ gnyis/ khyod/ bdag/ yod/ ba'i ming de yang sarba'i ming can du shes par bya'o/ /'di rnams ni rtags gsum cho ga thams cad 'jug
[\[44a.3\]]rung yin ni/ /sa rba la rnam dbye dang po'i su dang au gnyis gong sbyor btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ sar+b+ba:/ sar+b+bau/ sarba la/ dzas/ dza sa:shI/ dzas kyi shI'o/ a thung mtha' can sarba'i rtags la rnam dbye dang po'i ming tshig dzas ni shI ru 'gyur te/ sha 'gro
[\[44a.4\]]ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ a las zhes pa'i mdos sarbe/ rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams gong rA ma'i skabs ltar/ /sarbaM/ sarbau/ sarbA ma/ rnam dbye gsum pa rnams kyang gong bzhin/ sarbe Na/ sarbA b+h+yAM/ sar+b+bai:/ sarba la bzhi pa'i nge / sarba nAm+na:smai/ sarba'i ming can las smai'o/ /
[\[44a.5\]]a thung mtha' can sarba'i ming can te sarba sogs la rnam dbye bzhi ba'i de ni smai ru 'gyur ro/ /sarba smai/ sarba la bzhi pa'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gnyis/ /gong rA ma'i skabs ltar/ /sarba b+h+yAM/ sarba la lnga ba'i nga si/ nga si ng+YoHsmA t+s+mi nau/ nga si ngi dag gi smAta smin dag go/ /sarba
[\[44a.6\]]sogs la rnam dbye lnga ba'i gcig tshig nga si ni smA ta dang / bdun pa'i gcig tshig ngi ni smin du 'gyur ro/ /sarba smAta/ sarbA b+h+yAM/ sarbeb+h+ya:/ sarba la drug pa'i ngas dang os gnyis gong rA mi'i skabs ltar/ /sarba s+ya/ sarba yo:/ sarba la/ rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig A ma/ A mi
[\[44a.7\]]sarba nA m+na:su Ta/ A ma las rba'i ming can rnams las su Ta'o/ /a thung mtha' can sarba sogs la rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig A ma la suT A ga ma 'jug go/ /sarba sAM/ mang tshig la/ zhes dang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi mdos/ sarbe Sh+ShaM/ sarba la/ di/ nga si/ ngi dag
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gi zhes pa'i mdos/ sarba smin/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig spyir btang dang 'dra bas/ sarba yo:/ sarbaShu/ kun tu bod pa'i don can rnams la/ he sarba/ hesarbau/ he sa rbe/ zhes ba ltar bi Sha sogs sa rba'i ming can rnams la cho ga 'di kho na bzhin bsgrub pa'o/ /sarba'i
[\[44b.2\]]ming can gyi nang tshan/ u b+ha la ni/ su sogs gcig tshig bdun dang dzas sogs mang tshig bdun mi 'jug gnyis tshig bdun po kho na 'jug pas/ rnam dbye dang po la/ u b+hau/ gnyis pa la/ u b+hau/ gsum pa la/ u b+hA b+h+yI/ bzhi ba la/ u b+h+wa b+hA+e/ lnga ba la/ u g+hA b+h+yAM/
[\[44b.3\]]drug pa la/ u b+ha yo:/ bdun pa la/ u b+ha yo:/ de rnams rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis tshig kho nas grub pa'o/ /sarba'i ming can gyi nang tshan/ pU rba sogs la/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig gong ltar/ pU rba:/ pU rbau/ mang tshig dzas kyi skabs yang na ba ste/ pU rba
[\[44b.4\]]la/ dzas/ bU rba parA wa ra dak+Shi No t+ta rA parA k+ha rA Ni bya wa s+thA yA ma saM dz+nyA yAM/ pU rba/ bar/ a war/ dak+Shi Na/ u t+ta ra/ a pa ra/ a d+har rnams rnam par bzhag pa ste ming ma yin pa la'o/ /sarba'i nang tshan/ pU rba sogs te pU rba nas/ a d+ha ra'i bar rnams la rnam par bzhag pa ste
[\[44b.5\]]ming ma yin nas rba nA ma'i cho ga dang / ming yin na sbyor bting a thung mtha' can rA ma'i cho ga ltar bsgrub pa'o/ /pU rbe/ pU rbA:/ de bzhin swa'i sgra la dzas/ swa ma dz+nyA ti d+ha nA khyA yAM/ swa la gnyen dang nor dag la ma yin no/ sarba'i nang tshan swa la gnyen dang nor dag dang sbyor ba'i tshe sarba 'i
[\[44b.6\]]ming can ma yin te/ sarba sogs kyi cho ga ltar dzas shIr mi 'gyur bar spyir btang a thung mtha' can kho na'i cho gas bsgrub pa'o/ /swA:dz+nyA ta ya:/ a n+ta ra la dzas/ a n+ta ra ba hi r+Y+Yo go pa saM byA na yo:/ a n+tar la phyi dang sbyor ba gon pa dag las so/ /sarba'i ming can a n+ta ra'i sgra la/
[\[44b.7\]]phyi dang sbyor ba dang gos gyon pa'i smra sbyor ba'i tshe/ sarba nA ma'i bya ba mi 'jug par/ rA ma'i cho ga khe nas bsgrubs pas/ a n+ta rA:dang / mtho ris zhes pa/ phyi dang gon pa'i don ma yin na sa rba'i ming can ltar bsgrubs pas/ a n+tare/ bA rbA di b+h+yon wa b+h+yo bA/ pU rba sogs dgu las yang
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]na'o/ pU rba la sogs pa dgu las/ rnam dbye lnga pa'i gcig tshig nga si dang / bdun pa'i gcig tshig di gnyis ni yang na ba ste/ spyir btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i cho ga dang sarba nA ma'i cho ga gang rung 'jug pas/ lnga pa la/ pU rba ta/ pU rba smA ta/ bdun pa la/ pU rbe/
[\[45a.2\]]pU rba smin lta bu'o/ /de bzhin du/ ba rA ta/ pa ra smA ta/ lnga pa/ pa re/ par smin/ bdun pa ste/ de ltar pU rba nas/ /a n+tar pU rba nas/ a rta ra'i bar thams cad rigs 'gre'o/ /sarba'i ming can rnams la nyer bsgyur sbyor ba dang / ming dang / sa ma la mnyam pa'i don/ swa la nor dang gnyen gyi don/ an+ta la phyi'i
[\[45a.3\]]don rnams sbyor ba las rba'i ming can ma yin te/ sarba nA ma'i cho ga rnams mi 'jug par sbyor btang a thung can gyi skabs su bshad pa ltar bya'o/ de yang dper na/ a ti sarbA:/ zhes nyer bsgyur a ti yod pa'i sarba la dzas shIr mi 'gyur ba ra rA ma ltar bsgrubs pa lta bu'o/ /na pa hu brI hau/
[\[45a.4\]]'brum po la ma yin no/ /sarba sogs la 'brum da po'i tshig sdud gnas pa la yang sarba nA ma'i cho ga rnams mi 'jug ste/ dper na/ pri yas rba la/ shin tu thams cad rnams/ de byin pa smai ru mi 'gyur bar/ de yang bsgyur bas/ pri ya sarba ya/ tr-i twi yA sa mA se/ gsum pa'i tshig sdud
[\[45a.5\]]la'o/ /gsum pa'i tshig sdud ces pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bu'i khyad par rnam dbye gsum pa tshig sdud kyis phyis pa dang skabs 'gar ma phyis kyang 'dra ste/ rtags sarba'i ming can rnams las sarba'i bya ba mi 'jug par spyir btang a thung / dga' ba thams cad kyi ched du/ mtha' can gyi chog byed pas/
[\[45a.6\]]dpe na/ mas pU rbU ya/ ma sen pU rbA ya/ lta bu'o/ /dwa n+d+waM tsa/ zlas dbye la'ang ngo / rtags mtha' a yig sa rba'i ming na tshig sdud kyi khyad par zlas dbye gnas pa las kyang sa rba nA ma'i bya ba rnams mi 'jug pas spyir btang gi cho gas bsgrub pa'o/ /pU rba pa rA wa rA NAM/ suT mi 'jug
[\[45a.7\]]nuT 'jug pa lta bu'o/ mtshungs ba'i sngon/ /bi g+hA ShA dza si/ dzas la gdam nga'o/ sarba nA ma las/ zlas dbye'i tshig sdud gnas pa la sarba'i ming can gyi bya ba dang sbyor btang a thung mtha' gyi cho ga rnams dbye dang po'i dzas la gdam nga bya ste/ shar pha rol gzhan rnams kyi/ shI ru 'gyur ba dang
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]a ka 'dra ba'i cho ga gnyis ka 'jug pa'o/ /brtA shra me ta re/ bar+Nashra me ta rA: lta bu'o/ pra tham tsar ma tI yA lpA r+d+haka ti pa ya ne mAsh+tsa/ pa tha ma/ tsa ra ma/ tI ya/ a lnga/ a r+d+ha/ ka ti pa ya/ ne ma rnams la yang ngo / pra tha ma sogs la yang rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas ni sarba sogs kyi
[\[45b.2\]]skabs ltar shI ru 'gyur ba dang spyir btang a thung mtha' can ltar a ka 'dra ba'i cho ga gnyis kar 'jug pas gdam nga'o/ /pra tha me/ pra tha mA:/ dang po'am thogs pags ga chung du/ phyed/ ji tsam/ khrims/ tI ya'i rkyen sbyar ba ni/ dwi tI ye/ dwi tI ye/ dwi tI yA: lta bu'o/ /pra tha ma sogs la dzas ma gtogs rnam
[\[45b.3\]]dbye lhag ma gzhan thams cad rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ tI ya s+ya/ ngi t+su bA sa rba nA ma tA bA ts+bA/ dang po rnams/ tI ya'i nga 'gro ba rnams la sarba'i ming can du yang na bshad do/ /tI ya'i rkyan la/ gnyis pa rnams/ yang nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams sarba'i bya ba dang /
[\[45b.4\]]rA ma'i bya ba gnyis gdam nga can yin pas gnyis ka 'jug ste/ rnam dbye bzhi pa'i nge la/ dwi hI ya smai/ dwi hI yA ya/ lnga pa/ dwi tI ya smAta/ dwi tI yA ta/ bdun pa/ dwitI ya smin/ dwa tI ye/ lta bu'o/ lhag ma rnams rA ma dang 'dra'o/ /dza rA yA dza ra sa n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ dza rA'i dza ras yang
[\[45b.5\]]na'o/ /dza rA'i sgra la rnam dbye hal te gsal byed thog ma can rnams ma yin pa'i a tsa thog ma can rnams la/ dza rA/ dza ras zhes par bsgyur ba'o/ /su la ni rdza ra:/ a ca la/ dza ras su bsgyur bas/ ni rdza ra so/ ni rdza ras:/ gnyis pa la/ ni rdza ra saM/ ni rdza ra sau/ ni rdza ras:/ ni rdzar
[\[45b.6\]]la/ rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA/ 'dir 'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs pa/ ke tsidA dA be nA tA wA de shA pi tsha n+ti/ rgas/ la lar sda ma/ e na a ta dag tu kun  ma rgas la/ nas bsgyur bar 'dod do/ /zhes byung bas/ ni rdza rA/ zhes pa'i rtags 'di/ dzaras/ dzaras/ dzaras na/ rnams su
[\[45b.7\]]'gyur bas/ ni rdza rba sA/ ni rdzar sen/ ni rdzar se ne na ste gzugs gsum 'byung ngo / TA ma na chad rnam dbye thams cad la gzugs gsum du dbye pa dang / gzhung nyid kyis bshad pa ltar/ a tsa thogs can rnams la dza ras su bsgyur/ ha la thog ma can rnams la/ dza rA
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]nyid du gnas pa 'dam ka can du bya'o/ /nerdzar se/ nirdza rasA ya/ ni rdzar se nA ya/ zhes pa lta bu thams cad la rigs 'gre'o/ /pad+da n+no mAs hr-i n+ni sha sa n+bA Sha na do ShaM ya ka ny+tsha ka n+nu ka n+nu da n+nA sa ny+tsha sbra b+h+r-i ti Shu/ shas la sogs pa rnams la bad data nas mAs hr-id ni sha
[\[46a.2\]]a san/ pU Sha na do Sha na  ya ka na sha ka na  u da na  A san rnams so/ /pa da la sogs pa 'di rnams la rnam dbye dang po gsum dang / gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams gong a thung mtha' can spyir btang rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra/ rnam dbye gnyis pa'i mdo tshig shas nas
[\[46a.3\]]brtsams te/ bdun pa'i mang tshig sub kye bar rnam dbye rnams gang byung yang / pA da/ ni/ pad/ dan+ta ni/ da ta/ nA si kA ni/ nas/ mA sa ni/ mA sa/ hr-i da ya ni/ hr-i da/ ni shA zhes pa/ ni sha/ a sr-i dza ni/ a sa na/ pU Sha ni/ pU Sha na/ do Sha/ ni/ do Shan/ ya kr-i ta/ ni/ ya kan/
[\[46a.4\]]sha kr-i ta/ ni/ sha ka na/ u da ka/ ni/ u nga na/ A sa na rnams su/ rkang pa/ ya ngan/ ma chab/ sna/ mnyam pa 'am mtshungs pa/ 'gyur zhing / skabs snying / mi mthong ba/ 'gar bu brgyud/ mi 'gro ba/ ma sbyin pa/ dag pa/ kyi rkyen la'ang / mtshan mo/ thob par byed/ 'gyur te/ pad ya/
[\[46a.5\]]nus/ la shas/ ba da ya/ chu/ pad du 'gyur drangs/ gdan/ pad:/ grub/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ padA/ pad+d+h+yi:/ bad+b+hi:/ da ta/ da tA/ dad+b+hAM/ na sa:/ na sA/ no p+c+tsAM/ mA sa:/ mA sA/ mA b+hUM/ hr-i da:/ hr-i dA/ hr-i d+b+hAM/ ni sha:/ ni shA/ ni d+b+h+yaM/ a sa na:/ as nA/ a sa b+h+yAM/ p+bu Sh+Na:/ bU Sh+DA/ pU Sha
[\[46a.6\]]b+h+yAM/ do Sh+Na:/ do Sh+Na/ do Shab+h+yAM/ ya k+na ma/ ya k+na/ ya ka b+h+yAM/ sha kA:/ sha k+na/ sha ka b+h+yAM/ u d+na:/ u d+nA/ ud+nA/ u da b+hAM/ A snA/ a sa b+h+yAM/ zhes pa lta bu thams cad la rigs 'gre'o/ /hr-ing sogs su ma 'gyur ba'i phyogs rA ma dang 'dra'o/ /su Da na puMs ka s+ya/ suT ma Ning
[\[46a.7\]]ma yin pa'i 'o/ /rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su nas gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig au Ta'i bra lnga po rnams ma yin pa ste ma ning por pa'i skyes ba'i rtags sogs la suT so sor bsdu ba'am/ suTa'i ming can nam thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i ched du brda chad byed do/ /
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]swA di Sh+wa sarba nA ma s+thA ni/ su sogs rnams la thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin la'o/ /su sogs nyi shu rtsa gcig las gong du bshad pa ltar rnam dbye dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig au Ta'i phar lnga bo rnams thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dang / lnga bo rnams por ba'i shas
[\[46b.2\]]nas su bkyi bar rnams la thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed de/ dgos pa ni/ shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa rnams kyi snga ma'i ming de la rnam 'gyur byung ba'i phyir pa da zhes ming 'dod byed de 'og nas ci rigs
[\[46b.3\]]pa 'byung ngo / /ya ciM b+haM/ ya a tsa la b+ha 'o/ /ya'i rkyen dang shas sogs thams gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa rnams kyi rnam dbye a tsa ste dbyangs thog ma can rnams kyi snga ma'i ming ngam rtags de la ng+ha zhes dgos pa'i ched du ming 'dogs byed do/ /a l+lo bo na:/ na'i ata
[\[46b.4\]]dbyi'o/ /rtags b+ha'i ming can gyi pU Sha na zhes pa lta bu'i pha rol du shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa a tsa thog ma can pha rol rtags mtha' na srog med kyi snga ma'i a de dbyi'o/ /pU Sha na la/ shas a phyis/ ra Sha sogs kyi mdos na Na drangs/ pU Sh+NaH
[\[46b.5\]]pU Sha na la b+h+yAM/ na lo pa:/ prA ti pa di kI ta s+ya ming mtha'i na dbyi'o/ /ming mtha'i na srog med ni rnam dbye ha la thog ma can rnams la dbyi ste na phyis/ pU Sha b+h+yAM/ pU Sha na la/ bdun pa'i ngi byin/ bib+hA ShA di sh+yo:/ daM shi dag la gdam nga'o/ /rnam dbye bdun pa'i di dang shI ste/ ma ning gi
[\[46b.6\]]rtags la au shIr bsgyur ba gnyis kyi snga ma'i rtags mtha' na srog med gnas pa'i a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba gang rung 'dam ka can du bya ste/ pU Sh+Ne/ pU Sha Ni/ saM khyA bi sA ya pU rba s+yA han n+ya ta ra s+yAM ngo / grangs bi sA ya snga ma'i a ha na di la yang na'o/ /grangs rnams dang nyer
[\[46b.7\]]bsgyur bi dang / dgongs mo'i skad dod/ sA ya rnams snga ma'i a h+na'i sgra ni rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshig di la a han zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ grangs thog ma can la/ dwe a h+na la di la sbyin pas/ d+h+ya h+ne/ nyi ma gnyis/ d+b+ya ha ni/ d+b+ya hI/ nyi ma gnyis/ pi thog mar bzhag pa la/
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]bya h+ne/ bya ha ni/ bya h+ni/ sA ya thog mar bzhag pa la/ swa yA h+ne/ sA yA ha ne/ sA yA h+ni/ zhes pa lta bu'i gzugs gsum gsum byung ba'i rjes ma rnams na'i a ta dbyi 'o zhes pas bsgrubs pa'o/ /zhes ba de rnams ni skyes pa'i rtags las a thung mtha' can rnams so// ! //
[\[47a.2\]]skyes pa'i rtags/ nyi bral/ A ring mtha' can la/ bi shwa pA/ zhes pa'i rtags la dper brjod na/ bi shwa pA zhes pa la/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig/ su/ de dbyi 'os u phyis/ sa sa ju Sha sogs dang / /khar sogs kyi mdos bsgrubs pas/ bi shwa p+wa:/ au dang dzas la/ dI r+g+h+wa dz+dza si
[\[47a.3\]]tsi/ ring po las dzas i tsa la'o/ /a yig sna tshogs 'thung / ring po'i mtha' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye i tsa so sor bsdu ba dang po can rnams dang dzas la/ dang po dag la snga ma 'dra'o/ zhes pa'i mdo'i cho ga 'jug pa ma yin te/ e tsa'i 'phel ba dang / a ka 'dra ba la ring bo byas pas/
[\[47a.4\]]bi shwa pau/ bi shwa pA:/ gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ma la snga ma 'os/ bi shwapAM/ gnyis tshig la/ bishwa pau/ mang tshig shas la/ A to d+hA to:/ byings kyi A ta kyi 'o/ /rnam dbye gnyis pa'i shas nas brtsams te/ bdun pa'i su pa kyi bar gyi rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can gang byung yang /
[\[47a.5\]]rtags byings kyi A ring mtha' can yin pa'i A de dbyi ste/ A phyis pas/ bi shwa pa:/ rnam dbye lhag ma'ang bshad ma thag ba'i cho ga ltar gyis bsgrubs pa/ gsum pa la/ bi shwa pA/ bi shwa pA b+h+yAM/ bi shwa pA p+hi:/ bzhi pa la/ bi shwa pe/ bi shwa pA b+h+yAM/ bi shwa pA b+h+ya:/ lnga ba la/ bi
[\[47a.6\]]shwa pa:/ bi shwa pA b+h+yAM/ bi shwa pA b+h+ya:/ drug pa la/ bi shwa pa:/ bi shwa pAM/ bdun pa la/ bi shwa po:/ bi shwa pA su/ bod tshig la/ he'i shwa pA:/ hebi shwa pA:/ de bzhin du/ som pA/ kI lba la pA/ shaM kha d+gA/ hA hA/ s+t+wA/ snA la sogs pa mang po
[\[47a.7\]]dag kyang bi shwa pA dang bya dang bya ba 'dra ba'o/ /zhes pa skyes ba'i rtags kyi A ring mtha' can gyi bya ba bshad zin to/ ! /da ni skyes pa'i rtags i thung mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/ ha ri la/ 'phrog byed/ zhi ba 'thung / ngur bzo ba/ dri za/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]su/ sa sa dzu Sha dang khar sogs kyi mdos/ ha ri:/ ha ri la/ au/ dang po dag la/ zhes pas/ harI/ ha ri la dzas/ dza si tsa/ dzas la 'ang ngo / i ka so sor bsdu ba thung ngu rnams kyi pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas mthong na rtags a ng+ga'i ming can de yon tan du 'gyur te/
[\[47b.2\]]ha re/ dzas/ dza phyis/ e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs kyi mdos/ ha ra ya:/ ha ri la/ kun tu bod pa'i gcig tshig saM bu d+ng+hi'i ming can/ su/ tra swa s+ya gu Na:/ thung ngu'i yon tan no/ i ka thung ngu rnams saM bu d+d+hi la yon tan du 'gyur te/ he ha re/ su/ thung ngu dang eng la zhes pas/
[\[47b.3\]]su phyis/ he ha re/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gong rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra bas/ he ha rI/ he ra ya:/ ha ri la/ gnyis pa'i a ma dang / au/ a ma la snga ma'o zhes pas/ ha ri/ ha rI/ ha ri la/ shas sha phyis/ dang po dag la zhes pas/ ha rIs/
[\[47b.4\]]de yang shas kyi na skyes pa la'o/ /zhes pas sa srog med na/ ha rI na/ ha ri la gsum pa'i/ TA/ she Sho g+h+ya sa khi/ sa khim yin pa la lhag ma g+hi'o/ /na dI ming can dang rtags i ka so sor bsdu ba thung ngu rnams kyi nang nas sa khi ma yin pa ste/ sa khi'i sgra bor ba'i i ka thung ngu'i mtha'
[\[47b.5\]]rnams kyi pha rol du rnam dbye lhag ma ste/ dang po dang gnyis pa ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA nas brtsams te/ bdun pa'i sub kyi par pha rol du byung na rtags mtha'i dbyangs de la g+hi zhes ming rtags byed de dgos pa'i ched du 'o/ /A bo nA s+t+ri yaM/ bud med ma yin pa la Ang gi nA'o/ /
[\[47b.6\]]rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can gyi pha rol Ang ste/ TA ni bud med kyi rtags ma yin pa la nA ra 'gyur ro/ /ha ri NA/ gnyis tshig dang ming tshig la bya ba lhag po med pas/ ha ri b+h+yAM/ ha ri b+hi:/ ha ri la/ bzhi pa'i de/ g+ha rdzi ti/ g+hi'i pa 'gro ba las so/ /rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can de pha rol
[\[47b.7\]]rnam dbye nga 'gro ba'i ming rnams dang phrad na rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can de yon tan 'gyur bas/ ha re/ de/ da phyis/ e tsa'i a ya sogs kyi mdos/ ha ra ye/ ha ri b+h+yAM/ ha ri b+h+ya:/ ha ri la/ lda pa'i da si/ ha ri/ nga si/ bshad ma thag pa'i mdos/ ha ri/ a sa/ nga si
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]nga so:tsa/ nga si ngas dag gi yang ngo / /rtags mtha' eng so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na pha rol rnam dbye lnga ba'i nga si dang / drug pa'i ngas gnyis kyi da 'gro ba'i ming can phyis pa'i a de ni snga ma eng gi yi ge gang mthong ba de'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ ha re:/ ha ri b+h+yAM/
[\[48a.2\]]ha ri b+he:/ ha ri la/ drug pa'i/ ngas/ lnga ba dang 'dra bas/ ha re:/ ha ri/ os/ i ka gi zhes pas/ ha r+Y+Yo:/ ha ri/ A ma/ thung ngu sogs kyis nuT/ ra Sha dag la zhes pas/ na Na/ nA ma la 'os rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur/ ha rI NAM/ ha ri la/ di/ a ts+dzu g+he:/ g+hi'i a ta yang
[\[48a.3\]]ngo / /rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can gyi pha rol du rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi byung na/ rtags mtha' g+hi'i ming can de ata du 'gyur la/ yang gi sgras ngi yang au ru 'gyur te/ ha ra/ au/ e tsa la 'os/ ha rau/ ha r+Y+Y+Yau:/ ha ri Shu/ de bzhin du/ shrI pa ti/ a g+ni/ ra bi/ ka wi la sogs pa mang
[\[48a.4\]]po dag kyang ha ri dang bya ba 'dra'o/ /sa khi'i sgra la cung mi 'dra ste/ sa khi la rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su byin/ sa khi/ su/ a nang sau/ su la a na nga ngo / /sa khi'i sgra la kun du bod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i saM bu d+d+h+ri ma yin pa'i/ dpal gyi bdag po/ me/ nyi ma/ snyan ngag/ su la rtags
[\[48a.5\]]mtha' a nang du 'gyur te/ /sa kha na/ grogs po/ su/ a lo n+t+ra t+pU rba u ba d+hA/ a la mtha' las snga ma u pa ng+hA'o/ /rtags mtha' a la te gsal byed dam skabs 'gar dbyangs kyang rung ste mtha'i snga ma'i yi ge de ni u pa ng+hA'i ming can no/ /sarba nA ma s+thA ne tsA saM bu d+d+hau/ saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i mtha'
[\[48a.6\]]cad gnas pa'i ming can la yang ngo / /rtags mtha' na yi ge srog med kyi u pa d+hA'i a ca di ni bod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i su/ saM bu d+d+hi'i ming can ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can gyi rnam dbye rnams la ring por 'gyur ro/ /sa khAn su/ aM praM k+ta e kA la pra t+ya ya:/ rkyen al
[\[48a.7\]]gcig pa a pr-i k+ta'o/ /rkyen al gcig pa ste yi ge srog ldan dang gnyis gsum lta bu ma yin pa'i gsal byed srog med gcig po de la/ /pr-i k+ta'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed do/ /ha la d+yA b+h+yo dI r+g+hA ta su ti s+ya pr-i k+taM ha la/ ha la dI pa/ A pa/ ring po
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]rnams las su ti si a pr-i k+ta'i ha la'o/ /rtags mtha' la ha la te gsal byed srog med dang / /bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen dI pa dang A pa kye mtha' dang ring po rnams las/ su dang / ti sogs kyi ti dang / si rnams kyi u dang i phyis bas/ /ha la a tsa med pa'i yi ge gcig pa/ /
[\[48b.2\]]a pr-i k+ta'i ming can de dbyi bar bya ste/ su phyis/ sa khA na/ ming mtha'i nang byi'o zhes pa ma/ na phyis/ sa khA/ sa khyur saM bu d+d+ho/ sa khi las saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa la'o/ /sa khi'i skabs 'dir kun du bod pa'i don gyi gcig tshig saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i au Ta'i
[\[48b.3\]]bar gyi rnam dbye lnga po sngar thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes brda chad chad byas pa de rnams la skabs 'dir Ni ta ste/ Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i ched du ming 'dogs byed do/ /sa khi la/ dang po'i au dang dzas/ gnyis pa'i am dang au rnams sbyin/ a tsa ny+Ni ti/ ny+ra N+ra 'gro ba la
[\[48b.4\]]a ca'i'o/ /pha rol du nya Na 'gro ba'i ming can byung na rtags mtha'i a ca ste dbyangs de 'phel bar 'gyur bas skabs 'dir yang au sogs bzhi la Na yig 'gro ba'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byas pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin pas rtags mtha' 'phel ba/ e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs kyi mdos/
[\[48b.5\]]sa khA yau/ sa khA ya:/ sa khA yaM/ sa khA yau/ sa khi la/ kun du bod pa'i su sbyin saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa zhes pas skabs 'dir bshad ma thag pa'i bya mi 'jug /gong ha ri'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ he sa khe/ gnyis tshig dang ming tshig bshad ma thag ba'i rnam dbye dang po'i gnyis tshig dang
[\[48b.6\]]mang tshig ltar bsgrubs pas/ he sa khA yau/ he sa khA ya:gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas kyi skabs ha ri dang 'dra bas/ sa khIn/ gsum pa rnams la/ sa khyA/ sa khi b+hi:/ bzhi pa la/ sa khye/ sa khi b+h+yAM/ sa khi b+h+ya:/ sa khi la/ lnga ba'i/ nga si sbyin/ khya t+tA t+par s+ya/ /be ti
[\[48b.7\]]dag las pha rol gyi a'i'o/ /rtags mtha' khi ring po dang thung ngu ti ring po dang thung ngu rnams kyi pha rol rnam dbye lnga pa dang drug pa'i nga si dang ngas gnyis kyi da phyis pa'i a de ni u ru 'gyur te/ sa khyu:/ sa khi b+h+yaM/ si khi b+h+ya:/ sa khi la rnam dbyi drug pa rnams/ sa khyu:/ sa khyo:/ sa khI nA/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]sa khi la/ bdun pa'i nge byon/ au 'o/ /rtags na dI'i ming can dang g+hi'i ming can ma yin pa'i i thung dang u thung dag las pha rol gyi rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi ni au ru 'gyur te/ nga au/ i ka gi a ca la/ ya Na/ sa khyau/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ sa khyo:/
[\[49a.2\]]sa khi Shu/ pa ti:sa mA sa e wa/ pa ti tshig sdud med pa 'di bzhin no/ /pa ti'i sgra tshig sdud med pa ste/ pa ti zhes pa lta bu las khi'i sgra kho na'i bya ba rnams 'jug la/ chig sdud dang 'brel pa ni/ dper na/ pra dzA pa ti lta bu la ni g+hi'i ming can yin pas spyir btang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i
[\[49a.3\]]skabs dang cho ga thams cad 'dra'o/ /i thung mtha' can ka ti'i sgra la ni mang tshig kho na 'jug la gcig bdag po/ tshig dang gnyis tshig dag mi 'jug go/ /ba hu ga Na ba tu Di saM khyA/ mang du 'dren pa btu skye da bu'i bdag po/ Da ti rnams saM khyA'o/ /mang du 'dren pa ste mang tshig kho na thob pa
[\[49a.4\]]rnams dang / btu dang / Da ti'i rkyen rnams la saM khyA'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed do/ /Da ti tsa/ Da ti la yang ngo / /gong du bshad pa'i saM khyA'i ming can de rnams kyi nang nas kyang ka ti lta bu Da ti'i rkyen mtha' can de la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes slar yang ming 'dogs
[\[49a.5\]]byed do/ /pra t+ya ya s+ya lu ka shU lu pa:/ rkyen gyi lug shU lu pa rnams so/ /pha rol gyi rkyen dbyi ba de la lu ka 'am shU 'am lu pa zhes zer ro/ /dper na/ dzas/ lu ka zer ba'am/ dzas shU zer ba las/ dzas lu ba zer ba lta bu gang byung yang / /dzas de dbyi ba kho na'o/ /ka til/ rnam dbye
[\[49a.6\]]dang po'i mang tshig dzas dang / gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas gnyis byin/ Sha D+d+h+yo lu ka/ Sha Ta rnams las dbyi'o/ /Sha Ta'i ming can gyi rtags las pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas dang / gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas rnams dbyi ste/ la ti'i sgra Sha Ta'i  ji tsam/ ming can yin
[\[49a.7\]]pas/ dzas shas dag phyis/ ka ti/ ka ti zhes pa grub/ pra t+ya ya lo pe pra t+ya ya la k+Sha NaM/ rkyen phyis pa la rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do/ /pha rol rkyen byin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rkyen gyi bya ba thob bo zhes rtags mtha'i i er 'gyur ba'i spyir btang thob kyang / na lu ma tI ga s+ya/
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]phyis pa la a ng+ga'i mi yin no/ /zhes dmigs bsal lu ka'am sh+lu'am lu pa ces pa'i sgras phyis zin de la/ ang+ga te/ rtags de la bya ba med pas/ ka te zhes mi 'gyur bar ka ti nyid du gnas so/ /rnam dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig la/ ka ti b+hi:/ bzhi pa la/ ka ti b+h+ya:/ lnga ba la/
[\[49b.2\]]ka ti b+h+ya:/ drug pa la/ ka tI nI/ bdun pa la/ bod tshig la/ he ka ti/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ /i thung mtha' can tri'i sgra la yang grangs bgrang ba'i skabs su mang tshig kho na sbyor bas/ tri la/ rnam dbye dang po dang / gnyis pa/ gsum pa/ bzhi pa/ lnga ba rnams kyi mang tshig
[\[49b.3\]]rnams byin/ gong ha ri ltar bsgrubs pas/ tra ya:/ trI na/ ta b+hi:/ tri b+ha:/ tri la/ drug pa'i mang tshig A ma/ tri:tra ya:/ tri'i tra ya'o/ /rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma pha rol la tri zhes/ gsum/ pa'i sgra ni tra ya zhes par 'gyur te/ tri tra ya/ thung ngu zhes pas nuT/ nA ma la 'os
[\[49b.4\]]rtags mtha' 'i ring po/ ra Sha sogs kyi mdos/ na Na/ tra yA NAM/ bdun pa la/ tri Nu/ bod tshig/ he tra ya:/ i thung mtha' can dwi'i sgra la yang grangs bgrang ba'i skabs su gnyis tshig kho na sbyor ro/ /t+ya dA dI nA ma:/ t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a'o/ /t+ya da la sogs te d+ya da nas dwe'i bar
[\[49b.5\]]brgyad po rnams pha rol rnam dbye gang mthong yang rtags mtha' a ru 'gyur te/ dwi la/ rnam dbye dang po dang gnyis pa gnyis kyi gnyis tshig /au/ dwi'i i a mtshams sbyar bas/ dwau dwau/ rnam dbye gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa rnams la/ dwA b+h+yAM/ dwA b+h+yAM/ dwA b+h+yAM/ drug
[\[49b.6\]]pa dang / bdun pa la/ dwa yo:/ dwa yo:/ dwe'i sgra la ming dang nyer bsgyur/ gnyis/ thog ma can rnams la dwi'i i ar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam dbye yang su nas pa'i bar thams cad 'jug la de'i tshe cho ga yang spyir btang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /de yan gyis skyes
[\[49b.7\]]pa'i rtags i thung mtha' can gyi sde tshan spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas rags pa rnams bshad zin to// ! //da ni skyes ba'i rtags I rid mtha' can ni/ bA ta pra mI la/ ri dwags kr-iSh+Na/ su/ sa sa ju Sha'i mdo dang / khar sogs kyi mdos/ bA ta bra mIH/ bA ta bra mI la/ au dang
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]dzas i ka gi a tsa la ya Na 'os/ bA ta pra myau/ bA ta pra myaH/ rnamadabye gnyis pa la/ bA ta pra mIM/ bA ta pra myau/ gsum pa la/ bA ta bra myA/ bA ta pra mI+u b+h+rIH/ bA ta pra mI b+hiH/ bzhi pa la/ bA ta pra n+ye/ bA ta pra mI b+haM/ bA ta pra mI b+h+yaH/ lnga pa la/ bA ta pra myaH/ bA ta pra mI b+h+yAM/
[\[50a.2\]]bA ta pra mI b+h+yaH/ drug pa la/ bA ta pra myaH/ bA ta pra myoH/ bA ta pra myAM/ bdun pa la/ bA ta bra mI/ bA ta pra myoH/ bA ta pra mIShu/ bod tshig he pA ta pra mIH/ he pA ta bra myau/ he pA ta phra myaH/ he pA ta pra myaH/ rnams grub ste cho ga go bde 'o/ /de bzhin du/ de wa ya dzI/ a ti la k+ShI la sogs pa mang po
[\[50a.3\]]dag cho ga 'di kho na dang 'dra'o/ /I ring mtha' can byings gnas pa rnams bya ba cung mi 'dra ste/ su d+d+hi la/ su/ su d+d+hi:/ sud+d+hI/ su d+d+hIl/ au dang / dzas/ a tsi shU d+tA tu b+hA wAM y+wo ri ya ngu wa ngau / a tsa la sh+nu byings b+h+rU rnams kyi i u dag gi i ya u wa lha mchod pa/ shid tu phun tshogs pa/
[\[50a.4\]]dag go/ pha rol a tsa ste dbyangs gang mthong yang rkyen sh+nu dang byings kyi i ring thung u ring thung / blo bzang ngam legs pa'i blo/ b+h+ru'i sgra rnams kyi i rnams i ya dang / u rnams u wa ru 'gyur zhing / spyir btang i ka gi a Na 'o zhes pa thob kyang / na b+hU su d+d+hI dag la ma yin no/ /
[\[50a.5\]]b+hU dang su d+d+hI dag gi I dag a tsa pha rol la yaN ra 'gyur ba ma yin te/ i yar bsgyur bas/ su d+d+hi yau/ su d+d+hi yaH/ rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams la/ su d+d+hi yaM/ su ng+d+hi yau/ su d+d+hi yaH/ gsum pa la/ su d+d+hi yA/ su d+d+hI b+h+yAM/ sud+d+hI b+hiH lta bu ste/ rnam dbye lhag ma rnams la yang ha la thog
[\[50a.6\]]ma can rnams la bya ba med/ a tsa thog ma can rnams la i yar bsgyur ba kho na yin pas go bde'o/ /de bzhin du/ su shrI/ ya wa krI sogs kyang rig par bya'o/ /pra d+hI la/ su/ pra d+hIH/ pra d+hI la/ au/ dzas/ er ne kA tso saM yo ga pU rba s+ya/ I'i a tsa mang po'i snga ma brtsegs
[\[50a.7\]]pa ma yin pa'i 'o/ /rtags mtha' byings kyi I yig dang U yig gzugs mdzes sam dpal lam phun tshogs pa'am bde bar 'byor ba/ nas tshong / a tsa gcig pa ma yin pa ste/ blo rab/ dbyangs gnyis sam mang po yod pa sngon na yi ge mang po brtsegs pa med pa de ni a tsa pha rol la ya Nar 'gyur te/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]pra d+h+yau/ pra d+h+yaH/ gnyis pa la/ pra d+h+yaM/ pra d+hau/ prad+h+yaH/ gsum pa/ pra d+hA/ prad+h+yi b+hIH/ pra d+hI b+hi:/ rnam dbye lhag ma rnams kyang rigs 'gro'o/ /'di dang 'dra ba ni/ di d+hI/ su d+hi la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo / /a tsa mang po zhes pas dbyangs gcig pa la bshad ma thag pa'i bya ba mi
[\[50b.2\]]'jug ste/ dper na/ nI zhes pa a tsa gcig pa yin pas pra d+hI'i bya ba rnams mi 'jug/ rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi ma gtogs cho ga thams cad su d+d+hI'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ 'dzin/ blo bzang / nIH/ nIH/ ni yau/ ni yaH/ lta bu rigs 'gre/ bdun pa'i ngi la cung mi 'dra ste/ nI la ngi / de rI na d+yA m+nI b+h+ya:/
[\[50b.3\]]ngi'i A ma/ nadI A pa/ 'dren pa/ nI rnams las so/ /rnam dbye bdun pa'i de ni bud med kyi rtags/ na nI ming can rnams dang / A pa kyi mtha'i rnams dang / nI'i sgra rnams la A ma du 'gyur te/ ni yAM/ grA ma NI yang rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshig ngi ma gtogs pra b+hI'i skabs dang
[\[50b.4\]]'dra/ ngi la bshad ma thag pa nI dang 'dra ste/ grA ma NI:/ grAm N+yau/ grA maN+ya:sogs dang / bdun pa la/ grA ma Ni yAM/ sa khI dang pa tI ring po'i mtha' can yang rnam dbye lnga ba'i nga si dang / grong sde'i phra ma mkhan/ drug pa'i ngas ma gtogs rnam dbye gzhan thams cad la cho ga sra d+hI
[\[50b.5\]]dang 'dra zhing / nga si/ ngas gnyis las khI dang / ba tI la/ nga si dang ngas byin/ khi ti dag las pha rol gyi a'i lo a zhes pas nga se dang ngas kyi a u mtshams sbyar/ sa khU:/ ba t+yu:/ drug pa yang gzugs dang bsgrub tshul gnyis ka 'dra'o/ /lU nI'i sgra yang rnam dbye bdun pa'i
[\[50b.6\]]ngi la nI'i skabs dang 'dra zhing / ngi ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gzhan thams cad la pra d+hI'i skabs kyi cho ga dang 'dra'o/ /de ltar skyes pa'i rtags las I ring mtha' can spyir btang dmigs pas dang bcas par rags pa bshad zin to/ ! /da ni skyes/ zhing rnga bar byed/ pa'i rtags u thung gi bya ba
[\[50b.7\]]rnams bshad par bya ste/ shaM b+hu la/ su/ sa sa ju Shar zhes dang / kha ra dang zhes pa'i mdos/ shaM b+hu:/ lha chen po/ shaM b+hu la/ au/ dang po dag gi zhes pas/ shaM b+hU/ shaMb+hu la/ dzas/ dzas la 'ang ngos/ u o mtshams sbyar/ shaM b+ha wa:/ shaM b+hu la/ a ma/ a ma la snga ma 'os/
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]shaM b+huM/ /o gong dang 'dra bas/ /shaM b+hUM/ /shi b+hu la shas/ /dang po dag la zhes dang / de yang shas kyi na zhes bas/ shaM b+hU na/ shaM b+hu la/ DA bud med ma yin pa la/ Ang gi nA'o zhes bas/ /shaM b+hu nA/ /gnyis tshig dang shaM b+hu b+hUMH/ shaM b+hu la/ nge/ g+hi'i
[\[51a.2\]]pa 'gro ba las so zhes pas u o mtshams sbyar/ shaM b+ha we/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ shaM b+hu b+h+yAM/ shaM b+hu b+h+yaH/ shaM b+hu la/ dasi/ g+hi'i nga 'gro ba zhes dang / dasi/ ngas dag gi zhes pa'i mdos/ /shaM b+hoH/ shaM b+hu b+h+yAM/ shaM b+hu la/ ngas byin/ nga si'i skabs dang
[\[51a.3\]]'dra bas/ shaM b+hoH/ shaM b+hA+oH/ shaM b+hU nUM/ shaM b+hu la/ ngi/ g+hi'i a ta yang ngos/ shaM b+hau/ shaM b+h+woMH/ shaM b+hu Shu/ bo da tshig /he shaM b+ho/ he shaM b+hU/ he shaM b+ha waHrnams grub ste/ spyir btang u thung mtha' can shaM b+hu'i sgra dang i thung mtha' can ha ri'i skabs rnams dbyangs
[\[51a.4\]]mi 'dra ba'i 'gyur khyad phran bu me gtogs cho ga khyad par med do/ /bish+shu/ bA yu/ bA nu la sogs te skyes pa'i rtags spyir btang u thung mtha' can thams cad 'di dang 'dra'o/ /u thung mtha' can gyi nang tshan/ /kroSh+Tu'i cho ga spyir btang dang cung mi 'dra ste/ kroSh+Tul/ su/ tr-i dzA ta kroSh+TuH/
[\[51a.5\]]kroSh+Tu'i tri ca bzhin no/ /kroSh+Tu zhes pa'i sgra ni saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i khyab 'jug/ rlung / nyi ma/ rnam dbye dang po'i su nas/ gnyis ba'i oM Ta'i bar thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes brda chad byas pa/ /de rnams pha rol tu byung na kr-ita rkyen tr-i tsa'i mtha' can ce sbyang / dang bya ba 'dra bas rtags
[\[51a.6\]]mtha'i u de r-ir 'gyur te/ kroSh+T-I/ su/ r-i du shan slur daM sho\u0f85ne ha sAM tsa/ r-ita u sha nas bu ra daM shas an has rnams kyi yang ngo / /rtags r-i ta mtha' rnams dang u sha nas/ pu ra daM shas/ a ne has rnams kyi rtags mtha' ni saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i su la a nang du 'gyur te/ na'i
[\[51a.7\]]a dang 'gro ba yin pas phyis/ saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i zhes pa'i mdos u pad+hA ring por song / hal dwi A pa zhes bas su phyis/ ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os na phyis pas/ kroSh+TA/ kroSh+TUl/ dang po'i au dang dzas/ gnyis pa'i aM dang auT rnams byin/ r-i to ngi sarbanA ma l+thA na yoH/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]r-ita kyi di thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dag las so/ /rtags r-ita mtha' can las so/ /rtags r-ita mtha' can las rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams dang / rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi pha rol la rtags mtha' yon tan du 'gyur te/ r-i ar du bsgyur/ ab+h+r-i n+t+r-i tsa swa sr-in Sh-Ine Sh+T-i twa Sh+T+r-i k+Sha tr-i ho tr-i bo tr-i bra sha s+t+r-I NAM/ a pa
[\[51b.2\]]tr-in tr-i tsa swa sri nab+h+r-i neSh+TA twaSh+T-i k+Sha tr-i hotraM potr-i bra shas+t+r-i rnams kyi'o/ /rtags ab dang kr-ita kyi rkyen tr-in dang tr-i ca gnyis byin pa'i mtha' dang / rtags swa sri la sogs pa dgu bo ni saM bud+d+haM ma yin pa'i rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la u pad+hA ring por 'gyur te/ kroSh+TA rau/
[\[51b.3\]]kroSh+TA raH/ kroSh+TA raM/ kroSh+TA rau/ shas la shaM b+hu dang 'dra bas/ kroSh+Tu la gsum pa'i TA/ bi b+hA ShA tr-i tI yA di Sh+wa tsi/ gsum pa sogs rnams la a tsa la 'dam ka'o/ /kroSh+Tu'i sgra la pha rol du rnam dbye gsum pa'i DA nas/ bdun pa'i os kyi rab a tsa
[\[51b.4\]]thog ma can rnams gang byung yang spyir btang u thud mtha' can shaM b+hu'i skabs kyi bya ba dang / bshad ma thag pa bzhin rtags mtha' r-ir 'gyur ba'i phyogs gnyis ka thab pas 'dam ka can du bya ste/ kroSh+TA/ kroSh+Tu nA/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/ kroSh+TA b+hiH/ bzhi pa la/ kroSh+Tu kroSh+Ta we/ kroSh+Tu b+h+raM/
[\[51b.5\]]kroSh+Tu b+h+yaH/ kroSh+Tu la lnga pa'i/ nga si/ shaM b+hu ltar bsgrubs pas/ kroSh+ToH/ r-ir 'gyur ba'i phyogs la/ R-i ta ur/ r-i ya las ur 'o/ /rtags r-i ta mtha' can la pha rol rnam dbye lnga ba'i nga si dang / drug pa'i ngas dag gi a dang rtags mtha'i r-i gnyis 'dus par ur du 'gyur
[\[51b.6\]]te/ /kroSh+Ta/ u rA swa/ zhes pa la/ rA t+sa s+ya/ ra las sa'i 'o/ /ra yig srog med las pha rol gyis yig srog med ni dbyi bar bya ste/ sa phyis/ ra rnam bcad byas pas/ kroSh+TuH/ b+h+yAm b+has la/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/ kroSh+Tu b+h+yaH/ drug pa'i ngas yang bya ba lnga ba'i ngasi dang 'dra bas/
[\[51b.7\]]kroSh+ToH/ kroSh+TuH/ os la/ kroSh+To+uH/ kroSh+TA+oH/ kroSh+Tu la drug pa'i Am shaM b+hu ltar bsgribs bas/ /kroSh+TU nAM/ lugs gcig la/ nu ma tsi ra tr-i dz+wad+b+hA be b+h+yo nu Ta/ ra a tsa la nu m-i tra tsa bzhin 'gyur ba rnams kyi nu Ta'o/ /rtags mtha' ra yig a tsa dang ldan pa nu ma A ga ma thob pa
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]rnams dang kroSh+Tu tr-i tsa bzhin du 'gyur ba'i pha rol rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tsheg A ma la nu Ta A ga ma nges bar 'jug ste/ nu Ta A ga ma byin pas/ kroSh+T+r-I NAM/ rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi la/ kroSh+Ta ri/ kroSh+Tau/ os la/ kroSh+T+roH/ kroSh+T+roH/ su pa la/ kroSh+Tu Shu/ bod tshig /
[\[52a.2\]]he kroSh+To/ he kroSh+TA rau/ he kroSh+TA raH/ gnyis pa'i shas la yang na kroSh+T+rAM na zhes pa'ang 'byung ngo / /de yan gyis skyes pa'i rtags kyi u thung mtha' can spyir btang bar de migs bsal rnams bshad zin to/ ! /da ni skyes pa'i rtags las U ring mtha'i can gyi bya ba rnams ston par byed de/ hU hU
[\[52a.3\]]zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod du bya ste/ dbyangs mi 'dra ba'i 'gyur khyad phran bu ma gtogs pA ta pra mI dang 'dra bas/ hU hUl/ rnam dbyed dang po rnams byin/ gong ltar gyi cho gas bsgrubs bas/ hU hUH/ hU hA+au/ hU haH/ gnyis pa la/ hU hwaM/ hU hwaM/ hU h+yaH gsum pa la/ hU hA/ hU
[\[52a.4\]]hU b+h+yAM/ hU hU b+hiH/ lta bu ste a ca thog ma can rnams la/ u war 'gyur/ ha la thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med bas go bde'o/ /de ba nin du/ a ti tsa mU la sogs pa spyir btang dris U ring skyes pa'i rtags thams cad cho ga 'di dang 'dra'o/ /U ring mtha' can kha la pU la su
[\[52a.5\]]byin/ kha la pUH/ kha la pU la/ au/ oHsu pi/ U'i su ba la'o/ /byings kyi U rnam dbye dang po'i su nas/ bdun pa'i mang tshig gi pa'i bar gyi a tsa  shin tu g.yo ba/ thog ma can gang byung yang U de wa kho nar 'gyur te/ de yang mtha' U de'i sngon du yi ge gnyis sam gsum sogs
[\[52a.6\]]yod pa yi ge brtsegs pa med pa zhig dgos so/ /kha la bA+au/ kha la braH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ kha la p+waM/ kha la p+wau/ kha la p+waH/ gsumapa rnams la/ kha la pA/ kha la pU b+hAM/ kha la pU b+hiH/ sogs te la sgrub tshul rigs 'gre'o/ /su lU la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /swa b+h+ya
[\[52a.7\]]zhes pa/ su d+d+hi'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ su la swa b+hUH/ rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can rnams la/ u war 'gyur bas/ swa b+hu wau/ swa b+hu waH/ gnyis pa la/ swa b+hu waM/ swa b+hu wau/ swa b+hu waH/ gsum pa la/ swa b+hu wA/ swab+hu b+h+yAM/ legs gcod/ swa b+hU b+hiH/ sogs so/ /ka Ta bdag yod/
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]sU/ swa yaM b+hU/ sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /b+hU su d+hA+e dag lam yin no/ /ya Nar 'gyur ba ma yin kyang dmigs bsal bar+ShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra ni b+hU'i mtha' yin kyang ya Nar 'gyur te/ su la/ bar+ShA b+huH/ bar+ShA b+hUH/ bar+ShA b+hU la au/ bar+ShA b+hA sh+tsa/ bar+ShA b+hU'i 'ang ngo / /bar+ShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra 'di su sogs
[\[52b.2\]]kyi rnam dbye zhes pas/ /a tsa thog ma can rnams la ya nar 'gyur te/ /U war bsgyur bas/ /bar+ShA b+h+wau/ bar+ShA b+hAHsogs/ lo dus su 'byung ba/ kha la pU'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /'grel par/ dr-ig+g+hU/ kA rA b+hU/ pun r+b+hU rnams kyang bar+ShA b+hU dang 'dra'o zhes byung bas/ 'di rnams la yang rnam dbye
[\[52b.3\]]byin pa'i bya ba thams cad bar+ShA b+hU dang 'dra bas bshad mkhrag pa'i tshogs bsgrub pa'o/ /de ltar U ring mtha' can las skyes ba'i rtags kyi bya ba rnams bshad zin to/ ! /da ni skyes ba'i byed pa 'byung ba/ slar yang 'byung ba/ rtags ri yig mtha' can gyi cho ga rnams ston par bya ste/ b+hA tr-i la/
[\[52b.4\]]su/ r-ita u sha nas/ bu ru da shas a ne has rnams kyi yang ngo / /zhes pas/ r-i a nang / saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i zhes pas u pa d+hA ring po/ ha la dI A pa ces pas su phyis/ ming mtha'i na dbye 'os/ na phyis pas/ b+hA tA/ b+hA tr-i la dang po'i au dang jas/ gnyis pa'i a 'dzin byed/
[\[52b.5\]]dang au rnams byin/ r-i ta kyi de thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dag las so/ /zhes bas/ r-i a ra du bsgyur/ a ba tr-i na tr-i tsha sogs kyi mdos/ u pab+hU red por drang / b+hA tA rau/ b+hA tA raH/ b+hA tA raM/ b+hA tA rau/ b+hA tr-i la shas/ dang po dag la snga ma 'dra ba'o dang / de yang shas kyin
[\[52b.6\]]skyes pa la 'os/ b+hA tr-In/ gsum pa/ b+hA trA/ b+hA tri b+h+yAM/ b+hA tr-i b+hiH/ bzhi pa la/ b+hA tre/ b+hA tr-i b+h+yAM/ b+hA tr-i b+h+yaH/ b+hA tr-i/ nga se/ r-i ta las ur 'o zhes dang / ra las sa'i'o zhes pas/ b+hA tuH/ b+hA tr-i b+h+yA/ b+hU tr-i b+h+yaH/ drug pa'i gcig tshig kyang nga si dang 'dra bas/ b+hA tuH/ o sa la/
[\[52b.7\]]b+hA troH/ A ma la/ ra a tsa sogs kyis nuT/ nA ma la 'os rtags mtha' ring po/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ r-ibar+NAn+na s+yaN twaM bAMts+ya/ r-i las na'i Nar brjod do/ /ra Sha gnyis sum zad dbyangs r-i'i pha rol gyen yang Nar 'gyur te/ b+hA tr-I NAM/ bdun pa'i ri la r-ita kyi di thams cad gnas pa
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]zhes pas yon tan/ b+hA ta ri/ b+hA troH/ b+hA tri rtsa/ kun tu bod pa'i su la/ r-i ta kyi de thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes pas yon tan/ he r+b+hA taH/ gnyis tsheg dang mang tshig dang po'i skabs dang 'dra/ he b+hA tA rau/ he b+hA tA raH/ de bzhin du/ na b+h+r-i/ ho tr-i/ po tr-i sogs mang
[\[53a.2\]]po zhig 'di dang 'dra'o/ /pi tri la/ su/ gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/ pi dA/ pi tra'i skabs 'dir gzhan cho ga thams cad snga ma b+hA tr-i'i skabs dang 'dra la/ dang po'i au nas gnyis pa'i au'i bar rnams la u pa b+hA reng bor mi 'gyur te/ b+hA tr-i zhes ba rkyen  tsha bo/ sbyin sreg sbyin sreg tr-i tsa tr-i
[\[53a.3\]]mtha' can yin la/ pho/ pi tr-i zhes pa tr-i tsa mtha' can ma yin pas so/ /pi ta rau/ pi taraH lta bu'o/ /gzhan rnams rigs 'gre'o/ dzA mA tri/ b+hA tr-i sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ nr-i ca/ nr-i'i yang na'o/ /nr-i zhes pa'i rtags la rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma ma gtogs pi tr-i'i skabs dang
[\[53a.4\]]'dra/ A ma la rtags mtha' ring por 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ ran-I NAM bam/ yang na nr-i NAM lta bu'o/ /de rnams kyis mag pa /spun zla/ skyes pa'i rtags la r-i yig mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad mi zin to/ ! /skabs 'dir r-I ta dang l-i ta dang e ta rnams kyi mtha' can gyi
[\[53a.5\]]rtags med bar grags so/ ! /o yig mtha' las go'i sgra la dper brjod du bya ste/ go to Ni ta/ go las Ni ta'o/ /o mtha' can mgo lta bu'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye dang po nas gnyis pa'i auTa'i bar sngar thams cad gnas pa'i ming zhes brda chad byas pa de rnams skabs 'dir Na 'gro ba'i
[\[53a.6\]]ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /go la/ su au jas rnams/ nya? Na 'gro ba la a tsa'i 'o zhes pa'i mdos rtags mtha' 'phel ba/ gauH/ gA wau/ gA waH/ gnyis pa'i a ma dang shas la/ o to \u0f85m+sha so/ /o ta las a ma shas dag la'o/ /rtags o yig mtha' can las
[\[53a.7\]]rnam dbye gnyis pa'i a ma shas pha rol la rtags mtha'i o dang pa pha rol gyi a 'dus pas A ru 'gyur te/ a ma la/ gAM/ au la/ gA wau/ shas la/ gAH/ gsum pa rnams la/ ga wA/ go b+h+yAM/ go b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ ga we/ go b+h+yAM/ go b+h+yaH/ lnga ba rnams la/ goH/ go b+h+yAM
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]go b+h+yaH/ drug pa rnams la/ goH/ ga wAMH/ ga wAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ ga wi/ ga woH/ go Shu/ bod tshig /he gauH/ he gA wau/ he gA waH/ de bzhin du/ su d+yo sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /de ltar o mtha' can rnams bshad zin to/ ! /de ni e yig mtha' can las rai'i sgra la
[\[53b.2\]]dper brjod na/ Rail su/ rA yo ha li/ rai'i ha la la'o/ /ai yig mtha' can rai sgra lta bu'i pha rol du rnam dbye ha la thog ma can gang byung yang rtags mtha'i ai de A ru 'gyur ro/ /nyi ga /rAH/ rA yau/ rA yaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ rA yaM/ rA yau/ rA yaH/ gsum pa rnams la/ gser ram nor/
[\[53b.3\]]rA yA/ rA b+h+yAM/ rA b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ rA ye/ rA b+h+yAM/ rA b+h+yaH/ lnga ba rnams la/ rA yaH/ rA b+h+yA/ rA b+h+yaH/ drug pa rnams la/ rA yaH/ rA yoH/ rA yAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ rA yi/ rA yoH/ rA su/ bod tshig la/ he rAH/ he rA yau/ ha rA yaH/ au yig mtha' can glau zhes pa'i
[\[53b.4\]]sgra la dper brjod bya ste/ a tsa thog ma can rnams la au A war 'gyur/ hal thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med pas/ rnam dbye dang po rnams la/ glauH/ glA wau/ glA waH/ gnyis pa la/ glA wA/ glau b+h+yAM/ glA+au b+h+yAMH/ sogs so/ /naul
[\[53b.5\]]sogs ba rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tA da than+ta bu rling+gA sA mA b+hAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las a tsa'i mtha' can skyes pa'i rtags rnams rdzogs so/ /de rnams kyis brda spyod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga su/
[\[53b.6\]]dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las skyes pa'i rtags a tsa mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags ba rnams re zhig rdzogs so/ ! /da ni bud med kyi rtags las a tsa mtha' can gyi cho ga rnams
[\[53b.7\]]bshad par bya ste/ ramA la/ rtsa bam/ su/ ha la dI ba A pa ring po sogs kyis su phyis/ ra mA/ ra mA la/ au/ au pa A paH/ au'i A pa las so/ /bud med kyi rtags A pa kyi rtags A pa kyi mtha' can las rnam dbye dang po'i gnyis tshig au dang / gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig au gnyis ni shI
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]ru 'gyur te/ /sha 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis mtshams sbyar bas/ /ra me/ ra mA la dzas dang po dag la zhes pas/ ra mAH/ ra mA la/ kun tu bod pa'i su/ saM bu d+d+hau laM yang ngo / /A pa mtha' can ni saM bu d+d+hi pha rol la er 'gyur te/ rtags mtha' i/ thung
[\[54a.2\]]du eng sogs kyis saM bud+d+hi phyis pas/ he ra me/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gong dang 'dra ste/ he ra me/ he ra mAH/ ra mA la/ aM/ am la snga ma 'os/ ra mAM/ au la/ ra me/ shas la dang po dag gi zhes pas/ ra mAH/ ra mA la gsum pa'i TA/ A ri tsA baH/ A pa kyi Ang la
[\[54a.3\]]'ang ngo / /rtags A pa mtha' can ni Ang ste rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA dang yang gi sgras drug pa dang bdun pa'i os rnams pha rol la rtags mtha' e ru 'gyur te/ rtags mtha' e mtshams sbyar/ ra ma yA/ b+h+yAM b+hi sa la/ ra mA b+h+yAM/ ra mA b+hiH/ ra mA la/ de/ yA TA paH/ A ba las yA Ta 'o/ /
[\[54a.4\]]rtags A ba kyi mtha' las pha rol tu nga 'gro ba'i ming can gyi rnam dbye rnams byung na yang TA A ga ma 'jug go/ /ra mA yA/ e/ A Ta sh+tsa/ A Ta las 'ang ngo / /yA Ta lta bu A mtha' can gyi A ga ma byung ba de pha rol a tsa thog ma can dang phrad na 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ra mA ye/ ra mA ya/ ra mA b+h+yAM/
[\[54a.5\]]ra mA b+h+yaH/ lnga pa'i/ nga si/ yA Ta byin gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ ra mA yAH/ ra mA b+h+yAM/ ra mA b+h+yaH/ drug pa la/ ra mA yAH/ ra ma yoH/ ra mA NAM/ bdun pa'i/ di yA Ta/ ngi'i A ma  na dI A pa nI rnams las sos/ ngi A ma/ ra mA yAM/ os/ ra ma yoH/ ra mA su/ de bzhin du/ gAng+gA/
[\[54a.6\]]du rgya/ am+di kA sogs mang po 'di dang 'dra'o/ /mo rtags sarbA'i sgra la/ rnam dbye dang po rnams dang / bod tshig rnams dang / gnyis pa rnams bshad ma thag par mA dang 'dra/ sarbA/ sarbe/ sarbAH/ he sa rbe/ he sa rbaM/ he sa rbAH/ sarbAM/ sarbe/ sarbAH/ gsum pa yang 'dra bas/
[\[54a.7\]]bgrod dka' ma/ /na gar ko Ta'i lha mo/ sarba yA/ sarbA b+h+yaM/ sarbA b+hiH/ sarbA la/ nge / sarba nA m+naH/ s+yA b+h+yA swa sh+tsa/ sarba nA ma las s+yA Ta ste thung du'ang ngo / /sarba'i ming can A pa mtha' rnams las pha rol du rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams byung na s+yAT A ga ma 'jug cing rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur ro/ /sarba
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]s+yai/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa la/ sarbA b+h+yAM/ sarbA b+h+yAM/ nga sil/ sarbA s+yAH/ sarbA b+h+yA/ sarbA b+h+yaH/ drug pa la/ sarba s+yAH/ sarba yoH/ sarbA sAM/ bdun pa la/ /sarba s+yAM/ sarba yoH/ sarbA su/ de bzhin du/ bi shwA la sogs pa rnams kyang rigs 'gre'o/ /u d+ha ra pU nA zhes pa la rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams
[\[54b.2\]]ma gtogs sarbA dang 'dra/ nga 'gro ba rnams la ngamA'i skabs dang sarbA skabs gnyis kar gyi bya ba 'jug pas 'dam ka can no/ /u d+ta ra pU rbA/ ut+ta ra pU rba/ ut+ta ra pU rbAH/ he u t+ta ra pU rbe/ sna tshogs ma/ he u tA ra pU tre/ he u t+ta ra pU rbaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ u t+ta ra pU rbAM/ u t+ta ra
[\[54b.3\]]pU rbe/ u t+ta ra pu rbAH/ gsum pa rnams la/ ut+ta ra pU rba yA/ ut+ta ra pU rbA b+h+yAM/ ut+ta ra pU rbA la/ de/ bib+hA ShI di ka sa mA se ba hu brI hau/ 'bru mang po'i tshig sdud la phyogs la 'dam ka'o/ /phyogs kyi sgra 'bru mang po'i tshig sdud byas pa A pa mtha' can ni rnam dbye nga 'gro
[\[54b.4\]]ba'i ming can rnams la sarbA'i skabs ltar s+yAT A ga ma byin/ rtags mtha' thung dur byed pa dang / ra mA'i skabs ltar lAT ster ba 'dam ka can no/ /ut+ta ra phU rba s+yai/ ut+ta ra pU rbA b+h+yAM/ ut+ta ra pU rbA b+h+yaH/ sogs so/ bib+hA ShA dwi tI yA tr-i t-I yA b+h+yAM/ dwi tI yA tr-i tI yA dag las
[\[54b.5\]]'dam ka'o/ /dwi trI yA dang tr-i tI yA gnyis la'ang rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams la yA Ta dang s+yA Ta 'dam ka can te/ dper na/ bzhi pa'i de la/ dwi tI yA yai/ dwi tI yA yai/ tr-i tI ya s+yai/ tr-i tI ya s+yai/ lta bu'o/ /am+bA zhes pa yang saM bu d+b+hi ma gtogs rnam dbye thams cad ra m+nga'i skabs dang 'dra/
[\[54b.6\]]sa bud+d+hi la cung mi 'dra ste/ am+bA la/ saM bu d+d+hi/ am+bA r+tha na d+yoHhra swaH/ a m+bA'i don na dI rnams kyi thung ngu'o/ /am+bA'i sgra dang na dI'i ming can rnams saM bud+d+hi pha rol la rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur te/ he am+ba/ ak+kA dang / al+lA yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ 'grel par/ am+bA'i don can yin
[\[54b.7\]]gyang de phan gyi rkyen Da dang / la deng / ka gnas pa de la mo rtags su bsgrub pa'i rkyen TA pa byin pa lta bu la saM bud+d+hi la yang thung ngur mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bshad pas/ dper na/ am+bADAl/ am+bA n+b+hi byin thung ngur nor rgyun ma/ 'bigs khyed lha mo/ mi 'gyur/ ra mA dang 'dra bas/ he a m+bA De/ de
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]bzhin du/ he am+bA le/ he am+bI ge /lta bu'o/ /ja rA zhes ba'i sgra la rnam dbye ha la thog ma can la ra m+bA'i skabs dang 'dra/ a tsa thog ma can rnams la ja rA nyid dza ras zhes par 'gyur ba dang ra mA'i skabs gnyis 'dam ka can du bya ste/ rnam dbye dang po rnams la
[\[55a.2\]]dza rA/ dza ra sau/ dza ra saH/ bod tshig la/ he dza re/ he dza ra sau/ rgan mo/ he dza rasaH/ gnyis pa la/ dza ra saM/ dza ra sau/ dza ra saH/ gsum pa la/ dza ra sA/ dza rA b+h+yAM/ dza rA b+hiH/ bzhi pa la/ dza ra se/ dza rA b+h+yAM/ dza rA b+h+yaH/ lnga ba la/ dza ra saH/ dza rA b+h+yAM/ dza rA b+h+yaH/ drug pa
[\[55a.3\]]la/ dza ra saH/ dza ra soH/ dza ra sAM/ bdun pa la/ dza ra si/ dza ra soH/ dza rA su/ 'di rnams dza ra sa su 'gyur ba'i phyogs yin la/ ra mA dang 'dra ba'i skabs kyi dper brjod go bde bsam bkod do/ /nA si kA zhes pa rnams dbye dang po rnams dang / kun tu bod pa'i don can rnams dang /
[\[55a.4\]]rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams ramA'i skabs dang 'dra/ shas nas brtsams te/ shas la sogs pa rnams la pad da tan bzhes pa'i/ mdos/ nA si kA nas zhes par 'gyur bas/ shas la/ na saH/ gsum pa rnams la/ na sA/ nob+h+yAM/ nob+haMH/
[\[55a.5\]]bzhi pa la/ na se/ no b+h+yA/ no b+h+yaH/ lnga ba la/ nas/ no b+h+yAM/ nob+h+yaH/ drug pa la/ nasaH/ na soH/ na sAM/ bdun pa la/ na si/ na soH/ nasU/ ni shA/ zhes pa'ang su nas shas kyi bar mA dang 'dra/ shas nas bzung ste/ shas la sogs pa rnams la zhes pa'i/ mdos/
[\[55a.6\]]ni shA/ ni shA ru 'gyur/ shas la/ ni shaH/ TA la/ ni shA/ ni shal/ b+h+yAM/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra snga sri dza mri dza ya dza rA dza b+h+ra dza cha shAM Sha/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra snga sr-i dza mr-i dza ya dza rA dza b+h+rA dza tsha sha rnams kyi Sha 'o/ /bra sh+tsa sogs bdun dang / tsha dang sha srog med ming ma bra 'a yin pa de dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi
[\[55a.7\]]ge gang mthong yang Sha ru 'gyur ro/ /b+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams so zhes pas Sha Da drangs/ niD+b+h+yAM/ ni D+b+hiH/ bzhi pa la/ ni she/ ni D+b+h+yAM/ ni D+b+h+yaH/ lnga pa la/ ni shaH/ ni D+b+h+yAM/ niD+b+h+yaH/ drug pa la/ ni shaH/ ni shoH/ ni sh+daM bdun pa'i ngi dang os la/ ni shi/ ni shoH/ ni sha/
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]su/ sha Sha/ Sha Da/ Da las sa la b+huTa'o/ /zhes pas/ b+hu Ta A ga ma/ khar la ca ra'o zhes pas/ b+ha ta/ Da Ta/ ni ta/ mAMs pr-i ta nA rnams kyang rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la ra mA dang 'dra/ shas nas bzung 'dam ka can te/ 'grel par mAM sa pr-i ta nA
[\[55b.2\]]sA nu rnams kyi mAMs pr-i ta snu rnams su yang na'o zhes byung bas/ rnam dbye shas sogs pa rol la/ mA sa/ ne/ mAMs/ pr-i ta nI/ ni/ pr-i ta/ sA nu ni/ snu rnams su yar na 'gyur ro/ /shas la/ mAM saH/ TA la/ mAM sA/ b+h+yAM b+his gnyis la/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha'
[\[55b.3\]]dbyi'o zhes pas sa phyis/ mAM b+h+yAM/ mAM b+hiH/ sogs so/ de bzhin du/ pr-i taH/ pr-i tA/ pr-i b+h+yIH/ sogs so/ snu ni 'chad 'gyur b+he nu dang 'dra'o/ /bi shwa pA dang / go pA sogs ra mA dang 'dra'o/ /de rnams kyis bud med du brjod pa A ring mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams
[\[55b.4\]]bstan zin to/ ! /da ni mo rtags i thung mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/ ma ti/ su/ ma tiH/ ma ti pa/ au/ dang po dag gi zhes pas/ ma tI/ ma ti dzas/ sna tshogs 'thung ma/ ba lang skyong ma/ dzas la'ang ngos/ ma ta ya/ ma ti/ a ma/ aM la snga ma zhes pas/ ma tiM/ au la/
[\[55b.5\]]ma tI/ ma ti/ shas dang po dag gi mdos/ matIH/ ma ti/ TA/ 'dir bud med blo gros kyi rtags yin pas TA nar mi 'gyur/ ma t+yA/ ma ti b+h+yAM/ ma ti b+hiH/ ma ti la/ de/ ngi ti hra swa sh+tsa/ da 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na'o/ /bud med du brjod pa'i i u thung ngu rnams dang /
[\[55b.6\]]i ya u wa thob ba'i I ring U ring rnams kyang rnam dbye nga 'gro ba rnams pha rol pa na dI'i ming can gyi cho ga rnams yang na bar bya ste/ A na d+yaH/ na dI las A Ta'o/ /bud med kyi rtags na dI'i ming can las rnam dbye nga 'gro pa rnams la A Ta A ga ma ster ro/ /ma ti la yang na bar byas bas/
[\[55b.7\]]ma t+yai/ ma ta ye/ ma ti b+h+yAM/ ma ti b+h+yaH/ lnga ba'i nga si la 'dam ka/ mat+yAH/ ma teH/ ma ti b+h+yAM/ ma ti b+h+yaH/ drug pa la'ang / ma t+yAH/ ma teH/ ma d+yoH/ ma tI nAM/ ngi la/ mat+yAM/ ma tau/ ma t+yoH/ ma ti Shu/ bod tshig /he ma te/ he ma tI/ he ma ta yaH/ shru ti/ thos pa/ smr-i te/ dran pa/
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]pud+d+hi rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /tri la dzas/ tri tsha tu roHs+t+ri yaM ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i/ tri tsa tur dag gi bud med la ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i dag go/ /gsum gyi skad dod tri dang / bzhi'i skad dod tsa tur gnyis ni mo rtags kyi skabs rnam dbye pha rol la tri ni/ ti sr-i dang / tsa tur ni/ tsa ta sr-i zhes
[\[56a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/ blo/ ti sr-i/ dzas/ tsa ta sr-i/ dzas/ a tsir r-i taH/ r-i ta kyi a tsa la ra'o/ /ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i zhes r-i ta mtha' 'gyur pa'i r-i ta de rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can rnams lar srog med du 'gyur ro/ /ti sraH/ tsa ta sraH/ sha sa la/ ti sraH/ tsa ta sraH/ ti sr-i b+h-iH/ tsa ta sr-i b+hiH/ bzhi pa lnga pa
[\[56a.3\]]gnyis la/ ti sri b+h+yaH/ tsa ta sr-i b+h+yaH/ drug pa'i A ma la/ ra a tsa zhes pa'i mdos/ nuT/ na ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i/ ti sr-i tsa ta sr-i dag lam yin no/ /spyir btang nAM la rtags mtha' ring po thob kyang dmigs bsal ti sr-i dang / tsa ta sr-i dag nAM pha rol la ring por 'gyur pa ma yin te/ ti sr-i NAM/ tsa ta
[\[56a.4\]]sr-i NAM/ bdun pa la/ ti sr-i Shu/ tsa ta sr-i Shu/ bod tshig la/ he ti sraH/ he tsa ta sraH/ pri ya tri zhes pa lta bu ming thog ma can la tri/ tri sr-i zhes par mi 'gyur la/ rnam dbye yang mang tshig tu ma zad thams cad 'jug ste/ cho ga yang skyes pa'i rtags ha ri'i skabs su bshad pa dang
[\[56a.5\]]'dra la/ TA dang shas nang mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du/ pri ya tsa tur zhesapa yang / dga' ba gsum/ tsa ta srir mi 'gyur te/ dper brjod rgyas pa 'og tu 'byung ngo / yang skabs 'gar ming dang po can la yang / ti sr-i/ tsa ta sr-i/ zhes par 'gyur pa'ang srid do/ /zhes 'grel par
[\[56a.6\]]bshad do/ /dwi'i sgra la/ tad sogs kyi rnam dbye la a/ dga' ba bzhi/ a la bud med du brjod pa'i TA pa sbyar bas dwA zhes grub/ de la rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis tshig rnams byin/ ramA ltar bsgrubs pas/ au gnyis la/ dwe/ b+h+yAM gsum la/ dwA b+h+yAM/ o sa gnyis la/ dwa yoH/ de yan
[\[56a.7\]]gyis bud med kyi rtags i thung mtha' can rnams kyi bya ba bshad zin to/ ! /da ni mo rtags I ring gi cho ga rnams ston par bya ste/ gau rIl/ su/ hal bI zhes par su phyis/ gau rI/ au dang / dza sa la/ gau r+Y+Yau/ gaur+Y+YaH/ yU s+b+h+yA khyau na dAM/ I U bud med brjod pa dag na dI'o/ I ring dang
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]U ring bud med du brjod pa rnams na dwi'i ming can zhes bya'o/ /gau rI la/ saM bu d+d+hi su/ am+bA'i don rnams kyi thung ngu'o zhes pas rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur/ eng thung ngu / zhes bas saM bu d+d+hi phyis/ he gau ri/ he gaur+Y+YaH/ gau rI la/ am/ aM la snga ma 'os/ gau rIM/ au la/ gaur+Y+Yau/ shas la/ /
[\[56b.2\]]dang po dag gi zhes pas/ gaurIH/ gsum pa rnams dkar mo/ la/ gaur+YA/ gaurIb+h+yAM/ gau rI b+hiH/ bzhi pa'i de la/ na dI las a+wa Ta'o zhes pas/ a+waT a+wa gam/ gaur+Y+Yai/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas la/ gaurI b+h+yAM/ gau rI b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ gaur+Y+YAH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaHla/ gau rI b+h+yAM/ gau rI b+h+yaH/ ngas la yang / gaur+YAH/
[\[56b.3\]]o sa la/ gau r+YoH/ AM la/ thung du dwi zhes pas/ nuT/ gau rI NAM/ ngi la/ gaur+YAM/ os la/ gaur+YoH/ su pa la/ gau rI Shu/ bA nI/ na dI la sogs mang po zhig 'di dang 'dra'o/ /la k+Sh+mI zhes/ dI pa kyi rjes ma yin pas/ su mi dbyi ba ste/ lak+Sh+mIH/ gzhan ma rnams gau rI
[\[56b.4\]]dang 'dra'o/ /tA rI dang / ta n+tI yang / lak+Sh+mI dang 'dra'o/ /s+t+rI zhes pa'i sgra la su/ su phyis/ s+t+ri/ s+t+rA+e/ au/ s+t+rI yAH/ s+t+rI'a'o/ /rgyun can ta chu bo/ rnam dbye a tsa dang po can rnams la s+t+rI zhes dpal mo/ pa'i rtags kyi I yar 'gyur te/ s+t+ri yau/ sa la/ sti yaH/ bod tshig la/
[\[56b.5\]]he stA+e/ he stA+e yau/ sgrol ma/ he ste yaH/ s+t+rI ya am/ bud med/ bA mA soH/ am shas dag la yang na'o/ /rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig am dang mang tshig shas dag pha rol la s+t+rI'i i yar yang na 'gyur te/ s+t+ri yaM/ yang na am la snga ma 'os/ s+t+rIM/ aul/ s+t+ri yau/ shas/
[\[56b.6\]]bshad ma thag pa'i mdos/ s+t+ri yaH/ yang na dang po dag gi zhes pas/ s+t+riH/ gsum pa la/ s+t+ri yA/ s+t+rI b+h+yAM/ s+t+rI b+hiH/ nge la/ AT dang / i ya/ s+t+ri yai/ s+t+rI b+h+yAm/ s+t+rI b+h+yaH/ lnga pa la/ s+t+rI yAH/ s+t+rI b+h+yA ma/ s+t+rI b+h+yaH/ drug pa la/ s+t+ri yAH/ s+t+ri yoH/ s+t+rA NAM/ bdun
[\[56b.7\]]pa la/ s+t+ri yAM/ s+t+ri yoH/ s+t+rI Shu/ shI/ dpal mo/ la su shrIH/ shrI la/ au dang dzas/ a tsa la sh+nu byings b+hU rnams kyi zhes pa'i mdos i ya/ shri yau/ shri yaH/ shrI las du d+d+hi byin/ shrI/ su/ ne ya du wang s+thA nA wa s+t+rI/ s+t+rI ma yen pa'i i ya u wa gnas pa dag ma yin no/ /
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]s+t+rI ma yin pa zhes s+t+rI'i sgra ni i ya u war 'gyur yang na dI'i ming can yin la/ s+t+rI ma yin pa i ya u wa gnas pa ste/ i yar 'gyur pa dang U u war 'gyur pa rnams bud med du brjod pa'i skabs 'dir yang na na dI'i ming can ma yin te/ skabs 'dir shrI yang / na pI'i
[\[57a.2\]]ming can ma yin bas saM bud+d+hi dbyi ba dang rtags thung ngur 'gyur pa sogs mi byed/ he shrIH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ shri yaM/ shri yau/ shri yaH/ gsum pa la/ shri yA/ shrA b+h+yAM/ shrAb+hiH/ shrI la/ nge / spyir btang i ya u wa thob pa rnams bud med du brjod pa'i
[\[57a.3\]]skabs na dI'i ming can ma yin no zhes bkag kyang dmigs bsal/ nga 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na'o zhes pa'i 'grel par/ I U dag kyang yang na par bshad pas/ rnam dbye nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams lan dI'i ming can gyi bya ba ltar A Ta ster ba dang i ya u war 'gyur pa gnyis ka thob
[\[57a.4\]]bas/ shri ye/ shri yai/ b+h+ya ma b+h+yaHla/ shrI b+h+yAM/ shrI b+h+yaH/ lnga pa'i nga sil/ shri yaH/ shri yAH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yaHla/ shrIb+h+yAM/ shrI b+h+yaH/ drug ba'i ngas la/ shri yaH/ shri yAH/ o sa la/ shri yoH/ shrI la/ A ma/ bA mi/ Am la yang na'o/ /i ya u wa thob pa rnams rnam dbye
[\[57a.5\]]drug pa'i A ma pha rol la na dI'i ming can yang na'o/ shri yAM/ na dI'i ming can ltar na/ thung du ni dI'i zhes bas/ nuT/ shrI NAM/ bdun pa'i ngi la/ shri yAM/ shri yi/ o sa dang sub la/ shri yoH/ shrI Shu/ sud+d+hi la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /pra d+hI zhes pa'i sgra mo rtags la
[\[57a.6\]]yang chog thams cad skyes pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang khyad par med do/ /de rnams kyis bud med kyi rtags las I ring mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bstan zin to/ ! /da ni mo rtags u thung mtha' can rnams/ blo bzang ma/ brjod par bya ste/ d+he nu la/ su/ blo bar ma/ d+he nuH/ au la/ dang po
[\[57a.7\]]dag gi zhes pas/ d+he nU/ d+hi nu/ dzas/ dzas la 'ang ngos/ d+he na baH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ d+he nu/ a ma/ a ma la snga ma zhes bas/ d+henuM/ d+henu/ au/ d+ha nU/ d+he nu/ shas/ dang po dag gi mdos/ ng+he nUH/ gsum pa rnams la/ 'jo ma/ d+he nu TA/ TA nAr mi 'gyur/ d+he nA/ d+he nu b+h+yAM/
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]d+he nu b+hiH/ bzhi pa la/ d+he nu/ nge/ nga 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na 'os/ d+he n+wai/ d+he na wai/ d+he nu b+h+yAM/ d+he nu b+h+yaH/ lnga pa'i nga sil/ d+he nAH/ d+he noH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa'i ngas la/ d+hen+wAH/ d+he noH/ os la/ d+hen+woH/ A ma le/ d+he nU nAM/ bdun pa'i ngi la/ ng+he nAM/ ng+he nAM/ ng+he nau/ os
[\[57b.2\]]laT/ ng+he n+woH ng+he nuShu/ bod tshig rnams la/ he d+he no/ he d+he nA/ he d+he na wa rnams grub ste a tsa mi gcig pa'i 'gyur khyad phran tsam ma gtogs gong du bshad pa ma te'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /ta nu la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ u thung mtha' can kreSh+Tu la bshad ma thag pa
[\[57b.3\]]dang bya ba mi 'dra ste/ s+t+ri yAM tsa/ bud med la'ang ngo / /kroSh+Tu'i sgra ni bud med kyi rtags la tr-i tsa bzhin ri mthar 'gyur pas/ kroSh+T+r-i 'gyur/ r-in+ni b+h+yo dI pa/ r-i ta na rnams las dI pa'o/ /sus phra ma/ rtags R-i ta mtha' can rnams dang nam mtha' can rnams la bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen dI pa
[\[57b.4\]]'gyur te/ dI pa byin/ kroSh+T+rA zhes par 'gyur ro/ ce sbyang mo/ cho ga thams cad sngar mo rtags I ring skabs su bshad pa'i gau rA+e dang 'dra'o/ /de rnams kyis u thung mtha' can mo rtags kyi cho ga bstan zin to/ ! /da ni mo rtags A ring mtha' can rnams kyi bya ba brjod par bya ste/ bad+hU/ su/
[\[57b.5\]]bad+hUH/ au dang / dzas/ bad+h+wau/ bid+h+waH/ bad+hU la/ saM bu d+d+hi/ su/ am+bA'i don na dI rnams kyi thung du 'os/ rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur/ eng thung ngu zhes pas su phyes/ he ba d+hu/ he ba d+h+wo/ he ba d+hA+oH/ bad+hU la/ am la sngon ma'i 'os/ bad+hUM/ au la/ bad+hA+au/ shas la/ dang po mna' ma/
[\[57b.6\]]dag gis mdos/ bad+hUH/ gsum pa rnams la/ bad+hA/ bad+hU b+h+yA ma/ bad+hU b+hiH/ de la/ bad+h+wai/ bad+hU b+h+yAM/ bad+hU b+h+yaH/ ngas la/ bad+h+wAH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ ngas la yang / bad+hAH/ o sa la/ bad+h+wA+oH/ a+wa ma la/ thung ngu na dI zhes pas nuT/ bad+hU nAM/ bil/ bad+h+wAM/ o sa la/ bad+hA+oH/ su ba
[\[57b.7\]]la/ bad+hU Shu rnams grub ste gau rI'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /de bzhin du/ g.yo ma/ tsamU la sogs pa rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /gsal bar brjod ma/ b+h+rU zhes pa'i sgra 'di bya ba thams cad shrI'i skabs dang 'dra/ saM bud+d+hi la thung ngur byed pa 'dam ka yin pas/ he b+h+ru/ he b+h+rUH/
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]pun r+b+hU zhes pa gzhan cho ga thams cad bad+hU dang 'dra/ drug pa'i A ma la/ e kA dzu t+tar pa de NaH/ rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig pa la Na'o/ /rnam dbye tshig sdud kyis bsdus pa'i ming snga mar Sha' mar lta bu na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can yod na de'i rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig
[\[58a.2\]]pa ste dbyangs gcig las slar yang 'byung ma/ med pa dper na yod kyang na Nar 'gyur ro/ /bu na r+b+hU NAM lta bu'o/ /bar+ShA b+hUH/ o dang / dzas bar+ShA b+hA sh+tsa/ bar+ShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra ni rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can gang mthong yang ya Nar 'gyur ro/ /bar+ShA b+hA+au/ bar+ShA b+hAH/
[\[58a.3\]]bod tshig la/ he bar+ShA b+hUH/ he bar+ShA b+hA+au/ he bar+ShA b+hAH/ rnam dbye gzhan rnams la'ang a tsa thog ma lo dus su 'byung ngam/ can rnams la u war 'gyur/ /nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la A Ta ster/ he la thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med do/ /swa yaM b+hU zhes pa la/ nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams
[\[58a.4\]]la A Ta ster/ gzhan skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa dang khyad par med do/ /de rnams kyis bud med kyi rtags U ring rnams kyi cho ga bshad zin to/ ! /da ni dmigs bsal r-i ta mtha' can ni/ na Sha Ta swa srA di b+h+yaH/ swa sw-i sogs Sha Ta rnams las ma yin no/ /swa sr-i sogs
[\[58a.5\]]Sha Ta'i ming can zhes brda chad byas bde rnams la bud med du bsgrubs pa'i rkyen dI ba dang TA pa sogs mi 'jug /r-i ta na rnams las dI pa'o zhes spyir gtang thob kyang mdo 'dis bkag pa'o/ /Sha Ta'i ming can ni 'di rnams te/ swa sr-i/ ti sr-i/ tsa ta sr-i/ na nAM tr-i/ du hi hr-i/ ya tr-i/ mA tr-i/ bdun
[\[58a.6\]]po 'di rnams la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes bya'o/ /swa sr-i la/ su/ r-i ta u sha nas sogs kyi mdos/ ri a nang / saM du d+d+hi ma yin pa zhes pas u pa d+hA ring po/ ha la dI pa zhes pas su phyis/ ming mtha'i nang byi 'os/ /na phyis/ sgug mo/ gsum/ bzhi/ tsha mo/ bu zho'am/ gzhon nu ma/ ma/ swa sA/
[\[58a.7\]]au dzas/ am au rnams la skyes pa'i rtags  sgyug mo/ kyi skabs su/ d+hA tr-i la bshad ba'i cho ga dang 'dra bas/ swa sA rau/ swa sA raH/ swa sA rau/ shas dang TA nAr mi 'gyur te/ bud med kyi rtags yin pas so/ /shas la dang po dag gi zhes pa'i mdos/ swa sr-IH/ TA la/
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]swa swA/ swa sr-i b+hiH/ lhag ma rnams kyang d+hA tr-i'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /gzhan Sha Ta'i ming can bdun po thams cad cho ga 'di kho nas rigs 'gre'o/ /de rnams kyis r-i ta mtha'i bya ba rnams bstan zin to/ ! /bud med kyi rtags o yig mtha' can skyes pa'i rtags kyi
[\[58b.2\]]skabs su bshad pa'i go'i skabs dang 'dra/ i yig mtha' can rnams rai sgra dang 'dra/ au yig mtha' can rnams glau zhes pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra ste/ mdor na o mtha' dang ai mtha' can rnams skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga kho na las spros pa
[\[58b.3\]]med do/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA da dzan+ta s+t+rI ling+gA s+sa mA p+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las a tsa'i mtha' du da med kyi rtags rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su
