[\[58b.4\]]bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya bas/ a tsa' mtha' can bud med kyi rtags rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas par rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni a tsa'i mtha' can ma nang gi rtags rnams bshad par bya ste/ spyir btang a thung mtha'
[\[58b.5\]]can dz+nyAn zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod bya ste/ dz+nyA na/ su/ a to \u0f85 mra/ a ta la sa a ma'o/ /ma ning a thung gi mtha'i pha rol du rnam dbye dang po'i su dang gnyis pa'i am ni am du 'gyur ro/ /su/ am/ am la snga ma'o zhes pas/ dz+nyA naM/ dz+nyA na/ au/ na puMs kAts+tsa/ ma ning
[\[58b.6\]]la'ang ngo / /ma ning gi rtags las rnam dbye  ye shes/ dang po'i au dang gnyis pa'i au ni shI zhes par 'gyur la de la b+ha'i ming can zhes brda chad do/ /au shI/ ya s+ye ti tsa/ gang gi i ta la'ang ngo / /I yig b+ha'i ming can dang de phan gyi rkyen rnams la rtags mtha'i a yig dang i
[\[58b.7\]]yig dbyi'o zhes pas spyir btang a dbyir thob kyang dmigs bsal 'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs te/ au shIr 'gyur pa la a dbyi ba ma yin no/ /zhes pa byung bas a mi dbyi mtshams sbyar/ dz+nyA ni/ dz+nyA na la/ dzas/ dzash+sha soHshiH/ dzas shas dag gi shi'o/ /ma ning gi
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]rtags las pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i dzas dang gnyis pa'i shas ni zhes par 'gyur ro/ /shis rbanA mas+thA naM/ shi thams cad gnas pa'i ming can no/ /dzas dang shas shi zhes par 'gyur pa de la thams can gnas pa'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /na puMs ka s+ya
[\[59a.2\]]dz+ha la tsa/ ma ning gi dz+ha la a tsa'i 'o/ /ma ning gi rtags dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang a tsa'i mtha' las thams cad gnas pa'i ming can pha rol la nu ma A ga ma ster ro/ /u brjod don/ ma ni ma 'gro ba a tsa'i mtha' la pha rol zhes pa'i don/ saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas
[\[59a.3\]]pa'i ming can la yang ngo zhes pas/ u pad+hA ring por bsgyur/ dz+nyA nA ni/ gnyis pa rnams la'ang sgrub tshul dang gzugs gnyis ka 'dra bas/ dz+nyA naM/ dz+nyA ni/ dz+nyA nA ni/ saM bu d+d+hi la/ eng thung ngu zhes saM bud+d+hi phyis/ he dz+nyA na/ he dz+nyA nA ni/ rnam dbye lhag ma thams cad skyes pa'i
[\[59a.4\]]rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa'i rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ de bzhin du/ ng+han/ ban/ phal/ la sogs mang po zhig 'di 'dra'o/ ka tar sogs la su dang a ma la byang mi 'dra ste/ aD+ha ta rA di b+h+yaHpany+tsa b+h+yaH/ Da ta ra sogs lnga rnams las a daDa'o/ /ma ning gi rtags kyi
[\[59a.5\]]skabs su Da ta ra'i mtha' can/ ka ta ra dang / ka ta ma/ a n+ya ta ra/ a n+ya tam/ nor/ nags/ 'bras bu/ i ta ra ste lnga po'i pha rol gyi rnam dbye dang po'i su dang gnyis pa'i am ni/ a da Da zhes par 'gyur ro/ /ka ta ra/ a da Da zhes pa byung / TeH/ Ti'i'o/ rkyen Da 'gro ba pha rol la rtags
[\[59a.6\]]sogs kyi Ti dbyi bar bya ste/ Ti phyis/ drangs/ ka ta rang / bA wa sA ne/ gnas med pa la yang na'o/ /gnas med pa ste tshig mtha' ha la a tsa med pa de dz+ha la so sor bsdu pa'i yi ge yin na rang dang gnas mthun pa'i tsar so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams su yang na 'gyur te/ ka ta ra ta/ ka ta
[\[59a.7\]]ra da/ au dang dzas la/ ka ta re/ ka ta rA Ni/ bod tshig kyang rnam dbye dang po 'dra bas/ he ka ta ra da/ he ka ta ra ta/ he ka ta re/ he ka ta rA Ni/ gnyis pa rnams la'ang / ka ta ra da/ ka ta ra da/ ka ta re/ ka ta rA Ni/ rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i skabs su bshad pa'i
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]sarba'i rtags dang 'dra/ de bzhin du/ ka ta ma/ a n+ya ta ra/ a n+ya ta ma/ ita ra sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /a dzar/ zhes pa'i rtags la a tsa thog ma can rnams la sngar bshad pa'i mdos/ a dza ras/ zhes par 'gyur pa dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka ste/ su la/ a dza raM/ a dza ra saM/
[\[59b.2\]]au la/ a dza ri/ a dza ra sI/ dzas la a dza ras su mi 'gyur pa'i phyogs la/ a dza rA Ni/ lugs gcig la/ a dza ra na sa/ i zhes gnas pa la/ sAM ta ma ha taHsaM yog s+ya/ sa mtha' ma ha ta dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba'i 'o/ /sa mtha' na dang yang dag sbyor ba ste brtsegs pa
[\[59b.3\]]dang ma ha ta la num byin pa'i na lta bu'i u pa d+hA ni/ saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la ring por 'gyur ro/ /adza rA n+si/ saM bu d+d+hi la/ he a dza ra/ he a dza re/ he a dza sI/ he a dza rA Ni/ he a dza rA n+si/ gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/ gsum
[\[59b.4\]]pa rnams la/ a dza ri Na/ a dza Ra sA/ a dza rA b+h+yAM/ a dza riH/ bzhi pa la/ a dza rA ya/ a dza ra si/ a dza rA b+h+yAM/ a dza ri b+h+yaH/ lnga pa la/ a dza rA ta/ a dza rasaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ drug pa la/ a dza ra s+ya/ a dza ra saH/ a dza ra yoH/ a dza ra soH/ a dza rA NAM/ a dza ra sAM/ bdun pa
[\[59b.5\]]la/ a dza ri/ a dza ra si/ a dza ra yoH/ a dza ra soH/ a dza ra Shu/ hr-i da ya la/ rnam dbye dang po rnams dang bod tshig rnams dang / rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams dz+nyA na'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ hr-i da yaM/ hr-i da ye/ hraM da yA ni/ he hr-i da ya/ he hr-i da ye/ he hr-i da yA nI/
[\[59b.6\]]hra da yaM/ hr-i da ye/ hr-i da ya la/ shas/ shas sogs rnams la zhes snyig pa'i mdos hr-i da ya/ hr-i da du 'gyur/ dzas shas dag gi shi/ ma ning gi dz+ha la a tsa'i 'os nu ma/ hr-I nI/ lugs gcig /hr-i da yA ni/ TA la/ hr-i dA/ hr-i da ye na/ b+h+yAM la/ hr-i b+h+rAM/ hr-i da lA b+h+yAM/ b+hiHla/ hr-i d+b+hiH/
[\[59b.7\]]hr-i da yiH/ nge la/ hr-i da/ hri da yA ya/ b+h+yAM'adra/ b+h+yaHla/ hr-i ng+b+h+yaH/ hr-i da ye b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ h+y-i daH/ hr-i da yA ta/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yAH'dra/ nga sa la/ hr-i daH/ hr-i da ya s+ya/ os la/ hr-i doH/ hr-i da ya yoH/ A ma la/ hr-i dAM/ hri da yA nAM/ ngi la/ hr-i da ye/ os 'dra/ hr-i sbu/ hr-i da ye Shu/
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]u da ka la yang / rnam dbye dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i au Ta'i bar dz+nyA dang 'dra ste/ u da kaM/ u da ke/ u da kA ni/ he u da ka /he u da ke/ he u da kA ni/ gnyis pa la/ u da kaM/ u da ke/ shas la/ u du kA ni/ u dA ni/ TA la/ u da ke ma/ lugs gcig la/
[\[60a.2\]]u da na du 'gyur/ chu'am 'o na/ na'i a ta nga byi 'os/ u pad+hA'i a phyis/ u d+nA/ b+h+yAM la/ u da kA b+h+yAM/ lugs gcig la/ ming mtha'i nad byi 'os na phyis/ u da b+h+yAM b+hi sa la/ u da kaiH/ u da b+hiH/ nge la/ u da ne/ u da kA ya/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas la/ u da b+h+yAM/ u da kA b+h+yA ma/ u da b+h+yaH/ u da
[\[60a.3\]]ke b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ u d+naH/ u da kA ta/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ nga sa la/ u d+naH/ u da ka s+ya/ o sa la/ u ng+noH/ u da ka yoH/ A ma la/ u d+nAM/ u da kA nAM/ ngi la/ u d+ni/ u da ke/ o sa 'dra/ su ba la/ u da su/ u da ke Shu/ A sa nas yang dang po sogs 'dra ste/ A sa naM/
[\[60a.4\]]A sa ne/ A sa nA ni/ he A sa na/ he A sa ne/ he A sa nA ni/ he A sa nA ni/ gnyis pa la/ A sa ni/ A sa ne/ sha sa la/ A sA ni/ A sa nA ni/ DA la/ A snA/ A sa ne na/ b+h+yAM la/ A sa b+h+yAM/ A sa nA b+h+yAM/ lhag ma rnams kyang lugs gnyis  gdag ka u da ka dang 'dra'o/ mgo /shIr+Sha zhes
[\[60a.5\]]pa la yang dang po lnga dz+nyA na dang 'dra/ shIr+ShaM/ shIr+ShA+e/ shIr+ShA Ni/ he shIr+Sha/ he shIr+She/ he shIr+ShA Ni/ a ma la/ shIr+ShaM/ au la/ shIr+She/ sha sa la/ shIr+ShA Ni/ 'grel par gzhan sa lung drangs pa/ DA sogs la shIr+Sha'i shIr+Sha na yang na'o/ /shIr+Sha zhes pa'i rtags ni rnam dbye gsum
[\[60a.6\]]pa'i TA nas brtsams te bdun pa'i sub kyi bar gang mthong yang shIr+Sha na zhes par yang na 'gyur bas/ TA la/ shIr+She Na/ shIr+Sha na du bsgyur na/ na'i a ta dbyi 'os/ a phyis/ Sha ra sogs kyis na Na/ shIr+ShA/ b+h+yAM la/ shI r+ShA b+h+yAM/ lugs gcig la/ ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/ na phyis/ shIr+Sha
[\[60a.7\]]b+h+yAM/ b+haMs la/ shIr+ShaiH/ shIr+Sha b+hiH/ de la/ shIr+ShA ya/ b+h+yA ma 'dra/ b+h+yas la/ shIr+She b+h+yaH/ shIr+Sha b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ shI r+ShA ta/ shIr+ShA ta/ shIr+ShAH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ ngas la/ shIr+Sha s+ya/ shIr+ShAH/ o sa la/ shIr+Sha yoH/ shI r+ShA+oH/ A ma la/ shIr+ShA NAM/ shI r+ShAM/ ngi la/ shIr+She/ shI r+ShI/
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]os ra dra /su pa la/ shIr+She Shu/ shIr+Sha su/ hra sron puMs ke pru ti pa di ka s+ya/ ma ning las ming gi thung ngu'o/ rtags mtha' a tsa ring po rnams ni ma ning gi rtags kyi skabs su thung ngur 'gyur te/ dper na/ shI pA zhes pa A ring mtha' can yin kyang bshad ma thag pa'i mdos thung ngur 'gyur/
[\[60b.2\]]shA+e paM/ shA+e pe shrI pA ni lta bu ste A ring thams cad a thung ngu 'gyur te/ rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i bya ba thams cad a thung mtha' can spyir btang dz+nyA na'i skabs su bshad dang 'dra'o/ de rnams kyis  dpal spyod/ ma ning gi rtags las A ring a thung gi bya ba rnams bshad zin to/ ! /da ni
[\[60b.3\]]ma ning gi rtags i ring thung gi mtha' can rnams bshad par bya ste/ bA ri/ la/ su/ swa mo rna puMs kAng / ma ning las su a ma dag gi'o/ ma ning gi rtags las rnam dbye dang po'i su dang gnyis pa'i a ma ni 'jig go/ /zhes pas su 'jig pA ri/ pA ri la/ au/ ma ning la
[\[60b.4\]]'ang ngos au shI/ i ko tsi bi b+ha k+tau/ rnam dbye a tsa la i ka gi 'o/ chu/ ma ning gi rtags i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yong la rnam dbye a ca thog ma can byung na nu ma A ga ma ster ro/ /bA ri NI/ dzas la/ dzas shas dag gi shi/ rnam dbye a tsa la zhes pas nu ma/ sam+bu d+b+hi ma yin pa'i zhes
[\[60b.5\]]pas u pad+hA ring po/ bA rI Ni/ saM bu d+b+hi la/ thung ngu'i yon tan no zhes dang / thung ngu dang eng zhes pas saM bud+d+hi phyis/ he bA re/ he bA ri NI/ he bA rI Ni/ rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/ TA la/ bAri NA/ b+h+yAM la/ bA ri b+d+hAM/ b+hiHla/ bA ri b+hiH/ nge la/ bA ri Ne/ b+h+yAM 'dra/
[\[60b.6\]]b+h+yas la/ bA re b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ bA ri NaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ nga sa la/ bA ri NaH/ os la/ bA re NoH/ bA rA+e NA/ ngi la/ bA ri Ni/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ bA ri Shu/ a nA di zhes pa'ang rnam dbye TA yan chad bA ri dang 'dra ste/ dang po rnams la/ a nA de/ a nA de nI/ a nA dI ni/ bong
[\[60b.7\]]tshig la/ he a nA de/ he a nA di nI/ he a nA dI ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang dang po dang 'dra/ anA di/ TA/ tr-i tI yA di Shu b+hA Shi ta puM skaM puM bang+gAl wa s+ya/ gsum pa sogs rnams la skyes pa bzhin ga la wa'i'o/ /rtags i ka so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' can las pha rol
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA nas bdun pa'i sub kyi bar gyi a tsa thog ma can rnams la/ sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga rnams dang / mi ning gi rang lugs ltar a tsa thog ma can rnams la num ster ba sngon gyi drang srong ga la ba'i lugs so/ /a nA di nA ste lugs gnyis ka
[\[61a.2\]]gzugs 'dra/ skyes pa ltar na TA nA/ ma ning rang lugs ltar na nu ma byin drangs pa'o/ b+h+yAM b+he sa la/ a nA di b+h+yAM/ a nA di b+hiH/ nge la/ a nA da ye/ a nA di ne/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'ad/ nga si la/ a nA deH/ a nA di naH/ b+h+yAM b+ha sa 'dra/ nga sa la/ a nA deH/ a nA da naH/ o sa la/ a nA
[\[61a.3\]]d+yoH/ a nA di noH/ A ma la/ a nA dI nAM/ a nA dI nAM/ ngi la/ a nA di ni/ o sa 'dra/ a nA di Shu/ a s+thi/ au la/ a s+thi nI/ dza sa la/ a s+thI ni/ bod tshig la/ he la s+the/ he a s+thi nI/ he a s+thI ni/ he a s+thI ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ a s+thi da b+hi sha k+th+yA k+ShAM ma na du dA t+taH/
[\[61a.4\]]a s+thi da b+hi sha ha k+thi a k+Shi rnams kyi a nang u dA t+ta'o/ /ma ning gi rtags a s+thi sogs kyi rnam dbye TA sogs a tsa  rus ba/ thog ma can rnams la rtags mtha' a nang du 'gyur la de la u dA t+ta zer ro/ /a s+thi TA/ rtags mtha' a nang du 'gyur/ na'i a ta dbyi 'os/ a phyis/ /sa s+th+mA/ b+h+yAM
[\[61a.5\]]b+hiHla/ a s+thi b+h+yAM/ a s+thi b+hiH/ nge la/ a s+b+ne/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga si la/ a s+th+naH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ nga sa la/ a s+th+naH/ o sa la/ a s+th+noH/ A ma la/ a s+th+naM/ yang na ngi shI dag la 'dam ka'o/ /zhes pas a s+tha ni/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ as+thidaShu/ dad+hi/ shak+thi
[\[61a.6\]]ak+Shi rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /'grel par/ pri ya da b+h+yA brA h+ma Ne na/ pri ya shak+Sh+nA shu ri Na/ pri yA k+Sh+NA sa rbe Na/ pri yA s+th+nA shu nA zhes pa byung ste/ TA byin pa'i gzugs so/ sung+hI zhes pa la'ang ma ning las ming gi thung ngu'o zhes pas rtags mtha' thung ngur 'gyur/ su phyis/ zho/ nus
[\[61a.7\]]mig /sung+hi/ au la/ su ng+hi nI/ dza sa la/ bram ze dga' ba'o/ dmangs rigs kyi dga' ba nus pa/ thams cad kyi dga' ba mig /khyi'i dga' ba rus pa/ sud+hI ni/ bod tshig rnams la/ he su d+hi/ blo bzang / he su d+he/ he su d+hi nI/ he su d+hI ni/ gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/ su d+hi TA/ gsum pa sogs
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]la zhes pas/ ma ning rang lugs ltar na num byin/ su d+hi nA/ skyes pa'i lugs ltar la rtags mtha' thung ngur mi 'gyur/ a tsa la/ zhes pas i yar 'gyur/ su b+hi yA/ su d+hi b+h+yAM/ su d+hi b+hiH/ nge la/ su d+hi ne/ su d+hi ye/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga si la/ su d+hi naH/ su d+hi naH/ su d+hi yaH/ baM b+h+yaH'dra/
[\[61b.2\]]ngas la/ su d+hi yaH/ os la/ su d+hi noH/ sud+hi yoH/ A ma la/ su d+hi nI/ su d+hi yAM/ ngi la/ su d+hi yi/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ su d+hi Shu/ pra d+hI la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /de rnams kyis ma ning gi rtags i ring thung rnams kyi cho ga bstan zin
[\[61b.3\]]to/ ! da ni ma ning gi rtags u mtha' can rnams bshad par bya sta/ mad+hu su/ ma ning la su aM 'jig /ma d+hu/ au shI/ num/ mad+hu nI/ dza sa shi nu ma/ u pa d+hA ring po/ mad+hU ni/ he ma d+hu/ he ma d+ho/ he ma d+hU ni/ gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/ TA la num/
[\[61b.4\]]ma d+hu nA/ ma d+hu b+h+yAM/ ma b+hu b+hiH/ nge la/ ma d+hu ne/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga si la/ sbrang rtsi/ mad+hu naH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ nga sa la/ ma d+hu naH/ o sa la/ ma d+hu noH/ A ma la/ ma d+hU nAM/ nge la/ mad+hu ni/ os 'dra/ mad+hu Shu/ am+bu yang 'di dang 'dra'/ /su lU/ zhes pa'ang rtags mtha' thung
[\[61b.5\]]ngur 'gyur/ rnam dbye dang po rnams la/ su 'u/ su lu nI/ su lU ni/ he su lu/ he su lo/ /he su lu nI/ he su lU ni/ gnyis pa rnams dang po dang 'dra/ TA la/ ma ning rang lugs ltar na/ nu ma/ su lu nA/ skyes pa'i lugs ltar na legs gcod/ rtags mtha' thung ngur mi
[\[61b.6\]]'gyur/ ig gi a tsa la ya Na/ su lwA/ su lu b+h+yAM/ su lu b+h+yAMH/ nge la/ su lu ne/ su lwe/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ su lu naH/ su lwa naH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ nga sa la/ su lu naH/ su lwaH/ os la/ su lu noH/ su lwoH/ A ma la/ su lU nI/ su lwAM/ ngi la/ su lu ni/
[\[61b.7\]]su lwi/ os 'dra/ su lu Shu/ si lU yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /kroSh+Tu la/ su/ ma ni da la su am 'jig /pri ya kro Sh+Tu/ au shI/ pri ya kroSh+Tu nI/ dzas she/ pri ya kroSh+TU ni/ saM bu d+d+hi/ he pri ya kroSh+Tu/ he priya kroSh+To/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig 'dra/ gnyis pa dang po dang
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]'dra/ TA la/ ma ning rang lugs ltar na/ nu ma/ pri ya kroSh+Tu nA/ skyes pa'i lugs ltar na rtags mtha' r-ir 'gyur/ i ka gi a tsa la yaN/ pri ya kroSh+Tu/ pri ya kroSh+Tu b+h+yAM/ pri ya kroSh+Tu b+hiH/ nge la/ pri ya kroSh+Tu ne/ pri ya kroSh+Tu/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga si la/
[\[62a.2\]]bri ya kroSh+Tu naH/ pri ya kroSh+TuH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ ngas yang si dang 'dra/ os/ pri ya kroSh+T+ra noH/ pri ya kroSh+TuH/ A ma la/ pri ya kroSh+Tu nAM/ ngi la/ pri ya kroSh+Tu ni/ pri ya kroSh+Ta ri/ os 'dra/ pri ya kraSh+Tu Shu/ de rnams kyis u yig ring thung gi mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams bshad
[\[62a.3\]]zin to/ ! /ma Ni nga r-i mtha' can ni/ dz+nyA tr-i/ su/ su am 'jig /dz+nyA tr-i/ au ShI/ dz+nyA tr-i Ni/ bod tshig /he dz+nyA tr-i/ he dz+nyA tri NI/ he dz+nyA trI Ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la/ dz+nyA tr-i NA/ dz+nyA trA/ b+h+yAM b+hiH'dra/ nge/ dz+nyA tr-i ni/ dz+nyA tri/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ nga si la/
[\[62a.4\]]dz+nyA tri NaH/ dz+nyA tuH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ ngas/ nga si dang 'dra/ os la/ dz+nyA tri NoH/ dz+nyA troH/ AM la/ dz+nyA tr-I NAM/ ngi / dz+nyA tr-i Ni/ dz+nyA ta ri/ os 'dra/ b+h+yA tr-i Shu/ kart-I yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /de rnams kyis ma ning gi rtags las r-i mtha' rnams bshad zin to/ ! /da ni e tsa mtha'
[\[62a.5\]]can ne/ bra rdo su/ e tsa i g+g+hA swA de she/ zhe ca'i i ka thung ngur kun nas bsgyur ro/ /ma ning gi rtags las e tsa so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' can rnams ni i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge thung ngu rnams su 'gyur bas/ brang+hu zhes par 'gyur/ su phyis/ pra ng+hu/ pra ng+hu nI/ pra ng+hU nI/ he pra ng+hu/
[\[62a.6\]]he pra ng+hu nI/ he pra ng+hU ni/ gnyis pa rnams 'dra/ TA man chad la a ca dang po can rnams la ma ning rang lugs kyi cho ga ltar na nu ma byin/ skyes pa'i lugs ltar e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs bya ste/ pra ng+hu nA/ pra ng+ha l+l+wa/ pra ng+hu b+h+yAM/ pra ng+hu b+h+yIH/ pra ng+hu ni/ pra ng+ha we/ b+h+yA b+h+yaH'dra/ nga si la/
[\[62a.7\]]pra ng+hunaH/ pra ng+hoH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ ngas yang nga si dang 'dra/ o sa la/ pra ng+hu noH/ pra ng+ha noH/ pra ng+ha woH/ A ma la/ pra ng+hU nAM/ pra ng+ha wAM/ ngi la/ pra ng+ha wi/ o sa 'dra/ pra ng+hu Shu/ nor rab/ pra ri zhes pa'ang pra ri zhes par gru bzang po/ 'gyur / pra ri/ pra ri NI/ bra rI Ni/
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]he pra ri/ he pra ri NI/ he pra rI Ni/ gnyis pa rnams 'dra/ TA sogs la ma ning rang lugs ltar na num ster/ skyes pa'i lugs ltar na ai A yar 'gyur te/ rai zhes pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ /su no zhes pa/ su nu zhes par 'gyur/ o A ya dang o A wa'i khyad ma
[\[62b.2\]]gtogs pra rai skabs dang 'dra'o/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tA da jan+ha na puM sa ka ling+gA ni samA p+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las a tsa'i mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams rdzogs so/ /de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don
[\[62b.3\]]cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las a tsa'i mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams kyi bya ba spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni ha la gyi mtha' can te gsal byed mtha' can
[\[62b.4\]]las dang por pho rtags rnams bshad bar bya'o/ /de yang dang po ha mtha' can la/ la ha zhes pa la/ ho D+haH/ ha yi D+ha'o/ dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol na yod pa'i chu rol gyi ha srog med dang tshig mtha'i ha srog med ni D+ha ru 'gyur ro/ /li ha/ su/ ha yi D+ha 'os/ ha D+ha/ ha la
[\[62b.5\]]dI pa a+wa pa ring rnams la zhes bas/ su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ myong / li Da/ li Ta/ au dang dzas la/ a tsa dman pa pha rol du rab tu sbyor ro/ /zhes pas drangs/ li hau/ li haH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ li haM/ li hau/ li haH/ TA la/ li hA/ b+h+yA la/ ha yi
[\[62b.6\]]D+ha/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza rnams sos/ D+ha Da drangs/ li b+h+yAM/ b+hiH/ liD+b+hiH/ nge la/ li he/ b+h+yAMb+h+yaHla/ liMD+b+h+yA/ laD+b+h+yaH/ ngasi la/ li haH/ b+h+yAMMb+h+yaHla/ liD+b+h+yaH/ laD+b+h+yaH/ ngas la/ li haH/ A mal/ li hAM/ A ma la/ li hAM/ ngi la/ li he/ o sa la/ li hoH/
[\[62b.7\]]su pa la/ ha yi D+ha 'os ha D+ha/ khar la car 'os/ D+ha Ta drangs/ liT+su/ bod tshig rnams kyang rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra bas/ he li Ta/ heliT/ he li hau/ he li haH/ 'jog du ha zhes pa cung mi 'dra ste/ du ha/ su/ bA de r+b+hA to r+g+haH/ da snga ma'i byings kyi g+ha'o/ /da sngon na yong
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]pa'i byings kyi ha yig srog med ni/ dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gang rung pha rol du byung ba dang tshig mtha' la yang g+ha ru 'gyur te/ ha g+ha ra 'gyur/ du g+ha/ su/ e kA tso ba sho b+haSha dz+ha ShaM ta s+ya s+d+hA+oH/ a cag gcig pa'i ba sha'i b+ha Sha dz+ha Sha mtha'i sa d+h+wa da la'o/ /
[\[63a.2\]]byings a tsa gcig pa dz+ha Sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge mtha' na yod pa'i snga ma'i ba sha'i yi ge rnams b+haSha so sor bsdu pa'i yi ge rang dang gnas mthun pa rnams su 'gyur la/ de yang dz+haSha'i yi ge de'i pha rol du sa yig dang d+h+wa zhes pa dang / dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod pa tshig mtha' yin pa
[\[63a.3\]]zhig dgos so/ /skabs 'dir dz+haSha'i nang tshan g+ha yig gi snga ma bsha'i nang tshan da de b+ha Sha'i nang tshad ng+ha ru 'gyur/ hal/ dI pa A ba zhes pas su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ g+ha/ ka'am ba/ d+hu ka /d+hu ga /au dang dza sa la/ du hau/ du haH/ gnyis pa rnams la/
[\[63a.4\]]du haM/ du hau/ du haH/ TAl/ du hA/ b+h+yAM la/ da sngon ma'i zhes pas hag+ha/ a ca gcig pa'i zhes pas/ da ng+ha/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dz+ha sha 'os/ g+ha ga drangs/ d+hu g+b+h+yAM/ d+hu g+b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ du he/ d+hu s+b+h+yAM/ d+hu g+b+h+yaH/ lnga ba rnams la/ du haH/ d+hug+b+haM/ d+hu g+b+h+yaH/ drug
[\[63a.5\]]pa rnams la/ du haH/ du hoH/ du hAM ngi la/ du hi/ o sa la/ du hoH/ su ba la/ ha g+ha/ da d+ha/ khar la zhes pas/ g+ha ka kun nas bsgyur pa dang zhes pas/ ga Sha/ d+hu k+Sha/ bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ he g+hu ka /he dU ga /he du hau/ he du haH/ bA dru ha mu ha
[\[63a.6\]]snu ha sni hAM/ dru ha/ mu ha/ snu ha/ sni ha rnams kyi yang na'o/ dru ha la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi gong li ha zhes pa'i skabs ltar ha D+ha 'gyur pa dang bshad ma thag pa du ha'i skabs ltar ha g+har 'gyur ba gnyis 'dam ka can du bya ste/ dru hal/ su/ d+hU ka /d+hU ga /ng+hU Ta/ d+h+ru Ta/ zhes
[\[63a.7\]]gzugs bzhi 'byung ngo / rmongs pa/ au dang dzas la/ du hau/ dru haH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ dru haM/ dru hau/ dru haH/ TA la/ dru hA/ b+h+yAM la/ d+h+ru g+b+hUM/ d+h+ru g+b+h+yAM/ b+his la/ d+h+ru g+b+hiH/ d+h+ruD+b+hiH/ nge la/ dru he/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yaHla/ d+h+ru g+b+h+yaM/ d+h+ru g+b+h+yaM/ 'a khu sa/ d+h+ru D+b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ dru haH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH/ 'dra/
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]drug pa rnams la/ dru haH/ dru hoH/ dru hI/ ngi os la/ dru hi/ dru hoH/ su pa la/ d+h+ru T+su/ d+h+ru T+su/ saM bud+d+hi rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ /mu ha/ snu ha/ sni ha rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /bi shwa wA ha la su/ bi shwa wA Da/ au dang dzas/ bi shwa wA hau/ bi shwa wA haH/
[\[63b.2\]]he bi shwa wA Ta/ he baM shwa wA Ta/ he bi shwa wA to/ he bi shwa wA haH/ a ma la/ bi shwa wA haM/ au Ta la/ bi shwa wA hau/ sha sa la/ wA ha U Tha/ wA ha'i U Tha'o/ wA ha zhes pa'i sgra 'di'i  sna tshogs thob/ wa ni rnam dbye gnyis pa'i shas nas bzung a tsa thog ma can rnams la U Tha zhes
[\[63b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/ /wa U e ti e ng+ha ti U Tha rnams la'o/ zhes pas 'phel ba/ bi shrau haH/ TA la/ bi shwau hA/ b+h+yAM b+hi sa la/ bi shwa bAD+b+h+yAM/ bi shwa bA d+b+hAMH/ nge la/ bi shwau he/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ nga si la/ bi shwo haH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga sa la/ bi shwau haH/ o sa la/ bu shwau hoH/ A ma la/
[\[63b.4\]]bu shwau hAM/ ngi la/ bu shwau hi/ bi shwau hoH/ su ba la/ bu shwa bA T+su/ b+hU wa ha yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ ha yig mtha' can a na Du ha la/ glang khyug su/ tsa tu ra na Du ho rA mu dA d+haH/ tsa tu ra a na Du ha dag gi A ma u dA t+ta'o/ /tsa tu ra dang a na Du ha dag la/ rnam dbye thams cad nas pa'i ming can
[\[63b.5\]]rnams pha rol la A ma A gam ster te de la u dA t+ta'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /A ma zhes pa'i ma ni ma 'gro ba a tsa'i mtha' las pha rol zhes pa'i don no/ /a na D+wA ha/ su/ sA wa na Du haH/ a na Du ha'i su la'o/ /a na Du ha zhes pa'i rtags la rnam dbye dang po'i
[\[63b.6\]]gcig tshig su dang saM bu ng+ng+hi'i ming can gyi su pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/ nu ma byin/ ha la dI pa A pa zhes pas su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ hi phyis/ a na D+wA na/ au dang dza sa la/ a na D+wA hau/ a na D+wA haH/ a na Du ha la/ saM bu d+d+hi/ a ma saM
[\[63b.7\]]bud+d+hau/ saM bu d+d+hi la a ma'o/ a na Du ha dang tsa tur gnyis la saM bud+d+hi pha rol la a ma A ga ma ster ro/ /a na Du ha'i si la 'os nu ma/ he a na D+wa na/ he an D+wA hoM/ he a na D+wA haH/ a ma la/ a na D+wA haM/ au la/ a na D+wA hau/ sha sa la/ a na Du haH/ TA la/ a na
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]Du hA/ a na Du ha la/ b+h+yaM b+h+yas/ bsu sraM sU d+h+waM swa na D+wa hAM daH/ ba su sraM sud+h+waM su a na Du ha rnams kyi da'o/ ba su dang sraM su dang d+h+waM su dang a na Du ha rnams kyis mtha' rnams dang ha yig ni dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gang rung pha rol na yod pa dang tshig mtha' la da ru 'gyu ro
[\[64a.2\]]a na Du d+d+huM/ a na Du d+d+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ a na Du he/ a na Du d+b+h+yAM/ a na Du d+b+h+yaH/ lnga pa rnams la/ a na Du haH/ a na Du d+b+h+yAM/ a na Du d+b+h+yaH/ drug pa rnams la/ a na Du haH/ a na Du hoH/ a na Du hAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ a na Du hi/ a na Du hoH/ a na Du t+su/ shwe ta wA ha zhes
[\[64a.3\]]pa cung mi 'dra ste/ 'grel bar/ shwe ta wA ha/ u kla shA sa/ bu ro DA sa/ a la yA dza/ rnams la tshig mtha' ma yin pa la Da sa'i rkyen 'jug go zhes pa byung bas/ rtags de rnams la dbyangs ma yin pa'i ha la thog ma can gyi rnam dbye rnams la Da sa'i rkyen byin/ Da yig  dkar po thob pa
[\[64a.4\]]Ti'i lo zhes pa'i don yin pas Ti phyis/ shwe ta bas su/ a twa saM ta s+ya tsA d+hA toH/ a tu a sa mtha' dbyings ma yin pa'i'o/ a tu'i mtha' dang as kyi mtha' byings ma yin pa dag saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i su pha rol la u pad+hA ring bor 'gyur ro/ /shwe ta bAH/ au dang dza sa la/ shwe ta
[\[64a.5\]]bA hau/ shwe ta bA haH/ a ma la/ shwe ta bA haM/ au la/ shwi ta bA hau/ shwe ta bA ha/ shas/ shas nas bzung a ca thog ma can rnams la sngar bi shwa wA ha'i skabs su bshad pa ltar U Thar 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba yang na ba ste/ shwe tau haH/ shwe ta wA haH/ TA la/ shwe tau hA/ shwe ta wA hA
[\[64a.6\]]b+h+yAM la/ Da sa'i rkyen/ ti phyis/ sa sa ju Sha dag gi ru/ a las yon tan/ shwe ta po b+h+yAM/ b+his la/ shwe ta bo b+hiH/ nge la/ shwe ta bA he/ shwe tau he/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa la/ shwe ta bo b+h+yAM/ shwe ta bo b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ shwe tau haH/ shwe ta bA haH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ ngas la/ shwe tau haH/ shwe ta bA haH/
[\[64a.7\]]o sa la/ shwe tau hoH/ shwe ta bA hoH/ A ma la/ shwe tau hAM/ shwe ta bA hAM/ ngi la/ shwe tau hi/ shwe ta bA hi/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ shwe ta ba s+su/ saM bu d+d+hi la/ a wa yAH/ shwe ta bAHpu ro DA sh+tsa/ a wa yA ja shwe ta bA ha bu ro DA sa rnams kyi'ang ngo / /gong du/
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]a tu/ as mtha'i byings ma yin pa'i 'o zhes pa'i 'grel par/ saM bud+d+hi yin pa'i su pha rol la zhes pa byung yang / a wa yA dza/ shwe ta bA ta/ pu ro DAs zhes pa 'di rnams kyi saM bu d+d+hi la u pa d+hA ring por 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas gnyis ka 'jug pas 'dam ka can du bzung ngo / /
[\[64b.2\]]he shwe ta bAH/ he shwe ta baH/ he shwe ta bA tau/ he shwe ya bA haH/ u k+tha shA sa/ sogs kyang shwe ta bA ha dang 'dra ste/ su la/ Das/ Ti phyis/ u pa d+hA ring po/ u k+tha shAH/ au dang dza sa la/ u k+tha shA saH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ u k+tha shA saM/ uk+tha shA sau/ u k+tha
[\[64b.3\]]shA saH/ TA la/ u k+tha shA sA/ b+h+yAM la/ Das Ti phyis/ mtshams sbyar/ u k+tha sho b+h+yAM/ u k+tha sho b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ u k+tha shA se/ u k+tha sho b+h+yAM/ u k+tha sho b+h+yAH/ nga si la/ u k+tha shA saH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ u k+tha shA saH/ u k+tha shA soH/ u k+tha shA soH/ u k+tha shA sAM/ ngi la/
[\[64b.4\]]u k+tha shA si/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ u k+tha shAHsu/ u k+tha shA s+su/ bod tshig /he u k+tha shAH/ he u k+tha shaH/ he u k+tha shaH/ he mu k+tha shA sau/ he u k+tha shA saH/ u wa yA dza/ bu ro DA sa dag kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ twa rA sA ha/ su/ ha'i D+ha 'os/ ha D+ha/ sa he s+sA D+ha s+saH/ sA ha'i sA D+ha'i sa'o/ /
[\[64b.5\]]sA ha zhes pa'i rtags sA D+ha zhes par 'gyur ba'i snga ma'i sa de Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ Sha sa ha la dI pa/ zhes pas su phyis/ gnas med pa la 'os D+ha Da'am/ Ta/ tA rA ShA Da/ twa rA ShA Ta/ au dang dza sa la/ brgya byin gyi rta/ twa rA sA hauH/ twa rA sA haH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ twa rA sA haM/ twa rA
[\[64b.6\]]sA hau/ twa rA sA haH/ TA/ twa rA sA hA/ b+h+yAM b+hi sa la/ twa rA ShA D+b+h+yAM/ twa rA ShA D+b+hiH/ de la/ twa rA sA he/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa/ twa rA ShA D+b+h+yAM/ twa rA ShA D+b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ twa rA sA haH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ twa rA sA haH/ twa rA sA hoH/ twa rA sA hAM/ ngi la/ twa rA sA hi/ os 'dra/ su pa la/
[\[64b.7\]]twa rA ShA T+su/ bod tshig la/ he twa rA ShA Ta/ he twa rA ShA Ta/ he twa rA ShA Da/ he twa rA sA ho/ he twa rA sA haH/ pa yig mtha'i can su di wa la su/ nyi ma bzang po/ di wa au ta/ di wA'i au'i/ /di wa zhes pa'i wa ni su pha rol la au ru 'gyur ro/ /su d+yauH/ au dang dza sa la/ su di wau/ su di waH/ a ma la/
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]'grel par di wa'i wa a ma la yang na a'o zhes pa byung bas/ lugs gcig la di wa'i wa a/ i ka'i a tsa la ya Na/ a ma la snga 'os/ su d+yaM/ lugs gcig la/ su di waM/ au dang shas la/ su de wau/ su di waH/ TA la/ su di waH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa la/ di wa
[\[65a.2\]]u ta di wa'i u ta'o/ /di wa zhes pa'i wa ni rnam dbye dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge pha rol la u ru 'gyur ro/ /su d+yu b+h+yAM/ su d+yU b+hiH/ nge la/ su di wi/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa la/ su dU b+h+yAM/ su d+yA b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ su di waH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ su di waH/ su di woH/ su di wAM/ di la/ su di wi/
[\[65a.3\]]os la/ su di woH/ su pa la/ su d+yu Shu/ bod tshig la/ he su d+yauH/ he su di wau/ he su di waH/ ra mtha' can la tsa tu ra zhes par mang tshig bdun po sbyor te/ tsa tu ra/ dza sa/ tsa tu ra an Du ha dag gi A ma u dA t+ta'o zhes pa'i mdos A ma A ga ma/ tsa twA raH/ sha sa la/ tsa tu raH/
[\[65a.4\]]b+his la/ tsa tu r+b+hiH/ b+h+ya sa gnyis la/ tsa tu r+b+h+yaH/ A ma la/ Sha Ta tsa tu r+b+h+ya sh+tsa/ Sha Ta tsa tur rnams las kyang ngo / bzhi/ /Sha Ta dang tsa tu ra zhes pa la/ rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma la nu Ta ster ro/ /ra Sha sogs kyis na Na/ a tsa las ra ha la zhes pas Da gnyis/ tsa tu r+b+hA/ su ba la/ ro sbu gi
[\[65a.5\]]ra'i su pa la'o/ /tsa tu ra gyi ra ni rnam dbye bdun pa'i mang tshig su pa pha rol la rnam par bcad par mi 'gyur bar ra nyid 'dren pa'o/ /tsa tu r+Shu/ spyir btang ra ha la/ zhes pas Sha gnyis su bya ba thob kyang / sha ro ci/ a tsa la shar gyi'o/ /shar so so'i bsdu ba'i yi ge a tsa dang ldan pa dag ra
[\[65a.6\]]ha la gnyis su mi 'gyur ro zhes pas dmigs bsal gyi mdos gnyis su mi 'gyur/ he tsa twA raH/ pri ya tsa tu ra zhes pa lta bu rnam dbye thams cad 'jug ste/ su la/ pri ya tsa twAH/ au dang dza sa la/ pri ya tsa twA raH/ a ma la/ pri ya tsa twA raM/ au la/ pri ya tsa twA rau/ sha sa la/
[\[65a.7\]]pri ya tsa tu raH/ gsum pa rnams la/ pri ya tsa tu rA/ pri ya tsa tu r+b+haM/ pri ya tsa tu r+b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ dga' ba bzhi/ pri ya tsa tur+b+h+yaH/ da si la/ pri ya tsa tu raH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga sa la/ pri ya tsa tu raH/ o sa la/ pri ya tsa tu roH/ A ma la/ grangs bgrod
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]pa'i skabs ma gtogs nu Ta mi 'jug /pri ya tsa tu rAM/ ngi ya/ pri ya tsa tu ri/ o sa la/ pri ya tsa tu roH/ pri ya tsa tu r+Shu/ saM bu d+d+hi la aM/ he tsa twaH/ he tsa twA ra!/ he tsa twA raH/ ma mtha' can la/ pra shA ma la su/ mo no d+sA toH/ byings kyi ma'i na'o/ /byings kyi ma ni dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi
[\[65b.2\]]ge rnams pha rol dang tshig mtha' la na ru 'gyur te/ ma na/ su phyis/ pra shA na/ au dang dza sa la/ /pra shA mau/ pra shA maH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ pra shA mi/ pa shA mau/ pra shA maH/ TA la/ pra shA mA/ b+h+yAM la/ pra shA n+b+hAMH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ pra shA me/ pra shA n+b+h+yAM/
[\[65b.3\]]pra shA n+b+haH/ nga si la/ pra sha maH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ pra shA maH/ pra shA moH/ pra shA mAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ pra shA mi/ pra shA moH/ pra shA n+su/ he pra shA na/ he pra shA mau/ he pra shA maH/ ki ma la/ su/ ki maHkaH/ ki ma gyi ka'o/ /ki ma zhes pa'i sgra ni rnam dbye gang
[\[65b.4\]]mthong yang ka zhes pa 'gyur ro/ /kaH/ kau/ ke/ sogs te po rtags sa rba'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /sa rba nA ma'i nang tshan i dam la/ su/ i dmo maH/ i dam gyi ma'o/ i dam zhes pa'i ma i ni su pha rol lam nyid du gnas te/ t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a'o zhes pa 'gog
[\[65b.5\]]pa'i don no/ /i da mo ya puM si/ i dam gyi a y+ra skyes pa la'o/ i dam zhes pa'i i dang da srog med ni skyas pa'i rtags 'di/ kyi skabs si pha rol la yang a ya zhes par 'gyur te/ a yaM/ i dam la/ au/ t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a 'os ma a/ a to du Ne/ a da kyi yon
[\[65b.6\]]tan la'o/ /tshig mtha' ma yin pa'i a ya mtha' las i dam gyis ar 'gyur ba lta bu'i a yig yon tan gyi ming can de snga ma'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /i da/ au/ da sh+tsa/ da'i'ang ngo / i dam zhes pa'i ma ar 'gyur ba snga ma'i gzugs su sor ba'i da de'ang rnam dbye gang mthong
[\[65b.7\]]yang ma ru 'gyur ro/ /i ma/ au/ e ca la 'phel ba 'os/ i mau/ dzas la/ i dam/ i ma/ dzas shI a las yon tan/ i me/ gnyis pa rnams la/ i maM/ i mau/ i mA na/ TA la/ a nA bya kaH/ A pa la a na ka ma yin pa la'o/ i dam zhes t+yad sogs rnams
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]kyi a 'os/ i da zhes par bsgyur ba ni ka'i rkyan mtha' can ma yin na A pa so sor bsdu ba ste rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA nas bdun pa'i su pa kyi pa'i par gyi rnam dbye gang mthong yang an zhes par 'gyur ro/ /TA in/ a ne na/ b+h+yAM la/ ha li lo paH/ hal la dbyi'o/ /TA sogs kyi
[\[66a.2\]]nang tshan yin kyang rnam dbye ha la thog ma can rnams la yid zhes pa a nar mi 'gyur bar i dang da gnyis dbyi'o/ /a b+h+yAM/ su ba la'ang ngos ring po/ A b+h+yAM/ b+hi sa la/ a b+hiH/ ne dam da sor koH/ ka ma yin pa dag gi i dam a das dag la ma yin no/ /ka'i rkyen mtha' can ma yin pa'i i
[\[66a.3\]]dam dang a das dag las rnams dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig b+his ni ais zhes par mi 'gyur ro/ /mang tshig la dz+hal la e ta 'os/ e b+hiH/ nge la/ t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a 'os/ i da/ de/ sarba'i ming can las smai 'os/ nge smai/ hal la dbyi 'os/ i dang dbyi sa/ a smai/ b+h+yAM dang b+h+yas la/
[\[66a.4\]]A b+h+yAM/ e b+h+yaH/ i da/ nga si/ nga si ngi dag gi smA ta smyin dag gos/ nga si/ smA ta/ ha la la dbyi 'os id phyis/ a smAng / A b+h+yAM/ e b+h+yaH/ nga sa la/ a s+ya/ o sa la/ A pa la an kam yin pa la 'os i da a na zhes par 'gyur/ os la'ang ngos/ rtags mtha' e/
[\[66a.5\]]a na yoH/ A ma la/ e ShI/ ngi la/ a smin/ os la/ a na yoH/ su pa la/ e Sha/ yang mi dam gyi lus 'gyur lugs gcig la/ id zhes pa rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang / gsum pa'i nA dang drug pa dang bdun pa'i os rnams la yang na ba ste/ dwi tI yA Tau s+s+we na/ gnyis
[\[66a.6\]]pa TA/ os rnams la e na'o/ rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang TA dang os gnyis rnams pha rol la i dam dang e ta da ni e na zhes par 'gyur ro/ /gnyis pa rnams la/ e naM/ e nau/ e nA na/ TA la/ e ne na/ o sa la/ e na yoH/ t+ya da sogs la bod tshig mi 'jug go/ ! /
[\[66a.7\]]na mtha' can la/ rA dza na la/ rgyal po'am gsal ba/ su/ saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la'ang ngaso/ u pa d+hA ring po/ ha la dI pa A pa sogs kyis/ su phyi sa/ ming mtha'i ma dbyi 'os/ na phyis/ RA dzA/ au dang dza sa la/ saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa zhes pas/ u pa
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]d+hA ring po/ rA dzA namauH/ rA dzA naH/ rA dza na? la/ saM bud+d+hi'i ming can su/ na ngi saM bud+d+h+yoH/ ngi saM bud+d+hi dag la ma yin no/ /rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi dang saM bud+d+hi pha rol la ming mtha'i na dbyi ba ma yin no zhes pas na mi phyi/ he rA dza na/ he rA dzA nau/ he rA dzA naH/ aM dang au la/ rA dzA na/ rA dzA nau/ rA dzA ma la shas/
[\[66b.2\]]na'i a ta dbyi 'os/ dza'i a phyis/ a tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/ na nya/ dza nya 'dus pa dz+nya/ rA dz+nyaH/ TA la/ RA dz+nyA/ b+h+yAM la/ ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/ na phyis/ na lo paHsu p+s+wa ra saM dz+nyA tu g+pi d+hi Shu kr-i ti/ na dbyi ba su pa dbyangs ming kraM ta tu ka gi cho ga rnams la'o/ /su pa ste su sogs rnam dbye rnams
[\[66b.3\]]dang dbyangs pha rol dang ming dang kr-i ta kyi rkyen rnams dang / tu ka A ga ma sogs la na phyis pa'i rjes la cho ga gzhan mi 'jug ste/ dper na b+h+yAM gyi skabs su ma phyis pa'i rjes la su ba la'o zhes pa'i ring mo byed pa lta bu'o/ /rA dza b+h+yAM/ b+hi sa la/ rA dza b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ rA dz+nya/ rA dza
[\[66b.4\]]b+h+yaM/ rA dza b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ rA dz+nyaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga sa la/ rA dz+nyaH/ o sa la/ rA dz+nyoH/ U ma la/ rA dz+nyAM/ ngi la/ ngis bud+d+hi dag la ma yin no zhes pas/ lugs gcig la/ rA dza ni/ yang na/ rA dz+nyi/ o sa la/ rA dz+nyauH/ su pa la/ rA dza su/ ! pra ti di wan la su/ pra ti di wA/
[\[66b.5\]]au dang dzas/ pra ti di wA nau/ pra ti di wA naH/ a ma la/ pra ti di wA naM/ au la/ pra ti di wA nau/ shas la/ 'grel par a phyis pa las u pa d+hA ring po'o zhes pa byung bas/ na'i a dbyi 'os/ a phyis/ u pa d+hA ring po/ pra ti dI b+naH/ gsumapa rnams la/ pra ti dI b+nA/ so sor gsal ba/
[\[66b.6\]]pra te di wa b+h+yAM/ pra ti di wa b+hiH/ sogs/ rA dza na gyi skabs dang 'dra'o/ ! /ya dz+wa na la su/ ya dz+wA/ au la/ ya dz+wA nau/ dzas la/ ya dz+wA naH/ a ma dang au la/ ya dz+wA naM/ ya dz+wA nau/ shas la/ na saM yo gA dwa maM tA ta/ wa ma yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' las ma yin no/ /rtags
[\[66b.7\]]kyi u pa dz+hA wa yig dang ma yig brtsegs pa yod na spyir btang na'i a dbyi'o/ lha mchod mkhan/ zhes pa'i a mi dbyi ba ni nyid a tsa thog ma can rnams la 'dren pa kho na'o/ /ya dz+wa naH/ TA la/ ya dz+wa nA/ b+h+yAM b+hi sa/ ya dz+wa b+h+yAM/ ya dz+wa b+hiH/ nge la/ ya dzA ni/ b+h+yAM b+h+yaH'dra/ nga si la/ ya dz+r+wa naH/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ ya dz+wa naH/ ya dz+wa noH/ ya dz+wa nAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ ya dzA ni/ ya dz+wa noH/ ya dz+wa su/ bod tshig la/ he ya dz+wa na/ he ya dz+wA nau/ he ya dz+wA naH/ ! bra h+ma na yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /br-i ta han la su/ sau tsa/ su la'ang ngo / /rtags in mtha'
[\[67a.2\]]dang han dang / pu Sha na/ a r+Ya man rnams kyi saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i yu la u pa d+hA rtag tu ring por 'gyur te/ br-i tra hA/ au la/ rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig pa la Na 'o zhes pas/ na Na/ br-i tra ha Nau/ tshangs pa/ 'dir su ma gtogs rnam  'phel 'joms/ dbye thams can gnas pa'i ming can rnams
[\[67a.3\]]la u pad+hA ring por mi 'gyur te/ dza sa la/ br-i tra ha NaH/ a ma la/ br-i tra ha NaM/ au la/ br-i tra ha nau/ sha sa la/ na'i a dbyi 'os a phyis/ ho haM te rnyI n+ni Sha/ han gyi ha'i nya Na 'gro ba na rnams la'o/ /byings tan 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa'i han gyi ha ni rkyen nya Na 'gro ba'i ming can rnams
[\[67a.4\]]dang ba pha rol la g+ha ru 'gyur ro/ /bri tra hag+han/ shas/ haM ter th+pU rba s+ya/ han gyi a ta snga ma'i'o/ ha na zhes pa'i sgra'i sngon na a ta ste a yig yod na nar mi 'gyur te/ gong du rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig pa la Na'o zhes pa'i spyir btang 'gog pa'i don no/ /br-i tra g+h+naH/ gsum pa rnams
[\[67a.5\]]la/ br-i tra g+h+nA/ br-i tra ha b+h+yAM/ br-i tra ha b+hiH/ de la/ br-i tra g+h+ne/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga si la/ br-i tra g+h+naH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ br-i tra g+h+naH/ br-i tra g+h+naM/ bdun pa rnams la/ br-i tra g+h+ni/ br-i tra g+h+noH/ br-i tra ha su/ bod tshig la/ he br-i tra ha na/ he br-i tra ha Nau/ he pr-i tra ha NaH/
[\[67a.6\]]sha N+gi na/ ya shA swi na/ pu Sha na/ a r+YA ma na rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra la/ pu Sha na la/ 'grel par ngi la Ti yang na dbyi'o zhes pa byung bas/ lugs gcig la/ Ti phyis/ pu Shi/ pu Sh+Ni/ pu Sha Ni ste gzugs gsum 'byung ngo / ! /ma g+ha wan la/ su/ ma g+ha wA ba hu laM/ mag+ha wa na
[\[67a.7\]]ri dwags kr-i Sh+Na sA ra/ rgyas la/ nyi ma/ gyi yang na'o/ ma g+ha wa na zhes pa'i sgra ni rnam dbye gang mthong yang ma g+ha wa tr-i zhes par yang na 'gyur ro/ r-i 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas mi gnas kyang dgos pa'i ched du'o/ /u g+di tsA sa rba  brgya byin/ nA ma s+thA ne d+hA toH/ u ka 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]thams cad gnas pa'i ming tsa rnams la byings ma yin pa la'o/ /rtags mthar u ka ste u yig dang r-i yig dang l-i yig 'gro ba rnams dang a tsa zhes pa'i rtags byings ma yin pa dag la pha rol rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming tsa na gang byung yang num A ga ma ster ro/ /ma g+ha wa na tra/ su/
[\[67b.2\]]a tu as mtha'i 'ang byings ma yin pa'i 'os/ u pa d+hA ring po/ ha la dI pa A ba sogs kyi mdos su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ ta phyis/ mag+ha wA na/ au dang dza sa la/ ma g+ha wA n+tau/ mag+ha wA n+taH/ a ma dang au la/ mag+ha wA n+taM/ mag+ha wA n+tau/ sha sa la/ mag+ha
[\[67b.3\]]wa taH/ gsum pa rnams la/ mag+ha wa tA/ mag+ha wa d+b+h+yA/ mag+ha wa d+b+hiH/ nge la/ mag+ha wa te/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga si la/ mag+ha wa taH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ mag+ha wa taH/ mag+ha wA toH/ mag+ha wa tAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ mag+ha wa ti/ mag+ha wa toH/ mag+ha wa t+su/
[\[67b.4\]]bod tshig rnams la/ he mag+ha wa na/ he mag+ha wA n+tau/ he mag+ha wA n+taH/ mag+ha wa na/ zhes pa/ mag+ha wa tr-i zhes par ma 'gyur pa'i phyogs ni/ rnam dbye dang po rnams la/ mag+ha wA/ mag+ha wA nau/ mag+ha wA naH/ a ma dang au la/ mag+ha wA naM/ mag+ha wA nau/ sha sa la/ i gya NaHsaM
[\[67b.5\]]pra sA ra NaM/ ya Na'i i ka tu slar yang dag par bsgyur ro/ /ya Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge grangs mnyam pa rnams su 'gyur te/ de la slar yang dag par bsgyur ba'i ming can zhes zer ro/ /shA yu wa mag+ho nA ma ta d+d+hi te/ shwa na yu wa na mag+ha wa na rnams kyi de
[\[67b.6\]]phan ma yin pa la'o/ /shwa na la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi de phan gyi rkyen ma yin pa rnam dbye/ shas nas/ bdun pa'i sub kyi bar a tsa thog ma can rnams la slar yang dag par bsgyur te/ wa?/ u/ mag+ha u/ an/ shas/ saM pra sA raNA ts+tsa/ saM pra sA ra Na las kyang ngo / slar yang
[\[67b.7\]]dag par bsgyur ba las pha rol gyi a tsa de yang snga ma'i gzugs su 'gyur bas a u dang bcas pa u/ a la yon tan nos au/ mag+ho naH/ gsum pa rnams la/ mag+ho nA/ mag+ha wa b+h+yAM/ mag+ha wa b+hiH/ nge la/ mag+ho ni/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa 'dra/ nga si la/ mag+ho naH/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya sa
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ mag+ho naH/ mag+ha noH/ mag+ho nAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ mag+ho ni/ mag+ho noH/ mag+ha wa su/ bod tshig la/ he mag+ha ba na/ he mag+ha wA nau/ hem g+ha bAnaH/ ! khyi/ shwa na la su/ shwA/ au dang dza sa la/ shwA naH/ a ma dang au la/
[\[68a.2\]]shwA naM/ shwA nau/ shwan la/ shas/ shwan yu wa na mag+ha wa na rnams kyi zhes pas/ wa u/ shunaH/ TA la/ shunA/ b+h+yA ma b+his la/ shwa b+hi/ shA b+hiH/ rnam dbye lhag ma rnams la'ang a tsa thog ma can rnams shas dang 'dra/ ha la thog ma can rnams b+h+yAM dang 'dra'o/ ! /yu wa na la su/ yu wA/
[\[68a.3\]]au dang dzas la/ yu wA nau/ yu wA naH/ a ma dang au la/ yu wA naM/ yu wA nau/ shas la/ shwa na yu wa na sogs kyi mdos wa u/ yu u in/ shas/ na saM pra sAr Ni saM pra sA ra NaM/ slar yang dag par bsgyur ba la slar yang dag par bsgyur ba mi yin no/ /wa u nga  lang tsho'am dar bab/
[\[68a.4\]]bsgyur ba lta bu'i slar yang dag par bsgyur zin pa'i sngon na ya Na'i yi ge yod kyang slar yang dag par bsgyur ba ma yin te/ u'i sngun ma'i ya ir mi 'gyur/ a ka 'dra ba la ring po 'os/ yUnaH/ TA la/ yU nA/ b+h+yAM la/ yu wa b+hiH/ sogs rigs 'gre'o/ ! /a rba na la su/
[\[68a.5\]]arbA/ au dang dzas la/ arba Na s+t+ra sA wa na nyaH/ arba na gyi tri na nya dang su ma yin pa la'o/ arba na zhes pa'i rtags mtha'i na yig ni na nya sngun na yod pa dang rnam dbye dang po gcig tshig su dang saM bud+d+hI rnams ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gang mthong yang tr-i zhes par 'gyur ro/ /arba tr-i/ dzas/ uka
[\[68a.6\]]'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi zhes pa'i mdos num/ u pad+hA ring po/ a rbA n+tau/ arbA n+taH/ a ma dang au la'ang / arbA n+taM/ arbA n+tau/ shas la/ arba taH/ gsum pa rnams la/ arba tA/ arba d+b+hAM/ arba d+b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ arba te/ arba d+b+h+yAM/ arba d+b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ arba taH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas
[\[68a.7\]]'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ arba taH/ arba toH/ arba tAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ arba ti/ arba toH/ arba tU/ bod tshig la/ he arba na/ he arbA n+tau/ he arbA n+taH/ na nya sngun na yod pa/ a na rba na zhes pa'i rtags mtha' tr-i zhes par mi 'gyur te/ cho ga thams cad ya dz+wa na zhes pa'i rtags
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /pa thin la/ su/ pa thim th+YI b+hu k+ShA mA ta/ pa thin ma thi n-i ra b+hu k+Shan rnams kyi A ta'o/ /pa thin la sogs pa'i sgra 'di rnams kyi rtags mtha'i na yig ni su pha rol la A ta du 'gyur ro/ /pa thi A/ su/ i to t+sa rba nA ma s+thA ne/ i ta kyi a ta thams cad
[\[68b.2\]]gnas pa'i ming can rnams la'o/ lam/ pa thin la sogs pa rnams kyi i yig ni rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la a yig tu 'gyur te/ pa tha A/ su/ thon+thaH/ tha'i n+tha'o/ /pa thi dang ma thi zhes pa'i tha yig ni rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams pha rol
[\[68b.3\]]la n+tha zhes par 'gyur ro/ /pan+tha A/ su/ a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po/ sa sa dzu la sogs dang khar sogs kyi mdos/ pan+thAH/ au dang dzas la/ pan+thA nau/ pan+thA naH/ a ma la/ pan+thA ni/ au la/ pan+thA nau/ pa thin la/ shas/ b+ha s+ya TeHlo paH/ b+ha'i Ti dbyi'o/ b+ha'i ming can
[\[68b.4\]]pa thin la sogs pa rnams kyi Ti rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa a tsa thog ma can rnams la dbyi ste/ pa thaH/ TA la/ Ti phyis drangs/ pa thU/ b+h+yAM ma b+his la/ ming mtha'i na phyis/ pi thi b+h+yIH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ pa the/ pa thi b+h+yAM/ pa thi b+h+yaH/ nga si la/
[\[68b.5\]]pa thaH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ pa thaH/ pa thoH/ pa thAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ pa thi/ pa thoH/ pa thiShu/ bod tshig la/ he pan+thA/ he pan+thA no/ he pan+thA naH/ ma thi na yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ ! /r-i b+hu k+Shan la/ su/ pa thin ma thin r-i b+huk+Sha na rnams kyi A ta 'os/ na A/
[\[68b.6\]]a ka gi 'dra ba lang ring po/ R-i b+hu k+ShAH/ au dang dzas la/ r-i b+hu k+ShA nau/ r-i b+hu k+ShA naH/ a ma dang au/ r-i b+hu k+ShA naM/ ri b+hu k+ShA nau/ shas la/ b+ha'i Ti dbyi 'os/ Ti phyis drangs/ srungs pa/ r-i b+hu k+ShaH/ TA la/ brgya byin/ r-i b+hu k+ShA/ b+h+yAM la/ r-i b+hu k+Sha b+h+yA/ lta bu ste/ a tsa thog ma can rnams
[\[68b.7\]]la Ti dbyi/ ha la thogs ma can rnams la ming mtha'i na dbyi ba kho na'o/ ! /na mtha' can/ pany+tsa na la/ lnga/ dzas dang shas/ Sh+NaM tA Sha Ta/ Sha na mtha' rnams Sha Ta'o/ /grangs kyi don can gyi Sha yig mtha' can rnams dang na yig mtha' can rnams la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes ming
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]'dogs byed do/ /ming mtha'i na phyis/ /Sha Ta rnams las dbyi 'os/ dzas shas dag phyis/ pa ny+tsa/ bod tshig la/ he pa ny+tsa/ b+his dang b+h+yas gnyis la/ ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/ na phyis/ pany+tsa b+hiH/ pany+tsa b+h+yaH/ pany+tsa b+h+yaH/ A ma la/ Sha Ta ca tur rnams las kyang
[\[69a.2\]]ngos/ nu Ta/ no pa d+hA yA/ na'i u pa d+h+yA'i'o/ /na mtha'i u pad+hA nAM pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ u pad+hA ring po/ ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/ na gong ma phyis/ pany+tsa nAM/ su pa la/ pany+tsa su/ sap+ta na/ na wan/ da shan rnams la'ang cho ga thams cad pany+tsa na dang 'dra'o/ /'di rnams la
[\[69a.3\]]grangs ba grang sa'i skabs su rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig kho na 'jug go/ ! /na yig mtha' can/ aSh+Ta na la/ dzas/ aSh+Ta na A bib+ha k+tau/ aSh+Ta na gyi A rnam dbye la'o/ /aSh+Ta na zhes pa'i rtags/ bdun/ dgu/ bcu/ kyi Ti ni rnam dbye pha rol la A ru 'gyur te/ aSh+TA/ dzas/ aSh+TA b+h+ya au sha/ aSh+TA
[\[69a.4\]]las au'o/ /rtags aSh+TA zhes 'gyur pa'i pha rol dzas shas dag au zhes pe 'gyur te/ brgyad/ dzas au/ e tsa la 'phel ba 'os/ aSh+To/ 'grel par yang na par bshad bas/ lugs gcig la/ Sha Ta rnams las dbyi'o zhes pas/ dzas phyis/ aSh+TA/ shas la yang na bar byas
[\[69a.5\]]pas/ aSh+Tau/ aSh+TA/ bod tshig la/ he aSh+Tau/ he aSh+TA/ b+his la/ aSh+TA b+hiH/ b+h+yas gnyis la/ aSh+TA b+h+yaH/ aSh+TA b+h+yaH/ A ma la/ aSh+TA nAM/ aSh+TA su/ 'grel bar dzas dang shas dag yang na mi dbyi bar a ka 'dra ba'i cho ga dang sar ra rnam bcad byas pas/ aSh+TAHzhes pa yang byed
[\[69a.6\]]gsung ngo / /A ma la yang na nu Ta mi ster bas aSh+TAM zhes pa yang 'byung ngo / ! /d+ha yig mtha' can/ bud+hA la/ su/ a tsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i b+haSha dz+ha'i mtha'i sa d+hA dag la 'os/ bad+ha/ hal dI pa A pa ces pas/ su phyis/ gnas med ba la yang na 'os/ d+ha dra'am ta/ b+hu ta/ dU da/
[\[69a.7\]]au dang dzas la/ bu d+hau/ bu d+haH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ bun+haM/ bud+hau/ bud+haH/ TA la/ bud+hAH/ bud+hA/ b+h+yI la/ rtags pa/ ba b+ha/ dz+ha sha la d+b+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ d+ha da/ b+hu d+b+h+yAM/ b+his la/ b+hu d+hIH/ bzhi la rnams la/ bu d+he/ b+hu d+b+h+yAM/ b+hu d+b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ bud+haH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]rnams la/ bu d+haH/ bu d+hoH/ bu b+hAM/ ngi la/ bud+hi/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ ba b+ha/ khar la tsar 'os/ b+ha ta/ b+hu tU/ bod tshig rnams la/ he b+hu ta/ he b+hu da/ he bu d+hau/ he bu d+haH/ ! /dza yig mtha' can/ yu dza/ r-i tw-i gA b+h-I ka sr-i g+h+r-i gu sh+ni gaM tsu yu dzi kruM tsAM tsa/ r-i twi ka da d+h-I ka/ sri ka/ dr-ika
[\[69b.2\]]u sh+ni ka a ny+tsu yu dza kruM ca rnams kyi 'ang ngo / r-i twi ka sogs 'di rnams la byings las ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen kr-i ta sogs kyi nang tshan kwi na 'gyur te/ yu dza la kwi na byin/ yu dza la kwin byin/ yu dza/ kwin/ ha la mtha'i 'os na phyis/ de phan  sta mchod/ ma yin pa la la sha ku rnams kyi 'os ka phyis/ yu dza/ wi/ i brjod don/
[\[69b.3\]]yin pas phyis/ kr-i da ting / ting ma yin pa kraM ta'o/ ti sogs kyi rkyen ma yin pa'i ming du bsgrub ba'i rkyen rnams la kr-i ta ces zer ro/ be ra pr-ik+ta s+ya/ ba'i a pr-ik+ta'i 'o/ kwin gyi rjes 'brang phyis zin pa'i bsrog med lta du'i bde la a pri k+ta zer zhing de ni dbyi bar bya ste/ ba phyis/ krit+ta d+d+hi tas mA sA sh+tsa/
[\[69b.4\]]kr-i ta de phan tshig sdud rnams kyang ngo / /kring rkyen byin pa'i byings las 'gyur zhin pa de dang de phan gyi rkyen mtha' dang tshig sdud byas pa'i mtha' rnam dbye byin ma grub pa de la ming ngam rtags sam sgra zhes zer te su sogs 'jug pa'i yul yen pas/ yu dza la/ su/ yu dza ras mA se/ yu dza'i tshig
[\[69b.5\]]sdud ma yin pa la'o/ /tshig sdud med pa'i yu dza zhes pa'i rtags la rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams pha rol du byung na num u ga ma 'gyur te/ yu nu ju/ ha la dI ba A pa sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ dza phyis/ kwin+b+ra t+ya ya s+ya kuH/ kwin rkyen gyi ku'o/
[\[69b.6\]]kwin gyi rkyen byin pa'i mtha' na gnas pa'i yi ge rnams pha rol dz+nya la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang tshig mtha' la grangs mnyam pa'i ku ste kwa sder 'gyur te/ ta snga'i lnga pa na/ ka sde'i lnga par 'gyur/ yuM/ au dang dzas la/ yu ny+dzau/ yu ny+dzaH/ am dang au la/ yu ny+dzaM/ yu ny+dzau/ shas la/ yu dzaH/
[\[69b.7\]]T+wa/ yu dzA/ b+h+yAM b+h+ras la/ kwin rkyen gyi ku 'os dza ga yu g+b+hi/ yu g+b+hiH/ nge la/ yu dze/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ yu dza/ b+h+yAM b+h+ya 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ yu dzAH/ yu dzoH/ yu dzAM/ ngi la/ yu dzi/ os la/ yu dzaMH/ su pa la/ dza ga /khar la car 'os/ ga ka /i nya sogs kyis sa
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]'dra ngas/ yu k+Shu/ bod tshig rnams la/ he yuM/ he yuny+dzau/ he yu ny+dzaH/ ! /yu dza tshig sdud can ni/ su yuSh+tsa/ su/ tso d+kuH/ tsu'i ku'o/ /dz+nya laso sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gad rung pha rol du byung ba dang tshig mtha' la tsu ste tsa sde srog med pa rnams ku ste ka sdi'i grangs mthun pa rnams su 'gyur
[\[70a.2\]]te/ dza ga /gnas med pa la yang na 'os kar 'gyur ba'am gnyid du gnas pa 'dam ka can du byas pas/ su yu ka /lags par lha mchod pa/ su yug /au dang dzas la/ 'dren pa ma gtogs bya ba gzhan lhag po med/ su yu dzau/ su yu dzaH/ bod tshig rnams la/ he su yu ka /he su yu ga /
[\[70a.3\]]he su yu dzau/ he su yu dzaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ su yu dzaM/ su yu dzau/ su yu dzaH/ TA la/ su yu dzA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ tsu'i ku/ su yu g+b+h+yAM/ su yu g+b+hiH/ sogs a tsa dang po can rnams la 'dren pa dang / ha la thogs ma can rnams la tsu'i kur 'gyur ba kho na ste snga ma rnams kyis rigs
[\[70a.4\]]'gre'o/ /'grel par/ yu dza/ ting 'dzin gyi don la num mi 'jug go zhes byung bas/ de'i cha su yu dza'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ ! /dza yig mtha' can sany+dza la/ su ha la dIb A pa sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ dza byis/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med
[\[70a.5\]]do zhes pas nya nar log /san/ au dang dzas la/ sany+dzau/ sany+dzaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ sa ny+dzaM/ sa ny+dzau/ sa ny+dzaH/ TA la/ sany+dzA/ b+h+yAM b+his la yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ dza phyis/ nang ro/ saM b+h+yAM/ saM b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ sa ny+dze/ saM b+h+yAM/ saM b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ sany+dzaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas
[\[70a.6\]]'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ sa ny+dzaH/ sany+dzoH/ sany+dzaM/ bdun pa rnams la/ sany+dzi/ sany+dzoH/ saM su/ bod tshig rnams la/ he san/ he sany+dzau/ he sany+dzaH/ ! dza yig mtha' can/ rA dzA la/ su/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sr-i dza sogs kyi mdos/ dza Sha/ ha la dI pa/ A pa sogs kyis su phyis/ gnas med pa
[\[70a.7\]]la yang na 'os/ /ma Da 'am Ta/ rA Ta/ rA Ta/ au dang dzas la/ rA dzau/ rA dzaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ rA dzaM/ rA dzau/ rA dzaH/ TA la/ rA dzA/ b+h+yA ma b+his la/ dza Sha/ gsal las 'bal la/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos Sha Da/ rA n+b+h+yAM/ rA n+b+hiH/ de la/ rA dze/ b+h+yA b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]rA dzaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ rA dzaH/ rA dzoH/ rA dzAM/ ngi la/ rA dzi/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ dza Sha/ Sha Da/ khar la tsar 'os/ TA TA/ rA TU/ bod tshig rnams la/ he rA Ta/ he rA Da/ he rA dzau/ he rA dzaH/ bi b+hA dza/ de we dza/ bi shwa sr-i dza/ pa ri sr-i dza/ pa ri pra dza rnams kyang rA dza
[\[70b.2\]]dang 'dra'o/ ! /bi shwa rA dza/ su/ dza Sha/ Sha Da/ bi shwa rA Da/ bi shwa s+ya ba su rA ToH/ pi shwa'i ba su rA Ta dag la'o/ bi shwa zhes pa/ bsu dang rAdza rA Ta zhes par 'gyur ba'i sngon na yod na rtags ma [\[]ba'i [\]]ring bor 'gyur te/ bi shwA rI ta lta bu ste/ ha la thog ma can rnams la rA dza rA Sha zhes par 'gyur la/
[\[70b.3\]]de'i tshe bi shwa'i sna tshogs gsal ba/ a ring por 'gyur ba ma gtogs rA dza rang gi skabs su bshad pa dang khyad par med do/ bsu zhes pa u yig mtha' can ni/ cho ga thams cad b+ha nu'i skabs dang 'dra/ de'i sngon du bi shwa zhes pa byung na/ bi shwa'i bsu rA Ta dag la 'os ring por 'gyur te/
[\[70b.4\]]dper na/ bi shwA bsuHlta bu'o/ ! /dza yig mtha' can b+h+r-i s+dza la/ su/ skoHsaM yo gA d+yo ra n+te tsa/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' lasnga ma'i sra kra dag ge'ang ngo / /rtags mtha' yang dag par sbyor ba ste/ srog med gnyis brtsegs pa'i mtha'i snga ma des yig gam ka yig yin na dz+hal so
[\[70b.5\]]sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams pha rol dang tshig mtha' la dbyi bar bya ste/ sa phyis/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os Da 'am Ta/ b+h+r-i Ta/ b+h+r-i Ta/ aul/ dz+ha shal dz+hal rnams sos/ dz+ha sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dza'i snga ma'i dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i nad tshan
[\[70b.6\]]sa yig de kho rang dang skye gnas mthun pa'i da yig tu 'gyur/ sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/ dang drangs/ b+h+r-i dz+dzau/ dzas la/ b+h+r-i dz+h+raH/ am dang au la/ b+h+r-i dz+dzaM/ bab+h+r-i dz+dzau/ shas la/ b+h+r-i dz+dzaH/ TA la/ b+h+r-i dz+dzA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' la snga ma'i sa ka dag gis 'os/
[\[70b.7\]]sa phyis/ dza Sha/ Sha Da/ b+h+r-i d+b+h+yAM/ b+h+r-i d+b+hiH/ de la/ b+h+r-i dz+dze/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ b+h+r-i dz+dz+raH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ b+h+r-i dz+dzaH/ b+h+r-i dz+dzoH/ b+h+r-i dz+dzAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ b+h+r-i dz+dzi/ b+h+r-i dz+dz+roH/ b+h+r-i T+su/ bod tshig la/ he b+h+r-i Ta/ he b+h+r-i Ta/ he b+h+r-i Da/ he b+h+r-i dz+dzo/ he b+h+r-i dz+dzaH/ ! /dza yig mtha' can/
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]R-i twi dza la/ su/ r-i twi dza zhes pa ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen kwin byin pa'i rjes yin pas/ kwin rkyen gyi ku 'os/ dza ga/ gnas med pa la yar na 'os/ r-i twi ka/ r-i twi ga/ au dang dzas la/ r-i twi dzau/ r-i twi dzaH/ bod tshig rnams la/ he ri ti ka /he ri twi ga /he r-i twi dzau/ he r-i twi dzaH/ b+h+yAM la/
[\[71a.2\]]R-i twi g+b+h+yI/ sogs rigs 'gre'o/ ! /dza mtha' can/ U rdza la su/ kwin rkyen gyi ku 'os/ dza ga/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ ra yig las ma gtogs yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' mi dbyi/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ U rku/ U rgu/ au la/ U rdzau/ des a tsa dang po can rnams
[\[71a.3\]]rigs 'gre/ b+h+yAM la/ U b+h+yAM/ 'dis ha la dang po can rnams rigs 'gre'o/ ! /da yig mtha' can/ t+ya da/ la/ su/ t+ya da sogs rnams kyi a 'os/ da/ a/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/ snga ma'i gzugs su song / t+ya/ su/ ta dos+saHsA wa ni t+ya yoH/ ta da dag gi su la sa mtha'
[\[71a.4\]]ma yin pa la'o/ /t+yad sogs kyi mtha' ma yin pa'i ta yig dang da yig dag su pha rol las yig tu 'gyur ro/ de/ s+yaH/ o la/ t+yau/ dzas/ shI/ t+ye sogs te/ sarba po rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /da yig mtha' can ta da kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ saH/ tau/ te sogs
[\[71a.5\]]so/ yang ces pa la'ang / yaH/ yau/ ye/ sogs so/ /e ta da la/ e ShaH/ e tau/ e te/ sogs rigs 'gre/ yang e ta da kyi lus 'gyur gzhan ni rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang / TA dang os gnyis la/ gnyis pa TA de/ os rnams la e na'o zhes pas/ e ta da/ e na zhes
[\[71a.6\]]par 'gyur/ dang / gnyis pa rnams la/ e naM/ e nau/ e nA na/ de/ TA la/ e zhe na/ os gnyis la/ e na yoH/ zhes pa'ang lugs gcig go/ ! /da yig mtha' can/ yuSh+ma da/ a smad la/ su/ de pra tha ma yor ma/ de dang po dag gi a ma'o/ /yuSh+ma da dang aSh+ma da ces pa'i rtags las
[\[71a.7\]]rnam dbye dang po rnams dang gnyis pa rnams dang bzhi pa'i de rnams ni a ma zhes par 'gyur te/ su am du 'gyur/ yuSh+ma da/ a ma/ a smad/ am/ twA hau sau/ su la twa a ha 'o/ bod/ nga'am bdag /rnam dbye dang po'i su pha rol la yuSh+ma da kyi a da bzhag pa'i yu Sha ma gsum ni/ twa zhes par
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]'gyur la/ a smad kyi a da bor ba'i A sma rnams a ta zhes par 'gyur te/ twa ad/ a ma/ a ha ad/ a ma/ she She lo paH/ lhag ma la dbyi'o/ /yu Sh+ma da dang a smad ces pa'i da yig A dang ya ru 'gyur ba dag mi dbyi la/ A ya ru 'gyur ba ma yin pa rnams dbyi bar bya ste/ da phyis/
[\[71b.2\]]twa a/ a ma/ a ha a/ am/ a da kyi yon tan la'o dang / am la snga ma 'os/ twaM/ a haM/ yuSh+ma da/ a smad la au/ de dang po dag gi am 'os/ au/ am du 'gyur/ yuSh+ma da/ am/ a smad/ am/ yu wA wo+au dwi ba tsa ne/ gnyis tshig la/ yu wa A wa dag go/ /rnam dbye gnyis
[\[71b.3\]]tshig rnams la/ ad bor ba'i/ yuSh+ma ni/ yu wa dang ad bor ba'i a smA ni/ A wa zhes par 'gyur te/ yu wa ad/ am/ A wa ad/ am/ pra tha mA yA sh+tsa dwi ba tsa ne b+hA ShA yaM/ dang po'i 'ang gnyis tshig brjod pa la'o/ /rnam dbye dang po'i gnyis tshig pha rol la yuSh+ma da ces pa'i
[\[71b.4\]]mtha' Ar 'gyur te/ da yig A ru 'gyur/ yu wa a A/ am/ A wa a A/ am/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/ yu wa A/ am/ A wa A/ am/ a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po dang / am la snga ma 'os/ yu wAM/ A wAM/ yuSh+mad/ a smad la dzas/ de dang po dag gi am
[\[71b.5\]]'os dzas am/ yuSh+mad/ am/ a smad/ am/ yU ya ba yau dza si/ dzas la yU ya ba ya'o/ /rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas pha rol la ad bor ba'i yuSh+m+ra ni yU ya dang ad bor ba'i a sma ni pa ya zhes par 'gyur ro/ /yU ya ad/ am/ ba ya ad/ am/ lhag ma la
[\[71b.6\]]dbyi 'os da phyis/ a da kyi yon tan la 'o dang / am lasnga ma 'os/ yU yaM/ ba yaM/ yuSh+mad/ a smad la/ gnyis pa'i am/ de dang po dag gi zhes pas am am du 'gyur/ yuSh+mad/ am/ a smad/ am/ twa mA we ka ba tsa ne/ gcig tshig la twa ma dag go/ /rnam dbye gcig
[\[71b.7\]]tshig rnams pha rol la/ ad bor ba'i yuSh+m+ra ni twa dang ad bor ba'i a smra ni ma zhes par 'gyur te/ twa ad/ am/ ma ad/ am/ dwi tI yA yAM tsa/ gnyis pa la'ang ngo / /rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams pha rol la'ang yuSh+mad a smad dag gi mtha' ste da A ru 'gyur te/ twa a A am
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]maM a A/ am/ a ta kyi yon tan la'o dang / a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po/ am la snga ma 'os/ twAM/ mAM/ yuSh+mad/ a smad la/ gnyis pa'i au/ de dang po dag gi am 'os/ au am/ gnyis tshig la yu wa A wa dag gos/ yu wa ad/ am/ A wa ad am/
[\[72a.2\]]gnyis pa la'ang ngas da A/ a ta kyi yon tan la'o dang / a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po/ am la snga ma 'os/ yu wAM/ A wAM/ yuSh+ma de a smad la/ gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas/ sha so naH/ shas kyi na 'o/ /yuSh+mad a smad la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas ni na srog med tu 'gyur ro/ /shas na/
[\[72a.3\]]gnyis pa la'ang ngos/ mtha' A/ a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po 'os/ yuSh+mA na/ a smAn/ yuSh+mad/ asmad la/ gsum pa'i TA/ gcig tshig la twa ma dag gos/ twa ad/ TA ma ad/ TA/ yo tsi/ a tsa la ya'o/ au am du 'gyur ba lta bu ma yin pa'i rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can
[\[72a.4\]]gzhan du ma 'gyur ba rnams la/ yuSh+mad/ a smad byi mtha' rten ya ru 'gyur te/ da ya ru bsgyur/ a ta kyi yon tan la'o dang ya drangs pas/ twa yA/ ma yA/ yuSh+mad/ a smad la gsum pa'i b+h+yAM/ gnyis tshig la yu wa A wa dag gos/ yu wa ad/ b+h+yAM/ A wa ad/ b+h+yAM/ yuSh+ma da sma
[\[72a.5\]]dor nA de she/ yuSh+mad a smad dag gi kun nas bsgyur ba la'o/ su am du bsgyur ba lta bu ma yin pa'i rnam dbye ha la thog ma can gzhan du ma 'gyur ba rnams pha rol la yuSh+ma da a smad dag gi mtha' A ru 'gyur te/ da U/ a ta kyi yon tan la'o dang / a ki gi 'dra ba la ring po 'os/ yuwA
[\[72a.6\]]b+h+yAM/ A wA b+h+yAM/ b+his la/ yuSh+ma da a smad dag gi kun nas ma bsgyur ba la'os/ da A/ a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po 'os/ yuSh+sA b+hiH/ asmA b+hiH/ yuSh+mad a smad la/ nge / de dang po dag gi am 'os/ de am/ tu b+h+ya ma h+Yaud yi/ nge la tu b+h+ya h+Ya dag go/ /rnam dbye bzhi pa'i de pha rol la ad
[\[72a.7\]]bor ba'i yuSh+ma ni tu b+h+ya dang ad bor ba'i asmra ni mah+Ya zhes par 'gyur te/ tu b+h+ya dang ma h+la ra bsgyur/ lhag ma la dbyi 'os da phyis/ ata kyi yon tan la'o dang / am la snga ma 'os/ tu b+h+yaM/ mah+YaM/ b+h+yAM gsum pa'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ yuwA b+h+yAM/ A wA b+h+yAM/ yuSh+mad/ a smad la bzhi pa'i b+h+yas/ b+h+ya so
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]b+h+ya ma/ b+h+yas b+h+ya ma'o/ /yuSh+ma da/ a smad dag la/ b+h+yas ni b+h+yam zhes par 'gyur te/ b+h+yas b+h+yaM du bsgyur/ lhag ma la dbyi bos da phyis/ yuSh+ma b+h+yaM/ a smab+h+yaM/ yuSh+ma da a smad la/ lnga ba'i da si/ gcig tshig la twa ma dag gos/ twa ad/ nga si/ ma ad/ nga si/ e ka ba tsan s+ya tsa/ gcig
[\[72b.2\]]tshig gi'ang ngo / /rnam dbye lnga pa'i gcig tshig nga si ni/ yuSh+ma da/ asmad la'ang a ta ces par 'gyur te/ nga si/ a ta/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/ a gnyis ka snga ma'i gzugs su song / twa ta/ ma ta/ lnga pa'i b+h+yA ma yang gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ yu wA b+h+yAM/ A wA b+h+yA ma/
[\[72b.3\]]yuSh+ma da/ a smad la lnga pa'i b+h+yas/ pany+tsa myA a ta/ lnga pa'i a ta'o/ /yuSh+ma dA a smad dag la rnam dbye lnga pa'i b+h+yas ni a ha ces par 'gyur te/ b+h+yas a ta du bsgyur/ lhag ma la dbyi 'os/ da phyis/ a ta kyi yon tan la'os/ yuSh+ma ta/ a smad/ yuSh+mad asmad la/ drug pa'i ngas/
[\[72b.4\]]ta wa ma maung si/ ngas la ta wa ma ma dag go/ /rnam dbye drug pa'i ngas pha rol la ad bor ba'i yuSh+ma ni ta wa dang ad bor ba'i asmra ni ma ma zhes par 'gyur te/ ta wa ad/ ngas/ ma ma ad/ ngas/ yuSh+ma da smad+b+h+yAM da so a shwa/ yuSh+ma da a smad dag las ngas kyi a sha 'o/ /yu smad a smad
[\[72b.5\]]dag las rnam dbye drug pa'i ngas ni a sha zhes par 'gyur te/ ngas/ a sha ru bsgyur/ sha 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ lhag ma la dbye 'os daphyis/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os a gnyer snga ba'i gzugs su song / ta wa/ ma ma/ yu Sh+mad a smad la drug pa'i os/ gnyis tshig
[\[72b.6\]]la yu wa A dag gos/ yu wa ad/ os/ A wa ad/ /os/ a tsal ya 'os/ da ya/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/ a snga ma'i gzugs su song drangs bas/ yu wa yoH/ Awa yoH/ yuSh+ma da a smad la drug pa'i A ma/ lhag ma la dbyi 'os/ da phyis/ A ma la sarba'i ming can
[\[72b.7\]]rnams la su Ta 'os/ su Ta A ga ma/ yuSh+ma/ sA ma/ a sma/ sA ma/ sA ma a kaM sA ma gyi A kaM do/ /yuSh+mad a smad la rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma suT dang bcas pa'i sA ma zhes pa ni/ A kaM zhes par 'gyur te/ sAM A kaM du bsgyur/ a ka gi 'dra ba la ring po 'os/ yuSh+mA kaM//
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]asmA kaM/ yuSh+ma da a smad la rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi/ gcig tshig la twa ma dag gos/ twa ad/ ngi/ ma ad/ ngi/ a tsa la ya 'os/ nga ya/ twa yi/ ma ya/ os drug pa'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ yu wa yoH/ A wa yoH/ yuSh+ma da a smad la/ bdun pa'i ma da tshig su pa/
[\[73a.2\]]yuSh+mad a smad dag gi kun nas ma bsgyur ba la 'os/ da A/ a ka gi 'dra pa la ring po 'os/ yuSh+mA su/ a smA su/ ! yang yuSh+mad a smad kyi lus 'gyur gzhan ni mi zad pa'i tshig sdud kyis rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig bsdus rjes a ti snga ma can ni rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig dang mang tshig dang
[\[73a.3\]]bzhi ba'i ngi/ drug pa'i ngas rnams ma gtogs pha rol du rnam dbye gang byung yang ad bor ba'i yuSh+ma ni twa dang ad por ba'i a sma ni ma zhes pa kho nar 'gyur te/ dper na/ twAM bA a ti/ mAM bA a ti zhes pa rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig am/ tshig sdud kyis bsdus a ti sngon/ a ti
[\[73a.4\]]yuSh+ma da/ a ti a smad ces pa la/ rnam dbye gong du smos pa rnams ma gtogs gang byung yang yuSh+ma twa dang asnam zhes par 'gyur/ de nas gong du bstan pa'i rang rang gi tshogs bsgrub ste/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a ti twaM/ a t+ya haM/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti twAM/ a timAM/
[\[73a.5\]]mang tshig ya/ a ti yU yaM/ a ti pa yaM/ gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti tI/ a ti mAM/ gnyis tshig la/ a te twAM/ a ti mAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti twA na/ a ti mA na/ gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti twa yA/ a te ma yA/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti twA b+h+yAM/ a ti mA b+h+yaM/ mang
[\[73a.6\]]tshig la/ a ti twA b+hiH/ a ti mA b+hiH/ bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti tu b+h+yaM/ a tayi ma h+YaM/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti twA b+h+yAM/ a ti mA b+h+yAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti twa b+h+yaM/ a ti ma b+h+yaM/ lnga pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti twa ta/ a ti ma ta/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti twA b+h+yAM/ a ti mA b+h+yAM/ mang
[\[73a.7\]]tshig la/ a ti twa ta/ a ti ma ta/ dag pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti ta wa/ a ti ma ma/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti twa yoH/ a ti ma yoH/ mang tshig la/ a ti twA kaM /a ti mA kaM /bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti twa yi/ a ti ma yi/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti tA yoH/ a ti ma yoH/
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]mang tshig la/ a ti twA su/ a ti mA su/ lta bu'o/ /yang mi zad pa'i tshig bsdu sa rjes a ti snga ma can ni gong du smos pa'i rnam dbye rnams bor ba'i pha rol du rnam dbye gang byung yang ad bor ba'i yuSh+ma ni yu wa dang / ad por ba'i a sma nI wa zhes par
[\[73b.2\]]'gyur te/ dper na/ yu waM a ti/ A waM a ti/ zhes ba la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig au sdud kyis bsdus/ a ti sngon/ a ti yuSh+ma da/ a ti a sman ces pa la rnam dbye dmigs bsal bzhi po ma gtogs rnam dbye gang byung yang yuSh+ma ni yu wa dang / asma ni A wa kho nar
[\[73b.3\]]'gyur/ de nas rang rang gi cho ga gong du bshad pa rnams kyis bsgrubs bas/ dper na/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la a te twaM/ a d+ya haM/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yu wAM/ a ti A wAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti yU yaM/ a ti ba yaM/ gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/ a te yu wAM/
[\[73b.4\]]a ti A wAM/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yu wAM/ a ti A wAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti yu wA na/ a ti A wA na/ gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti yu wa yA/ a ti A wa yA/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yu wA b+h+yAM/ a ti A wA b+h+yAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti yu wA b+hiH/ a ti A wA b+hiH/ bzhi pa'i
[\[73b.5\]]gcig tshig la/ a ti tu b+h+yaM/ a ti ma h+YaM/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yu wA b+h+yAM/ a ti A wA b+h+yAM/ ming tshig la/ ati yu wab+h+yaM/ a ti yu A wa b+h+yaM/ lnga pa'i gcig tshig la/ a te yu wa ta/ a ti A wa ta/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yu wA b+h+yAM/ a ti A wA b+h+yAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti yu wa ta/
[\[73b.6\]]a ti A wa ta/ drug pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti ta pa/ a ti ma ma/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yu ba yoH/ a ti A ba yoH/ ming tshig la/ a ti yu bA kaM/ a ti A bA kaM/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti yu ba yi/ a ti A ba yi/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yu ba yoH/ a ti A ba yoH/ mang
[\[73b.7\]]tshig la/ a ti yu bA su/ a ti A bA su/ yang yuSh+man a ti/ asmAn a te/ gong bzhin mi zad pa'i tshig sdang[(]kyis [,]gis [)]rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig bsdus rjes a ti snga ma ni rnam dbye dmigs bsal bzhi po ma gtogs rnam dbye gang byung yang gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyur bar yuSh+mad asmAn ces
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]pa nyid du gnas la/ de nas rnam dbye rang rang gi cho ga gong du bshad pa ltar bya ste/ gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas tshig sdud kyis bsdus te a ti sngon/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a ti twaM/ a ti a twaM/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mAM/ a ti a smAM/ mang tshig la/
[\[74a.2\]]a ti yU yaM/ a ti pa yaM/ gnyis pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mAM/ a ti a smAM/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mAM/ a ti a smAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mAn/ a ti a smAn/ a ti a smAn/ gsum pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti yuSh+ma yA/ a ti a sma yA/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mA b+h+yAM/ a ti
[\[74a.3\]]asmA b+h+yAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mA b+hiH/ a ti a smA b+hiH/ bzhi pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti tu b+h+yAM/ a ti ma h+YaM/ gnyis tshig la/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mA b+h+yAM/ a ti a smra b+h+yAM/ mang tshig la/ a ti yuSh+ma b+h+yaM/ a ti a sma b+h+yaM/ lnga ba'i gcig tshig la/ a ti yuSh+ma ta/ a ti a sma ta/ gnyis tshig
[\[74a.4\]]la/ a ti yuSh+mA b+h+yAM/ a ti asmA b+h+yAM/ ming tshig la/ a ti yuSh+ma ta/ a ti asmata/ drug pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti ra wa/ a ti ma ma/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yuSh+ma yoH/ a ti asma yoH/ mang tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mA kaM/ a ti a smA kaM/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig la/ a ti yuSh+ma
[\[74a.5\]]yi/ a ti a sma yi/ gnyis tshig la/ a ti yuSh+ma yoH/ a ti a sma yoH/ mang tshig la/ a ti yuSh+mA su/ a ti a smA su/ yuSh+ma da a smad rnam dbye dang bcas pa slar yang khyad par gzhan du 'gyur tshul ni/ yuSh+ma da sma doHSha Sh+ShI tsa tu n+b+ri twi tI yA s+tha yo rbAM nA wau/ yuSh+ma da a smad dag
[\[74a.6\]]gi drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams gnas pa dag gi bAM no dag go/ /tshig gi thog ma ma yin pa la rnam dbye drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams kyi gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/ yuSh+ma da a smad rnam dbye dang bcas pa bAM no zhes par 'gyur te/ dper na/ yuSh+ma da rnam dbye drug pa'i
[\[74a.7\]]gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/ yu ba yoH/ zhes pa bAM zhes par 'gyur/ a smad drug pa'i gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/ a ba yoH/ zhes pa nau zhes par 'gyur/ de bzhin du bzhi pa'i gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zhin pa/ yu bA b+h+yAM ni bAM dang / A bA b+h+yAM ni no zhes par 'gyur/
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]de bzhin du/ gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/ yu bAM/ ni/ bAM dang / A bAM ni nau zhes par 'gyur ro/ /ba hu ba tsa na s+ya ba sna sau/ mang tshig gi bas nas dag go/ /rnam dbye drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams kyi mang tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/ yuSh+mA kaM dang yuSh+ma b+h+yaM dang yuSh+mA na rnams pas zhes
[\[74b.2\]]par 'gyur/ a smA kaM dang / asmab+h+yaM dang / a smAn rnams nas zhes par 'gyur ro/ /te ma yA be ka ba tsa na s+ya/ gcig tshig gi te me dag go/ /rnam dbye drug pa dang bzhi pa'i gcig tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa/ tu b+h+ya ma dang ta pa dag te zhes par 'gyur/ ma h+YaM dang / ma ma dag me zhes par
[\[74b.3\]]'gyur ro/ twA mau dwi tI yA yAH/ gnyis pa'i twA mA dag go/ /rnam dbye gnyis ba'i gcig tshig gis bsgrubs zin pa'i/ twAM zhes pa ni twA dang / mAM zhes pa ni mA zhes par 'gyur ro/ ! /de dag tshigs bcad dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ shrI sha s+t+wA wa tu mA pI ha da N+wA t+te me bi sha rmasaH/ swA mI
[\[74b.4\]]te me bis ha riHbA ta bA ma pi nau pi b+huH/ de yang bod skad la/ dpal gyi dbang phyug khyod bsrung ba dag la yang / /khyod la sbyin pa bdag la'ang bde ba stsol/ /khyod kyi rje de 'phrog byed bdag gi yang / /mnga' bdag khyod dag la bsrung pa dag la yang / /zhes pa ste/ tshig rkang dang po'i yi ge
[\[74b.5\]]gsum pa la twA dang drug pa la mA zhes pa ni khyod la dang bdag la zhes gnyis ba'i gcig tshig dang / tshig rkang gnyis pa'i yi ge gnyis pa la te dang gsum pa la me ni khyod kyi ched don la bdag gi ched don la zhes pa'i don gyi khyod la dang bdag la ste bzhi pa'i gcig tshig /tshig rkang gsum pa'i yi
[\[74b.6\]]ge gsum pa te dang bzhi ba me ni khyod kyi dang bdag gi zhes drug pa'i gcig tshig /tshig rkang bzhi ba'i yi ge gsum pa bAM dang lnga pa nau ni khyod dag la dang nged dag la zhes gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig go/ /de bzhin du/ su khaM bAM da dA twI shaH/ dbang phyug khyod dag la bde ba sbyin/ su khaM nau da dA twI shaH/
[\[74b.7\]]dbang phyug nged dag la bde ba sbyin/ zhes pa/ bA ma dang nau ni khyod dag la dang nged dag la zhes bzhi ba'i gnyis tshig go/ /pa ti bAM ha riH/ khyed dag gi bdag po 'phrog byed/ pa ti nau gu ruH/ nged dag gi bdag po bla ma/ zhes pa'i bAM dang nau ni khyed dag gi dang nged dag gi zhes drug pa'i gnyis
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]tshig go/ /ta myA byA two/ de'i khyed rnams la bsrung bar mdzod/ ta s+yA byA tA+o/ de'i nged rnams la yang bsrung bar mdzod/ ces pa'i bo dang no ni khyed rnams la nged rnams la zhes gnyis pa'i mang tshig go/ /su khaM bo da d+yAr/ bde ba khyed rnams la sbyin/ su khaM no da byA ra/ bde ba
[\[75a.2\]]nged rnams la sbyin/ zhes pa'i/ bo dang no ni khyod rnams la nged rnams la zhes bzhi ba'i mang tshig go/ /ba ti baHha riH/ khyod rnams kyi bdag po 'phrog byed/ ba tinaHbud+d+haH/ nged rnams kyi bdag po sangs rgyas/ zhes pa'i/ baHdang naHni khyed rnams kyi dang ded rnams kyi zhes drug pa'i
[\[75a.3\]]mang tshig go/ /slar yang kun nas bsgyur ba de rnams 'dod na yin gyi mi byed du mi rung ba ma yin pas 'dam ka can no/ /tshig gi thog ma ma yin pa la zhes pas/ tshig re re'i dang po ste thog ma la/ twAM mAM sogs rnam 'gyur thog ma kho na byed kyi/ twA mA la sogs pa rnams su mi 'gyur te/
[\[75a.4\]]dper na/ twAM pA tu/ mAM pA tu/ zhes pa lta bu dwA mA zhes par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du/ gnyis pa'i mang tshig gi dper brjod/ yuSh+mA na rak+Sha tu go bin+daH/ asmAn bud+d+haHsarba dA pA tu/ zhes pa bas nas su mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar drug pa'i gnyis tshig gi dper brjod/ yu wa yoHpu tra/ A wa yoH
[\[75a.5\]]pu tra/ zhes khyed la bsrung / pa yu ba yoH/ bAM dang / A ba yoH/ no zhes bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan rnams kyang khyod la bsrung ba'i mdzod khyab 'jug /bdag la sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu skyong bar mdzod/ de dag gis rigs 'gre'o/ na tsa bA hA he ba yuk+te/ tsa bA a ha ha e wa rnams  khyod dag gi bu/ nged dag gi bu/
[\[75a.6\]]sbyor ba lam yin no/ tsa la sogs pa lnga po rnams dang sbyor ba'i tshe yang te me sogs slar yang kun nas bsgyur pa de dag mi byed do/ /dper na/ ta wa tsa ma ma tsa me trI tsan+da le khe ba d+d+ha te/ khyod dang nga yi byams 'dris ni/ zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel/ /zhes pa lta bu ste/ te tsa me tsa mi zer bar/ /ha wa
[\[75a.7\]]tsa mam tsa zer ba lta bu'o/ /sdeb sbyor bsgrigs pa dang tshig rkang mi 'grig pa'i skyon yod na tsa sogs dang sbyor ba'i skabs yin kyang te me sogs su bsgyur ba mi 'gog go zhes pa 'grel par gsung ngo / /pa sh+yA m+bai sh+yA nA lo tsa na/ lta ba'i don rnams kyi yang mig gis mi mthong ba la'o/ /lta ba'i don dang
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]sbyor ba'i cha yang mig gis mthong ba'i don yin te me sogs su 'gyur la  mig gis mthong ba'i don ma yin na te me sogs su mi 'gyur bar ta ba ma ma sogs kho nar gnas so/ /'grel yar bod tshig bar ma chad pa gnyis sngon yod na te me sogs su 'gyur la/ bod tshig byin pa'i tshig gcig sngon na yod
[\[75b.2\]]na te me sogs su mi 'gyur zhes pa byung ste/ de yang dper na/ de bA smA n+pA hi nr-i ha re/ bi Sh+No sa nyasmA nrak+Sha sa rba dA/ kye lha bdag rnams la skyong mi'i seng ge/ rtag par bdag rnams la srungs khyab 'jug kye/ zhes pa lta bu ste/ de ba nas sogs mi 'byung bar/ de ba smAn/ biSh+No a smAn zhes byung ba bzhin no/
[\[75b.3\]]bod tshig byin pa gnyis sngon na yod na 'gyur te/ dper na/ ha re kr-i pA lonaHpA hi/ nged rnams la skyongs brtse ldan 'phrog byed kye/ zhes pa lta bu ste/ ha re  kr-i pA lo zhes bod tshig byin pa gnyis kyi rjes su naH/ zhes byung ba lta bu'o/ bod tshig byin pa gcig las med kyang nga'i gong na tshig gzhan
[\[75b.4\]]yod nanaHsogs su 'gyur te/ sa rA dA rak+Sha de ba naH/ kyi lha bdag rnams la srungs rtag tu ni/ /zhes pa lta bu/ de ba zhes bod tshig byin pa gcig las med kyang de'i gong nas rba dA rak+Sha zhes tshig gnyis yod pas naH/ zhes pa byung ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams kyis yuSh+ma da asmad kyi cho ga rnams bshad
[\[75b.5\]]zin to/ /yuSh+ma da asmad gnyis ni yul pho mo ma ning gsum po gang la yang 'jug tu rung ba la/ dngos su pho mo ma ning gi rnam 'gyur logs na med do/ ! /da yig mtha' can/ su pA da la/ su/ ha la dI pa A ba sogs kyis su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ su pA ta/ su pA da/ au dang
[\[75b.6\]]dzas la/ su bA dau/ su bA daH/ bod tshig kyang dang po dang 'dra/ am dang au la/ su bA daM/ su bA dau/ shes la/ bA daH/ ba ta/ bA da kyi pa da'o /bA da ces pa'i rtags ni/ rkang mdzes/ shas nas bzung rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can rnams la ba da ces u pa d+hA thung ngur 'gyur ro/ /su pa ngaH/
[\[75b.7\]]gsum pa rnams la/ su ba dA/ su bA d+b+hAM/ su bA d+b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ su ba de/ su bA d+b+h+yAM/ su pA d+b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ su pa daH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ su ba daH/ su pa doH/ su pa dAM/ bdun pa la/ su pa di/ su pa doH/ su pA dA/ ! /tha yig mtha' can/ mi srubs ba/ ag+ni ma tha
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]la su/ ha la dI pa sogs kyis su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ tha? da? 'am tra/ ag+ni ma ta/ a ga ni mad/ au dang dzas la/ ag+ni mthau/ ag+ni ma thaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ ag+ni ma thaM/ a g+ni mthau/ a g+ni ma thaH/ TA la/ ag+ni ma thA/ b+h+yA ma b+his la/ dz+ha la gyi dza sha 'os/ tha? da?
[\[76a.2\]]a g+ni mad+b+hAM/ a g+ni ma d+b+haMH/ nga si la/ ag+ni ma thaH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ ag+ni ma thaH/ ag+ni ma thoH/ ag+ni ma thAM/ ngi la/ ag+ni ma thi/ os la/ ag+ni ma thoH/ su pa la/ dz+ha la gyi dza sha 'os/ tha? da?/ /bar la tsar 'os da? ta?/ ag+ni ma trU/ bod tshig la?/ he ag+ni ma ta?/ he
[\[76a.3\]]ag+ni ma da?/ he ag+ni mthau/ he ag+ni ma thaH/ ! tsa yig mtha' can/ pra aM tsuM/ r-i twi ka sogs kyis kwin/ kwin yongs rdzogs phyis/ a ni di tAM ha la u bad+hA ya' k+di ti/ ita 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa'i hal gyi u pad+hA'i kwa da? 'gro ba la'o/ /ita 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa'i ha la te gsal
[\[76a.4\]]byed srog med mtha' can gyi u bad+hA'i na yig ni ka? yig 'gro ba'i/ sngon nam shar/ rkyen pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ 'dir kwi na ka 'gro ba yin pas u pad+hA'i na phyis/ pra a tsu la/ su/ ug 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la byings ma yin pa la 'os/
[\[76a.5\]]num u de'i don yin pas phyis/ pra an tsa/ su/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag bar sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ tsa? phyis/ rkyen/ kwin gyi ku 'os/ nang / brAd/ au dang dzas la num/ prA ny+tsau/ prA ny+tsaH/ a ma dang au la yang / num/ prA ny+tsaM/ prA ny+tsau/ shas la/ a tsaH/ /
[\[76a.6\]]a tsa'i 'o/ a tsa zhes u pad+hA'i na phyis pa de'i pha rol du shas la sogs pa a tsa thog ma can rnams byung na a tsa zhes pa'i a yang dbyi bar bya ste/ a phyis/ pa? tsa?/ shas/ tsau/ tsa la'o/ a phyis zin pa'i tsa? zhes pa de'i sngon na a Na so sor bsdu ba ste/ a i u gsum yod
[\[76a.7\]]na ring por 'gyur te/ pra ring par bsgyur/ prA tsaH/ TA la/ prA tsA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ rkyen/ kwin gyi ku 'os/ tsA ku/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ kra gra/ prA g+b+h+yAM/ prA g+b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ brA tse/ prA g+b+h+yAM/ prA g+b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ prA tsaH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]rnams la/ prA tsaH/ prAtsoH/ brA tsAM/ ngios la/ prA tsi/ prA tsoH/ su pa la/ kwin gyi ku 'os/ tsa?ka?/ kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen dag la 'os/ saSha/ ka Sha 'dus pa k+Sha/ prA k+Sha/ bod tshig la/ he prA nga / he prA ny+tsaH/ ! bra t+ya tsa sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /yang any+tsa la
[\[76b.2\]]brten pa'i ming sngon ma la rnam 'gyur 'jug tshul ni/ biSh+pa g+de ba yo sh+tsa Te ra d+r+yaM tsa tau rkyen/ ba bra t+ya ye/ bi Sh+wa ka de wa dag gi'ang Ti'i a dri any+tsa ba 'gro pa'i rkyen can la'o/ /any+tsa ba'i rkyen can gyi sngon du biSh+wa ka ces pa'i rtags dang de wa dang sa rba'i ming can rnams byung na rtags de rnams kyi tri ni a dri
[\[76b.3\]]zhes par 'gyur te/ a dang i/ a tsa zhes gnas pa la/ a da so sa rdA du domaH/ a das kyi sa'i ra la u ste da'i 'ang ma'o/ /a das zhes pa'i sa ni da rung gyur la/ da la u ste da de yang ma ru 'gyur zhing / de yang sngon gyi slob dpon rnams la las da gnyis ka ma dang u ru 'gyur bar
[\[76b.4\]]'dod/ la las phyi ma kho na ing dai mi zad pa'o/ mu zhes par 'gyur bar 'dod do/ /a mu mu ya tsa/ su/ uka 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi zhes pas/ num/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi'os/ tsa phyis/ kwin gyi ku 'os nang / a mu mu yang / au dang dzas la/ a
[\[76b.5\]]mu mu yAny+tsau/ a mu mu ta ny+tsaH/ am dang au la/ a mu mu yany+tsaM/ a mu mu yany+tsau/ shas la/ a tsa'i 'os a phyis/ u mu mu i tsa shas/ tsa? la 'os/ i ring po/ a mu mu I tsoH/ DA la/ a mu mu I tsAM/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ kwan gyi ku/ rkyen/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dzad sha rnams sos/ ka? ga?/
[\[76b.6\]]a mu mu ya k+ShAM/ a mu mu ya g+hiH/ nge la a mu mu I tse/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ a mu mu I tsaH/ b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ a mu mu I tsaH/ a mu mu I tsauH/ a mu mu I tsAM/ ngi aus la/ a mu mu I tsi/ rkyen/ a mu mu I tsoH/ ku ba la/ kwin gyi ku/ kun nas
[\[76b.7\]]bsgyur pa sogs kyis saSha/ ka Sha 'dus pak+Sha/ a mu mu yak+Shu/ bod tshig rnams kyang dang po dang 'dra'o/ /yang na da phyi ma kho na mu ru 'gyur/ a da mu ya tsa/ zhes pa la/ cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/ yang na/ bi? Sh+wa kwa de wa dag gi'ang Ti'i a  rkyan / dri sogs kyi mdos
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]a das kyi Ti/ a dri ru 'gyur/ la las snga ma kho na'i dmar 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ a mu d+r+ya tsa zhes par 'gyur/ rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i cho ga snga ma rnams dang 'dra/ yang na da snga ma yang mar ma bsgyur pa/ a da d+r+ya tsa/ zhes pa la rnam dbye rnams ster te/ de dag a das a tsa dang
[\[77a.2\]]bcas pa la rnam dbye 'jug tshul gzugs bzhi po 'dam ka can no/ /yang u ta snga ma'i a tsa/ u da tsa la/ su au dzas/ u dang / u dany+tsau/ u dany+tsaH/ a ma dang au la/ u dany+tsaM/ u dany+tsau/ u da tsa/ shas la/ u daH/ I ta/ u ta las I ta'o/ /u ta snga ma'i a tsa'i a rnam dbye shas
[\[77a.3\]]la sogs pa a tsa thog ma can rnams pha rol la I ru 'gyur ro/ /u dI tsaH/ TA la/ u dI tsA/ b+h+yA ma b+his la/ u da g+b+h+yAM/ a da g+b+hiH/ nge la/ u dI tse/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ u dI tsaH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ u dI tsoH/ u dI tsAM/ bdun pa rnams la/
[\[77a.4\]]u dI tsi/ u dI tsoH/ u da k+Shu/ bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra'o/ /sa maHsa miH/ sam gyi sa mi 'o/ /a tsa zhes pa'i rtags kyi snga ma'i nyer bskyur sam ni sa mi zhes bar 'gyur te/ sa mya tsa zhes pa'ang cho ga rnams bra tsa'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /ti ras a tsa/ su/ ti
[\[77a.5\]]rAsti r+Ya lo pi/ ti ras kyi ti ri mi dbyi ba la'o/ /ti ras zhes pa ni a tsa a dbyi ba ma yin pa pha rol la ti ri zhes par 'gyur te/ ti r+Ya tsa/ su/ u ka 'gro ba sogs kyis num/ hal dI pa A ba sogs kyis yang dag pa su phyis yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os ca phyis/ kwin gyi ku 'os nang
