[\[77a.6\]]ti r+Yang / au dang dzas la/ tir+Ya ny+tsau/ ti r+Ya ny+tsaH/ a ma dang aul/ ti r+Yany+tsaM/ ti r+Ya ny+tsau/ shas la/ a tsa'i 'os/ a phyis/ ti ras kyi ti ji mi dbyi ba la'o zhes pas a ma phyis na ti ri zhes par 'gyur yang 'dir shas nas bzung dbyangs thog ma can rnams la a dbyi bas ti ras nyid rkyen/ du gnas/
[\[77a.7\]]dud 'gro rgyags po/ sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/ sa sha/ tir sh+tsaH/ TA la/ tir sh+tsA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ tir+Ya g+b+h+yaM/ tir+Ya g+b+hiH/ nge la/ ti ra sh+tse/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ ti ra sh+tsaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ ti ra sh+tsaH/ tir sh+tsoH/ ti ra sh+tsoH/ tir Sh+tsAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ ti ra sh+tsi/ tir sh+tsoH/
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]ti r+Yak+Shu/ bod tshig dang po dang 'dra'o/ /nAM tsaHpU dzA yAM/ any+tsa'i mchod pa la ma yin no/ /mchod pa'i don la any+tsa zhes pa'i u pa d+hA'i na dbyi ba ma yin te/ bra any+tsa su/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ tsa phyis/ kwan gyi ku 'os/ na da/ brAng / au
[\[77b.2\]]dar dzas la/ brA ny+tsau/ brAny+tsaH/ a ma au shas rnams la/ brA ny+tsaM/ prA ny+tsau/ prA ny+tsaH/ TA 'a/ prA ny+tsA/ b+h+yA ma b+his la/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ rab tu mthong / tsa phyis/ kwin gyi ku 'os/ nra du/ prA d+b+h+yAM/ prA d+d+hiH/ nge la/ prA ny+tse/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ byin/ prA ny+tsaH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug
[\[77b.3\]]pa rnams la/ prA ny+tsaH/ prA ny+tsoH/ prA ny+tsAM/ ngi dang os la/ brA ny+tsi/ prAny+tsoH/ su ba la/ dra Na dag gi shar la kuka Tu ka 'os/ ku ka A ga ma/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ rkyen/ ka Sha 'dus pa k+Sha/ prAM k+Sha/ yang na kuka A gam mi ster/ prAM Shu/ bod tshig rnams la/ he prA pa/ te prA ny+tsau/ he
[\[77b.4\]]prA ny+tsaH/ kruny+tsa yang 'di dang 'dra'i/ ! /tsa yig mtha' can/ pa yo mu tsa la/ su/ tsu'i ku 'os/ tsa ku/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ pa yo mu ka /pa yo mu ga /au dang dzas la/ pa yo mu tso/ pa yo mu tsaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ pa yo mu tsa/ ba yo mu tsau/ pa yo mu tsaH/ TA la/ pa yo mu tsA/ b+h+yAM b+h+rais la/
[\[77b.5\]]tsu'i gu 'os/ tsa? ka?/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ kra ga /ba yo mu g+b+h+yAM/ pa yo mu g+b+hiH/ nge la/ pa yo mu tseH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ pa yo mu tsaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ pa yo mu tsaH/ pa yomu tsoH/ pa yo mu tsAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ pa yo mu tsi/ pa yo mu tsoH/ pa yo muk+Shu/ bod
[\[77b.6\]]tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ ! tsa yig mtha' can/ su b-i Sh+tsal/ su/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' snga ma'i su ku dag gi'ang ngos/ sha phyis/ pra sh+tsa b+h+ra sh+dza sogs kyis tsaShA/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ Sha Da/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ su bri Ta /su br-i Da/
[\[77b.7\]]o dang dzas la/ su khri sh+tsau/ su br-i sh+tsaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ su br-i sh+tsaM/ su br-i sh+tsau/ su br-i sh+tsaH/ TA la/ su br-i sh+tsA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ su br-i d+b+h+yAM/ su br-i d+b+hiH/ nge la/ su br-i sh+tse/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ su br-i sh+tsaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ su bri sh+tsaH/ su br-i sh+tsoH/ bdun pa rnams la/
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]su br-i sh+tsi/ su br-i sh+tsoH/ bod tshig rnams la/ he su dr-i Da/ he su br-i Ta/ he su br-i sh+tsaH/ ! ta yig mtha' can/ ma ha ta la/ su/ u ka 'gro ba sogs kyis num/ sa mtha' ma ha ta dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba'i 'os u pa b+h+yA ring po/ ta la sogs kyis su phyis/ yang
[\[78a.2\]]dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ ta byis/ ma hA na/ au dang dzas la/ ma hA n+tau/ ma hA n+taH/ am dang o la/ ma hA n+taM/ ma hA n+to/ shas la/ ma ha te/ chen po/ TA la/ b+h+yAm dang b+his la/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ tra dra/ ma ha d+d+h+yaM/ ma ha d+d+hiH/ nge la/ ma ha te/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/
[\[78a.3\]]ma ha taH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ ma ha taH/ ma ha toH/ ma ha toH/ ma ha tAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ ma ha ti/ ma ha toH/ ma ha t+su/ bod tshig la/ he ma ha na/ he ma hA n+tau+u/ he ma hA n+tAH/ b+ha wa ta la yang u pad+b+hA ring por mi 'gyur/ gzhan cho ga thams cad ma ha ta dang 'dra'o/ d+he ma te ces ba la yang / a ta as
[\[78a.4\]]mtha'i 'ang byings ma yin pa'i 'o zhes pas su'i skabs su u pad+hA ring po byed/ gzhan thams cad b+ha wa ta dang 'dra'o/ /a tra b+ha wa ta dang / ta tra b+ha wa ta ces pa la'ang mchod pa'i don la su'i skabs su u pad+hA ring po byed/ gzhan ma thams cad ng+him ra dang 'dra'o/ /dza sha su ta ces pa' ba a tra b+ha wa ta dang
[\[78a.5\]]'dra'o/ /a b+ha wa ta dang b+ha ga wa ta gnyis kyang cho ga thams cad d+hi ma ta dang 'dra/ saM bu d+d+hi la 'dam ka can te/ d+hi ma ta dang 'dra pa'i phyogs la/ he b+ha ga wa na/ he a g+ha wa na/ yang na 'dam ka/ d+ha wa ta b+ha ga wa ta a ta a g+ha wa ta rnams kyi yang na ste a wa o ta yeng ngos/ a wa o ta du 'gyur/ yang spras ta
[\[78a.6\]]sro ga med ru u brjod don/ skal ldan/ he b+ha boH/ he a g+ho la/ ! u b+he a b+h+ya staM/ gnyis pa la a bru sta'o/ /da da ta ces pa lta bu'i yi ge 'dra ba gnyis btud nas yod pa de la a b+h+ya sta'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/ /da da ta la/ su/ nA b+ha stA ts+tsha tu/ a b+h+ya sta las sha tu'i ma yin no/ /a b+h+ya sta'o ming
[\[78a.7\]]can las kr-i sogs kyi rkyen sha tu'i mtha' can la rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa rnams la'ang num ster ba ma yin te/ sbyin/ num mi steng / ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ da dang / da da ta/ au la/ da da tau/ rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can thams cad de dang 'dra la/ b+h+yA ma la/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ ta da/ da da d+b+hAM/ ha la dang po can rnams 'di dang 'dra/ bod tshig dang po dang 'dra'o/ /ta yig mtha' can dzak+Sha ta thogs la/ dzak+Sha tA da yaHShaT/ dzak+Sha sogs drug la'ang ngo / /dzak+Sha sogs drug dang tsakAs rnams la'ang sha tu'i rkyen mtha' can la ya b+ha sta'i ming can zer te/ num
[\[78b.2\]]'gog pa'i don du'o/ /dzak+Sha sogs sha tu'i mtha' can ni/ dzak+Shatra/ dI b+h+ya ta/ da ri dra ta/ shA sa ta/ bya bya ta/ tsa kwas da/ rnams te 'di rnams la rnam dbye sbyor ba'i cho ga thams cad da da ta dang 'dra'o/ ! /ba yig mtha' can ha maM gu ba la su/ hal sogs kyis su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/
[\[78b.3\]]d+harma gug d+harma gug au dang dzas la/ d+ha rma ku bau/ d+ha rma gu baH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ d+harma gu raM/ d+ha rma gu pau/ d+harma gu paH/ /TA la/ d+ha rma gu pA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ pas/ d+ha rma gu b+h+yAM/ d+ha rma gu bliH/ chos gsang pa/ bzhi ba rnams la/ d+ha rma gu be/ d+ha rma gu s+b+h+yAM/ d+harma gu b+b+h+yAH/ nga si
[\[78b.4\]]la/ d+ha rma gu paH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ d+harma gu paH/ d+harma gu poH/ d+ha rma gu pAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ d+ha rma gu pi/ d+ha rma gu po/ d+ha rma gu p+su/ bod tshig rnams la/ he d+harma gu pa/ he d+harma gu ba/ he d+harma gu pau/ he d+harma gu paH/ ! /sha yig mtha' can/ t+yA dr-i sha la/ su/ hal sogs kyis su
[\[78b.5\]]phyis/ kwan gyi ku 'os/ she ka/ gnas med pa la yang 'os/ t+yA dr-i ka/ t+yA dri ga/ o dang dzas la/ t+yA dr-i shaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ t+yA dr-i shaM/ t+yA dr-i shaMH/ t+yA dr-i shaH/ gsum pa rnams la/ t+yA dr-i shA/ t+yA dr-i l+b+hAM/ de la/ trA dr-i sha/ b+ham b+has 'dra/ nga si la/ de mthong ba/ b+hAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug
[\[78b.6\]]ba rnams la/ d+yAdr-i shaH/ t+yA dr-i shoH/ t+yA dr-i shAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ t+yA dr-i shi/ t+yA dr-i shoH/ t+yA dr-i k+ShA/ bod tshig rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ t+ya dA diShu dr-i sho nyan+Da la tsa ne kany+tsa/ t+ya da sogs rnams ka dr-i sha'i mi mthong ba la ka nya'ang ngo / /t+yad sogs snga ma'i dr-i sha la mthong ba'i don ma yin pa la kra ta sogs kyi
[\[78b.7\]]ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen ka nya yang na 'jug bas/ ka nya byin na/ t+yA dr-i sha/ zhes pa grub ste/ de'i tshe rnam dbye'i cho ga rnams spyir btang a thung mtha' can rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /'grel par/ sa mA na snga ma'i dr-i sha la krin kho na 'jug ste/ de'i ches mA na yang sa zhes par 'gyur ro zhes byung pas/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]sa dri sha/ zhes pa la rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i cho ga rnams t+yA dr-i sha dang 'dra'o/ ! /sha yig mtha' can/ bi sha la/ su/ brash+tsa b+h+raSh+dza sogs kyi mdos sha Sha/ ha la dI ba zhes pas su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ biT/ biT/ au dang dzas la/ bi shau/ bi shaH/ gnyis pa rnams
[\[79a.2\]]mnyam par blta ba'am mtshungs ba blta/ bi shaM/ baM shau/ bi shaH/ TA la/ bi shA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ brash+tsa sogs kyi sha Sha/ dz+hasha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ ShaDa/ bid+b+h+yAM/ bid+b+hiH/ nge la/ bi she/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ bishaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ bi shaH/ bishoH/ bishAM/ ngi la/
[\[79a.3\]]bi shi/ os la/ bi shoH/ su pa la/ biTU/ yang na Da las la d+huT 'os/ d+huT u ga ma/ khar la tsar 'os/ d+ha ta Da Ta/ baD+b+h+yA/ bod tshig rnams la/ he bi Ta/ he bi Da/ he bi shau/ he bi shaH/ sha yig mtha' can/ na sha la/ su/ na she nA/ na sha'i yang na'o/ /na sha zhes pa'i sha ni dz+hal so sor
[\[79a.4\]]bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams pha rol dang tshig mtha' la yang sha ka ru 'gyur te/ sha ka/ su phyis/ gnas med pas/ nag /nag /yang na brash+tsa sogs kyis sha Sha/ gnas med pa sogs kyis naT/ naT/ au dang dzas la/ mi mthong ba'am nyams pa/ na sha/ na shaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ na shaM/ na shau/ na shaH/ TA
[\[79a.5\]]la/ na shA/ b+h+yAm la yang na bar byas bas/ na D+b+h+yAM/ na D+b+h+yAM/ b+his la/ na Sh+b+hiH/ nag+b+hiH/ nge la/ na she/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ na shaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ na shaH/ na shoH/ na shAM/ ngi la/ na shi/ os la/ na shoH/ sub la/ na d+bU/ naD+Yu/ nak+Shu/ bod tshig la/ he na ka/ he na ga/ he na Ta/ he na Da/
[\[79a.6\]]he na shau/ he na shaH/ ! sbra sho nu da ke kwi na/ sbr-i sha'o chu ma yin pa la kwi na'o/ /spri sha reg ba la'o zhes ba'i byings la chu'i don ma yin pa la ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen kwin 'dug go/ /zhes bas kwin byin pa'i mtha' can g+h+r-i ta spr-i sha la/ su/ kIn gyi ku 'os sha ka/ su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i ka/
[\[79a.7\]]g+h+r-i ta spr-i ka/ au dang dzas la/ g+h+r-i ta spri shau/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i shaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i shaM/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i shau/ g+h+r-i ta sprar shaH/ TA la/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i shA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ rkyen/ kwin gyi ku 'os sha ka/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ mnga' reg/ rkyen/ ka ga/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i g+b+h+yAM/ g+h+r-i ta spr-i g+b+hiH/ sogs rigs 'gre'o/ /chu'i don
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]yin na/ u da ka spr-i sha la/ su/ braSh+tsa sogs kyis sha Sha/ gnas med pa sogs kyis/ u da ka spr-iT/ u da ka spr-iT sogs bi sha dang 'dra'o/ ! Sha rigs mtha' can/ dad+h-i Sha la/ su/ kwin gyi ku 'os/ Sha ka/ gnas med pa sogs kyis/ da d+h-I ka /dad+h+r-i ga /au dang dzas la/ da d+h+r-i Shau/ da d+h+r-i ShaH/ gnyis
[\[79b.2\]]pa rnams la/ nus deg da d+h+r-i ShaM/ da d+h+r-i Shau/ da d+h+r-i ShaH/ TA la/ da d+h+r-i ShA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ kwin gyi gu 'os/ Sha ka/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ ku gu/ da d+h+r-i g+b+h+yIH/ da d+h+r-i g+b+hiH/ nge la/ rtsem/ da d+h+r-i She/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ da d+h+r-i ShaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ da d+h+r-i ShaH/ da d+h+r-i ShoH/ da
[\[79b.3\]]d+h+r-i ShAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ dad+h+r-i Shi/ da d+h+r-i ShoH/ da d+h+r-i k+Shu/ bod tshig rnams la/ he da d+h+r-i ka rtses har d+h+r-i ga/ her ng+h+raShau/ he da d+h+r-i ShaH/ ! [\[79b.4\]]la/ rat+na mu Shau/ rat+na mu ShaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ rat+na mu ShaM/ rat+na mu Shau/ rat+na mu ShaH/ TA la/ rat+na mu ShA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ rat+na mu d+b+h+yAM/ rat+na ma d+b+hiH/ nge la/ rat+na mu She/ b+h+yA b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ rat+na mu ShaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ rat+na
[\[79b.5\]]mu ShaH/ rat+na mu ShoH/ rat+na mu ShAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ rat+na mu Shi/ rat+na ShoH/ rat+na mu T+su/ bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ ! /Sha yig mtha' can/ Sha Sha la dzas/ Sha Ta rnams la dbyi 'os/ dzas/ shas/ 'jig/ dz+ho sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ Sha Ta/ gnas med pa
[\[79b.6\]]sogs kyis/ Sha Ta/ Sha Ta/ shas la'ang / Sha Ta/ Sha Ta/ b+his la/ Sha d+b+hiH/ b+h+yas gnyis la/ Sha d+b+h+yaH/ A ma la/ Sha Da tsa tu ra rnams la'ang ngos/ nu Ta/ drug ra Sha sogs kyis na Na/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ Sha Da/ yar gyi rjes su sna ldan la rjes su sna ldan yang na 'os/ Da Na/
[\[79b.7\]]ShaD+b+h+yAM/ Sha d+b+haM/ su pa la/ ShaT+su/ ShaT+t+su/ bod tshig la/ he Sha Ta/ he Sha Ta/ ! [\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]juSha dag gi ru 'os/ Sha ru u brjod don/ pi pa Thir/ rbo ru pa d+hA yA dI r+g+ha i kaH/ ru bu dag gi u pa d+hA'i ring po i ka gi 'o/ /ru yig dang bu yig srog med kyi u pad+lA i ka so sor bsdu pa'i yi ge rnams ring por 'gyur te/ i ring po/ khar dag gis rnam par bcad bya/ pi ma
[\[80a.2\]]ThIH/ au dang dzas la/ pi ba Thi Shau/ pi pa Thi ShaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ pi pa Thi ShaM/ pi pa Thi ShaM/ pi pa Thi Shau/ pi pa Thi ShaH/ TA la/ pi pa Thi ShA/ d+h+yAm d+his la/ su'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ pi pa ThI b+h+yA/ pi pa ThI r+b+hiH/ nge la/ pi pa Thi She/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ pi pa Thi ShaH/ b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/
[\[80a.3\]]drug pa rnams la/ pi pa Thi ShaH/ pi pa Thi ShoH/ pi pa Thi Sh-I/ bdun pa rnams la/ pi pa Thi Shi/ pi pa Thi ShoH/ pi pa tA r+She/ yang na/ num bi sa rdza nI ya sha r+b+ya bA ye pi/ shar la rnam bcad num par na yod kyang ngo / /in so sor bsdu ba sogs pa gar 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan yod na de gnyis kyi par na num
[\[80a.4\]]A ga ma dang rnam bcad yod kyang shar pha rol la Shar 'gyur te/ sa Sha/ pi pa ThIHShu/ bod tshig rnams la/ he pi pa ThIH/ pi pa Thi Shau/ he pe pa Thi ShaH/ ! sa yig mtha' can/ tsi kIR+sa la/ su/ ha la sogs kyis phyis/ yang dag bar sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ sa phyis/ ra rnam bcad/ tsi kInaH/ au
[\[80a.5\]]dang dzas la/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ saSha/ tsikId+Shau/ tsikIr+ShaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ tsikI r+ShaM/ tsikIr+Sho/ tsikI r+ShaH/ TA la/ tsikIr+Sha/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ yang dag par sbyor byed 'dod/ ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ sa phyis/ tsikIr+b+h+yAM/ tsikI r+ShIH/ nge la/ tsikIr+Shai/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ tsikIr+ShaH/ b+h+yam b+h+yas
[\[80a.6\]]'dra/ drug ba rnams la/ tsikIr+ShaH/ tsikIr+ShoH/ tsikIr+ShAM/ bdun ba rnams la/ tsikIr+Shi/ tsikIr+ShoH/ tsikIr+Shu/ bod tshig rnams la/ he tsikIH/ he tsikIr+Sha/ he tsikIr+ShaH/ ! sa yig mtha' can/ ngos la su/ so phyis/ su sa dzu Sha'i ru/ ngoH/ au dang dzas la/ kun nas bsgyur pa sogs kyis/ sa Sha/ do Shau/ do ShaH/
[\[80a.7\]]ma ma la/ do ShaM/ au la/ do Shau/ shas la/ shes la sogs pa rnams la/ bad/ da ta nas/ mAs sogs kyis/ do Sha/ do Sha na du 'gyur/ na'i a ta dbyi 'os/ u pa d+hA'i a phyis/ shar sogs kyi mdos na Na/ doSh+NaH/ yang na/ do ShaH/ TA la/ do Sh+tA/ doShA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ do Sha na du bskyur ba dang ma bsgyur ba gnyis
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]gzugs gcig pas/ tsas dzu' sogs kyis Shar/ dor+b+h+yAM/ dor+b+hiH/ nge la/ doSh+DaH/ doShe/ b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ do Sh+NaH/ do ShaH/ b+h+yA ma b+h+yas 'dra/ ngas la/ doSh+NoH/ doShoH/ os la/ doSh+NAM/ doShAM/ A ma la/ doSh+DaM/ doSha Ni/ ngil doShi/ doSha Ni/ sho Shi/ os la/ doSh+NoH/ do ShoH/
[\[80b.2\]]su pa la/ dor+Shu/ bod tshig rnams la/ he doH/ he da Shau/ he do SheH/ ! k+Sha yig mtha' can/ bi bi k+Sha la su/ ha la dI pa sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' snga ma'i sru ka dag gi'ang ngos/ ku phyis/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ Sha ka /gnas med pa la la dan 'os/ bi'i
[\[80b.3\]]bi bi Ta/ au dang dzas la/ bi bi k+Shau/ bi bi k+ShaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ bi bi k+ShaM/ bi bi k+Shau/ bi bi k+ShaH/ TA la/ ba bi k+Sha/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ dang po'i gcig tshig gi skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ bi bi r+b+h+yI/ bi bi d+b+hiH/ nge la/ bi bi k+She/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ bi bi k+ShaH/ b+h+yA b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams lan bi bik+ShaH/
[\[80b.4\]]bi bi k+ShoH/ bi bi k+ShAM/ ngi la/ ba bi k+Shi/ os la/ bi bi k+ShoH/ sub la/ bi bi T+su/ bi bi T+su/ bod tshig rnams la/ he bi bi Ta/ he bi bi Ta/ he bi bi k+Shau+u/ he bi bi k+ShaH/ ! k+Sha yig mtha' can/ tam+Sha yang cho ga thams cad bi bi k+Sha dang 'dra/ gor k+Sha yar lugs gcig pa bak+Sha dang 'dra/ yang na/ yang dag par
[\[80b.5\]]sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ Sha phyis/ gor ka/ gor ga/ rnam dbye a ca thog ma can rnams bi bi k+Sha dang 'dra/ b+h+yAm la/ go ra g+b+h+yAM/ bi sa la/ gor g+b+hiH/ su pa la/ gor k+Shu sogs so/ phra mo/ yang k+Sha yig mtha' can/ pi pa k+Sha su/ babar skyong / su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ Sha
[\[80b.6\]]phyis/ gnas med pa sogs kyis pi bkwa/ pi pa ga/ au dang dzas la/ pi pa k+Shau/ pi pa k+ShaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ pi pa k+ShaM/ pi pa k+Shau/ pi pa k+ShaH/ DA la/ pi pa k+ShA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ Sha phyis/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ ga ga/ pi pa g+b+h+yAM/ pi pa g+b+hin/
[\[80b.7\]]nge la/ pi pa k+She/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ pi pa k+ShaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ pi pa k+ShaH/ pi pak+ShoH/ pi pa k+ShAM/ nga la/ pi pak+Shi/ os 'dra/ su ba la/ pi pak+Shu/ bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/ skabs 'dir yang na bar mi byed do/ ! /k+Sha yig mtha' can dad+ha k+Sha zhes pa'ang cho ga thams
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]cad bi bik+Sha dang 'dra'o/! /sa yig mtha' can su pis la su/ su phyis/ sa sa dzul dag ge ru 'os sa ru/ u brjod don/ ru bdag gi u pad+hA'i ring po i ka gi 'os/ i ring por bsgyur/ su pIH/ au dang dzas la/ su pi sau/ su bi saH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ su pi saM/ su pi so/ su pi saH/
[\[81a.2\]]TA la/ su bi sA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ sas dzu Sha'i ru/ ru b+na sogs kyis mdos/ u pa d+hA ring po/ su pI N+h+yIH/ su pI N+hiH/ nge la/ su pi se/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ su pi saH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ su pi saH/ su pi soH/ su pi sAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ su pi si/ su pi soH/ su pI r+Shu/ su pIHShu/
[\[81a.3\]]bod tshig rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ su nus zhes pa'ang cho ga rnams su pis dang 'dra'o/ ! /sa yig mtha' can u rjes 'brel can/ bi dwa su la/ su/ u num gyi don yin pas phyis/ u ga 'gro ba a tsa rnams kyi thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la byings ma yin pa la 'os/ num/ si bu d+d+hi ma yin
[\[81a.4\]]pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la yang ngos/ u pa d+hu ring po/ ha la dI ba sogs dang / yang dag par sbyor ba sogs kyis/ mkhas pa/ bi dwAn/ au dang dzas la/ bidwAn+sau/ pidwAn+saH/ am dang au la/ pidwAn+saM/ pi dwAn+sau/ shas la/ wa soHsaM pra sAr NaM/ was kyi saM pra sAr Na'o/ /rtags mtha' was
[\[81a.5\]]zhes pa'i pha rol du shas la sogs pa'i rnam dbye a tsa thog a can gang byung yang slar yang dag par bsgyur ba ste wa srog med ur 'gyur ro/ /bid/ u as/ shas/ so pra sAr Na las kyang ngos/ a snga ma'i gzugs su song / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ sa Sha/ bi du ShaH/ TA la/ pi du ShA/ b+h+yAm
[\[81a.6\]]b+his la/ bsu sraM su h+yAM su an Du ha rnams kyid 'os sad/ pi dwa d+b+hiH/ bi dwa d+b+hiH/ ngar la/ bu du She/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ bi du ShaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ bi du ShaH/ bi du ShoH/ pi duShAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ pi du Shi/ bi du ShoH/ bi dwa dU/ bod tshig rnams la he bi dwa na/ he bi dwA m+sau/ he mi dwA n+saH/
[\[81a.7\]]! sa mtha' u rjes 'brel can/ pi tsi wa su la/ su/ u ka 'gro ba sogs kyis nu ma/ su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis/ saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/ pe tsi wA na/ au dang dzas la/ pi tsi wA r+Shau/ pi tsi wA n+saM/ pi tsi wA n+sau/ shas la/ was kyis pra sA
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]ra Na 'os/ wu u/ saM bra sAr Na las kyang ngos/ a snga ma'i gzugs su song / was u ru 'gyur iT 'jig go zhes pa 'grel par byung bas/ tsa'i srog gi i phyis/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha/ pe tsu ShaH/ TA la/ pi tsu ShA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ wa su sraM su sogs kyis sad/ pi tsi wa d+b+haM/ pi tsi wa d+b+hiH/ nga la/ pi tsu'i
[\[81b.2\]]b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ pi tsu ShaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ pi tsu ShaH/ pi tsu ShoH/ pi tsuShAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ pi tsu Sha/ pi tsu ShoH/ pi tsu wa t+su/ bod tshig rnams la/ he pi tsi wa na/ he pi tsi wa n+sau/ he pi tsi wA n+saH/ ! sa mtha' can/ dza ga ma su/ la su/ spoHtsa/ ma bdag la'ang ngo / ma yi ge dang ba yig dag gi
[\[81b.3\]]rkyen pha rol la byings kyi ma yig ni na ru 'gyur te/ man/ dza ga nA su/ su/ u/ 'gro ba sogs kyis num/ u de'i don/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' phyis/ saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/ dza ga nA na/ au dang dzas la/ dza ga nA n+sau/ dzag nA n+saH/ a ma dang au la/
[\[81b.4\]]dzagan+wA nAM/ dza ga n+wA nA+au/ sha sa la/ gam ha na dza na khan g+ha sAM lo paHk+di t+ya na ngi/ gam ha na dza na khan g+has rnams kyi dbyi ba ang ma yin pa'i krang 'gro ba la'o/ /gam la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi u pad+hA'i a ni ti sogs kyi rkyen ang ma yin pa'i rkyen ka yig 'gro ba dang nga yig 'gro ba rnams rnam dbye shas nas
[\[81b.5\]]bzung / bdun pa'i aus kyi bar a tsa thog ma can gang byung yang dbyi ste/ ga'i a phyis/ was kyi saM pra sA raN 'os/ wu u/ wa las phyungs pa'i a/ saM pra sA raN las kyang ngos/ snga ma'i gzugs su song / wa ur 'gyur bas/ na yar mar log kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ sa Sha/
[\[81b.6\]]dzag+muShaH/ TA la/ dzag+muShA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ wa su swaM su sogs kyis/ sad/ dza ga nA d+b+h+yAM/ dza ga n+wa d+b+hiH/ nge la/ dzag+muShe/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ dzag+muShaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra drug pa rnams la/ dzag+mu ShaH/ dzag+mu ShoH/ dzag+mu ShAM/ ngi la/ dzag+Yu Shi/ o sa la/ dzag+mu ShoH/ su pa la/ dza ga n+wa t+sA/
[\[81b.7\]]bod tshig rnams la/ he dza ga nA na/ he dza ga n+wA nA+au/ he dza ga n+wA n+saH/ sa yig mtha' can/ shin tu 'tsho ba/ su hi n+sa la/ su/ he la sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ sa phyis/ su hi da/ au dang dzas la/ su hi d+sau/ su hi d+laH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ su hi d+saM/ su
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]hid+sau/ su hid+saH/ TA la/ su hi ng+sA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ sa phyis/ su hiM b+h+yAM/ su hiM b+hiH/ nge la/ su hi d+se/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ su hi d+saH/ b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ su hi d+saH/ su he d+soH/ su hi d+saM/ bdun pa rnams la/
[\[82a.2\]]su hi d+si/ su hi d+soH/ su hi d+su/ bod tshig rnams la/ he su hi da/ he su hi d+sau/ he su hi d+saH/ ! sa yig mtha' can/ bu m+su la su/ dum+so \u0f85 srung / pum+sa'i a srung ngo / /pum+sa zhes pa'i mtha'i sa yig ni rnam dbye su Ta rnams pha rol la a srung zhes par 'gyur te/ sa a su da/ da rjes 'brel/ u ka
[\[82a.3\]]'gro ba sogs kyis num/ u de'i don/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ sa phyis/ skyes pa/ saM bud+b+hi ma yin pa sogs kyis u pa d+hA ring po/ pumAn/ au dang dzas la/ pu mAn+sau/ pu mAn+saH/ am dang aul/ pu ma n+saM/ pu mAn+sau/ shas la/ puM saH/ TA la/ puM sA/
[\[82a.4\]]b+h+yAm b+h+yas la/ yang dag par sbyor ba' mtha' dbyi 'os/ sa phyis/ pu m+b+hAM/ pum+b+hiH/ nge la/ puM se/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ puM saH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ puM saH/ puM soH/ puM sAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ puM si/ puM soH/ puM su/ bod tshig rnams la/ he pu man/ he pu mAn+sau/ he pu
[\[82a.5\]]mA T+saH/ ! sa yig mtha' can/ u shan sa la su/ r-i ta u sha nas/ pu ru daM shas a ne has rnams kyi yang ngos/ rtags mtha' a nang du 'gyur/ na'i srog gi a dang rjes 'brel/ saM bud+b+hI ma yin pa sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/ ming mtha'i nad kyi 'os na phyis/ u sham+la au dang dzas la/ u shan
[\[82a.6\]]sau/ u shan saH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ bsang pa/ u shan saM/ u shan sau/ u shan saH/ TA la/ u shan sA/ TA la/ u shan sA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ u sha no b+h+yAM/ u shan b+hiH/ nge la/ u shan se/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ u sha nasaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ u sha na saH/ u sha na soH/ u sha na sAM/ bdun
[\[82a.7\]]pa rnams la/ u sha na si/ u shan soH/ u sha na s+su/ saM bu d+d+hi la/ gzugs gsum 'byung bas lugs gcig la/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis/ he u sha naH/ yang na 'grel par/ saM bud+d+hi la rtags mtha' a nang du yang na 'gyur te/ nad byi ba dang mid byi ba
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]'dam ka can no zhes pa byung bas/ rtags mtha' a nang / nad byi ba dang mid byi ba yang na ba byas pas/ he u sha na/ he u sha na na/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig dang po dang 'dra'o/ /a ne has/ pu ru daM shas gnyis la'ang saM bud+d+hi la yang na ba mi byed gzhan cho ga thams cad u sha nas dang
[\[82b.2\]]'dra'o/ ! /sa mtha' can/ bed+has la su/ su phyis/ a tu as mtha'i 'dra byings ma yin pa'i 'os/ u pad+hA ring po/ be d+hAH/ saM bud+b+hi la/ he bed+haH/ gzhan ma thams cad u shan sa dang 'dra/ su bas zhes pa'ang su la u pad+hA ring por mi 'gyur gzhan cho ga rnams bshad ma thag pa be
[\[82b.3\]]d+has dang 'dra'o/ ! /sarba sogs kyi nang tshan sa yig mtha' can/ a das la/ su/ a das au su lo pash+tsa/ a das kyi au ste su dbyi ba'ang ngo / /a das zhes pa'i rtags mtha'i sa ni au ru 'gyur la/ su yang dbyi ste/ sa au/ su phyis/ ta da dag gi su las mtha' ma yin pa la
[\[82b.4\]]'os/ das/ e tsa la 'phel ba 'os/ a sau/ a das la/ 'di/ a ka tsa'i rkyen byin pas/ as ka/ zhes pa grub pa la/ sA du twaM tsa/ sa las u'ang ngo / /a das la a ka tsa'i rkyen byin pa'i skabs das yig tu bsgyur zin pa'i spo ga a yig de ni u ru 'gyur te/ a su
[\[82b.5\]]ka zhes pa grub/ de la rnam dbye'i cho ga thams cad spyir btang a thub mtha' can rA ma dang 'dra'o/ /aul/ t+ya da sogs rnams kyi rnam dbye la a 'os/ sa a/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os/ snga ma'i gzugs/ e tsa la 'phel ba 'os/ a dau/ a da so rdA du do maH/ a das kyi da la u ste da'i
[\[82b.6\]]'ang ma'o/ /a das zhes pa'i da ni rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su ma gtogs rnam dbye gang mthong yang na yig tu 'gyur zhing da'i srog a tsa ring po gang yod kyang U ring du 'gyur/ thung du gad yod kyang u thung du 'gyur te/ a mU/ dzas la/ t+ya da sogs kyis a da/ dzas/ a
[\[82b.7\]]das kyis zhes pas/ dam/ das kyi shI/ a las yon tan/ a me/ e ta I dwa hu ba tsa ni/ e ta gyi Ita mang tshig la'o/ /a das kyi da mar gyur pa'i rnam dbye mang tshig las byung ba'i e ni I ru 'gyur te/ e I/ a mI/ am la/ a muM/ au la/ amU/ shas la/ a
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]mUn/ TA la/ a mu nA/ b+h+yAm la/ a mU b+h+yAM/ b+his la/ ka ma yin pa dag gi i daM a das dag lam yin nos/ b+his ai sar mi 'gyur/ mang tshig la dz+hal la e ta 'os e/ e ta kyi i ta mang tshig la 'os/ a mI b+hiH/ de la a muShai/ b+h+yAm la/ a mU b+h+yAM/ b+h+yas
[\[83a.2\]]la/ a mI b+h+yaH/ nga sai la/ a muSh+mAta/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga sa la/ a muSh+ya/ os la/ a mu yoH/ A ma la/ a mI ShA/ ngi la/ a muSh+mi na/ os la/ a mu yoH/ su pa la/ a mIShu/ i ti pA Ni ni b+h+yA kar Na s+ya sU trA t+yu rlid+ga ha lan+tAHsa mA b+hAH/ zhes pa bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mang las skyes
[\[83a.3\]]pa'i rtags su ha la mtha' can rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni na byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las skyes pa'i rtags ha la mtha' can rnams rnam dbye dang phrad
[\[83a.4\]]pa'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas par rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni bud med kyi rtags ha la mtha' can rnams bshad par bya ste/ de la dang por mo rtags ha yig mtha' can ni/ u pA na ha la/ su/ na ho d+haH/ na ha yi d+ha'o/ /na hra zhes pa'i ha ni rnam dbye
[\[83a.5\]]dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang tshig mtha' d+ha yig tu 'gyur ro/ /ha d+ha/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ d+ha da/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ u pA nad/ au dang dzas la/ nye bar bcing bsta lhas spro ba/ u A na hau/ u bA na haH/ gnyis pa rnams la/
[\[83a.6\]]u bA na haM/ u pA na hau/ u pA na haH/ TA la/ u bA na hA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ na ha yi d+ha 'os/ ha ng+ha/ d+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ d+ha da/ u pA na d+b+hiH/ u pAn ng+d+hiH/ nge la/ u pA na he/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ u bA na haH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ u pAn haH/
[\[83a.7\]]u pA na hoH/ u pA na hAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ u pA na hi/ u bA na hoH/ u bA na D+shu/ bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ ha yig mtha' can/ uSh+Ni he la/ su/ rkyen/ kun gyi ku 'os/ ha g+ha/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ g+ha ga/ gnas med pa la sogs
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]gyis/ u Sh+Naka/ u Sh+Di ga/ au dang dzas la/ uSh+Ni hau/ uSh+Ni haH/ sogs te/ rnam dbye a tsa thog ma tsa na rnams des rigs 'gre/ b+hAm b+his la/ kwin gyi ku/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ uSh+Ni g+b+hi/ uSh+Na g+b+hiH/ su pa la/ kwin gyi ku/ khar la tsa ra 'os/ g+ha ka/ ka
[\[83b.2\]]Sha 'dus pak+Sha/ uSh+Ni k+Shu/ bod tshig dang po dang 'dra/ ! ba yig mtha' can/ di ba la/ su/ di w+ra'i w+ra au/ d+yauH/ au dang dzas la/ dibau/ di baH/ am la  rkyen/ yang na par bshad pa ltar/ d+yaM/ di gi au dang shas la/ di ba/ di baH TA la/ rkyen/ di wA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ di bra'i u ta 'os
[\[83b.3\]]ba u/ dU b+h+yAM/ dU b+hi na/ nga la/ di be/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ di paH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ 'od gsal/ drug pa rnams la/ di baH/ di ngoH/ di bAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ di bi/ di poH/ d+yAShu/ bod tshig la/ he d+yauH/ he di bau/ he di baH/ ! de ba snga ma'i ta yig mtha' can/ d+YUr+Na ta 'grel par gzhan
[\[83b.4\]]nas lung drangs te/ u yig pha rol la di bra kyib ur 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas/ ba u/ a ka ki 'dra ba la ring bo/ i ka'i a tsa pa yaN/ d+YUr+Na ta la/ su/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ d+YUr+Nuta/ d+YUr+Nud/ au dang dzas la/ d+YUr+Nu tau/ d+YUr+Na taH/ sogs te a tsa
[\[83b.5\]]thog ma can rnams nges rigs 'gre/ b+h+yAm la/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ tad/ d+YUr+Nad+b+h+yAM/ b+his b+h+yAm b+h+yas sogs kyang rigs 'gre/ su pa la/ d+YAr+Na t+su/ bod tshig rnams la/ hed+YUr+Nu ta/ he d+YUr+NA da/ he d+YUr+Nu tau/ he d+YUr+Nu taH/ ra yig mtha' can/ gi ra la/ su/ ru ba dag gi u bab+hA ring po 'os/ i ring go su phyis/
[\[83b.6\]]gIH/ au dang dzas la/gi rau/ gi raH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ gi ri/ gi rau/ gi raH/ TA la/ gi rA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ ra ba sogs kyi mdos/ u pad+hA ring po/ gIr+b+h+yAM/ gIr+b+hi/ nge la/ gi re/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ da sa la/ gi raH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa/ smrag rnams la/ gi raH/ gi roH/ gi rAM/ bdun pa rnams
[\[83b.7\]]la/ gi ri/ gI roH/ gI rU/ bod tshig la/ he gUH/ he gi rau/ he gi raH/ ! ra yig mtha' can/ pur zhes ba dang / dur zhes pa'ang / cho ga thams cad gir gyi skabs dang 'dra'o/ ! /ra yig mtha' can/ tsa tu ra la/ dzas/ tri tsa tur bdag gi bud med la/ ti s-i tsa ta sr-i dag
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]gos/ tsa ta sr-ir 'gyur/ tsa ta sraH/ shas la/ tsa ta sraH/ b+his la/ tsa ta sr-i b+h-iH/ b+h+yas gnyis la/ tsa ti sri b+hiH/ tsa ta sr-i b+h+yaH/ A ma la/ tsa ta sr-i NAM/ su pa la/ tsa ta sr-i Shu/ bod tshig la/ he tsa ta sraH/ ! ma yig mtha' can/ kim la/ kim gyi ka 'os/ bud
[\[84a.2\]]med du brjod pa'i rkyen TA pa/ kA la/ su/ ha la dI pa A pa ces pas su phyis/ kA/ oM la/ au'i A pa las sos/ ke/ dzas la/ dang po dag la zhes pas/ kAH/ sogs te cho ga thams cad mo rtags rba'i skabs bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ ma yig mtha' can/ i daM la/ su/ -i daM gyi ma 'os/ Ti
[\[84a.3\]]ar mi 'gyur/ yaHsau/ sU la ya'o/ id ma zhes pa'i da ni bud med du brjod pa'i skabs su pha rol laya ru 'gyur ro/ /da ya/ su phyis/ i yaM/ au~M la/ t+ya da sogs kyi a 'os/ ma a/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os snga ma'i gzugs/ da'i'ang nges dam/ bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen TA pa/ i mA/
[\[84a.4\]]au'i A pa pas so/ au shI/ i me/ dzas la/ i mAH/ a ma la/ i mAM/ au la i me/ shas la/ i mAH/ TA la/ A pa la an sogs kyis/ id/ a na/ bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen/ TA pa/ a nA/ Ang kyi Ang la'ang ngos/ an yA/ b+h+ya ma lo/ ha la la dbyi 'os/ i dang da phyis/ a/ TA pa/ A
[\[84a.5\]]b+h+yAM/ b+his la/ A b+hiH/ nga la/ i daM/ a/ TApa/ sarba nA ma las s+yA Ta ste thung ngu 'ang ngos/ s+yAT/ a s+yai/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas la/ A b+h+yAm/ A b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ a s+yAH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ ngas la/ a s+yA/ o sa la/ an yoH/ A ma la/ A sAM/ ngi la/ a s+yAM/ o sa la/ an yoH/ su pa la/ A
[\[84a.6\]]su/ rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams dang TA dang os gnyis la yang na bar bshad pa ltar/ lugs gcig la/ gnyis pa rnams la/ enA/ en/ enaH/ TA la/ en yA/ os gnyis la/ en yoH/ ! dza yig mtha' can/ sra dza la/ su/ tsu'i su 'os/ dza ga/ su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang
[\[84a.7\]]na 'os/ sra ka/ sa ga/ au dang dzas la/ sra dzau/ sra dzaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ sra dzaM/ sra dzau/ sra dzaH/ TA la/ sra dzA/ b+h+yAM b+his la tsu'i ku 'os/ sra g+b+h+yAM/ sra g+b+hiH/ nge la/ sra dze/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ nga sil/ sra dzaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ sra dzaH/ sradzoH/ sra dzAM/ ngi la/ sra dzi/ os
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]la/ sra dzoH/ su pa la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dza ga/ khar la tsar/ sra k+Shu/ bod tshig rnams dang po 'dra/ ! da yig mtha' can/ t+yad la/ su/ t+yad sogs kyis a/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os snga ma'i gzugs/ mo rkyen TA pa/ ta da dag gi su las mtha' ma yin pa la 'os/ ta sa/ su phyis/
[\[84b.2\]]sta/ au la/ t+ye/ dzas/ t+yAH/ sogs mo rtags sa rba'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /ta da yang gnyis kyang cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /tsa yig mtha' can/ bA tsa la/ su/ tsu'i ku'o sa/ tsa ka/ su phyis/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ bA ka/ bA ga/ au dang dzas la/ pA tsau/ bA
[\[84b.3\]]tsaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ bA tsi/ bA tsau/ bA tsaH/ TA la/ bA tsA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ tsa ka/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ ka ga/ bAg+b+h+yAM/ bAg+b+haMH/ dag gam brjod dang / nge la/ bA ce/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ bA tsaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ bA tsaH/ bA tsoH/ bA tsAM/
[\[84b.4\]]bdun pa rnams la/ bA tsi/ bA tsoH/ bAk+Shu/ bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ ! pa yig mtha' can/ chu a pa la ni mang tshig kho na ma gtogs rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig rnams mi 'jug pas/ a pa la dzas/ a pa tr-in sogs kyis u pa d+hA ring po/ A paH/
[\[84b.5\]]shas la/ a paH/ b+his la/ a bod+hi/ a pa kyi b+ha la'o/ a pa ces pa'i pa yig ni rnam dbye b+ha yig pha rol la ta ru 'gyur te/ pa ta/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ tad/ ad+b+hiH/ b+h+yas gnyis la/ a d+b+h+yaH/ A ma la/ a pAM/ su pa la/ a p+su/ bod tshig la/ he A paH/ ! sha yig mtha' can/
[\[84b.6\]]di sha la/ su/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ sha dza/ cu'i ku 'os/ dza ga/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ di ka/ di ga/ au dang dzas la/ di shau/ di shaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ di shaM/ di shaH/di shau/ di shaH/ TA la/ di shA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ sha dza/ tsu'i ku 'os/
[\[84b.7\]]ga/ dig+b+h+yAM/ dig+b+hiH/ nge la/ di she/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ di shaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ di shaH/ di shoH/ phog ga/ di shAM bdun pa rnams la/ di zi/ di shoH/ dik+Shu/ bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/ dr-i sha zhes pa'ang cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /Sha yig mtha' can/ tISha
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]la/ su/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ sha Da/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ twiT/ twi Ta/ au dang dzas la/ twi Shau/ twi ShaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ twi Shi/ twi Shau/ twi ShaH/ TA la/ twi ShA/ g+b+h+yAm b+his la/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ ShaDa/ twi g+b+h+yI/ twi g+b+hiH/ nge la/
[\[85a.2\]]tI She/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ twi ShaH/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ twi ShaH/ twi ShoH/ twi ShAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ twi Shi/ twi ShoH/ twi T+su/ twi T+tU/ bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra'o/ ! /Sha yig mtha' can/ sa dzu Sha la/ su/ su phyis/ sa sa dzu Sha dag gi ru 'os/ Sha ra/ ra bdag gi zhes pas
[\[85a.3\]]u pad+hA ring po/ sa dzUH/ au dang dzas la/ sa dzu Shau/ sa dzu ShaH/ gnyis pa rnams la/ sa dzu ShaM/ sa dzu Shau/ sa dzu ShaMH/ TA la/ sa dzuShA/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas la/ sa dzU r+b+h+yAM/ sa dzU r+b+hiH/ nge la/ sa dzuShe/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ sa dag bam/ dzu ShaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ sa dzu
[\[85a.4\]]ShoH/ sa dzuShAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ sa dzuShi/ sa dzu ShoH/ sa dzUr+Shu/ bod tshig rnams la/ he sa dzUH/ he sa dzu ShoH/ hes dzu ShaH/ a Sha shi Sha yang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /sa yig mtha' can/ a das la/ su/ a das kyi au ste su dbyi ba'ang ngos/ sa au/ su byis/ ta da dag gi zhes pas/
[\[85a.5\]]das/ a sau/ au la/ t+ya da sogs kyis a/ a ta kyi yon tan la'os snga ma'i gzugs/ bud med du brjed pa'i rkyen/ TA pa/ a dA/ au/ au'i A pa las sos/ au I/ a la yon tan nos/ a e/ a das kyi da la u ste de'i 'dam 'os/ a mU/ dzas/ a mUH/ am la/ amUM/ au la/ amU/
[\[85a.6\]]Shal la/ a mUH/ TA la/ a mu yA/ b+h+yAm la/ a mU b+h+yAM/ b+his la/ a mU b+hiH/ nge la/ a mu Sh+ye/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ a mu Sh+yAH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ ngas la/ a mu Sh+yAH/ os la/ a mu yoH/ A ma la/ a mU ShAM/ ngi la/ a mu Sh+yAM/ os la/ a mu yoH/ su pa la/ a mU Shu/ i ti pA Ni ni byA kar Na
[\[85a.7\]]s+ya sU trA ta s+t+rI yid+ga ha la n+tAHsa mA patAH/ zhes pa bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las bud med kyi rtags ha la mtha' can rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brdo sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]shing rta zhes bya ba las bud med kyi rtags ha lam mtha' can rnams rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i tshig sbyor btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni hal gyi mtha' can ma ning gi rtags rnams brjod par bya ste/[ a] yig mtha' can/ swa na Du hal/ su/ tsa tu ra a na Du ha dag
[\[85b.2\]]gi Am/ u dA t+ta 'os/ A ma A gam/ ma ning la su am 'jig/ ba su sraM su d+haM su a na Du ha rnams kyi da 'os/ ha da/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ swa na D+wA ta/ swa na D+wA da/ au la/ ma ning la'ang ngos/ au shI/ swa na D+wA hI/ dzas la/ dzas shas dag gi shi 'os/ dzas/ glang khyung bzang po/ shi/ ma ning gi
[\[85b.3\]]dz+hal a tsa'i 'os/ nu ma saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i zhes pas u pa d+hA ring po/ swa na D+wAM hi/ gnyis pa rnams la/ swa na D+wA ta/ swa na D+wA da/ swan D+wA hi/ swa na D+wAM hi/ bod tshig dang po dang 'dra/ TA nas bzung rnam dbye lhag ma thams cad skyes pa'i rtags a na Du ha'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /ra yig
[\[85b.4\]]mtha' can/ bA ra la/ su/ ma ning la su am dag 'jig/ bAH/ au la/ bA rI/ dzas la/ bA ri/ gnyis pa rnams la'ang / bAH/ bArI/ bAri/ bod tshig rnams la/ ha bAH/ he bArI/ he bAri/ TA la/ bA rA/ b+h+yA b+his la/ bA r+b+h+yAM bAr+b+hIH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ bA re/ bA r+b+h+yAM/ bA r+b+h+yaH/ lnga pa rnams la/ bA raH/
[\[85b.5\]]bA r+b+h+yAM/ bA r+b+h+yaH/ drug pa rnams la/ bA raH/ bA roH/ bU rAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ bA re/ bA roH/ bA r+Shu/ ! ra yig mtha' can/ tsa tu ra la/ dzas/ sha tur a na Du ha dag gi AM u dA d+ha 'os/ A ma/ dzas shas dag gi shi/ tsa t+bA ri/ shas la/ tsa twA ri/ b+his la/ tsa tu r+b+haMH/ b+h+yas gnyis la/ tur+b+b+yaH/
[\[85b.6\]]A ma la/ tsa tu r+NAM/ su pa la/ tsa tur+Shu/ bod tshig la/ he tsa twa ri/ pri ya tsa tur zhes pa lta bu grangs kyi don ma yin na rnam dbye thams cad 'jug ste/ dang po rnams la/ pri ya tsa tuH/ pri ya tsa tu rI/ /pri ya tsa tu ri/ gnyis pa rnams la'ang / pri ya tsa tuH/ pri ya tsa tu rI/ pri ya tsa tu
[\[85b.7\]]ri/ gsumapa rnams la/ pri ya tsa tu rA/ pri ya tsa tu r+b+h+yAM/ pri ya tsa tu r+b+hiH/ bzhi pa rnams la/ bri ya tsha tu re/ pri ya tsa tu r+b+h+yAM/ pri ya tsa tu r+b+h+yaH/ nga si la/ pri ya tsa tu raH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ pri ya tsa tu raH/ pri ya tsa tu roH/ pri ya tsa tu rAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ pri ya
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]tsa tu ri/ pri ya tsa turoH/ pri ya tsa tu r+Shu/ bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/ ! ma yig mtha' can/ kim la/ su/ ma ning la su am dag 'jig pas/ su phyis/ kim/ aul/ kiM ka/ au/ I/ ke/ dzas la/ kA ni/ gnyis pa rnams la'ang / kim/ ka/ kA ni/ TA
[\[86a.2\]]sogs lhag ma rnams la/ kim kar 'gyur cho ga thams cad sarba dang 'dra'o/ ! /ma yig mtha' can/ i dam la su/ ma ning su am 'jig/ i daM/ au la/ i me/ dzas la/ imA ni/ gnyis pa rnams la/ i daM/ i me/ i mA ni/ TA la sogs pa rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i skabs
[\[86a.3\]]dang 'dra/ ! /na yig mtha' can/ brah+ma na la/ su/ ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/ na phyis/ ma ning la/ su am 'jig/ brah+ma/ aul/ brah+ma NI/ dzas la/ brah+ma Ni/ gnyis pa rnams la'ang / brah+ma/ brah+ma NI/ brah+ma Ni/ TA la/ brah+ma NA/ b+h+yAM b+his la/ ming mtha'i na phyis/ brah+ma b+h+yAM/ bah+ma b+hiH/ pel/
[\[86a.4\]]brah+ma Ne/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ tshang pa/ brah+ma NaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ brah+ma NaH/ brah+ma NoH/ brah+ma NAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ brah+ma NoH/ brah+ma su/ bod tshig la 'grel par nad byi ba dang mid byi ba 'dam ka can no zhes pa byung bas/ he brah+ma/ he brah+ma na/ he brah+ma
[\[86a.5\]]NI/ he brah+ma Ni/ ! /ma yig mtha' can/ a han la/ su/ a han raH/ a had gyi ra'o/ /a han zhes pa'i na naM ma ning gi rtags kyi skabs dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang tshig mtha' la ra ru 'gyur te/ su 'jig/ a haH/ aul/ di shI dag la 'dam ka 'os/ a ha nI/ a h+nI/ dzas
[\[86a.6\]]la/ a ha ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ nyi ma/ TA la/ na'i a ta dbyi 'os/ u pad+hA'i a phyis/ ah+nA/ b+h+yAm b+h+yis la/ a ho b+h+yAM/ a ho b+hiH/ nge la/ a h+ne/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ a snaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ a h+naH/ a h+noH/ a hAM/ ngi la/ a h+naM/ a hani/ os
[\[86a.7\]]la/ a h+noH/ su pa la/ a haH/ su/ bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ ! na yig mtha' can/ su dan+Di na la/ dbyug pa bzang po/ su/ ming mtha'i na phyis/ ma ning la  u a ma 'jig /su da n+Di/ aul/ su dan+Di nI/ dzas la/ dzas shis dag gi shaM/ in han pU
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]ShAr+Ya ma NAM shau/ in tan bU Sha na Ar+Ya ma na rnams kyi shi la'o/ /in mtha' la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi u pad+hA ni dzas shas shir 'gyur ba pha rol la ring bor 'gyur te/ sU da N+DI ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la/ sud N+Di nI/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ mid mtha'i na phyis/ su N+Di b+h+yAM/ su da N+Di b+hiH/
[\[86b.2\]]nge la/ su da Ni ni/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ ngas le/ su da N+Di naH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'ad/ drug pa rnams la/ su da N+Di naH/ su da N+Di noH/ su da N+Di nI/ ngi la/ su da N+Di ni/ os la/ su da k+Sha noH/ su pa la/ sud N+DiShu/ bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/ ! ni yig mtha' can/ ba hu br-i tra ha na la/ su/
[\[86b.3\]]ma ning la su am 'jig/ ming mtha'i na phyis/ ba hu br-i tra ha/ au la/ ba hu pri tra ha NI/ dzas la/ in han sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/ pa hu br-i tra hA Ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la sogs pa rnams skyes pa'i rtags br-i tra han gyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /na yig mtha'
[\[86b.4\]]can/ ba hAr+Ya ma na la/ su/ ming mtha'i na phyis ma ning la su am 'jig/ ba hAr+Ya ma/ au la/ ba hUr+Ya ma NI/ dzas la/ in han sogs kyis u pad+hA ring po/ ba hAr+Ya ma NI/ gnyis pa rnams kyang gzugs dang sgrub tshul gnyis ka dang dang po dang 'dra/ TA la/ na'i a dbyi 'os/ u pa ng+dA'i
[\[86b.5\]]a phyis/ ba hAr+Ya m+Na/ b+h+yAm b+h+yis la/ ming mtha'i nang byi'o/ bahwa r+Ya ma b+h+yAM/ bahA r+Ya ma b+hiH/ nge la/ bahA mar+Yam b+h+yA/ b+h+yam b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si/ bahu r+Ya m+Na \u0f7f/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ ba hwa r+Ya m+Na \u0f7f/ bahwa r+Ya m+No \u0f7f/
[\[86b.6\]]hwa r+Ya ma su/ bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra'o/ ! /na yig mtha' can/ ba hu pu Shan la/ su/ ming mtha'i na phyis/ su am 'jig/ ba hupuSha/ au Sha/ pa hu pu Sha NI/ dzas la/ in han zhes pas u pad+hA ring bo/ pa hu pu ShA Ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la/ ba hu puSh+NA/ b+h+yam b+his
[\[86b.7\]]la/ ming mtha'i na phyis/ ba hu pu Shab+h+yAM/ ba hu pu Sha b+hiH/ nge la/ ba hu pu Sh+Ne/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ ba hu pu Sh+NaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ ba hu puSh+NaH/ pa hu pu Sh+NoH/ ba hu pu Sh+NAM/ ngi la/ ba hu pu Sh+Ni/ ba hu pu Sha Ni/ os 'dra/ su pa la/ ba hu pu Sha su/ bod
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]tshig dang po dang 'dra/ ! dza yig mtha' can/ a sr-i dza la/ su/ ma ning la su am 'jig/ kwin gyi ku 'os/ dza ga/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ a sr-i ka/ a sr-i ga/ au la/ a sr-i dzI/ dzas la/ nu ma/ a sr-iny+dzi/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la/ a
[\[87a.2\]]sr-i dzA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ kwin gyi ku/ a sr-i g+b+h+yAM/ a sr-i g+gIH/ nge la/ a sraM dze/ b+h+yAM b+h+yas 'dra/ nge si la/ a sr-i/ rkyen/ dzaH/ ma b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ a sr-i dzaH/ a sr-i dzauH/ a sr-i dzAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ a sr-i dzi/ a sr-i dzoH/ a sr-i k+Shu/ bod tshig dang po dang
[\[87a.3\]]'dra/ dza yig mtha' rkyen/ can/ Urdza la/ su/ ma ning la su am 'jig/ kwin kyi ku/ yang dag bar sbyor ba'i mtha' mi dbyi/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ Urka/ Urga/ aul/ UrdzI/ dzas/ shas la 'grel par num yang na bar bshad pas/ AM rdzi/ yang
[\[87a.4\]]na U rdzi/ gnyis pa rnams kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/ TA la/ urdzA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ kwin gyi  rkyen/ ku/ U h+h+rAM/ u r+g+b+hiH/ nge la/ U rdze/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ U rdzaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ U rdzaH/ U rdzoH/ U rdzAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ U rdzi/ U rdoH/
[\[87a.5\]]U r+k+tsa/ bod tshig dang po dang 'ad/ ! nga yig mtha' can/ t+ya da la/ su/ ma ning la su/ rkyen/ am 'jig/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ t+ya ta/ t+ya da/ au la/ au shI/ t+ya da sogs kyis da a a ta kyi yon tan la 'os snga ma'i gzugs/ a la yon tan/ t+ye/ dzas shi/
[\[87a.6\]]num/ t+yA ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/ TA sogs rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i rtags rba'i skabs dang 'dra/ de bzhin du tad dang yang dang e tad kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /tsa yig mtha' can/ go a ca la su/ su phyis/ tsu'i ku/ gnas
[\[87a.7\]]med pa la yang na 'os/ go a ka/ go a ga/ au la/ a ca'i 'os/ a phyis/ gotsAM/ dzas la/ go A ny+tsi/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA sogs rnam dbye lhag ma rnams skyes pa'i rtags phra tsa'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ ! /ta yig mtha' can/ ya kr-i ta la/ su/ su am 'jig/
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ ya kr-i ta/ ya kr-id/ au la/ yakr-itI/ dzas la/ ya kr-its+taM/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la/ yakr-i tA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ ya kr-id+b+h+yA/ ya kr-id+b+hiH/ de la/ ya kra te/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ ya kr-i taH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ ya kr-i
[\[87b.2\]]taH/ ya kr-i toH/ ya kr-i tAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ ya kr-i ti/ ya kra toH/ ya kr-i t+su/ bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra'o/ /sha kr-i ta nges pa'i cho ga thams cad ya kr-i ta dang 'dra'o/ ! /ta yig mtha' can/ da da ta la/ su/ su a ma 'jig/ gnas med pa la yang na 'os/ da dad/
[\[87b.3\]]da da ta/ au la/ da da tI/ dzas la/ dzas shas shi/ bA na puMs ka s+ya/ ma ning gi yang na'o/ /a b+h+ya sta'i ming sha tu'i rkyan mtha' can ma ning gi rtags kyi skabs dzas shas shir 'gyur ba thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la num A ga ma yang na 'jug go/ /da dAn+te/ da da ti/ gnyis pa
[\[87b.4\]]rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la/ da da tA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ da da d+b+hI/ da da d+b+hiH/ nge la/ dad te/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ dad taH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ dad haH/ da da toH/ da da tAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ da da ti/ da da toH/ da da l+su/
[\[87b.5\]]bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/ dzA gr-i ta dang / dza kA ta sogs kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /ta yig mtha' can/ tu da ta la/ su/ su a ma phyis/ gnas me pa li yang na 'os/ tu dad/ tu data/ au la/ au shI/ Ats+tshI na d+yoH/ num/ A las shIn dI dag la na ma'o/ /byings
[\[87b.6\]]A sha tu'i rkyen mtha' can las/ pha rol du au shIr 'gyur ba'i shI dang na dI mid can rnams la nu ma yang na 'jug ste/ tu dan+tI/ tu da tI/ dzas la/ tu dan+ti/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA sogs da da ta dang 'dra'o/ /b+ha ta bcas pa'ang tu da ta dang tshogs thams cad 'dra'o/ ! /ta yig mtha'
[\[87b.7\]]can/ pa tsa ta la/ bcas/ su/ su am phyis/ gnas med pa sogs kyis/ pa tsa ta/ ba tsa da/ aul/ au shI/ sha pa sh+ya no rni t+yaM/ sha pa sh+yan dag la des pa'o/ /a yig ring thung gi mtha' sha pa dang sh+yan gyi rkyen can las au shI dang na dI ming can rnams la nu ma la ngan ba mi
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]byed par gtan du nges par ster te/ btsan+hI/ dzas la/ btsan+ti/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA sogs da da ta dang 'dra'o/ /dI bya ta ces pa'ang pa tsa ta dang cho ga thams cad 'dra'o/ ! /pa yig mtha' can/ swa pa la/ su/ su a ma phyis/ gnas med pa sogs kyis/ swa pa/ swa pa/
[\[88a.2\]]au la/ swa pI/ dzas la/ swAM pi/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la/ swa pA/ b+h+yAm b+his la/ a pa kyi b+ha la 'os/ swa d+b+h+yI/ swa d+b+hiH/ nge la/ swa pe/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ nga si la/ swa baH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ swa paH/ swa poH/ swa pAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ swa pi/ swa poH/ swa p+su/
[\[88a.3\]]bod tshig rnams dang po dang 'dra/ ! sa yig mtha' can/ d+ha nus la/ su/ su am phyis/ sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis d+ha nuH/ o la/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ sa Sha/ d+ha nu ShI/ dzas la/ d+ha nUM Shi/ gnyis pa rnams kyang 'dra/ TA la/ d+ha nu ShA/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ sa sa dzu Sha sogs
[\[88a.4\]]kyis sar/ d+ha nu r+b+n+yAM/ d+ha nu r+b+hiH/ nge la/ d+ha nu She/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas gzhu/ 'dra/ nga si la/ d+ha nu ShaH/ b+h+yAm b+h+yas 'dra/ drug pa rnams la/ d+ha nu ShaH/ d+ha nu ShA+oH/ d+ha nu ShAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ d+ha nu Shi/ d+ha nu ShoH/ d+ha nu r+Shu/ bod tshig rnams rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra/ ha bis
[\[88a.5\]]dang po yas sogs kyang d+ha nus dang 'dra'o/ ! /sa yig mtha' can/ a das la/ su/ ma ning la su am phyis/ sa sa dzu Sha dag gis ru/ a daH/ au la/ t+ya da sogs kyis a/ a la yon tan/ a de/ a das kyi nga la u ste da'i'ang ma 'os/ a mU/ dzas la/ a mU
[\[88a.6\]]ni/ gnyis pa rnams kyang dang po dang 'dra/ TA nas bzung rnam dbya lhag ma rnams kyi cho ga thams cad a das skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ga ra Na s+ya sU trA d+na puM sa ka ying+ga ha lan+tAHsa mA pyAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las ma ning gi
[\[88a.7\]]rtags ha la mtha' can rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don dper brjod cho ga sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las ma ning gi rtags ha la mtha' can rnams rnam
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]dbye dang phrad pa'i tshig sbyor btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //de ltar rtags drug tshig tu bsgrub pa'i cho ga rnams bshad zin nas/ da ni ming gcig gis don du ma ston pa ni bA ta'am mi zad pa'i sde rnams ston par bya ste/ swa rA di ni pA ta ma
[\[88b.2\]]bya yaM/ swa ra la sogs pa rnams ni pA ta mi zad pa'o/ /swa ra la sogs pa rnams la a byA ste mi zad pa zhes sa ma ni pA ta zhes bya'o/ /swa ra la sogs pa na 'di rnams te/ spar/ aM ta ra/ prA ta ra/ pu na ra/ sa nu/ ta ra/ a ts+tshais/ nits+tshais/ sa ne sa/ r-id+ha ka/ r-i te/ yu
[\[88b.3\]]ga pa ta/ gnyis/ A rA ta/ pr-i thag/ h+Yas/ swa sa/ di wA/ rA tA+au/ sA yaM/ tse raM/ ma nA ga/ i Sha ta/ dzau ShaM/ tA Sh+NiM/ ba his/ phyi/ a wa sa/ sa ma yA/ mtho ris/ bar mtshams/ snga dro'am zhog kha/ slar/ nyung ngu'am chung ngu/ brgyal/ mtho ba'am ring pa/ dma' ba/ g.ye' ma da la po/ grub pa'am 'dzin pa/ sbangs pa
[\[88b.4\]]thag ring thung gnyis ka la 'jug/ so so/ phyin nas/ kha sang / song nyin/ nyin mo/ mtshan mo/ dgong ma mang po/ ye shes/ chung ngu / dga' ba/ mi smra ba/ zha dang bsrung ba dang rgyan rnams la/ dam tshig gam nye ba/ ni ka ShA/ swa/ swa yaM/ br-i thA/ na k+taM/ na nya/ he hau/ i b+d+hA/ ad+d+hA/ sA mi/ bat+p+ra t+ya yAM taM tsa/ ba tu'i rkyen mtha' rnams
[\[88b.5\]]kyang ngo / /byings sam rtags ba tu'i rkyen mtha' can rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/ /brAh+ma Na pa ta/ k+Sha tr-i ya pa ta/ ces pa lta bu pa tu'i rkyen mtha' can dang / gzhan yang / swa na/ thag nye ba/ nga'am rang / brdzun/ mtshan mo/ dgag tshig/ gnyen/ ma 'dres pa/ ma 'dres pa/ mtshungs pa'am 'dra pa/ u pad+b+hA/ sa na ta/ swa
[\[88b.6\]]nA ta/ tr-i ras/ a n+tA ra/ a n+ta re Na/ dz+yoka/ kaM/ shaM/ bde ba'am skyid pa/ bram ze ltar ram bram ze can/ rgyal rigs ltar ram can/ sa ha sA/ pi nA/ nA nA/ swa sti/ bden pa'am des so/ swa d+hA/ a laM/ ba Sha Ta/ a n+ya ta/ a sti/ u pAM shu/ k+Sha mA/ di hA/ thag nye ba'am ring ba min la snying ba'am sngon ma'am snga sor/
[\[88b.7\]]'phur ba/ bar ram mtshams/ gsal ba dang srog chags phra mo/ mtho ris bram ze lta bu'am 'dra ba/ ya sA/ doTA/ mtshan mo/ mr-iShA/ brdzun/ mi th+yA/ bcas/ spangs pa/ sna tshogs/ bde legs/ pa ma'i don/ rgyan nam gang ba/ sngags/ gzhan/ yod pa/ ring po/ bzod pa/ gnam la 'phur ba/ mu d+hA/ dga' ba/ pu rA/ sngon nam shar/ 'grel chags sam/ mi
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]tho/ mi thas/ prA yas/ mu has/ brA bA hu kaM/ Ar+Ya ha laM/ a bak+She Ni/ gzi brjid/ sA kaM/ sA r+b+haM/ sa ha/ ma nas/ hi ru ka/ d+hi ka sogs kyang mi zad pa'o/ /ta si lA di sta d+h+yi ta ed+hA ca pa rnaMta/ ta si la sogs de phan gyi ad+hA'i rab rnams kyang ngo / /de phan gyi rkyen ta sil nas
[\[89a.2\]]e d+hA'i bar gyi  mthun pa/ mang po/ slar ram par yang / bab tu rang pa/ mkhas pa'am slob dpon/ mthun pa'am grogs/ rkyen gang rung  bcas/ yid/ khra bo/ ngan pa/ byin pa'i rkyen mtha' rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/ /de phan gyi rkyen kr-i twa su tsa/ sa sta si/ A r+ya lau/ ts+b+yAN+yA Sh+a rnams kyi mtha' can yang mi zad pa'o/ /
[\[89a.3\]]gzhan yang / a tha/ A ma/ pratA ma/ pra sA na/ pra tA na/ mA/ mAng rnams te/ de rnams swar la sogs pa rnams so/ /tsa/ bA/ hA/ a ha/ e ba/ 'di ci nges pa/ e baM/ nU naM/ sha shwa ta/ ku pa ta/ ku tsita/ ne ta/ tse ta/ tsaN/ kwa tsi ta/ a tra/ gang la/ ne ha/ he n+ha/ mA kiM/ yA
[\[89a.4\]]bta/ tA/ de nas bkra shis/ glo bur dang nad/ mi shes pa/ bzang ba/ rgyas pa/ dgag tshig/ sems pa/ bta/ twai/ dwai/ shrai/ bau Sha Ta/ sbA hA/ dang yang / yang na dang 'dra ga nges pa/ tshig gi/ ba bskang smras pa/ de bzhin/ nges pa/ 'os pa/ blun po/ ngan pa/ spangs pa/ yod/ 'jigs pa/ ya lar ram skabs bar gang / 'ching ga sdug bsngal/ ci'ang med/ tu ma/
[\[89a.5\]]chu gang la/ twa thA hi/ la lu/ ki la/ ta thA/ smA/ smi/ a/ i/ u/ r-i/ Sh-i/ e ai/ de'i rgyu la/ de kho na nyid/ drang / dpal/ sngags/ gzhi chugs/ o au sogs dbyangs re re rnams dang / A ba/ dgag tshig/ a/ mA/ no/ nA/ bzhi dang / u ta/ U nya/ o gas/ A da ta/ A taM ka/ be lA yAM/ ya thA/ ki~M/ ci/ nas
[\[89a.6\]]de'i dus nges pa/ gtam sam tshig rgyan nam nges pa/ de'i/ yod pa/ ya ta/ yi/ hA/ hai/ he/ a+YAT/ yA ta/ a ho/ na nu/ ma N+ye/ na hi/ u tA ho/ a si/ brU hi/ na tu/ mtshams sam ces/ ai ti/ I ba/ au/ phaT/ ya di/ ster/ tog gag khang pa/ thal pa/ phyong ba/ dus/ gang gi dus/ ho/ i hi/ i ha/
[\[89a.7\]]na mas/ 'dud/ a ho/ nyung ngu bam nyung ngu / swa ta/ u pa r+yi/ steng / gang / gang la/ dri ba/ kye zhes bod tshig/ thob pa/ ngo mtshar/ snga ma'i dus/ sems pa/ med/ tog ge ba/ yod dang ral gri/ smra ba/ med/ A bAM/ bdag/ su/ zhes sa nyam pa/ gang gi dus/ kaM/ bde ba'am mtho ris/ shu ka/ ne mo/ a nu kaM/ rjes su mtho ris/ yod/ 'di/ 'di/ na hi
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]kaM/ sa t+yaM/ r-i ta ma/ no tse ta/ na tse ta/ dzA ta/ ka thaM/ ku taH/ ku tra/ sha ka TaM/ ad+ya/ di Sh+D+ya/ pa shu/ A nu Sha ka/ b+hadza ka/ aM ga/ DA ka/ phra an/ a re/ tsa Tu/ ngan byed man ngag/ tsA Tu/ hAM/ kuM/ muM/ khuM/ luM/ be/ b+hU ya ma/ a ni shaM/ suSh+Du/ kA maM/ bu ru taH/ A shu/ ta r+hi/ ra has/
[\[89b.2\]]mtho ris med/ bden pa/ bden ba/ med dam dgag tshig/ le lar/ ci'am gang / ci nas/ ci la/ shing rta/ de ring / skar ra/ byol song / dong pa/ nor gong ba'am snod/ lus sam gzugs/ khor zhes ba lta bu rang las chung ba'i bod tshig/ sa ba di/ bod pa/ blo rtse gnyis/ nges ba/ yang yang / rgyun du'am rtag tu/ mchog/ 'dod pa/ da lta/ mgyogs pa/ de la/ dben gnas/ u
[\[89b.3\]]ri/ U ra ri/ de rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/ /tad+d+hi ta sh+tsAs rba bi b+hak+hiH/ de phan las rnam dbye thams cad me 'jug pa rnams kyang ngo / /de phan gyi rkyen rnam dbye rnams mi 'jug pa  mgyogs pa/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/ /de yang dper na de phan gyi rkyen rnam dbye lnga ba'i don
[\[89b.4\]]mang pa las gcig bzung ba'i don/ dang / bdun pa'i don la tes tra sbyar ba'i/ ta haH/ ya taH/ ta tra/ ya tra lta bu'o/ /kr-in+me dzaMtaH/ kr-i ta kyi ma e tsa mtha' 'ang ngo / /kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen ma yig mtha' can rnams dang e tsa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge'i mtha' can rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/ /dper na/ smA raM/
[\[89b.5\]]zhes ma mtha' can dang / dzI ba se/ ping d+h+yaM/ zhes pa e tsa'i mtha' can/ de las/ de la/ gang las/ de la/ gang la/ lta bu rnams kyang mi zang pa'o/ k+t+wA to sun+ka su naH/ k+t+wA to sun ka sun rnams kyang ngo / /k+t+wA dang to sun dang ka sun zhes pa'i rkyen byin pa'i mtha' rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/ /de yang dper na  dran pa'i gyis
[\[89b.6\]]k+tA rkyen mtha' can/ kr-i twA/ to  chor ba 'thung ba/ sun gyi mtha'/ u de to ma ka sun gyi rkyen mtha' can/ bi sr-i paH/ lta bu'o/ /a bya yA t+su paH/ mi zad pa las su pa kyi'o/ /mi zad pa'i sde rnams las su ba ste su sogs rnam dbye thams cad 'jig go/ /'grel par ji skad du/ sa dr-i shaM tr-i Shuling+ge Shu sarbA su
[\[89b.7\]]ca bi b+hak+ti Shu/ btsa byas nas/ ne Shu tsa sa rbeShu yan+na bye ti ta da bya steng / yaM/ zhes pa byung ste/ bod skad du/ rnam par mgyogs pa/ rtags gsum la ni mnyam par mtshungs/ /rnam dbye thams cad la yang ngo / /tshig rnams thams cad la yang ste/ /dbyer med gang de mi zad pa'o/ /zhes mi zad pa'i sde 'di
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]rnams la pho mo ma ning gi dbye ba'i rtags kyi mtha' da mi 'dra ba cung zad tsam yang med de/ kun la sbyor ba kho na yin pas/ gang las kyang mi 'gyur bas na mi zad pa'am/ yang tshig gcig gis don sna tshogs ston pas na don zad pa med pa'i phyir mi zad pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /nyer bsgyur a
[\[90a.2\]]ba dang a pi gnyis kyi a dbyi ba dang / ni sha dang btsa/ di sha gsum la TA pa ster ba sngon gyi drang sreng b+ha gu ri 'dod do zhes yang 'grel par byung ngo / /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya trA da bya yAHsa mA byAH/ zhes bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las mi zad pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda
[\[90a.3\]]spyod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don dper brjod cho ga sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las mi zad pa'i sde rags rim du bstan ba'i sde tshan rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni rtags gsum ngos bzung ba'i
[\[90a.4\]]don du rtags so so'i dbye ba shes par 'dod pas/ mo rtags kyi rkyen nam bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen rnams kyi 'jug tshul bshad par bya ste/ a dzA d+ya ta Sh+DApa/ a dza sogs a ta las TA pa'o/ /a dza sogs a ta mtha' rnams las bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen TA pa ster ro/ /a dza la/ TA pa/ mtha'i
[\[90a.5\]]ha la 'os pa phyis/ cu Tu dag sogs Ta phyis/ a ka gi 'dra ba la rid po 'os/ a dzA/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ e Da kA/ a shwA/ tsa Ta kA/ mU'i kA/ bA lA/ to TI/ bA kA/ ba t+sA/ man+gA/ bi la/ tA/ meng+hA/ ko kilA/ sarbA sogs dang a ta mtha' can ma yin kyang / bAtsa/ ni sha/ di sha/ gsum la TA pa 'jug pa b+ha gu
[\[90a.6\]]ri 'dod do zhes pa ltar/ TA pa sbyar bas/ bA tsA/ ni shA/ di shwa/ sogs dang / /yang 'grel  lug mo'am ma mo/ rgod ma/ bye'u mo/ byid mo/ bu mo lo bcu drug ma/ dbang can/ tshod ma/ bi'u mo/ dal bus 'gro ma/ khrel med ma/ blo ldan ma/ khu byug mo/ thams cad/ par gzhan nas lung drangs pa/ ha laM tA dwA/ ha la mtha' las yang na'o/ /zhes
[\[90a.7\]]pa byung bas skabs 'gar a ta mthar dag ma/ mtshan mo/ phyogs ma/ ma zad ha la gyi mtha' can la yang TA pa 'jug par bshad do/ /shU drA ts+tsA ma ha t+pu rbA dz+dza tiH/ shU dra zhes pa'i rtags las ched po'i skad dod/ ma ha ta sngon na med pa'i rigs kyi don brjod pa la
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]TA pa 'jug go/ shUdrA/ dmang ris/ saM b+ha dzin sha Na pi N+De b+h+yaHpa lwa ta/ saM b+ha s+t+ra a dzin sha Na piN+Da rnams las pha la las so/ /saM dang b+ha s+t+ra dang a dzin/ sha Na dang piN+Da rnams sngon na yod pa'i pha la la bud med kyi rkyen TA pa 'jug go/ /saM ba lA/ b+ha s+t+ra pha lA/ a dzin pha lA/ sha Na pha lA/ paN+Da pha la/ 'grel par
[\[90b.2\]]skabs 'gar e ka sngon ma la'ang 'gyur ro zhes ba byung bas/ e ka pha lA/ 'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs te/ sa ta/ prA kAM Da/ prA ta/ sha ta/ e ka rnams snga ma'i bu Sh+pa la'ang TA pa 'jug go zhes  yang dag pa'i 'bras bu ma/ gsungs b+ha s+t+ra'i 'brus bu ga a dzin pa'i 'bras bu ma/ sha Ni'i 'bras bu ma/ buN+Da'i 'bras bus/ pas/
[\[90b.3\]]sa t+pu t+pA/ prA kAM Da pu Sh+pA/ prAM ta pu Sh+pA/ sha ta pu Sh+pA/ e ka puSh+pA/ 'bras bu gcig/ yang 'grel par/ dz+yeSh+Tha/ ka niSh+Tha/ mad+h+ya ma rnams dang na nya snga ma'i mU la la TU pa 'jug go zhes pa byung bas/ dz+yeSh+ThA/ ka ni Sh+ThA/ ma d+h+ya mA/ a mU lA/ gong du r-i ta na rnams las dI pa'o zhes pa byung pa ltar dI pa/ mtha'i ha la
[\[90b.4\]]me tog dam pa/ 'os pa phyis/ de phan mi/ me tog ma brgya/ me tog ma gcig/ yin pa la la sha ku rnams sos/ da phyis/ kar+t+t+rI/ daN+Di nI/ rA dz+wI/ shu nI/ mag+ho nI/ ma g+ha pa tI rgan mo/ na chung ma/ 'bring ma ste dang babs/ rtsa med ma/ sogs so/ u gi ta sh+tsa/ u ka 'gro ba las
[\[90b.5\]]kyang ngo / /rtags mtha' u ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams 'gro ba las kyang bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen byed pa mo/ dbyug pa can ma/ rgyal mo/ khyi mo/ brgya byin ma/ dI pa 'jug ste/ bi du ShI/ shrA ma tI/ b+ha ba tI/ pa tsa n+tI/ di bya n+tI/ tu dan+tI/ b+hun+tI/ pa t+yi tsI/ pra t+yaM tsI/ tir sh+tsI/ u dI
[\[90b.6\]]tsI/ ba no ra tsa/ wa na las ra'i 'ang ngo / /wa yig u pa d+hu na yod pa'i na mtha' la dI pa 'jug par ma zad na yig kyang ra yig tu 'gyur te/ d+hi ba na? la dI pa/ d+hi ba rI/ de bzhin du/ ha ri dr-i shwa rI/ mkhas ma/ dpal ldan ma/ skal can ma/ g.yos ma/ rtsed mo mkhan ma/ nad can ma/ mdzes ma/ nub phyogs kyi bud med/ dud 'gro ma/ yang
[\[90b.7\]]byang phyogs kyi bud med / 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ba no na ha sha ban gyi ha sha las ma yin no/ /gong du ba na mtha' can la dI ba 'gyur zhing na rang 'gyur ba bshad bA+o ldan ma/ kyang de'i dmigs bsal wa de dang ha sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gang rung nyis brtsegs su yod na dI pa kyang mi 'jug cing na rar mi 'gyur te/
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]dper na/ rA dza yu d+hAn/ sa ha yu d+hAn/ zhes pa lta bu la dI pa mi 'jig go /'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs pa/ ba hu brI hau bA/ 'bru mang po yang na'o/ /tshig sdud kyi na mtshan 'bru mang po'i tshig sdud kyi mtha' la dI ba ster ba dang na ra ra 'gyur ba yang na ba ster 'dam ka can no/ ba hu ng+hi
[\[91a.2\]]ba rI'am yang na dI pa ma byin par gong ha la mtha'i skabs su bshad pa ltar bsgrubs pas/ ba hu d+hi bA lta bu'o/ bA do n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ bA da las yang na'o/ /bA da las dI ba yang na ba ste ster mi ster 'das ka can no/ /dI ba dI/ yang na/ bA da ba ta sogs so/ /TA bri tsi/ rig byed  blo ldan ma mang po/
[\[91a.3\]]la TA pa'o/ /pad ces pa rig byed kyi don can yin na mo rkyen TA pa 'jug ste/ dwi pa dA/ ma naHma na las so/ /ma u pad+hu na yod pa'i na yig mtha' can la mo rkyen dI la 'jug pa ma yin te/ dper na/ sim na/ rkang gnyis ma/ zhes pa lta bu la dI ba mi 'jug/ su/ gong ha la mtha'i skabs ltar/ si
[\[91a.4\]]mA lta bu'o/ a no ba hu br-I he/ an las 'bru mang po'i 'o/ /'bru mang po'i tshig rkang gnyis ma/ sdud kyi mtha' an mtha' la dI pa mi 'jug go zhes gong du 'bru mang gi tshig sdud kyi mtha' la tI pa yang na bar bshad pas dmigs bsal lo/ /dper na/ ba hu ya dz+wa na/ zhes pa la/ dI pa mi
[\[91a.5\]]gla ba mo/ 'jug gong ha la gyi mtha' can ltar bsgrubs pas/ ba hu ya dz+wA zhes pa 'byung ba lta bu'o/ /'on kyang mdo 'di ya dz+wa na kho nam gtogs gzhan la mi 'jug gsung / DA bu D+hA b+h+yA ma n+ya ta ra s+thaM/ gnyis dag la DU pa yang na'o/ /'bru mang po'i tshig sdud kyi mtha' can/ ba hu ya dz+wa dang si man
[\[91a.6\]]gnyis la bud med kyi rkyen DA ba yang na 'jug ste/ DA pa/ mtha'i ha la 'os/ pa phyis/ Ti 'os/ phyis/ da'i don gyi Da phyis/ si mA/ ba hu ya dzA/ yang na gong du bshad pa ltar ba hu rA dz+nyI/ pra t+ya ya s+thA t+kA t+pU rbas+yA ta i dA bya su baH/ rkyen gnas pa las ka las snga ma'i a ta kyi i ta su pa ma yin pa'i A pa la'o/ /ka'i
[\[91a.7\]]rkyen byin pa'i ka'i snga ma'i a ta ste a yig ni su pa ma yin pa'i zhes su pa kyi rnam dbye nA nas bdun pa'i mang tshig gi bar so sor bsdu ba la A pa zer ba de ma yin pa'i bud med kyi rkyen A pa pha rol la i ta ste i yig tu 'gyur te/ dper na/ sarba ka dang / kA ra ka la/ TA ba/ a i/ sarbi kA/ thams cad/ gA ri
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]kA/ mA mi kA/ na ri kA lta bu'o/ /a ta ma yin na ir mi 'gyur te/ naukA/ yang a ta yin kyang / ba hu pa ri brA dza kA/ zhes pa ir mi 'gyur zhes 'grel par byung ngo / /t+yaka t+ya yo sh+tsa/ t+ya ka t+ya ya dag gi'ang ngo / /da phan gyi rkyen t+ya ka dang t+ya ya dag kyang A pa pha rol la i ru 'gyur te/ dper na/ dA k+Shi
[\[91b.2\]]tshig pe'u byed pa/ mi mo ste bud med/ NA t+yi kA/ i ha t+yi kA/ kwa t+y-i kA/ gru mkhan ma/ lta bu'o/ /na yAs yoH/ yas dag gi ma yin no/ /ka'i snga ma yin kyang a ste yang dang sa ste ta da gnyis kyi a ni i ru 'gyur ba ma yin ta/ dper na/ ya kA/ sa kA zhes par gnas la/ yi kA/ si kA/ zhes par
[\[91b.3\]]mi 'gyur ro/ /'grel par/ t+ya ka na ma yin no zhes pas de phan gyi rkyen t+ya kan gyi mtha' ni ir mi 'gyur bas/ dper na/ a d+hit+ya kA/ u pa t+ya kA/ zhes pa nyid du gnas so/ /yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ shis brjod la bun gyi ma yin no/ /bun gyi rkyen shis brjod kyi don can yin na a ir mi
[\[91b.4\]]'gyur te/ dzI ba kA/ b+ha ba kA lta bu ste/ bun a kar 'gyur ba'i rjes so/ /tshig rjes ma la mi 'gyur te/ de ba da t+ti kA/ ya dz+nyi kA/ yang 'grel par/ k+Shi pa kA sogs las ma yin no zhes pa byung pa'i/ k+Shipa kA/ tsa Ta kA/ d+h+ru ba kA/ tAr kA rnams kyang a ir mi 'gyur ro/ /par+Na kA zhes skud
[\[91b.5\]]pa'i mdog 'tsho bam/ ya dang ma yin/ lta bu skud pa'i don yin na a ir 'gyur la/ don gzhan yin na ni 'gyur  lhas sbyin ma/[ (]mchad sbyin [,]mchod sbyin[)] ma/ ro/ /pa r+t+ta kA zhes pa'ang shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rnams de kar gnas  zad ma/ byi'u ma/ brtan ngam/ sgrol ba ma/ par 'dod la/ byang phyogs kyi paN+Di/ mdog ma/ ta
[\[91b.6\]]rnams ba rti kA zhes a ir 'gyur ba 'dod ces 'grel par byung ngo / gtor ma/ /aSh+Ta kA zhes pa'ang lha dang pha'i don yin na a ir mi 'gyur la/ don gzhan la a ir 'gyur bas/ lo brgyad ma/ a Sh+Ti kA zhes pa 'byung ngo / /yang 'grel par gzhan nas lung drangs te/ sU ta kA sogs la 'dam ka'o zhes pa byung bas/
[\[91b.7\]]sU ta kA bud med sbum ma bcas nas zhag bcu las mang bab song ba'i ming / sU te kA/ bu mo/ pu ti kA/ bri n+dAr kA/ bud med mang po tshogs pa'am/ br-in+dA ri kA/ yul bcom brlag gi bud med pa yang zer/ u dI tsA mA ta sa \u0fb6\u0f97\u0f71ne la ka pU rbA yAH/ byung pa rnamasaA ta kyi shul ya ka snga ma'i 'o/ /byang phyogs kyi paN+Dita rnams A phyis pa'i shul ya yig dang ka
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]yig ka dang bcas pa'i A pa pha rol la a ir 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du 'dod pas/ A r+Y+Ya kA/ A r+Y+Yi kA/ tsa Ta ka kA/ tsa Ta ki kA/ yang 'grel par/ A kA sh+ya kA sogs ir 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes pa byung bas/ sAM kA sh+yi kA/ a shI kA/ shu b+ha yi kA/ su na yi kA/
[\[92a.2\]]su pA ki kA/ 'di rnams la yang na pa mi byed do/ /b+ha s+t+rai/ ShA dzA dz+nyA dwA swA na nya pU rbA NA ma pi/ b+ha s+t+ra e  'phags ma/ Sha a dza dz+ha bye'u so/ dwa swa rnams la na nya snga ma las kyang yang na'o/ /b+ha stA la sogs pa de rnams lan nya sngon na yod/ ka shI bud med/ rgod ma/ mdzes ma/ med
[\[92a.3\]]shin tu mdzes ma/ g.yos bzhad ma/ gang yin kyang a ir 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can no/ b+ha s+t+ra kA/ b+ha s+t+ri kA/ e Sha kA/ e Shi kA/ a dza kA/ a dzi kA/ dz+nya kA/ dz+nyi kA/ dwa kA/ dwi kA/ sa kA/ si kA/ a b+ha s+t+ri kA/ b+ha s+t+ri kA/ lta bu'o/ /yang de rnams kyi nang nas kyang na nya
[\[92a.4\]]snga ma'i e Sha kA ni ir mi 'gyur ro zhes 'grel par byung bas/ a ne Sha kA zhes pa nyid du gnas so/ 'grel khol tho/ bar/ b+ha s+t+ra kA zhes pa'i sngon du nyer  ram/ bsgyur gang  she sam/ byung  gnyis ma/ yang er 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka byed do zhes pa byung bas/ ni r+b+ha s+t+ra kA/ ni r+b+ha s+t+ri
[\[92a.5\]]kA/ a b+hA Shi ta puM skA ts+tsa/ skyes pa las ma bshad pa la yang na'o/ /sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su ma bshad pa rnams la yang a ir 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ ga ga kA/ gaM gi kA/ a gaM ga kA/ ba ra ma ga ga kA/ par ma gaM gi kA/ skyes
[\[92a.6\]]pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad pa rnams la a ir 'gyur ba kho na byed la yang na mi byed de/ shu b+h+ri kA lta bu'o/ ba hu brI hau tu ni t+yaM/ 'bru mang po la nges pa'o/ /sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su bshad ma thag pa'i rtags 'bru mang gi tshig sdud can la yang na bar mi byed par a ir 'gyur ba kho na
[\[92a.7\]]bya ste/ a kha T+ri kA lata bu'o/ /A dA tsA r+Y+YA NAM/ slob dpon rnams kyi A ta la'o/ /sngon gyi slob dpon 'ga' zhig sngar skyes pa'i rtags kyi skabs su ma bshad pa'i rtags mtha' ring po rnams TA pa dang bcas pa'i ka pha rol la thung ngur bsgyur bar yang ga 'dod de/ dper na/ gaM gA kA zhes pa la/
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]gaM ga kA lta bu'o/ /Ti D+h+ya Na nya dwa ya sa dza da g+h+nany+mA tra tsa ta ya pa Tha ka Tha nya ka nya kA ra pa bU nAM/ Ti D+hi a Na a nya dwa yas dza da g+hA nya mA tra tsa ta ya pa Tha ka Tha nya ka nya kwa rab blun rnams kyi'o/ /rkyen Ta 'gro ba rnams dang D+ha 'gro ba rnams dang a Na la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi mtha' la'ang bud med du brjod pa'i
[\[92b.2\]]rkyen dI ba 'jug ste/ de yang dper na/ Ta 'gro ba'i rkyen mtha' la/ ku ru tsa rI/ na dI sogs dang / D+ha 'gro ba la/ sau pa r+Ne yI/ a Na la/ an+d+rI/ a nya la/ au t+sAM dr-i yas dza la/ u ru dwa ya sI/ da g+h+nanyal/ u ru da g+ni/ mA tra tsa la/ u ru mA trI/ ta ya pa la/ pany+tsa tA yI/
[\[92b.3\]]Tha ka le/ a+wa k+Shi kI/ Tha nya la/ lA wa Ni kI/ ka nya la/ yA dr-i shI/ ku ru'i yul du spyod pa/ rgyun can te chu bo/ kwa ra pa la/ i twa rI/ khUn la/ A d+yaM/ mig mo/ ka ra NI sogs so/ /yang a Na'i  zad ldan ma/ dmigs bsal/ pa hu ku ru tsa ra dang / daN+Da la dwi pa mi 'jug TA pa 'jug lnga len ma/
[\[92b.4\]]mig ldan ma/ go zhes pa 'grel  lan tshwa can ma/ par 'byung bas/ ba hu ku ru tsa rA/ daN+DA zhes pa lta bu'o/ /na nya sna nyi  'gro ba/ nyin byed ma / ka k+ta ru Na ta lu nA nAM tsa/ na nya sna nya I ka ka ta ru Na ta lu na rnams kyi 'ang ngo / /rkyen na nya sna nya sgra ngan du spyod ma mang po/ dbyug pa ma/ I ka ka rnams dang ta ru Na
[\[92b.5\]]zhes pa'i rtags rnams la yang dI pa 'gyur te/ dper na/ sgra ngan du sbyod pa mang po/ dbyug pa can ma/ na nya la/ stai NI/ sna nya la/ pauM snI/ I ka ka la/ yA Sh+TI kI/ sha k+tI kI/ ta ru NI/ ta lu ni sogs so/ /prA tsAM Sh+ga tad+R+hi taHshar pa rnams Sh+ka tad+R+hi ta'o/ /ya nya mtha' la rgya gar shar phyogs kyi
[\[92b.6\]]slob dpon rnams bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen Sh+ka 'jug la/ de la tad+R+hi ta ste de phan gyi ming can zhes brda chad  bud med/ byed de/ gA rgyal/ Sh+ka/ sa chod sbyin byed ma/ ma dung can ma/ lus phra ma/ ShaHpra t+ya ya s+ya/ rkyen gyi Sha'o/ /w+ka lta bu'i rkyen gyi thog ma'i Sha yig ni 'gro ba'i ming can yin te/
[\[92b.7\]]Sha phyis/ nye ba'i yul la a tsa dang rjes su sna ldan 'gro ba'o zhes pas/ a phyis/ mtha'i ha la 'os/ ka phyis/ gA rgya/ ya nya sh+tsaH/ ya nya las 'ang ngo / /ya nya'i rkyen mtha' las kyang bud med du byed pa'i rkyen dI pa 'jug ste/ gA rgya/ dI pa/ gang gi i ta la'ang ngos/ rtags mtha'i a phyis/ ha
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]la stad+d+hi twa s+ya/ ha la las de phan gyi'o/ /hal gyi pha rol la de phan gyi ya yig ni dbyi bar bya ste/ ya phyis/ ga rgI/ A ya ne yI nI yi yAHpha D+ha la tsha gAM/ pha D+ha la tsag+ha rnams kyi A yan e yan In ya i ya rnams so/ de phan gyi rkyen gyi pha rnams A ya na ru
[\[93a.2\]]'gyur/ D+ha rnams e ya/ ka rnams In/ tsha rnams I ya/ g+ha rnams i ya zhes par 'gyur te/ gA rgya la/ pha nya/ drang srong gA rga'i chung ma/ pha A ya nang bsgyur/ gA rgA ya Na/ Shi d+gau rA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ Shi ta gau ra sogs rnams las kyang ngo / /rkyen Sha 'gro ba rnams dang gau ngal sogs
[\[93a.3\]]pa rnams la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI Sha 'jug ste/ gA rgyu ya Na zhes pa gau nga sogs kyi nang tshan yin pas/ di Sha/ mtha'i ha la 'os/ Sha phyis/ la sha ku zhes pas da phyis/ gang gi i ta la'ang ngos/ rtags mtha'i a phyis/ gArgyA ya NI/ na rta kI/ gau rI/ ba ya si pra tha me/
[\[93a.4\]]dang po'i na tshod la'o/ /dang po'i na tshod ces pa lo bcu tshun gyi na tshod brjod pa'i don can gyi a yig mtha' can la'ang dI Sha 'jug ste/ ku mA rI/ ki shwa rI/ 'grel bar lo bcu tshun du ma zad rgan mo min pa'i dar bab la yang dI Sha 'jug go zhes pa 'byung bas/ gar ma/ dkar mo/ tsi ra TI/ rgan mo
[\[93a.5\]]yin na dI pa mi 'gyur TA pa 'jug pas/ br-id+d+hA/ a ta mtha' ma yin na dang po'i na tshod yin kyang mi 'gyur te/ dper na/ shi shu zhes pa/ gzhon nu ma/ 'a dISha mi 'jug go /a ta mtha' yin kyang ka n+ya la dI Sha mi 'jug TA pa 'jug ste/ /ka n+yA/ dwi goHphyog gnyis pa las  sgang yo sam/ so/
[\[93a.6\]]tshig sdud kyi nang tshan phyogs gnyis/ rgan mo/ pa'i tshig sdud byas pa'i a mtha' can la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen  gzhon nu/ dI ba 'jug ste/ pany+tsa mU lI/ phyogs gnyis pa yin kyang tri pha la la dI pa mi 'jug TA pa 'gyur te/ gzhon nu ma/ tri pha lA/ a pa ri mA Na bistA tsi ta kam+ba l+ye b+h+yo na
[\[93a.7\]]ta d+d+hi ta lu ki/ chad ma yin pa'i snya a tsi ta kam+da l+ya rnams las de phan phyis pa la ma yin no/ /pi sta sogs 'di rnams la phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig sdud  rtsa ba lnga ma/ kyis de phan gyi rkyen phyis pa dang tshad kyi sgra ma yin pa rnams la dI pa 'jug pa ma yin 'bras bu gsum ma/ te TA pa 'jug go /
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]bany+tsa shwa/ dwi bar+ShA/ dwi bi stA/ d+w+ya tsi tA/ dwi kam+ba l+yA/ tshad yin na dI pa 'jug ste/ d+w+yA Da ki/ kA N+DAM tA ta k+She tre/ kAN+Da mtha' las zhing la'o/ /grangs snga ma'i kAN+Da la zhing brjod pa'i don las de phan gyi rkyen phyis pa la dI pa 'jug pa ma yin te/ dwi kAN+DA k+She tra b+ha k+tiH/ zhing ma yin na dI pa 'gyur
[\[93b.2\]]rgod ma lnga/ lo gnyis/ mtho gnyis/ mchod pa gnyis ma/ lab gnyis ma/ te/ dwi kA N+DI  bro do/ ra rdzuHpu ru ShA t+p+ra mA Ne n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ pu ru Sha las tshad la yang na'o/ /grangs snga ma'i de phan phyis pa la pu ru Sha las tshad la dwi pa yang na ste/ dwi pu ra  tsher ma gnyis pa'i shing zos/ ShI ya Sh+tsiHdwi pu ru ShA/
[\[93b.3\]]U d+ha so nar/ U d+has kyi a nang ngo / U ng+has zhes pa'i Ti ni  tshe ras ma gnyis pa'i thag pa/ bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen ma yin na Ti a nang du mi 'gyur te/ /Ti a nang du bsgyur/ mtha'i hal 'os/ da phyis/ na'i a brjod don U ng+d+ha na/ bahu brI he rU ng+ha so rI Sha/ skyes bu gnyis kyi mchod sdong /
[\[93b.4\]]'bru ma mang po la U ng+has la sa dI Sha'o/ 'bru mang gi tshig sdud can U ng+has la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI Sha 'gyur te/ na'i a dbyi 'os u pa ng+hA'i a phyis/ pI no ng+h+ni/ bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen ma yin na Ti a nang du mi 'gyur to/ /dA ma hrA ya nAM tA ts+tsha/ dA ma na hA yan las 'ang ngo / /
[\[93b.5\]]grangs snga ma'i dA ma na dang hA ya na las na tshod la dI Sha 'gyur te/ dI rA m+ni/ dwi hA ya nI/ yang 'grel par hA yan lan tshod la dI Sha 'gyur zhing / tri tsa tur/ nu ma 'o mas gang ba/ nu ma 'o mas gang ba/ dag sngon du byung na na'i 'ang Na'o zhes pa byung bas/ tri hA ya NI/ tsa tu D+hA ya NI/ na tshod min na dI Sha mi 'gyur te/ /
[\[93b.6\]]tri hA ya nA shA lwa/ an+da rba t+pa ti rnuka/ an+ta rba ta pa ti/ chu bo gnyis ma/ lo gnyis ma/ ba ta las nu ka'o/ /an+ta rba ta dang pa ti bta dag las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen pha rol la nu ka A ga ma 'gyur te/ an+ta rba p+mI/ pa ti ba t+nI/ pa lo gsum ma/ mo bzhi ma/ t+yA rno ya dz+nya saM yi ge/ pa ti lin
[\[93b.7\]]lo gsum gyi mgron khang / mchod sbyin sbyor ba la'o/ /pe ti'i sgra las mchod sbyin sbyor ba can te bdag po dang ldan pa'i don la Ti nar 'gyur zhing dI Sha 'jug ste/ pat+nI/ bdag ldan ma/ big+hA ShA sa dU rbas+ya/ sda ma/ mngal ldan ma/ bdag po ldan ma ste chung ma/ dang bcas pa'i yang na'o/ /ming gzhan snga ma dang
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bcas pa'i pa ti'i sgran pu 'gyur ba dang dI Sha yang na ste/ dr-i b+ha pa t+nI/ dr-i b+ha pa tiHni byis pa h+n+yA di Sha/ sa pat+nI sogs rnams la rtag tu'o/ /sa mA na la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi pa ti sgra rta ka tu na dang dI Sha 'gyur te/ sa pA t+nI/ e ka pat+nI sogs so/ /bU ta kra tor tse/ mU ta
[\[94a.2\]]kra tu'i ai yang ngo / /pU ta ka tu'i sgra ni ai ru 'gyur zhing dI Da 'jug ste/ bstan ba'i bdag mo/ bstan pa'i bdag po/ pU ta kA tA yI/ br-i ShA kA d+ya g+ni ku si ta ku sI dA mu dA t+taH/ br-i ShA ka pi ag+ni ku si ta ku sId rnams kyi u dA t+ta'o/ bdag bcas ma/ bdag po gcig ma/ /br-i ShA ka pi sogs 'di rnams
[\[94a.3\]]kyi skyes pa ldan pa las dA+eSha 'gyur zhing mtha' ai ru yang 'gyur te/ udA t+ta'i ming can zhes zer ro/ /b-I ShAH/ gtsang ma'i mchod sbyin/ ka pA yI/ ag+nA yI/ ku si tA yI/ ku sI dA yI/ ma no rau bA/ ma nu las au yang na'o/ /ma nu las skyes pa ldan pa la di Sha yang na ste mtha' au ru 'gyur
[\[94a.4\]]pa'am yang na au ru 'gyur te/ mnA wI/ ma nA yI/ ma nuH/ bar+NA da nu dA t+tA t+to pa d+hAt+to naH/ dbyangs a nu dA t+ta las u pa/ ce sbyang 'dra ba'i spre'u mo/ me lha mo/ b+ha'i ta/ ngan ma/ le lo ma/ na'o/ mtha'i dbyangs a nu dA t+ta ste sgra skad gsang dma' bar brjod pa a yig thung ngu'i u pa ng+hI ta yig ni
[\[94a.5\]]dI Sha pha rol lan yig tu 'gyur te/ mi mo/ mi mo/ mi/ e nI/ yang na a tA/ mtha' a yig min na a nurA t+ta yin kyang ta nar mi 'gyur te/ shi tI/ lta bu'o/ 'grel par gung drangs pa/ pa shaMg las 'ang ngo / /pa shaMg la'ang bud med du brjod pa'i 'i rkyen dI Sha 'gyur zhes pa 'byung bas/ pi
[\[94a.6\]]shaM g+Shi/ yang 'grel bar a shi ta dang pa li ta la dI Sha 'jug sna ba mo/ pa ma yin zhing TA pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas/ a shi tA/ ba li tA/ yang dkar mo/ k+na'i rkyen can la dI Sha 'gyur te/ a shi g+nI/ ba li g+nI/ sUr+Ya ti Sh+yAg skya ma t+s+yAnAM ya u pa b+hA yAH/ sUr+Ya ti Sh+ya a ga s+t+ya ma t+h+ya rnams
[\[94a.7\]]kyi u pa d+hA'i ya'o/ /sUr+Ya sogs de rnams la dISha 'gyur zhing u pad+hA'i ya dbyi ste/ sdu rI/ nyi ma'i/ ti ShI/ a gastI/ ches cher rgan mo/ ma t+sI/ nya mo/ 'grel bar pu Sh+ya kyi ya'ang dbyi'o zhes ba byung  ches cher rgan mo/ bas/ buShI/ rgyal/ dzAn pad kuN+Da go Na m+thA ka b+hA dza nA ga lA la nI la
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ku shakAmu ka ka Da r-I d+d+ra t+yaM na trA baM pa nA kr-i t+ti mA shrA NA s+thau l+ya ba r+NA nA tshA da nA yo ba'i kA ra mai thu ne tshA ke sha be she Shu/ dzA na pa da kuN+da go Na s+thA la b+hA dza nA ga kA la nI la ku sha kA mu ka ka bar rnams las rgyu snod gang kha la/ ma bcos ba lo ma sbom ba mdog khebs min pa khyim 'khrig 'dod/ skra chas
[\[94b.2\]]rnams la'o/ /dzAn pad la sogs pa bcu gcig po de rnams la go rims bzhin rgyu la sogs pa bcu gcig rnams kyi don brjod pa'i tshe dISha 'jug ste/ dzA na pa dI/ ku N+DI/ go NI/ s+thA lI/ b+hA dz+Shi/ nA gI/ kA lI/ nI lI/ ku shI/ kA mu kI/ ka ba rI/ lta bu yin la/ de dag
[\[94b.3\]]las gzhan la TA pa 'jug pas/ dzA na pa dA nas/ ka ba rA'i bar ro/ /'grel par gzhan nas lus drangs te/ nI la las srog skyes yul gyi rgyu ma/ snod ma/ glang khal ma/ ma bcos ma/ lo'am 'dab ma/ sbos ba'am phyug mo/ nag mo/ rim mam sngon mo/ lcags khyim/ 'khrig 'dod ma/ thor cog ma/ chags dang sman
[\[94b.4\]]dag la bang ngo / /zhes pa 'byung bas/ nI lI ba Da bA/ nI mI o Sha d+hiH/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ /yang 'grel par sho Na las shar gyi paN+Di ta rnams dI Sha 'jug par yang na 'dod zhes 'byung bas/ shoNI/ sho NA/ u ngaM tA ng+gu Na ba tsa nA ta/ u ta mtha' las yon tan brjod pa las so/ /u ta
[\[94b.5\]]mtha' las yon tan brjod pa la  rgod ma sngon mo/ sman sngon mo/ dI Sha yang na 'gyur te/ mri dwI/ mri duH/ pa T+wI/ pa TuH/ u ta mtha' ma yin na yon tan brjod pa yin kyang dI Sha mi 'gyur te/ dmar mo/ shru tsiHsbI/ u ta mtha' yin kyang yon tan brjod pa ma yin na dI Sha mi 'jug
[\[94b.6\]]ste/ A khuH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ kha ru dang u pa d+hA na brtsegs pa yod na dI Sha 'jam mnye nam/ mkhas ma/ 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa byung bas/ kha ruH/ pA N+DuH/ ba hwA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ ba hu sogs  bud med gtsang ma/ rnams las yang na'o/ /ba hu la sogs pa rnams la dI Sha
[\[94b.7\]]'jug byi ba/ ba dang mi 'jug pa 'dam ka can te/ bahwI/ mang pos/ ba huH/ mang bo/ pad+d+ha tI/ dra las/ pad+d+ha tiH/ dral/ i tAH/ prA t+yAM gA ta/ i ta las srog chags skya sangs/ kyi lus las so/ /i ha mtha' las srog chags kyi lus kyi yan lag brjod pa la dISha yang na 'gyur te/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]aM gu lI/ aM gu liH/ kr-i di kA rA dak+tinaH/ kr-i ta i yig las k+tin ma yin pa las so/ /kri ta sogs kyi rkyen i ta mtha' las k+tin ma yin pa la thISha yang na 'gyur te/ rA dzI/ rA dziH/ A dziH/ k+tin la/ bud+d+hiH/ ma tiH/ puM yo bA dA khyA yAM/ skyes
[\[95a.2\]]pa'i ming dang ldan pa la'o/ mdzub mo/ skyes pa'i ming dang ldan pa la dI Sha 'gyur te/ go pI/ a na Du hI/ a na D+wa hI/ ma tA ma hI/ pi tA ma hI/ go bA li kA sogs la dI Sha 'gyur ba  gsal bam/ gsab ba/ rmo mo'am a hI/ ma yin no zhes  blo gros/ 'grel bar byung bas/ go sA
[\[95a.3\]]li kA/ sUr+YAd+de ba tA yAM tsA ya/ sUr+Ya las lha la tsA ba'o/ /skyes pa'i ming dang  'brog mo/ ldan  'bri/ pa sUr+Ya la lha  sa'i ma/ pha'i ma/ las te nyi ma'i chung ma brjod pa la tsA ba 'gyur te/ mtha'i hal 'os ba phyis/ tsu Tu sogs kyis ca phyis/ sUr+YA/ yang na/ sUr+Ya ti Sh+ya
[\[95a.4\]]ba lang sbyor ma/ sogs kyis/ sU rI/ in+d+ra ba ru Na b+ha ba sharba ru dra mr-i Da hi mAr N+ya ya ba ya ba na mA tu lnga tsAr+YA NA mA nu ka/ inA ba ru Na b+ha ba sha rba ru dra mr-i Da hi ma a ra N+ya ya ba na mA tu la A tsAr+Ya rnams kyi A nu ka'o/ /in+d+ra sogs 'di rnams  nyi ma'i lta mo/ la skyes pa dang ldan pa la
[\[95a.5\]]dISha 'gyur zhing A nu ka A ga ma yang 'gyur te/ in+dA NI/ ba su d+ha ran+d+rA NI/ ba ru NA NI/ b+ha bA nI/ sha rbA NI/ ru dwA NI/ mr-i DA nI/ hi mA nI/ /a ra N+yA nI/ ya bA nI/ ya ba nA nI/ mA tu lA nI/ A tsAr+YA NI/ 'grel par bra h+ma las A nu ka dang dI Sha yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/
