[\[95a.6\]]brah+ma NI/ 'grel par mA tu la dang u pa/ dbang mo/ nor 'dzin dbang mo/ b+h+yA ya gnyis  tshu pA mo/ srid pa mo/ 'tshe byed mo/ dag mo/ bde ba mo/ kha ba mo/ dgon pa mo/ nas ma/ 'dres mo/ zhang bo'i mna' ma/ slob dpon kyi tshung ma/ la yang na bar bshad pas/ mA tu lA nI/ mA tu li/ u pA b+h+yA
[\[95a.7\]]tshangs pa mo/ yA nI/ mkhan mo/ u pA d+h+yA yi/ 'grel par Ar+Ya k+Sha tri ya gnyis la yang na lo zhes ba byung bas/ Ar+YA NI/ rje mo'ang ngo mo 'am 'phags ma/ Ar+YA/ k+Sha tri yA NI/ rgyal rigs ma/ k+Sha tri yA/ yang na dI Sha 'gyur A nu ka ma byin bas/ Ar+YI/ k+Sha tri yI/ zhang po'i mna' ma/ sUr+Ya la yang
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]skabs la lar Anu ka 'jug pa srid de/ sUr+YA NI/ krI tA t+ka ra Na dU rbA ta/ krI ta las byed pa snga ma las so/ /byed pa'i tshig snga ma'i krI ta las dI Sha 'gyur te/ bas+t+ra krI tA/ 'grel par la lar byed pa'i tshig snga ma can la dI Sha mi 'gyur ba yang yod do zhes pa byung bas/ d+ha na krI tA/ k+tA
[\[95b.2\]]da wA khyA yAM/ k+ta las chung ngu brjod pa  nyi ma'i chung ma/ la'o/ /byed pa snga ma'i k+ta'i mtha' las chung ngu brjod pa la dI Sha 'gyur te/ /a b+h+ra bi li b+hI/ ba hu brI  gos to ma/ he sh+tsAM to dA t+tA ta/ 'bru mang po'i mtha' la'ang u dIt+ta las so/ /'bru mang po'i tshig stad k+ta'i  nor nyo ma/ mtha'
[\[95b.3\]]can u dA t+ta las kyang dI Sha 'gyur te/ U ru b+hi n+nI/ 'grel par/ dzA ta las dI Sha 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes pa byung bas/ dan+ta dzA tA/ sprin gyi ma khebs ma/ pa hu na nya su kA la su khA di pA rbA ts+tsa ni/ ba hu na nya su kA la su kha sogs snga ma las kyang ma yin no/ /ba hu la sogs pa 'di rnams sngon
[\[95b.4\]]na yod pa'i mtha' la'ang dI Sha 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ba hu kr-i tA/ a kr-i tA/ su kr-i tA/ kA la kr-i tA/ su kha kr-i tA/ sogs so/ so skyes ma/ /'grel par pA Ni gr-i hI ta las bag ma brjod pa la dI Sha'o zhes pa byung bas/ pA Na gr-i tI tI/ gzhan la pA Ni gr-i hI tA/ a sAM ga pA rba ba rA dwA/ rang lus
[\[95b.5\]]ma yin pa'i tshig snga ma las yang na'o/ /rang gi  mang byed ma/ byed min ma/ bzang byed ma/ ngus khyed ma/ nga de byed ma/ lus ma yin pa'i tshig snga ma can k+ta'i mtha' las dI Sha yang na 'gyur te/ su rA pI  lag pa nas bzung ma ste 'gam/ lag 'dzin ma/ tI/ su rA pI tA/ swA gAts+tso pas rdza nA da
[\[95b.6\]]saM yo go bad+hA ta/ rang gi yan lag la'ang nyer bsgyur las u ba d+hA yang dag par sbyor ba med pa las so/ /rang gi lus las nyer bsgyur snga ma can u pa d+hA yang dag par sbyor ba ste brtsegs pa ma yin pa la dISha yang na 'gyur te/ su mu khA/ su mu khI/ chang 'thung ma/ a ti ke shA/ a ti ke shI/
[\[95b.7\]]u bad+hA yang dag bar sbyor ba yod na dI Sha mi 'gyur te/ su gu wA/ rkang tshigs mdzes ma/ 'grel par aM ga gA tra ka N+Tha rnams la dISha yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/ swaM gI/ gzugs mdzes ma/ swaM gA/ su gA trI/ lus mdzes ma/ su gA  gdong mdzes ma/ trA/ su  skra bzang ma/ skra bzang ma/
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]kaN+ShI/ su ka N+ThA/ yang 'grel par ba nyu swe da sogs la dI Sha 'jug pa ma yin no zhes pa byung bas/ ba hu sA+e dA/ su dz+wA nA/ su so pA/ yang 'grel par srog chags ma yin pa la dISha yang na'o zhes pa byung bas/ su sta nI/ su sta nA/ nA si ko da rau Sh+Tha dzi g+hA da n+tA ka rta
[\[96a.2\]]shrA gA ts+tsa/ nA si ka mgrin mdzes ma/ u dar o Sh+Tha dzaM g+ha ngan+ta kar+Na shr-i ng+ga las 'ang ngo / n+da so ka la sogs pa'i da  lus la rngul mang po 'dzag ma/ ye shes bzang mo/ khang bzang ma/ rnams la dI Sha yang na 'gyur te/ su nA si kI/ sri Sho  nu ma mdzes ma/ da rI/ pr-i Sho da rA/ bim+da Sh+ShA/ bam+ba Sh+ThA su
[\[96a.3\]]dzi g+h+nge/ su dzaM g+hA/ su da n+tI/ su dan+tA/ su kar+NI/ su kar+NA/ su shr-ing+gI/ su shr-ing+gA/ 'grel par su buts+tsha las dI ma yang na'o zhes 'byung bas/ supu ts+tshI/ supu ts+tshA/ yang 'grel par/ ka ba ra/ ma Ni/ bi Sha/ sha ri sna mdzes ma/ rgyas pa'i lto ba ma'am ri dgas lto ba ma/ bim pa'i mchu ma/
[\[96a.4\]]rnams  byin mdzes ma/ so mdzes ma/ snga ma'i pu ts+tsha  sna mdzes ma/ rA mdzes ma/ las dISha rtag tu 'gyur te yang na ba mi byed do gsung bas/ ka ba ra  'jug mdzes ma/ puts+tsI/ ma Ni pu ts+tshI/ shar pu ts+tshA/ u bamA nA t+pa k+Sha pu ts+tshA b+haM/ nye bar 'jal ba las pa k+Sha pu ts+tsha dag las so/ /
[\[96a.5\]]nye bar 'jal ba las pak+Sha dang puts+tsha'i sbra dga' dwiSha yang na 'gyur te/ sh+ye na pak+ShI/ sh+ye na pak+ShA/ ulU ka pu ts+tshI/ u lU ka pu ts+tshA/ na kro DA di bah+b+r-i tsaH/ ko Da  mjug ma phra mo/ nor bu'i mjug ma/ dug 'jug ma/ sogs dang bah+b+ri tsa las ma yin no/ /kro Da la sogs pa rnams dang
[\[96a.6\]]bah+b+r-i tsa las dI Sha 'gyur ba ma yin te/ su kro DA/ su dza g+ha nA/ bah+b+r-i khra'i spro lta bu ma/ khra'i sgro lta bu'am/ 'ug ba'i mjug ma lta bu ma/ tsA/ sa ha na nyI d+ya mA na pU rbA ts+tsha/ sa ha na nya di d+ya mA na snga ma las kyang ngo / /sa ha la sogs ba 'di rnams snga ma'i rang lus la dI Sha 'gyur ba ma yin te/ sA ke shA/ a nA si
[\[96a.7\]]kA brang yo na/ bi d+ya mA no da rA/ 'grel  rmig pa mdzes ma/ brla mdzes ma/ par/ Na kha/ mu kha dag las ming la dI Sha 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes ba byung bas/ sU rba na khA/ mna' ma'i min mo/ /gau ra mu khA/ gdong dkar ma/ ming ma yin na/ zangs sen ma/ ShA ma na khI/ bzhin mdzes ma/ tsA ru  skra bcas ma/ sna med ma/
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]mukhI/ bA haH/ bu ta las so/ /bA ha'i mtha' la'ang dI Sha 'gyur te/ b+hA ro hI/ sa khya shi shwI b+hA ShA yAM/ sa khi a shi shwi brjod pa la'o/ /sa khi dang a shi shwi la dI Sha sbyar ba'i/ /sa khI/ a shi shwI dag bud med brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /dzA ti ra stI bi Sha yA da yo pa d+hA ta/ ya u pa d+hA ma yin pa'i rigs
[\[96b.2\]]las bud med kyi yul ma yin pa las so/ /u pa d+hA ya yig ma  khur po 'khur ma/ yin pa rigs thun mong gi tshig las bud med kyi yul ma yin pa las dI Sha 'gyur te/ grogs mo/ mo gsham/ mr-i gA/ haM sI/ d+ha TI/ ku k+ku TI/ su ka rI/ rigs ma yin na dI Sha mi 'gyur te/ muM D+na/
[\[96b.3\]]bud med kyi yul yin na dI Sha mi 'gyur te/ ba lnga kA/ ya yig u pa d+hA la k+Sha tri yA/ yang 'grel par ya yig u bad+hA yin kyang yul ma yin pa las dI Sha 'gyur ro zhes 'byung bas/ ga pa ri dgas mo/ ngang mo/ srang ma/ bya gag mo/ phag mo/ yI/ ha yI/ mu kA yI/ ma t+s+yI/ ma nu Sh+TA/
[\[96b.4\]]pA ka kar+Na par+Na pu Sh+pa pha la mU la bA lo t+tar  stobs ldan ma/ pa dA ts+tsa/ pA ka/ rgyal rigs ma/ kar+Na/ bar+Na/ buSh+Na/ ba la/ mU la/ bA la rnams tshig phyi ma las kyang ngo / /rigs brjod pa can gyi pA ka sogs tshig phyi ma la dI Sha 'gyur te/ o  rkyang mo/ rgod ma/ rdzab ra mo/ ha mo/ mi mo ste bud med/
[\[96b.5\]]da na pA kI/ shaM ku kar+NI/ shA la bar+NI/ shaM Sha puSh+pI/ dA sa pha lI/ da r+b+ha mU lA/ go bA lI/ i to ma nu Sh+ya dzA teH/ i ta las mi'i rigs las so/ /i ta ste i yig mtha' can mi'i rigs brjod pa las dI ma 'gyur te/ a ba b+tI/ dA k+ShI/ ku n+tI/ U du taH/ u ta las U nga'o/ /u
[\[96b.6\]]zan 'tshod ma/ rna rgyas ma/ lo 'dab ma/ dung gi me tog ma/ bsus bu ril mo/ ku sha'i rtsa ba ma/ ba lang gzhon nu ma/ yig mtha' las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen Ung 'gyur te/ ku rUH/ brah+ma ban+dUH/ d+h+ri ban+hUH/ yus srung byed ma/ tshangs pa'i bu'am na' ma/ mdung can ma/ 'grel par ya yig u
[\[96b.7\]]pa d+hA can las Ung 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa byung bas/ a ng+ha r+YuH/ mchod sbyin ma/ 'grel par srog chags ma yin pa rnams kyi yin pa rnams kyi radzU sogs ma yin pa  ku ru yul gyi bud med/ tshangs pa'i rtsa lag ma/ blo'i tsu lag ma/ rnams las Ung 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas/ a lA bUH/ su nga / thug pa/ ya bA
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]gUH/ srog chags yin na d+he nuH/ radz+dzA sogs la/ radz+dzuH/ ha nuH/ ta nUH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ pi gu shwa shru dag las kyang ngo / /paM gu dang shwa shru dag las kyang bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen Ung 'gyur te/ paM gUH shwa shruH/ de dag bud med du brjod pa
[\[97a.2\]]la tshig prad do/ /A rA t+ta ra pa dA dau pa mye/ U/ 'dod 'jom/ ru tshig phyi ma  thag pa/ 'gram pa/ sna las/ las he bar 'jal ba la'o/ /U ru zhes pa'i sgra tshig phyi ma yin na nye par 'jal pa'i don can bud med du brjod pa la Ung 'gyur te/ gong mo/ rgyud mo/ ka ra b+ho rUH/ nye bar 'jal
[\[97a.3\]]ba ma yin na/ br-i to ruH/ saM hi ta sha pha la k+Sha Na bA mA de sh+tsa/ saM hi ta/ sha pha/ lak+Sha Na/ bU ma sogs las kyang ngo / /saM hi ta la sogs pa 'di rnams sngon ma'i U rul Ung 'gyur te/ saM hi to rUH/ sha pho rUH/ lak+Sha No rUH/ bA mo rAH/ brla mdzas ma/ byang po'i brla lta bu ma/ sa hi ta sa
[\[97a.4\]]hA b+h+yI tsa/ sa hi  brla snyoms pa/ ta sa ha dag las kyang ngo / /sa hi ta dang sa ha snga ma'i U ru las kyang Ung du 'gyur te/ sa hi to rAH/ sa ho rUH/ 'grel par/ ta nu  brla dang bcas ma ste brla shin tu sbom pa/ brla'i spu/ brla phun tshogs ma'am brla mtshan nyid can ma/ sogs la Ung yang na 'gyur bar
[\[97a.5\]]ba shid pas/ ta nUH/ ta nuH/ tsany+tsuH/ tsany+tsuH/ shA r+ng+ga ra bA d+ya nyoHdU na/ shA r+d+ga ra bA sogs a nya yas dI na'o/ /shA r+ng+ga  brla dang bcas pa/ ra bA sogs a nya'i rkyen mtha' can la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI na 'gyur te/ shA r+ng+ga ra bI/ bai dI/ nr-i na ra yo r+b+r-i d+d+hi sh+tsa/ nr-i na ra dag las
[\[97a.6\]]'phel ba'ang ngo / /gzugs/ nr-i ba ra chu/ dag las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI na 'gyur te 'phel ba'ang ngo / /nA rI/ yang nga sh+tsA pa/ yang las tsA ba'o/ /yang gi mtha' las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen  ri dgas kyi skad 'dra ma/ rig byad ma/ tsA pa 'gyur te tsa ni rigs kyi mtshon
[\[97a.7\]]byed TA ba 'gog ba'i don no/ /ka rI Sha gan+b+h+yA/ gci pa'i dri ma/ kau mu da gaM d+h+yA ku muda'i dri ma/ bA rA h+yA/ phag mo/ 'grel  mi mo/ bar Sha las pha rol gyi ya nya la'ang ngo shes 'byung bas/ pau nyi mA Sh+tsA sa nam gtsang ma/ yUn stiH/ yu ba na las ti'o/ yub na gyi sbra las bud med du brjod pa'i
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]rkyen ti 'gyur te ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os/ na phyis/ yub tiH/ gang tshom/ i ti bA Na ni byU ka ra Na s+ya trA ta s+t+ri yo btsan pra t+ya yA s+sa mA b+hAH/ zhes ba pA Ni ni byu ka ra Na'i mdo las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pI Ni ni byA ka
[\[97b.2\]]ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen ngos bzung 'jug yul cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rnams re zhing rdzogs so// //da ni byed ga
[\[97b.3\]]can gyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ le'u 'dis gong du bshad pa'i rnam dbye rnams kyi 'jug yul rgyas par ston par byed de/ prA ti pa di kA tshA ling+ga ba ri mA NA ma tre bra tha ma/ rtags kyi mtshan nyid ming gi don tsam brjod pa la dang po'o/ /rtags gsum po gang yang 'jug tu rung pa'i mtshan
[\[97b.4\]]nyid can de la ming gi don tsam brjod pa la rnam dbye dang po rnams 'gyur te/ u ts+tsaiH/ ni ts+naiH/ kr-iSh+NaH/ shrIH/ dz+nyA naM/ khA rIH/ droNaH/ A D+ha kaM/ e kaH/ dwau/ ba ha waH/ yung / au ba ga waH/ tsi tra guH/ zhes pa lta bu ste ming gi don tsam brjod pa kho na'o/ /saM bong+ha ne
[\[97b.5\]]tsa/ kun du bod pa la'ang ngo / /kun du bod pa'i don la'ang rnam dbye dang po  mtho ba/ dma' ba/ nag po/ dpal/ ye shes/ khal/ gre mo che/ gla bo che/ gcig/ gnyis dag/ mang 'o rnams/ sbyor ba/ nyi ba'i ba lang / ba lar khra'o/ rnams 'gyur te/ he rA ma/ he rA mau/ he rA mAH/ de ltar rnam
[\[97b.6\]]dbye sde tshan bdun las dang po rnams kyi 'jug tshul spyir btang bshad nas/ ! /gnyis pa'i 'jug tshul ni/ ka rtu rI b+si ta ta maM ka rma/ byed po'i 'dod pa las so/ /gang byed pa po'i 'dod pa'i bya ba'i las ka de la las zhes brda chad  bye dga' byed/ bye dga' byed dang / phye dga' byed rnams/ byed
[\[97b.7\]]do/ /karma Ni dwi tA+e yA/ las las gnyis pa'o/ /las te gang bya ba'i las ka ston pa'i don la rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams 'jug ste/ ka TaM ka ro ti/ rtswa lhas byed/ o da na ma pa ca ti/ zas 'tshed/ grA maMgats+tsha na/ grong la 'gro/ yang 'grel bar b+ha ba karma te/ dngos po dang las la rnam dbye dang
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]po 'jug go zhes byung ste/ se bya te se bi taH/ lak+Sh+m+yA sa dA ha riH/ sha te na krI taHsha t+yaH/ ta thA yu k+taM tsA nI p+si taM/ de'i sbyor ba mi 'dod pa la'ang ngo / /byed pa po 'dod pa'i bya ba'i las ka de las zer bar ma zad byed pa po'i 'dod pa ma yin zhing las mtshan nyid pa ma yin kyang
[\[98a.2\]]gang bya ba'i las ka de la'ang gnyis pa 'gyur te/ mchod pa su mchod/ dbang rtag tu 'grog byed/ brgya'i rdzas brgya/ dper na/ bi ShaM b+huM k+te/ dug bza' zhes pa byed pa po'i 'dod pa dang las mtshan nyid pa ma yin kyang / pi ShaM zhes rnam dbye gnyis pa byung pa lta bu'o/ /a ka thi taM tsa/ ma bshad
[\[98a.3\]]pa'ang ngo / /nges bar kun sbyin pa sogs dang yang na bar ma bshad pa rnams la'ang las zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /dug bza'/ byings du ha 'jo pa/ yA tsa slong pa/ ru d+hi sgrib pa/ pra tshi 'gri ba/ tsi ga sogs pa/ brU gsal por brjod pa/ shA su rjes su bstod pa/ dzi rgyal ba
[\[98a.4\]]rnams dang / NI thob pa/ hr-i 'phrog pa/ kr-i Sha rkob/ man+tha srub pa/ ba ha thob pa/ daN+Da chad pa/ gra ha he bar len pa/ mu Sha rkub/ ba tsa 'tshod pa rnams dang sbyong ba las kyi tshig gnyis gnyis skyor dgos la de yang rnam dbye gnyis pa kho na 'jug ste/ dper brjod 'grel par
[\[98a.5\]]tshigs bcad du byung ba ni/ yau du do haR+ha ra man+ni ya yA tsa ba su d+hAM pa laM/ du do d+ha dai t+yA na pA tA laM pa pra tsha n+d+raM tsa bAM tshi taM/ 1 /d+ha rmA na bA tsi no dwe da ma bra b+Shi t+tA na swa se bi naH/ gA r+thi bA na nA shA d+b+ha kriM tri lo kI ma dza ya dri b+bu na/ dwA ra kA ma na ya dwa n+b+hU na ru k+ni NI ma ha ra d+pu raM/ tsa ka r+Sha kaM saM bi pi naM ma man+tha k+ShI ra
[\[98a.6\]]d+hiM su d+haM/ gang dag sa la za yang ngo ma/ /stobs ldan pa slong nor 'dzin sa/ /snya min rnams la sa lag sgrib/ /dpang po la yang 'grib par 'dod/ /chos rnams kun gsog rig byed la/ /de dmas 'ang g.yon rnams la smras/ /sa bdag rnams la bstod nas mchod/ /'jig rten gshum pas dgra rnams rgyal/ /sgo lnga na gnas ba gtan rnams thob/ /grong la gzhon nu ma srogs te/ /nags la b+ha min rkeng 'byed
[\[98a.7\]]kyi mtshos sru la 'dud rtsil/ a ba ha n+ma n+da raM siM d+hu ma daN+Da ya da rI na sU na/ rgya mtsho thob man+da ra/ /dgra bo rnams la nor chad byung / /dza grA ha d+yu ta ruM sha kra ma mu Sh+NA d+di ti dzA na su d+hAM/ dpag bas mang shing la da rang mos bzung / /lha min mam la bdud rtsi brkus/ /ba tsa ti prA Ni nAM karma yaHpha li ti hi raM b+ha dze/ srog tshags rnams kyi
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]bas tshod pa/ /gang bde kha 'phrog byed mchod/ /zhes pa tshig rkang re re la gong du smos pa'i byings ting mtha' can re dang / tshig grogs rnam dbye gnyis mtha' can gnyis gnyis byung ba lta bu'o/ /ga ti bu d+d+hi pra d+ya ba sA nA r+tha sha b+ha ka rma ka rmA NA ma Ni ka rtA sa Nau/ 'gro ba dang rtogs pa dang zas dang sgra'i
[\[98b.2\]]don gyi las dang las med pa rnams kyi Ni dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i Ni med pa la byed pa po la'o/ /'gro ba la sogs pa de rnams kyi sgra sbyar bar bya ba'i rtags tshig grogs Ni tsa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa Ni tsa med pa dang spyir ba'i byed pa po la rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur la/ Ni tsa dang lhan cig pa yin
[\[98b.3\]]na las kyi don la gnyis pa 'gyur te/ dper brjod 'grel par tshigs bcad byung ba ni/ sha trU na gam ya t+s+warga m+be dA r+thaM s+tha na bed ya ta/ A sha yats+tsA mr-i taM de pA na bde mang+h+yA pa ya dwi ng+hiM/ A sa yat+sa li le pr-i th+bIM yos me shrI ha ri rga tiH/ zhes gong du smos pa'i don rnams dang sbyor ba'i tshig
[\[98b.4\]]rkang re rer rnam dbye gnyis pa'i rjes byung ba lta bu'o/ /'grel par NI ba ha/ mtho ris la song dgra bo rnams/ rig byed don la nged rnams mig /bdud rtsi bzas shas lha rnams kyang / /tshangs bas sngon dus rig byed bklags/ /sa gzhi la ldad chu bo rnams/ /'dro ga byed gang de ba bdag gi dbal/ /dag dang sbyor ba las byed pa po la
[\[98b.5\]]gnyis pa 'gyur ba ma yin te gsum pa nyid do zhes pa byung bas/ nA ya ti b+hA raM b+h+r-i t+ye na/ bA ha ya ti b+hA raM b+h+r-i t+ye na/ yang 'grel par A di dang khA di dag sbyor ba'i rtags de la'ang / gnyis pa rnams 'gyur ba ma yin gyi gsum pa kho na 'gyur bar bshad pas/ de gnyis dang sbyor ba'i
[\[98b.6\]]rtags de ba dat+ta la TA sbyar bas/ A da ya ti de ba dat+te nA n+naM/ khA da  bran gyis khur 'dren/ /bran gyis khur 'khur 'thob/ ya ti de ba da t+te nA n+ni/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ b+hak+Sha'i 'tshe ba ma yin pa la ma yin no/ b+ha k+Sha'i sgra 'tshe ba'i don ma yin pa'i sbyor ba la byed pa po la gnyis pa
[\[98b.7\]]'gyur ba ma yin te/ srob ma zan bza' ru 'jug/ b+hak+Sha ya  lus skyin gyi bza' ru 'jug zan/ t+yan+naM ba Tu nA/ 'tshe ba yin na gnyis sa 'gyur te/ b+hak+Sha ya ti pha lI wa rda ta sa s+yaM/ bza' ru 'jug glang rnams yo tog la/ yang 'grel bar shru gra ha dr-i sha rnams don sbyor ba la byed pa po la gnyis pa 'gyur ba sngon
ba[\[99a.1\]]gyi slob dpon kha cig 'dod do zhes pa byung bas/ shrA ba ya ti gI taM de ba dat+taM/ grA ha ya ti ba TuM de daM/ dar+sha ba ti b+ha k+taM de baM/ yang 'grel bar/ a ya kran+da shab+dA pa hwe nya rnams kyi sbyor ba la gnyis pa 'gyur ba ma yin gyi gsum pa nyid do zhes pa byung bas/ a
[\[99a.2\]]ya ya ti sai ni kai ra rI na/ kran+da ya ti sai ni kai ra rIn/ shab+hA ya ya ti sai lhas byin slu nyan du 'jug/ slob ma rig byed len du 'jug/ lha mchod gtong du 'jug/ ni kai ra rIn/ hwA ya ya ti shU rai ra rI na/ hr-i kror n+ya tar s+yAM/ hraM kraM dag gi yang na'o/ /hraM nya dang kri nya gnyis kyi sgra sbyor ba'i byed pa
[\[99a.3\]]dmag 'gro ru 'jug dgra po rnams pa/ dmag rnams kyis dgra bo rnams du ru 'jug/ po la gnyis pa yang na 'gyur te/ hA ra ya ti b+hA raM b+h-i dmag rnams kyis dgra po rnams sgra sgrog du 'jug/ dba' bo rnams kyis 'gron du dgra po rnams la/ t+yaM/ hA ra ya ti b+hA raM b+h+raM t+ye na/ kAr ya ti
[\[99a.4\]]ka TAM de ba da t+taM/ kA ra la ti ka TaM de ba da t+te na/ yang 'grel par a b+hi bA di dang dr-i sha sbyor ba las byed pa po la tang An sbyor ba'i yul gnyis pa yang na 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas/ a b+hi wA da ya te ku rU na ba Tu/ a b+hi wA da ya te gu rU na  bran phur 'grog tu 'jug/ ba Tu nA/ dar+sha ya te  lhas byed ra lde byed du 'jug/
[\[99a.5\]]rA dzA b+h+r-i t+yaM/ dar+sha ya te rA dzA g+h+r-i t+ye na/ a d+hi shIng s+thA A pa rnams kyi 'angango / /nyer bsgyur ad+hi snga ma'i shI da s+thA dang A pa rnams sbyor ba'i bdun pa'i  bla ma slob ma la gsong por smra ru 'jug/ don la gnyis pa 'gyur te/ a d+hi she te be ku N+ThaM ha riH/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha ti bai
[\[99a.6\]]rgyal po'i bran la lta ru 'jug/ ku N+ThaM ha riH/ ad+b+h+yA ste bai ku N+ThaM ha riH/ a b+hi ni bi sha sh+tsa/ a b+hi ni bi sha'i 'ang ngo / /nyer bsgyur a b+hiM dang ni snga ma'i bi sha dang sbyor ba'i 'ang bdun ba'i don la gnyis pa 'gyur te/ a b+hi bi sha te sam+mA rgaM/ ni bi sha te 'phrog byed mthar sa la nyal/ sam+mA rgaM/
[\[99a.7\]]'grel bar ni dang a b+hi snga ma yin 'phrog byed mtho ris la gnas/ kyang la lar gnyis pa mi 'gyur te bdun pa nyid do zhes pa byung bas/ pA pe a b+hi ni bi shaH/ sdigs la nges bar 'gro/ u bA n+wa d+h+yA ng+ba saH/ u pa a nu ad+hi/ legs ba'i la ni ya mngon par 'gro/ legs pa'i lam la nges par 'gro/ Ang
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]rnams bas la'o/ /nyer bsgyur u pa a ru a d+hi Ang rnams snga ma'i bas dang sbyor ba la bdun pa'i don la gnyis pa 'gyur te/ u pa bas ti bai kuN+ThaM ha riH/ zhes pa nas/ A bas ti bai kuN+ThaM ha riH/ zhes ba'i bar g+ta bu'o/ /'grel par/ u pa sogs sna ma'i bas dang sbyor
[\[99b.2\]]ba yin kyang gnas pa'i yul de bza' btung med pa'i sa yin na bdun pa'i don la gnyis pa mi 'gyur zhing bdun pa nyid do zhes pa byung bas/ ba ne 'phrog byed mtho ris la kun du gnas/ u pa bas ti/ u bas rba ta soHkA r+YA ng+hi gu bar+YA di Shu tri Shu dwi tI yA mre Di tAM te Shu ta
[\[99b.3\]]to n+ya trA pi dr-i sh+ya te/ gnyis dang / thams cad de dag gi bya ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / yang yang la sogs par gsum du dang / zlos pa'i mtha' rnams su dang / de las gzhan du yang dag gnyis pa mthong ngo / nag sal nye bar gnas/ /u pa ya dang sarba tas kyi mtha' can de dag gi bya ba ste/
[\[99b.4\]]de gnyis dang 'brel pa'i ming gzhan dang 'dzin pa steng na pa'i don ng+hika sbyor ba dang / yang yang la sogs par gsum pa zlos pa'i mtha' zhes pa/ u pa ri/ a d+hi/ a ho gsum yang yang zlos pa'i mtha' rnams dang / de las gzhan du yang zhes ba/ a b+hi taH/ pa ri taH/ sa ma yA/
[\[99b.5\]]ni ka Sh+'a/ hA/ r-i te/ pra ti rnams sbyor ba la'ang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur te/ dper brjod rim pa bzhin/ u pa ya taH/ go pA kr-i Sh+NaM/ sarba taHkr-i Sh+NaM/ d+hi ka kr-i Sh+Na bak+taM/ u pa r+Yu pa ri lo kaM ha riH/ a ng+h+ya ng+hi lo kaM/ a d+ho nya d+ho lo kaM/ a bi taH b-iSha/ pa ri taHkr-iSh+NaM/ sam yA
[\[99b.6\]]kr-i Sh+NaM/ ni ka ShA kr-i Sh+NaM/ hA kr-iSh+NaM/ r-i to kr-iSh+NaM/ pra ti kr-iSh+NaM/ an+ta rA an+ta re Na yu ste/ an+ta ra an+ta 'drog ba nag bo gnyis/ thams cad du nag po ba/ ngan pa nag po mi mtshan/ steng ma steng ma'i 'jig rten la 'phrog byed/ lhag pa lhag pa'i 'jig rten/ 'og ma 'og ma'i 'jig rten/ mngon par nag a+wo/ yongs su nag po 'dus ba'i nag po la/
[\[99b.7\]]nye ba'i nag po la/ kye ma nag po/ nges par nag po/ so sar nag po/ re Na sbyor la'o/ /an+ta ra dang  nang / an+ta re Na bar ram mtshams sam dbral/ sbyor ba la'ang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur te/ an+ta rA gA rta pa  khyim bdag gi nang / t+yaM/ an+ta re Na da rmaM su khan+na b+ha ba ti/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa la bde bar mi 'gyur/
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]a nu rlak+Sha Ne/ a nu'i mtshan nyid la'o/ /mtshan nyid kyi don la a nu sbyor ba la yang gnyis pa 'gyur te/ /dzab ma nu bra ba r+Shata/ hr-i tI yAr+the/ gsum ba'i don la'o/ a nu sbyor ba las rnam dbye gsum pa'i don la'ang gnyis pa 'gyur te/ na dI ma n+wa ba si tA se
[\[100a.2\]]nA/ hI ne/ dman pa la'o/ dman pa'i don la a nu yis sbyor ba la yang rnam dbye gnyis pa 'gyur te/ anu ha riM su rAH/ bzlas bas rjes su chang rab tu lab/ u ba lhag pa la'ang ngo / dman pa'i don dang lhag pa'i don la'ang u pa yis sbyor  chu'o la rjes su nye ba'i dmag/ /
[\[100a.3\]]ba la gnyis pa 'gyur te/ /u ba hari su rAH/ /lak+Sha Ne t+thaMb+hUtAkhyA na b+hAg bIp+sAsu bra ti brlan paH/ /mtshan 'phrog byed rjes su lha/ /nyid dang 'di ltar gyur pa dang bgo skal dang zlos pa rnams la bra ti ba ri anu rnams las so/ /mtshan nyid la sogs pa de rnams kyi don la bra til sogs
[\[100a.4\]]ba sbyor ba la gnyis pa  'phrog khyed la nye ba lha/ 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid la/ hari braMti/ ha ri ma nu/ 'di ltar gyur pa la/ b+hak+to bu ng+d+haM bra ti/ b+ha k+ho bi Sh+NuM pa ri/ b+hak+hobu ng+d+ha ma nu/ bgo skal la/ lak+Sh+mIHha ri m+b+ra ti/ lak+Sh+mIHhari m+b+ra ti/ lak+Sh+mIHha ri ma nu/ zlos ba
[\[100a.5\]]la ! b+hU taMb+hU taM pa ri pra b+huH/ b+hU taMb+hU taM pa ri pra b+huH/ b+hU taMb+hU taM pa ri pra b+huH/ 'phrog byed la so sor/ 'phrog bye la rgyas ba/ 'phrog byed la rjes su/ so so sangs rgyas kyi 'bangs/ khyag 'jug gi 'bangs rgyas/ rjes su sangs rgyas kyi 'bangs/ 'phrog byed dpal so sor byed/ 'phrog byed dpal rgyas/ 'phrog byed dpal rjes su/
[\[100a.6\]]sems can dang sems can la so sor bdag po/ sems can dang sems can rgyas pa'i bdag po/ sems can dang sems can la rjes su bdag po/ a b+hir b+hA ge/ ab+hi bgo skal ma yin pa la'o/ bgo skal gyi don ma yin pa'i a b+hi sbyor ba la gnyis ba 'gyur te/ hari ma b+hi brta to b+ha k+haM/ a tir ti kram Ne/
[\[100a.7\]]a ti shin tu pa'i bya ba la'o/ a ti phul du byung ba'i bya ba sbyor ba la gnyis pa 'gyur te/ a te de bAn kr-iSh+NaH lha rnams las phul du byur ba nag po/ kA lA d+h+wa no ra t+yaM ta saM yo ge/ dus dang lam bar mtshams med par sbyor ba la'o/ dus la don bar yod 'grog byed la 'bangs/ bltos nas
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]lo re bzhin lan re klog ces pa lta bu dang lam bar mchad pa'i don sbyor ba la gnyis pa 'gyur te/ mAsaM ka l+YaNI/ mA sa ma b+hi te/ mA saM gu Dad+hA nAH/ kroshaM ku Ta lAn hI/ kro sham gi riH/ yang de lta bu las gzhan bar mchad ba ma yin pa la gnyis pa mi 'gyur
[\[100b.2\]]te/ mAs s+yadwir d+hI te/ kro sha s+ya ka de shaHpa rbata/ de rnams kyis rnam dbye gnyis/ zla ba la piSh+ji/ zla ba la klogs/ zla ba la bu ram dang sos bza'/ rgyang grags la ba gyog por chu/ rgyang grags la glog go/ rgyang phrags la ri bo/ ba 'jug yul bshad nas da ni gsum pa'i yul bshad par bya'o/ ! /swa
[\[100b.3\]]tan+t+raH zla ba gnyis klog go rgyang grags kyi yul gcig ri bo/ kartA/ rang dbang can de byed po'o/ /shing gcod mkhan lta bu rang dbang dang ldan pa de la byed po zhes brda chad byed do/ /sAd+ha ka ta maM ka ra NaM/ bsgrub nus pa de byed pa'o/ bya ba gang yang bde blag tu bsgrub nus pa de la byed pa
[\[100b.4\]]zhes brdar btags so/ /kar+t+w-ika ra Na yo sny-itI yA/ /byed pa po dang byed pa dag la gsum pa'o/ /bya ba gang yang byed pa be dang byed pa gnyis kyi don ston pa la rnam dbye gsum pa 'gyur te/ /rA me Na pA na ha to bA lI Ne na ha bA lI zhes pa rA me Na byed pa po bA Ne na byed pa lta bu'o/ /bra kr-i t+ya di b+h+ya tI yA/ /pra kr-i ti
[\[100b.5\]]sogs rnams las gsum pa'o/ /bra kr-i ti la sogs pa rnams la yang rnam dbye gsum pa 'gyur te/ bra kr-i t+yatsA ruH/ brA ye NasaH/ go tI Na gA rgyaH/ sa me ni ti/ bi Shame ni ti/ dwi dro  dga' byed kyis mda' yil spre'u bsad/ Ni na d+hAn+yAM krI NA ti/ pa ny+ca ke na pa shUn hwa ti/ su khen duHkhen yA ti/
[\[100b.6\]]de baHkarma tsa/ di ba'i la sa la'ang ngo / /di ba'i sgra sbyor ba la las kyi don la'ang gsum pa  rang bzhin mdzes pa/ de rab tu mang ba'i/ gA rgya'i rims/ song cha/ ong zhes/ yang na 'gyur te/ /ak+She+eHdI bya ti/ /a  'bru dri the po che gnyis chong du 'jug/ /phugs lnga sprong du 'jug/ /sdug bsngal las bde ba thob/ /
[\[100b.7\]]k+ShAn dI bya ti/ a ba brge t+p-itI yA/ 'bras bu thob pa la gsum pa'o/ /yang dag bar shes sam bya ba gang gi 'bras bu thob pa'i don la dus dang lam par mtshams med bar sbyor ba la gsum pa 'gyur  sho tsal 'jug/ te/ ah+nA be don d+h+di taH/ nyin mo rig byad glog go/ kro she na be do nya b+hI
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]taH/ /'bras bu thob pa'i don ma yin na gsum pa mi 'gyur te/ mA sam d+hI tonAyA tAH/ sa ha yu k+te prad+hA ne/ lhan cig sbyor ba la'o/ lhan cig pa'i sgra sbyor ba'i don la gsum pa 'gyur te/ pu tre Nas hA ga taH/ 'grel par sAr+ng+haM sA kaM sa maM rnams sbyor ba
[\[101a.2\]]rgyang grags pa'i khyed slog go/ la gsum pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byur bas/ pu tre Na sar+ng+ha  zla bar bklags kyang ma shes/ mA ga taH/ pu tre Na sa kaM ga taH/ shi Sh+yi Na sa maM tiSh+Na ti/ /ye nAM ga bi kA ram/ /gang gi lus kyi rnam 'gyur/ /bu dang lhan du yod/ /la'o/ /gang gi lus kyi rnam par 'gyur
[\[101a.3\]]ba yod pa gsal par gzhan mtshon nus pa de la rnam dbye dang po'i don la gsum pa 'gyur te/ ak+NA+A kA/ /su dang lhan du yod/ bu dang lhan du song / slob ma dang nye bar gnas/ NaH/ pA de na khany+dzaH/ kar+Ne na ba d+hi raH/ shir sA kha lbATaH/ i t+thaM b+hU ta la k+Sha Ne/ 'di 'drar yod pa'i mtshan
[\[101a.4\]]nyid la'o/ /'di dang 'di 'dra'o zhes ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don kyi don la gsum pa 'gyur te/ /k+Shatre No pA/ /mig zhar ba'o/ /ng+h+yaM ya ma drAk+ShI ta/ /saM dz+nyo n+ya ta ra s+yAM karma Ne/ yang dag/ /rkang pa 'theng po'o/ rna ba 'on pa'o/ /mgo bo spyi ther ba'o/ /par shes pa'i las la yang na'o/ /yang dag par shes pa'i
[\[101a.5\]]las kyi don la gsum pa yang na 'gyur te/ pitrA sany+dzA nI te/ pi ta raM sany+dzA nI te/ he  mkhan po dang 'dra bar slob ma la ba lta'o// to+o/ rgyul 'o/ /bya ba sbyor ba'i rgyu la gsum pa 'gyur te/ pu N+yen dr-i th+to gu ruH/ 'grel par de'i bya ba sbyor ba'i rgyul zlos pa la'ang skabs 'gar gsum pa
[\[101a.6\]]'gyur ro zhes byur bas/ /sha te na sha te na/ /phar yang dag par shes/ /phar yang dag par shes/ /bat+sAn bA ya ya ti pa yaHsha taM sha ta bat+sAn bA ya ya ti pa yaH/ /yang 'grel par/ /dal  bsod nams kyis mthong bla ma'o/ /po'i don sbyor ba la gsum pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byur bas/ /a lam+be la m+be
[\[101a.7\]]na/ yang 'grel par bden pa'i don sbyor ba la'ang gsum pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byung  le'u ba nu ba rgya'o ma 'thung du 'jug/ bas/ sa tA ma rbo ha ri b+ha k+d+bA/ bden pa'i don 'phrog byed 'bangs/ yang 'grel bar bUrba dang a bar sbyor ba dang don med pa ste ngan pa'i don la gsum pa 'gyur ro dal pos dal lo/ /
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]zhes pa byung bas/ mA sen bUrbaHabaraH/ bu N+nen hI naH/ shas+t+re NaM ka la haH/ asr-iSh+Tas+ya bya ba hA re tsa tu r+b+h+yar+the tr-i hI yA mi 'os pa'i rgyul bzhi pa'i don la gsum pa'o/ gang mi 'os pa'i bya ba'i rgyu sbyor ba la bzhi pa'i don la gsum pa 'gyur te/ dA sbA saM yats+tsha ti kAmu kaH/ mi
[\[101b.2\]]'os pa ma yin na gsum  gzhan zla ba sngam/ bsod nams dman pa/ mtshon chas 'khrugs/ pa mi 'gyur te/ b+hAr+YA yai saM yats+tsha ti kA mu kaH/ de rnams kyis gsum pa'i 'jug yul bshad zin nas da ni bzhi pa'i 'jug yul bshad par bya'o// ! karmaNA  than mol thig le sbyin/ ya ma b+hi
[\[101b.3\]]bri tis sa bra dA naM/ gang gi par rab tu sbyin pa la bzhi pa'o/ /gang gi  gang gi chung ma la thig le sbyin/ ched du sbyin par 'dod pa dang len par 'dod pa ste sbyin pa'i las dang / gang gi ched du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rnams la yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa zhes tha snyad btags
[\[101b.4\]]so/ /tsa tu nrIs pra dA ne/ /yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa la bzhi pa'o/ /gang gi ched du mang dag par rab tu sbyin pa zhes brda chad byas bde la rnam dbye bzhi pa 'gyur te/ /brAh+ma Ne b+h+yaHgAMd dA ti/ /de be b+h+yaHpu da dA ti/ /upA ng+h+yA yA ya su lba r+NaM da dA ti/ /yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa ma yin na
[\[101b.5\]]sbyin pa'i don yin kyang bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/ /dA nI yo pi praHzhes pa rnams sbyin pa'i las kyi don 'ong ba'i don la/ prat+ye she te s+t+rI/ ru ts+yar r+thA nAM pri ya mA NaH/ /srid  bram ze rnams lab lang sbyin/ lha rnams la che tog sbyin/ mkhan po la gser 'bul/ nga'i don dang ldan pa'i dga' bal 'o/ /gang
[\[101b.6\]]srid pa'i don dang ldan pa'am sred pa la dga' bram ze la shog ma sprod/ ba'i byed ba can la bzhi pa 'gyur te/ ha ra ye ro bud med bdag po'i ched du nyal/ /tsate b+hak+tiH/ /shA g+ha ng+hU s+thA sha bI dz+nyi p+sa mAnaH/ sh+la g+ha h+nung s+thA sha pa rnams kyi shes pa'i 'dod pa dang ldan pa la'o/ /byings sh+lA g+ha dang h+nu dang s+thA
[\[101b.7\]]dang sha pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'i shes par 'dod pa'i byed ba can la bzhi ba 'gyur te/ go pI smarA ta kr-iSh+NAya sh+lA g+ha te/ 'brog mo nag po bran bzhin 'dod/ 'brog khyed 'bran sred ba byed/ kr-iSh+NA yah+nu t-i/ nag po la ngan pa smra/ kr-iSh+Naya tiSh+Tha te/ nag po la gnas/ kraMSh+NA ya sha pa te/ nag po la bram byed/ b+hA re ru d+ta ma r+NaH/ 'dzin pa'i bu lon lalhag
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pa la'o/ /gang 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba bu lon lhag pa'i byed pa can la bzhi pa 'gyur te/ a haM mo k+ShA ya d+hA ra pa te bu d+ng+haH/ smr-i he rIp+sitaM/ grogs 'dod pa la'o/ gang gi grogs 'dod pa'i sbyor ba'i byed pa can la bzhi ba 'gyur te/ har ye sbr-iha ya ti/ kru ng+ha
[\[102a.2\]]dru he r+ThA sU yAr+thanAM yaM pra ti ko paH/ /krung+ha dru ha I r+Sh+ya/ /a sU rnams gang la so sor khro ba'i don la'o/ /krung+ha  bdag grol ba'i phyir 'dzin par byed sangs rgyas/ /sogs rnams khro ba'i don bya ba ma yin pa so sor brjod pa'i sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/ ha ra ye kru ng+h+ya ti/ ha ra 'phrog byed 'dod
[\[102a.3\]]ye dru t+ya ti/ ha ra ye I r+Sh+ya ti/ ha ra ye sha bU ya ti/ kru d+ha dru ho ru pa sr-iSh+Ta yoH/ kru d+ha dru ha dag gi nye bar 'os pa dag la'o/ /kru d+ha dang dru ha dag gi sbyor ba mi 'os pa ma yin pa 'os ba'i don gyi sbyor ba ste khro ba'i don ma yin na bzhi pa 'gyur 'phrog byed la khro bar byed/ bam yin pas
[\[102a.4\]]'phrog byed la 'khu bar byed/ 'phrog byed la phrag dog byed/ 'phrog byed la phram byed/ gnyis pa nyid 'gyur te/ brAh+ma Nam b+hikru d+h+ya ti/ rA d+hI k+Sho R+Y+Ya s+ya bi pra sh+naH/ rAd+ha Ik+Sha dag las gang gi 'dri ba la'o/ rAd+ha dang IkA dag 'dre ba'i don la sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/ /
[\[102a.5\]]kr-iSh+ThayarAng+h+yate/ kr-iSh+cA ye k+ShA te/ prat+yAt+b+h+yaM shru ba pU rba s+ya ka rta/ pra ti Ang dag las shru'i snga  bram ze la khro bar mi byed/ bram ze la 'khu bar mi byed/ ma'i byed pa 'ol 'o/ /nyer bsgyur pra ti dang Ang yad pa'i shru'i snga ma'i rtags de la byed pa po'i don la sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/ /pi prA ya g+hAM pra ti shri No ti/
[\[102a.6\]]bi prA ya/ nag pa la 'dri par byed/ gA mA shI No ti/ a nu prati gr-i Nash+tsa/ a nu prati dag gi gr-i Na la'ang ngo / a nu dang pra ti snga ma'i gr-i Na dang sbyor ba'i rtags snga ma de la'ang byed pa po'i don la bzhi pa 'gyur te/ ho tre anu gr-iNAti/ ho tre pra ti gr-i NA ti/ ba ri kra  bram ze ri ba lang so sor thos/
[\[102a.7\]]bram ze ba lang kun du thos/ ya Ne saM pra dA na ma n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ pa ri kri ya'i yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa yang na'o/ /pa ri kri ya'i sbyor ba las byed pa po'i don yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa'i don can la bzhin pa yang  sbyin sreg mkhan la so sor rjod par byed/ sbyin sreg mkhan la rjes su rjod par byed/ na 'gyur
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]la yang na gsum pa nyid de/ shatA la pa ri krIto nya nu bU ti/ sha te na pa ri krI to nu bU hi/ tad r+thA+etsa tu r+thI bA ts+ya/ de'i don la bzhi pa brjod do/ /de'i don zhes pa don shin tu bzang ba bsgrubs na myur du 'grub nges pa da lta mngon du ma gyur pa zhig la zer la don de la bzhi ba 'gyur te/ /dper brjod
[\[102b.2\]]'grel par tshigs bcad du byung ba ni/ saM  brgya yis yongs su nyos pa rjes su smros/ ya mA ya shru taM d+han+te na ro ng+ha rmA la saM ya maM/ d+ha rmi mo k+Sha ya me d+hA ya me d+hA bI ng+ha naM dA nA ya b+duk+ta ye/ zhes pa/ mA ya gnyis dang k+Sha ya dang nA ya zhes bzhi ba'i de sbyar ba ltabu'o/ de bzhin du bu ng+d+ho b+ha be yaM dza ga te hi tA
[\[102b.3\]]ya ma mAr+thA ya ma nu ka m+pA ya me bi g+ho ltabu'o/ /yang 'grel par lung drangs  sdom brtson ched du thos ba 'dzin/ /mi dag sdom brtson chos kyi ched/ /blo ldan thar pa'i ched du chos/ /sbyin pa'i phyir dang zas phyir nor/ /pa/ he tu yo ga tsa/ rgyu sbyor ba la'ang ngo / /gang gi  'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'phru ba par shog/
[\[102b.4\]]rgyu'i don sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/ brAh+ma NA ya he taM k+ShI raM/ kri yA r+thob par s+yatsa ka rma Ni s+tha ni naH/ bya ba'i don gyi nye ba'i tshig la'ang las la'o/ bya ba'i don gyi nye ba'i tshig la las te gnyis pa'i don la bzhi pa yang na 'gyur te/ pha la b+h+yo yA ti/ tu mar+thAts+tsa b+hA ba ba tsa nA ta/ tum gyi don las
[\[102b.5\]]kyang dngos po brjod pa las so/ /rkyen tu ma tham ze'i rgyu 'bres zan/ dang / g+hanya sogs dngos po brjod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i sbyor ba la'ang bzhi pa 'gyur te/ yA gA ya yA ti/ namaHswastiswA hA la ba ShaD+yo gAts+tsa/ na ma sa swa sti sbAcA/ a la ba 'phras bu rnams thob par byed/ ShaDa rnams sbyor ba las kyang
[\[102b.6\]]ngo / /nam sal sogs pa de rnams kyi sbyor ba la bzhi pa 'gyur te/ na mo bu d+t+hAya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ nam s+sa g+hA ya/ swasti pradzA b+b+yaH/ swAhApi/ mchod sbyin thob/ t-ib+h+yaH/ aMl b+hU te b+b+yaH/ pa Sha Da n+d+rI ya/ yang 'grol par lung drangs pa/ us pa da bi b+hak+teHkAr ka bi b+ha k+ta rba lI ya sI/
[\[102b.7\]]nye ba'i tshig gi rnam dbye las byed ba can gyi rnam dbye ba can gyi rnam dbye stabs dang ldan  sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde legs su cis skye dgu rnams/ pha mes rnams legs par tshim mo/ tshim ba 'byung po rnams/ dbang byed dbang po la/ pa la'o/ /gong du na mas sbyor ba la rnam dbye bzhi pa kho
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]na 'jug par bshad kyang lung 'dis gcig tu ma nges te gong du rnam dbye bzhi pa 'jug par bshad pa ni nye ba'i tshig la ltos pa yin la/ skabs 'dir byed pa can ni gnyis pa yin pas nams dang sbyor ba la yang skabs 'gar gnyis pa 'jug go zhes pa byung bas/
[\[103a.2\]]dper na/ oM na maHsid+ng+haM/ na ma ska ro ti de bA na ltabu'o/ /man+ya kar+m+ma N+r+ya nA dA re bi g+hA ShAprANi Shu/ ma na'i las la srog chags ma yin pa rnams la smad pa la yang ma'o/ /man+ya'i las srog chags ma yin pa la smad pa la bzhi pa yang na 'jug cing yang na gnyis pa nyid do/ /natwAMtr-i NA ya ma n+ye/ na
[\[103a.3\]]trAM tr-i NaM ma grub thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /n+ye/ smad pa ma yin na bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/ twAMdebaM man+ye/ yang srog chags ma yin kyang no+o la bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/ na twAM nA daM ma n+ye/ srog chags yin na smad pa yin kyang bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/ /khyod rtswar lang mi sems/
[\[103a.4\]]na twAM shu kaM man+ye/ na twAM shrig laMm n+ye/ ga t+ya tswa ka r+m+ma Ni dwi tI yAtsa tu r+tho+otsa Sh+TA yA na ng+h+wani/ 'gro ba'i don gyi las khyod lhar sems/ la gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dag g.yo ba la ste lam ma/ khyod grung yang mi sems/ yin pa la'o/ /'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'i byings kyi las su bya ba la rnam
[\[103a.5\]]khyod ni tsor yang ma sems/ /khyod be spyang du'ang mi sems/ dbye bzhi pa dang gnyis pa gang ru 'gyur te/ de'ang g.yo bste 'gro bzhin pa de yang lam la 'gro ba ma yin pa la'o/ pradzaM bradza ti kr-iSh+NA/ bradzA ya bra dza ti kr-iSh+NA/ g.yo bzhin pa ma yin na bzhi pa mi 'gyur te/ man sA banaM yA ti/
[\[103a.6\]]lam sa yin na'ang gnyis pa nyid de/ mArgaM gats+tsha nyi/ yang 'grel par lam yin kyang ut+pa then snga ma'i ba thil 'gro ba'i don la bzhi pa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa/ ut+pa  bcom rlags 'gro bar byed do nag so/ then pa the gats+tsha ti/ yang 'grel par/ 'gro ba'i  sems kyis nags la sreg
[\[103a.7\]]don yin na g.yo ba dang / ma yin min la  lam la 'gro bar byed/ yang mi bltos par bzhi pa dang gnyis pa yang na bar skabs 'gar srid do zhes byung bas/ grA mA ya gaM tA/ gro ba la 'gro bar byed/ gra maM gaM tA de rnams 'grul ba lam la 'gro bar byed/ /kyis bzhi ba'i yul bshad nas da ni lnga pa'i yul
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]bshad par bya ste/ ! ng+h+ru ba ma pA ye pA dA naM/ brtan pa las bral ba de nges par kun sbyin pa'o/ gang brtan pa las 'bral ba'am sngar 'dus pa'am 'byar ba gyis shing zhag pa'am so sor phral ba de la nges par kun sbyin pa zhes tha snyad byed do/ /apAdA ne pany+tsa mI/ /nges par kun sbyin pa
[\[103b.2\]]la lnga pa'o/ /gong du nges par kun sbyin pa zhes brda chang byas pa de la rnam dbye lnga pa 'gyur te/ grA mA dA yA ti/ ng+h+nga ba to nya shwAt+pa ta ti/ yang 'grel par gram dang dga' ba dang bral ba dang 'os ma yin pa rnams dang sbyor ba las kyang lnga pa 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ pA pA dz+ngu gu p+sa te/ pA pI dri
[\[103b.3\]]ra ma ti/ d+harmAd+p+ra mA d+ya ti/ b+hI twA n+pA nAM p+ha ya he tuH/ 'jigs pa dang bsrung ba'i don rnams kyi  grong las 'ongs so// bang brgyugs ba'i rta las lhung ngo / 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o/ /'jigs pa'i don dang bsrung ba'i don rnams kyi sbyor ba las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la yang lnga ba 'gyur te/ sdig pa las phrag dog byed/
[\[103b.4\]]sdig pa las dga' ba dang bral bar 'gyur/ chos las mi 'os pa byed/ tso+orAdwi b+heti/ /tso+o rA y+wa te/ pa'A dzer so D+haH/ rgyal ba ma yin pa'i 'pham pa la'o/ gang rgyal ba ma yin pa'i 'pham pa'i don sbyor ba la lnga pa 'gyur te/ pA pA t+pa rA dza ya te/ bAr NAnrAnA mI p+si taH/ spangs pa'i don rnams kyi 'dod pa
[\[103b.5\]]la'o/ gang spangs pa'i don rnams la de spang bar/ /chos rkun las 'jigs so/ chos rkun las bsrung ngo / 'dod pa la lnga pa 'gyur te/ ya bi b+h+yo gAHbAr ya ti/ an+ta r+ng+ho+o yinA dar+shan mi tsha ti/ gang gis mi mthong bar/ sdig pa las 'pham par 'gyur/ /byed pa'i sbe dpa' 'o/ /gang gis mi mthong bar 'dod
[\[103b.6\]]pa'i sbed pa'i don sbyor ba la lnga pa 'gyur te/ mA tu rni lI ya te kr-iSh+NaH/ AkhyAto pa yo ge/ klog pa dang nye bar sbyor ba la'o/ slob nas rnams las pa lang rnams zlog par byed/ pa'i don nye bar sbyor ba'i klog pa'i sgra sbyor ba la yang lnga pa 'gyur te/ u pA ng+h+yA yA da ng+hI te ba TuH/ slob pa'i don nye bar sbyor ba
[\[103b.7\]]ma yin na lnga pa mi 'gyur te/ /nags s+ya gI nag po ma las yib bar byed/ tAM shr-I No te/ gar mkhan gyi glu thos par 'gyur/ dza ni kartuHprakr-i ti/ skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin la'o/ rang bzhin te rgyu gang gi 'bras bu'am dngos po bskyed  mkhan po las glog par byed slob ma/ par byas zin pa'i rgyu la lnga pa
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]'jug ste/ brah+ma NaHpra dzAHbra dzA yan+te/ b+hu baHpra b+ha baH/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba las so/ gang las 'byur bar 'gyur ba'i yul la lnga pa 'gyur te/ hi ma ba to gaM gA pra b+ha ba ti/ 'grel par/ l+ya ba phyis pa la gnyis pa dang bdun pa'i don la lnga pa'o zhes pa byung
[\[104a.2\]]bas/ kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen l+yab  tshangs pa las skye dgu rnams skyed par byed/ phyis pa'i rtogs la rnam dbye gnyis pa dang bdun pa'i don la lnga pa 'gyur te/ prAsA dA t+p+rek+Sha te/ A sa gangs can las gaM sA 'byung bar byed/ nAt+p+rek+Sha ta/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ prash+nA khyAn yo sh+tsa/ 'dri pa'i
[\[104a.3\]]brjod pa la'o/ gang shes lta bu 'dri ba'i brjod pa sbyor ba la lnga ba 'gyur te/ /kasmA ta twamA ga taH/ /ya tash+tsa ng+h+wa kA la ni rmA NaM ta dra pa ny+tsa mI/ /khang bzangs la lta bar byed/ /gdan las lta'o/ /gang las lam dus nges pa'i tshad de la lnga pa'ang ngo / /gang las lam dang dus nges pa'i tshad ston pa la
[\[104a.4\]]lnga pa 'gyur te'ang gi sgras dang po dang gnyis pa dang bdun pa rnams kyang 'gyur ro/ /khyed ci nas 'ongs/ /banAng+g+rA mo yo dza naM/ /kArti kyAHAgra hA ya NI mA se lta bu'o/ /an+yA rA di tar rte di ka shab+dAnyUt+ta ra pa dA dzAhI yu g+te/ an+ya  ArA ta  i tar  r-ite  phyogs kyis any+cu rnams kyi phyi ma'i
[\[104a.5\]]tshig dang Atsa A hi dag gi sbyor ba la'o/ /a n+ya la sogs pa 'di rnams dang sbyor ba'i tshig  nas gnas grong la rgyang grags bzhi/ phyi ma dang A tsa Atsa A hi rkyen mtha' can la lnga pa 'gyur te/ an+yaHkr-iSh+Nata/ b+hin+no rA mA ta/ A rA ta rA mA ta/ /i ta ro rA mAta/ r-i te bu d+ng+hAta ku to mo k+Shata/
[\[104a.6\]]pU co grA ta/ a ya ma smAta bUrbaH/ prAka grA mA ta/ dak+ShiNA grA mA ta/ dak+Shi NA hi grA mA ta/ yang 'grel par/ snga ma'i don sbyor ba las skabs 'gar lnga pa 'gyur ro zhes ba shad pas/ /b+ha bA dA nag po gzhan/ dga' byed las gzhan/ dga' byed las gzhan/ dga' byed las nyeg dga' byed las cig shos/ sangs rgyas kyi bor bas ci phyi 'grol
[\[104a.7\]]shar phyi grong las/ /'di nged las snga ma/ /grong las shan/ /rab+h+yaH/ 'khor ba las sdam/ /lho phyogs kyi grong / /yang 'grel par grong gi phyi lta bu phyi'i don sbyor ba la lnga pa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ grA mA dA hiH/ grong las phyi/ a pa pa rI brdza ne/ a pa pa ri dag gi bor ba la'o/ a pa pa ri dag sbyor ba bor
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]ba rjod pa la las rab tu sbyor ba zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /A nga mar+Y+Ya dA btsa ne/ /Ang las mtshams brjod pa la'o/ /Ang las mtshams lta bu bar mtshams bzung ba'i don brjod pa las rab tu sbyor ba zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed do/ /pany+tsa mya Ang ba ri b+hiHa
[\[104b.2\]]pa Ang ba ri rnams kyi lnga pa'o/ /a pa la sogs pa 'di rnams gong du las rab tu sbyor ba zhes ming 'dogs byas pa'i don de dag dang sbyor ba la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i don la lnga pa 'gyur te/ apa ha re casaM sA reH/ pa ri ha reHsaM sA raH/ A mu g+te s+saM sAraH/ pra tiH/ pra ti ni p+hi pra ti dAn yoH
[\[104b.3\]]pra ti 'gran pa dang brje ba dag la'o/ /pra ti sbyor ba 'gran pa dang brje ba dag 'jug pa'i tshe las rab tu brjod pa zhes ming 'dogs byed ngo / /pra ti ni ng+hi pra ti rA ne tsa yasmAta/ gang  'khor ba las 'phrog byed bral/ 'khor ba las so sor 'phrog byed bral/ 'khor ba las grol ba'i bar du/ las 'gran pa dang brje
[\[104b.4\]]pa la'ang ngo / /pratwI sbyor ba gang las 'gran pa dang brje ba'i don brjod pa gong du las rab tu brjod pa zhes mi 'dogs byas pa de la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i don la lnga pa 'gyur te/ a b+hi ma n+yu ra rdzun taHpra ti/ mA ShA na smi ti le b+h+yaHpra ti yats+tsha ti/ a ka rtar+Y+re Ne pa ny+tsa mI/ /byed pa bo med pa la bu lon
[\[104b.5\]]la lnga pa'o/ /bu lon gyi rgyu las byed pa po med pa de la lnga pa 'gyur te/ sha tA dwa rngAH/ bi b+hA ShAguNe nya stI yAM/ bud med ma yin pa la yon tan la yang na'o/ cho ga'i yan/ srid sbru ba la so sor ldan par byed/ sran ma 'di dang hi la rnams so sor brje/ lag tu gyur pa'i yon gyi rgyu la bud med kyi rtags
[\[104b.6\]]ma yin pa la lnga ba yang na 'gyur te/ dzAD+r+yA dwad+ng+haH/ /dzA D+yA+e na pa ng+ng+haH/ yon  brgya thams pas bcings/ /tan gyi yan lag yin na mi 'gyur te/ /d+ha ne na ku laM/ /bud med kyi rtags yin na mi 'gyur te/ /bu d+ng+h+y+wamu k+taH/ pr-i tha g+bi nA nA nA b+hi s+t+r-i dI yA n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ /pr-ithag  bi nA  nA nA rnams kyi gsum pa yang na'o/
[\[104b.7\]]pr-i tha ka sogs 'di rnams kyi sbyor ba  ral bas bcings/ las gnyis ba dang lnga pa 'gyur zhing gsum pa yang ngo / /dga' byed dang so so ru/ p-i tha ka nor gyi rigs/ rA me Na/ pr-i tha ka rA / blo yi grol/ maM/ dga' khyed dang so sor/ /binA pA pi na/ sdig pa dang bral bas/ binA pA pA ta/ sdig pa dang bra ba las/
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]pinA pA paM/ nA nA pra kA re Na/ nAnA pra kA rAta/ nA nA pra kA raM/ ka ra Ni tsa snyo kAlpa kr-its+tsh+waka ti pa ya stsA pa twa ba tsa na s+ya/ byed pa la 'dra snyo ka a lang kr-its+tsh+wa ka ti pa ya rnams kyi yod pa ma yin pa'i brjod pa la'o/ pyad pa'i byed pa can la/ sto ka la sogs pa 'di rnams las yod pa
[\[105a.2\]]ma yin pa'i sdig pa dang bral ba la/ gos sna tshogs kyi/ gos sna tshogs la/ gos sna tshogs kyi/ don brjod pa la gsum pa dang lnga pa ste/ ste ke na muk+taH/ sto kAn+muk+taH/ albA+en+muk+taH/ a na lpe na mu k+taH/ kr-i ts+tshaN mu k+taH/ kr-its+tsh+wan+muk+taH/ ka ti pa ye na muk+taH/ ka ti pa ye na muk+taH/ yod pa ma yin
[\[105a.3\]]pa'i don ma yin na lnga pa mi 'gyur te gsum pa nyid do/ /sto ke na pi She Na ha taH/ byed pa'i byed pa can ma yin kyang gsum pa mi  chung dus grol/ chung dus las grol/ nyung du grol  nyung du las grol  dka' bas grol/ dka' ba las 'grol/ 'ga' zhig gis gril/ 'gyur te/ sto kaM pa
[\[105a.4\]]tsa ti/ dU rA n+tikAr+the b+h+yo dwi tI yA tsa/ ring ba dang nye ba'i  dug chur dus shi/ don dag las gnyis pa'ang ngo / thang ring ba dang nye ba'i don sbyor ba la gsum pa dang lnga pa 'gyur te gnyis pa'ang ngo / grA ma s+ya ngUraM/ grAm s+ya dU re Na/ grA ma s+ya dA rA ta/ grA ma s+yA n+ti kaM/ grA ma  cung zad tsam la chos/
[\[105a.5\]]s+yA n+ti ke na/ grAm stsAn+ti k+Shata/ de rnams kyis rnam dbye lnga pa'i 'jug yul bshad zin nas/ da ni byed pa can na la mi 'gro yang rnam dbye'i go rims bzhin drug pa'i yul bshad grong gi ring bo la/ grong gi ring bas/ grong gi ring ba las/ grong gi nye ba la/ grong gi nye bas/ par bya'o/ /! /ShaSh+Shi she
[\[105a.6\]]She ! lhag  grong gi nye ba las/ ma la drug pa'o/ gong du bshad pa'i rnam dbye dang po sogs dang 'og nas 'byung ba 'dun pa ste byed can drug pa'i lhag ma dang 'grel pa sogs brjod pa la rnam dbye drug pa 'gyur te/ rAdz+nyaHpu ruShaH/ A tsa r+Yas+ya shi Sh+yaH/ ra dz+nyaHkumAr/ yang 'grel par skabs
[\[105a.7\]]'gar las kyi don la drug pa 'jug pa yang srid do zhes bshad pas/ b+hadze shaMb+ho sh+tsa ra Na yoH/ dbang phyug zhabs la mchod par byed/ ShaSh+ShI he tu pra yi ge/ rgyu dang rab tu sbyor ba la drug pa'o/ 'di'i rgyu  rgyal po'i skyes bu/ slob dpon gyi slob ma/ rgyal po'i bu/ 'di zhes pa lta bu rgyu'i don sbyor
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]ba la drug pa 'gyur ro/ an+na s+ya he toHba sa ti/ sarba nAm+na s+t+r-i tI yA tsa/ sarba nA ma'i gsum pa la'ang ngo / rgyu'i don brjod pa'i sarba nA ma'i rtags rnams dang sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur zhing gsum pa'ang ngo / ka s+ya he toH/ ke na he tu nA/ yang 'grel
[\[105b.2\]]bar lung drangs pa/ zas kyi phyir snod do/ sarba sogs dang sbyor ba'i rgyu'i don brjod pa la rnam dbye thams cad kyang ngo / sarba nA ma'i rtags rnams dang sbyor ba'i rgyu'i don brjod pa la gsum pa dang drug pa 'gyur bar ma zad rnam dbye thams cad yang na 'gyur ci'i rgyu'i/ te/ rgyu ci yis/ kAHhe tuH/
[\[105b.3\]]ki hi tuM/ ke na he nA sogs so/ ShaSh+Sh+ya ta sar+thapra t+ya yen/ rkyen ata tas kyi son la drug pa'o/ rkyen ata dang tas sbyor ba'i don dang sbyor ba la drug ba 'gyur te/ dak+Shi Na to grA ma s+ya/ pu rasta ta grwa ma s+ya e na yA dwi tI yA/ e na'i gnyis pa la'ang ngo / e na'i sbyor ba la drug pa  rgyu ci
[\[105b.4\]]rgyu ci la/ rgyu ci yis/ 'gyur te gnyis pa la'ang ngo / dak+Shi Ne na grA maM/ dak+Shi Ne na grA ma s+ya/ dU rUn+ti kAr+theHShaSh+Sh+yan+ya ta ra s+yaM/ ring ba dang nye ba'i don rnams kyi drug pa yang na'o/ thag  grong gi lho/ grong gi sdun/ ring ba dang nye ba'i sbyor ba la lnga pa 'gyur zhing drug pa'ang 'gyur te/ dU raM thA mA ta/ dU raM grA ma s+ya/
[\[105b.5\]]ni kaTaMgrAmAta/ ni ka TaM grAm s+ya/ dz+nyonya bid r+thas+ya ka ra Ni/ grong gi lho/ dzan shes pa'i don ma yin pa la byed pa po la'o/ dzan shes pa'i don brjod pa ma yin pa'i mi shes pa'i don brjod pa sbyor ba la byed pa po ste gsum pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ sarbi Sho dzA nI te/ grong las dang ba/ grong gi ring ba/ mi
[\[105b.6\]]grong la nye ba/ grong gi nye ba/ shes pa ma yin na mi 'gyur te/ swa re Na pu traM dzA nA ti/ a ng+hIg r+tha da ye shAM karma Ni/ dran pa'i don dang nga ya i sha rnams kyi las la'o/ dran pa'i don brjod pa dang byings da ya i sha rnams kyi sbyor ba la las te gnyis  mar gsar du shes pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ mA
[\[105b.7\]]turang+h+ye ti/ ma dran par byed/ pi tuHsmar ti/ pha dran par byed/ skad kyis khur shes/ sar+thi Shod ya te/ mang za bar byed/ dza ga tA miSh+Te/ 'gro ba rnams kyi dbar phyug/ kr-inyaHpra ti yan+ne/ kr-i nya'i 'bad ba la'o/ Du kr-i nya byed pa la'o zhes pa'i byings las 'bad pa rtogs par byed pa dang sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur te/ /e
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]ng+hod ka s+yo pasaM sku ru te/ ru dzA r+thA nAM b+hA ba tsa nA nA ma dz+wa reH/ nad kyi don rnams kyi dngos po brjod pa rnams kyi dz+war ma yin pa la'o/ nad dang brdeg pa la sogs pa 'tshe ba'i don can gyi byings rnams las grub pa rnams kyi dz+war ma yin pa ste ma rtogs pa'i tshig gi sbyor ba'i rta gas la
[\[106a.2\]]chu 'phel gyi bya ba yang dag par 'bad par byed/ las kyi don la drug pa 'gyur te/ tso+o ra s+ya ru dza ti/ tso+or s+ya ni han+ti/ dz+war sbyor ba la gnyis pa nyid de/ tso+oraM dzar ya ti/ AshiShi nAthaH/ nA tha'i smon pa la'o/ /nA tha'i sgra smon pa dang shis pa brjod pa dang sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur te/ /sarbiSho nA tha te da
[\[106a.3\]]dA ti/ dzA si ni pra ha Na nA Ta krA tha pi ShA hi ng+sar+tha nAM/ dzA si ni pra ha Na nA chom rkun nad kyi 'debs/ chom rkun nges bar gsod/ Ta/ krA tha pi Sha rnams  chom rkun [(]dims [,]rims [)]kyi 'debs/ kyi 'tshe ba'i don rnams kyi'o/ dzA si la sogs pa 'di rnams 'tshe ba'i don brjod pa dang sbyor ba la  mgon pos mar skyin par byed/
[\[106a.4\]]gnyis pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ tso+or s+yo dz+dAs ya ti/ tso+or s+ya ni pra ha n+ti/ tso+or s+yo n+na Ta ya ti/ tso+o ra s+ya krA tha ya ti/ tso+o ra s+ya krA tha ya ti/ tso+o ra s+ya pi na Sh+Ti/ 'che ba'i don ma yin na mi 'gyur te/ ng+hA nAHpi na Sh+Ti/ bya ba hr-i pa NoHsamaR+ba yo/ bi a ba hr-i pa Na dag gi rgyal ba la'o/ bi dang a ba sda ma'i hr-i dang
[\[106a.5\]]pa Na rgyal ba'i  chom rkun 'joms par byed/ chom rkun ngas par rab tu gsod par byed/ chos rkun 'ching bar byed/ chom rkun li snun bar byed/ chom rkun phye mar 'jag par byed/ don brjod pa dang sbyor ba la/ yos 'thag par byed/ gnyis pa'i don la drug par 'gyur te/ sha ta s+ya bya ba har te/ sha ta s+ya bya ba Na te/ rgyal
[\[106a.6\]]ba brjod pa ma yin na drug pa mi 'gyur te/ brAh+ma NaM pa NA ya ti/ di bsta da r+tha s+ya/ di ba'i de'i don gyi'o/ di ba zhes pa'ang ce'i son te bshad ma thag pa ltar rgyal ba'i don la sbyor ba la'ang gnyis pa'o don la drug pa 'gyur te/ sha ta s+ya dI bya ti/ bi b+hA Sho pa sarge/ brgya thams pa'i rgyal bar byed/ nyer bsgyur
[\[106a.7\]]la yang na'o/ nyer bsgyur sda ma'i  bram ze la bstod pa byed/ /di ba las rgyal ba'i don brjod pa la gnyis pa'i don la drug pa yang na 'gyur te/ sha taM pra dI bya ti/ brgya thams pas rab tu rgyal bar byed/ sha ta s+ya pra dI bya ti/ kr-i tonya r+tha pra  brgya thams pa'i rgyal bar byed/ ye gi kA lo nyad+hi kar Ne/ dus kyi don rab tu
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]sbyor ba'i kr-ita las lhag par byed pa la'o/ kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen dus kyi don brjod pa dang sbyor ba las lhag par byed pa ste rnam dbye bdun pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ pany+tsa kr-i twa nyah+haHb+huM k+te/ dwi ra h+no p+huMk+te/ ka rt-ika rma NoHkr-itiH/ byed pa po dang las dag la kr-ita la'o/ /byed pa po dang las
[\[106b.2\]]dag brjod pa yang yin la kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen mtha' can kyang yin pa sbyong ba las drug pa 'gyur te byed pa po la/ ta ba grwa saMkA/ ta pa ga mi kA/ las la/ sarba sa twA  nyi ma lnga zan za bar byed/ nyi ma gnyis zan za bar byed/ nAMpuSh+TiMkuru/ na maHsaman+tabung+d+hA nAM/ u b+ha ya prA p+to+o karmaNi/ gnyis
[\[106b.3\]]thob pa la las la'o/ /rnam dbye gnyis pa dang drug pa gnyis ka thob pa la las la drug pa 'gyur te/ tsi traM gabAMdo ho go ba  khyod za bar byed/ ke na/ k+ta s+yatsabarta mAne/ k+ta'i 'ang  sems can thams cad la rgyas bar mdzod/ sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ da ltar ba la'o/ k+ta'i rkyen da
[\[106b.4\]]ltar ba'i don brjod pa sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur te/ satAM dz+wAtaH/ da ltar ba ma yin na mi  ba lang skyong ba khram rnams 'jo bar byed/ 'gyur te/ grAmaM gtaH/ nasuM sakeb+hAbe/ ma ning la dngos po la'o/ k+ta'i rkyen dngos po'i don brjod pa ma ning gi rtags sbyor ba la drug pa yang na 'gyur te/ satAM
[\[106b.5\]]gtaH/ sang+b+him taH/ ang+hi ka ra NabAtsi na sh+tsa/ bden par shes bzhin pa/ lhag par byed pa po brjod pa la'ang ngo / k+ta'i rkyen mtha' can grong la sor/ dang sbyor ba las lhag par byed pa ste bdun pa'i don la drug pa 'gyur te/ id meShA mA se taM/ na lo kA bya ya ni Sh+Sha Sha la r+tha tr-i NaM/ 'jig rten
[\[106b.6\]]bden pa rnams sang / mi zad pa bden pa Shal tr-iN rnams kyi don lam yin no/ 'jig rten gyi sgra sbyor ba dang mi zad pa'i sde rnams dang sbyor ba dang bden pa'i don can gyi rkyen dang Shal gyi rkyen dang / tr-iN sogs rkyen lnga po'i mtha' can rnams dang  'di 'di ru sA+ong / sbyor ba la drug pa 'gyur ba ma yin te/
[\[106b.7\]]'jig rten gyi sgra sbyor ba la/ tsakr-ibAn sr-iSh+tihaM riH/ /'jig rten byed po 'phrog byed/ mi zad pa la/ a laM kari Sh+NuH/ gang bar byas/ bden pa'i rkyen mtha' can/ ha ri de+e byAn ha tabAn/ lha min 'joms byed 'phrog byed/ biSh+Nu nAha tAHde+e t+yAH/ khyab 'jug gis lha min rnams bsad/ Shal gyi rkyen mtha'/ i
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]Shat+karaHahA ri/ tr-iN sogs lda ni 'di rnams te/ tr-i/ shAnatsa/ tsAn/ sha tr-i/ tr-iN sogs lnga po yin la thog mar tr-i'i rkyen mtha' can la/ lo kAn kartA/ shAn tsa la/ so maM pa bamA naH/ tsa na la/ /At+mA naM maN+Da ya mAnaH/ bdag nyid gsal ba/ shatril/ be da ma ng+hI yan/ rig byed klog/ dri Na la/
[\[107a.2\]]lo kAn ka rtA brah+ma/ yang 'gral mar/ nyung ngu bas/ dwiSha sha tu'i rkyen can dang sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la drug pa yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ mu ra s+yadwi Shan/ mu raM dwiShan/ a ke nor b+hi 'jig rten byed go zhib 'byur bar byed/ biSh+ya dA r+ha ma r+N+ya yoH/ aka in dag gi 'byung 'gyur bu lon ngan pa la'o/ a ka dang in
[\[107a.3\]]'jig rten byed po tsha nges pa/ gyi rkyen dus 'byung 'gyur brjod pa bu lon ngan pa'i don can dang sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la drug pa gyur ba ma yin te/ sa taHbA la/ lha min gyi sgra/ ko\u0f85 pa ta ra ti/ su kha mr-i NaM dA yI/ kr-i t+yA nAM karta ri bA/ kr-i ta rnams kyi byed pa po la yang na'o/ /kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen mtha'
[\[107a.4\]]can dang sbyor ba na byed pa po'i don la drug pa yang na 'gyur te/ ma yA sa byo swa ra swa stI/ ma ma se byo swa ra swa stI/ tu l+ya r+thai ra tu lo ba mA/ skyes bu dam pas bu lon 'phrod par 'gyur/ bde sa bu lon 'phrod par 'gyur/ b+h+yAM tr-i tI yA n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ mnyam pa'i don dang mnyam par nye bar 'jal ba ma yin pa dag la gsum
[\[107a.5\]]pa mang na'o/ /mnyam pa'i don gyi sgra rnams kyi sbyor ba dang / bdag gi dbyangs can ma mchod/ bdag gi dbyangs can ma mchod/ mnyam par nye bar 'jal ba ma yin pa ste mnyam pa med ba sbyor ba dag la drug pa dang gsum pa yang na ste/ pitrAtu l+yaHpu traH/ /bituHtul+yaHpu traH/ /pi
[\[107a.6\]]tuHsa dr-i shaHpu traH/ pi tuHsa dr-i shaHputraH/ pi trAs mak+putraH/ pi tu s+sam k+pu traH/ bung+ng+ha s+ya tu l+yaHnAsti/ bung+ng+he na tu l+yaHnAsti/bu ng+ng+he na tu l+yaHnA sti/ tsatur+thitsA shi Sh+yayu Sh+yam dra b+ha dra ku shal su khAr+tha hi tiH/ smon pa  AyuSh+ya  madra  b+hadra  ku sha la bde ba'i don rnams dang hi ta  pha dang 'dra ba bu/ rnams kyi bzhi pa'ang  pha dang mnyam pa bu/
[\[107a.7\]]ngo / smon pa rtogs par byed pa dang  pha dang mtshungs ba bu/ A yu Sh+ya sogs bzang po'i don sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa med/ dge ba'i don bde ba'i don sogs de rnams kyi sbyor ba la drug pa dang bzhi pa dag 'gyur te/ A yu Sh+yaMta ba b+hU yAta/ /khyod tshe ring bar gyur cig/ /Ayu Sh+yaM tu b+h+yaM b+hU yAta/ /ma draM ta ba b+hU yAta/ /khyod dga'
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]bar gyur cig/ madraMtu b+hAMb+hU yAta/ b+ha draM tu b+h+yaMb+hA yAta/ b+ha draM tu b+h+yaMb+hA yAta/ ku sha laM ta b+hU yAta/ ku sha laMtub+hAMb+hU yAta/ su khaM ta ba b+hU yAta/ su khaM tu b+h+yaM b+hU yAta/ tsiraMdzI bi taMm ma b+hU yA ta/ tsi raM dzI be haM ma h+yaM b+hU yAta/ ka l+yANaMta ba b+hU yAta/ kal+yA NaM tu b+h+yaM b+hU yA ta/ hi taM ta ba b+gU yAta/ hi
[\[107b.2\]]taM tu p+h+yaM b+wU yAta/ tr-ip+t+ya r+b+rA nAM ka ra Ne ShaSh+Shi bA/ khyod bzang por gyur cig khyod dge bar gyur cig khyod dge bar gyur cig tshim pa'i dom rnams kyi khyod bde bar gyur cig byed pa po la drug bdag ring tu 'tsho bar shog pa yang na'o/ /tshim pa'i khyed  dge bar gyur cig khyod la phan par gyur cig
[\[107b.3\]]don rnams dang sbyor ba la byed pa po'i don la drug pa yang na 'gyur te/ pa liHtr-ip+taH/ phalA nAM tr-ip+haH/ de rnams kyis drug pa 'jug tshul bshad zin nas/ da ni bdun pa'i 'jug yul bshad par bya ste/ ! /Ang+hAronyang+hikaraNaM/ gnas gzhi ste lhag par byed pa'o/ gang gnas
[\[107b.4\]]pa'i gzhi'am yul de la 'dir lhag par byed pa zhes brda chad byed do/ 'bras bu rnams kyis tshim/ sap+ta myang+hikaraNetsa/ lhag par byed pa la'ang bdun pa'o/ gong du lhag par byed ba zhes ming 'dogs byas pa de la bdun pa 'gyur te/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ dUrAn+tikAr+the b+h+yaH/
[\[107b.5\]]ring ba dang nye ba'i don rnams las so/ gong du lhag par byed pa'ang zhes 'ang gi sgra dang lung 'dren 'dis lhag par byed pa ma yin kyang thag ring pa dang nye ba'i don la'ang bdun pa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ de yang dang po gnas la lhag par gnas pa'i don la dbye ba bzhi ste/ au pa shAShikaH/ sA
[\[107b.6\]]mIpi kaH/ biSha yaH/ a b+ha byA s+yAH/ de rnams bod skad du nye bar 'dus pa dang / nye ba can dang / mngon par khyab pa dang / yul can dang bzhi bo yin la/ gnas gzhi'i ngon dbye ba bzhi po de rnams la bdun pa 'jug ste dpe rim pa bzhin/ dang po nye bar 'dus pa ste brten bde la dngos
[\[107b.7\]]su rig pa yin la/ de la bdun pa 'jug pa'i dpe ni/ /kaTe Aste/ rtswa lhas la bsdad/ nye ba can/ /na d+yA mA ste/ chu la gnas te chu dang nye bar gnas pa'i don/ mngon par khyab pa la/ ti le'u te+elaM/ ti la 'bru rnams la til mar/ yul can la/ hr-idi bra h+mAmr-i ham+pa raM/ snying la tshangs pa mchog gi bdud rtsi'o/ nye ba dang
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]ring ba'i dpe ni/ ban s+ya ngUre/ banas+yAn+ti ke/ 'grel par/ k+ta'i rgyen can dang sbyor ba la gnyis pa'i don la bdun pa yang na'o zhes bshad pas/ ang+hI tI byA kar Ne/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ sAdwA sAng+hu pra yo ge tsa/ legs pa po dang legs pa po ma yin pa rab tu
[\[108a.2\]]sbyor ba la yang ngo / legs pa  nags dang ring ba la/ nags dang nye ba la/ po zhes pa sdig pa dang bral ba'i ming yin la/ de dang sbyor ba la bdun pa 'gyur zhing  brda sprod klog par byed/ sdig bral ma yin pa dang sbyor ba la yang bdun pa yang na 'gyur te/ sAng+huHkraMSh+No mA ta ri/ asAng+huHkr-iSh+No
[\[108a.3\]]mA tu le/ yang 'grel par/ dgos pa las byung ba'i las la sbyor ba la bdun pa 'gyur bar bshad cing dper brjod tshigs bcad du byur ba ni/ tsarmaNi dwi pi naM ha n+ti dan+ta yo r+han+ti ku ny+dza raM/ bA le'u tsa mA rI him+nyi sim+ni puSh+kal kA ha taH/ zhes pa lta  legs pa nag po sim/ mi legs pa nag po'i zhang po/
[\[108a.4\]]bu snye/ tsarmaNi/ dan+ta yoH/ bAle'u/ sim+ni/ zhes/ ngi os/ supa ngi rnams sbyin pa'i rjes 'byur ba ltabu'o/ yas+ya  pags pa'i phyir du stag gsod do/ mche bdag la glang chen gsod/ gla r+ci'i ched du dri ldan gsod/ b+hA be na b+hA ba la k+Sha NaM/ dngos po gang gi
[\[108a.5\]]dngos po'i mtshan nyid la'o/ gang gi bya ba dang bya ba'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid la bdun pa 'gyur te/ goShuduh+yamA ne Sha ga taH/ a ng+hi dbang phyug la'o/ a ng+hi sbyor ba dbang phyug gi don brjod pa can la las rab tu brjod pa zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ yasmA dang+hi kaM ya
[\[108a.6\]]s+yatse shwar btsa naM ta tra sap+tasI/ gang las a ng+hi gang gi dbang phyug brjod pa de la bdun pa'o/ ba rnams 'jo ba la song / gang las a ng+hi sbyor ba gang gi 'ang dbang phyug gi don brjod pa las rab tu brjod pa zhes ming 'dogs byas pa de la bdun pa 'gyur te/ a ng+hi b+hu birAmaH/ ShaSh+Shi tsA nA da
[\[108a.7\]]re/ ma gus pa las drug pa yang na'o/ gang gi bya ba'i bar gyi rtags de las ma gus pa brjod pa la drug pa dang bdun pa'ang ngo / rud tiprA dzIta/ pu zhing song / ru da ta prA brA dzi ta/ swAmI shwarA ng+hi pa ti dA yA da sAk+Shi pra ti b+hU prapasU te+esh+tsa/ swAmI  i  sa'i dbang phyug dga' byed  shwa ra a
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]ng+hi pa ti  ngA yAd/ sAk+Shi/ pra ti b+hUpa \u0fb2 sU ta rnams kyi'ang ngo / /swAmI la sogs pa 'di rnams dang sbyor ba'i rtags la drug pa dang bdun pa yang na ba ste/ ng+harmaswAmI/ ng+harmas+yaswAmI/ ng+ha na I shwaraH/ ng+ha na s+ya I shAraH/ de she ang+hi pa tiH/ de sha s+ya ang+hi pa ti/ b+ho ge dA yA nga / b+ho ga
[\[108b.2\]]s+ya ngA yA da/ ng+ha ne sA kI/ da na s+ya sA k+Shi/ ng+ha ne pra ti b+hU/ ng+ha nas+ya pra ti b+hU/ ga baM pra sU ta/ go Shu pra sU ta/ a yu k+ta ku sha lA b+h+yAM bA se bA yAM/ chos kyi rje/ chos kyi rje/ A yu k+ta ku sha/ nor gyi dbang phyug/ la dag gi mchod pa la/ yul gyi bdag po/ yang na'o/ longs spyod 'go skal/
[\[108b.3\]]A yu k+ta dang ku shal nor gye dbang po/ dag gi mchod pa'i nor gyi gnya' go don brjod pa dang / ba lang gi be'u/ sbyor ba la drug ba dang bdun pa yang na ste/ A yu k+ta \u0f7fha ri pU dza ne/ A yuk+taHhi pU dza na s+ya/ ku sha laHhari pU dza ne/ ku shalaHhari pUdzan s+ya/ ya ta sh+tsani r+d+hA r+NaM/ gang las
[\[108b.4\]]kyang nges par bkar ba rnams kyi'o/ rigs dang yon tan dang bya ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas gzhan las nges par bkar ba ste nges par bzung ba'i don la drug 'phrog byed la mchod pa kun du sbyor bar byed/ pa dang bdun pa rnams/ 'phrog byed la dge bar mchod par byed/ 'gyur te/ nr-i NAM dwi dza rna shreSh+Sha/ nr-i Shu dwidzaH
[\[108b.5\]]shreSh+ShaH/ ga bAM kr-iSh+NA go+oHba hu k+ShI rA/ go Shu kr-iSh+NAgo+oHba huk+ShI rU/ yang 'grel par dper brjod tshigs bcad du byung ba ni/ puru ShANAM k+ShatI yaH/ shU raNash+yAmA nA rI NAM da r+Sha NI yA/ gats+tsha tAMng+hA ban+hA bac+ta shIg+hAH/ ng+harma shIdAnAM shrad+ng+hAgrAH/ de rnams drug pa'i  mi rnams kyi gnyis skyes mchog/ Am
[\[108b.6\]]mi rnams la gnyis skyes mchog ba lang rnams kyi ba nag mo 'o ma mang / ba lang rnams la ba nag mo 'o ma mang / dang / yang na bdun  skyes bu rnams kyi rgyal rigs dpa'/ bud med rnams kyi snga bsangs mdzes/ 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyug pa mgyogs/ chos dkar rnams kyi dad pa mchog  pa'i sub sbyar bas/ rguruSheShu k+Shat+tI yaH/ shU
[\[108b.7\]]rAHsh+yA mA nA rI Shu dar+Sha NI yA/ bud med rnams la sngo bsangs mdzes/ /gats+tshat+su ng+hA ban+ta shI g+haH/ 'gro ba rnams la rgyug pa sa gyogs/ ng+harma shi te Shu shrang+d+hAgraH/ chos dkar rnams la dad pa mchog /zhes pa tshig rkang dang po rigs las dkar ba/ gnyis pa yon tan/ gsum pa dang skyes bu rnams la rgyal rigs dpa'/ /
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]bzhi pas bya ba ston pa'o/ pany+tsa mI bi b+hak+te/ rnam par gus pa la lnga pa'o/ rnam par gus pa ste dad pa phul du byung pa gzhan las bkar ba'i don la rnam dbye lnga pa 'gyur te/ udI ts+yAdAk+Shi Na t+ye b+h+yaHsu shrotri yAH/ sAng+hu ni bu NA r+thA b+h+yA maHyAMsap+ta myapra teH/ pra
[\[109a.2\]]ti med pa'i mchod pa'i dom la sA rnyu ni pu Na dag gi bdun pa'o/ /nye bsgyur brati sngon na med pa'i sAng+hu/ nipu Na dag mchod pa'i don du sbyor ba'i rtags la bdun ba 'gyur te/ nA ta risA ng+huH/ mAta ri ni puNaH/ lhob dang byang bdag shin tu gus/ pra ti sbyar ba la/ sAng+huHmAtwaraMbra ti/ yang 'grel par
[\[109a.3\]]bra ti med pa la'ang gnyis pa yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad las/ sA ng+huHa numA ta raM/ pra si to t+su gA b+h+yaM hr-i tIyAtsa/ pra si ta dang ut+su ka dag gi gsum pa yang na'o/ pra  ma mchod pa sdig bral/ ma mchod pa slang / si ta dang ut+su ka dag gi sbyor ba la/ legs po ma la so sor/ bdun pa 'gyur
[\[109a.4\]]zhing gsum pa'ang 'gyur te/ pra si to hi NA/ pra si to ha ro+o/ legs po ma rjes su/ ut+su ko ha ri NA/ ut+su ko ha ro+o/ nak+Sha te tsa lu pi/ skar ma la'ang mi mthong ba la'o/ skar ma las mi mthong ba'i don sbyor ba la gsum ba dang bdun pa yang na ste/ pu Sh+ye Na gats+tshe ta/ pu Sh+ye gats+tshe ta/
[\[109a.5\]]mi mthong ba'i don ma yin na gsum pa mi 'gyur te/ pu Sh+ye sha neH/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ a karma ng+hA tub+hA tu b+hiHyo ge de sha kA lA ng+h+wa b+hA be b+hA be b+h+yaHdwi tI yA bA/ byings las med pa rnams kyi sbyor ba la yul dus lam dngos po rnams las gnyis pa yang na'o/ /byings rgyal song / /las med
[\[109a.6\]]pa rnams kyi sbyor ba la'ang yul sogs kyi sgral bdun  rgyal dang spen pa/ pa 'gyur zhing gnyis pa'ang ngo / /de yang yul la/ na d+yAM ba sa ti/ nI daM pa sa ti/ dus la/ rA tr-iMshe te/ rA tro+o she ta/ lam la/ kro shi pa sa ti/ kro she pa sa ti/ kro she pa sa ti/ dngos po la/ yA gaM tiSh+Tha ti/ yA ge tiSh+Tha
[\[109a.7\]]ti! i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+yasU trAt+kA ra kA ni samA p+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las byed pa can rnams rdzogs so// //rdul gnas/ de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i  nam kha nyal/ bstan bcos chen po pA  rgyang grags la gnas/ Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go  mchod sbyin la gnas/
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]don chog dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ byed pa can te rnam dbye rnams kyi 'jug tshul zhib ma mor ston pa las spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni
[\[109b.2\]]tshig sdud kyi rnam gzhag 'chad par bya ste/ sa mar+thaHpa da bing+hiH/ don sdud pa tshig gi cho ga'o/ /tshig gnyis sam mang po don gcig tu sdud pa'i cho ga ston par byed pa ni tshig sdud kyi cho ga'o/ sa mAs sh+tsatur+ng+hA/ tshig sdud bzho'o/ ga lA pa/ tsan+ha pa/ dbyangs can ma
[\[109b.3\]]sogs su bsdu ba'i grangs drug tu bzhed kyang gzhung 'dir phyogs gnyis pa dang las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba gnyis de'i skyes bu'i nang du bsdus te spyir btang bsdu ba'i grangs bzhi yod par bzhed la/ bzhi po ci zhe na/ mi zad pa'i bsdu pa/ de'i skyes bu'i pa sdu pa/ 'bru mang po'i
[\[109b.4\]]bsdu ba/ zlas dbye'i bsdu ba dang bzhi'o/ de yang bsdu ba byas pa'i tshig gnyis las/ tshig sdam brjod bya'i gtso bor gyur pa mi zad pa'i bsdu ba/ tshig phyi ma gtso bor gyur pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba/ dngos su brjod pa gnyis po de dang 'grel pa'i don gzhan gtso bor brjod
[\[109b.5\]]pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba/ tshig gnyis ka btso bor gyur pa zlas dbye'i bsdu ba rnams so/ a bya yaM pi b+hak+ti sa mI pa sa mr-ing+ng+hipr-ing+ng+h+yar+thA p+hA bAt+ya yA D+ha saM prati/ shab+daprAdu r+b+hA ba bash+tsA ng+ya thA nu bU rgya yo+o ga pa ng+ya sA dr-i sh+yasaM pat+hi sAka lhAM ta btsan ne Shu/ mi zad pa rnam dbye dang nya ba dang / 'grub pa
[\[109b.6\]]dang / 'phel ba dang / dngos med kyi don dang / 'das pa dang / dus ma yin pa dang / sgra rab tu gsal ba dang / rjes su ji lta ba dang / snga ma'i phyi ma dang / cig car dang / mnyam pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtha' dag dang / mtha'i tshig rnams la'o/ mi zad pa
[\[109b.7\]]sogs don de rnams su pa dang su pa don gcig pa'i tshig sdud can du 'gyur te de rnams kyang mi zad pa'i bsdu ba'i ming can du 'gyur ro/ 'grel par/ tshig mang po tshig gcig tu sbyor ba dang / atsa du ma atsa gcig tu sbyor ba dang / rnam dbye'i mtha' can mang po rnam dbye gcig tu
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]sbyar bas/ sngar tshig mang ba dang brjod pa ma bde ba rnams tshig nyung zhing brjod pa bde bar 'gyur ba ni tshig sdud kyi dgos pa'o zhes bshad do/ de rnams las dang po mi zad pa'i bsdu ba bshad par bya ste/ ha ro+o a ng+hikrit+ya/ zhes pa tshig sbyor ram ngag ces bya ste tshig
[\[110a.2\]]sdud byed pa'i gzhi yin no/ pra tha mAni r+ng+diSh+TaM sa mA sa u pa sa jaM naM/ dang nges par sbyor ba'i tshig sdud nyer bsgyur ro/ rnam dbye dang po dang sbyor ba'i bsdu ba byed pa'i yul rnam dbye dang po thob pa de la nyer bsgyur zhes ming  'phrog byed d+ya ba lhag por/ 'dogs byed do/ u pa sardza naM pUMrbaM/
[\[110a.3\]]nyer bsgyur sngon du'o/ tshig sdud kyi skabs 'dir gong du nyer bsgyur zhes ming 'dogs byas pa de tshig sbyor gyi skabs mtha' dbus gang na yod kyang sngon du sbyor bar byed pas/ a ng+hi ha ro+okr-it+ya/ zhes gnas pa 'di la prA ti pa di ka zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ su po ng+hA tu prA ti pa di ka yoH/
[\[110a.4\]]byings prA ti pa di ka dag las su pa kyi'o/ byings dang sbyor ba dang tshig sdud kyi skabs prA ti pa di ka zhes ming 'dogs byas pa bsdu bya der gnas pa'i rnam dbye rnams dbyi zhing der ma zad gzhi dang / phrad dang / khyad par dang 'dra ba'i skad dod sogs tshig gi rjes 'brang rnams kyang dbyibs ha ri
[\[110a.5\]]la sbyin pa'i di dang kr-it+ya phyis/ ang+hi ha ri/ de ltar rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis pas tshig sdud kyi ming thogs pa de la slar tshig tu sgrub byed kyi rnam dbye rnams 'jug pa las mtshon byed su byin/ a ng+hi ha ri su/ a bya yI b+hA bash+tsa/ mi zad par gyur pa la'ang ngo / mi zad
[\[110a.6\]]par kyur pa ste mi zad pa sngon na yod pa mi zad pa'i bsdu ba byas pa de la rnam dbye thams cad 'jig cing bya ba yang med pas su phyis/ de'i rjes su don ston pa'i tshig gzhan sbyor dgos te/ ang+hi ha ri prabr-it+tA ka thA/ de bzhin du/ rA yam ti krAn+ta/ rnam dbye rjes 'bang dang bcas pa phyis/ a
[\[110a.7\]]ti re+e/ zhes pa la/ mi zad pa'i bsdu ba'i mtha' ma ning du 'gyur zhing / ma ning la thung ngur 'gyur bas/ a ti ri/ 'byor ldan/ de bzhin du/ nA ba ma tikrAn+tal/ gru shin tu non pa/ lhag par rab tu 'phel ba'i brjod pa 'phrog byed/ chos 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ a ti nu/ hru nub la khar/ de rnams mi zad
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]pa'o/ 'grel par/ don tshang zhing brjod bden gong du bshad pa ltar tshig sdud kyi bya ba 'jug la don mi ston cing brjod pa mi bde na cho ga sdud kyi cho ga rnams mi 'jug ste/ dper na/ san+ti gu NAHharo+o/ zhes pa lta bu la tshig sdud kyi bya ba mi 'jug go nye ba la/ kr-iSh+Nas+ya
[\[110b.2\]]u pa/ zhes pa la/ upa kr-iSh+Nasu/ nA bya yI b+hAbAd to masto pany+tsa myAH/ mi zad par gyur ba las atal ma yin zhing lnga bam yin pa'i ama'o/ spyir btang mi zad pa'i bsdu ba'i mtha' 'phrog byed la son tan rnams yod/ las rnam dbye thams cad 'jig par bshad  nag po'i nyi la/
[\[110b.3\]]kyang dmigs bsal mi zad par gyur pa las kyang a yig mtha' can la rnam dbye rnams mi 'jig cing rnam dbye lnga pa rnams ma gtogs rnam dbye thams cad am du 'gyur te/ su am/ upakr-iSh+NaM/ lnga pa la/ u pa kr-iSh+NA ta sogs so/ tr-i tI yAs p+ta myorba hulaM/ gsum pa
[\[110b.4\]]bdun pa dag yang na'o/ gong du mi zad bar gyur pa'i a yig mtha' la rnam dbye lnga pa ma gtogs rnam dbye lhag thams cad am du 'gyur bar bshad kyang / mdo 'dis rnam dbye gsum  nag po nye ba/ pa dang bdun pa/ dag po nyams/ dag am du 'gyur ba dang spyir btang a
[\[110b.5\]]thung mtha' can gyi bya ba gnyis ka 'jug pas 'dam ka can du bya ste/ gsum pa la/ upakr-iSh+Nen/ u pa kraMSh+Na/ bdun pa la/ u pa kr-iSh+Ne/ u pa kr-iSh+NaM ltabu'o/ /'grub pa la/ ma drANAM sa mr-i ng+hiH/ zhes pa la gong bzhin rnam dbye rnams bsdus sa mr-ing+d+hi'i don nyer
[\[110b.6\]]bskyur su sngon/ su ma draM/ /yang 'grel par mi zad par gyur pa'i a yig mtha'  nye bar nag po yis/ can yin kyang su ma dra dang  nye ba nag po la/ un+mat+ta gang+gal bdun pa rnams  dge ba rnams kyi bgrub pa/ a ma nyid du 'gyur gyi yang na ba mi byed do/ zhes bshad
[\[110b.7\]]pas/ ngi la/ dge ba bzang po/ sum draM/ un+mat+ta gang+gaM/ gang+hAsmyon pa la/ 'phel ba la/ yam nA nAM br-ing+ng+hiH/ kla klo rnams kyi 'phel ba/ zhes pa la/ gong bzhin rnam dbye bsdus pr-ing+ng+hi'i don nyer bsgyur dur sngon/ dur+Y+Ya pa naM/ kla klo 'phel ba/ /dngos med kyi don la/ /sbrang ma nyid med pa  mak+Shi
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]kANA ma b+hA baH/ zhes pa la/ gong bzhin rnam dbye bsdus/ a b+hA ba'i don nyer bsgyur nir sngon/ ni r+m+ma k+Shi kAsu/ a bya yI b+hA bash+tsa/ mi zad par gyur pa la'ang ngo / mi zad par gyur pa de'ang ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/ ma ning la thung ngu / su am/
[\[111a.2\]]nIr+m+ma k+Shi kaM/ 'das pa la/ himA ni a ti tA ni/ rnam dbye rnams bsdus a ti tA ni'i don nir sngon/ ni rti maM/ dus ma yin pal/ ni drA yAHa kAlaH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus akA la'i don nyer bsgyur a ti sngon/ a ti ni draM/ sgra rab tu gsal ba la/ ha riHi ti/
[\[111a.3\]]sgrong ma med/ zhes pa la/ i  khab med/ ti hA ri/ rjes su la/ biSh+NoHpa sh+tsAta/ rnam dbye bsdus pats+ya kyi/ khab med/ don a nu sngon/ a nu gnyid kyi dus ma yin/ baSh+Ni+u /ji lta ba la/ baSh+Ni+uHpra ti/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ pra ti  gnyid kyi dus ma bzhi/ biSh+Nu/ sngon ma'i phyi ma la/ dz+yeSh+thaM a nu
[\[111a.4\]]kramya/ zhes pa la/ anu dz+yeSh+ThaM/ 'phrog byed 'di/ khyab 'jug gi rjes las/ cig car la/ tsakreN yug pa ng+ng+h+ye hi/ zhes pal  khyab 'jug rjes/ rnam dbye gsum pa'i  khyab 'jug so sor/ rjes bsdus/ yug pang+h+ye  khyab 'jug so sor/ hi'i don sa ha sngon/ sahatsakra su/ zhes
[\[111a.5\]]gnas pa la/ abya yIb+hA  rjes su thu'o/ be tsA kA le/ mi zad par gyur ba la'ang dus ma yin pa la'o/ mi zad  'khor lo yis sbyor ba bcas pa/ par gyur ba'i bsdu ba las kyang dus kyi sgra sbyor ba ma yin pa la saha ni sa zhes par 'gyur te/ satsakraM/ mnyam pa la/ ha reHs-Idra sh+yaM/
[\[111a.6\]]zhes pa la gong bzhin rnam dbye bsdus/ /sAdr-i sh+ya'i don sa sngon su 'jig /sa ha ri/ phun sum tshogs pa la/ k+ShatrAM NAM saM pa ti/ zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus sam ti zhes pa'i don las sngon/ sak+ShatraM/ mtha' dag la/ tr-i Ne  'khor lo dang bcas pa/ nas ka laM at+ti/ 'phrog byed pad+mas
[\[111a.7\]]zhes pa la gong bzhin rnam dbye rnams bsdus/ saka la'i son Ang sngon/ 'phrog byed 'dra ba/ rtswa kun za bar byed/ Atri NaM gdugs kyi bdag 'o/ at+ti/ mtha'i tshig la/ me'i pu ti'i mtha' klog par byed/ ag+nigran+tha gdugs bcas/ par+YaM ti ang+hI te/ zhes pa la rnam dbye  rtsA mtha' dag za bar byed/ bsdus
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]gran+tha bar+YaMta'i don sa sdon/ sAg+ni ang+hite/ zhes pa lta bu rnams so/ yathA sA dr-ing sh+ye/ ya thA'o mnyam pa ma yin pa la'o/ ya thA'i sgra mnyam pa'i don brjod pa ma yin na su pa dang su pa don gcig bar 'gyur te/ shak+ti ma nati kramyag+ga myo ti/ zhes pa la rnam dbye rjes
[\[111b.2\]]'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ a  se'i bu ta mtha' klog bar byed/ na ti zhes pa'i don mi bde ba ya thA sngon/ yathA shak+hi/ mnyam pa'i don brjod pa yin na tshig sdud kyi bya ba mi 'jug ste/ yathA ha riH/ ta thA ha raH/ yA ba da ba  chus ba dar ci 'tsham pa'i rim bas kyis shig/ ng+hA na Ne/ yA bta kyi
[\[111b.3\]]logs su bkol ba la'o/ /mang bo'i nang nas gcig logs su bskol ba'i don yod pa'i  nus ba ji lta ba/ yA bta kyi sgra sbyor ba yang mi zad pa'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/ yA ban+h+yaman+hA ji ltar 'phrog byed/ de ltar gsod byed/ Ni ta ban+to brAh+ma NA nAM A man+t+ra ya swa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye dang rjes 'brang
[\[111b.4\]]gi tshig rnams phyis/ yA ba dam n+h+ra mA man+t+ra ya swa/ sU pa pra ti nA ma trArwe/ pra ti yi tsam gyi don la sUpa la'o/ pra ti yi tsam gyi don la 'jug pa'i sUpa dang / snod rnams ji tsam pa'i bram ze de rnams 'dir bos shig/ sbyor ba la mi zad pa'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/ sU po a la po a smin b+ho dza
[\[111b.5\]]ne/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang  snod ji tsam pa 'dir bos shig/ deng bcas pa phyis/ pra ti sngon/ pra ti sU paM/ tsam gyi don ma yin na mi 'gyur te/ br-ik+ShaM pra ti/ zhes pa rnam dbye mi sdud pa de ka la gnas pa ltabu'o/ /a pa pa ri ba hi rany+tsa  'di za bar byed chod ma tsam/ paH
[\[111b.6\]]pany+tsa myA pA/ a pa / pa ri/ ba hi ra/ any+ca rnams lnga pa'i yang na'o/ a pa sogs sbyor ba  chod ma tsam/ la rnam dbye lnga pa'i su pa dang su pa don  shing la so sor/ gcig par yang na 'gyur te/ a pa biShU/ a pa paSh+NoH/ a pa biShU/ pi ri piSh+NoH/ bahirbanaM/ banA ta
[\[111b.7\]]ba hiH/ prAb+ba ni/ nags las shar/ ba nAtabrAka Ang+sar+YAngAb+hi pi ng+h+yoH/ Ang gi chod 'thung thams cad dag las so/ Ang tshad bzung dang / kun nam/ thams cad dam/ mtha' dag gi don la sbyor ba yang mi  khya la 'jug bas bral ba/ khyab 'jug las yongs su/ nags las phyi/ zad pa'i
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]bsdu bar yang na 'gyur te/ Amuk+ti/ Amuk+teH/ Ab le b+h+yaH/ A ba laM/ lak+Sha Ne nA b+hi pra tI A b+hi bu khye/ mtshan nyid kyi ab+hi pra ti dag sngon du mthong ba la'o/ mtshan nyid brjod pa'i ab+hi pra ti dag sngon du mthong ba'i don la mi zad pa'i bsdu ba yang na 'jug
[\[112a.2\]]ste/ a b+h+yagyi/ ag+ni ma b+hi shal b+hAHpa tan+ti/ grol ba las mtshams/ bad+yag+ni/ ag+nim+p+ra kun byis pa rnams las/ ti shal b+hAHpa ti n+ti/ a nur+Yat+sam yA/ a nu'i gang nye ba la'o/ /nye ba'i don brjod pa la a nu'i ming mi zad pa'i bsdu ba yang na 'jug ste/ adreH/ samI paM/ zhes
[\[112a.3\]]pa rang gnas mngon par me la phye ma leb ltung / sam yang na rnam dbye bsdus  so sor me la bye ma leb lhung / sa mI pa'i son a nu sngon/ an+wa dri/ de bzhin du/ ba na s+ya sa mI paM'am/ yang na/ a nu ba naM/ ya s+yatsAyA maH/ gang gi'ang dkyus la'o/ gang ri yi nye ba/ gi dkyus la
[\[112a.4\]]'jug pa'i son du sbyor ba'i a nu'i'ang mi zad pa'i bsdu ba yang na 'jug ste/ gang+gA de+e r+g+h+ya N+ya trakA shI/ zhes pa'ang rang gnas sam/ ri nye ba/ yang na rnam dbye  nags kyi nye ba/ rjes 'brang dang nags nyeg bcas pa phyis/ de+e r+g+h+ya'i don la a nu sngon/ a nu gaM ga tiShu ta gu pra br-i
[\[112a.5\]]tI ni tsa/ tiSh+Thata gu la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo / /tiSh+Thata gu la sogs pa  gang gA ring ba de ltar kA shI/ 'di rnams mi zad pa'i bsdu ba can tshig phrad du bya ste/ dper na/ tiSh+Than+ti gA baHyasmin kA le/ zhes pa la/ tshig phrad kyis bsdus pas teSh+Thang+gu/ /de gang+b+nga ring / /bzhin du / /btan+ti
[\[112a.6\]]gA baHya smin kAle/ zhes pa la/ bahad+gu/ A yan+ti gA baHya smin kA le/ zhes pa la/ Ayang+gu/ kha le ya baMsmin kAle spak+ThaMkr-i yate/ zhes pa la/ kha dus gang la ba lang rnams gnas/ le ya paM/ lUn ya baM yasmin kA le/ ba lang gnas/ zhes pa la/ dus gang la ba lang rnams thob/
[\[112a.7\]]lUn ya baM/ nas rnga/ saM hr-i taMyapaM/ ba lang thob/ dus gang la ba lang rnams byung / dus gang la nas phrogs ya smin ba lang byung / /dus gang la nas g.yul thang du 'grem par byed/ gA le/ zhes pa la/ /saMhr-ita ya  g.yul kha ru nas/ dus gang la rnga / baM/ nas phrogs/ de rnams tshig phrad kyis bsgrub pa'o/ bA
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]rim d+h+yeShaSh+Sh+ya bA/ bA re ma ng+h+ye dug pa'i yang na'o/ /bAr mang+h+ye dag drug pa'i don la mi zad ba'i bsngu ba tshig phrad du yang na bya ste/ gang+hA yA pA re'am/ yang na/ bAr gang+kaM/ de bzhin du/ gang+gA ya ma ng+hA+e/ yang na/ mang+h+yegang+gaM/ yang na de'i skyes bu'i bslu ba byas pas/ gang+gA yA pAraM/ zhes pa la/
[\[112b.2\]]gang+gA pa raM/ de bzhin du/ gang+gAyA mang+h+yaM/ zhes pa la/ gang+gAmang+h+yaM/ zhes pa ltabu'o/ saMkhyAM baM sh+ye na/ rigs kyi grangs gang+gA pha rol tu/ la'o/ rigs gaM ga 'phol tu/ kyi dngos po/ gaM gA'i dbus/ brjod pa'i/ gang+gI dbus/ grangs kyi sgra mi zad pa'i bsdu bar yang  gang+gA'i pha rol/ 'gyur te/ dwo+o
[\[112b.3\]]gang+gA'i pha rol/ mu nI baM sh+yo+o/ gang+gA'i dbus/ yang na/ dwi  gang+gA'i dbus/ mu ni/ de bzhin du/ tri mu ni byA ka ra Na s+ya bid+yA/ zhes pa'am/ yang na/ tri mu ni bya ka ra NaM pi d+yA/ nadIb+hish+tsa/ chu klung rnams kyi'ang ngo / chu klung gi skra brjod pa'i grangs kyi sgra'ang mi zad pa'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/
[\[112b.4\]]sap+tAnAM gang+gA  thub pa'i rigs gnyis/ nAM sa ma ha raH/ zhes pa la/ rnam  thub pa gnyis/ lung ston pa shes pa'i thub pa gsum/ dbye dang rjes 'brang bsdus/ lung ston pa shes pa'i thub pa gsum/ sab+tagang+mA/ de bzhin du/ dwa yoHya mun yoHsam ha raM/ zhes pa la/ dwi ya mu naM/ an+yapa dAr+thetsa
[\[112b.5\]]gang+gA bdun pa nyal du/ saM dz+nyA yaM/ tshig don gzhan la ming la'o/ chu klung rnams kyi tshig don gzhan la sung kyi mtha' ming la mi zad pa'i bsdu par 'gyur te/ an+mat+nya gang+gA ya smin de/ gang+gA 'dran/ she/ zhes pa nu'o ya mun gnyis lan du/ la/ rnam dbye tshig  chu bo ya mun gnyis/ rjes 'brang
[\[112b.6\]]dang bcas pa phyis/ un+ma t+ta gang+laM de she/ ming min na/ shrI g+h+raM gang+gA rnga laM be go yas+ya/ zhes pa la /mi zad pa'i bsdu ba mi 'jug go/ /des na 'bru mang gi  yul gang la gang+gA smyon ba dang / bsdu ba byas pas/ shI g+h+ra gang+gA de shaH/ a bya yI b+hA besha rata pra br-i ti b+h+yaH/ mi zad par gyur
[\[112b.7\]]pa lang shar ta sogs rnams yul gang+gA'i smyon pa/ las so/ /mi gang gi myur ba gang+gA'i chu/ /zad par gyur pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mtha' las sha ra ta sogs rnams la Ta tsa'i rkyen sbyin par bya ste/ snyon la nye ba/ sha ra daM u  mUng bar gang+gA'i yul/ pa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye gnyis pa'i rjes phyis/
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]u pa sngon/ u ba sha rad ces pa lags tsa'i rkyen tsu Tu sogs kyis tsa dang Ta phyis/ da drangs/ suaM/ a mal snga ma'i gzugs/ u pA shar daM/ de bzhin du/ pA shaM pra ti/ zhes la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ pra ti sngon Ta tsa'i rkyen sbyin pas/ pra ti pA shaM/
[\[113a.2\]]de dang 'dra bar/ bi pA shaM/ pratse ta saM/ su ma na saM/ upAn haM/ u pAnasaM/ pra ti di ba/ prati di shaM a ma di shaM/ a pa di shaM/ swa na DuhaM/ pra bi shaM/ ston la nye ba/ u padzar saM/ de zhags pa la so sor/ rnams sha rad kyi sogs khong yin pas tshig skyor dang  zhags pa la so sor/
[\[113a.3\]]zhags pa med/ sems la rab tu/ Taca/ yid bzang / lha ma/ u pa Ang sA+on/ Tatsa u pa smon a nas/ lha mgas tsa/ nyi ma lo sor/ Tatsa/ phyogs mtshams/ su sngon a na Du ha na/ Ta tsa glang khyu bzang po/ gnas pa/ Tatsa/ nye ba'i rgan po/ Tatsa/ bsdu ba'i cho ga Ta tsa'i rkyen ster lugs sogs sha rad kyi skabs dang 'dra'o/ /pra ti par s+sam
