[\[113a.4\]]b+h+yok+Sh+NaH/ pra ti par sam  a nu rnams las a kI'i'o/ /nyer bskyur de rnams dang sbyor ba'i ak+Shi las mi zad pa'i bsdu ba'i mtha' lags tsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/ /de la b+ha'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/ tang+ng+hi tAH/ de phan rnams so/ /Ta tsa'i rkyen 'di sogs 'ga' zhig de
[\[113a.5\]]phan gya rkyen ma yin kyang de phan gyi rkyen zhes dgos pa'i dbang gi ming 'dogs byed do/ /ak+Shiprati/ zhes pa la/ pra ti sngon/ prati ak+Shi Ta tsa spyin/ tsu Tu sogs kyis tsa dang Ta phyis/ gang gi i ta la'ang ngo zhes pa'i mdos rtags kyi i phyis/ bshad ma thag par b+ha'i
[\[113a.6\]]ming can zhes dang / de phan rnams so zhes ming 'dogs byed pa ni gzhung 'di'i dgos pa'i ched du'o/ pratuk+ShaM/ de bzhin du/ ak+Shi byAM bar/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ par sngon/ par ak+Shi/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ par las ak+Shi las suTa'o/ /par las
[\[113a.7\]]ak+Shi dang sbyor ba la suT A ga ma 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ suT/ Ta gnas kyi don u brjod don sa sa dzuSha mngon sum/ mig dag las pha rol/ sogs kyis sa ru/ u brjod don ata las ru'i p+lu ta ma yin pa las blu ta ma yin pa la 'os/ rau/ a las yon tan nos/
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]o/ eng las tshig mtha' las a ta la 'os/ aphyis/ pa ro\u0f85k+Shi/ zhes pal/ Ta tsa sogs snga ma ltar bsgrubs pas/ paro\u0f85k+ShaM/ /de bzhin du/ samak+ShaM/ gnyis kyang tshig sbyor Ta tsa'i rkyen sogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra'o/ an sh+tsa/ an las
[\[113b.2\]]kyang ngo / mi zad par gyur pas bsdu ba'i mtha' an mtha'  lkog gyur/ la'ang Ta tsa'i rkyen sbyin par bya'o/ na stang+ng+hi te/ de  lkog gyur/ phan las  mig legs pa/ rjes su mig/ na'i 'o/ de phan gyi rkyen ba rol lan mtha'i ti dbyi bar bya ste/ rAdzAHsa mI paM/ zhes pa
[\[113b.3\]]la rnam dbye bsdus/ sa mI pa'i don nyer bsgyur u pa sngon/ u pa rAdzan/ an las kyang ngos/ Tatsa bshad ma thag pa'i mdos bri phyis/ u parAdza/ de bzhin du/ At+mano\u0f85ng+hi/ zhes ba la'ang gong bzhin bsdu ba Ta tsa'i rkyen sbyor ba sogs byas  rgyal po las rnag  pas/
[\[113b.4\]]ang+h+wAt+saM/ na buMs kAdan+ya tar swAM/ ma ning las yang na'o/ mi zad pa'i bsdu ba byas nas ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur pa lta bu ma yin pa'i bsdu ba  rgyal nye/ byed gong nas ma ning gi  lhag pa'i bdag nyid/ rtags yin pa an mtha' las ma zad pa'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las kyang Ta tsa yang na
[\[113b.5\]]lhag pa'i bdag nyid/ gyur te/ tsarma naH/ u pa zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/ u pa snyon/ yang naT tsa byin nas Ti phyis/ u am/ yang na su 'jig/ mir mtha'i na phyis/ u ba tsa rmaM/ u pa tsarma/ na dI po+oN mA swAgra gA ya NI b+h+yaH/ na dI/ po+or+NamA si/ a gra hA ya Ni rnams las
[\[113b.6\]]so/ na dI sogs 'di rnams la'ang mi zad bar gyur ba'i mtha' las Ta tsa yang na 'gyur te/ nang+yaHsamI paM/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus sa mI pa'i don u la sngon/ yang na Ta tsa sbyar pags pa las nye pa/ bas/ u pa na du/ u pa na di/ de bzhin du/ po+or+Na mA s+yAs mI paM/ zhes pa
[\[113b.7\]]la/ u pa po+or+Na pAsaM/ yang na/ zla ba nya gang ba ste bco lnga dang nye ba/ u pa po+o r+Na mA si/ a gla hA ya N+yAH chu klung las nye ba/ samI po/ zhes pa la/ upA gra hA ya Ni/ yang na/ gza' 'dzin med pa'i teg upA gra hA ya Ni/ dz+nyayaHdz+nya ya'i'o/ chu klung las nye ba/ mi zad par gyur/ zla ba nya gang ba'i nye ba  ba'i mtha'
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]ladz+ha ya so sor ba ldu ba'i yi ge gang yod kyang Ta tsa yang na 'gyur te/ sa mi ng+haHsamI paM/ zhes pa pa/ rnam dbye phyis/ samI pa'i don u pa sngon/ Tatsa/ yang na/ ma ning la/ su am 'jig gnas med pa la yang na'os/ u pas mi ng+haM/ u pas mi ta/ u pas
[\[114a.2\]]mid/ gi re sh+tsa se na kas+ya/ gi ri las mchod pa'i'o/ ge ri'i sbra mchod pa'i don  ngas/ nye ba'i yog pa dang 'brel ba'i don mi zad par gyur pa'i mthA las Ta ca yang na 'gyur te/ ge reHsamIpaM/ zhes pa la rnam dbye phyis/ u pa sngon/ Tatsa/ nye ba'i yog pa/ Ta tsa yang  nye ba'i yog pa/ na
[\[114a.3\]]ba byas bas/ u pagi raM/ u pa gi ri/ de rnams kyis mi zad pa'i bsdu ba rnams bshad zin to/ ! /da ni de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba bshad par bya ste/ dwi tI yA shri tA tI ta pa ti ta ga tA t+ya sta ri yi ge/ prAb+dA ban+diH/ gnyis pa la brten pa dang / 'das pa dang / ltung ba dang / song ba
[\[114a.4\]]dang / bden pa  TAtsa/ ri yi nye ba la/ dang / thob pa dang / gyur pa rnams kyi'o/ bsten pa sogs don de dag dang sbyar ba la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i mtha' su pa dang su pa don gcig pa'i de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/ bsten pa'i don la/ kr-iSh+ShaM shritaH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye gnyis pa'i
[\[114a.5\]]rjes bsdus/ kr-iSh+Na shitaH/ de bzhin du rnam dbye bsdus pas/ 'das ba la/ o dan b+huk+taH/ lhung ba la/ pha la pa ti taH/ song ba la/ grA mag taH/ bden pa pa/ bu ng+ng+hAd+yastaH/ thob pa la/ ar+tha prAp+taH/ gyur pa la/ su nag pa la bsten kha ba n+naH/ 'grel par/ 'gro ba'i
[\[114a.6\]]don dang sbyor ba la yang gnyis pa'i mtha' don gcig bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad  zab zos/ a ma/ pas/ grA  a ma/ 'bram bu lhung / ma grA mI/ grong du song / e ma/ swa yaM k+ten/ sangs rgyas bden/ swa yaMl k+ta'i 'o/ don thob/ swa yaM dang sbyor ba'i  bde bar gyur/ k+ta'i rkyen can yang sung pa mtha' dang su pa
[\[114a.7\]]mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/ a ma  spa yaM kr-i taM/ bdag gis byas/ ban+hA k+She be/ khashA'i ngan pa la'/ ngan pa'i don grong du 'phro/ grong du 'phro/ e ma/ brjod pa'i k+ta'i rkyen can dang sbyor ba'i khaTA zhis ba'ang su pa dang su pa don gcig pa'i de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba 'jug snye/ khril bsdad/ khaT+wAM ArU
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]D+haH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye gnyis pa'i rjes phyis/ kharU T+haH/ sAsI/ sAmi'o/ k+ta'i rkyen mtha' can dang sbyor ba'i sA mi yang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/ sA mi kr-i taM/ kA lAH/ dus rnams so/ /dus brjod pa'i gnyis pa'i mtha' 'ang kA'i rkyen can pha rol las su pa dang
[\[114b.2\]]sub don gcig pa'i de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba 'jug ste/ mA  khril bsdad/ saM pra mi taHtsan+d+raH/ zhes pa la/ a ma gyi rjes phyis/ mAs pra mi taH tsan+d+raH/ tri tI yAta d+k+r-i  a ma/ les bar byas/ tA r+then gu Na btsa ni na/ de'i byed pa'i don gyi yon tan brjod pa la gsum pa'o/ /de'i byed pa'i
[\[114b.3\]]don gyi yon tan brjod pa la gsum pa'i mtha' su pa dang sub don gcig  zla ba'i tshang zla ba/ pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/ shaMku la/ bla ba'i chad zla ba/ yAkhat+DaH/ zhes pa la/ gsum pa'i rjes bsdus/ shaM ku lA khaN+DaH/ de bzhin du  ng+hA n+hA rdzA/ yon tan brjod pa ma yin na de'i
[\[114b.4\]]skyes bu'i bsU ba mi 'jug ste/ ak+RaNA kA NaH/ zhes pa lta bu la gsum pa'i rjes mi dbyi'o/ pUrba sadr-i shas monA r+thaka la ha ni pu Na mi shra  sta res gcod/ sh+lak+Sh+Ne+eH/ pUrba sa dr-i sha  sa mdon  ngan  sta res gcod/ ba  ka laha  ni  thA/ 'khrab so ba'i don/ puN  mi shra  sh+lak+Sh+Da
[\[114b.5\]]rnams kyi'o/ bUrba sogs dang  mig zha rag sbyor ba gsum pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/ mA sen pUrbaH/ zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/ mAs pUrbaH/ de bzhin du/ kr-iSh+Nas dr-i shaH/ TA rAm samaH/ TA bU N+ya hi naHkhA shAstA ka la haH/ TAbU N+yu hi naHkhashas+t+ra ka la haH/ TAshA s+t+ra ni pu NaH/ dug+dami  TA
[\[114b.6\]]shraH/ na yan sh+lAk+Sh+NaH/ 'grel bar/ a bar dang sbyor ba'ang gsum pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ /mAsA b.raH/ zla bas sngon ma  k-irta ka raNe TA/ nag po phal chungs pa/ dag byed phyis 'dra ba/ bsod nams kyis dman pa/ /mtshon gyis 'khrugs/ bstan bcos mkhas pa/ kr-i tA
[\[114b.7\]]'o mas bsres/ TA+e/ mig legs pa/ ba hu laM/ byed pa byed po dag la kr-ita kyi mang po'o/ byed pa dang byed po'i don gyi gsum pa'i  TA/ zla bas gzhan/ mtha' kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen can dang sbyong ba la 'ahU laM zhes pa don gsum la 'jug pas don gcig pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba 'gyur ba dang
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]mi 'gyur ba yang na ba sogs mang po 'byung ste/ dper na tshig sdud kyi bya ba 'jug pa/ /ha ri NA trA taH/ zhes pa la gsum pa'i rjes phyis/ ha ri trA taH/ de bzhin du/ na khe+eHban+niH/ zhes pa la/ na khab+tinAH/ tshig sdud kyi cho ga mi 'jug pa/ b+hik+Sha b+hiHu di taH/
[\[115a.2\]]zhes pa lta bu rnam dbye mi dbyi'o/ de bzhin du/ dA treNalU na bAn/ khaD+ge+eHtshe n+wa bAn/ sogs so/ kr-ita/ 'phrog byed kyis bsrung / t+yair ng+hikAr+tha ba ca ni/ kr-ita  'phrog byed kyis bsrung / sen mos bsral/ rnams kyis ltab/ sen mos bsral/ pa'i don brjod pa la'o/ bslangs pas ltogs/
[\[115a.3\]]kr-ita sogs rnams kyi rkyen yod pa gsum pa'i mtha'  zor bas rnga/ gri yis bcad/ don lhag po brjod pa can ni su pa dang su pa don gcig pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba 'jug ste/ /kAge+eHpe yA na dI/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ kA ka pe yA na dI/ de bzhin du/ bAShA+en tshe ng+thani/ zhes
[\[115a.4\]]pa'ang rnam dbye bsdus don gsal bar byed pa'i tshig grogs tr-i Na sbyar bas/ bASh+pa tsheng+yaM tr-iN ni/ an+ne na byany+dzanaM/ zas kyis bya na la'o/ zas kyis byan brjod pa la  bya rog rnams kyis chu 'thung / gsum pa'i mtha' don gcig  bya rog chu 'thung / bar 'gyur te/ k+Shi  kha yis brdas/ reN sik+ta
[\[115a.5\]]o da naH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye dang rjes 'brang phyis/ k+Shi rod naH/ b+hak+She lhA rnams kha yis 'jas/ Na mi shrI kar NaM/ zas kyis sre ba'i byed pa la'o/ zas sre ba'i byed pa sbyor ba la gsum pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/ gu Den mi shrAHng+hAnAH/ zhes pa la/ 'o ma dang zan sbyor  guDang+hA
[\[115a.6\]]naH/ tsa tu r+thI tA dar+thAr+tha ba li hi ta su kha rak+Shite+eH/ de'i don 'o ma dang zan/ dang ba 'i hi ta su khar k+Sheta rnams kyi bzhi pa'o/ de'i don zhes don bzang po brjod pa dang / /ba li sogs sbyor ba la'ang bzhi pa'i mtha' su pa dang  bur ma dang yos bsres/ su pa don gcig pa su ram dang yos/ de'i
[\[115a.7\]]skyes bu'i bsdu bar 'gyur te/ yUpA yangA ru/ ka ba'i ched kyi shing / rnam dbye bsdus/ yUpa ngA ru/ ka ba'i ched kyi shing / 'grel par/ skabs 'gar de'i don yin kyang rnam dbye mi sdud pa yang yod do zhes bshad pas/ raM ng+hanA ya s+thIl/ tshong pa'i phyir gyi snod/ zhes pa lta bu rnam dbye mi dbyi'o//
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]bal dang sbyor ba la/ b+dUtA ya ba liH/ zhes pa la/ zhes dbye bsdus/ b+tUtab liH/ de bzhin du/ de na ra su khaH/ de go hi taM/ pany+tsa mI b+ha yen/ 'jigs pas lnga pa'o/ 'jigs pa'i rgyu'i don brjod pa'i sbyor ba la lnga pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur
[\[115b.2\]]te/ tso+o+orAta b+ha yaM/ zhes 'byung po'i ched gtor ma/ pa la rnam dbye lnga pa'i  'byung po'i gto ram/ rjes bsdus/ mi kha bde ba/ mi la bde ba/ 'khang la bsrung ba/ ba lang ma phan pa/ cor b+hayaM/ de bzhin du/ ngis br-i ka b+hi tiH/ bsi br-i ka b+hiH/ a pe tA po d+ha muk+ta pa ti tA pa tra ste+er lpa
[\[115b.3\]]chom chun las 'jigs/ shaH/ /a be ta  a po D+ha  muk+ta  ba ti ta  a bo  trasta rnams kyi chung ngu la'o/ a be ta sogs tshegs chung du brjod chom rkun las 'jigs/ ba can dang sbyar ba la  spyang li pas dAg/ lnga pa'i  spyang ki las skrag/ mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/ /su khA da
[\[115b.4\]]pe taH/ zhes pa la/ lnga ba'i rjes bsdus/ su khA pe taH/ de bzhin du/ ngasi kalpA po D+haH/ ngasi tsa kramu k+taH/ ngasi srag pa ti haH/ ta raM gApa trasta/ sto kAn+ti kangU rA rbakr-i tsh+rANi k+ten/ sto ka an+ti ka ring ba'i don kr-i tsh+ra rnams k+ta'i'o/ k+ta'i rkyen can sto ka dang / an+ti ga dang ring
[\[115b.5\]]bde ba las sbyor/ ba'i don rnams dang / kr-itsh+ra bde basbyor/ rnams k+ta'i rkyen can  stobs dang mnyam/ 'khor lo las grol/ bde 'gro las lhung / brlabs la skrab/ dang sbyor ba la lnga pa'i mtha' mi dbyi zhing rang sar gnas kyang de dag la mi dbyi ba'i tshig sdud cas zer ro/ snyo kAn+mustaH/ cung zad grol
[\[115b.6\]]a lcAn+muk+taH/ an+tikAn+luk+taH/ dUrAn+muk+taH/ kr-itsh+rAn+muk+taH/ zhes pa rnams lnga pa'i rjes ma phyis pa'o/ /ShaSh+ShI/ drug pa'o/ rnam dbye drug pa'i mtha' yang su pa mtha' dang su pa mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/ rAdz+nyaHpuru ShaH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phyis/ rAdzan du
[\[115b.7\]]cung zad las grol/ nyi lags grol/ re ba las grol/ /ring ba las grol/ sdug bsngal las grol/ log ming mtha'i nang byi 'os/ na phyis/ rAdzapuru ShaH/ rgyal po'i skyes bu/ 'grel par/ kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen mtha' can dang sbyor ba las/ rgyal po'i skyes bu ste rgyal po'i mi sna/ mtshan nyid brjod pa la
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]drug pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ byAs s+ya kr-itiH/ zhes pa la drug pa'i rjes bsdus byAs kr-itiH/ de bzhin du/ b+hArata bra baNaM/ ngas yAdza kA di b+hi sh+tsa/ yA dzaka sogs rnams kyi'o/ yAdza ka sogs dang sbyor ba la'ang dug pa'i
[\[116a.2\]]mtha' su pa dang su pa don gcig par 'gyur te/ dwi dzas+yayAdza kaH/ zhes pa la  rgyas par byas/ rnam dbye phyis/ dwidzayAdza kaH/ de bzhin du/ ngas  dwi dza pU b+hAr ta sas thos 'byed/ dzakaH/ dwi dzA ng+h+ya pa kaH ngas  dwi dza dwar+t+takaH/ ngas  dwi dza ho tr-i kaH/ 'grel
[\[116a.3\]]par lung drangs pa/ gra ha/ ra tha/ bat+ti/ gnyis skyes kyi mchod sbyin/ rnams ga Na ka dang sbyor ba yang don gcig gnyis skyes kyi mchod sbyin/ par 'gyur mo zhes bshad pas/ gnyis skyes kyi mchod pa/ gnyis skyes khrus byed/ gnyis skyes klog par byed/ gnyis skyes byug pa byed/ gnyis skyes sbyin srig byed/
[\[116a.4\]]graha gaN kaH/ ra tha gaN kaH/ pat+ti gaNakaH/ na ni r+ng+nAr Ne/ nges par bkar ba lam yin no/ gang la nges par bkar ba'i don gyi drug pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ nr-iNAMdwe dzaHshreSh+thaH/ zhes pa lta bu rnam dbye mi dbyi'o/ pUr Na guNasu hi tAr+tha
[\[116a.5\]]gza'i phrangs/ shing rta'i grangs/ ltung ba'i grangs/ sad bya ya ta byas mAnA ng+hi kar Ne na/ gang ba dang yon tan dang shin tu phan pa'i don dang bde ba dang mi zad pa ta bya rnams mnyam pa'i lhag par  mi rnams kyi gnyis skyes mchog/ byed pa'i'o/ rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i son de rnams
[\[116a.6\]]dang mi zad pa dang sbyor ba dang / ta bya gyi rkyen can dang sbyor ba dang / mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa'i don sbyor ba yang drug pa'i mtha' don gcig par mi 'gyur te/ rdzogs pa la/ satAM ShaSh+ShaH/ yon tan la/ gu Na s+ya pa traM/ gu Na s+ya pa traM/ yang 'grel par/ yon tan rgyun du rtags pa'i don la drug pa'i
[\[116a.7\]]mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ tsan+da nagan+ng+haH/ tsan dan gyi dri/ zhes pa lta bu don gcig par 'gyur ro/ shin tu phan pa'i don la/ shin tu phan pa rnams kyi tshim/ su hi  bden pa drug/ tA nAMtr-ip+tiH/ phalA yon tan gyi stod de mkhas pa/ nAMtraM p+tiH/ 'bras bu rnams kyis tshim/ bden pa la/
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]dwi dza s+yakurba NaH/ satAM kurbaNaH/ mi zad pa la/ satAMkr-itwA/ ta bya la/ /sa tAMkartabyaM/ yang 'grel par/ ta bya gyi rkyen can dang sbyor ba las kyang skra bas 'gar don gcig par yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ ngas dwi dza karta byaM/ mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i byed pa'i don la/ rA dz+nyo nyan la
[\[116b.2\]]gnyis skyes kyis byas/ bden pa rnams kyis byas/ bden pa rnams kyis byis nas/ bden pa rnams kyi byed/ s+yaM/ k+ten tsa pU dzAyAM/ k+ta'i yang mchod pa la'o/ /k+ta'i rkyen can yang mchod pa'i don sbyor ba la drug pa'i mtha' don  gnyis skyes kyi byed/ gcig par mi 'gyur te/ rA dzI rkyal bo'i le lo med/
[\[116b.3\]]mato bung+ng+haHpU dzitaH/ karmaNi tsa/ las la'ang ngo / /las kyi don gnyis yod pa dang sbyor ba la drug pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ tsAr ya tig bAM doho go pe na/ tr-i dza kAb+h+yAM ka rta raM/ tr-itsa a ka dag las byed pa la'o/ byed pa'i don gyi rkyen tr-i tsa a ka dag sbyar pa'i

[\[116b.7\]]lhag par byed pa sbyor ba la drug pa'i mtha' don gcig ri mo 'dri/ par 'gyur te/ pUrbaMkA yas+ya/ lus kyi snying / zhes pa la drug pa'i rjes bsdus/ pUrba kA yaH/ lus kyi stod/ de bzhin du/ a par kAyaH/ lus kyi g.yas/ ang+ha ra kA yaH/ lus kyi smad/ /ut+ta ra kA yaH/ 'grel par/
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]ahA dang sbyor ba'i sarba/ saya/ mang+h+ya rnams kyang drug pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ro zhes pa shad pas/ ngas  sarbA h+naH/ ngas mang+h+rAh+dAH/ sA yAt+naH/ ar+ng+haM na pu sa kaM/ ar+ng+ha ma ning ngo / ar+ng+ha'i sgra ma ning gi rtags can ni de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba 'jug ste/ ar+ng+haM
[\[117a.2\]]pip+pa l+yaH/ zhes pa la/ ar+ng+ha pip+pa li/ dwitI yatr-i tI yatr-i tI ya tsa tur+thatUr+YA N+h+ya n+ya ta rastAM/ dwi tI ya/ tsatur+tha/ tur+Ya rnams yang na'o/ /dwi tI ya la/ nyi ma thams cad/ nyi mi dgung / dgongs so/ sogs pa 'di rnams spyor bal drug pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur zhing tshig sbyor gyi skabs kyi rtags de
[\[117a.3\]]gnyis yang na gong 'og brje ste/ pi pi ling gi byed/ dwi tI yaM bik+ShA yAH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ gong 'og brje ba'am mi brje pa yang na bar byas pas/ dwi tI yab+hik+ShA/ b+hik+ShA dwi tI yaM/ de bzhin du/ tr-i tI yaMb+hik+ShA yAH/ zhes pa la/ tri tI ya b+hik+ShA/ b+hik+ShA tr-i tI yaM/ de dang
[\[117a.4\]]'dra bar/ tsa tur+thab+hik+Sha'aM/ b+hik+ShA tsa tu r+thaM/ tur+Ya b+hik+Sha/ b+hik+ShA tur+YaM/ gnyis slor/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ pAd dang hasta/ ta la a gra dang sbyor ba la yang na'o/ pU da dang gnyis slong / ta la sbyor ba dang ha sta dang a gra sbyor bal yang dug pa'i mtha'  gsum slong / gsum slong / don

[\[117a.6\]]gra hastaM/ brAp+tA pa n+netsa dwi tI ya yA/ prAp+ta A pan+na la'ang gnyis pa'i'o/ prAp+ta dang A pan+na gnyis pa'i'o/ prAp+ta dang A pan+na gnyis dang sbyor  zhabs kyi mthil/ ba las gnyis pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur zhing rtags gong 'og brje ba'ang  zhabs kyi mthil/ yang na bya ste/ prAp+to dzI  phyag gi rtse/ bi  phyag gi rtse

[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]NinA/ dus rnams kyi tshad la'o/ dus kyi tshad brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/ mAso dzA tas+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ mA sadzAH/ sab+ta mI sho+oN+DaH/ shauN rnams kyi bdun pa'i'o/ sho+oN+Da sogs rnams dang sbyor ba'i sa bdun pa'i mtha'

[\[118a.1\]]aM/ /can rnams la ba ti'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de gong du ku ga ti pral sogs pa rnams kyang ngo zhes pa'i don du ming 'dogs byas te/ dper brjod na/ am U rI kr-i t+ya/ su  am ur rI kr-i t+ya/ su am alaM kr-i t+ya/ su yam an+taHkr-itaM su/ nga tham na skr-i taM/ ngi  bu r-iskrataM/
[\[118a.2\]]tiraskr-i taM/ de rnams ga ti'i ming can dang cwi'i mtha' la/ ngas  shuklI kr-i t+ya/ DAtsa la/ bde bar byas/ su khAkr-i taM/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ a tsha gat+yar+tha bde Shu/ a tsha'i 'gro ba'i don  sems par bya ba/ brjod  brgyan par bya pa rnams la'o/ bar mtshams byas/ sems kyi byas/ sngon du byas/

[\[118a.5\]]tiraskratA/ tiraHkr-i twA/ tir spa ti/ ti raHpa ti/ 'grel par/ ha ste lto 'grob krad+ya/ bedaM dzI  yid 'brog  bi kA/ pA No kr-i t+ya/ rnam dbye bdun pa'i rjes mi dbyi yang nges pa'i tshig sdud zer ro zhes byung ngo / bral sogs pa'i dper brjod ni/ su prakr-i t+ya/ saMb+ha ba ti/ su hr-itaM/ a b+hi She
[\[118a.6\]]mi snang bar byas/ ka/ prAcar+YaH/ me snang ba'i bdag lo/ prati pak+ShaM/ pra lag par byas nas/ rig byed 'tsho ba/ lag par byas nas/ ti nA thaH/ nguHna raH/ duHkr-itaM/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ swa tI pu dzAyaM/ su a ti dag mchod pa  rang bzhin/ 'dza' po'am yid btsugs / dbang bslur ba/

[\[118b.1\]]ya ti sha yen rA dzA/ zhes pa la/ ati rA dzA/ suSh+Ta s+ya uk+taH/ zhes pa la/ sUk+tA/ a ti sha yen dz+nyA/ zhes pa la/ a ti dz+nya/ yang 'grel par/ Ang gi nyung du'i don dang sngon par khyab pa'i don gcig par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ iShata bang+haM/ zhes pa'i
[\[118b.2\]]don la/ phul du byung ba'i rgyal po/ Abang+haM/ de bzhin  legs bar smras pa/ du/ a b+hibya stiHna  mkhyen pa phul du byung ba/ garaH/ zhes pa'i don la/ An garaH/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ a t+yA da yaHkran+tA da yaHkrAn+tA ng+yar+thetwi tI yA la/ a ti sogs  cung zad 'ching / rnams
[\[118b.3\]]khyab pa sogs kyi don la gnyis pa'i'o/ /cung zad 'ching / a ti la sogs pa rnams  mngon par khyab pa'i grong / khyab pa sogs kyi don brjod pa la gnyis pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/ a ti krAn+to mA lAM/ /zhes pa la rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ a ti mAlA su/
[\[118b.4\]]e ka pi b+hak+hi tsA pU rba ni pA te/ rnam dbye gcig la'ang sngam ma yin pa'i nges tshig la'o/ nges pa'i tshig rnam dbye gcig tu sdud pa'i cho ga tshig sbyor gyi skabs kyi tshig gnyis bzhag pa'i sngam ma  shin tu khyab pa'i phreng pa/ yin pa'i tshig phyi ma de la u pa rdza zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /

[\[118b.7\]]khaH/ mngon par phyogs pa/ khyab pa'i phreng ba/ gaM gA'i shin tu khyab pa/ pra ti ak+shaM/ zhes pa la gang+gA'i khyab pa/ gnyis pa'i rjes  khyab par 'gro ba'i dus/ phyis/ prat+yak+ShaH/ cho lo so sor/ bud med kyi rkyen mtha' ma yin na thung ngur mi 'gyur te/ khyab pa'i dus/ a ti tan+t+rI/ nyu shin cu non pa/ ati lak+Sh+mI/ shin tu dpal dang ldan pa'am
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]shin tu phun gsum tshogs pa/ a ti shrIH/ 'grel par/ a ba sogs rnams kuSh+ta sogs dang sbyor ba la gsum pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur zhes bshad pas/ a ba kuSh+TaH/ ko ki la yA zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas ba phyis/ a bko
[\[119a.2\]]ki laH/ yang 'grel par/ pa ri sogs glA na sogs kyi don brjod pa la bzhi pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ra zhes bshad pas/ pa ri glAnaH/ a ng+yaya nA ya/ zhes pa'i  khu byugs snyad snyan bo 'don/ ngag sbyor la rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ par+Ya ng+ya yanaH/
[\[119a.3\]]de bzhin du/ a laM su b.raHku mAr+Ye+e/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ a laM ku mA riH/ yongs su klog  par pi 'dod/ nir sogs rnams khyab pa sogs kyi don du sbyor ba la lnga ba'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur ro  glog mi 'dod/

[\[119a.5\]]ib/ zhes pa lta bu la rnam dbye ming byi mtshams sbyar/ tA bib/ bAsasApa/ pUrba kA le+e ka sarba dzar t+purA Nan tsa ke ba nges par mdzod ldan/ lAH/ samA nAng+hi kar Ne na/ snga ma'i dus  e ka sarba  dzarata  bu rA Na rnams gcig ma yin pa la'ang mnyam de dag 'dra ba/ gos dag 'dra ba/
[\[119a.6\]]pa'i lhag par byed ba la'o/ /snga ma'i dus te 'das ba'i dus dang sbyor ba dang e ka sogs dang sbyor ba la'ang tshog gcig min bdon mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa la sub dang su pa don gcig par 'gyur te/ sna ten anu lip+taH/ zhes pa la/ gsum pa'i rjes bsdus/ sna tAnu lip+taH/
[\[119a.7\]]de bzhin du/ eke na snataH/ gcig gi khrus/ zhes pa la/ /e ka sna taH/ gcig khrus/ de dang 'dra bar/ sarbe Na sna taH/ thams cad kyi khrus/ zhes pa la/ sarba sna taH/ de dag dang 'dra bar/ dzar tA ba khrus kyi rjes su byug pa/ yaH/ rgan po yin chod/ zhes pa la/ dza  khrus kyi ng+nes su phyug pa/
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]ra dwa yaH/ de bzhin du/ burA Nen uk+taH/ zhes pa la/ burA Nok+taH/ burANok+taH/ tshig gcig yin na bsdu ba'i tha snyad med de/ bUrbaH/ zhes ba lta bu la bsdu ba'i cho ga med do/ mnyam pa'i don lhag par byed pa ma yin pa ste/ don 'gal bal tshig gnyis dang gsum la sogs pa yod kyang
[\[119b.2\]]rgan po yin chod/ don gcig par  purA Na glon mi 'gyur te/ bah+ni purA Na klog/ setsa naM dza la/ zhes pa lta bu la bsdu ba'i bya ba mi 'jug go/ tatUru ShaHsamAnA ng+hi kar NaHkarmang+hAr yaH/ de'i skyes bu mnyam pa'i lhag par byed ba las 'dzin pa'o/ de'i skyes bu'i tshig sdud kyi nang
[\[119b.3\]]tshan mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa ste snga phyi'i tshig gnyis kyi don/ dngos po mel chu snyim pas blugs/ gcig la mnyam par 'jug pa'i don can de la las 'dzin pa'i bsdu bzhes bya ste/ e kAtsAs sATI tsa/ zhes pa la rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ e kAsATI/ zhes
[\[119b.4\]]gnas pa la/ bus bat+karma d+hAtI yaHde shI yeShu/ skyes pa dang 'dra bar las 'dzin rigs yul rnams la'o/ las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba'i skabs don mnyam pa dang sbyor ba gcig kyang 'di yin gos kyang 'di/ dang rigs kyi sgra dang yul sAnI zhes pa rgya gar gyi bud med kyi bgos gcig gi ming /
[\[119b.5\]]gyi pha rol can rnams la tshig gnyis bsgrigs pa'i snga ma'i mtha' na bud med kyi rkyen mtha' U ma yin pa gang yod kyang skyes pa'i rtags dang 'dra par thung ngur 'gyur bas kA thung ngur song / eka sA TI/ de bzhin du/ pAtso kA tsA so sI tsa/ zhes pa la/ pAtsa kasti/ de dang 'dra bar/
[\[119b.6\]]pa t+tsa mA tsA sau b+hAr+YA tsa/ zhes pa la/ bAny+cam b+nA r+YA/ de rnams dang 'dra bar/ dat+tA tsA so b+hA r+YA tsa/ zhes pa la/ dat+ta b+dAr+YA/ /de bzhin du/ su keshA tsA sa b+hAr+YA tsa/ zhes pa la/ su ke sha b+hAr+YA/ de bzhin du/ chod mkhan ma yang 'di bud me kyang 'di/ bud med chod ma/ brAh+ma NAtsA so b+tAr+YA tsa/
[\[119b.7\]]chung ma lang 'di lnga yang 'di/ zhes pa la/ chung ma lnga/ brAh+ma Na b+hAr+YA/ chung ma bram ze mo/ sbyin pa mo dang 'di chung ma yang 'di/ de bzhin  chung ma sbyin pa mo/ du/ pA  skra mdzos ma yang 'di tshung ma yang 'di/ rtsa chung ma skra mdzos ma/ kash+tsA so dzAtI ya/ sh+tsa/ 'tshod pa yang 'di rigs kyang 'di/ zhes  bram ze mo yang 'di chung ma yang 'di/
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]pa la/ pA tsa ka dzAtI yaH/ de bzhin du/ pA tsa kash+tsa de shI ya sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ bA tsa ka de shI yaH/ de bzhin du/ sarbe tsa de bash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ sarga de baH/ de bzhin du/ dzarats+tsa so+ob ti sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ dzarat+tsati/ u pa mAnA ni sA mA n+ya ba tsa ne+eH/
[\[120a.2\]]nye bar sbyor ba rnams mnyam par  'tshod pa'i rigs/ brjod pas so/ 'tshod pa yang 'di yul 'di/ 'di dang 'di  'tshod pa ri yul/ 'dra zhes pa lta  thams cad la yang lta dang / bu nye bar lha thams cad/ sbyong ba  rgas po yang 'di bdag mo yang 'di/ rnams don  shes po bdag po/ mnyam par brjod
[\[120a.3\]]pa yang don gcig par 'gyur te/ g+han sh+tsa i pash+tAmaH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye dang 'dra pa'i skad dod bsdus/ g+han sh+yAmaH/ u pa mi taM byAg+h+rA ti b+hiH/ nye bar sbyor ba byA g+h+ral sogs pa rnams kyis so/ byAg+h+ra la sogs pa rnams nye bar sbyor ba'i don brjod pa yang don gcig par 'gyur
[\[120a.4\]]te/ puru ShobyAg+h+rai ba shrUraH/ sprin dang sngo skya 'dra/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbyi rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ pu ru Sha byA  sprin sdo skya/ g+h+ra shrU raH/ bi sheSha NaM bi sheSh+ye Na ba hu laM/ khyad par byad par gyis mang po la'o/ don gcig gis khyad par du byed pa'i su pa mtha' dang / khyad par
[\[120a.5\]]skyes khu stag dang 'dra bal dba' 'o/ byis bsdu ba'i gzhi don gcig par 'gyur te/ rak+tAtsA so+o la tA tsa/ zhes pa la  skyes pa stag lta bu/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ rak+ta la tA/ de bzhin du/ kr-iSh+Nash+tsa so sarbash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ kr-iSh+Na sarbaH/ de bzhin du/ /lo hi tA tsA so+o
[\[120a.6\]]a hi sh+tsa/ zhes ba la/ lotitA haMH/ de bzhin du/ nIlaMn ta du t+palaM tsa/ dmar ba yang 'di 'khri shing yang 'di/ zhes pa la/ nI lot+palaM/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ shA  'khrel shing dmar po/ dag po yang 'di sprul yang 'di/ kapAr+thi bAdInA mu d+tar pa spu nag pa/ da lo pa sh+tsa/ lu nyang yang 'di sbrul yang 'di/
[\[120a.7\]]shAka pAr+thi ba sogs  sbrul lu tang / sngon po yang 'di u t+pal yang ngo / rnams kyi tshig phyi ma dbyi ba'ang ngo / las 'dzin gyi bsdu u h+pal sngon go/ ba'i skabs 'dir shAka pAr+thi ba sogs kyi chog snga ma'i phyi ma ste tshig gsum bsgrigs pa'i dbus ma dbyi ste/ shAkaHpri yaHpAr+thi baH/ 'dab ma la dga' bas
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]bdag/ sa bdag ste rkya la bo'i ming / zhes pa la/ tshig snga ma'i phyi ma dang rnam dbye rnams phyis/ shwaka bAr+thibaH/ da dang 'dra bar/ debaHpU dzalobrAh+ma NaH/ zhes pa la'ang / tshig snga ma'i phyi ma pU dza ka dang rnam dbye phyis/ de ba brAh+ma NaH/ nanya/ nanya'i'o/ /dgag pa'i na nya s+jon du 'jog pa yang
[\[120b.2\]]de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'o/ /na lo pon nyaH/ na nya'i na dbyi'o/ /tshig sdud kyi skabs na nya zhes pa'i na ni tshig phyi ma pha rol tu  lha mchod pa'i bram ze/ byung na dbyi ste/ ng+harmaMpiru ng+ng+haH/ zhes pa la/ rnam pa bye phyis/ pi lta'i bram ze/ ru ng+hA'i don na nyasngon/ mdo 'dis na phyis/ ang+ha rmaH/ de
[\[120b.3\]]bzhin du/ pA pA b+ha baH/ zhes pa la/ a pA paH/ de dang 'dra bar/ na brAh+maNaH/ zhes pa la/ abrAh+maNaH/ tasmAn+nuDa tsi/ de las a tsa la nuTa'o /chos 'dzoms/ dgag pa'i na nya'i na phyis bde las tshig grogs atsa thog ma can byung na nuT atsa thog ma can byung na nuT A ba ma 'gyur te/ chos 'dzoms/ ka
[\[120b.4\]]lA par dbyangs la/ sdig med/ yi ge bzlog snig med/ bar bya ba zhes pa dang dgos don 'dra'o/ /aH bram ze ma yin/ shwAta an+yaH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ an+ya gyi don na nya sngon/ nanya'i dbyi'os/ na phyis mdo 'dis nuT Ta gnas kyi don u brjod don/ /an
[\[120b.5\]]shwaH/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ na nyo na lo paH/ ti ngi k+She ye/ ting la med pa la na nya'i na dbyi'o/ /ting mtha'  rta las gzhan pa/ can gyi sngon du 'jog pa'i nanya'i na'ang med pa'i don brjod pa yin na dbyi ste/ na pa tsi si/ zhes pa la na phyis/ a pa tsa si/ rta las gzhan pa/ 
[\[120b.6\]]na b+hAn+na pAn+na bde nAs t+yan mu tsi na ku la na khan puM sa kan k+Sha tra nag+nan kra nA ke Shu prakr-i t+yaH/ na b+h+rAT/ na bAta/ na bed/ nA sa t+ya/ na mu tsi/ na ku la/ na kha/ na puMs ka/ nak+Sha tra/ nag+na/ na kra/ nA ka rnams la'ang / 'tshod bar mi byed/ bzhin gyis so/ na 'tsho de bar mi byed/ b+h+rAT sogs de
[\[120b.7\]]rnams kyi na yig ni chog gzhan gyi thog ma yin kyang mi dbyi bar rang bzhin du gnas mabs lab/ ming srung ba/ mi rig pa/ mi bden pa/ mi lhong pa/ rigs med de swe yang / sen mo/ ma ning / sgar ma/ gos med/ mi 'bro ba/ mtho ris/ so/ /san+ma hat+par mo t+ta mo t+k+riSh+TaHpU dz+yam niH/ sata ma ga ha ta par ma u t+ta
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ma ut+k+r-iSh+Ta rnams mchod bsems pa rnams kyi'o/ sata sogs de rnams mchod pa dang legs par sems pa'i don brjod pa'i phyir du sbyor ba yang don gcig pa'i de'i skyes bu'i nang tshan las 'dzen gyi bsdu bar 'gyur te/ sat+tsaso ng+harma sh+tsa/ zhes pa la rnam
[\[121a.2\]]dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa byis/ sang+ng+harmaH/ de bzhin du/ ma hAM sh+tsA sa de bash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas phyis/ ma had de baH/ An+ma hataH/ samA nA ng+hi kar NadzAtI ya yoH/ ma ha ta kyi mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa dang  dam pa yang 'di chos kyang 'di/ rigs dag
[\[121a.3\]]la Ata'o/ ma ha ta kyi mtha'  dam pa'i chos/ mnyam pa'i lhag par byed  lha yang 'di chen po yang ngo / bste gzhi mthun pa'i tshig dang rigs  lha chen go  dag la Ata du 'gyur te/ ka lA par/ gzhi mthun tshig la ma ha ta kyi/ A'i yi ger byed pa'o zhes ba dang gcig go/ 'di'i Ti
[\[121a.4\]]Ata/ mahA de baH/ de bzhin du/ pa ram sh+tsa so de bash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ /pa ra ma de baH/ ut+tam sh+tsa so+o gu ru sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ ut+ta ma gu ruH/ ut+k+r-iSh+Ta sh+tsA so+o de ba sh+tsa/ zhes ba la/ ud+k+r-iSh+Ta debaH/ 'grel pang lung drangs pa/ g+hA sa ka ra bi shiSh+Te Sh+wa pi shAts+yi/ g+hAs/ ka ra bi
[\[121a.5\]]shiSh+Ta  lha chen po/ rnams pha rol la A yi ge tu  mchog kyang 'di lha yang ngo / /lha mchog/ mchog kyang 'di bla ma yang ngo / brjod par bya zhing g+hAs sogs  bla ma mchog/ gzi brjid can kyang 'di lha yang ngo / lha gzi brjid can/ /pha rol kha ma ha tI zhes pa'ang ma ha ru 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ ma ha tI la Ta/ b+hAs la
[\[121a.6\]]su  ma ha t+yAg+hAsaH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus ma ha tI ru 'gyur / ma hAg+hA saH/ de bzhin du/ nA maha t+yAkaraH/ zhes pa la/ mahA ka raH/ de bzhin du/ nAm ha t+yAbi shiSh+TaH/ zhes pa la/ ma hAbi shiSh+TaH/ /tang+ng+hitA r+tho d+tar pa da samAhA re tsa/ de phan gyi don tshig phyi ma
[\[121a.7\]]mang pos r+tha/ mnyam du 'dus pa la'ang ngo / /de phan gyi don can gyi tshig phyi ma  rtsa mang bo/ pha rol la mnyam du 'dus pa  chen po yis bya ba/ bya ba chen po/ na don gcig pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bar  chen po yis mchog/ che mchog/ 'gyur te/ bUrbas+yAM shA lA yAM b+ha ba/ 'gron khang shor ma la/ rnam dbye
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]rnams bsdus/ pUrba shA la b+ha ba/ zhes pa la/ di ka pUrba pa dA da saMdz+nyAyAM nyA/ phyogs kyi tshig snga ma las ming ma yin pa la la nya'o/ phyogs kyi tsheg snga ma can la ming ma yin pa la dngos bo'i don la de phan gyi rkyen nya 'gyur ro/ zhes pas/ de phan gyi don can gyi tshig phyi ma b+ha ba phyis/ de'i
[\[121b.2\]]don gyi rkyen nya/ nya 'gro bal 'phel ba/ po+orba shAlaH/ dika saMMkhyesaM dzA yAM/ phyogs grangs ngag la ming la'o/ phyogs kyi sgra dang grangs dag ming brjod pa na don gcig par 'gyur te/ dak+Shi NA tsA so+o ag+ni sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ dak+Sha NAg+ninaH/ de bzhin du/ sap+ha tsa te grA mAsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/
[\[121b.3\]]sab+tagwAmAH/ de bzhin du/ sap+ta tsa r-i  'gron khang shar/ Sha ya sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ sap+tar+Sha yan/ saM khyA pUrbo dwiguH/ grangs thog ma can ni phyogs gnyis pa'o/ dngos po gang zhig grangs kyi  lho yang 'di me yang ngo / sgra dang 'grel ba  lho'i me/ grong yang de bdun yang ngo / na grangs kyi sgra sngon du
[\[121b.4\]]'jog grong 'dun rnams/ drang srong yang de bdun lang / cing de la de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i nang  drang srong bdun rnams/ tshan phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba zhes brda chad byed do/ /ban+tsa su ka pA leShusaMskr-itaH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rnams dang rjes 'brang bsdus/ pany+tsa ka pA la/ saMskr-i taM bak+ShaH/ 'dus
[\[121b.5\]]pa la zas la'o/ /zas kyi don gyi 'das ba'i don la de phan gyi rkyen aNa'o zhes pas aN 'jug kyang / dwi goHlug na pa t+ye/ phyogs gnyis pa'i bu brgyud ma yin pa la dbyi'o/ ha bA li lnga 'dus/ phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig sdud kyi skabs 'dir bu brgyud kyi rkyen  ka bAli lnga/ ma yin pa'i de phan gyi
[\[121b.6\]]rkyen rnams dbyi snye/ pany+tsa ka pA la la yang aNam sbyin kyang chog/ sbyin kyang mdo 'dis dbyibs gzugs 'dra'o/ bu brgyud kyi rkyen yin na mi dbyi ste/ dwa yoH/ mi tra yoH/ putraH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rnams bsdus pu brgyud kyi rkyen nyi nya 'gro ba la 'phel ba/ dwe+e mi triH/ zhes
[\[121b.7\]]pa lta bu mi dbyi'o/ yang / pany+tsa p+hiHgo b+hiHkrIta/ bal nga lnga yis tshong / /zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rnams bsdus/ pa dang lda/ pany+tsa guH/ te na krA+e tag de yis rdzas brje ba la'o/ de yis rdzas brje ba ste tshong gi don la de phan gyi rkyen ka 'gyur ro zhes pa thob kyang / a t+h+ya r+b+ba pU rbAng+d+wi  phrogs gnyis kyi phu/
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]go rlu ga saM dzAyAM/ lhag pa'i don snga ma las phyogs gnyis pa la ming ma yin pa la dbyi'o/ lhag pa'i don snga ma can las/ phyogs gnyis pa'i tshig stud kyi skabs 'dir ming ma yin pa la de phan gyi rkyen rnams dbyibs/ ka byin ma byin la gzugs khyad par
[\[122a.2\]]med do/ yang / pany+tsa ga bo ng+ga na yas+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ pany+tsa go ng+ha naM/ gor ta ng+ng+hi ta lung ki/ go yis de phan dbyi ba ma yin no/ go yis sgra'i mtha' dang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la de phan gyi rkyen a tsa 'gyur zhing dbyi ba'ang ma yin no
[\[122a.3\]]zhes pas atsa'i rkyen/ gang gi nor ba lang lnga/ pany+tsa ga paH/ zhes pa la/ dwi gu re ka pa tsa naM/ phyogs nor ba lang lnga/ gnyis pa la gcig tshig go/ /phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mtha' las rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig kho na 'jug pa shas che'o/ /sa na puM sa kaM/ /de ma
[\[122a.4\]]ning ngo / /phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i ba dar lnga/ mtha' gcig tshig 'jug pa de rnams ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur ro/ /ma ning la su a ma du 'gyur/ pany+tsa ga paM ng+hanaM/ a kArAn+tot+ta ra ba do dwi guH/ phyogs gnyis pa a yig mtha' tshig phyi ma la'o/ phyogs gnyis
[\[122a.5\]]pa'i bsdu pa'i skabs tshig phyi ma a yig mtha' can las bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI ba 'gyur te/ trayA NAM lokA nAM/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ bud med du gang gi nor ba lang lnga/ brjod pa'i rkyen dI pa/ tri lo kI/ A baM to bA/ Apa mtha' la yang na'o/ phyogs
[\[122a.6\]]gnyis pa'i tshig sdud kyaM skabs tshig phyi ma'i mtha' de A ba mtha' can yin na yang na dI pa 'gyur  'jig rten rnams kyi gsum rnams kyi/ zhing yang na ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/ tra yAnAM kha T+wAnAM/ zhes pa la/ tri kha T+wI/ 'jig rten gsum/ tri ba T+waMM 'grel par lung drangs pa/ a no rlo pa sh+tsa
[\[122a.7\]]stI yAbA/ an gyi dbyi zhing bud med du yang na'o/ phyogs gnyis pa'i an gyi mtha' dbyi zhing bud med kyi rtags su yang na 'gyur te/ lnga rnams kyi las rnams kyi/ pany+tsA nAM karmA  khri rnams kyi gsum rnams kyi/ khri gsum ma/ NAM/ zhes pa la rnam dbye khri gsum/ phyis/ pany+tsa ka rma na/ go yis de phan dbyi
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]ba ma yin no zhes pa'i mdos atsa an phyis/ dI pa yang na ba byas pas/ pany+tsa karmI/ pany+tsa karmaM/ yang lung drangs pa/ bat+DA do+o na dIng / pA tra sogs la dI pa mi 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mtha' pA tra sogs la bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dI pa 'gyur ba ma yin te/ pany+tsa nAM pA tA NAM/ zhes
[\[122b.2\]]pa la/ rnam dbye phyis dI pa mi 'gyur/ pany+tsa pAtraM/ de bzhin du/ las lnga ma/ las lnga/ tsa tur+Yu gaM/ tri b+hu ba naM/ tad+pu ru Sha s+yAM gu leHsaM khyA bye yA deH/ aM gu li las de'i skyes bu'i grangs mi zad pa sogs kyi'o/ de'i skyes bu'i bsdu  snod rnams kyi lnga rnams kyi/ ba'i
[\[122b.3\]]skabs drangs dang mi zad pa snga ma'i aM gu snod lnga/ li zhes pa'i rtags la rkyen a tsa  gzugs bzhi/ sa gsum/ 'gyur te+e/ dwo+o aM gu lI pra mA Na ma s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis/ rkyen a tsa byin/ d+w+yaM gu laM/ de bzhin
[\[122b.4\]]du/ niraM gu laM/ agas+sarbe+eka de shasaM byA ta pu N+yAts+tsa rAtA+eH/ a han sarba saMs khyAta pu N+ya rnams las rA tri las kyang ngo / a han sogs de rnams lnga ma'i rA tri'i sgral rkyen  srog chags kyi mdzub mo gnyis/ atsa 'gyur zhing yang gi sgras mi zad pa dang grangs sngon ma la'ang 'gyur te/ mdzub mo gnyis/
[\[122b.5\]]mdzub mo med pa/ a hash+tsa rA tri sh+tsa/ zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/ atsa'i rkyen/ a ho rA traM/ rAtrAh+nA hAHpuM si/ rA tri aha na aha rnams skyes pa'o/ rA tri la sogs pa de rnams yang na skyes pa'i rtags su 'gyur te/ sarba sh+tsa so+orAtrish+tsa/ zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/ yang na a
[\[122b.6\]]han sogs kyi  nyin mo dang mtshan mo/ mdos a ca'i rkyen byin ma ning gi rtags su nyin mtshan/ 'gyur/ yang mdo 'dis skyes pa'i rtags su 'gyur te/ sarba rA traM/ sarba rAtriH/ /de bzhin du/ pUrbadAtriH/ zhes pa la/ mtshan mo yang 'di thams cad kyang ngo / bUrba rA traM/ pUrbarA triH/ de bzhin
[\[122b.7\]]du/ a ma saMkhyA tarA traM/ a ma saMkhyA ta rA traM/ driH/ mtshan mo bshad/ am  pu N+ya rA traM/ triH/ mtshan mo'i bsod nams/ sh+tsa dwi rA traM/ triH/ mtshan lo gnyis/ a ti rA traM/ tIH/ shin tu mtshan mo/ rA dzA haH mtshon mo thams cad  sa khi b+h+yaSh+Tatsa/ nA  mtshan mo'i s+jon la/ dzan  a han  sa khi rnams las Ta tsa'o/ mtshan mo'i sngon ma/ de'i skyes
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bu'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir rAdzan sogs rtags gsum po de'i mtha' lags tsa'i rkyen 'jug ste/ ma hAMsh+tsA so+o rA dzA tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ ma ha ta rA dzan du log/ 'dis Tatsa/ tsA Tu sogs kyis tsa phyis/ an gyi dbyi zhing zhes pas an
[\[123a.2\]]phyis/ mahA rA dzaH/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du/ a ti sha yen rAdza/ zhes pa la/ a ti rA dzA//zhes pa la/ a ti rA dza/ a chen po yang bor rgyal po yang ngo / ti rA dzI/ de bzhin du/ rA ma s+ya sa khA/ zhes pa la/ rA ma sa khaH/ ma hAM sh+tsA so+os khA Ta/ Ti ta D+ha sogs kyi son yin bas phyis/ tsa/ zhes pa la/ mahA sa khaH/
[\[123a.3\]]mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa sogs kyis ma ha ta ma hA ru 'gyur/ phul du byung ba'i rgyal bo/ ah+na Sha kho re ba/ a rgyal bo phul byung / han gyiT kha de dag las phul du byung ba'i rgyal po/ nges pa'o/ dga' byed kyi grogs go a  dga' byed grogs bo/ han gyi mtha'  chen po yang 'di grogs po yang ngo / las Ta dang kha'i  grogs po chen po/
[\[123a.4\]]rkyen 'gyur zhing rkyen de dag pha ro la la a han gyi Ti nges par dbye ste/ u t+da ma sh+tsA so+o atash+tsa/ zhes ba la/ rnam dbye phyis/ Ta'i rkyen byin/ Ti phyis/ ut+ha mAhaH/ de bzhin du/ dwe a ha nI/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus rkyen kha byin kha I nar 'gyur Ti phyis/ ng+h+yahI naH/ yang
[\[123a.5\]]'grel par/ rAdzan gyi mtha' yin kyang / ma drA NAM rA dzI/ zhes mchog kyang 'di nyi ma'ang ngo / palta bu la rnam dbye dbyi ba ma gtogs Ta tsa'i rkyen mi nyi ma mchog/ 'jug go zhes bshad  nyi ma dag gnyis dag/ pas/ ma dra rA dz+nyA/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ anyi ma gnyis/ han gyi
[\[123a.6\]]mtha' la mchod sbyin brjod pa'i pung po'i don  bzang pa rnams kyi rgyal yo/ la rkyen kha 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ a hInaHkratuH/ ah+Sho nya h+na e te b+h+yaH/ a han gyi ah+na 'di rnams las so/ 'di rnams zhes pa rgyal mo dge ba/ sarba la sogs pa sdo nan yod pa'i a han gyi mtha'
[\[123a.7\]]las rkyen Ta tsha 'gyur zhing a han gyi ah+na zhes par yang 'gyur te/ sarba sh+tsA so+o a ha sh+tsa/ thams cad kyang 'di nyi ma'ang / zhes mchod sbyin byed pa'i phung bo/ pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ Ta tsa'i rkyen mdo 'dis ah+na ru 'gyur/ sarbAh+na/ zhim thams cad/ zhes pal/ ah+no nyadan+tA ta/ a
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]han gyi a ta mtha' las so/ a han zhes pa a ta mthar 'gyur ba las de'i tshig sngam de la na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi yi ge re pha yod na ah+na'i na yang Nar 'gyur te/ sarbAh+DaH/ de bzhin du/ pUrba a haH/ zhes pa la/ pUrbAh+NaH/ pa ri ahaH/ zhes pa la/ parAd+Na/ na
[\[123b.2\]]saM khyA deHsamAha re/ grangs la sogs pa'i kun sdud pa la ma yin no/ grangs dang po la sogs pa'i kun sdud pa la a han gyi mtha' ah+na zhes par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ dwe a hi nA/ zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/ Ta tsa'i nyi ma snga dro/ rkyen  nyi ma phyi dro/ byin mtha' ah+na  nyi ma phyi dro/
[\[123b.3\]]ru mi 'gyur bas/ d+w+ya haH/ de bzhin du/ t+r+yahaH/ ut+ta me+e kA b+h+yAM tsa/ ut+ta ma e ka dag las kyang ngo / ut+ta ma dang e ka dag las pha rol gyi a han gyi mtha' yang  nyi ma dag gnyis dag/ ah+na zhes par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ut+ta ma dang pu N+ya don gcig pas/ puN+yash+tsA
[\[123b.4\]]so+oa gash+tsa/ zhes nyi ma gnyis/ pa la rnam  nyi ma gsum/ dbye bsdus Ta tsa'i rkyen byin/ puN+yA ha su/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ pu N+ya su ti nA b+h+yAM na pus kaM/ puN+ya su di na dag las ma ning ngo / puN+ya dang su din dag las pha rol gyi a han zhes pa ni ma ning / bsod nams kyang 'di nyi ma yang ngo /
[\[123b.5\]]gi rtags su 'gyur te/ bu N+yA haM/ de bzhin du/ ekash+tsA so+o a hash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ /e kAhaH/ a grA khyA yA mu rasaH/ u ras las tsub las so/ u ras las de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las tsub kyi don la rkyen a tsa 'gyur te/ a shwa s+ya u rasaHa gre a khyA/ zhes pa la rnam dbye phyis/ a
[\[123b.6\]]gra A khyA gyi don a tsa  bsod nams nye ma/ sbyar te/ a gcig kyang bde nyi ma yang ngo / shwar saM/ a no nya sh+mA  nyi ma gcig/ yas sar sAM dzA ti saMdzA ti saMdz+nya yoH/ a nas  ash+ma  a yas  sa ras rnams kyi rigs ming dag las so/ a  rta yi brang gi rtse'i tsu pa/ nas la sogs pa 'di rnams la de'i skyes
[\[123b.7\]]bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las rigs dang ming gi don la rkyen atsa 'gyur te/ rta yi brang tsug su/ su pa a na saM/ g.yos khar la nye ba/ zhes pa la/ gnyis pa'i rjes phyis a tsa byin/ su am u pAn saM/ g.yos khang nyeg/ de bzhin du/ a mr-i taM a sh+maH/ zhes pa la/ Ta ci su ma mr-i
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]dAsh+maH/ de bzhin du/ kAlaM a ya saM/ zhes pa la/ kAlA yasaM/ de bzhin du/ mAN+yU kA nAM sa ra sAM/ zhes pa la/ mAN+DUka sa rasaM/ grA ma ko+oTA b+h+yAM tsa ta k+Th+TaH/ grA ma ko+oT dag las kyang ta k+Shi las so/ grA ma dang ko+o Ta dgo snga ma'i ta k+Shi las kyang de'i skyes bu'i
[\[124a.2\]]bsdu ba'i mtha'  'chi med ngal bu'am bdud rtsi ril bu/ la Ta tsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/ grA me  lcags nag a tsa u am/ tak+Shi/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phyis Ta'i rkyen  mtsho yi sbal pa/ byin/ grA ma tak+ShaH/ de bzhin du/ ko+oT sh+tsA so+o tak+Shi tsa/ zhes pa la/ ko+oT ta k+ShaH/ ataHshunaH/ a ti las shwan
[\[124a.3\]]las so/ a ti snga ma'i shwan las kyang de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las/ Ta tsa'i rkyen 'jug ste/ a hi sha yen shwA/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas pa phyis/ grong la shing mtho ba/ Ta tsha sbyin/ a ti shwaH/ shing bzo bag yo sgyu can/ shing bzo ba g.yo sgyu can/ a ti shwI/ u pa mAnA dprANi Shu/
[\[124a.4\]]nye bar 'jal ba las srog chags ma yin pa rnams la'o/ shwan gyi sgra la nye bar 'jal ba la yang srog chags ma yin pa las de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' laT tsa 'gyur te/ A kar+Sha shwA i ba/ zhes pa la/ ri phag/ Akar+Sha shwaH/ srog chags yin  TiD+di sogs kyis dI pa/ ri phag mo/ na/ Ta tsa mi
[\[124a.5\]]'gyur te/ bA na raHshwA i ba/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ Tatsa mi 'gyur /bA na rang shwA/ ut+ta ra mraMg pUrbAts+tsa sak+thanaH/ ut+ta ri mraM ga pUrba rnams lasak+thi  khyi 'dra ba'i lcags kyu/ las kyang ngo / khyi 'dra ba'i lcags kyu/ ut+ta ra dang mraMg dang pUrba rnams snga ma'i sak+thi las Ta tsa 'gyur zhing
[\[124a.6\]]kyang gi sgras nye  khyi 'dra ba spre'u/ bar 'jal ba la'ang 'gyur te/ ut+ta ra s+yas k+thi i ba/ khyi 'dra ba spre'u/ zhes pa la/ ut+tar sak+thaM/ de bzhin du/ bUrba s+ya sak+thi i ba/ zhes pa la/ pUrba sak+thaM/ mr-ig s+ya shraMng+ga i ba sak+Thi/ zhes pa la/ mraM ga sak+thaM/ phal ka s+ya i ba sak+thi/ zhes pa la/ pa
[\[124a.7\]]la ka sak+tha/ bod lcags 'dra ba'i mdung / nA bo dwi goHno+o las phyogs  byang bim tung 'dra ba/ gnyis pa las so/ no+o  Tatsas yam/ byang gi mdung 'dra ba/ zhes pa'i sgra las  shar gyi mdung ba dra ba/ Ta tsa su am/ ri dgas kyi rA 'dra ba'i mdung / ri dgas phyi rwa 'dra ba'i mdung / thong lcags 'dra ba'i mdung / phyogs gnyis pa'i
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]bsdu ba'i mtha' laT tsa 'jug ste/ dwe nA po+o/ zhes pa la/ di nA baM/ de bzhin du/ tI nA baM/ pany+tsa nAbaM/ aT+hAts+tsa/ ar+d+ha las kyang ngo / ar+ng+ha las pha rol gyi no+o las kyang Ta tsa'i rkyen 'jug ste/ ad+haMnA baH/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus/ Tatsa byin/ ar+d+hanA baM/ khAr+YAHbrAtsI/ khArI las shar
[\[124b.2\]]pa rnams kyi'o/ /rtsa r+ng+ha dang  gru dag gnyis dag/ Ta tsa su am/ gru gnyis/ Tatsa u a ma/ /gru gsum/ bru lnga/ grangs snga ma'i khA rI las Tatsa 'jug par shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rnams yang na 'dod de/ dwe khAr+Yo/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phyis Ta tsa yang na bar byas bas/ glu byed/ dwe khA re/ dwe khA rI/ de
[\[124b.3\]]bzhin du/ ar+ng+haMkhA rI/ zhes pa la/ ar+ng+hakhA rAM/ dI tri b+d+hA many+jalaH/ dwi tri dag las any+dza li las so/ /dwi tri snga ma'i any+dza li laT tsa yang na 'gyur te/ dwe an+dza lwaM/ khal dag gnyis dag/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phyis/ Tatsa yang na bar byas bas/ khal gnyis  d+w+yany+dza laM/ d+w+yany+dza
[\[124b.4\]]li/ de bzhin du/ ti sraHany+dza la yaH/ khal byed/ zhes pa  khal byed/ la/ t+r+yany+ja laM/ t+r+yany+ja li/ brah+ma No dzAn pa dA khyA yAM/ brah+man las yul brjod pa la'o/ yul snyim po dag do dag/ dang 'brel pa'i bra h+man la Tatsa 'gyur te/ swa rwAThA brah+ma/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbya phyis/ snyim po do/
[\[124b.5\]]Tatsa byin pas/ snyim po rnams gsum rnams/ b-I mdzas/ bud me la tr-i tsa cung dag gi ti sr-itsa ta sr-i 'os bsgrubs pa'o// swarASh+ta brah+ma/ ku ma ha b+b+h+yA man+ya ta ra s+yAM/ ku ma ha ta ngag las lang na'o/ /ku dang ma ha ta snga ma'i brah+man laT tsa yang na 'gyur te/ ku brat+maH/ ku brat+maH/ de bzhin du/ ma hA brah+maH/ mahA
[\[124b.6\]]brah+mA/ ta tro pa pa daM sap+ta mI s+thaM/ de la bdun pa gnas pa la nye ba'i tshig go/ /bsdu ba'i bzhi  rang lu las tshar la pa/ tshig gnyis bsgrigs pa'i snga ma rnam dbye bdun pa gnas bde la nye ba'i tshig ces ming 'dogs byed do/ /u pa pa  tshangs ba chung ngu / da ma hing / nye ba'i tshig la  tshangs pa chen po
[\[124b.7\]]ting ma yin pa la'o/ /gong du nye ba'i tshig ces ming 'dogs byas bde las pha rol tu ting mtha' can ma yin pa'i tshig gang byung yang don gcig pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba nges bar 'jug ste/ gum+b+haM kAraH/ zhes pa la rnam dbye bsdus/ kum+b+ha kAraH/ bum ba byed ba ste dza mkhan/ tu mun NU lo+o kr-i yA yA
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]mi tis b+ta myA nirde shA ti dan+ta s+yo pa pa da twaM/ tu mun NU la dag dang bya ba sbyor ba bdun pa'i yul ting mtha' ma yin pa'i nye ba'i tshig gi'o/ /tu mun dang NUl dag gi rkyen mtha' can dang kr-ita sogs kyi bya ba'i rkyen dang sbyor ba'i ting mtha' ma yin ba'i nye ba'i tshig rnam dbye bdun pa'i yul
[\[125a.2\]]can kyang don gcig de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba 'jug ste/ swa du kA ra b+huk+te/ zhes pa la/ a me+e bAbya yen/ mi zad pa'i nges par a ma'o/ gong du smos pa'i bsdu ba de dang 'brel ba'i mi zad pa sngon na yod na am A ga ma 'gyur te/ 'dis a ma/ a ma la sngon ma'i gzugs/ ma nga ro/ /
[\[125a.3\]]swaduM kArab+hu k+te/ tu mun la/ kA le b+hak+tuM/ zhes pa la/ kAl b+huk+tuM/ tr-itI yA pr-i b+h+r-itI n+ya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ gsum pa sogs rnams yang na'o/ /u pa daM sha pha rol na yod pa'i mU la ka gsum pa sogs kyi mtha' don gcig par yang na 'gyur te/ mU la ken u pa daM shaHb+huk+te/ zhes pa
[\[125a.4\]]ro dang ldan za bar byed/ rang gnas sam yang na rnam dbye bsdus/ dus zos nas/ pas/ mUl ko pa daM shaM b+huk+te/ k+tA tsa/ k+t+wA yang ngo / /k+t+wA'i rkyen mtha' can dang sbyor ba la yang gsum pa'i mtha' don gcig par 'gyur te/ uts+tse+eHkr-i twU/ u pa dz+nyo pa rtsa ba can nye bar so yis bzang / kra ma ta dA ng+yA bi khyA
[\[125a.5\]]sayAM/ u ba dz+nyA u pa kra ma de sogs 'dod pa la'o/ /u padz+nyA/ u pa kram sogs dang sbyor ba yang 'dod pa'i don can yin don gcig pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu bar 'gyur zhing de dag ma ning gi rtags su'ang 'gyur te/ Ta phyis ba'o/ mtho bar byas nas/ pANi neH/ ngas umadz+nyA/ zhes ba la/ rnam
[\[125a.6\]]dbye bsdus/ pANi n+yu ba dz+nyaM/ de bzhin du/ nan+da s+yo ba kra maH/ zhes pa la/ nan+do pa kramaH/ tshA yA bA hu l+ye/ tshA yA mang po la'o/ de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir mang po brjod pa dang 'brel ba'i tshA yA zhes pa'i sgra yang ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/ shal b+hAnAM tshA yA/ zhes pa la/
[\[125a.7\]]sha la b+hatshA  pANi ni nye bar shes/ yaM/ phye ma'i ba rnams kyi grib ma/ dga' ba'i nye ba'i rim pa/ dga' ba'i nye ba'i rim ga sab+hArA dzA ma nu Sh+ya pUrbA rA dzan dang mi ma yin pa snga ma'i sa b+hA la'o/ /rA dzan dang mi ma yin pa'i sgra snga ma'i sab+hA zhes pa ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/ in s+ya sa  phye ma le ba rnams kyi grib ma/ b+hA/ zhes pa la/ tshoT
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]ba 'di'i/ in sab+haM/ de bzhin du/ I shwa ra s+ya sa b+tA/ zhes pa la/ I shwar sa b+haM/ rAdz+nyaHsa b+hA/ zhes pa la/ rA dza sa b+haM/ de bzhin du/ mi shAtsa s+ya sa b+hA/ zhes pa la/ pi shAtsas b+haM/ a shA lA tsa/ 'gron khang ma yin pa la'ang ngo / /gong du mi ma yin ba zhes byung yang mdo 'dis 'gron
[\[125b.2\]]khang du 'tshogs pa lta bu ma yin pa'i 'tshogs dbang phyug gi tshogs/ pa'i don lam dbang phyug gi tshogs pa /rgyal pa'i tshogs pa/ rgyal bo'i tshogs/ ning gi rtags su 'gyur te/ snrA NAMs  sha ba'i tshogs gab+hA/ zhes pa  sha za'i tshogs la/ sdI sab+haM/ pib+hAShA senAsu rA tshA yA shA lU ni shA nAM /senA  gurAtshA yA  shA lA  ni shA rnams
[\[125b.3\]]kyi 'dam ka'o/ /se nA la sogs pa de rnams bsdu ba'i mtha' ma ning gi rtags su yang na 'gyur te/ dwidzA nAM sa nA/zhes pa la/ dwi dza se na/ dwi dza se nA/ de bzhin du/ ya bA nAM su rA/ bud med kyi tshogs/ zhes pa la/ ya ba suraM/ rA/ brak+Sha s+ya tshA yA/ zhes pa la/ pr-i k+Sha tshA yaM/ yA/ ga
[\[125b.4\]]bAM shA lA/ zhes pa la/ go shwa laM/ lA/ su ni shA/ su ni shaM/ senA la sogs pa de rnams gnyis skyes te bram ze'i sde/ de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i nang tshan las 'dzin dang  nas rnams kyi chang / na nya snga ma can lam ning gi rtags su mi 'gyur te/ shing gi grib ma/ dr-i D+ha sh+Na so+o se nA  ba lang gi 'gran khag tsa/
[\[125b.5\]]zhes pa lta bu la rnam dbye phyis ma ning gi rtags su mi  legs pa'i mtshan mo/ 'gyur te/ go bud med sogs kyis thung ngu / dr-i D+ha senaH/ de bzhin du/ na se nA/ zhes pa la/ a se naH/ par ba l+ling+gaMdwan+d+wa tat+pu tu Sha yoH/ rtags pha rol 'dra bar zlas  bstan ba'ang 'di sde yang ba di/ dbye de'i skyes
[\[125b.6\]]bu dag gi'o/ /de'i skyes du'i bsdu ba dang zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'gar rtags gnyis bsgrigs pa'i snga ma pha rol tu  sde ba snyan pa/ song zhing phyi ma sngon mar song la de'i skabs rtags dang rnam dbye phrad pa'i bya ba rnams pha rol tu song ba'i rtags de nyid rtags gsum po gang yin kyang de dang 'dra
[\[125b.7\]]bar bsgrub ste/ kuk+kuT sh+tsa ma yU rI tsa/ khyim bya dang rma bya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye bsdus rtags snga phyi yang na brjes rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i cho ga pha rol tu gang byung ba de'i lugs byas pas/ ma yUrI ku k+kuTo+o/ yang na/ kuk+kuT ma yUr+Yo+o/ de bzhin du/ pi pi ling byed kyi/ ar+ng+ha s+ya pip+pa lI/
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]zhes pa la/ pip+par+ng+ha/ yang na/ ar+ng+ha pap+pa lI/ pUrba bad shwab Da bo+o/ snga ma 'dra bar a shwa ba Da bdag go/ a shwa dang ba Da bdag snga ma dang 'dra bar rnam dbye rnams 'jug ste/ a shwa sh+tsa pa Da bA tsa/ zhes pa la/ a shwa ba Da bo+o/ bAr+ng+hartsaD+ha/ a r+ng+hartsaH/ ar+ng+ha ri tsa'i
[\[126a.2\]]yang na'o/ /ar+ng+ha dang sbyor ba'i ri tsa yang na ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur zhing lang na pho rtags nyid do/ /raMtsaHar+ng+haM/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phyis/ snga phyi bsgyur/ Ta tsa byin/ ar+ng+hartsaM/ ar+ng+ha rtsaH/ d+w+yaSh+ta rta dang rgod ma/ naHsaM khyA yA ma ba hu brI  rta dang rgod ma h+ya shI t+yoH/ dwi aSh+tan dag gi
[\[126a.3\]]grangs la 'bru mang po dang brgyad cu ma yin pa dag la'o/ /dwi dang aSh+Tan dag gi mtha' grangs brjod pa  nges tshig phyed/ can 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba dang brgyad cu ma yin pa la A yig tu 'gyur te/ d+w+yang+hi kAd sha/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis/ dwi dwA zhes par 'gyur/
[\[126a.4\]]dwA da shaH/ lung drangs pa/ paMk+ti bi sha ti tri shats+tsa twA ri shat+pany+tsA shata ShaSh+Thi sab+ta t+yA shI tin ba ti sha me te saM khyA shab+da ni pA taH/ paMk+ti/ bi shaM ti/ triM sha ta/ tsa twA riM shata/ tsatwA riM shata/ bany+tsA shata/ ShaSh+Thi/ sab+ta bcu las lhag po gnyis/ ti/ a shI ti/ na pa ti/ na pa ti/ sha taM /de rnams grangs kyi sbra la tshig
[\[126a.5\]]bcu gnyis/ prad do zhes pa byung bas de rnams grangs kyi sgra de rnams brjod pa la tshig phrad du bya ste ni pA ta'o/ /d+w+ya ng+hi kA biM sha ti/ bcu tham pa/ nyi shu tham pa/ sum cu/ bzhi bcu/ lnga bcu/ drug cu/ bdun cu/ zhes pa la gong bzhin brgyad cu/ dgu bcu/ brgya tham pa/ bsgrubs pas/ dwA biM sha tiH/ de
[\[126a.6\]]de bzhin du/ d+w+yang+hi k-I traMshata/ zhes pa la/ dwAtr-ishata/ aSh+tI ka dang sha/ zhes pa la/ aSh+tA da nyi shu las lhag po gnyis/ sha/ aSh+TA ng+hikA piM sha ti/ zhes pa la/ aSh+wA biM sha ti/ aSh+TA ng+hikA tr-iM shata/ zhes pa la /aSh+tAtr-iM shata/ brgyad cu yin na mi 'gyur te/ d+w+ya ng+hi  nyer gnyis/ kA shI
[\[126a.7\]]ti/ rnam dbye bsdus/ sum cu las lhag po gnyis/ so gnyis/ bcu las lhag po brgyad/ bco brgyad/ dwi a shItI/ gya gnyis/ nyi shu las lhag po brgyad/ nyer brgyad/ sum cu las lhag po brgyad /so brgyad/ de bzhin du/ brgyad cu las lhag po brgyad/ aSh+TA  brgyad cu las lhag po gnyis/
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]ng+hikA shI ti/ zhes pa la/ aSh+DA a shIti/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ prAka sha tA ta pra yo genaH/ brgya las mang ba rab tu sbyor ba la ma yin no/ brgya las mang ba zhes pa nyis brgya brgyad brgya stong phrag gnyis stong phrag brgyad sogs sbyor ba la dwi dang aSh+Tan gyi mtha' A ta du 'gyur ba
[\[126b.2\]]ma yin te/ dwi sha taM/ aSh+Ta  brgyad/ sha taM lta bu'o/ /yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ kapA la dang go pha rol la aSh+Tan gyi'ang ngo / /ka bA la dang go pha rol du byung na aSh+Tan gyi mtha' Ata du 'gyur te/ aSh+DA ka pA laH/ aSh+TA ga paH/ tre s+t+ra yaH/ tri'i tra yas so/ tri zhes pa ni
[\[126b.3\]]grangs brjod   nyis brgya/ brgyad brgya/ pa pha rol la tra yas zhes par 'gyur ro/ /t+r+yang+hi kAd sha/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brel dang bcas pa phyis/ tri tra yas su 'gyur/ tre yod sha/ de bzhin du/ t+ya  ka dA li brgyad/ ba lang brgyad/ ng+hi k-I traM shata/ ces pa la/ traya s+t+raM
[\[126b.4\]]shata/ tri tsa twA riM/ brgya las mang ba sgrong ba yin na mi 'gyur te/ tri sha taM/ bcu las lhag po gsum/ tri sa ha sraM/ bi b+hA ShAtsa twAriM shata prab+h+r-i to+osarbe ShA/ tsatwA riM shata sogs thams  bcu gsum/ cad rnams kyi 'dam ka'o/ /bzhi bcu nas bzung brgya stong sogs sgrong ba ma yin  so gsum/
[\[126b.5\]]bal di dang  so ba'i/ aSh+Tan gnyis kyi mtha' sAta du 'gyur pa  sum brgya/ dang tri tra yas su 'gyur ba  sum stong / sogs 'dam ka can du bya ste/ dwA tsa dwA ri shata/ yang na/ dwi ca twA riM shata/ de bzhin du/ aSh+TA tsa trA riM shata/ yang na/ a tsa twA riM shata/ tra yaHtsa twA riMshata/ yang
[\[126b.6\]]na/ tri tsa twA riM shata/ lta bu snye thams cad la rigs 'gre'o/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ e ka'i mtha' A ta'am yang na uka'o/ /grangs dang  zhe gnyis/ sbyor ba'i e ka zhe gnyis/ zhes pa'i mtha' Ata  zhe brgyad/ du 'gyur ba'am yang  zhe brgyad/ zhe gsum/ na u ka A
[\[126b.7\]]zhe gsum/ gam 'gyur te/ e kA d+hikAd sha/ bcu las lhag po gcig/ zhes pa la/ e kA da sha/ bcu gcig/ e kod sha/ de bzhin du/ e kAn biM shati/ yang na/ nyi shu nga gcig med pa ste bcu dgu'o/ e ko na biM sha ti sogs so/ /yang 'grel par lung drangs pa /Sha'i u sted 'ang Da'o/ /
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]Sha Sha zhes pa da shan dang phrad na Sha yig u ru 'gyur zhing da'ang Da ru 'gyur te/ Sha Da ng+hikA da sha/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phyis/ ShaSha da shan/ mdo 'dis Sha pyi ma u/ a la yon tan nos o/ da Da/ ShoDa sha/ de rnams kyis de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba bshad
[\[127a.2\]]zin nas da ni 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba bshad par byaste/ ! /a ne ka man+ya pa dAr+the/ du ma gzhan gyi tshig gi don la'o/ /su pa mthA du ma gzhan gyi su ba mtha'i tshig gi don la 'jug pa ste tshig gnyis sa ma mang po'ang rung ste dngos su  bcu drug/ brjod pa de ma yin pa la/ tshig de dag gi
[\[127a.3\]]don dang 'brel pa'i don gzhan dngos du ma brjod pa zhig brjod bya'i gtso bor byed pa'i su pa mtha' mang po don gcig tu bsdu ba de ni 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba zer ro/ /sab+ha mI bi she Sha Ne ba hu brI ho/ bdun pa khyad par du 'bru mang po la'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu pa'i skabs 'dir rnam dbye bdun pa
[\[127a.4\]]khyad par du bya ste tshig gnyis sam mang po bsgrigs pa'i cho ga snga ma de bdun pa'i don can yin na snga ma kho nar gnas la tshig sbyor gyi skabs tshig phyi ma bdun pa'i don can yin na de sngon du 'jog pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i khyad chos yin no/ /prAp+taM u dkaM ya s+yaso+o/ zhes pa la rnam dbye rjes 'brel
[\[127a.5\]]dang bcas pa phyis/ prAb+to dko grA ma/ de bzhin du/ U D+ho ra tho ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ U D+ha ra tho nyan D+wAn/ ung+h+ra ta mo de naM ya s+ya saH/ zhes pa la/ u ng+h+r-i to da nA/ pI tam ba raM ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ pItA ba ro ha riH/ gong gi chu bo thab pa 'di/ bIrAHpuru ShakAHyasmin/ zhes pa
[\[127a.6\]]la/ pIr puru Sha ko  chu bo thob pa'i grong / gang gi shing rta 'dren pa de/ grA maH/ nIl mu dz+walaM ba puH/ shing rta 'dren glang khyu ba/ gang zan 'jogs de/ ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ zan 'jogs/ gang gi gos ser po 'di/ gos ser po 'phrog byed/ nI lo dzral bapuH/ ats+tse+eH dpa' bo rnams skyes bu rnams gang la/ mu
[\[127a.7\]]khaM ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ uts+tse+eHmukhaH/ snyo mthau ba/ khar  skyes bu dpa' bo'i grong / gang gi lu lngo skya/ s+ya mu kha mi pa mu kho ya s+yA so+o/ gang gi gdong bong bu'i gdong 'dra 'di/ zhes pa la/ kha ra mu khaH/ bong bu'i bdong / 'grel par lang khus sno skya/ gang gi spo mthob/ drungs pa/ su d+ya mra ma pa Da pa rba
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]s+yot+ta ra bad lo pash+tsa/ bdun pa nye ba snga ma'i tshig phyi ma dbyi ba'ang ngo / /tshig sbyor gyi skabs rnam dbye bdun pa nye ba sngon na yod pa'i tshig phyi ma yang dbyi bar bya ste/ ka resbi taM ng+hanaM ya s+ya so+o/ zhes pa la/ bdun pa'i rjes ka re zhes pa'i nye ba'i tshig phyi ma sbi taM phyis/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang dang bcas
[\[127b.2\]]pa'ang phyis pas/ kar ng+ha naH/ yang 'grel par/ 'dus pa dang byed pa'i tshig rnam dbye drug pa la dbyi ba'ang de zhes bshad pas/ ke shAnAM so g+ha taHtsUDA ya  gang gi la gan gnas pa'i dor 'di/ s+ya/ zhes pa la/ ke sha tsUDaH/ su bar+Na s+ya bi kA ro \u0f85laM kA ro ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ su bar+NA laM
[\[127b.3\]]kAraH/ sti yAHpuM  la gnor/ bang+hA+A Shi ta puM skA da nU paHsamAnA ng+hi kar Ne s+t+ri yA ma pUr NI bri yA di Nu/ bud med kyi skyes pa can bshad pa  gang gi skra rnams 'dus pa'i thor gtsug/ Ung ma yin pa'i bud med la mnyam skra'i thor gtsug/ gang gi gser las byas pa'i rgyan 'di/ pa'i lhag par  gser gyi rgyan/
[\[127b.4\]]byed pa la rdzogs pa dang bri ya sogs ma yin pa'i skyes pa bzhin no/ /bud med kyi rtags sngar skyes pa'i rtags can du bshad pa da lta Ung gi rkyen ma yin pa'i bud med kyi rtags su bsgrub pa'i rkyen mtha' can ni mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa ste gzhi mthun pa'i tshig la rdzogs pa'i rkyen mtha' can
[\[127b.5\]]dang bri ya sogs pha rol na yod pa ma yin pa ni skyes pa'i rtags bzhin a tsa rnams thung ngur 'gyur te/ tsi trA gA baHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye prad dang bcas pa phyis/ mdo 'dis A pa mtha' can tsi trA thung ngur 'gyur/ tsi tra guH/ rUpa ba tI b+hAr+YAya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad
[\[127b.6\]]dI ba dang bcas pa phyis/ rUpa bang+b+yAr+YaH/ sngar skyes pa'i rtags can du bshad pa ma yin na thung ngur mi 'gyur  gang gi bakhra mo/ te/ gang+gA b+hAr+Ya ya s+ya/ zheng ba thung ngur mi 'gyur/ gaM gA b+hAr+yaH/ Ung gi rkyen can la/ brAh+ma ba  ba khra mo/ gang gi chung ma gzugs ldan ma/ ng+hU b+hAr+YAyas+ya/ zhes pa la thung
[\[127b.7\]]ngur mi 'gyur te/ brAh+ma  chung ma gzugs ldan ma/ bang+hUb+hAr+YAH/ chung ma bram ze'i bu mo/ a pUr NI pra mAN+yoH/ ma yin zhing rdzogs gang gi chung ma gaM gA/ pa tshad dag las so/ gong chung mag gla/ du bshad pa ltar rdzogs pa'i  gang gi chung ma bram ze'i bu mo/ rkyen can dang tshad las thung ngur 'gyur ba ma yin
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]zhing rdzogs pa'i rkyen can dang tshad kyi sgra dag la zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las rkyen a ba 'gyur te/ kal+yANI pany+ca mI yA sAMrA trINAM/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ kal+yANI pa ny+ca mI/ zhes pa gnas pa la rkyen a ba byin/ ka l+yANI pany+ca ma rA tra yaH/ tshad la/

[\[128a.4\]]de bzhin du/ r-ita mtha' las/ bahabaHkartAro yas+ya/ zhes pa la/ ba  gang gi dge ba ma lnga pa 'di/ hukar+t+r-i kaH/ pri yA sogs la/ kal+yANI pri yA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la thung ngur mi 'gyur/ kal+yA NI pri yaH/ tshig sbyor bsdu tshul sogs de dang 'dra bar byas pas/ dga' ma lnga pa/ b+hAr+YA
[\[128a.5\]]ma no dzA/ b+hAr+YAka l+yA NI/ b+hAr+YA su  gang gi byed pa so mang po rnams/ b+ha gA/ b+nyar+YA dur+b+ha gA/ b+hur+YA sa  byed pa po mang po pa/ mA/ b+hAr+YA tsa pa lA/ gang gi dge ba ma dga' la/ b+hAr+YAswA/ kaltA NI sa ce  dge ba ma'i dga' ma/ lbA/ b+hAr+YAkAn+tA/ b+hAr+YAb+hak+ShI/ kal+yA NI du hi tA/ chung ma yid 'ong ma/
[\[128a.6\]]ta si lA  chung ma dgo pa la/ chung ma skal bzang ma/ di Sh+wA kr-i twa sutsaH/ chung ma skal ngan ma/ chung ma mnyam pa mo/ ta sil sogs chung ma rtsa ba thob ma/ nas kr-i twa su tsa'i bar chung mnor can ma/ btsun mo dge ba mo/ rnams so/ /de phan  chung ma mdzes ma/ chung ma mtshar mo/ bu mo dge ba so/ gyi rkyen ta sil

[\[128b.1\]]pa pat+tataH/ de bzhin du/ kr-itwa su tsa'i rkyen can la/ rU pa pa tIng ny+tsakrautwaH/ zhes pa la/ rU pa bat+pany+tsa kr-i twaH/ de bzhin du/ tsa raTa'i rkyen la'ang skyes pa bzhin du 'gyur te/ A D+b+yA na raH/ zhes pa la/ a D+b+ya tsa ra:/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ dzAtI yaka lpa de sh+ya de shI ya rU pya pA

[\[129a.1\]]dar+sha nI yAM mAn nA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ dar+shanI ya mAni nI/ na ko pang+hAyAH/ ka u pa ng+hA'i ma yin no/ de phan gyi ka u ba ng+hAn yod pa la skyes pa bzhin 'gyur ba ma yin te/ pAtsi kA b+hAr+YAya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ pAtsi kAb+hAr+YaH/ de bzhin du/ res kAb+ngAr+YA ya s+ya/ zhes

[\[129b.1\]]ke sha mAni nI/ dzA te sh+tsa/ rigs kyi'ang ngo / rigs brjod pa can bud med kyi rtags dISha mtha' can yang skyes pa bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ dISha brAd+ma NI b+hAr+YA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ thung ngur mi 'gyur/ de Sha  brAh+ma NI b+hAr+YaH/ saM khya yA bya yAs n+nA ngUrA ng+hi ka saM khyAHsaM khye ye/ grangs kyi mi zad pa A /

[\[129b.3\]]saM khye yeDa tsa ba hug NAta/ 'gru mang po la grangs laDa tsa sta ba hug Na ma yin pa las so/ 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las grangs kyi sgra la ba hu dang gaN ma yin pa la Da tsa'i rkyen 'dug ste/ u pa ga taHda sha yeShAM te/ zhes pa la/ bshad ma thag pa'i mdo snga mas rnam dbye phrad dang
