[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]s+ya/ zhes pa la/ u pa ga NAH/ 'grol par lung drangs pa/ saM khyA yasA sta t+pu ru Shas+ya Datsa/ grangs la de'i skyes bu'i Da tsa'o/ /'bru mang por ma zad grangs la de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las kyang Da tsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/ ni r+t+riM shataHaM gu li b+h+yaH/ zhes pa la/ rnam
[\[130a.2\]]dbye phrad pa dang bcas pa phyis/ ni r+t+riM shata/ tshogs pa nye ba/ la/ Datsa/ Di phyis/ nir+t+riM shaH/ ding+nA mA n+yaM ta rA le/ phyogs mtshams kyi ming la'o/ shar lho zhes pa lta bu phyogs mtshoms kyi ming rjod par byed pa na yang 'bru mang po'i bsdu bar  ngan pa mdzub mo sum cu/ 'gyur te/ dak+Shi Na
[\[130a.3\]]pUcA yAHaM ta rA laM/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad dang bcas pa phyis/ dak+ShiN pU rbaH/ ngan pa sum cu/ ta tra te ned mi ti sa rU pe/ de la des 'di zhes rang bzhin mthun pa na'o/ /ga yul du de la bzung ba dang / des phrogs pa 'di zhes brjod pa'i su pa mtha' rnams rang bzhin mthun pa na don
[\[130a.4\]]lho shar kyi mtshams/ gcig par 'bru mang po'i bsdu bar 'gyur ro/ /an+ye ShA  shar lho/ ma pi dr-i sh+ya te/ gzhan yang mthong ngo / /bshad ma thag pa'i don de rnams tshang ba don gcig par 'gyur bar ma zad gzhan yang bsdu ba byas pa'i rtags snga ma'i mtha' de a tsa gang yin kyang pha rol
[\[130a.5\]]a tsa thog ma can ma yin la A ring mtha' can du 'ang 'gyur ro/ /itsa karma bya ti hA re/ g.yul gyi las la itsa'o/ /g.yul gyi don 'dru mang po'i bsdu ba byas pa'i mtha' la i tsa'i rkyen 'jug ste/ ke she Shu ker she Shu gr-i hI twA i daM yu ng+dz+haM pra br-it+taM/ zhes pa la/ de la des 'di
[\[130a.6\]]sogs kyi mdo sa rnam dbye phrad dang bcas pa phyis/ ke sha ke sha/ zhes pa la/ gzhan yang mthong ngo zhes pa'i mdos rtags snga ma'i a thung Ata/ mdo 'dis i tsa/ ke shA ke shi/ de bzhin du/ daN+De+e sh+tsa  sgra rnams la sgra rnams la bzung nas 'di rab tu 'khrug pa'i tshul/ dan+De+e sh+tsa i daM yung+dz+haM pra
[\[130a.7\]]br-it+nyaM/ zhes pa la/ daN+DA daN+Di/ dbyug 'thang / muSh+ti b+hiHmu Sh+Ta b+hiHmuSh+Ti b+hiH i daM yu ng+ng+haM pra braMt+taM/ khu tshur rnams kyis khu tshur rnams kyis 'dir gtu 'khrug pa'i tshul ni/ zhes pa la/ 'dzog 'thab/ muSh+DA  skra 'thab/ dbyug pa dang dbyug pa bzung nas 'di rab tu 'khrug pa'i spyod pa ni/ muSh+Ta/ orgu caH/ u'i yon tan no/ /rtags gang
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]zhig u yig mtha' can yin pa de'i pha rol tu de phan gyi rkyen byur na u yig de nyid yon tan du 'gyur te/ bU hU b+hiHbAhU b+hiH idaM yung+ng+haMpra br-it+taM/ zhes pa la/ gong ma rnams dang 'dra bar rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/ rtags gong ma Ata itsa/ mdo 'dis yon tan/ bA hA bA ha bi/ a si
[\[130b.2\]]b+hiHa si b+haMH/ idaM yung+ng+haMpra braMd+taM/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ 'di'i rtags snga ma'i mtha' pha rol  lag pa rnams kyis lag pa rnams kyis 'di rab tu 'khrug pa'i tshul/ a tsa yin pas Ar mi 'gyur/ i tsa/ a s+ya si/ rang bzhin mthun pa ma yin na bsdu ba mi 'jug ste/ lag 'thab/
[\[130b.3\]]phri rnams kyis gri rnams kyis 'dir rab tu 'khrug pa'i tshul/ dper na/ ha le na mu sha len edaM yung+ng+haM pra br-it+taM/ zhes pa lta bu la bsdu ba mi 'jug go/ te na sa he ti tul+ya yo ge/ de yis sa ha zhes pa'i mnyam pa'i sbyor gri 'thab/ bal 'o/ /de yis zhes pa gsum pa'i mtha' sa ha mnyam pa'i
[\[130b.4\]]sbyor ba la don gcig pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu bar 'gyur ro/ /thong pa yis gtun shing gis 'di rab tu 'khrug pa'i tshul/ po pas rdzan s+ya/ yang na nye bsgyur ro/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir sa ha zhes pa yang nas zhes par 'gyur zhing sa ru 'gyur ba de la nyer bsgyur zhes ming 'dogs byed de
[\[130b.5\]]dgos pa ni sa de rtags gang yin pa de'i sngon du 'jog pa'i ched yin te/ pu tre Na sa haH/ zhes pa la/ de yis sa ha zhes pa'i mdo snga mas rnam dbye bsdus mdo 'dis yang na bar byas pas/ sa pu traH/ pu tra sa haH/ de bzhin du/ karma kiN sa haH/ zhes pa la/ karma ka sahaH/
[\[130b.6\]]sa karma kaH/ lo ma ken sa haH/ zhes pa la/ sa lom kaH/ lo ma  thu dang bcas pa/ ka sa haH/ ba hubrI ho+o sak+b+ya k+Sh+NoHswAM gAtaShatsa/ babru mang po las k+thi ak+Shi ak+Shi dag las gzugs mdzes pa las Shatsa'o/ bu bcas/ 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la  las dang bcas/ sak+thi dang  las bcas/
[\[130b.7\]]las bcas/ baspu dang bcas pa/ ak+Shi gzugs mdzes pa'i don  bslu can/ brjod pa las Shatsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/ dIr+g+has k+thi ya s+ya/ gang gi mdung ring ba/ zhes pa la/ phrad sogs bsdus Shatsa byin tsu Tu sogs kyis tsa phyis/ Sha yang 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ dIr+g+ha sak+thaH/ mdung ring / de
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]bzhin du/ puN+Da rI ka ba dak+Shi NI ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ puN+Da rI kAk+ShaH/ dzal ba dak+ShiNI ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ dza lAk+ShaH/ gzugs mdzes pa'i don ma yin na Shatsa mi 'gyur te/ snyul a k+Shi NI ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs bsdus/ Shatsa
[\[131a.2\]]mi 'gyur/ s+th+bu lA k+Shi/ aM gu gang gi pad+ma dkar po 'dra ba'i mig 'di/ lejAru Ni/ ang+gu pad dkar sig/ gang gi chu 'dra ba'i mig/ la la shing la'o/ chu mig  'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las aM gu la'i sgra la shing gi  gang gi mig sbom po/ don brjod pa laShatsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/ pany+cAng+gu la yoH/
[\[131a.3\]]ya s+ya/ zhes mig sbom bo/ pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsum/ Shatsa  pany+tsAng+gu laM dA ru/ dwi tri b+h+yAM mU r+ng+h+NaH/ dwi tri dag las mUr+ng+han las so/ 'bru mang bo'i bsdu ba'i mtha' dwi dang tri dag las pha ro gyi mUr+ng+han la Shatsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/ dwi mUr+ng+hA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ gang gi yan lag lnga/
[\[131a.4\]]rnam dbye sogs phyis/ Shatsa byin Ti phyis/ dwi mUr+ng+haH/ de bzhin du/ tri mU r+ng+hAya s+ya/ shing gi yan lag lnga/ zhes pa la/ tri mU r+d+haH/ an+ta rba hi r+b+h+yA tsa la m+naH/ an+tar/ bahir dag las kyang lo man las so/ an+tar ba tir dag las  gang gi mgo bo gnyis/ pha rol gyi lo man las 'bru
[\[131a.5\]]mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las a pa rkyen du  mgo bo gnyis/ gang gi mgo po gsum/ 'gyur te/ an+tarlo mAnaHya s+ya so+o/ zhes  mgo bo gsum/ pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs bsdus a pa byin/ pa 'gro ba'i ming can Ti phyis/ an+ta rlo maH/ de bzhin du/ ba hi rlo mA naHa tsa s+ya so+o/
[\[131a.6\]]zhes pa la/ ba hi rlo maH/ a tsa nA sikA yAHsaM dz+nyA yAMn saMbA s+thU lA te/ s+thU la ma yin pa las/ gang gi nang gi ba spu 'di/ nA si kA'i ming la atsa ste nas kyang ngo / /s+thU la zhes pa'i sgra sngon na yod pa ma yin pa'i nA si kA las ming brjod nang s+thU/ pa la 'bru mang  gang gi phyi'i na ba spu 'di/ po'i
[\[131a.7\]]bsdu ba'i mtha'  phyi spu/ la a tsa rkyen du 'gyur zhing de'i tshe/ nA si kA nyid kyang nas zhes par 'gyur ro/ /bU rba padAt+YaM dz+nyA+o yA ma gaH/ snga ma'i tshig las ming la ga ma lin pa las so/ /'bra mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir/ snga ma'i tshig de la na Na ra 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yi ge
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]yod na tshig gcig ma yin kyang ga yig ma gtogs pa'i yi ge gzhan bar na yod kyang na Nar 'gyur te/ du ri ba nA si kA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ mdo sngon mas a tsa dang / nA si kA nas su 'gyur/ mdo 'dis na Nar/ dur+Na saH/ de bzhin du/ kha re banA si kA
[\[131b.2\]]ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ khar Na saH/ bar NAH/ s+thUl sngon na yod na nas su mi 'gyur te/ s+thU laM nA si kA gang gi sna bu gang na pa 'dra ba/ ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ nas su mi 'gyur/ atsa byin/ s+thUl nA si kaH/ 'grel par lung snang  na nam sna mi mdzes pa/ gang gi sna bong bu 'dra ba/ drangs
[\[131b.3\]]pa! khur kharA b+h+yAM bA/ khur bong sna/ khar dag las yang na'o/ /khur dang khar dag snga ma la/ nA si  gang gi sna sdom po/ kA nas su 'gyur zhing / a tsa yang na 'gyur te/ khu re banA si kA la s+ya/ zhes sna sbom po/ pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ nA si kA/ nas su 'gyur/ a tsa yang
[\[131b.4\]]na bar byas pas/ khur NAH/ khur NasaH/ u pa sargAts+tsa/ nyer bsgyur las kyang ngo / /nyer bsgyur snga ma'i nA si kA yang nas su 'gyur zhing atsa yang na 'gyur ro/ /u  gar gi sna rmig pa 'dra ba/ bsargAta ba hu laM/ nyer bsgyur las mang po'o/ /'bru mang yo'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir/
[\[131b.5\]]nye bsgyur lan Nar 'gyur  mig pa 'dra ba'i sna/ ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yi ge yod na/ na de skabs la lar Nar 'gyur pa dang la lar mi 'gyur ba sogs mang po 'byur ngo / pra kar+She NanA sikA yas+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ mdo sngams nA si kA nas/ atsa/ mdo 'dis na
[\[131b.6\]]Na! pra Na saH/ de bzhin du/ u ts+tse+eHnA si kA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ uta na saH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ beHgraH/ bi las gra'o/ /nyer bsgyur bi sngon gang gi snar ba tu mdzes pa/ du byung na nA si kA zhes pa ni gra zhes par 'gyur te/ bi ga tAnA si kA ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/
[\[131b.7\]]sna med/ bi  sna rab/ graH/ nanya duHsu b+h+yo ha gang sna mthon pa/ li sa sbyor mya ta ra s+yAM/ sna mthon po/ na nya dur su rnams las ha li sak+thi las yang na'o/ /nanya dang dur dang su rnams snga ma'i ha li dang sak+thi dag la 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la a tsa yang gang gi sna rnam par song ba 'di/ na 'gyur
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]te! na ha li ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ phrad sogs phyis/ a tsa yang na bar byas pas/ a ha lam/ a ha liH/ de bzhin du/ nas k+thi pa s+ya/ zhes pa la/ a sa k+thaH/ a sa k+thiH/ su ha laH/ su ha liH/ su sa k+thiH/ duH ha laH/ duH ha
[\[132a.2\]]liH/ duHsak+thaH/ duHsak+thiH/ gang gi thod pa med pa/ ni rgyam si tsa phradzA me ng+ha yoH/ pradzAme ng+ha dag la rtag tu a si tsa'o/ thong med/ na nya dang dur dang su rnams sngon  gang gi mdung med/ na yod pa tung med/ thong ba ba zang bo ngam legs po/ mdung bzang po'am mdzes po de dag go thong ba ngan pa/ thong ba ngan pa/
[\[132a.3\]]ba'i bra dzA dang  bdung ngan pa/ me ng+ha dag la 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las rkyen a sitsa rtag tu 'gyur te/ na pra dz+'ata ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brang sogs phyis/ a si tsa  tsa rjes 'brel/ i brjod don/ a bra dzAH/ de bzhin du/ dzas duHpra dzaHla s+ya/ zhes pa la/
[\[132a.4\]]duHpra dzAH/ dzas  su pra dzAHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ su pra dzAH/ dzas  na me ng+hAHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ a me ng+hAH/ dzas  duH gang gi skyed gu med pa/ me ng+hAHyas+ya/ zhes pal/ dur+m+me ng+hAH/ dzas  su med ng+hAHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ su meng+hAH/ skyed gu med ga a si tsa su/ ng+harmA da ni tsa ka ba  gang gi skye bo ngan na ba/ lAta/
[\[132a.5\]]a si tsa su/ skye bo ngan pa/ gang gi skye bo bzang po/ a si tsa su/ skye bo bzang pa/ gang gi blo gros med pa /a si tsa su/ blo gros med pa/ gang gi blo gros ngan pa/ gcig las ng+harma  las a si tsa su/ blo gros ngan pa/ gang gi blo gros bzang po/ blo gros bzang bo/ a ni tsa'o/ /'bru mang bo'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir sngon du rtags
[\[132a.6\]]gnyis gsum phyogs med pa/ rtags gang yang rung ba gcig sngon na yod pa'i ng+harma las rkyen a ni tsa 'gyur te/ ka l+yA Na ng+ha r+m+mo ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs bsdus/ a ni tsa byin/ tse rjes 'brel i brjod don/ kal+yA Na ng+harmA/ tshig gnyis sogs yod na a ni tse
[\[132a.7\]]mi 'gyur ba'i dpe ni/ su pra ng+harmo ya s+ya/ chos gang gi rab tu bzang po/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/ su gang gi dge bas chos/ pra ng+harmaH/ rab tu bzang ba'i chos/ dak+Shi Ne rmA lub+t+ha yo ge/ dak+Shi Ne rmA bsnun ba'i sbyor ba la'o/ chos dge'i/ ng+ha rman la su sku phyis na'i u bang+nyA ring bo ming mtha'i nad byis ba'o/ /
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]dak+ShiNe rmA /zhes pa mda' bsnun pa lta bu'i ri dgas gzhogs rman pa can brjod pa la 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba tshig phrad do/ /pra sa m+ng+b+yaMdzAnu no dz+nyuH/ pra sam dag la dzA nu na gyi dzU'o/ /dbru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir nyer bskyur bra dang sam sngon du byung na/ dzanu na zhes pa'i sgra dz+nyu zhes par
[\[132b.2\]]ri dgas gzhogs g.yas phul ba/ 'gyur te/ brag te dzAnunI ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs bsdus/ dzAnu dz+nya ru 'gyur/ pradz+nyuH/ de bzhin du/ saMdzA nunI ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ saMdz+nyuH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ Ur+ng+hA dwi b+hA Sha/ Ur+ng+ha las yang na'o/ /Ur+ng+ha sngon ma'i dzA nun
[\[132b.3\]]yang dz+nyu zhes par 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba  mgyogs pa'i pus mo/ 'dam ka can te/ Ur+ng+haMdzAnu nI ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ Ur+ng+ha dzA  bus no rab/ gang gi pus mo legs po/ nuH/ yang na/ Ur+ng+hadz+nyuH/ pus mo legs pa/ ng+hanu Shash+tsa/ ng+hanu Sha'i 'ang ngo / /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir ng+hanu Sha zhes pa'i
[\[132b.4\]]mtha' a nang du 'gyur te/ shA r+d+ga ng+ha nur s+ya/ zhes pal/ rnam dbye phrad sogs bsdus gang gi pus mo sbam po/ mtha' a nang du 'gyur/ nga rjes 'brel na'i srog a brjod don/ pus mo sbom po/ shA r+d+ga ng+ha n+wA/ dzA yA yA ning / dzA yA'i ni nga'o/ /'bru ma mang po'i bsdu ba byas pa'i dzA yA zhes pa'i mtha'
[\[132b.5\]]ming zhes par 'gyur te/ yu ba gzhu srab pa'i/ ri dzA yA ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/ yA las A phyung A de ning du 'gyur nga rjes 'brel/ yu  Sha a nang du bskyur ng+ha nu an la su  na'i u pang+hA ring po hal sogs kyis su gyis  ming mtha'i na gyis  i ka gi a tsa la yaN byas ba'o  gzhu srab/ ba dzA ya ni/ su/
[\[132b.6\]]lo po byo R+l+ra yi/ bra y+ra dag gi lba la  gang gi chung ma dar ma/ la dA byi'o/ /byings dang byings ma yin pa'i 'ang ya srog med dang bra srog med dag lbal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge gang rung pha ro la la dbyi ste/ yu badzAniH/ de bzhin du/ lak+Sh+mIHdzA yA ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ lak+sh+mI dzAniH/ gan+ng+h+ya s+yi du n+pU
[\[132b.7\]]ti su sur b+hi b+h+yaH/ gan+ng+ha'i uta  pU ti  su su ra b+hi rnams las i ha'o/ /u ta sogs de rnams snga ma las gan+ng+ha zhes pa'i mtha'i a ni 'bru mang po'i bsdu pa'i skabs 'dir ita du  chung ma dar ba'i/ gang gi b+ha mo mtshan bzang ma dpal mo 'di'am phun sum tshogs pa 'di/ bu mo mtshan bzang ma dpa' mo/ 'gyur te/
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]ung+gan+ng+ho yas+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ a i ta du 'gyur/ ung+ga n+ng+hiH/ de bzhin du/ pU tiHgan+ng+ho ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ pU ti gan+ng+hiH/ su gan+ng+ho ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ su gan+ng+hiH/ sur b+hiHgan+ng+ha ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ su ra b+hi gan+ng+hiH/ alpA khyA yAM/ chung
[\[133a.2\]]du brjod pa la'o/ /chung  gang gi dri khyab ma/ du brjod pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i gan+ng+ha'i mtha' yang 'bru mang  dri khyab/ gang gi dri gtsang ma/ po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir dri gtsang ma/ gang gi dri bzang po/ i ta du 'gyur te/ g+h+r-i  bri bzang / gang gi g.yag gi dri ma/ ta s+ya gan+ng+ho ya s+ya/ g.yag dri/ zhes pa la/ g+h+r-i
[\[133a.3\]]ta gan+ng+hiH/ u pa mA nAts+tsa/ nye bar gzhal ba la'o/ /nye bar gzhal ba'i don brjod pa can gyi gan+ng+ha'i mtha' yang ita du 'gyur te/ pad+ma s+ya -i ba gan+ng+ho ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ pad+ma gan+ng+hiH/ pA da s+ya lo po nya ha di b+h+yaH/ hasti sogs  gang gi mar gyi dri/ rnams ma yin pa las pA da'i mar k+Shi dri/
[\[133a.4\]]dbyi'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir ha sti la sogs pa 'di rnams ma yin pa las pA de'i mtha' dbyi ste/ byA g+h+ra s+ya bA do+o i ba pA do+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ gang gi pang+ma'i dri 'dra ba/ rnam dbye phrad sogs dang bA da'i mtha' phyis/ byA g+h+ra pAd/ ha sti sogs la/ hasti
[\[133a.5\]]naHpA do+o i ba pA do+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/ bA de'i mtha' mi dbyi/ ha sti pA daH/ gang gi rkang pa stag gi rkang pa 'dra ba/ de bzhin du/ ku sU la bA do+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ ku sU la pA daH/ kum+ng+ha pA dI Shu tsa/ kunam+ng+ha pA dI Shu tsa/ kum+b+ha pA dI  stag gi rkang pa/ rnams la'ang ngo / /'bru
[\[133a.6\]]gang gi rkang ba glang po che'i rkang pa 'dra ba/ mang po'i mtha' ku m+b+ha pA da sogs la bud med du brjod pa na/ pA da/ glang po che'i rkang pa/ pad du 'gyur ba dang dIpa sbyin bas kum+ng+ha gang gi rkang ba skyog go pangI sogs tshig phrad du bya ste/ rkang ba skyog po/ kum+ng+has+yapA do+o i bapA do+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ kum+ng+ha
[\[133a.7\]]pA daH/ de bud med du brjod pa nam ngo 'dis/ kum+b+ha pa dI/ bum rkar ma/ de bzhin du/ gang gi nyang pa brgya rnams/ sha ta pA ngAHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ shasha ta pA daH/ rkang ba brgya pa/ sha ta pa dI/ rkang brgya ma/ saM khyA su pUrba s+ya/ grangs  gang gi rkang pa bum pa'i rkang pa 'dra ba dag/ dang su snga ma'i'o/ /grangs kyi bu ma rkang /
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]sgra rnams dang nyer bsgyur su sngon na yod pa'i pA da'i mtha' yang 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir dbyi ste/ dwo+o pA do+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ dwi pAta/ dwi pAd/ de bzhin du/ sa ha sra pA ngAHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ sa ha sra pAta/ su bA do+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ su pAta/ su
[\[133b.2\]]pAd/ ba ya si dan+ta s+yad traM/ na tshod la dan+ta'i da tr-i'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir na tshod brjod pa'i gang gi rang ba gnyis/ don dang  rkang pa gnyis/ 'brel ba'i dan+ta ni su dang grangs sngon  gang gi rkang ba stong / rkang ba stong / rkang ba stong / gang gi rkang pa mdzes ba/ du byung na da tr-i zhes  rkang mdzes/
[\[133b.3\]]par 'gyur te/ dwo+od n+to+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ ngan+ta da tr-i ru 'gyur/ r-i u ka 'gro ba la nuM gyi don/ dwi dan/ de bzhin du/ tsa twa raHdan+tAHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ tsa tu rdan/ de bzhin du/ ShaT dan+tAHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ Sho Dan/ su dan+tAHya s+ya/ zhes
[\[133b.4\]]pa la/ su dan/ gang gi so dag gnyis/ da tr-il su  u ka 'gro ba rnams la nu m-i ra de'i don yin pas phyis  hal sogs kyis su phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os ra phyis/ so gnyis/ gang gi so bzhi pa rnams/ na tshod kyi don can  so bzhi pa/ gang gi so drug pa/ min na da tr-ir mi  so drug pa ste rta bong / gang gi so mdzes/ 'gyur
[\[133b.5\]]te! dwo+o  si mdzes te dar bab/ dan+to+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ dwi dan+ta karI/ agrA ta shung+ng+ha shu b+h+ra br-i Sha pA rA he b+h+yash+tsa/ a gra an+ta shung+ng+ha shu b+h+ra br-i Sha  bA rA ha rnams las kyang ngo / /a gra la sogs pa 'di rnams sngon du byung na 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir dan+ta ni da tr-i ru yang na 'gyur te/
[\[133b.6\]]kuD+mA la s+yA gra dan+to ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs mche gnyis pa ste glang po che/ phyis/ dan+ta da tr-i ru yang na 'gyur bas/ kuD+mA lA gra dan+taH/ kuD+ma lA gra dan/ de bzhin du/ shat+ng+haHdan+to ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ shut+ng+ha dan+taH/ shung+ng+ha dan/ shu b+h+raHdan+to ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ shu b+h+ra
[\[133b.7\]]dam+taH/ so dkar po/ shu  gang gi so gug ba'i rtse mo/ b+h+ra dan/ br-i Shas+ya dan+to ya s+ya/ gang gi glang gi so/ zhes pa la/ br-iSha dan+taH/ glang so/ br-iSha dan/ bA  so gug pa'i rtse mo/ rA ha s+ya dan+to ya s+ya  gang gi phag pa'i so/ gang gis gtsang ma/ zhes pa la/ so gtsang ma/ gang gi so dkar po/ bA rA hadan+taH/ phag so/ bA rA
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]hadan/ 'grel par kyang gi sgras mU Shaka dang a hi gnyis las kyang / yang na bar bshad pas/ mUSha kas+ya dan+to ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ mU Shaka dan+taH/ mU Shaka dan/ de bzhin du/ u heHdan+to ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ a hi dan+taH/ a hi dan/ ka ku da s+ya bas+thA yAM
[\[134a.2\]]lo paH/ ka ku da yi  lag so/ na tshod la dbyi'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir na tshod kyi don dang 'brel ka gang gi byi ba'i so/ ku da zhes pa'i mtha' dbyi phyi so/ byi so/ byi so/ ste/ a dzA to ka ku daM ya gang gi sbrul gyi so/ s+ya/ zhes pa  sbrul so/ sbrul so/ la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/
[\[134a.3\]]ka ku da'i mtha' yang byis/ a dzA ta ka ku da/ a dzA ta ka kuta/ de bzhin du/ pUr+NaM ka ku daM ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ pUr+Na ka kud/ bU r+Na ka kuta/ u dru b+hAM ka ku nga s+ya/ uta bi dag las ka gang gi tshogs nam gang ba/ kud yi'o/ /'bru mang bo'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir nyer bsgyur u ta
[\[134a.4\]]dang bi sdon du byung na'ang ka kung zhes pa'i  tshogs ma ma gang ba ste byis ba chung ngu / gang sha tshogs ma gang ba/ mtha' dbyi ste/ ut+ka  tshogs ma gang bste dar lab bab/ kudaM ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ ut+ka kud/ ut+ka kuta/ de bzhin du/ bi ka kudaM ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ bi ka kuta/ bi ka kud/ su hraMd
[\[134a.5\]]du hraM do+o mi trA ma tra yoH/ su trid du hraM dag grogs dang grogs min dag las so/ grogs dang grogs ma yin pa dag brjod pa la 'bru mang po'i gang gi dang ba'i tshogs ma  tshogs ma dang ba/ tshogs ma dar ba/ bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir nyer  gang gi tshogs lhag pa/ tshogs ma lhag pa/ bsgyur su dang dur
[\[134a.6\]]sngon ma'i hrid ya ni hr-ita ces par 'gyur te/ su hr-id yaM mi traM ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ su hraMd/ su hraMta/ de bzhin du/ du r+t+ra da yaM sha tru ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ du r+h+raMta/ du r+h+raMd/ u raHpra b+h+r-i ti b+h+yaHka pa/ u ram sogs rnams las ka pa'o/ /u ras la sogs pa rnams la 'bru mang
[\[134a.7\]]po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la rkyen ka pa 'gyur te/ gang gi snying grogs bzang po/ mdza' bo'am snying grogs sam yid gcugs/ gang gi dgra bo sems ngan pa/ gang gi brang rnam paHrgyab pa/ b+YU D+haH dgra bo'am sems ngan pa/ uraHya s+ya/ zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ ka pa/ brjes 'brel/ gong du de phan ma yin pa'i la sha
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]ku zhes ba byung bas de phan gyi ga yin bas mi dbyi/ b+YUb+hor skaH/ de bzhin du/ pri yaHsarbiHya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ pri ya sar+piSh+kaH/ inaHs+t+ri yAM/ in las bud med la'o/ /'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' can las bud med du brjod pa na ka ba rkyen du 'gyur te/ bahu daN+Di naHya smin de she/
[\[134b.2\]]zhes pa la/ rnam dbye  zang rnam par rgyas ba/ rjes 'brel sogs  gang gi dga' ba mar gsar/ phyis/ ka ba byin  dga' ba mar gsar/ pa rjes 'brel/ ming mtha'i na dbyi bos na phyis/ DA ba byin/ bahu daN+Di kA/ na ka pi/ ka ba lam yin no/ spyir btang  gang la dbyug pa can mang po'i yul
[\[134b.3\]]ka pha rol la aN gyi thung ngu'i zhes pas rkyen ka yig pha rol la aN so sor bsdu ba'i a tsa ring po rnams thung ngur 'gyur yang dmigs bsal rkyen ka pa la thung ngur 'gyur bam yin te/ bahul k+Sh+m+yaH dbyug pa can ma mang po/ ya smin de she/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ na di
[\[134b.4\]]r-i ta mtha' dag la'ang ngos ka pa/ mdo 'dis thung ngur mi 'gyur/ ba hu lak+Sh+sI kA/ sheShA dwi b+hA ShA/ lhag ma las 'dam ka'o/ /sngar bshad zin pa bud med du brjod par ma  gang la phun sum tshogs ba mang po'i yul/ zad lhag ma snye mdo 'di nas bzung bud med du brjod pa dang bud med du
[\[134b.5\]]brjod pa ma yin pa la'ang ka pa ster ba dang mi ster ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ dpal mo mang po/ ba hud N+DinaHya smin de she/ zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs sdus/ ka pa 'dam ka can du byas pas/ ba hu d+N+DikaH/ yang na/ ba hu dANI/ A po nya n+ya tar s+yaM/ A pa kyi yang na'o/ /sgyir
[\[134b.6\]]btang rkyen ka pa pha rol la aN thung ngur mi 'gyur bar bshad kyang / de'i dmigs bsal  gang la dbyug ba can mang po'i yul/ rkyen ka pa pha rol la A pa mtha' can thung ngur yang  dbyug pa can mang po/ dbyug can mang po/ daN+Dil su in ha na sogs kyis na ring po/ ming mtha'i na ta la sogs kyis su phyis pa'o//
[\[134b.7\]]na 'gyur te/ bahu mA lA ya s+ya/ gang gi phreng ba mang po ma/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ lhag ma las 'dam ka 'os/ kapa yang na bar byas byin pa'i phyogs la mdo 'dis thung ngur 'gyur ram mi 'gyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ ba hu mA la kaH/ phreng ba mang po/ bahu mA lA

[\[135a.1\]]kaH/ bahumA la/ yang grel par/ A pa mtha' can ma yin kyang A yig mtha' can ka ba pha rol la yang na thung ngur 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ su so ma pA ya s+ya so+o/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye dbyi ba sogs gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ su so ma bkagaH/ su
[\[135a.2\]]so ma bAkaH/ su so ma bA/ phreng ba mang po/ nasaM dz+nyAyAM/ ming lam yin no/ dngos po gang gi 'ang ming brjod pa la 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la ka ba 'gyur pa ma yin/ gang gi legs pa bzhi ba 'thung ba 'di/ te/ bi shwas+ya de bAH a s+ya/ zhes pa la/ rjes  legs pa bzhi ba 'thung ba/ 'brel
[\[135a.3\]]legs bar zhi ba 'thung ba/ legs par zhi ba 'thung / sogs phyis ga pa mi 'jug /bi shwa de baH/ I ya sash+tsa/ i yas kyi'ang ngo / rkyen I yas sbyor ba'i rtags la yang 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las ka ba  sna tshogs kyi lha 'di/ 'gyur pa ma yin te/ ba habaHshre yAsaHa s+ya/ zhes
[\[135a.4\]]pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ ka pa mi 'jug/ ba hu shre yAn/ ban+di te  sna tshogs lha/ b+h+rAtuH/ bstod pa la b+h+rA tr-i yi'o/ /bstod pa'i sgra don brjod pa'i b+h+rA tr-i las 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la ka mi 'jugs ste/ su b+h+rA tAya s+ya/ rnam dbye  dge ba' mang po 'di/ sogs byis/ ka ba
[\[135a.5\]]shra la su la su u ka 'gro ba sogs kyis nu ma  u de'i don u pa ng+hA ring po brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os/ sa phyis/ ha la sogs kyis su phyis/ dpal mang po/ mi 'jug/ su b+h+rAtA/ bstod pa'i don ma yin na ka pa 'gyur te/ mUrbo b+h+rA tA ya s+ya/ zhes  gang gi spun zla bzad bo/ bal/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ ka ba byin/

[\[135a.7\]]spun zla glen pa/ pa la/ sarba shwe taH/ thams cad dkar po/ de bzhin du/ dwo+o shu klo+o bi d+ya te ya s+ya/ gang gi gnyis dag dkar po/ zhes pa la/ dwi shukAH/ dkar po gnyis/ nen+d+wA di b+h+yaH/ in+du sogs rnams las ma yin no/ /spyir btang 'bru mang po'i bsdu gang gi thams cad dka' por yon pa 'di/
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]ba'i skabs 'dir tshig sbyor gyi skabs rnam dbye bdun pa thob pa tshig gral bsgrigs kyi phyi ma la yod na bsdu ba tshar nas sngon du 'jog dgos kyang / dmigs bsal in+ngu sogs ni phyi mar spo ba ma yin te/ i n+du mU lo+o ya gya/zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ mU lo+o zhes pa la bdun pa
[\[135b.2\]]byin pa yin kang de'i pha rol tu i n+du mi spo/ i n+du mU liH/ de bzhin du/ in+du she kha re ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ in+du she kharaH/ shaM khaM pA No+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ shaM kha pA NiH/ tsakraHpA No+o ya s+ya/ gang gi rtsa ba la zla ba/ zhes pa la/ tsakra pA NiH/ badzraHbA No bi ng+ya te ya s+ya saH/ zhes pa la/

[\[135b.5\]]pa la/ rnam dbye rjes 'brel sogs phyis/ kr-i ta kaTaD+haH/ bAhitAg+n+ya di Shu/ A hi ta ag+ni sogs rnams la yang na'o/ spyir btang ni Sh+ShA'i ming can gyi rkyen can gyi rkyen can tshig sngon mar 'jog par bshad kyang dmigs bsal la A hi ta ag+ni sogs dang sbyor ba'i  gang gib+ng+ha lhas bya ba/ ni Sh+ShA'i

[\[135b.7\]]taH/ bu skyes/ dza ta pu traH/ 'grel par/ gang gi me la sbyin sreg byas/ 'bru mang po bsdu pa la dbye ba gnyis te/ de ma yin pa'i yon tan can dang / de'i yon tan can no zhes byur bas de  mel sbyin sreg byas/ mel sbyin sreg byas/ gang gi bu skyes/ ma yin pa'i yon tan can gyi dper
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]brjod ni/ bahu ng+ha naM ya smin/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs bsdus/ ba hud+hanaH/ asti ng+ha naMya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ asti ng+ha naH/ de'i yon tan can gyi dper brjod ni/ lam+bo+o kaNo+o ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ lam+ba kar+NaH/ de bzhin du/ ma hA pradz+nya ya s+ya

[\[136b.1\]]baH/ zhes pa lta bu ru gu g+hi'i ming can yin kyang ha ra zhes pa'i rjes su byung ba ltabu'o/ /a dzAng+ya dan+taM/ a tsa dang po ata mtha' 'o/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir rtags gang la'ang a tsa ste dbyangs yig gang rung dang po na yod pa/ ata mtha' na yod pa de ni thog mar 'jog ste/ I
[\[136b.2\]]shash+tsa kr-iShAsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ i shakr-iSh+No+o/ de yang gong du g+hi'i ming can gyi skabs su bshad pa ltar ming mang po bsgrigs pa la ni gcig tu ma nges te/ dper na/ a shwash+tsa ra tha  sh+tsa an+d+ra sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ a shwa rathan+d+rAH/ zhes pa in+d+ra ra tha'i rjes su byung ba lta bu'o/ /'grel par lung

[\[137a.1\]]sha kA shaM/ yang 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ ab+h+yartitaM tsa/ mchod pa la'ang ngo / /mchod pa ste gus pa'i yul gyi rtags de sngon du 'jog go zhes bshad pas/ ta pas sh+tsapa r+pata/ zhes pa la/ ta pa sa parba to+o/ gus pa'i yul dka' thub pa sngon du byur ba lta bu'o/ /de

[\[137a.7\]]rnams kun sdud pa don gcig  rnga zlum dang 'khar ja/ shing rta dang glang po che dang / par 'gyur te/ ng+hA nA  shing rta rta glang po che/ tsa shaSh+ku lA tsi/ yos dang 'khur ba dang / zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ ng+hAnA shaShU li/ yos 'khur ba/ bi shiSh+Tha ling+go na ngI de sho nya grA mAH/ grong khyer ma yin pa'i yul
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]dang chu bo rnams kyi rtags tha dad pa'i 'o/ /grong khyer gyi sgra brjod pa ma yin pa'i yul gyi sgra dang / chu bo'i sgra rnams kun sdud pa la don gcig par 'gyur te/ gang+gA tsa sho Na sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ gang+rA sho NaM/ de bzhin du/ ku ru sh+tsa k+She+e traM tsa/ zhes pa la/ ku'u k+She traM/ rtags thad dam yin na kun

[\[137b.4\]]'gyur te/ yU kA tsa li k+ShaMtsa/ zhes pa la/ yU kA  dzAmU'i grong dang sA lU'i grong / lik+ShaM/ ye ShAM tsa bi ro ng+haHsha shA ti kaH/ dzA m+bu'i grong dang sA lU'i grong dag/ gang rnams kyi gtan gyi dgra rnams kyi'o/ /srog chags gang dang gang gi gtan gyi dgra rtag tu 'khon pa rnams kun sdud pa don

[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]dzag tan+du bA yaM/ mi gnas pa yin na/ kun sdud par mi 'gyur te/ tsAN+Dal sh+tsa mraM ta yash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ tsA N+DA la mr-i nya yo+o/ ga bAsh+tsa brab+h+raM ti ni tsa/ ba lang la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang ngo / /ba lang la sogs pa rnams kyi mthun pa la'ang kun sdud 'don
[\[138a.2\]]gcig par 'gyur te/ ga ras 'khrud mkhan dang thag pa/ bAsh+tsa a shwash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ ga gtum bo dang ro dang / bA shwaM/ de bzhin du/ gtum po dang ro/ dAsI tsa dAs sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ dA sIngAsaM/ go+o sh+tsA eDakAtsa/ zhes pa la/ gabeDa kaM/ ku b+dza sh+tsabA man sh+tsa/ zhaiMs pa la/ kub+ja
[\[138a.3\]]bA ma ni/ pu trash+tsa po+o trash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ pu tra po+o traM/ shwAtsa tsAN+DA la sh+tsa/ ba lang dang rta dang / zhes pa la/ sh+shA tsAN+DA laM/ s+ny+rI  mkha' dar ta/ tsa ku mA rash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ dran dar bran yo dang / s+r+j+bAku mAraM/ uSh+Ta sh+tsa bran bran mo/ ba lang dang ma mo dang / khurash+tsa/ zhes pa dad mamo/ sbur po dang mi bu thung dang / pal/ sgur po ma zung /
[\[138a.4\]]bu dang bu'i bu dang / uSh+Da kha raM/ b+ha ga ba  bu bu'i bu/ khyi dang gtum po/ tI tsa b+ha ga ba ta sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ b+ha khyi gi tum so/ bud med dang gzhon nu/ gab tIb+ha gab taM/ mu trash+tsa pu rI Shash+tsa/ bud med gzhon nu/ zhes pa la/ mutrabu rISh-i/ ja mo dang bong bu/ mAs sh+tsa shoNi tash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ mAMs
[\[138a.5\]]sho Ni taM/ dar+b+nyash+tsa  rnga mo'ang bong bu/ skal ldan dang skal ldan ma/ shar sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ dar+b+ha sharaM/ ardzun sh+tsapuru Shash+tsa/ zhes pa  skal ldan skal ldan ma/ dri chu dang dri chen/ la/ ardzun buru Shi/ bi b+dA ShA br-i k+Sha mr-ig  tsa chu/ traM Na ng+hAn+ya bya ljan pa shur sha gu  sha khrag dang / n+ya shwab Dab bUcAr rA ng+haro ng+ta
[\[138a.6\]]sha khrag/ ku sha dang mda'/ rANAM/ ljon shing dang / ri dgas dang / rtswa dang / 'bru ku sha mda'/ sring sgrub dang skyes bu dang / dang / byan dang / phyugs dang / bya dang / rta dang / rgod srid sgrub s+yes bu/ mdang / shar da / gzhan dang mchu dang / byang rnams kyi yang na'o/ /sgra de dag kyang kun sdud pa don
[\[138a.7\]]gcig par yang na 'gyur te 'dam ka can no/ tsU ta sh+tsa a sho kash+tsa/ shing tsU ta dang shug pa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ gcig gcig sbyor ba dang kun sdud ba yang na bar byas pas/ s+ya tsU tA shokaM/ shing tsU ta dang shugs/ dzas tsU tA sho kAH/ shing tsU ta dang shug pa rnams de bzhin du/ sgra sgrogs ru ru sh+tsa
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]pr-iSha tash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ su ru ru pr-i Sha taM/ dAH/ dzas ku shash+tsa kA shash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ su ku sha kA shaM/ shAH/ dzas  yab sh+tsamA Shash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ su  ya ba mA ShaM/ ShAHdzas ngang+hi tsa g+h+r-i taM tsa/ zhes pa la/ su  dang+hi g+h+r-itaM/ o+oshI te/ go+o  sh+tsa ma hi Shash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ su go ma hi ShaM/ Sho+o  o+o shu
[\[138b.2\]]ri dgas ru ru dang sha ba/ ri dgas ru ru shas/ rnams/ rtswa ngan sel dang kA sha/ kash+na hang+sa sh+tsa/ zhes  ngan sel kA sha rnams/ nas dang sran ma dang / pa la/ su ku sha haM  nas sran/ rnams/ zho dang 'om/ saM/ sAH/ dzas  a  zho 'o ma/ rnams/ sa yang dang ma he/ shwash+tsa ba Da ba sh+tsa/ zhes  pa lang ma he/ ngag  pa la/
[\[138b.3\]]su a shwa ba Da baM/ dzas  bAH/ pUrba sh+tsa a par sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ ne tso da ngang ba dang / pUrbA pa ri/ dzos rAH/ a ng+har sh+tsa ut+ta rash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ ne tso ngang pa/ su  a ng+ha ro d+haraM/ dzas  rAH/ bi  rnams/ pra tiShit+t+haMtsAn ng+hi ka ra Na bA tsi/ 'gal da rdzas  rta dang rgod ma dang / med pa rnams kyi brjod
[\[138b.4\]]pa  la'ang ngo / /rta rgod ma/ rnams/ shar dang gzhan/ 'gal brdzas med pa rnams kyi shar gzhan/ rnams/ mchu dang byang ngam dma' dang byang / brjod pa la'ang kun sdud pa mchu rtsang / rnams/ don gcig par yang na 'gyur te/ shi ta sh+tsa ush+naMtsa/ zhes pa la/ phu  shi to sh+naM  o+o sh+ne/ der zhin du
[\[138b.5\]]kAm  sh+tsa krong+hash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ kAm krong+haM/ o+o ng+ho+o/ su khaM tsa duHkhaM tsa/ zhes pa la/ su  su kha duHkhaM/ o+o  khe/ ning ng+hi pa yA dI ni/ da ng+hi pa yas la sogs pa rnams ma yin no/ /dang+hi pa las la sogs pa rnams kun  thang ba dang dro ba dang / sdud pa don gcig grang pro dag  par 'gyur pa
[\[138b.6\]]las dang khro ba dang / ma yin te/ dang+hi  las khrog dag/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag tsa ya sh+tsa/ zhes bde sdug/ dag/ pa la /rnam dbye sogs phyis/ da ng+hi pa ya sI/ de bzhin du/ ing+ng+mAsh+tsa bar+hish+tsa/ zhes pa la/ ing+h+ma brtiShI/ bAka tsa ma nash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ wA ng+ma na so+o/ ma ng+hu tsa
[\[138b.7\]]sarbish+tsa/ zhes pa la/ ma ng+hu sarbi ShI/ sgang mar gsar dag/ dad can ma dang blo ldan ma dang / zho dang 'o ma/ shrAng+ng+hAtsa me ng+hA tsa/ zhes pa la/ shrAng+ng+hA meng+he/ shrAng+ng+hA meng+he/ dad can ma blo ldan ma dag/ zho 'o ma dag/ dkar phyogs dang nag phyogs dang / shukla sh+tse gsal ba dang sgro mdongs dang / gsal ba sgro ma dngos dag/ ngag dang yid dang / dag yid dag/ sbrang rtsi dang mar gsar dang /
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]kraMsh+Nash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ shu klakraMSh+No+o/ Ad+yash+tsa a ba sA naM tsa/ zhes pa la/ Ad+yA ba sAne/ ya dzatsa anu bA kyaM tsa/ zhes pa la/ yadzA nu pA kye/ u lU kha laM tsa mu sha laM tsa/ zhes pa la/ ngas  u lU kha la mu sha le/ ha rish+tsa ba sa lbAsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/

[\[139a.3\]]'phrog byed brgya byin dag/ tshangs pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang / Nash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ shi ba be+e shra ba No+o/ som sh+tsa ru drash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ so ma ru dro+o/ na rA da sh+tsa parbatash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ na rad par+pa to+o/ sUr+Yash+tsatsa n+d+ra ma sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ sUr+Ya  tshangs ba dang skye dgu'i bdag bo dang / zhi ba dang rnam thos sras dang /
[\[139a.4\]]tsan+d+ra ma so+o/ rAm sh+tsa lak+Sh+ma Nash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rAm la k+Sh+ma No+o/ b+hI  zhi ba rnam thos sras dag/ zla ba dang drag po/ zla ba drag po dag/ drang srong mi sbyin dang ri bo dang / mash+tsa ardzun sh+tsa/ zhes pa  mi sbyin ri bo dag/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang / nyi zla dag/ la/ b+hi mArdzu no+o/ kam+pa la sh+tsa a shwatarash+tsa/
[\[139a.5\]]zhes pa la/ kam+pa lA shwa dga' byed dang mtshan nyid ldan dang / dga' byed mtshan nyid ldan dag/ ta ro+o/ de dag dang+hi'i sogs khong yin no/ /A nang r-i tAM draM dwe/ 'jigs pa dang srid sgrub dang / zlas dbye la raM ta rnams kyi A nang ngo / /zlas dbye'i bsdu  'jigs pa srid sgrub dag/ snam bu dang rta dang / ba'i
[\[139a.6\]]skabs 'dir tshig  snam bu rta dag/ sngon ma'i mtha' r-ita mtha' raMta mtha' can yin na A nang du 'gyur te /ho tA tsa po tA tsa /zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ ho traM zhes pa'i mtha' A nang du 'gyur/ na dang brjes 'brel/ ho tA po ta ro+o /de bzhin du /mA tA tsa pi tA tsa/ zhes pa la/ mA tA pi ta ro+o/ de bzhin du/ pi

[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]zhes pa la/ mi tra b.ru No+o/ Id g+niHsom ba ru Na yoH/ a g+ni'i som ba ru Na dag la I ta'o/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir so ma dang ba ru Na dag pha rol la ag+na'i mtha' Ita du 'gyur te/ ag+neHsU t+s+to ma so mAH/ ag+ni las stuta sto ma so ma rnams so/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs
[\[139b.2\]]grogs chu lha dag/ 'dir ag+ni'i pha rol tu stuta sto ma so ma rnams byung na/ rtags de dag gis yin rnams Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ ag+ni sh+tsastush+tsa/ zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs byis/ mdo 'dis sa Sha/ Sha Tul ShaDu 'os/ taT/ ag+niSh+Duta/ de bzhin du/ ag+nish+tsa sto mash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ ag+niSh+To mo+o/
[\[139b.3\]]de bzhin du/ ag+nish+tsaso mash+tsa /zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ mdo sngon ma'i ag+ni mtha' Ita/ ag+niSho mo+o/ 'grel ma dang bston pa dang / par yang na Sha dang I gnyis ka ru mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ ag+ni so mo/ me bstod ba/ de bzhin du/ ag+nish+tsa ba ru  me dang mchod sbyin/ me mchod sbyin/
[\[139b.4\]]Na sh+tsa/ zhes  me dang zla ba/ pa la/ a g+r+nI ba ru nau/ i ng+g+r-i ng+ng+hau/ gong du ba ru Na pha rol  me zla ba dag/ la a g+ne'i mtha' Ita du 'gyur bar bshad kyang / ba ru na phel ba byas pa dag pha rol Ir du mi 'gyur zhing A nang du'ang mi  me dang chu lha dang / 'gyur bar ir nyid du gnas
[\[139b.5\]]te! ag+ni sh+tsa ba ru na sh+tsa/ zhes me chu lha dab/ pa la/ ag+ni bAru No/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ di bo ng+yA bA/ dib kyi ng+h+yA bA'o/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu pa'i skabs 'dir ding ces pa'i rtags ni d+yA bA zhes par 'gyur te/ d+yAbA ca b+hU mish+tsa /zhes pa la/ o+o d+yA bA b+hU mI/ dwaMdwAc+tsu dr-i ShahU N+tA t+sa mAhA re/
[\[139b.6\]]me dang chu lha'i bu dang / zlas dbye las cu dr-i Sha ha mtha' las kun  me chu lha'i bu dag/ sdud la'o/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu ba las kun sdud pa la tsu ste tsa sde'i mtha' can dang rtags draM Shata dang Sha yig mtha' can dang ha yig mtha' can rnams las  gnam dang sa gzhi/ gnam sa dag/ atsa'i rkyen 'gyur te/ lbAk+tsa twa ka
[\[139b.7\]]tsa/ zhes ba la phrad sogs bsdus/ atsa byin/ tsa rjes 'brel/ lbAka twa tsaM/ ngag pags pa/ de bzhin du/ shrIsh+tsa sraT tsa/ dpal dang 'phrad pa dang / zhes pa la/ shri sra dza/ dpal 'phrang / shamI tsa draM Shats+tsa/ shing sha mI dang rdo dang / zhes pa la/ a tsa  sha mI dr-i Sha taM/ shing shamI rdo/ bAka tsa  ngag dang phags pa dang /
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]twiT tsa/ zhes pa la/ bAka twiShaM/ tshatraM tsa upAnats+cha/ zhes pa la /tsha tro pA na haM/ pu mAn s+h+ri lA/ skyes ba las bud med kyi'o/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir skyes pa dang bud med gnyis yin bud med kyi rtags de dbye ste/ brAh+ma Na sh+tsa bat+tsa NI tsa/

[\[140a.3\]]sring mo'i rtags dbyi zhing / bu dang bu mo dag la bu mo'i ming dbyi ste/ swa sA tsa b+h+rAtAtsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs  bram ze pho mo dag/ dang swa sraM yang phyis/ b+h+rA ta ro+o/ de bzhin du/ putrash+tsa bu hi tAtsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs dang du he hraM yang phyis pas/ bu trA+o+o/ na
[\[140a.4\]]puM sa ka man puMs ke ne+e ka bats+tsa stAn+ya ta ra s+yAM/ ma ning lam ni da ma yin pa'i  sring mo dang jo jo dang / gcig 'dra ba'ang 'di'i yang na'o/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu ba lam ning gi  ming srid dag/ bu dang bu mo dang / rtags dang / ma ning ma yin pa'i rtags dag sbyor ba nang di ste ma ning gi rtags  bu bu mo ngas/
[\[140a.5\]]ma yin pa de yang na dbyi zhing 'ang gi sgras kun sdud pa'ang yang na 'gyur te/ shuklaMtsaka m+pal sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs dang skyes ba'i rtags ka mra la rnams phyis/ sh+yak+khaM/ yang na/ shuklo+o/ yang ma phyis pas/ shakla kamA lo+o/ pi tA mAtrA/ pha lam yi'o/ /zlas dbye'i bsdu ba la pha dang ma
[\[140a.6\]]gnyis lam nyid yang na dbyi ste/ mAtA tsa pitAtsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye dkar po dang snam bu/ sogs phyis/ mA tr-i dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ pi ta  snam dkar/ snam dkar dag/ ro+o/ mAtA pi ta ro+o/ shwa snam dkar dag/ shu raHshwash+b+ra/ gyos po la sgyug mo'i'o/ /zlas dbye
[\[140a.7\]]khas gyos bo dang sgyug mo gnyis las  ma dang ba dang / sgyug mo nyid yang na dbyi ste/ shwa shru sh+tsa sh+ba shur sh+tsa/ gyos po dang m+b+yug mo dang / zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ shwA shrU dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba pham dag/ yang na bar byas pas/ gyos sgyug dag/ shwu shrU shwa shu ro/ t+ya ngA dI ni sarbe+e rnaM t+yaM/
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]d+yata sogs rnams la thams cad rnams kyi rtag tu'o/ /zlas dbye'i skabs 'dir t+yad sogs rnams la rtags gzhan thams cad rtag tu dbye ste/ sa tsa de ba dad+tash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye tshig grogs dang bcas pa phyis /to+o/ 'grel par/ d+yad sogs gnyis tshogs pa la ni sngon ma dbyi'o zhes
[\[140b.2\]]bshad pas/ satsA yash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye phrad sogs dang ming gong ma phyis/ yo+o/ grA mya pa shu saM g+he Sh+wa stI/ grong gi phyugs 'dus  de dang lhas byin yang / ba rnams la gzhon nu ma yin pa la bud med 'o/ /lhas byin de dag/ zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir grong du gnas pa'i phyugs 'dus
[\[140b.3\]]pa brjod pa la/ gzhon  de dang gang dang / nu ma 'am chung ngu ma yin pa ste bor ba'i gzhan ma  de gang dag/ rtags mo rtags rnams gnas shing rtags gzhan ma rnams yang na dbyi ste/ gA bash+tsa imAsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ go dbyi pa dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ imAH/ yang na  ga bimAH/
[\[140b.4\]]ga de bzhin du/ adzAsh+tsa i mAsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ imAH/ yang na/ adza imAH/ grong du gnas pa ma yin na mi dbye ste/ ru rab sh+tsa imAsh+tsa/ bal rnams dang 'di rnams dang / i mA ni i daM bud med du bsgrubs pa'o/ zhes pa la/ ru ru imAH/ phyugs ma yin na  ba lang 'di rnams/ ba lang 'di rnams/ 'dus
[\[140b.5\]]pa'i don yin kyang mi dbyi ste/ re rnams 'di rnams/ brAh+ma NAsh+tsa i mAsh+tsa/ ra 'di rnams/ zhes pa la/ brAh+ma Na i mAH/ gzhon nu yin  ri dgas rung rnams dang 'di rnams dang / na mi dbyi ste/ bat+sAsh+tsa i mAsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ bat+sa i mAH/ ri dgas ru lu 'di rnams/ de rnams kyis zlas dbye'am gnyis gnyis
[\[140b.6\]]pa'i bsdu ba rnams bshad zin to/ ! /da ni tshig sdud bram ze rnams dang 'di rnams dang / bram ze 'di rnams/ bzhi po'i cho gci rigs thun mong du bshad pa las/ r-ig pUr b+ng+rAHpathA ma nak+She/ r-itsa pur ng+hur be bye rnams dang 'di rnams dang / be'u 'di rnams/ pa thin rnams kyi ak+Sha ma yin pa las a pa'o/ /ng+hur dang
[\[140b.7\]]ak+Sha sbyor ba ma yin pa'i rtags de rnams las bsdu ba'i mtha' la a pa kyi rkyen 'gyur te/ ar+ng+ha s+yaraka/ ces pa rnam dbye bsdus/ a pa byin pa rjes 'brel/ ar+ng+hatsaH/ rig byed kyi tshig phyed/ de bzhin du/ biSh+NoHpUH/ khyab 'jug gi grong / zhes pa la/ baMSh+NupuraM/ khyab 'jug grong / rAdz+nyaHng+hUHng+hUHrgyal po'i ga rtsa/ zhes pa la/ rA
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]dzalhuraM/ sakhyuHpan+thAH/ zhes pa la/ sa a khi pa thaH/ ramyAsh+tsAso+o pan+bAsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ ra mya pa thAH/ ma hAMsh+tsa pan+d+bA sh+bA so+o/ zhes pa la/ ma hA ba thaHdak+Shi NA yAHpan+thAH/ dak+ShiNA ba thaH/ ak+Sha dang sbyor ba'i ng+hur las a pa mi 'gyur te/ ak+Shash+tsa ng+bUsh+tsa/ zhes pa la/
[\[141a.2\]]ak+Shang+hUH/ de rnams de'i rgyal po/ grogs kyi lam/ grogs lam/ pa thin la ab pa lbin gyi Ti dbye'i sa phyis pa'o/ /de ga rab yab 'di lam yang ngo / /dga' ba'i lam/ chen po yang 'di lam yang ngo / /lam chen/ lho'i lam/ skyes bu'i bsdu ba'o/ /lho lam/ shing rta'i 'khor lo dang de gnyis sbrel ba'i lcags 'di/ d+w+yan+ta ru pas chen b+h+yonya pa ita/

[\[141a.4\]]du/ an+taHapaHbyAsti ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ an+ta rAMpaM/ sam a po a dUre ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ sa mI paM/ U da norde she/ a nu las yul la a+duta'o/ /a gang la 'gro ba'i chu gnyis/ nu las pha rol gyi a pa zhes pa'i rtags kyi a ni yul brjod pa'i don la Utadu  chu gnyis 'gyur
[\[141a.5\]]gang gi bar mtshams khyab pa'i chu/ te! a nu a po sa mAn  bar gyi chu/ gang gi ring bam yin pa'i nye ba/ tuM yo gyaM/ zhes  nye ba/ pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ a U/ anU paH/ a tsa bra t+ya nra pa pU rbAt+la ma la m+naH/ pra ti a nu a bsngon ma las sAm lo man las a ca'o/ /pra ti la sogs pa
[\[141a.6\]]'di rnams sngon ma las sA ma lo man dag  byin nas nye bar sbyor ba'i yul/ las bsdu ba'i mtha' la atsa'i rkyen byin par bya ste/ AtsAr+YaMpra ti a ng+hI te sA ma be daM/ zhes pa la byin phul/ rnam dbye rjes 'breng sogs phyis/ a tsa byin/ tsa rjes 'brel/ pra ti sAmaM/ de bzhin du/ a nu ang+hI te sA mo be daM/
[\[141a.7\]]zhes pa la/ a nu sA maM/ rjes su snyan tshig/ a ba rak+ShAr+thaM ma traM snga ma be daM/ bsrub pa'i don la sngags snyan tshig rig byed/ zhes pa la/ a bsA  slob dpon rnam so sor klog par byed snyan tshig rig byed/ maM/ bsrung bsnyan tshig/ bslu so sor sbyor ba/ lo ma naM pra ti yu k+taM/ zhes pa la/ so sor snyan tshig/ rjes su klog par byed snyan tshig rig byed/ bslu so sor/ pra ti lo
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]maM/ a nu lo ma no ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ anu lo maM/ a ba ur si lo mA ni ya sa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ a tsa byin/ a ba lomaH/ de rnams 'bru mang po'i bsdu pa'o/ /'grel par/ kr-iSh+Na/ pAN+Da /u dka/ grangs rnams sngon ma'i ng+hU mi las a tsa 'gyur ro zhes
[\[141b.2\]]bshad pas/ kr-iSh+Nash+tsA deng gi rjes su ba spu/ rjes su ba spu/ gang gi brang kun la bsku/ so+o b+hUmi sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ atsa kun la bslu/ byin pas/ kraSh+N-i b+hU maH/ de bzhin du/ pAN+Du sh+tsA sob+hU mish+tsa/ zhes pa la/ pAN+Du b+hU maH/ u dka sh+tsA so+o b+hU mi sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ u
[\[141b.3\]]dka b+hUmaH/ dwo+o b+hU miH/ zhes pa la/ dwi b+hU maM/ tra yo b+hUmiH/ zhes pa la/ ji b+hU  nag po yang 'di sa yang ngo / maM/ de rnams kyis kr-iSh+Na sogs gsum po de'i skyes bu'i  sa nag po/ skya bo yang 'di sa 'ang ngo / sdu ba'i nang tshan las 'dzin dang / dra  sa skya/ sa yang bdi dam ba'ang ngo / sogs gnyis po phyogs
[\[141b.4\]]gnyis sa dar ba/ sa gnyis dag/ sa gnyis/ sa rnams gsum rnams/ sa gsum/ pa'i bsdu ba'o/ ak+Sh+Nonyad r+sha nAta/ ak+Shi'i mi mthong ba las so/ /ak+Shi mi mthong ba'i don can las bsdu ba'i mtha' la atsa 'gyur te/ gabAMak+Shi i ba/ zhes pa la/ atsa rnam dbye sogs phyis/ ga lbA k+ShaH/
[\[141b.5\]]mthong ba'i don yin na mi 'gyur te/ bi bra s+ya ak+Shi/ zhes pa lta bu la a tsa mi 'gyur rnam dbye sogs phyis/ bo prAk+ShiH/ a tsa tur bi tsa tu ra su tsa tur s+t+rAM buMs ng+hen+wa na Du ha r-i k+sA mabAd+man sAk+Shi b+h+ru ba dA rag borba Sh+Thi ba  ba lang gi mig dang 'dra ba ste skar khung / nak+taM di ba rAtrin+di bA hardi ba sar dza ba lang mig lta skar khung /
[\[141b.6\]]sa naM shre yas pu ru ShA yu Shar+b+yA yu Sha bram ze'i mig/ r-ig+Ya dzu Sha dzA to k+Sha ma hok+Sha braMng+ng+hok+Sho pa shun goSh+tha shwAH/ bram ze'i mig/ a tsa  a tsa tu ra a tsa bi tsa tu ra a tsa tu ra a tsa  su tsa tur  a tsa s+t+rAM pu sa a tsa s+t+rAM puM sa a tsa ng+he n+wan Duha a tsa ro ka sA ma atsa lbAd+ma na sa  a  ak+Shi b+hu pa a tsa dA  ra ga ba/ a tsa  UrbaSh+Thi ba a tsa pa daSh+Thi ba nak+ta
[\[141b.7\]]di ba atsa rA triM di ba a tsa a chi rdi ba a tsa sar dzas a tsa  ni shre yas a tsa pu ru ShA yu ShA yuSha atsa d+b+yA yu Sha a tsa t+yA yu Sha a tsa raMg+Ya dzu Sha atsa dza to k+Sha a tsa braMng+ng+hok+Sha a tsa u pa shun a tsa goSh+tha shwa rnams so/ a tsa tu ra la sogs pa nye shu rtsa lnga po de rnams bsdu pa'i mtha' la a tsa tshig phrad kyi byin pa ste/
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]a pa gtA ni tsa twA ri a s+ya/ zhes pa la/ a pa ga ta'i don a sngon rnam dbye sogs phyis/ atsa byin/ tsa rjes 'brel/ a tsa tu raH/ de bzhin du/ mig tA ni tsa twA ri as+ya/ zhes pa la/ bi tsa turaH/ suSh+Tu tsa twA ri la s+ya/ zhes pa la/ su tsa tu raH/ de gsum bo 'bru mang po'i
[\[142a.2\]]bsdu ba'i mtha' ma a tsa bzhi song ba 'di/ byin pa'o/ de bzhin du/ s+t+rI tsa puM mAn sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ s+t+rI puM so+o/ ng+he nu sh+tsa a na D+wAM tsa/ bzhi med dam song / zhes pa la/ ng+hen+wa na Duho+o/ r-ika tswa sA mash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ bzhi bral/ bzang po bzhi gang gi/ legs ba bzhi/ r-ika sA me/ lbA ka tsa ma nash+tsa/ zhes pa
[\[142a.3\]]la! lbAd+man se/ ak+Shi NI tsa b+h+ru bo+o tsa/ zhes pa la/ ak+Shi b+h+ru baM/ dA bud med dang sbyes pa yang / bud med skyes pa dag/ 'dod 'jo dang glang yang / rash+tsa go+o sh+tsa/ zhes pa la/ dA ra ga  ba glang dag/ snyan tshig dang tshig rkang yang / baM/ U rtsa baSh+ThI bAn tsa/ zhes pa la/ Urba Sh+ThI baM/ snyan tshig tshig rkang / ngag dang yid kyang / pa dash+tsaSh+ThI bAn
[\[142a.4\]]tsa/ zhes  ngag yid dag/ mig dag dang ze ma dag dang / mig ze ma/ ba dang glang dang / pa la/ pa daSh+ThIbaM/ nak+taM tsa dib tsa/ zhes pa la/ nak+taM di baM/ rAtriM tsa di ba tsa/ zhes pa la/ rA triM di baM/ a hash+tsa dib tsa/ zhes ba glang / brla dang dbyi mgo/ mad+ma dbyi mgo/ pa la/ a hardibaM/ rkang pa dang rlang mong / de rnams zlas
[\[142a.5\]]dbye'i bsdu ba'o/ /sa radza sA/ zhes pa la/ sar dza saM/ de mi zad pa'i bsdu ba'o/ rkang rlang mor/ mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang / nyin mtshan/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo yang / nyin mtshan/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo yang / nish+tsi taM shre yaH/ zhes pha la/ ni shre yaM/ pu ru Sha s+ya  nyin mo nyin mo/ A yuH/ zhes pa la/ bu ru ShA
[\[142a.6\]]yu ShaM/ dwa yoHA yuH/ zhes  thal bde/ de thal ba/ ba la/ d+w+ya yu ShaM/ tra yA NAMM A yuH/ zhes pa la/ t+r+yA yu ShaM/ de rnams de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'o/ /r-ika tsa ya dzush+tsa/ zhes pa la/ r-ig+Ya dzuShaM/ de zlas  des par dge ba/ des bar dge ba/ skyes bu'i tshe/ dbye'i bsdu pa'o/ /dzatash+tsa  skyes bu'i tsho/
[\[142a.7\]]gnyis dag gi tshe/ uk+Sha sh+tsa so+o/ zhes pa la/ dzato k+ShaM /glang rgyal/ gnyis kyi tshe/ gsum gyi tshe/ ma hAM sh+tsauk+Shash+tsAso+o/ glang yang 'di chen po yang ngo / zhes pa la/ ma hok+ShaM/ glang chen po/ braMng+ng+hash+tsa uk+Shash+tsA so+o/ rgad po yang 'di grang yang ngo / zhes pa la/ braMng+t+hok+ShaM/ glang rgan/ de rnams nge'i skyes bu'i glang yang 'di rgyal ba yang ngo /
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]nang tshan las 'dzin gyi bsdu ba'o/ /shunaHsa mI paM/ zhes pa la/ u pa shunaM/ de mi zad par gyur pa'i bsdu pa'o/ /go Sh+TheshwAH/ zhes pa la/ goSh+ThA shwAH/ brah+ma hasti b+h+yaM pa r+ts+tsasaH/ brang+ma ha sti dag las brtsas las so/ brah+ma dang hasti sngon ma'i bar+ts+tsas las bsdu pa'i mtha' la a tsa'i rkyen 'jug
[\[142b.2\]]ste/ brah+ma tsa ba rtsa sh+tsAso+o/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye  khye nye ba/ khyi nye ba/ sogs phyis/ atsa byin/ brah+ma brtsa saM/ de bzhin du/ re ba na khyi rnams/ rabaHkhyi rnams/ hasti sh+tsa brtsam sh+tsAso+o/ zhes pa la/ hasti brtsasaM/ de de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i nang tshan las 'dzin gyi bsdu ba'i mtha' la a tsa byin pa'o/ /
[\[142b.3\]]tshangs pa yang 'di gzi brjid kyang ngo / 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ alparA dzab+ng+yAM tsa/ a lba rA dza dag las  tshangs pa gzi brjid/ kyang ngo / alpa dang rA dzan sdon ma'i brtsas la'ang bsdu  glang po che lang 'di gzi brjid kyang ngo / glang po che gzi brjid/ ba'i mtha' la a tsa 'gyur te/ aldaM brtso ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/
[\[142b.4\]]a lnga brtsa saM/ de 'dru mang po'i/ rAdzAtsa brtsa sh+tsAso+o/ zhes pa la/ rAdza brtsa saM/ zhes pa las 'dzin no/ /a ba sa man+ng+he b+h+yaHta ma saH/ a ba saMan+ng+ha rnams las ta mas la'o/ /a ba saM an+ng+ha rnams sngon ma'i ta mas las bsdu ba'i mtha' la atsa 'gyur te  gang gi gzi brjid chung ngu/ a
[\[142b.5\]]gzi brjid chung ngu / rgyal po yang 'di gzi brjid kyang ngo / rgyal po gzi brjid/ ba ta mo ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ a ba ta ma saM/ de bzhin du/ saM ta mo yas+ya/ zhes pa la/ saM ta ma saM/ an+ng+hadz+nyA naM ta mo ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ an+ng+ha ta ma saM/ de rnams 'bru mang ngo / /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ swa
[\[142b.6\]]si ba shI yaHshre ya saH/ sras las ba shi yas shre yas dag las so/ /swas gang gi kun du bro ba snga ma'i ba shI yas  kun du khrog gang gi rgyun du khrob dang shre yas dag la'ang a tsa  rgyun du khro ba gang gi rmongs ba shes med khro ba/ rmongs ba khros ba 'gyur te/ swaHba shI yaH zhes pa la/ sA ba shI yasaM/ de bzhin du  swaH
[\[142b.7\]]shre yaH/ zhes pa la/ swo shre ya sAM/ mtho ris dge ba/ a n+wa ba ta p+tA dra ha saH/ a nu a pa  tang+ta las ra has las so/ /a nu a ba tap+ta rnams sngon ma'i ra has las a tsa 'gyur te/ a nu tiSh+Thar ha si/ dben par rjes su gnas/ zhes pa la/ mtho ris kyi gnas/ mtho ris gnas/ a nu ra ha  mtho ris dga'/
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]saM! a ba tiSh+Tha ra hasi/ zhes pa la/ a ba ra ha saM/ de gnyis mi zad par gyur pa'i bsdu ba'o/ /tap+ta ta par ha si tiSh+Tha ya s+yasaH/ zhes pa la/ tap+tar ha saM/ zhes pa 'bru mang ngo / /bra te rur saH/ pra ti las u ras las so/ /pra ti sngon ma'i u ras las atsa 'gyur te/ ur
[\[143a.2\]]sipra ti tsi h+naM  dben par rjes su/ dben par kun du gnas/ kun du dben par/ brta te/ zhes pa la/ prat+yu ra saM/ de mi zad  gang gi dka' thub pa dka' thub la dben pa/ dben bar dka' thub/ pa'i bsdu ba'o/ /a nu ga ba mA yA me/ a nu las go la rgyas pa la'o/ /a nu sngon ma'i go las rgyas thang la so sor mtshan nyid yod/
[\[143a.3\]]pa'i don brjod pa la a tsa 'gyur te/ anA yA maM yAn yuk+taM ga bAM/ zhes pa la/ a nu ga baM/ zhes brang so sor/ pa mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ u pa sa rgA da b+h+wanaHnyer bsgyur las ang+h+wan la'o/ nyer bsgyur sngon ma'i ang+h+wan la atsa 'gyur zhing an yang dbyi ste/ pra
[\[143a.4\]]ga taHang+h+rA naM/ zhes pa la/ prAng+hAH/ rjes su rgyas pa'i d+yed shing rta 'dren ba'i ba lang rnams/ rjes su ba lang / na pU dzanAta/ bstod pa las ma yin no/ /bstod pa'i don can las bsdu ba'i mtha' la rkyen gang yang 'gyur ba ma yin te/ suSh+Tu rA dzA/ zhes pa la/ su rA dzA/ de bzhin du/ a ti sha ye nA rA
[\[143a.5\]]rab tu 'gro ba'i lam/ dzA/ zhes pa la/ lam rag/ a ti rAdzA/ de rnams mi zad par gyur pa'i bsdu ba'o/ ki maHk+She pe/ kim gyi phrag dog la'o/ /kim gyi sgra phrag dog gi don brjod pa can la bsdu ba'i mtha' la rkyen gang yang mi 'gyur te/ kim  rgyal po legs po ma bzang / phul du byung ba'i rgyal po/
[\[143a.6\]]rA dzA/ na nyastat+pu ru ShAta/ na nya'i de'i skyes bu las so/ rgyal po bul byung / /na nya de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mtha' las rkyen gang yang mi 'gyur te/ na rAdzA/ zhes pa la/ arA dzA/ de bzhin du/ na sa khA/ zhes pa la/ a sa khA/ pa tho bib+hA ShA/ pa thin gyi  ci'i rgyal po/ 'dam ka'o/ pa thin gyi sgra la na nya
[\[143a.7\]]de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i mthang la a tsa ster ba da mi ster pa 'dam ka can te/ napan+thAH/ lam min/ zhes pa la/ a tsa yang na bar byas pas/ apan+thAH/ apa thaM/ rgyal po min/ grogs min/ 'grel par tshig sdud kyi  grogs min/ skabs 'dir a ba sh+yam la sogs pa'i ma dbyi bar 'dod do zhes bshad
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]pas/ de yang ji skad du/ lum+ped ba sh+yamaHkr-i t+ye tuM kA ma ma na sor pi/ sa mo rA gi ta ta ta yorgAM sa s+ya pa tsi yuT+g+ha nyoH/ zhes pa byung ste/ de bod skad du/ kr-i ta la a ba sh+yam gyi ma dbye ste/ kA ma ma nas dag las dum gyi yang / hi ta ta ta la sam gyi yang na ste/ mA sa'i a ni yuT g+ha nya la/ zhes
[\[143b.2\]]gsungs te/ a ba sh+yam zhes pa'i pha rol tu byings kr-i ta sogs kyi mtha' can byung na/ a ba sh+yam gyi ma dbyi ba ste/ a ba sh+yaM b+hAbyaH/ zhes pa la/ pha rol tu kraM ta sogs kyi rkyen can byung bas ma phyis/ a ba sh+ya b+hA byaM/ de bzhin du/ byings tu ma gyi rkyen can gyi pha rol tu kA ma dang ma nas gang rung bzhig byung na
[\[143b.3\]]tum gyi ma dbye ste/ gan+tuMgA maH/ zhes pa lam phyis/ gan+tu kA maH/ de bzhin du/ gan+te+e+u ma nAH/ zhes pa la/ gan+tu ma nAH/ los kyang bden/ de bzhin du/ nyer bsgyur sam gyi pha rol tu hi ta dang ta ta gang rung byung na sam gyi ma yang na dbyi ste/ saM hi taH/ zhe pa rang gnas sam yang nam phyis pas/ sa hitaH/ saM hitaH/
[\[143b.4\]]de bzhin du/ saM tataH/ 'gro bar 'dod/ yang na/ sa ta taH/ mAM sa'i pha rol tu byings patsa g+ha nya'am/ yuTa'i rkyen  yid 'gro bar byed/ can byur na mAM sa'i sa yi a dbyi ba'am yang na mi dbyi ste/ mAM sa s+ya pa tsa naM/ zhes pa la/ mAM spa can/ yang na/ mAM sa pa tsa naM/ de bzhin du/ mAMs s+ya pAkaHgrogs bzang po/
[\[143b.5\]]zhes pa la/ mAM spA ka lpa nge la bzang so de lang zang po/ yang na/ mAM sa pA kaH/ zhes pa ltabu'o/ yang 'grel par/ kA ba dang ma nas pha rol la yang sam gyi ma yang na dbyi'o zhes byung bas/ saMkAmo yas+ya/ zhes pa la/ sa kA maH/ yang na/ sha btsos pa/ sa kA maH/ de bzhin du/ sha btsos gsam no ya s+ya/ zhes pa
[\[143b.6\]]la! sa ma naH/ yang na/ saM mnaH/ ung ka s+yod s+sa dz+nyA sha btsos pa/ yAM/ ming la ud ka'i ud 'o/ /ming gi don dang 'brel pa'i u dka ni ung zhes par 'gyur te/ u dkash+tsA so+o  gang gi yang dag 'dod/ yang dag 'dod/ meg+hash+tsA/ zhes pa la/ u da me g+haH/ gang gi yang dag 'dod/ gang gi yid phang dga'
[\[143b.7\]]dang pa'i yid/ dang ba'i yid/ de bzhin du/ lo hita sh+tsAso+o ung ka sh+tsa/ dmar po yang 'di chung par ngo / zhes pa la/ lo hi to daH/ chu dmar po/ k+ShIrash+tsA so+o ung kash+tsa 'om yang 'di chu'ang ngo / zhes pa la/ k+ShI ro daH/ 'o chu/ pe Sha bA sa bA ha na  chu yang 'di smin yang ngo / /chu sgrin/ ng+hiShutsa/ pe Sha bAs bAha na ng+hi rnams la yang ngo /
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]peSha la sogs pa 'di rnams dang sbyor ba'i u dka 'ang yang na u da zhes par 'gyur te/ u dke na peShaM/ zhes pa la/ ung pe ShaM/ yang na/ u dka be+e Sha/ de bzhin du/ ud ke b+nga saH/ zhes pa la/ ud bA saH/ yang na/ u dka bAsaH/ ud ka s+ya bA
[\[144a.2\]]ha naH/ zhes pa la/ u dbA hanaH/ yang na/ u dka bA hanaH/ u dkaMng+hi ya smin/ zhes pa la/ ud ng+hiH/ chu yis phye mar byas/ yang na/ ud kang+hiH/ e ka ha lA do+o pUr yi ta bye nyan+ya tar s+yAM/ dang  tshul gnas pa/ por hal  chu gnas/ chu gnas/ gcig pa la gang bar byed pa
[\[144a.3\]]la yang na'o/ /gang ba'i don dang  chu thob pa/ 'brel pa'i u dka dang sbyor ba'i tshig  gang la chu gter/ chu gter/ grogs de la tshig de'i yi ge dang po de hal/ chu gter gcig pa ste/ yi ge gnyis gsum brtsegs pa min na u dka nyid u da ru yang na 'gyur te/ ud ka s+ya pUr NaM
[\[144a.4\]]kum+b+haM/ zhes pa la/ ud kum+b+haM/ yang na/ u dka kum+b+haM/ de bzhin du/ ud ka s+ya pU ra NaMpA traM/ zhes pa la/ud bA traM/ yang na/ ud ka bA traM/ yi ge sngon ma brtsegs pa yin na mi 'gyur te/ ud ka s+ya bU ra NaM s+thA lI/ zhes pa la/ u da ka s+thA lI/ chus gang ba'i bu ma gaman+tho+o
[\[144a.5\]]da na sak+tu ba'i n+tu badzra b+hA ra hAr bI chu bum/ bang+ha gA he Shu tsa/ man+tha chubum/ chus gang ba'i snod/ od na  sak+tu  ban+tI+u  badzra  b+hAr  hA ra bI  pa chu snod/ chu snod/ ng+ha  gA ha rnams la'ang ngo / /man+tha sogs 'di rnams pha rol  chus gang ba'i snod/ la'ang ud ka ni ud zhes par  chu snod/ yang na 'gyur te/ ud
[\[144a.6\]]ka man+thaH/ zhes pa la/ ud man+thaH/ ya nge na/ ud ka man+thaH/ de bzhin du/ u dkash+tsa o da naM tsa/ zhes pa la/ u do da naM/ u dkod naM/ u dken mi shri to sak+tuH/ zhes pa la/ ud sak+tu/ u da ka sak+tu/ ud ka s+ya bin+tuH/ zhes pa la/ u dbaMMn+duH/ u dka bin+duH/ u dka
[\[144a.7\]]chul s+ya badzraH/ zhes pa la/ u  chu srub ma/ srubs/ da badzram  ser ga  u dka badzraH/ ser ba/ u  'bras zan dang chu yang / da ka s+ya b+hA  chu 'bras zan/ chu dang bsres ba'i rtsam ba ste zan no/ /r+yaH/ chu yi khur bo/ zhes pa la/ zin nam pa la/ chu li thigs pa/ u da b+hAraH/ chu khur/ chu khur/ u dka chu thigs/ chu thigs b+hAraH/ ser ba
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]u da ka s+ya hAr pI/ zhes pa la/ u da hA ra bI/ u dka hA ra bI/ u dke bang+haH/ zhes pa la/ u da bang+haH/ u da kash+tsa so+o gA hash+tsa/ zhes pa la/ u da ga haH/ u de ka ga haH/ 'grel par lung drangs ba/ i kohra swo \u0f85 ng+Yo gA la bas+ya/ dI ba ma yin pa'i i ka thung ngur gAl
[\[144b.2\]]chu yi 'khor/ pa'i'o/ bsdu pa'i  skabs chu 'khor/ chu 'khor/ chul bskyur/ 'dir dI ba mtha' can ma yin pa'i  chu skyur/ chu yang 'di gting ring po yang ngo / ika so sor bsdu pa'i yi ge red po  chu gting ring / rnams yang na thung ngur 'gyur ba sngon gyi drang srong gA la pa 'dod do zhes bshad pas/ grA ma N+yaHpu traH/
[\[144b.3\]]zhes pa la/ grA maNi pu traH/ yang na/ grA ma NI bu traH/ ekAta ng+ngI te ca/ e ka'i da phan la'ang ngo / /e kA zhes pa'i mtha' ni de phan gyi rkyen pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur te/ e kA sab+ha ba/ bya ba'i don de phan gyi rkyen ta phyin/ rnam dbye phyis/ A thung ngur gyur/ nA ba e ka tA/ d+YA  grong gi phra ma mkhan gyi bu/
[\[144b.4\]]poHsaMdz+nyA tsha n+da so rbahu laM/ grong gi phra ma mkhan gyi bu/ dI pa A pa dag gi ming sde ba sbyor dag las mang po'o/ /dIb kyi mtha' dang A pa kyi mtha' dag ming dang sde ba sbyor sogs la thung  gcig gi dngos po/ ngur mang po 'gyur te/ re ba t+yaHmidraH/ zhes pa la rnam dbye byis/ re ba tI  dngos po gcig ma/ drung ngur song /
[\[144b.5\]]re ba ti mi traH/ de bzhin du/ sha lA yAHba haH/ zhes pa la/ shel ba haM/ iSh+Ta ke ShI kA mA lA nAM ci ta tU la b+hA riShu/ iSh+Ta kA IShI kA  mA lwa rnams kyi tsi ta tU la b+hAr rnams la'o/ /i Sh+Ta kA la sogs bde rnams  skar ma'i gnyen/ kyi pha rol tu rim bzhin/ tsi ta la sogs pa de rnams byung na/
[\[144b.6\]]i Sh+Ta kA la \u0f7csong sa pa de rnams kyi mtha' thung ngur 'gyur te/ rdo thob pa/ si Sh+Ta kA yA \u0f7ftsi ta \u0f7f/ zhes pa la/ i Sh+Ta kAyAHtU laM/ zhes pa la/ I ShI ka tUlaM/ de bzhin du/ I ShI kA yAHtU laM/ zhes pa la/ I ShI ka tU laM/ mA lA tsA sau b+ha rI tsa/ zhes pa la/ mAl b+hA rI/ dz+yo ti rdzan pa da rA ti nA b+hi nA mgo tra rU pastAn bar+Nab yo ba
[\[144b.7\]]tsa na/ ban+ng+shuShu dz+yo ti Sha  dzan pa da  rAtrinA b+hi nA mgo tra  rU pa  swAn  bar+Na  ba yas  ba  so phag gi rtsig pa/ so phag gi rtsig pa/ so bag mnyam pa'am mtshungs pa'am 'dra ga  tsan ban+tu rnams la'o/ dz+yo tiShal  phreng ba lang 'di lci ba yang ngo / phreng ba lci mo/ sogs pa 'di rnams pha rol las ma nA zhes pa'i sgra ni sa zhes/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]par 'gyur te/ samA naMdz+yo ti r+Y+Ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la rnam dbye phrad sogs phyis/ sa mAn/ sa zhes par 'gyur/ sadz+yotiH/ de bzhin du/ samA naM dzan pa do ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa dzan padaH/ sa mA naMrAtri r+Ya s+ya so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa rA triH/ sa mA naM na bir+Yas+yA so+o/
[\[145a.2\]]zhes pa la/ sa nA b+hiH/ samA naMnAm  gang gi mtshungs pa'i 'od 'di/ s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa nA ma/ samA naM go tro ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ mtshungs pa'i 'od/ gang gi skye ba'i yul mtshungs pa 'di/ sa gotraH/ sam naM ru ngo / skye yur mtshungs pa/ gang gi mnyam pa'i mtshan mo 'di/ mtshan mnyam pa/ gang gi lte ba mtshungs pa 'di/
[\[145a.3\]]ya s+yA so+o/ zhes  lte ba mtshungs/ gang gi ming mtshungs pa 'di/ pa la/ sa ru paH/ samAnaM s+thA naM  ming mtshungs pa/ gang gi rigs mtshungs pa 'di/ ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sas+thA naM/ samAnaM bar+Na \u0f7cya  rigs mtshungs/ gang gi gzugs mtshungs pa 'di/ s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sabar+NaH/ sa mAnaM ba yo ya s+yA so+o/ zhes
[\[145a.4\]]pa la/ sa pa yaH/ samAnaM btsa no ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa ba  gzugs mtshungs/ gang gi gnas mtshungs pa 'di/ tsa naH/ sa mA naM ban+nuHya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ gnas mtshungs/ gang gi mdog mtshungs ba 'di/ saban+duH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa /piN+Dag n+d+ha  mdog mnyam pa/ gang gi na tshod mtshungs ba 'di/
[\[145a.5\]]lo hi ta  na tshod mtshungs pa/ gang gi brjod pa mtshungs pa 'di/ kuk+Shi be NI pat+nI pa k+She Shu/ pi N+Da gan+ng+ha lo hi ta  ku k+Shi  pe NI  brjod pa mtshungs pa/ gang gi gnyen bshes mtshungs pa 'di/ pat+nI pa k+Sha rnams la'o/ /pi N+Da la  gnyen mtshungs/ sogs pa 'di rnams pha rol la'ang sa mA na sa ru 'gyur te/ sa mA naM pi N+Do yas+yA
[\[145a.6\]]so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa piN+DaH/ de bzhin du/ sa mAnaM gan+ng+ho ya s+yA so+o/ zhes ba la/ sa gan+ng+haH/ sa mA naM lo hi to ya s+yA so/ zhes pa la/ sa lo hitaH/ samA naM ku k+ShiHyas+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa kuk+ShaH/ sa mAnaM be NI ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sapeNI/ sa mA naM pat+nI gang gi bda' kha mtshungs pa 'di
[\[145a.7\]]ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa 'dar kha mtshungs pa/ gang gi dri mtshungs pa 'de/ pat+nI/ bdag mo mtshungs pa/ dri mtshungs pa/ gang gi dmar po mtshungs pa 'di/ dmar bo mtshungs pa/ gang gi mkhal mtshungs pa 'di/ mkha' ma mtshungs pa/ gang gi lcang ma mtshungs pa 'di/ lcang li mtshungs pa/ gang gi bdag mo mtshungs pa 'di/ sa mA naM pak+Sho ya s+yA
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]so+o/ zhes pa la/ sapak+ShaH/ tsa ra Ne brah+ma tsA ti Ni/ spyod pa la brah+matsA ril 'o/ /spyod ba'i don dang 'brel ba'i brah+ma tsA ri zhes pa pha rol la'ang sa mA nas ru 'gyur te/ samAnaM brah+ma tsA rI ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa bra h+matsA rI/ tIr+tha la ya la'o/ tIr+tha ya'i rkyen can pha rol la 'ang sa mAn sa ru 'gyur te/ sa mAnaM
[\[145b.2\]]gang gi phyogs mtshungs pa 'di/ phyogs mtshungs pa/ tIr+th+ya ya s+yA so+o/ zhes pa la/ sa tIr+th+yaH/ big+hASho da re/ u dar la 'dam ka'o/ /ya rkyen can gyi mu dar pha rol la gang gi tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs pa 'di/ sa mAn sa ru 'gyur pa dang mi 'gyur pa 'dam ka can te/ sa man mud r+Yo ya gyA so+o/ zhes pa la /rnam dbye phrad
[\[145b.3\]]sogs phyis/ sa mAn sa ru 'gyur ba dang mi  gang gi bsti gnas mtshungs pa 'di/ bsti gnas mtshungs pa/ 'gyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ so dar+YaH/ yang na/ samA no dar+YaH/ dr-i ka dra sha btu Shu/ dr-i ka dri sha btu rnams la'o/ dr-ika dang dr-i sha pha rol dar gang gi lto bas mtshungs pa 'di/ ba tu'i rkyen can rnams pha rol

[\[149a.1\]]rnam dbye la/ ma Shapa pAM ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ TA in ma Sha bA pe Sha/ yu ba de r+Na/ yu ban sogs kyi ma yin no/ /mdo snga ma'i mtshan nyid rnams tshang yang yu ba na sogs kyen Na ra mi 'gyur te/ ra mya sh+tsA so+o yu bA tsa/ zhes pa la/ TA ramya yA nA/
[\[149a.2\]]de bzhin du/ ra myas+yA haH/ zhes pa la/ gang gi sran ma'i sa bon/ mAr myA h+nA/ ku ma ti tsa/ sran son/ ku ldan pa la'ang ngo / /tshig sngon ma de la na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yi ge yod la/ tshig phyi ma de'i yi ge dang po la ku yid 'phrog pa yang 'di dar bab kyang ngo / /yid 'phrog dar bab kyi
[\[149a.3\]]ldan pa snye/ rtse ba'i nyi ma/ ka sde'i yi ge yod na'ang na Nar  rtsa bas nyi ma/ yang na 'gyur te/ ha reHkA mi nI/ zhes pa la/ ha ri kA mi Ni/ de bzhin du/ shuSh+ka tsA so+o go ma yaM tsa/ zhes pa la/ shuSh+ka go ma ye Na/ pa dbya bA ya \u0f85bi/ tshig bar na yod pa la'ang ngo / mdo stam de
[\[149a.4\]]rnams kyi rgyu mtshan rnams tshang yang de'i bar na tshig yod na na Nar mi 'gyur te/ ma 'phrog byed kyi 'dod pa la/ Shash+tsakum+b+hash+tsa bA pash+tsa/ zhes pa lha/ skam po'ang 'di ba'ang gi l+tsi ba'ang ngo / /bu la/ ma Sha  lci bskam po/ kum+b+ha bA pen/ de bzhin du/ tsatush+tsAng+hash+tsa yog sh+tsa/ zhes pa
[\[149a.5\]]la/ tsa tu rang+ga yo ge na/ pA ra skar pra b+h+raMtI ni tsa saM dz+nyA yAM/ pAr skar la sogs pa rnams kyang ming la'o/ /pA ra ska sran ma dang bum pa dngas bon dang / ral sogs pa rnams kyang ming brjod pa  sman ma bum pa sa bon gyis/ la gzugs lags pa rnams su 'gyur bzhi dang yan lag dang sbyor ba dang
[\[149a.6\]]te tshig phrad do/ /yan lag bzhi sbyor gyis/ pAraHka ro ti/ zhes pa la/ pAr skaraH/ de bzhin du/ kiHkiMng+hAya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ kiSh+kin+ng+hA/ ba naHpa tiH/ zhes pa la/ ban spa tiH/ ang+haHshir shi ba de/ ang+hashir shI'i pad la'o/ /a ng+ha dang shir shI'i rnam bcad ni pa da pha
[\[149a.7\]]rol las ru 'gyur te/ ang+haHpa daM/ 'og rkang pa/ pha rol byed pa/ zhes pa la/ pha rol byed pa/ ang+ha spa daM/ 'og rkang pa/ gang gi ci caM tshad/ de bzhin du/ tsa tsi'i ched/ nags kyi bdag po/ /nags bdag/ shir shIHpadaM/ mgo [(]borkang [,]brkong[)] pa/ shi ra shI spadaM/ pany+ca myAHste kA daMb+h+yaH/ sto ka/
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]la sogs pa rnams lnga pa'i 'o/ /sto ka la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi rnam dbye lnga pa tshig phyi ma la mi dbye ste/ sto kA n+suk+taH/ ngUrAn+muk+taH/ alpAn+mak+taH/ kr-its+tshA n+nuk+taH/ ka ti pa yAn+muk+taH/ o dzas+sa ho nya m+b+ha sta mas st-i tI yA yAH/ o dzas/ sa has/ am+b+has/
[\[149b.2\]]ta mas las gsum pa'i'o/ /o jas la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi gsum pa tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi ste/ chung ru las grol/ ring po las grol/ nyung ngu las grol/ dka' ba las grol/ cung zad las grol/ o dzasAkr-itaM/ sa ha sAkraM taM/ am+w+ha sA kraMtaM/ tam sAkraMtaM/ ma na saH
[\[149b.3\]]saM dz+nyA yAM/ ma nas las ming la'o/ /ma nas la pha rol gyi rnam dbye gsum pa'i tshig phyim la ming brjod pa la mi dbye ste/ ma na sA gu p+taH/ ma na sA de bI/ A dz+nyA yi ni tsa/ A dz+nyA yin la'ang ngo / /gzi brjid kyis byas/ lhan cig gis byas/ chu yis byas/ khro bar byas/ ma nas las pha rol
[\[149b.4\]]gsum pa ni Adz+nyA yin tshig phyi mar gyur pa'ang mi dbyi ste/ man sA dz+nyAyI/ At+ma na sh+tsa pU ra Ne/ At+ma na las kyang rdzogs pa  yid kyi spas pa/ yid kyis lha mo/ la'o/ At+ma na las kyang pha rol gyi gsum pa ni grangs rdzogs pa'i rkyen can gyi tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi ste/ TA At+manA
[\[149b.5\]]pany+tsa maH/ Ta At+manAShaSh+thaH /pra kr-i t+yA di b+h+yash+tsa/ prakraM  yid kyis bka'/ ti sogs rnams las kyang ngo / /pra ky-i ti la sogs pa rnams las kyang pha rol gyi gsum pa ni tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi ste/ prakr-it+yAtsa rUH/ prakr-i t+yA tsarUH/ be+eyAkar NA khyA yAM tsa tu r+th+thaH/ brda sprod pa'i
[\[149b.6\]]bdag nyid kyis lnga pa/ bdag nyid rtsis drug pa/ ming la bzhi pa ya'i'o/ /brda sprod pa'i ming gi don can At+man las pha rol gyi bzhi pa ni tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi ste/ At+ma ne ba daM/ At+ma ne b+hA ShA/ pa ra s+ya tsa/ rang bzhin gyis gzugs/ rang bzhin gyis mdzes pa/ ba ra'i 'ang ngo / /don sngon ma ltar la
[\[149b.7\]]At+man du ma zad par las kyang pha rol gyi bzhi ba ni tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi ste/ ba ra smai pa daM/ gzhan gyi ched kyi tshig/ pa rasme+e b+hA ShA/ gzhan gyi ched du bshad pa/ bdag nyid kyi ched kyi tshig /bdag nyid kyi ched kyi bshad pa/ ha la dan+tAt+sa p+ta myAHsaMdz+nyA yAM/ ha la ata mtha' las bdun pa'i ming la'o/
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]hal mtha' can dang a ta mtha' las pha rol gyi bdun pa ni ming la tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi ste/ /ga bi yu d+hi b+h+yAM s+thi raHga bi yu d+hi dag las s+thi ra'i 'o/ /ga bi dang yu d+hi dag las pha rol gyi s+thir zhes pa'i sa ni Sha ru 'gyur ro/ /ga bi s+thi raH/ zhes pa la
[\[150a.2\]]mdo sngon mas bdun pa mi dbyi/ mdo 'dis sa Sha/ sa Shar song bas tha'ang Sha/ ga bi Sh+thi ra \u0f7f/ de bzhin du/ yu d+hi s+thi ra na/ zhes pa la/ yu d+hi Sh+Thi raH/ yang mi dbyi ba kho nar ma nges te/ a+wa ra n+ye s+thi raH/ zhes pa la/ A ra n+ya s+thi raH/ bar+She dzaH/ bar+Sha dzaH/ trid d+Yu b+h+yaM tsa/ ba lang la gnas/ tr-id di pa
[\[150a.3\]]dag las kyang ngo / /hr-i da dang dpi dag las kyang pha rol gyi bdun pa tshig phyi  ba lang la gnas/ ma la mi dbyi ste/ hr-i di sbr-i ka/ g.yul ngor brtan pa/ di pi sbr-i ka /ma d+h+y+wa d+gu rau/ ma d+h+ya las dgon pa la gnas/ dgon pa na gnas/ gu ru la'o/ /dbyar skyes/ ma d+h+ya las pha rol gyi bdun pa ni gu ru tshig phyi
[\[150a.4\]]mar gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/ ma d+h+ye gu ruH/ a n+tA ts+tsa/ a n+ta las kyang ngo / a n+ta las pha rol gyi bdun pa ni  snying la rag /gu ru tshig phyi mar mtho ris la reg /gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/ a n+te gu ruH/ a mU r+d+d+ha ma sta kA t+sA d+ga da kA me/ mU r+d+d+r+wa ma sta ka kA ma la ma yin zhing rang lus las
[\[150a.5\]]so/ /rang gi lus kyi yan lag dbus na bla ma/ las pha rol gyi bdun pa tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi zhing mU r+d+d+ha ma sta ka kA ma rnams la dbyi'o/ /ka n+Tha kA laH/ u ra si lo mA/ u da re/ mtha' na bla ma/ ma Ni rtsa/ mU r+d+d+ha so gi sel/ mU r+d+d+ha ni shi kha/ zhes pa la/ mU r+d+d+ha shi khA/ su sta ke
[\[150a.6\]]shi khU/ zhes pa la/ ma sta ka shi khA/ mu khe kA mo ya s+ya/ zhes pa la/ mu kha kA maH/ pa n+d+he tsa ba b+hA ShA/ ban+d+ha la'ang gdam da'o/ mgrin nag /tshig sngon ma'i brang la sU/ bo ba la nor bu/ mtha'i bdun pa ni ban+d+ha pha rol la dbyi ba dang mi  spyi bo la gtsug phud/ spyi bo gtsug phud/ dbyi ba 'dam
[\[150a.7\]]ka can thod pa la gtsug phud/ te/ gang gi gdong la dang sam/ ha sta ban+d+haH/ lag pa la bcings/ zhes pa la/ gdong la dngas ma/ ha sta ban+d+haH/ lag pa la bcings/ yang na rang gnas/ de bzhin du/ tsa kre ban+d+haH/ 'khor lo la bsdams/ tsa kre ba n+d+haH/ ta t+pu ru She kr-i ti ba hu laM/ de'i skyes bu la kr-i ta la mang po'o/ /
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba la bdun pa'i mtha' can mang po kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen can pha rol la mi dbyi ste/ /sta sbe ra maH/ ka r+Ni dza paH/ prA pr-i Ta sha ra t+ka la di bAM dze/ prA br-iSha sha ra ta kA la di ba rnams kyi dza la'o/ /prA br-iSha sogs 'di rnams kyi pha rol gyi bdun po ni dza tshig phyi mar
[\[150b.2\]]gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/ /dri prA br-iShi dzaH/ di  sha ra di dzaH/ dri kA le dzaH/ dri di bi dzaH/ bi b+hA ShA bar+Sha  sdong po dga'/ rna bar zlos ba/ k+Shar bar sha rA+e ta/ bar+Sha k+Sha ra shar ba ra las gdam por/ /bak+Sha la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi pha rol gyi bdun pa'ang dza tshig phyi mar gyur pa
[\[150b.3\]]la dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba 'dam ka can te/ dbyar skyes/ ston skyes/ dus la skyes/ mtho ris skyes/ bar+She dzaH/ bar+Sha dzaH/ k+Sha re dzaH/ k+Sha ra dzaH/ sha re dzaH/ sha ra dzaH/ ba re dzaH/ ba re dzaH/ sha ya bA sa bA si ShA kA lA ta/ sha ya bA sa grA sin rnams la dus ma yin pa la'o/ /tshig sngon
[\[150b.4\]]ma'i bdun pa ni dus kyi don tsam ma yin pa'i sha ya sogs pha rol la dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba 'dam lo la skyes/ ka ca na te/ 'gyur skyes/ mda' skyes/ mnga' skyes/ mchog skyes/ swe sha yaH/ swa sha yaH/ grA me bA saH/ grA ma bA saH/ grA me bA sI/ grA ma kA sI/ 'grel par
[\[150b.5\]]lung drangs pa/ a po yo ni dza ma ti Shu/ a pa las yo ni dzam ti rnams la'o/ /a pa kyi pha rol gyi bdun pa ni yo ni sogs 'di rnams tshig phyi mar gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/ ap+su  bdag nyal/ yo ni+uH/ ap+su dza/ grong la bsdad/ u p+su ma tiH/ grong du bsdang / Shab+Y+ya A kro she/
[\[150b.6\]]drug pa ni khros tshig la'o/ /drug pa'i mtha' ni khros tshig rtogs par byed pa na tshig phyi ma la mi dbyi ste/ tsai ra s+ya ku laM/ dA sa s+ya ku laM/ bA ka di k+pa sh+ya d+d+h+yo yu k+ti da n+Da ha re Shu/ lbA ka de sha pa sh+yata rnams chu rnams la skyes pa la yu k+ti da N+Da chu rnams la blo gros ha ra rnams la'o/ /srA ga di sha
[\[150b.7\]]pa sh+ya ta rnams las pha rol gyi drug pa ni rim pa bzhin/ yu k+ti N+Da ha ra rnams tshig phyi mar gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/ chom rkun gyi rigs/ /dran gyi rigs/ /bA ko yu k+tiH/ ngag gi sbyor ba/ di sho daN+Da/ phyogs kyi dbyug pa/ bash+ya to ha raH/ mthong ba'i 'phrog pa/ she pha pu ts+tsha lA d+gu le Sha shu naH/ sha na las
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]she pha pu ts+tsha lA d+gu la rnams la'o/ /shwa na las pha rol gyi drug pa ni she pha sogs 'di rnams tshig phyi mar gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/ shu naHshe phaH/ shu naHpu ts+tshaH/ shu naHlU d+gu laH/ pu tre nya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ pu tra la yang na'o/ pu tra tshig phyi ma la khros tshig
[\[151a.2\]]rtogs par byed pa la drug pa yang na mi dbyi ste/ dA s+yA pu taH/ dA sI pu traH/ br-i Sha l+yA pu traH/ priSha lI pu traH/ khros tshig ma yin na dbyi ba nyid de/ brA h+ma n+yA pu khyi'i rtags/ khyi'i mjug ma/ khyi'i mdzum mo/ traH/ zhes pa la/ brA h+ma NI pu traH/ r-i to bi d+ya yo ni se bar+d+hi b+h+yaH/ t-i ta las rig
[\[151a.3\]]pa skye gnas 'brel pa rnams las so/ /r-i ta mtha' bran mo'i'u/ blan mo'i bu/ las rig pa dang  dmangs rig mo'i bu/ 'brel pa dang skye gnas ngang 'brel ba can las bram ze mo'i bu/ pha rol gyi drug pa ni rig pa dang skye gnas dang 'brel pa can bram ze mo'i bu/ gyi tshig phyi mar gyur pa la mi dbyi ste/
[\[151a.4\]]ngas  ho tuHbu tra/ ngas  ho tu ra n+te bA sI/ bi b+hA ShA swa sr-i pa troH/ swa sr-i pa te dag la gdam nga'o/ /swa sr-i dang pa ti dag tshig phyi mar gyur ba las tshigs ma'i r-ita mtha'i pha rol gyi drug pa ni dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba 'dam ka can te/ na nAM duHpa triH/ na nI dr-i pa tiH/ du hi tuHpa tiH/ du hi tr-i pa ti/
[\[151a.5\]]sbyin sreg mkhan gyi bu/ sbyin sreg mkhan gyi nye gnas/ mA tuHswa sA+e/ mA tr-i Sh+wa sA/ mA tr-i pi tr-i b+h+yAM swa sA/ mA tr-i pi tr-i dag las swa sr-i'o/ /mA tr-i dang pi tr-i dag gi pha rol du swa sr-i byung na sa'i sa Shar 'gyur te/ mA tuHswa sA/ mA tr-i Sh+wa sA/ a chi'am rmo mo'i bdag po lte me me'am po po/ bu mo'i bdag po ste mag pa/
[\[151a.6\]]bi tuHswa sA/ pi tr-i swa sA/ mA tr-i pi tr-i b+h+ya ma r+ya twa ra s+yAM/ me yi spun te sru mo/ mA traM pi tr-i dag la yang na'o/ /swa sr-i mA tr-i dang pi tr-i dag gi tshig phyi mar gyur pa yang na Shar mi 'gyur te/ mA tr-i Sh+wa sA/ mA tr-i swa sA/ ma li spun te sru mo/ pi tr-i Sh+wa sU/ pi tr-i swa sA/ rnam dbye ma phyis ma la Sha ra mi
[\[151a.7\]]pha ya sbun te e bu'i/ /'gyur te dper brjod gong du bstan zin to/ /e ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA t+sa mA s+sa mA b+hAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra/ na'i mdo las tshig sdud rnams rdzogs so// ma'i sdun/ //de rnams kyis brda sprod ba'i bstan pa'i spun/ bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]'grel gyi go don dper brjod cho ga sogs zin bris si bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ tshig sdud kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// ! //da ni ming las rang dang 'brel pa yis/
[\[151b.2\]]ming gzhan bsgrub pa de phan te/ /zhes pa'i de phan gyi rkyen rnams kyi 'jug yul bshad par bya ste/ /brA grI bya to \u0f85Na/ rtses pa las gong du ana'o/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i mdo de yis rtses so/ thul lo/ /rgyal lo/ /brkos zhes 'byung ba las gong du de phan gyi 'jug
[\[151b.3\]]yul bshad pa de rnams la aN yang na 'gyur te spyir btang ngo / /ta s+yA pa t+yaM/ de'i bu brgyud la'o/ /rtags gang dang gang la'ang drug pa'i mtha' las de'i bu brgyud kyi don la a Nal sogs pa 'gyur so/ /sa mat+dA nAM pra mA dwA/ yang dag pa'i don rnams kyi thog ma las yang
[\[151b.4\]]na'o/ /yang dag pa'i don zhes pa bu brgyud kyi rkyen ster rgyu'i mi bde don 'ga' ba ma yin pa don mthun pa'i tshig bu brgyud sogs kyi rkyen ster yul de'i sngon na yod na'ang an la sogs pa rnams yang na 'gyur te/ u pa go ra pa t+yaM/ zhes pa ngag sbyor la rnam dbye phyis/ a
[\[151b.5\]]pa t+ya'i don aN byin/ ta t+d+hi te Sha tsA mA deH/ de phan rnams la a tsa rnams kyi dang po'i'o/ /de phan gyi rkyen rnams la nya na rjes su 'phrel pa las rkyen ster yul gyi ming rnams kyi a tsa rnams las dang po de 'phel bar 'gyur te/ nye ba'i ba lang gi bu/ au pa gu/ an/ Na de'i don yin
[\[151b.6\]]pas byis/ u'i yon tan nos/ u o/ e tsa'i a ya sogs kyi mdos/ au ba ga baH/ bud med du brjod pa na/ Ti ta D+ha sogs kyis dI pa/ au pa ga bI/ a pa t+yaM pau tra pra b+h+r-i ti go traM/ bu brgyud la bu'i bu la sogs pa rnams la rigs la'o/ /bu brgyud brdod pa can bu'i bu
[\[151b.7\]]la sogs pa la rigs rtogs par byed pa la'ang an la sogs pa 'gyur ro/ /nye ba'i ba lang gi bu/ a \u0f7ako go tre/ rigs la gcig pa'o/ /bu brgyud  nye ba'i ba lang gi bu mo/ kyi rkyen rnams rigs rtogs par byed pa la'ang 'jug ste rkyen gcig pa zhes so/ au pa ga paH/ nye ba'i ba lang gi rigs/
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]-i taHi nya/ a ta las i nya'o/ a ta mtha' las bu brgyud kyi don la i nya 'gyur te/ dak+Sha s+yA pa t+yaM/ zhes pa dag sbyor la/ rnam dbye a pa t+ya dang bcas pa phyis/ mdo 'dis a pa t+ya gyi don i nya de phan rnams la sogs pa'i mdos 'phel ba/ nya de'i
[\[152a.2\]]don yin pas phyis/ gang gi i ta la'ang ngos/ rtags mtha'i a phyis pas/ dA k+Sh-iH/ ya nyi nyo sh+tsa/ ya nya i nya dag  mkhas pa'i bu/ las so/ /bu'i bu la sogs pa brjod pa la ya nya dang i nya dag gi mtha' las pha ka 'gyur te/ ki ti tsa/ ka 'gro ba la'ang ngo / /de phan
[\[152a.3\]]gyi rkyen ka rjes su 'brel ba las kyang ming gi a tsa dang po de 'phel par 'gyur ro/ /dA k+SheH/ mkhas pa'i bu/ a ba t+yaM/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye a pa t+ya dang bcas pa phyis/ dak+Sha i nya'i rkyen can la mdo 'dis phag byin/ ka 'phel ba'i don/ pha A ya Nar 'gyur/ dA k+Sha ya NaH/ gargA
[\[152a.4\]]di b+h+yo yanya/ garga sogs rnams las yanya'o/ garga sogs rnams las bu brgyud  mkhas pa'i bu'i bu/ kyi don la yanya 'gyur te/ garga s+yA pa t+yaM/ zhes pa la/ rnam dbye sogs phyis/ mdo 'dis yanya de phan rnams la zhes pas 'phel ba nya de'i don/ gang gi ita la'ang mkhas pa'i bu'i bu/
[\[152a.5\]]ngos a phyis/ gA rgyaH/ de bzhin du/ pat+sa s+yA pa t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ bA t+s+yaH/ yanya nyo sh+tsa/ yanya anya dag gi'ang ngo / garga'i bu/ yanya dang anya'i rgyen ni rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig pha rol la 'jigs ste/ gA rgya dang bA t+s+ya/ la dzas/ yanya 'jig kyang don gnas so/ gargAH/ bat+sAH/
[\[152a.6\]]yang / garga s+yA pa/ garga'i bu/ ti/ zhes pa la/ rnam  de nyid shin pa'i bu/ dbye sogs  gnyen gshin pa'i bu/ phyis/ yanya inya dag las sos pha ka /ka 'phel ba'i don/ pha A yaN/ gang gi ita la 'ang ngos/ aphyis/ gA rgya/ A ya Na zhes gnas pa la/ A pa  gna'i bu/ gnyen gshin gyi bu/
[\[152a.7\]]garga'i bu'i bu/ t+ya s+ya tsa r+d+hi te nA ti/ bu brgyud kyi'ang de phan la u tam yin pa la'o/ /bu brgyud kyi rkyen pa yig ni hal srog med brtsegs pa'i mtha' yin na de phan gyi rkyen gzhan pha rol la rkyen gyi yi ge thog ma de A yig ma yin pa la dbyi dgos kyang skabs 'dir A yig yin pas ya mi dbyi
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]drangs pas/ gA rgyA ya NAH/ de bzhin du/ bA t+s+ya s+yA pa t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ pA t+s+yA ya NaH/ ba hA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ ba hu la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / ba ho la sogs pa rnams las bu brgyud la inya 'gyur te/ ba hu ra pa t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ bA ha biH/ de bzhin du/ u
[\[152b.2\]]pa bi n+dor pa t+yaM/ garga li bu'i bu/ zhes pa'i don la/ au  gnyen gshin gyi bu'i bu/ pa bi n+da piH/ gnyen gshin gyi bu'i bu/ u Du lo m+naHa pa t+yaM/ zhes pa la/ au Du lo miH/ 'grel par/ u Du lo man la bu brgyud mang po'i don la a 'gyur mang po'i bu/ ro zhes bshad pas/ mer po'i bu/ u D+ya lo m+naHba hu
[\[152b.3\]]nye [\[]ba'i thir [\]]pa'i bu/ sha khra can gyi bu/ a pa t+yA ni/ zhes pa'i sha khra can gyi bu/ nye ba'i thig pa'i bu/ don la/ u Du lo mAH/ zhes pa'o/ ba spu la das pa'i bu/ ba spu [\[]khangs [\]]pa'i bu/ u Du yo man la inya 'phel ba na'i de [\[]phan la 'os [\]]Ti phyis su/ ag+ni sha r+m+naHa pa t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ A g+di sha rmiH/ su kr-i Sh+Na s+yA pa t+yaM/ zhes pa
[\[152b.4\]]la/ kA r+Sh+NiH/ a rdzun s+yA pa  ba spu [\[]langs [\]]pa'i bu mang po/ t+yaM/ zhes bya ba la/ A rdu ni+uH/ su t+hA tu kang tsa/ ba spu la das pa'i bu mad po/ su d+hA tr-i'i a kang ngo / su d+hA tr-il bu brgyud brjod pa la i nya 'gyur te mtha' a kang du 'gyur ro/ /su d+hA tuHA pa t+yaM/ zhes pa la/ dge ba'i me'i bu/ nag po'i bu/ rnam
[\[152b.5\]]dbyi a pa  nag po'i bu/[ \[]sbing snub [\]]kyi bu/ t+yaM sogs phyis/ inya/ mtha' a  srid sgrub kyi bu/ ka dang rjes 'brel/ sau b+hA da kiH/ 'grel par lung drangs ba/ byA sa b.rU D+ha ni ShA da tsa n+Da la piM bA nAM tse Sh+TiH/ byA sa/ ba rU D+ha ni ShA da tsa N+Da la biM ba rnams legs 'dzin gyi bu/ kyi'ang 'dod do/ byAs srogs
[\[152b.6\]]'di rnams la bu brgyud la i nya 'gyur zhing di rnams kyi mtha' a kang du 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ byA sa s+ya pa t+yaM/ rnam dbye legs 'dzin gyi bu sogs phyis/ inya mtha' a ga/ byAs ka /inya/ na y+wA b+h+yAM pa dA n+hA b+hAM pU rbau tu tA b+h+ya mai tsa/ ya? wa? tshig dang po dag gi ma yin zhing de dag gi ai tsa'o/ /
[\[152b.7\]]de phan gyi rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la rkyen ster yul gyi tshig de la ya yig dang ba yig tshig rgyas pa'i bu/ gi dang po dang nye ba can yod na 'phel bar mi byed cing de dag la ai tsa A ga ma ster te/ de'ang i tsa ni so sor bsdu ba yin pas ya yig yod na ai dang ba yod na au
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]ster te/ ka lA pa ra/ ya ba tshig dang po dag gi ma yin zhing 'phel ba A ga ma'i zhes byung ba dang gcig go/ /skabs 'dir ya yin pas ai byin/ bai yA sa kiH/ tshig sbyor sngon ma ltar byas pas/ bA rU D+ha kiH/ nai ShA da kiH/ tsA c+Da la kiH/ pai m+ba kiH/
