[\[153a.2\]]go tre ku \u0f85\u0fab\u0f71 di b+h+ya sh+ts+lanya/ ku ny+dza sogs rnams las rigs la'ang ts+pa nya'o/ /kuny+dza la sogs pa rnams la bu brgyud kyi don dang rigs brjod pa la'ang ts+phanya 'gyur te/ ku ny+dza s+yA pa rgyas pa'i bu/ t+yaM/ zhes pa'am/ ku ny+dza s+ya go traH/ zhi dul can gyi bu/ nags kyi mi'i bu/ ga tu ma po'i bu/ di mI'i mdog 'dra ba'i bu ste shin tu
[\[153a.3\]]dmar ba'i bu/ zhes pa'i don la/ ts+panya/ nya 'phel ba'i don tsa dbyangs don/ phe/ skabs 'gar a ya Nar 'gyur/ skabs 'gar A ya nar 'gyur zhes  glang po'i bu/ 'grel par byung bas/ A ya nar 'gyur/ glang po'i rigs/ kauny+dzA ya naH/ prA ta ts+pha nyor s+t+ri yAM/ brA ta las ts+phanya la
[\[153a.4\]]bud med min pa la'o/ brA ta sogs la bud med ma yin pa la ts+pha nya'i mtha' la rang don la ny+ya 'gyur te/ /brA ta la ts+phanya byin nas gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ brA tA ya na s+ya swA thraM/ zhes pa'i don la/ brA tA yA n+yaH/ de bzhin du/ kau ny+dzA ya n+yaH/ glang po'i bu'i rigs/ ny+ya da ya sta drA dzAH/ ny+ya sogs
[\[153a.5\]]rnams de'i rgyal po'o/ /ny+ya la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams la de'i rgyal po zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /ta dra dza s+ya ba hu Shu te ni bA sti y+waM/ de'i rgyal po mang po rnams la bud  th+wa ta'i bu'i rang don/ med ma yin th+wa ta'i bu'i rang don/ pa la de yis so/ gleng po'i bu'i rang don/ gong du de'i rgyal po zhes ming
[\[153a.6\]]'dogs byas pa de rnams bud med du brjod pa ma yin pa'i rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig pha rol la 'jigs ste/ gong du ny+ya gyis bsgrubs zin pa/ brA tA ya n+ya dang / kauny+dzA ya n+ya la/ dzas/ mdo 'dis/ ny+ya phyis/ brA tA ya nAH/ kauny+dzA ya nAH/ naDA di b+h+yaHphaka /na Da sogs rnams
[\[153a.7\]]las pa ka'o/ na Da sogs la bu brgyud dang rigs kyi don la pha ka 'gyur te/ na Da s+ya pa t+yaM/ zhes pa'am/ na Da s+ya go traM/ zhes pa'i don la nA TA ya Na drang srong na Da'i bu'am rigs/ de bzhin du/ tsA rA ya NaH drang srong tsa ra'i bu'am rigs/ glang po'i bu'i rang don rnams/ A mu Sh+yA ya NaH/ drang
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]srong che [\[]zhe [\]]mo'i bu/ shi bA di b+h+yo nyan/ shi ba sogs la a Na'o/ /shi ba sogs la bu brgyud la aN 'gyur te/ shi ba s+yA pa t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ shi baH/ r-i [\[]Sh+yAM [\]]ku ru b+h+ya sh+tsa/ drang srong a[\[]N+nyA[\]]ka pr-i ru Sh+na ku ru rnams las kyang ngo / /drang srong gi rigs dang / a[\[]n+dA [\]]ka'i rigs dang /
[\[153b.2\]]br-i Sh+NA'i rigs dang / ku ru'i rigs rnams kyi bu brgyud la aN 'gyur te/ bu brgyud kyi rkyen rnams la ngag sbyor rnam dbye zhi ba'i bya/ drug pa dang / a ba t+ya  zhes pa'i bu/ kho na sbyor ba ste/ sngon ma rnams kyis rigs 'gre'o/ /drang srong gi rigs la/ aN  bA shiSh+ThaH/ a Na [ \[]briM [\]]shrA mi traH/[ \[]an+d+ha
[\[153b.3\]]ka'i [\]]rigs la/ a Na  shwA pha[\[] lkaH/[\] ]aN  rA n+yA saH/ br-i Sh+Na'i rigs la/ bA su de baH/ sA ha de byaH/ ku ru'i rigs la/ nA ku laH/ mA tu ru t+saM khyA si b+ha dra pU tsA yAH/ grangs sam b+ha dra sngon ma'i mA tr-i las u ta'o/ /grangs dang sam dang b+ha dra rnams snga  gnas 'jog gi bu/ sna tshogs bshes [\[]gnyen [\]]gyi bu
[\[153b.4\]]ma'i mA tr-i las bu brgyud la  shwa tha lka'i bu/ ra [\[]n+h+yA [\]]ma'i bu/ a Na 'gyur zhing tr-i'i t-i u ta du  nor lha'i bu/ lhar bcas kyi bu/ 'gyur te/ Nai mA tu raH/ rigs med kyi bu/ khA [\[]N+mA [\]]tu raH/ sA mA tu raH/ b+hA dra mA tu raH/ b+hA dra mA turaH/ kan+yA yA ka ni na tsa/ kan+yA gyi ka nI na'ang ngo / kan+yA la bu brgyud la aN 'gyur zhing ka nA ne ke nI na zhes
[\[153b.5\]]par 'gyur te/ kA nA naH/ s+t+rI+u D+ha ka /bud med rnams las D+ha ka'o/ /dri m+na tr-i la a Na dang po [\[]'phel ba ti u ta ra'i a Na las ra la sos ra A ga ma/ ma gnyis kyi bu/ ma [\]]drug gi bu/ kun du ma'i bu/ mazang mo'i bu/ bud med kyi rkyen mtha' can rnams la bu brgyud la D+ha ka 'gyur te/ tsan+d+ra pa ra/ dI pa A pa ti Ung las
[\[153b.6\]]so zhes ba dang gcig go /bu mo'i bu sten la bu/ pi na tA yAHa pa t+y-i/ zhes pa la/ D+haka /ka 'phel pa'i don/ D+ha/ e yar 'gyur/ bai Na te yaH/ de bzhin du/ mA te yaH/ yau ba te yaH/ yu [\[]tha nyi la D+haka[\]]/ shu b+hA de b+h+Yash+tsa/ shu b+h+ra la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / shu b+h+ra la sogs pa rnams
[\[153b.7\]]las kyang bu brgyud la ma D+ha ka 'gyur te/ shau b+h+re yaH/ dkar po'i bu/ gad+ge yaH/ gang ga'i bu/ D+ha lo po \u0f85ka drAH/ ka drU ma yin pa'i D+ha la dbyi'o/ 'dus byed ma'i bu/ ma he la D+haka /sa phe bu ste mig dmar/ na chung ma'i bu/ de phan gyi rkyen D+ha pha rol la ka [\[]d+hU [\]]ma yin pa'i mtha'i u yig dbyi ste/ kA ma N+Da le ya ma N+Da la
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]shu b+h+ra sogs kyis D+ha ka mdo 'dis u phyis D+ha ma ya mu/ yaH/ ka d+hU la mi dbyi ste/ k+Sha dra be yaH/ gzar bu ma'i bya/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ baN+Do sh+tsa na/ paN+Du'i 'ang ma yin no/ D+ha'i rkyen pha rol la paN+Du'i u yang mi dbyi ste/ pA N+Da be yaH/ sbya po'am skya sangs kyi bu/ i ta sh+tsA ni nyaH/
[\[154a.2\]]i ta las kyang i nyam yin pa las so/ a ta las i nya'i zhes  ril ba can gyi 'u/ pa lta bu'i  kadrU la shu b+h+ra sogs kyi paD+ha ka 'phel gaD+ha e la u ta yon tan/ de phan gyi rkyen inya byin pa'i ita mtha' ma yin pa'i i yig mtha' las kyang bu brgyud la D+haka bat+Du la shu b+h+ra sogs kyis D+ha ga D+ha i ya u yon tan/ 'gyur te/
[\[154a.3\]]A tre yaH/ rgyan shes kyi bu/ nai d+he yaH/ nges 'dzin gyi bu/ ka l+yA N+yA dI nA mi nang / ka l+yA NI la sogs pa rnams kyi i nang ngo / /ka l+yA NI la sogs pa rnams kyi bu brgyud la D+ha ka 'gyur zhing ka l+yA NI sogs kyi mtha' i nang du'ang 'gyur te/ kA l+yA Ni ne yaH/ dge ba ma'i bu/ dzau br-i Ni ne yaH/ rgan ldan ma'i bu/
[\[154a.4\]]e tri dang ni D+hig mdo 'dis rtag 'phel baD+ha e ya gang gi mi ta la yang ngos i phyis/ dz+yi Sh+Tha ne yaH/ hr-i d+b+ha ga si n+d+h+wa n+he pU rba pa da s+ya tsa/ hr-i da b+ha ga si n+d+hu rnams mtha' la tshig snga ma'i 'ang ngo / /de phan gyi rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la hr-i ta  ka l+yA NI dang dzu bri NI la mdo'i D+ha ka dang mtha' iN dang rje[\[]sa phre la na'i a [\]]brjod don/
[\[154a.5\]]sogs 'di rnams tshig phyi ma yin zhing de'i sngon du tshig rgan mo'i bu/ dz+yi Sh+tha la D+ha ka ma [\[]bar mi nang /[\] ]gzhan yod na tshig snga phyi gnyis kar gyi'ang a tsa dang po 'phel bar 'gyur te/ sau hA rdaH/ yid gcugs kyi bu/ sau b+hA gi ne yaH/ legs pa'i sring mo'i bu/ sau sain+d+ha baH/ legs ba'i se n+d+ha'iH/ 'grel par lung
[\[154a.6\]]drangs pa/ a nu sha ti kA dI nAM tsa/ a nu sha ti ka la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang ngo / su [\[]hrid [\]]la de'i bu brgyud la sogs aN snga phyi gnyis 'phel ba/ su b+ha gi ni la bud med rnams las D+ha ka 'os D+ha ka mdo 'dis snga phyi gnyis 'phel ba/ su saM n+d+hu ba de'i bu brgyud la ngos a na mdo 'dis lda phyi gnyis 'phel ba/ a nu sha
[\[154a.7\]]ti ka la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang de phan gyi rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la tshig snga phyi gnyis kar gyi a tsa dang po 'phel bar 'gyur te/ a nu sha ri ka la de'i bu brgyud la 'os aN mdo 'dis snga phyi gnyis 'phel ba/ A Nu shA ti kaM/[ \[]b+sha pal+yI la ga l+d+h+riNi [\]]la sogs pa rnams kyis i nang ngos D+ha dang mtha' i nang mdo 'dis bA phyi gnyis 'phel ba
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]T+ha i yu/ pA ra s+t+rai ne yaH/ ku la TA yA bA/ ku la TA'i yang na'o/ /ku la TA la bu brgyud la D+ha ka 'gyur zhing ku la TA'i mtha' i nang du yang na 'gyur te/ kau la Ti ne yaH/ kau la Te yaH/ tsa Ta kA yAHai ra ka /tsa Ta kA las ai ra ka'o/ /tsa Ta ka dang / tsa Ta kA gnyis las bu brgyud la
[\[154b.2\]]ai ra ka 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi bud med kyi bu/ tsa Ta kA yAHa pa t+yaM/ zhes pa la/ tsA TA kai raH/ de bzhin du/ tsa Ta ka s+yA ba t+yaM/ zhes pa la/ tsA Ta kai raH/ yang 'grel  'byon ma'i bya/ 'byon ma'i bu/ par/ tsa Ta kA bud med kyi rkyen can la byin pa'i ai ra ka ni rnam dbye mang tshig pha rol la 'jig ste/
[\[154b.3\]]tsaT kAH/ dzas a+wai ka phyis pa'o/ /go d+hA yAHD+hA ka /go ng+hA las/ khug rta'i bu/ khug rta'i bu/ tsa Ta ka la/ ai ra ka ka 'phel ba'i don/ khug rta ma'i bu/ D+h+ra ka'o/ go d+hA las bu  khug rta yo'i bu/ brgyud la D+h+ra ka 'gyur te/ gau d+he raH/ cings pa'am dbyid mo'i bu/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ A ra gu dI tsI shar pa rnams kyi A
[\[154b.4\]]khug rta mo'i bu rnams/ ra ka'o/ go d+hA las bu brgyud la shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rnams A ra ka ster bar 'dod pas/ gau d+hA raH/ rtsangs pa'am dbyid mo'i bu/ k+Shu drA b+h+yo bA/ phra mo rnams las yang na'o/ /god+hA la [\[]D+h+raka[\]]/'phel ba D+ha e phra bra yu dag gi lbal la [\[]dbyi [\]]'os ya phyis/ phra mo rnams las bu brgyud la D+h+ra ka yang
[\[154b.5\]]na 'gyur te/ yang na D+ha ka 'gyur ro/ /ko la Te raH/ 'phyon ma'i bu/ kau la Te yaH/ b+ha ka d+ha e ya/ D+ha ka  dA se  god+hA la A ra ka /'phel ba'i don/ raH/ D+haka  dA se yaH/ D+h+raka  kA Ne raH/ b+ha ka  kA Ne yaH/ pi tr-i Sh+wa pu sh+tsha Na/ pi tr-i Sh+wa sr-i las tsha tsha Na'o/ pi tr-i sngon ma'i swa sr-i las bu brgyud la che Na 'gyur
[\[154b.6\]]te/ ku la Ta la D+h+ra ka 'phel baD+ha [\[]e y+ra bra phra [\]]dag gi [\[]pha las [\]]dbyi 'os ya phyis/ pai hr-i Sh+wa srI nayaH/ 'phyin ma'i bu/ D+ha ki lo paH/ D+ha ka la dbyi'o/ /pi tr-i snga ma'i swa zag ma'i bu/ si las bu brgyud la  bran gyi bu/ D+ha ga 'gyur zhing D+ha ka pha rol la swa sr-i'i r-i yang dbyi ste/ pai t-I Sh+wa se yaH/ pha'i sring mo'i bu'am a ni'i bu/ mA
[\[154b.7\]]pi [\[]tri Sh+tha [\]]srel/ cha NaN 'phel ba'i don/ tshA I ya/ i ka gi a tsal yaN su/ pa'i sring mo'i bu'am a ne'i bu/ tr-i Sh+wa su sh+tsa/ mA tr-i Sh+wa sr-i las 'ang ngo / mA tr-i sngon ma'i swa sp-i las kyang bu brgyud la tshaN dang D+haka 'gyur zhing D+haka pha rol la r-i'ang dbyi ste/ pi t-ISh+ra sr-il/ D+ha ka mdo 'dis r-i phyis/ D+ha e ya 'phel ba su/ mA
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]tr-i Sh+wa srI yaH/ ma'i nu ma'i bu'am sru mo'i bu/ mA tr-i Sh+wa se yaH/ ma'i nu ma'i bu'am sru mo'i bu/ rA [\[]dzar [\]]shwa su rA d+ya ta/ rA dza na shwa su ra las ya ta'o/ /rA dza na dang shwa sur dag las bu brgyud la ya ta 'gyur te/ rA dza n+yaH/[ \[]r+ts+ya labo phu[\]]/ shwa su rlaH/ mna' ma'i zha rA dz+nyo dzA tau ya ta/ rA dza na las rigs la
[\[155a.2\]]mA tr-i Sh+wa sri la tshaN na la 'phel ba/ tsha I ya i ka gi a tsa la yaN su/ mA tr-i ShA sr-i la  D+ha ka krita la'ang ngos 'phel ba/ D+ha e ya mdo 'dis ri phyis/ ya ta'o/ /rA dzan las rigs brjod pa la'ang yata 'gyur te/[ \[]dra s+ya rA dz+nyaHjA [\]]t-i/ zhes pa'i don la/ rA dzan dang shwa sur gnyis la ya ta ta ta li de'i dus kyi 'os phyis/ ya ta su  rA dza nraH/ k+Sha trA d+l+haH/
[\[155a.3\]]k+Sha tra la g+ha'o/ /k+Sha tra la rigs dang bu brgyud dag la g+ha 'gyur te/ k+Sha tri yaH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ k+Sha trA dz+d+rA hau inya/ k+Sha tra las rigs brjod pa la yang  rgyal po'i rigs/ inya 'gyur te/ k+Sha triH/ ku lA t+baH/ ku la las kha'o/ ku la'i sgra 'ba' zhig  rgyal rigs/ pa dang
[\[155a.4\]]tshig gzhan gyi phyi mar gyur pa las kyang bu brgyud la kha 'gyur k+Sha tra las b+ha i ya/ rgyal rogs rgyal po'i bu/ te/ ku lI naH/ A D+h+ya ku lI naH/ a pU rba pa dA da n+ya ta ra s+yAM ya ta D+ha ka nyau/ tshig sngon na med pa las/ rgyal rigs/ ya ta D+ha ka nya dag yang na'o/ ku la las sngon na tshig gzhan med pa la
[\[155a.5\]]bu brgyud la yata dang D+ha kanya dag yang na 'gyur te/ ku l+yaH/ kau le ya kaH/ khar [\[]sbyin [\]]ku rgyal rigs kyi bu/ ku[\[]ra la kha lnga I [\]]na/ phyug po'i rogs kyi bu/ lI naH/ ma hA ku lA da nya kha nyau/ ma hA ku la las a nya kha nya dag go/ /ma hA ku la las bu brgyud la a nya dang kha nya dag yang na 'gyur te/
[\[155a.6\]]mA hA ku laH/ rigs chen po'i bu/ ma hA ku lI  ku[\[] la la [\]]ya ta/ rigs kyi bu/ ku la la D+ha ka nya nya 'bel ba'i [\[]don [\]]d+ha e ya/ naH/ duHku lA ta D+ha ka /du Sh+ku la las D+ha ka'o/ rigs kyi bu/ du Sh+ka la las bu brgyud la D+ha ka yang na 'gyur te/ dau Sh+ku le yaH/ du Sh+ku lI naH/ swa su sh+tsha/ swa sr-i las tsha'o/ sra sr-i las
[\[155a.7\]]la nya 'phel ba'i don/ rigs chen po'i bu/ nya 'phel ba'i don ba I na/ bu brgyud la tsha 'gyur te/ sring mo'i bu/ sA srI yaH/ sA y+raM ya tsha tsha I ya mtshams sbyar/ b+h+rA tu r+b+ya tsU/ b+hA tr-i las bya ta 'ang ngo / b+h+rA tr-i las bu brgyud la bya ta 'gyur  D+ha ka kang sel ba'i don D+ha e ya/ rigs ngan gyi bu/ kha I na/ zhing 'ang gi sgras cha yang 'gyur te/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]b+h+rA tri byaH/[ \[]spun drA'i [\]]bu/ b+ha trI yaH/ b+h+rA hr-i la tsha tsha I ya/ bya n+sa pha t+ne/ dgra bo la byan la'o/ /b+h+rA tri las dgra bo'i bu brgyud brjod pa la byan 'gyur te/ b+hA tr-i byaH/ re ba t+yA di b+h+ya Sh+Tha ka /re ba tI la sogs pa rnams las Tha ka'o/ /re ba tI la sogs pa rnams las bu brgyud la Tha ka 'gyur ro/ Tha s+ye kaH
[\[155b.2\]]b+h+rA tra la bya ta ta ni ta yi de'i dus kyi 'os don/ Tha'i i ka'o/ /rkyen gyi Tha ni i kar 'gyur te/ rai ba ti kaH/ nam gru'i bu/ A  b+h+rA tri la byan na dbyangs don su/ dgra bo'i spun bla'i bu/ shwa pA li kaH/ rta skyong ba'i bu/ a nr-i Sh+yA naM ta r+Ye bi dA di b+h+yo \u0f85nya/ drang srong ma yin pa'i rgyun ma chad pa la bid la sogs pa rnams las
[\[155b.3\]]a nya'o/ /drang srong ma yin pa'i bid sogs las bu brgyud dang rgyun ma  re ba tI la  Tha ka  ka 'phel ba'i don Tha i kang 'gyur/ chad pa ste bu'i bu la sogs pa la'ang a shwa pA la la thaka ka 'phal pa'i don Tha i ka/ a nya 'gyur te/ bai daH/ rig byed kyi bu'i bu/ au rbaH/ ya ska di b+h+yo go tre/ ya ska la sogs
[\[155b.4\]]pa rnams las rigs la'o/ ya ska la sogs pa las rigs brjod pa la a nya 'gyur te/ de rnam dbye rnams kyi mang tshig pha rol la dbyi'o/ yA skaH/ 'khar ba'i rigs/ dzas la/ ya skAH/ 'khar ba'i rigs rnams/ 'di dang u rba la a nya nya 'phel ba'i don/ rba rlabs kyi bu/ de bzhin du/ lA h+yaH/ dzas la/
[\[155b.5\]]la h+YAH/ a tr-i b+h+r-i gu ku t+sa ba si Sh+Tha go ta mA d+gi ro b+h+ya sh+tsa/ a tri  b+h+r-i gu  ku t+sa  bsi Sh+Tha  go ta ma  a d+gi ras rnams las kyang ngo / a tr-i  ya ska la a nya  nya 'phel ba'i don/ ya ska la  dzas  mang tshig la  a nya phyis rgyu mtshan med na zhes pas zung ngu / la sogs pa 'di rnams las kyang rnam dbyi mang  thob pa'i rigs/
[\[155b.6\]]thab pa'i rigs rnams/ tshig pha rol la bu brgyud rnams 'jig ste/ dzas  a tra yaH/ dzas N+ya  b+h+r-i ga paH/ dzas N+ya  ku t+sAH/ ba shiSh+ThAH/ shas N+ya go ta mAH/ shas N+ya  a d+gi ra saH/ dza na pa da sha p+tA k+Sha tri yA da nya/ ljongs kyi sgra las rgyal rigs las anya'o/ /ljongs kyi sgra dang 'brel
[\[155b.7\]]pa'i rgyal rigs brjod pa can las bu brgyud la a nya 'gyur te/ rgyun shes kyi bu rnams/ D+ha ka gyis pa'o/ dan spong gi bu rnams/ smad pa'i bu rnams/ gnas 'jig gi bu rnams/ regs mchog gi bu rnams/ yan lag skyes sam nyi ma'i bu rnams/ lnga len pa'i rgyal po'i bu/ pA ny+tsA laH/[ \[]pa ny+tsA la [\] ]a nya nya 'phel ba'i don/ kA li d+gaH/[ \[]kA ling+ga'i [\]]rgyal po'i bu/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]hra swaM la g+hu/ thung ngu yang ba'o/ yi ge gang la dbyangs thung du zhugs pa de yang pa'o/ saM yo ge gu ru/ /saM yo ge gu ru/ yang dag par sbyor ba la lci ba'o/ yang dag par sbyor ba ste yi ge brtsigs pa pha rol na yod na de'i sngon ma'i dbyangs te thung ngu yin kyang de
[\[156a.2\]]yang ba ma yin te lci ba'o/ dI r+g+haM tsa/ ring po 'ang ngo / /yi ge gang la yang dbyangs ring po zhugs pa'am dbyangs ring po kho na'ang lci ba'o/ /a ni nyo ra nA r+Sha yo rgu rU po t+ta ma yo N+yang go tre/ drang srong ma yin pa lci ba mtha' nye ldan pa las rigs la aN inya dag ni Sh+ya nga'o/ drang srong
[\[156a.3\]]ma yin pa brjod pa can gyi lci ba mtha' nye ldan pa las rigs kyi don gyi aN i nya dag gi mtha' ni bud med la Sh+yang du bsgyur bar bya ste/ da ni yang [\[]lo [\]]tsA pa po'i don dang / Sha ni Shi ta la dI Sha'i don te/ kau mu da gan+d+h+yA/ bA rA hA/ a shwa pa t+ya di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ a shwa pa ti la sogs pa
[\[156a.4\]]rnams las kyang ngo / a shwa pa ti la sogs pa rnams las kyang bu brgyud la a Na 'gyur te/ aN a shwa pa taH/ aN gau pa taM/ aN  gA na pa taM/ di t+ya di t+ya di pa t+yu t+ta ra pa dA ta N+yaH/ ku mu da'i dri ma/ phag rgod ma/ di ti a di ti A di bya ba ti tshig phyi ma las N+ya'o/ /
[\[156a.5\]]di ti  a di ti/ A di t+ya rnams dang pa ti tshig phyi mar 'gyur pa las kyang bu brgyud la N+ya 'gyur te/ rta'i bdag po'i bu/ ba lang gi bdag po'i bu/ tshogs bdag gi bu/ dai t+yaH/ sbyin pa'i bu/ N+ya  a d-i t+yaH/ ma sbyin ma'i bu/ A dai tAH/ kun du sbyin ma'i bu/ N+ya prA dzA pa t+yaM/ N+ya  sai nA pa t+yi/ 'grel
[\[156a.6\]]bar lung dngas pa/ ya mA ts+tsa/ ya ma las kyang ngo / ya ma las kyang bu brgyud la N+ya 'gyur te/ yA myaM/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ de ba s+ya yanya  N+ya Na 'phel ba'i don / A di t+yal N+ya na 'phel ba'i don  nyal las ya ma rnams kyi ya ma dbyi 'os ya sngon ma phyis pa'o/ /skye [\[]rgu'i [\]]bdag po'i bu/ sde'i bdag po'i bu/
[\[156a.7\]]nyau/ de ba'i ya nya a nya dag go/ de ba las bu brgyud la yanya dang any+ha dag 'gyur te/ gzhin rje'i bu/ yanya dai byaM/ lha'i bu/ yanya dai baH/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ba he ShaHTi lo po yaN/ ba he Sha las yaN ste Ti dbya'o/ /ba he Sha las bu brgyud la yaN 'gyur zhing Ti'ang
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]dbyi ste/ bA h+yaH/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ I ka ka /i ka ka'o/ /ba hi Sha las bu brgyud la I ka ka 'gyur zhing Ti dbye ba 'ang ngo / /bA hI kaHphyi'i bu/ u t+sA di b+h+yonya nya/ u t+sa la sogs pa rnams las anya'o/ /u t+sa la sogs pa rnams las bu brgyud la anya 'gyur te/
[\[156b.2\]]phyi'i bu'am 'di phyi rang la rang 'jug go/ /anya  au t+saH/ anya  au da pA naH/ s+t+wa puMsA b+h+yaM nanya sna nyau b+ha ba nA ta/ s+t+ri puM sa dag las dngos po la nanya snanya dag go/ bA+e heSha la I ka kra 'phel ba'i don Te phyis/ sti dang puM sa dag las dngos po brjod pa la rim pa bzhin nanya sna nya dag 'gyur te/ nanya  s+t+reNaH/ bud med
[\[156b.3\]]pauM snaH/ de rnams bu brgyud kyi rkyen  chu lha'i bu/ btung ba'i chu'i bu/ rnams so/ /te na rak+taM rA gA ta/ de yis btsos pa'i tshos las so/ ngur smrig dang gur kum lta bu de yis btsos pa'i tshos brjod pa las gsum pa'i mtha' las aN 'gyur te/ ka ShA ye na ra k+taH/ zhes pa'i don la/
[\[156b.4\]]skyes ba/ bus la sna nya 'phel ba yang dag par skyor ba'i mtha' dbyi 'os sa sngon ma phyis pa'o/ /kA ShA yaH/ de bzhin du/ ku d+ku me na ra k+taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ aN  kau dU naH/ lA k+ShA ro tsa nA sha ka la ka r+d+daHTha ka /lA k+ShA ro tsa na  sha ka la  ka r+d+da ma rnams las Tha ka'o/ /lA k+ShA sogs  ngur smrig gis bcos pa/ 'di
[\[156b.5\]]rnams las de yis btsos pa la Tha ka 'gyur [(]ta[,]te[)]/ lnga k+ShA  ngur smig gis bcos pa/ aN Na la 'phel ga gur kum gyis bcos g.yA rak+taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ lA k+Shi kaH/ gur gum gyis btsos pa/ tshig sbyor de dang 'dra bar byas pas/ Thaka  rau tsa ni kaH/ Thaka  shA ka li kaM 'grel par/ sha ka
[\[156b.6\]]la dang / kar+ng+da ma dag las de yis btsos pa la aN yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ aN  kar+d+da maM/ aN  shA ka rgya skyegs kyis btsos pa/ lA k+ShA la Tha ka 'phel ba'i don Tha i ka/ laM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ni lA ta da na/ ni la lbang gis btsos pa/ shing shun gyis btsos pa/ 'dam gyis btsos pa/ las a na'o/ /
[\[156b.7\]]ni la las de yis btsos pa la a na 'gyur te/ a na na dbyangs don/ ni laM/ rams kyi btsos pa/ yang 'grel 'dam gyis btsos pa/ par lung drangs pa/ pi tA t+ka tsa/ pi ta las katsa'o/ /shing gyis btsos pa/ pi ta las de yis btsos pa la katsa 'gyur te/ ser pos btsos pa/ pi ta kaM/ ka tsa tsa dbyangs don/
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]yang 'grel bar lung drangs ba/ ha ri dra yaHanya/ ha ri drA las a nya'o/ /ha ri dA las de yis btsos pa la anya 'gyur te/ hA ri draM/ na k+Sha tre Na yu k+taHkA laH/ rgyu skur gyi sbyor ba'i dus la'o/ /rgyu skar rnams dang zla ba ldan pa'i sbyor ba'i dus mtshon
[\[157a.2\]]pa la aN 'gyur te/ pu Sh+yi Na yu k+taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ rnam dbye yu k+ta dang bcas pa phyis/ aN/ pau ShaH/ de la Ti D+ha sogs kyis ska ser gyis bcos pa/ anya nya 'phal ba'i don/ dI pa byin/ pau ShI/ rtags so so'i rnam dbye dang phrad pa'i lus 'gyur tsam ma gtogs tshig sbyor de
[\[157a.3\]]rgyal dang 'dus pa ste rgyal gyi zla ba/ dang 'dra bar byas pas/ mA g+haH/ mA g+hI/ mchus nya ga phA lgu NaH/ phA lgu N+Shi/ rgyal zla/ ts-i traH/ tsaitr-I/ yaN bA+e ga bai shA khaH/ bi shA khI/ dzaiSh+ThaH/ n+ya 'gyis nya bste dkar phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga/ dzaiSh+bI/ A ShA D+haH/ aShA dz+nya la a ma dIng  A ShA D+shI/
[\[157a.4\]]shrA ba NaH/ shra ba Na la an dI ba/ shrA ba N+rI/[ \[]shra ba Da 'tha' na 'dA+e ga pa g+ha ka sha mdu'i D+ha ba/[\] \[]mag+ha la aN dA+e ga pha lku Na la aN/ dpo'i zA ga aDa rI gad po'i nya gtso tra la a ma nanya ba'i zla ga nag pas nya gas pa'i zla ga'i shA kha la aN/ sa gas nya ga snron gyi zla ba/[\]]b+hA dra pa dI/ chu stod kyis nya ga
[\[157a.5\]\[]bro bzhin gyi zla ga gro [\]]bzhin gyis nya ga A shaThe naH/ a shwi ni la aN/ A shi nI/ tha skar gyis nya ga kArti kaH/ kri ti ka aN dI pa/ kArti kI/ mgo'i zla ba/ mArga shi raH/ mA rga shi rI/ dr-i Sh+TaM sA ma/ mnyam par lta ba  khums stod kyi zla ba/ b+ha dra bad la aN/ la'o/ /mnyam par lta [ \[]spangs [\]]stod kyis nya ba/ b+ha dra ba dal aN dI ba/ pa'i
[\[157a.6\]]don la gsum pa'i mtha'  za skar gyi zla ba/ la anya a shwi ni la aN dI pa/ 'gyur te/ smin drug gi zla ba/ ba shi Sh+Tha na dr-i Sh+TaM/ smin drug gis ta ba/ mr-i ga shir kha aN dI/ mgo yis nya ba/ zhes pa'i don la/ bA shi Sh+ThaH/ pa ri br-i tor thaH/ shing rta yongs su kris pa'o/ /shing rta yongs su dkris
[\[157a.7\]]pa zhes pa 'di'i don la bas+t+ra dang / tsarma la anya 'gyur te/ pas+t+re Na pa ri draM to ra thaH/ shing rta gos kyis yongs su dkris/ gnas 'jog gis blta/ zhing pa'i don la/ gos kyis dkris/ bA staH/ anya nya 'phel ga anya nya 'phel ba'i don/ gnas 'jog gis blta/ de bzhin du/ tsA rma NaH/ pags pas dkris/ ta tro t+d+h+r-i tri pA tre b+h+yaH/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]snod rnams la der blugs pa la'o/ /snod rnams las snod der blugs pa la bdun pa'i mtha' la anya 'gyur te/ sa ra be u d+d+h+r-i taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ sA ra baH/ saM skr-i taM b+ha k+ShAH/ zas legs par sbyar ba rnams so/ /zas legs par sbyar ba brjod pa las bdun pa'i mtha' la anya
[\[157b.2\]]'gyur te/[ \[]b+h+rASh+DAH[\]]/ sA smin pau r+Na sA ti saM dz+hA yi/ de 'di la zla ba nya gang ba'i ming la'o/ de 'di la zla ba gang bste rdza phor du blugs pa/ thog mtha'  rdza phor du blugs pa/ mnya nya 'phel ga rdzogs pa'i zla ba brjod pa la dang po dang bdun pa'i mtha' la anya 'gyur te/ pau ShI pau r+Na mA sI a smin/ zhes
[\[157b.3\]]anya 'phel ba/ btsos ba/ ba'i don la/ bau Sho mA saH/ sA s+ya se ba tA/ de 'di'i lha nyid la'o/ de 'di'i lha nyid du brjod pa la dang po dang / drug pa'i mtha' la anya la sogs par 'gyur te/ bu d+dA+o de ba tA ya s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ anya  baud+d+haH/ rgyal gyis nya ba zla ba nya gang ba'i 'di la/ de bzhin du/
[\[157b.4\]]tshig sbyor byas pas/ aN shai baH/ anya 'phel ba/ rgyal gyi zla ba/ aN ai n+d+raH/ bA rta sA t+yaM/ ka s+ye ta/ ka'i i ta'o/ don mang po la 'jug pa'i ka'i sgra lha brjod pa can la aN 'gyur zhing ka'i mtha' i ta gang gi lha sangs rgyas/ du 'gyur te/ gA yaM ha  sangs rgyas pa/ biH/ shu kru d+g+ha na/ shu kra las
[\[157b.5\]]g+ha na'o/ /shu kra las de 'di'i [\[]zhibs[\]]/ lha brjod pa la g+han dbang po pa/ phur bu pa/ gri ha snga til yanya 'phel ba/ 'gyur te/ shu kri yaH/ bsangs/ so mA d+ya na/ so ma las ya Na'o/ /so ma las de 'di'i lha brjod pa la yaN skye dgu'i bdag po/ /[\[]sha laaN [\]]ka [\[]ki ra 'gyur Na 'phel ba e tsa'i a la [\]]sogs/
[\[157b.6\]]'gyur te/ sau myaH/[ \[]thos la yaN Nal 'phel ba[\]]/ pA y+w-i tu bi tru Sha so ya ta/ bA yu r-i tu tr-i u Shas rnams las yata'o/ shu kra la g+ha nan dbyangs g+ha i ya/ bA yul sogs pa 'di rnams las de 'di'i lha brjod pa la ya ta 'gyur te/ bA ya byaM/[ \[]yo a lba r-i ta byaM[\]]/ dus ba/ u Sha s+yaM gdung byed pa/
[\[157b.7\]\[]bsil ba ba'ang zla ba ga[\] ]pi tr-i la ya ta/ rIng ri taH/ r-i ta kyi rI nga'o/ /kri ta sogs kyi rkyen ma yin pa'i rkyen dang byings thams cad pa rnams dang / tswi ba rol la r-i ta kyi rIng du 'gyur te nga dbyangs don no/ /ya rta pi taD+yaM/[ \[]pha mes pa[\]]/ rlung [\[]lhag pA phu dang ra tu la panya ta ta'i da'i dus u'i yon tan pha rol la la'i mtha' can no[\]]/ /
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]ag+neHD+ha ka /ag+ni las D+ha ka'o/ ag+ni las de 'di'i lha brjod pa la D+ha 'gyur te/ A g+ne ya/[ \[]mes[\]]/ de ba tA dAM de tsa/ lha nyid la zlas dbye la'ang do/ /de 'di'i lha brjod pa la zlas dbye'i bsdu ba'i mtha' la anya 'gyur zhing 'ang gi sgras tshig snga phyi gnyis kyi a tsa'ang
[\[158a.2\]]'phel bar 'gyur te/ ag+ni sh+tsa ma ru ta sh+tsa/ zhes pa la rnam dbye sogs phyis/ mdo 'dis anya snga phyi [ \[]ag+ni la D+ha ka ka 'phel ba'i don D+ha e pha gang gi yi ta ba'ang ngos [\]]i phyis/ gnyis ka 'phel ba/ A g+ni mA ru taM/ ne n+d+ra s+ya par s+ya/ i n+d+ra pha rol gyi ma yin no/ /zlas dbyi'i bsdu ba'i mtha'
[\[158a.3\]]yin kyang i n+d+ra tshig  me lta dang rlung lta yang / phyi ma yin na tshig ma la 'phel pa mi byed de/ sau man+RaM/ phyi ma zhes pa'i rnam bcad kyi i n+d+ra tshig snga ma yin na gnyis ka 'phel 'gyur te/ ai n+da g+naM/ dI r+g+dA ts+tsa ba ru Na s+ya/ ring po las kyang ba ru Na'o 'o/ zlas dbye'i
[\[158a.4\]]bsdu ba'i mtha' yin kyang tshig snga ma'i mtha' a tsa de ring po yin na de'i pha rol gyi ba ru Na zhes zla ba dbang bo pa/ som in+d+ra anya/ pa la 'phel ba mi 'byung ste/ en+d+ra ba ru NaM/ ta s+ya sa mU haH/ de'i tshogs  dbang pos pi/ la'o/ de'i tshogs brjod pa la drug ba'i mtha' las aN la sogs pa
[\[158a.5\]]'gyur te/ kA kA nI sa mU haH/ zhes pa'i don la/ aN  kwa kaM/ tshig sbyor de bzhin byas pas/ bA na spa t+yaM/ s+t+ri Ni/ bud med kyi tshogs/ bau snaM/[ \[]b+ha nya aN[\]]/ dbang po dang rgyu lta ba/ b+hik+ShA di b+b+yonya [\[]NA[\]]/ b+hi k+Sha la sogs pa rnams la ana'o/ /b+hi k+Sha la sogs pa rnams las de'i tshogs pa brjod pa la drug
[\[158a.6\]]pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur  bya rog rnams tshogs te/ b+hi k+ShA NAM sa mu haH/ bya rog tshogs/ zhes pa'i don la/ ya ta aN/ shing shi chogs/ nenya aN/ skyes pa'i tshogs/ aDA  b+hai k+ShAM/ aN k+She traM/ yau ba yaM/ ya ba til aN/ go tro k+Sho Sh+D+ro ra b+h+ra rA dza rA dza rA dza N+ya rA dza pu tra bat+sa ma nu [\[]Sh+D+ya dzA d+bu [\]]nya/ rigs yu k+Sha na uSh+Ta u ra b+h+ra  rA dza
[\[158a.7\]]rA dza N+ya  rA dza pu tra bat+sa ma nu Sh+D+ya a dza las bu nya'o/ /[\[]blod [\]]mo rnams kyi tshogs/ rigs la sogs pa 'di rnams las tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i [ \[]slob pas[\]]tshogs/ zhing gi tshogs/ khad mo ma'i tshogs  mtha' la bunya 'gyur te/ nye ba'i ba lang rnams kyi tshogs/ o pa ga bA nAM sa mU haH/ zhes pa'i don la/
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]au pa ga ba kaM/[ \[]su a[\]]/ nya ba'i ba lang gi tshogs/ zhes pa rigs dang / de bzhin du/ au k+Sha kaM/ sog can te glang gi tshogs/ au Sha kaM/ bu nya  au ra b+h+ra kaM bu nya  rA dza kaM/ bunya  rA dza N+ya kaM/ bu nya  rA dza bu tra ka/ bunya  bA tA kaM/ bunya  mA ru Sh+D+ya kaM/ A dza kaM/ br-i d+d+h+ra ts+tsa/ bri d+d+ha las kyang ngo / br-i d+d+ha las kyang
[\[158b.2\]\[]o ba ga ba la bunya [\] ]nya 'phel ba'i don/ tshogs pa brjod pa la bu nya 'gyur te/[ \[]bu nya nya 'phel ba bu a ga na'i de ba na la'ang ngos gang shi i ta la rang ngos a phyis[\]]/[ \[]rnga mo bcos sa[\]]/[ \[]lto bral te bshan pa'i [\]]tshogs/ rgyal po'i tshogs/ rgyal rigs tshogs/ rgyal po'i du'i tshogs/[ \[]be'u'i tshogs/ me'i tshogs/ ba'i tshogs/ bA N+d+ha kraM/ kedA rA d+ya ny+tsa[\]]/ ke dA ra las yanya 'ang ngo / /
[\[158b.3\]]ke dA ra las tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la bu nya 'gyur te ya nya yang ngo / kaidA ra kaM/ kai dA r+YaM/ yu bor nA kau/ yu bu dag gi a na a ka dag go/ /rkyen gyi yu dang bu dag ni rim pa bzhin a na dang a ka dag tu 'gyur ro/ /rgan po'i tshogs/ br-i d+d+he la bu nya nya 'phel ba bu a ka su a ma/ 'grel bar
[\[158b.4\]]lung drangs pa/ ga Ni kA yAHyanya/ ga Ni kA las yanya'o/ ga Ni kA la de'i tshogs pa brjod pa [ \[]nya ba'i tshogs sam zhing gi tshogs sam nags kyi tshogs[\] ]la drug pa'i mtha' la yanya 'gyur te/ gA Ni kya/ Tha nya ka ba tsi na sh+tsa/ ka ba tsi na las tha nya yang do/ /ka ba tsi na dang ke dA ra las kyang tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i
[\[158b.5\]]mtha' la Tha nya 'gyur te/ kA ba tsi kaM/ go cha can gyi tshogs/ kai bA ri kaM/ zhing pa'i tshogs/ brA h+p+ra Na mA na ba bA na ba bA Da bA D+ya ta/ brA t+ma Na mA na bA Da ba las ya ta'o/ /brA t+ma Na sogs 'di rnams  rtsis mkhan gyi chung ma'i tshogs sam smad 'tshong ma'i tshogs las tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la yata 'gyur te/ yata  byA h+ma N+ya/ bram ze'i tshogs
[\[158b.6\]\[]ka 'tshon la ta nyanya 'phel ba'i don pa'i gan 'di lan pa'ang ros na byis gang gi i ta la'ang ngos a phyis pa'o/ /a ta/ mAn byaM/ bA Da byaM/ grA ma dza na baN+b+ng+kus hA ye b+h+ya sta la/ brA ma/ dza na/ ban+t+nu/[\] ]sa hA ya rnams la su tal 'o/ /grwam sogs 'di rnams tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha'  ya ta ta tayi de'i dum gyi don/ la/
[\[158b.7\]]ta la 'gyur zhing ya dbyangs don dang tal gyi mtha' rang bzhin gyi mo rtags so/ /[\[]bram ze'i bu'i tshogs  nod ma'i tshogs/[\] \[]brong gi [\]]tshogs/ grA ma tA/[ \[]ta le TA 'a[\]]/ dza na tA/ skye bo'i tshogs/[ \[]gnyen nam rtsa [\]]lag gi tshogs/ ban+d+hu tA/ ta la NA pha sa hA ya tA/ grogs kyi tshogs/ 'grol
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]bar lung drangs pa/ ga dzA ts+tsa/ ga dza las kyang ngo / ga dza las kyang tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la tal 'gyur te/ ga dza tA/ a tsi t+ta ha sti d+he no Sh+Tha ka /sems med pa ha sti na d+hi nu las Tha ka'o/ /sems med pa dang ha sti na dang d+he nus rnams las tshogs pa brjod
[\[159a.2\]]pa drug pa'i mtha' la Tha ka 'gyur te/ A bU pi kaM/[ \[]spang ba'i tshogs[\]]/ hA sti kaM/ Thaka /i su su k+tA n+ta tA [\[]skaH[\]]/ is us u ka mtha'  glang po'i tshogs/ rnams las ka'o/ /rkyen is dang us dang u ka dang ta rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]mtha' can las pha rol gyi rkyen Tha ni ka ru 'gyur te/ d+hai nu
[\[159a.3\]]kaM/[ \[]zhon pa'i blu[\]]/ de bzhin du/ a b+wu pa la Na ka ka bsel ba'i don yin/[ \[]la Sha sdan ce'u nya snyig la Tha ka ka sel ba'i don pa'i ka na'i de na la'ang ngos na byis  gang gis a tala'ang ngos i byis a ma[\]]/ sA rba [\[]Sh+ki[\]]/ bar gsur gyi tshogs/ d+hA nu Sh+kaM/[ \[]ga bu'i tshogs[\]]/ 'grel par lung grangs ba/ br-i tsha tA su [\[]sh+nA [\]]ta di b+h+yaH/[ \[]d+hai nu la Tha ga la 'phel ba thaka[\]]/
[\[159a.4\]]bri tsha ta su Sh+Na ta la sogs pa rnams las so/ /pr-i tsha ta dang su Sh+Na ta sogs rnams las kyang tshogs brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la Tha ka 'gyur te [\[]Sha ka pA r+tsha [\]]ti ka na [ \[]sa bi Sha las Tha ka 'phel ba Thaka /rta nu Sha 'a Tha ka la phel ba Tha ka[\] ]Thaka  sau Sh+Na ti kaH/ tai ma d+gi la kaH/ nya chen po'i tshogs/ gau ny+dzi kaH/ tha ny+dza la Tha ka
[\[159a.5\]]sau kha shA yi kaH/[ \[]nu kha shA ya Tha ka[\] ]/sai d+na li kaH/ bA shA di b+h+yo yaH/ pA sha la sags pa rnams las ya'o/ /bA sha la sogs pa rnams dri ba'i tshogs/[ \[]la [\]]tshogs pa brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' las ya[ \[]rdus kyi tshogs/ ti ma rne ba Tha ka[\] ]/dmar ru mgo nag gi tshogs/ 'gyur te/[ \[]la dA sh+yA[\] ]/
[\[159a.6\]\[]bde bar nyal ba'i tshogs las dmar ser gyi tshogs/ se sna le la d+ha/ /ya  bA tra/ ba tr-i N+ya[\]]/ U lonya pi/ U la 'ang ngo / ba ta las tshogs pa brjod pa la U la'ang 'gyur te/ bA tU laH/ U la/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ kha la go ra thA d+ya/ kha la go ra tha las ya'o/ /kha la  zhags pa'i tshogs/
[\[159a.7\]]sogs pa 'di rnams las tshogs pa brjod pa la ya[ \[]chu ba ni tshogs/[\] ]Da ba sbyar ba stir bzhin gyi mo rtags so/ /'gyur te/ ya  kha l+ya/ D+wa be tha chad dam ngan pa'i tshogs [ \[]la ga byA DA ba  ba la nga'i tshogs/ rlung gi tshogs[\]]/[ \[]ya  rath+yA/ Ta pa  shing ny+ta'i tshogs[\] ]i ni tra ka d+ya tsa sh+tsa/ i ni tra tsa rnams kyang ngo / /kha la gor tha rnams
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]las tshogs pa brjod pa la rim pa bzhin i ni tA ka d+ya tsa rnams 'gyur te/ kha li n+Shi/[\[]ba lang gi tshogs sam rigs kyi tshogs/[\] ]go trA/ go sda la DA/ ra tha ka dra/ shing rta'i tshogs/ ta da s+y+raM pra ha ra Na mi ti kr-I DA yA N+NaH/ mtshon cha las de 'di la rtse bar byed pa zhes pa la Na'o/ /mtshon cha las de 'di la
[\[159b.2\]]rtse bar byed pa zhes pa'i don la dang po'i mtha' bdun[ \[]tha can dam [\]]dan pa'i tshogs/[ \[]Sha la si nin e brjod don ri tan ma bzhes par dIr[\]]/[ \[]ratha la ka d+ya tsa tsa dbyangs don[\]]/ ba'i don can laN 'gyur te/ daN+daHpra ha ra Na ma s+yaM gr-I dA yAM/ zhes pa'i don la/ dan+Da la Na/[ \[]dA N+DA/ Na DA ga[\] ]de bzhin du/ mau Sh+Ta/
[\[159b.3\]]g+ha nyaH sA s+yAM kr-I ye ti nyaH/ de 'di bya ba zhes pa'i g+ha nya la nya'o/ bya ba'i tshig sngon na yod pa g+ha nya'i mtha' las bdun pa'i don la nya 'gyur te/ sh+ye na pA ta la nya/ sh+ye na ti la s+ya bA te nye/[ \[]'di la mtshon chad thug paT skye bar byed/ sh+ye na ti la'i b+Tan nya la 'o[\]]/ /[\[]lcug pas rtse/ mu N+Ti la Na bsel ba TA ga khu ru ba'i rtse [\]]
[\[159b.4\]]b+wa ta ha'i rkyen can pha rol la sh+ye na dang til dag la mu ma A ga ma 'gyur te/ ma ni ma 'gro ba a tsa'i mtha' las pha rol gyi don dang u brjod don no/ /[\[]nya TA ba shrai naM pA tA[\]]/ de bzhin du/ tai laM bA tA/ snum thog ta da d+hI te ta dwe da/ de brjod pa dang de rig pa'o/ /de brjod pa dang de rig pa'i
[\[159b.5\]]don la gnyis pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ i[\[]N+d+rA [\]]da yaH/ i Sh+Ta byA ka ra NaM a r+hi te pA Ni r-i ShiH/ zhes pa'i don la/ bai [ \[]la lha bu na[\]]/ yA ka ra  til sngon ma'i pA ta la nya[\[] 'phel ba sh+ye na ti la'i zhes pa na baTA ba[\]]/ NaM pA Ni ni ri Shi tha/ de bzhin du/[ \[]i n+t+na [\]]da yaH/[ \[]aSh+Ta byA ka ra NaM be hi
[\[159b.6\]]i n+d+ra sogs zhes pa'i brda sprod brgyad ni i N+D+ra ka ra Na bi bA byA ka ra Na shA ka TA ya Na b+y+ra ga ra Na pI Ni ni byA ka ra ma n+ta d+ha dra b+ha ka ra Na ba he tsha li byA ka ra Na ma nu dze n+d+ra b+y+ra ka ra Na rnams so[\]]/ dbang po [\[]sogs brda sprod brgyad klog pa brang spong bA NaM ba[\]]/ bA Ni ni r-i ShiH/[ \[]byA ka ra Na ma a na e A ga ma su ya ga[\]]/ brda sprod klog pa drang srong bA Ni ba/ zhes pa'i don la/ aN  bai
[\[159b.7\]]yA ka ra NaM bA Ni ni r-i ShiH/ brda sprod rig pa dang srong bA Ni ba/ kra mA di b+h+yo bu na/ kra ma la sogs pa rnams las bu na'o/ /kra ma la sogs pa rnams las de brjod pa  dbang po sogs brda sprod brgyad rig pa drang srong bA Ni ga dang de rig pa'i don la bu rda 'gyur te/ na dbyangs don bu a ka/ bu na kra ma kaH/[ \[]ru ma ba shes[\]]/
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]bu na pa da kaH/ ta da smi na sdI ti she ta n+nA m+ni/ de 'di na yod pa zhes pa yul la de'i ming la'o/ /de 'di na yod pa zhes yul gyi ming yang go bar byed pa'i don la bdun pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/ u du m+ba rA Ni saM ti a smin de she/ zhes pa'i don la/
[\[160a.2\]]au du mA raH/ te na ni r+b+r-i t+taM/ tshig rig pa/ de yis rdzogs pa la'o/ /de yis rdzogs pa'i don la gsum pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ ku shu shA m+be na ni nr-i t+ta/ zhes pa'i don la/ kau sha m+b+Shi na ga ti/ ta s+ya ni bA saH/ de'i  'di na u du mA ra rnams yod pa'i yul/ gnas la'o/ /
[\[160a.3\]]u du bya ra lod ba/ gnas su sdod pa la de'i ming la drug pa'i mtha' la a Na la sogs pa 'gyur te/ shi bA nI ni bA saH/ zhes pa'i don la/ shai baH/ a dU ra b+ha ba sh+tsa/ ngan sel gyis [\[]gangag [\]]mi ring ba grong khyer [\[]mdzod[\]] ldan/ ku sha mA la aN 'phel ba Ti ta D+ha sogs kyis dI ba/ nyid las kyang do/ /mi ring ba nyid brjod pa la drug
[\[160a.4\]]pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ bi ding shA NA ma du ra b+ha baM/ zhes pa'i don la/ bai di shaM/ aN 'phe ba/ zhi ba rnams kyi gnas/ zhi ba pa/ aN bsel ba/ dza na pa de lu ba/ ljongs la dbyi'o/ /gnas kyi don can gyi rkyen rnams ljongs brjod pa'i don yin na rnam dbye mang tshig la 'jig ste/
[\[160a.5\]]paM tsa lAH/ aN phyis pa'o/ /yul rnams kyi mi ring ba nyid/ ba ra NA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ ba ra Na la sogs pa rnams yul mi ring ba/ las kyang ngo / /ba ra Na la sogs pa rnams kyi mi ring ba'i don gyi rkyen rnams kyang rnam dbye mang tshig pha rol la 'jig ste/ pa ra NaH/ rigs nye ba rnams/ she She/ lhag ma la'o/ /gong du
[\[160a.6\]]ljongs lnga len pa rnams/ bshad pa de rnams las nye bar sbyar ba la lhag ma don gzhan la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ tsa k+Shu ShA gr-i h+ya te/ zhes pa'i don la/ tsA k+Shu ShaM/ aN  shrA ba NaH/ aN  rA sa naH/ aN  sbA r+sha naH/ dzas la aN phyis pa'o/ /ta tra dzA taH/ der skyes pa las so/ /
[\[160a.7\]]der skyes pa'i don la bdun pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa rnams 'gyur te/ bcom brlag tu skyes pa/ ma thu rA yAM  ba lta bya mig /dzA taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ blta bya/ aN su a mi/ mnyan bya/ myang bya/ reg bya/ bcom brlag tu skyes/ mA thu raH/ aN 'phel ba/ brA br-i Sha Sh+Tha ka /prA pr-i Sha
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]las Tha ka'o/ /prA br-i Sha'i sgra las der skyes pa'i do na la bdun pa'i mtha' la Tha ka 'gyur te/ prA br-i Shi kaH/ ta tra baha baH/ de la dngos po la'o/ /de'i dngos po brjod pa la bdun pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ ma thu rA yAM b+ha baH/ zhes pa'i don la/ mA thu raH/ di gA
[\[160b.2\]]di b+h+yo ya ta/ di sha la sogs pa rnams las yata'o/ /di sha la sogs Tha ka ka 'phel do na Thaka e ka /dbyar skyes/ pa rnams la dngos po la ya ta 'gyur te/ ya ta  di sh+yaM/ ya ta  brgyi/ sha ri rA ba ya bA ts+tsa/ lus kyi cha shas las kyang ngo / /bcom brlag nyid/ lus kyi cha shas  bcom baR+lag nyid
[\[160b.3\]]las kyang dngos po la yata 'gyur te/ yata  da n+h+yi/ yata  kar+N+yaM/ yata  ha s+t+yaM/[ \[]auSh+Sh+yaM/[\] ]yata  pA d+yaM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ad+h+yA t+mA deHka /phyogs nyid/ sde tshan nyid/ ad+h+yA t+ma la sogs pa rnams las Tha ka'o/ /a d+h+yA t+ma la sogs pa rnams las dngos po la Tha ka
[\[160b.4\]]'gyur te/ A d+h+yA t+mi kaM/ A t+hi dai ba  so nyid/ rna ba nyid/ lag pa nyid/ mchu nyid/ rkang pa nyid/ kraM/ ai ha lau ki kaM/ ta ta A ga taH/ de las 'ongs pa la'o/ /de las 'ongs pa'i don brjod pa las lnga pa'i mtha' la iN 'gyur te/ mthu rA yAHA ga taH/ zhes
[\[160b.5\]]Tha ka ka la 'phel ba Na eka /nang pa nyid/ Thaka na a cu shar ka la sobs kyis snga phyi gnyis 'phel ga pa'i don la/ mA thu raH/ lhag pa'i lha can/ 'jig rten bde/ Thaka 'phel ba/ gnas nas 'ongs pa la Thaka'o/ /gnas nas 'ongs pa brjod pa la lnga pa'i mtha' la Thaka/ bcom brlag nas 'ongs pa/
[\[160b.6\]]'gyur te/ Thaka A paNi kaM/ so\u0f85 s+ya ni bA saH/ de 'di'i gnas la'o/ /de de'i gnas  bcom brlag nas 'ongs pa/ brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/ ma thu raHpa ni bA so s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ mA thu raH/ te na pro k+taM/ des rab tu gsung ba la'o/ des rab tu gsung
[\[160b.7\]]pa'i don la gsum  rang gnas nas 'ongs/ pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/ b+ha ga ba tA pro k+taM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu gsungs pa/ zhes pa'i don la/ aN  b+h+ra ga ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu gsungs ba/ 'di'i gnas bcom brlag /bcom brlag pa/ mA na baH/ mi yis rab tu gsungs pa/ kr-i te gra n+thi/ byas
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa'i gzhung la'o/ /de byas pa'i gzhung gi don la gsum pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/ pA Ni ne na kr-i gra n+thaH/ zhes pa'i don la/ aN  pA Ni no gra n+thaH/ ta s+ye daM/ de'i 'dis la'o/ /de'i 'di zhes pa'i don la drug pa'i mtha' la aN 'gyur te/ u pa go ri naM/
[\[161a.2\]]zhes pa'i don la/ au pa ga baH/ ra thA d+ya ta/ ra tha las yata 'o/ /ra tha las de'i 'di zhes pa'i don la ya ta 'gyur  bA Ni bas byas pa'i gzhung / te/ ra tha s+yedaM/ pA Ni bas byas [\[]kha ra [\]]gzhung / zhes pa'i don la/ ra th+yaM/ grA mA d+ya kha nyau/ grA ma las ya kha nya dag go/ /grA ma las  nye ba'i[\[] ba [\]]yang red/
[\[161a.3\]]lhag ma la ya dang kha nya dag  nye ba'i ba lang 'di/ 'gyur te/ grA me dza taH/ grA mA dA ga taH/ grA me b+ha baH/ zhes pa rnams kyi don la/ ya grA myaM/ shing rta 'di/ grA mI NaH/ na d+yA di b+h+yo d+h+ya D+ha ka /na dI la  shing rta 'di/ sogs pa rnams las D+ha ka'o/ /na dI la sogs pa rnams las
[\[161a.4\]]lhag ma ste skyes pa sogs don tshan gsum po de rnams  grong du skyes/ grong nas 'ongs/ laD+haka  grong nyid/ 'gyur te/ grong ngam grong nas 'ongs sam grong du ba gro/ /ba nya nya 'phel don kha I nar bskyur/ nA de yaH/ chu klung du skyes sa mchu klung nas 'ongs sam chu klung nyid/ yA mu ne yaH/ chu bo ya mu na ru skyes sam ya mu
[\[161a.5\]]na ma 'ongs sam ya mu na/ mA he yaH/ ma hI la D+ta la ka/ dak+Shi NA sh+tsa t+pu ra sa s+t+ra ka /tak+Shi NA pa sh+tsA ta phu ras t+yaka 'o/ /dak+Shi NA sogs 'di rnams las lhag ma la t+ya ka 'gyur te/ D+ha ka ka la 'phel baD+ha e ya/ t+yaka  dak+Shi NA t+yaH/ t+yaka pA sh+tsA t+yaH/[ \[]dz+nyar las dz+nyar zhes ra phyis[\]]/ ya mu na la D+ha ka  /t+yaka  pau ra s+t+yaH/ d+Yu brA ga
[\[161a.6\]]sa nas skyes sam sa nas 'ongs sam sa gzhi/ bA gu dka pra tI tso ya ta/ dib prA tsa a bA tsa  u dI tsa/ pra tI tsa las yata'o/ /di pa sogs 'di rnams las lhag lho phyogs su skyes pa'am lho phyogs nas 'ongs pa'am lho phyogs pa/ nub phyogs su skyes pa'am nub phyogs nas 'ongs sam nub phyogs pa/ shar phyogs su skyes pa'am shar phyogs
[\[161a.7\]]nas 'ongs pa'am shar phyogs pa/ ma la yata 'gyur te/ yata  di byaH/ mtho ris su skyes pa'am mtho ri su nas 'ongs pa'am mtho ris pa/ ya ta  prA ts+yaH/ shar du skyes pa'am shar nas 'ongs pa'am shar ba/ yata  a bA ts+yaH/ nub tu skyes pa'am nub nas 'ongs pa'am nub pa/ ya ta  u dI ts+yaH/ byang du skyes pa'am byang nas 'ongs pa'am byang ba/
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]yata  pra tI ts+yaH/ a bya yA t+h+ya ba/ mi zad pa las t+ya pa'o/ mi zad pa'i nang tshan a ma i ha/ kwa rnams dang ta sil dang tral gyi rkyen mtha' rnams las lhag ma la t+ya pa 'gyur te/ a mA taH/ t+yab pa dbyangs do na/ t+yab  i ha t+yaH/ t+yab  kwa t+yaH/[\[]thi las [\]]skyes sam ci nas 'ongs pa'am ci/ t+yatha ta
[\[161b.2\]]nub tu skyes pa'am nub nas 'ongs pa'am nub pa/ ta s+h+raH/ t+yab  ta tra t+yaH/ t+yapa neHd+h+ru be/ ni las brtan pa la t+yapa 'o/ /ni las brtan pa'i don la t+yab 'gyur te/ ni ya [\[]taM d+g+ru baM[\]]/ zhes pa'i  blon po'am blon po las skyes pa/ don la/ t+yapa ni t+yaM/[ \[]'di ma [\]]'di las skyes pa'am 'di nas 'ongs/ ai Sha mo h+yaH/ shwa so nya n+ya ta ra
[\[161b.3\]]de las skyes sam de nas 'ongs pa'am de la/ de las skyes sam de nas 'ongs sam de la/ s+yI/ ai Sha mas h+yas  shwa sa las yang na'o/ /ai Sha mas sogs rnams las rnams las lhag ma la nges pa'am brtan pa/ t+yapa yang na 'gyur te/ nges pa'am brtan pa'am mi g.yo ga t+yab  ai Sha ma s+t+yaM/ 'di las skyes sam 'di nas 'ongs
[\[161b.4\]]sam 'di/ t+yab  h+ya s+t+yaM/ t+yab  shwa sbyaM/ rlung las skyes sam rlung nas 'ongs sam rlung / yang na/ ai Sha ma sta naM/ sogs te 'og tu 'chad do/ /br-i d+hiHya s+yA mA di sta d+b+r-i d+t+hi/ gang gi atsa rnams kyi dang po 'phal ba de 'phel ba'o/ /rtags gang gi'ang atsa rnams kyi dang po 'phel ba'i yi
[\[161b.5\]]ge yod pa de la  kha sang skyes sam kha sang 'ongs sam kha sang / 'phel pa'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed de dgos pa ni 'phel ba las tsha'i zhes sogs kyi ched de/ br-id+d+hats+tsaH/ 'phel pa las tsha'o/ /gong du 'phel ba'i ming can zhes pa rda chang byas pa de las lhag ma la tsha
[\[161b.6\]]'gyur te/ gA rgye dza taH/ gA rgye dza taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ gA rgI yaH/ gA rgA'i bu 'am ga rga'i bu las skyes pa/ A ga ste yaH/ tsha I ya/ shA lI yaH/ t+ya dA dI ni tsa/ t+yad las sogs pa rnams kyang ngo / t+yad las sogs pa rnams las kyang lhag ma la cha 'gyur te/ t+ya rI yaM/ tsha ta
[\[161b.7\]\[]sha rga'i [\]]bu las skyes pa/ ga rga'i bu nyid/ gargya la tsha tsha I ya bu brgyud kyi tha na la A ma yin bzhes ya [\[]phyis[\]]/ ri bya'i bu'am ri bya'i bu las skyes ga rab du skyes pa'am rab nas 'ongs pa'am rag dI yaM/ de las skyes pa'am de nas 'ongs pa'am de/ tsha ya dI [\[]yaM gang las skyes pa ma gang nas 'ongs pa'am gang /[\] ]de las skyes pa'am de nas 'ongs pa'am de/
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]bra t+ya yo t+ta ra pa da yo sh+tsa/ rkyen dang tshig phyi ma dag las kyang ngo / /yu Sh+ma da dang a smad gnyis kyi da bor ba'i yu Sh+masma a sma dag ni rkyen pha rol dang tshig gzhan pha rol las kyang rim pa bzhin twa dang ma dag tu 'gyur te/ twa dI yaH/ yu Sh+Ya da a sA da la/ ma dI nayaH/ bdag
[\[162a.2\]]las skyes pa'am bdag /tshig phyi ma la/ twa t+bu traH/ ba d+bu traH/ b+ha ta Sh+Tha ka tshe sau/ /b+ha bta las Tha ka zhas dag go/ /b+ha ba ta las lhag ma la Tha ka dang tshas dag 'gyur te/[ \[]tsha I la[\] ]b+hA bat+kaH/ b+ha bta la tshas si ti tsa/ sa 'gro ba byod [\[]pa tha skyes pa'am kyodA[\]]/[ \[]ny+yad la sogs bzhes pas tsha shra sma tsa dang a sma bu 'gyur[\]]
[\[162a.3\]]la'ang ngo / /rkyen sa 'go ba dang  khyod kyi bu/ bdag gi bu/ ya la sogs pa pha rol tu byung na rkyen ster yul gyi mang de la tshig ces ming 'dogs byed do/ /khyod las skyes pa'am khyod las 'ongs pa'am khyod/ b+ha ba ta la Tha ka ka 'phel ba is us uka ta sogs kyis Thaka /dgos pa ni mtha'i dz+nya la rnams kyi dza sha rnams so/
[\[162a.4\]]zhes pas/ ta dar 'gyur ba'i ched yon no/ b+ha pa dI yaH/ i nya sh+tsa/ i nya las kyang ngo / /rigs kyi don du byin pa'i i nya'i mtha' las lhag ma la aN 'gyur te/ ngA k+Shau b+ha baH/ dA k+Shau dza taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ i nya aN  dA k+ShaH/ k+Sha traH/ inya aN/ ga hA di [\[]b+b+yash+za[\]]/ ga ha la
[\[162a.5\]\[]b+ha bta wa tshas sa ta dar [\]]'gyur ba'i don tsha I ya/ khyod las skyes sam khyod/ sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / /ga ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang lhag ma la tsha 'gyur te/ ga hI yaH/ mkhas pa'i rigs/ mkhas pa'i rigs las skyes pa/ mkhas pa'i rigs las skyes pa'am mkhas pa'i rigs/ rgyal po'i rigs las skyes pa'am rgyal po'i rigs/
[\[162a.6\]]dza na par yoHku ka tsa/ dzan par dag las ku ka'ang ngo / /ga ha sogs kyi nang tshan dzan dang par dag las rkyen tsha  khang pa ru skyes pa'am khang pa nas 'ongs ba'am khang pa/ tsha I ya/ pha rol la ku ka A ga ma 'gyur te/ dza na kI yi/ mi'am mi las skyes pa/ par kI yaM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/
[\[162a.7\]]da ba s+ya bA/ de ba'i yang na'o/ /de ba las tsha pha rol la ku ka A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ de ba kI yaM/ lha'am lha las skyes pa/ de bI yaM/ yu Sh+mad do ra n+ya ta ra s+yaM kha ny+tsa/ yu Sh+mad  dza na dang par la tsha tsha I ya ku ka A gam ka gnas kyi don u brjod don/ pha rol lam/ pha rol tu skyes pa'am pha rol nas 'ongs pa/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]asmad dag las khanya yang na 'ang ngo / /yu Sh+mad naa smad dag las lhag ma la kha nya yang na 'gyur zhing yang na aN dang 'ang gi sgras tsha yang 'gyur te/ ta smi n+naNi tsa yu Sh+mA kA smA kau /de la aN la'ang yu Sh+mA ka a smA ka dag gau/ /khanya dang aN pha rol la'ang yu Sh+mad a smad dag ni
[\[162b.2\]]rim pa bzhin yu Sh+mA ka dang a smA ka dag tu 'gyur te/ yau Sh+mA kI nraH/ yau Sh+mA kaH/ aN 'phel ba/ tsha AM ya  yu Sh+ma dI yaH/ khanya 'phel ba kha I na/ A smA kI naH/ A smA kaH/ aN 'phel ga a sma di yaH/ tsha A la/ ta ba ka mam kA pe ka ba tsa ne/ gcig tshig la ta ba ka mam ka dag go/
[\[162b.3\]]gcig tshig nyid la 'jug pa'i yu Sh+ma a smad [ \[] nya 'phel ba kha I na[\]]/ khyod dam khyod las skyes pa'am khyod las 'ong ba/ khyod dam khyod las skyed pa'am skyes pa'am khyod las 'ong ba/ bdag gam bdag las skyed pa'am bdag las 'ong ba/ bdag gam bdag las skyes pa'am bdag las 'ong ba/ dag lhag ma'i don gyi rkyen kha nya dang aN pha rol la tab ka dang ma ma
[\[162b.4\]]ka dag tu 'gyur te/ tA ba kInaH/ tA ba kaH/ aN 'phel ba/ mA ya kI naH/ mA ma kuH/ aN 'phel ba/ ma d+d+yAn+maH/ ma d+h+ya las ma'o/ /ma d+h+ya las lhag ma la ma 'gyur te/ ma d+ha maH/ A de sh+tsa/ A di las kyang ngo / /A di las kyang lhag ma la 'gyur te/ A di maH/ a d+ha so\u0f85 sta'o
[\[162b.5\]]kha nya 'phel ba la Sha I na/ khyod nyid dam khyod nyid las skyes ba/ khanya 'phel ba I na/ bdag nyid dam bdag las skyes pa/ pa sh+tsa/ a d+has kyi mtha' dbyi ba'ang ngo / /ad+has las lhag dbus ma 'am dbus su skyes pa'am dbus nas 'ong ba/ ma la ma 'gyur zhing mtha' dbyi ba'ang ngo / /dang po'am thog ma'am legs pa/ a
[\[162b.6\]]d+ha maH/ a sAM pra tri ka /mnyam pa la a'o/ /mad+h+ya las mnyam pa'i don la a 'gyur te/ mad+h+yaH/ kA lA ta Thanya/ dus las Thanya 'o/ /dus brjod pa can la lhag ma la Thanya 'gyur te/ mA si kaH/ Thanya 'phel ba i ka/ A r+d+ha mA si kaH/ Thanya 'phel ba i ka/ sA mA t+sa ri kaH/ thanya 'phel ba i ka/ ni shA pra
[\[162b.7\]]ngan pa'am ngan pa las skyes pa'am tham/ do ShA [\[]b+h+yAM [\]]tsa/ ni shA pra do Sha dag las kyang ngo / /ni shA dang pra do/ ma [\[]N+d+ya [\]]la a gang gi i ta la'ang ngos a phyis su/ dag las lhag ma la thanya 'gyur te/ zla ba'am zla ba las skyes pa/ /zla ba phyed dam zla ba phyed nas 'ongs pa/ lo'am lo las skyes pa/ dbus mnyam pa'am 'dra ba'am mtshungs/ /
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]nai shi kAM/ Thanya 'phel ba Tha ika /prA do Shi kaM/ Thanya 'phel ba ika /shwa sa s+hu ts+Ta/ shwas las tuT+ra 'ang ngo / /shwas las lhag ma la Thanya 'gyur zhing tuT A ga ma yang ster te/ shwas la Thanya/ tuT/[ \[]d+hA [\]]sogs kyis i tsa A ga ma/ Tha I ka /shau ba sti kaM/ rlung ngam rlung las skyes/
[\[163a.2\]]mtshan mo'am mtshan las skyes sam mtshan las 'ongs/ srod dam mtshan mo'i dang po'am srod las skyes sam sros las 'ongs/ dwA rA dI nAM tsa/ d+nA ra la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo / dwA ra la sogs pa rnams kyi pha rol tu rkyen 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can byung na rtags de dag gi dang po 'phel ba mi byed par ai tsa A ga ma
[\[163a.3\]]ster ro/ /dwA ra sogs ni/ dwA ra  swa ra  bya lka sha  shwa sti swa du  mr-i du  shwa su  shwa ta  spya rnams so/ /sarba trA Natsa ta lo pa sh+tsa/ rtag tu aN ste ta dbyi ba'ang ngo / /he man+ta las lhag ma la aN rtag tu 'gyur zhing ta dbyi ba'ang ngo / /hai ma naH/ 'grel bar yang na Thanya 'o zhes
[\[163a.4\]]bshad pas/ hai man+ti kaH/ sA yaM tsi raM brA h+ne pra ge\u0f85bya ye [\[]b+h+yo[\]] Sh+Yu D+Yulau tu T+tsa/ sA yaM  tso raM  prA h+ne  pra ge  mi zad pa rnams las Sh+YuT yul dag ste tuT 'ang ngo / lhag ma'i don can gyi aN ma gtogs aN byung tshad ma tad bye ba ma yin no/ /dgun nam dgun ka skyes pa/[ \[]ta ma rda la[\]]/[ \[]aN 'phel ba ta [\]]phyis su/ sA yaM dang / tsi raM
[\[163a.5\]\[]he ma ny+ta la[\]]/[ \[]banya [\]]'phel ba tha i ka su/ dgun nam dgun ka skyes pa/ dang / bra [\[]h+ne [\]]dang / pra ge rnams dang / mi zad pa'i rtags rnams la dus brjod pa la Sh+YuT dang yul dag 'gyur te tuT a+nga ga ma'ang ngo / /sA yaM kA la/ srod dus/ zhes pa'i don la/ sA yaM ta naM srod dus/ tsi raM ta naM/ de bzhin du/ brA h+ne
[\[163a.6\]]ta naM/ pra ge ta naM/ 'di dag gi ma mtha' dang e dag ni tshig phrad kyis bsgrubs pa'o/ /mi zad pa la/ do ShA ta naM/ mr-i ShA ta naM/ rgyun gyi dus/ h+ya sta naM/[ \[]Sh+muT [\]]'am yul tuT/ 'grel bar [ \[]sA yaM la Sh+mu Ta Ti D+ha sogs kyi don Sha 'gro ba'i ching can yu thal na r+n+baT [\]]yang na yul/ dus ring po'am yun ring po/ lung drangs
[\[163a.7\]]nyi ma dang po'i dus/[ \[]Sh+buT 'am lus nyaDa/ snga mo'i dus/[\] ]pa/ tsi ra t+pa ru t+pa rA ri b+h+yaHt+naH/ tsi ra ta pa ru ta  pa rA ri rnams[ \[]ph+p+ShaT 'am phul tuT[\]]/ mtshan mo'i dus/[ \[]Sh+bu Ta'am yul tuT[\]]/ /kha sang gi dus/ las t+na'o/ /tsi ra ta sogs 'di rnams la dus brjod pa la t+na 'gyur te/ yun ring po/ tsi ra t+naM/[ \[]tsi ra dang ba ru tal  t+na dz+ha na 'dra ba la dz+har [\]]rnams
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]kyi ngos te [\[]gongs byis ba'o/ sang pa nu t+naM/[ \]]gnangs pa rA ri tI/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ brag s+ya ga lo ba sh+tsa/ pra ga'i ga dbyi ba'ang ngo / /pra ga las dus brjod pa la t+na 'gyur zhing ga dbyi ba 'ang ngo / /pra t+naM/ snga mo'i dus/ a bra pa sh+tsA di man/ a gra pa sh+tsa ta las i ma na'o/ a gra dang ba sh+tsa ta dag las lhag ma la i
[\[163b.2\]]man 'gyur te/ a gri ma/[ \[]i man na dbyangs don[\] ]pa sh+tsi maM/[ \[]ba shU ta la awa man na dbyangs don bti Sha [\]]sogs kyis Ti phyis/ a n+tA ts+tsa  an+ta las kyang ngo / /a n+ta las kyang lhag ma la [ \[]brag ba t+na byis[\]] su am/ a min 'gyur te/ an+ti maM/ i man na dbyangs don/ tas+ya bi kA raH/ de'i rnams 'gyur ba la'o/ /
[\[163b.3\]]bro mo'am rtse mor skyes pa'am rtsa nas 'ongs pa/ phyi ma'am nub bam nub tu skyes pa'am nub nas 'ongs ba/ de'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i don la drug pa'i mtha' la aN la sogs pa 'gyur te/ su bar+Na s+ya bi kA ro\u0f85sau/ zhes pa'i don la/ mtha' ma'am mtha' ru skyes pa'am mtha' nas 'ongs ba/ sau bar+Na/ a ba ya ba tsa prA [\[]n+y+yo Sha [\]]
[\[163b.4\]]d+hi bri+-i k+She b+h+yaH/ srog chags dang  sman dang  shing rnams las yan lag la'o/ /srog chags dang sman dang shing rnams las yan lag brjod pa la drug pa'i mtha' aN la sogs  gser gyi rnam 'gyur 'di/ pa 'gyur te/ ka po ta s+yA ba ya baH/ zhes  gser gyi rnam 'gyur/ aN na la[\[] 'phel ga ba'i [\]]
[\[163b.5\]]don la/ kA po traM/ aN  kA rI ri/ bau rba kA N+DaM/ ma ya Dai ta yo b+hA Sha ya ma k+ShA ts+tshA da na yoH/ bshad pa la ma yata yang na sta bza' ba dang gos de dag les ma yin no/ /bza' dang gos kyi don ma yin pa'i  ug ron gyi yan lag /bshad pa zhes bshad ma thag pa'i rnam
[\[163b.6\]]aN Na la 'phel ba/ phug ron gyi yan lag /myu gu'i yan lag /sngon gyi tshor can gyi yal ga /'gyur dang yan lag gi don la ma yaT yang na 'gyur te/ dU rba ma yaM/ yang na/ aN  dau rba/ zas dang gos la mi 'gyur te/ aN mau [\[]d+laH[\]]/ aN  rgA saM/ ni t+yaM braM d+d+ha sha rA di b+h+yaH/ 'phel ba dang sha ra
[\[163b.7\]]la sogs pa rnams las rtag tu tu'o/ /gong du 'phel ba'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byas pa rnams dang shar la/ dU rba la ma yaT Ta Ti D+ha sogs kyi don/ dU rba las byung ba/ sogs pa rnams las rnam  sran ma dang ming ka las byung ba/ srin bal las byung ba/ 'gyur dang yan lag la ma yaT rtag tu
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]'gyur te/ ma yaT  A mra ma yaM/ ma yaT a ra ma yaM/ ma yaTu[ \[]da n+ta ma yaM[\]]/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ e kA tsonya bi ma yaT/ a tsa gcig pa las kyang ma yaT 'o/ /rtags gang zhig a tsa gcig pa rnams las rnam 'gyur dang yan lag gi don la ma
[\[164a.2\]]yaT 'gyur te/ lbA d+ma yaM/ ngag gi rnam 'gyur/[ \[]tsU ta [\]]las byung ba/ mda'i rnam 'gyur ram yan lag/ kun sha'i yal ga/[ \[]tsi n+ma yaM/[\]\[ ]rig [\]]pa'i rnam 'gyur ram lan lag[ \[]ta t+tha [\]]kraM ti ba tsa ne ma yaT/ de rang bzhin brjod pa la ma yaT 'o/ /de rang bzhin brjod pa la dang po'i mtha' las ma yaT 'gyur te/ ma yaT dA
[\[164a.3\]\[]sngag dang tsi ta la ma [\]]yaT/ Ta Ti ta D+ha sogs kyi don/ na ma yaM/ ma yaT  shI la mi yaM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/[ \[]yang de rjes [\]]su sna ldan la rjes su sna ldan yang na 'os ka dang ta ra dang na/ pa [\[]d+hA [\]]n+ya nyapi/ gtso bo la yang na'o/ /gtso bo brjod pa las kyang ma yaT 'gyur te/ ma yaT  d+ha rma ma yaH/ go sh+tsa pu rI She/ go las
[\[164a.4\]]gci ba la'o/ /go las gci ba/ sbyin pa rang bzhin nam/[ \[]tshu ba'i nyi mas las [\]]byung ba/ brjod pa la ma yaT 'gyur te/ mayaT go ma yaM/ go ba yaM so yata/ ga dang ba yas dag las yata 'o/ /go dang ba yas dag las rnam 'gyur yate 'gyur te/ ga [ \[]rim kyi gtso bo/[\] ]byaM/ yata  pa ya s+yaM/
[\[164a.5\]]pa le lu ka /'bras bu la 'jig go/ /'bras bu'i don brjod pa las rnam 'gyur gyi rkyen rnams 'jig go/ /lu ka ta d+d+hi ta ba lang gi gcig lu ka /de phan 'jig pa las 'jig go/ /'bras bu'i don brjod ba can de phan gyi rkyen 'jig pa la  go la yata pha rol wa'i mtha' can no/ /ba lang / bud med du  'o thug
[\[164a.6\]]brjod pa'i rkyen rnams kyang 'jig ste pa dA rlA pha laM/ zhes pa'i don la/ ma yaT/ ba da rnyi ma yaM/ mdo sde ma ma yaT 'jig /mdo 'dis di pa 'jig /ba da raM/ de bzhin du/[ \[]bU [\]]ru ra'i 'bras bu/ A ma la kaM/ i ta go [\[]naN+naH[\]]/ go nA'i i ta'o/ /go NI'i sgra las de phan gyi rkyen rnams
[\[164a.7\]]dbyi zhing mtha' i ta du 'gyur ba'ang ngo / /ba dA re ni 'bras bu/ bad re'i 'bras bu'am cha shas/ pany+tsa b+hiH/ go NI b+hiHk+r+w-i ta  gal te lda rnams kyis tshong / zhes pa la/ bad ma'i 'bras bu'am cha shas/ A ma la kI lam yam/ zhes pa lam yaT dang dwab gyis pa'o/ /[\[]gal te lnga yis tshong [\]]/[ \[]pa ny+ma [\]]go NiH/[ \[]taN myis mtha' i ta su/[\]]
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bla k+ShA di b+h+yonya na/ bA k+Sha la sogs pa rnams las aN 'o/ /pA k+Sha la sogs pa rnams las 'bras bu brjod pa la aN 'gyur zhing dbyib 'ang ma yin te/ bA k+Sha s+ya pa laM/ zhes pa'i don la/ aN  p+lA k+ShaM/ de bzhin du/ A shwA t+tha/ o ranya/ u las anya'o/ /rtags u yig ring thung
[\[164b.2\]]mtha'i can las rnam 'gyur la anya 'gyur te 'bras bu brjod pa la 'jig go/ /dzam+b+rA pha laM/ zhes pa'i don la/ dza m+ba'uH/ dza m+b+bAHbA/ dza m+bu las [ \[]b+ba [\]]k+Sha'i 'bras bu/ yang na'o/ dza m+bU las/ pA k+Sha'i 'bras bu/ rtag nas kyi 'bras bu/ aN su a ma/ 'bras bu la aN 'gyur te/ dza m+bU'i 'bras bu/ dzA m+ba baM/
[\[164b.3\]]lu b+tsa/ dbyi ba'ang ngo / /dza m+bU la 'bras bu'i don du byim pa'i aN yang na dbyi ste/ dzam bu'i 'bras bu/ an phyis pa'o/ /dza m+bu'i 'bras bu/ dzA m+ba baM/ dzam+bUH/ ha rI ta kyA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ ha rI ta kI la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo / /ha rI ta kI las sogs dza m+bu las aN 'phel ba u'i yon tan tan A tsa'i a ya ba su/
[\[164b.4\]]rnams las 'bras bu'i don gyi rkyen rnams dbyi zhing bud med du brjod pa'i rkyen dbyib ma yin te/ ha rI ta kyAHpha laM/ zhes pa'i/ dzam+bU'i 'bras bu/ aN phyis ba/ don la/ hA rI ta kI/ aN phyis pa'o/ /drA k+ShA/ ta tra ni yu k+haH/ de la nges par sbyor ba'o/ /de la nges par sbyor ba'i don la bdun
[\[164b.5\]]pa'i mtha' la thag 'gyur te/ dwa re ni yu k+taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ dau bA ri kaH/ sgo srung / kA ru Ni  a ru ra'i 'bras bu/ kaH/ shau lka sha li kaH/ 'grel yang brjod pa'i  a ru ra'i 'bras bu/ rgun 'brum/ don la'ang tha ka 'gyur ro zhes pa bshad pas/ swa sti t+ya haH/ zhes pa'i don la/ sau
[\[164b.6\]]bsti kaH/ bde legs su byung zhes brjod pa/ sbro la nges par sbyor ba/ drA ra la Thaka drA ra sogs kyi ai tsa [\[]A ga ma Tha i [\]]ka/[ \[]Thaka 'phel ba Tha'i ika[\] ]/snying rje can/ sho gam gyi bal  n+ya gro d+ha s+ya tsa ke la s+ya/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'ang gcig nyid la'o/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i 'ang tshig grogs gzhan med pa'i gcig bde legs su gyur ces brjod pa/ nyid la de phan gyi
[\[164b.7\]\[]swA sti la Tha ke rwA[\]]sogs kyi i [\[]tsa sA[\]] ga ma [\[]Thai kaN+d+na rkyen [\]]'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan pha rol la 'phel ba mi phyed par ai tsa A ga ma 'gyur te/ n+ya gro d+ha pha laM/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'bras bu/ zhes pa'i don la/ n+ya gro d+ha la aN ai tsa A ga ma/ ne ya gro d+haM/ tshig gcig nyid ma yin na ai tsa mi ster te/ n+ya gro d+ha le b+ha p+laH/ n+ya gro d+ha'i rtsa ba/
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]zhes pa'i don la/ aN sel ba / n+ya gro d+ha m+bU laM/ swA ga tA dI nAM tsa/ swA ga ta la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo / /A ga ta la sogs pa rnams pha rol gyi swa la'ang ai tsa A ga ma 'gyur ba ma yin te/ swA ga te kaH/ swA d+h+wa ri kaH/ swA d+giH/ rang lus kyi bu/
[\[165a.2\]]byA DiH/ chong ba  byA+e ba hA ri kaH/ 'grel par lung drangs ba/[ \[]n+yaM gro d+ha'i ratsa ba[\]]/ pa th+ya ti thi ba sa ti swa pa te D+ha nya/ ba thi a ti thi  ba sa ti swa pa ta la D+ha nya'o/ /pa thi la sogs pa 'di rnams la dngos po la D+hanya 'gyur  rang yongs pa/[ \[]lhag sogs kyis Thaka 'phel ba/ Tha i ka Shang gi tshon sbyin/ a ta ba i nya 'os i nya
[\[165a.3\]]'phel ba rtsol ba can gyi bu/ lhag pa sogs kyis Tha ka 'phel ba la aika[\]]/te/ bA bre yaH/ A ti the yaH/ bA te yaH/ swA pa te yaH/ shwA de ri nyi/ shwA de ri nyi/ shwa na la sogs pa rnams kyi i nya la'o/ /shA na la sogs pa rnams kyi i nya pha rol la ai tsa mi 'gyur te/ shwa b+ha sta s+yA pa t+yaM/ zhes pa'i don la/
[\[165a.4\]\[]aN pa i nya mos e nya[\]]/ shrA ba stiH/[ \[]shwa gaN+D+wa T+D+ya nya tsa[\]]/ shwa [\[]gaN  lam /ga[\] ]dge slong /[ \[]D+hanya  nya 'gro ba la 'phel ga  ga rdas ba/ D+ha e la su/[\] ]nyal ba/ las Tha nya 'ang ngo / shwa ga Na las ga yo ba'i don la Tha nye 'gyur zhing 'ang gi smras Than yang ngo / /shwa ga Ni tsa ra ti/ zhes pa'i don la/[ \[]ci gos can gyi bu[\]]/ shwA [\[]ga Ni [\]]
[\[165a.5\]]kaH/ shwa ga Ni kaH/[ \[]rgya'i gos [\]]can gyi bu/ pa dA n+ta s+yA ha ra s+yAM/ bad mtha'i yang na'o/ /bad mtha'i shwan sogs la de phan gyi rkyen 'phel pa'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la ai tsa A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ shwa ba das+ya i daM/ zhes  chu'i tshogs g.yo ba/ pa'i don la/ shau ba pa daM/ bsel ba Tha ika/
[\[165a.6\]]bya'i tshogs g.yo ba/ Tha nan dbyangs don Tha ika /sh+w+ba pa da/ 'grel par/[ \[]n+ya d+gul [\]]yang ai tsa yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ Nai ya [\[]d+ga [\]]baM/ yan lag mtshan ma can 'di/[ \[]n+yA d+ka baM[\]]/ su [\[]sarbA r+d+hA [\]]ta dza na ba da s+ya/ su sarma ar+d+ha  kyi'i rkang pa 'di/ aN i tsa A ga ma dang 'phel ba yang na bar bya ba'o/ khyi'i rkang pa 'di las
[\[165a.7\]]aN ai tsa A ga ma dang 'phal ba yang na bar bya ba'o/ /khyi'i rkang pa 'di/ ljongs kyi'o/ /su sarba a r+d+nya rnams snga ma las ljongs brjod pa la aN ai tsa dang 'phel ba yang na ba u'i yon tan/ aN 'gyur zhing rtags phyi ma kho na 'phel ba byed de/[ \[]lA len [\]]gyi ljongs ba legs pa/ su pA [\[]ny+T+ra laH[\]]/ aN rtags [\[]bye ma [\]]'phel ba su/ sarba pA ny+tsa laH/ lnga len
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]gyi ljongs thams cad/ ar+d+ha pA ny+tsA laH/ saM yo gA di sh+tsa/ yang dag par sbyor ba sogs kyang ngo / /yang dag par sbyor ba ste rtags gang gi u pa d+hA yi ge gnyis sogs brtsegs pa yod la/ aN dang in pha rol tu byung na Ti dbyib sogs mi byed de/ tsA kri NaH/ 'khor lo can gyi bu/ yA dz+wa naH
[\[165b.2\]]lnga len gyi ljongs phyed/ aN rtags phyi ma 'phol ba su/ na ma pU rbo\u0f85 t+yenya t+yenya ba rma NaH/ ba rman ma yin pa'i ma sngon ma las bu brgyud la ma yin no/ /ba rman ma yin pa'i ma yig sngon na yod na bu brgyud brjod pa la Ti mi dbyi ba ma yin te dbyi ba nyid [\[]tsa kri Na dang dz+wa na [\]]la aN 'phel ba Ti mi dbyi/ mtshod sbyin can gyi bu/ do/ /
[\[165b.3\]]sau sA maMH/ snyan tshig bzang po'i bu/ b+ha dra shra maH/ dge ba bzang bo'i bu/ ba rman ma yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi ba rman la/ b+hA dra ba rmaNaH/ 'grel par lung dngas ba/ karmA ta shI le/ ka rman las dang tshul la'o/ /ka rman las dang tshul brjod pa la aN 'gyur zhing Ti'ang dbyi bar bya ste/ kArmaH/
[\[165b.4\]\[]su sra man dang b+ha dra shra man la an [\]]'phel ba Ti phyis/ au k+Sha man pa t+ye/ au k+ShaM bu brgyud ma yin pa la'o/ /u k+Sha na  aN 'phel ba Ti mi dbyi/ go cha bzang po'i bu/ la aN sbyar ba'i au k+ShaM/ zhes pa bu brgyud ma yin pa'i glang nyid brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /Sha b+du rba han d+h+ri ta rA dz+nyA maNi/ las kyi dad tshul/ ka chan la aN 'phel ba/
[\[165b.5\]]Sha sngon ma han d+h+ri dzan rnams kyi aN la'o/ /Sha yig sngon na yod pa dang han dang d+h+r-i ta rA dzan rnams kyi u pa d+ha'i a tsa aN phyi rol la dbyi ste/ glang / auk+ShaH/ lha min 'joms byed kyi bu/ bA rta b+h+naH/ 'dzin byed rkyal po'i bu/ d+hA rta rA dz+nyaH/ prA gwa ha ta Tha ka /'dren pa las gong du Tha ga'o/ /
[\[165b.6\]]ra tha yu ga prA sad+ga la de 'dren no la'o zhes pa'i 'dren pa las sngon du don gang yin pa rkyen dmigs bsal med pa thams cad la Thaka rkyen du 'gyur ro [\[]glang gi bu[\]]/ u k+Sha N-i la aN 'phal kha u pa[\[] d+hA d+ye a[\]]/[ \[]br-i ta han [\]]la aN 'phel ba u pa [\[]d+hA phyis han gyi ha'i b+ha[\]]/ d+h+r-i ta dA dzan la/ aN 'phel ba u ba d+hA phyis [\[]su tu'i zhes pas ranyadza ta 'dus pa dz+nya[\]]/ zhes
[\[165b.7\]]spyir btang pa'o/ ten dI kha na ti dza ti dzi taM/ de yis rtsas so brkos so rgyal lo thul pa rnams la'o/ /rtses so la sogs pa don 'di rnams las gsum pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/ ak+ShaiH dI bya t-i/ cho lo rnams kyis rtses so/ /zhes pa'i don la/[ \[]aka 'phel pan mig/ A k+Shi kaH[\]]/ cho lo rnams
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]kyis rtses so/ /ku dA len kha na ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ kau dA li kaH/ sha ste Na dza ya ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ shwa sti k+ShaH/ shas+t+ri Na dzaM taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ shA s+t+ri kaH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ b+hA ba pra t+ya yAM ni r+b+raM t+te i man/ dngos po'i rkyen mtha' ma tshar ba
[\[166a.2\]]la i ma na'o/ /kr-ita sogs kyi/ ton tses brkos so/ /rkyen dngos  tog rtses bat+kos so/ /ku rA la Thaka 'phal ba Tha e ka/ mtshon chas rgyal lo/ mtshon chas rgyal lo/ /sha s+t+ra la Thaka 'phel ba [\[]Tha'i eka[\] ]mtshon chas Thul lo/ /[\[]sha s+t+ra la Thaka ka la 'phel ba Tha'i ika[\] ]/po'i don can gyi mtha' las tshar ba la i man 'gyur te/ pA ke na ni r+b+raM taH/ zhes
[\[166a.3\]]pa'i don la/ pA ki maH/ bcos tshar/ bak+Shi ma t+s+ya mr-i pA ka ha n+ti/ bya nya ri dwags rnams la gsod do la'o/ /bya'i rigs dang / nya'i rigs dang / ri dgas kyi rigs rnams la gsod do la gnyis pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/ bak+Shi Ni han+ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ bA k+Shi  bcos tshar/ kaH/
[\[166a.4\]\[]pa tsal [\]]dngos po'i don la b+hanya pA ka de la [\[]i mnan [\]]dbyangs don/ de bzhin du/ bya gsod pa/ shA ku ni kaH/ tai t+ti ri kaH/ ri dgas gsod/ mA rgi kaH/ hA ri Ni kaH/[ \[]shA rad+gi kaH/ shA rad+ga la Thaka/ mA t+s+yi kaHpa/ nya gsod/ min ba Tha ka/ maini kaH bya rnams gsod/ dak+Shin la Thaka 'phel ba na'i de phan la'ang ngos Ti phyis tha'i ika[\] ]/bya rnams gsod/
[\[166a.5\]]sa skr-i taM/ yang dag par byas pa la'o/ yang dag par/ ku ni la thaka /mthing ril gsod/[ \[]ti N+te ta la Thaka 'thel ga mr-i ga la Thaka/ sha ba gsod/ ha ri Na la Thaka/ khri sta nas le gsod/ ma rgyal Thaka 'phel Tha eka sbu rla ti Sh+ya sogs kyis byis/[\] ]nya chen po gsod/ byas so zhes pa'i don la gsum pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/ Thaka dA d+hi kaM/
[\[166a.6\]]sha b+da da rdu raM ka ro ti/[ \[]shab+dadang da rdur dag la byed do la'o/ /sha b+da dang da rdu ra dag la byed dol gnyis pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/ shab+daM [\]]ka ro ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ Thaka shA b+di kaH/ de bzhin du/ Thaka  dA rdu ri kaH/ dA rdu ri kaH/ d+ha rmaM tsa ra ti/ d+ha rma la spyod do la'o/ /d+ha rma la spyod do la [ \[]zho thas so[\]]/
[\[166a.7\]]gnyis pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/ d+ha rmaM tsa ra ti/ chos la spyod par byed/ zhes pa'i don la/ Thaka d+hA rmi kaH/ chos la spyod pa/ 'grel par/ sgra byed do/ /lung drangs pa/ ad+ha rmA ts+tsa/ sgra byed do/ ad+ha rma las kyang ngo / /[\[]lbal ba byed[\]]/ ad+ha rma las kyang spyod do la gnyis pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]\[]ad+ha [\]]rmaMkaH/ asti NA staM di Sh+TaM ma ti/ asti NA sti di Sh+ta la blo gros la'o/ /a sti  nA sti  di Sh+Ta rnams la dang pa'i mtha' blo gros brjod pa la Thaka 'gyur te/ yang  A sti kaH/ nA sti kaH/ dai Sh+Ti kaH/ pra g+g+ti tA bya ta/ phan pa las sngon du yata'o/ /de la phan pa la'o zhes pas
[\[166b.2\]]chos[\[] lha yin pa [\]]la spyod ba/ phan pa las gong du don gang yin pa de la rkyen dmigs bsal med pa rnams la yaT 'gyur ro zhes pa spyir btang ba'o/ /ta dwa ha ti ra tha yu ga prA so gaM/ ra tha yu ga med pa/ ston pa/ brA sa d+ga la de 'dren no la'o/ /ra tha la sogs pa 'di rnams la de 'dren no la gnyis
[\[166b.3\]]pa'i mtha' la [\[]yata [\]]'gyur te/[ \[]rathaM ba [\]]ha ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ yata  rath+yaH/ shing rta 'dren pa/ de bzhin du/ yata  yu gyaH/ gnya' shing 'dren pa/ yata  brA so gyaH/ glang drug gis 'dren pa/ d+hu ro yata D+ha kau/ d+hur las yata D+ha ka dag go/ /d+hur las de 'dren no la yata dang D+ha ka dag 'gyur
[\[166b.4\]]te/ yata  d+hu r+YaH/ d+hau ra yaH/[ \[]D+haka 'phel bad+ha el[\]]/ ha li tsa/ hal la'ang ngo / /ra yig dang ba yig srog med kyi u ba d+hA i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na hal pha rol la ring bor 'gyur ro/ /na b+ha ku r+tshu rAM/ b+ha ku ra chur rnams kyi ma yin no/ /b+ha'i ming can rnams dang shing
[\[166b.5\]]rta'i 'khor lo gnyis kyis lcags 'dir 'dren pa/ kur dang tshur rnams kyi u pa d+ha'i i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams tal pha rol la ring por 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /khaHsa rba d+hu rA ta/ satra d+hu ra las kha'o/ /sarba snga ma'i d+hu ra las de 'dren nol kha 'gyur te/ sarba d+hu rI NaH/ e ka d+hu [\[]rA lku ka[\]]
[\[166b.6\]]bA/ e ka d+hu ra las yang na 'jig go/ /e ka d+hu ra las kha yang ni 'jig ste/ e ka b+hu raH/ e ka d+hu rI NaH/ sha ka TA daN/ sha ka ta las aN 'o/ /sha ka Ta las de 'dren no la aN 'gyur te/ shA ka TaH/ ha la sAM rA ta Thaka /lcags 'ding thams cad 'dren pa/[ \[]kha kha'i tha smin[\]]/ ha la
[\[166b.7\]]sA+e ra las Thaka 'o/ /ha la dang sI ra las[\[] de 'dred no [\]]la Thaka 'gyur te/ kha phyis pa/ lcags 'ding gcig 'dren pa/[ \[]kha a'es/ Thaka hA li kaH[\]]/ thong gshol 'dren pa/[ \[]ske ra las Thaka 'phel ba thaeka[\]]/ /sai ri kaH/ thong ba 'dren pa/ ta tra [ \[]Thaka [ \]]'phel ba/ shing rta [\[]'dren [\]]pa/ sA t+yuH/ der legs pa la'o/ /der legs pa la bdun
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]pa'i mtha' la yata 'gyur te/ sA ma su sA d+huH/ zhes pa'i don la/ sA ma n+yaM/ sA ma n+yaM/ de bzhin du/ karma D+yaH/ ka rma nas yata/ sa b+hA las ya'o/ /sa b+hA la der legs pa la ya 'gyur te/ sa b+h+yaH/[ \[]'du khang [\]]ngam tshogs khang legs pa/ sa mA na [\[]tI rbe bA mi[\]]/ sa mA na
[\[167a.2\]]ti r+tha la gnas pa la'o/ /sa mA na tI r+tha las/ snyan tshig rnams la legs pa/ bdun pa'i su ba/ snyan tshig legs pa/ sA man ba taya/ las legs pa'am las su rung ba/ der gnas pa la bdun pa'i mtha' la ya 'gyur te/ sa mA na tI r+the bA si/ zhes  sa b+ha la yaH/ pa'i don la/ sa tI r+th+yaH/ sa mA no da re sha yi taH/ sa mA
[\[167a.3\]]ni u dar la nyal ba la'o/ /sa mA na u dar la nyal ba'i don la ya 'gyur te/ sa mA nod re sha yi te/ zhes pa'i don la/ sa mA no da r+YaH/ so da rA d+yaH/ so dar las  bsti gnas mtshungs par gnas/ sa mA [\[]na tI tha la ya mA na'i sa 'os sa sa ma nas[\]]/ bsti gnas mtshungs par gnas/ ya'o/ /sa mA na
[\[167a.4\]]sar 'gyur bas so dar las kyang nyal ba la ya 'gyur te/[ \[]ya so da r+YaH/ agrA  lto mtshangs pa la nyal pa/ lto mtshungs pa la nyal ba ste spun bla[\]]/ d+ya ta/ a gra las ya ta'o/ /a gra las gdongs po brjod pa la ya ta 'gyur te/ a gre b+ha baH/ zhes pa'i don la/ yata  a g+r+yaH/ g+ha tshau tsa/ g+ha
[\[167a.5\]]tsha dag kyang ngo / /a gra las dngos po brjod pa la g+ha dang tsha/ lto mtshungs pa la nyal ba/ dag kyang 'gyur te/ a gri yaH/ a grI yaH/ ta smo hi taM/ de'i ches du phan pa la'o/ /de'i ched du phan pa'i don la bzhi ba'i mtha' la  rtse mo nyid/ tsha 'gyur [\[]te/[\] ]sbu r+YA ya hi taM/ rtse mo/ zhes pa'i don
[\[167a.6\]]la/[ \[]sU rI yaH/ sha rI rA pa ya bA d+ya ta/ lus kyi cha shas la ya ta'o/ /lus kyi cha shas la phan pa'i  g+ha i ya/ rtse mo nyid/ tsha I ya/ don la bzhi pa'i mtha' la yata 'gyur te/ dan+tA ya hi taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ yata  dan+t+yaM/ de bzhin du/ yata [ \[]o Sh+th+yaM[\]]/ nyi ma'i ched [\[]du phan pa[\]]/ yata  nA byaM/
[\[167a.7\]]shi ma la phan pa/[ \[]sgu r+Ya la tsha tsha'i sI ya sU r+Ya tI Sh+ya sogs kyis ya skyis[\]]/[ \[]A d+man bi [\]]shwa dzan b+ho got+ta ra ba dA t+khaH/ b+hog tshig phyi ma dang A t+man bi shwa dza na las kha'o/ /rtags gang gi'ang b+ho ga tshig phyi mar  so yi ched du phan pa/ gyur pa dang / so la phan pa/ A t+ma na bi [ \[]ma chu la [\]]phan pa/ shwa dzan rnams las  lte ba la phan pa/
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]phan pa'i don la bzhi ba'i mtha' la kha 'gyur te/[ \[]mA tr-i b+ho g+thi nasaH/ pi tr-i b+ho gI naH/ kha kha a+win/ ba n+hu b+ho g+ShinaH/ bi shwa dza ni nyaH/ kha kha'i I na/ A t+man la kha[\]]/ A d+mA d+hA nai khe/ a+da t+man [ \[]a d+h+rAn dag kha la'o[\]]/ /A t+man dang /[ \[]a d+h+wAn dag gi T+ri khi pha[\]] rol la dbyi ba ma yin te/ A t+ma nI naH/
[\[167b.2\]]te na krI taM/ des nyos pa la'o/ /des  ma'i longs spyod la phan pa/ kha kha'i [\[]A+e na[\]]/[ \[]pha ro longs [\]]spyod la phan pa/ gnyen gyi  longs spyod la phan pa/ skyi po sna tshogs la phan pa/ nyos pa'i don la gsum pa'i mtha' la Thaka 'gyur te/ sa b+ta t+yA gri taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ sA b+ha ti kaH/ A t+man la kha kha'i In Ti mi dbyi/ bdag nyid la
[\[167b.3\]]phan pa/ sa khyA yA ya ti sha dan+tA yAHkan/ ti shata kyi mtha' can ma yin pa'i grangs las ka na'o/ /sa n+ta ti dang tsa twA riM sha bu ti dang shata kyi mtha' can ma yin pa'i grangs las nyos pa sogs  bdun cu yis nyos pa/[ \[]ab+ta tel  Thaka 'phel ba Tha yin/[\]]/bdun cu yis nyos pa/ la ka na 'gyur te/ bany+tsa
[\[167b.4\]]b+hiH krI taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ bany+tsa kaH/ lnga yis nyos pa'am lnga pa/ ti dang shata mtha' can la/ A shI ti kaH/ tsA twA riM shat+kaH/ bzhi bcus nyos pa'am bzhi bcu pa/ ba to riDA/ ba tu'i iT yang na'o/ /ba tu'i rkyen mtha' can las kyang nyos pa sogs la kan 'byung te iT yang na'o/ /
[\[167b.5\]]lnga yis nyos pa/[ \[]ba ny+tsa na la  kan ming mtha'i na phyis[\] ]tA ba ti kaH/ de srid/ tA ba t+gaH/ a shi til des nyos bzhes pas Thaka 'phel pa Tha ika/ brgyad cu nyos pa'am brgyad cu/[ \[]tsa t+dAM ri sha ta la [\] ]des nyos pa zhes pas Thaka ka 'phel ba is us sogs kyi mdos Thaka /[\[]biM sha triM sha d+sh+d+y+wa T+Shu na saM r+d+nyA yAM[\]]/ biM sha ti triM shata dag las [\[]ming ma yin pa Du na'o[\]]
[\[167b.6\]]biM sha ti dang triM shata [ \[]nyata la ba tu tA ba ta ka na ika [\] ]sa rba sogs A/[ \[]ta ba ta la kan[\]]/[ \[]de sis[\]]/ dag las ming ma yin pa la nyos sogs kyi don la Dun 'gyur te/ biM sha kaH/ nyi shu ba/ tring sha kaH/ sha tA ts+tsa Tha n+ya tA ba sha te/ shata las kyang Than ya ta dag ste sha ta ma yin pa la'o/ /sha ta gzhan brjod pa ma
[\[167b.7\]]yin pa'i nyos pa'i don kho na brjod pa'i sha ta las kyang nyos pa'i bing sha ti la [\[]DUn Da [\]]'gro ba la thing sha dbyi 'os ti phyis [\[]Da de'i don gus [\]]ka gang gi [\[]inya gyi'ang ngos [\]]a phyis/ don la Than sum cu ba/[ \[]trid shad la DUnaDa 'gro ba la Ti phyis bu aka [\]]dang yata dag 'gyur te/ sha te na kr-I taH/[ \[]brgya yis nyos pa[\]]/ zhes pa'i don la/ yata  sha
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]t+yaH/ than  sha ti kaH/ nyos ba'i don ma yin na mi 'gyur te/ sha taM ba ri mA NaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ sha ta kaH/ ta s+yeM shwa raH/ de'i dbang phyug la'o/ /sa [\[]rba bU [\]\[] dang pr-i bli  bri [\]]dag las dbang phyug gi don la drug pa'i mtha' ma aN an 'gyur te/[ \[]sa rba b+hu me [\]]rI shwaraH/
[\[168a.2\]]zhes pa'i don la/ swa rba [ \[]brgya yis [\]]nyal ba/[ \[]b+hU maH[\]]/ de bzhin du/ bA[\[] r+thi baH[\]]/ te na tu l+yaM/[ \[]brgya li [\]]chad/ /kr-i yA tse dwa ti/ des  ka nan dbyangs don/ mnyam par bya ba la bti'o/ /de dang de 'dra zhes pa lta bu des mnyam par bya ba'i don la bti 'gyur te/[ \[]brA h+ma Ne tu l+yaM kha thams [\]]dbang phyug /
[\[168a.3\]]a Na 'am anya/ sa tha mas cad kyi dbang phyug sa rigs kyi dbang phyug /br-i thi bI la aN 'am anya 'phel ba/ zhes pa'i don la/ sa h+ma Na ba ta/ de bzhin du/ k+Sha tri ya bta/ ta tra ta s+ye ba/ de la de'i lta bu la'o/ /lta bu'am bzhin nam ltar zhes pa'i don la drug pa zam ze dang mnyam pa/ dang bdun pa'i
[\[168a.4\]]mtha' la ba ti 'gyur te/ de ba s+ya i ba/ de ba i ba/ zhes pa'i don la/ ba ti  de ba  bta/ de bzhin du/ bram ze dang mnyam pa'am 'dra ba/ ba te i brjod don/ rgyal rigs dang mnyam ba'am 'dra ba'am mtshungs ba/ ba ti  ba rba ta bta/ ba ti  rA dza bta/ ta dartaM/ de mchod pa la'o/ /de mchod do zhes pa'i don
[\[168a.5\]]la gnyis pa'i mtha' la ti 'gyur lta bzhin/ lta bzhin/ te bi d+hiM a r+d+haH/ zhes  lha bzhin nam lha ltar/ pa'i don la/ bi d+hi ba ta/ ta s+ya b+hA ba s+t+wa ta lau/ /de'i dngos po la twa ta la dag go/ /de'i ngo bo'am  ri bo ltar/ dngos po'i rgyal po bzhin/ don la drug pa'i mtha' la twa dang tal dag 'gyur zhing
[\[168a.6\]]twa byin pa na ma ning dang tal byin pa rnams bud med kyi rtags  tshogs mchod/ so/ /ngas [ \[]sA d+hA+o c+h+Sha ba[\]]/ zhes pa'i chogs[\[] mchod[\]]/[ \[]ba ti'i i badzad don[\]]/ don la/[ \[]sA d+hu su tAM[\]]/ legs pa mnyid/[ \[]sA d+hu d+hA[\]]/[ \[]ha swA t+dA dau ta d+d+hI [\]]te/ thung du las de ba na ta la sogs pa la'o/ /rtags gang gi u pa d+hA dbyangs thung ngu
[\[168a.7\]]yin pa de'i a rol gyis ni de phan gyi rkyen ta te twa la sogs pa byin na Sha ru 'gyur te/ legs po nyod/ dza yu Sh+TaM/[ \[]dza yus la tA bung bu zhes sam sa Sha Sha phu ca taTu bas taT su am[\]]/ legs po nid/ twa su ma ning la su am/ tal la dbyangs don a dza sogs kyi TAs/ thung [\[]ngu [\]]zhes pas rnam bcad kyi ring bo la mi 'gyur te/ nga gnyid  gI stAM/[ \[]gling la twaM ra rnam kha cad[\]]
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]rnam par bcad pa'i sa/ pri th+wa di b+h+ya i ma ni dz+dA/ pr-i thu la sogs pa rnams las i man dang i tsa y-ing na'o/ /pra thu la sogs pa rnams las dngos po la twa ta la 'gyur bar ma zad i man dang i tsa dag kyang yang na 'gyur ro/ /TiH/ Ti'i 'o/ /by-i thu sogs kyi Ti i man i tsa i
[\[168b.2\]]yas dag pha rol la dbyi'o/ /r-i toHha lA de rla g+hoH/ hal dang po'i r-i ta yang ba'i 'o/ /hal dang po na yod pa'i r-ita yang ba ni rkyen i man dang i tsa dang e yas rnams pha rol la ra ru 'gyur te/[ \[]pra thi mA/ pra thiH/ twa br-i thu twa twaM[\]]/[ \[]a dam pa/ ta la pr-i thu tA[\]]/ hal dang po zhes pas rnam
[\[168b.3\]]bcad kyi hal dang po na med na r-i thung du yin kyang rar mi 'gyur te/ ra dzi mA/ yang ba zhes pas rnams bcad kyi [ \[]pra thub i man Ti'i D+hos Te phyis hal dang ba la zhes pas rar bra thi man su na'i u ba d+hA ring ba ming mtha'i phyis hal sogs kyis su ba cig yangs ba nyid do[\]]/ /yangs pa/[ \[]tha thu la i tsa tsa dbyangs don[\]]/ lci ba la rar mi 'gyur te/ i man  kr-i [\[]Sh+NaM T+Sha [\]]
[\[168b.4\]]pri thu sogs ni/ phr-i thu/ mr-i du/ r-i dzu/ 'jam pa nyid dam sla ba nyid/[ \[]ri dzu la e ma na[\]]/ dr-i D+ha/ b+h+raMsha /kr-i sha /br-i D+ha/ kr-i Sh+Na rnams so/ /bar+Na dr-i D+hA di b+h+yaHSh+ya ny+tsa/ kha dog dang dr-i D+ha la sogs pa rnams las Sh+ya nya 'ang ngo / /kha dog gi khyad par brjod pa dang dr-i D+ha sogs la dngos po [ \[]nad po nying /[\]]
[\[168b.5\]]la Sh+yanya 'gyur te  yangs ba/ 'jam ba'am sla ba/ i man 'ang ngo / /shau k+l+yaM/ dkar btid/ brtan pa/ shin tu/ nad/ 'phel ba/ nag po/ shu kri mA/[ \[]Sh+yakya dA b+d+h+yaM/ dra D+d+hi mA/ Sh+ya ha lA ba N+d+yaM[\]]/ la ba Ni mA/ gu Na ba tsan brA b+ma NA di b+h+yaHka rma Ni tsa/ yon tan brjod pa dang brA h+ma Na la sogs pa rnams las las
[\[168b.6\]]la'ang ngo / /yon tan brjod pa rnams dang brA h+ma Na la sogs  ShA nya nya 'phel don/ Shi ta la dI ba'i don/ pa rnams las dngos po  i yan/ dgar ba nyid/[ \[]brtan pa nyid[\]]/[ \[]i man[\]]/ dza nyid/ i man/[ \[]ba nyid[\]]/ dang las la'ang Sh+yanya 'gyur te/ dza Da s+ya b+ha ba/ dza Da s+ya karma/ zhes pa dag gi don pa/[ \[]Sh+yanya dzA D+yaM[\]]
[\[168b.7\]]de bzhin du/[ \[]Sh+yanya  brA h+la T+yaM[\]]/[ \[]tha ma dri nyid dam dram ze'i lags[\]]/ Sh+yanya  tsau rmaM/ chom rkun nyi dang mchom kun[\[]byings[\]]/ 'grel bar lung drangs la/ tsa tu rba [\[]r+NA 'I nI swA r+the Sh+yanya[\]]/[ \[]tse tu rba r+Na [\]]la sags pa rnams kyi rang don la Sh+ya nya'o/ /[\[]tsa tu rba r+Na [\]]la sogs pa  blun po nyid/ blun po'i las/ rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]rang don  blun po nyid dam blun po'i las/
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]la Sh+yanya 'gyur te/ Sh+yanya  tsA tu rba N+yi  Sh+yanya tsA tu rba N+yi  Sh+yanya tsA tu rA shrA maM/[ \[]Shanya  ti lo kyi[\]]/ 'gril par/ tsa t+ya rbed las kyang rang don la Sh+yanya 'gyur zhing tshig snga phyi gnyis kar gyi 'phel ba'o/ /zhes bshad pas/ Sh+yanya  tsA tu rbai d+yaM/ ste nA [\[]d+ya n+nya [\]]lo pa shu/ sten las yata sten
[\[169a.2\]]dbyi ba'ang ngo / /ste na las dngos po dang las kyi don rigs bzhi/ la Sh+yanya dal ba bzhi/ 'jig rten gsum/ 'gyur bar ma zad yata kyang 'gyur te yata pha rol la na yang dbyi ste/ stai n+yaM/ ste yaM/ sakhyu rbaH/ sa khi las ya'o/ /sa khi'i las dngos  rig byed bzhi/[ \[]bo [\]]dang las la ya 'gyur te/ sakhyaM/ dU
[\[169a.3\]]ta pa [\[]Ni g+b+h+yaM tsa[\]]/ dU ta pa Ni dza dag las kyang ngo / /dU ta dang pa Ni dza dag las kyang dngos po dang las kyi don la 'gyur te/ dU t+yaM/ chom rkun nyid dam chom rkun gyi las/ sten la Sh+yanya/ ste na la la ta gang gi ita kyi 'ang ngos na'i srog a kyis mdo 'dis na [\[]phyes[\]]/[ \[]pra Ni dz+yaM[\]]/ grogs po nyid dam grogs po'i las/ sa khel ya/ ka
[\[169a.4\]]pi dz+wA do dz+haMka /ka pi dz+nyA ti dag las D+ha ka'o/ /ka pi dz+nyA ti dag las dngos po dang las kyi don la D+ha ka 'gyur te/ phonya nyid dam po nya'i las/ D+haka  kA pe yaM/ D+haka dz+nyA te yaM/ pa t+ya n+ta pu ro hi tA di b+h+yo laka /pa ti mtha' dang pu [ \[]tshong pa nyid dam tshong pa li bas[\]]/ ro hi ta la sogs pa rnams las yaka lo lo
[\[169a.5\]]nga ti tshig phyi mar gyur pa dang bu ro hi ta la sogs pa las dngos po dang las kyi don la yaka 'gyur te/ sa nA pa d+yaM/ bau ro hi  spre'u nyid dam [\[]spre'u'i las[\]]/ shes pa nyid dam shes pa'i las/ t+yaM/[\[]rA radz+yaM[\]]/ rgyal pa nyid dam rgyal po'am rgyal po'i las/ prA Na dzA ti ba yo ba tsa no d+gA trA di b+h+yo nya nya/ srog chags kyi rigs
[\[169a.6\]]dang na tshod brjod pa dang [\[]u d+bA tra[\]] la sogs pa rnams las anya 'o/ /sde'i bdag po nyid dam sde'i bdag po'i las/[\[ ]sen pa ti la yaka[\]]/ rgyal po'i mdun na 'don nyid mad las/ srog chags kyi rigs dang na tshod [ \[]pu ri te ha la yaka[\] \[]rA dza na la yaka na'i de pa na la'ang [\]]ngos Ti phyis/ brjod pa dang u dwA tra la sogs pa rnams las dngos po
[\[169a.7\]]dang las kyi don la anya 'gyur te/ aN  A shwaM/ rta nyid/ ku mA ra la aN/[ \[]ko m+ba raM[\]]/ gzhon nu nyid/[ \[]dul gyi sha sher ba nyid [\] ]od+gA traM/[ \[]u rnA N+ra aN[\]]/ ho tr-i la aN [\[]ika gi ab la[\]] yan/ hau traM/ sbyin sreg nyid/ hA la nA n+ta yu pA d+h+yo nyaN/ hA yan mtha' dang yu ba la sogs pa rnams las anya'o/ hA ya na tshig lci mar
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]'gyur ba dang yu ba la sogs pa rnams las dngos po dang las la an 'gyur te/ aN  dwe hA yanaM/ aN  yau ba naM/ shau ba naM/ gya nyid/ so tA rdaM/[ \[]yi dag drugs nyid dam mthar byo nyid[\]]/ i ga [\[]n+h+ra ts+tsa la glu pU rbA ta[\]]/ yang ba sngon ma las ika mtha' las kyang ngo / /rtags kyi yi ge sngon ma
[\[169b.2\]]yang ba las pha rol gyi mtha' ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na'ang dngos po  lo gnyis banyid/[ \[]yang chos dang pa nyid[\]]/[ \[]shad pa an  hUr sogs kyis ai tsa yA gas[\]]/[ \[]sa tra da la aN su draMng b+ha ga sogs kyi mdos cho ga snga khyi gnyis kar [\]]'phel ba/ dang las kyi don la aN 'gyur te/ mau nai/ mu nai aN/ gaur paM/ yang ba nyid/ lA g+ha
[\[169b.3\]]baM/ yang ba zhes pas rnam bcad kyis lci ba la/[ \[]kA N+DA [\]]twaM/ yo pa [\[]d+h+da d+hu rU po t+ha mA dwunya[\]]/ ya u pa d+ha las lci ba nye ba las bunya 'o/ /rtags gang gi'ang u ba d+hA ya yig yin pa de'i sngon ma'i nye ba'i yi ge de lci ba yod pa las dngos po dang [ \[]thub pa nyid/ bla ma nyid[\]]/[ \[]zhu ru ya aN 'phel ba khu'i yon ta na[\]]/
