[\[169b.4\]\[]la g+ha la [\]]aN/ las kyi don la bu nya 'gyur te/ rA ma NI ya ka/ bzang ba nyid/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ sa hA yA dwA/ sa hA ya las yang na'o/ mdo snga ma'i don rnams tshang yang sa hA ya las dngos po dang las kyi don la bu nya yang na ba ste/ bunya  sA hA ya ka/ sA hA y+yaM/[ \[]d+hA n+yA [\]]nAM b+ha nga
[\[169b.5\]]ni k+She tA+e khanya/ 'bru rnams kyi  dga' bar bya ba nyid/ ngam NI ya la bu nya nya 'phel pa'i don du aka /yod pa'i zhing la khanya'o/ 'bru brjod pa'i sgra rnams la de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la kha nya 'gyur te/ mu d+gA nAM b+ha ba ne k+She tre/ zhes pa'i don la/ mau d+gI naH/ phrI hi shA l+yo [\[]r+D+ha kaTazA [\]]bo nyid/[ \[]sa hA yal kha ti[\]] mtha' dang du'o
[\[169b.6\]\[]hi ta sogs kyi mdos yaka 'phel ga[\] ]brI hi dang shA li dag las D+haka 'o/ /brI hi dang shA li dag las de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la D+haka 'gyur te/ pre he yaM/ hA yaM la D+ha ka/ shA le yaM/ ya ba ya ba kaSha Sh+Thi  sran ma [\[]mu rga rnams yod pa'i zhing / kA d+ya ta/ mu dga'i zhing /[ \[]mu rgal kha nya nya 'phal ba iN[\]]/ ya ba ya ba kaSha Sh+Thi ka las
[\[169b.7\]]yata 'o/ /ya ba ka [\[]Sha Sh+khika [\]]rnams las di yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la yata 'gyur te/ yata  ya byi/ nas kyi zhing / yata  ya ba  'bru'i zhing /[ \[]brA+e hil [\]]D+ha ka /[\[]'bras [\]]kyi zhing / kyiM/ yata Shi Sh+Tha kyaM/ drug cu pa'i zhing ste nyi ma drug cu la 'bru [\[]smin [\]]pa'i zhing / pi b+hA ShA ti la ma' Sho mA d+gA [\[]NA [\]]b+h+yaH/ ti la  mA Sha  u mA  b+ha d+gagA  a
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]Nu rnams la yang na'o/ /til la sogs pa 'di rnams las de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la ya ta yang na 'gyur te/ yata  ti l+yaM/ khanya  tai lI naM/ yata mA Sh+yaM/ khanya  mA ShI naM/ yata  u myaM/ khanya  au mI naM/ yata  b+hA d+g+yaM/ yanya  b+hA d+gI naM/ a Na byaM/ khanya  A Na bI naM/
[\[170a.2\]]ta t+sa rbA deHb-i th+ya ga ka rma ba tra [\[]bA traM byA b+no [\]]ti/ sarba dang po'i pa thi  aM ga  karma  pa tra  bA tra la de rnams par khyab ba la'o/ /sarba dang po'i ba thi til gyi zhing / la sogs pa  sran ma'i zhing / 'di rnams la de [ \[]thar pa'i [\]]zhing / rnam par khyab/ so mar tsa'i zhing / pa'i don la kha  phra mo'i zhing / 'gyur te/
[\[170a.3\]]sha sa  sarba pa thA na bya b+ho ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ sarba pa thI naH/ de bzhin du/ kha  sarba cA d+hI NaH/ kha  sarba ka rmI NaH/ kha  sarba pa trI NaH/ kha  sarba pA trI NaH/ a d+ha no ya tA+au/ a d+hA na las ya ta kha dag go/ /a d+hA na las myur ba bgrod pa'i don la yata dang kha dog 'gyur te/ a d+h+wa na
[\[170a.4\]]lam thams cad khyab ba/ ma lad+ga ts+tsha ti/ zhes pa'i kha kha A+en/ lam thams cad khyab gdon la/ lus thams cad khyab pa/ las thams cad khyab pa/ 'dab ma thams cad khyab pa/ snod thams cad khyab pa/[ \[]lata  a d+hA n+yaH[\]]/ kha [\[]ad+hA [\]]nI naH/[ \[]ta s+ya pA ka mU le pI lwA di ka r+NA di b+h+yaHku Na b+dzA ha tsau[\]]/ pI lu la sogs pa rnams las
[\[170a.5\]]smin pa dang kar+Na lam myur bar bgrod/ la sogs pa rnams las de'i rtsa ba la ku Nab dzA hatsa dag go/ /pI lu la sogs pa rnams kyi smin pa brjod pa la ku Na pa dang kar+Na la  lam myur bar 'grod/ sogs pa rnams kyi de'i rtsa ba brjod pa la dzA ha tsi 'gyur te/ pI lU nAM pA kaH/ zhes pa'i
[\[170a.6\]]don la/ pI lu ku NaH/ de bzhin du/ a shwa t+tha ku NaH/[ \[]ku Na ba/ ka rka n+d+hu ku NaH[\]]/ kar+Na s+ya mU laM/ zhes pa'i don la/ kar+Na dzA haH/ de bzhin du/[ \[]dzA ha tsa  a k+Shi dzA haM/ dzA ha tsa  pu Sh+ba dzA haM/ dzA ha tsa  br-i k+ShA haM/ de ni bi t+ta sh+tsu tsu b+tsa Na pau[\]]/ des rig pa la tsu ny+cu pa  se yab smin/ tsa Na pa dag
[\[170a.7\]]pI lu la ku Nab par byangs don/ se yab smin pa/ khyad par gnas smin pa/ ku Na ba/[ \[]che ba kha [\]]smin pa/ rna ba'i rtsa ba/ 'o/ / /des rig pa  rna ba'i rtsa ba/ dzA ha tsa tsa dbyangs don/ brjod pa la/ mig gi rtsa ba/ me tog gi rtsa'o/ gsum pa'i  shing gi rtsa ba/ mtha' la [\[]tsu ny+cu [\]]pa dang ca Na pa dag 'gyur te/ skabs 'dis tsa rnams
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]'gro ba'i ming can ma yin no/ /she b+de na pi t+taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ sha b+ha cu ny+tsu rma/ sgra rig pa/ sha b+ha tsa NaH/ saM prod sh+tsa ka Ta tsa swA r+the/ saM pra u ta rnams las rang don la ka Ta tsa'o/ /saM bra u ta rnams dang 'ang gi sgras bi las kyang rang don la ka Ta 'gyur te/[ \[]ka Ta tsha [\] ]saM ka TaH/ /
[\[170b.2\]]ka Ta tsa  pra ka TaM/[ \[]sma rig [\]]ba'am shes pa/ ka Ta tsa  baM ka TaH/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ a lA bU ti lo mA b+haM gA [\[]b+h+yo ra[\]] dza si ka Ta dz+wA ts+yaH/ a lA bU  ti la  u mA  b+ha d+gA rnams las thal pa la ka Ta tsa'o/ /shin tu sdug pa/
[\[170b.3\]]rab tu g.yo ba/ a lA bU la sogs pa 'di rnams  shin tu brtsigs pa/ la thal ba brjod pa la kaT tsa 'gyur te/[ \[]ka Ta a so ma [\]]gcod/ lA bU ka TaH/ til ka TaH/ u mA ka TaH/ b+ha d+gA ka TaH/[ \[]go Sh+thA dzA da yaH y+thA nA di Shu ba Shu nA b+h+yaH[\]]/ a dza la sogs pa phyugs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]ming rnams la gnas la
[\[170b.4\]]sogs pa ran+mas la go Sh+tha'o/ /a dza la sogs pa phyugs kyi ming rnams las gnas la sogs pa rnams kyi don la drug  so mar tsa'i thal ba/ til gyi thal ba/ zar ma'i thal ba/ so mar tsa'i thal ba/ pa'i mtha' go Sh+Tha 'gyur te/ ga bAM s+thA naM/ zhes pa'i don la/ go go Sh+Tha/ de bzhin du/
[\[170b.5\]]ma hi ShI go Sh+ThaM/ a dza go Sh+ThaM/ saM g+haM te ka Ta tsa/ 'dus pa la ka Ta tsa 'o/ 'dus pa brjod pa la ka Ta tsa 'gyur te/ a bI nAM [\[]saM g+thA [\]]taH/ zhes pa'i don la/ a bi ka TaH/[ \[]pi s+tha re ya Ta tsa[\]]/ rgyal pa la ya Ta tsa'o/ /rgyal pa yang rnams kyi gnas/ pa'i don la/[ \[]ba lang gi gnas[\]]/ ya Ta tsa
[\[170b.6\]\[]ma he'i [\]]gnas/ ra'i gnas/ 'gyur te/ a [\[]bI nAM bi stA raM[\]]/ zhes pa'i don la/ a pi ya TaH/ a pi ya TaH/ dwi dwe [\[]yu ga tsa[\]]/ gnyis  lug rnams kyi tshogs/ pa la go yug tsa 'o/ lug gi tshogs/ grangs gnyis kyi don la go [\[]yu gtsa [\]]'gyur te /[ \[]u Sh+TA dwau[\]]/ zhes pa'i don la/ a Sh+Ta go gaM/ Sha Te dwe Sha TA
[\[170b.7\]]ba tsa/ drug pa la [\[]Shad+ga [\]]btsa'o/ /lug rnams kyi rgyal pa/ lug rgyas ba ste mang po'i don/ yaT tsa tsa dbyings don/ grangs drug gi don la Sha D+gab tsa 'gyur te/ a shwaH ShaT/ rta rnams drug rnams/ zhes pa'i don la/ rta drug a shA [\[]Sha D+ga baM[\]]/ mo dag gnyis dag /sna ha [\[]te la tsa[\]]/ rnga mo gnyis/ rnga mo gnyis/ snum pa [\[]la tai la tsa'o[\]]/ /
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]snum pa'i don la tai la tsa 'gyur te/ ti lA nAM sne haM/ zhes pa'i don la/ ti la ti laM/ de bzhin du/ g+h+r-i ta tai laM/ b+ha ba ne k+She tre shA ka Ta shA ki nau/ yod pa'i zhing la shA kaT shA kin dag go/ /de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la shA ka TA dang shA ki na dag 'gyur te/
[\[171a.2\]]i [\[]k+ShU nAM [\]]b+ha ba ne k+She tre/ zhes pa'i don la/ i k+Sha shA ka TaM/ til rnams kyi snum pa/ i k+Shu shwa ki naM/ til gyi snum pa/[ \[]tad s+ya saM dzA taM[\]]/ mar gyi snum pa/ tA ra[\[] kA di b+h+ya i ta[\]] tsa/ de 'di'i yang dag par skyes pa la tA ra ka la sogs pa rnams las i ta tsa 'o/ /de 'di'i yang dag par skyes pa la
[\[171a.3\]]bu ram shing rnams yod pa'i zhing / dang po'i mtha' drug pa'i don  bu ram shing gi zhing / can la tA ra ka la sogs pa rnams la i ta tsa 'gyur te/ tA ra kAHsaM dzA tAHa s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ tA ra ki taM/ na b+haH/ de bzhin du/ bu [\[]Sh+thi [\]]taMH/ bu k+ShaH/ pra ma Ne dwa las [\[]dz+da g+h+Na ny+mA tra tsaH[\]]/ tshad
[\[171a.4\]]la dwa ya sa tsa [ \[]dag+n+Nanya [\] ]mA tra tsa rnams so/ /tshad la dang po'i mtha' drug pa'i don can la dwa ya sa tsa/[ \[]dag+h+ya nya mA [\]]tra tsa rnams 'gyur te/ skar ma rnams yang dag par skyes pa 'di/ ha staHbra mA NaHa  skar ma can te/ nam mkha'/ s+ya/ zhes [ \[]me togacan [\]]te/ shing / ba'i don la/ ha sta dwa ya saM/ de bzhin
[\[171a.5\]]du/ dzA nu dag+h+naM/ na b+hi mA traM/ bra mA Ne laH/ tshad la dbyi'o/ /tshad kyi don la byin pa'i rkyen rnams sdeb sbyor sogs kyi dgos pa yod na dbyi'o/ /dwi goHnaM t+yaM/ khru gang tsam 'di/ phyogs gnyis pa las rtag tu'o/ /phyogs gnyis pa'i bsdu ba'i [ \[]da yas nA tsa dbyangs don  khru gang tsham[\]]/
[\[171a.6\]\[]da g+ny+da nya nya [\]]'phel don/ pus mo tsam/ lte ba tsam/[ \[]ma tra tsa tsa [\]]dbyangs don/ mtha' la tshad kyi don gyi rkyen rnams rtag tu dbyi ste/ dwi bi steH/ tri bi sti/ dwaD+ha kI/ bu ru Sha ha sti b+h+yA ma Na tsa/ bu ru ha sti na dag las an 'ang ngo / /pu ru Sha dang ha sti na dag las tshad la dwa yas tsa sogs 'gyur bar ma zad
[\[171a.7\]]aN 'ang 'gyur te/ aN  bau ru ShaH/ skyes pa tsam/ pu ru Sha dwa ya saM/ da ya sa tsa/[ \[]da k+h+nanya [\] ]bau ru Sha/ mthong ngo / /dwa yas tsa phyis ba'o/ /mtho gsum/[ \[]bre do[\]]/ /ma tra tsa phyis ba'o/[ \[]dag+h+naH[\]]/ skyis pa tsam/ sA tra tsa  bu ru Sha mA traH/ skyes pa tsam/ ha stin la/ aN/ i na N+ya na pa t+ye/ bu brgyud ma yin pa la aN la in 'o/
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]bu brgyud brjod pa ma yin pa'i aN pha rol la rtags in mtha'i Ti dbyi ba ma yin te/ aN  hA sti naM/ ha sti dA ya saM/[ \[]dag+h+nanya [\] \[]hA sti dag+hAH[\]]/[ \[]mA dA tsa  ha sta mA traH/[\] \[]ya t+ta de te b+h+yaHpha rol mA Na ba tu pa/ yata  ta ta  e ta ta rnams las tshad la ba tu ba'o/ /ya ta la sogs
[\[171b.2\]]pa 'di rnams la tshad la ba tu pa 'gyur te/ lA ba ta/ ba tu bA tA ba ta/ de tsam/ ba tu ba  e ta ba te/ de tsam/ glang po che tsam/ ha sten la dwa yas tsa tsa dbyangs don ming mtha' na phyis/ glang po che tsam/ ki mi daM b+h+yaM bo g+haH/ ki ma i dam dag las pa'i g+ha'o/ /ki ma dang i dam dag las tshad [\[]la ba tu ba [\]]'gyur zhing ba tu ba kyi ba
[\[171b.3\]]yang g+har 'gyur te/ ci tsam/ ki yA na/ ci tsam/ ya ta la[\[] ba tu ba dbyangs don u num gyi don sa cha'i ming can rnams kyi a 'os Ti a[\]]/ 'di tsam/ i yA na/[ \[]i ta ba la ba tu ba ba dbyangs don u du ma gyi don i dam kim dag gi I sha[\] ]sha 'gro ma mdo 'dis ba g+ha [\[]i ya gang gi i ta kyi 'ang ngos i phyis nus [\]]sogs/ ki maHsaM khyA pa ri mA Ni De ti tsa/
[\[171b.4\]]kim las grangs kyi tshad la Da ti'ang ngo /[ \[]kim la ba tub ba dbyangs don i dam kim dag gi I sha kI sha dag gos kim kI sha [\] ]sha 'gro ba mdo [\[]'dis ba b+ha g+ha'i i ya gang gi ita kyi'ang ngos i phyis uka 'gro ba zhes pas num na'i u ba d+hA [\]]ring bo brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os ta phyis/ kim las grangs kyi tshad la Da ti 'ang 'gyur te/ ci tsam/ ka tiH/
[\[171b.5\]]k+She pen/ khangs tshig la ma yin no/ /khengs tshig brjod pa'i kim la tshad kyi rkyen rnams 'gyur ba ma yin te/ kA saM khyA e ShaM de shA nAM/ 'grel par lung drangs ba/[ \[]yat+ta t+h+ya ma bi Da ti ngi ti ke tsi ta[\]]/[ \[]yata ta ta dag [\]]las kyang Da ti zhes pa/[ \[]kim laDa ti Da 'gro ba las Ti dbyi 'os phyis Da de'i don[\]]/ skabs
[\[171b.6\]]'gar ro/ /skabs 'gar [\[]yata ta ta dag [\]]las kyang tshad laDa ti 'gyur te/ ji tsam [ \[]ya tIH[\]]/ de tsam ta ti/[ \[]saM khyA yA a ba ya be ta [\] \[]yu bde [\]]rnams la brangs ci/ yab/ grangs las cha shas la ta yapa'o/ /grangs las cha shas brjod pa la ta yab 'gyur te/ pany+tsA ba ya ba ya s+ya/
[\[171b.7\]]zhes pa'i don la/ lnga cha  bany+tsa ta yaM/[ \[]bany+nan la ta yab pa dbyangs don ing mtha'i na [\]]phyis/[ \[]yata dang lba Da 'gro ba la De phyis[\]]/[ \[]dwi tri b+h+yA ta ya s+yA ya dz+wA[\]]/ dwi tri dag las ta yab kyi a ya tsa yang na'o/ /dwi dang tri dag las cha shas kyi ta rkyen ta ya ba ni a ya tsar yang na 'gyur te/[ \[]gang gi lnga cha/ til ta yab byin ta yab [\]]
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]a la tsar 'gyur tsa dbyangs don gang gi zhes pas i gyis/ da yaM/ gnyis cha/ dwi ta yaM/ tra yaM/ tri ta yaM/[ \[]u b+hA ti taM[\]]/ u b+ha las rtag du'o/ /u b+ha las cha shas brjod pa'i rkyen ta yab ni rtag tu a tsar 'gyur te/ u b+hA yaH/ ta da smin d+hi ka mi ti da [\[]shA n+ta [\]]taDa/
[\[172a.2\]]de 'di la lhag pa zhes pa da sha'i mtha' las Da'o/ /de 'di la lhag pa zhes pa'i don la  gsum che/ gsum che/ da sha'i mtha' can la Da 'gyur te/ e ka da shaM sha traM/ sha da[\[] n+ta bi d+Sha te sh+tsa/[\] ]sha ta mtha' dang bing sha ti  cha gnyis/[ \[]tal pa a [\]]tsa 'gyur ba/ las kyang ngo / /
[\[172a.3\]]shata kyi mtha' can dang bing sha ti las kyang lhag pa la Da 'gyur te/ ting shaM sha taM/ brgya dang nye shu/ bing shi sha traM/ brgya dang lhag po bcu gcig ste brgya dang bcu gcig /[\[]e ka da shan la Da Ti [\]]phyis pa'o/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ saM khyA bU rbA da bI Sh+ya te/ grangs snga ma la'ang 'dod do/ /grangs kyi sgra
[\[172a.4\]]sngon na yod pa'i shata kyi mtha' can dang bing sha ti las kyang / brgya dang sum cu/[ \[]tri sha ta la Da Ti phyis[\]]/ bir sha taM la Da Ti phyis ba'o/ /lhag pa la Da 'jug par 'dod de/ Da e ka [\[]tring shaM sha taM/ Da  e [\]]ka bing shaM sha taM/ ta s+ya bU r+Ne Da Ta/ de'i rdzogs pa la Da Ta'o/ /grangs de'i rdzogs pa la Da Ta
[\[172a.5\]]'gyur te/ e kA da shA nAM pU ra NaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ e kA dang shaH/ shI/[ \[]dA+e ba[\]]/ de bzhin du/[ \[]dwA da shaH[\]]/ shI/ dwib/ nA n+tA da saM [\[]khyA deHmaT[\]]/ brgya dang so gcig /grangs dang po ma yin  brgya dang nyer gcig /pa'i na mtha' las ma Ta'o/ /grangs dang po ma yin pa'i grangs kyi [\[]sgra na [\]]yig mtha'
[\[172a.6\]]bcu gcig rnams kyi rdzogs pa/[ \[]eka da shan la Da Ta Ta Ti ta D+ha sogs kyi don Di ta la Ti phyis[\]]/ bcu gcig can rnams las  bcu gnyis/ rdzogs pa'i rkyen Da Ta la ma Ta A ga ma ster te/ lnga ba  pany+tsa maH/ mI [ \[]dI ba/ sa b+ta maH/ mI/ dI ba/ aSh+Ta maH/ mI/ dIb/ na ba maH/ mI/ dIb/ da shaHH/ mI/ deb/ na
[\[172a.7\]]mtha' zhes pas rnam bcad kyi na yig mtha' can ma yin na maT mi 'gyur te/[ \[]bany+na ta la de'i rdzogs pa Da Ta mdo 'des maT A ga ma Ta gnas kyi don ming ma na'i na dbyi 'os na phyis[\]]/[ \[]sa b+ha na kha Da Ta maN [\]]A ga ma sogs/ bdun pa/ brgyad pa/[ \[]a sta na la Da Ta ma Ta ba gam[\]] sogs/[ \[]dgu ba na ba na laDa maT A ga ma sogs/ bcu ba/ da sha na pa Da Na ma/ A ga [\]]ma sogs/
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]bing shaH/ nyi shu ba/ shI/ dAMg grangs dang po ma yin pa zhes pas grangs dang po la/ DaT e kA da shaH/ shI/ dI ba/ ShaT  ka ti ka  te ba ya tsa tu [\[]rAM thu ka[\] ]/Sha Sha  ka ti  ka ti pa ya tsa tu ra rnams kyi thuka'o/ /Sha Sha la sogs pa 'di rnams la rdzogs pa'i rkyen DaT pha rol la thuka A ga ma 'gyur
[\[172b.2\]\[]bing sha til Tu/ te[\]]/[ \[]Sha Sh+ThaH[\]]/ drug pa/[ \[]dwi ba/ Sha Sh+ThI[\]]/ ya ti la Da Ta cu ka A ka ma/ ka ti thaHthI/[ \[]cung zad pa/ dIg[\] ]bcu gnyis pa/ ka ti ba ya thaHthI/[ \[]dIg tsa tu r+thaH r+thI[\] ]dI ba/ tsa tur [\[]sh+tsha ya tau tsa lo pa sh+tsa[\]]/ tsa tur las tsha yata dag ste tsa dbyi ba'ang ngo / /tsa tur las rdzogs pa la cha dang yata 'gyur te tsa tur gyi [\[]tsa yig dbyi
[\[172b.3\]]Sha Sha la Da Ta byin mdo 'des Sha Sha la thu ka ka gnas kyi don Te ta la Ti dbyi 'os u gyis Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os tha Tha[\]]/[ \[]ka ti ba ya la Da Ta thu ka A ga ma[\]]/ thung zad tsam thob pa/ bzhi pa/ tsa tur lba Da Ta thu A ga ma/ ba'ang ngo / /tu rI yaH/ bzhi pa/ tu r+YaH/ bzhi pa/ ba tu pU ga ga Na saM g+ha s+ya ti thuka /ba hu bU ga  ga Na si g+ha rnams kyi ti thu ka'o/ /ba tu la
[\[172b.4\]]sogs pa 'di rnams la rdzogs pa'i rkyen Da Ta pha rol la ti thug A ga ma 'gyur te/ ba hu ti thaH/ thI/[ \[]dI ba/ mang bo tha[\]]/ bU ga lba Da Ta [\]]ti thuka A ga ma  pU ga ti thaHthI/[ \[]dIb[\]]/ bu yu'i shing ba/[ \[]tsa tu ra la  tsha tsha'i I ya tsa phyis tsa tung la ya ta ta ta'i de'i dus kyi don tsa phyis/[\] ]gaN ti thaHthI/ dI ba/ saM g+ha ti thaHthI/[ \[]rI ba[\]]/ 'grel bar
[\[172b.5\]]lung drangs pa/[ \[]pU ga saM g+hA b+h+wAM Da Ta eSh+Ta[\]]/ pU ga  saM g+ha/ dag las kyang Da Ta 'dod do/ /[\[]grangs ba tu ba de'i rdzogs bzhes pas Da Ta ha Da Ti sogs kyi don Da Di Ta la Ti'i don mdo 'dis ti thug ka gnas don Te phyis[\]]/ ma yin kyang pU ga dang saM g+ha dag gaN la Da Ta ti thug A ga ma/ tshogs pa/ 'dus pa/ se b+ha laDa Ta ti thug A ga ma/ las kyang
[\[172b.6\]]rdzogs pa la Da Ta 'gyur bar 'dod de dper brjod du bstan zin to/ /pa to ri thuka /ba tu las i thu ka'o/ /ba tu'i rkyen mtha' can la rdzogs pa la Da Ta 'gyur zhing Da Ta pha rol la i thu ka A ga ma sbyin par bya ste/ ji snying ba/ yA ba ti thaH/ de snyed pa/ tA ba ti thAH/[ \[]de sti[\]] yaH/ dwe las tI
[\[172b.7\]]ya'o/ /dwe las rdzogs pa la tI ya 'gyur te/ dwi tI yaH/ gnyis pa/ treHsaM pra sA ra NaM tsa/ tri'i slar yang dag par 'gyur ba 'ang ngo / /tri las rdzogs pa la trI ya 'gyur zhing slar yang dag par 'gyur ba 'ang bya'o/ /[\[]ya bta dang ta ba ta la mdo 'dis Da Ta [\]]dang i thuka A ga ma gnas don Di ta la Ti phyis/
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]tI tI yAH/[ \[]bid sha t+yA di b+h+ya sta ma Da n+ya ta ra s+yAM[\]]/ bing sha ti la sogs pa rnams las ta maT yang na'/ /bing sha ti la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi rdzogs pa'i rkyen Da Ta la ta ma Ta A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ ping shaH/ nyi shu ba/[ \[]ping sha tiDa Ta te phyis[\]]/[ \[]bing sha [\]]ti ta maH/ nyi shu ba/
[\[173a.2\]]ting shaH/ sun cu ba/ tring  gsum pa/ sha t+ta maH/ ni t+yaM sha tA dI mA sA N+haM mA sa saM bat+sa rA ts+tsa/ sha ta la sogs pa rnams dang mAs [ \[]a r+d+ha mAs saM [\]]bat+sa ra las rtag tu'o/ /sha ta la sogs pa rnams dang /[ \[]mA sa dang ar+d+ha mA sa  so bat+sa bing sha ti ba de'i rdzogs pa bzhes baDa Da Da Ta la ta ma A ga ma Ta gnas don[\]]/ ra rnams
[\[173a.3\]]tring sha ta la Da Ta/[ \[]tring sha ta la Da Ta ta thaT A ga ma sogs[\]]/ las kyang rdzogs pa la Da Ta 'gyur zhing Da Ta la ta ma Ta A ga ma yang tag tu sbyin par bya'o/ /brgya pa  sha ta ta maH/ stong ba  sa ha sra tra maH/ ba bu Na  la k+Sha ta maH/ zla ba ba  mA sa ta maH/ zla phyed ba  a r+d+ha mAs ta maH/ slob  saM bar+sar ra ta maH[\]]/[ \[]Sha Sh+th+yA de sh+tsA
[\[173a.4\]]si khyA deH[\]]/ grangs dang po ma yin pa'i Sha ShA+e la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / /grangs kyi sgra gzhan sngon na yod pa ma  sha ta laDa Ta Ti ta D+ha sogs kyi don/ yin pa'i [\[]Sha Sh+Thi  De Ta ta maT A ga ma[\]]/ la sogs pa rnams la [ \[]Da Ta ta ma [\]]Ta A ga ma/ rdzogs pa'i rkyen  Da Ta ta ma Ta A ga ma  Da Ta la ta ma Ta
[\[173a.5\]]A ga ma rtag tu 'gyur te/ Sha Sh+Thi ta maH/ sab+ha ti ta maH/ a shi ti ta maH/ na ba ti ta maH/ grangs dang po la/ e kA ma Sh+Thi sogs so/ /ma tai tsha sU k+ha sA m+noH/ legs brjod dang snyan tshig dag la ma tu la tsha'o/ /legs brjod dang snyan tshig dag brjod pa la ma tu ba kyi
[\[173a.6\]]don la tsha 'gyur te/ drug cu ba/ Da Ta ta ma Ta A ga ma/ bdun cu pa/ brgyad cu pa/ Da Ta ta ma Ta A ga ma/ dgu bcu pa/[ \[]a ts+gAM bA ga smin [\] ]drug cu re gcig  si ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ a ts+tsha bA kI yaM/ bA ra ban+taM sA maH/ zhes pa'i don la/ bA ra ba n+tI yaM/ bU rbA di ni/ bU rba las i ni 'o/ /bU rba
[\[173a.7\]]las 'dis bros pa'am 'thungs pa 'am byas pa'i don la i ni 'gyur te/ sngon ma 'dis zos/ pU rba  legs brjod yod pa 'di la/ ma ne na b+hu k+taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ tsha tsha'i A+e ya/ legs brjod can/[ \[]lhan tshig tshig rkang can/ snyan tshig tshig rkang can[\]]/[ \[]tsha tsha mA ga sngon du zos/ pU tshI[\]]/[ \[]tha cha la e ni ta'i i [\]]brjod don mu
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]e ha na zhes pas ring po ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os na phyis ta la sogs kyi su 'jig /de bzhin du/ bU rba ma ne na pI taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ bU rbI/ sngon du 'thung / sa bU rbA ts+tsa/ snga ma dang bcas pa las kyang ngo / /tshig gzhan snga ma dang bcas pa'i bU rba las kyang 'dis zos pa sogs kyi don la i ni 'gyur te/
[\[173b.2\]]b+ha k+ta pU rba ma ne na b+hu k+taM/ zhes pa'i don la/ b+ha k+ta pU rbI/ i Sh+Ta di bah+ya sh+tsa/ sngon la 'dis 'thungs/ du rba la i ni na'i i brjod don su  in ha na zhes bas ring po ming mtha'i na dbyi 'os na phyis ha la sogs kyis su 'jig /i Sh+Ta la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / /i Sh+Ta la sogs pa rnams las kyang 'dis 'dod pa la
[\[173b.3\]]zas sngon pa 'dis thos/ sogs pa la i ni 'gyur te/ zas sngon zos pa/ i Sh+Ta ma ne na ya dzA+e/ zhes pa'i don la/[ \[]i ni i Sh+Ti ya dz+nyo[\]]/ de bzhin du/ a d+hi tI byA ka ra Ne/ brda sprod klog par 'dod/[ \[]ta da s+ya s+t+ya smi n+ni ti [\]]ma tub/ de 'di'i yod pa 'di la zhes pa ma tu ba'o/ /de 'di'i yod pa 'di la zhes pa ldan pa'i
[\[173b.4\]]don la ma tu ba 'gyur te/[ \[]shrI ra sti[\]]/ zhes pa'i don la/ shrI  'dis mchod sbyin 'dod/ mA na/ dpal ldan/ dpal ldan ma shrI mchod sbyin 'dod/ ma tI/ skyes [\[]pa dang lnga tha pa sogs kyi d+ni[\]]/ ta sau ma twa r+the/ tas dag las ma tub kyi don la'o/ /rtags sa yig dang ta yig gi mtha' can yin la/[ \[]mnya'[\]]
[\[173b.5\]]dpal yod pa'am dpal ldan pa/[ \[]shI lam tub pa dbyangs don u u ka 'grob la nub [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]don nub na'i u pa t+hA ring po su phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' phyis[\]]/ dar ma tub kyi don gyi rkyen rnams pha rol tu byung na rkyen de dag la b+ha'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed de b+ha'i ming can pha rol la slar yang dag par 'gyur ba'i don te/ pi dwa
[\[173b.6\]]sa la/ ma tu ba/ bsa'i slar yang dag par 'gyur ro zhes pas/ ba u kun nas 'gyur ba sogs kyis Sha/ bi[\[] du Sh+mA na[\]]/ de bzhin du/[\[ ]lag ldan[\]]/ doM Sh+mA na/ mA du pa d+hA yA sh+tsa ma to [\[]rbonya [\]]ya bA di b+h+yaH/ ya ba la sogs pa rnams ma yin ba las ma ata u pa b+dA'i 'ang ma tu'i ba'o/ /
[\[173b.7\]]ya ba la sogs pa rnams ma yin pa las rtags ma yig dang a yig u ba d+hA na yod pa dang 'ang gi sgras ma yig dang  su nus/ mkhas pa can/ a yig mtha' can las kyang ma [ \[]doN la ma tub su [\]]num sogs/ tub kyi ma yig ni ba yig tu 'gyur te/ ci lod [ \[]kim+bA [\]]na/ ma tung la num zhogs/[ \[]ma tu ba d+hA [\]]na
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]bA na/ ma tu ba/ bi d+ya bA na/ yon tan can/ ma tu ba  la k+Shi bA nra/ thags pa can/ ya sha sbA nra/ ma tu ba  b+hA swA nra/ ya ba sogs la ma bar mi 'gyur te/ ma tu ba  ya ba mA nra/ ma tu ba [ \[]b+hU mi mA na[\]]/ dz+ha yaH/ dz+ha ya las so/ /rtags mtha' dz+ha ya so sor bsdu ba'i
[\[174a.2\]]yi ge yod na'ang ma  ye shes can/ tupa kyi ma yig  dpal ldan nam phun sum tshogs pa ldan pa/[ \[]yi shes na tub[\]]/[ \[]a u ba d+hA la nu ma [\]]sogs/[ \[]gsal ldan te nyi ma'o/ ni ba yig tu 'gyur te[\]]/ matu ba [ \[]bid+yu d+bAn[\]]/ nam ldan/ sa ldan [\[]te rgyal po/[\] ]/prA Ni [\[]ska dwa taHlba dza n+ya ta ra h+yAMka[\] ]srog chags kyi yan lag las a+wa ta las
[\[174a.3\]]latsa yang na'o/ /srog chags kyi yan lag brjod pa la Ata kyi mtha' can las ma tub kyi don la la tsa yang na 'gyur te/ tsU DA laH/ ma tub  tsU DA bAn/ sid+h+mA di b+h+yash+tsa/ si d+h+ma la 'thug can/ sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / /sid+h+ma la sogs pa rnams las kyang ma tub kyi don la latsa yang na 'gyur te/
[\[174a.4\]]latsa  si d+h+ma laH/ shing ldanaH/ ma tub  si d+h+ma bA na/ shing ldan/ latsa  mAM sa laH/ sha ldan/[ \[]ma tub  mAM sa bAn[\]]/ latsa  ma Ni laH/[ \[]ma tub ma  latsa tsa dbyangs don[\]]/ gtsug phud can/ Ni bAn/ phe nA las i latsa 'ang ngo / /phe na la ma tub kyi don la latsa dang i latsa yang 'gyur te/[ \[]i latsa  phe ni laH[\]]/ latsa  lte
[\[174a.5\]\[]se ts+ma [\]]zhes pa bstan bcos bkra shis ba 'gro ba grub ba shing rnams la 'jug /na laH/[ \[]ma tub [\] ]phe na bA na/ grub can/ nor bu ca na/[ \[]she ldan/[\] ]nor bu canan pa nor bu ldan/[ \[]lo mA di bA mA di pi ts+tshA di b+h+yaH sha ne la tsaH lo man la sogs pa rnams dang bA man la sogs pa rnams dang pi ts+tsha la sogs pa rnams las shan a latsa rnams so[\]]/ /lo man la sogs  sgrub can/
[\[174a.6\]]pa rnams dang pA man la sogs pa rnams dang / pi ts+tsha la sogs pa rnams la sam tul kyi don la rim pa zhin sha dang na dang i latsa rnams kyang 'gyur te/ lo ma shaH/ lo ma ldan/ sha  rom shaH/[ \[]ma tu ba  ro ma bAn/ bA mnaH/ ma tub  bA ma bAn/ na  ad+ga naH/ ma tub  a d+ga bAn/ i latsa  bi ts+tshi laH/[ \[]lar
[\[174a.7\]]bag can [\]]ma tub  pi ts+tsha bAn/ mi latsa  u ra si laH/ brang can nam lto ba can[\]]/[ \[]ma tub  u ra swAn/ bra dz+nyA shrA d+d+bA rtsA br-i t+ti b+h+yo NaH/ bra dz+nye shrA d+h+tA  lo man la sha ming mtha'i na phyis/ sku can/ sbru can/ ma tub ming mtha'i na phyis/ smu can/ smu can[\]]/[ \[]bA ma na'i rna med sa bin kyis[\]]/ gtsang ma can/[ \[]a rtsA br-i t+ti [\] ]yan lag ldan/ rnams las Na'o/ /pa/ dz+nya la
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]sogs pa 'di rnams las ma tub kyi don la Na'ang 'gyur te/ Na prA dz+nyAH/ ma tub  pra dz+nyA bAn/ Na shrA d+d+haH/ shra d+d+hA bAn/ Na A rtsaH/ ma tub  A rtsA bAn/ Na bA r+t+taH/ ma tub  bri rat+ti mAn da n+ta u n+na ta u ra tsa/ dan+ta mtho ba la u ratsa 'o/ /dan+ta las mtho ba brjod pa dang 'brel ba'i ma
[\[174b.2\]]tub kyi don la u ratsa 'gyur te[\]]/ u ratsa dan+tu raH/ so mtho ba can/ U Sha shu Shi  shes rab can/ mu Sh+ka ma d+horaH/ dang pa can/ matub  U Sha shu ShiH/ mchod pa can/ mu Sh+ka  ma d+hu las  lo rgyus can/ lo rgyus can/ ra'o/ /U Sha la sogs pa 'di las ma tub kyi don la ra'ang 'gyur te/[ \[]U sha raH/ U Sha bAn/
[\[174b.3\]]shu Shi raH/ shu Shi mA na/ muSh+karaH/ muSh+ka bAn/ ma d+hu raH/ ma d+hu mAn/ kha mu kha ku ny+dze b+h+ya sh+tsa/ kha mu kha kuny+dza rnams las kyang ngo / /kha mu kha kuny+dza rnams las kyang ma tub kyi don la ra 'gyur te/ kha raH/ mu kha raH/ kuny+dza raH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ na ga p+ngaM shu p+ny+tsaN b+h+ya sh+tsa/ nag pAM shu bA N+DA rnams tshab tsaH/ las kyang
[\[174b.4\]]rnam po can/ skem po can/ chom rkun can/ snyan pa can nam dang rab can/ snyan pa can/ ngo / nag bAM shu N+Du rnams las kyang ma tupa kyi don lar 'gyur te/ na garaH/ bong bu can/ mu cor ram spyi brtol can/ glang po che can/ pAMr shu raH/ pA nU raH/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ka ts+tshA hra swa tAM tsa/ ka ts+tsha'i thung
[\[174b.5\]]du nyid la 'ang ngo / /u las Ung lta bu ring po ma yin pas kac+tshu thung du nyid la ma tub kyi don lar 'gyur te/ ka ts+tshu raH/ ke shA do n+ya ta ra s+yaM/ grong khyer can/ ko sha las ba yang na'o/ /ke sha las ma  rdul can/ skye bo can/ tub kyi don la ba yang na 'gyur te/ ke sha baH/ a ni ke shI
[\[174b.6\]]tan  ke shi kaH/ ma tub  ke sha bAn/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ a n+ya b+h+yonya pi/ gzhan las kyang ngo / /sbal pa can/ ke ra ma zad gzhan la'ang ma tub kyi don la ba 'gyur te/ bar ma Ni baH/ lan ma Ni laH/ ar+Na saHsa lo pash+tsa/ a r+Nas kyi sa dbyi ba'ang [ \[]skra [\]]can/ ngo / /[\[]skra [\]]can
[\[174b.7\]]a d+shas [ \[]skra [\]]can/ la ma tub  skra can/ kyi don la ba 'gyur zhing ba pha rol la a rnas kyi da dbyi ba'ang ngo / /ba  a r+Na baH/ dgon pa can/[ \[]mnyub [\] ]a r+Na swAn/ me d+hA ra thA b+h+rAM mi ra n+ni ra tsau tsa/ me d+hA ra tha  nor bu can/ dag las si ran i ra tsa dag kyang ngo / /me d+hA dang ra tha dag las ma tub kyi don
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]la rim pa bzhin i ran dang i ras dag kyang 'gyur te/ i ran  me d+hi raH/ ma tu pa  me d+hA bAn/ i ratsa  ra thi raH/ ma tub  ra tha pAn/ kA N+DA N+DA dI ba n+nI ra tsau/ kA N+Da A N+Da las a+di ran I ratsa dag go/ /kAN+Da dang AN+Da dag las rim pa bzhin I ran dang I ratsa dag 'gyur
[\[175a.2\]]te/ I ran  kA N+DI raH/ ma tub  gA N+Di bA na/ I ratsa  A N+DI raH/ ma tub  A N+Da bAn/ blo ldan nam yid gzhungs ldan pa/ d+Yu dru b+h+yAM ma ka shing rta can/ d+Yu dru dag las shing rta can/ ma'o/ /d+Yu dang dru dag las ma tub kyi don la ma 'gyur te/ d+Yu maH/ dru maH/ ataH/ i ni Tha nau/ ata las i ni Tha na dag go/ /
[\[175a.3\]]rtags ata mtha'  tsher ma can/ can las ma tub  sgong can/ kyi don la i sgong can/ ni dang Than dag 'gyur te/ i ni da d+dI/ Than da N+Di kaH/ ma tub daN+Da bA na/ i ni ke shI/ Than  ke shi kaH/ ma tub ke sha bAn/ ba  ke sha paH/ 'od ldan/ ljon shing ldan nam ljon shing / brI h+yA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ brI hi la sogs pa rnams las
[\[175a.4\]]kyang ngo / /brI hi la sogs pa rnams las kyang ma tub kyi don la i ni dang Than yang na 'gyur te/ i ni  brI hI/ tan bri hI kaH/ dbyug pa can/ ma tub brI hi mAn/ skra can/ skra can/ i ni go d+yu mi/ skra can/ Thad god+yu  skra can/ mi kaH/ ma tub  go d+yu ma bAn/ shi khA deHna Than/ shi kha la sogs pa rnams
[\[175a.5\]]las Than ma yin no/ /shi kha la sogs pa rnams las ma tub kyi don la i ni 'gyur zhing Than 'gyur ba ma  'thas bu can/ 'thas bu can/ yin te/ 'bras bu can/ i ni  shi khI/ ma tub  shi kha bA na/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ sab+ha myaM/ bdun  tho can/ ba la'o/ /rtags a tsa gcig pa dang rigs
[\[175a.6\]]brjod pa las bdun pa'i don la i ni dang Than dag 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ma tub  swa bAn/ ma tub  si d+ha bAn/ tu n+dA di b+h+yaHi lats+tsa/ tu n+ha la sogs pa rnams las  btsug phud can/ a latsa 'o/ /tun+da la sogs pa rnams las ma tub kyi don la i latsa 'gyur te/ i latsa  tu n+di laH/ ma tub  tu n+da bAn/
[\[175a.7\]]i ni  tu n+dI  ltob sbom po can/ Than tu n+di kaH/ a smA yA mo d+hA sra jo bo niH/ as mA yA  me  bdag ldan/ seng ge can/ d+hA  sra ja las si ni'o/ /as mtha' can rnams dang / mA mA/ me d+hA/ sra dza rnams la ma tub kyi don la bi ni 'gyur te/ bi ni i brjod don su na'i mu pa d+hA ring bo ming mtha'i na byis/ te  lto ba sbom po can/[ \[]sha su sbyin [\]]
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]swI/[ \[]phA si brjed na[\]]/ ma tub ta pa swA na/ bi ni ta pa swI/ ma tub  ta ba swA na/ bi ni mA yA bI/ ma tu pa  mA yA bA na/ bi ni  me d+h+na bI/ ma tu pa  mi d+hA bA na/ bi ni sra g+h+ri/ ma tub  sra krA na/ shri d+ga br-i[\[]n+d+na b+m+ya[\]]mA ra ka tsa/ shri d+ga br-i n+da dag las A ra ga tsa'o/ /shri d+ga dang br-in+da dag las ma tub kyi don la A ra ka tsa
[\[175b.2\]]'gyur te/ shri d+gA ra gzi rjes can/ dga' thub can/ kAH/ dka' thub can/[ \[]skyu [\]]ma can nam nor can/[ \[]skyu [\]]ma can/[ \[]ma tub [\] ]shri d+ha bA na/ blo ldan ma/ A ra ga tsa  bra n+da ra kaH/ 'phreng ldan/ ma tu pa  br-i n+da pA na/ phe le bar+hA b+h+ya mi nan/ pha la brta dag las i na na'o/ /pha la bar+ha dag las ma tub kyi don la i na na
[\[175b.3\]]'gyur te/[ \[]A ra ga tsa/ i nan  pha li naH/ rwa ca na/ ma tub  pha la bAn/ i nan/ bar+ha NaH/ ma tub  bar+hi bAn/ ra thA ts+tsa/ ra tha las kyang ngo / chogs ldan/ ra tha las ma tub kyi  chogs ldan/ don la i nan 'gyur te/ i nan  ra thi na/ ma tub  ra tha bAn/ shI to Sh+Na tri ShA b+h+ya  sh+tsA lu tsa tad sa ha na/ shI ta uSh+Na
[\[175b.4\]]tr-i Sha rnams las kyang de mi bzod pas ldan/ pa la A lu tsa'o/ /'bras ldan/ shI ta  u Sh+Na  rma bya can nam nags ldan/ tr-i Sha rnams las de mi bzod pa'i don la A lu tsa 'gyur te/ shI taM na sa ha te/ zhes pa'i don la/ A lu tsa shI  shir rta bam  tA luH/ de bzhin du/ A yu tsa  u Sh+Na luH/ A lu tsa traM ShA
[\[175b.5\]]luH/ hi mA ts+tsa[\] ]hi ma las kyang ngo / /hi ma las kyang de mi bzod pa la A lu tsa 'gyur te/ A lu tsa  hI mA luH/ ba lA dU laH/ ba la las U la'o/ /ba la las gring bas mi bzod/ de mi bzod pa la U la 'gyur te/ ba  shin tu grang ba/ lU yaH/ ba tA ts+tsa/ shin tu tsha be/ shin tu skom pa/
[\[175b.6\]]ba ta las kyang ngo / /ba ta las kyang de mi bzod pa la U la 'gyur te/ ba tU laH/ taHparba ma ru d+b+h+yaM[\]]/ kha ba mi bzod pa/ parba ma ru ta dag las ta'o/ /pa rba dang ma ru ta dag las de mi bzod pa la ta 'gyur te/ parba taH/ ma ru  stobs ma ba rmod pa/ taH/ rlung mi bzod pa/ U r+Na yAH yus/
[\[175b.7\]]Ur+NA las yus 'o/ /U r+NA las de mi bzod pa'i don la yus 'gyur te/ rlung mi bzod pa/ U r+NA nas ha te/ bal mi bzod pa ste mang po'i don/ zhes pa'i don la/ U r+NA yuH/ bal mi bzod pa/ bA tso g+mi niH/ bA tsa las g+mi ri bo/ ma ru ta la ta dz+har badz+har rnams kyi zhes pas ta gong ma gyis/ ni'o/ /bA tsa la de mi
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]bzod pa la g+mi ni te/ bA g+mi/ dag mi bzod pa'am dag ldan nam sma mkhas/ A la dzAT tsau ba hu b+hA Shi Ni/ smad pa la A la tsa A Ta ca dag go/ /bA tsa las smad pa rtogs par byed pa la A la tsa dang A Ta tsa dag 'gyur te/ A latsa  bA tsA lAH/ A Ta tsa  bA tsA TaH/ swA mi n+nai
[\[176a.2\]]btsal g+mi ni ga kro ba'i ming can na ri i brjod don cu'i ku dz+hal rnams kyi zhes pas ka ga su yin sogs kyis ring po/ shwa r+Ye/ dbang phyug la swA la mi na'o/ /dbang phyugs brjod pa la swA las min 'gyur te/ swA mI/ a d+shA di b+h+yonyA tsa a r+shas la sogs pa rnams las atsa 'o/ /dan chog/ ar+shas la sogs
[\[176a.3\]]pa rnams las ma tub kyi don la atsa 'gyur te/ atsa  lar+sha saH/ atsa  bai dza yan+taH/ atsa tsa tu raH/ a tsa pa li taH/ atsa  pa li taH/ atsa pA TaH/ atsa  ab+hAH/ rjo bo/ atsa  a tsaH/ bA tA tAM sA rA b+h+yAM ku k+tsa/ bAta  a tI sA ra dag las ku ka 'ang ngo / /bA ta dang a
[\[176a.4\]]tI sA ra dag las ma tub kyi don la i ni 'gyur zhing  gzhang 'brum can/ kuka A  'phrang ring can/ ga ma  brang can/ yang ngo / /mkhas ldan/ skra dkar can/ ba ta kI/ ral ba can/ dar can/ skrin can/ a tI sA ra  mchod pa can/ kI/ 'grel par lung drangs ba/ bi shA tsA ts+tsa/ pi shA tsa las kyang ngo / /pi
[\[176a.5\]]shA tsa las kyang ma tub kyi don la i ni 'gyur zhing kuka A ga ma yang ngo / /pi shA  ba ta la  i ni kuka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don su sogs/ rlung nad can/ tsa krI/ ha stA dz+dzA tau/ ha sta las  i ni kuka A ga ma/ tshad 'bru can/ rigs la'o/ /ha sta las rigs brjod pa'i ma tub kyi don la i ni 'gyur te/
[\[176a.6\]]i ni  ha sti/ kaM shaM b+h+yaM ba b+ha lu sti tu ta ya saH/ kaM shaM dag las  ba b+ha  yus  sha za can/ ti tu ta yas rnams so/ /kaM dang shi dag las ma tub kyi don  i ni kuka A ga ma/ la/ ba dang / b+ha dang / yus dang / ti dang / tu dang / ta dang / yas rnams 'gyur te/ ka mAH/ sham+baH/ kam+b+haH/ sham+b+haH/
[\[176a.7\]]glang po can/ lus ki yuH/ chu ldan/ yus  shaM yuH/ bde ldan/ kan+tiH/ chu ldan/ shan+tiH/ bde ldan/ kan+tuH/ chu ldan/ shan+tuH/ bde ldan/ kan+taH/ chu ldan/ shan+taH/ bde ldan/ yas  kaM yaH/ chu ldan/ yas  shaM yaH/ bde ldan/[ \[]tu n+di ba li ba De r+b+haH/ tu n+di ba li ba Ti chu ldan[\]]/ bde ldan/ chu ldan/ bde ldan/
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]las b+ha'o/ tu n+di la sogs pa 'di rnams las ma tub kyi don la b+ha 'gyur te/ tu n+di b+haH/ ba li b+haH/ ma Ti b+haH/ a hi shu b+ha mo r+Yus/ a haM shu b+haM dag las yus 'o/ /a haM/ shu b+haM dag las ma tub kyi don la yus 'gyur te/ a haM yuH/ shu b+haM yuH/ radzaHkr-iSh+tsa su ti ba ri Sha do
[\[176b.2\]]ba la tsa/ ra dzas kr-i Shi A su ti bra riShad las ba la tsa'o/ /ra dzas la sogs stob slos mo can/ stobs can/ slong mo ba/ ba 'di rnams las ma tub kyi don la ba latsa 'gyur te/ ba le/ ba la la'o/ /rkyen pa la tsa pha rol la rtags mtha'  bdag ldan/ aN  de ge ldan/ so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge
[\[176b.3\]]yod na de ring bor 'gyur te/ ra dza swa laHpa/ rdul can/ kr-i ShI ba laH/ A su tI ba laH/ ba ri Sha dwa laH/ prA g+ni shoHbi b+ha k+tiH/ phyogs las snga ma rnam dbye'o/ /'di nas phyogs kyi sgra rnams las bdun lnga ba dang po zhes ba'i bar gyi rkyen gang yin pa de rnams rnam dbyi'i don la 'jug
[\[176b.4\]]ste rnam dbye'i ming can gyi rkyen zhes ming 'dogs byed  zhing las can/ zhib spyod pa can/ yongs su 'joms can/ do/ /kiM sarba nA ba tu d+h+yonya d+w+yAdaM b+h+yaH/ dwi la sogs pa rnams ma yin pa'i sarba nA ma rnams dang kiM ba hu rnams las so/ /dwi la sogs pa rnams ma yin pa ste bor ba'i sarba nA ma
[\[176b.5\]]rnams dang kiM ba hu rnams kas 'chad 'gyur gyi rkyen ta sil sogs rnams 'gyur ro zhes pa spyir btang ba'o/ /pany+tsa myA sta si/ lnga pa las ta sil la'o/ /gong du bshad pa'i dwi la sogs pa ma yin pa'i sarba nA ma rnams dang ba hu dang kim rnams las rnam dbye lnga ba'i don la ta sil
[\[176b.6\]]'gyur te/ sarba taH/ sarba smata/ kim la/ ta sil/ ku ti toH/ ta ha dag las ku'o/ /rnam dbyi'i ming can rkyen ta yig dang po can dang ha yig dang po can pha rol tu byung na kim ni ku zhes par 'gyur te/ kutaH/ kasmA ta/ tataH/ de las  ta smA ta/ la taH/ yad la ta sel/ gang las/
[\[176b.7\]]ta sil las dbyangs don i brjod don/ thams cad las/ yasmA ta/ gang las/ ba hu taH/ sang bo las/ ba hoH/ mang po las/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ sarba brA ti ba di kA t+ta sil tsa/ rtags thams cad las ta sil 'o/ /gong du smos  ci las/ tata ta sil t+yad sogs kyi rnam dbye la a/[ \[]rgyad [\]]sogs kyi rnam dbyi la a/ ba'i
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]sarba nA ma sogs sum zad rtags thams cad las kyang lnga pa'i don la ta sil 'gyur te/ bu d+d+ha taH/ bu d+d+hA ta/ de ba taH/ de bA ta/ sogs so/ /i dam i sha /i dam i sha'o/ /rnam dbye'i ming can gyi rkyen pha rol la i dam ni i shar
[\[177a.2\]]'gyur te/ i taH/ 'di las/ a taH/ 'di las/ asmA ta/ 'di las/ e ta do\u0f85 sha /e tata kyi a sha'o/ /rnam  sangs rgyas las/ lha las/ lha las/ dbyi'i ming can gyi rkyen pha rol la e tata ni a sha zhes par 'gyur te/ ataH/ 'di las/ e ta smA ta/ par+Ya b+hi b+h+yAM tsa/ ma ri
[\[177a.3\]\[]pa'i [\]]dam la ta sel i dam e sha sha 'bro ba'i ming can/ yi dam pa ta sil byad sogs kyi Tita la la dbyi'o/ i dang ra kyig a b+hi dag las kyang ngo / /nyer bsgyur la ba ri dang a b+hi dag las kyang lnga ba'i don la ta sil 'gyur te/ ba ri taH/ a b+hi taH/ e tata la ta sil e tata a sha /'di las/ sab+ta myA stA la/ bdun pa
[\[177a.4\]]lam ta la'o/ /dwi la sogs pa ma yin pa'i sarba nA ma rnams dang [\[]ba hu[\]]dang kim rnams las bdun pa'i don la [\[]hral[\]] yang na 'gyur te/ ka tra/ ci la/ ka smin/ sarba tra/ sarba smin/ ta hra/ yangs las/ mdon las/ ta smin/ ya tra/ ya smin/ atra/ 'di la/ a ta smin/ ba hu
[\[177a.5\]]tra/ de ba ho/ id mo haH/ i dam las ha'o/ /i dam las bdun pa'i don la ha 'gyur te/ i ha/ a smin/ ki mo\u0f85 ta/ ki ma la tras la dbyangs don ta ta dag la ku 'os ku/ thams cad pa/ kim las a te'o/ /de la/ ki ma la bdun pa'i don  gang la/ eta ta la tral e tata kyi a sha 'os e tata ya sha/ la
[\[177a.6\]]mang po la/ ata yang na 'gyur te/ kim/ ata/ kwA ti/ ata  i dam la ha mi dam i sha'o ma i dam i shata 'gyur/ 'di la/ de la kwa'o/ /bdun pa'i don can gyi rkyen ata pha rol la ki ma ni kwa zhes par 'gyur te/ kwa/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ tral pi/ tral la 'ang ngo / /
[\[177a.7\]]tral pha rol la'ang kim ni ka zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ kwa tra/ gutra/ ga smin/ ci la 'am gang la/ bA ha tsa ts+tsha n+da si/ sdeb sbyor la ha yang na'o/ sdeb sbyor sogs kyi dgos pa yod na kim las bdun ba'i [ \[]ki[\]]ma ata kim kwa ta ta'i dus kyi don gang gi ita kyi'ang tshes rtags kyi a phyig don la ha yang na 'gyur
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]te/ ku ha/ sarbi kA/ rgya kim yat+ta daHkA le dA/ sarba e ka  an+ya  kim  yad  tata rnams las dus la dA'o/ /sarba la sogs pa 'di rnams las bdun pa'i mtha' las dus la 'jug pa la dA 'gyur te/ e ka dA/ an+ya dA/ ka dA/ ya dA/ ta dA/ sarba la/ dA/
[\[177b.2\]]ci la'am gang la/ zhim la ta ta ha dag las ku/ sarba s+ya so\u0f85n+ya ta ra s+yaM di/ sarba'i dA las yang na'o/ /rkyen dA bar ro la las sarba ni sa zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ sadA/ rtag tu/ sarba dA/ yang na/ sarba smin ka le sogs  gcig gi tshe/ gzhan gyi tshe/ nam kyi tshe/ gang gi tshe/ de'i tshe/ so/ /[\[]id [\]]
[\[177b.3\]]mo r+hil/ i di las r+hila'o/ i dam las bdun pa'i mtha' dus la 'jug pa na r+hil yang na 'gyur te/ i dam la/ r+hil/ e tau ra thoH/ sarba la dA mdo 'dis sarba bcus rab gyur/ ra tha dag las e ta i ta dag go/ rnam dbye'i ming can gyi rkyen ra yig dang tha yig dang thog ma can pha rol la i dam ni rim pa bzhin
[\[177b.4\]]e ta dang i ta ru 'gyur te/ e ta [\[]r+hi[\]]/ a d+hu nA/ a d+hu nA'o/ /i dam ni a d+hu nA zhes par 'gyur te dus dang 'brel ba'i bdun pa'i don la tshig phrad do/ /dA nIM tsa/ dA nIM 'ang ngo / /i dam la bdun pa'i mtha' dus la 'jug pa la dA niM yang 'gyur te/ 'di'i dus/ i dA nIM/
[\[177b.5\]]ta do dA tsa/ tad las dA 'ang ngo / /'di'i tshe/ tad las bdun pa'i mtha' dus la/ 'di la/ 'jug pa la dA nIM dang dA'ang 'gyur te/ ta dA nIM/ ta dA/ 'gral par lung drangs pa/ pu na ro dA/ pu nar yas dA'o/ /bu nar las bdun pa'i  i dam la dA nI i dam i ta 'os yi dam i shar 'gyur/
[\[177b.6\]]mtha' can dus la 'jug pa la dA yang na 'gyur te/ phu na rdA/ a na d+ya/ ta ni [\[]rti [\]]la rgya ta ra s+yAM/ de ring ma yin pa la [\[]rtil [\]]yang  de'i tshe/ na'o/ /dwi sogs khor ba'i sarba nA ma rnams dang kim ba hu rnams las bdun pa'i mtha' de ring ma yin pa'i dus la 'jug pa na [\[]rtil[\]] yang na
[\[177b.7\]]'gyur te/ karti/ kim rtil/ gang gi tshe/ ta ta rtil/ ta rti  de'i tshe/ slar gyi dus/ gang gi tshe/ ya rti/ yang [\[]rtil/[\] ]sa d+yaHba ru t+ba rA r+Yi Sha maHpa ra d+ya bya d+ya pU rbe d+yur n+ye d+yur n+ya ta re d+yu ri ta re rgyur pa re d+yu ra d+ha re d+yu ru b+ha ye d+yu ru t+ta re d+yuH/ mod la'am 'gral du/ sa d+yaH/ samA na la d+yas/ bar la uta/ ba ru ta/ pha rol gyi dus/ pa
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]rwa ri/ ba ra ya A ri/ ai Sha maH/ pa re d+ya biH/ n+da ma'i dus/ ad+ya/ 'di'i dus/ pU rbe d+YuH/ snga dus/ a n+ye d+YuH/ gzhan dus/ a n+ya ta re d+YaH/ dus gzhan pa/ i ta re d+YuH/ i ta sa la ed+Yus/ a pa re d+YuH/ a pa ba la e tul/ a d+ha re d+YuH/ a d+ha ra la e d+Yus/ u b+ha ye d+YuH/
[\[178a.2\]]u d+ha re d+YuH/ i dam la ma tsa i dam e Shar 'dung / 'di'i dus/ bar la e bya bi sa/ i dam la d+ya'i dam a/ b+hu ca la awa d+Yus/ rnams so/ /sa dal [ \[]e bas d+YuH/[\] \[]sa n+ya ta ra la e smus[\]]/ sogs pa 'di rnams bdun dus [\[]tshig shos/[\] ]pa'i mtha' can dus  dus gzhan/ brjod pa la tshig  dus tshog ma/ gnyis ka'i dus sam nyi ma gnyis ka/ u b+ha sa la e d+Yul/
[\[178a.3\]\[]d+Ya la e d+Yus/[\] ]dus rtsim 'am nyi ma gyis/ phrad do/ /pra kA ra ba tsa ni thA la/ rnam pa brjod pa la thA la'o/ /dri sogs ma yin pa'i sarba nA ma rnams dang kim dang ba hu rnams las rnams pa brjod pa thAl 'gyur te/ ke na pra kA re Na/ zhes pa'i don la/ kathA/ de bzhin du/ ta thA/ de bzhin du/ ta thA/ yathA/ sarba thA/
[\[178a.4\]]i dam s+tha muH/ i dam las tha mu'o/ /i dam las rnam pa brjod pa la tha mu 'gyur te/ i t+thaM/ kim sh+tsa/ kim las kyang ngo / /kim las kyang rnam pa brjod pa la tha mu 'gyur te/ kathaM/ dika  rnam bci/ sha b+de b+h+yaH sa b+ha mI pany+ca mI  rnam pa ci/ pra tha mA b+h+yo  de ltar/ de ltar/ rnam pa thams cad du/
[\[178a.5\]]dig+de sha kA le Sh+wa stA tiH/ phyogs kyi sgra rnams las bdun pa lnga pa dang bo rnams las phyogs dus i dam la tha mu u brjod don ta tha dag la e ta i ta 'os i ta du 'gyur mang ngo / /yul rnams la a stA ti'o/ rnam pa ni/ phyogs kyi sgrar grags pa rnams las bdun pa dang lnga pa dang dang po rnams kyi mtha'
[\[178a.6\]]las phyogs dang yul dang dus kyi don rnams la 'jug pa la a stA ti 'gyur te/ pa ra stA ta/ a ba ra stA ta/ pU r+b+ha d+ha rA ba rA NA ma si bu ra d+haya ba sh+tsai ShAM/ bU rba  a d+ha ra  a ba ra rnams kyi a sil/ pur ad+ha a ba 'di rnams kyang ngo / /bU rba la sogs pa 'di rnams rkyen
[\[178a.7\]]a si pha rol la rim pa bzhin phur la sogs pa 'di  pha rol lam pha rol las sam pha rol tu/ bar la a stA ti i brjod don/ tshu rog lam tshu rol las sam tshu rol tu/ rnams su 'gyur ro/ /a stA ti tsa/ a stA ti las kyang ngo / /rkyen a stA ti pha rol las kyang pU rba la sogs pa rnams rim pa bzhin phur la
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]sogs pa rnams su 'gyur te/ pu ra stA ta/ shang ram shang du las gang las/ a d+ha sta ta/ a d+ha ra la a sta ti/ a bstA ta/ a ba ra la a stA ti  pu raH/ pU Na la a si i brjod don/ ad+haH/ ad+ha ra la a saM/ a baH/ a ba ra la a si/ a bi b+hA ShA ba ra s+ya/ a ba ra'i 'dam ka'o/ /rkyen a stA ti pha rol
[\[178b.2\]]bU rba la a stA ti i brjod bU rba pu ra du 'gyur/ las a  'og gam 'og las sam 'og tu/ gzhan nam gzhan las sam gzhan du ba ra ni a ba shar ram shar nas sam shar du/ ru 'gyur ba  'og gam 'og nas sam 'og tu/ gzhan phyogs sam gzhan phyogs nas sam gzhan phyogs su/ dang mi 'gyur pa 'dam ka can du bya ste/ a ba
[\[178b.3\]]rastA ta/ a ba ra stA ta/ dak+Shi Ni t+ta rA b+h+yA ma ta su tsa/ dak+Shi Na u t+ta ra dag las ata su tsa'o/ /dak+Shi Na u t+ta ra dag las bdun pa sogs gong du smos pa'i don de rnams la a ta su tsa 'gyur te/ dak+Shi Na taH/ lho phyogs su/ u t+ta ra taH/ byang phyogs su/ phyogs gzhan nam phyogs gzhan las sam phyogs gzhan du/
[\[178b.4\]]bi b+hA ShA ba rA pa rA b+h+yaM/ bir a bar dag las yang na'o/ /bdun pa sogs kyi don la pa ra a ba ra dag la a ta su tsa yang na 'gyur te/ bar taH/ a ba ra taH/ dak+Shi Nal a ta su tsa dbyangs don u brjod don/ u t+ta ra la a ta su tsa/ a ny+tse lu ka/ any+tsa las dbyi'o/ /a ny+tsa ti mtha' can gyi phyogs
[\[178b.5\]]kyi sgra las a stA ti 'jig par 'gyur te/ prA g+ba pa ti/ shar du gnas/ prA gA ga taH/ u par+Yu ba ri Sh+TA ta/ u pa ri Sh+TA ta'o/ /A r+d+ha'i a ta su tsa/ pha rol tu/ a ta su tsa/ phyogs nub tu/ sgra la a stA ti'i don la a ril dang a ri Sh+TA til 'gyur zhing U r+d+ha u pa ru 'gyur bas u ba ri dang / u pa ri Sh+TA ta dag
[\[178b.6\]]tshig phrad do/ /pa sh+tsA ta/ pa sh+tsA ta'o/ bra [\[]sdo rda tha'i a tu la [\]]a stA ti phyis ba'o/ shar nas 'ong / a ba ra pa sha ru 'gyur ba dang  u pa ri/ a stA ti'i don la A ti don la A ti byin pas/ pa sh+tsA ta/ sa pa tshig phrad do/ /u t+ta ra rA dak+Shi NA dA ti/ u t+ta ra  ad+ha ra  dak+Shi Na las A ti'o/ steng phyogs su/ u t+ta ra
[\[178b.7\]]dang / ad+ha ra dang / dak+Shi Na rnams las a stA ti'i don la A ti 'gyur te/ byang phyogs su/ u t+ta rA ta/ A ti brjod don/ a d+ha rA ta/ 'og phyogs su/ dak+Shi NA ta/ lho phyogs su/ nub phyogs su/ e na pa n+ya ta ra s+yA ma du re\u0f85 bany+tsa m+bAH/ ring po ma yin pa ya lnga pa ma yin pa las e nas na'o/ /
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]lnga ba'i mtha' ma yin pa'i bdun pa dang dang po dag gi mtha' las/ ad+ha ra/ dak+ShiN/ u t+ta ra rnams las thag ring po ma yin pa la e nas yang na 'gyur te/ a d+ha re Nab sa ti/ dak+Shi Ne na bas ti/ u t+ta re Na bas ti/ lnga pa min pa zhes pas lnga ba'i mtha'
[\[179a.2\]]la mi 'gyur te/ nga si  u t+ta rA dA ga taH/ ring po yin na e nas mi 'gyur te/ nya sil  u t+ta da to hi ma bA na/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/[ \[]dik+Sha[\]]b+da mA trA ta/ phyogs tsam las kyang  'og ga nye bar gnas/ lho'i nye bar gnas/ byang gi nye bar gnas/ ro/ /phyogs brjod pa tsam la'ang e nas 'gyur
[\[179a.3\]]te/ bU rbe Na/ dak+Shi Ne na/ byang nas 'ongs/ a bar Na/ u t+ta re Na/ dak+Shi NA dA tsa/ byang thag ring kha ba can/ dak+Shi Na las A tsa'o/ /dak+Shi Na las lnga pa bor ba'i bdun pa dang dang po'i mtha' las A tsa 'gyur te/ dak+Shi NA ba sa ti/ atsa  dak+Shi NA ra ma NI yaM/ lnga pa min pa
[\[179a.4\]]shar phyogs/ lho phyogs/ zhes pas lnga pa la/ nub phyogs/ byang phyogs/ dak+Shi NA dA ga taH/ A hi tsa dU re/ ring bo las A hi 'ang ngo / ring po brjod pa dang 'brel pa'i dak+Shi Na la bdun pa dang dang po'i mtha' la/ a tsa tsa dbyangs don/ lho ru gnas/ lho ru rtse/ A ha 'gyur te 'ang gi sgras atsa
[\[179a.5\]]'ang ngo / /A nyi  dak+Shi NA hi ba sa ti/ atsa  dak+Shi NA ba sa ti/ u t+ta rA ts+tsa/ lho nas 'ongs/ u t+ta ra las kyang ngo / /u t+ta ra las kyang A tsa dang A hi dag 'gyur te/ atsa  u t+ta rA ba sa ti/ A hi  u t+ta rA hi ba sa ti/ saM khyA yA bi d+hA D+re d+hA/ grangs las rnam pa'i don la d+ha'o/ /grangs
[\[179a.6\]]kyi sgra rnams las rnam pa'i don thag ring po'i lho phyogs su gnas/ la d+hA 'gyur nye/ tsa tuHpra kA raM/ zhes pa'i don la/ ca tu d+hA/ de bzhin du  e ka d+hA/ dwi d+hA/ ShoD+ha/ rnam pa drug/ thag ring po'am lhor gnas/ ShaD+D+hA/ pany+tsa d+hA/ sogs so/ /i kA r+d+ho d+h+ya munya n+ya ta ra s+yaM/ a ka las d+ha'i d+h+ya mu nya
[\[179a.7\]]yang na'o/ /e ka las rnam pa'i don gyi rkyen d+hA ni d+hA mu nya zhes par yang na  rnam pa bzhi/ 'gyur te/ rnam pa bzhi/ rnam pa gcig /rnam pa gnyis/[ \[]Sha Sha la d+hA Sha'i u te d+ha'i D+ha 'os/ dz+ha la gyi dza sha 'os ShaDa/ rnam pa lnga/ e ka la d+hA d+hA d+h+ya nu nya 'phel don u brjod don / ai kad+h+ya ma/ rnam pa gcig/ e
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]kad+hA/ e d+hA ts+tsa/ e d+hA 'ang ngo / /dwi dang tri dag las rnam pa'i don gyi rkyen d+hA na e d+hA zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ dwe d+hA/ dwi d+hA/ tre d+hA/ tri ng+hi/ yA s+ye pA sha pa/ smad pa la pA sha pa'o/ /smad pa brjod pa las rang don lap+Shasha ba 'gyur te/ ku t+si to b+haM Sha ba/ /zhes pa'i don
[\[179b.2\]]la/ b+hi Sha k+pA shaH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ bA sha ka lba ka mye/ 'dod pa la/ pA sha pa ka lba dag go/ /rnam pa gnyis/ rnam pa gsum/ 'dod pa'i don la'ang pA sha pa dang ka mya dag 'gyur te/ pa yaHka mye/ zhes pa'i don la/ pA sha ba pa ya sbA  mtsho byed ngan pa/ shaM/ kalba  pa
[\[179b.3\]]'tsho byed ngan pa/ bA sha ba pa dbyangs don/ yaska lpaM/ i NaH ShaH/ i Na las Sha'o/ /rtags i Na so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol gyi rnam bcad ni rkyen pa sde dang ka sde dang po can pha rol la Sha yig ru 'gyur te/ sa rbi Sh+bA shaM/ 'o ma 'dod dam chu 'dod/ pU ra Na d+b+hA ge yA da na/ 'o ma 'dod dam chu 'dod/ rdzogs
[\[179b.4\]]pa las tI ya las cha la a na'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rkyen tI ya'i mtha' can las cha'am skal pa'i don la  aN 'gyur te/ dI tI yo b+hA gaH/ zhes pa'i don la/ dwi tA yaH/ de bzhin du/ an  tri tI yaH/ sarbe la bA sha ba/ 'o ma 'dod/ prA ge kA da sha b+h+yonya ts+tsha n+da si/ sdeb sbyor ma yin pa la bcu
[\[179b.5\]]gcig gi snga ma rnams las so/ /rig byed brjod pa'i sdeb sbyor gyi don ma yin pas bcu gcig las snga ma ste grangs gnyis cha'am skal ba gnyis pa/ kyi sgra/ gnyis cha/ a nan dbyangs don/ rdzogs pa'i gsum cha/ rkyen can gcig nas bcu'i bar la chal an 'gyur te/ an/ tsa tu nraH/ an da sha
[\[179b.6\]]maH/ sogs so/ /Sha Sh+ShA Sh+Ta mA b+h+yAM nya tsa/ ShaSh+Tha aSh+Ta ma dag las nya 'ang ngo / /Sha Sh+Tha dang a Sh+Ta ma dag la chal nya'ang 'gyur te/ ShA Sh+ThaH/ an  Sha Sh+ThaH/ nya  A Sh+Ta maH/ an aSh+Ta maH/ b+hU ra rU rbe ca ra Ta byung ba snga ma la tsa ra Ta'o/ /dus sngon du byung ba'i don bzhi cha/ bcu cha/
[\[179b.7\]]la tsa ra Ta 'gyur te/ b+hU ta pU rbo dri Sh+TaH/ sngon mthong bar gyur/ zhes pa'i don la/ tsa ra Ta Ta Ti ta sogs kyi don/ dr-i Sh+Ta tsa raH/ sngon mthong bar 'gyur/ nya nya 'gro ba la D+haphel/ drug pa/ de bzhin du/ tshar du A  brgyad pa/ D+h+ya ca raH/ sngon phyug por gyur/ sngon bzhon nur gyur/ ku mA ra tsa raH/ tsar Ta/ Sha Sh+Th+ya rU pya tsa/ drug ba las rU bya yang
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]ngo / /drug pa'i mtha' lad dus sngon du byung ba brjod pa la rU pya 'gyur zhing tsa raT 'ang ngo / /kri Sh+Na s+ya b+hA ta pU rbo gau/ zhes pa'i don la/ kr-i Sh+Na rU pyaHgau/ yang na tsa raT sbyar bas/ kr-i Sh+Na tsa raH gau/ de bzhin du/ b+hU ta pU rbA yA shu b+h+rA/ zhes pa'i don la/
[\[180a.2\]]shu b+hA rU pyaH shu b+h+rA tsa raH/ a ti shA ya ne ta ma biSh+Sha no/ phul du byung ba la ta ma pa i Sh+Tha na dag ga go/ /mang po'i  nag po'i sngon du byung ba'i ba lang / nang nas gcig nag po'i sngon du byung ba'i ba lang / phul du byung ba  nag po'i sngon du byung ba'i ba lang / brjod pa la sngon dkar por gyur/ ta ma pa dang i Sh+Sha na
[\[180a.3\]]rU pya  sngon dkar por gyur/ tsar Ta/ dag 'gyur te/ a yi me Sha ma ti sha ye na la g+tuH/ zhes pa'i don la/ la g+hu ta maH/ la g+hi Sh+Tha na/ la g+hu la/ ti ra sh+tsa/ ting las kyang ngo / /pa tsa ti lta bu ting gi mtha' las kyang phul du byung ba brjod pa la ta ma pa 'gyur te/ a ti sha ye na pa tsa ti/
[\[180a.4\]]zhes pa'i don la/ pa tsa ti ta mAM/ mcho ba tA la dag 'di rnams kyi nang nas ches thung ba/ de bzhin du/ tam pa pa dbyangs dod/ ches thung ba/ yi Sh+Tha na na dbyangs don Ti'i 'os Ti phyis/ b+ha ba ti ta mAM/ dwi ba tsa na bi b+ha dz+yo pa pa de ta ra bI ya su nau/ brjod pa gnyis las bkar ba dang nye ba'i tshig phul du byung bar 'tshod ba/ la tar pa
[\[180a.5\]]pa tsa til ta ma pa dang kim tir mi zad pa zhes pa la A mu/ I ya su na'o/ /brjod pa gnyis las gcig bkar te phul du byung ba brjod pa dang nye ba'i b+ha ba tel ta na pa dang A su/ mchog tu yod pa/ tshig ste tshig gzhan gong na yod pa las kyang phul du byung ba brjod pa la tar ba dang a'i ya sun dag 'gyur te/ a yam
[\[180a.6\]]na yo ra ti sha ye na la g+huH/ zhes pa'i don la/ ches thung ba/ la g+hu ta raH/ la g+hI yA na/ ches thung ba/ de bzhin du nye ba'i tshig can la/ u d+hI ts+yAH a ti sha ye na pa Ta baH/ byang pa rnams ches mkhas pa/ zhes pa'i don la/ byang pa rnams ches mkhas pra/ u dI tsI pa Tu  'di 'di dag gi nang nas phul byung ba'i thung ba/
[\[180a.7\]]ta raH/ ta ra ba dzas/ de bzhin du/ la g+hu la tar pa pa dbyangs don/ la g+hu la I ya spun Ti'o 'os Ti phyes na dbyangs don sa'i u uka 'gro ba la num gyi don num na'i u bad+hA ring po su phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' phyis/ pA ts+yA pa Ti yA nas/ I ya su na Ti phyis dzas num u pa d+hA ring bo/ a dzA di gu Na ba tsa nA de ba/ a dza la sogs
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]pa rnams las yon tan brjod pa las 'di'o/ /a dza la sogs pa rnams las phul du byung ba la 'jug pa'i yon tan brjod pa la/ 'di ste i Sh+Tha na dang I ya sun 'gyur te/ a ti sha ye na pr-i thuH/ zhes pa'i don la/ pra thi Sh+thaH/ rgya phud du byung ba/ ba thI yA na/ pr-i thu la A
[\[180b.2\]]ya su/ ta ra p+ta ma bau g+haH/ ta ra pa  ta ma pa dag lta'o/ /phul du byung ba sogs brjod pa'i rkyen ta ra ba dang ta ma pa dag la g+ha'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/ /ki ma ti da bya ya g+hA dA m+wa dra bya pra kar+She/ rgya phud du byung / pri thu la iSh+Tha na ta la dang po'i ta zhes pas r-i ra Ti'i 'os u phyis/ rdzas ma yin  rgya phul du byung ba
[\[180b.3\]]pa phul du byung ba la ki ma dang e dang ting dang mi zad pa rnams la g+ha las A mu'o/ /rdzas ma yin pa phul du byung ba mngon par brjod pa la kim dang e yig mtha' can rnams dang ting mtha' can rnams dang mi zad pa rnams las pha rol gyi rkyen g+ha'i ming can las A mu 'gyur te/
[\[180b.4\]]a ti sha ye na ki ma/ zhes pa'i don la/ kiM ta rAM/ ci zhig mchog /ki ta mAM/ de bzhin du/ prA h+na ta rAM/ grA h+na ta mAM/ pa tsa ti tA rAM/ mchog tu 'tshod pa/ pa tsa ti ta mAM/ u ts+tse ta rAM/ u ts+tsai sta mA/ sogs te A mu'i mtha' can rnams kyang mi zad pa'o/ /rdzas ma yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi
[\[180b.5\]]ci zhig mchog /ki ma la ta rab dang A mu u brjod don/ kim la ta ma pa dang A mu/ ci zhig mchog /pra h+Ne la ta ra pa A mu/ nyi ma snga ma mchog/ drA h+ne la ta ma pa A mu/ ta ra pa A mu/ ta ma pa A mu/ u ts+tsau ta ra pa A mu/ ches mthong ba/ ta ma pa A su/ rdzas yin na A mu mi 'gyur te/ ta ra ba u ts+tsai ta raHta ruH/ lta bu'o/ /tu sh+tsha n+da si/
[\[180b.6\]]tr-i las sdeb sbyor la'o/ /kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen tr-in dang tr-i tsa'i mtha' las rig byed kyi sdeb sbyor las kyang phul du byung pa'i don la i Sh+Tha na dang I ya sun 'gyur ro/ /tu ri Sh+Tha me yas s+su/ tra'i iSh+Tha na i man I ya sun rnams la'o/ /shing chos ring ba/ tr-in dang tr-i tsa'i rkyen gyi
[\[180b.7\]]de phan gyi rkyen iSh+Sha na dang i man dang I ya sun pha rol la dbyi ste/ tril i Sh+Sha na tr-i phyis/ ka ri Sh+ThaH/ mchog tu byed pa/ ka ri maH/ kar+t+raM la i man/ kar+t+ri la I ya sun/ ka rI yA na/ mchog tu byed pa/ do hi trel i Sh+Tha na mdo 'dis tr-i phyis Ti'i 'os i phyis/ do hi Sh+ThaH/ mchog tu 'job/ do hi tr-il i man/ do hi maH/ mchog
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]tu 'jog  do hwi yA na/ pra sha s+ya s+ya shraH/ /pra sha s+ya zhes pa'i rtags ni iSh+Tha na dang I ya sun pha rol la shra zhes par 'gyur ro/ /pra kri t+yai kA tsa/ a tsa gcig pa la rang bzhin gyis so/ /rtags a ca gcig pa'i pha rol tu iSh+Tha na
[\[181a.2\]]sogs gsum po byung na Ti dbyi [ \[]de te tral I [\]]ya sun/ ba ma yin te/ shre Sh+ThaH/ shre yA nA/ dz+ya tsa/ j+ya 'ang ngo / /eSh+Tha na dang I ya sun pha rol la pra sha s+ya ni dz+ya zhes par 'gyur te/ /iSh+Tha na  dze Sh+ThaH/ dz+ya la I ya sun/ dz+yA dA dI yasaH/ dz+ya las I yas kyi A ta'o/ /pra sha s+ya
[\[181a.3\]]dang br-i[\[] d+d+ha [\]]dz+ya du 'gyur  bra sha s+ya la iSh+Tha na pra s+ya shra ra 'gyur Ti me dbyi yon tan/ mchog gam gtso bo/ pra sha s+ya la I ya su na/ ba'i dz+ya kyi pha rol gyi I yas kyi I yas kyi I ni A ta du 'gyur te/ dz+yA yA na/ dr-i d+d+ha s+ya tsa/ br-i d+d+ha'i  bsu bo/ 'ang ngo / /i Sh+Tha na dang I ya sun pa rol la br-i d+d+ha zhes pa'ang dz+ya zhes par
[\[181a.4\]]'gyur te/ a ti sha ye na bri d+d+haHpa/ zhes pa'i don la/ dz+yeSh+ThaH/ dz+yA yAn/ an+ti ka bA D+ha yo r+Na da sA d+hau/ an+ti ka dang bA D+ha dag gi ne da sA d+ha dag go/ /mthu bo'am gtso bo/ bra sha s+ya la I ya sun pra sha s+ya dz+ya du 'gyur I yas kyi I A aka 'dra ba la ring po num sogs/ rkyen iSh+Tha na dang I ya sun dag pha rol
[\[181a.5\]]ches rgas ba'am rgas pa phul du byung ba/ la an+ti  br-i d+d+ha la iSh+Tha na/ ches rgas ba/ br-i d+d+ha la I ya sun/ ches rgas pa/ ka ni ne dang bA D+ha ni sA d+ha zhes par 'gyur te/ ne di Sh+ThaH/ ne dI yA na/ sA d+hi Sh+ThaH/ sA d+hiSh+ThaH/ che shos/ sA d+hi yA na/ s+thu la dU ra yu ba hra swa k+Shi pra k+Shu drA NAM ya NA di pa raM pU rba s+ya tsa gu Na/ s+thU la  dU ra
[\[181a.6\]]yu ba  hra swa  k+Shi pra  k+Shu dra rnams kyi pha rol gyi dang po'i yaN ste snga mas kyang yon tan no/ /s+thu la sogs  an+ti ka la iSh+Tha ka ne dar 'gyur Ti phyis/ chung shos/ an+ti ka la I ya sun/ sA rta la/ iSh+Tha na dang I ya sun/ bA D+ha sA re d+ha re 'gyur Ta phyis/ pa 'di rnams kyi rkyen iSh+Tha na dang I ya sun dang i man pha rol
[\[181a.7\]]gyi dang po'i rtags kyi mtha' na yaN so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na dbyi ste/ rtags kyi dang po'i atsa dang po'ang yon tan du 'gyur te/ s+tha biSh+ThaH/ ches sbom pa  lba bI yA na/ sU la la iSh+Tha dang I ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis aNa'i yi ge la phyis su yon tan i ca li bA ya sogs/ da biSh+ThaH/ ches ring ba/ dra bI lA na/ d+lu ra
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]la iSh+Than dang I la sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis  ya Na'i yi ger phyis dU yaM u yon tan e tsa'i a ya'o/ /ches dang bab/ ya beSh+ThaH/ yu ba la iSh+Than dang I ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis ya Na'i yi ge lba phyis u yon tan e ca'i ya ya sogs/ ya bI yA na/ ches dar bab/ hra siSh+ThaH/ ches thung ba/ hra sI yA na/ k+She piSh+ThaH/ ches mgyogs
[\[181b.2\]]pa! k+She pI yA na/ k+Shi di Sh+ThaH/ ches phran tshogs/ k+Sho dA+e yA na/ i man ni pri thu la sogs pa'i sogs khong hra swa dang / k+Shi bra dang / k+Shu dra gsum la 'jug pa nyid de s+thu la sogs 'di rnams thams cad la  hwa swa la i t+ta na dang I ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis yaNa'i yi ge lba phyis/ k+Shi za la aSh+Than dang I ya sun Ti phyis
[\[181b.3\]]mdo 'dis ya Na'i ger gyis i yon tan/ k+Shu dral iSh+Than dang I ya sun Ti phyis mdo 'dis ya Na'i yi ger phyis u yon [(]tano[,]tan[)]/ 'jug pa ma yin no/ /hra si maH/ thung du nyid/ k+Shepi maH/ k+Sho di maH/ pri ya s+thir sbi ru ba hu la gu ru br-i d+d+ha tr-i p+ta dI rgya dr-i n+ba ra kA NAM pra s+tha sba barbaM hi garba r+Shi hra pa drA g+hi pr-i n+dAH/ pri ya  s+thi ra  s+thi ra  u ru
[\[181b.4\]]ba hu la  gu ru  br-i d+d+ha  tr-i p+ta  dI r+g+ha  br-i n+dA ra ka rnams kyi pra  sba  s+pha ba ra  hra swa la i man Ti phyis mdo 'dis yaNa'i yi ge lba phyis ba'o/ /k+Shi pra la i man/ mgyogs pa nyid/ phran chogs nyid/ k+Shu dra la i man/ baM hi  ga ra  bar+Shi  tra pa  drA g+hi  br-in+ha rnams so/ /iSh+Than dang I ya sun i man rnams pha rol la pri ya la
[\[181b.5\]]sogs pa 'di rnams rim pa bzhin pra la sogs pa 'di rnams su 'gyur te/ bre Sh+ThaH/ mchog tu dga' ba/ pre yAn/ s+theSh+ThaH/ mchog tu brtan pa/ s+the yAn/ mchog tu 'phel ba/ s+pheSh+ThaH/ sbe yAn/ mchog tu 'phel ba/ ba ri Sh+ThaH/ bde legs ba'am mchog/ ba rI yAn/ baM hi t+ThaH/ mchog tu mang ba/ baM hI
[\[181b.6\]]yAn/ ga ri Sh+ThaH/ mchog tu lcig ga rI yA na/ pri ya la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdo 'dis pri ya bra ru 'gyur bar yon tan/ s+thir la iSh+Thin dang I a sun mdo 'dis s+thir s+thar 'gyur yon tan/ s+thir la iSh+Than dang I ya sun sbir s+phar 'gyur yon tan/ u ru la iSh+Tha ya sun mdo 'dis u ru ba rar 'gyur Ti phyis/ ba tu la iSh+Than dang a'i la sun mdo 'dis ba hu
[\[181b.7\]]la baM hir 'gyur Ti phyis/ yu ru la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdi 'dis su ru ga rar 'gyur Ti phyis/ bar+Shi Sh+ThaH/ ches rgas ba/ bar+ShI yA na/ br-id+d+ha la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdo 'dis baMd+d+ha bar+Shi ru 'gyur Ti phyis/ hra piSh+ThaH/ ches chom pa/ ta bI yA na/ tr-i b+ta la iSh+Than dang I la sun mdo 'dis hra b+ha tra pa ru 'gyur Ti gyis/ drA g+hiSh+ThaH/ ches ring ga drA g+hi yAn/ dri d+ha ba iSh+Than dang a'i ya sun mdo 'dis dI r+d+ha chA g+hi ru 'gyur
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]Ti phyis/ br-i n+ngi Sh+ThaH/ ches tshogs pa/ br-i n+dI yAn/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas pri ya a ru  a ru  ba hu la  gu ru  dI r+g+ha rnams pr-i thu la sogs pa'i nang tshan yin pas i man 'gyur te/ pre maH/ dga' ba nyid/ ba ri maH/ brang nyid/ mang bo nyid/ baM nyi maH/ ba hu la/ i man ba hu la baM hir 'gyur
[\[182a.2\]]phyis/ ga ri maH/ br-i n+dA nga ka la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdo 'dis br-in+dA ra ka bra n+dar 'gyur Ti phyis/ drA g+hi maH/ ba ho rmo po b+hU tsa ba haH/ ba hu las dbyi ste ba hu'i b+hU'o/ ba hu'i pha rol tu I ya sun iSh+Tha na i man  thi ya la i man thi ya thu ru 'gyur yon tan/ u ru la i man u ru ba rar 'gyur Ti phyis/ rnams byung na rkyen de rnams kyi thog
[\[182a.3\]]b+ho ba nyid/ tha ru la i man gu ru ga rar 'gyur Ti phyis/ dI r+d+ha la i man dI r+g+ha drA b+hir 'gyur Ti phyis/ cher ring ba/ ma'i yi ge dbyi zhing ba hu'ang b+hU zhes par 'gyur te/ b+hU yAn/ ches mang ba/ b+hA maH/ mang ba nyid/ i Sh+Tha s+ya yiT+tsa/ iSh+Than gyi yiT 'ang ngo / /ba hu la iSh+Than sbyin pa na iSh+Than phyi i dbyi zhing ba hu la b+hUr
[\[182a.4\]]'gyur la iSh+Than la yiT A ga ma yang 'gyur te/ b+hU yi Sh+ThaH/ ches mang ba/ yu bA lba yoHka nA n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ ba hu la I ya sun mdo 'dis I phyis ba hu b+hUr 'gyur/ ba hu la i man mdo 'dis i phyis ba tu b+hU ru 'gyur/ yu ba alba dag gi ka na yang na'o/ /iSh+Than a'i ya sun dag pha rol la yu ba dang alba dag ni
[\[182a.5\]]ka na zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ ka nyiSh+ThaH/ ches dar ba la bam ches tung ba/ ka nI yA na/ ches dar bab bam ches chung ba/ yang na/ ya bi Sh+ThaH/ ches dang badra/ ya bI yA na/ ches nyung ba/ a lbiSh+ThaH/ a lbiSh+ThaH/ iSh+Than/ I ya sun/ a lbI yA na/ chas nyung ba/ bin+ma to t+lu ka /bin ma tu pa dag gis 'jig go/ /rtags
[\[182a.6\]]yu ba 'am a lba la iSh+Than tu ba'am a lba ka nar 'gyur Ti phyis/ yu ba'am a lbal I ya sun rtags ka nar 'gyur Ti phyis/ /yu ba la iSh+Than dang I ya un Ti gyis s+thu la blu sogs kyi mdos yaNa'i yi ge ba phyis u yon tan e tsa'i a ya sogs/ de bin dang ma tu pa kyi mtha' can yin la rkyen iSh+Than dang a'i ya sun pha rol la bin dang ma tu pa 'jig ste/
[\[182a.7\]]sra dziSh+ThaH/ ches byed can/ sra rda'i yAn/ bin gyi mtha' can sra sbin la iSh+Tan dang I ya sun mdo 'dis bin 'dig/ twa dziSh+ThaH/ ches pa bas ba can/ twa dzI yA na/[ \[]ma num kyi mtha' can twa bA tu la iSh+Than dang I ya sun mdo 'dis ma tu ba 'jig[\] ]/pra shaM sA yAM tU ba yaH/ kha bsgyur ba la rU pa ya'o/ /mi mkhas pa la mkhas par ba rdzus pa lta bu'i
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]don la rtags dang ting mtha' las kyang rU pa ya 'gyur te/ bra sha staHpaTuH/ zhes pa'i don la/ ba Tu dU baH/ de bzhin du/ pa tsa ti rU paM/ I Shad pa ris mA p+tau ka lba pa de shI ya raH/ cung zad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dag la ka lba pa de sh+ya de shI yar rnams so/ /
[\[182b.2\]]bya ba gang yin pa de phal cher rdzogs  rdzus ma'i cha las ba/ mkhas pa'i gzugs sam rdzus ma'i mkhas pa/ ba Tu la ya ya dbyangs don/ 'chod par brdzus pa/ zin pa cung zad tsam yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i don ting mtha' dang rtags rnams las ka lba pa  de sh+ya  de shI yar rnams 'gyur te/ I ShA
[\[182b.3\]]dU no bi dwA na/ zhes pa'i don la/ bi dwa t+ka lbaH/ cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/ de bzhin du/ ya sha ska lbaH/ cung zad dman pa'i grags pa can/ bi dwa d+de sh+yaH/ cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/ bi dwa d+de shI yaH/ ba tsa ti kalbaM/ ba tsa ti de sh+yaH/ pa tsa ti de shI yaH/ bi b+hA ShA  cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/
[\[182b.4\]]su bo ba hu c+mu ra stA ta/ bi tra sa la kasma bas dbyangs don ba su sra su d+hAM su aN Tu ha sogs kyi mdos sad khar la tsar 'os da [\[]te[\]]/ su ba las ba hu tsa yang na ste dang  bi dwi sa las de sh+ya dang de shI ya rar dbyangs don bsu sogs kyi mdos sa da/ bor 'o/ /sub  cung zad chos pa/ cung zad mu chos pa/ ste su sogs 'jug pa'i gzhi'i rtags rnams
[\[182b.5\]]las cung zad ma rdzogs pa'i don la ba hu tsa yang na 'gyur te rkyen ba hu tsa ni rtags de'i sngon du'ang 'jogs par bya'o/ /I Sha dU no pa TuH/ zhes pa'i don la/ ba hu pa TuH/ pa Tu kalbaH/ pra kA ra ba tsa ne dzA tI yar  rnam pa brjod pa la dzA tI yar 'o/ /rnam pa brjod pa'i don la
[\[182b.6\]]dzA tI yar 'gyur [\[]te[\]]/ maTu bra kA raH/ zhes pa'i don la/ paTu dzA tI yaH/ g+ha rU ba ka lba tse laT brub go  cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/ baTu la rkyen ba hu tsa sngon du bzhag tsa dbyangs don/ cung zad dman pa'i mkhas pa/ tra ma ta ha te Shu d+Ye\u0f85ne kA tso hwa swaH/ g+ha rU pa  kalba  tse laT  bru ba  go tra  ma ta  ha ta rnams
[\[182b.7\]]mkhas pa'i rigs sam rang bzhin  la dI'i atsa [ \[]mkhas [\]]pa'i rang bzhin/ bA tA+ai ya rar dbyangs don/ gcig ma yin pa las thung du'o/ /rkyen g+ha'i ming can rnams dang rU pa la sogs pa 'di rnams pha rol la rtags a tsa gcig pa ma yin pa'i mtha'i bud med du brjod pas rkyen dI ba dang dISha dag thung ngur 'gyur
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]te/ brA h+ma NI la/ tar sogs sbyar bas/ brA h+ma Ni ta rA/ brA h+ma ta mA/ brA h+ma Ni rU pAM/ rU pa TA ba/ brA h+ma Ni ka lbA/ kalba TA ba/ brA h+ma Ni tso lI/ the laT dI ba/ brA h+ma Ni bru bA/ thu ba TA ba/ brA h+ma Ni go trA/ po tra T+ra ba/ brA h+ma Ni ma tA/ pa ta TA pa/ brA h+ma Ni ha tA/ ha ha TA pa/ sogs te mdo
[\[183a.2\]]'dis dI mtha' thung ngur bsgyur ba'o/ /na d+yAHa n+ya ta ra s+yaM/ na dI'i  bram ze mo mchog tar ba TA ba/ bram zes mo brju sam/ cung zad dman pa'i bram ze mo/ cung zad dman pa'i bram ze mo/ cung zad dman pa'i bram ze mo/ yang na'o/ /bram ze ma'i rigs/ dI mtha' ma  cung zad dman pa'i bram ze mo/ yin kyang bshad ma thag pa'i
[\[183a.3\]]rkyen rnams pha rol la na dI'i ming can rnams kyi'ang thung ngur yang na 'gyur te/ ba mo ru ta rA/ ba mo rU ta rA/ sti ta rA/ stI ta rA/ sogs te rtags mtha' thung ngur byed pa dang mi byed pa yang na bste rkyen gzhan rnams la'ang rigs 'gre'o/ /na dI'i ming can yin kyang la k+Shi dang ta
[\[183a.4\]]rI dang ta n+tI rnams ni thung ngur mi 'gyur te/ la k+Sh+mi ta rA/ ta rI ta rA/ ta n+tI ta rA/ mchog tu brla mdzes ma/ bud [\[]med [\]]mchog ma/ sogs so/ /u gi ta sh+tsa/ u ka 'gro ba las kyang ngo / /rtags u ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge 'gro ba la dI byin pa' mtha' yang rkyen g+ha'i ming can
[\[183a.5\]]dpa' mchog ma'am mchog tu bun sum tshogs ma/ sogs pha rol la thu mchog ma/ sgra snyan mchog ma/ thung ngur yang na 'gyur te/ bi du Sha ta rA/ mchog tu mkhas ma/ bi du ShI ta rA/ sa ti ta rA/ mchog tu'ang tshul ma/ sa tI ta mA/ prA gi bA t+kaH/ 'di las gong du ka'o/ /'di las zhes pa grangs med pa
[\[183a.6\]]thi dA su la Sha 'phro ba gaur sogs kyis rI sa u 'phro ba ba su'i slar yang dag par 'gyur ro zhes pas pa u mdo 'dis yang na thung ngur 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba yang na ba/ sa tr-i la Shi ta gaur sogs kyis dI [\[]ba mi 'gro ba [\]]mdo 'dis thung 'gyur ba dang pi 'gyur ba yang na ba/ sa tha nA ma rnams kyi Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa'o zhas pa las gong du don gang yin pa de la ka
[\[183a.7\]]'gyur ro zhes skyer btang ba'o/ /a dz+hA ti/ mi shes pa la'o/ /mi shes pa'i don brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/ ka s+ya a yi a shaH/ 'di su'i rta/ zhes pa'i don la/ a shA kaH/ su'i rta/ de bzhin du/ pa ya skaM/ su'i chu'am su'i 'o ma/ ku t+si te/ smad pa la'o/ /smad pa'i don la'ang ka 'gyur te/
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]ku t+si tonya shwa/ zhes pa'i don la/ a shwa kaH/ 'grel par/ de [\[]bar [\]]t+ta lta bu rtags yi ge gnyis gnyis byas pa gnyis bsgrigs pas rtags phyi ma ka pha rol la yang na dbyi'o zhes bshad pas de ba dA t+ta kaHde ba kaH/ apya ya sarba nA m+nA ma ka ts+p+ra ka TeH/ mi zad pa sarba nA pa rnams
[\[183b.2\]]rta ngan pa/ gyi Ta'i gong du a ka tsa'o/ /rtang na pa/ mi zad pa rnams dang sa rba nA ma rnams las mi shes pa sogs kyi don la a ka tsa 'gyur zhing de yang rtags kyi Ti'i gong du sbyin par bya ste/ u ts+tsa ltas sbyin ngan ba'am su'i [\[]ltas sbyin[\]]/[ \[]da t+ta phyis pa'o[\]]/ /kaiH/ mtho ba sug  nI tsa kaiH/ dma' ba su'i/ thams cad su'i 'am thams
[\[183b.3\]]cad ngan pa/ sarba ke/ dzas shi/ dzas she/ u b+ha ke/ ba tis su'i 'am ngan pa/ 'grel par/ rtags su ba kyi mtha' can rnams dang byings ting gi mtha' can rnams las kyang mi shes pa sogs  u ts+tsus la Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa tsa dbyangs don a brjod don/ kyi don la  ni tsi sa la ti'i sngon du aka tsa/ sub mtha' yin
[\[183b.4\]]sarba la Ti'i sngon du katsa/ u b+ha la Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa/ na rtags dang ting mtha' yin na ti sogs kyi Ti'i gong du a ka tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ yu Sh+ma kA b+hiH/ khyed rnams kyis mi shas/ a sma kA b+hiH/ yu ba ka yoH/ khyed dag gis mi shes/ A ba ka yoH/ rang dag gis mi shes/ byed rnams la mi shes/ yu Sh+ma
[\[183b.5\]]kA su/ a sma kA su/ bed rnams la mi shes/ tA ya kA/ khyed kyis mi shes/ ma ya kI/ ded kyis mi shes/ twa ya ki/ ma ya kyi/ ded la yi shes/ yA Sh+mA b+hoHdang a smA b+haH/ rtags kyi Ti'i gong du a ka tsa byin pa'o/ /nged rnams kyis mi shes/ yu ba ka yoHdang A ba yoHdag gi Ti'i gong du ka tsa/ pa tsa ta ki/ 'tshod par ngan pa'am mi shes/
[\[183b.6\]]yu smA su dang smA su dag rtags kyi Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/ tA yA dang ma yA dag gi rtags kyi Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/ pa Tha ta ki/ khyed la mi shes/ tA yi dang ma yi dag gi rtags [\[]kyi[\]] gong du a ka tsa/ ka s+ya tsadaH/ ka'i 'ang da'o/ /mi zad pa rnams kyi mthar ka yig yod na de'i Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/ pa tsa ti la Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/ byin pa na ka
[\[183b.7\]]srog mad de da srog med du 'gyur te/ su ngan ba/ b+ha kita/ d+ha ki dang he ru  ba Tha te la Ti'i gong du a ka tsa/ su'i klog/ ka dang br-i thag rnams las Ti'i gong du a ka tsa mdo 'dis ka rnams dag nas med pa sogs phyis da bA hi ra  ku ta/ su'i nad/ pri tha ka ta/ so sor su/ ku tA+e sha mI shu N+DAb+h+yoHraH/ ku TI  sha mI  shuN+DA rnams las ra'o/ /
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]ku Ti sogs 'di rnams las thung ngu'i don lar 'gyur te/ hra sra ku TI/ zhes pa'i don la/ ku TI raH/ de bzhin du/ sha mI raH/ shu N+Da raH/ bat+so k+Sha  shwa r+Sha b+he sh+tsa ta nu twe/ ba t+sa  u k+Sha  a shwa rnams las lus nyid la'o/ /bet+sa la sogs pa 'di
[\[184a.2\]]rnams las rang bzhin gyi lus nyid brjod pa la Sh+Ta ra tsa 'gyur te/ Sha 'gro ba'i ming  sa phug chung du/ can te Shi ta la dI Sha'i don  sa phug chung du/ rgyu mtshan  shing sha mi thung ngu/ glang po che'i sna bu ga thung du/ med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes pas Ta yang tar log go/ ta nu ba t+saH/ zhes pa'i don la/
[\[184a.3\]]bat+sa ta raH/ rI/ ma dIg de bzhin du/ u k+Sha ta raH/ rI/ mdISha/ a shA ta raH/ rI/ mdISha/ r-i Sha g+ha ta raH/ rI/ mdISha/ kim yat+ta do ni r+d+d+hAr dwa yo ka s+ya ta ra za/ kim yata tad las gnyis las gcig nges par 'dzin pa la Ta ra tsa'o/ /kim yad  be'u'i lus sam byis pa'i lus/ tad
[\[184a.4\]]be'u'i lus sam byis pa'i lus/ dar ma'i lus sam glang gi dus/ rnams las  rta yi lus/ gnyis kyi nang  khyu mchog gi bus/ nas gcig nges par 'dzin pa'i don la Da ta ra tsa 'gyur te/ a na yo ka ta ro paTuH/ a na yo ya ta ro paTuH/ a na yo ta ta ro pa Tu rA ga ts+tsha tu/ bA ba hU nAM dzA ti ba ri pra sh+ne Da ta ma tsa/
[\[184a.5\]]mang po rnams kyi rigs 'dri ba la Da ta ma tsa yang na'o/ mang po rnams kyi nang nas gcig nges par bkar te rigs 'dri ba'i don la Da ta  kim la Da ta ra tsa ced byangs don Di ha la Ti phyes de'i don/ 'di dag las mkhas pa su/ yad laDa ta ra tsa/ 'di dag las mkhas pa gang yin/ 'di dag las mkhas pa de tshud shog /ma tsa yang na
[\[184a.6\]]'gyur te/ e ShAM ka ta mo brA h+ma NaH/ e ShAM ya ta mo brA h+ma NaH/ e ShAM ta ta mo brA h+ma NaH/ yang na a ka tsa sbyar bas/[ \[]e ShAM ka kaHbrA h+ma NaH/ e ShAM ya kaHbrA g+ma NaH/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze gang / e ShAM sa kaHbrA h+ma NaH/ e kA ts+tsa bA tsAM/ e ka las kyang shar pa rnams
[\[184a.7\]]kyi'o/ /'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze su/ kim laDa ta ma tsa/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze gar/[ \[]yad [\]]'aDa ta ma tsa/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze de/ ta ta laDa ta ma tsa/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze su/ kaHla a ka tsa Ta'i [\[]shor du[\]]/ ya ra la Ti'i gong du a katsa/ sa tsa la Ti'i sngon du a ka tsa/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas bram ze de/ bshad ma thag pa'i don de dag la e ka las kyang
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]Ta ta ra tsa dang Da ta ma tsa dag 'gyur te/ sngon gyi shar phyogs kyi slob dpon rnams kyi 'dod pas so/ /e ta yo re ka ta ro bi praH/ e ShA me ka ta mo bi praH/ e Sh+Tha me ka kaHbi praH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ a n+ya sha b+hA taDa ta na ts+tsa/ a n+ya gyi sgra las Da ta ma tsa'ang ngo / /a n+ya gyi sgra las kyang Da ta ma tsa 'gyur
[\[184b.2\]]te/ e shA mya n+ya ta maH/ sarba sha b+de b+h+yaHswA r+the ka na/ skra thams cad las rang don la kana'o/ /'di dag las gcig bram ze/ e ka Da ta ra tsa/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gcig bram ze/ e ka la Da ta ra tsa/ e ka ta la Ti'i gong du a ga tsa/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gcig bram ze/ sgra thams cad de gang yang rung ba de la rang don brjod pa la ka na 'gyur
[\[184b.3\]]te/ ba hu ta ra ka/ a [\[]n+ya[\]] la Da ta ma tsa/ 'di rnams kyi nang na gzhan yod/ kan+yA la kaH/ kenyaNaH/ ka la aNa'i 'o/ /rkyen kan pha rol la rtags mtha' aN so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge ring po yod na thung ngur 'gyur te/ ga n+ya kA aN so sor bsdu ba ma yin na thung ngur mi 'gyur te/ nau kaH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ tI yA
[\[184b.4\]]ka nan dbyangs don/ mchog tu mang ba/ dI ka ka swA nre/ tI ya las rang don la I ka ka'o/ /rkyen tI yi mtha' can la rang don la I ka ka 'gyur te/ dA+ai tI yI kaH/ gnyis pa nyid/ gzhon nu ma/ tA rtI yI kaH/ pra dz+nyA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ pra dz+nyA la sogs pa  gru nyid/ rnams las kyang ngo / /pra dz+nyA la sogs
[\[184b.5\]]pa rnams las kyang rang don la aN 'gyur te/ prA dz+nyaH/ dI pa  drA dz+nyI/ tsau raH/ dI ba  tsau rIH/ saM khyA yAH kr-i yA b+h+yAM br-i t+ti gaN ne ky-i twa su tsa/ hwi tI ya la  I ka ka ka 'gro ba la 'phel ba/ gsus pa nyid/ tr-i t-I ya la I ka ka/ grangs las bya ba lan grangs la tr-i twa su tsa'o/ /grangs las bya ba dang 'brel
[\[184b.6\]]pa'i lan grangs brjod pa la kr-i twa su tsa 'gyur te/ pra dz+nyA la aN 'phel ba/ shes rab/ shes rab ma/ tsau ra aN/ chom rkun/ chom rkun ma/ pa ny+tsa bA rA na b+huM k+ta/ zhes pa'i don la/ pany+tsa kr-i twaHb+huM k+te/ de bzhin du/ ka ti kr-i twaHb+huM k+te/ dwi traM tsa tu r+b+h+yaH su tsa/ dwi tr-i tsa tu ra rnams las su tsa 'o/ /dwi dang tr-i dang tsa tu ra
[\[184b.7\]]rnams las bya ba dang 'brel pa'i lan grangs brjod pa la su tsa 'gyur te/ lan grangs lnga za bar byed/ lan grangs lnga za bar byed/ lan grangs ci tsam za bar byed/ dwi ya su tsa tsa dbyangs don u brjod don sa sa dzu sogs/dri r+b+huM k+te/ lan grangs gnyis za bar byed/[ \[]tri 'a [\]]su tsa tsa dbyangs don u brjod don sa sa dzu sogs/[ \[]t-i k+ba Tha [\]]
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ti/ lan grangs gsum klog par byed/ tsa tu dra Tha ti/ lan grangs bzhi klog par byed/ e ka s+ya sa kr-i ts+tsa/ e ka 'is kr-i ta'ang ngo / /e ka las bya ba dang 'brel ba'i lan grangs brjod pa la su tsa 'gyur zhing / su tsa pha rol e ka su tsa dang bcas pas kr-i ta zhes par
[\[185a.2\]]'gyur te/ sa kr-i te/ ba hwa l+b+yA r+thA ts+tsha skA ra kA da n+ya ta ra s+yI/ ba tu ra la su tsa tsa dbyangs don u brjod don ra las sa 'os sa yang phyis/ mang ba dang nyung ba'i don las byed pa las shas yang na'o/ /mang ba dang nyung ba'i don brjod pa las byed pa ste rnam dbye byed pa can rnams kyi don la shas yang na 'gyur te/[ \[]pha bu
[\[185a.3\]]hU [\]]ni/ rkyen shas lan gcig/ be hu shaH/[ \[]b+hil[\] ]ba hu b+hiH/ shas  ba hu shaH/ b+h+yas  ba hu b+h+yAH/ shas  ba hu shaH/ sub  ba hu ShuH/ shas  ba hu shaH/ de bzhin du/ b+hu rI shaH/ b+hu rIn sogs dang / al+b+ya shaH/ a l+b+yaM/ sta ka shaH/ sta kaM/ sogs so/ /byed pa can zhes pas rnam
[\[185a.4\]]bcad  mang po rnams/ kyi byed can  mang po rnams kyis/ mang po rnams kyis/ mang po rnams las/ mang po rnams la/ mang po rnams las/ mang po rnams la/ min na mi 'gyur te/ mang po rnams la/ ba hU nAM swA mI/ saM  thung du la/ thung ngu la/ khyai ka ba tsa  nyung ngu la/ nA ts+tsa pi p+mA yAM/ grangs gcig tshig las thob par
[\[185a.5\]]'dod pa la'ang ngo / /grangs kyi sgra gcig tu brjod pa la thob bar 'dod pa'i don la'ang shas 'gyur te/ dwau dwau de hi/ zhes pa'i don la/ shas  dwi shaH de hi/ de bzhin du/ mang po rnams kyi [\[]rtso [\]]bo/ shas  tri shaHde hi/ pra ti yo ge dany+tsa myA sta si/ pra ti sbyor ba la lnga pa las ta si'o/ /bra ti
[\[185a.6\]]sbyor ba las rnam dbyi lnga pa'i don la ta si 'gyur te/ bA su de bA t+b+ra ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ bA su de ba taH gnyis gnyis dag byin cig/ pra ti/ A di ma d+h+yA t+ta  gnyis byin cig /pr-i Sh+Tha pA r+shA de sh+tsa/ A di ma d+h+ya las ta te  gsum byin cig /pr-i Sh+Tha pA r+shA pA r+shA la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / A di dang ma
[\[185a.7\]]d+h+ya dag las lnga pa'i don la ta 'gyur zhing priSh+Tha bA r+shA la/ nor lha'i bu las so so/ sogs pa rnams  ta si i brjod don/ las kyang 'gyur te/ nor lha'i bu las so so/ A di ta/ dang po las/ ma d+h+ya ta/ dbus ma [\[]la[\]]sa/ br-i sh+Tha ta/ phyi ma las/ br-i Sh+Tha ta/ phyi ma las/ pA r+Sha ta/ a pA dA na tsA hI ya ru hoH/ byung khungs la yang hI ya ru ha dag
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]ma yin ba las so/ /hI ya ste byings o hA ka dang ru ha dag dang sbyor ba ma yin pa'i byung khungs brjod pa'i lnga pa'i don la'ang ta si 'gyur te/ ngas  grA mA dA ya ti/ grA mA taHA yati/ spyas tsau re b+h+yo baM b+he ti/ ta si  tsau ra taHbi b+he ti/ ta si  tsau ra taHbi b+he te/ hA ka ru ha dag dang sbyor ba la ta si mi 'gyur ba'i dper
[\[185b.2\]]brjod ni/ ngasi sA r+thA ta hi te/ ngasi  parba tA da ba ro ha hi/ a b+hu ta ta b+b+ha be kr-i b+h+wa sti yo ge saM pa d+ya ka r+t+ta ri tswiH/ ma byung ba de byung ba la kr-i b+hU a sti sbyor  brong nas 'ongs so/ /ta saM i brjod don/ ba la phun sum  chom dun rnams [\[]las 'jigs [\]]so/ tshogs pa'i byed pa la tswi'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i byed pa
[\[185b.3\]]brjod pa can dus dang 'brel  de don la 'phags/ de las 'thab/ pa ma byung ba de byung bar byed pa'i don la kr-i dang b+hU dang a sti rnams dang sbyor ba la tsI 'gyur te/ a s+ya tswau/ a'i tswi la'o/ /rtags mtha'i a yig mtha' can ni rkyen tswi pha rol la I ru 'gyur te/ be rlo paH/ bi'i dbyi'o/ /rkyen tsi'i
[\[185b.4\]]rkyen gyi ngang po'i tsu Tu zhes pas tsa phyis pa'i rjes pi yang dbyi ste/ a kr-iSh+NaHkr-i Sh+NaH/ saM pa d+ya te ga ro ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ kr-iSh+NI  ka ro ti/ dkar po min pa dkar po byed/ a bra h+ma bra h+d+ma saM pa d+ya te b+ha ba ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ tsi  bra h+mA b+ha ba ti/ tshig sbyor de dang 'dra bar byas pas/ ma tri ka ro ti/
[\[185b.5\]]a gad+gA ga d+gA saM pa d+ya te s+ya/ zhes pa'i don la/ gad+gI ka ro ti/ nag po man pa nag po/ phun sum tshogs par byed/ kr-i D+NA la tsI tsa phyis baM dbyi'o sa'i phyis a'i tsI la 'os a I/ a gAH gA rgyaHsaM bad+ya ka ro ti/ tshangs pa min pa tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa byung / zhes pa'i don la/ gA rgya la tswi/ ka ro ti/ tshangs pa byung / kya tswau tsa/ ma tri la tswir te khyi rI 'os r-i dI nI phyis/ mar byed/
[\[185b.6\]]gang snga ma yin pa gang gA phun sum tshogs par gyur/ gad+gAr gyur/ kya tswi la 'ang ngo / /rkyen kya dang tswi pha rol la/[ \[]drang [\]]srong gargA'i bu ma yin pa gargA'i bur byed do/ /rtags byings kyi mtha'i hal dang brtsegs pa'i ya yig ni dbyi ste/ gA rgI ka ro ti/ tswau tsa/ tswi la 'ang ngo / /tswi pha rol la rtags mtha'
[\[185b.7\]]ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na ring por 'gyur te/ shu tsi la tsi/ shu tsI b+ha ba ti/ gtsang ma byung / gtsang ma byung / baTu la tsI/ ba TU s+yA ta/ mkhas par 'gyur/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ a bya ya s+ye twa dI r+g+hau ne ti ke tsi ta/ mi zad gargA'i bur bya'o/ pa'i i ring po dag la lar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi zad pa'i sde
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]yin na tswi pha rol la a Ir 'gyur ba dang i ka ring por 'gyur ba sogs la lar mi byed de/ tswi  di bA s+yA t+ya/ tswi  swa sti s+yA ta/ a ru t+ma na sh+tsa k+tsa sh+tse to ra hor dza swaM lo pa sh+tsa/ a rus  ma nas  tsa k+Shus  tse tas  ra has ra dzas rnams kyi dbyi'o/ /a rus
[\[186a.2\]]sogs 'di rnams kyi mtha'i sa yig rnams tswi pha rol la dbyi ste/ a rU ka ro ti/ rma byung ngo / a rU b+ha ba ti/ rma byed do/ /nyid mor gyur/ bde legs su gyur cig /a rU s+ha ta/ rmar gyur/ de bzhin du/ u n+ma nI/ u ts+tsa k+ShU/ bi tsi tI/ ba ra hI/ mi ra dzI/ sogs te rnams la a ka
[\[186a.3\]]ro ti dang b+ha ba ti dang s+yAta sbyor ba sogs rigs 'gre'o/ /bi b+hA ShA sA ti kA [\[]k+Sh+s+wa/[\] ]tswis phyis ika ring po/ tswis phyis ika ring po/ rdzogs pa la sA ti yang na'o/ /rdzogs tswis phyis ika ring po/ ba'i don dang 'brel ba'i [\[]skyo ba/[\] ]gyan mig/ sems log /chags 'dod/ rdu ba med/ tswi'i yul la sA ti yang na 'gyur ro/ /
[\[186a.4\]]sA t+ba  dA d+yoH/ sA ta dang tshig gi dang po dag gi'o/ /sa Shar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yi ge sngon na yod kyang tshig kho rang gi cha shas ma yin pa'i tshig gzhan gyi thog ma'i sa yig dang rkyen sA ti sa ni Shar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshig gzhan gyi thog ma la mi 'gyur ba'i dper brjod ni/ da d+hi sany+tsa twi/
[\[186a.5\]]kr-i t+k+naM sha s+t+raM a g+niHsaM ba t+ya te ka ro ta/ zhes pa'i don la/ ag+ni sA taM ka ro ti/ yang na/ ag+ni ka ro ti/ a b+hi bi d+hau saM pa dA tsa/ mngon par khyab pa la saM ba da las kyang ngo / /mngon par khyab pa'i don la kr-i dang b+hU dang a sti saM pa da rnams dang sbyor ba las kyang sA ti 'gyur te/ zho ldugs par byed/
[\[186a.6\]]me yi mtshon chas rdzogs par phun sum tshogs par byed/ sA ti  ag+ni sA t+saM pa d+ya ti/ mes rdzogs par byed/ mes rdzogs par byed/ sA ti  ag+ni sA t+ka ro ti/ sA ti  ab+ni sA ta b+ha ba ti/ sA rti  ag+ni sA t+s+ya ta/ ta da d+hi na ba tsa ne/ de'i g.yog 'khor brjod pa la'o/ /de'i g.yog 'khor brjod pa'i don la kraM b+hU a sti saM
[\[186a.7\]]ba da rnams dang sbyor ba la sA ti 'gyur te/ me phun sum tshogs pas khyab par byed/ rA dz+nyaHa d+hi na ka ro ti/ rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor byed/ mes khyab par byed/ mes khyab par byung / mes khyab par gyur/ zhes pa'i don la/ sA ti  rA dza sA t+ka ro ti/ rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor byed/ de bzhin du/ sA ti  rA dza sA ta b+ha ba ti/ rgyal
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]po'i g.yog po byung / sAti  rA dza sA t+s+ya ta/ sA ti  rA t+saM pa d+ya ti/ de yi trA tsa/ sbyin par bya ba la trA yang ngo / /gang gi ched du gang sbyin par bya ba de'i dbang po mngon par brjod pa'i don la kr-i b+hU a sti saM pa da rnams sbyor ba la trA 'gyur zhing 'ang gi sgras sA ti'ang 'gyur te/ bi brA d+hi nAM de ka ro ti/
