[\[186b.2\]]zhes pa'i don la/ rgyal po'i g.yog por gyur/ rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs par byed/ trA  bi pra trA ka ro ti/ sA ti  pi pra sA t+ka ro ti/ de bzhin du/ trA  bi pra trA b+ha ba ti/ sA ti  bi bra sA ta b+ha ba ti/ trA  bi bra sA ta b+ha ba ti/ trA  bi bra trA s+yA ta/ sA ti  bi pra sA t+s+ya ta/ bi pra trA saM pa bya ti/ bi bra trA saM pa bya ti/ bi bra  bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa byed/
[\[186b.3\]]sA t+saM pa d+ya ti/ de ba ma nu bya pu ru Sha pu ru ma r+t+ye b+h+yo dwi tI yA sa b+ha myo rba hu laM/ de ba ma nu Sh+ya  bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa byed/ pu ru Sha pu ru ma r+t+ya rnams las  bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa byung / bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa gyur/ bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa gyur/ bram ze las rag las par sbyin pa phun sum tshogs/ gnyis pa dang
[\[186b.4\]]bdun pa dag la mang po'o/ /de ba la sogs pa 'di rnams las rnams dbye gnyis pa dang bdun pa'i don la mang po la ste/ kr-i b+hA a sti saM da rnams dang de rnams ma yin pa gzhan dang sbyor ba las kyang trA 'gyur te/ de bA na gats+tsha ti/ de ba trA gats+tsha ti/ de be Shu gats+tsha ti/ de ba trA gats+tsha ti/
[\[186b.5\]]de bzhin du/ ma nu Sh+ya trA/ bu ru Sha trA/ pu ru trA/ ma r+t+ya trA/ a bya k+tA nu ka ra NAd ne kA tso/ ni tau nar+t+ra tsa/ mi gsal ba rjes su byed pa las atsa gcig ma yin pa las i ti ma yin pa la DA tsa 'o/ sgra mi gsal ba rjes su byed  lha rnams la 'gro/ pa'i rtags a tsa gcig  lha rnams la 'gro/ /ma
[\[186b.6\]]yin pa las kr-i b+hU/ mi rnams la/ skyes pa rnams la/ rnying ba rnams la/ a sti rnams sbyor ba las i ti ma yin pa la DA tsa 'gyur te/ ba Tata ba Tata/ TA tsa/ tsa dbyangs 'gog pa'i don Di ta la Ti phyis/ pa Tata pa TA/ zhes pa la/ ta s+ya pa ra mA mrai Di taM/ des zlos pa la pha rol
[\[186b.7\]]lo/ /pa Tata pa Tata zhes pa lta bu rtags gcig lan gnyis sogs ldabs nas bzhag pa na rtags snga ma de'i mtha' yang pha rol de'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /ni t+yaM A mre De ti DA tsi/ zlos pa la rtag tu DA tsa la'o/ /bshad ma thag pa ltar rtags gcig lan gnyis ldabs pa na DA tsa
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]pha rol la rtag tu pha rol gyi gzugs su 'gyur te ta srog med dang pha rol gyi ba 'dres pa ba gcig tu song / baT pa TA ka ro ti/ a tsa gcig ma yin pa zhes pas rnam pa cad kyi shra t+ka ti/ i ti ma yin pa zhes pas/ ba Titi ka ro ti/ snam bu 'di byed/
[\[187a.2\]]kr-i nyo dwi tI ya tri tI ya sham+bA bI dzA [\[]t+ki [\]]Shau/ kr-i nya yi dI tI ya tr-i tI ya  sha sba bI dza las rko ba la'o/ /kr-inya yi sbyor ba la dI tI ya la sogs sman bur byed/ ba 'di rnams las rko ba ste zhing rmod pa'i don la DA tsa/ dad pa bya/ baTata la i ti mi shes pa rjes su bya ba'i ata i ru song / 'gyur
[\[187a.3\]]te/ DA tsa  dwi tI yaM ka r+Sha NaM ka ro ti/ zhes pa'i don la/[ \[]DA tsa [\] ]dwi tI yA ka ro ti/ de bzhin du/ DA tsa  tr-i tAM yA/ gsum rmod par byed/ shasmA/ DA tsa  bI dzA  son rmo bar byed/ saM khyA yA sh+tsa gu NA n+tA yAH/ grangs las kyang guN mtha' las so/ /grangs kyi sgra dang po can guN mthar yod pa
[\[187a.4\]]gnyis rgo bar byed dam rmod par byed/ las kyang kr-inya dang sbyor ba  gnyis rmod par byed/ sngon la gzhung la lan cig rmos nas slar 'gred la rmo ba'i don/ sngon las bon btab nas slar rmo pa'i don/ las zhing rmod pa'i don la DA tsa 'gyur te/ dwi gu NaM kar+Sha NaM ka ro ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ DA tsa  dI gu NA ka ro ti/ sa ma yA ts+tsa
[\[187a.5\]]yA pa nA yAM/ sa ma ya las kyang thob par byed pa la'o/ /sa ma ya las kyang thob par byed pa'i don la kr-inya sbyor ba laDA tsa 'gyur te/ sa ma yaM yA pa nA ka ro ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ nyes 'gyur rmod par byed/ DA tsa  sa ma yA ka ro ti/ nyis  'gyur rmod par byed/ sa pa tra ni Sh+pa
[\[187a.6\]]trA ti bya tha ne/ sa pa tra ni Sh+pa tra las shin tu 'khrugs pa la'o/ /sa pa tra dang ni Sh+pa tra dag las shin tu 'khrugs pa'i don la kr-inya sbyor ba la  dus su thob par byed/ DA tsa 'gyur te/ sa pa traM dza raM mr-i ga kA ye bra be sha ya ti/ zhes  dus su thob par byad/ pa'i don la/ DA tsa sa ba trA ka ro ti mr-i
[\[187a.7\]]gaM/ de bzhin du/ mda' sbro pha rol tu ma song ba go chas/ ni Sh+pa traM sha raM ma pa raM ni rga ma ya ti ka ba tse na/ zhes pa'i don la/ DA tsa  niSh+pa trA ka ro ti ka ba tse na/ sgro mi 'gro bar byed go chas/ sbo dang bcas pa'i mdas ri dgas kyi lus 'begs par byed/ niSh+ku lA n+ni ko Sha Ne/ niSh+ku  sgro dang bcas 'begs par byed ri dgas/ la
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]las shubs med pa la'o/ /ni Sh+ku la las bar du gnas pa'i shubs med pa'i don la kr-inya sbyor ba laDA tsa 'gyur te/ ni ShA sha ya ti dA Di maM/ zhes pa'i don la/ ni Sh+ku lA ka ro ti dA Di maM/ su kha bri yA dA nu lo mye/ su kha bri ya las rjes su mthun pa la'o/ /su kha dang bri ya dag las rjes su
[\[187b.2\]]mthun pa brjod pa las kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/ DA tsa  su khA ka ro ti/ DA tsa  pri yA ka ro ti/ duH khA t+b+ra ti lo mye/ shubs med par byed se 'bru/ duHkha las rjes su  shubs med par byed se 'thu/ mi mthun pa la'o/ /duHkha las rjes su mi mthun pa brjod pa las kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/
[\[187b.3\]]DA tsa  duHkhA ka ro ti/ shu lA t+bA ke/ shUl las tshos  bde ba rjes gu mthun par byed/ dka' ba rjes su mthun par byed/ /ba la'o/ /shU la las tshos pa brjod pa la kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/ shU len pa tsa ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ shU lA ka ro ti/ sa t+yA da sha pa the/ sa t+ya las mna' ma
[\[187b.4\]]rjes su mi mthun pa dang sdug bsngal bar byed/ yin pa la'o/ /sa t+ya las mna' ma yin pa gzhan la kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/ sa t+ye na kre ta byaM/ zhes pa'i don la/ DA tsa  ba t+yA ka ro ti/ ma drA t+ba  lcags 'ding gis tshod par byed/ ri bA ba Ni/ ma drag lcags 'ding gis tshod par byed/ las skra 'dreg pa la'o/ /ma hra
[\[187b.5\]]las skra 'dregs pa brjod pa la kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/ ma traM pa ri bA pa naM ka ro ti/ zhes pa'i don la/ DA tsa  ma trA ka ro ti/ b+ha drA ts+tsa/ bden pas tshong byed/ b+ha da las kyang ngo / /bden pas tshong byed/ b+ha dra las kyang skra 'dreg pa brjod pa las kr-inya sbyor ba la DA tsa 'gyur te/ b+ha drA ka ro ti/ rkyen tsi ba ti DA tsa rnams
[\[187b.6\]]kyi mtha' can kyang mi zad pa'o/ /a ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na sgra bregs nas bzang bor byed de chos byed pa'i don no/ /s+ya sU trA t+ta t+t+hi ta pra t+yA  bzang por byed/ yA sA mA p+taH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las de phan gyi rkyen rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams  bzang por byed/ kyis brda sprod pa'i
[\[187b.7\]]bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ de pan gyi rkyen ngos gzung 'jug yul dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni 'phrod don
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]thor bu cung zad 'chad bar bya ste/ ni t+ya bi p+sa yoH/ khyab par 'dod pa las rtag tu'o/ /khyab par 'dod pa la 'jug pa na brjod pa'i tshig gang yin ba de gzugs gnyis su rtag tu 'gyur te/ ba tsa ti pa tsa ti b+hu k+tAM/ u ts+tsai su ts+tsai stiSh+Tha ti/ br-i k+ShaM br-i k+ShaM sa ny+tsa ti/ grA mo grA
[\[188a.2\]]mor ma NI yaH/ ba re rba rdza ne/ ba ri'i sbangs pa la'o/ /spangs pa la zhugs pa'i tshig dang sbyor ba las ba ri'i sgra gnyis su 'gyur te/ pa ri pa ri paM ge b+h+yoHbr-iSh+To de baH/ u bar+Ya d+t+ya d+ha saHsA mI bye/ u ba ri  tshod cing chod nas bza'/ mtho bar mtho bar gnas/ shing dang shing la thor/ grong dang grong la rtse/
[\[188a.3\]]a d+gi  a d+has rnams kyi nye ba la'o/ /u ba ri la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi grong dang dus dag las nye ba la 'jug pa la gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/ nam mkha' ma yin pa rnams las lha char bab/ u pa ri u pa ri grA ma/ a d+hi a r+hi su khaM/ ad+honya d+ho barba taM/ bA kyA de rA maM tri ta s+yA sU yA
[\[188a.4\]]saM ma ti ko pa kut+sa na b+ha r+t+sa na Shu/ khro ba dang smad pa dang mi sdug pa rnams la go bar mi bzod pa dang yang dag par 'dod pa dag la bos nas brjod pa tshig dang po'o/ /khro ba dang smad pa dang mi sdug pa steng dang steng du grong / lhag par lhag par bde ba/ 'og nas 'og tu ri bo/ brjod pa na lan gnyis sogs
[\[188a.5\]]ma brjod na go bar mi bzod pa ste go mi nus pa dang yang dag par 'dod pa dag la kun du bos nas brjod pa'i tshig dang po de gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/ he sun+da ra ha sun+da ra te pr-i thA saun+da r+YaM/ zhes pa ngan tshig dang / he de pa he de ba twAM ba n+dA+o si/ zhes pa yang dag par 'dod pa dang /
[\[188a.6\]]du rbi nI ta du rbi nI te/ dA nAM dz+nya bi/ zhes pa khro ba dang / he d+hU nuSh+ga he d+hU nuSh+ka bya r+thaM te d+ha nuH/ zhes pa'ang smad ba dang / he tsau ra he tso ra b+hA/ ta yi Sh+ya mi twAM/ kye mdzes ba kye mdzes ba khyod kyi mdzes pas ci byed/ zhes pa mi sdug pa  kye lta kye lta khyed la phyag 'tshal ba stod do/ /rnams so/ /e kaM pa hu brI hi ba ta/
[\[188a.7\]]lugs ngan ba lugs ngan pa/ de ni shas zin 'dug /kye gzhu 'dzin pa kye gzhu 'dzin pa khyed kyi gzhus don med/ e ka 'bru mang po 'dra'o/ /kye chom rkun kye chom rkun khyod song zhig /khyab par 'dod pa la e ka gnyis su gyur ba ni 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba dang 'dra ba ste e ka snga ma'i rnam dbye dbyi'o/ /e kai kaM k+Sha
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]raM/ A bA d+he tsa/ kun du gnod pa la'ang ngo / /kun du gnod pa ste sems kyi dgra bor gyur ba'i gnod pa dang sbyor ba la gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/ ga ta ga taH/ pra kA re gu Na ba tsa na s+ya/ rnam pa la yon tan gyi'o/ /rnam pa rtogs par byed pa la yon tan gyi
[\[188b.2\]]yi ge re re 'am gcig gcig/ gzugs gnyis su 'gyur te/ paTu paTuH/ mU le mU le s+thU la/ 'grel bar lung drangs ba/ kri mA sa ma b+hi ha re tsa/ bya ba yang dag par  song song / mngon par 'phrog pa la'o/ /bya ba'i tshig yang dag par mngon par 'phrog pa brjod pa la gzugs
[\[188b.3\]]gnyis su 'gyur te/ lu nI di lu nI hi/ yang 'grel  mkhas pa mkhas pa/ rtsa ba rtsa ba sdom po/ bar lung drangs ba/ karma bya ti hA res rba nam+no dwe staH/ las phan tshun byed pa las rba nA ma rnams kyi gnyis so/ /las phan tshun byed pa rtogs bar byed pa las rba nA ma rnams kyi gzugs gnyis
[\[188b.4\]]su 'gyur te/ samA  gcod par byed gcod par byed/ sa bats+tsa ba hu laM/ tshig sdud ltar mang po la'o/ /gzugs gnyis su brjod pa can mang po tshig sdud ltar snga ma'i rnam dbye dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba dang mo rkyen rnams thung ngur 'gyur ba sogs kyang bya'o/ /su  a n+yonya n+yaM bi pA na man+ti/
[\[188b.5\]]su  a n+yonya n+ye b+ha dza yan+ti/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ i ta ra shab+da s+ya ni t+yaM sa mA ba ta/ i ta ra'i sgra ni rtag tu tshig sdud bzhin no/ /i ta ra'i sgra ni gzugs gnyis su byas pa na rtag tu tshig sdud bzhin bya ste/ i ta re ta raM/ yang 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ bram ze phan tshun phyag byed
[\[188b.6\]]phan tshun za bar byed/ s+t+rIn buMs ka yo ru pa da s+ya bA A ma b+hA bo bA ts+yaH/ bud med dang ma ning dag las tshig phyi ma yang na A ma gyi dngos por brjod do/ /skyes pa'i rtags ma yin pa'i bud med dang ma ning gi rtags  gzhan dang gzhan/ pha rol la tshig snga ma gzugs gnyis su gyur ba de'i phyi
[\[188b.7\]]ma'i mja' Am du yang na 'gyur te/ a n+yonya n+yAM s+t+rI/ bud med phan tshun/ bar sba rI na buM sa kaM/ pha rol pha rol na ma ning / a n+yonya n+yA mi me prA h+ma Nau b+ho dza ya taH/ bram ze mo 'di dag phan tshun za bar byed/ yang na/ pham tshun nam gzhan dang gzhan/ a n+yonya n+yaM/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA b+h+wo
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]ru k+tA s+sa mA b+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las gnyis su brjod pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad
[\[189a.2\]]nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ 'phros don tshig gnyis su brjod pa bshad pa'i sde tshan rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //!bla ma dang dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar rtags drug tshig tu bsgrub pa/ mi zad pa'i sde
[\[189a.3\]]rags rim du bstan pa/ bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen/ byed pa can gyi le'u/ tshig sdud bzhi/ de phan gyi rkyen/ zhar byung 'phros don dang bcas pa de rnams kyi su ba kyi bya ba mtha' dag bshad zin nas/ da ni rnam dbye sde tshan gnyis pa byings las tshig tu bsgrub pa ting gi bya ba
[\[189a.4\]]rnam pa bshad par bya ste/ de yang 'grel ba'i thog mar ji skad du/ br-i kra tiHsA dza la t+yA d+yA ya yA d+hA twA di rU ba yA/ bya dz+yaM te sha b+da rU pA Ni pa ra ba t+ya ya saM ni d+heH de bod skad du/ dang po rang bzhin rgyal po de'i/ /gang gi byings la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /gsal bar byed pa sgra yi
[\[189a.5\]]gzugs/ /pha rol rkyen dang sbyor ba'o/ /zhes pa byung ste/ dang por rang bzhin gyi rgyal ba sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyi thugs rje dang smon lam gyi mthu las/ gang brjod par bya ba'i gzhi byings la sogs pa rnams la sgra de gsal bar bya ba'i brjod bya'i don ston pa'i gzugs
[\[189a.6\]]su bsgrub ba'i phyir/ pha rol gyi rkyen dang sbyor ba'i tshig la sogs pa byung ba'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /d+hA toHbyings las so/ /byings tshu rol tu yod pa las byings de tshig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu laT la sogs pa'i rnam dbye rnams 'jug go zhes rnam dbyi ti sogs kyi 'jug yul
[\[189a.7\]]bstan pa'o/ /laT la sogs pa ci zhe na/ laT/ liT/ luT/ l+r-iT/ loT/ lang / ling  lung / smon pa'i ling / l+r-ing rnams so/ /de rnams kyi laT nas loTa'i bar lngaT 'gro ba'i ming can dang / lang nas l+r-ing gi bar lnga po rnams pa 'gro ba'i ming can no/ /
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]brta mA ne laT/ da ltar ba la laT 'o/ /la yig bcu po de rnams kyi nang nas da ltar ba'i bya ba'i don la byings las laT 'gyur ro/ /aTA bi tau/ aT dag 'gro ba'o/ /laTa'i Ta yig dang la'i srog gi a yig dag 'gro ba'i ming can te dbyi'o/ /ti b+ta stI si p+tha s+tha mi b+ba sma stA tAM dz+ha lngA sA
[\[189b.2\]]thAM d+h+wa miT ba hi ma hing / ti ba  tas  dz+hi  sib  thas  tha  mib  bas  mas  ta  A  tAM  dz+haM thAs  A thAM  d+h+waM  aTi  bahi  ma hing ngo / /laTa'i Ta dang a phyis pa lta bu la yig bcu po de rnams kyi rjes 'brel rnams phyis thas la yig srog med rnams ni ti pa la sogs pa bco brgyad po
[\[189b.3\]]'di rnams su 'gyur ro/ /laHba ra smai pa daM/ la rnams pa ra smai ba da'o/ /la yig 'gyur ba'i ti ba la sogs pa dang po dgu po rnams par smai pa da ste gzhan gyi ched du bya ba'i tshig ces bya'o/ /ta dA nA bA t+ma ne ba daM/ ta da A na dag A t+ma ne ba da'o/ /tang zhes pa la srog med kyi 'gyur ba
[\[189b.4\]]ta nas da'i nar dgu po rnams dang A na zhes pa kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen shA na tsa dang kA na tsa dag A t+ma ne pa da ste bdag gi ched du bya ba'i tshig ces bya'o/ /sheShA t+ga rta re ba ra smai ba daM/ lhag ma byed pa la ba ra smai ba da'o/ /bdag gi ched du bya ba'i tshig rnams ma yin pa'i lhag ma ste ti pa la
[\[189b.5\]]sogs pa dgu po rnams par smai pa da zhes bya ste byed po gzhan gyi ched du bya ba'i tshig go/ /a nu dA t+ta di A t+ma ne ba daM/ a nu dU t+ta dang di ta dag gi At+ma ne ba da'o/ /byings gang la'ang a nu dA t+ta ste atsa skad gdangs dma' bar 'gro ba rnams dang nga ti steng 'gro ba rnams At+ma ne ba da ste
[\[189b.6\]]bdag gi ched du bya ba'i tshig gi rnam dbye rnams 'jug ste bdag don gyi byings zhes bya ba'o/ /swa ri ta nyi ts+tsa u b+he/ swa ri ta dang nyita kyi gnyis ka'o/ /byings gang la swa ri ta ste sgra skad gsang 'bring po rnams 'gro ba dang nyita ste nya yig 'gro ba rnams ni bdag don dang gzhan don gnyis ka la 'jug
[\[189b.7\]]pas gnyis ka'i byings zhes so/ /she She bar smai ba daM/ lhag ma bar smai ba da'o/ /gong du bshad pa'i a nu dA t+ta dang / nga 'gro ba dang / swa ri ta dang / nya 'gro pa rnams ma yin pa ste de rnams bor ba'i lhag ma rnams ni gzhan don gyi byings zhes bya'o/ /ting s+t+rI Ni tri Ni pra tha mam D+b+ya mo t+ta mA/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]ting gi gsum gsum rnams dang po dpus ma phyi ma rnams so/ /ting zhes pa so sor bsdu ba ste ti nas nga'i bar yin la/ de rnams bco brgyad po las A t+ma ne pa da dgu dang / ba ra smai pa da dgu las gsum gsum du gnas pa la snga ma gsum skyes bu dang po
[\[190a.2\]]dang dbus ma gsum skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma gsum skyes bu phyi ma'o/ /tA n+ye ka ba tsan dwi ba tsan ba hu ba tsa nA n+ye ka shaH/ de rnams re la gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig rnams so/ /tib la sogs pa gsum gsum du bcad pa de rnams re re la 'ang gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig
[\[190a.3\]]rnams su yod do/ /shi She pra maH/ lhag ma la dang po'o/ /tib la sogs pa rnams kyi skyes bu dang po dbus ma phyi ma gsum las nye ba'i tshig ste dang por bzhag pa'i tshig de yu smad dang a smad gnyis ma yin pa ste/ spangs pa'i lhag ma tshig gang dang sbyor yang skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[190a.4\]]po 'jug go zhes pa spyir btang ba'o/ /yuSh+ma d+yu pa des mA d+hi ka ra Ne s+thA ni n+ya pi ma d+h+ya maH yuSh+mad nye ba'i tshig mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa gnas pa las kyang dbus ma'o/ /yu Sh+mad nye ba'i tshig tu gnas pa las mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa ste de dang sbyor ba'i byings de la skyes bu dbus ma
[\[190a.5\]]gsum po 'jug go/ /a sma d+yu t+ta ma/ asmad la phyi ma'o/ /nye ba'i tshig asmad yin na de dang sbyor ba'i byings de la skyes bu phyi ma rnams 'jug go/ /de ltar 'jug yul bshad nas da ni de rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la da ltar ba la
[\[190a.6\]]'aTa'o zhes pas laT/ ting shi t+sA rba d+hA tu kaM/ ting gi sha 'gro ba byings thams cad pa'o/ /ti sogs kyi bar rkyen sha 'gro ba 'jug pa de la byings thams cad pa'i rnam dbye zhes brda chad byed do/ /[\[]karta[\]] ri shab/ byed pa po la sha ba'o/ /byings thams cad pa zhes brda chad byas pa'i
[\[190a.7\]]rnam dbye rnams pha rol la byings las byed pa po la shapa 'gyur te/ shapa byin/ laTa'i/ aT 'gro ba yin pas phyis la tib tu bsgyur/ mtha'i ha la'o zhes pas ba phyis/ sha yig dang ba yig dag 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ b+hU a ti/ sA rba b+ha tu kA r+d+hA d+hA tu ka yoH/ byings
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag las so/ byings thams cad pa'i ming can gyi rkyen rnams dang / 'og nas 'byung ba'i byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la rnam dbye de rnams yul gyi byings de'i mtha' i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na yonatan du 'gyur te/ yod  b+ha ba
[\[190b.2\]]ti/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig go/ /gnyis tshig la/ dag yod/ b+ha ba taH/ mang tshig la la dz+hi ru bsgyur/ b+hU/ a dz+hi/ t+tonya n+taH/ dz+ta'i an+ta'o/ /ti sogs kyi rnam dbye'i dang po'i dz+ha yig srog med ni an+ta zhes par 'gyur te/ b+ha ban+ti/ rnams yod/ skyes bu dbus ma rnams la'ang /
[\[190b.3\]]gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ b+ha ba si/ yod/ dag yod/ b+ha ba thaH/ rnams yod/ b+ha [\[]rnU[\]] la Na laT la ta su sha ba yon tan sa rur rnam bcad/ pa tha/ skyes bu phyi ma rnams kyang / b+hU/ b+ha bar 'gyur ba'i bar snga ma rnams dang  b+hu la/ laT la dz+hi dz+ha las i phyung / dz+ha a n+t+ra drangs yon tan e tsa'i a ya a ba sogs a'i yon tan nog gnyis dag gi snga ma'i gzugs su song /
[\[190b.4\]]'dra/ b+ha ba/ mi ba/[ \[]b+hUl[\]]/ laT/ shab yon tan la sib/ thas ba rnams su 'gyur ro/ /a to dA r+g+ho ya nyi/ yanya la ata kyi ring po'o/ /rkyen dang rnam dbye byings thams cad pa'i ming can yanya so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la mtha'i a yig ni ring por 'gyur te/ b+ha bA mi/ yod/ gnyis tshig dang
[\[190b.5\]]mang tshig la'ang de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ b+ha bA baH/ dag yod/ b+ha bA maH/ rnams yod/ de rnams tshig grogs dang sbyar ba ni/ su/ saHb+ha ba ti/ au/ tau b+ha ba taH/ dzas/ te b+ha ba n+ti/ skyes bu dang po dang / su/ twaM b+ha ba si/ b+hUl/ 'aT shab la mib pa 'gro ba yon tan sogs kyis b+ha ba mdo 'dis ring po/
[\[190b.6\]]b+hUl/ laT shas la ba sa dang mas su 'gyur yon tan sogs mdo 'dis ring po/ au yu bAM b+ha ba thaH/ dzas/ yU yaM b+ha ba tha/ skyes dbus ma dang / su a  de yod/ haM b+ha bA mi/ de dag yod/ de rnams yod/ au/ A bA b+ha bA baH/ dzas/ ba yaM b+ha  khyod yod/ bA ma/ de rnams skyes bu phyi ma rnams te/ gzhan gyi ched kyi tshig
[\[190b.7\]]rnams so/ /'grel par drangs pa/ b+hU prAb+tA bAt+ma ne pa di/ khyed dag yod/ khyod rnams yod/ b+hU thob pa la A t+ma ne pa da'o/ /byings b+hU thob  bdag yod/ ba la'ang 'jug ste de'i tshe rnam dbye  bdag dag yod/ bdag rnams yod/ A t+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ b+hU la/ laT/ la ta ra 'gyur/ sha pa/
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]b+ha pa ta/ Ti taHa+wat+ma ne pa dA nI Ti ri/ Ta 'gro ba'i At+ma ne pa da rnams kyi Ti'i e'o/ /laT la sogs pa Ta 'gro ba A t+ma ne pa da rnams kyi mtha'i Ti ni e yig tu 'gyur te/ b+ha ba te/ gnyis tshig la/ b+hU la/ laT sha pa la A tAM du 'gyur/ Ti e/ b+ha ba/ A te/
[\[191a.2\]]sA rba d+hA tu ka ma pata/ byings thams cad pa pa 'gro ba ma yin pa'o/ /byings thams cad pa'i ming can rnams kyi nang nas pa yig 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa ste bor ba'i rnam dbye gzhan rnams la dgos [ \[]thog [\] ]pa'i dbang gis nga 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/ /A to ngi taH/ nga 'gro ba'i
[\[191a.3\]]Ata kyi'o/ /tshu rol b+ha ba lta bu a yig mtha' can gyi pha rol gyi rnam dbye nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams kyi dang po'i yi ge de A yig yin na a yig de i ya zhes par 'gyur ro/ /dag thog b+ha be te/ mang tshig la yang a i yang mi 'gyur gzhan ma gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/ b+h+ra
[\[191a.4\]]ban+te/ rnams thong / de rnams A t+ma ne pa da'i bu dang po rnams so/ /skyes bu dbus ma rnams la/ b+hU la/ laT sha pa la thAs su 'gyur/ b+ha ba  thAs  thA saHseH b+hUl/ laT/ sha ba rjes 'brel phyis nas la A tAM du 'gyur/ Ta 'gro ba'i shes pas Ti e nga 'bro atA kyi 'os A i la/[ \[]bra ya? dag gi ba la la dbye 'os ya phyis yon tan/ b+hUl/
[\[191a.5\]]baT sha pa la dz+ta 'gyur/ dz+ha bas a [\[]gyung dz+ha an+tar 'gyur/[\] ]Ta 'gro legs pa la Ti ata kyi yon tan nos gnyis dag gi snga ma'i gzugs/ thAs kyi se'o/ /ta 'gro ba'i la yig 'gyur ba'i thAs ni se zhes par 'gyur te/ b+hUl/ laT sha ba la thAs su 'gyur thAs kyi se'i thAs se/ b+ha ba se/ thob pa/ gnyis tshig la/ b+ha be the/ thob pa dag
[\[191a.6\]]mang tshig la/ thob pa rnams/ b+ha ba d+he/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshigs la/ b+ha be/ thob pa/ gnyis tshig la/ b+ha bA he/ thob pa dag/[ \[]b+hU [\]]ba laT shas la ba hi ra 'gyur ya nya las ata kyi ring po 'os a ring boT 'gro ba sogs kyi saTi a/ b+hU la/ laT sha ba la A thAM du 'gyur Ta 'gro ba'i At+ma ne pa da zhes pas Ti awang 'gro ba'i Ata kyi 'os/ A i ya ba? ya \u0f84dag gi bal pa dbyi 'os phyis yon tan/
[\[191a.7\]]b+hUl/ laT sha ba la d+hAM du 'gyur  Ta 'gro ba'i A rba na bad zhes pas Ti er 'gyur/ b+hUl/ lata sha la la i Tar 'gyur Ta 'gro ba'i ming can/ Ta 'gro ba zhes pas Ti e ata las yon tan nos gnyis dag gi pha rol gyi gzugs/ mang tshig la/ thong pa rnams/ b+ha bA ma he/ b+hUl/ laT sha ba la ma hir du 'gyur nga so sor bsdu ba'i don yanya bas zhes pas ring poT 'gro ba sogs kyis Ti e/ bi d+hi ni maM tra
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]NA ma n+t+ra NA d+hI Sh+Ta saM pra sh+na prA r+tha ne Shu ling / cho ga bsgrub pa  nges par bod pa  kun tu bod pa  gsol ba gdab pa  yang dag par dri ba  don du gnyer ba rnams la ling 'o/ /cho ga bsgrub pa la sogs pa 'di rnams la bya ba'i don la byings la ling 'gyur ro/ /b+hUl/ lang / sha pa da ngi ta kyi don i brjod don/
[\[191b.2\]]tib tas sogs kyis ya tib tu 'gyur/ b+ha ba  tipa  yA suT pa ra smai ba de ShU dA t+to ngi ts+tsa/ pa ra smai ba dal A suT ste ba 'gro ba'i u t+ta 'ang ngo / /ling 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye bar smai bad rnams la A su Ta A ga ma ster zhing yA su Ta de la nga 'gro ba'i u dA t+ta zhas ming 'dogs byed do/ /
[\[191b.3\]]na ngi ts+tsa/ nga 'gro ba'ang ma yin no/ /gong du yA suT de nga 'gro ba'i u dA t+ta'o zhes ming 'dogs byas ba de yA suT rang du gnas na nga 'gro ba'i ming can yin la yA suT de i ya? lta bu gzugs gzhan du 'gyur na de ni nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin no/ /b+ha ba  ti ba la lA suT/ Ta gnas don/ u brjod
[\[191b.4\]]don/ b+ha pa  yAs  ti/ lingaHsa lo ponya n+ta s+ya/ ling gi mtha' ma yin ba'i sa dbyi'o/ /ling gi 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye byings thams cad pa'i ming can rnams kyi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa yig ni dbyi'o/ /b+ha ba yA ti/ i ta sh+tsa/ ita kyi'ang ngo / /nga 'gro ba'i la yig gi 'gyur ba pa da smi pa da
[\[191b.5\]]rnams kyi ita kyang dbyi ste ti'i i phyis/ a to yeyaH ata las yA I ya'o/ /b+ha ba lta bu ata mtha'i pha rol gyi bying thams cad pa'i ming can gyi rnam dbyi rnams kyi thog ma'i yA yig ni i ya zhes par 'gyur te/ ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya yang phyis/ b+ha beta/ gnyis tshig la/ b+hU
[\[191b.6\]]la/ ling  shab/ la tas su 'gyur/ yA suT/ b+hab  yA  t+sa/ ta s+tha s+tha me phAM tAM taM tA maH/ tas  thas  tha  mi pa rnams kyi nyAM taM ta am rnams so/ /ling sogs nga 'gro ba'i ming can bzhi po'i la'i lus 'gyur gyi tas/ thas  tha mi pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du/ tAM taM ta a ma rnams
[\[191b.7\]]su 'gyur te/ tas tAM du 'gyur/ b+ha ba  yA tA/ yA I ya/ b+ha be tAM/ ba ya dag gi zhes pas ya pyis yon tan/ mang tshig la/ b+hU sha pa yA dz+hi/ dz+hi rdzus/ dz+hi'i dzus so/ /ling gi lus 'gyur gyi dz+hi ni dzus zhes par 'gyur te/ b+ha be yuH/ b+hUl/ ling sha pa la dz+hi yA suT Ta gnas don u brjod don ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa phyis/ /
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]ata las yA I ya mdo 'dis dz+ta dzus su 'gyur/ tsu Tu sogs kyi dza phyis/ ya drangs sa ru/ ra rnams tha cad mtshams sbyar/ ling gi skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha beH ling gi skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig la/[ \u0f1c ]mab+ha be taM/ ling gi skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/ b+ha be
[\[192a.2\]]b+hU la/ ling sha ba la seb pa be ta kyi don phA suT/ Ta yum rnams phyis/ A ta la a ya ba dag gi ba la la dbyi'o sa ya phyis/ yon tan ita kyi ngos sa'i sog gi i phyis sa ru u brjod don ra rnam bcad/[ \u0f1c ]b+ha la sha pa ling la zas su 'gyur lA suT suT gnyis phyis ata la A I ya/ ba ya sogs kyis phyis/ mtshams sbyar/ ta ma thal/ tha mi ba rnams kyi zhes pas thas taM ru 'gyur ro/
[\[192a.3\]]ta/ ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha be yaM/ b+hU la sha ba/ ling la mi pa du 'gyur yA suT/ suT phyis/ ata la yA I ya yon tan/ tas thas/ tha m-i pa rnams kyi/ tAM/ taM ta/ am rnams sos mi pa am du 'gyur la drangs/ ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig la/ b+hU  shab  yA  suT  ling la bas su 'gyur/ yA
[\[192a.4\]]b+hU la/ sha ba ling la tha ru 'gyur lA suT/ suT phyis yA I ya/ ba ya sogs kyis ya phyis mtshams sbyar tas thas tha mi pa rnams kyi/ tAM taM ta/ am rnams sos thatar 'gyur/ I ya  ba ya sogs kyis ya phyis/ b+ha be bas/ ni t+yaM ngi taH/ nga 'gro ba'i rtag tu'o/ /ling sogs nga 'gro ba rnams kyi lus 'gyur gyi mtha'i sa yig srog med ni
[\[192a.5\]]rtag tu dbyi ste bas kyis phyis/ b+ha be ba/ ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i mang tshig la/ b+ha be ma/ d+hU la/ sha pa ling la mas su 'gyur/ nga 'gro ba'i rtag tu 'os sa phyis/ yA suT/ suT phyis ata la yA I ya?/ tha? ya? dag gi bal la dbyi 'os la phyis/ mtshams sbyar/ de rnams par smi ba da rnams so/ /b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa la/
[\[192a.6\]]At+ma ne ba da rnams 'jug ste/ de yang b+hU la sha pa byin pas b+ha bar 'gyur ba sogs cho ga lnga ma rnams dang 'dra/ rnam dbye'i lus 'gyur sogs ni skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha ba la  ling la/ ta ru 'gyur/ b+ha ba/ ta/ lingaH sI yuT/ ling gi sI yuTa'o/ /A t+ma ne pa da'i
[\[192a.7\]]ling gi lus 'gyur gyi rnam dbye rnams la sI yuT A ga ma ster te/ b+ha be ta/ b+ha ba la/ ling rjes 'brel phyis/ lata ru 'gyur/ mdo 'dis sI yuT A ga ma Ta gnas don u brjod don/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa dbyi'os sa phyis/ ba ya dag gi ba la dbyi 'os ya phyis mtshams sbyar/ ming gi A t+ma ne'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]tshig la/ b+ha be yA tAM/ b+ha ba la/ ling la? A tA du 'gyur sI yuT/ Ta dang u phyis/ sa yang phyis/ mtshams sbyar ya drangs pa'o/ /ling gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ dz+ha s+ya ran/ dz+ha'i rana'o/ /ling gi lus 'gyur At+ma ne pa da'i dz+ha ni ran du 'gyur te/ b+ha be ran/ b+ha ba la/ ling la dz+ha
[\[192b.2\]]mdo 'dis dz+ha ran du 'gyur sI yuT Ta us rnams phyis ba la dag gi bal la dbyi'os ya phyis mtshams sbyar/ ling gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+ha ba thAH b+ha ba la/ ling la thas su 'gyur sA+e uT A ga maT dang u phyis/ bal la dbyi 'os ya yang phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i nas pas sa yang phyis/ mtshams sbyar/ b+ha be yA thAM/ b+ha ba la/
[\[192b.3\]]ling la A thAM du 'gyur sI yuT/ Ta dang u phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa zhes pas sa phyis mtshams sbyar ya drangs/ b+ha ba d+hAM/ b+ha ba la/ ling la d+hAM du 'gyur sI yuT A ga ma Ta dang u phyis/[ \[]ngal[\]] la dbyi'o sa ya yang phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i zhes pas sa yang phyis/ mtshams sbyar/ ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ i To\u0f85 tra/ i Ta'i
[\[192b.4\]]ata'o/ /ling gi lus 'gyur gyi iT ni iT du 'gyur te ta yig ni ta yi de'i dus kya'o'i don no/ b+ha ba ya/ b+ha ba la/ ling tha iT mdo 'dis iT ata du 'gyur/ sI/ guT/ Ta dang u phyis/ ming gi mtha' ma yin pa'i zhes pas sa phyis/ mtshams sbyar ya drangs/ ling gi skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha be ra
[\[192b.5\]]hi/ b+ha ba la/ ming la/ ba hi ru 'gyur sI suT Ta dang u phyis/ ba la la dbyi'os ya yang phyis/ ming gi mtha' yin bzhes pas sa phyis/ mtshams sbyar/ b+ha be ma hi/ b+ha ba la/ ling lam hing du 'gyur/ nga so sor bsdu ba'i don sI yuT Ta dang u phyis/ bal la dbyi'os ya yang phyis ling gi mtha' min pa'i zhes pas sa phyis/ mtshams sbyar/ de rnams [\[]seng ge [\]]
[\[192b.6\]]'jug yul rnam 'gyur dang bcas pa ste/ ka la pa ras b+ta me zhes zer so/ /loT tsa/ lo Ta'ang ngo / /chog bsgrubs pa nges par bod pa/ kun du bod pa/ gsol ba gdab pa/ yang dag par dri ba/ don du gnyer ba rnams la bya ba 'don la byings la ling 'gyur bar ma zad loTa'ang 'gyur ro/ /
[\[192b.7\]]Asha Shi ling lo Tau/ sman pa la ling loT dag go/ /smon pa'am bkra shis pa la bya ba'i don la'ang byings la loT dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i smon pa'i ling dag 'gyur ro/ /e ruH i'i u'o/ /loT 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye rnams kyi i yig rnams ni u yig tu 'gyur te/ b+hU la byed pa po la sha ba
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]byin pas b+hU b+ha bar 'gyur ba sogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra'o/ /b+hab tu/ b+hab la/ lo Ta Ta Ta 'gro ba o brjod don la tib pa bod kyi don mdo 'dis i u/ tu h+yo stA ta dA shi Sh+ya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ tu hi dag gi shis brjod la tA tang yang na'o/ /loT 'gyur ba'i tu dang hi dag gi cho ga bsgrubs ba sogs ma
[\[193a.2\]]yin pa shis brjod dam smon ba'i don du ster na tA tang du yang na 'gyur [\[]te[\]]/ b+ha ba tA ta/ b+ha ba la/ sman pa la ling loT dag gos loT rjes 'brel phyis nas la tib ba bi ta kyi don i'i u 'as tu/ mdo 'dis tu tA tang dang / nga dita kyi don ta'i a brjod don/ b+ha ba tu/ b+ha ba la loT la tib e mi u 'os tu/ loTa'i pa ra sme ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig
[\[193a.3\]]la/ loT la ra ba ta/ loTa'i lang 'dra ba'o/ /loTa'i bya ba'i skabs 'gar lang dang 'dra bar bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ dper na/ loT 'gyur ba'i tas lta bu tas zas tha mi ba rnams kyi tAM taM ta a ma rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pas/ 'grel bar/ nga 'gro bzhes pa byung bas loT nga 'gro ba ma yin kyang
[\[193a.4\]]mdo 'dis yang dang 'dra'i zhes pas tas tAM du 'gyur ba lta bu'o/ /b+ha ba tAM/ b+ha ba la/ loT la tas su 'gyur/ loTa'i yang 'dra ba'i zhes pas tas tAM pu 'gyur/ loTa'i pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ b+ha ba n+tu/ b+ha ba/ loT la dz+taM ru 'gyur dz+ta las i phyung dz+ta'i an+ta 'os a n+tar 'gyur i'i 'os i ur 'gyur ata kyi yon tan/
[\[193a.5\]]nos gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs su song / an+t+ra u la drangs/ loTa'i par smai pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ser+h+yali ts+tsa/ si'i hi ste pa 'gro ba'ang ma yin no/ /loT 'gyur ba'i si ba ni hi ru 'gyur te/ de yang pa 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin bzhes brda chad byed do/ /a to heH a ta las
[\[193a.6\]]tili'o/ /b+ha ba lta bu a yig las pha rol gyi loT 'gyur ba'i hi yig ni dbyi ste/ b+ha ba/ b+ha ba la/ loT la si ba si'i hi steng 'gro ba 'ang ma yin nos si hi mdo 'dis hi phyis pa'o/ yang na/ b+ha ba tA ta/ b+ha ba la/ loT si ba si'i hi ste ba 'gro ba 'ang ma yin nos se hi tu hi dag gi shis brjod la tA tar yang na 'os/ hi tA tang [\[]du 'gyur 'di tar yon tan 'gog
[\[193a.7\]]pa'i don ta'i a brjod don/ loTa'i ba ra smai da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha ba taM/ b+ha ba la/ loT la thas su 'gyur/ loT li'ang 'dra ba 'os thas taM du 'gyur ba'o/ /b+ha ba ta/ b+ha ba/ loT ba tha ru 'gyur/ loT li a dra ba 'os tha ta ru 'gyur ba'o/ /loT di ba ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ metha niH ma'i ni'o/ /
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]loT 'gyur ba'i mi ste mi pa ni ni zhes par 'gyur ro/ /A Du t+ta ma s+ya bi ts+tsa/ phyi ma'i AT ste pa 'gro ba'ang ngo / /loT 'gyur ba'i skyes bu phyi ma rnams la AT A ga ma sbyin par bya ste/ b+ha bA ni/ b+ha ba la/ loT la mi ba tu 'gyur mi'i ni 'os/ le ni pa 'gyur/ mdo 'dis AT A ga maT gnas don a ka 'dra ba la ring po
[\[193b.2\]]loTa'i ba ra smai ba da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha bA ba/ b+ha ba la/ loT la bas su 'gyur phyi ma'i AT ste tha 'gro ba'ang ngos AT A ga maT gnas don/ a ka 'dra ba la ring po loTa'i lang 'dra ba'os sa phyis/ b+ha bA ma/ te brA b+d+ha toH de rnams byings kyi dang po'o/ /de rnams te nyer bsgyur rnams byings dang
[\[193b.3\]]sbyor ba'i tshe nyer bsgyur de rnams byings kyi dang por 'jog go zhes pa spyir btang ngo / /pra b+ha bA ni/ A ni loTaHloTa'i Ani'o/ /byings kyi dang por pra lta bu nyer bsgyur na yig Nar 'gyur pa'i/ b+ha ba la loT la mas su 'gyur phyi ma AT ste ba 'gro ba'ang [\[]'os [\]]AT ta gnas don a ka 'dra bar ring loTa'i lang 'dra ma 'os sa phyis/
[\[193b.4\]]rgyu mtshan can yod na loTa'i mi pa kyi 'gyur ba ni AT dang bcas pa ste A ni'i na yig rab tu gyur cig /niN yig tu 'gyur te/ pra b+ha bA Ni/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ sra dan+ta raHu ba sarga bta/ srata an+ta ra dag gnyar bsgyur 'dra ba'o/ /srata dang an+tar dag ni nyer bsgyur 'dra'o/ /zhes pas ste
[\[193b.5\]]dgos pa ni byings kyi dang por 'jog pa sogs kyi'o/ /lam yod/ sra d+b+ha bA ni/ gzhan du gyur cig/ an+ta r+b+ha bA Ni/ loTa'i A ni 'os naNar 'gyur ba'o/ /yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ duraHpar s+ya Na twa na ke ci ta/ dur gyi pha rol laN nyid la lar ma yin no/ /nyer bsgyur dur gyi pha rol gyi loTa' A ni ni
[\[193b.6\]]skabs la lar Nar 'gyur ba'am yin te/ dir+b+ha bA ni/ b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa la sha pa byin nas yon tan sogs byas pas b+ha ba zhes bsgrub pa sogs sngar ltar byas nas loTa'i A t+ma ne ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ A me taH eta kyi A ma'o/ /loT 'gyur ba'i rnam
[\[193b.7\]]dbye rnams kyi mtha'i e yig rnams ni A ma ngan bar gyur cig /du 'gyur te/ thob bar shog/ b+ha ba tAM/ b+ha ba la/ loT lata ru 'gyur Ta 'gro bzhes pas ta'i srog a e ru 'gyur/ mdo 'dis e A ma ru 'gyur/ loTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ thob ba dag shog /b+ha pe tAM/ b+ha ba la/ loT la A tAM ba 'gro
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]ba la A ta kyi 'os/ A e la 'di rang 'gro ba ma yin kyang loTa'i [\[]yang 'dra ba 'os/[\] \[]ba la[\]] sogs kyis sa phyis/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis A ma e eta kyi A ma 'os slar A ma du log /b+ha ban+taM/ loTa'i A t+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ sa bA b+hAM bA mau/ sa bdag las ba am dag go/ /loT 'gyur
[\[194a.2\]]ba'i sa yig dang ba yig gi srog gi e yig ni rim pa bzhin pa am dag tu 'gyur te/[ \u0f1c ]b+ha ba swa/ loTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang / b+ha ba ma/ loT la[\[] dz+ha dang dz+ha b+hA thos pas sogs kyis cha la [\]]e e ha kyi A la[\[] 'os [\]]A ma nya gyi yon tan pa 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs su sod/ mang tshig la/
[\[194a.3\]]b+hA ba la/ loT la thAs su 'gyur thAs kyi be 'os thAs se ru 'gyur/ mdo 'dis e ba srog bcas su 'gyur/ sra drangs pa'o/ /thob ba dag shog/ b+ha be thAM/ b+ha ba la/ loT la A b+hAM ru 'gyur A ta gyi ngi ta la'o dang 'o Ta'i 'ang 'drang 'os/ A i ya pa ya sogs kyis ya phyis mtshams sbyar/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis A e ata kyi A ma 'os slar sA ma su log /b+ha ba d+h+waM/ b+ha ba la/ loT la d+hAM du
[\[194a.4\]]'gyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mtha'i Ti es bdag la ba a ma dag gos[\[] slar[\]] yang e am du 'gyur/ loTa'i A t+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ e taHai/ eta kyi ai'o/ /loT 'gyur ba'i skyes bu phyi ma'i rnam dbye rnams kyi e yig rnams ni ai ru 'gyur te/ thab par shog/ /b+ha bi/ b+ha ba la/ loT la iT 'gyur
[\[194a.5\]]phyi ma'i AT ge dis bas AT A ga ma Te gnas don a ka 'dra ba la ring go mdo 'dis e e ru 'gyur tsa'i rel ba/ loTa'i A t+Ya ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ b+ha bA ba hai/ b+ha ba ma hai/ b+ha ba la/ loT la ma hi ru 'gyur phyi ma'i AT ste sogs kyis AT song / aka 'dra ba la ring boT 'gro ba sogs kyis i e e ta kyi ai
[\[194a.6\]\[]o ra [\]]ai ru 'gyur/ de rnams loT ste ka lA pa ra bany+tsa mi zer zhing dbyangs can bya ka ra Na shis brjod kyi rkyen zhes brda chad byed do/ /b+ha ba la/ loT la ba hi ru 'gyur phyi ma'i AT ste zhes pas A TaT sor a ka 'dra ba la ring poT 'gro ba sogs kyis i e eta kyi i 'os ai ru 'gyur/ a na d+ya ta ne yang / de ring mo yin pa la lang ngo /
[\[194a.7\]]de ring ma yin pa ste de ring yod pa ma yin pa 'das nas yun ring lon pa ma yin pa kha sang lta bu byung ba la 'jug pa'i bya ba'i don la byings la lang 'gyur ro/ /b+hU yod pa la byed pa po la sha ba dang yon tan sogs byas pas b+ha ba sgrub tshul gong ma rnams dang 'dra/ b+ha ba la/ lang / nga yig
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]nga 'gro ba la yon tan 'gog pa'i don a brjod do/ /l+ra ti ba/ lung lang l+r-ing k+Shu a Du dat+taH/ lung lang l+r-ing rnams la aT ste u dAt+ta 'ang ngo / /lung dang / lang dang / l+r-ing rnams pha rol la byings la aT A ga ma ster te/ de la u dA t+ta zhes brda chad byed do/ /a b+ha ba ta/ b+ha ba la
[\[194b.2\]]lang / lung lang l+r-ing zhes pas byings la aT Ta gnas don lang gi nga yig nga 'gro ba la yon tan 'gog pa'i don la brjod don/ lnga ti pa nu 'gyur pa yig bi ta kyi don yita kyi'ang ngos i kyis/ lang gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a b+ha ba tAM/ b+ha ba lang la tas/ lung lang l+r-ing zhes pas aT A gas Ta gnas don/ tas thas
[\[194b.3\]]tha mi pa rnams kyi/ tAM taM ta  a ma rnams sos/ tas tAM du gyur/ a b+ha ba na/ b+ha ba la lang / lung lang phr-ing sogs kyi ba byings la aT A ga ma la dz+hi ru 'gyur/ dz+ha las i [\[]sgyur [\]]dz+ha'i an+ta'os b+ha an+ta ita kyi 'ang dos i phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os ta phyis/ a ra kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs su song / lang gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu
[\[194b.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/ a b+ha baH b+ha ba la la bung lang gr-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la? si pa du 'gyur ba'i ta kyi don iha kyi 'ang ngos i phyis sa dzu la sogs kyis sa ru u phyis ra rna bas/ a b+ha ba haM/ b+ha ba la lang lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/ lnga thas su 'gyur tag thas tha mi ba rnams kyi tAM taM ta a ma rnams sos thas taM mu 'gyur/
[\[194b.5\]]a b+ha ba ta/ b+ha ba la/ lang lung lang gr-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga maT gnas don la tha ru 'gyur/ tas thas tha mi ba rnams kyi tAM taM ta a ma rnams sos tha ta ru 'gyur/ lang gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+ha baM/ b+ha ba la lang / lung lang sr-id sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la ming du 'gyur tas thas tha mi pa rnams kyi tAM taM ta
[\[194b.6\]]am rnam la sos mi pa am du 'gyur ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs so/ /a b+ha bA ba/ b+ha ba la lang / lung lang sr-id sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/ la bas su 'gyur/ ata kyi ya ta la ring po 'os ring po/ nga 'gro ba la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/ a b+ha bA ma/ b+ha ba la yang / lung yang lang sogs kyis byings la aT
[\[194b.7\]]A ga ma/ Ta gnas don/ l+ra mas su 'gyur aT kyi lanya la ring po 'os ring po nga 'gro ba la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/ de rnams pa ra smai pa da'o/ /b+hU thob pa la sha pa byin yon tan sogs byas pas b+ha ba sgrub lugs gong dang 'dra/ At+ma ne da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+ha ba ta/ b+ha ba pha lang / lung lang l+r-id sogs
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la ta ru 'gyur/ a b+ha be tAM/ b+ha ba la lang lung lang sr-id sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la A tAM du 'gyur/ nga 'gro ba la A ta kyi 'os A i la/[ \[]ba la dag [\]]gi ba la la dbyi 'os la byis mtshams sbyar/ a b+ha ban+ta/ b+ha ba la lang lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la
[\[195a.2\]]dz+ha ru 'gyur dz+ha las a byung dz+ha'i an+ta 'os dz+ha an+tar [\[]'gyur [\]]ata kyi yon tan la[\[] 'os [\]]gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma rig gzugs su song / lang gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+ha ba thAH b+ha ba la lang / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la thAs su 'gyur sa ju Sha dag gi ru u phyis ra rnam bcad/ a b+ha be thAM/ b+ha ba la/[ \[]lang[\]]/
[\[195a.3\]]lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga maT gnas don/ la A TAM du 'gyur/ nga 'gro ba la Ata kyi 'os A i ya ru 'gyur/ ba la dag gi bal la 'os ya phyis/ mtshams sbyar/ a b+ha ba d+hAM/ b+ha ba la lang lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga maT gnas don la d+hAM du 'gyur/ lang gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+ha be/ a b+ha baH/
[\[195a.4\]\[]lang lung lang l+r-ing[\]] sogs kyis byings la aT A gam Ta gnas don la aT ru 'gyur mtshams su sbyar/ a b+ha bA ba hi/ b+ha ba la lang lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/[ \[]la pa [\]]hi ru 'gyur ata kyi anya la ring bo 'os ring bo/ a b+ha bA ma hi/ b+ha ba la  lang / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lam hing du 'gyur/ nga do dor bsdu ba'i don aha
[\[195a.5\]]kyi ya nya la ring po 'os ring po/ de rnams lang dang byings phrad pa'i cho ga ste 'di dang tsad+n+ra par lang zer la/ ka lA par h+yasta nI zer zhing dbyangs can brda sprod du de ring ma yin pa zhes brda chang byed do/ /lung / lung 'o/ byung ba'am 'das pa la 'jug par byed pa las bya ba'i don la byings la lung 'gyur te/
[\[195a.6\]]de yang 'angs nas dus yun ring lon pa'i bya ba'i don la 'jug pa shas che'o/ /mA ngi lung / mA ngal lung 'o/ /mAng sbyor ba'i byings la 'byung 'gyur gyi don la 'jug pa la'ang lung 'gyur te/ de yang rnam dbye lung rang 'angs pa ston pa'i rkyen yin kyang mAng gis bkag bas ma 'ongs pa ston pa'o/ /
[\[195a.7\]]smo t+ta re lang tsa/ sma phyi ma lang 'ang ngo / /mAng sbyor ba sma phyi ma la byings la 'byung 'gyur gyi don la lang 'gyur zhing 'ang gi sgras lung yang 'gyur ro/ /ts+li lu ngi / lung la ts+li'o/ /lung pha rol la byings la [\[]ts+li [\]]bar rkyen du ster ro/ /ts+liHsitsa/ ts+li'i si tsa'o/ /lung pha rol gyi rkyen c+li ni tsa zhes par
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]'gyur ro/ /gA ti sgrA g+hu pA b+hU b+h+yaH si tsaHpa ra sme pa de Sh+tsa/ gA ti gnas pa g+hu pA b+hU rnams las pa ra smai pa da rnams la si tsa'i 'o/ /gA ti gnas pa ste byings gai sgra la'o/ /pA btung ba/ iN 'gro ba rnams dang byings g+hu'i ming can rnams dang pA skyong ba dang b+hU yod pa rnams las lung gi
[\[195b.2\]]bar sme pa da rnams pha rol la rkyen ts+li 'gyur ba'i si tsa ni 'jig go/ /b+hU su bo sti ngi/ b+hU ShU dag las ting la'o/ /byings b+hU dang ShUnya dag gi pha rol du byung ba'i lung gi par smai pa da'i ti ste ti sogs dgu po la byings thams cad pa zhes ming 'dogs byed de rnam dbye de rnams pha rol la b+hU dang ShUnya dag la
[\[195b.3\]]yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed do/ /a b+hU ta/ b+hU yod pa la/ lung 'os lung byi nang ngi ta kyi don u rigs don lung la [\[]ts+li [\]]'os/ ts+li bar rkyen du byin [\[]tsI'i [\]]si tsa 'os [\[]ts+li'i [\]]si tsa 'os [\[]ts+la si [\]]tsar 'gyur/ gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig /lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la tib [\[]bu [\]]'gyur/ pa yon tan gyi don yin kyang skabs 'dir b+hU ShU dag las yon tan mi byed/
[\[195b.4\]]ita kyi 'ang ngos ti'i srog i gyis/k+ngi ti tsa/ krang 'grau ba la'ang ngo / /byings kyi pha rol tu ka yig 'gro ba dang / nga yig 'gro ba dag pha rol la yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs mi byed do/ /lung gi par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ ab+hUtAM/ b+hU la lung / lung lang grang sogs kyis
[\[195b.5\]]byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/ lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin sli'i si tsa 'os ts+li si tsar gA ti sogs kyis se tsa 'jig /la tas su 'gyur/ tas thas tha ming rnams kyi tAM taM ta a ma rnams sos/ tas tAM du 'gyur/ byings thams cad pa pa 'gro ba ma yin pa'i zhes pas/ 'dir tas nga 'gro ba'i ming can yin la krang 'gro ba la'ang ngos yon tan mi byed/ lung gi
[\[195b.6\]]bar smai ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ b+hu bo bu ka lung li ToH/ lung liT dag las b+hU'i bu ka'o/ /lung liT dag gi 'gyur ba'i rnam dbyi a tsa dang po can rnams pha rol las byings b+hU la bu ka A ga ma ster so/ /a b+hU ba na/ b+hU la/ lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don la
[\[195b.7\]]lung la tsa 'os ts+li byin ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsang 'gyur gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig /la dz+hi dz+ha las i phyung dz+ha an+d+ra i ta kyi 'ang ngos i phyis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os ta phyis/ mdo 'dis bu ga a ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don ba drangs/ lung gi pa ra smi pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ /a b+hUH/ b+hU la/ lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]la aT A ga ma gnas don lung pa ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/ gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig la/ si ba i ta kyi'ang ngos i phyis sa rur rnam bcad [\[]d+hUsbu [\]]dag ces pas yon tan mi byed/ a b+hU taM/ b+hU la lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li si tsa 'os si car 'gyur gtA ti sogs
[\[196a.2\]]kyis si tsa 'jig su 'gyur tas bas tha mi pa rnams kyi tAM taM ta A ma sogs kyis thas taM du 'gyur/ a g+hU ta/ b+hU la lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+le 'os ts+li byin se tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/ gA ti sogs kyis sitsa 'jig la thar 'gyur/ tas thas tha mi pa rnams kyi tAM taM ta aM rnams sos za ta ru 'gyur/ lung gi pa ra smai pa da'i
[\[196a.3\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+hU baM/ b+hU la/ lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la c+le 'os c+le byin si tsa 'os tsar 'gyur/ /gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig la mi pa tu 'gyur/ tas thas tha mi pa rnams kyi hAM taM ta a ma rnams sos mi ba a ma du 'gyur/ /lungayiT dgas las b+hU'i bu ga 'os/ bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod
[\[196a.4\]]don ba drangs/ a b+hU ba/ b+hU la lung / lung lang l+r-ing kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li'i si tsi 'os i tsa ra 'gyur/ gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig /la bas su 'gyur ngi ta la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/ a b+hU ma/ b+hU la lung lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsa ra 'gyur/
[\[196a.5\]]gA ti sogs kyis si tsa 'jig /la mas su 'gyur/ nga 'gro ba la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/ b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la lung gi At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug tshul ni/ /A r+d+ha d+hA tu kaM she She/ lhag ma byings phyed pa'o/ /sngar bshad zin pa laT/ ling / loT/[ \[]yang [\]]rnams dang byings b+hA dang ShUnya la ster ba'i lung gi
[\[196a.6\]]par smai par rnams ma yin pa'i lhag ma ste At+ma ne ba da sogs dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i la yig gzhan rnams dang kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen dmigs bsal med pa rnams la'ang byings phyed pa can zhes brda chad byed do/ /a+war+d+ha d+hA tu ka s+ye DA lA deH byings phyed pa'i bal dang po la iTa'o/ /byings phyed
[\[196a.7\]]pa'i ming can gyi rnam dbye dang rkyen rnams kyi dang po na wal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod na lbal gyi yi ge de la iT A ga ma steng ro/ /a b+ha bi Sh+Ta/ b+hU la lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings laaT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung ba ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/ tsa dang i 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ la ta ru
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]'gyur/ byings phyed pa'i lba la la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi ngos byings la yon tan e tsa'i a ya a ba sogs kyi mdos o a ba ba i la drangs kun nas sgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha Sha Tu yi Sha Tu 'os ta Ta drangs/ lung gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ a b+ha bi ShA
[\[196b.2\]]tAM/ b+hU la lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don/ lung la ts+li 'os/ tsI byin tsI'i si tsa 'os si tsa ra 'gyur/ tsa dang i phyis/ byings phyed pa'i lbal la iT 'os iT A ga maT gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis o a tha kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis
[\[196b.3\]]sra Sh+ra/ ya? A tAM du 'gyur Ta drangs/ mang tshig la/ At+ma ne pa de ShA na taH/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la a ta ma yin paM las so/ /b+ha ba lta bu ata mtha' can gyi pha rol ma yin pa'i At+ma ne pa da'i dz+ha ni ata ces bar 'gyur te/ a b+ha bi Sha ta/ b+hU la/ lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis bying sa la aT A ga ma
[\[196b.4\]]Ta gnas don/ lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/ tsa dang i phyis/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa can dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba drangs/ la dz+ha ru 'gyur dz+ha las a phyung mdo 'dis dz+ha ata du 'gyur/ ta a la drangs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs
[\[196b.5\]]kyis sa ShA ShA a la drangs/ lung gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ a b+ha bi Sh+thAH/ b+hU la lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT A ga ma Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os/ ts+li byin/ ts+li'i sitsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/ tsa dang i phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa
[\[196b.6\]]can dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ang la thas su 'gyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra Sh+ra/ Sha Tu yi Sha Tu 'os brA ThA sa ru u phyis ta rnam bcad/ lung gi At+sa ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig la/ a b+ha bi ShA thAM/ b+hU la lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis bye ras la aT A ga ma Ta gnas
[\[196b.7\]]don/ lung la tsI 'os tsI byin tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/ tsa dang i phyis byings phyed ba'i bal la 'os iT A ga ma/ Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba/ la A thAM du 'gyur kun nas bsgyur ba sogs gyis [\[]la Shu Shu \u0f84\u0f84\u0f84\u0f84\u0f84\u0f84[\]]A la drangs/ lung gi At+ma ne ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/ /
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]d+hI tsa/ b+ha la'ang ngo / /rnam dbye d+ha yig dang po can pha rol la sra srog meng dbyi'o/ /bi b+hA She DaH i Ta'i 'dam ka'o/ /byings iN so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' yin la/ de la iT A ga ma byin pa'i i Ta'i pha rol gyi lung dang liT 'gyur ba'i d+ha yig dang smon pa'i ling
[\[197a.2\]]gi sI d+hAM gyi yig ni D+ha yig tu yang na 'gyur te gdam nga can no/ /a b+ha bi D+hAM/ a b+ha bi d+hAM/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ d+has lo po bA sa s+yad ke tsi ta/ d+hAM las dbyi ba'am yang na sa'i de 'ga' zhig tu'o/ /gong du bshad pa ltar rnam dbye d+ha yig pha rol la sa dbyi zhing skabs 'gar
[\[197a.3\]]b+hU la/ lung lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings ba aT A ga maT gnas don lung la ts+li 'os tsI byin ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur/ /tsa dang i byis/ byings byed pa'i lba la la iT 'os/ iT A ga ma Ta gnas don bying sa thams cad pa dang bying ba phyed ba dag gi 'os bying sa la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba la d+hAM du 'gyur d+ha la'ang ngos sa gyis/ mdo 'dis d+ha D+har 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur
[\[197a.4\]]ba yang na bar byas ba'o/ /yang nas de mi dbyi bar sra de nyid dra yig tu 'gyur ba yang bya ste/ a b+ha bi d+d+tAM/ a d+ha di d+haM/ lung gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+hUl/ khung lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os tsI byin tsI si 'os si tsar 'gyur tsa dang i byis sa phyed pa'i lba la ba iT
[\[197a.5\]]'os/ iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa [\[]dang [\]]byings byed pa dag gi byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o agra/ la d+h+raM du 'gyur 'da'i sa dbyi ba dang dar 'gyur ba yang na bar byas ba'o/ /a b+ha bi Shi/[ \[]b+hU la lung [\]]/ lung lar gr-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/ lung la ts+li 'os/ tsI byin [\[]ts+li [\]]si 'os si tsar 'gyur tsa dang i phyin bying sa byed pa'i lbal la
[\[197a.6\]]iT 'os/ iT A ga maT gnas don byings thams cad ba dang byings phyed pa dag gi pos byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba la iT ra 'gyur/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa [\[]Sha [\]]drangs/ a b+ha bi Sh+wa hi/ b+hU la lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings ya aT Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur tsa dang i phyis byings phyed pa'i
[\[197a.7\]]lbal la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don gyis thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lbal ba hi ru 'gyur/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha drangs/ a b+ha ba Sh+mi hi/[ \[]b+hU [\]]lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don lung la ts+li 'os/ ts+li byin ts+li'i ni tsa 'os si tsar 'gyur tsa dang i
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]phyis/ byings phyed pa'i ngal la iT 'os/ iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag go 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o a lba/ la ma hir duHkyur nga so sor bsdu ba'i don/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra [\[]ShA [\]]drangs/ na mAng yo ge/ mAng sbyor ba la ma yin no/ /gong du lung lang l+r-ing rnams pha rol
[\[197b.2\]]la byings la aT A ga ma ster bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bas la lung lang l+r-ing rnams pha rol la'ang mAng sbyor ba la byings la aT 'gyur ba na yin te/[ \[]byod [\]]ma byung / mA b+ha bA na b+hU ta/ b+hU la lung la tib aT mi ster/ b+hU la lang sha ba la tib/ mA sma b+ha ba ta/ ma byung / b+hU la lung la ting ba du 'gyur ba'o/ /mA sma b+hU ta/ ma byung /
[\[197b.3\]]de rnams la 'di dang tsan+d+ra par lung zhes brda chad byed la/ ka lA bar si dang lhan cig pa'i di ba sogs zer zhing byangs can byA ka ra Nar byung ba'i rnam dbye zer ro/ /pa ro\u0f85k+She liT/ lkog tu gyur ba la liTa'o/ /lkog gyur ni lkog tu gyur ba'i dus te/ de yang 'das pa dang ma
[\[197b.4\]]'ongs pa gnyis su yod pa las/ 'das pa'i byung ba brjod pa la byings la liT 'gyur te/ de yang 'das nas yun ring song ba la 'jug pa shas che'o/ /liD+ca/ liT 'ang ngo / liT 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye rnams la yang byings s+yed pa can zhes brda chad byed do/ /pa ra smai ba dA
[\[197b.5\]]nAM Na la tu su s+tha la thu saN lba mAH/ pa ra smai pa da rnams kyi Nal a tus  us  thal  a thus  a Nal  ba ma rnams so/ /liT 'gyur pa ti pa sogs pa ra smai pad dgu po ni rim pa bzhin Nal la sogs pa dgu po 'di rnams su 'gyur ro/ /i n+d+hi b+ha ba ti b+h+yAM tsa/ i n+d+hi b+ha ba ti
[\[197b.6\]]dag la 'ang ngo / /byings in+d+hi gsal ba dang d+ha ba ti ste byings b+hU dag gi pha rol gyi liT 'gyur ba'i rnam dbye rnams la ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed de dgos pa ni yon tan 'gog pa'i don du'o/ liTi b+hA to ra na b+h+yA sa s+ya/ liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'o/ /byings
[\[197b.7\]]lan gnyis brjod pa'i snga ma de la a b+hA sa zhes ming 'dogs byed la/ a b+h+yA sa med pa ste sngar byings lan gnyis byas zin yin na slar lan gnyis su me 'gyur bas/ sngar gnyis su ma 'gyur ba a b+h+yA sa med pa'i byings de ni liT pha rol la gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /e kA tso dwe pra tha ma s+ya/
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]a tsa gcig ba'i dang po'i gnyis so/ /sngar bshad pa ltar a b+h+yA sa med pa'i byings yin pa de yang a tsa gcig pa'i byings yin na de'i mtha' na ha la yon kyang liT pha rol la dang po de gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /pU rbonya b+h+ya saH/ sda ma a b+h+yA sa'o/ /gong du bshad pa/
[\[198a.2\]]ltar byings lan gnyis brjod pa'i snga ma de la a b+h+yA sa zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /hra swa rtsaH/ thung ngu'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i snga ma a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de ni a tsa ring po yin na thung ngur 'gyur ro/ /a b+h+yA se tsa r+ts+tsa/ a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'ang ngo / a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de dz+ha la so
[\[198a.3\]]sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na tsar so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang 'ang gi sgras dza sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams su 'gyur te/ de yang dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams kyi nang nas kha ya so sor bsdu ba rnams tsar so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge sde pa dang skye gnas mthun pa rnams su 'gyur la/
[\[198a.4\]]de 'phrod kyi dz+hal gyi yi ge rnams sde pa gcig cing skye gnas mthun pa'i dza sha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams su 'gyur ro/ /b+ha ba te raH/ b+ha ba ti'i a'o/ /b+ha ba ti ste byings b+hU gnyis brjod pa'i snga ma a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de'i u ni liT pha rol la a yig tu 'gyur ro/ /de rnams
[\[198a.5\]]kyi dper brjod ni b+hU yod pa la liTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ba b+hU ba/ b+hU la/ lkog tu gyur pa la laT 'os/ liTaHniT Ti kyi don i khyad don la tib du 'gyur ba bar sme ba ba rnams kyi Nal a tus sogs kyis ti ba Nal du 'gyur/ Na yig Na 'gro ba la 'phel ba'i don yin kyang 'dir in+d+hi b+ha ba ti dag las kyang ngos/ 'phel ba mi byed
[\[198a.6\]]i khyad par gyi don/ liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur 'gyur/ b+ha ba ti'i 'os u a ru 'gyur/ a b+h+yA sa la tsa ra'ang ngos b+ha ba ru 'gyur/ b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don pa a la drangs pa'o/ /liTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ ba b+hU ba taH/ b+hU
[\[198a.7\]]la liT la tas su 'gyur/ par smai pad rnams kyi Nal a rkus sogs kyis tas a tus su 'gyur/ liT la byings b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os U yig u ru 'gyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a yig tu 'gyur/ a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'ang ngos b+ha yig ba ru 'gyur b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don pa i la drangs/ liTa'i
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/[ \[]tha b+hU buH[\]]/ b+hU la liT/ la dz+nyu ru bsgyur/ thar smai ba da rnams kyi Nal a tus us sogs kyis dz+hi us su 'gyur liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod glung du 'os U blud dur 'gyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar song / a [\[]b+h+yA sa la tsa ra sar b+ha lbar [\]]'gyur/ b+hU'i bu [\[]ka 'os bu ka [\]]A ga ma ka gnas
[\[198b.2\]]don u brjod don ba us la drangs/ liTa'i ba ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+hU bi tha/ b+hU sa liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la sib tu bsgyur/ ba ra smai ba da rnams kyi Nal a tu sa us thal sogs kyis sib thal du 'gyur la khyad don liT la bying sa [\[]a b+h+yA sa lbin [\]]'di 'os byings gnyis bsdod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur song b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar 'gyur/
[\[198b.3\]]a b+h+yA ra la tsar 'ang ngos b+ha bar 'gyur b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnos don u brjod don byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin Ta gnas don i la drangs/ tha b+hU pa thuH/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la thas su 'gyur/ par smai ba da rnams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]Nal a tus us thal a thus sogs kyis a thas a thus bsgyur/ liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings
[\[198b.4\]]gnyis brjod thung 'os thung ngur 'gyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ru song / a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'ang ngos b+ha bar 'gyur/ b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don ba a la drangs/ ba b+hU ba/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel gyis nas la thar bsgyur bar smai ba da rnams kyi Nal a tus us thal a thus a sogs kyis tha ata du 'gyur/ liT la byings a
[\[198b.5\]]b+h+yAs [\[]zad [\]]pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur 'gyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ru song / a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os b+ha bar 'gyur b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don yin pas phyis/ ba a la drangs/ liTa'i par smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+hU ba/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la mi ba tu bsgyur bar smai bar da
[\[198b.6\]]rnams kyi Nal/ a tus us thal a thus aN la sogs kyis mi ba Nal du bsgyur/ la khyad don Na yig 'dir 'phel ba mi byed kyang gzhan du 'phel ba'i don liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ru bsgyur/ a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os b+ha bar song / b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod
[\[198b.7\]]don ba a la drangs/ ba b+hU bi ba/ b+hU la liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la lba su bsgyur/ thar smai pa da rnams kyi Nal a tus us thal a thus a Nal pa sogs kyis bas lbar bsgyur liT la byings a ng+n+nga sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ti'i a 'os u a ru yong / a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'os b+ha ba b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]ma ka gnas don u brjod don byings byed ba'i bal la iT 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don ba i la drangs/ ba b+hU bi ma/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas lam sa su bsgyur/ pa ra smai ba da rnams kyi Nal  a tus  us  thal  a thus a Nal/ tha ma rnams sos mas mar bsgyur/ liT la byings a b+hA sa med pa'i 'os
[\[199a.2\]]byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os A thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ru song / a b+h+ya sa la tsar 'os b+ha bar bsgyur b+hU'i buka 'os/ buka A ga ma byin ka gnas don u brjod don bying sa phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don l+b+ra i la drangs/ de rnams liTa'i bar smai bad rnams so/ b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa la A t+sa ni pa da rnams
[\[199a.3\]]byin pa'i dper brjod ni/ liTa'i At+ma ne da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ liT sta dz+ha yo re shi re tsa/ liTa'i ta dz+ha dag gi e sha i re tsa'o/ /liT 'gyur ba'i At+ma ne ba da'i ta yig ni e sha dang dz+ha yig ni i re tsa zhes par 'gyur te/ ba b+hU be/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel gyis nas la ta
[\[199a.4\]]ru bsgyur/ mdo 'dis ta e shar bsgyur/ mtha'i ha la 'os sha phyis/ liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar song / a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os b+ha lbar bsgyur/ b+hU'i buka 'os buka A ga ma byin gnas don u brjod don lba e la drangs/ liTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu
[\[199a.5\]]dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ ba b+hU bA te/ b+hU ba liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la A dI du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' er 'gyur/ liT la byings a b+hUs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar [\[]bsgyur a b+h+yUr a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os b+ha lbar bsgyur/ b+hU'i bu ka 'os buka A ga ma byin/ ka
[\[199a.6\]]gnas don u brjod don lba A la dungs/ liTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ ba b+hU bi re/ b+hU la liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la dz+har bsgyur/ liTa'i ta dz+ha dag gi e ri tsa 'os d+ha i tsa ra bsgyur/ mtha'i ha la 'os za phyis liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i byings gnyis brjod/ bur du 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba
[\[199a.7\]]ti'i a 'os u ar bsgyur/ a b+h+yAs la tsar 'os/ b+ha ba/ b+hA'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ga gnas don u brjod don yin pas phyis/ la i la drangs/ liTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+hU bi She/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas la thAs bu bsgyur/ nyAs kyi se ngos thAs ser bsgyur/ liT la byings a
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti'i 'os u ar song a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'os b+ha lbar bsgyur/ b+hA'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas don i la bu drangs/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha/ ba b+hU bA tha/ b+hU la/ liT rjes
[\[199b.2\]]'brel phyis nas/ la A thA du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti a 'os u la/ a b+h+yU sa tsar 'ang ngos b+ha bar bsgyur/ b+hU'i buka 'os ka A ga ma byin/ ka gnas don u brjod don lba A la drangs/ /ba b+hA bi d+he/ ba b+hA bi D+hA+e/
[\[199b.3\]\[]D+tA+au+ul[\]]/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas sa d+hI ru bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e liT byings a b+h+yAs med ba'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os U thung ngur song / b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u ar bsgyur/ a b+h+yA sa la tsar 'ang ngos b+ha bar bsgyur/ b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma byin/ ka gnas don u brjod don byings byed pa'i lba las iT 'os yiT Ta
[\[199b.4\]]gnas don iTa'i 'dam ka 'os d+ha d+har 'gyur mi 'gyur ba yang na byas ba'o/ /liTa'i At+ma ne ba da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba d+hU be/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la i Tar bsgyur Ta khyad don Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis i a iT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a/
[\[199b.5\]]b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma byin ka gnas don u brjod don/ lba? e la drangs/ ba b+hU bi ba he/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la ba hi ra bsgyur/ liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os U thung rur bsgyur/ b+ha ba ti'i a 'os u a ra bsgyur/ a b+h+yA sa la tsor 'ang ngos b+ha bar bsgyur/ byings byed pa'i bal
[\[199b.6\]]la iT 'os iT byin Ta gnas don/ b+hU'i bu ka 'os bu ka A ga ma byin/ ka gnas de ni u brjod don lba i la drangs/ ba b+hU bi ma he/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ lam hir du bsgyur/ nga so sor bsdu ba'i don liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os U thung ngur bsgyur/ a b+h+yA ba ti'i a 'os u ar bsgyur/ a b+h+yAs la tsar 'ang
[\[199b.7\]]ngos b+ha bar bsgyur/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don b+hU'i bu ga 'os bu ka A ga ma ka gnas don u brjod don l+b+ra e la drangs/ de rnams liT ste 'di dang tsa n+d+ra par liT zer la/ ka lA pa dang dbyangs can byA ka ra Na gnyis su lkog gyur gyi rnam dbye zhes zer ro/ /a na d+ya ta ni luT/ de ring ma yin pa la
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]luTa'o/ /de ring yod pa ma yin pa 'byung 'gyur gyi don la 'jug pa'i bya ba'i don la byings la luT 'jug ste/ de yang ma 'ongs pa shin tu dus thag ring ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa shas che'o/ /s+ya tA sI l+r-i lu ToH/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la'o/ /byings la l+r-i zhes pa l+r-ing
[\[200a.2\]]dang l+r-ing dag gzung bar bya ste/ l+r-ing dang l+r-iT dag pha rol la s+ya ster zhing luT pha rol la tAs sbyar bar bya'o/ /luTaH pra tha ma s+ya DA rau ra saH luTa'i dang po rnams kyi DA ro ras rnams so/ /luT bsgyur ba'i pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dang bo rnams dang / At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po rnams ni rim pa
[\[200a.3\]]bzhin DA rau ras rnams su 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni dper brjod rim pa bzhin pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ b+ha bi tA/ b+hU la/ de ring ma yin pa la luT 'os luT Ti ta kyi don/ u luTa'i dang po sogs kyi khyad don la ti ba tu 'gyur/ luTa'i dang po rnams kyi DA [\[]rau [\]]ras rnams sos tib DA ru bsgyur/
[\[200a.4\]]Da Di ta la Ti dbyi ba'i don s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin ti'i 'os ti phyis ta drangs/ byings [\[]phyed [\]]pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba l+b+ra i la drangs/ lu Ta'i ba ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ ri tsa/ ra la
[\[200a.5\]]'ang ngo / /ra yig pa rol la tAs dang byings as yod pa dag gi sa yig srog med ni dbyi ste/ b+ha bi tA rau/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la tas su bsgyur luTa'i dang po rnams kyi zhes pas tas rau ru bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag lb-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin/ mdo 'dis phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT
[\[200a.6\]]'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed bdag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o lba drangs/ luTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ b+ha bi tA raH b+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la dz+hi ru bsgyur/ luTa'i dang po sogs kyis dz+hi ras su bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag ces
[\[200a.7\]]pas tAs byin/ ral 'ang ngos sa phyis/ byings phyed pa'i lbal la aT 'os iT A ga maT gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba drangs/ luTa'i pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ tA sa s+t+yo rmo paH/ tA sa a sti dag gi dbyi'o/ /
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]tas dang a sti ste byings as dag gi sa yig ni rkyen sa yig dang po can pha rol la dbyi ste/ b+ha bi tA si/ b+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la sib tu bsgyur/ ba bita phyi don/ s+ya tAs dag ces pas tAs byin/ mdo 'dis phyis byings phyed pa'i bas la iT 'os iT byan Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os
[\[200b.2\]]byings la yon tan e tsa'i sogs kyis o a lba drangs/ luTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig la/ b+ha bi tA [\[]sbraH[\] ]b+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la thas su bsgyur s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin sa thal drangs byings phyed pa'i bal iT 'os iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi byings
[\[200b.3\]]la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o aT drangs/ luTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/ b+ha bi tA s+tha/ b+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la thar bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin sa thal drangs/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin/ Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi
[\[200b.4\]]'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba drangs so/ /luTa'i pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+ha bi tA smi/ b+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la mi ba tu bsgyur/ ba [\[]mi[\]] ta kyi don s+ya tAs dag ces pas tAs byin/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag
[\[200b.5\]]gi 'os byengs la yon tan awa tsa sogs kyis o a ba drangs/ b+ha bi tA lbaH/ b+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la bas su sgyur s+ya tAs dag ces pas tAs sbyar/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba/ b+ha bi tA smaH b+hU la/
[\[200b.6\]]aT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la mas su bsgyur s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs sbyaraH/ byings phyed pa'i bal iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba drangs/ de rnams par smai pa da'o/ /da ni b+hU thob ba la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar bas skyes
[\[200b.7\]]du dang bo gsum par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum dang 'dra ste/ b+ha bi tA/ b+hU la/ luT la ta ta DAr 'gyur tAs iT sogs/ b+ha bi tA rau/ la A tAM A tAM rau sgyur tAs iT sogs/ la dz+ha dz+ha ras su 'gyur/ tAs dang iT sogs kyis o a ba/ b+ha bi tA raH/ luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]b+ha ngi tA se/ b+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ l+ra thas su bsgyur thas kyi se 'os thAs sa s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs byin tAs a sti dag gi dbyi 'os phyis/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan i tsa sogs kyis o abra/
[\[201a.2\]]luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig la/ b+ha bi tA sA tha/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la A tAM du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os tAs sbyar/ byings phyed pa'i bal iT byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa'i sogs kyis o
[\[201a.3\]]a ba drangs/ luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig la/ b+ha bi tA[\[] d+hA[\]]/ d+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/[ \[]bra d+h+raM du bsgyur[\]]/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ s+ya tAs dag ces pas tAs sbyar/ d+tA la 'ang ngos sa byis/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon
[\[201a.4\]]tan e tsa sogs kyis o a l+b+ra drangs/ luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ ha e ti/ eta la ha'o/ /tAs dang byings as dag gi sa yig ni rkyen a pha rol la ha yig tu 'gyur te/ b+ha bi tA he/[ \[]b+hU la[\]]/ luT rjes 'brel byis nas/ lnga iTar 'gyur Ta khyad don Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis i e
[\[201a.5\]]s+ya tAs dag l+r-i liT dag la 'os tAs byin/ mdo 'dis sra hra byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings phyed pa dang thams cad pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis abra/ luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig la/ b+ha bi tA sA he/ b+hU laH/ luT rjes 'brel phyi ma nas/[ \[]la[\]] ba hir 'gyur[\]]/
[\[201a.6\]]Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT zhes pa tAs sbyar/ byings phyed pa'i bal iT yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a bra/ luTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma'i mang tshig la/ b+ha bi tA sma he/ b+hU la/ luT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ lam hing dung sgyur da so sor bsdu ba'i don 'gro ba sogs kyis i er song / byings
[\[201a.7\]]byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a bra drangs/ de rnams luT ste 'di dang tsan+d+ra pa gnyis su luT zer la/ ka lA pa dbyangs can byA ka ra Na gnyis su shwa sta ni zer ro/ /li dA shi Shi/ smon pa la ling 'o/ smon
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]pa'i don la 'jug pa'i bya ba'i don la ling 'gyur te/ de yang smon pa'i ling zhes brda chad byed la/ ling phyi ma smon pa'i ling zhes brda chad byas pa 'di ni byings phyed pa'i ming can yang yin no/ /ki dA shi Shi/ smon pa la ki ta'o/ /smon pa'i don gyi lita 'gyur ba'i pa ra smai pa da rnams
[\[201b.2\]]la'ang yA suT 'jug cing smon pa'i ling gi skabs 'dir yA suT la ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/ /smon pa'i ling byings la sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ smon pa'i ling gi pa ra sme ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ b+hU lA ta/ b+hU la/ smon pa'i [\[]ling nga rita kyi don i khyad don la ti ya du
[\[201b.3\]]bsgyur/ pa pita kyi don ita ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis pa ra smai pa dal A luT steng 'gro ba'i u dA d+ta 'ang ngos A uT/ smon pa la ki ta 'os de ki ta kyi ming can du gnas don u brjod don/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i dang po'i sa ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/ smon pa'i don gyi ling gi par smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ b+hU yA stAM/
[\[201b.4\]]d+hU la/ smon ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la dAs sung sgyur/ tas/ thas/ tha me pa rnams kyi dAM taM ha a ma rnams sos/ tas t+daM du bsgyur/ pa ra smai pa da zhes pas yA suT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don sra drangs/ smon pa'i ling gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ b+hU yA suH b+hU la/ smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis
[\[201b.5\]]nas la dz+hi ru bsgyur/ dz+hi'i dzus 'os dz+hi dzus su bsgyur/ tsu Tu sogs kyis dza phyis/ pa ra smai pa da zhes pas yA suT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don/ swa u la drangs/ smon pa'i ling gi ba ra smai'i pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+hU yAH/ b+hU la/ smon ling rjes 'brel phyis/ la si ba tu bsgyur ba pi ta kyi don ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis pa
[\[201b.6\]\[]nga [\]]smi pa da sogs kyis yA suT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don yang dag par sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i dang po'i sa? ka? dag gi 'os lnga su Ta'i sa phyi/ si pa kyis ru u phyis ru u phyis ra rnam bcad/ b+hU yA staM/ b+hU la/ smon ling rjes 'brail phyis nas/ mthas su bsgyur/ tas thas sogs kyis thas taM thas du bsgyur/ par smai ba de sogs kyis y+ba suT/ Ta gnas don
[\[201b.7\]]u brjod don spa taM la [\]]drangs/ b+hU yA sta/ d+hU la/ smon ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la thar bsgyur/ tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis tha tar 'gyur/ pa ra smai sogs kyis yA suT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don sa tal drangs/ smon pa'i ling gi pa ra smai pa da'i sgyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+hU yA saM/ b+hU la/ smon pa'i ling rjes 'dral
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]phyis nas/ la mi pa du bsgyur tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis mi pa a ma du bsgyur ba ra smai ba da sogs kyis [\[]sA u/[\] ]Ta gnas don u brjod don sra a ma la drangs [\[]mra pa ro[\]]/ b+hU yA sA/ b+hU la/ smon pa'i lir rjes 'brel phyis nas/ langs su bsgyur/ ri ta la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/ pa ra smai ba da sogs kyis yA suT/ Ta gnas
[\[202a.2\]]don u brjod don sra mra la drangs/ b+hA yA sma/ b+hU la/ smon ling rjes 'brel phyis nas la mas su bsgyur/ ngi ta la rtag tu 'os sa phyis/ pa ra smi ba da sogs kyis yA suT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don sA ma la drangs/ b+hU thob pa la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ smon pa'i ling gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang
[\[202a.3\]]po'i gcig tshig la/ suT ti thoH/ ta tha dag gi suTa'o/ /smon pa'i ling 'gyur ba'i At+ma ne pa da'i rnam dbye ta yig dang tha yig dag la luT A ga ma ster te/ b+ha bi ShI Sh+Ta/[ \[]b+hU la [\]]smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel byis nas/ la tar bsgyur ling gi lI uT sos sI uT Ta gnas don u brjod don byings byed pa'i bal la
[\[202a.4\]]iT 'os iT byin/ Ta gnas don byings thams cad ba dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o a ba ba i la drangs/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra Sha?ba? ya? dag gi bal la dbyi 'os phyis/ mdo 'dis suT A ga ma Ta gnas don u brjod don kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha drangs Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os tra D+ra Sh+da la drangs/
[\[202a.5\]]smon pa'i lig gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ b+ha bi ShI yA stUM/ b+hUs smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/ lwa A tAM du bsgyur/ ling gi sI luT 'os sa'i yuT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/ iT A ga ma Ta gnas don u brjod don byings thams cad pa dang phyings phyed pa sogs
[\[202a.6\]]kyis yon tan e tsa kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis swa Sha y+ra A la drangs/ ta tha dag gi suT 'os tAM dang Ta'i bar du suT Ta gnas don u brjod don sra tAM la drangs/ smon pa'i ling gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ b+ha bi ShI ran/ b+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la? dz+ha ra bsgyur/ dz+halir na 'os dz+ha ran du
[\[202a.7\]]bsgyur/ ling gi sI yuT 'os sI uT Ta gnas don u brjod don byings phyed ba'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed dag gi 'os/ byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a lba [\[]l+b+Ta[\]] i la drangs/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/[ \[]ba ya dag [\]]gi bal dbyi 'os ya phyis/ smon pa'i
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ping gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+ha bi ShI Sh+TaH/ b+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel byis nas/ la thA sa su bsgyur/ ta ba dag gi suT Ta gnas don u brjod don/ ling gi sI luT Ta gnas don u brjod don/[ \[]ba ya [\]]dag gi bal la dbyi [\[]phog [\]]la phyis/ byings phyed ba'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad ba dang
[\[202b.2\]]byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o a ba/ lnga il drangs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs gyis sa gnyis Sha/ Sha Tul Sha Tu 'os thA ThA Sha ThA la drangs ras ru rnam bcad/ b+ha bi ShI yA s+thAM/ b+hU la/ smon pa li ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la? A thAM ru bskyur/ ta tha dag gi su Ta 'os/ A dar thAM gyi bar du suT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don
[\[202b.3\]\[]lu thAM la drangs[\]]/ ling gi sI yuT 'os/ sI yuT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os/ byings la yon tan/ etsa sogs kyis o a ba/ lba i a drangs kun nas bsgyur pa sogs kyis sraShA/[ \[]a? tha sA [\]]ba drangs/ b+ha bi ShI d+gAM/ b+ha bi ShI d+haM/ smon
[\[202b.4\]]d+hU la smon ling rjes 'brel byed nas/ la d+hI du bsgyur ling gi sI uT 'os sa'i yuT/ Ta gnas don u brjod don ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os la phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o u ba/ lba? i la drangs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis [\[]sra Sha [\]]
[\[202b.5\]]iTa'i gdam nga 'os d+ha D+har 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka byas pa'o/ pa'i ling gi At+ma ne da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+ha bi ShI ya/ b+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la iTar bsgyur iTa'i ata 'os/ iT ata du bsgyur/ ta yig ta yi de'i dus kyi don/ ling gi sI uT 'os/ sI yaT/ Ta gnas don u
[\[202b.6\]]brjod don byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'o ma byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba lba i la drangs kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? Sha?/ ya a la drangs/ b+ha bi ShI ba hi/ d+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la ba hir bsgyur/ ling gi sI yuT 'os sI yaT Ta gnas don
[\[202b.7\]]u brjod don ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os a phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba tha i la drangs/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha ru bsgyur/ b+ha bi ShI ma hi/ b+hU la smon pa'i ling rjes 'brel phyis nas/[ \[]sa? ma hing [\]]
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]du bsgyur/ nga so sor bsdu ba'i don/ ling gi sI yuT 'os sI yuT Ta gnas don u brjod don ba la dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e ca sogs kyis e a ba ba? i la drangs/ kun
[\[203a.2\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra Sha/ de rnams smon pa'i don gyi ling ste/ 'di dang tsan+d+ra pa ra smon pa'i ling zer la/ ka lA pa dang dbyangs can byA ka ra Na gnyis su smon pa'i yA ta sogs zhes zer ro/ /b+ha bi Sh+ya ti l+r-iT/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba la l+r-iTa'o/ /de ring ma yin pa'i 'byung 'gyur gyi bya
[\[203a.3\]]ba'i don la byings la liT 'gyur zhing 'byung 'gyur de yang ma 'ongs pa dus ring po'i don la 'jug bshas che'o/ /'byung 'gyur gyi rnam dbye de dag byings dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ b+hU la  lbiT/ Ta/ Ta te kyi don [\[]r-i khyad don Ta tir tu bsgyur[\]]/ ba bita
[\[203a.4\]]gyi don/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya byin/ byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iTaT gnas don/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis i aka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? ShA/ b+ha bi Sh+ya taH/ b+hU la/ phr-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la tas su bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag
[\[203a.5\]]la 'os s+ya sbyar/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iTaT gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o a ba kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha/ b+ha bi Sh+ya [\[]n+ti[\]]/ b+hU la/ l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la dz+hi ru bsgyur/ dz+ha'i an+ta 'os dz+ha an+ta/ s+ya tAs [\[]dag l+r-i luT [\]]dag la 'os s+ya
[\[203a.6\]]s+ya sbyar aT kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs/ byings phyed pa'i ngal la iT 'os/ iTaT gnas son/ byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o ya ba kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? Sha?/ l+r-iTa'i pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum
