[\[203a.7\]]la/ b+ha bi Sh+ya si/ b+hU la/ l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la sib ba pi ta kyi don/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya byings phyed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas son/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa'i a la a lba A la A lba rnams sos o a ba/ bra i la drangs/ kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]kyis sa Sha/ b+ha bi Sh+ya thaH/ b+hU la/ l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la? thas su bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/ iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os/ byings la yon tan e tsa sogs gyis o [\[]as/[\] ]kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/
[\[203b.2\]]b+ha bi Sh+ya tha/ b+hU la/ l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la Sha ru bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o as/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis la Sha/ liTa'i bar smai ba da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+ha bi
[\[203b.3\]\[]b+h+yA mi[\]]/ b+hU la/ lb-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la mi pa du bsgyur/ ba bita kyi don/ s+ya tA sa dag l+r-iT dag la 'os s+ya byin/ yanya la ata gyi ring bo 'os/ s+ya ring bor song byir sa phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin Ta gnas don byings thams cad tha dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun
[\[203b.4\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ b+ha bi Sh+yAbaH/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas phabs dang mas su bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ ya ta la ata kyi ring po 'os/ s+ya ring por slong / byings phyed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis
[\[203b.5\]]o ab/ bra i la drangs/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis s+ya ShA/ b+ha bi Sh+yA maH/ b+ha bi Sh+yA maH/ de rnams bU la l+r-iTa'i par smai ba da rnams sbyar ba'o/ /b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ l+r-iTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ b+ha bi Sh+ya te/ b+hU la/ l+r-iT
[\[203b.6\]]rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la ta ru bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ s+ya tAs dag sr-i luT dag la 'os/ s+ya/ byings phyed pa'i bal iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os/ byings ka yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha/ b+ha bi Sh+ye te/[ \[]b+hU la/[\] ]l-iT rjes
[\[203b.7\]]'brel phyis nas/[ \[]la?[\]]A tAM du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i uT dag la 'os s+ya byin byings phyed pa'i ral la iT 'os/ iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis la Sha/ nga 'gro ba'i A ta kyi 'os A tI gyi
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]A i ya/ ba ya dag gi ba bal 'os ya phyis/ a las yon tan nos e/ b+ha bi Sh+ya n+te/ b+hU la/ l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ ya dz+har bsgyur/ d+ha'i an+ta 'os dz+ha an+ta ra bsgyur/ na 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' a/ s+ya tAs dag khr-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ a ta kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i
[\[204a.2\]]gzugs/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT byin/ Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan etsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis [\[]seSha/[\] ]l+r-iTa'i At+ma ni pa da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+ha bi Sh+ya se/ b+hU la/[ \[]l-i?T [\]]rjes 'bral phyis nas la thAs su bsgyur thAs
[\[204a.3\]]kyis 'os thAs ser bsgyur s+ya tA sa dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyang / byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/ iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis sa Sha/ b+ha bi Sh+ye the/ b+hU la/ l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la A thA ma du bsgyur
[\[204a.4\]]Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i phuT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ nga 'gro ba'i A ta kyi 'os A thA ma gyi A il/ ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os phyis/ a las yon tan mtshams sbyar byings phyed pa'i bal la iT yon tan sogs/ b+ha bi Sh+ya d+hA+e/ b+hU la/ liT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la d+g+ra du bsgyur/
[\[204a.5\]]Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha/ l+r-iTa'i At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ b+ha bi [\[]Sh+ye[\]]/ b+hU la/ l-i?T rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la iT ra bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis
[\[204a.6\]]e/ s+ya tAs dag l+ra luT dag la 'os/ s+ya sbyar/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ byings phyed pa'i bal la eT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? Sha?/ b+hA bi Sh+yA ba he/ b+ha bi Sh+yA
[\[204a.7\]]ma he/ b+hU la/ l+r-iT rjes 'brel phyis nas/ l-i? ba hi dang ma hing du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/ s+ya sbyar/ yanyal a ta kyi ring po 'os/ s+ya ring po/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os -iT Ta gnas don/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ga kun
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa? ShA/ de rnams l+r-iT ste 'di dang tsa n+d+ra ba ra l+r-iT zer la/ ka lA ba dang dbyangs can byA ka ra Na gnyis su s+ya dang lhan cig pa'i ti sogs sam b+ha bi Sh+ya n+ti zer ro/ /lid ni mi t+te s+y-ing kri yA ti pa t+tau/ ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba la l+r-ing 'o/ /bya ba shor ba ste dus la [\[]mtho la [\]]
[\[204b.2\]]pa'am/ rgyu tshogs ma 'dzom pa'i don la ling gi yul la l+r-ing 'jug cing / skabs 'gar bya ba ma rdzogs par 'phro lus pa'i don dang / bya ba zin ba thag pa'i grub pa gsar pa la yang 'jug par bshad do/ /de yang l+r-ing dang byings sbyar ba'i per brjod ni/ l+r-ing gi pa ra smi ba da'i
[\[204b.3\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing / nga / ngita kyi don/ ri s+ya gyi don/[ \[]la? [\]]tin tu bsgyur[\]]/ ba bi ta kyi don ita kyi 'ang ngos/ i phyis/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/ s+ya sbyar/ lung lang / l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas dan/ byings phyed pa'i tha sal -i+iT byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dge gi
[\[204b.4\]]'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis sa Sha/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya tAM/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la? ta sa su bsgyur/ tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis tas tA ma du bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/ byings phyed pa'i bar
[\[204b.5\]]la 'os/ iTaT gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ a b+ha pi Sh+ya na/ b+hU la/ l-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/[ \[]l+ra??[\]]dz+hi ru bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/ s+ya sbyar/ dz+ha'i an+ta 'os dz+ha an+ta ita kyi 'os i
[\[204b.6\]]byis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os tA phyis/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig sta ma'i gzugs/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings aT Ta gnas don byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs dang kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ l+r-ing gi napa ra smai ba da'i skyes
[\[204b.7\]]bud bus ma gsum la/ a b+ha bi Sh+yaH/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ l+ra sib du bsgyur/ pa pita kyi don ita kyi 'ang ngos/ i byis/ phya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/ s+ya sbyar/[ \[]sa sa dzra Sha sogs kyis sa ru/ u phyis ra rnam bcad/[ \[]lung la l+r-ing [\]]sogs kyis byings la aTaT gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la aT 'os iTaT
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya taM/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyes nas/ l+ra thas su bsgyur/ tas thas tha mi ba sogs kyi thas tAM du bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+raM luT dag la 'os/ s+ya
[\[205a.2\]]sbyar/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT/ Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ l+ra bar bsgyur/ tas thas tha m-i ba sogs kyis
[\[205a.3\]]tha tar bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la a Ta Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/ iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed bdag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ l+r-ing gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[205a.4\]]la rim pa bzhin/ a b+ha bi Sh+yi/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis na so la mi ba tu bsgyur/ tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis mi ba am du bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os/ s+ya sbyar/ ata gyi yon tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs mang ngo lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la
[\[205a.5\]]iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis a ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ a b+ha bi Sh+yA ba/ a b+ha bi Sh+yA ma/ b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la l+rang gi At+ma ne pad rnams sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ l+r-ing gi At+ma ne pa da'i spyes bu dang po
[\[205a.6\]]gsum la/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la bas dang mas su bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT ngag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ yanyal ata kyi ring po 'os s+ya ring por song / bi tas rtag tu 'os sa phyis/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag
[\[205a.7\]\[]ni ngom [\]] byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ag kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis saSha/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la tar bsgyur/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis aT s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs saSha/ a b+ha bi Sh+ye tAM/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ l+ra A tAM du bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+raM luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar ba 'gro ba la A ta kyi 'os/ A tAM gyi A i ya bra ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya? phyis/ a las yon tan nos e lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis
[\[205b.2\]]byings la aT Ta gnas don byings byed pa'i bal la iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya n+ta/ b+hu la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la dz+har bsgyur/ dz+ha'i an+t+ra 'os/ dz+ha an+tar bsgyur s+ya tAs dag gi l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya
[\[205b.3\]]sbyar/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig snga ma'i gzugs su song / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os phyings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o a ba kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ l+r-ing gi At+ma ne pa de'i
[\[205b.4\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya thAH/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la? thAs su bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ byings phyed ba'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis sa Sha/
[\[205b.5\]]lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/ a b+ha bi Sh+ye [\[]ShAM/[\] ]b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la? A thAM du bsgyur/ s+ya d+tas dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ nga 'gro ba'i A ta kyi 'os A thA ma gyi A i ya/ ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os yu kyis/ a las yon tan nos e lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don byings phyed
[\[205b.6\]]pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya d+hAM/ b+hU la l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la d+hAM du bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag praM luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don
[\[205b.7\]]byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ l+r-ing gi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+ha bi Sh+ye/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ l+ra iTar bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dang
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]la 'os s+ya sbyar/ a las yon tan nos e byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os/ byings la yon tan e tsa sogs kyis o ab/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT/ a b+ha bi Sh+ya ba hi/ a b+ha
[\[206a.2\]]bi Sh+yA ma hi/ b+hU la/ l+r-ing rjes 'brel phyis nas/ lab hi dang ma hing du bsgyur/ s+ya tAs dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar/ ya ta la ata kyi rung po 'os s+ya ring po/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT/ Ta gnas don byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT/ Ta gnas don byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag gi 'os byengs la yon tan a tsa
[\[206a.3\]]sogs kyis o ar/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ de dang / tu bkod pa ni/ ya dA br-iSh+TiHsu rA dz+yaM tsA b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ gang dag tu char babs shing rgyal po bde bar gyur/ ta dA su b+he k+Sha ma b+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ ces pa ste char 'beb pa'i rgyal po [\[]bde ba ni [\]]grub zin gsar pa dang / slong mo thob par 'gyur zhes pa
[\[206a.4\]]ni/ da lta thob ma zin pas bya ba ma rdzogs pa'i dpe'o/ /de rnams l+r-ing ste 'di dang tsa n+d+ra par l+r-ing zer la/ ka lA par bya ba shor ba'i di ba sogs dang ba/ de dag tu slong mo bzang po thob par 'gyur/ dbyangs can byA ka ra Nar bya ba lus pa'i rnam dbye zer ro/ /de ltar laT la sogs pa bcu po ngos
[\[206a.5\]]bzung ba dang / de dag gi 'gyur sogs cha tsam bshad nas da ni de dag dang byings sbyor ba'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs pas la dang bcas pa bshad par bya ste/ a ka khA dA ba Sha n+te bA Thi bA/ bklags ba la dang por ka kha med pa mthar Sha med pa la yang na'o/ /bstan pa'am bklags pa la byings
[\[206a.6\]]nad sogs dang / gad sogs dang / byings gang gi thog mar ka yig dang kha yig med pa mthar Sha med pa dag pha rol la pra la sogs pan nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can snga ma las nye bar bsgyur ni'i na yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ bra Ni b+ha ba ti/ rab tu des par yod/ bra ni b+ha ba ti/ pu gan+ta la b+hU
[\[206a.7\]]ba d+ha s+ya tsa/ pu ka mtha' dang u pa d+hA thung du dag gi 'ang ngo / /u ka A ga ma sbyin pa'i mtha' dang byings u ba d+hA i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge thung du yod pa rnams rnam dbye byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan b+hU la laT sha pa/ la ti gcan pha rol la yon tan du
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]'gyur te/ ! tsa ta ti/ tsa tA yang dag par shes pa la laT sha ba l+ra tib/ mdo 'dis yon tan/ tsa te ta/ tse ta tu/ a tsa ta ta/ tsi tI la byed pa po la shapa sbyar nas laT sogs byings thams cad pa'i ming can bzhi ba cho ga thams cad b+hU'i sgabs dang 'dra la/ pa ra smai pad rnams 'jug
[\[206b.2\]]cing / At+ma ne ba da rnams mi 'jug go/ /tsi tI la lung sbyar ba'i dper brjod  tsi ta ling [\[]shab[\]] yA suT la tipa/ tsi ta la poT [\[]shab [\]]la tib/ tsi ta la lang shab la tib/ b+hU'i skabs dang cung mi 'dra ste/ ba da bradza ha la n+ta s+yA tsaH bad bra dza ha la mtha' rnams kyi a tsa'i 'o/ /byings bad dang / bra dza dang /
[\[206b.3\]]byings gal mtha' can gyi dang po'i atsa ni ts+lir bsgyur ba si tsa bar smai pad rnams pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ne Ti/ iT lam yin no/ gong du byings hal mtha' sogs kyi dang po'i atsa ts+lir bsgyur ba'i sitsa bar smai pad pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur par bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal
[\[206b.4\]]rgyu mtshan de dag 'dzom yang / byings phyed pa'i lbal la iTa'o zhes pa lta bu'i iT bar na yod pa la atsa de 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /a sti si tso\u0f85 pr-i k+to/ a sti si tsa'i a pr-i k+ta la'o/ /byings as dang ts+li 'gyur ba si tsa'i pha rol tu a pr-i k+ta'i ming can te ha la srog med lung gi 'gyur ba'i
[\[206b.5\]]rnam dbye yin pa bzhin byung na rnam dbye ha la de la IT A ga ma ster ro/ /dI d+hI pe thI TAM/ dI d+hI be bA+e iT rnams kyi'o/ /byings dI b+hI dang / be bI dag dang / bar rkyen iTa'i 'phel ba dang yon tan sogs mi byed do/ /iTaHITi/ iT las I Ta la'o/ iTa'i pha rol gyi si tsa ni
[\[206b.6\]]IT A ga ma pha rol 'jig go/ /'grel par sitsa phyis ba la slar mtshams mi sbyor ba ma yin no zhes bshad pas aka 'dra ba la ring po/ /a tse tI ta/[ \[]tsi nya la/[\] ]lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/ rjes 'brel phyis nas l+ra tib du bsgyur/ lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os
[\[206b.7\]]si tsar bsgyur/ tsa dang i byis/ byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT/ Ta gnas don/ pu ka mtha' dang u ma d+hA thung ngu dag gi 'ang ngos byings la yon tan ita kyi 'ang ngos/ ti'i i phyis/ a sti si tsa'i a br-i k+ta 'os IT A ga ma byin/ Ta gnas don iT las IT la 'os sitsa 'jig /a ka 'dra ba la ring po 'os ring po/ a
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]tse tiSh+TAM/ tsi ta la/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/ l+ra tAs su bsgyur/ l+ra tAs su bsgyur/ lung lang ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ tsa dang i phyis/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ bu ka mtha' u ba ng+da zung du dag gi 'os/ byings la yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha
[\[207a.2\]]tas bras tha mi ba sogs kyis tas tA ma du bsgyur/ laTA la Sha Tu 'os taT Sha drangs/ lung gi pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ si[\[] dza [\]]b+h+yasta bi b+h+ya sh+tsa/ si tsa a b+h+yasta bi di rnams las kyang ngo / /rkyen sitsa dang a b+h+yasta'i ming can rnams dang byings bi di rnams kyi pha rol gyi dz+hi ni dzus su 'gyur te/
[\[207a.3\]]a tse ti ShuH tsi ta la/ lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/ lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li sitsa 'os sitsar bsgyur/ tsa dang i phyis byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT/[ \[]lug [\]]mtha' u [\[]ba d+hA thung [\]]du dag gi 'ang ngos byings la yon tan la dz+hi/ mdo 'dis dz+hi dzus su bsgyur/ tsu Tu sogs kyis dza phyis/ kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen sogs kyis
[\[207a.4\]]sa Sha/ lung gi ba ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ a tse hIH tsi ta la lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la a Ta Ta gnas don/ la si ba ru bsgyur/ ita kyi 'ang [\[]byos[\]]i phyis/ lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li'i saM tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ i dang tsa phyis/ byings phyid pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ bu ka mtha' u pa d+hA zung du dag gi
[\[207a.5\]]'os byings la yon tan/ asti si tsa'i aphr-i k+ta la 'os iT A ga ma Ta gnas don/ iT las IT la 'os si tsa 'jig /a ka 'dra ring po sa sa dzuSha sogs kyis sa ru u phyis ra rnam bcad/ lung gi ba ra smi ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a tse ti Sh+TaM/ a tse ti Sh+Ta/ lung gi ba ra smai ba da'i skyes bu byim gsum
[\[207a.6\]]tsa ta la/ lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/ la thas dang thar bsgyur/ de yang tas thas tha mi ba sogs kyis taM dang tar bsgyur/ lung pa ts+li 'os tsI byin ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ i dang tsa phyis/ byings byed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ puka mtha' u pa d+hA thung du dag gi 'os/ byings la yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/[ \[]Sha Tu la Sha Tu [\]]'os
[\[207a.7\]]ta gnyis Ta Sha drangs/ la/ a tse ti ShaM/ tsita la lung / lung / lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don/ la mi pa du bsgyur/ tas thas tha mi pa sogs kyis mi pa am du bsgyur/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ tsa dang i phyis/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os iT Ta gnas don/ puka mtha' u bad+hA thung du sogs kyis byings la yon tan
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]kun nas bsgyur ba dang [\[]rkyen [\]]sogs kyis saSha/ a tse ti Sh+wa/ a tsi ti Sh+Ya/ tsi ta la/ lung / lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis aT Ta gnas don/ la? bas dang mas su bsgyur/ di ta la rtag tu 'os sa gnyis phyis/ lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ tsa dang i phyis/ bal dang po'i iT 'os i TaT gnas don/ bu ka mtha' dang u bad+hA thung du dag
[\[207b.2\]]gi 'os byings la yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ba dang mal drangs/ tsi ta la liT sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ par smai ba da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ tsi tse ta/ shes/ a saM yo gA lIT+ki ta/ brtsegs pa ma yin pa las liT ka 'gro ba la'o/ /byings yi ge brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i
[\[207b.3\]]tse ta la/ liT liT la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang bo  lhag po 'os/ ta phyis la tib du bsgyur bar smai ba da rnams kyis Nal a tus us sogs kyis ti pa Nal du bsgyur/ buka mtha' dang u ba d+hA thung ngu dag gi 'os/[ \[]ci phyim [\]]yon tan ta a la drangs/ pha rol gyi liT bsgyur ba'i rnam dbye pa pa 'gro ba'i ming can
[\[207b.4\]]ma yin pa rnams la ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed do/ dgos pa ni byings la yon tan mi byed pa'i don no/ /liTa'i pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ tsi tsi ta tuH tsi ta la/ liT/ liT ba byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag po 'os ta [\[]mong [\]]
[\[207b.5\]]ma phyis/ la tas dang dz+hi ru bsgyur/ par snai ba da'i Nal a tus/ us zhes bas/ tas/ a tus dang / dz+haya us su bsgyur/ ta gnyis drangs/ sas dzu Sha sogs kyis sa gnyis ru ru bsgyur/ u gnyis phyis/ ra gnyis rnam bcad/ tsi tsituH liTa'i pa rasmai ba da'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsi tsi ti tha/ tsi tal liT/ liT la byings
[\[207b.6\]]a b+h+yA sa med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag po 'os ta phyis/ la sib tu bsgyur pa rasmai pa da rnams kyi zhes bas sib thal du bsgyur mtha'i hal sogs kyis la phyis byings phyed ba'i bal la iT buka mtha' u ba d+hA thung du sogs kyis byings la yon tan/ tsi tsi ta thuH tsi tsi ta/ tsi ta la/ liT/ liT la byings a sbyAs med pa'i 'os byings
[\[207b.7\]]gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag po 'os ta phyis/ l+ra thas dang thar bsgyur/ ba ra smai pa da rnams kyi zhes pas/ thas a thus dang / tha ar bsgyur/ liTa'i pa rasmai pa da'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsi tsi ta/ tsi ta la/ liT liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag bol mi pa du bsgyur/ ba ra smai pa da rnams zhes
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pas mi ba Nal du bsgyur/ bu ka mtha' u bad+hA thung du sogs kyis byings la yon tan/ tsi tsiti ba/ tsi tsiti ma/ tsita la luT sbyar bas/ tse ti tA/ tse ti tA rau/ tse ti tA raH sogs te cho ga thams cad b+hU yod pa la luT sbyar ba'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /tsita la smon pa'i ling sbyar de'i
[\[208a.2\]]tsita la/ liT byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang bo lhag po la bas dang mas su bsgyur/ pa ra smai pa da sogs kyis bas ba dang / ma su mar bsgyur/ byings phyed pa'i bal la iT/ buka maRa' dang u bad+hA thung ngu sogs kyis byings yon tan/ pa ra smai ba da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsi t+yA stAM/ tsi t+yA suH skyes bu dbus ma
[\[208a.3\]]gsum la/ tsi t+yAH tsi t+yA staM/ tsi t+yA sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsi t+yA saM/ tsi t+yA sba/ tsi t+yA sma/ tsita la liT pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tse ti Sh+ya ta/ tsi ti Sh+ya tAM/ tse ti Sh+ya n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tse ti Sh+yasi tse ti Sh+ya taM/ tse ti Sh+yatha/
[\[208a.4\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tse ti Sh+yA mi/ tse ti Sh+yA baH tse ti Sh+yA maH tsita la l+r-ing gi pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tse ti Sh+ya ta/ a tse ti Sh+ya tAM/ a tse ti Sh+yan/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tse ti Sh+yaH a tse ti Sh+ya taM/ a tse ti Sh+ya ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[208a.5\]]a tse ti Sh+yaM/ a tse ti Sh+yA ba/ a tse ti Sh+yA ma/ ! ts+Yu tir kun 'khrud pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT la sogs pa la yig bcu po'i pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ bshad ma thag ba'i tsi ti yang dag par shes pa la'o zhes pa'i skabs dang phal tsher 'dra [\[]ste/[\] ]byings kyi
[\[208a.6\]]ir rjes 'brel/ byed pa po la shab sogs sbyar bas laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ts+Yota ti/ ts+yota taH ts+yo ta n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ts+yau ta si/ ts+yau ta thaH/ ts+yauta tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ts+yo tAmi/ ts+yau tA baH/ ts+yau tA maH/ ts+Yu tir la ling sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[208a.7\]]ts+yi ti ta/ ts+yo ti tAM/ ts+yo te yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ts+yo teH ts+yo te taM/ ts+yo te ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ts+yo te yaM/ ts+yo teb/ ts+yo tem/ ts+Yu tal loT pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ts+yo ta tu/ ts+yo ta tA ta/ ts+yo ta tAM/ ts+yo ta n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]gsum la/ ts+yo ta/ ts+ya to tA ta/ ts+yo ta taM/ ts+yo ta ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ts+yo tA ni/ ts+yo tA ba/ ts+yo tA ma/ ts+Yu ta la lang gi pa rasmai pad rnams sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ts+yo ta ta/ a ts+yo ta tAM/ a ts+yo ta na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ts+yo taH a ts+yo taM/ a ts+yotata
[\[208b.2\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ts+yo taM/ a ts+yo tA ba/ a ts+yo tA ma/ ts+Yuta la lung sbyar ba'i skabs tsi tI dang cung mi 'dra ste/ i ri to bA/ ir 'gro ba las yang na'o/ /byings ir 'gro ba las pha rol gyi lung la ts+Yi 'o zhes pas pa ra smai pa da'i skabs kyi ts+li ni ang du yang ma 'gyur te/ ts+li ang du
[\[208b.3\]]bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ts+Yu ta ta/ a ts+Yu ta tAM/ a ts+Yu ta na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ts+Yu taH/ ats+Yu ta tAM/ ats+Yu ta ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ts+Yu tA/ a ts+Yu tA ba/ a ts+Yu tA ma/ yang na ts+li si tsar bsgyur/ cho ga thams cad tsi tI'i skabs dang 'dra
[\[208b.4\]]ste! skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ts+yo tAM ti/ a ts+yo taM Sh+TAM/ a ts+yo ti ShAMH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ts+yo tIH a ts+yo ti Sh+TaM/ a ts+yo ti Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ts+yo ti ShaM/ a ts+yo ti Sh+wa/ a ts+yo tiSh+ma/ ts+yu ta la liT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ha lA diH she ShaH/
[\[208b.5\]]hal dang po lhag po'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de'i ts+Yu ta'i tsA lig lta bu hal thog de lhag po ste mi dbyi bar gnas la gzhan hal brtsegs pa'i 'og ma dang mtha' rten hal srog med yod pa rnams ni dbyi'o/ /tsu ts+yo to/ tsu ts+yo ta tuH tsu ts+yo tuH skyes bu dbus ma
[\[208b.6\]]gsum la/ tsu ts+yo ti tha/ tsu ts+yo ti thaH tsu ts+yo ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsu ts+yo ta/ cu ts+yo ti ba/ tsu ts+yo ti ma/ ts+Yu ta la luT pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad tsi tI'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ts+yo ti tA/ ts+yo ti tA rau/ ts+yo ti tA raH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ts+yo ti tA
[\[208b.7\]]si/ ts+yo ti tA s+thaH ts+ya ti tA s+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ts+yo ti tA smi/ ts+yo ti tA spaH ts+yo ti tA smaH ts+Yu ta la smon pa'i ling gi pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang tsi tI'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ts+Yu t+yA ta/ ts+YuM t+yA stAM/ ts+Yu d+yA suH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ts+Yu t+yAH ts+Yu t+yA stAM/
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]ts+Yu t+yA sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ts+Yu t+yA sa/ ts+Yu t+yA sA/ ts+Yu t+yA sma/ ts+Yuta la l+r-iT pa ra smai ba da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad kyang tsi tI'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ts+yau ti Sh+ya ti/ ts+yo ti Sh+ya taH ts+yi ti Sh+ya n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ts+yo ti Sh+ya si/
[\[209a.2\]]ts+yo ti Sh+ya thaH ts+yo ti Sh+ya tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ts+yo ti Sh+yA mi/ ts+yo ti Sh+yA baH ts+yo ti Sh+yA maH ts+Y+Yuta la l+r-ing pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i bya ba rnams kyang tI'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ts+yo ti Sh+ya ta/ a ts+yo ti Sh+ya tAM/ a ts+yau ti Sh+ya na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ts+yo ti Sh+yaH
[\[209a.3\]]a ts+yo ti Sh+ya taM/ a ts+yo ti mya ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ts+yo ti Sh+yaM/ a ts+yo ti Sh+yA ba/ a ts+yo ti Sh+yA ma/ ! sh+ts+Yu tir 'gyur byed la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams phal cher bshad ma thag pa'i ts+Yu tir gyi skabs dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu
[\[209a.4\]]dang po gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ta ti/ sh+ts+yo ta taH sh+ts+yo ta n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ta si/ sh+ts+yo ta thaH sh+ts+yo ta tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yo DA mi/ sh+ts+yo tA baH sh+ts+yo tA maH sh+ts+yu tir la ling gi pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga ts+Yu ha dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ti ta/
[\[209a.5\]]sh+ts+yo te tAM/ sh+ts+yo te yuH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yo teH sh+ts+yo te taM/ sh+ts+yo te ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sh+ts+Yo ta yAM/ sh+ts+yo te ba/ sh+ts+ya te ma/ sh+ts+yu tir la loT pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang ts+Yu tir dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ta tu/ sh+ts+yo ta tA tAM/ sh+ts+yo ta tAM/ sh+ts+yo ta
[\[209a.6\]]n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yo to/ sh+ts+yo ta tA ta/ sh+ts+yo ta taM/ sh+ts+yo ta ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yo tA ni/ sh+ts+yo tA ba/ sh+ts+yo tA ma/ sh+ts+ya tir la lad gi pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang ts+Yu tir dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sh+ts+yo ta ta/ a sh+ts+yo ta tI/ a sh+ts+yo
[\[209a.7\]]ta na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sh+ts+yo taH a sh+ts+yo te taM/ a sh+ts+yo ta ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sh+ts+yo ti/ a sh+ts+yo tA ba/ a sh+ts+yo tA ma/ sh+ts+yu tir la lung gi pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang ts+Yu tir gyi skabs dang 'dra ste/ ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsa ra bsgyur ba
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]'dam ka can du byas pas ang gi phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sh+ts+yu ta ta/ a sh+ts+yu ta tA/ a sh+ts+yu ta na/[ \[]skyes [\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sh+ts+yu taH a sh+ts+yu ta ta/ a sh+ts+yu ha ta/[ \[]skyes[\]] bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sh+ts+yu taM/ a sh+ts+yu tA pa/ a sh+ts+yu tA ma/ tsI si tsar bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[209b.2\]]la/ a sh+ts+yo tI ta/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+TAM/ a sh+ts+yo ShaH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sh+ts+yi tIH a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+TaM/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sh+ts+yo to ShaM/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+wa/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ma/ sh+ts+yu tir la iT pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang a b+h+yA sa dbyi sa'i phyogs cung zad mi 'dra ba ma gtogs ts+Yu tir
[\[209b.3\]]gyi skabs dang 'dra ste/ sha r+pU rbAHkha yaH shar snga ma rnams kha ya rnams so/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de'i yi ge snga ma shar so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin la/ de'i phyi ma de kha ya so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin na kha ya de gnas shing hal gzhan rnams dbyi [\[]ste[\]]/ skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[209b.4\]]la/ tsu sh+ts+yu ta/ tsu sh+ts+ya ta tuH tsu sh+ts+yo tuH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsu sh+ts+yo ti tha/ tsu sh+ts+yo ta thuH tsu sh+ts+yo ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsu sh+ts+yo ta/ tsu sh+ts+yo ti ba/ tsu sh+ts+yo ti ma/ tsash+ts+Yu tir la luT pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad [\[]ts+Yu [\]]tir gyi skabs dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ti tA/
[\[209b.5\]]sh+ts+yo ti tA ro/ ats+yo ti tA raH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ti tA si/ sh+ts+yo ti tA s+thaH sh+ts+yo ti tA s+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yi ti tA smi/ sh+ts+yo ti tA spaH sh+ts+yo ti tA smaH sh+ts+Yu tir la smon pa'i ling pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad n+yu tir gyi skabs dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sh+ts+yu t+yA ta/
[\[209b.6\]]sh+ts+yu t+yA stAM/ sh+ts+yu t+ya suH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yu t+yAH sh+ts+yu t+yA staM/ sh+ts+yu t+yA sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yu t+yU saM/ sh+ts+yu t+yA sba/ sh+ts+yu t+yA sma/ sh+ts+yu tir la l+raT smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang ts+Yu tir gyi skabs dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya te/ sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya taHsh+ts+yo ti D+ya n+ti/
[\[209b.7\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya si/ sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya thaH sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ts+ya tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sh+ts+yo ti sh+ts+yA mi/ sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ts+yA baH sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ts+yA maH sh+ts+yu tir la l+r-ing pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang ts+yu tir gyi skabs dang 'dra ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya ta/ a sh+ts+yo tiT+ya tAM/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya na/
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+yaH a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya taM/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+ya ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+yaM/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+yA ba/ a sh+ts+yo ti Sh+yA ma/ ! ma n+tha sru ba pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs la yig bcu po'i pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad bshad ma
[\[210a.2\]]thag pa dang 'dra la/ 'o na kyang smon pa'i ling la i 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams kyi ha la u pa d+hA'i kang 'gro ba la'o zhes pas na dbyi ba bon [\[]ste/[\] ]laT la/ ma n+tha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ma n+thita sogs dang / loT la/ man+tha tu sogs dang / lang la/ a man+thata sogs so/ /lung la/ a man+thAti sogs
[\[210a.3\]]dang / liT ya/ ma ma n+tha/ man+tha tuH/ sogs so/ /luT la/ man+tha tI/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ smon pa la ki ta'o zhes pas na phyis/ math+yAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la man+thi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la a man+thi Sh+ya ta sogs te/ bya ba lhag po dang mi 'dra ba ci yang med do/ /i di to num d+hA to/ /i ta
[\[210a.4\]]brtsegs pa ma yin pa la liT kita'o [\[]nas byung bas [\]]brtsegs pa yin pas liT ka ti ma yin pas na mid byi'o/ /'gro ba'i byings kyi nu ma'o/ /byings ku thi lta bu ita 'gro ba rnams kyi pha rol tu ming du bsgrubs pa'i rkyen dang / tshig tu bsgrubs pa'i rkyen gang byung yang byings de la nu ma A ga ma ster te / ma gnas don dang u brjod don no// ! byings ku ti
[\[210a.5\]]'tshe ba dang nyon mongs pa dag la'o [\[]zhes pa[\]]la la Tasogs ba ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i laT la/ kun+tha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ku n+thi ta sogs so/ /liT la/ a kun+d+ra tu sogs so/ lang la/ a ku n+tha ta sogs so/ /lung la a kan+thI ta sogs so/ /liT la/ ku ho Sh+tsuH ku ha dag gi tsu'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+yA sa'i ming
[\[210a.6\]]can de ku ste sde yin na grangs mthun pa'i tsa sbar 'gyur zhing ha yig na dz+ha yig tu 'gyur la/ dz+ha di yang a b+h+yA sa'i car 'ang ngo zhes pas dza yig tu 'gyur te/ tsu kun+tha/ cu kun+tha tuH tsu kun+thuH sogs so/ /luT la/ kun+tha tI sogs dang / smon pa'i ling la skabs 'dir i 'gro ba'i num yin pas nra ying sh+khi/
[\[210a.7\]]kuSh+Th+ya tas gas so/ /l+r-iT la/ kun+thi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ l+r-ing la/ a kun+thi Sh+ya ta sogs te rigs 'gre'o/ /d+hA dA deH ShaHsaH byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa'o/ /Shi d+hu lta bu byings kyi dang po'i Sha yig ni sa yig tu 'gyur te/ ! Shi d+hu 'gro ba la'o/ /zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i laTa'i
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ se d+ha ti/ u pa sargA d+su no ti su ba ti s+ya ti stau ti stau d+ha ti s+thA se na ya se b+ha si tsa sany+dza swa ny+dzAM/ nyer bsgyur las/ su ni ti su bti s+ya ti stau ti  sto b+ha ti s+thA se na ya  se d+ha si tsa sany+dza sA ny+dza rnams kyi'o/ /nyer bsgyur sa yig Sha yig tu 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can snga
[\[210b.2\]]ma las byings su ni taM sogs te/ ShU ta bskyed pa/ ShU nya ded pa/ Sho mtha'i las/ Sh+Tu nya bstod pa/ Sh+Tu b+ha rengs pa/ Sh+ThA gnas pa/ Shi nya 'ching ba/ Shi b+hu 'gro ba/ Shi tsa 'dzag pa/ Shany+dza chags ba/ Shany+dza 'khyur ba rnams kyi dang po'i Sha yig byings kyi ngang po'i Sha'i sa 'os Sha sar bsgyur ba rnams
[\[210b.3\]]slar yang Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/ /sa dir pra teH pra ti ma yin pas sa di'i/ /pra ti ma yin pa ste bor bas nyer bsgyur gzhan Shar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can dang po las sa di ste byings Sha d+li 'gro Sha 'gyur ba'i sa yang slar Shar 'gyur ro/ staM b+heH sta m+b+hi'i'o/ /nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon ma
[\[210b.4\]]las sa zhi [\]]te/ byings Sh+Ta b+hi so sor 'ching ba  sa yig kyang slar Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/ a bA ts+tsA la m+ba nA bi dU r+Ya yoH a ba las kyang brten pa dang mi ring ba dag la'o/ /a ba snga ma las kyang sta m+b+hi'i yig brten pa dang mi ring ba'i don la 'jug pa na Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/ /pe sh+tsa sba no b+ho dza ne/ bi
[\[210b.5\]\[]yas kyang [\]]swa na'i zas la'o/ /bi dang yang gi sgras a ba sngon ma las kyang swa na ti zas kyi don la 'jug pa na Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/ /pa ri ni bi b+h+yaHse ba si tas ya si ba sa ha suT stu Sh+wa ny+dzuM/ ba ri ni bi rnams las se ba si ta  sa ya si ba sa ha  stu  Sh+wany+dza  suT rnams kyi'o/ /nyer bsgyur ba ti dang /
[\[210b.6\]]ni dang bi rnams snga ma las/ byings se ba sogs te/ She br-i 'thong ba/ si ta dang Shi nya 'ching ba/ Shi bu thags 'thag pa/ kha ha bzod pa/ Sh+Tunya bstod pa/ Sh+wany+dza 'khyud pa rnams dang suT dang 'brel pa'i sa yig rnams Sha yig tu 'gyur ro/ /ni sngon ma'i Shi d+hu la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/
[\[210b.7\]]ni She d+ha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ni She d+he ta sogs so/ /loT la/ ni She d+ha tu sogs so/ /bra ka si tA da T+ya ba yonya bi/ si ta las dang por aT sa bar chod pa las kyang ngo / /nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon na yod pa las si ta ste su no ti la sogs pa rnams kyi sa yig ni aT A ga ma bar na yod ba
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]las kyang Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ lang la/ n+ya She d+ha ta sogs so/ /lung la/ n+ya She d+hi ta sogs so/ /s+thA di Sh+wa b+h+yA se na tsA b+h+yA sa s+ya/ s+tha la sogs pa rnams la a b+h+yA sa yis kyang a b+h+yA sa'i 'o/ /nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can snga ma las/ s+thA la sogs pa rnams kyi byings gnyis
[\[211a.2\]]brjod pa a b+h+yA sa'i ming can yod na a b+h+yA sa de nyid Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ liT la/ ni Shi She d+ha/ mdo 'dis sa snga ma Sha dang kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa phyi ma Sha/ ni Shi Shi d+hi tuH ni Shi Shi d+huH brtsegs pa ma yin pa'i zhes pas 'dir piT kita li na pas yon tan mi byed/ sogs so/ /luT la/ ni She d+hi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling
[\[211a.3\]]la ni Shi d+h+yA ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la ni She d+hi Sh+ya ti sogs dang / khr-ing la n+ya She d+hi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /se d+ha te rga tau/ /se d+ha ti 'gro ba la'o/ /nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon na yod kyang byings Shi d+ha 'gyur ba'i sa yig ni 'gro ba'i don brjod pa la Shar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ni snga ma'i Shi d+ha 'gro ba
[\[211a.4\]]la laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i/[ \[]latral[\]]/ ni se d+ha ti sogs te/[ \[]dag [\]]tu sbyar na/ ni se d+ha ti pAM/ ling la ni se d+he ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ ni se d+ha tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ n+ya se d+ha ta sogs so/ /lung la n+ya se d+hi ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ ni si se d+ha/ ni si si d+ha tuH
[\[211a.5\]]sogs so/ /luT la/ ni se d+hi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ni si d+h+yA ta/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ba lang rnams nges par 'gro bar byed/ ni se d+hi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ n+ya si d+hi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /!Shi d+hU bstan bcos la  brtsegs pa ma yin pa la zhes pas 'dir liT kita yin pa u ba d+hA yon tan mi byed/ ste 'akra shis
[\[211a.6\]]ba lang 'ang ngo / /zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs sbyar ba'i cho ga  smon pa la kita 'os u pa d+hA yon tan me byed/ rnams kyang bshad ma thag pa rnams dang 'dra ste 'on kyang lung man chad byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams kyi skabs su cung mi 'dra'o/ /laT la/ sed+ha ti sogs dang / ling la/ se d+he ta/ sogs dang / loT la
[\[211a.7\]]se d+ha tu sogs dang / lang la/ a se d+ha ta sogs so/ /lung la/ swa ra ti sU ti sU ya ti d+hUnyU di to bA/ swa ra ti sU ya ti  d+hUnya  U 'gro ba rnams yang na'o/ /byings/ sbr-i sgra la'o dang / ShUnya dang ShU nga mngon par skye ba dang / b+hU [\[]ta [\]]g.yo ba rnams dang / byings U 'gro ba rnams la byings phyed pa lbal dang po rnams
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]la iT yang na ba bya ste/ iT+wa byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang pa gsum la/ a se d+hI ta/ a se d+hI Sh+TAM/ a se d+hi ShAH skye /bu dbus ma gsum la/ a se d+hiH a se d+hi Sh+TaM/ a si d+hi Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a se d+hi ShaM/ a se d+hi Sh+wa/ a se d+hi Sh+ma/ sogs te snga ma rnams dang 'dra la/ iT mi
[\[211b.2\]]ster ba'i phyogs kyi lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a sai t+sI ta/[ \[]Shi d+hU [\]]la lung U iT yang na pa'i don/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os sa Sha/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT Ta gnas don rjes 'brel byes nas/ la ti ba du bsgyur/ ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis/ lung la ts+la'i sa ts+li byin/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ tsa dang i phyis ba ta bra dza ha la mtha' rnams
[\[211b.3\]]kyi a tsa'i 'os byings kyi u pa d+hA 'phel ga a sti bi ca'i a br-i ltas 'os  IT/ gnas don/ khar la tsa ra 'os d+ha ta/ dz+ha lo dz+ha li/ dz+hal gyi dz+hal la'o/ /byings kyi mtha' dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin pa'i pha rol gyi ts+li 'gyur ba'i si tsa ni rnam dbye dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la 'jig go/ /dz+ha Sha sta tho dz+honya d+haH
[\[211b.4\]]t+tA ma yin pa'i dz+ha Sha las ta tha dag gi d+ha'o/ /phyings Du dz+hAnya ma yin pa'i byings mtha' dz+haSha so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin pa'i pha rol gyi ta yig dang bra yig dag ni d+ha yig ru 'gyur ro/ /lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ a sai d+hUM/ Shi d+hU la lung / byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os Sha sa/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la
[\[211b.5\]]aT/ lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ bad tha dza ta la mtha' rnams kyi a tsa'i 'os byings 'phel brjes 'brel phyis la tas su bsgyur/ tas thas mi tha mi ba sogs kyis tas tAM du bsgyur/ dz+ha la gyi sh+tsA la la 'os si tsa 'jig/ mdo 'dis ta d+har bsgyur/ dz+ha shab dz+ha rnams kyi dza 'os d+ha gong ma dar bsgyur da [\[]dra bka[\] ]skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ a si sat+suH[ \[]Shi b+hU ba/[\]]
[\[211b.6\]\[]thang [\] ]byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os sa ma lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyis byings la aT/ lung la ts+li 'os tsI byin ts+Yi'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyug a dang tsa phyis rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la dz+hir bsgyur/ si tsa a b+h+yAs bi di rnams las kyang ngos dz+hi dus su bsgyur/ tsu Tu sogs kyis dza phyis/ bad bra dza ha la mtha' rnams kyi a tsa'i 'os byings 'phel ba/ khar la tsar 'os  dz+ha ta ri ma bzhin drangs/ skyes bu dbus
[\[211b.7\]]ma gsum la/ a sai t+sI/ a sai d+d+haM/ a sai d+d+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sai t+saM/ a sai t+s+ma/ a sai t+s+ma/ Shi d+hU la liT pa ra smai ba da rnams sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ si se d+ha/ si se d+ha/ si se tuH si se d+huH skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la iT yang na bar byas pas/ si se d+hi tha/ si si d+ng+ha/ skyes
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ si se d+ha thuH si se d+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ si se d+ha/ si se d+hA/ la bas/ bas bar bsgyur d+ha drangs/ si se d+h+ma/ la mas/ mas mar bsgyur d+ha ma la drangs/ Shi d+hU la luT ba ra smrai bad rnams sbyar/ iT yang na bar byas pa'i iT byin pa'i
[\[212a.2\]]phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ se d+hi tA/ se d+hi tA rau/ se d+hi tA raH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ se d+hi tA si/ se d+hi tA s+thaH se d+ha tA s+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ se d+hi tA mi/ se d+hi tA sAH se d+hi tA smaH sogs so/ /iT ma ster ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ se d+d+hA/
[\[212a.3\]]se d+t+hA rau/ sad+t+hA raH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ se d+t+hA si/ se d+t+hA s+thaH se d+t+hA s+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sed+t+hA mi/ se d+t+hA swaH se d+t+hA swaH se d+t+hA smaH Shi d+hU la smon pa'i ling gi pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar pa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ si d+h+yA ta/ si d+h+yA staM/ si d+h+yA su/ skyes bu dbus mi gsum
[\[212a.4\]]la/ si d+h+yAH si d+h+ya staM/ si d+h+ya sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ si d+h+yA saM/ si d+h+yA sma/ si d+h+yA sma/ Shi d+hU la l-iT pa ra smai pa da rnams sa sbyar iT sting ba dang mi stir ba 'dam ka can du byas ba'i iT sbyar pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ se d+hi Sh+ya ti/ se d+hi Sh+ya taH si d+hi Sh+ya n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[212a.5\]]la/ se d+hi Sh+ya si/ se d+hi Sh+ya thaH se d+hi Sh+ya tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ se d+hi Sh+yA mi/ sa d+hi Sh+yA maH iT mi ster ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a se t+s+ya ti/ se t+s+ya taH se t+s+ya n+ti/ se t+s+ya n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e t+m+ya si/ se t+s+ya thaH se t+s+ya tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[212a.6\]]se t+s+yA mi/ se t+s+yA baH se t+s+yA maH Shi d+hU la l+r-ing pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar/ iT yang na pa ra byas pa'i iT sbyin pa'i  phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a se d+hi Sh+ya ta/ a se d+hi Sh+ya tAM/ a se d+hi Sh+ya na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a se d+hi Sh+ya taM/ a se d+hi Sh+ya ta/ skyes
[\[212a.7\]]bu gsum la/ a se d+hi Sh+yaM/ a se d+hi Sh+yA ba/ a se d+ha Sh+yA ma/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a se t+s+ya ta/ a se t+s+ya tAM/ a se t+s+ya na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a se t+s+yaH a se t+s+ya taM/ a se t+s+ya ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]set+s+yAM/ a se t+s+yA ba/ a se t+s+yA ma/ ! khad brtan pa la ste 'tshe ba la'ang ngo / /zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang snga ma rnams dang 'dra la 'on kyang lung gi skabs cung zad mi 'dra ste/ de yang laT la/ kha da ti/ sogs dang / ling
[\[212b.2\]]la/ kha de ta/ sogs dang / kho Ta la/ khad tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a kha da ta/ sogs so/ /a to ha lA de rA g+hoH hal dang po'i ata thung ngu'i 'o/ /ts+li 'gyur ba'i si tsa ba ra smi pa da can pha rol la byings hal dang po ste atsa gcig pu ma yin pa'i hal gyi srog
[\[212b.3\]]tu zhugs pa'i a yig thung ngu ni 'phel ba byed pa dang mi byed pa 'dam kha can te/ lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a kha dI ta/ a khA dIta/ gnyis tshig la/ a kha diSh+TAM/ a khA di Sh+TAM/ mang tshig la/ a kha di ShuH a khA di ShuH sogs so/ a ta
[\[212b.4\]]u pa d+hA yAH u ba d+hA'i a ta kyi'o/ /rkyen nya 'gro ba dang Na 'gro ba dag pha rol la byings kyi u pa d+hA'i a yig ni 'phel bar 'gyur te/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ tsa khA da/ khad la/ liT/ liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag po
[\[212b.5\]]'os dra gang ma phyis/[ \[]ku[\]] ha dag gcu 'os/ kha gong ma tsha/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ tsha tsar bsgyur/ rjes 'brel byis nas/ l+ra tib du bsgyur/ pa ra smai bde rnams kyi Nal sogs kyis ti pa Nal du bsgyur la khyad don mdo 'dis u pad+hA'i a 'phel ba sogs Na de'i don da a la drangs/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ tsa kha da tuH tsa kha duH skyes
[\[212b.6\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa kha di tha/ tsa kha da thuH tsa kha da/ Na lu d+ha mo bA/ Nal phyi ma'i yang na'o/ /liTa'i skyes bu phyi ma'i Nal pha rol la u pa d+hA'i a 'phel bar byed pa dang mi byed pa yang na ba bya ste/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ tsa khA da/ tsa kha da/ gnyis tshig
[\[212b.7\]]dang mang tshig la/ tsa kha di ba/ tsa kha di ma/ luT la/ kha di tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kha d+yA ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ kha di Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a kha di Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /!ga da gsal bar brjod pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]cho ga rnams kyang sA ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ ga da ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ga de ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ ga da tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a ga da ta/ sogs so/ /lung la u ba d+hA 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ a gA dI ta/ a ga dI ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ dza gA da/
[\[213a.2\]]dza ga da tuH dza ga duH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza ga di tha/ dza ga da thuH dza ga da/ skyes bu [\[]phyi [\]]ma gsam la/ dza gA da/ dza ga da/ Nal phyi ma'i yang na 'os 'phel ba dang ma ka byas ba'o/ /[\[]dzag di ba/[\] ]dza ga di ma/ luT la/ ga di tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ga d+yA ta  byings gnyis brjod nas ku har [\[]ga ge tsu [\]]'os ga dza ra bsgyur/
[\[213a.3\]]sogs so/ /l+riT la/ ga di Sh+ya taM sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a ga di Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /byings gad sogs pha rol la nyer bsgyur ni la rnam 'gyur 'byung tshul ni/ ne rga dan da ba ta pa da stu mA s+ya ti ha n+ti yA ti pA ti drA ti b+sA tib ya ti ba ha ti shA mya ti tsi no ti deg+g+hIShu tsa/ ni'i gad/ gad gsal por brjod [\[]pa la'o stan da Nad [\]]mi gsal ba'i
[\[213a.4\]]s+tha la'o/ /pa ta ba tI ldung ba la'o/ ba da  bad 'gro ba la ro/ /gU byings d+hu'i ming can [\[]Du[\]] d+hAnya 'dzin pa dang [\[]D+ya [\]]dAnya sbyin pa gnyis/ mA mang [(]mchad [,]ma chad [)]ba la'o/ /s+ya ti  Sho mtha'i las la'o/ /ha n+ti  ha na 'tsho ba la ste 'gro ba la'ang ngo / /yA ti lnga thob par byed pa la'o/ /pA ti  ba 'gro ba la ste dri la'ang ngo / /drA ti  dA smad pa kha ro/ /p+sA ti  blA mtha' ba la'o/ pa ya ti be nya lags [\[]'thag [\]]ba stsa'o/ /ba ha ti  ba ha thob
[\[213a.5\]]pa la go/ shA mya ti sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o/ tsi no ti tsinya gsog pa la'o/ /de ha de ha ga thog pa la'o/ rnams pa'ang ngo / /byings ga da la sogs pa 'di rnams pha rol la nyer bsgyur na Nar 'gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan can rnams las pha rol gyi nyer bsgyur ni'i na yig Na ru 'gyur te/ bra dang ni snga ma'i ga da la laT sogs sbyar ni'i na Nar
[\[213a.6\]]bsgyur bas/ pra Ni ga da ti/ sogs so/ /! rang rnam par rko ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i liTa'i skabs su cung zad gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ ra di ta/ sogs sa/ /ling la/ ra de ta sogs so/ /loT la/ ra da tu sogs so/ /
[\[213a.7\]]nges par rab tu rjod par byed/ lang la/ a ra da ta sogs so/ /lung la/ 'phel ba yang na ba byas pas/ a rA rI ta/ a ra dI ta/ sogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ra rA da/ a ta e [\[]ka ha l+ma d+h+yenya nA [\]]de shA de rmi Ti/ liT la dang po kun nas bsgyur ba ma yin pa'i hal gcig
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]pa dbus ma'i ata kyi'o/ /liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+ya sa'i can di a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngo 'am/ ku ha dag gi tsu'o zhes ba lta bu'i kun nas bsgyur pa ma yin pa'i dbus ma ste/ de'i pha rol gyi yi ge de brtsegs pa ma yin pa hal
[\[213b.2\]]gcig pa yin pa'i srog gi a yig ni e yig tu 'gyur zhing a b+h+yasa'i ming can de yang dbyi ste/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ red tuH re duH tha li tsa se Ti/ thal la'ang iT dang bcas pa la'o/ liTa'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig
[\[213b.3\]\[]re[\]]da la/ laT/ liT la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag pa'o zhes pas dgong ma phyis/ rjes 'brel phyis nas/ l+ra tas dang dz+hi ru bsgyur ba ra smai [\[]bar [\]]rnams kyi zhes pas/ tas a tus dang dz+hi us su bsgyur/ mdo 'dis phyi ma'i sog i dang [\[]sho ma [\]]phyis dwa a dang us pa drangs/ thal i n+da dang bcas pa
[\[213b.4\]]pha rol la'ang bshad ma thag pa bzhin 'gyur te/ ra di tha/ skyes bu dbus ma dang phyi ma la/ red thuH red/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ ra rA da/ ra ra da/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ re di ba/ re di ma/ luT sogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/
[\[213b.5\]]luT la/ ra di tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling  rang la liT/ la/ ra d+yA ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ra di Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ ar di Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /Ni naH Na'i na'o/ /byings kyi dang po'i Na yig ni na yig tu 'gyur te/ ! byings Na da mi gsal ba'i sgra la'o/ /zhes pa la laT
[\[213b.6\]]sogs sbyar mdo 'dis Na na ru bsgyur/ gzhan cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ nad ti sogs so/ /ling la/ na da ta sogs so/ /loT la/ nad tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a na da ta sogs so/ /lang la/ a na da ta sogs so/ /lung la 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ a nA dI ta/ a
[\[213b.7\]]na dI ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ na nA da/ med tuH ne duH sogs so/ /luT la/ na di tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ na d+yA ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ na di Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a na di Sh+ya ta sogs te cho ga mi 'dra ba ci yang me do/ /u pas rgAd sa mA se\u0f85pi no pa de sha s+ya/ nyer bsgyur las
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]tshig sdud ma yin pa las kyang Na nye ba'i yul gyi'o/ /Na nye ba'i yul te byings kyi dang po'i Na Na'i na 'os/ na yig tu bsgyur ba'i ha yig ni nyer bsgyur na  Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can dang po las/ tshig sdud dang tshig sdud ma yin pa las kyang Nar 'gyur te/ pra snga ma'i Nad la
[\[214a.2\]]laT/ na'i na 'os/ Na nar bsgyur/ mdo 'dis slar yang Nar bsgyur/ pra Na da ti sogs so/ ! /a rda 'gro ba la ste slong ba la'ang do zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang liTa'i skabs phran bu ma gtogs bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laT la/
[\[214a.3\]]a rda ti sogs so/ ling la a rde ta sogs so/ /loT la/ a rda tu sogs so/ /rab tu mi gsal ba'i sgra/ lang la/ A rda ta/ a rda la lang byed pa po la sha ba 'os sha ba byin pa dang sha phyis/ rjes 'brel phyis nas/ l+ra tib tu bsgyur/ ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis/ lung lang l+r-ing sogs kyi byings la aT Ta gnas don atsa dang
[\[214a.4\]]po rnams kyi AT 'os byings la AT yang byin/ Ta gnas don a ka 'dra ba la ring po 'os a A a gsum ring po gcig tu song / sogs so/ /lung la/ A [\[]rdI [\]]ta sogs so/ /a ta A deH dang po'i a ta kyi'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de hal gyi srog tu zhugs pa lta bu ma yin
[\[214a.5\]]pa'i a yig kho na yin na a de ring por 'gyur ro/ /ta smA n+nu Ta dwi ha laH de las nuT hal gnyis pa rnams so/ /gong du bshad  atsa dang po rnams kyi AT 'os AT Ta gnas son/ pa'i a ring por song ba de las pha rol gyi a yig la nuT A ga ma ster te de yang a yig de'i pha rol tu hal nyis
[\[214a.6\]]brtsegs yod pa zhig dgos so/ /liT la/ A na rda/ A na rda tuH A na rduH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A ne rdi tha/ A na rda thuH A na rda/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A nA rda/ A na rdi ba/ A na rdi ma/ luT la/ A rdi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la
[\[214a.7\]]A r+d+yA ta  a rda la/ a tsa gcig pa'i gnyis so so a gnyis brjod/ dang po'i aT kyi 'os a gong ma ring por song / mdo 'di sa a phyi ma la nuT A ga ma byin/ Ta gnas don u brjod don rjes 'brel rnams phyis nas/ l+ra ti pa tas [\[]dz+hi [\]]rnams su bsgyur pa ra smai bad rnams kyi zhes pas ti pa sogs rim bzhin/[ \[]nal[\]]/[ \[]a tas yus na mas su bsgyur ba'o[\]]
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ardiSh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+ring la/ Ardi Sh+yata sogs so// ! i di mchog gi dbang phyug nyid la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs bar sme+e pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang phal cher 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ in+da ti/ in+dataHin+tan+ti/
[\[214b.2\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsa dang po rnams kyi AT 'os/ AT dang byings kyi a mtshams sbyar bas a ring bo gcig tu song / in+dasi/ i n+da thaH in+da tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ in+bA mi/ in+dA baH in+dAmaH/ ling gi i 'phro bal nus 'os/[ \[]phyi[\]]ngas nus ma gnas don u brjod don/ skyes
[\[214b.3\]]bu dang po gsum la/ in+deta/ in+detAM/ in+deyuH ling gi skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ inreH in+de taM/ in+de taM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ in+da yaM/ in+de pa/ in+de ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ in+da tu/ in+da tAta/ in+da tAM/
[\[214b.4\]]in+dan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ in+da/ in+datAta/ in+da taM/ in+da ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ in+dAni/ in+dAni/ in+dA ba/ in+dAm/ ADadzAngInAM/ atsa dang po rnams kyi ATango / /byings a tsa dang po rnams la lung lang l+r-ing rnams pha rol la aT mi ster bar
[\[214b.5\]]AT Ab ma ster te/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e+en+data/ e+en+datAM/ in+dan/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e+en+ngaH/ e+en+da te/ e+en+da ta/ skyes bu phyim gsum la/ e+en+daM/ e+en+dA ba/ e+enrAm/ lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e+en+dI ta/ in+diSh+waM/ e+en+deSh+waH

[\[214b.7\]]in+diSh+ma/ i dzA de sh+tsa gu ru ma tonyanats+tshaH r-its+tsham yin pa'i i tsa dang bo las kyang lci ba ldan pa las so/ /byings r-its+tsha 'gro bam yin pa ste bor ba'i byings kyi dang po'i yi ge de i tsa so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yin pa i tsa'i yi ge de yang lci ba dang ldan pa de las pha rol tu liT 'gyur ba'i rnam
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]dbye rnams byung na byings de'i mtha' la A ma rkyen du ster te skabs 'di'i ma yig ni gnas kyi don ma yin pas mi dbyi'o/ /AmaH Am las so/ /byings la Am sbyar ba'i pha rol las liT 'gyur pa'i rnam dbye thams cad 'jig go/ /kr-iny+shu nu pra yu dz+ya te li Ti/ kr-inya'ang
[\[215a.2\]]rjes su rab tu sbyor te leT la'o/ /byings Am sbyar ba las kr-inya zhes pa so sor bsdu ba ste/ kr-ib+hU a sti rnams rjes su rab tu sbyor bar bya ste de rnams la liTa'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /ur ta/ r-i'i ata'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a th+h+yasa'i ming can dor yag yan na ata du 'gyur
[\[215a.3\]]ter pha rol lo/ /liTa'i par sme+e pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ in+dAM tsa kAr/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ika gi a tsal yaN 'os r-i ru rub bsgyur bas in+dI tsakra tuH -in+dAM tsakruH/ kr-isr-ib+h+r-ibr-istu dru sru shru po liTi/ liT la kr-i sr-i b+h+r-i br-i s+shu du su shrU las so/ /byings Du kr-inya
[\[215a.4\]]yi dil/ l-iT/ i 'gro ba la num 'os byings la num ma dang u phyis/ raMts+tsham yin pa'i i tsa dang po las kyang lci ba ldan pa las sos byings la Am sbyar/ Am las sos liT 'jig/ in+dAM zhes pa grub/ kr-inya'ang rjes su rab tu sbyor te l-iT la ro zhes pas kr-i sbyar laMT la 'os kr-i la l-iT sbyar/ liT la byings ab+h+yA+os med pa'i 'os byings
[\[215a.5\]]gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis raM ar dang ram rol/ hal dang po lhag po 'os ra yang phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu'os ka tsa rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la ti pa du bsgyur/ par smai pa da rnams kyi zhes pas ti pa Nal du bsgyur/ nyaN 'gro ba la a tsa'i 'os/ r-i a+wa/ r-i'i aN las rab rol 'os/ raA ga ma/ ra a la drangs/ byed pa sr-i 'gro ba b+h+r-inya
[\[215a.6\]]'gangs pa/ br-inya sgrib pa/ Sh+Tunya bstod pa/ dru dang sru 'gro ba/ shru thos pa rnams las pha rol gyi liT la iT 'jug pa ma yin te/ liTa'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ in+ngAM tsa kar+tha/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ zhin+dAM tsakrathuH in+dAM tsakra/ skyes bu phyi ma'i
[\[215a.7\]]gcig tshig la 'phel ba yang na par byas pas/ in+d+waM tsa kAr/ in+hAM tsa ka ra/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ in+dAMtsa kr-im/ in+ngAM zhes bsgrubs bal b+hU dang asti liT dang bcas pa sbyar bar bya ste/ de gnyis la liT sbyar ba'i tshog so so'i skabs su bshad pa las
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]bya ba lhag po med de/ b+hU la/ in+dAM bab+hU pa/ in+dAM bab+hU ba tuH irdAM ba bA buHsogs so/ /asti sbyar bas in+dA mA sa/ in+dAmAsuHsogs so/ /luTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ in+ditA/ /irdi tA ro+o/ /in+di tAraH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[215b.2\]]in+di tA si/ in+di tAs+tha/ i n+di tA s+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ in+dit+nisma/ in+di tAsAH in+ditAspaH smon pa'i ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ i n+b+yAta/ in+d+tAstAM/ in+ng+yA suH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ in+d+yAH i[\[]n+b+ya[\]]staM/ in+d+yAsto/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[215b.3\]]la/ in+d+yAsaM/ in+d+yA swa/ in+t+yA sma/ l+r-iTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ in+diSh+yati/ in+diSh+ya haH in+diSh+yan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ in+di Sh+yi si/ in+ngi Sh+ya thaH/ skyein+ngi Sh+ya tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ in+dI[\[]Sh+yar [\]]mi/ in+ta'i Sh+yA baH in+dISh+yAmaH l+r-ing
[\[215b.4\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e+en+di Sh+yata/ e+en+di Sh+yatAM/ e+en+diSh+ya tAM/ e+en+di Sh+yan/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e+en+di Sh+yaH e+en+diSh+ya taM/ e+en+di Sh+yata/ skyes bu phyim gsum la/ e+en+diSh+yaM/ e+en+di Sh+yaM ba/ e+en+ngi Sh+yA ma/ ! byings Ni di smad pa la'o zhes pa la/ laT
[\[215b.5\]]sogs par sme+e pa da rnams/ a tsa dang bo rnams kyi AT 'os byings la a+waT/ AT las kyang a tsa'i 'os 'phel ga sbyar ba'i cho ga yang bshad ma thag pa dang rigs 'gre ste/ laT la/ nin+da ti sogs so/ /ling la/ nin+de ta sogs so/ /loT la/ nid tu sogs so/ /lang la/ an+din+dita
[\[215b.6\]]sogs so/ /lung la/ a nin+dI ta sogs so/ /liT la/ ni ni n+da sogs so/ /luT la/ nin+di ta sogs dang / smon pa'i ling lan n+d+yA ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ nin+di Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ anin+ngiSh+yata sogs so/ /bA ni n+sa ni k+Sha ni n+dAM/ nin+sa nik+Sha nin+da rnams
[\[215b.7\]]kyi yang na'o/ /nyer bsgyur Na nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can snga ma las byings Na si dang Nik+Sha'o byed pa la'o zhes pa gnyis dang / bshad ma thag pa Ni di smad pa gsum gyi Na 'gyur ba'i slar Na na yig tu yang 'gyur te/ praNin+nga ti/ rab tu smad par byed/ pra nin+nga ti/ rab tu smad bar byed/ pra nin+nga ti lta bu'o/ /! byings la
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]la 'gro ba'i don la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs par smi pad rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyar liTa'i skabs su cung zad ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ o kha ti/ sogs so/ /ling la/ o kheta sogs so/ /loT la/ o kha tu sogs
[\[216a.2\]]so/ /lang la au khata/ sogs so/ /lung la/ o+o+o+o khAti/ sogs so/ /a smyas s+yAs bar+Ne/ a b+h+yAsa'i 'dra bam yin pa la'o/ /byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yAsa'i ming can de hal gyi srog tu zhugs pa ma yin pa'i u dang i yig gang rung yin la/ de'i pha rol tu atsa 'dra bam
[\[216a.3\]]yin pa byung na u ni uba? dang i ni i y+ra zhes par 'gyur/ atsa dang po rnams kyi AT 'os/ byings la AT+Ta gnas don/ AT las kyang atsali 'os 'phel ba/ te! liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ u bo kha/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ u kha tuH u khuH skyes bu
[\[216a.4\]]u kha la liT atsa gcig pa'i dang po'i gnyis so zhes pas u gnyis brjod/ rjes 'brel phyis nas/ la? ti pa du bsgyur/ bar sme+e pa da rnams kyi zhes pas ti paN du bsgyur bu ka mtha' u bang+hA thung ngu dag gi 'ang ngos u pa ng+hA yon tan mdo 'dis u mu bar bsgyur rin bzhin drangs/ dbus ma gsum la/ u bo khi tha/
[\[216a.5\]]U kha thuH Ukha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u bo kha/ u bo khi ba/ u bo khim/ luT la/ o khi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ u khyAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ o khaM Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ o khi Sh+yata sogs so/ ! /a ny+tsu 'gro ba dang mchod
[\[216a.6\]]pa byed pa dag la'o zhes pa'i byings [\[]ya[\]] laT sogs par smai ma da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang smon pa'i ling gi skabs sun dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba cho ga phran tsam ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ an+tsa ta sogs so/ /loT la/ an+tsa tu sogs so/ /lang la/ Any+tsa ta sogs so/ /lung la/ Any+tsItu
[\[216a.7\]]sogs dang / liT la/ A\u0f85 ta \u0f7cgas so/ /lung la/ A \u0f85\u0fa9\u0f71\u0f72ta sogs dang / /liTal/ An ny+tsa a tsa dang po'i ata kyi 'os a gongs ring bo des zhuT hal gnyis pa rnams sos/ nuT A gam/ sogs so/ /luT la/ any+tsi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ smon pa la ki ta'o zhes pas rnam
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]dbye rnams kita yin bas/ any+tsa 'gro ba la 'jug pa na any+tsa'i mchod pa la ma yin no zhes pas na mi dbyi ste/ 'gro ba la/ ats+yAta sogs dang / mchod pa la/ any+tsAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ any+tsiSh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ Any+tsi Sh+yata sogs so/ ! /mru tsu 'gro ba la'o zhes
[\[216b.2\]]pa'i byings la laT sogs par sme pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang lung gi skabs su ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsar bsgyur ba  'a dro bar shog 'dam ka can du  mchod par shog phyed pa tsam ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laTal/ mro tsa ti sogs so/ /[\[]li pa la[\]]/ mro tsa ta
[\[216b.3\]]sogs so/ /loT la/ mo tsa tu sogs so/ /lang la amro tsata sogs so/ /dzrI sta m+b+hu mru tsu m+lu tsu gru tsu glu tsu glu ny+tsu shwi b+h+ya shwa/ dzrAM sta m+b+du mru tsu m+lu tsu gru tsu glu tsu glu ny+tsu shwi rnams las kyang ngo / /byings dzr-I lang tsho nyams pa/ ta m+b+hu mdo'i byings/ mru tsu gru tsu glu ny+tsu rnams 'gro ba/ m+lu tsu dang
[\[216b.4\]]glu tsu dang rku bar byed pa/ Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa rnams las kyang ts+li ang du yang na 'gyur te/ lung gi par sme+e pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ts+li ang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a mru tsata/ amru tsa tAM/ a mru tsan sogs so/ /si tsang bsgyur
[\[216b.5\]]ba'i phyogs la/ a mro tsA+e ta/ a mro tsiSh+Ta'aM/ a mro tsi Sha sogs so/ /l-iT la/ mu mro tsa/ mu mo tsa tuH mu mro tsuHsogs so/ /luT la/ mro tsi tA/ mro tsi tA ro/ mro tsi tA raHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ mru ts+yAta/ mru ts+yA stA/ mru tsA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT
[\[216b.6\]]la ! mro tsi Sh+ya ti/ mro tsi Sh+ya taH mro tsi Sh+yan+ti/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a mro tsi Sh+ya ta/ a mro tsi Sh+ya tAM/ a mro tsiSh+yan sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ slu tsa grutsu glutsu gluny+tsu rnams kyang cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra zhing smon pa'i ling gi skabs su gluny+tsu'i nya yig
[\[216b.7\]]dbyi'o/ /A tshi ring ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar ba'i tshog yang liTa'i skabs cung zad ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang rigs 'gre ste/ laT la/ Any+tsa ti  i 'gro ba la num byin ba'o/ /sogs so/ /ling la/ Any+tseta sogs so/ /loT la/ Any+tsa tu sogs so//
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]lang la/ Any+tsata sogs so/ /lung la/ Any+tshita sogs so/ /'grol par lung drangs pa/ Any+tsha teHdwi ha lon D+wA/ Any+tsha ti'i hal gnyis ba las nuT yang na'o/ /Atshi byings gnyis brjod pa'i hal nyis brtsegs kyi snga ma de la nuT A ga ma yang na ster te liT
[\[217a.2\]]la byings gnyis brjod pa'i nuT A ga mi byin ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A nAny+tsha/ A nAny+tsha tuH A nA ny+tshuHsogs so/ /nuT ma byin pa'o phyogs la/ Any+tsha/ Any+tsha tuHAny+tshuHsogs so/ /luT la/ Any+tshi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ any+tshuT sogs so
[\[217a.3\]]so/ /l+r-iT la/ Any+tshi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ Any+tshi Sh+yata/ sogs so/ /u pa ng+hAyA tsa/ u pa ng+hA la'ang ngo / /byings ra yig dang ba yig gnyis pha rol la de'i u ba ng+hA na i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge thung ngu yin na ring por 'gyur te/ hur+tshA gya gyu la'o zhes ba'i byings la
[\[217a.4\]]laT sogs par smi pa da rnams sbyar/ mdo 'dis ring por byas pas laT la/ hUr+tshati/ sogs dang / ling la/ hU r+tsheta sogs dang / loT la/ a hUr+tshata sogs dang / lung la/ a hUr+tshIta sogs so/ /liT la/ dzuhUtsha sogs

[\[217a.6\]]snga ma rnams kyi rigs 'gre ste/ laT la/ ba dza ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ba dze ta sogs dang / loT la/ ba dza [\[]t+d+ra[\]]sogs so/ /lang la/ a ba dzatra sogs so/ /lung la 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ a ba dzIta sogs sam/ yang na abAdzIta sogs so/ /na sha shad dbA tI
[\[217a.7\]]nAM! sha sha dad/ pa dang po rnams kyi ma yin no/ /byings sha sha ring du 'gro ba dang dad byin pa dang byings ba yig dang po can rnams gnyis brjod pa'i skabs a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang / phyi ma'i a er 'gyur ba sogs bya ba ma yin te/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba bA dza/ ba ba dza tuH

[\[217b.1\]]ba badzuHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba badzi tha/ ba badza thuH ba badza/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ ba bAdza/ ba ba dza/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ba ba dzi ma/ ba badzi ma/ luT la/ ba dzitA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/
[\[217b.2\]]ba dz+yAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ba dzi Sh+yata/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ba dzi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a ba dzi Sh+yata sogs so/ /bra dza 'gro ba la'o zhes ba'i byings la laT sogs par smi ba da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang sdam rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la bra dza ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ bra dzeta/ sogs dang /
[\[217b.3\]]loT la/ bra dzatu sogs so/ /lang la/ a bra dzata sogs so/ /lung la/ a brAdzIta/ a brAdziSh+TAM/ abAdziShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ ba brA dza/ ba brA dza tuH ba bradzu ba sogs so/ /luT la/ bra dzi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ bradzAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT
[\[217b.4\]]la! bradziSh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ abra dziSh+yata/ sogs so/ a [ \[]bad pra [\]]dzita mtha'i pang raso 'phel ba/ dza 'gro ba dang 'phan ba dag la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT la sogs pa par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga byings thams cad pa'i ming can bzhi po snga ma rnams dang 'dra
[\[217b.5\]]ste/ laT la/ adzati sogs so/ /ling la/ adzeta sogs so/ /loT la/ adza tu sogs so/ /lang la/ Adzata sogs so/ /lung nas brtsams te byings phyed pa rnams cung zad mi 'dra ste/ a rdzer+b+yag+ha nya yoH a dza'i bA g+ha nyam yin ya ma yin pa dag las
[\[217b.6\]]so! /byings a dza ni g+hanya dang la thog ma can ma yin pa'i kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen rnams dang byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la bI zhes bar 'gyur te/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ pa lA ngA bA r+ng+hA d+hA ta ke be Sh+ya te/ lbal dang po'i byings phyed pa la yang na bar 'dod do/ /gong du byings phyed ba'i
[\[217b.7\]]ming can rnams pha rol la byings adza bIr 'gyur bar bshad kyang de'i nang gses byings phyed pa'i ming can lbal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po na yod pa pha rol la adza bIr 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'dam ka can du byed do/ /e kA tsa rung de shA rA niT/ a tsa gcig pa nye pa'i yul las eT ma
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]yin no/ /byings ata mtha' dang UT mtha' r-I ta mtha' rnams dang / huH Sh+NuH k+Sh+NuH shIngaH yuH NuH k+ShuH shwiH DiH shr-iH DiH shriH br-ingaH br-inya rnams ma yin ste bor ba'i byings pa tsa gcig pa mtha' rten hal med pa rnams las bal dang po la iT 'gyur pa ma yin
[\[218a.2\]]zhing / byings a tsa gcig pa mtha' rten hal med pa ma yin kyang / byings bas sha kl-i/ g+hasl-iH ra b+haH yab+haH la b+haH la b+haH yamuH ramuH mnaH Na maH hanaH gam+l-iH de haH du haH mi haH Na haH ba haH le haH ru haH da haH di shaH dr-i shaH daM shaH sbraMng sha \u0f7f mr-i shaH bi sha/
[\[218a.3\]]ru \u0f7f kru sha \u0f7f li shaH ri shaH She ng+haH ru ng+hiraH rAng+haH sAng+haH yu ng+haH shung+haH bu ng+haH krung+haH k+Shu ng+haH bya ng+haH baN+haH shu ShaH pu ShaH sh+liShaH du ShaH dwi ShaH pi Sh+l-iH pi Sh+l-iH twiShaH ru ShaH she kr-iH kr-i Sha 'tshe ba la 'o dang / kr-iSha rko ba la'o gnyis dang / tabaH o pyA yIH Tu baH nyi Sh+wa baH
[\[218a.4\]]li paH la paH s+t+r-i baH dr-i paH sr-i ba sha ba tshu paH k+Shi baH ska n+diraH ha daH tshe diraH b+hi diraH k+Shu diraH a daH shang+l-i \u0f7f Sha d+l-iH khi daH nudaH tudaH nyiSh+wadAH padaH ba nuH bidaH bid+laM/ Du ba tsa ShaH btsaH bi tsaH ri tsaH pra tshaH rany+dzaH Ni dziraH Shi tsaH mu ts+laH b+ha dzaH b+hany+dzuH b+ha s+dzaH ya dza
[\[218a.5\]]t+yadzaH yudziraH Shany+dzaH ru dzaH Sh+wany+dzaH sr-i dzaH ma dzaH b+du dzaH mi dzir sogs byings pa'i 'di rnams las kyang lbal dang po la iT 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /a dzabIr mi 'gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A dzAta/ A dzi Sh+TAM/ AdziShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[218a.6\]]la| AdzIH A dziSh+Ta/ A dziSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ AdziShaM/ A dziSh+wa/ A dzi Sh+ma/ adzabI ra 'gyur ba'i phyogs la/ si tsi braMng+ng+hiH pa rasme+e pa deShu/ si tsa la 'phel ba pa rasme+e pa da rnams la'o/ /byings mtha' ig so sor bsdu ba yin na si tsa rnam dbye bar sme+e pad dang
[\[218a.7\]]bcas pa la rol la 'phel bar 'gyur te/ lung gi skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ a be+e kIta/ a beSh+TAM/ a be She+uH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a be+e ShIH/ a be+e Sh+TaM/ a be+eSh+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a be+e ShAM/ a be+eSh+ma/ l-iTa'i skyes bu dang po
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]gsum la/ bi bA ya/ bi byatuH bi b+tuH a tsa[\[]b+ng+hAmA tA l+ya [\]]niTo ni t+yo/ atsa las tAs 'dra bar [\[]thal la [\]]iT rtag tu 'gyur bam yin no/ /byings atsa gcig pa mtha' brten hal mid ba las tAs dang 'dras stes la la iT rtag tu 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /ri ta b+h+rar ng+rA[\[]dzamyaM/[\] ]r-ita las [\[]staradwA dza'i 'o/ /
[\[218b.2\]]gong du tAs dang thal dag la byings atsa gcig pa mtha' rten hal med pa las iT rtag tu 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes byung yang de'i dmigs bsal byings r-ita mtha' rnams dang atsa gcig pa mtha' rten hal med pa las byang thal dang tAs dang bal dang po rnams las kyang iT 'jug par sngon gyi drang srong
[\[218b.3\]]b+hAr dwA dza 'dod do zhes byung bas thal gyi skabs 'dir gzugs gsum 'byung ste/ bal dang po'i byings phyed pa la yang na bar 'dod do zhes pas/ a dzabI ru 'gyur pa dang mi 'gyur ba yang na ba dang /[ \[]yIru [\]]'gyur ba'i phyogs la mdo 'di gnyis kyis iT yang na par byas pas/ A [\[]dzi bo/[\] ]bi
[\[218b.4\]]ba yi tha/ bi be tha/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ bi byathuH bibya/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la 'phel pa dang yon tan yang na bar byas pas/ bibA ya/ bi ba ya/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ bI ru 'gyur ba dang a dza nyid du gnas pa yang na bar byas pas
[\[218b.5\]]A dzi ba/ A dzi ma/ bIru 'gyur ba'i phyogs la iT yang na bar byas pas/ bib yib/ bib yim/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ bi bI ba/ bibIm/ a dzabI rum bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi luTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ adzitA/ a dzitAro+o/ AdzitAraH skyes bu

[\[219a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bI yAH bI yA staM/ bI yA sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bI yA saM/ bIyA swa/ bI yA sma/ a dza bI rum bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi lb-iTa'i skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ a dzi Sh+yati/ a dziSh+ya taH a dzi Sh+yan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[219a.2\]]gsum la/ a dzi Sh+ya si/ a dzi Sh+ya thaH/ a dzi Sh+ya tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dzi Sh+yA mi/ a dzi Sh+yA baH a dzi Sh+yA maH a dzabI ru bskyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ beSh+ya te/ beSh+yataH be Sh+yan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be Sh+ya si/ be Sh+ya thaH/ be Sh+yatha/ skyes bu

[\[219a.6\]]kyang phal cher bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laT le/ k+Sha ya ti/ sogs so/ /ling la/ k+Sha yeta sogs so/ /loT la/ k+Shaya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a k+Sh+yata/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ak+She+e ShIta/ ak+She+e+e Sh+DAM/ a k+She+e ShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ tsik+ShA ya/ tsik+Shi ya
