[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]k+She tA'am/ k+Sha yi tA sogs so/ /a kr-it+sArba ng+hA tu ka yo rdI r+g+haH/ kr-ita ma yin pa byings thams cad pa dag la ring po'o/ /kr-ita sogs kyi nang tshan ma yin pa'i rnam dbye byings phyed pa dang byings thams cad pa dag pha rol gyi rkyen ya yig ka dang nga 'gro ba'i ming can la byings mtha'i a tsa ring por 'gyur
[\[219b.2\]]te/ sman pi' ling la/ k+ShI yAta/ k+ShI yA stAM/ k+ShI yA suH sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ k+She Sh+ya ti 'am/ k+Sha yi Sh+yati sogs so/ /l+r-ing la'ang / ak+She Sh+yata'am/ a k+Shayi Sh+yata sogs so/ ! /zheT char dang sgrib pa dag la bzhes pa'i byings la/ laT
[\[219b.3\]]sobs pa ra sme+e pad rnams sbyar pa'i bya ba rnams kyang lung gi skabs 'phel ba mi byed pa'i khyad tsam ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ kaT ti sogs so/ /ling la/ kaTe ta sogs so/ /loT la/ kaT ti sogs so/ /ling la/ akaTe ta sogs so/ /h+m+Yan+ta k+Sha Na shwas dzA
[\[219b.4\]]gr-i Ni sh+ye di tAM/ hra mra y+ra mtha' k+ShaN/ shwa sa/ dzAgraM Nishwi e 'gro ba rnams kyi'o/ /ts+li'i 'gyur bas tse iT dang po can pha rol la/ byings hra yig dang ma yig dang ya? yig gsum gyi mtha' can rnams dang / k+ShaNu 'tsho ba/ shras srog /dzAgraM gnyid sad pa/ Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel
[\[219b.5\]]ba rnams dang / byings gang la yang rkyen Ni sbyar ba rnams dang / byings e yig 'gro ba rnams kyi 'phel bar 'gyur pa ma yin te/ 'dir ka Te e 'gro ba yin pas lung la 'phel ba mi byed/ aka TiSh+DAM/ aka TiSh+DAM/ aka TiShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsakAT/ tsaTatuH/ tsa kaTuH/ dbus ma
[\[219b.6\]]gsum la/ tsakaTi tha/ tsa kaT thuH/ tsa kaT/ phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kaT/ phyi ma gsum la/ tsakA Ta/ tsa kaT/ tsa kaTi ba/ tsa kaTi ma/ luT la/ kaTi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ka[\[]T+yA[\]]ta sogs so/ /lb-iT la/ kraTi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ akaTe ShA ta sogs so/ /gupUng+hU
[\[219b.7\]]ba ba [\[]tsha pa [\]]Ning ni b+h+ya A 'oH gu pU ng+hU ba bi tsha pa Na  pa na rnams las A ya'o/ /byings gu bU bsrung ba/[ \[]ng+hU[\]]ng+hU pa kun tu gdung ba/ bi tsha 'gro ba/ paN dang pan tha snyad de byings 'di rnams las rang don la A la 'gyur te byings byings su byed pa'i rkyen no/ /sa nAng+ya n+tA ng+hA ta baH san la
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]sogs pa'i mtha' rnams byings so/ /san la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams sbyar ba'i mtha' dang ka mu laNe sbyar ba'i mtha' yang byings nyid du gnas te byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen dang / ming byings su bsgrub ba'i rkyen zhes zer ro/ ! /gu bU bsrung bal A ya sbyar a+ngu yig
[\[220a.2\]]U di ta kyi don/ buka mtha' u pat+pA thung du dag gi 'os yon tan/ byings byings su bsgrubs nas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas cho ga sngam rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ go pA ya ti/ sogs so/ /ling la/ go pA yeta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ kopA ya tu sogs so/ /
[\[220a.3\]]lang la/ a go p+'aya ta sogs so/ /byings phyed pa rnams la yang na bar byed de/ A yA da yaH/ Ar+ng+hang+hA tu ke pA/ A yal sogs pa rnams byings phyed pa la yang na'o/ /A ya la sogs ba'i rkyen rnams byings phyed ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la yang na 'gyur ro/ /a to lo paH/ ata
[\[220a.4\]]kyi dbyi'o/ /rkyen mtha'i ata ni byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la dbyi'o/ /gu pUl A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum/ a go p+nga yIta/ a go pA yi Sh+TAM/ a go pA yi ShUH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a go pA yIH/ a go pA yiSh+TaM/ a go pa yiSh+Ta
[\[220a.5\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a go pA yi ShaM/ a go pA yi Sh+wa/ a go pA yi Sh+ma/ A yam byin pa'i phyogs la U 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byed de/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la a go pIta/ a go piSh+TAM/ a go pi ShuHsogs so/ /iT ma byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po
[\[220a.6\]]gsum la/ a gaub+sIta/ a gaup+taM/ a gau p+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a gaup+siH/ a gau p+taM/ a gau p+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a gaup+saM/ a gaup+s+wa/ a gaup+sa/ liT la/ kAs prat+ya yAdA ma mi treli Ti/ kAs dang rkyen las bod pa ma yin la liT
[\[220a.7\]]la A ma'o/ /byings dz+hal gyi dz+hal la 'os sa phyis pa'o// kAsr-i skra ngan pa la'o zhes pa bod pa'i don brjod  dz+hal gyi dz+hal la 'os sa phyis pa ma yin pa dang / san sogs rkyen mtha' can rnams las liT pha rol la byings mthar Am sbyar bar bya ste/ go pA la la/ liT/ mdo 'dis Am/
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]sbyar/ Am las so zhes pas liT yang 'jig /kr-inya b+hU as sogs liT dang bcas pa rjes su sbyar bas go pA yA mAs/ go pA yAM ba b+hU ba/ sogs so/ /yang na A ya mi sbyor te/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzu go pa/ dzu gu pa tuH dzu gu puH skyes bu dbus
[\[220b.2\]]ma gsum la/ dzu go pi tha/ dzu go p+tha/ dzu gu pa thuH/ dzugu pa/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ dzu go pa/ gnyis tshig la U 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na par byas pas/ dzu go pi ba/ dzu gup+pa/ mang tshig la yang / dzu go pe ma/ dzu gup+ma/ gupUl/ A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs
[\[220b.3\]]kyi luT la/ go pA yi tA sogs so/ /A ya ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ go pi tA'am/ gob+ta/ sogs so/ /gupa la A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi smon pa'i ling la ata kyi dbyi 'os byangs mtha'i a phyis nas drangs pas/ go pA y+yAta sogs dang / yang na A
[\[220b.4\]]yam sbyar bas gu pyAta sogs so/ /gupU la A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi l+r-iT la/ go pA yi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /a yA ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la iT yang na bar byas pas/ go pi Sh+ya ti'am/ gop+s+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a go pA yi Sh+yata sogs sam/ a go piSh+yata sogs sam/ a go p+s+yata
[\[220b.5\]]sogs so/ a go p+s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /d+hU pa kun tu gdung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ ng+ho pA ya ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ng+ho pU yeta sogs so/ /loT la/ ng+ho pA ya tu sogs so/ /
[\[220b.6\]]lang la/ a ng+hopA yata sogs so/ /lung la/ a ng+ho pA yIta'am/ ang+ho pA yIta'am/ a ng+hopIta sogs so/ /liT la/ ng+ho pA yA mA sa sogs sam/ yang na/ du ng+ho ba/ ngu ng+hU pa tuH/ dung+hU puHsogs so/ /luT la/ ng+ho pA yi tA sogs sam/ yang na/ ng+ho pi tA sogs so/ /smon
[\[220b.7\]]pa'i ling la/ ng+hopA y+yAta/ sogs sam/ yang na/ ng+hU pyAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ng+ho pA yi Sh+ya ti sogs sam/ yang na/ ng+ho pi Sh+yati sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a ng+ho pA yi Sh+yata sogs sam/ yang na/ a ng+ho pi Sh+yata sogs so/ ! ta pa kun tu gdung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings pa
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga phal cher snga ma rnams dang 'dra/ 'on kyang byings ta pa iT mi 'jug pa'i gras yin kyang / 'grel par ta pa la yiTa'i thal dang ba dang ma gsum la iT 'jug go zhes bshad do/ /laT la/ ta pa ti sogs so/ /ling la/
[\[221a.2\]]ta pe ta sogs so/ /loT la/ ta pa tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a ta ba ta sogs so/ /lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ atAp+sIta/ atAp+tAM/ atAp+tAM/ atAp+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tAb+sIH/ a tAb+taM/ a tAp+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a
[\[221a.3\]]tAp+saM/ a tAb+sA/ a tAp+s+ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ta tA pa/ te ba tuH/ te puH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ te pi tha/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/ te pa thuH/ te pa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum dz+hal las dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/ la/ tatApa/ ta tapa/ te pi
[\[221a.4\]]ba te pi ma/ luT la/ tap+tA/ tap+t+wa rau/ tab+tAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ta pyAta/ ta byA stAM/ ta byA stAM/ ta byA suHsogs so/ /l+riT la/ tap+s+ya ti/ tap+s+ya taH/ tap+s+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a tap+s+yata/ a tap+s+ya tAM/ atap+s+yan sogs so/ /Sh+Thi bukAm+bA tsa mAM shiti/
[\[221a.5\]]Sh+ThibuH klayuH A tsa mu rnams kyi sha 'gro ba la'o/ /byings Sh+Thi bu sel ba dang / kla mu dman pa dang / nyer bsgyur Ang sngon ma'i tsa mu za ba rnams kyi a tsa ni rkyen sha 'gro ba pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ ! /nyer bsgyur Ang snga ma'i tsa mu za ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs par smi pa da rnams
[\[221a.6\]]sbyar bas/ AtsA ma ti sogs dang / nyer bsgyur Ang sngon na med na ring por mi 'gyur bas/ laT la/ tsa ma ti sogs so/ /ling la/ tsa ma ti sogs so/ /loT la/ tsa ma tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a tsa ma ta sogs so/ /lung la/ a tsa mIta/ a tsa miSh+TAM/ a
[\[221a.7\]]tsa mi ShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ tsa tsA ma/ tse ma tuH/ tse muHsogs so/ /luT la/ tsa mi tA sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ tsamyAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ tsa miSh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a tsa mi Sh+yata/ a tsa mi Sh+ya tAM/ a tsa mi Sh+yan sogs so/ bA b+h+rA
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]shab+h+la sha b+h+ra mu [\[]kra[\]]mu[\[]kla [\]]mu tra sI truTi la ShaH/[ \[]ng+hU[\]]shaH[ \[]b+h+mA[\]]shaH b+h+ra muH kra maH kla muH tra sIH hru tri/ la Sha las yang na'o/ /byings b+hA shr-i dang / Tu b+h+la shr-i 'bar ba/ b+h+ra mu g.yo ba/ kra mu rkang pa bskyod pa/ kla mu dman pa/ tra sI skyo ba/ tU Ti gcod pa/ laSha mdzes pa
[\[221b.2\]]rnams las byed pa po la sha pa'o zhes pas shab kyi yul la sh+yan yang na 'gyur te/ ! /kra mu rkang ba bskyod ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i sh+yan byin pa'i phyogs kyi laT la/ kramya ti sogs so/ /ling la/ kra myeta sogs so/ /loT la/ kra mya
[\[221b.3\]]tu sogs so/ /lang la/ akra myata sogs so/ /sha ba byi pa'i phyogs la/ kramaH par smai ba de[\[] Shu/[\] ]kram gyi pa rasmai pad rnams la'o/ /byings kram gyi u bang+hA'i a yig ni shab dang bcas pa'i rnam dbye par smai pa da rnams pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ laT ba/ krA ma ti
[\[221b.4\]]sogs so/ /ling la/ krA meta sogs so/ /loT la/ krAm tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a krAm ta sogs so/ /snu kra mor nA t+ma ne pa da ni mi t+te/ snu kra ma dag las Ad+ma ne pa da'i rgyu mtshan ma yin pa la'o/ /byings snu dang kra ma las At+ma ne pa da rnams At+ma ne pa da'i rgyu mtshan can
[\[221b.5\]]ma yin pa ste bor ba'i lbal dang po pha rol la iT 'gyur te/ lung la/ a kra mIta/ akra mi Sh+TAM/ a kra mi ShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ tsakrA ma/ tsakra ma tuH /tsakra muH/ tsa kra mi tha/ tsakra ma thuH/ tsa kra ma sogs so/ /luT la/ kra mi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kramyAta sogs
[\[221b.6\]]so/ /l+r-iT la/ kra miSh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a kra mi Sh+yata sogs so/ /i Shu ga mi ya mAM tshaHi Shu gam yam rnams kyi tsha'o/ /rkyen sha 'gro ba pha rol la byings i Shu 'dod pa/ gam+l-i 'gro ba/ ya mu nye bar 'gog pa rnams kyi mtha'i yi ge ma gnyis dang Sha yig
[\[221b.7\]]ni tsha yig tu 'gyur te/ ! /ya mu nye bar 'gog pa la'o zhes ba'i byings la laT sogs bar smai pa da rnams sbyar/ byed pa po la sha pa mdo 'dis ma tsha/ laT la yats+tsha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ yats+tsheta sogs dang / loT la/ yats+tsha tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a yats+tsha ta sogs so/ /
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]yam ram namA tI sak+tsa/ yamaH ramaH namaH Ata rnams kyis ka'o/ /byings ya mu nye bar 'gog pa/ ra mu rtse ba/ Na mu 'dud pa gsum dang / yA thob pa lta bu Ata mra' can rnams la ts+tshi 'gyur ba sitsa pha rol las ka Ag ma 'gyur zhing sitsa la iT 'ang 'gyur te/
[\[222a.2\]]ya mu la lung si tsa mdo 'dis sa ka ka gnas don a brjod don/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a yaM lIta/ a yaM siSh+TAM/ a yaM siShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a yaM sIH/ a yaM siSh+TaM/ a yaM siSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a yaM saM Sha/ a yaM siSh+wa/ a yaM
[\[222a.3\]]siSh+ma/ ya mu la liT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ya yA ma/ ye ma tuH/ ye muH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ye mi tha/ ya yan+tha/ ye ma thuH/ yem/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ya yAm/ ya yam/ ye mi ba/ ye mi ma/ luT la/ yan+tA/ yan+tA rau/ yan+tA raH
[\[222a.4\]]sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ya myAta/ ya myAstAM/ ya myA suH sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ yaM s+ya ti/ yaM s+ya taH/ yaM s+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a yaM s+yata/ a yaM s+yatAM/ a yaM s+yan sogs so/ ! /Na mu rab tu 'dud pa dang sgra la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT
[\[222a.5\]]sogs par smai+ai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i chog rnams kyang bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ na ma ti sogs dang / ling la/ na meta sogs so/ /loT la/ na ma tu sogs so/ /lang la an mata sogs so/ /lung la/ a naM sIta sogs dang / liT la/ na nA ma/ ne ma
[\[222a.6\]]tuH/ nemuHsogs so/ /luT la/ nan+dA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ na myAta sogs dang / l+r-iT la/ naM s+ya ti sogs so/ /l+ring la/ a ni s+yata sogs so/ ! /ha ya 'gro ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs smai bad rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang snga ma rnams
[\[222a.7\]]kyis rigs 'gre ste/ laT la/ ha ya ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ha ye ta sogs so/ /liT la/ ha ya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a ha yata sogs so/ /lung la/ a ha yita sogs so/ /liT la/ dzahA ya/ dza ha ya tuH/ dza ha yuHsogs so luT la/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]ha yi tA sogs so/ /smin pa'i ling la/ ha y+yAta sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ ha yi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a ha yiSh+yata sogs so/ ! /de la rnam par rgyu ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang lung la 'phel ba byed pa'i khyad par
[\[222b.2\]]tsam ma gtogs snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ da la ti sogs so/ /ling la/ da leta sogs so/ /loT la/ da la tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a da lata sogs so/ /a to l+rAn+ta s+ya/ l+rar mtha'i ata kyi'o/ /la yig dang ra yig dag mtha' na yod pa'i u pa
[\[222b.3\]]ng+hA'i ata kyi si tsa pa rasmai pa da pha rol la 'phel bar 'gyur te/ a dA lIT/ a dA liSh+TaM/ a dA liShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ dngA la/ de la tuH/ de luHsogs so/ /luT la/ nga litA sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ da l+yAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ da li Sh+yati sogs
[\[222b.4\]]so/ /l+r-ing la/ a da li Sh+yata sogs so/ /A dirnyi Tu Du ba/ dang bo'i nyiTuDu rnams so/ /byings kyi dang po'i nyi dang Tu dang Du rnams 'gro ba'i ming can te dbyi bar bya ste/ ! nyi pha lnga rnam par rgyu ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ mdo 'dis nyi phyis laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyang cho ga
[\[222b.5\]]snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ pha la ti sogs so/ /ling la/ pha la ta sogs so/ /ling la/ pha le ta sogs so/ /loT la/ pha la du sogs so/ /lang la/ a pha lata sogs so/ /lung la/ a phA lIta/ a phA liSh+DAM/ a phA liShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/
[\[222b.6\]]ba phAl/ tr-I phal g+ha dza tra pash+tsa/ tr-Iphal b+ha dza tra pa kyi'ang ngo / /liT ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams dang iT dang bcas pa'i thal pha rol la byings trI rkyal bar byed pa la'o dang nyi pha la rnam par rgyu ba/ b+ha dza bsten pa/ tra pUSha ngo tsha ba rnams kyi a b+h+yAs dbyi zhing e du yang 'gyur te/ skyes
[\[222b.7\]]bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ phel tuH/ pheluH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ phe li tha/ phe la thuH/ phel/ phyi ma gsum la/ pa phA la/ pa pha la/ phe li ba/ phe li ma/ luT la/ pha li tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ pha l+yAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ pha
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]liSh+ya ti/ l+r-ing la/ a pha li Sh+tsata sogs so/ ! Nik+Sha'o byed ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i bya ba rnams kyang snga ma rnams kyis rigs 'gre ste/ laT la/ nik+Sha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ nik+She ta sogs so/ /loT la/ nik+Sha tu
[\[223a.2\]]sogs so/ /lang la/ a ni k+Shata sogs so/ /lung la/ a ni k+Shita sogs so/ /liT la/ nini k+Sha sogs so/ /luT la/ nik+Shi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ nik+t+yAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ nik+Shi Sh+yati sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a ni k+Shi Sh+yata sogs so/ /! t+sa ra rgyan 'gyed par 'gro ba la'o zhes
[\[223a.3\]]pa'i byings la par smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ t+sar ti sogs so/ /ling la/ t+sare ta sogs so/ /loT la/ t+sar tu sogs so/ /lang la/ ar+sa rata sogs so/ /lung la/ at+s+wa rIta sogs so/ /liT la/ ta t+sA ra/ ta t+sa ra tuH/ ta t+sa
[\[223a.4\]]ruHsogs so/ /luT la/ t+sari tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ t+sar+YA ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ t+sa ri Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ at+sa ri Sh+yata sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ su b+hU tu Sh+yai l+rar mtha'i ata kyi 'os/ u bang+ha ring po/ Sh+waSh+kaShI pAM sa t+bani Shing+haH/
[\[223a.5\]]su pa kyi byings Sh+Th+yai  ShaSh+ka Sh+Thi ba rnams kyis nyid ma yin no/ /su pa kyi byings rnams dang / byings Sh+Th+yai sgra dang / kun tu chogs pa dag la'o dang / Sh+waSh+ka 'gro ba/ Sh+Thi[\[]kru [\]]sel ba rnams kyi dang po'i Sha yig ni sa yig tu 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ! Sh+Thi bu sel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings
[\[223a.6\]]la laT sogs sbyar 'dis Sha sar mi 'gyur cho ga gzhan sda ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ Sh+ThI pa ti sogs so/ /ling la/ Sh+ThI pe ta sogs so/ /loT la/ Sh+ThI pa tu sogs so/ /lang la/ aSh+ThI bta sogs so/ /lung la/ aSh+ThebIta sogs so/ /'grel bar lung
[\[223a.7\]]drangs pa/ Sh+Thi peHra b+h+yA sa s+ya Tha kAr s+tha kA ro bA/ Sh+Thi bu'i a b+h+yA sa'i Tha yig dang tha yig  Sh+Thi buk+Ya mu sogs kyis shita la ring be/ yang na'o/ /Sh+Thi bu gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+yA sI ming can sha ra sngon ma'i khanya lta po 'os/ Sha phyis pa'i Tha yig ni ta yig nyid dam/ yang na tha nyid du
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]'gyur te/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ TiSh+The ba/ tISh+The ba/ gnyis tshig la/ TiSh+The ba tuH/ teSh+The ba duH/ mang tshig la/ tiSh+The buH/ tiSh+The buHsogs so/ /luT la/ Sh+Thi bi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Sh+ShI byAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ Sh+Thi bi Sh+yati
[\[223b.2\]]sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ aSh+Thi biSh+yata sogs so/ /ab+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ Tharu bsgyur ba'i phyogs Ta dang / tha ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs ta ru bsgyur ba'o/ /Ta 'gro ba sogs Ti e/ ! dzi rgyal ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT la sogs pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar/ cho ga liTa'i skabs cung zad ma gtogs
[\[223b.3\]]snga ma rnams dang rigs 'gre ste/ laT la/ dza ya ti sogs so/ /ling la/ dza yeta sogs so/ /loT la/ dza ya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a dza tra sogs so/ /lung la/ adze ShIta/ a dzaiSh+TAM/ adzeShuHsogs so/ /san+li TordzeH/ san liT dag la dzi'i 'o/ /san
[\[223b.4\]]dang liT dag pha rol la byings dzi lan gnyis brjod pa'i phyi ma ni grangs mnyam pa'i ka sder 'gyur te/ lita'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzi gAya/ dzi gi ya tuH/ dzi gu yatuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzig yi tha/ dzi ge tha/ dzigi ya thuH/ dzi gi ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[223b.5\]]la/ dzi gA ya/ dzig la/ dzi ga yi ba/ dzi ga yi ma/ luT la/ jotA/ jotAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dzI yAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dzA+e Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a dzeSh+yata sogs so/ /tu rbI 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs
[\[223b.6\]]pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang sngam rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ tUrba ti sogs so/ /ling la/ tUrbeta sogs so/ /kr-ita dang byings thams cad ba dag ma yin pa dag gi ring po 'os ring po/ loT la/ tUrba tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a tUrbata sogs so/ /lung la/ atUrgIta
[\[223b.7\]]sogs so/ /liT la/ tu tUrba sogs so/ /luT la/ tUrbi tA sogs so/ /ubang+hA'i 'ang ngos ring po/ smon pa'i ling la/ tur+b+yAta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ tUrbi Sh+ya ti sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a tUrbi Sh+yata sogs so/ /!rak+Sha skyong ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]pa rasmai pa da rnams sbyar/ chog snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ rak+Sha ti sogs dang / ling la/ rak+Sheta sogs so/ /liT la/ rak+Sha tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a rak+Sha ta sogs so/ /lung la/ ra rak+ShuHsogs so/ /luT la/ rak+Shi tA sogs so/ liTal/ rarak+Sha/ rarak+ShatuH/ ra
[\[224a.2\]]rak+ShutaHsogs so/ /luT la/ rak+Shi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ra k+Shata sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ rak+Shi Sh+ya ti sogs gso/ /l+r-ing la/ a ra k+Shi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /ak+Sho n+yata rastAM/ ak+Sha las yang na'o/ ! ak+ShU khyang pa la ste kun du tshogs pa la lang po zhes pa'i byings
[\[224a.3\]]la rnam dbye byings thams cad pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la byed pa po la sha pa'o zhes pas shapa kyi yul la sha yang na 'gyur te ak+Sha la shab sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi laT la/ ak+Sha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ak+She tu sogs so/ /loTal/ A k+Shata sogs so/ /lang la/ A k+Shata
[\[224a.4\]]sogs so/ /sh+nu sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ak+Sh+No ti/ ak+Sh+NutaH/ ak+Sh+Nu ba n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ak+Sh+No Shi/ ak+Sh+Nu thaH/ ak+Sh+Nu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ak+Sh+No mi/ ak+Sh+Nu baH/ ak+Sh+NumaH/ ling gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig
[\[224a.5\]]tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ ak+Sh+Nu yAta/ ak+Sh+NuyA stU/ mang tshig la/ u s+ya pa dAn+TAta/ us la tshig mtha' ma yin pa las so/ /dzi dzus su bsgyur pa'i dza phyis pa'u us pha rol la tshig mtha' ma yin pa'i A yig ni gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su 'gyur te/ ak+Sh+Nu yu
[\[224a.6\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ak+Sh+Nu yAH/ ak+Sh+Nu yA taM/ ak+Sh+Nu yAta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ak+Sh+Nu yAM/ ak+Sh+Nu yA ba/ ak+Sh+DuyA ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ak+Sh+No tu/ ak+Sh+NutAta/ ak+Sh+Nu tAM/ ak+Sh+Nu ban+ta skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ak+Sh+Nu hi/ ak+Sh+NutAta/
[\[224a.7\]]ak+Sh+Nu taM/ ak+Sh+Nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ak+Sh+Na bA ni/ a k+Sh+Na pA ba/ ak+Sh+Na bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ Ak+Sh+Nota/ Ak+Sh+Nu tAM/ Ak+Sh+Nu ban/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Ak+Sh+NoH/ A k+Sh+Nu taM Ak+Sh+Nuta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Ak+Sh+Na bi/ ak+Sh+Nu
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ba/ ak+Sh+Nu ma/ lung la U 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byed de/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a+wak+Shita/ Ak+ShiSh+DAM/ Ak+Shi Shu sogs te go bde la/ iT med pa'i phyogs skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ShaD+hoHkaHsi/ sal ShaD+ha dag gi ka'o/ /sa yig pha rol
[\[224b.2\]]la Sha yig dang D+ha yig dag ni ka yig tu 'gyur te/ Ak+ShIta ak+Sha la/ lung/ lung la ts+li'os/ ts+li byin tsI'i si tsa 'os/ si tsar bsgyur/ si tsar bsgyur/ tsa dang i phyis/ a tsa dang po rnams kyi aT 'os/ byings kyi dang por AT byis nas mtshams sbyar/ l+rati lung bsgyur/ babitAkyi don/ ita kyi'ang ngos/ yi phyis/ a sti si tsa sogs
[\[224b.3\]]byin/ IT/ Ta gnas don brtsegs pa'i dang po'i sa ka dag ki 'os/ ku phyis/ sa la/[ \[]rba D+ha[\]]dag gi ka 'os/ Shakar bsgyur/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis maSha kaSha 'dus pak+Sha Il drangs/ gnyis tshig la/ ASh+DAM/ ak+Sha la/ lung / lung la ts+li 'os/ ts+li byin/ ts+li'i saM tsa 'os/ sitsar bsgyur/ a tsa dang po rnams
[\[224b.4\]]kyi AT 'os/ byings la AT/ brtsegs pa'i dang po'i sa ka sogs kyis ka phyis/ /tas su bsgyur/ tas thas sogs kyis tas tA mdu bsgyu[\[]raMSha[\] ]dz+hal la sa dz+hal la 'os [\[]si[\]] tsa 'jig Sha Tul ShaDu 'os taT Sha drangs/ skyes bu dang bo'i mang tshig la/ masgak+ShaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Ak+ShIH/ ASh+TaM/ ASh+Ta/
[\[224b.5\]]skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ Ak+ShaM/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ Ak+ShA/ ak+Sha la lungaH lung laH ts+li 'osaH ts+li byinaH ts+li siH tsa 'osaH si tsar bsgyuraH la dz+hiru bsgyuraH ng+hi'i dzus 'os/ dzus/ tsu Du sogs kyis dza phyis/ a tsa dang po'i AT pos a+waT/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyis
[\[224b.6\]]ka phyis/ su la ShaD+ha dag gi zhes pas Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ kraSha 'dus pak+Sha us la drangs/ Ak+ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a nak+Sha/ a nak+Sha tuH/ an k+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus gsum la/ a nak+Shitha/ a nak+Sha thuH/ anak+Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum

[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ro+o/ /aSh+TA raHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ak+ShAha sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ak+ma Sh+yati/ ak+Shi Sh+ya taH/ ak+Shi Sh+yan+ti sogs sam/ a k+Sh+ya ti/ ak+Sh+ya taH/ ak+Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /phr-ing la/ Ak+Shi[\[]k+Sh+ya[\]]tA/ Ak+Shi[\[]k+Sha[\]]tA/ a+wak+ShiSh+yan sogs sam/ yang
[\[225a.2\]]na/ Ak+Sh+yata/ Ak+Sh+ya tA/ Ak+Sh+yan sogs so/ /tanU ka raNeta k+ShaH/ tak+ShU'i phra mor byed pa la'o/ ! /byings tak+ShU phra mor byed pa'i don la 'jug par sha pa kyi yul la shU yang na 'gyur te/ laT la/ tak+Sha ti sogs som /tak+Shoti sogs so/ /ling la /tak+She ta sogs sam/ tak+She ya ta
[\[225a.3\]]sogs so/ /loT la/ tak+Sha tu sogs sam/ tak+Sh+No tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a tak+Shata sogs sam/ a taSh+Nata sogs sam/ a taSh+Nota sogs so/ /lung la/ iT yang na bar byas pa'i iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ a tak+ShI ta/ atak+ShiSh+TaM/ a tak+ShiShuHsogs so/ /iT med pa'i phyogs la/
[\[225a.4\]]a tA k+ShIta/a tAk+TAM/ atAk+ShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ /ta tak+Sha/ ta tak+Sha tuH/ tatak+ShuHsogs so/ /lung la'ang iTalang na par byas pa'i iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/tak+Shi tA/ tak+ShitAro+o/ tak+Shi tA raHsogs so/ /iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ taSh+TA/ taSh+Ta ro+o/ raSh+TA raH/ sogs so
[\[225a.5\]]smon pa'i ling la/ tak+Sh+yAta/ tak+Sh+yAstAM/ tak+Sh+yAsuHsogs so/ /l+riT la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa ri phyogs la/ tak+Shi Sh+yati/ tak+Shi Sh+ya taH/ tak+Shi Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /iT med pa'i phyogs la/ tak+Sh+ya ti/ tak+Sh+ya taH/ tak+Sh+yan n+nyisogs so/ /l+r-ing la'ang iT yang
[\[225a.6\]]na bar byas pas iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a tak+Shi Sh+yata/ atak+Sha Sh+ya tAM/ a ta k+Shi Sh+yan sogs so/ /iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ atak+Sh+yata/ atak+Sh+yatAM/ atak+Sh+yan sogs te chog thams cad ak+Sh+ra'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra bo/ ! /kr-i Sha rnam par rkob la'o zhes pa'i byings la

[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]spri sh-i tr-i pa dr-i bsr-ipa sh+ts+leHsidzrA/ kraMSha mr-iSha  spr-i sha  tr-ipa  dr-i pa  sr-i ba las smi'i si yang na'o/ /byings kraMSha rnam par rkob/ mr-i Sha bzod pa/[ \[]smr-i[\]]sha snod dang reg par byed bdag la 'o dang / hr-i pa tshim ba/ dri ba dga' ba/ sr-ibl-i 'gro ba rnams las/ lung la/ tsI'o zhes pas ts+li'i ni
[\[225b.2\]]tsa ra yang na 'gyur ro/ /a nu dAng+tas+ya tsa ju pa ng+ha s+yA r+yatar s+hI/ anudAta'i'ang r-i ha u pa ng+hA'i yang na'o/ /a nu dAt+ta ste byings atsa skad gdang dma' ba'i 'ang raMta a pang+hA can la dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge ka 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa pha rol la am A ga ma yang na 'jug ste/ ts+lisi
[\[225b.3\]]tsar bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi am ma byin pa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a kAr+k+Shita/ bad bra dza ha la mtha' sogs kyis 'phel pas la ShaD+ha dag gis zhes bas Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur bu sogs kyis saSha/ kaSha 'dus ba Sha IT la drangs/ a kAr+hAM/ lanyas/ nyas thas sogs kyis twa mdu bsgyur/ dz+hal las dz+nyal

[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]so/ /da ha thal khar byed ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs par smi pa da rnams sbyar/ cho ga bshad ma thag dang phal cher 'dra ste/ laT la/ da ha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ da he ta sogs so/ /loT la/ da ha tu sogs so/ /yang la /a da hata sogs so/ /lung gi skyes bu
[\[227b.2\]]dang po'i gcig tshig la /an+hAk+ShIta /nga ha la lung  tsItsa tsar bsgyur -i dang tsa phyis phra to pa du bsgyur iT bya'i ba ngos i phyis  a sti si tsa zhes pas IT  da ha sogs kyi b+ha  dz+ha Sha'i a tsa gcig pa sogs kyis dang+ha bad bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba la khang la tsar 'os  g+ha ka kun nas bsgru rab sogs kyis sa Sha kaSha bdu du tha pha k+Sha/

[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]smon pa'i ling la/ tsa h+ya ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ tsa hiSh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a tsahi Sh+yata sogs so/ ! /shu tsa mya ngan la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs pa rasme+e pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ sho tsa ti sogs so/ /ling[\[]laT[\]]/ shatsa ta sogs
[\[228a.2\]]so/ /loT la/ sho tsa tu sogs so/ /lang la /a sho tsata sogs so/ /lung la/ a sho+o tsA ta/ a sho+o tsaSh+TAM/ a sho+otsa ShuHsogs so/ /loT la/ shu sho tsa/ shu shu tsa tuH/ shu shu tsuHsogs so/ /luT la iT yang bar byed de/ 'grel par lung drangs pa /b+h+raMsha
[\[228a.3\]]tu shu dzA s+t+ya shub+h+yaHpar s+ya tA te rA r+d+ha tu ka s+ya iD+wA /b+h+r-i sha shu tsa bas a shu rnams las pha rol gyi ta dang po'i byings phyed pa'i aMT yang na'o/ /byings b+h+r-i shu'og tu ltung ba/ shu tsa mya ngan/ bas kun nas 'gebs pa/ a shu za ba rnams las pha rol gyi byings phyed pa ta yig dang po

[\[228a.5\]]a sho tse Sh+yata/ sogs so/ ! /glai dga' ba zad pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ lata sogs par smi pa da rnams sbyar bas laT la/ gla ya ti sogs so/ ling la/ gA yeta sogs so/ /loT la/ gA ya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a gU yata sogs so/ /A de tsa u pa de shenya shiti
[\[228a.6\]]sha 'gro ba ma yin pa nye pa'i yul la etsa'i Ata'o/ /rkyen sha 'gro ba ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la byings mtha' etsa so sor bsdu ba'i  shab she tsa'i a ya a lba sogs so/ /yi ge ni Ata du 'gyur te/ gle+e la/ lung / aglA sIta/ aglA siSh+TAM/ aglAsi Shu tsa sogs so/ /Ata o+oN
[\[228a.7\]]laHAta las Nal gyi o+o'o/ /byings glil lung byings la aT lung la ts+li ts+li sitsa la tib ita kyi'ang ngos/ aMphyis mdo 'des mtha'i a tsa Ata yam ram nam Ata mtha' rnams kyis ka 'ang ngo sa ka dang iT A stisi tsa sogs kyis iT iT las iT la 'os/ si tsa phyis/ Ata mtha' las liTa'i skyes
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bu dang po'i gcig tshig Nal dang skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig Nal gnyis ni o+o zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ skyes bu dang bo'i gcig tshig la/ dza glo/ A to lo ba iTi tsa/ iT la'ang Ata kyi dbyi'o/ /byings phyed pa kang 'gro ba'i ming can a tsa dang bo rnams dang iT pha rol la'ang byings
[\[228b.2\]]mtha'i Ata dbyi bar bya sate/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dza glatuH/ glail laT sha 'gro bam yin pa sogs kyis etsa Ata abyAs med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod dang po'i hal ltag bo phos la phyis kuta sogs kyis ga dza la Nal du bsgyur/ mdo 'di [\[]sta cal [\]]la o mtshams sbyar/ dza gluHskyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ /
[\[228b.3\]]dzagli tha/ dzaglA tha/ dzagla thuH/ dzagla/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza glo+o/ dzagli ba/ dzagli ma/ sogs so/ /luT la/ glA tA/ glA taro+o/ glA tAraHsogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ bAn+ya s+ya saM yo gA deH/ gzhan brtsegs pa sogs kyi yang na'o/ /byings [\[]glu'i [\]]ming can
[\[228b.4\]]rnams dang / mA mchod pa Sh+Tha 'gro ba las ldog pa rnams dang / gzhan yang A ta mtha' yi gi brtsegs pa sogs kyi 'ang smon pa'i ling kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la e ru yang na 'gyur te/ g+hA yA ta sogs so/ /yang na er bsgyur bas gle yAta/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ glA s+ya
[\[228b.5\]]ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ aglA s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /ge+e sgra la'o zhes pa'i byings la laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga rnams kyang phal cher bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste /laT la /gAya ti sogs so/ /ling la/ gAyeta sogs so/ /loT la/ gA yang tu sogs so/ /
[\[228b.6\]]lang la /agA yata sogs so/ /lung la /a gA sIta /a gA siSh+TAM /agAsiShuH/ liT la/ dza go+o/ /dzag tuH/ dza guHsogs so/ /erlingi / ling la e'o/ /byings g+hu'i ming can rnams dang / mA mchod pa/ Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa/ ge+e sgra/ bA btung ba/
[\[228b.7\]]o tAka gtong ba/ Sho mtha'i las rnams kyi mtha' ni smin pa'i ling kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la e'u 'gyur te/ ge+el/ smon pa'i ling / sha 'gri ba ma yin pa sogs kyis etsa/ Ata/ mdo 'dis e/ ge yAta/ ge+e yAstA+e/ ge yA suHsogs so/ /l+riT la /sA s+ya
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a gA si Sh+yata/ sogs so/ ! /Sh+sh+ye+esgra dang kun tu 'tshe ba dag la'o zhes pa'i byings la 'a[\[]pa kha Ta[\]]sogs par sme+e pad rnams sbyar/ cho ga snga mas rigs 'gre ste/[ \[]Sh+sh+ya [\]]ya ti sogs so/ /ling la/[ \[]Sh+sh+yA[\]] yeta sogs so/ /loT la/ b+h+ya ya tu sogs
[\[229a.2\]]so/ /lang la/ a[\[]Sh+D+ya [\]]ya ta /sogs so/ /lung la/ a[\[]Sh+sh+yA[\]] sIta/ aSh+D+yA siSh+shAM/ aSh+sh+yA si ShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ taSh+n+yo+o/ taTh+b+ya tuH/ ta[\[]D+D+b+ya[\]]sogs so/ /luT la/ sub kyi byings skye+e/ Sh+walka sogs kyis Sha sar mi 'gyur/ Sh+b+yAtA/ Th+b+yA tAro+o/ Sh+b+ya tAraH/ smon pe'i 'ing la/
[\[229a.3\]\[]s+t+yai[\]]la liT sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis mtha' A  a byA sa med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod  shang sngon ma'i Sha ya 'os Sha dang ya phyis  rgyu mtshan can yang med di zhes pas Sha phyis pas  Tha yang zar log  a [\[]b+h+yA[\]]sa'i tsar 'ang ngos tha ta' Nal A ta laNal kyi o 'os  Dal so mtshams sbyar/
[\[229a.4\]]gzhan brtsegs ba sogs kyi yang na'o zhes pa'i mtha' i du 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba yang na bar byas pas/[ \[]ng+b+yA [\]]yAta/[ \[]Sh+T+yA[\]] yAs+h+raM/ Sh+sh+yA yA uHsogs sam/yang na/ yang na/ Sh+n+ye yata/[ \[]ng+t+yai[\]]yAstAM/ Sh+D+ye yAsuHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ Sh+b+yA s+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ aSh+n+yA s+yata sogs
[\[229a.5\]]so/ /de+e bra dag pa la'o zhes pa'i byings la'ang laT sogs par smi pa da rnams sbyar/ cho ga bshad ma thag ba dang 'dra ste/ brjes 'drel yin pas phyis/ laT la/ dA ya ti sogs so/ /ling la/ dA yeta sogs so/ /loT la/ dA ya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a ngA yaha
[\[229a.6\]]sogs so/ /ngA+aid+hA g+h+ra dA pa/ dA pa min pa'i dA d+hA rnams glu'o/ /byings dApa gcod pa dang de+epa dag pa dag ma yin pa'i Da dA nya sbyin Du ng+hAnya 'dzin pa/ do gcod pa/ deng bsru ba sogs dA dang ng+hA'i gzugs su byu ba rnams la/ glu'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed de/ tsan+tha par dIn med
[\[229a.7\]]pa'i 'o zhes dang / kalA par dA ba min pa'i dAd+hA dag dA'o zhes pa dang don gcig go/ skabs 'dir yang de+eng g+hu'i ming can ma yin pas/ tsI 'gyur bsi tsa mi dbyi ste/ lung la/ a ngA sIta/ adAsISh+nAM/ adA siShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ da do+o/ dad tuH/ da duH sogs so/ /luT
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]la/ ngAtA/ dAtA ro+o /dA tAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la g+hu'i ming can ma yin pas mtha' er mi 'gyur te/ hA yAta sogs so/ /l+riT la/ dAs+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ angA s+yata sogs so/ ! /ng+nya Ta btung ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs par smi pa de rnams sbyar/
[\[229b.2\]]cho ga phal cher snga ma rnams dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ ng+haya ti sogs/ /loT la/ ng+ha ya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ ang+ha ya ta sogs so/ /bi b+hA ShA ng+heT sh+yoH/ ng+heT shri dag lag dam ba'o/ /byings ng+heT dang shwi dag las lung lats+li'o zes pa'i ts+lini si tsar bsgyur ba dang tsang zhes par bsgyur
[\[229b.3\]]pa 'dam ga can du bya'o/ /tsa di/ tsang la'o/ /cang pho rol la byings a b+h+yA sa med pa gnyis brjod par bya ste/ ng+heT la/ lung / ts+li/ tsang du bsgyur/ tsang gi nga yig nga 'gro ba'i don dang tsa yig tsang la'o zhes byings gnyis brjod pa'i don/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis mtha' Ata/ byings gnyis
[\[229b.4\]]brjod thung du 'o/ thung du rab/ ab+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ ng+had/ iT la'ang Ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dang+ha ta/ a dang+hahAM/ a dang+han /skyes bu dbus ma gsum pa/ adang+haH/ a da ng+ha haM/ ad ng+ha ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dang+haM/ a
[\[229b.5\]]da ng+hAb/ a dang+hAm/ ts+lisi tsa ra bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ bing+hA ShAk+sA ng+heT shAtshAsaH/[ \[]g+hA[\]]ng+heT shA tshA sAr sa yang na'o/ /byings z+ShA drinye bar len pa/ ng+heT btung ba/ sho phra mor byed pa/ tsho gcod pa/ /ro mtha'i sa rnams las par smi pa dal ts+li 'gyur ba'i si sha yang na 'jig ste/ si tsa
[\[229b.6\]]byis pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ ang+hAta/ AtaH/ Ata las so/ /sitsa 'jig pa'i byings Ata mtha' las/ l+ra bsgyur ba'i j+hi ni dus su 'gyur te/ arUH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ang+hAH/ ang+hA taM/ a ng+hA ta/ skyes
[\[229b.7\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ ng+heT la/ lung ts+lis tsa /li [\[]dz+hi[\]]/ lung sogs kyis byings ba aT/ b+hA sogs kyis si tsa 'jig/ mdo 'dis/ dz+nyi dzus/ tsu Tu sogs kyis dza phyis/ us la tshig mtha' min pa las sos/ gnyis dag ge gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ ang+hAM/ ang+hA ba/ a ng+hA mi/ si tsa mi 'jig pa'i phyogs la/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]yaM ram ma Ata mtha' sogs kyis ka dang iT sbyar bas/ ang+hA sIta/ ang+hAsi[\[]Sh+haM[\]]/ ang+hasi ShuHsogs so/ /liT la /ngang+ho+o /dang+hatuH/ dang+huHsogs so/ /luT la/ ng+hAtA/ ng+hAtA/ ng+hAtAro+o/ ng+hAtAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la /ling la e 'os /ng+he
[\[230a.2\]]yAta /ng+he yA staM /ng+he yAsuHsogs so/ /l+raMT la/ lhA s+yati/ ng+hAs+yataH/ ng+hAs+ya'+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la /a lhAs+ya ta/ a ng+tAs+ya tAM/ a ng+hAs+yan sogs so/ /pAg+hAng+h+ma s+thAm+nAngA Na draSh+yarti sa rti shad sa dA pi baji g+h+rang+ha ma tiSh+tha ma na ya tsha pa sh+yatsha ng+ho+oshI ya sIdAH/ pA g+hA ng+d+mA snA m+nA ngAN
[\[230a.3\]]driSh+Di arti sarti shad sad rnams kyi pi pa dzi g+h+ra ng+ha ma tiSh+Tha man ya cha pash+ya r-i tsa ng+ho+o shrI ya sId rnams so/ /byings/ pA btung ba/ b+thA drinye bar len pa/ ng+h+nAsgri dang me kun hu sbyor ba/ Sh+ThA 'gro ba bas ldog pa/ m+nA goms pa/ dAN sbyin pa/ draSh+Ti te dra shir lte ba/ a rti
[\[230a.4\]]te r-ita 'grogs rtid[\[] skri 'grog [\]]Shang+l-i 'gro ba rnams kyi rkyen sha 'gros pha rol la rim pa bzhin pi ba la sogs pa 'di rnams su 'gyur te/ ! /pA btur ba la laT sogs par smi pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ pi ba ti sogs so/ /ling la /pi bi ta sogs so/ /loT la/ pi ba tu
[\[230a.5\]]sogs so/ /lang la/ a bi bta sogs so/ /lud la/ gAti s+thA/ g+hupA b+hU rnams las zhes pas si tsa 'jig a pA tA/ a pA tAM /a puH/ liT kha/ pha po+o/ ma pa tuH/ pa puHsogs so/ /luT la/ pA ta/ pAtAro+o/ pA tA raH/ smon pa'i ling la/
[\[230a.6\]]ling la e'os/ mtha' e/ pe yAta/ pe yAstAM/ pe sAsuH/ luT-i la/ pA s+ya ti/ pA s+ya ti/ pA s+yataH/ pA s+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a bAs+yata/ a A ta las sos/ dz+hi sus/ us la tshig mtha' min pa sogs kyis gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ pA s+ya tAM/ apAs+yan sogs so/ /
[\[230a.7\]]g+nyAdri nye bar len pa la/ laT sogs par sme+e pa de rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ dzig+h+ra ti sogs so/ /ling la/ dzi g+h+re ta sogs so/ /loT la/ dzig+h+ra tu sogs so/ /lang la/ adzi g+h+rata sogs so/ /lung la /g+h+rA ng+heT shA tshA sA las yang na 'os si tsa yang na
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]'jig ste phyis pa'i phyogs la/ agrAta/ ag+h+rA tAM/ ag+h+ruHsogs so/ /si tsam phyis pa'i phyogs la/ yam/ ram/ nam/ Ata mtha' sogs kyis sag dang iT sbyar bas/ ag+h+rA sIta/ ag+h+rA siSh+TI/ ag+h+rAsiShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ dzag+h+rA+o+o/ dzag+h+rA tuH/ dza
[\[230b.2\]]s+huHsogs so/ /luT la/ g+h+rAtA/ g+h+rAtAro+o/ g+h+rA tAraH/ g+h+rAtAraH/ smon pa'i ling la/ gzhan brtsegs pa sogs kyis yang na 'os/ er bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ g+h+re yI ta/ g+h+reyAstAM/ g+h+re yA suHsogs sam/ yang na/ g+h+rAyAta/ g+h+rAyang s+hAM/ g+h+rAMyA
[\[230b.3\]]b+huHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ g+hA s+yati/ g+h+rAs+ya taH/ g+h+rA s+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la /ag+h+rAs+yata /ag+h+rA s+ya taM/ a g+h+rA s+yan sogs so/ l+ring / a g+h+rA s+yata/ a g+h+rAs+ya tAM/ ag+h+rA s+yan sogs so/ ! /[\[]ng+h+nA[\]]sgra dang me kun tu sbyor ba la'ang laT sogs par sme+e pad rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ ng+ham ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ng+ha meta
[\[230b.4\]]sogs so/ /loT la/ ng+ham tu sogs so/ /lang la /ang+ha ma ta sogs so/ /lang la /ang+ham ta sogs so/ /lung la /yam ram /nam Ata mtha' sogs kyis saka dang iT byin bas /ang+h+ma sIta /ang+p+mA siSh+TAM /ang+h+mA siShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ pang+h+mo/ dang+p+ma tuH/ dang+p+muHsogs so/ /
[\[230b.5\]]luT la /da[\[]d+m+ma[\]] tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ e re bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang bar byas pas/ ng+h+me yAta/ d+h+me yA stA+e/ d+h+me yA suHsogs sam/ yang nar+d+mA yAT/ t+h+mA yA stAM/ ng+h+mA yAsuHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la /ng+p+mAs+ya ti /ng+h+mA s+ya taH/ ng+h+mAs+yan+hi sogs so/ /l+raMng la yang+h+mA s+ya ta/
[\[230b.6\]]ang+s+ma s+ya tAM/ ang+p+mA s+yan sogs so/ /Sh+ThA 'gro ba las ldog pa la'o/ zhes pa la/ laT sogs par sme pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ tiSh+Tha ti sogs so/ ling la/ tiSh+Thata sogs so/ /loT la/ tiSh+Tha tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a tiSh+Thata sogs so/ /lung la /byings kyi
[\[230b.7\]]dang po'i Shazhis 'os Sha sa/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes Tha 'ang thar log /gAti s+thA sogs kyis si tsa phyis/ as+thAta/ as+thA tAM/ as+thuHsogs so/ /liT la /shar sngon ma la /tas+tho+o /tas+thatuH/ la ya logs phyis ash+thas ri tsa ra bang ri tsar bang ngos thata/ tas+thuHsogs
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]so/ /luT la /s+thA dA /s+thA tA ro+o /s+thA tA raHsogs so /smon pa'i ling la /ling la e'os /mtha' e/ s+the yAta/ s+the yAstAM/ s+the yA uHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ s+thA s+yati/ s+thA s+yataH/ s+thAs+yan+t+ri sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ as+thA
[\[231a.2\]]s+yata/ a sbA s+ya tAM/ asbAs+yan sogs so/ /m+nA goms pa la/ laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ ma na ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ma ne sog so/ loT la/ ma na tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a man ta sogs so/ /lung la/ ya ma/ ra ma/
[\[231a.3\]]nam/ Ata mtha' sogs kyis ka dang iT sbyar bas/ am+nA sIha/ am+nAsiSh+TAM/ am+nA siShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ mam+no+o/ mam+na tuH/ mam+nuHsogs so/ /luT la/ m+nAtA/ m+nAtA ngo+o/ /m+nAtAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gzhan brtsegs ba sogs
[\[231a.4\]]kyi yang na 'os/ m+ne yAta/ m+na yAstAM/ m+ne yA suHsogs sam/ yang na/ m+nA yAta/ m+nA yAstAM/ m+nA yA suHsogs sam/ l+r-iT la/ m+nA yAti/ m+nA yAstAM/ m+nA yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ a [\[]T+nA[\]]s+ya ta /a m+nA s+yataM/ a snAs+yan+ti sogs so/ ! /dAN sbyin pa/ Na rjes 'brel
[\[231a.5\]]laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ yats+tsha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ yats+tshata sogs so/ /loT la/ yats+tsha tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a yats+tshata sogs so/ lung la/ gAta s+thAg+hu sogs kyis si tsa 'jig/ a dAd/ angA tAM/ a duHsogs so/ /
[\[231a.6\]]liT la/ da do+o/ dad tuH/ da duHsogs so/ luT la/ dA tA/ dA tA ro+o/ dA tAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ling la e 'os/ de yAta/ de yA s+thAM/ de yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dA s+ya taH/ dAs+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a dA s+yata/
[\[231a.7\]]a dAs+ya tAM/ a dA s+yan sogs so/ /h+th-igya gyu la'o zhes ba'i byings la/ laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ hAr ti dang / ling la/ hra reta sogs so/ /loT la/ hA ra tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a hwar ta sogs so/ /lung la /si tsa la
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]'phel pa bar sme+e pad rnams la 'os /'phel ba byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum la /a hwAr+ShIta/ ah+nAr+Sh+DAM/ ag+m+YarngaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ah+mAr+ShIH/ a hwAD+Sh+TaM/ a hwA r+Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phye ma gsum la/ a hwAr+Sh+Ti/ ahwAr+Sh+ma/ a hwa r+Sh+Ta/ liTa'i skyes bu dang
[\[231b.2\]]po'i gcig tshig la/ byings 'dir dz+hal gnyis phyi bar yin kyang si tsa mi dbye ste/ 'grel bar dper na/ bu tshad du songs nas pa la gnod pa mi skye lab pa bzhin du/ dz+hal s+jon mar yig yong ba'i ng+tsu mtshan si tsa yin bas de dbyi bam yin ces byung bas so/ gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag po/ raMta kyi a ta/ k+Shu ha dag gi tsu/
[\[231b.3\]]a byA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos sogs dang 'phel ba byas pas/ dzashwAr/ r-i ta sh+tsa saM yo gA de rgu NaH/ brtsegs pa dang po'i r-ita kyi'ang yon tan no/ /byings yi ge brtsegs pa dang po can gyi r-iha mtha'i l-iT 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can min pa pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis
[\[231b.4\]]tshig dang mang tshig la/ dzahwar tuH/ dzahwaraH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzahwar+tha/ dza hwar thuH/ dza hAr/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza hwA ra/ dza hwar/ dza hwa ri ba/ dza hwa ri ma/ luT la/ hwartA/ hwartA ro+o/ hwartAtaHsogs so/ /gu No nyartisaM lo gA
[\[231b.5\]]byoH/ arti ba rtsegs pa dang po  'grel par r-ita mtha' las pha rol gyi bal la eT mi 'jug go zhas bshad pas iT mi ster/ dag gi yon tan no/ /arti ste byings raM 'gro ba kr-i sr-i sogs kyis iT ba dang mas/ laste/ thob pa la'ang ngo zhes pa dang byings yi ge brtsegs pa dang po can
[\[231b.6\]]gyi r-i ha mtha' rnams kyi smon pa'i ling pha thog ma can dang rkyen ya ka pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/ smon pa'i ling la/ hwar+YA ta/ hwar+YA suH/ r-ing+ng+ha no s+s+ye/ r-ita han dag las s+ya la'o/ /byings raM ta mtha' dang han 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba la'o zhes pa dag las pha rol gyis+yat+ngas dag l+r-ing
[\[231b.7\]]luT dag la'o zhes pa'i s+ya la iT 'gyur te/ l+raTi la/ hA ri Sh+ya ti/ hA re Sh+yataH/ hwa ri Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a hAri Sh+yata/ a hwa riSh+yatAM/ a hwa riSh+yan sogs so/ ! /s+th-i sgra dang nye bar gdung ba dag la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs par smai pad rnams sbyar
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]ba'i cho ga phal cher bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ swar ti sogs so/ /ling la/ swa re ta sogs so/ /loT la/ swar tu sogs so/ /lang la /a swar ta sogs so/ /lung la/ /swar ti sU ti/ sU ba ting+hUnya U 'gro ba sogs kyis iT
[\[232a.2\]]yang na par byas pas iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a swA r-ita/ aswAr-i Sh+TAM/ a swAriShuHsogs sam/ a swAr+ShIta/ a swAr+Sh+TAM/ aswAr+ShAHsogs so/ /liT la/ sa swAr/ sa swar tuH/ sa swa ruHsogs so/ /luT la yang mdo snga mas iT yang na bar byas pas/ swa ri tA/
[\[232a.3\]]swa ri tA ro+o/ swa ri tA raHsogs sam/ sa rtA/ swartA ro+o/ swartAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ arti brtsegs pa dang po dag gi yon tan nos/ swa r+YAta/ swarlA stAM/ swar+YasuHsogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ swa ra teHs+ya s+ya ni t+ya mi DA ts+yaH/ swa ra ti las s+ya kyi
[\[232a.4\]]iT rtag tu brjod do/ /swar ti ste byings s+w+r-i las pha rol gyi s+ya la iT rtag tu 'gyur te/ l+r-iT la/ swa ri Sh+ya ti/ swa ri Sh+ya ti/ swa ri Sh+ya taH/ swa ri Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ aswa ri Sh+yata/ a swa ri Sh+ya tAM/ a swa ri Sh+yan sogs so/ ! /sr-i 'gro ba la'ang ngo zhes pa'i byings la/
[\[232a.5\]]laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar/ bAg+h+rA ng+h+mA sogs kyi mdos sr-i ng+ho+oru bsgyur byed pa po la/ shad ng+hA bti sogs so/ /ling la/ ng+hA beta sogs so/ /loT la/ ng+hA btu sogs so/ /lang la/ a ng+hA bta/ sogs so/ yang 'grel bar sr-i 'gro bde yang shin tu mgyogs par 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa na sha 'gro ba pha rol la ng+ho+o
[\[232a.6\]]zhes par 'gyur la dal bus 'gro ba la ni ng+ho+o ru 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bshad pas/ dal bus 'gro ba'i don la/ laT la/ sar ti sogs so/ /ling la/ sa rita sogs so/ /loT la/ sar tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a sar ta sogs so/ /sarti shA s+d+yarti b+h+yash+tsa/ sarti shAsti
[\[232a.7\]]arti rnams las kyang ngo / /sr-i 'gro ba/ shAsu rjes su ston pa/ r-i 'gro ba la ste thob pa la'ang ngo zhes ba rnams las kyang ts+lini par sme+e bad dang At+ma ni gnyis ka la ang du 'gyur te/ sr-i+-i la/ lung / ts+li yang / r-i dr-i shonya di gu NaH/ r-i dr-i sha dag gi ang la yon tan no/ /byings
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]r-ita mtha' dang dr-i shir lta ba dag gi ts+li 'gyur ba ang pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/ a sar ta/ a sar tAM/ a sa ran sogs so/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ r-i sr-i b+h+yA mang+bA ke tsi ta/ r-isr-i dag las la lar ang yang na'o/ /gong du s+r+waM/ shA u/ r-i rnams lats+li ang du 'gyur
[\[232b.2\]]bar bshad kyang skabs la lar-i ra dang sr-i dag las yang nas tsa ru'ang 'gyur te/ a sAr+ShIta/ a sAng+Sh+DAM/ a sAr+ShuHsogs so/ /sr-i la/ liT sbyar bas/ swa sA ra/ sa sra tuH/ sa sruH/ sa sar+tha/ sa sra thuH/ sa sra/ sa sAr sa sar sa sraM ba/ sa sraM ma/
[\[232b.3\]]luT la/ sartA/ sartA ro+o/ sartA raHsogs so/ /ring sha ya kling+Sh+ya/ sha ya ka ling rnams la ring ngo / /rkyen sha dang yaka dang smon pa'i ling ya dang  Nal  a tus  us  po can  thal  a thus  a  Nan  rnams pa  iT mi 'jug  rol la
[\[232b.4\]]byings r-iT mtha' ni ring zhes par 'gyur te/ da dbyangs 'gog pa'i don no/ /sr-i la smon pa'i ling / sr-i yAta/ sri yAstAM/ sri yAsuHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ rita han dag las s+ya la'o zhes pas iT byin/ sa ri Sh+ya ti/ sa ri Sh+ya taH/ sa ri Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/
[\[232b.5\]]l+r-ing la iT sbyar bas/ a sa ri Sh+yata/ a sa ri Sh+ya tAM/ a sa ri Sh+yan sogs so/ ! /r-i 'gro ba dang thob pa la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs bar sme+e pad rnams sbyar/ pAg+h+rAng+h+mA sogs kyis raMts+tsha du bsgyur/ laT la/ raMts+tsha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ r-its+tsheta sogs so/ /loT la/
[\[232b.6\]]r-its+tsha tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a raMts+tshata sogs so/ /lung la/ ts+tshi ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas ang gi phyogs la/ Ar ta/ A ra tAM/ A ran sogs so/ /si tsa ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ Ar+ShIta/ Ar+ShAM/ Ar+ShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i
[\[232b.7\]]skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ byings gnyis brjod nas/ r-i'i a 'o r-i gong ma ar du bsgyur/ hal dang po lhag bo 'os ra phyis pas/ r-i 'og ma 'phel ba/ aka 'dra ba la ring po byas pas/ Ar/ r-its+tshat+YAMtAM/ rits+tshate rAM ta rnams kyi'o/ /byings raM 'gro ba dang byings r-Ita
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]mtha' rnams kyi liT 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa dag pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ Ar tuH/ AruH/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la /iT t+b+yarti bya yatInAM/ at+ti arti bya ya ti rnams kyi iTa'o/
[\[233a.2\]]byings ad za ba/ r-i 'gro ba/ byanya sgrib pa rnams las pha rol gyi thal la iT rtag tu 'gyur te/ A re tha/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ A ra thuH/ A ruH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Ar/ A ri ba/ A rim/ luT la/ artA/ artA ro+o/
[\[233a.3\]]artA raH/ smon pi ling la/ a rti brtsegs pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas /ar+YAta /ar+YAstAM /ar+YA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la /rita han sogs kyis aMT sbyar bas /a ri Sh+ya ti /a ri Sh+ya taH/ a ri Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ A raM Sh+yata/
[\[233a.4\]]Ari Sh+ya tAM/ A ri Sh+yan sogs so/ /shru baH/ shr-itsa/ shru'i shr-i'ang ngo / /byings shru thos pa la'o zhes pa la byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la byed pa po la sha pa kyi don la sh+tsu 'gyur zhing der ma zad byings shru nyid kyang shraM zhes par 'gyur te/ sha yig ni sha 'gro ba'i don no/ /laTa'i/
[\[233a.5\]]skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ shr-iNo ti/ shr-i Nu haH/ hush+nu boH/ sArba ng+hA tu ke/ hush+nu dag gi byings thams cad pa la'o/ /byings hu sbyin pa dang rkyen sh+nu dang gzhan lang byings a tsa gcig pa dang / yi ge brtsegs pa ma yin pa rnams kyi mtha'i u yig ni rnam dbye
[\[233a.6\]]byings thams cad pa a tsa dang po can raSha sogs kyis naN byings phyed pa dang byings thams cad bdag gi 'os yon tan/ rnams pha rol la ya Nar 'gyur te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ shr-i Sh+han+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shr-i No Shi/ shr-i Nu thaH/ shr-i Nu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig
[\[233a.7\]]tshig la/ shraMNo mi/ lo pa sh+tsA s+yAn+ya ta ras+yAM b+soH/ ba ma dag la 'di'i dbyi ba'ang yang na'o/ /rkyen gyi u yig ni pa 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa'i rnam dbye ba yig dang ma yig dang po can rnams la yang na dbyi ste/ skyis bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ shr-iNu baH/ shr-i NuH/
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]shr-iNumaH/ shr-i N+maH/ ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shraM Nu yAta/ shr-i Nu yAstAM/ shr-iNu rA suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shraM Nu yAH/ shraMNu yAstaM/ shr-i Nu yAsta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shr-i Nu yAM/ shraM NuyA ba/ shraMNu yA ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po
[\[233b.2\]]gsum la/ shraMNotu/ shraMMNu tAta/ shraMNu tAM/ shraMN+wan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ u tash+tsa pra t+yayAta saM yog pUtAta/ rkyen u ta las kyang brtsegs pa dang po ma yin pa las so/ /yi ge brtsegs pa dang po ma yin pa'i rkye ni u yig mtha' las kyang si pa bsgyur ba'i hini dbyi ste/ shraMNu/ la sing / la sing / si hi/ hi phyis
[\[233b.3\]]cu hi dag gi tA tar yang 'os/ hi tAtang rub sgyur/ shraNu tAta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ shraMNu taM/ shraMNu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shr-i Na bANi/ shr-iN bA ba/ shr-iN bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sh-iN tAM/ a shr-i Nu trI/ a shr-i N+wan/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[233b.4\]]gsum la/ a shraMNoH/ a shraM NutaM/ a shraMNu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a shr-iN baM/ a shr-iNu ba/ a shr-iN+ma/ a shr-i Nu ma/ a shr-i Nu ma/ shru la/ lung sbyar/ si tsa bar sme+e pad rnams la 'phel ba 'os/ 'phel ba byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a
[\[233b.5\]]shro+oShI ta/ a shro+oSh+TAM/ a shro+oShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a shro+o ShI/ a shro+oSh+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a shro+oSha/ a shro+o Sh+wa/ a shro+oSh+ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shu shrAb/ shu shru ba tuH/ shu shru buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[233b.6\]]la/ shu shro tha/ shu shrub thuH/ shu shrub/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shu shrA ba/ sha shru ba/ shu shru ma/ luT la/ shro tA/ shrotA ro+o/ shro+otAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por  a tsa la/ sh+nu byings shru sogs kyis u ba byas so/ byas pas
[\[233b.7\]]shU yAta/ shrU yA stAM/ shrU yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ byings Nal 'phel ba yang na bar byas/ phyed pa dang byings thams cad pa sogs kyi yon tan byas pas/ shro Sh+ya ti/ shro Sh+yataH/ shro Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a shroSh+yata/ a shroSh+ya tAM/ a shro
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]Sh+ya na sogs so/ /Shu rab tu skye ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha 'is dang byed pa po la sha pa byin pas/ laT la/ sa bti sogs so/ /ling la/ sa geta sogs so/ /loT la/ sa btu sogs so/ /lang la/ a
[\[234a.2\]]sa bta sogs so/ /stu su ng+hUnya b+h+yaHpar sme+e pa deShu/ stu su ng+hUnya rnams las pa rasme+e bad rnams la'o/ /byings Sh+Dunya bstod pa/ Shu rab tu skye bdag gi byings kyi dang po'i Sha sa byas pas stu su dag dang / ng+hUnya 'gul ba rnams las si tsa par sme+e bad rnams la iT 'gyur te/ sul/ lung
[\[234a.3\]]a sA bIta/ a sAbaMSh+DAM/ a sA bi ShuHsogs so/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ ru du sunu ng+hAtU nAM liTaM pi nA iDA/ byings ru du su nu rnams kyi liT ma yin pa la iT yang na'o/ /byings ru sgra/ du 'gro ba/ Shu rab tu skye ba/ Nu bstod pa rnams las bal dang po can gyi liT la
[\[234a.4\]]iT rtag tu 'gyur zhing liT ma yin pa gzhan bal dang po la aT yang na 'gyur te/ su la lung / iT sbyar ba'i dper brjod bshad ma thag pa/ a sa bIta sogs yin la/ iT med pa'i phyogs la 'phel ba byas pas/ a so ShInya/ aso+oSh+TAM/ a so+o ShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i
[\[234a.5\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/ suShA ba/ suShu btuH/ su Shu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su Sho tha/ suShu bathuH/ suShu ba/ su daShu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum pa/ su ShA ba/ su Sha ba/ su Shu bi ba/ su Shu bi ma/ luT la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ sabi tA/ sa
[\[234a.6\]]bi tA ro+o/ sa bi tAraHsogs sam/ yang na/ so tA/ so tA ro+o/ so tAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kraMta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ sU yUta/ sUyAstAM/ sU yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ sa bi Sh+ya ti/ sa bi Sh+ya taH/ sa bi
[\[234a.7\]]Sh+yan+ti sogs sam/ yang na/ so Sh+ya ti/ so Sh+ya taH/ so Sh+yan+yi/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a sa bi Sh+yata/ a sa bi Sh+ya tAM/ a sa bi Sh+yan sogs sam/ yang na/ a so Sh+yata/ a soSh+yatAM/ a so Sh+yan sogs so/ ! /sru 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs pa
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ra smai pad rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ sra bti sogs so/ /ling la/ sra beta sogs so/ /loT la/ sra bcu sogs so/ /la pa la/ a sra bta sogs so/ /Ni shri dru sru [\[]srub+h+ya[\]\u0f7f]karta ri tsang / Ni shri dru sru rnams la byed pa la tsang 'o/ /rkyen Ni'i mtha' can khyi byi ba rnams dang / shrinya bsten
[\[234b.2\]]pa dru dang sru 'gro ba rnams las byed pa po la ts+lini tsing du 'gyur te/ dang ti kyi don dang / tsa ni/ tsang la'o zhes byings gnyis brjod pa'i don no/ /sru la/ lung / ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ atsa la sh+nu sogs kyis u sba/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a su sru bta/ a su sru ba tAM/ a su sru ban/
[\[234b.3\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a su srubaH/ a su srub taM/ a su sru bta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a su srubaM/ a su sru bA ba/ a su sru bAm/ liT la/ skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ su srAg su sru btuH/ su sru buH/ skyes bu dbu sam gsum la/ su sro tha/ su srub thuH/ su srub/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su swA ba [\[]Nal [\]]su sra
[\[234b.4\]]ba/ su sru ba/ su sru ma/ skabs 'dir sa phyi ma Shar mi 'gyur te/ byings 'di dang po nas sa yig yin pas so/ /luT la/ sro tA/ sro tA ro+o/ sro tAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/[ \[]srU yAta/[\] ]spra yA[\[\]]sru yA[\[]srU[\]]/ s+Ru yA suH
[\[234b.5\]]sogs so/ /l+r-i Ta la/ sro Sh+ya ti/ sroSh+ya taH/ sro Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a sroSh+yata/ asro Sh+ya tAM/ a sro Sh+yan sogs so/ ! /du 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs par sme+e ba da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ da ba ti sogs so/ /ling la/ dab ti sogs so/ /loT la/
[\[234b.6\]]da ba tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a da ba ta sogs so/ /lung la/ byings ru du su sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ a bA bIta/ a ngAbiSh+TAM/ a dAbiShuHsogs sam/ yang na/ a do+o ShIta/ ado+o ShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du drab/ hu
[\[234b.7\]]du ba tuH/ du ngu buH/ 'grel bar iT dang bcas pa'i liTa'i 'gyur ba rnams la lar ka 'gro ba'i ming can du bya zhing / la lar pa 'gro ba'i ming can du yang bya'o zhes bshad pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du dbi tha/ du du bi tha/ du tu ba thuH/ du du ba/ skyes bu phyi ma
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]gsum la/ dudA ba/ dud ba du du bi ba/ du da bi ba/ du du bi ma/ dud bim/ luT la/ byings ru du su sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ da bitA/ da bi tA ro+o/ da btA raHsogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ do tA/ dotA ra/
[\[235a.2\]]ro tAraHsogs so/ /smin pa'i ling la/ kr-ita min pa sogs kyis ring bo byas pas/ dU yAta/ dUyAstAM/ dU yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ byings ru tu su sogs kyis aT yang na par byas pas/ da bi Sh+ya ti/ da bi Sh+yataH/ dbi Sh+yan+hi sogs sam/ yang na/ do Sh+ya ti/ do Sh+ya taH/
[\[235a.3\]]Sh+yartA sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lb-ing la'ang a dbi Sh+yata/ a dbi Sh+ya tAM/ a dpi Sh+yan sogs sam/ yang na/ a do Sh+yata/ a do Sh+yan sogs so/ ! /dru 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ dra ba ti sogs so/ /ling la/ dra
[\[235a.4\]]be ta sogs so/ /loT la/ dra ba tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a dra bta sogs so/ /lung la/ Nishridru zhes pa sa ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod pas/ a du dru bta/ a du dru pa tAM/ a du dru ban sogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang pa rnams la/ du drA ba du dru
[\[235a.5\]]ba tuH/ dudru buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du dro tha/ du dru ba thuH/ du dru ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ du drA ba/ du dra ba/ dudru ma/ kr-i kr-i sogs kyi iT mi 'jug go/ /luT la/ dro tA/ dro tAro/ drotAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kr-ita ma yin
[\[235a.6\]]pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ drUyAta/ drU yAstAM/ drUyA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iTal/ droSh+ya ti/ dro Sh+ya taH/ dro Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a dro Sh+yata/ adroSh+ya tAM/ a dro Sh+yan sogs so/ ! /gam+l-i 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs pa rasme+e bad rnams sbyar/ eShu ga ma
[\[235a.7\]]yam rnams kyi tsha 'os/ mtshar ba sgyur bas/ laT la/ gats+tsha ti sogs so/ /ling la/ gats+tsheta sogs so/ /liT la/ gats+tsha tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a gats+tshata sogs so/ /buShA di d+yuhA byAM ditaHpar sme+e pa deShu/ pu Shal sogs pa rnams dang byu ta la sogs pa rnams dang l-i
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]'gro ba las par sme+eb da rnams la'o/ /byings puSha la sogs pa rnams da d+yata la sogs pa rnams dang byings l-i 'gro ba rnams las lung gi par sme+e bad rnams la lung la ts+li ni ang du 'gyur te/ da yig ni ang ma yin ba la zhes u bad+hA mi dbyi ba'i don no/ /gam+laM la lung / ts+li ang du
[\[235b.2\]]bsgyur bas /ag mata/ a ba ma tAM/ a ga man sogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza gA ma/ dzag+mu tuH/ dzag+muH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzag+mi tha/ dzag+ma thuH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzagA ma/ dza gam/ dzag+mi ga dzag+mi ma/ luT la/ gan+tA/ gan+tA ro+o/ gan+tAraHsogs so/ /smon
[\[235b.3\]]pa'i ling la/ gamyAstAM/ ga myA suHsogs so/ /ga me riT par sme+e pa de Sha/ gam la pa  gam han dzan khan sogs kyis u pa ng+hA phyis pa'o/ /rasme+e pa da rnams la iTa'o/ /gam las byings phyed pas yig dang po can par sme+e pad rnams la iT 'gyur zhing skabs la lar At+ma ne
[\[235b.4\]]pad rnams la'ang 'gyur ro/ /gam la l+raMT/ mdo 'dis iT sbyar bas/ ga mi Sh+ya ti /ga mi Sh+ya taH/ ga mi Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ga mi Sh+ya ta/ a ga mi Sha tAM/ a ga mi Sh+yan sogs so/ ! /sr-i bl-i 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs ba rasme+e pad rnams
[\[235b.5\]]sbyar bas/ laT la/ sarbati sogs so/ /ling la/ sarbeta sogs so/ /loT la/ sarbatu sogs so/ /lang la/ a sarbata sogs so/ /lung la/ puSha la sogs pa rnams dang d+yu tul sogs pa rnams dang laM 'gro ba sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang / kraMSha mr-i sha traM pa dr-i pa
[\[235b.6\]]sr-ib sogs kyis yang na ts+li si tsar bsgyur bas si tsaru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ anu dAt+ta'i 'ang r-ita upa ng+hA sigs kyis am Ag ma yang na 'jug pas bsgrub tshul gsum 'byur ste/ ts+li ang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a sr-i pata/ a sr-i ba tAM/ a sr-i ban sogs so/ /ts+li si tsar
[\[235b.7\]]bsgyur nas am Ag ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ a sra p+sIta/ a sra p+hAM/ dz+nyal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis pa'o/ a srap+suHsogs so/ /am A ga ma ma byin pa'i phyogs la 'phal ba byas pas/ a sAr+b+sIta/ a sAr+b+t+waM/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os sitsa phyis pa'o// a sAr+ng+suHsogs so/ /
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sa sArba/ sa sr-i patuH/ sa sr-i puH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa sarbi tha/ sa sr-i ba thuH/ sa sr-i pa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa sArba/ sa sarba/ sa sr-i bi ba/ sa sr-i pi ma/
[\[236a.2\]]luT la/ sar+b+tA/ sar+b+tA ro+o/ sar+b+tAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ sr-i pyAta/ sr-ibyA stA/ sr-i byA suH/ l+r-iT la/ yon tan byas pas sar+b+s+ya ti/ sar+p+s+yataH/ saN+s+yan+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a sar+b+s+yata/ a sar+p+s+yatAM/ a sar+g+s+yan sogs so/ ! /ska n+dir 'gro ba
[\[236a.3\]]dang skams pa dag la'o zhes pa la laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ skan+ta ti sogs so/ /ling pa/ skan+deta sogs so/ /loT la/ skan+da tu sogs so/ /lung la/ ir 'gro ba la yang na'os/ ts+li yang na ang du 'gyur te/ ang
[\[236a.4\]]gi phyogs la/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ aska da tu/ a ska datAM/ a ska dan sogs so/ /ts+li si tsa ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ bad pra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/ aska'aMt+s+wita/ a skAMd+tAM/ askAMt+suHsogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa skan+da/
[\[236a.5\]]tsa skan+da tuH/ tsaskan+duH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsaskan+di tha/ tsaskan+tha/ tsaskan thuH/ tsa skan+da/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsaskan+ta/ tsaskan+di ba/ tsa skan+di ma/ luT la/ khar la tsar 'os bta/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/ dz+har 'dra ba la dz+har rnams kyi 'os ta gong ma phyis pas/ skan+tA/
[\[236a.6\]]skan+tAro+o/ skan+tAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling khar la tsang bos da ta/ dz+har 'dra bal dz+har rnams kyi 'os ta phyi la/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ skad+yAta/ ska d+yA stAM/ skad+yAsuHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur bas skaMt+s+ya ti/ skaMt+s+yataH/ skaMt+s+yan+ti sogs so/ /
[\[236a.7\]]de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ askaMd+s+yata/ askaMt+s+ya tAM/ a skaMt+s+yan sogs so/ /beHskan+de na ni Sh+tA yAM/ bi las skan+po'i ni Sh+Th+Na ma yin pa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur pi las pha rol gyi skan+di'i sa yig ni kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen niSh+Tha'i ming can gyi rkyen can ma yin ba la Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ biskan+da ti/ biD+kan+da ti
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]sogs so/ /niSh+ThA'i ming can yin na mi 'gyur te/ niSh+ThA'i ming can k+ta sbyar bas/ biskan+maHltaba'o/ /pa rash+tsa/ /pa re sh+tsa/ ba ri las kyang ngo / skan+di'i sa yi ga ni nyer bsgyur ba ri snga ma las kyang Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ pa ri skan+d+ra ti/ pa riSh+kin+da ti sogs so/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ niSh+ThA
[\[236b.2\]]yam pi bA Sha tA/ niSh+ThA la yang Sha nyid yang na'o/ /skan+da'i sa yig ni nyer bsgyur pa ri snga ma las niSh+ThA'i rkyen la'ang yang na Sha nyid du 'gyur ta/ pa ri sngon ma'i skan+dir la/ k+ta sbyin pas/ pa ri skan+naH/ pa ri Sh+kaN+NaH sogs so/ ! /tr-I rgyal bar byed pa dang sgro la bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs
[\[236b.3\]]par smi pa da rnams sbyar pas/ laT la/ Tar ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ta re ta sogs/ /loT la/ tar tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a tar ta sogs so/ /br-Ito bA/ br-ir-Ita las yang na'o/ /br-iste/ br-inya sgrib pa dang br-ing yang dag par gus pa gnyis dang byings rAta mtha'
[\[236b.4\]]rnams pas pha rol gyi l-iT ma yin pa'i bal dang po la IT yang na 'gyur ro/ /si tsi tsa pa sme+e pade Sha/ si tsa la'ang par sme+e pa dal 'o/ /gong du br-inya br-ing r-Ita mtha' rnams las pha rol gyi bal dang bol IT yang na bar bshad kyang / de'i dmigs bsal si tsa par sme+e pad can la IT ring po mi 'gyur ti brung du
[\[236b.5\]]nyid sbyin par bya ste/ tr-Il/ lung iT 'phel ba byas pas/ a tArI ta/ atAri Sh+TAM/ a tA riShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ta tA ra/ te ra tuH/ te ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ te ri tha/ ter thaH/ ter/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ta tA ra/
[\[236b.6\]]ta ta ra/ te ri ba/ te ri ma/ luT la/ br-i r-i ta las yang na 'os/ iT dang / -IT yang na bar byas pas/ ta ri tA/ ta ri tA ro+o/ ta ri tAraHsogs sam/ r-i tsha ti r-I tra rnams kyi zhes pas yon tan dang / tr-i bal bsogs kyis a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba'o/ /yang na/ tarItA/ ta rI tA ro+o/
[\[236b.7\]]ta rI tAraHsogs so/ /na li ngi / ling lam yin no/ /ling la sI yuTa'o zhes pa lta ba'i smon pa'i ling gi bal dang po la IT ring po 'gyur ba ma yin te/ dper brjod rgyas par 'chad 'gyur At+ma ne pa de'i skabs su 'byung ngo / /r-Ita i ng+l+hA toH/ byings kyir-Ita kyi i ta'o/ /byings kyi rIta
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]mtha' rnams ni yon tan dang 'phel ba sogs rkyen dmigs bsal med pa gang byung yang ita du 'gyur zhing yang pha rol du 'dri par bya ste/ tr-I la smon pa'i ling / tIr+YAta/ tIr+YAstAM/ tIr+YAsuH/ l+r-iT la/ br-i r-Ita las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ ta ri

[\[237a.6\]]bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ asaMk+ShIH/ a sAMk+taM/ a sAM k+ta/ a sAMk+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ asAM k+Sha/ asAMk+Sh+ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sa saM dza/ sa saM dzatuH/ sa saM dzaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa saM ji tha/ sa saMk+tha

[\[237b.1\]]dz+yAsuHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ tsu'i ku dang / khar la tsang kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha byas pas/ saMkyati/ saMk+Sh+ya ta/ saMk+Sh+Dan+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ asaM k+Sh+ya tAM/ a saM k+Sh+yan sogs so/ ! /dr-i shir lta ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs par sme+e pa da rnams sbyar/ bAb+h+rAd+h+mA

[\[238a.7\]]po dang / kita nges par gnas pa la ste nang sel bar byed pa la yang ngo zhes pa'i byings gsum la san pha rol tu 'gyur te/ san gyin yig ni san yang dag la'o zhes byings gnyis brjod pa'i don no/ /san+yadoHsan yang dag la'o/ /san dang yang dag pha rol la byings ab+h+yA sa med ba'i gnyis
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]brjod par bya'o/ /bUrbat+sanaH/san gyi snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /byings la san byin pa'i san gyi mtha' yang snga ma dang 'dra ba ste byings nyid du gnas pas byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ deHkra mni n+dA k+Sha ma ru g+dzayeShu san+ni Sh+ya te/ gu pa sogs las ram ba bzhin

[\[238b.3\]]'jug bam yin te/ kita la/ san/ san yang dag la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag po 'os/ ta gong ma phyis/ kuha dag gi tsu 'os ka gong ma tsa/ tsikit+sa zhes pa la laT sogs bar sme+e bad rnams sbyar/ byad pa po la shab/ rjes 'phrel phyis nas/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os/
