[\[238b.7\]]kit+sitA/ tsikit+sitAro/ tsikit+satrAraHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ata kyi dbyi 'os a byis pas/ tsikit+sataha/ tsi ki t+sa stAM/ tsi ki t+s+tasu \u0f7fsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ lbal dang po'i iT dang / ang kyi dbyi 'os/ tsi kit+YiSh+ya ti/ tsi kit+si Sh+ya taH/ tsi kit+si Sh+ya n+hi sogs so/ /de bzhin du
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]l+ring la/ a tsi kit+si Sh+ya ta/ a tsikit+si Sh+ya tAM/ a tsi kaMt+si Sh+ya na sogs so/ /ki taHsaM de hetsa/ kita las the tshom la'ang ngos/ /kita las the tshom la 'jug pa la yangs na 'gyur te/ cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'drabs/ bi tsi kit+sati sogs so/ /r-i tirI
[\[239a.2\]]yang ri ti las I yang ngo / /r-i ta 'gro ba la sta yang dag par dga' la 'ang ngo zhes pa la ngo bo'i rkyen i spyar bas r-iti las yang dga' ba'i don la 'jug pa na pha rol ru rkyen I yang 'gyur te/ I yang sbyar ba'i mtha' yang byings nyid do/ /I yang gi thi tshom byed  da yig ni At+mane pa
[\[239a.3\]]da rnams 'jug pa'i don no/ /r-ita la I yang laT sha pa sogs sbyar bas/ r-i tI ya te sogs te dper brjod rgyas pa 'og tu 'chad do/ /de rnams kyi b+hU la sogs pa byed pa po'i don la shapa 'jug pa rnams kyi byings pa rasmai pa da 'jug pa rnams la laT sogs la yig bcu'i 'gyur ba'i pa rasmai pad
[\[239a.4\]]rnams sbyor ba'i tshig spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams bshad zin to// //da ni b+hU la sogs pa byings At+ma na'i tshig can rnams la/ rnam dbye At+la ne pa da rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga 'chad par bya ste/ ! /e ng+ha 'phel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT
[\[239a.5\]]sogs At+ma ne bad rnams sbyar/ cho ga rnams b+hU thob pa la'o zhes pa'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ eng+hate/ yeng+hal/ laT sha brjes 'brel phyis nas lata ta las a byung / Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ tra drangs ba'o/ /e ng+he te/ eng+hal  shab laT la AtAM ta las Am byung /
[\[239a.6\]]'brong sogs kyis mtha' e drangs/ Ata kying 'gro ba la'os A i y+ra lpa ya dag gi sba la la dbyi 'os ya phyis/ i mtshams sbyar/ eng+han+te/ eng+ha la shab laT la dz+hadz+ha las a phyung / dz+nya'i a n+t+ra Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' a/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ laTa'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[239a.7\]]eng+ha se/ e b+hal sha bra l+raT la thAs/ thAs kyi se 'os thAs se/ e ng+he the/ /eng+ha la shab laT l+ra AthAM tha las Am phyung / Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ Ata kyis 'gro ba la 'os A e ya lbe+e ya dag gi bal la dbye 'os ya phyis i mtshaShas sbyar/ eng+hang+he/ shab laT la b+h+raMT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ skyes bu phyi ma
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]gsum la/ eng+he/ eng+ha la shab laT la iTaT [\[]bahro [\]]ba sogs kyis i e ata [\[]t+pi+u [\]]'ashon tan la 'os/ gnyis ma gzhis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ eng+dA ba he/ a ng+ha [\[]mang zhab phaT la [\]]spa he dang ma hing / Ta 'phral sogs [\[]kyang mtha' [\]]i/ ata kyi mnyal ring po 'os/[ \[]la [\]]ring por sor/ eb+hAmanye/ e[\[]b+hA[\]]la long / sha ba/ ling gi sli
[\[239b.2\]]yuT 'os/ sI yuT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ eng+hal  shapa  ling lanya  ling la  sI yuT  Ta gnas don u brjod don lba ya dag gi bal pha dbye 'os ya phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin ba'i ma dbyi 'os sa phyi ba mtshams sbyar/ eng+ge ta/ e ng+hal  sha tsa [ \[]la A tra ba'i mthA 'brel phyis/ ling ni [\]]
[\[239b.3\]]mtha' yas yin sogs kyis sa phyis mtshams sbyar/ eng+ha yAtAM/ e ng+heran/ eng+ha la shang ling madz+ha sI luT rjes 'brel phyis  ling gi mtha' ma yin pa [\[]sags [\]]byis sa phyin mtshams sbyar  dz+ha'i 'os/ dz+haran/ lba ya dag gi bal 'khyi los ya phyis/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ eng+hethAH/ meng[\[]me ng+ta k+Sha ba ling ba thA ba gI [\]]
[\[239b.4\]]phuT rjes 'brel phyis/ ling gi mtha' yin pa sogs kyis [\[]sa gyis [\]]pa ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis/ eng+heyAthAM/ eng+hal shang ling la A thAM  sI yuT  ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis  mtshams sbyar/ eng+heng+h+waM/ eng+hal  ling  sha ba lang+h+ra sI yaT  ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sags kyis la phyag/ bal shel sa byis/
[\[239b.5\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ eng+he ya/ eb+ha la na ba'i la tsiT  sIyuT rjes 'brel phyis  iTa'i ata 'os [ \[]iSha[\]]ahas phyis mtshams sbyar/ eng+heb hi/ e b+hang shab  ling  la ba hi dang ma nyid tu bsgyur  sI yuT rjes 'phre la phyis  la ya dag gi zhes pas la phyis  ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis mtshams skyar/ e ng+he
[\[239b.6\]]ma hi/ eng+hal soT sbyar pa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ eng+hatAM/ eng+hal sha ba yaT la taT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e ata byi am 'os e Am/ e ng+hetAM/ eng+haya shab  loT lwa  AtAl Ata kying 'gro ba la 'os  A i ya a mtshams sbyar  ba ya gad zhi zhes bas ya phyis  Ta 'gro pa sogs kyis mtha' e  eta kyi
[\[239b.7\]]Am 'os slar yang Am du log  eng+han+dAM/ eng+hal  laT  lang+hadz+ha'i an+ta 'os  j+ha an+ta  Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e eta kyi Am 'os e Am  atakya yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ eng+ha swa/ eb+hal shab  loT la thAs thas kyi sa 'os  thAs ses
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]lba dga' ba am dag gos/ e pha/ eng+heshrAM/ er+hal sha ba loT la A dzAMAta kyi ngi ta la 'os  A i yab ya dag gi zhes bas ya phyis  i mtshams sbyar/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ eta kyi A ma 'os  e skar As/ eng+hang+sAM/ eb+hal  shab loT phoT la[\[]ng+hAMT[\]]'bro ba sogs kyis mtha' es bdag la ba
[\[240a.2\]]i dag gos/ e+e slar yang am/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e ng+he+e/ e ng+ha la shab  loT la iTaT 'gro ba sogs kyis i e  eta kyi i 'os e e+e du bsgyur phyi ma'i AT ste zhes pas AT aka 'dra ba la ring po a tsa'i 'phel ba byas/ e ng+hA ba he/ e ng+ha la sha ba soT la tha hi dang ma hing du bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' o
[\[240a.3\]]eta kyi e+e 'os e e+e phyi ma'i a+waT ste zhes pas a+waTaT gnas don a ka 'dra ba pha ring ngo / e ng+hA ma he+e/ eng+ha la lang sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e+e ng+ha ta/ eng+hal lang / lata atsa dang bo rnams kyi AT 'os bings la AT Ta gnas don/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ e+e ng+hetAM/ e t+nyal  shang  yar byi dag la AT
[\[240a.4\]]dang 'phel ba la A tA mang 'gro ba Ata kyi 'os  A i ya za ya dag gi zhes pas ya phyis mtshams sbyar/ e+e ng+han+ta/ a ng+hal  sha ba lang  byings la AT dang 'phel ba/ ladz+ha dz+ha'i a n+ta 'os dz+ha an+ta/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gis gcig la rol gyi gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e+eng+hathAH/ eng+ha la sha ba/ lang
[\[240a.5\]]la thas byings la/ A Ta dang 'phel ba/ e+e ng+he thAM/ e ng+hal shab lang byings la AT dang 'phel bal A thAmang 'gro ba la Ata kyi 'os A i ya ba ya dag gi ba lang 'os ya phyis mtshams sbyar/ e+e t+had+h+waM/ eng+hal sha pa lang byings la aT dang 'phel ba kha[\[]rbA [\]]du bsgyur/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e+e ng+he/ e ng+ha la
[\[240a.6\]]sha ba lang byings la AT dang 'phel bal iT ru bsgyur mtshams sbyar/ e+e ng+hA ba hi/ e ng+hal sha pa lang byings la aT dang 'phel ba la lba gi dang 'phel bal lba hi dang ma hing du bsgyur ata kyi ya nyal ring po 'os ring po/ e+eng+hA ma hi/ eng+ha la lung / lung lats+li 'os/ ts+li byin/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os si sar bsgyur/ a tsa dang po'i AT 'os
[\[240a.7\]]byings la sngag/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba dang / byings phyed pa'i bal la iT 'os/ iT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e+e ng+hiSh+Ta/ la ta ru bsgyur/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha Sha T+mu la Sha nu 'os haT/ e+eng+hi ShA tAM/ la AtwA du bsgyur kun nad bsgyur ba sogs kyis
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]sa Sha/ e+eng+hi Sha ta/ la dz+ha ru bsgyur/ dz+ha las a phyung nas/ At+mane bad rnams la ata ma yin pa las sos/ dz+ta ata du bsgyur/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e+e b+hiShAHl+na thas gun nas bsgyur tha sogs kyis sa Sha/ Sh+Dul thU 'os tha Tha/ ang+hi ShAthAM/ laA thA kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ e+e ng+heng+hAM/ lang+hAng+ha
[\[240b.2\]]la lar ngos sa phyis  iTa'i gdam pa'o bu ng+harang gnas sam  yang na r+ha/ e+eng+heD+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e+e ng+hiShi/ la iT ru bsgyur/ e+eng+hi Sh+wa hi/ la bahi ru bsgyur/ e+e ng+hiSh+ma hi/ la ma hid du bsgyur/ e ng+ha la liT/ r-its+tsham yin pa'i i tsa dang po las kyang lci ba ldan pa las so zhes pas byings
[\[240b.3\]]mtha' Am sbyar Am las sos liT yang 'jig pas/ eng+hAM zhes pa gru ba/ de la kr-inya sogs spyar dgos te/ Am pra t+yaya bat+k+raM nyonu bra yog s+ya/ rkyen Am bzhin kraMnya rjes su sbyar pa'i'o/ /A ma gyi rjes su sbyor ba'i kr-ib+hU as gsum las/ asnya lta bu byings At+ma ne pa da can la
[\[240b.4\]]A ma sbyar ba yin kyang / D+hU dang as gnyis pa rasme+e'i tshig can yin pas liT pa rasme+e pa da'i rkyen rnams sbyor ba khon yin/ kr-inya gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas Am sbyor yul gyi byings de At+ma ne pad can yi na snga ma dang 'dra bar kr-inya At+mane'i rkyen can sbyor bar byed la/ byings de pa rasme+e pa
[\[240b.5\]]da can yin na kr-inya yang par sme+e pa da'i rkyen can sbyar bar bya ste/ eng+h+waM la b+hU dang as sbyar ba la/ eng+hAM ba p+hU pa/ e ng+nyAmA sa/ kr-inya sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ aT ng+hAM tsa kre/ kr-i la[\[]laT[\]]/ liT la byings ab+h+yAs med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata 'os ata du bskyar/ shu ha dag gi tsu 'os/ gtsa
[\[240b.6\]]la ta ru bsgyur/ liTa'i tadz+ha dag gi e sha i re tsa 'os/ ta e sha sha phyis ika gi a tsal yaN/ eng+hAM tsa krA te/ la AtAMT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' a/ e ng+hAMtsa kri re/ kr-il  liT byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a 'os r-i a kuha dag gi tsu 'os  kats+la dz+ha ru bsgyur/ liTa'i tadz+nya dag di e sha ire tsa 'os  dz+ha i re tsa ru bsgyur
[\[240b.7\]]tsad byangs don i ka gi a tsal yaN byas pa'o/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig dang gnyis chig la/ ang+haM tsa sr-i She/ lathAs su bsgyur  thAs kyi se 'os thAs se kun nas bskyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ aM d+hAM tsa krA the/ la A thAM Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ ika gi a tsa la yaN/ skyes bu dbus ma'i mang tshig
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]la/ i NaHShIng+h+waM lung li DAMng+honya n+dAta/ iN mtha' las ShIng+h+waM lung liT rnams kyi ng+ha'i 'o/ /byings iN so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' las pha rol gyi smon pa'i ling gi sing+sh+waM dang lung liT rnams kyi ng+ha yig ni D+ha yig tu 'gyur te/ eng+h+raM tsakr-iD+h+we/ kr-il laT byings gnyis brjod  r-i'i ata
[\[241a.2\]]'os/ r-i a kuha dag gi tsu 'os/ katsa/ lang+h+waMT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ mdo 'dis ng+haD+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e ng+hAM tsa kre/ la iT ru bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ e ng+haM tsa kri ba he/ la bahi dang ma hing du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ e ng+hAM tsa kr-im he/ eng+hAMtsa kr-im he/ eng+ha la buT lbal
[\[241a.3\]]dang po'i iT skyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e ng+hi tA/ e ng+hi dAro+o/ e ng+hi tAraH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ et+hetAse/ eng+hal  luT hAs la thAs su bsgyur thAs kyi se 'os thAs se tAs a sti dag gis dbyi 'os tAs kyis phyis rbal dang po iT/ e ng+hi tA sA the/ la A thAm du bsgyur/
[\[241a.4\]]Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ e ng+hi tAng+he/ lang+h+waMT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' eng+ha la bad ngos t+nas kyis phyis/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ aT d+hi hA he/ eng+ha la/ luT ngAs la iT ru bsgyur Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis i e eta la ha'os/ sa ha bal dang bo'i iT/ eng+hetA swa he/ la b+hi dang ma hing du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba
[\[241a.5\]]sogs kyis mtha' e/ eng+hi tA sma he/ e ng+hal smon ba'i ling sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e ng+hiShIShA ya s+t+raM/ eng+hi ShI ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e ng+hi ShI[\[]Sh+Sha[\]\u0f7f]/ eng+haM ShI yAs+thAM/ eng+hi ShIng+h+waM/ et+hi ShI D+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e ng+hiShI ya/ eng+hiShI
[\[241a.6\]]ba haM/ e ng+heShI ma hi/ e ng+hal l+r-iT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e ng+hiSh+ya te/ eng+hi Sh+ya n+te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+hiSh+ya se/ eng+hiSh+ya the/ eng+hiSh+ya d+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum/ eng+haMSh+ya/ e la eT ru bsgyur iTa'i ata'os/ iT ata/ ng+h+riSh+ya ba he/
[\[241a.7\]]e ng+hiSh+ya ma he/ e ng+ha la/ l+r-ing / a tsa dang po'i AT 'os/ byings la ATaM/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ s+ya sbyor ba sogs byas bas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e+eng+hiSh+ya ta/ e+eng+hiSh+yetAM/ e+eng+hiSh+ya n+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e+e ng+hiSh+ya thAH/ e+eng+hiSh+ye thAM/ e+eng+nyebyatAM/ skyes
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ e+eng+hiSh+ye/ e+eng+haSh+ya ba hi/ e+e ng+hiSh+ya ma hi sogs te/ cho ga la la cher b+hU thob pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ ! ik+Sha lta ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ /laT sogs At+ma ne pad rnams sbyor ba'i chog thams cad bshad ma thag dang 'dra'o/ ! /dad sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la laT
[\[241b.2\]]sogs at+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar bas cho ga yang leTa'i skabs ma gtogs e ng+ha'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ dad te/ da da te/ da dan+te sogs so/ /ling la/ da de ta/ da de yA tAM/ da de ran sogs so/ /loT la/ dad tAM/ da detAM/ da dab+tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a dang ta
[\[241b.3\]]a da retAM/ a dang n+ta sogs so/ /lung la/ a dadiSh+Ta /ad diShA tAM/ a da deSha ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ byings gnyis brjod pa dang lbal dang po la iT sbyor ba sogs byas bas/ skyes khu dang po gsum la/ dad de/ dang dA te/ dad di re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dad
[\[241b.4\]]di She/ dad dA the/ da da ding+h+wa/ da dadin+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da dade/ dad di ba he/ da dadi ma he sogs te/ 'dir sha sha/ dad/ ba dang po sogs kyi mdos/ ang+h+yAs dbyib dang o ra bsgyur ba sogs mi byed do/ /luT la byings phyed ba'i bal dang po la iT 'os iT spyar bas
[\[241b.5\]]da di tA/ da ditA ro+o/ da ditA raH/ da ditA se/ da ditA sA the/ da di tAt+h+we/ da di tAng+h+we/ da ditA he/ da ditA swa te/ da di tAsma he/ smon ba'i ling la'ang iT sbyar bas/ da di ShISh+Ta/ da diShI yAstuM/ da diShI ran sogs so/ /l+raT-il/ lbal dang po'i iT dang s+yatA sa zhes pas s+ya sbyin las/ da diSh+yate/
[\[241b.6\]]da diSh+ye te/ da diSh+yan+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ ad diSh+ya ta/ a da diSh+ye tAM/ a da di Sh+yan+ta sogs so/ /Sh+waSh+ka 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs Ah+ma ne pad rnams sbyar/ cho ga bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/ 'dir sub kyi byings sogs kyi byings kyi dang po'i Shas ra mi 'gyur te/
[\[241b.7\]]laT la/ Sh+waSh+ka te/ Sh+waSh+ke te/ Sh+waSh+kan+te sogs so/ /ling la/ Sh+waSh+ke ta/ Sh+waSh+ke yAstAM/ Sh+waSh+ke ran sogs so/ /loT la/ Sh+wa Sh+ka tAM/ Sh+wa Sh+ke tAM/ Sh+waSh+ka n+taM sogs so/ /lang la/ a Sh+waSh+ke ta/ a Sh+waSh+ke tAM/ a Sh+waSh+ka n+ta sogs so/ /lung la/ bal dang po'i iT sbyar
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bas/ a Sh+waSh+kiSh+Ta/ a ShaSh+kiShA tAM/ aSh+waSh+kaSha ta sogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Sha Sh+waSh+ke/ Sha ShaSh+ka te/ Sha Sh+waSh+ki re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Sha Sh+waSh+ki She/ Sha ShaSh+kA the/ Sha Sh+waSh+ke d+h+we/ Sha Sh+waSh+kiD+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma
[\[242a.2\]]gsum la/ Sha Sh+waSh+ke/ Sha Sh+waSh+ke ba he/ Sha Sh+waSh+ki ma he/ luT la/ iT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum pa/ Sh+waSh+ki tAro+o/ Sh+waSh+ki tAraH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Sh+waSh+kitAse/ Sh+waSh+ki tAsA the/ Sh+waSh+ki tAd+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Sh+waSh+ki tA he/ Sh+waSh+ki tA swa
[\[242a.3\]]he/ Sh+waSh+kitA sma he/ smon pa'i ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Sh+waSh+ki ShISh+Ta/ Sh+waSh+kiSh-I yAs+t+waM/ ShaSh+ki ShI ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Sh+waSh+ki ShI Sh+ThAH/ Sh+waSh+ki ShI yAs+thAM/ Sh+waSh+ki ShI ng+h+waM/ Sh+waSh+ki ShID+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Sh+waSh+ki ShI ya/ Sh+waSh+ki ShI ba hi/ Sh+waSh+ki ShI mahi/
[\[242a.4\]]l+r-iT la/ s+ya dang lbal dang po'i iT sbyin pas/ Sh+waSh+ki Sh+ya te/ Sh+waSh+ki Sh+ye he/ Sh+waSh+ki Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a Sh+waSh+kiSh+ya ta/ a Sh+waSh+ki Sh+ye tAM/ a Sh+waSh+ki Sh+yan+ta sogs so/ ! /ri dza 'gro ba la ste gnas pa la'ang ngo zhes pa la/ laT sogs Ang+ma ne bad rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga
[\[242a.5\]]snga ma dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ ardza te/ ardze te/ ardza n+te sogs so/ /ling la/ ardze ta/ ardza yAtAM/ ardze ran sogs so/ /loT la/ ardza tAM/ ardze tAM/ ardzenAM sogs so/ /lang la/ Ardzeta/ ArdzetAM/ Ardzan+ta sogs so/ /lung la/ bal dang bo'i iT
[\[242a.6\]]dang ts+li si tsa ru bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ Ardzi ShA/ Ardzi ShA tAM/ Ardzi Sha ta sogs so/ /liT la/ byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata 'os/ r-i a dang dang po'i ata kyi ring bod las nuT ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A nr-idza/ Anr-idzAta/ A
[\[242a.7\]]nr-i dzi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A nr-i dziShe/ Anr-i dzAtha/ Anr-i dzid+h+we/ Anr-i dziD+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A nr-i dze/ A n-i dza ba he/ Anr-i dze ma he/ phuT la/ lbal dang po'i iT dang tAs sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ ardzi tA/ ardzitA ro+o/ ardzi tA raH/
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]ardzi tA se sogs so/ /smon pa'o ling la/ ardzi ShISh+TaH/ ardzi ShI yAstUM/ ardziShI ran sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ lbal dang po'i iT dang s+ya tA sa dag l+r-i luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar bas/ erdzi Sh+ya te/ ardzi Sh+ye tAM/ ardzi Sh+yan+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ Ardzi
[\[242b.2\]]Sh+ya ta/ Ardzi Sh+ye tAM/ Ardzi Sh+yan+ta sogs so/ ! /ti dza rno ba la ste bzod pa la yang po zhes pa la/ gup+ti dzaki ta rnams las san 'os/ san san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag bo 'os/ dza gong ma phyis/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dzag/ khar la tsar 'os/ ga ka/ kun
[\[242b.3\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ kaSha 'dus pak+Sha/ ti ti k+Sha zhes bsgrubs pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ ti ti k+Sha te/ ti ti k+She te/ ti ti k+Shan+te sogs so/ /ling la/ ti tik+She ta/ ti tik+She yA tAM/ ti tik+Sheran sogs so/ /loT la/ ti tik+ShatAM/ ti tik+She
[\[242b.4\]]tAM/ ti ti k+Shan+tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a ti tik+Sha ta/ a ti tik+She tAM/ a ti tik+Shan+ta sogs so/ /lung la byings phyed byed pa po la shapa rjes 'brel pyis nas ata kyi yon tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ pa'i lbal dang po la iT 'os/ iT byaMn/ ata kyi dbyi'o/ /byings
[\[242b.5\]]mtha'i a dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ a ti tik+ShiSh+Ta /a ti tik+She ShA tAM /a ti tik+Shi Sha ta sogs so/ /liT la/ kAs rkyen sogs kyi byings mthar Am sbyar/ Am las sos/ liT 'jig /kr-inya sogs sbyar bas/ ti tik+ShAM tsa kre/ ti ti k+ShAM bab+hU ba/ ti ti k+ShA mA sa sogs so/ /luT
[\[242b.6\]]la lbal dang po'i iT dang / ata kyi dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ ti ti k+Shi tA/ ti tik+Shi tA/ ti tik+ShitA ro+o/ te tik+Shi tA raH/ ti tik+Shi dA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la'ang / ti tik+Shi ShISh+Ta/ ti tik+Shi ShI yAstAM/ ti tik+Shi ShI ran sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang / byings phyed pa'i bal dang pa la iT dang / s+ya tAs dag ces pas/ s+ya
[\[242b.7\]]sbyar bas/ ti tik+Shi Sh+ya te/ ti tik+Shi Sh+ye te/ ti ti k+ShiSh+ya n+nye sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ti ti k+Shi Sh+ya ta/ a ti tik+Shi Sh+ye dAM/ a ti tik+ShiSh+yan+ta sogs so/ ! /Sh+wany+dza yongs su 'khyud pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'is 'osaSha sa/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]danu/ sany+dzaswany+dza rnams kyi shab la 'os na dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ laT la/ swadza te /swa dze te /swadzan+nye sogs/ /ling la/ swa dzeta/ swa dzeyA tAM/ swa dze ran sogs so/ /loT la/ swa dza tAM/ swadze tAM/ swadzan+tAM sogs dang / lang la/ a sa dza ta/
[\[243a.2\]]a swa dze dAM/ aswa dzan+ta sogs so/ /lung la iT ma 'jug /c+li si tsa ru bsgyur/ dz+hal las dz+hal la dbyi ba dang / tsu'i ku sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a swaMk+ta/ a swaMkA tAM/ aswaMk+Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a swaMk+thAH/ a swek+ShA
[\[243a.3\]]tAM/ a swaMb+ng+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la /a swaM k+Shi /a sAM k+Sh+wahi /a swaMk+Sh+mahi /liT la/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ swaMdzaHsaM yo gA dpi li To bA kitwaM/ swany+nga las brtsegs pa las kyang li Ta'i kita yang na'o/ /swany+ja dang brtsegs pa las kyang pha rol kyi liT
[\[243a.4\]]bsgyur ba 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams ni yang na ka 'gro ba'i ming can du ming 'dogs byed de/ dgos pa ni iT 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyi ki ta la nad byi ba dang yon tan sogs yang na bar bya ba'i don te/ kita kyi phyags kyi skyes bu dang bo gsum la /sa swa dze/ sa swadzA te/ sa swa dzi
[\[243a.5\]]re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa swa dziShe/ saswa dzA the/ sa swa dzing+h+wa/ sa swa dziD+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa swa dze/ sa swa dzi bahe/ sa swa dzi ma he/ kita kyi brda chad ma byas pa'i phyogs las kyang na mi dbyi ba ma gtogs gzhan 'dra ste/ sa swany+dze/ sa swany+dzA te/ sa swadzi re/
[\[243a.6\]]sogs so/ /luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dzragra/ khar la car 'os/ ga kar bsgyur bas/ swaMk+tA/ swaM k+hAraH/ swaMk+hA se sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ tsu'i klu dang / khar la tsang 'os/ ga ka/ D+him mas bsgyur ba sogs kyi sI yuTa'i saSha/ ka Sha 'dus pa k+Sha sogs
[\[243a.7\]]byas pas/ swaMk+ShISh+Da/ swak+ShI yAstAM/ swaMk+ShI ran sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ tsu'i ku dang / khar la tsar/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ swaMk+Sh+ya te/ swaMk+Sh+ye te /swaMk+Sh+yan+te sogs so/ de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a swaMk+Sh+ya ta/ aswak+Sh+ye tAM/ a swaM k+Sh+yan+ta sogs so/ ! /
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]swa dza te'i sngon du nyer bsgyur ni sbyor ba/ pa rin pi rnams las sogs kyis Shar 'gyur te/ ni Sha dza te sogs so/ /i bAdInaM bAT bya bA ye\u0f85pi/ si pa la sogs pa rnams kya aT par na yod pa la'ang yang na'/ /nyer bsgyur pa rini bi rnams las si ba la sogs pa ste/ Shi bu thags 'thag pa
[\[243b.2\]]Shaha gus pa/[ \[]k+Shu[\]]nya bstod pa/ Sh+wany+ja yongs su 'khyud pa rnams dang suT Ag ma'i sa nges par 'khyud par byed/ yi [\[]ge[\]] rnams ni aT A ga ma bar na yod kyang Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ n+ya Sh+wa dzata/ n+ya swa dzata sogs te/ lang gi rjes so/ /sa di swa[\[]ny+j+yoH[\]\u0f7f]par s+ya li Ti/ sad swany+ja dag gi pha
[\[243b.3\]]rol gyi liT la'o/ /sa de steSha d+l-i rnam par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas mnyes par byed pa la'o dang / Sh+wany+dza yongs su 'khyung pa dag la liT byin pas byungs gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a[\[]b+h+yA [\]]sa'i ming can de las pha rol gyis ni/ pa ri ni bi rnams sngon ma las kyang Shar 'gyur pa ma yin te/
[\[243b.4\]]niSha swa dze'am/ ni Sha swany+dze sogs so/ ! /dra pUSha ngo tsha ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la /laT sogs sbyar/ U dang Sha rjes 'brel/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la shapa dang byings phyed pa rnams kyi lbal dang po la U 'gro ba sogs kyi iT yang na sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT
[\[243b.5\]]la/ tra pa te/ tra pe ta/ dra pan+te sogs so/ /ling la/ tra pe ta/ tra pe yA tAM /tra pa ran sogs so/ /loT la/ trapa tAM /tra pe hAM/ tra pan+tAM sogs so/ lang la /a tra pa ta/ a tra pan+ta sogs so/ /lung la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la /a tra piSh+Ta /a
[\[243b.6\]]tra pIbA tAM/ a tra pi Sha ta sogs so/ /iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la /a trab+ta /a trap+sA tAM /a trap+sa ta sogs so/ /l+riT la /trAMpa la b+ha dza tra ba las kyang ngo zhes pa'i mdos /a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ tre pe/ tre pA te/ tre pi re sogs so/ /luT la /lbal
[\[243b.7\]]dang po'i iT yang na bar byas pas/ trapi tA sogs sam/ brap+tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ tra piShISh+Ta/ trapi ShI yAstAM/ tra pi ShI ran sogs sam/ /iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la /trap+sISh+Da /hrap+sI ran sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]yang na bar byas pas/ tra pi Sh+ya te/ tra pi Sh+ye te/ tra pi Sh+yan+te sogs sam/ trab+s+ya te/ trab+s+yete/ trab+s+ye te/ trabas+yan+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a tra pi Sh+yata/ a tra pi Sh+ye tAM/ a tra pi Sh+yan+ha sogs sam/ a trab+s+ya tAM/ a trap+s+yan+ta sogs so/ /ra
[\[244a.2\]]ng+hidza b+hor tsi/ ra ng+hidzab+ha dag gi a tsal la'o/ /ra ng+ha 'tshe ba dang dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams par dag gi rkyen a tsa dang po can pha rol la num A gam 'gyur te/ ! /dza b+hal laT sogs sbyar/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la sha pa dang phyed pa bal dang po can rnams la iT sbyor ba sogs kyis
[\[244a.3\]]bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ dzam+b+ha te/ dzam+b+he te/ dzam+b+han+te sogs so/ /ling la/ dzam+b+he ta/ dzam+b+he yA tAM/ dzam+b+he ran sogs so/ /loT la/ dzam+b+ha tAM/ dzam+b+hetAM/ dzam+b+han+hAM/ lang la/ a dzam+b+ha ta/ a dzam+b+he tAM/ adzam+b+han+ta/ lung la/ a dzam+b+hiSh+Ta/ a dza m+b+hiShA tAM/ a dzam+b+hiSha
[\[244a.4\]]ta sogs so/ /liT la/ dza dza m+b+hA/ dza dza m+b+hA te/ dza dzam+b+he re sogs so/ /luT la/ dzam+b+hi tA/ dzam+b+hi tA ro+o/ dzam+b+hi tAraHsogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ dzam+b+hi ShISh+Ta/ dzam+b+hi ShI yAstAM/ dzam+b+hi ShI ran sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dzam+b+hi Sh+ye te/ dzam+b+hi Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ /
[\[244a.5\]]l+r-ing la/ a dza m+b+hi Sh+ya ha/ a dzam+b+hi Sh+ye tAM/ a dza m+b+hi Sh+yan+ta sogs so/ ! /th+b+hab+ha brtan pa la'o zhis pa la laT la sogs pa rnams sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os Sha sa/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes pas Ta tar lob/ /rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la shab
[\[244a.6\]]dang phyed pa rnams la iT sbyor bas gas byas pas/ laT la/ stob+ha te/ ste b+he te/ stob+he te/ sto b+han+te sogs so/ /ling la/ sto b+he ta/ sto b+heyA stAM/ sto b+he ran sogs so/ /loT la/ sto b+ha tAM/ sto b+he tAM/ sto b+han+tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a sto b+ha ta/ a sto b+hetAM/ asto
[\[244a.7\]]b+han+ta sogs so/ /lung la/ asto b+hiSh+Ta/ asto b+hiShA tAM/ astob+hi Shata sogs so/ /liT la/ shar dang po sogs kyi a b+h+yA sa'i sa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ tub+Du b+he/ tuSh+Tu b+hA te/ tuSh+Du b+he re sogs so/ /luT la/ sto b+hi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ stob+hi ShISh+Ta/
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]stob+hi ShI yAstAM/ stob+hi ShIran sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ stob+hiSh+ya te/ sto b+hiSh+ye te/ sto b+hi Sh+yan+ti sogs so/ l+r-ing la/ asto b+hiSh+ya ta/ a sta b+ha Sh+ya tA/ astob+hiSh+yan+ta sogs so/ ! /paN tha snyad la ste bstod pa la'ang ngo zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ phu pUng+hUpa sogs kyi byings la A ya
[\[244b.2\]]sbyor ba dang / 'grel par Ang+ma ne pad rnams la yang na par bya'o zhes pa byur bas/ A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi laT la/ pa NA yate/ paNA ye ta/ baNA yan+te sogs dang / ling la/ paNA ye ta/ pANA ye yAtAM /pANA ye ran sogs so/ /loT la /paNA ya bAM /baNA yetAM/ pa
[\[244b.3\]]NA yan+taM /sogs so/ /lang la /a paNA yata/ apaNA ye hAM/ a pa NAyan+ta sogs so/ /lung la/ lbal dang po'i iT dang aT kyi dbyi 'os/ byings ma za'i a phyis pas/ a paNAyiSh+Ta/ a baNA yi ShA tAM /apa NA yiSha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ kAs sogs kyi

[\[244b.5\]]pa NA yi Sh+ye tAM/ a paNAyi Shan+ta sogs so/ /A lam sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi leT la/ baN te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ paN ta sogs so/ /loT la/ paNA tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a paN ta /sogs so/ /lung la/ a paNiSh+Ta sogs so/ /liT la /peNe/ paNAte /peNi re sogs so/ /luT
[\[244b.6\]]la/ paNi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ paNi ShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ paNi Sh+yate sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ paNiSh+ya te sogs so/ /yang 'grel par paN rnam dbye At+ma ne can yin kyang skabs 'gar A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs la pa ra sme+e pad rnams kyang 'jug go zhes bshad
[\[244b.7\]]pas pa NA ya ti sogs kyang 'byung ngo / /ka me r+Ning / ka mi las Ni nga'o/ /kamu mdzes pa la' zhes pa la ngo po'i rkyen i sbyar ba'i ka mi las pha rol tu Ning 'gyur te/ paat+ma ne pad 'jug pa'i don dang / Na byings la 'phel ba'i don no/ /laT la/ byed pa po la sha ba yon tan sogs byas
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]pas/ kA ma yate sogs so/ /ling la/ kA ma ya ta sogs so/ /loT la/ kAm ya tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a gA ma yata sogs so/ /kamul Ni spyar bas kA mi la lung / lung / ts+li/ Ni/ shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur la ta/ kA mi tsang ta/ No+o tsa ng+Yu
[\[245a.2\]]bang+hAyAhra soH/ Ni la tsang la u bang+hA'i thung du'o/ /Ni mtha' can gyi u pang+hAts+li bskyur ba'i tsang pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur te/ kA thung ngur song / tsang la'o zhes bas byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu'os/ tsa ka/ tsa ka mi/ tsang ta zhes pa byung / sa n+wal+la g+hu ni tsang ba re natwa glo pa/ aka phyis/
[\[245a.3\]]pa ma yin pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin no/ /byings kyi mtha' a ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge phyis ba ma yin ba Ni mtha' can yi ge yang ba yin pa de'i a b+h+yA sa'i bya ba rnams tsang pha rol las na bzhin du bya'o/ /san+yataH san la Ata kyi'o/ /san pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i
[\[245a.4\]]dang po a b+h+yA sa'i ming can gyi ata ni ita du 'gyur te/ skabs 'dir mdo snga phyi gnyis kyis tsi ka mi/ tsang ta dIr+g+hoHyang ba'i ring po'o/ /yi ge yang ba'i sngon ma'i a b+h+ya sa'i Ni dang tsang pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ tsi ring por song / tsI ka mi/ tsang ta/ Na ra ni Ti/ iT ma yin pha
[\[245a.5\]]la Ni'i 'o/ /rnam dbye byings phyad pa iT dang po can ma yin pa pha rol la Ni dbyi bar bya ste/ Na'i rjes 'brel phyis/ tsang gi rjes 'brel nga dang ca'ang phyis/ lud lang sogs kyi byings la aT sbyar bas/ atsI kam ta/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ atsI ka me
[\[245a.6\]]tAM/ a tsI ka man+ta/ lung gi skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ itsAka ma thAH/ a tsI ka me thAM/ a tsI ka ma ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsI ka me/ a tsI ka mApa hi/ a tsI kamAm hi/ A ya la sogs ba rnams byings phyed ba la yang na'o zhes ba'i mdos Ning ma byin ba'i phyogs
[\[245a.7\]]la/ 'grel par Ni med pa la'ang ts+li tsanga'o zhes bshad pas/ a tsa ka ma ta/ a tsa ka me tAM/ a tsa ka man+ha sogs so/ /liT la/ kwas sogs kyikA mi la Am sbyar/ kA mi/ Am/ liT/ Am la 'os/ liT 'jig/ a yAman+tA lwAphyet+ni[\[]k+Shu[\]]Shu/ am mtha' A lu
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]A pya it+nu iSh+nu rnams la a ya'o/ /Am mtha' dang kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen A lu/ A pya/ ing+nu/ iSh+Nu rnams pha rol la Ni'i mtha' can ni a ya zhes par 'gyur te/ kA ma yAM tsakre/ kA ma yAM ba b+hU ba/ kA ma yAM ba b+hU ba/ kA ma yA mA sa sogs so/ /Ning ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ tsa ka me/ tsa ka

[\[245b.3\]]mitA sogs so/ /Ning sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi smon pa'i ling la/ kA ma yiShISh+Da sogs dang / Ning ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ lami ShISh+Da sogs so/ /l+r-iT la Ning sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA ma yi Sh+yate sogs dang / Nir ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ ka mi Sh+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du Ning sbyar ba'i
[\[245b.4\]]phyags kyi l+r-ing la/ a kAm yi Sh+yata sogs dang / Ning ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a kami Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /a ya 'gro ba la'o shes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ a ya te sogs so/ /ling la/ a yi ta sogs so/ loT la/ a yatAM sogs so/ /lang la/ A
[\[245b.5\]]ya ta sogs so/ lung la/ A yiSh+Ta sogs so/ da yA yA sash+tsa/ da ya aya As las kyang ngo / /da ya sbyin pa a ya 'gro ba As nye bar sdang pa rnams las kyang liT pha rol la Am sbyor bar bya ste/ a ya la liT Am sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a yAMtsa kre
[\[245b.6\]]a yAM bab+hA ba/ a yAmA sa sogs so/ /luT la/ lbal dang po'i iT yin pas/ a yi hA sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ a yi ShISh+Da sogs sa/ /l+r-iT la/ a yi Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ A yi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /u pasarga s+yA ya to/ nyer bsgyur gyi a ya ti
[\[245b.7\]]la'o/ /nyer bsgyur gyir yig ni a ya te pha rol la la yig tu 'gyur te/ a ya te'i sngon nu pra bzhag/ mdo 'des ral aka 'dra bal ring po byas/ tha  p+l+nga ya te/ rab tu 'gro bar byed/ de bzhin du/ ba rA yal/ 'ar  pa lA ya te/ pha rol tu 'gro bar byed/ ba ri lang la ika gi
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]atsa la yaN 'os/ mtshams sbyar bas/ b.ri pa l+ya ya te/ 'grel bar a ya te pha rol la'ang bra te dang nir dang dur rnams kyi ra yig la ru 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /zhes bshad bas/ prah+ya ya te/ nir ya te/ dur ya te lta bu'o/ ! /da ya 'gro ba dang / 'tshe ba
[\[246a.2\]]dang / sbyin pa rnams la'o zhes pa la/ laT la sogs pa sbyar  yongs su 'gro bar byed/ 'bi bya ba thams cad a ya dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ da ya te sogs so/ /ling la/ da yo ta sogs so/ /liT so sor 'gro bar byed/ mi 'gro bar byed/ ngen par 'gro bar byed/ la/ da ya tAM sogs
[\[246a.3\]]so/ /lang la/ ad yata sogs so/ /lung la/ ang yiSh+Da sogs so/ /liT la/ da ya a ya As las kyang ngos Am sbyar bas/ da yAM tsa kre/ da yAM ba b+hU ba/ da yA mA sa sogs so/ /luT la/ da yi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ da yi ShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/

[\[246a.5\]]lbal dang po rnams la iT yang na bar bya ste/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ tsAya s+phA yapyA yA miD+wA/ tsA ya s+phA ya byA ya rnams kyi iT yang na'o/ /tsA y+r-i mchod pa/ sbA yI dang o byA yI 'phel ba rnams kyi liT ma gtogs pa'i lba la dang po la iT yang na par bya ste/ lung la/ iT sbyar
[\[246a.6\]]ba'i phyogs la/ as+phA yiSh+Ta/ a s+phA yiShAtAM/ a s+phA yi ShA ta sogs so/ /iT ma byin ba'i phyogs la/ lba ya dag gi lbal la dbyi ros ya phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ as+phAsta/ as+phAsAtAMM/ a s+phAs ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ as+phAs+thAH/ as+phA sA

[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ba/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bas+phA ye/ pas+phA yA te/ bas+phA yi te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pas+phA yIShe/ pas+phAyA the/ pas+phA ying+h+we / pa s+phA yiD+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ /pas+phA ye/ bas+phA yib he/ pas+phA yi ma he/ luT la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ s+pha yi tA/

[\[246b.3\]]so/ /l+r-iT la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ sgA yi Sh+ya te sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la lba ya dag gi zhes pas ya phyis pas/ stA s+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du l+r-ing la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ sas+phA yi Sh+ya ta sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ ya phyis pas/ as+phA s+ya te
[\[246b.4\]]sogs so/ ! /o byA yI 'phel ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ byA ya te sogs so/ /ling la/ pA ye ta sogs so/ /loT la/ pyA ya tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a byA ya ta sogs so/ /dI ma dzan bu ng+habUri tA yi pyA yi b+h+yonyan+ya ta ras+yAM/ dI pa dzan bung+ha pU
[\[246b.5\]]ri/ tA yi pyA yi rnams las yang na'o/ /dIpI 'bar ba/dzanI rab tu skyo ba/ bung+ha khong du chud pa/ pUrI tshim pa/ tAy-i rgyad/ opyA yI 'phel ba rnams las lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig ta pha rol la ts+li ni yang na tsi Na zhes par 'gyur zhing yang na si tsar 'gyur te/ tsi No lug/
[\[246b.6\]]ci Na las 'jig go/ ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur ba'i tsi Na las la bsgyur ba'i ta yig kyang dbyi bar bya ste/ byA ya la/ lung / lung la ts+li dI pa sogs kyis ts+li tsi Na ru bsgyur/ Na 'phel don/ tsa/ tsiN las 'jig go'i don/ la ta mdo 'dis ta phyis/ a byA yi/ ts+li si tsar bsgyur ba'i
[\[246b.7\]]phyogs la/ tsA ya sogs kyis iT yang na bar bya ste/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a pyA yiSh+Ta/ a pyA yi ShAtAM/ a pyA yi Sha ta sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ lba y+ra dag gi lbal la dbyi'os ya phyis pas/ a byAsta/ a byA sA tAM/ a pyA se ta sogs so/
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]liD+ya dosh+tsa/ liT yang dag la'ang ngo / /liT dang yang dag pha rol la pyA ya ni pI zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ byA ya la liT/ mdo 'dis pIru bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pi bye/ pi byA te/ pi byi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pi phyi She/
