[\[247a.3\]]du smon pa'i ling la/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ byA yiShISh+Ta sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ byA sISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ pyA yi Sh+ya te sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ lba ya sogs kyis ya phyis pas byA s+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin
[\[247a.4\]]du/ l+r-ing la/ a pyA yi Sh+ya ta sogs sam/ a pyAs+ya ta sogs so/ ! /tAy+r-i rgyud dang skyong ba dag la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ tA ya te sogs so/ /ling la/ tA ye ha sogs so/ /loT la/ tAya dAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a tA ya ta sogs
[\[247a.5\]]so/ /lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dI pa sogs kyi ts+la yang na tsi yang na tsi Nar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a tA yi/ yang na si tsar bsgyur bas/ a tA yiSh+Ta/ atA yiShAtAM/ atA yi Sha ta sogs so/ /liT la/ ta dA ye/ tadAyAte/ tatA yi re/ tadA yi She sogs so/ /luT
[\[247a.6\]]la/ tA yi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ tA yi ShISh+Da sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ tA yi Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ atAyi Sh+ya ta/ a tA yi Sh+yetAM/ a tA yi Sh+yan+ta sogs so/ ! /sha la g.yo ba la ste kun du sgrib pa la yang ngo zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ sha la
[\[247a.7\]]te sogs so/ /ling la/ sha le ta sogs so/ /loT la/ shal tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a shal ta sogs so/ /lung la/ lbal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a sha liSh+Ta sogs so/ /liT la/ a b+h+yAs dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs byas/ she le/ shelA
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]te/ she li re sogs so/ /luT la/ sha li tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ iT sbyar bas/ sha liShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+riT la/ sha li Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a sha li Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /Shebr-i 'khrud pa la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha sar bsgyur
[\[247b.2\]]ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ seb te sogs so/ ling la/ se be ta sogs so/ /loT la/ se ba tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a se bta sogs so/ /lung la byings phyed pa'i lbal dang po'i iT 'os/ iT byin pas a sebiSh+Ta sogs so/ /liT la/ byings gnyis
[\[247b.3\]]brjod/ thung du 'os/ e ir bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ si She bA te/ siShe pi re sogs so/ /luT la/ se bi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ se bi ShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ se bi Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a se bi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /kAshr-i
[\[247b.4\]]'bar ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ kA sha te sogs so/ /ling la/ kA sheta sogs so/ /loT la/ kA sha tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a kA sha ta sogs so/ /lung la iT sbyar bas/ akA shiSh+Ta sogs so/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ kAsha k+Sha
[\[247b.5\]]so rAm+nyA/ k+nga sha kA sa dag gi Am yang na'o/ /kA shr-i 'bar ba dang / kA sr-i sgra ngan pa dag gi liT pha rol la Am yang na sbyar bar byaste/ Am sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA shAMtsa kri/ kAshAM bab+hU ba/ kA shA mA sa sogs dang / Am ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tsa kA she/ tsa kA shAte/ tsekAshri
[\[247b.6\]]re sogs so/ /luT la eT sbyar bas/ kAshi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kAshiShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ kA shi Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a kA shiSh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /kAsr-i sgra dan ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar ba'i bya ba thams cad bshad ma thag ba dang 'dra'o/ /
[\[247b.7\]]Iha rtsed mo byed pal 'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ Ita te sogs so/ /ling la/ I he ta sogs so/ /loT la/ I ha tAM sogs so/ /lab la/ e+eha ta sogs so/ /lung la lbal dang po'i iT byin pas/ ihiSh+Ta sogs so/ /liT la/ i tsa dang
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]po lci ba ldan pa sogs kyis Am sbyar bas/ I hItsa kre/ I hAM ba b+dU ba/ I hAM mA sa sogs so/ /luT la/ iT byin bas/ I hitAsogs so/ /smin pa'i ling la/ IhiShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang byings phyed pa lbal dang po'i iT 'os/ iT sbyin
[\[248a.2\]]pas Ihi Sh+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ i hi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /gAng 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ byed pa bol sha pa 'os sha pa rjes 'brel phyis nas/ aka 'dra ba la ring po byas pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ 'gro bar byed/ gA te/ la A tAMT 'gro
[\[248a.3\]]ba sogs kyis mtha' e aka 'dra ba la ring po/ bAte/ gA te/ ladz+ha Ad+ma ne pad rnams la arta ma yin pa'as sos dz+ha a ta du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e aka 'dra ba sogs kyis ring bo/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ gA se/ gAthe/ gAng+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ge+e/ gA ba he/ gA
[\[248a.4\]]ma he/ ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum/ 'gro bar byed dang / 'gro bar byed ba rnams/ la/ geta/ ge yA tAM/ ge ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ge thAH/ ge yA thAM/ geng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ge ya/ ge ba hi/ gem hi/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ laM taDa
[\[248a.5\]]'gro ba sogs kyis e/ eta kyi Am 'os i Am/ gUtAM/ pa AtAM aka 'dra bal ring po/ gAtAM  rnams 'gro bar badzad/ gAngAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ gA swa/ gAthAM/ gAng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ge+e/ gA lba he+e/ gAm he+e/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a gA ta/ a
[\[248a.6\]]ShAtAM/ a gAta/ skyes bu dbus ma  gsum 'gro bar mdzod/ la/ agAthAH/ dag 'gro bar mdzod/ a gAthAM/ ladz+haAd+mane pad sogs kyis dz+ha atra Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis a eta kyi Am/ agA ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ga/ /a gA pa hi/ a gA mahi/ lung la/ agAsta/ a gA
[\[248a.7\]]sA tAM/ a gAs ta sogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzage/ ata kyi iT la'ang dbyi ngos a phyis pa'o/ /dzagA te/ dza gi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza gi She/ dza gA the/ dzagi ng+h+we/ dzagiD+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza gi/ dza gi ba he/ dzagi ma he/ luT
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]la/ gAtwa/ gAtAro+o/ gA tA raMH/ gA tAs sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gA sISh+Ta/ gA sI yAstAM/ gAsIr na sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ gAs+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ agA s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /rud 'gro bal ste bshad pa la'ang ngo zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ ra
[\[248b.2\]]bte sogs so/ /ling la/ ra be ta sogs so/ /loT la/ rab tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a rab ta sogs so/ /lung la/ ru dru sogs kyi iT yang na bar byas pas/ a rabiSh+Ta/ ar bi ShA t+ngaM/ a ra bi Sha ta sogs sam/ a roSh+Ta/ a ro ShA taM/ a ro Sha ta sogs
[\[248b.3\]]so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ru ru pe/ ru ru bA te/ ru ru bi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ru ru pi She/ ru ru bA the/ ru ru bing+h+we/ ru ru biD+h+we/ ru ru bi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ru ru pe/ ru ru bi ba he/ ru ru bi ma he/ luT la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ rabitA
[\[248b.4\]]sogs sam/ ro tA sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ ra bi ShISh+Ta sogs sam/ roShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ra bi Sh+ya te sogs sam/ roSh+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ra'i Sh+ya ta sogs sam/ aro Sh+yata sogs so/ ! /de bskyed
[\[248b.5\]]pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs byin pas/ laT la/ da ya te sogs so/ /ling la/ da ye ta sogs so/ /loT la/ da ya tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ ad ya ta sogs so/ /s+thA g+ho rits+tsha/ s+thA g+hu'i ita'ang ngo / /lung Ad+ma ne ba da rnams pha rol la s+thA dang byings g+hu'i ming can rnams
[\[248b.6\]]kyi mtha' i ta du 'gyur zhing ita du 'gyur bde las pha rol gyi ts+li 'gyur ba si 'gyur ba si tsa'ang ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes tha snyad byed de/ yon tan sogs mi byed pa'i son no/ /deng la/ lung / si tsa/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la la etsa'i Ata 'os/ e A mdo 'dis A Itatu bsgyur/ ta
[\[248b.7\]]ya gi te pha rol de'i dus kyi 'os ta phyis pas/ a di/ sra tra/ zhes pa la/ hraswAdaMgAta/ gzugs thud gul sa so/ /gzugs te byings mtha' a ca thung du las ts+li bsgyur ba'i si tsa ni dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la dbyi ste/ sitsa phyis pas/ a dinya/ gnyis tshig
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]dang mang tshig la/ a diShA tAM/ a diSha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ adi thAH/ a diShAthAM/ a dib+haM/ a diD+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a di Shi/ a di Sha hi/ a diSh+ma hi/ da ya ti rdi gi liTi/ liT la da ya ti'i di gi'o/ /liT pha ral la da ya ti
[\[249a.2\]]ste/ deng skyong bal 'os/ byings deng ni di gi zhes par 'gyur zhing gnyis brjod pa sogs kyang mi byed de/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di gye/ degyAto/ di gyi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ di gyiShe/ di gyiShe/ digyI tha/ di gyi ng+h+we/ digyiD+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ di gye/ di gyi pa
[\[249a.3\]]nye/ di gyi ma he/ luT la/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs e tsa Ata du basbyar bas/ dAtA/ dA tAro+o/ dA tA raHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dA sISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dA s+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a ngAs+ya ta sogs so/ ! /DIng nam mkha' la 'gro ba la'o zhes pa
[\[249a.4\]]la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ Da ya te sogs so/ /ling la/ Da yata sogs so/ /loT la/ Da ya tAMsogs so/ /lang la/ aT ya ha sogs so/ /lung la/ iT dang byings la yon tan byas pas/ aDa yiSh+Ta sogs so/ /liT la byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung
[\[249a.5\]]ngur song / a b+h+yA sa'i tsir 'ang ngos Da tar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ Ti D+ya/ TiD+yA te/ DiD+yi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Ti tsiShe/ TiDA the/ TiD+yIng+h+we/ TiD+yi D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Ti D+ye/ TiD+yi ba he/ DiD+yi ma he/ luT la iT sbyar yon tan byas pas/ Da yi tA sogs so/ /
[\[249a.6\]]smon pa'i ling la/ Da yiShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ Dali Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/aDa yi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /[\[]gub[\]] sbad pa dang smod pa la'o zhes ba la/ gup+ti dzaki ta rnams las san 'os san sbyar/ san yang dag la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ba/
[\[249a.7\]]dzar bsgyur nas/ dzugu p+sa zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas laT la/ dzugup+sa te sogs so/ /ling la dzugup+se ta sogs so/ /liT la/ dzugu p+satAM sogs so/ /lang la/ adzugup+sa ta sogs so/ /lung la/ lbal dang po'i iT dang / ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]dzugup+siSh+Da sogs so/ /liT la/ kAs sogs kyis Am sbyar bas/ dzugu p+sAM tsakre/ dzugup+sAM ba b+hUpa/ dzugup+sA mA sa sogs so/ /luT la iT byin ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ dzugup+si tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dzugup+siShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dzugup+siSh+ya
[\[249b.2\]]te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ adzugup+si Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /mAnA ng+hadA n+YA n+b+h+yodIr+g+hash+tsA b+h+yAs s+ya/ mAn bang+ha dAn shA rnams las ab+h+yA sa'i reng po'ang ngo / /mAn mchod pa/ ba ng+hA smad pa/ dAn kun nas 'gems pa/ shA na rno ba rnams las san 'gyur zhing / san yang dag la 'os/
[\[249b.3\]]byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de yang ring por 'gyur [\[]te/[\] ]mAn la/ san/ byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os/ sngam thung ngur song / san la ata kyi 'os a i/ mdo 'dis ring bo mI mAn+sa zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ mi mAn+sa te sogs so/ /ling la/
[\[249b.4\]]mi mAn+se ta sogs dang / loT la/ mInAn+sa tAM sogs dang / lang la/ a mI mAn+sa ta sogs so/ /lung la lbal dang po'i iT dang ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a mI mAn+siSh+w+Ta sogs so/ /liT la/ kA sa sogs kyi Am sbyar bas/ mImAsnAM tsa kre/ mI mAn+sA+eb b+hU ba/ mI mAn+sAMmAs
[\[249b.5\]]sogs so/ /luT la/ iT dang a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ mI mAn+si dA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ mI mAn+sI ShISh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ mI mAn+si Sh+ya te sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ amImAn+siSh+ya ta sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ bang+hA sma dpal san/ san lang dag la 'os
[\[249b.6\]]byings gnyis brjod/ san la ata kyi 'os a i/ mdo 'dis ring po/ a tsa gcig ba'i ba sha'i b+haSha/ dz+taSha/ mtha'i sang+hA dag la 'os pa 'og mab+ha/ khar la tsar 'os/ ng+hata ru bsgyur bas/ gI b+hat+sa zhes ba la laT sogs sbyar bas laT la/ bIb+hat+sa te sogs so/ /ling la /bI
[\[249b.7\]]b+had+se ta sogs so/ /ling la/ bI b+had+sa tAM sogs so/ /lung la/ lbal dang bo'i iT dang kyi dbyi'os/ a phyis pas/ abI b+hat+siSh+Ta sogs so/ /liT la/ bI b+ha[\[]b+hA[\]]tsa kre/ bI b+hat+sAM ba b+dU ba/ bI b+hat+sA mA sa sogs so/ /luT la/ bI b+had+si tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bI b+ha t+si ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ bI b+ha t+si Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a bI b+ha t+si Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /d+yu ta 'ang rab la 'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ /laT la/ /t+yo ta te sogs so/ /ling la/ d+yo te ta sogs so/ /loT la d+yo ta tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a d+yo ta ha sogs so/ /d+yu d+b+h+yo lu di/
[\[250a.2\]]d+yu ta rnams las lung la'o/ /d+yu ta la sogs pa rnams la lung gi bar sme pad rnams yang na 'gyur te/ par smai'i phyogs la/ pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs zhes pa'i mdos ts+li ang du bsgyur ba bas/ a d+yu ta ta/ a d+yu ta tAM/ a d+yu tan sogs so/ /A t+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la/ ts+li si tsar
[\[250a.3\]]bsgyur/ wa la dang bo'i i Ta sbyar pas/ a d+yo ti Sh+Ta/ a d+yo ti Sha ta sogs so/ /t+yu ti swA ra NaM/ byu ti swA pi dag gi saM pra sA ra Na'o/ /d+yu ta 'bar ba/ nyi ShA ba nyal ba dag gi leT la bying sa gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sa'i ming can de saM pra sA ra Na sre slar yang
[\[250a.4\]]dag par bsgyur bar bya ste/ di d+yu te/ di d+yu tA te/ di d+yu ti re/ di d+yu ti She/ sogs so/ /luT la/ iT sbyar bas/ d+yo ti tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ d+yo ti ShA Sh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ d+yo ti Sh+ya te sogs so/ l+r-ing la/ a d+yo ti Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /br-i tu 'jug pa la ngo shes ba
[\[250a.5\]]la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la brta te sogs so/ /ling la/ brte ta sogs so/ /loT la/ brta tAM sogs so/ /la [\[]pa [\]]la/ a brta ta sogs so/ /lung la d+yu ta rnams las lung la'o zhes pas/ yang na pa ra smai pa da rnams dang A t+ma ne ba da rnams yang na bar d+yas bas/ par smai pad sbyar
[\[250a.6\]]ba'i phyogs la/ a br-i ta ta/ a br-i ta tAM/ a br-i tan sogs so/ /A t+ma ne ba da'i phyogs la/ tsI si tsar bsgyur/ wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a brti Sh+Ta/ a brti ShA tAM/ a brti Sha ta sogs so/ /leT la/ ba br-i te/ ba br-i tA te/ pa br-i ti re sogs so/ /luT la/ brti bA/
[\[250a.7\]]brti tA rau/ brti dA ra:sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ brti ShI Sh+Ta/ brti ShI yA stAM/ brti ShI ra na sogs so/ /br-i d+d+h+ya:s+ya sa no:br-i ta rnams la s+ya san dag la'o/ /br-i ta la sogs pa ste/ br-i tu 'jug pa/ br-i b+hu 'phel ba/ shw-i d+hu sgra smad pa/ s+ya n+dU zag pa/ kr-i bU nus pa rnams te/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]byings de rnams A d+ma ne pa da can yin kyang / s+ya dang san dag pha rol la par smi ba da rnams kyang yang na 'gyur ro/ na br-i d+d+h+ya sh+tsa tu r+b+h+ya:br-i ta rnams las bzhi rnams las ma yin no/ /br-i ta sogs lnga las kr-i bU bor ba'i bzhi 'khyings phyed bas yig dang po can bar smai pa da rnams pha rol la iT 'gyur ba ma
[\[250b.2\]]yin zhing skabs 'gar rkyen gzhan la yang na bar bya ste/ br-i tu la/ br-i ta rnams las zhes bas/ l-iT par smai ba da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ brta ti/ sar+t+s+ya ti/ bar+t+s+ya:/ bar+t+s+ya n+ti sogs so/ /A t+ma ni ba da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ brta Sh+ye te/ brti Sh+ye te/ brti Sh+ye te/ brti Sh+ya n+te sogs so/ /de
[\[250b.3\]]bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ par smai pa da'i phyogs la/ a ba r+t+s+ya ta/ a bar+t+s+ya taM/ a s+ya n+da ta sogs so/ /a d+ma ne ba da sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a brti Sh+ya ta/ a brti Sh+ye tAM/ a brti Sh+ya n+da sogs so/ ! /s+ya n+dU zag pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ s+ya n+da te sogs so/ /ling
[\[250b.4\]]la/ s+ya n+de ta sogs so/ /loT la/ s+ya n+da tAM sogs so/ /ling la/ a s+ya n+da ta sogs so/ lung la/ d+yu ta sogs kyis par smai pad rnams dang / a t+ma ne pad rnams yang na bar byas pas/ pa ra smai ba da sbyar ba'i phyogs la pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs zhes pas/ ts+li ang du bsgyur/
[\[250b.5\]]i ta 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis bas/ a s+yad ta/ a s+ya ta tI/ a s+ya dan sogs so/ A s+ya d+na sogs so/ /A t+Ya ne ba da'i phyogs la/ U 'gro ba sogs kyis i Ta yang na bar byas pas/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a s+ya n+di Sh+Ta/ as+ya n+di ShA tAM/ a s+ya n+di Sha ta sogs so/ /iT ma sbyar ba'i
[\[250b.6\]]phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a s+yaM ta/ a s+ya n+da tAM/ a s+ya n+d+sa ta/ phyogs kyi skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a s+ya n+dAH/ a s+ya n+thAM/ a s+yaM d+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a s+yaM d+si/ a s+yaM d+mA ti/ a s+yaM d+s+mA hi/ laT skyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sas+yaM de/ sa s+yaM ta t+she/ sa
[\[250b.7\]]s+yaM di re/ skyes bu dbus ma  la ta dz+ha la las dz+ha la la 'os si tsa phyis/ dz+har 'dra ba la dz+har rnams kyi 'os dra [{]pab[}]phyis/ khar la tsar 'os da ta drangs/ gsum la/ sa s+yaM di She/ sa s+yaM d+se/ sa s+yaM dA the/ sa s+yaM di d+h+we/ a s+yaM ng+he/ dz+har 'dra ba la/ dz+har rnams kyi 'os da phyis/ sa s+yaM d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa s+yaM de/ sa
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]s+yaM di ba he/ sa s+yaM rwa ha/ sa s+yaM di ma he/ sa s+yaM d+ma he/ luT la iT yang na bar bas pas/ iT sbyin pa'i phyogs la/ s+yaM di twa sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ dz+har 'dra ba la dz+har rnams kyi 'os dra phyis pas/ s+yaM tA/ s+ya n+tA rau/ s+ya n+tA ra:sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ /
[\[251a.2\]]iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ s+yaM di ShI Sh+Ta/ s+yaM di ShI yA stAM/ s+yaM di ShI ran sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur bas/ /s+yAM t+sI Sh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ br-i ta rnams las s+ya san yang dag bos/ pa ra sme ba da rnams dang A t+ma ne pa da rnams yang na bar byas bas
[\[251a.3\]]pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la br-i ta rnams las bzhi rnams la sa ma yin no zhes pas iT mi 'gyur te/ khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur bas/ /s+yaM d+m+ya ta:/ s+yaM d+s+ya n+di sogs so/ /A Sh+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la/ U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT 'i phyogs la/ s+yaM di
[\[251a.4\]]Sh+ya te sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ s+yaM t+s+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ bar smai pa'i phyogs la/ a s+yaM t+se ta/ a s+yaM d+s+yan sogs dang / A t+ma ne ba da sbyar ba'i phyogs la iT yang na par byas pas/ a s+yaM di Sh+ya ta sogs sam/ yang na a s+yaM [{]r+l+tsu[\]]ta sogs so/ /a
[\[251a.5\]]nu bi ba r+ya b+hi ni b+h+ya:s+ya n+da te ra prA Ni Shu/ srog chags ma yin pa la a nu pi pa ri a b+hi ni rnams las s+ya n+pa te'i 'o/ /srog chags ma yin pa la 'jug pa na nyer bsgyur a nu la sogs pa 'di rnams las/ s+ya d+na te yi sa yig ni Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ a nu Sh+ya n+da te ra tha:sogs sam/ a nu
[\[251a.6\]]s+ya n+da te ra tha: sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ bi/ pa ri/ a b+hi/ ni rnams kyang sbyar bar bya'o/ /srog chogs ma yin pa zhes pas rnam bcad kyi srog chags la 'jug pa na Sha ra mi 'gyur te/ ni s+ya n+da te ha stI/ ! /kr-i pU nus pa la 'o zhes pa la laT/ shing rta rjes su rgyu/ sogs  shing rta rjes su rgyu/
[\[251a.7\]]sbyar/ kr-i bo rol:/ kr-i phU'i ra la'o/ /kr-i pU'i ra yig ni rkyen pha rol la la yig tu bsgyur bar bya la/ de yang mtha' gcig tu ni ma nges pas skabs 'gar mi bsgyur ba yang yod do/ /kr-i pU la/ laT/ glang chen nges par rgyu/ sha ba/ mdo 'dis r-i l-i/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ /ka wa te sogs so/ /
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]leng la/ ka lpe ta sogs so/ /loT la/ ka lpa tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a ka lpa ta sogs so/ /lung la/ d+yA ta rnams las lung la 'os/ bar smai pa da rnams dang A d+ma ne pa da rnams yang na bar byas pas/ par smai pa da'i phyogs la/ pu Sha sogs d+yU ta sogs zhes pas tsI ang du bsgyur
[\[251b.2\]]bas/ a kl-i pa ta/ a kl-i ba tAM/ a kl-i pan sogs so/ /A d+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ i Ta'i phyogs la/ a ka lpi Sh+Ta/ /a ka lpi ShA tAM/ a ka lpi Sha ta sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ling si tsA bA t+ma ne ba de Shu/ A d+ma
[\[251b.3\]]ne pa da rnams la ling si tsa dag go/ /byings ha la mtha' can i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge u pa d+hAn yod pa las/ smon ba'i ling dang / si tsa A t+ma ne pa da tsa na dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can yod pa ste/ iT med pa rnams ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de/ yon tan dang 'phel
[\[251b.4\]]ba sogs mi byed ba'i don no/ /skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a kl-i lta/ a kl-i prA tAM/ a kl-i p+sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a kl-i p+thA:/ a kli p+d+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a kl-i p+si/ a kl-i p+s+wa hi/ liT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa kl-i pe/
[\[251b.5\]]tsa kl-i pA ti/ tsa kl-i pi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dz+hal las dz+ha la 'os si tsa phyis/ tsa kl-i pi She/ tsa kl-i p+se/ tsa kl-i pA tha/ tsa kl-i pi d+h+we/ tsa kl-i pi D+h+re/ dz+ha la las dz+hal las si tsa phyis/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha 'os ba ba/ tsa kl-i p+d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kl-i pe/ tsa kl-i pi ba he/ tsa kl-i pA he/
[\[251b.6\]]tsa kl-i pi ma he/ tsa kl-i b+ma he/ lu Ti tsa kl-i ba:luT la'ang gl-i ba'i 'o/ /kl-i pa la luT dang 'ang gi sgras l+riT dang l+ring rnams kyi bar smai pa da rnams yang na 'gyur zhing / san gyi mtha' la yang par smai pa da rnams yang na 'gyur ro/ tA si tsa kl-i pa:/ tA sa la 'ang kl-i pa'i 'o/ kl-i pa las pha rol gyi tAs
[\[251b.7\]]dang sa yig dang po byings byed pa par smi pa da rnams la'ang iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ luT la'ang zhes pas pa ra smai pa da dang A t+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la/ mdo 'dis iT mi 'jug /pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ka l+p+tA/ ka l+p+hA rau/ ka l+p+hAr:/[ \[]k+p+gA[\]]
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]si sogs so/ /A t+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpi tA/ kalpi tA tau/ ka lpi tA ra:/ ka lpi tA se sogs so/ i Ta ma byin ba'i phyogs la/ /kal+p+hA/ ka l+m+n+ra ro/ kal+h+pha ra:/ ka ltA se sogs so/ /
[\[252a.2\]]smon pa'i ling la/ /U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas bas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpi ShI Sh+Ta sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ Atwa ne pa da rnams la ling si tsa dag go zhes pas ki ta yin pas yon tan mi byed de/ kl-i r+sI:Sh+Ta/ kl-i sh+sI yA s+t+raM/ kli p+sI ra na sogs so/ /
[\[252a.3\]]l+r-iT la/ luT la 'ang kl-i ba'i 'os/ pa ra smai pa da dang a t+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas bar smai pa da sbyar pa'i phyogs la/ tAs la'ang kl-i ba'i 'os iT mi 'jug ste/ kal+b+s+ya ti/ ka p+b+s+ya ta:/ ka l+b+s+ya n+ti sogs so/ /A t+ma ne ba de'i phyogs la/ U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas
[\[252a.4\]]pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ ka lpi Sh+ya te sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ka l+b+s+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ luT la'ang kl-i pa'i 'os par smai pa da dang a+wa t+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas/ pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs ya/ tA sa la 'ang zhes pas
[\[252a.5\]]iT mi 'jug ste/ a ka l+p+s+ya ta/ a ka l+b+s+ya tAM/ a ka l+p+s+ya tAM/ a ka l+p+s+ya sogs so/ A tA ne ba da'i phyogs la iT yang na bar byas pas/ a ka lpi Sh+ya ta sogs sam/ a ka l+p+s+ya ta sogs/ ! /bya tha sdug bsngal dang yang dag par g.yo ba dag la 'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ /laT la/
[\[252a.6\]]bya tha te sogs so/ ling la/ bya the ta sogs so/ loT la/ bya tha tAM sogs so/ /lang la/ a bya tha ta sogs so/ /lung la/ a bya thi Sh+Ta/ a bya thi ShA tI/ a bya thi Sha ta sogs so/ bya tho liTi/ bya tho li Ti/ bya tha'i liT la'o/ liT pha rol la bya tha gnyis brjod pa'i a b+h+ya
[\[252a.7\]]sa'i saM pra sA ra Na ra 'gyur te/ pi bya the/ bi bya thrA re/ pi bya thi re/ pi bya thi She/ sogs so/ luT la/ bya thi tA sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ bya thi ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ bya thi Sh+ya te sogs so/ l+r-ing la/ a bya thi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ nyi twa rA mgyogs pa la'o/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ tAr te sogs so/ /ling la/ twa re ta sogs so/ loT la/ twa ra tAM sogs so/ lang la/ a twa ra ta sogs so/ /lung la/ a twa re k+Sha sogs so/ /liT la/ ta twa te/ ta twa re/ ta twa ri re/ ta twa ri She sogs so/ /luT la/ twa
[\[252b.2\]]ri tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ twa ri ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/ /l-iT la/ twa ri Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a twa ri Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /de rnams kyi byed pa po la sha pa 'jug pa'i yu la b+hU la sogs pa las byings A t+ma ne pa da 'jug pa rnams la laT sogs rnam dbye A t+ma me rnams sbyar ba'i
[\[252b.3\]]cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal la dang bcas par rags pa rnams bshad zin to// ! //da ni b+hU la sogs pa gnyis ka'i tshig can rnams la laT sogs par smai pa da dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams gnyis ka sbyor ba dang / yang byings A t+ma ne can la A t+na ne sbyor ba dang / par smai ba
[\[252b.4\]]da can la par smai ba da rnams sbyor ba sogs cho ga ci rigs pa thun mong du bshad par bya ste/ ! /Du pa tsa Sha mtshed pa la'o zhes pa la/ rjes 'brel phyis nas laT sogs sbyar bas/ la Ta'i pa ra smai pa da rnams la/ ba tsa ti/ pa tsa ta:/ pa tsa n+ti sogs so/ /A t+na ne pa da rnams la/ pa
[\[252b.5\]]tsa te/ pa tse te/ pa tsa n+te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ byed pa po la shab byin pas ling gi par smai ba da rnams la/ pa tse ta/ pa tse tAM/ pa tse yu:sogs so/ /A t+ma ne pad rnams la/ pa tse ta/ pa tse yA tAM/ btse ra na sogs so/ /lo Ta'i par smi pa da rnams la/ pa tsa tu/ pa tsa tA ta/ pa tsa
[\[252b.6\]]tAM/ pa tsa n+tu sogs so/ /A t+na ne pa da rnams la/ ba tsa tAM/ ba tse tAM/ pa tsa n+taM sogs so/ /lang gi par smai pa da rnams la/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tsa tAM/ a pa tsa na sogs so/ /A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a pa tsa ta/ a pa tse tAM/ a pa tsa t+na sogs so/ lung la/ byings
[\[252b.7\]]a niT yig pas iT mi 'jug/ bad bra dza sogs kyis u ba d+hA ring po/ tsu'i ku 'os/ tsa ka/ /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur ba dang / dz+hal dang po can rnams la dz+hal 'os si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ par smai pa da rnams la/ a pA k+Shi ta/ a
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]pA k+tAM/ a bA k+Sha:sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ A t+ma ne ba da rnams la/ a pa k+ta/ a pa k+ShA tAM/ a pa k+Sha ta sogs te/ A t+ma ne rnams la u pa d+hA ring po mi byed do/ /liT la byings gnyis brjod pa dang ki ta rnams la i b+h+yAs dbyi zhing er bsgyur ba dang / wa la dang
[\[253a.2\]]po rnams la kr-i br-i sr-i sogs kyi mdos iT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa pA tsa/ pe tsa tu:/ pe tsu:/ pa tsi tha/ pa pa k+tha sogs dang / A t+ma ni pa da rnams la/ pe tse/ pe tsA te/ pe tsi re sogs so/ /luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur
[\[253a.3\]]bas/ par smai pa da rnams/ pa k+tA/ pa k+tA ro/ pa k+tA ra:/ pa k+tA si sogs so/ A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ pak+tA/ pa kyArau/ pa k+tA ra:/ pa k+tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/ pa ts+tA stAM/ pa ts+yA su:sogs so/ A t+ma ne pa da rnams la tsu'i ku dang / kun
[\[253a.4\]]nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa k+ShI Sh+Ta/ pa Sh+rI yA staM/ pa Sh+rI ra na sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang tsu'i ku dang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis par smai pa da rnams la/ bak+Sh+ya ti/ pha Sh+Sh+ya ta:/ pa k+b+ya T+ti sogs dang / A d+ma de rnams la pa k+Sh+ya te/ pa k+Sh+ye te/ pa n+b+ya n+te sogs so/ /
[\[253a.5\]]nge bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi par smai pa da rnams la a pa k+Sh+ya ta/ a \u0f7ck+Sh+ya dAM/ a pa k+Sh+ya na sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a pa k+Sh+ya ta/ a pa k+Sh+ye taM/ a pa k+Sh+ya n+ta sogs so/ ! /pa t+l-i laM la yang ste 'gro ba la lo zhes pa la/ byings par smai ba da can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da
[\[253a.6\]]rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ pa ta ti sogs so/ /li bas/ pa te ta sogs so/ /loT la/ pa ta tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a pa ta ta sogs so/ /pa taHbum/ /pa ta'i bum 'o/ /pa ta'i tsI bskyur ba ang pha rol la bum A gam ster bar bya ste/ ma gnas kyi don dang u brjod
[\[253a.7\]]don no/ /pa ta la lung / lung la tsI pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs li 'gro ba sogs kyis tsI ang du bsgyur/ mdo'i das pus A ga ma byin pas/ a pa b+ta ta/ a pa p+ta dAM/ a pa t+ta na sogs so/ /liT la/ ki ta rnams la a b+h+yA sa phyis nas er bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]ba pA ta/ be ta tu:/ pe tu:/ pe ti tha/ sogs so/ /luT la/ wa la dang po'o iT sbyar bas/ ma ti tU sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ /pa tA ta/ pa d+yA stAM/ pa d+yA su:sogs dang / l-iT la/ wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ pa ti Sh+ya ti/ pa ti Sh+ya taH
[\[253b.2\]]pa ti Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+ring la/ a pa ti Sh+ya ta/ a ba ti Sh+ya tAM/ a pa ti Sh+ya na sogs so/ ! /Tu ba mu skyug pa la'o zhes la la 'ang par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai par rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ tha ma ti sogs so/ /ling la/
[\[253b.3\]]ba me ta sogs so/ /loT la/ ba ma tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a ba ma ta sogs so/ /lung la/ wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a ba mI tA/ a pa mi s+b+TAM/ a pa mi Shu: sogs so/ 'grel bar lung drangs pas/ bam e twA b+hAs lo pau bA/ ba ma'i a b+hA sa dbyi ba dang e nyid yang na 'o/ /
[\[253b.4\]]gong du sha sha dad pa dang po zhes a b+hA sa mi dbyi bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal laT ki ta pha rol la ba ma'i a d+h+yAs dbyi ba dang ar bsgyur dbyi ba dang ar bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ ba bA ma/ them tuH/ ba ba ma tuH/ be muH/ ba ba muH/ be mi tha/ ba ba mi tha/ luT la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/ ba mi
[\[253b.5\]]tA sogs dang / smon pa'i ling la/ bamyA ta/ ba myA stAM/ ba myA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/ ba mi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du / Na la  l+r-ing la/ e tus/ a ba mi Sh+yata  us  sogs so/ b+h+ra tha/ mu g.yo ba la'o zhes ba'ang par smai pa da can yin
[\[253b.6\]]bas laT sogs bar smai pa da rnams sbyar/ byings thams cad pa bzho po la byed pa po la sha ba dang / /thrA sha/ b+h+lA sha/ b+h+ra mu sogs kyi mdos/ sh+ya na yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ b+h+ra ma ti sogs sam/ b+h+rA mya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ b+h+ra me ta sogs sam/ b+thA bye
[\[253b.7\]]ta sogs so/ /loT la/ b+h+ra ma tu sogs sam/ b+h+rA mya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a b+h+ra ma ta sogs sam/ a b+h+rA mya ta sogs so/ lung la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/ a b+h+ra mI ta/ a b+h+ra mi Sh+TaM/ a b+h+ra mi Shu:sogs so/ /pA dzr-I b+h+ta mu tra sAM/ dzrAM b+h+ra mu  tras rnams kyi yang
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]na'o/ /dzri ShU lang tsho nyams pa/ b+h+ra mu g.yo ba/ tra sI skyo ba rnams kyi liT ki ta pha rol la a b+h+yAs dbyib dang er bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ pa g+h+rA ma/ b+h+re matuH/ ba b+h+ra ma tuH/ b+h+re muH/ b+h+re mi tha/ bar+h+ra mi tha sogs so/ /luT la/ wa la da
[\[254a.2\]]po'i iT sbyar bas/ b+h+ra mi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ b+h+ru mya ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ b+h+ra mi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ Na li/ l+r-ing la/ a tus/ a d+h+ra miSh+ya ta/ us/ sogs so/ /tha ba !/Sha ta bzod pa la'o zhes pa byings A t+ma ni
[\[254a.3\]]can yin pas laT sogs A t+ma ne bad rnams sbyor/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os/ Sha sar sgyur ba sogs kyi bsgrub pas/ laT la/ sa ha te sogs so/ ling la/ sa he ta sogs so/ /loT la/ sa hi Sha ta sogs so/ /lung la/ as ha ta sogs so/ /lung la iT
[\[254a.4\]]sbyin pas/ a sa hi Sh+Ta/ a sa hi ShA tAM/ a sa hi Sha ta sogs so/ /liT la/ se he/ se hA te/ si hi re sogs so/ /luT la/ iShu sa ha sogs kyi mdos iT yang na bar byas bas/ i Ta'i phyogs la/ sa hi tA/ sa hi tA rau/ /sa hi tA ra:sogs dang / iT med
[\[254a.5\]]pa'i phyogs la/ sa ha la/ luT/ tAs/ luTa'i dang po sogs kyis ta DA/ sa ha/ tA/ ha'i D+ha 'os ha D+ha/ dz+ha Sha las d+hA min pas ta tha dag gi d+ha 'os/ ta d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os d+ha D+ha ra bsgyur bas/ sa D+ha/ D+hA zhes pa la/ sa hi ba ho rod wa r+Na s+ya/ sa hi/ ba ha dag gi a yig
[\[254a.6\]]gi o ta'o/ /D+ha'i n+Da la dbyi 'os D+ha phyis pa las/ Sha ha bzod pa dang / ba ha thob pa dag gi a yig ni o ta du bsgyur bar bya ste/ D+ha'i D+ha la zhes pas D+ha gong ma phyis/ mdo 'dis o ta bsgyur bas/ so D+hA/ de bzhin du/ so D+hA rau/ so D+haraH/ sa hi ba ho rod wa rnams so/ /so D+hA:so b+ha'i 'o/ /
[\[254a.7\]]sa ha/ so D+ha zhes 'gyur ba'i sngon du nyer bsgyur Shar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can byung yang so D+hA zhes pas Sha yig tu mi 'gyur te/ bi so D+hA/ pa ri so D+ha sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ /sa hi ShI Sh+Ta/ sa hi ShI yA stAM/ sa hi ShI ra na sogs so/ /l+r-ing la'ang wa la dang
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]po'i iT sbyar bas/ sa hi Sh+ya te/ sa hi Sh+ye te/ sa hi Sh+ya na te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ma hi Sh+ya ta/ a la hi Sh+ye tAM/ a sa hi Sh+ya n+ta sogs so/ ! /Sha d+li rnam par 'gyur ba dang 'gro ba dang kun nas mnyes par byed pa la'o zhes pa par smai pad can yin pas/ laT sogs par smai
[\[254b.2\]]pa ba rnams sbyar/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po la/ bA g+h+ra d+h+mA sogs kyi mdos sId du bsgyur bas/ laT la/ sI de ta sogs so/ ling la/ sI de ta sogs so/ /loT la/ sI da tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a sI da ta sogs so/ /lung la/ pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs l-i 'gro ba
[\[254b.3\]]zhes pas ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/ a sad ta/ a sad tI/ a sa dan sogs so/ /liT la/ sa sA ra/ /seng taH/ sed tuH/[ \[]ye+u[\]] duH/ se di tha/ sas t+tha sogs so/ /luT la/ khar la tsar 'os da ta ru bsgyur bas/ sa t+tA/ sa t+tA rau/ sa t+tA raH/ sa t+t+ra si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la
[\[254b.4\]]sA d+yA ta/ sad+yA stAM/ sa d+yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ sa ng+s+ya ti/ sa t+s+ya taH/ sa t+s+ya n+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sa d+s+ya ta/ a sa d+s+ya ta/ a sa d+s+ya tAM/ a sa d+s+tan sogs so/ sha deH/ shi taH/ shi di'i sha 'gro ba'i 'o/ /sha d+l-i 'jig pa la'o zhes pa byings ngo bo par smai pa can yin kyang
[\[254b.5\]]sha 'gro ba rnams kyi a p+ma ne pad rnams 'jug ste/ laT sogs byings thams cad pa bzhi pa'i A t+ma ne pa ja rnams sbyar/ thA g+h+ra[\[] ng+h+yA[\]]sogs kya mdos shad shI ya zhes par bsgyur bas/ laTal/ shI ya te sogs so/ /ling la/ shI re ta sogs so/ /loT la/ shA ya tAM sogs so/ /lang
[\[254b.6\]]la/ a shI ya ta sogs so/ /lung sogs byings phyed pa rnams kyi par smai pa da rnams sbyor te/ lung la/ pu Sha sogs kyi ts+li ing du bsgyur bas/ a sha da ta/ a sha da tAM/ a sha dan sogs so/ /liT la/ sha shAd/ she da tuH/ she duH/ she di ba/ sha shat+thasogs so/ /
[\[254b.7\]]luT la/ khar la tsa ba 'os da ta ru bsgyur bas/ sha t+tA/ shat+tA rau/ sha t+tA raH/ sha t+tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ /sha d+yA ta/ /sha d+yA stAM/ sha d+yA su:sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ khar la tsa ra 'os da ta ru bsgyur nas drangs/ sha t+s+ya ti/ sha t+s+ya taH/ sha d+s+ya Ti sogs so/ /de bzhin
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]du/ l+r-ing la/ a sha t+s+ya ta/ a sha d+s+ya tAM/ a sha t+s+ya na sogs so/ ! /pha Na 'gro ba la 'o zhes pa par smai ba da can yin pas laT sogs par smai ba da rnams [\[]skye rabs [\]]/ laT la/ pha Na ti sogs so/ /ling la/ pha Ne ta sogs so/ /loT la/ /pha na tu sogs so/ /ling pha a pha Na ta sogs so/ /lung la
[\[255a.2\]]l+ra la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a phA NI ta/ a phA Ni Sh+TAM/ a phA Ni Shu :sogs so/ /pa NAM tsas b+tA nI/ pha Na rnams kyi 'ang bdun rnams kyi'o/ /pha Na la sogs pa rnams kyi nang nas kyang pha Na 'gro ba/ rA dzI/ b+h+rA dzri/ Tu b+h+rA shr-i/ Tu b+h+lA shr-i rnams 'bad ba s+ya mu dang swan sgra ste/ byings bdun
[\[255a.3\]]po 'di rnams kyi liT ka 'gro ba'i  bad bra dza sogs kyis u ba d+hA 'phel ba/ ming can pha rol la a [\[]b+hA[\]] sa dbyi ba dang e ru bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ pha Na la liT sbyar bas/ pa phA Na/ phe Na tuH/ pha pha Na tuH/ phe NuH/ pa pha NuH/ phe N-i tha/ pa pha Ni tha sogs so/ /luT la wa la dang
[\[255a.4\]]po'i iT byin bas/ pha ni tA/ pha Ni tA sau/ pha Ni tA raH/ pha Ni tA mi sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ pa N+yA ta/ pha d+yA stAM/ pha N+yA saH:sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ wal dang po'i Nang  iT  a tus  sbyar bas/ us pha Ni Sh+ya ti/ thal  pha Ni Sh+ya taH/ pha Ni Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/ /
[\[255a.5\]]de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a pha Ni Sh+ya ta/ a pha Ni Sh+ya tAM/ a pha Ni Sh+ya na sogs so/ ! /rA dzri 'bar ba la 'o zhes pa byings gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams dang / a t+ma ne gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laT 'i par smai pa da la/ RA dza ti/ rA dza tiH/ RA dza n+ti sogs
[\[255a.6\]]so/ /A t+ma ne bar rnams la/ rA dza te/ rA dza n+te sogs so/ /ling gi par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ rA dze ta/ rA dzai tAM/ rA dza yuHsogs so/ /A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ rA dze ta/ rAdze yA tAM/ rA dzai ra na sogs so/ /lo Ta'i bar smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ rA
[\[255a.7\]]dza tu/ rA dza tA ta/ rA dza tAM/ rA dza n+tu sogs so/ /A t+ma ne pa da la/ rA dza tAM/ rA dze tAM/ ra dza n+tAM sogs so/ /lang gi par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ a rA dza ta/ a rA dza tAM/ a rA dza na sogs so/ /A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a rA dza ta/ a rA dze tAM/ a rA dza n+ta sogs so/ /
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]lung gi bar sma ba da rnams la/ a tA dzI ta/ a rA dzi Sh+TAM/ a rA dzi ShuHsogs so/ /A d+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a rA dzi Sh+Ta/ a tA ShA tAM/ a rA dzi Sha ta sogs so/ /liT la/ pha Na rnams kyi 'ang bdun rnams kyi 'os a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar bya ste/ bar smai pa da rnams la
[\[255b.2\]]ra rA dza/ re dza taH/ ra rA dza tuH/ re dzuH/ ra rA dzuHsogs dang / A d+ma ne pa da rnams sbyar bas/ re dze/ ra rA dze/ re dzU te/ ra rA dzA te/ re dzi re/ ra rA dzi re sogs so/ /lu Ta'i par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ rA dzi tA/ rA dzi tA rau/ rA dzi tA
[\[255b.3\]]raH/ Nel/ rA dzi tA/ a tu sa/[ \[]si[\]] sogs so/ /A t+ma  us  ne pa da rnams la/ rA dzi tA/ rA dzi tA rau/ rA dzi tA ra:/ te  rA dzi tA se sogs so/[ \[]A tI[\] ]so/ smon pa'i ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/ rA dz+yA ta/ rA dz+yA stAM/ rA dz+yA suHsogs dang / A d+ma ne pa da sbyar bas/
[\[255b.4\]]rA dzi ShI Sh+Ta/ rA dzi bI yA stAM/ rI dzi Sh+yi na sogs/ l+r-i ta tri pa ra smai pa da rnams/ rA dzi Sh+ya ti/ rA dzi Sh+ya taH/ rA dzi Sh+ya n+ti sogs dang / rA dzi Sh+ya n+ta sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ rAdzi Sh+ya te/ rA dzi b+h+ye te/ rA dzi Sh+ya n+te sogs so/ /l+r-ing gi par smai pa da rnams la/ a rA dzi b+h+ya ta/
[\[255b.5\]]a rA dzi Sh+ya tAM/ a rAdzi Sh+ya na sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a rA dzi Sh+ya ta/ a rA Sh+ya ye tAM/ a rA dzi Sh+ya n+ta sogs so/ ! /Tu b+hA shri 'bar ba la'o zhes pa A t+ma ne pa da can yin pas laT sogs A t+ma ne rnams 'jug ste/ byings thams can pa bzhi bo la/ b+h+rA sha/ b+h+lA
[\[255b.6\]]sha/ /b+h+ra mu sogs kyi mdos/ byed pa po'i don la shab dang Sh+ya na yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ b+ha sha te sogs sam/ yang na/ b+h+rA sha Sh+Ta sogs so/ /de bzhin du ling la/ b+h+rA she ta sogs sam/ b+h+rA sh+ye ta sogs so/ /loT la/ b+h+rA sha tAM sogs sam/ b+h+rA sh+ya tAM  sogs
[\[255b.7\]]so/ /lang / a b+h+rA sha ta sogs sam/ a b+h+rA sh+ya sogs so/ /lung la wa la dang po'i aTi sbyin pas/ a b+h+rA shi Sh+Ta sogs so/ /liT la pha Na sogs kyi mdos a b+h+yas dbyib sogs yang na bar byas pas/ b+h+re she/ bab+h+ra she/ b+h+re shA te/ bab+h+rA shA te/ b+h+re shi re/ ba
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]b+h+rA shi re sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ b+h+rA shi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ /b+h+rA shi ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ b+h+rA shi Sh+ya te sogs so/ l+r-ing la/ a b+h+ra shi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ b+h+rA shr-i 'bar ba yang cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang
[\[256a.2\]]'dra'o/ ! /swa na sgra la la'o zhes pa byings par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ swa na ti sogs so/ /ling la/ swa ne ta sogs so/ /loT la/ sra na tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a swa na ta sogs so/ /lung la 'phel ba yang na bar byas/ a
[\[256a.3\]]swa nI ta/ a swa ni Sh+thaM/ a swa ni ShuHsogs sam/ /a swA nI ta sogs so/ l-iT la/ pha Na sogs kyi a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar byas pas/ sa swA na/ swa ne taH/ sa swa na taH/ se nuH/ sa swa nuHsogs so/ /luT la/ wa la dang po'i eT sbyar bas/ swa
[\[256a.4\]]ni tA sogs dang / smon pa'i ling la/ /s+yA n+yI ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ /swa ni Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ /i swa niSh+yata sogs so/ /gong du'i las kyang swa ni zas la 'o zhes bas/ swa ni'i sngon du bi dang a ba zas kyi don brjod pa na Sha ru 'gyur te/ /bi Sh+wa Na ti mA saM/ zas ma yin
[\[256a.5\]]nas Sha ru mi 'gyur bas/ bi swa na ti bI NA sogs te/ de bzhin du a wa yang sbyar bar bya'o/ ! /kha nu kun nas rko ba la 'o zhes par smai ba da can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ kha na ti sogs so/ /ling la/ kha na ta sogs so/ /sha za bar byed/ loT la/ kha na
[\[256a.6\]]tu sogs so/ /lang la/ pi wang gi sgra/ a kha na ta sogs so/ /lung la/ 'phel ba yang na bar byas bas/ a khA nI ta/ a kA ni Sh+TAM/ a khA ni Shu:sogs so/ /liT la/ ki ta rnams la/ gam ha na/ dza na kha na sogs kyi mdos u pa d+hA'i a dbyi ba sogs
[\[256a.7\]]kyis bsgrubs pas/ tsa khA tuH/ tsa khA tuH/ tsa kh+nuHsogs so/ /luT la/ wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ kha ni tA sogs so/ ye bi b+hA ShA/ ya la 'dab ka'o/ /byings kha na rko ba/ dza na skye ba/ Sha na kun nas gus pa rnams kyi Ti rkyen ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ya yig dang po can
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pha rol la yang a ta du 'gyur te/ smon pa'i ling la/ kha n+yA ta sogs sam/ kha yA ta sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ kha ni Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a kha ni Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /tsA y-i? mchod pa dang zhi bdag la 'o zhes bdag la 'o zhes pa 'ang par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams
[\[256b.2\]]sbyar bas/ laT la/ tsA ya ti sogs so/ /lingal/ tsA ye ta sogs so/ /loT la/ tsA ya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a tsA ya ta sogs so/ /lung la/ tsA ya spA ya pyA ya sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis iT yang na par byas/ iT ma byin ba'i phyogs la/ /wa? ya? dag gi wal la dbyi 'o zhes ya dbyi ba sogs kyis
[\[256b.3\]]bsgrus pas/ a tsA yI ta/ a tsA yi Sh+TAM/ a tsA yi ShuHsogs sam/ a tsA sI ta/ a tsa stAM/ a tsA suHsogs so/ /liT la/ tsa tsA ya/ /tsa tsA ya tuH/ tsa tsA yuHsogs so/ /luT la/ iT yang na par byas bas/ tsA yi tA sogs sam/ tsA tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling
[\[256b.4\]]la/ tsA y+yA ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT ster ba dang ya? dbyi ba yang na par byas pas/ tsA yi Sh+ya ti sogs sam/ tsA s+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ /l+r-ing la/ a tsA yi Sh+ya ta sogs sam/ a tsA s+ya sogs so/ ! /la Sha mdzes pa la la'o zhes pa yang par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs
[\[256b.5\]]par smai pa da rnams 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po rnams la/ b+h+rA sha b+h+rA sha b+h+rA mu sogs kyi mdos sha ba dang sh+ya na yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ la Sha ti sogs sam/ la Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ la She ta sogs sam/ la Sh+ye ta sogs so/ /loT la/
[\[256b.6\]]la Sha tu sogs sam/ la Sh+ya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a la Sha ta sogs sam/ a la Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /lung la/ wal dang po'i aT byin 'phel ba yang na par byas pas/ a lA ShI ta/ a lA Shi ShuHsogs sam/ /a la ShI ta sogs so/ /liT la/ la
[\[256b.7\]]lA Sha/ le Sha tuH/ le ShuHsogs so/ /luT la wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ la Shi tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ la Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT sbyar bas/ la Shi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ /l-ing la/ a la Shi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /U du pa d+hA yA go
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]ha:/ go ha'i u pa d+hA'i U ta'o/ /rkyen a tsa dang po can pha rol la go ha ste/ go hu kun nas sgrib pa'i u pa d+hA'i u yig ni U ta ste U ring por 'gyur te/ ! /gu hU gnyis ka'i chig can yin pas/ laTa'i par smi pa da la/ /gU ha ti sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ gU ha te
[\[257a.2\]]sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ /lang gi par smai rnams la/ gU he ta sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ /gU te ta sogs so/ /loTa'i par smai rnams la/ gU ha sogs dang / a t+ma ne rnams la/ gU ta tAM sogs so/ /lung la/ Uta 'gro ba sogs kyi iT yang na bar byed de/ iT
[\[257a.3\]]byin pa'i phyogs la go ha'i zhes pa'i mdos u pa d+hA ring po byed de/ eT byin pa'i phyogs kyi pa ra smai rnams la/ a gU hI ta/ a gU hI Sh+TAM/ a bU hi ShuHsogs dang / A t+ma ne rnams la/ agU hi Sh+Ta/ a gU hi Sha tAM/ gU ha tAM sogs so/ /i Ta med pa'i phyogs la i ka u ba ng+hA sha la iT
[\[257a.4\]]med pa sogs kyis tsI k+sa ru bsgyur/ ha'i D+nya 'os/ ha D+ha/ a tsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i b+ha Sha dz+ha Sha mtha'i sa d+h+wa dag la'o zhes pa'i mdos gag+ha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os T+haka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a g+hu k+Sha ta/ a g+hu k+Sha tAM/ a
[\[257a.5\]]g+hu k+Sha sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs kyi A t+ma ne ba da la/ lu gwA du ha di ha li ha gu hAM A t+ma ne pa de n+t+ye/ du ha  di ha  li ha  gu ha rnams kyi A t+ma ne ba da so la gnas pa las yang na 'jig go/ /du ha 'jog  di ha nye bar gsog pa/ li ha ro myang ba/ gu hU kun nas sgrib pa rnams la ba
[\[257a.6\]]rol gyi tsI bsgyur ba'i k+sa ni rnam dbye A t+ma ne pa da so la gnas pa 'am so las skyes pa'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la yang na 'jig ste/ k+sa mi 'jig pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a g+hu k+Sha ta/ k+sa 'jig pa'i phyogs la/ ha'i D+ha 'os da ha D+ha/ d+ha min pa sogs kyis ta b+ha/
[\[257a.7\]]Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/ d+ha D+ha D+ha'i D+hal dbyi 'os/ D+ha gong ma phyis/ D+h+ra ru phyis  l-i du la sa rnams so la gnas zhes pas/ ba la snga ma'i a Na gyi ring po'o zhes pa'i mdos U ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a gU D+ha/ k+si s+yA tsi/ k+sa'i a tsa la'o/ /li ha sogs las pha rol
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]gyi ts+la'i 'gyur ba'i k+sa'i mtha' rnam dbye A t+ma ne pa da a tsa dang po can rnams pha rol la dbyi ste/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a g+hu k+ShA tAM/ a g+hu k+Sha ta/ yang 'grel bar a tsa dang po yin kyang mang tshig la kra'i mtha' 'ga' zhig dbyi bar mi 'dod do zhes bshad pas/ a g+hu k+Sha n+ta
[\[257b.2\]]lta bu'o/ /cho ga de rnams dang 'dra bar byas pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a gU D+hAH/ a g+hu k+Sha thAH/ a g+hu k+ShA thAM/ a g+hu a tsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i sogs kyis ga g+har bsgyur ba'o/ D+h+waM/ a g+hu d+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a g+hu k+Shi/ a g+hu k+ShA ba hi/ a g+hu k+ShA ma hi/ li Ta'i
[\[257b.3\]]bar smai pa da rnams la/ dzu gU ha/ dzu gU ha tuH/ dzu g+hu huH/ dzu gU hi tha/ dzu gU D+ha  shras sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ dzu gU hA te/ dzu gU hi re/ dzu gU Sh+She sogs so/ /luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ gU hi tA/ gA hi tA rau/ gU
[\[257b.4\]]hi tA ra:/ gU hi si sogs sam/ gU D+hA/ gU D+hA rau/ gU D+hA raH/ thal/ gU D+hA si sogs so/ /A t+ma ne la yang / bU hi tA/ gU hi tA rau/ gU hi tAraH/ gU hi tA si sogs sam/ gU D+hA/ gU ng+hA rau/ g+hu D+haraH/ gU D+hA se sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/
[\[257b.5\]]gu h+yA ta/ guh+yA stA/ gu h+yA su \u0f7f sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na par byas pas/ gU hi D+ti Sh+Ta/ gU hi ShI yA staM/ gU hi ShI ra na sogs sam/ g+tu k+Sh+yi Sh+Ta/ gU k+ShI yA staM/ k+ShI ran sogs so/ /l+r-iT la yang iT yang na bar byas pas par smai pa da
[\[257b.6\]]rnams la/ gU hi Sh+yi ti/ gU hi Sh+ya taH/ gU hi Sh+ya n+ti sogs sam/ g+tu k+Sh+ya ti/ g+tu k+Sh+ya taH/ g+hu k+Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/ A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ gU hi Sh+ya te/ gU hi Sh+ye te/ gU hi Sh+ya n+te sogs sam/ g+hu k+Sh+ya te/ g+hu k+Sh+ya te/ g+hu k+Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi par smai pa da rnams la/ a gU
[\[257b.7\]]hi Sh+yata/ a gU hi Sh+ya tAM/ a gU hi Sh+ya na sogs sam/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya ta/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya tAM/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya na sogs so/ /A t+ma ne rnams la/ a gU hi Sh+ya ta/ a gU hi Sh+ye tAM/ a gU hi Sh+ya n+ta sogs sam/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya ta/ a g+hu k+Sh+ye tAM/ a g+hu k+Sh+ya n+ta sogs so+o/ ! /hr-i nya 'phrog pa la 'o zhes pa'ang
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams dang / a t+ma ne pa da rnams gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i par smai ba da rnams la/ ha ra ti sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ har te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/ ha re ta sogs
[\[258a.2\]]dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ ha re ta sogs so/ /loTa'i pa ra smai pa da rnams la/ /ha ra tu sogs dang / A t+ma me pa da rnams la/ ha ra tAM sogs so/ /lang gi ba ra smai pa da rnams la/ a ha ra ta sogs dang / /A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ a ha ra ta sogs so/ /lung gi pa ra smai pa da rnams
[\[258a.3\]]la/ si tsa la 'phel ba par smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a hA r+ShI ta/ a hA r+Sh+TIta/ a hA r+Shu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hA r+ShI:/ a hA r+Sh+Ta/ a hA r+Sh+TA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hA r+ShaM/ a hA r+ShA/ a ha r+Sh+ma/ u sh+tsa/ r-i las kyang ngo / /byings r-i mtha'
[\[258a.4\]]las pha rol gyi iT med pa'i ts+li bsgyur ba'i si tsa rnam dbye A t+ma ne pa nga pha rol can dang / smon pa'i ling A t+ma ne rnams kyang ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de dgos pa ni 'phel ba dang yon tan mi byed pa'i don te/ hr-i nya la lung A t+ma ne rnams spyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hr-i ta/
[\[258a.5\]]a hr-i ShA tAM/ a hr-i Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hri TA:/ a hr-i ShA thAM/ a hr-i d+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hr-i Shi/ a hr-i Sha hi/ a hr-i Sh+ma hi/ liT la/ a b+h+yA sa med pa sogs kyis/ gzugs thung ngu las so zhes pas/ dz+ha la dang po can rnams la si tsa 'jig go/ byings
[\[258a.6\]]gnyis brjod/ r-i a ta 'os r-i a/ ku ha ngag gi tsu 'os/ ha dz+ha/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pa ra smai pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza hA ri/ dza hra ru:/ dza hU:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza ha cwa/ dza nya thu:/ dza hra/ skyes bu
[\[258a.7\]]phyi ma gsum la/ dza hA ra/ dza ha ra/ dza ha ri ba/ dza ha ri ma/ de bzhin du/ A t+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza hre/ dza hrA te/ dza hri re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza hA ri She/ dza hrA the/ dza ha ri d+h+we/ dza ha'i D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza hre/ dza ha ri ba he/ dza
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]ha ri ma he/ luT la/ byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa dag gi 'os yon tan byas pas/ par smai pa da rnams la/ ha rtA/ ha tAM rau/ ha rtA raH/ ha rtA si sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ ha rtA/ ha rtA rau/ ha rtA pa:/ ha rtA se sogs dang / smon pa'i ling gi par smai pa da rnams
[\[258b.2\]]la/ sha ya ka /ling rnams la ring 'os r-i ring du bsgyur bas/ hr-i yA ta/ hr-i yA stAM/ hri yA suHsogs dang / A t+ma na pa da rnams la/ r-i las kyang ngos/ ki ta yin pa sa yon tan sogs mi byed de/ hri ShI Sh+Ta/ hri ShI yA stAM/ hri ShI ra na sogs so/ /l+r-iT dang l+r-ing la/ r-i ta ha na
[\[258b.3\]]dag gi s+ya la'o zhes pa'i mdos iT sbyor te/ l+r-iTa'i bar smai pa da la/ ha ri Sh+yati sogs dang / /A t+ma ne pa da la/ ha ri Sh+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ /l+r-ing gi par smai ba da la/ a ha ri Sh+ya ri ta sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da la/ a ha ri Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /b+h+r-i nya 'gengs pa la 'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laTa'i
[\[258b.4\]]pa ra smai pa da la/ b+ha ra ti sogs dang / A t+ma ne pa da rnams la/ b+ha ra te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ b+ha re ta sogs dang / tang la/ b+ha re ta sogs so/ /loTa'i a ta nga la/ b+ha ra tu sogs dang / tang la/ b+ha ra tAM sogs so/ /lang gi a ta nga la/ a
[\[258b.5\]]b+ha ra ta sogs dang / tang la/ a b+har ta sogs so/ /lung gi a tang la/ /si tsa la 'phel ba zhes sogs kyi mdos 'phel ba byas pas/ /a b+ha r+Sh+Ti ta/ a b+har+Sh+TAM/ a b+hA r+Shu:sogs dang / /lung gi tang la/ r-i las kyang ngos/ ki ta yin pas yon tan mi byed/ gzugs thung ngu
[\[258b.6\]]las so zhes pa'i mdos rnams dbye dz+hal dang po rnams la si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a b+h+r-i ta/ a b+h+r-i ShA tAM/ a b+h+r-i Sha ta sogs so/ /liT la/ kr-i sraM b+h+r-i sogs kyi wa la dang po rnams la iT mi 'jug ste/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+hA ra/ ba b+h+ra tuH/ ba
[\[258b.7\]]d+h+ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+ha r+b+ba/ ba b+h+ra thuH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bab+hA ra/ bab+ha ra/ ba b+h+r-i ba/ /ba b+h-i ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+h+re/ ba b+h+ra te/ ba b+hi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+h+r-i She/ ba b+h+r-I She/ ba b+h+r-i D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]la/ ba b+h+re/ ba b+h-i ba he/ bab+h+r-i ba he/ luT la 'grel par iT yang na bar bshad pas/ /a tang la/ /b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ri tA si sogs sam/ b+ha rtA/ b+ha rtA so sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ta ra la/ b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ri tA se sogs sam/ b+ha rtA se sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ sha sha
[\[259a.2\]]ya ka ling rnams la ring 'os r-i ring du bsgyur bas/ b+h+rI yA ta sogs dang / tang / r-i las kyang ngos ki ta yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed de/ b+h-i ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT dang l+r-ing la/ /r-i ta ha na dag gi s+ya la 'os/ aT byin pas/ l+r-iTa'i a tang la/ /b+ha ri Sh+ya ti sogs dang / ta ba la/ b+ha ri Sh+ya
[\[259a.3\]]te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ i b+ha ri Sh+ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ a b+ha ri Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /dA na kun nas 'gems pa la'o zhes pa la/ /mA na ba ng+ha dA na sogs kyi san dang san la a ta kyi 'os/ a b+h+yA sa i ta mA na ba d+ha dA na sogs kyi I ta du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs
[\[259a.4\]]pas/ bI dA m+sa zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs A t+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor te/ byis nyid gnyis ka'i tshig can yin kyang san mtha' la tar rnams 'gyur zhes bshad de/ laTal/ dI dA n+sa te sogs so/ /ling la/ dI dA n+sa tI sogs so/ /loT la/ dA dA n+sa tI sogs so/ /lang la/ a
[\[259a.5\]]dI dA n+sa ta sogs so/ /lung la/ wa la dang po'i iT dang aT kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a dI dA nI Sh+Ta sogs so/ /liT la/ kAs sogs kyis A ma sbyar bas/ dI dA n+sI tsa kre/ dI dA n+saM b+hA ba/ dI dA n+sa mA sa sogs so/ /luT la yang iT byin pas/ dI dA n+si tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ /dI dA n+si
[\[259a.6\]]ShI Sh+Ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dI dA n+si Sh+ya te sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a dI rA n+si Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /shA na rno ba la 'o zhes pa la yang san sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ shI shA n+sa te sogs cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dA na gyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ ! /b+ha dza bsten pa la 'o zhes
[\[259a.7\]]pa gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs pa ra smai pa da rnams dang A t+ma ne ba da rnams gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i a teng la/ b+ha dza ti sogs dang / tang la/ /b+ha dza te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ b+ha dze ta sogs dang / /tang la/ b+ha dze ta sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]b+ha dza tu sogs dang / tang la/ b+ha dza tAM sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a b+ha dza ta sogs dang / tang la/ a b+ha dza ta sogs so/ /lung la tsu'i ku 'os/ dza ga/ /khang la tsa ra 'os/ ga ka /dz+ha la las dz+ha la la 'os rnam dbye dz+ha la dang po rnams la si tsa 'jig /dz+ha 'am yin pa rnams la kun nas bsgyur pa sogs kyis
[\[259b.2\]]sa Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+ha k+ShI ta/ a b+hA k+tAM/ ab+hA k+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+hA k+ShIH/ ab+hAk+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/a b+hAk+ShaM/ a b+hA k+Sha/ a b+hAk+Sh+ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+hA k+Sha ab+hA k+ShA
[\[259b.3\]]tAM/ a b+hAk+Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+hA k+ShaH/ a b+hA k+ShA thAM/ rang b+h+ra sogs kyi 'phel ba/ a b+hA k+ShaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+hA k+Shi/ a b+hA k+Sha hi/ a b+hA k+Sh+ma hi/ liT la/ byings gnyis brjod ki ta rnams la/ trI phal b+ha dza tra pa las kyang ngos/ a b+h+yas dbyib dang er bsgyur ba sogs kyis
[\[259b.4\]]bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bab+hA dza/ b+hadza tuH/ b+he dzaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+he dzi tha/ b+ha b+ha k+ja/ b+he dza thuH/ b+he dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bab+hA dza/ ba b+ha dza/ b+he dzi ba/ b+ho dzi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ b+he dze/ b+he dzA te/ b+he dzi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum

[\[259b.6\]]tang la/ b+ha dz+yA ta/ b+ha dz+yA s+t+raM/ b+ha dz+yA su:sogs dang / /tang la/ ci'i ku 'os/ dza ga /khar la tsar 'os/ ga ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur pas/ b+ha k+ShI Sh+Ta/ b+ha k+ShI yA stAM/ b+ha k+ShI ra na sogs so/ /l+r-iT la 'ang bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga dang mthun par bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ b+ha k+Sh+ya ti

[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dang / tang la/ shra ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling gi a tang la/ shra ye ta sogs dang / /tang la/ shra ye ta sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ shra ya tu sogs dang / /tang la/ shra ya tAM sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a shra ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ a shra ya ta sogs so/ /
[\[260a.2\]]lung la/ Ni shr-i dru sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i hal lhag po 'os/ ra phyis/ a tsa la byings sh+nu sogs kyi i ya sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ /a tang la/ /a shi shri ya tAM/ a shi shri yan sogs dang / /tang la/ a shi shri ya ta/ a shi shri ya
[\[260a.3\]]tAM/ a shi shri ya n+ta sogs so/ /liT la 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/ swa ny+dza las brtsegs pa la liTa'i ki ta yang na'o zhes pas lung 'dren gyi kita kyi brda chad yang na bar byas pas/ kita kyi phyogs la i ya dang kita ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byed de/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po

[\[260a.6\]]kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs/ ta kyis  te ring po byas  a tA bas/ shrI yAta/ shI yA stAM/ shrI yA suHsogs dang / tang la iT byin pas/ shra yi ShA Sh+Ta/ shra yi ShI yA stAM/ shra yi ShI ra na sogs so/ /w-iT la 'ang iT byin nas yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ shra yi Sh+ya ti sogs dang / tang la/ shra

[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]rnams kyi dza sha 'os Sha D+wa Sha Tu la Sha cu 'os ng+ha T+ha/ a ya D+D+haM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ya k+Shi/ a ya k+Sha hi/ li T+ya b+h+yas s+yo b+ha ye ShAM/ liT la gnyis rnams kyi a b+h+ya sa'i 'o/ /liT pha rol la gnyis rnams te ba tsa la sogs pa rnams dang /
[\[262a.2\]]gra ha la sogs pa rnams kyis a b+h+yA sa'i saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur te/ ya dza ba tsa sogs kyi nang tshan yin pas/ liTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ i yA dza/ ba tsi sra pi ya dzA dI nI ki ti/ ba tsi swa pi/ ya dza la sogs pa rnams kyi ki ta la'o/ /ba tsa 'chang pa/
[\[262a.3\]]nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba gnyis dang ya dza la la sogs pa rnams kyi ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la a b+h+yA sa yod na gnyis ka dang a b+h+yA sa med kyang ya Na'i yi ge rnams saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur te/ liTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ I dza tunaH/ I dzuH/ skyes

[\[263a.1\]]ti sogs dang / tang la/ bap+s+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a ba b+s+ya ta sogs da nga / tang la/ a bap+s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /ba ha thob par byed pa la'o zhes pa la 'ang a tang dang / tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ ba ha ti
