[\[263a.6\]]gsum la/ a bak+Shi/ a ba k+ShA hi/ a ba k+Sh+ma hi/ liT la kita min pa rnams la/ liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi mdos a b+h+yAs/ saM pra sA ra Na dang / kita rnams la wa tsa swa pi ya dza sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra 'gyur ba sogs byas pas a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u bA ha/
[\[263a.7\]]U ha tuH/ UhuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba hi tha/ u bo D+ha/ thal/ U ha thuH/ U ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u bA ha/ u ba ha/ U hi ba/ U hi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang la/ U he/ U hA te/ U hi re sogs so/ /luT la/ ha'i D+ha/ d+hA ma yin pa sogs kyis ta d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/ d+ha D+ha/ D+ha'i D+ha
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]la dbyi 'os D+ha gong ma phyis/ sa hi ba ha sogs kyis o ta du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ bo D+hA/ bo D+hA si sogs dang / tang la/ bo D+hA/ po D+hA se sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ ba tsi swa pi ya dza sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ u h+yA ta/ u h+yA su:sogs dang / tang
[\[263b.2\]]la/ ha'i D+ha 'os/ ha D+ha/ /sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ D+ha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byis pas/ wa k+ShI Sh+Ta/ wa k+ShI yA stAM/ ba k+ShA ra na sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang ha D+ha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ wa k+Sh+ya ti/ wa k+Sh+ya taH/ ba k+Sh+ya n+ti sogs dang / tang la/ ba k+Sh+ya te/
[\[263b.3\]]ba k+Sh+ye ti/ ba k+Sh+ya n+te sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a ba k+Sh+yu ta/ a ba k+Sh+ya tAM/ a ba k+Sh+ya na sogs dang / tang la/ a ba k+Sh+ya ta/ a ba k+Sh+ye tAM/ a ba k+Sh+ya n+ta sogs so/ ! /be nya thags 'thag pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i a
[\[263b.4\]]tang la/ pa ya ti sogs dang / tang la/ ba ya sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ ba ye ta sogs dang / tang la/ ba ye ta sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ ba ya tu sogs dang / tang la/ ba ya tAM sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a ba ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ a ba ya ta sogs so/ /lung
[\[263b.5\]]gi a tang la/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta/ ya ma/ ram/ nam/ A ta rnams kyis ka 'ang ngos/ iT dang sa ka byin pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bA sI Sh+TAM/ a bA si ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bA sIH/ a bA si Sh+Ta/ skyes
[\[263b.6\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bA si ShaM/ a bA si ShA/ a bA si Sh+ma/ tang bas 'dren pa ma gtogs bya ba lhag po med de/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bA sta/ a bA sA tAM/ a bA sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bA s+th+raH/ a bA sA thAM/ a bA sA ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a w+wa si/
[\[263b.7\]]a bA swa hi/ a bA sma hi/ liT la/ be nya ny-id du gnas pa dang / ba yi ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs gnyis 'byung ste be nya nyid du gnas pa'i phyogs la/ be nyaH/ be nya'i'o/ /gong du liT la gnyis rnams kyi zhes sogs kyis be nyab tsa'i  ng+ha la'ang ros si tsa phyis pa lo/ sogs khongs yin kyang de'i
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dmigs bsal/ liT pha rol la be nya'i saM pra sAr Na mi phyed de/ be nya la liT sbyar bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba bau/ ba btuH/ ba buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba bi tha/ ba bA tha/ ba ba thuH/ ba ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba bau/ ba bi ba/ ba bi ma/ tang la'ang
[\[264a.2\]]iT las kyang Ata kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba be/ ba bA te/ ba bI re/ skyes bu dbus/ Ata las Na la gyi au 'os/ Na la yau/ iT las kyang A ta kyi dbyi 'os/ /A phyis/ ma gsum la/ ba bi She/ ba bA the/ ba bi ng+he/ ba bi D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba be/ ba bi ba he/ ba bi
[\[264a.3\]]ma he/ yang phyogs gcig la/ be nyo ba yiH/ nge nya'i wa yi'o/ be nya ni liT pha rol la ba yi zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ liTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ be nya/ wa yi ru bsgyur i brjod pa'i don yin pas phyis/ a b+h+yA sa med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod/ liT la
[\[264a.4\]]gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi mdos a b+h+yA sa saM pra sA ra Na ra byas pas/ u bA ya/ gnyis tshig la byings gnyis brjod/ ba tsi swa pi ya dza sogs kyi mdos/ ba gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/ a ka 'dra ba la ring po 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ U ya?/ a tus zhes pa la gra hi dz+yA ba yi bya d+hi ba Sh+Ti bi tsa ti
[\[264a.5\]]dr-i sh+tsa ti pr-i tsha ti pr-i dz+dza tI nI di ti tsa gra hi dz+yA ba yi byA d+hi/ ba Sh+Ti pi tsa ti br-i sh+tsa ti pr-i tsha ti b+h+r-i dz+ya ti rnams kyi nga 'gro ba la'ang ngo / /gra ha nye bar len pa/ dz+yA lang tsho nyams pa/ ba yi ste/ be nya snal ma'i rgyud/ bya d+ha ba snun pa/ ba sha mdzes pa'i baSh+Ti/ bi tsir tha dang du 'gyur ba/ bra sh+tsu gcod pa/ prats+tsha shes par 'dod
[\[264a.6\]]pa/ b+h+ra dz+dza 'tshe pa rnams kyi ya Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams ni rkyen ka 'gro ba'i ming can dang / nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la saM pra sA ra Na ra 'gyur ro/ /li Tib yo yaH/ liT la ba ya'i ya'o/ /ba shad ma thag pa gra hi dz+yA ba yi sogs kyi mdos/ ba ya'i ya yang i ru 'gyur ba thob kyang de'i
[\[264a.7\]]dmigs bsal/ liT kita pha rol la ba ya'i ya yig ni saM pra sA ra Na ra 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /ba sh+tsA s+yA n+ya ta ra s+yaM ki ta/ ki ta la de'i 'ang wa yang na'o/ /liT kita pa rol la de'i ste wa ya'i ya yig gi saM pra sA ra Nar mi 'gyur bar bshad pa de ni w+ra yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ ya? dang wa yang na bar byas
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bas/ u ya taH/ U ba tuH/ de bzhin du mang tshig la/ U yuH/ U buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba yi tha/ U ya thuH/ U ba thuH/ U ya/ U ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u wA ya/ u wa ya/ U yi wa/ U bi ba/ U yi ma/ tang la'ang de
[\[264b.2\]]bzhin du skyes bu dang po gsum la/ U ye/ U be/ U yA te/ U bA te/ U yi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum  a bus  la/ a/ She/ U bi She/ U snga the/ U bA Nal/ the/ U yi D+he/ U ye D+he/ wa/ U bi d+h+we/ U bi D+h+we/ skyes mo/ bu phyi ma gsum la/ U
[\[264b.3\]]ye/ U be/ U yi ba hi/ U bi ba hi/ U/ ta/ yi ma hi/ U/ A tAM bi ma hi/ luT/ dz+ha  la/ sha 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta du bsgyur ba ma/ thas  gtogs bya ba/ A thAM/ gzhan med pas/ ng+hAM/ a tang la/ d+hAM/ bA tA/ bA tA si sogs dang / tang la/
[\[264b.4\]]bA  iT/ tA/ bA tA se/ ba ti/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling  ma hi/ gi a tang la/ ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/ kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ U yA ta/ U yA stAM/ U yA suHsogs so/ /tang la bya ba gzhan med/ bA sI Sh+Ta/ bA sI yA sdI/ bA sI ran sogs
[\[264b.5\]]so/ /l+r-iT la'ang e tsa A ta du bsgyur bas a tang la/ wa s+ya ti sogs dang / tang la/ wA s+ya te sogs so/ tang la/ wA s+ya te sogs so/ de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a pa s+ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ a ba s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /bye nya kun nas sgrig pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can te/ laTa'i
[\[264b.6\]]a tang la/ bya ya ti sogs dang / tang la/ bya ya te sogs so+o/ /ling gi a tang la/ bya ye ta sogs dang / tang la/ bya ye ta sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ bya ya tu sogs dang / tang la/ bya ya tAM sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a bya ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ a bya ya ta sogs
[\[264b.7\]]so/ /lung ga a tang la/ yam/ ram/ nam/ A ta rnams kyis ka'ang ngos/ sa ka dang iT byin pas/ a byA sI ta/ a byA si Sh+TAM/ a byA si ShuHsogs dang / tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a byA sta/ a byA sA tAM/ a byA sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a byA s+thA/ a
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]byA sA thAM/ a byA d+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a byA si/ a byA swa hi/ a byA sma hi/ na byo liTi/ byA'i liT la ma yin no/ /bye nya'i e tsa ni liT pha rol la A ta du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ bye nya la liT/ liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyi mdos/ a b+h+yA sa
[\[265a.2\]]saM pra sA ra Na byas/ a tsa'i  d+ha pha'ang ngos si tsa phyis/ nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ bi byA ya/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ bye nyaHki ti'i TisaM bra sA ra NaM bA/ bye nya'i liT ki ta la saM pra sA ra Na yang na'o/ /bye nya'i a b+h+yA sa ra ma zad liT ki ta pha rol la gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Nar
[\[265a.3\]]yang na bsgyur te/ a b+h+yA sa nyid saM pra sA ra Na byas pa'i phyogs kyi rnam dbye sa a tsa dang po can rnams  Nal la/ e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs dang / gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na'i phyogs la i ka gi a tsa la ya Na byas pas/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gnyis la/ pi bya ya tuH/
[\[265a.4\]]bi bya tuH/ di bya yuH/ bi byuH/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi bya yi tha/ bi bya yi tha/ bi bya ya thuH/ bi bya thuH/ bi bya ya/ bi bya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi byA ya/ bi bya ya/ bi bya ya/ bi bya yi ba/ bi byi ba/ bi bya yim/ bi byi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang la yang / bi bya ye/ bi bye/ bi bya yA te/ bi byA te/
[\[265a.5\]]bi bya yi re/ bi byi re sogs so/ /luT la/ shi ta ma  a t+ti a rti byA ya ti rnams kyi iT 'os/ thal la iT yang na bar mi byed/ yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta du bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ byA tA/ byA tA si sogs dang / tang la/ byA tA se sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi/ ta/ a tang la/ A tAM/ shi ta
[\[265a.6\]]ma yin/ d+ha/ ba sogs kyis e tsa A ta/ ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM bra sA ra Na dang / kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ bI yA ta/ bI y+wa stAM/ bi yA suHsogs dang / tang la/ byA sI Sh+Ta/ byA sI yA stAM/ /sogs so/ /l+r-iT la e tsa a ta du bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ byA s+ya ti sogs
[\[265a.7\]]dang / tang la/ byA s+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a byA s+ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ a byA s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /hwau nya 'gran pa la ste sgra la yang ngo zhes pa 'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can te/ laTa'i a tang la/ hwa ya ti sogs dang / tang la/ hwa ya te sogs so/ /ling
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]gi a tang la/ hwa ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ hwa ye ta sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ hwa ya tu sogs dang / tang la/ hwa ya tAM sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a hwa ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ a hwa ya ta sogs so/ /li bi si ci hwa sh+tsa/ li bi si tsi hwA pa sa kyang ngo / /li ba byug pa/ Shi tsa 'dzag pa/ hwA 'gran
[\[265b.2\]]pa rnams las kyang ts+li ni ang du 'gyur te/ ts+li ang du bsgyur/ iT ba'ang A ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis a tang la / ahwa tAM/ a hwa na sogs so/ /tang la yang na bar byad da/ A t+ma ne pa de Sh+wa n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ A t+ma ne pa da rnams la yang na'o/ /li ba/ Shi tsa/ hwA rnams las A dat+ma ne pa da rnams pha rol la
[\[265b.3\]]ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang / si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/ ts+li ang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la A phyis bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hwa ta/ a hwe tAM/ a hwa n+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hwa thAH/ a hwe thAM/ a hwa d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hwe/ a hwA ba hi/ a hwA ma hi/
[\[265b.4\]]ts+li si tsa ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ i tsa A ta du bsgyur ba kho na ste/ A hwa sta/ a hwa sA tAM/ a hwa sa ta sogs so/ /a b+h+ya sta s+ya tsa/ a b+h+ya sta'i 'ang ngo / /liT pha rol la hwa'i a b+h+ya sta'i saM bra sA ra Na ra 'gyur te/ hwA la liT/ a b+h+yA sta ste gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na byas/ ki ta ma yin pa rnams la
[\[265b.5\]]'phel ba dang yon tan/ ki ta rnams la/ a tsa la shU byings sogs kyi u pa byas pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzu hA ba/ dzu hu ba tuH/ dzu hu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzu ha bi tha/ dzu ho tha/ dzu hu ba thuH/ dzu hu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzu hA
[\[265b.6\]]ba/ dzu ha ba/ dzu hu bi ba/ dzu hu bi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang la 'ang dzu hu be/ dzu hu bA te/ dzu hu bi re/ luT la shi ha ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta du bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ hwA tA/ hwA tA si sogs dang / tang la/ hwA tA/ hwA tA se sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ gzhan yang
[\[265b.7\]]brtsegs pa dang po'i yang na 'os/ e A data du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ hwA yA ta/ hwA yAM stAM/ hwA yA suHsogs sam/ /hA+e yA ta/ hwe yA stAM/ hwe yA suHsogs so/ /tang la/ e tsa A ta du bsgyur bas/ hwA sI yA stAM/ hwA si ra na sogs so/ /l+r-iT la 'ang e tsa dra sA ta
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]du bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ hwA s+ya ti sogs dang / tang la/ hwA s+ya ta sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a twA s+ya ta sogs dang / tang la/ a hwA s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /bas nges bar gnas pa la'o zhes pa bar smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs a tang
[\[266a.2\]]rnams 'jug ste/ laT la/ bas ti sogs so/ /ling la/ ba se ta sogs so/ /loT la/ bas tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a bas ha sogs so/ /sa s+yA r+ng+ha d+hA tu ke/ byings phyed pa las sa'i 'o/ /byings phyed pas yig dang po can pha rol la ba sa'i sa yig ni ta yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ was la
[\[266a.3\]]lung sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a wA t+sI ta/ a wA d+tAM/ a bA t+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a wA t+sIH/ a bA t+taM/ a bA t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bA t+saM/ a bA d+sA/ a bA d+s+ma shA si ba si g+ha sI nAM tsa/ shA si  ba si  g+ha si rnams kyi 'ang ngo / /shA su rjes
[\[266a.4\]]su ston pa/ bas nges par gnas pa/ g+ha sl-i za ba rnams kyi/ bang t+h+ra sogs kyis 'phel ba dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/ sa yig ni i Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang / ka yig sngon ma las Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ bas la liT byin/ ki ta ma yin pa rnams la liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs
[\[266a.5\]]kyi a b+h+yA sa saM pra sAr Na ra bsgyur ba dang / kiT rnams la ba tsi sra bi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na dang mdo 'dis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u bA sa/ U Sha tuH/ U ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba si tha/ a ba s+tha/ U Sha thuH/ U Sha/ skyes bu phyi
[\[266a.6\]]ma gsum la/ u bA sa/ u bas/ U Shi ba/ U Sham/ luT la bstA/ bsta rau/ bsta rau/ bstaraH/ bstA si sogs dang / smon pa'i ling la/ btsi sA li sogs kyi saM pra sA ra Na dang / shI sa/ ba si/ g+ha si sogs kyi sas Sha ra bsgyur bas/ u Sh+yA ta/ u Sh+yA stAM/ U Sh+yA suHsogs so/ /
[\[266a.7\]]l+r-iT la/ byings phyed pa la sa'i 'as sa tar bsgyur bas/ bat+s+ya ti sogs dang / de bzhin du w-ing li/ a bat+s+ya ta sogs so/ /bdag sa la par brjod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang par smai pa da rnams 'jug ste/ laT la/ bad ti sogs dang / ling la/ ba da ta sogs so/ /loT
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]la/ bad tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a ba da ta sogs so/ /lung la/ ba la dang po'i iT dang / bad b+h+ra ja sogs kyi su 'phel ba byas pas/ a bA dI ta/ a bA di Sh+TAM/ a bA di ShaHsogs so/ /liT la/ ki ta ma yin pa rnams la/ liT la gnyis kyi sogs kyis a b+h+ya sa saM pra
[\[266b.2\]]sA ra Na dang / gi ta rnams la ba tsi swa bi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u bAd/ U da tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba di tha/ U da thunaH/ U da/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u bA da/ a ba da/ U dI ba/
[\[266b.3\]]U di ma/ luT la wa la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ ba di tA/ ba di tA rau/ ba di tA raH/ ba di tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ u d+yA ta/ u d+yA stAM/ u d+yA suHsogs so/ /l-iT la/ -iT byin bas/ ba di Sh+ya ti sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a 'di Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /
[\[266b.4\]]Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa'ang par smai pad can yin pas/ laT sogs a tang rnams 'jug ste/ laT la/ shwa ba tsi sA bi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/ ya ti sogs so/ /ling la/ shwa ya tu sogs so/ /loT la/ shwa ya tu sogs so/ /lang la/ a shA ya ta sogs
[\[266b.5\]]so/ /lung la bsgrub tshul gsum 'byung ste/ dz+w-I sta m+b+mu/ mru tsu/ m+lu tsi sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang / /si tsa ru bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/ ang gi phyogs la/ shwa yi teraH/ shwa ya ti'i a'o/ /ts+li bsgyur ba'i ang pha rol la shwa ya ti'i i yig ni a yig tu 'gyur te/ a
[\[266b.6\]]a a ta kyi yin tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su song / a shwa ta/ a shwa tAM/ a shwa na sogs so/ /ts+li si tsang bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/ a shwa yI ta/ a shwa yi Sh+DA/ a shwa yi ShuHsogs dang / yang nad+he Ta shwi dag
[\[266b.7\]]di 'ad ma ka 'os/ ts+li tsang du bsgyur tsad la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i ha la lhag po dang / a tsa la/ sh+du byings sogs kyis u ba tu bsgyur bas/ a shi shwi ya ta/ a shi shwi ya taM/ a shi shwi ya na sogs so/ /bi b+hA ShA shA+eH/ shwi'i gdam nga'o/ /liT pha rol shwi'i sa pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shu shA ba/ shu shu ba tuH/ shu shu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shu sha ba tha/ shu shu ba thuH/ shu shu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shu shA ba/ shu shu bi ba/ shu shu bi ma/ ma bsgyur ba'i
[\[267a.2\]]phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shi shwA ya/ shi shwi ya tuH/ shi shwi  mdo 'dis ba dbyings bcas u ru bsgyur nas/ de nas byings gnyis brjod/ kita man pa rnams la rang bzhin yon tan dang 'phel ba/ kita rnams la a tsal sh+nu sogs kyis u ba/ yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shi shwa ya tha/ shi shwi ya thuH/ shi shwi ya
[\[267a.3\]]skyes bu phyi ma la/ shi shA ya/ shi shwa ya/ shi shwi yib/ shi shwi yim/ l+r-iT la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/ shwa yi tA/ shwa yi tA sI sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ wa tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM bra sA ra Na byas/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ shU yA ta/ shU yA stAM/ shU yA suHphyogs
[\[267a.4\]]so/ /l+r-iT la wa la dang po'i iT byin pas/ shwa yi Sh+ya ti sogs dang / de bzhin du w-ing la/ a shwa yi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na sU tra d+d+h+rA da ya s+sa mA b+ta:zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Ni'i mdo las b+h+rU la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen
[\[267a.5\]]po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ byed pa po la sha pra 'jug pa'i yul b+hU la sogs pa rnams las/ byings gzhan don gyi tshig can pa ra smai pa da 'jug pa rnams la rnam dbye ba ra smai pa da rnams sbyor
[\[267a.6\]]tshul dang / byings bdag don gyi tshig can A t+ma ne pa da 'jug pa rnams la rnam dbye A t+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor tshul/ byings gnyis ka'i tshig can rnams la rnam dbye pa ra smi pa da rnams dang A t+ma ne pa da gnyis ka spyor tshul sogs spyir btang dmigs bas la dang bcas pa rags pa rnams
[\[267a.7\]]re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni a da la sogs pa byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa 'jig pa'i bya ba rnams bstan par bya ste/ a di pra b+h+r-i ti b+h+yaHsha paH/ a nga la sogs pa rnams las sha pa kyi'o/ /byings a ta za ba la'o zhes pa la ngo bo'i rkyen i sbyar ba'i a di la sogs pa rnams la byed
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]pa po'i don gyi sha ba 'jig ste/ ! /ad la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyar/ byed pa po la sha pa 'os sha pa sbyin/ mdo 'dis sha pa phyis pa su laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a t+taH/ a da n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a t+si/ a t+thaH/ a t+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+mi/ a dwaH/ a t+maH/
[\[267b.2\]]ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+yA da/ a d+yA tAM/ a d+yUnaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+yAH/ a d+yA tAM/ a d+yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+yAM/ a  khar la tsa ra 'os da ta/ d+yA ba/ a d+yA ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a t+tu/ a t+tA ta/ a t+tAM/ a da n+du/ skyes bu dbus
[\[267b.3\]]ma'i gcig tshig la/ hu dz+ha w+h+yo us la tshig mtha' min pa'i 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ he T+d+hiH/ hu d+hal rnams las hi'i d+hi 'o/ /hu sbyin pa dang byings mtha' dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams las pha rol gyi hi ni d+hi ru 'gyur te/ a d+d+hi/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a t+taM/ a t+ta/
[\[267b.4\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dA ni/ a dA ba/ a dA ma/ a daHsarbe ShAM/ A da las thams cad kyi'o/ /Ad las byings thams cad ha la gcig pa a pr-i k+ta'i  a da la/ laT sha pa/ a di sogs kyis sha pa phyis/ la si'i hi ste pa 'gro ba'ang ma yin nos/ si hi ru bsgyur mdo 'dis hi b+hi nga drangs/ ming can de la
[\[267b.5\]]la mig mi'i ni 'os mi'i phyi ma la A Ta ste pi ta 'ang ngos/[ \[]A [\]]Ta sbyin/ la bas dang mes su bsgyur la nga dang 'dra ba sogs kyi pas phyis/ phyi ma la AT ste'i ta'ang ngos/ AT da drangs/ aT A ga ma ster ba sngon gyi drang srong thams cad 'dod de/ lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ A da tA/ AT/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ A t+tAM/
[\[267b.6\]]A da na/ de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a daH/ A t+tAM/ A t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A daM/ A dA/ A t+ma/ lung sa nor+g+ha sl-i/ lung san dag la g+ha sl-i'o/ /lung dang san dag pha rol la a da ni g+ha sl-i zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ l-i ni l-i 'gro ba'i don no/ /a g+ha sa ta/ a g+ha sa tAM/ a g+has
[\[267b.7\]]sogs so/ /li D+ya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ liT la yang na 'o/ /a ta ni liT pha rol la g+ha sl-ir yang na 'gyur te/ ad g+ha sl-ir bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ g+ha dz+ha a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ ki ta pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs l-i 'gro ba zhes pas tswi ang du bsgyur ba'o/ /
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]rnams la gam/ ha na/ dzan/ khan g+has rnams sogs kyis u d+hA phyis/ khar la tsa ra 'os g+ha ka  shA si  ba si  g+ha si rnams kyi 'ang ngos/ sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza g+hA sa/ dza k+Sha tuH/ dza k+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[268a.2\]]gsum la/ dza g+ha si tha/ dza k+ShathuH/ dza k+Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza g+hA sa/ dza g+has/ dzak+Shi ba/ dzak+Shi ma/ g+ha sl-i ra ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A da/ A da tuH/ A duH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A di tha/ A da thuH/ A da/ skyes bu phyi ma
[\[268a.3\]]gsum la/ Ad/ A di pa/ A di ma/ luT la khar la tsa ra 'os/ dra tra byas bas/ a t+tA/ a t+tA rau/ a t+tA raH/ a t+tA di sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ a d+yA ta/ a d+yA stAM/ a d+yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ra la tsa ra 'os dra tar bsgyur bas/ a d+s+ya ti/ a d+s+ya taH/ a d+s+ya n+ti sogs
[\[268a.4\]]dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ A t+s+ya ta/ A t+s+ya tAM/ A d+s+ya na sogs so/ ! /p+sA za ba la'o zhes pa la'ang pa ra smi pa da can yin bas/ laT sogs a tang rnams 'jug la/ a di la sogs pa rnams las sha pa kyi 'os sha pa 'jig ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ p+sA yAM/
[\[268a.5\]]p+sA ni/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ b+sA si/ p+sA thaH/ p+sA tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ p+sA mi/ p+sA baH/ p+sA maH/ ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ p+sA yA ta/ p+sA yA tAM/ p+sA yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ p+sA yAH/ p+sA yA taM/ p+sA yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ p+sA yAM/
[\[268a.6\]]p+sA ya ba/ p+sA yA ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ p+sA tu/ p+sA tA ta/ p+sA tAM/ p+sA n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ p+sA hi/ p+sA tA ta/ p+sA taM/ p+sA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ p+sA ni/ p+sA ba/ p+sA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la a b+sA ta a b+sA ta/ a p+sA tAM/ lang shA ka TA ye
[\[268a.7\]]na s+ya ba/ lang gi shA ka TA ya ma'i nges pa'o/ /A ta mtha' las lang bsgyur ba'i dz+hi ni dzus su 'gyur te/ sngon gyi drang srong shA ka Ta' ya na'i 'dod pa ltar na nges par 'gyur bar bshad de/ p+sA la/ lang la dz+hi ru bsgyur/ shA ka TA ya na'i 'dod pa ltar dzus su bsgyur ba dang / a n+ta ru bsgyur
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ba yang na bar byas bas/ a p+suH/ a p+ma na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a p+sAH/ a p+sA taM/ a p+sA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a p+sAM/ a p+sA ba/ a p+sA ma/ lung la/ yaM/ raM/ naM/ A ta rnams kyis ka 'ang ngos/ sa ka A gam dang iT byin pas/ skyes bu dang
[\[268b.2\]]po gsum la/ a p+sA sI ta/ a p+sA si Sh+TAM/ a p+sA saM Shi \u0f7f/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a p+sA sIH/ a b+sA si Sh+TaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a p+sA si ShaM/ a p+sA si Sh+wa/ a p+sA si Sh+ma/ l-iTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pa p+sau/ pa p+sa tuH/ ba blaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[268b.3\]]pa p+si tha/ pa p+sA tha/ pa p+sa thuH/ pa p+sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pa p+sau/ pa p+si ba/ pa p+si ma/ luT la/ p+sA tA/ p+sA tA rau/ p+sA tA ra:/ p+sA tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gzhan/ A ta las Nal gyi au 'os Nal au ru sbUr/ iT las khyad AT kyi [\[]dbyi sos A phyis/[\]]brtsegs pa dang po'i
[\[268b.4\]]yang na 'os/ A e ru bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ p+sA yA ta/ p+sA yA stAM/ p+sA yA \u0f7fsogs sam/ p+se yA ta/ spe yA staM/ spe yA su \u0f7fsogs so/ /l+r-iTal/ spA s+ya ti/ spA s+ya taH/ spA s+ya n+ti sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a spA s+ya ta/ a spA s+ya tAM/ a spA s+ya na
[\[268b.5\]]sogs so/ ! /ba sha mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug cing sha pa 'jig ste/ kita rnams la gra? hi sogs kyi saM pra sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na dang / bra sh+tsa b+h+ra rdza sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ za sh+tsa sogs kyi Sha bul Sha Tu 'os taT/ ba Sh+Ti/ u Sh+TaH /u
[\[268b.6\]]sha n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba k+Shi/ bra sha sogs kyi sha Sha/ sa la lha dag gi so gsol/ Sha pha/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Sha/ u Sh+baH/ u d+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba sh+mi/ u shAH/ gra hi dz+yA sogs kyi saM pra sAr Na byas pas ga u sh+yA ta/ u sh+ya tAM/ u sh+ya tAM/ u sh+yu \u0f7f/ bra sh+tsa sogs kyi sha Sha/[ \[]Shab Sha Tu 'os taT khra hi sogs kyi bra sar/[\]]rab bsgyur
[\[268b.7\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u sh+yAH/ bra sh+tsa sogs kyi sha Sha TA sogs kyis tha Tha/ gra hi sogs kyi saM pra sAr Na ra bas/ u sh+yA taM/ u sh+yA ta/ /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u sh+yAM/ u sh+yA ba/ a sh+yA ma/ loT la'ang kita rnams la gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na dang / dz+ha la
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dang po rnams la bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha dang / Sh+Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba Sh+tu/ u Sh+TA ta/ u Sh+TaM/ u shan+sha/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u D+hi/ u Sh+DA ta/ u Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ /
[\[269a.2\]]ba shA ni/ ba shA ba/ ba shA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gcig tshig la/ ba shal lang / la ti/ i ta kyi 'ang nges i phyis/ ha la dA pi sogs kyis ta phyis/ ba sha la hi/ gra hi sogs kyis saM bu sA ra Na pra sh+tsa sogs kyis sha Sha/ hu dz+ha la sogs kyis hi d+hi Sha [\[]Tub[\]]Sha Tu 'os b+ha T+h+wa/ mtha'i dz+ha la sogs kyis Sha Da/ bra sh+tsa
[\[269a.3\]]sogs  AT/ AT/ kyis sha Sha/ mtha'i dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os/ Sha Da/ gnas med pa la yang na'os/ a baT/ a baT/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ au Sh+TAM/ au sha na/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a baDa/ a ba Ta/ au Sh+TaM/ au Sh+Ta/ skyes
[\[269a.4\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ba shaM/ au shwa/ au sh+ma/ lung la/ ha la dang po yang ba sogs kyis 'phel ba yang na ba dang / iT sbyar bas/ a bA shIta/ gra he sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na aca dang po rnams kyi AT 'os/ byings la AT/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ a bA shi Sh+TaM/ bA shi ShaH/
[\[269a.5\]]sogs sam/ a gA shita sogs so/ /l-iT la kita ma yin pa rnams la/ gnyis rnams sogs kyis a b+h+yAs/ saM bra sA ra Na dang kita rnams la gra ha sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sAr Na ra bsgyur/ a ka 'ang ba la ring bo sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[269a.6\]]u bA sha/ U sha tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba shi tha/ U sha thuH/ U sha/ /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u bA sha/ /u ba sha/ /U shi ba/ U shi ma/ luT la/ ba shi tA/ ba shi tA rau/ ba shi tA raH/ ba shi tA raH/ ba shi tA raH/ ba shi tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i
[\[269a.7\]]ling la/ gra ha b+h+yA sogs kyis sa pra sA ra Na byas pas/ u sh+yA ta/ u sh+yA stA/ u sh+ya suH/ u sh+yAH/ u sh+yA staM sogs so/ /l+r-iT las wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ ba shi Sh+ya ti/ ba shi Sh+ya taH/ ba shi Sh+ya n+ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a pa shi Sh+ya ta/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]A ba shi Sh+ya tAM/ a la shi Sha na sogs so/ ! /ta na 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba dag la'o zhes pa la 'ang / laT sogs par smi pa ra rnams 'jug cing shal kyang 'jig ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ ha n+te/ a nu dA t+ho pa de sha ba na ti ta no t+yA dI nA ma nu nA si ka lo pa dz+ha li k+di ti/
[\[269b.2\]]a nu dA t+ta nye ba'i yul ba no ti/ ta no ti la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan dz+ha la kang 'gro ba la dbyi'o/ /a nu dA t+ta nye ba'i yul te/ ya mu nyi bar 'gog pa/ ra mu rtse ba/ na ma rab tu 'dud pa/ ga m+l-i 'gro ba/ ha na 'tsho ba/ ma nu shes pa rnams dang / ba no ti ste/ ba nu
[\[269b.3\]]'tshe ba dang / ta no ti la sogs pa ste/ ta nu rgyas pa/ k+Sha nu 'tshe ba/ r-i nu 'gro ba/ g+h+r-i Nu 'bar ba/ ba nu slong ba/ ma nu rtogs pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan gyi yi ge rnams rkyen dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can ka dang nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ ha na
[\[269b.4\]]la skyes bu dang po gnyis tshig sbyar bas/ ha taH/ mang tshig la/ ga ma  ha na  dza na sogs kyis u pa d+hA phyis/ ha n+ti'i hi ny+Ni ta rnams la 'os/ ha g+har bsgyur bas/ g+hA n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ha n+si/ ha thaH/ ha za/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[269b.5\]]ha n+yi/ ha n+baH/ ha n+maH/ ba mo rbA/ tha mo dag la yang na'o/ /nyer bsgyur na Na ra 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na ha na gyi na yig ni ba yig dang ma yig dag pha rol la Na yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ pra ha n+mi/ pra ha N+mi/ pra ha naH/ pra ha N+baHsogs so/ /ling
[\[269b.6\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ha n+yA ta/ ha n+yA tAM/ ha n+yAH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ha n+yAH/ ha n+yAte/ ha n+yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ha n+yAM/ ha n+yA ba/ ha n+yA ma/ nyer bsgyur rgyu  rab tu mtshe bar byed/ mtshan can sngon du byung na/ ha n+ti'i a ta sngon ma'i
[\[269b.7\]]'os/ na r+Nar 'gyur te/ pra ha N+ya ta sogs so/ /loT la/ kita rnams la/ a nu dA t+ta nye ba'i yul sogs kyis rjes su sA ldan dbyi ba dang / a tsa dang po can rnams la/ gam ha na sogs kyi u pa d+hA dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]po gsum la/ ha n+tu/ ha twA ta/ ha tAM/ g+h+na n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ ha n+ti rdzaH/ ha n+ti'i dza'o/ /si'i hi ste ba 'gro ba 'ang ma yin no zhes pas loT la si hi ru bsgyur ba'i hi pha rol la ha n+ti'i dza zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ dza hi ha ha
[\[270a.2\]]tA ta/ a si ng+d+ha ba da trA shra yi/ 'di la gzhi mnyam pa pha ma grub po/ dza hi zhes gzhi mnyam du gnas pa 'di la a ta las hi'i 'o zhes pas hi ra byi bam grub ste/ snga ma ha na zhes na yig gi rgyu mtshan nyid las so/ /gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ha taM/ ha ta
[\[270a.3\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ phyi ma la AT sta bita 'ang ngos AT sbyin pas/ ha nA ni/ ha nA pa/ ha nA ma/ lang la/ ha la gcig pa rnams/ ha la dI ba sogs kyis dbyi ba dang / kita dz+hal dang po can rnams la a nu dA t+ta sogs kyis na dbyi/ a tsa dang po can rnams
[\[270a.4\]]la ga ma ha la sogs kyis u pa ng+hA dbyi ba sogs byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ha na/ a ha tAM/ a g+h+na na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ha ni/ a ha ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ha naM/ a han+ba/ lu ngi tsa/ lung la 'ang do/ /lung pha rol la ha na ni ba ng+han ni bang+ha zhes par bsgyur bar
[\[270a.5\]]bya ste/ ha na la lung / mdo 'dis ha na bad+ha ru bsgyur/ bal dang po'i iT/ ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a ba d+hI ta/ a ba d+hi Shu sogs so/ /leT la byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsa 'os ha dz+ha/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ Nal gnyis
[\[270a.6\]]la/ ha n+ti'i hi ny+Ni ta ni rnams la 'os ha g+ha/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos 'phel ba/ kaM ta rnams la gam han sogs kyis u pa/ rdzes su a phyis ba yin la/ dang po nas ha la mtha' ma yin pas/ pa da sogs kyis 'phel pa 'dir mi byed/ ng+hA phres/ ha n+ti'i hi sogs kyis ha g+har bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/
[\[270a.7\]]g+hAn/ dza g+h+na tuH/ dza g+hUH/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ /a b+h+yA sA ts+tsa/ a b+h+yAs las kyang ngo / /a b+h+yAs las kyang pha rol gyi ha ni g+ha ru bsgyur te/ dza g+ha ni tha/ dza g+ha n+tha/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dza g+h+na thuH/ dza g+h+na/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]dza g+nan/ dza g+na na/ dzag+ni ba/ dzag+hi ma/ luT la/ han+tA/ han+tA rau/ han+tAH/ han+dAH/ han+ta si sogs so/ /ha no ba ng+ha li di/ ling la han gyi bang+da'o/ /smon pa'i ling pha rol ma han ni ba ng+ha zhes par sgyur bar bya ste/ han la/ smon ling / mdo 'dis ba ng+ha rab sgyur/ a ta kyi
[\[270b.2\]]dbyi 'os a phyi pas/ ba ng+h+yA ta/ sa ng+h+tA staM/ pa ng+h+yA suH sogs so /l+riT la/ r-i ta han dag gis sa la 'os/ iT byin pas/ ha ni Sh+ya ti/ ha ni Sh+ya taH/ ha ni Sh+ya n+ti sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ha ni Sh+ya ta/ a ta ni Sh+ya na sogs so/ !/
[\[270b.3\]]d+yu mngon par 'gro ba la 'o zhes par la a tar 'jug cing a'i sogs kyis sha pa kyang 'jig go/ /u to br-ing+hirluki ha wi/ 'jig pa ha la la uta kyis 'phel ba'o/ /sha pa 'jig pa lta bu bar rkyen 'jig pa la rkyen hal dang po ba 'gro ma'i ming can pha rol la uta kyi 'phel bar 'gyur te/
[\[270b.4\]]d+yu la luTal sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ d+yauti/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ d+yu taH/ d+yu ba n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ d+yauSha/ d+yu thaH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ d+yau mi/ d+yo baH/ d+yu ma baH/ ling la bya ba lhag po med de/ d+yu yA ta/ d+yu yA staM/
[\[270b.5\]]d+yu yAHsogs so/ /loT la/ tipa ha la dang po can rnams la 'phel ba dang / a tsa dang dang po can rnams la/ a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ d+yau tu/ d+yau tA ta/ d+yu tAM/ d+yu ba n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[270b.6\]]gsum la/ d+yu hi/ d+yu tA ta/ d+yu taM/ d+yu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ d+ya bA ni/ d+ya bA ba/ d+ya bA ma/ de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+yau ta/ a d+yu tAM/ a d+yu ba na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+yauH/ a d+yu taM/ a d+yu ta/ skyes bu
[\[270b.7\]]phyi ma gsum la/ a d+ya baM/ yon tan/ a d+yu ba/ a d+yu ma/ lung la/ si tsal 'phel  AT byin nas yon tan byas so/ ba par smai pad rnams la 'os/ 'phel bar byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+yau ShI da/ a d+yau Sh+DAM/ a d+yau ShuH skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]a d+yau ShIH/ a d+yau Sh+TAM/ a d+yau Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+yau ShaM/ a d+yau Sh+ma/ liT la/ Nal gnyis dang thal ma yin pa rnams la/ swa ny+dza brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis ki ta yang na byas pas/ kita kyi phyogs la/ a tsa
[\[271a.2\]]sh+nu byings kyi u pa dang / ki ta ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du d+yA ba/ du rgyu ba tuH/ du d+ya ba tuH/ du d+yu buH/ du d+ya buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du d+yo tha/ du d+ya bi tha/ du d+yu ba thuH/ du d+yab thuH/ du d+yu ba/ du d+ya ba/ skyes
[\[271a.3\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ du d+yA ba/ du d+ya ba/ du d+yu bi ba/ du d+ya bi ba/ du d+yu bi ma/ du d+ya bi ma/ luT byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ h+yo tA/ d+yo tA rau/ d+yo tA raH/ d+yo tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs kyis
[\[271a.4\]]ring po byas pas/ d+yU yA ta/ d+yU yA stAM/ d+yu yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan dang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha byas pas/ d+yo Sh+ya ti/ d+yo Sh+ya haH/ d+yo Sh+yahaH/ d+yo Sh+ya n+ti sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a d+yo
[\[271a.5\]]Sh+ya ta/ a d+yo Sh+ya tAM/ a d+yo Sh+ya nas sogs so/ ! /yu sres pa la'o zhes ba la'ang a tang rnams 'jug cing cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes ba dang po gsum la/ yau ti/ yu taH/ yu nga n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yau Sh-i/ yu thaH/ yu tha/
[\[271a.6\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ yau mi/ yu baH/ yu maH/ ling la/ yu yA ta/ yu yA tAM/ yu yuHsogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ yo tu/ yu tA ta/ yu tAM/ yu ban+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yu hi/ yu tA ta/ yu taM/ yu ta/ skyes
[\[271a.7\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ ya bA ni/ ya bA ba/ ya bA ma/ ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a yo ta/ a yu tAM/ a yu ba na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a yauH/ a yu taM/ a yu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ya baM/ a yu ba/ a yu ma/
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]lung la ba la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a yA bI ta/ a yA byaSh+DAM/ a yI bi ShuHsogs so/ /l+riTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ yu yA ba/ yu yu ba tuH/ yu yu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yu ya bi tha/ yu yu ba shuH/ yu yu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[271b.2\]]la/ yu yA ba/ yu la ba/ yu yu bib/ yu si tsal 'phel ba/ yu bi ma/ luT la bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ ya bi tA/ ya bi tA rau/ ya bi tA raH/ ya bi tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas bas/ yU yA ta/ yU
[\[271b.3\]]yA stAM/ yu yA su:sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ ya bi Sh+ya ti sogs dang / de bzhin du/ ling la/ a ya bi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /Nu bstod pa 'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor/ cho ga yu dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ nau ti/ nu taH/ nu ba n+ti/
[\[271b.4\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ nauShi/ nu thaH/ nu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ nau mi/ nu maH/ ling la/ nu yA tAM/ nu yuHsogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ nau tu/ nu tA ta/ ni ba n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ nu
[\[271b.5\]]hi/ nu tA ta/ nu taM/ nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ na bA ni/ na bA ba/ na bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a nau ta/ a nu tAM/ a nu ba na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a noH/ a nu taM/ a nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a nu baM/ a nu ba/ a nu ma/
[\[271b.6\]]lung la wa la dang po'i iT dang / si tsa 'phel ba par smai ba da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas bas/ /a nA bI ta/ a nA bi Sh+TAM/ a nA bi ShuHsogs sam/ yang na 'grel bar nu las pa la dang po la iT yang na mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas iT med pa'i phyogs la 'phel ba byas pas/
[\[271b.7\]]a nau ShI ta/ a nau Sh+TAM/ a nau Sh+TAM/ a nauShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ nu nA ba/ nu nu ba tuH/ nu nu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ nu nu ba thuH/ nu nu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ nu TAb/ nu na bing / nu nu bi ma/ luT
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]la/ na bi tA sogs sam/ no tA sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la ring bo byas bas/ nU yA ta/ nU yA staM/ nu yA suHsogs so+o/ /l+r-iT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ na pi Sh+ya ti sogs sam/ no Sh+ya dati sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a
[\[272a.2\]]na bi Sh+yata sogs sam/ /a no Sh+ya da sogs so/ ! /k+Shu rno ba la'o zhes pa 'ang yu dang 'dra ste/ a tang rnams spyar bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ k+Sh+Nau ti/ k+Sh+NutaH/ k+Sh+Nu pa n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ k+Sh+Nau+u Shi/ k+Sh+nu thaH/ k+Sh+Nu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[272a.3\]]k+Sh+Nau mi/ k+Sh+Nu baH/ k+Sh+Na maH/ ling la/ k+Sh+Nu yA ta/ k+Sh+Nu yA tAM/ k+Sh+Nu yuHsogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ k+Sh+Nau tu/ k+Sh+Na tA ta/ k+Sh+Nu tAM/ k+Sh+Nu ba T+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ k+Sh+Nu hi/ k+Sh+Nu tAM ta/ k+Sh+Nu taM/ k+Sh+Nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[272a.4\]]k+Sh+Na bA ni/ k+Sh+Na bA ba/ k+Sh+Na bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a k+Sh+nau ta/ a k+Sh+nu tAM/ a k+Sh+Nu ban/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a k+Sh+NauH/ a k+Sh+Nu taM/ a k+Shu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a k+Sh+Na baM/ a k+Sh+nu ba/ ak+Shu ma/ lung la bal dang po'i iT sbyar/
[\[272a.5\]]'phel ba byas pas/ a k+Sh+NA bI ta/ a k+Sh+Nu biSh+TA+e/ a k+Sha pa ShuHsogs so/ liT gnyis brjod/ dang po'i hal lhag po 'os/ /kha dang Na phyis/ ku haM dag gi tsu Na la gnyis dang thal bor te/ gzhan rnams kita yang na bar byas pas/ skyes bu dngo po gsum
[\[272a.6\]]la/ tsu k+ShA ba/ tsu k+Sh+na ba tuH/ tsu k+Sh+Nu butuH/ tsu k+Sh+nu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsu k+Sh+Na bi tha/ tsu k+Sh+Na ba thuH/ tsu k+Sh+Na ba thuH/ tsu k+Sh+Na thu/ tsu k+Sh+Na ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsu k+Sh+Na ba/ tsa k+Sh+Na ba/ tsu k+Sh+Na bi ba/ tsu k+Sh+Nu bi ba/ tsu k+Sh+Na bi ma/ tsu k+Sh+Nu bi ma/
[\[272a.7\]]luT la iT byin bas/ k+Sh+Na bi tA/ k+Sh+Na bi tA rau/ k+Sh+Na bi tA raH/ k+Sh+Na bi tA/ si sogs so/ /smon pa'i li ra la kr-i ta ma yig pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ k+Sh+Nu yA ta/ k+Sh+Nu yA staM/ k+Sh+Nu yA ta/ k+Sh+Nu yA stAM/ k+Sh+Nu yA suHsogs so/ /waT la wa la dang pa'i iT sbyar bas/ k+Sh+Na bi Sh+ya ti sogs dang
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a k+Sh+Na bi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /Sh+Nu rab tu 'dzag pa la'o zhes pa'ang [\[]phar[\]] smi pa da can yin pas a tang rnams 'jug cing sha ba 'jig byings kyi dang po'i Sha 'i sa 'os Sha sa/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes bas/ Na 'ang na ru log/ snu
[\[272b.2\]]zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ cho ga bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ snau ti/ snu ti/ sdu ba sti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ snau Shi/ snu thaH/ snu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ snau mi/ snu baH/ snu maH/ ling
[\[272b.3\]]la/ snu yA ta/ snu yA tAM/ snu luHsogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sno tu/ snu tA ta/ snu tAM/ snu ban+hu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ snu hi/ snu tA ta/ snu taM/ snu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sna bA ni/ sna bA ba/ sna bA ma/ lung
[\[272b.4\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a snau ta/ a snu tAM/ a snu ba na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a snauH/ a snu taM/ a snu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sna paM/ a snu ba/ a snu ma/ lung la wa la dang mo'i iT dang 'phel ba byas bas/ a snA pI ta/
[\[272b.5\]]a snU bi Sh+D+daM/ a snA bi ShuHsogs so/ /liT la Na la gnyis dang thal bor ba'i rnam dbye gzhan rnams swa ny+dza brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyi kita yang na par byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su k+Shu ba/ su k+Shu ba tuH/ su k+Shu ba tuH/ su k+Sh+nu buH/ skyes bu dbus
[\[272b.6\]]ma gsum la/ su Sh+Na bi tha/ su Sh+Na ba bruH/ su Sh+NA bathuH/ su Sh+Na ba/ su Sh+Nu ba/ skyes phyi ma gsum la/ su Sh+Nu bi ba/ su Sh+Na bam/ su Sh+Ta bi ba/ su Sh+Tu bi ba/ su Sh+Nu bi ma/ su Sh+Ta bi ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ sna bi tA/ sna bi tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la
[\[272b.7\]]kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ snuM yA ta/ snU yA stAM/ snA lA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin bas/ sna bi Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la'ang iT byin pas/ a sna bi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /i Na 'gro ba la'o zhes ba la'ang a ta ra rnams 'jug
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ste/ a di sogs kyis sha ba 'jig /byings kyi Nu rjes 'brel bi ta la yon tan sogs byas pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ e ti/ i taH/ i No ya Na/ i Na gyi ya Na'o/ /rkyen pi ta ma yin pa a tsa dang po can pha rol
[\[273a.2\]]la i Na ni ya Na so sor bsdu pa'i yi ger 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang bo'i mang tshig la/ ya n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e Shi/ i thiH/ i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e mi/ i baH/ imaH/ ling la/ i yA ta/ i yA tAM/ i yuHsogs
[\[273a.3\]]so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e tu/ i tA ta/ i tAM/ yan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i hi/ i tA ta/ i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a yA ni/ a yA pa/ a yA ma/ lang la/ a tsa dang po la AT
[\[273a.4\]]'os/ byings la AT/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ai ta/ ai tAM/ A ya na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ aiH/ ai taM/ ai ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A yaM/ ai ba/ ai ma/ i No gA
[\[273a.5\]]ngi / lung la i Na gyi kA'o/ /lung pha rol la i Na ni gA zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ i Na la/ lung / A la 'phel ba byas bas ai zhes ba la la [\[]D+b+haM[\]]/ dz+ha a n+ta/ ita kyi 'ang ngos i byis brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'as/ ta phyis/ e tsa'i a la apa sogs kyis mtshams sbyar/ mdo
[\[273a.6\]]'dis gAr bsgyur/ gA ti/ s+thA/ g+hu pA/ b+hU sogs kyis si tsa 'jig pas/ a gA ta/ a gA tAM/ a guH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a gAH/ a gA taM/ a gA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a gI/ a gA ba/ a gA ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang
[\[273a.7\]]po'i gcig tshig la/ i Na liT a b+h+yAs med pa sogs kyis byings gnyis brjod/ la ti ba/ hipa Na la/ a tsa'i ny+ra Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba e tsa'i al a ba sogs kyis i A ya?/ a b+h+yA sa'i 'dra ba ma yin pa la 'os i gong ma i yang dang a 'gro ba rim bzhin drangs
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]pas i yA ya/ dI r+g+ha i NaHki ti/ ka 'gro ba la i Na gyi ring po'o/ /liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la in gyi a b+h+ya sa ring bor 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ i gnyis brjod mdo 'dis a b+h+yA sa ring bo/ i Na gyi ya Na 'os i phyi ma y+ra drangs
[\[273b.2\]]bas/ I ya tuH/ I yAH/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i ya yi tha/ i ye tha/ I ya thuH/ I ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ i yA ya/ i ya ya/ i yi ba/ i yi ma/ luT la byings thams cad pa dang
[\[273b.3\]]byings byed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ e tA/ e tA rau/ e tA raHsogs so/ /smon pa'i ling ba kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring bo byas/ I yA ta/ I yA stAM/ I yA suHsogs so/ /e te rli ngi/ /e ti'i ling la'o/ /nyer bsgyur sngon du sbyor na i Na'i smon
[\[273b.4\]]pa'i ling pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur te/ I yAta ces grub pa'i sngon du a nu bzhag /mdo 'dis thung ngu / i ka gi a tsa la ya Na byas pas/ a n+wi yA ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la yon tan byas pas/ e Sh+ya ti/ e Sh+ya taH/ e Sh+ya n+taM sogs dang / l+r-ing 'ang de dang 'dra ba la/ a tsa
[\[273b.5\]]dang po'i AT 'os AT byin/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/ i Sh+ya ta/ ai Sh+ya tAM/ ai Sh+ya na sogs so/ ! /i ka dran pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ i NA di ka i ti tsa ba k+ta bya mi ti Na t+ka r+ya rU paM tsa/ i Na 'dra bar i ka ces
[\[273b.6\]]pa'ang brjod bar bya ste/ bya ba i Na 'dra zhing gzugs 'ang ngo / /i ka ces pa 'di 'ang i Na dang 'dra bar brjod par bya ste/ i ti sogs sgrub tshul gyi bya ba thams cad 'dra la/ i Na skabs kyi mdo rnams kyang thams cad 'jug cing bsgrubs zin gyi gzugs thams cad kyang i Na dang
[\[273b.7\]]'dra bas/ laT sogs sde tshan bcu po thams cad la rigs 'gre bas/ sgrub tshul bsgrubs zin gyi gzugs sogs dper brjod logs su ma bkod do/ ! /mA mchod pa la zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ a di sogs kyis sha pa 'jig pas laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]la/ mA ti/ mA taH/ mA N+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mA si/ mA thaH/ mA tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mA mi/ mA baH/ mA maH/ ling la/ mA yA ta/ mA yA tAM/ mA yuHsogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ mA tu/ mA tA ta/ mAM tAM/
[\[274a.2\]]mA n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mA hi mA tA ta/ mA taM/ mA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mA ni/ mA ba/ mA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mA tAM/ a muH/ a mA na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mAH/ a mA taM/ a mA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[274a.3\]]a mAM/ a mA ba/ a mA ma/ lung la/ ya ma/ ra ma/ nam sogs kyis sa ka dang iT byin pas/ a mA sI ta/ a mA si ShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i  lang la shA ka TAl Nas ngas ba 'os/ dz+hi dzus/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ma mau/ ma ma tuH/ ma muH/ skyes bu
[\[274a.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/ ma mi tha/ ma ma thuH/ ma ma/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ma mau/ ma mi pa/ ma me ma/ luT la/ mA tA/ mA tA ro/ mA tA raH/ mA tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ling la e 'os er bsgyur bas/ me yA ta/ me yA stAM/ me yA suHsogs
[\[274a.5\]]so/ /l+r-iT la/ mA s+ya ti sogs dang / l+ring la/ a mA s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /yA thob pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ cho ga phal cher mA dang 'dra bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po+o gsum la/ yA ti/ yA taH/ yA n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yA si/ yA thaH/ yA
[\[274a.6\]]tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ yA ma/ yA baH/ yA maH/ ling la/ yA yAta/ yA yA staM/ yA yAHsogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ yA tu/ yA tA ta/ yA tAM/ yA n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yA hi/ la tA ta/ yA taM/ yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ yA
[\[274a.7\]]ni/ yA ba/ yA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a yA ta/ a yA tAM/ ayuH/ a yA na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a yAH/ a yA taM/ a yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a yAM/ a yA ba/ a yA ma/ lung la/ yam/ ram/ nam sogs kyis
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]sa ka dang iT byin pas/ a yA sbyi ta/ a yA si Sh+TAM/ a yA si ShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ya yau/ ya ya tuH/ ya yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ya yi tha/ ya ya thuH/ ya ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ /ya yau/ ya yi ba/ ya yi
[\[274b.2\]]ma/ luT la/ yA tA/ yA tA rau/ yA tA raH/ yA tA sI sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ 'dir er mi 'gyur bas/ yA yA ta/ yA yA stAM/ yA yA suHsogs so/ /l+raT la/ yA s+ya ti sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a sA s+yata sogs so/ /bA 'gro ba dang dri ba dag la 'o dang / /
[\[274b.3\]]drA smad ba la'o gnyis kyang cho ga thams cad yA dang 'dra'o/ ! /khyA gtam la'o zhes pa'ang bshad ma thag pa rnams dang phal cher 'dra ste/ laT la/ khyA ti/ khyA taH/ khyA n+ti sogs so/ /ling la/ khyA yAta/ khyA yA stAM/ khyA yuHsogs so/ /loT la/ khyA tu/ khyA tA ta/ khyA tAM/ khyA n+tu
[\[274b.4\]]drA ba/ smon pa'i ling la/ gzhan yang brtsegs pa sogs kyis e ru bsgyur ba dang / mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byed pa'o/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a khyA ta/ a khyA tAM/ a khyAH/ a khyA na sogs so/ /a s+ya ti ba k+ti khyA ti b+h+yo nyang / a s+ya ti/ bak+ti/ khyA ti rnams las ang 'o/ /a su 'phel pa/ ba tsa
[\[274b.5\]]brjod pa khyA gtam rnams las ts+li ni ang du bsgyur te/ khyA la/ lung / lung la ts+li 'os ts+li byin/ mdo 'dis ts+li ang / iT las kyang A ta kyi dbyi 'os A phyis bas/ a khya ta/ a khya tAM/ a khya na sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po lhag po/ ku ha ngag gi tsu 'os/ kha
[\[274b.6\]]tsha/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ tsha tsar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum pa/ tsa khyau/ tsa khyatuH/ tsa k+buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa khyi tha/ tsa khya thuH/ tsa khya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa khyau/ tsa khyi ba/ tsa khyi ma/ luT la/ khyA tA rau/ khyA tA raH/ khyA tA si sogs
[\[274b.7\]]so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gzhan yang brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyis er bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas bas/ khye yA ta/ khye yA stAM/ khye yA suHsogs sam/ khyA yA ta/ khyA yA stAM/ khyA yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ khyA s+ya ti sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a khyA s+ya ta sogs so/ ! /bi dang shes pa
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]la'o zhes ba la bar smai pa da rnams 'jug ste bi do liTo bA/ bid las liTa'i yang na'o/ bi da las pha rol gyi laT bsgyur ba'i a tang gi ti ba la sogs pa rnams rim pa bzhin Na la la sogs pa rnams su yang na 'gyur te/ bid la/ laT/ sha pa 'jig/ mdo 'dis ti ba sogs Na la sogs su bsgyur ba'i
[\[275a.2\]]phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bed/ bid tuH/ bi duH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/[ \[]bat+b+ra/[\] ]ba di thur/ bid/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be da/ pi dwa/ bid+ma/ Nal la sogs bar ma bsar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bat+ti/ bat+taH/ bi ra n+ti/ skyes bu
[\[275a.3\]]dbus ma gsum la/ be t+si/ bi t+thaH/ bit+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be d+mi/ bi draH/ bi d+maH/ ling la bya ba lhag po med pas/ bi d+yAta/ bi d+yA tAM/ bi d+yAHsogs so/ /bi dAM ku rba n+ti t+ya n+ya ta ra s+yA/ bi dAM ku rba n+tu zhes pa yang na'o/ /bi ta la loT pha rol la yang na A ma sbyor zhing loT
[\[275a.4\]]yang 'jig pa dang kr-i nya loTa'i rkyen can rjes su sbyor ba sogs tshig phrad du byas pas/ bi dAM ka ro tu sogs te/ bi dAM sA+on mas Du kr-i nya byed pa la/ loT rjes 'brel phyis la ti ai u 'os/ i u ru bsgyur bas/ bi dI kr-i tu ba ces pa la/ ta nA di b+h+ya uH/ ta na la sogs pa rnams
[\[275a.5\]]las u'o/ ta nu rgyas ba la sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad ba pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi shab kyi yul la u 'gyur te/ u sbyar byings thams cad ba dang byis phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ bi dAM ka ro tu 'grub pa'o/ /a ta u t+sA r+b+ba ng+hA tu ke/ a ta kyi u ta byings thams cad
[\[275a.6\]]pa la'o/ /kr-i nya u'i mtha' can gyi ad ni byings thams cad ba ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la u tu du 'gyur te/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ bi dAM ku ru tAM/ bi dAM ku rba n+tu/ de bzhin du skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi dAM ku ru/ bi dAM ku ru tA ta/ pi dAM ku ru tA ta/ bi dAM ku ru taM/ bi dAM ku
[\[275a.7\]]ru ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pi dAM ka ra bA Ni/ bi dAM ka ra bA ba/ bi dAM ka ra bA ma/ A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la bi ta rnams la/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byed sha pa 'jig pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ be t+tA ta/ bi t+tAM/ bi/ rkyen uta las kyang brtsegs pa ma yin pa sogs kyis hi phyis/
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]dan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bid+d+hi/ bit+tA ta/ bi t+taM/ bit+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be dA ni/ bedA ba/ be dA ma/ phid la lang spyar ba'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ a bde/ a beta/ a bi tAM/ 'grel bar lung drangs ba/ be t+te rla ngo dz+ho swa/ be ti las lang gi
[\[275b.2\]]dz+hi'i dzus yang na'o/ /bi ta las/ hu dz+hal la hi h+hi 'os hi d+hir bsgyur/ pha rol gyi lang bsgyur ba'i dz+hi ni dzus su yang na 'gyur te/ a bi duH/ a bi dan/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ da sh+tsa/ da'i 'ang ngo / byings mtha'i da srog med pha rol nas si pa phyis pa de ni yang na ru ru 'gyur te u
[\[275b.3\]]brjod don no/ /a beH/ a be ta/ a bed/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a bi t+taM a bi t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a be daM/ a bi dwa/ a bi t+ma/ lung la iT byin yon tan byas bas/ a be dI ta/ a be di Sh+TaM/ a be di ShuHsogs so/ /liT la/ u Sha
[\[275b.4\]]bid dzA gr-i sogs kyis yang na A ma sbyar bas/ bi dAM ba b+hU ba/ bi dAM tsa kA ra/ bi dA mA sa sogs sam/ /yang na liT nyid sbyar/ byings gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi bed/ bi bid tuH/ bi bi duH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi be
[\[275b.5\]]di tha/ bi bi nga thuH/ bi bid/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi bed/ bi bi di ba/ bi bi di ma/ luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ be di tA/ be di tA rau/ the di tA raH/ be di tA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ /bi d+yA ta/ bi d+yA stAM/ bi d+yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin
[\[275b.6\]]yon tan byas pas/ be di Sh+ya ti sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a be di Sh+ya ta sogs so/ ! /as yod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyor te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a sti/ sh+nA so ra l+lo paH/ sh+na as dag gi a ta dbyi'o/ rkyen sh+na
[\[275b.7\]]dang as kyi a yig byings thams cad pa ka da 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la dbyi ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ staH/ san+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a si/ tA la a sti dag gis dbyi 'os sa phyis/ s+thaH/ s+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a smi/ swaH as
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]la laT sha ba 'jig/ /la bas dang mas su bsgyur/ sh+na as dag gi a dbyi 'os/ a phyis/ sa drangs/ smaH/ ling la sh+tsa as dag gi a tang byi 'os a phyis sra yA la drangs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ s+yA ta/ s+yA tAM/ s+yAH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ s+yAH/ s+yA taM/ s+yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ s+yAM/ s+yA ba/
[\[276a.2\]]s+yA ma/ de bzhin du loT la 'ang ka nga 'gro ba rnams la a dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a [\[]snu/[\]]stA ta/ stAM/ san+tU/ g+h+wa so re d+d+hA+e ba b+h+yA sa le pa sh+tsa/ g+hu as dag gi hi la e ste a b+h+yAs dbyi ba'ang ngo / /byings g+hu'i ming can rnams dang as kyi loT bsgyur ba'i hi pha
[\[276a.3\]]rol la e ru bsgyur zhing g+hu sogs kyis a b+hA sa 'ang dbyi ste/ as la/ loT/ sha pa 'jig/ la si pa/ si hi 'os/ si hi ra bsgyur/ mdo 'dis as e ru bsgyur/ hu dz+ha la la hi d+hi'o zhes pas hi ng+hi ra 'gyur te/ a sa zhes snga ma dz+hal gyi yi ge yin pas 'di la gzhi mnyam pa la sam
[\[276a.4\]]grub po zhes pa'i mdos da lta gzhi mnyam yang snga ma'i sa yig gi rgyu mtshan te/ e d+hi/ yang na tu hi dag gi zhes pas/ hi tA tang du bsgyur bas/ stA ta/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ staM/ sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sA ni/ a sA ma/ lang la/
[\[276a.5\]]ha la gcig pa rnams la a sti si tsa sogs kyis IT/ kang 'gro ba rnams la a dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A sI ta/ A stI/ A san/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A sIH/ A staM/ A sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A saM/ A swa/
[\[276a.6\]]A sma/ a ste n+h+biH/ a sti'i b+hU'o/ /rnam dbye byings byed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la a sti ste/ as ni b+hU zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ a ma kyi a phyis kyang 'i ba la gzhi mnyam pa las ma thub po zhes pas sngon ma'i A'i rgyu mtshan la AT byin pa'o/ a sa la lung / mdo 'dis b+hU ru bsgyur/ gA ti sogs kyis si tsa
[\[276a.7\]]'jig/ 'grel par b+hU a ha ra bsgyur ba dang / a sa b+hUr bsgyur ba dag las ha la gcig pa la IT mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas IT mi ster te/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+hU ta/ a b+hU tAM/ a b+hU ba na sogs te/ bya ba dang gzugs thams cad b+hU yod pa'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /byings phyed pa yin kyang
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]liT pha rol la b+hU mi 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A si/ A sa tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ As tha/ A sa thuH/ A sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A sa/ A si ba/ A si ma/ luT smon ling liT l+ring rnams as g+hU tu bsgyur pas cho ga dang gzugs
[\[276b.2\]]sogs thams cad b+hU yod pa'i skabs dang 'dra ste khyad par cung zad kyang med do/ /u pas r+g+ha prA du rgyA ma sti r+ya ts+ba ranaH/ nyar bsgyur dang prA dur dag las i sti'i ya a tsa pha rol la'o/ /nyer bsgyur sa Sha ra 'gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang mi zad ba'i nang tshan prA dur sngon ma las a sta'i sa yig
[\[276b.3\]]ni ya yig dang a tsa dang po can gyi rkyen pha rol na yod pa la Sha ru bsgyur te/ ni Sha n+ti/ ni Sh+yA ta/ prA duHShan+ti/ prA duHSh+yA ta/ a tsa dang ya dang po can ma yin no mi 'gyur te/ ni staH/ prA dustaHsogs so/ ! /mri dzU Sha dag pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ mr-i dze r+b+r-i d+d+hiH/
[\[276b.4\]]mr-i dzi'i 'phel ba'o/ /ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa'i  a tsa dang po/ ya dang po can/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams dang byings phyed pa rnams pha rol la mr-i dzi'i i ka gi 'phel par 'gyur te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ mdo 'dis 'phel ba/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra l+dza sogs kyis
[\[276b.5\]]dza Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Ta ra bsgyur bas/ mA n+Sh+Ti/ gnyis tshig la/ ka nga 'gro ba 'phel ba mi byed bra sh+tsa sogs dang / Sha D+ra sogs kyi mr-i Sh+TaH 'grel par lung drangs pa/ k+di t+ya tsi mr-i dzo pra ng+d+ha rba/ k+nga 'gro ba a tsa mr-i dza'i 'phel ba yang na'o/ /kar 'gro ba'i ming can
[\[276b.6\]]yin kyang a tsa dang po can la mr-i dza'i 'phel ba yang na bya ste/ /ming tshig la/ mA dza n+ta/ mr-i dza n+ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mA r+k+Shi/ mr-i Sh+ThaH/ mr-i Sh+Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mA t+d+mi/ mr-i dz+waH/ mr-i dz+maH/ ling la cho ga lhag po med pas/ mr-i dz+yA ta/
[\[276b.7\]]mr-i dz+yA tAM/ mr-i dz+yuHsogs so/ /loT la/ laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ la i ba/ bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha sa laH/ nga D+ha dag gi zhes pas/ ba ka/ rkun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ mA n+Sh+TAH/ mr-ir+k+Shi / mA rdzan+tu/ mr-i dza n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mr-i [\[]T+Sha[\] ]/dza la/ loT la si pa si hi ru bsgyur/ hu dz+ha la zhes pas
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]hi t+hi/ bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/ mtha'i dz+hal sogs kyis Sha Da/ Sha Tu la sogs kyis ng+ha D+ha/ mr-i Sh+TaM/ mr-i Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mA rdza ni/ mA rdzA ba/ mA rdzA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mA r+DA/ a mA r+DA/ a mr-i Sh+TAM/ A mA rdza na/ a mr-i dza na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mA r+DA/ a mA r+Da/ a
[\[277a.2\]]mr-i Sh+Ta/ a mr-i Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mA rdzaM/ a mr-i dz+wa/ a mr-i dz+ma/ lung la U 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na par bya ste/ i Ta byin pa'i phyogs la/ mr-i dzi'i 'phel ba 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a mA rdzI ta/ a mA rdzi Sh+TA/ a mA rdzi ShuHsogs dang / iT med
[\[277a.3\]]pa'i phyogs la/ r-i ta u bad+hA'i yang na 'os/ a ma A gam ster ba dang / mi ster ba yang na bar byas/ dz+hal dang po rnams la dz+hal las 'os si tsa 'jig /bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/ Sh+Tu la Sh+Tu sogs dang / sa la Sha D+ha dag gi sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a ma byin pa'i phyogs
[\[277a.4\]]kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mrA k+ShI ta/ a m+Ta Sh+TAM/ a mrA k+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mrA k+ShiH/ a mr-i Sh+Ta/ a mrI Sh+Tu/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mA k+ShaM a mrA k+ShA/ a mrA k+Sh+ma/ a ma A ga ma ma byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a
[\[277a.5\]]mA k+ShIta/ a mAr+Sh+TaM/ mr-i dza'i 'phel ba 'os ring po/ bad zA dza sogs kyis ring po/ a mA r+g+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mA r+k+ShAH/ a mA N+Ta/ a mA r+Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mA r+k+ShaM/ a mA r+k+Sh+wa/ a mA r+k+Sh+ma/ liT la/ kang 'pho ba'i ming can a dang po rnams la
[\[277a.6\]]'phel ba yang na ba dang / Na la gnyis dang thal la 'phel ba byed pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ma mA rdza/ ma mA rdza tuH/ ma mr-i dza tuH/ ma mr-i dza tuH/ ma mA rdzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ma mA rdzi tha/ ma mA r+Sh+T+wa/ ma mA thuH/ ma mr-i dza thuH/ ma mA rdza/ ma
[\[277a.7\]]mr-i dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ma mA rdzi / ma mA rdzi ba/ ma mr-i dzi ba/ ma mA rdzi ma/ ma mr-i dzi ma/ ma mr-i dzi ma/ luT la Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ mA rdzi tA/ mA rdzi tA si sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ mA r+Sh+Ta/
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]mA r+Sh+TA si sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ mr-i dz+yA ta/ mr-i dz+yA staM/ mr-i dz+yA suHsogs so/ /l+r-iT la yang iT yang na bar byas bas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ ma rdzi Sh+ya ti sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gis Sha kra/ /kun nas
[\[277b.2\]]bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ 'phel ba byas pas/ mA r+Sh+ya te sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ma rdzi Sh+ya ta sogs lam/ yang na/ a ma r+k+Sh+yata sogs so/ ! /ba tsa 'chad pa la 'o zhes pa la 'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ 'grel par btsa dang swa pi dag las pha rol byings
[\[277b.3\]]thams cad pa pi ta min pa rnams kyang kang 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin no zhes bshad de/ dgos pa ni saM pra sA ra Na mi byed pa'i don no/ /yang 'grel bar btsa la laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig a n+ti mi 'jug go zhes kyang bshad de/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis
[\[277b.4\]]tshig la/ tsu'i ku 'os ca ka ra bsgyur bas/ bak+ti/ bak+taH/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bak+Shi/ bak+thaH/ bak+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bats+mi/ btswaH/ ba ts+maH/ ling la/ bats+yAtAM/ bats+yUHsogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[277b.5\]]la/ bak+tu/ bak+tAta/ bak+taM/ btsan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bak+d+hi/ bak+tAta/ bak+taM/ bak+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ btsA ni/ ba tsA ba/ ba tsA ma/ lang gi skyes ba dang po gsum la/ a ba ka/ a ba ga/ a ba k+t-I/ a ba tsa na/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[277b.6\]]gsum la/ a ba ka/ a ba ka/ a ba k+taM/ a ba k+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum  hu dz+hal la hi d+hi 'os hi d+hi mtha'i dz+hi la sogs kyis ka ga/ la/ a ba tsi/ a ba tswa/ a ba ts+ma/ lung la/ a s+ya ti/ ba k+ti/ khyA tI rnams las ang ngos ts+li ang du bsgyur/ a bats+ra/ a tra ces pa la/ ba tsa u ma/
[\[277b.7\]]ba tsa'i u ma'o/ /btsa'i ts+li bsgyur pa'i ang pha rol la u ma A gam ster te/ ma gnas kyi don/ a las yon tan nos/ mtshams sbyar bas/ a bo tsad/ de bzhin du/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a bo tsa na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bo tsaH/ a bo tsa taM/
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]a bo tsa ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bo tsaM/ a bo tsA ba/ a bo tsA ma/ liT la Nal gnyis dang thal la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis A b+h+yAs saM phra sA ra Na dang ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la/ ba tsi swa pi ya dza sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/ a ga
[\[278a.2\]]'dra ba la ring po sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u bA tsa/ U tsa tuH/ U tsuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba tsi tha/ u ba k+tha/ U tsa thuH/ U tsa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u bA tsa/ u ba tsa/ U tsi ba/ U tsi ma/ luT la/ bak+tA rau/

[\[278a.4\]]sogs so/ ! /ru di ra mchi ma 'dzag pa la'o zhes pa la'ang pa ra smai pa da rnams 'jug ste/ ru dA di b+h+ya s+sA rba d+hA tu ki/ rud las sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad la la'o/ /rud la sogs pa ste/ rudi ra mchi ma 'dzag pa/ Sh+wa pa nya la ba/ shwa sa dang a na srog/ /dzak+Sha za ba dang dgod pa
[\[278a.5\]]rnams las pha rol gyi byings thams cad pa ba la so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can la iT A gam 'gyur te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ ro di ti/ ru di taH/ mang tshig la/ rung n+ti/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ro de Shi/ ru di thaH/ ru di tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ro di mi/ ru di thaH/
[\[278a.6\]]ru di thaH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ro di mi/ ru di baH/ ru di maH/ ling la/ ru d+yA ta/ ru d+yA ta/ ru d+yA tAM/ ru d+yAHsogs so/ /loT la/ rud la sogs pa rnams sogs kyis iT byin pas/ ro di tu/ ru di tA ta/ ru di tAM/ rud N+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ru di hi/
[\[278a.7\]]ru di tA ta/ ru di taM/ ru di taM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ro tA ni/ ro dA ba/ ro dA ma/ ru da sh+tsa pa ny+tsa b+h+yaH/ rud las kyang lnga rnams las so/ /rud la sogs pa rnams rkyen ha la gcig pa a pr-ik+ta'i ming can la IT A gam 'gyur te/ a r+d+rA rgya gA la ba
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]yoH/ ga rga'i bu dang gA la bdag gi aTa'o/ /rud la sogs pa lnga las pha rol gyi byings thams cad ba ha la gcig pa a br-i k+ta'i ming can ne pa aT ster ba sngon gyi drang srong gna'i bu dang drang grong gA la ba dag gis skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la A+eT dang aT yang na bar byas
[\[278b.2\]]bas/ a ro dI ta/ a ro da ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a ru di tAM/ a ru dan/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs bas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a rodaH/ a ro dIH/ a ru di taM/ a ru di ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ro daM/ a ru di ba/ a ru
[\[278b.3\]]rim/ lung la ir 'gro ba la yang na 'os/ tsI ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsa ra bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ ang gi phyogs la/ a ru da ta/ a ru da tAM/ a ru da na sogs dang / si tsa'i phyogs la pal dang po'i iT dang / bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/ a ro di ta/ a
[\[278b.4\]]ro da Sh+Tu/ a ro di ShuHsogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ru ro da/ ru ru da tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ru ro ditha/ ru ru di thuH/ ru ru da/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ru ro da/ ru ru di ma/ luT la ba la dang po'i iT byin bas/ ro di tA/ ro di tA
[\[278b.5\]]rau/ ro di tA raH/ ro di tra saM sogs so/ /smaun pa'i ling la/ ru da ta sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ ro di Sh+ya ti sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ro di Sh+ya da sogs so/ ! /nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a ta ra rnams sbyar bas/ laTi'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[278b.6\]]swa pi ti/ swa pi taH/ swa ba n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ swa pi Shi/ swa pi thaH/ swa bi tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ swa pi mi/ swa bi maH/ swa bi maH/ ling la/ sapyAta/ swa byA tAM/ swa byAHsogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ swa pi tu/ swa pi tAM/ swa ba n+tu/ skyes bu
[\[278b.7\]]dbus ma gsum la/ swa pi hi/ swa pi tI/ swa pi ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ swa pA ni/ swa bA ba/ swa bA ma/ lang skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a swa pI ta/ a swa ba ta/ a swa bi tAM/ a swa ba na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a swa pIH/ a swa baH/ a swa pa taM/ a swa
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]bi ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a swa paM/ a swa pi pa/ a swa pi ma/ lung la dz+hal dang po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os/ si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a swA p+sI ta/ a swA p+tAM/ a swA p+s+ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[279a.2\]]a swA p+sIH/ a [\[]swA[\]] p+taM/ a swA b+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a swA p+saM/ a p+sA p+sA/ a swA s+b+ma/ swa pi la liT sbyar byings gnyis brjod nas/ Nal gnyis dang thal la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa saM Na dang / bad b+h+ra dza sogs kyis 'phel/ ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la/
[\[279a.3\]]ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su Sh+wa pa/ su Shu pa tuH/ su Shu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su Sh+wa pi tha/ su Sh+wa b+tha/ su Shu pa thuH/ su Shu pa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su Sha pa/ su Sh+wA pa/ su Shu pi ba/ su Shu pi ma su bi ni rdur
[\[279a.4\]]b+h+yaHswa pi sU tis mAH su bi ni du ra rnams las swa pi sU ti sa rnams kyi'o/ /nyer bsgyur su bi ni dur rnams las/ swa bi nyal bslu ti ste/ ShUng srog chags rab tu skye ba/ sa ma mnyam ba rnams kyis yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ su Shu Sh+wA pa/ ni Shu th+wA ba/ du r+Shu Sh+DA pa sogs
[\[279a.5\]]so/ /luT la/ swa p+tA/ swa p+tA rau/ sba p+tA raH/ sA p+tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ su pyA ta/ su byA stAM/ su byA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la swa p+s+ya ti/ sogs dang / legs par nyel/ rnam par nyal/ nges par nyal/ ngan par nyal/ l+r-ing
[\[279a.6\]]la/ a swa p+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /shwa sa sogs la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa pal dang po rnams la/ rung la sogs pa rnams sogs kyis iT byin/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shwa si ti/ shwa si taH/ shwa sa n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[279a.7\]]la/ shwa si Shi/ shwa si thaH/ shwa si tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shwa si mi/ shwa sa baH/ shwa si maH/ ling la/ shwa s+yA ta/ shwa s+yA tAM/ shwa s+yA ta/ shwa s+yA tAM/ shwa suH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shwa si tu/ shwa si tA ta/ shwa si tAM/ shwa sa n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shwa si ti/ shwa si tA ta/
