[\[279b.1\]]shwa si taM/ shwa si ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shwa sA ni/ shwa sA bi/ shwa sA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a shwa sI ta/ a shwa sa ta/ a shwa saM tAM/ a shwa sa na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a shwa sIH/ a shwa sa ta/ a shwa si taM/ a shwa si ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a shwa saM/ a
[\[279b.2\]]shwa si ba/ a shwa si ma/ lung la/ ha ma? ya? mtha' sogs kyis 'phel ba mi byed/ bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ a shwa sI ta/ a shwa si Sh+TAM/ a shwa si ShuH/ sogs so/ /l+riT sbyar pa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sha shwA sa/ sha shwa sa tuH/ sha shwasuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sha shwa
[\[279b.3\]]si tha/ sha shwas thuH/ sha shwas/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shwA sa/ sha shwAs/ sha shwa si ba/ sha shwa si ma/ luT la iT sbyar bas/ shwa si tA/ shwa si tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ring la/ shA s+yA ta/ shA mya staM/ shA s+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ shA si Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[279b.4\]]an srog la 'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug la/ cho ga snga ma dang 'dra ste/ liT sbyar pa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ni ti/ a ni taH/ a na n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ni Shi/ a ni \u0f7f/ a ni tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ni mi/ a ni baH/ a ni maH/ ling la/
[\[279b.5\]]a n+yA ta/ a n+yA tAM/ a n+yAH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ni tu/ a ni tA ta/ a ni tAM/ a na n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ni hi/ a ni tA ta/ a ni taM/ a ni ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a nA ni/ a nA pa/ a nA ma/ lang gi/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[279b.6\]]A nI ta/ A na ta/ A ni tAM/ A na na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A nIH/ A naH/ A ni taM/ A ni ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A ni/ A ni pa/ A ni ma/ lung la iT byin pas/ A nI ta/ A nI Sh+TAM/ A ni ShuH/ sogs so/ /liTa'i skyes ba dang po gsum la/ A na/ A
[\[279b.7\]]na tuH/ A nuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A ni tha/ A na thuH/ A na/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A na/ A ni ba/ A ni ma/ luT la/ a ni tA/ a ni tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ a n+yA ta/ a n+yA stAM/ a n+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+raT la/ a ni Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]l+r-ing la/ a ni Sh+ya da/ sogs so/ /a ni te rbA/ a ni ti'i yang na'o/ /nyer bsgyur na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can las pha rol gyi a ni ti'i na yig tu 'gyur te/ prA Ni ti/ prA na ti/ sogs so/ ! /dza k+Sha za ba dang dgod pa dag la 'o zhes pa la'ang
[\[280a.2\]]a tang rnams 'jug ste/ ru da sogs kyis dz+hal dang po rnams la iT byin pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ dza k+Shi ti/ dza k+Shi taH/ a da b+h+ya sta ta/ a b+h+ya sta las a ta'o/ /byings la a b+h+ya sta'i ming can dza k+Sha za ba/ dzA gr-i gnyis sad pa/ da ri dA ngan
[\[280a.3\]]'gro/ tsa kA sr-i 'bar ba/ shA su rjes su ston pa/ dI d+hIng 'bar ba/ be bid rdan pa sogs las pha rol gyi dz+ha ni a ta du 'gyur te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ dza k+Sha ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza k+Shi Shi/ dza k+Shi thanaH/ dza k+Shi tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza k+Shi mi/ dza k+Shi
[\[280a.4\]]baH/ dza k+Shi maH/ ling la/ dza k+Sh+yAta/ dza k+Sh+yA tAM/ dza k+Sh+yaH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza k+Shi tu/ dza k+Shi tA ta/ dza k+Shi tAM/ dza k+Shi tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza k+Shi hi/ dza k+Shi tA ta/ dza k+Shi taM/ dza k+Shi ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza k+ShA Ni/ dza k+ShA ba/ dza k+ShA ma/ lang gi
[\[280a.5\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dza k+ShA ta/ a dza k+Sha ta/ a dza k+Shi tAM/ a dza k+ShiH/ si tsa a b+h+ya sta sogs kyis dz+hi dzus/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dza k+ShiH/ a dza k+ShaH/ a dza k+Shi taM/ a dza k+Shi ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dza k+ShaM/ a dza k+Shi ba/ a dza k+Shi ma/ lung la iT sbyar 'phel ba
[\[280a.6\]]byas pas/ a dzA k+Shi ta/ a dzA k+Shi ShuH/ sogs so/ /loT la/ byings gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza dzA k+Sha/ dza dza k+Sha tiH/ dza dza k+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza dza k+Shi tha/ dza dza k+Sha thuH/ dza dzak+Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza
[\[280a.7\]]dzA k+Sha/ dza dza k+Sha/ dza dza k+She ba/ dza dza k+Shi ma/ luT la iT byin bas/ dza k+Shi tA/ dza k+Shi tA ro/ dza k+Shi tA raH/ dza k+Shi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dza k+Sh+yUta/ dza k+ShA stAM/ dza k+Sh+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ a dza k+Shi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a dza k+Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dza gi gnyid
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]sad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a ta ra rnams 'jug ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzA ga rti/ dzA gri taH/ dzA graM ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzA gar+Shi/ dzA gr-i thaH/ dza gr-i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzA garmi/ dzA gr-i baH/ dzA gr-i maH/ ling / dzA gr-i yA ta/ dzA gr-i ya tAM/ dzA gr-i yuH/ sogs so/
[\[280b.2\]]loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzA gartu/ dzA gr-i tA ta/ dzA gr-i tAM/ dzA gra tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzA gr-i hi/ dzA gr-i tA ta/ dzA gr-i taM/ dzA gr-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzA ga rA Ni/ dzA ga rA pa/ dzA ga rA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ a dzA gaH/ a dzA gr-i tAM/
[\[280b.3\]]mang tshig la/ dzu si tsa/ dzus la'ang ngo / /byings mtha' i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge ni dz+hi dzus su bsgyur ba'i dzus pha rol la yon tan bya ste/ dzA gr-i la/ lang / la dz+hi/ si tsa a b+h+ya sta sogs kyis dz+hi dzus/ mdo 'dis yon tan byas pas/ a dzA ga ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dzA gaH/ a dzA
[\[280b.4\]]gr-i taM/ a dzA gr-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dzA ga raM/ a dzA gr-i ba/ a dzA gr-i ma/ dzA gro \u0f85 bi tsi N+Na ldi t+su/ dzA gr-i gyi pi tsi Na Na lang 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa rnams la'o/ /dzA gr-i gyi rkyen bi dang tsi Na dang Na la dang / gzhan yang nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la yon tan
[\[280b.5\]]bya ste/ lung la iT dang mdo 'dis yon tan byas bas/ a dzA ga rI ta/ a dzA ga ri Sh+TAM/ a dzA ga ri ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ u Sha/ bi da/ dzA gr-i rnams las yang na 'os/ A ma sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba yang na bar byas bas/ A ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ dzA ga rAM tsa kA ra/ dzA ga nA mA ma/ sogs
[\[280b.6\]]dang / A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza dza gU ra/ dza dzA ga ra tuH/ dza dzA ga ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza dzA ga ri tha/ dza dzA ga ra thuH/ dza dzA ga ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza dzA gA ra/ dza dzA ga ri ba/ dza dzA ga ri ma/ luT la/ dzA ga ri tA/ dzA ga ri tA rau/ dzA ga ri tA
[\[280b.7\]]raH/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la'ang skabs 'dir/ dzA gyi bi tsi na sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/ /dzA ga r+yA ta/ dzA ga r+yA stAM/ dzA ga r+ya suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dzA ga ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ l-ing la/ a dzA ga ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /da ri drA ngan 'gro la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]rnams 'jug ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ da ri drA ti/ i d+da ri dra s+ya/ da ri drA'i i ta'o/ /byings thams cad pa ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ha la dang po pha rol la da ri drA'i A ta ni i ta du 'gyur te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ da ra dri taH/
[\[281a.2\]]sh+nA b+h+ya sta yo rA taH/ sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag A ta kyi'o/ /byings thams cad pa ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can a ca dang po pha rol la rkyen sh+n+ra dang byings a b+h+ya sta'i ming can rnams kyi A ta dbyi ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i ming tshig la/ la?/ dz+hi/ a b+h+ya sta las a ta 'os dz+ha a ta/ mdo 'dis A phyis
[\[281a.3\]]bas/ da ri dra ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da ri drA si/ da ri drA si/ da ri drI thaH/ da ri drI tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da ri drA mi/ da ri dri baH/ ling la/ da ri dra'i i ta 'os/ i ru bsgyur bas/ da ri dri yA ta/ da ri dri yA tAM/ da ri dri yuH/
[\[281a.4\]]sogs so/ /loT la'ang ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ha la dang po rnams la A ta iT bsgyur ba dang a tsa dang po rnams la dbyi ba sogs byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da ri drA tu/ da ri dri tri ta/ da ri dri tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da ri dri hi/ da ri dri hi/ da ri dri tA ta/ da ri dri taM/ da ri dri ta/ skyes
[\[281a.5\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ da ri drA Ni// da ri drA ba/ da ri drA ma/ de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a da ri dri ta/ a da ri dri tAM/ a da ri druH/ si tsa a b+h+ya sta sogs kyis dz+hi dzus/ sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi A ta kyi 'os A phyis/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a da ri drAH/ a da ri dri taM/ a da ri dri ta/ skyes bu phyi ma
[\[281a.6\]]gsum la/ a da ri draM/ a da ri dri ba/ a da ri dri ma/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ da ri drA te rA r+ng+ha d+hA tu ke A l+lo bo/ da ri drA ti'i byings phyed pa la A ta dbyi'o/ /da ri drA ti'i A ta ni/ san dang Nu la dang l+yuT rnams ma yin pa'i rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can pha rol la dbyi'o/ /yang 'grel par byings phyed
[\[281a.7\]]pa yin kyang lung la yang na bar bya'o/ /zhes bshad pas/ a dbyi ba'i phyogs la wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ a da ri drI ta/ a da ri drI Sh+TAM/ a da ri dri ShuH/ sogs so/ yang na mi dbyi ba'i phyogs la/ yam ram nam A ta rnams kyis sa ka 'ang ngos ka dang iT byin pas/ a da ri drA si ta/ a
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]da ri drI sa Sh+TAM/ a da ri drA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i ha la lhag po 'os/ a b+h+ya sa'i dang zhag gzhan thams cad phyis pas/ da ri drA ti'i byings phyid pa la A ta dbyi 'os A ta dbyi 'os A ta dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da da ri drau/ da da ri dra tuH/
[\[281b.2\]]da da ri druH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da da ri dri tha/ da da ri dra thuH/ da da ri dra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da da ri drau/ da da ri dri ba/ da da ri dri ma/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ a ne/ kA tsa A m+ba k+ta byaH/ a tsa gcig ma yin pa la'ang A ma rjod par byed do/ /byings a tsa gcig pa
[\[281b.3\]]ma yin pa'i liT pha rol la A ma sbyor bar bya ste zhes pas liT pha rol la A ma sbyor ba thob kyang de'i dmigs bsal/ yang 'grel bar lung drangs ba/ da ri drA te rA mA/ da ri drA te rA mA/ da ri drA ti'i A ma yang na'o/ /da ri drA ti'i liT pha rol la A ma sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba yang na bar bya ste/ A ma mi sbyor
[\[281b.4\]]ba'i dper brjod bshad zin la/ A ma sbyar la/ iT 'jig pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ /da ri drAM ba b+hU ba/ da ri drAM tsa kA ra/ da ri drA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin/ da ri drA ti'i byings phyed pa la A ta dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ da ri di tA/ da ri dri tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling
[\[281b.5\]]la/ A ta phyis pas/ da ri d+h+yA ta/ da ri d+h+yA stA/ da ri d+r+yA siH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin A ta phyis pas/ da ri dri Sh+ya hi/ sogs so/ de bzhin du ling la/ a da ri dri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /tsa kA sri 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la'ang pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyor te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa
[\[281b.6\]]kA sti/ tsa kA staH/ tsa kA sa ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa kA s+si/ tsa kA s+thaH/ tsa kA s+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kA smi/ tsa kA swaH/ tsa kA smaH/ ling la/ tsa kA s+yA ta/ tsa kA s+yA tAM/ tsa ka s+yAH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa kA stu/ tsa kA stA ta/ tsa kA stAM/ tsa kA sa
[\[281b.7\]]tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ si pa/ si hi hu dz+hal la zhes pas hi d+hi/ dz+hal rnams kyis dza sha rnams sos/ sa dar bsgyur ba dang / yang na 'grel par d+hi la sa dbyi'o zhes bshad pas/ tsa kA d+d+hi/ tsa kA d+d+hi/ tsa kA stA ta/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ tsa
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]kA staM/ tsa kA sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kA sA ni/ tsa kA sA ba/ tsa kA sA ma/ ti pya na steH/ a sti ma yin pa'i ti pa la'o/ /a sti ma yin pa'i byings mtha'i sa yig ni lang bsgyur ba'i ti ba pha rol la dra ru 'gyur te/ a tsa kA ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la
[\[282a.2\]]a tsa kA stAM/ a tsa kA suH/ si pi k+hA to ru rbA/ si pa la byongs kyi ru yang na'o/ /lang bsgyur ba'i sib pha rol la byings mtha'i yig ni yang na rur 'gyur zhing yang na ru 'gyur te/ a tsa kAH/ a tsa kAd/ a tsa kA staM/ a tsa kA sta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsa kA saM/ a tsa kA swa/ a tsa kA sma/ lung la
[\[282a.3\]]iT byin pas/ a tsa kA sI ta/ a tsa kA si Sh+TAM/ a tsa kA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis A ma yang na bar byas pas/ A ma med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu rang po gsum la/ tsa tsa kA sa/ tsa tsa kA sa tuH/ tsa tsa kA suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa tsa kA si
[\[282a.4\]]tha/ tsa tsa kA sa thuH/ tsa tsa kA sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa tsa kA sa/ tsa tsa kA si ba/ tsa tsa kA si ma/ A ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tsa kA sAM ba b+hU ba/ tsa gA sAM tsa kA ra/ tsa kA sA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la/ iT byin pas/ tsa kA si tA/ tsa kA si tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la
[\[282a.5\]]tsa kA s+yA ta/ tsa kA s+yA staM/ tsa kA sA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la yang iT byin pas/ tsa kA si Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a tsa kA si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /shA su rjes su ston pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang rnams 'jug ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ shA sti/ shA sa
[\[282a.6\]]i dang he loH/ shUs kyis iT ang ha la dag la 'o/ /shAs kyi u pa d+hA'i A ni ts+li bsgyur ba'i ang rkyen kang 'gro ba'i ming can ha la dang po can pha rol la ita du 'gyur te/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ shi Sh+TaH/ shA su la/ laT sha ba 'jig la tas mdo'i 'dis i shA si g+ha si ba si sogs kyis Sha/ Sha Ta
[\[282a.7\]]sogs kyis taT/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las a ta 'os/ dz+ha a ta du bsgyur bas/ shA sa ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shA s+si/ shI Sh+ThaH/ shi Sh+Tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shA smi/ shi ShaH/ shi Sh+maH/ lang la/ shi Sh+yA ta/ shi Sh+yA tAM/ shi Sh+yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]bu dang po gsum la/ shA stu/ shi Sh+TA ta/ shi Sh+TAM/ shA sa tu/ loTa'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ shA hau/ hi la shA'o/ /shAs ni loT bsgyur ba'i hi pha rol la shA zhes par 'gyur te/ shA su la/ loT sha ba 'jig /la si pa/ si hi 'os/ si hi/ mdo 'dis shAs shA ru bsgyur/ 'di la bzhi
[\[282b.2\]]mnyam pa las ma gru pa zhes pas sngon ma sa'i rgyu mtshan las hi yang hu dz+hal la hi d+hi 'os hi d+hir bsgyur bas/ shA d+hi/ yang na hi tA tang du bsgyur bas/ shi Sh+TA ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ shi Sh+Ti/ shi Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shA sA ni/ shA sA ba/ shA sA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po'i
[\[282b.3\]]gcig tshig la/ la ti pa/ iT kyi'ang ngos i phyis/ a sti ma yin pa'i ti la 'os/ sa? da?/ ha la dI pa sogs kyis ta? phyis/ gnas med pa sogs kyis a shAd/ a shA ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a shi Sh+TAM/ a shI suH/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ si pa la byings kyi ru
[\[282b.4\]]yang na 'os ru dang / da yang na bar byas pas/ a shAH/ a shA ta/ a shAd/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a shI Sh+TaM/ a shi Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a shA saM/ a shi ShA/ a shi Sh+ma/ lung la/ sa rti shA sti a rti rnams las kyang ngos/ ts+li ang du bsgyur/ shAs kyis ita ang
[\[282b.5\]]ha la dag la 'os/ u pa d+hA ita du bsgyur/ shA si/ g+ha si bsi sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ a shi Sha ta/ a shi Sha tA/ a shi Sha na/ sogs so/ /loT la gnyes brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sha shAs/ sha shA sa tuH/ sha shA suH/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[282b.6\]]gsum la/ sha shA si tha/ sha shA sa thuH/ sha shAs/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shAs/ sha shA sib/ sha shA si ma/ luT la/ shA si tA/ shA si tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ shAs kyi ita ang ta la dag la 'os u ba d+hA i/ shA si g+ha si bsi sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs
[\[282b.7\]]byas pas/ shi Sh+yA ta/ shi Sh+yA stAM/ sha Sh+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la ba la dang po'i iT byin pas/ shA si Sh+ya ti/ shA si Sh+ya taH/ shA si Sh+ya n+ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a shA si Sh+ya ta/ a shA Sh+ya tAM/ a shA si Sh+ya na/ sogs so/ /tsa k+Shing gsal bar brjod pa la'o zhes pa la/ laT
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]sogs A t+ma ne ba da rnams 'jug ste/ dz+hal dang po rnams la brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ka sogs kyis dbyi ba dang / Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrugs pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa Sh+Ti/ tsa k+Sha te/ tsa k+Sha te/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/[ \[]lda [\]]thAs/
[\[283a.2\]]thAs kyi se 'os/ thAs se/ brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis ka phyis/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha byas pas/ tsa k+She/ gnyis tshig la/ tsa k+ShA the/ mang tshig la/ la? d+hAM/ brtsegs pa sogs kyis ka phyis/ Sha Tu sogs kyis d+ha D+ha/ Ta 'gro ba
[\[283a.3\]]sogs kyis Ti e/ dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha 'os Sha Da byas pas/ tsa D+D+h+wi/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa k+She/ tsa k+Sh+wa he/ tsa k+Sh+ma he/ lang la/ brtsegs pa sogs kyis ka phyis/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ tsa k+ShI ta/ tsa k+ShI yA tAM/ tsa k+ShI ran/ skyes bu
[\[283a.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/ tsa k+ShI thAH/ tsa k+ShA A thAM/ tsa k+ShI d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa k+ShI ya/ tsa k+ShA ba hi/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa Sh+TAM/ tsa k+ShA tAM/ tsa k+Sha tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa k+Sh+wa/ tsa k+Sha thAM/ tsa D+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa k+Shai/ tsa k+ShA thAM/ tsa D+d+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa k+Shai/ tsa k+ShA ba hai/ tsa k+ShA
[\[283a.5\]]ma hai/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tsa Sh+Ta/ a tsa k+ShA tAM/ a tsa k+Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsa Sh+ShAH/ a tsa k+ShA thAM/ a tsa D+d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsa k+Shi/ a tsa k+Sh+wa hi/ tsa k+Shi ngaHkhyA nya/ tsa k+Shing gi khyA nya'o/ /rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can pha rol la tsa k+Shing
[\[283a.6\]]ni khyA nya zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ nya yig ni a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug pa'i don te/ lung la/ tsa k+Shing / khyA nya du bsgyur/ a s+ya ti/ bak+ti khyA ti rnams la ang ngos/ ts+li ang du bsgyur/ A ta kyis dbyi 'os A dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a
[\[283a.7\]]khyad/ a khya tAM/ a khyan/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a khyaH/ a khya taM/ a khya ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a khyaM/ a khyA ba/ a khyA ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a khya ta/ a khye tAM/ a khya n+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a khya thAH/ a khye thAM/ a khya d+h+yaM/
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a khye/ a khyA ba hi/ a khyA ma hi/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ k+sA nya pI Sh+Ta/ k+sA nya'ang 'dod do/ /rkyen byings phyed pa'i ming can pha rol la tsa k+Shing ni khyA ru 'gyur bar ma zad yang na k+sA nya zhes bar bsgyur ba'ang 'dod de/ tsa tsa k+Shing / skA ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi lung gi a
[\[283b.2\]]tang la/ ya ma/ ra ma/ nam sogs kyis ka dang iT byin pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a k+sA sI ta/ a k+sA sI ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a k+sA sIH/ a k+sA si Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a k+sA si ShaM/ a k+sA si Sh+wa/ a k+sA sa Sh+mi/ tang la ts+li si tsa ra bsgyur
[\[283b.3\]]pa'i sa 'dren kho na ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a k+ShA sta/ a k+ShA sa tAM/ ak+ShAs ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a k+ShA s+jAH/ a k+ShA sA [\[]brAM/[\] ]a k+ShA ng+hAM/ ng+ha la'ang ngos sa phyis/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a k+ShA si/ ak+ShA swa hi/ ak+ShA sma hi/ yang 'grel bar/ tsak+Shing spang ba'am bor ba'i
[\[283b.4\]]don dang 'brel ba na khyA nya dang k+sA dag tu 'gyur bam yin zhing de'i tshe tang kho na 'jug go zhes bshad pas/ khya nya sogs su ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tsa k+Shi Sh+Ta/ a tsa k+Shi ShA tAM/ a tsa k+Shi Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsa k+Shi Sh+dzAH/
[\[283b.5\]]a tsa k+Shi ShA thAM/ a tsa k+Shi d+h+wa/ a tsa k+Shi D+h+wi/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsa k+Shi Shi/ a tsa k+Shi Sh+wa hi/ a tsa k+Shi Sh+ma hi/ bA liTi/ liT la yang na'o/ /liT pha rol la tsa k+Shing nyid du gnas pa dang khyA nya ru bsgyur ba dang k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba rnams yang na bar bya ste/ tsa k+Shing nyid du gnas pa'i phyogs la tang rnams
[\[283b.6\]]sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa tsa kI/ tsa tsa k+ShA te/ tsa tsa k+Shi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa tsa k+Shi Shi/ tsa tsa k+ShA the/ tsa tsa k+Shi d+hA+e/ tsa tsa kI D+h+re/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa tsa k+She/ tsa tsa k+She ba he/ tsa tsa k+Shi ma he/ tsa tsa k+Shi ma he/ tsa k+Shing khyA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a tang dang tang gnyis ka
[\[283b.7\]]'jug pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa khyo/ tsa khya tuH/ tsa khyAH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa khyi tha/ tsa khyA tha/ tsa khya thuH/ tsa khya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa khyau/ tsa khyi ba/ tsa khyi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa khye/ tsa khyA te/ tsa khyi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]la/ tsa khyi She/ tsa khyA the/ tsa khyi d+h+we/ tsa khyi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa khyi/ tsa khyi ba he/ tsa khyi ma he/ yang tsa k+Shing k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la 'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug cing a yig mtha' can yin pas cho ga rnams khyA nya dang 'dra ste/ a tang gi skyes bu dang
[\[284a.2\]]po gsum la/ tsa k+sau/ tsa k+sa tuH/ tsa k+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa k+si tha/ tsa k+sA tha/ tsa k+sA thuH/ tsa k+sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa k+sau/ tsa k+si ba/ tsa k+si ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa k+se/ tsa k+sA te/ tsa k+sI re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa k+si She/ tsa k+sa the/ tsa k+si d+h+we/ tsa k+si
[\[284a.3\]]D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa k+se/ tsa k+si ba he/ tsa k+si ma he/ luT la khyA nyu ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/ khyA tA/ khyA tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ khyA tA/ khyA tA se/ sogs so/ /k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/ k+sA tA/ k+sA tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ k+sA tA/ k+sA tA se/ sogs
[\[284a.4\]]so/ /yang bor ba'i don la sbyor ba'i dbang du byas na/ tsa k+Shing nyid gnas pa la luT tang rnams sbyar/ bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ tsa k+Shi tA/ tsa k+Shi tA rau/ tsa k+Shi tA raH/ tsa k+Shi tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ming la/ khya nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la gzhan yang brtsegs pa dang po sogs
[\[284a.5\]]kyis er bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/ khyA yA ta/ khyA yA stAM/ khyA yA suH/ sogs sam/ khye yA ta/ khye yA stAM/ khyA yA suH/ sogs sam/ khye yA ta/ khye yA stAM/ khye yA su:/ sogs so/ /tang la er mi bsgyur bas/ khyA sI Sh+Ta/ khyA sI yA stAM/ khyA sI ran/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs la'ang a tang
[\[284a.6\]]la A nyid dang e yang na bar byas pas/ k+sA yA ta/ k+sA yA stAM/ k+sA yA suH/ sogs sam/ k+se yA ta/ k+se yA stAM/ k+se yA suH/ sogs so/ /tang la er mi bsgyur bas/ k+sA sA Sh+Ti/ k+sA sI yA stAM/ k+sA sI ran/ sogs so/ /tsa k+Shid nyid du gnas ba'i phyogs la tang rnam sa sbyar/ bal dang po'i iT
[\[284a.7\]]byin pas/ tsa k+Shi ShI Sh+Ta/ tsa k+Shi ShI yA stAM/ tsa k+Shi ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la khyA nya bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/ khyA s+ya ti/ khyA s+ya taH/ khyA s+ya n+ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ khyA s+ya te/ khyA s+ye te/ khyA s+ya n+te/ sogs so/ /k+sA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/ k+sA s+ya ti/ k+sA s+ya taH/ k+sA s+ya n+ti/
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]sogs dang / tang la/ k+sA s+ya te/ k+sA s+ye te/ k+sA s+ya n+te/ sogs so/ /tsa k+Shing rang du gnas pa'i phyogs la tang rnams kho na 'jug/ /bal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ tsa k+Shi Sh+ya te/ tsa k+Shi Sh+ye te/ tsa k+Shi Sh+ya n+te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la 'ang khyA nya ru bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang la/

[\[284b.3\]]nyid du gnas pa'i phyogs la tang rnams sbyar te/ bal dang po'i iT byin kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tsa k+Shi Sh+yu te/ a tsa k+Shi Sh+ye tAM/ a tsa k+Shi Sh+ya n+ta/ sogs so/ ! /IDa bstod pa la'o zhes ba'i tang rnams sbyar te/ laTa'i skyes bu

[\[284b.5\]]byed pa dang / I sha dbang phyug nyid las kyang byings thams cad pa se dang ng+h+wa dag la iT A gam ster te/ laTa'i skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ I Di She/ I Di the/ I Di ng+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ I De/ I DA he/ A T+ma he/ ling la/ a ta mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI

[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ /bar la tsa ra dang / Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ai T+Ta/ ai DA tAM/ ai Da ha/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ai T+TAH/ ai TA thAM/ ai Di ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ai Di/ ai D+wi hi/ ai D+ma hi

[\[285a.3\]]lci ba ldan pa sogs kyis A ma sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba yang na bar byas pas/ I DA tsa kre/ IDI ba b+hU ba sogs sam/ I Da la/ liT byings gnyis brjod/ a ka 'dra ba sogs byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ I De/ I DA te/ I Di re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ I De

[\[285a.5\]]iT byin pas/ I Di Sh+ya te/ I Di Sh+ya n+te/ I Di Sh+ya n+te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ A+ai Di Sh+ya ta/ ai Di Sh+ye tAM/ aiDi Sh+ya n+ta/ sogs so/ ! /I sha dbang phyug nyid la'o zhes pa'ang bya ba thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ I Sh+Te/ U shA te/ I sha te/
[\[285a.6\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ /I shi She/ I shA the/ A+e shi ng+hI/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ I she/ I shwa he/ I shwa he/ ling la/ A ta mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis nas drangs pas/ I shI ta/ I shI yA tAM/ I  brash+tsa/ b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sa Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs/ shI ran/

[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]dbus ma gsum la/ ai Sh+ThAH/ ai shA thaM/ ai shi ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ai shi/ ai shwa hi/ ai sh+ma hi/ lung la/ bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ ai shi Sh+Ta/ ai shi ShA tAM/ ai shi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyor ba dang mi sbyor ba yang na bar byas pas/ I shI tsa kri/ I shAM ba

[\[286a.1\]]ngos A ma sbyar bas/ A sAM tsa kre/ A sAM ba b+hU ba/ A sA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ A si tA/ A si tA se/ A si tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la'ang iT byin pas/ A si ShI Sh+Ta/ A si ShI yA stAM/ A si ShI ran/ sogs so/ /

[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]ba la'ang tang rnams sbyor te/ Na'i na 'os/ Na na/ i ta 'gro ba sogs kyis nu ma byin sha ba 'jig pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ nin+s+ti/ nin+sA te/ ni n+sA te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ni n+sA+e/ ni n+sA the/ ni n+d+s+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ni n+se/ ni n+sA he/

[\[287a.1\]]loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sU tAM/ su bA tAM/ su ba tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sU Sha/ su bA thAM/ sU ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su bi/ su bA ba hai/ su bA ba hai/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sU ta/ a su pA tAM/ a su ba ta/ skyes bu

[\[287a.4\]]Sh+wa hi/ a so Sh+ma hi/ liT la byings gnyis brjod a tsa dang po can rnams la/ a tsa la Sh+nu sogs kyis u ba ru bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su Shu be/ su Shu ba te/ su Shu bi te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su Shu bi She/ su Shu bA She/ su Shu bA the/ su Shu bi d+h+we/
[\[287a.5\]]su Shu bi D+h+we/ su ShU d+h+we/ su ShU D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su Shu be/ su Shu bi ba hi/ su ShU ba he/ su Shu bi ma he/ su ShU ma he/ luT la iT yang na bar byas bas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ sa bi tA/ sa bi tA se/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ so tA/ so tA se/ sogs
[\[287a.6\]]so/ /de bzhin du/ smon pa'i ling la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ sa bi ShA Sh+Ta/ yA sa bi ShI yA stAM/ sa bi ShI ran/ sogs dang / a ni Ta'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ so ShI Sh+Ta/ so ShI yA stAM/ so ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT yang na bar byas bas/ /

[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ a so Sh+ya ta/ a so Sh+ya tAM/ a so Sh+ya n+ta/ sogs so/ ! /shIng nyal ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams 'jug ste/ shIngaHsarba d+h+wa tu ke gu NaH/ shIng gi byings thams cad pa la yon tan no/ /byings thams cad pa'i ming can rnams pha rol la shIng gi yon tan

[\[288b.1\]]dag pha rol la ing ni gAng zhes par bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya'o/ /gang kuTA di b+h+yo \u0f85ny+Nita di ta/ gAng kuT la sogs pa rnams las nya ta 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams nga 'gro ba'o/ /ing bsgyur ba'i gAng dang kuT la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi rkyen nya Na 'gro ba ma yin

[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]gi ka 'os/ Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/ a dwi k+Shata/ a dwi k+Sha tAM/ a dwi k+Sha na sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod Na la gnyis dang thal ma gtogs gzhan ma rnams la/ swa ny+dza brtsegs pa sogs kyis kita

[\[290a.5\]]yon tan/ da dang po'i g+ha 'os ha g+ha/ dz+ha Sha la d+hA ma yin pa'i ta tha dag gi d+ha 'os/ ta d+ha/ dz+hal sogs kyis g+ha gar bsgyur bas/ do g+d+hi/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ du g+d+haH/ du ha n+ti/ skyes bu dbus pa'i gcig tshig la/ la si pa/ da dang po'i g+ha 'os ha g+ha/ a tsa gcig sogs

[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuT 'is phyis nas ha drangs pas/ du hI taM/ du nI yA tAM/ du hI ran/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ do g+b+hu/ du g+b+hA ta/ du g+b+haM/ du ha n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ la sipa/ si'i

[\[290b.7\]]gcig tshig la/ du ha/ li ha sogs kyis k+sa dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ a d+hu k+Sha ta/ a du g+d+ha/ gnyis tshig la/ k+sa'i aca la 'os sa'i a phyis pas/ a d+hu k+ShA tAM/ mang tshig la a dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ a d+hu k+Sha n+ta/ a d+hu k+Sha ta/ de bzhin du/
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ a d+hu k+Sha thAH/ a d+huk+d+hAH/ gnyis tshig la/ a d+hu k+ShA thAM/ mang tshig la/ a d+hu k+Sha d+hAM/ a d+hu g+d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+hu k+Shi/ a d+hu k+Shi/ a d+hu k+Sha ba hi/ a d+hu k+ShA ma hi/ liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/ a tang gi
[\[291a.2\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du do ha/ du du ha tuH/ du du huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du do hi tha/ du do g+d+ha/ du du ha thuH/ du du ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ du do ha/ du du hi ba/ du du hi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du du he/ du du hA te/ du du hi re/
[\[291a.3\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du du hi She/ du du hA thAM/ du du hi d+h+we/ du du hi D+h+we/ skyis bu phyi ma gsum la/ du du he/ du du hi ba he/ du du hi ma he/ luT la/ da dang po'i g+ha 'os ha g+ha/ dz+ha Sha las d+hA ma yin pa sogs kyis ta d+ha/ dz+hal sogs kyis g+ha gar bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ do g+hA/ do g+d+hA si/
[\[291a.4\]]sogs dang / tang la/ do g+d+hA/ do g+d+hA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ du h+yAta/ du h+yA stAM/ du h+yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ ling si tsa A t+ma ne pa da rnams la 'os yon tan mi byed/ da dang po'i g+ha 'os ha g+ha/ khar la tsar 'os g+ha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis
[\[291a.5\]]Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ du k+ShI ta/ du k+ShI yA stAM/ du k+ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang byings thams cad pa dang byings phyid pa sogs kyis yin tan/ ha g+ha/ khar la tsa ra/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ do tang la/ do k+Sh+ya ti/ do k+Sh+ya ti/ do k+Sh+ya taH/ do k+Sh+ya n+ti/
[\[291a.6\]]sogs dang / /tang la/ do k+Sh+ya te/ do k+Sh+ya n+te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a do k+Sh+ya ta/ a do k+Sh+ya tAM/ a do k+Sh+ya na/ sogs dang / tang la/ a do k+Sh+yata/ a do k+Sh+ya tAM/ a do k+Sh+ya n+ta/ sogs so/ ! /di ha nye bar gsog pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyisaka 'jug
[\[291a.7\]]cing yon tan gyi sku bas o dang e'i khyad par tsam ma gtogs cho ga dang sgrub gzugs thams cad bshad ma thag pa du ha'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ de g+d+hi/ di g+d+haH/ di ha n+ti/ sogs so/ /nyer bsgyur ni dang pra lta bu sngon du sbyor na/ ga da/ nad/ bad sogs kyis Nar bsgyur bas/ pra Ni
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]di g+d+hi/ sogs so/ ! /li ha ro myang ba la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can te/ laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ la ti pa/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ ha'i D+ha 'os/ ha D+ha/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/ d+ha D+ha/ D+ha las d+ha dbyi 'os/
[\[291b.2\]]D+ha gor ma phyis pas/ le D+he/ gnyis tshig la/ la tas/ ha 'i D+ha/ dz+haSha sogs kyis d+ha D+ha/ D+ha las D+ha phyis/ d+har phyis pa la sngon ma'i a Na'i ring po 'os/ ring bor bsgyur bas/ lI D+haH/ mang tshig la ha 'dren pa kho na ste/ li ha n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ la si pa
[\[291b.3\]]bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ ha'i D+ha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ D+ha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ le k+Shi/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ la thas dang thar bsgyur/ ha'i D+ha/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis tha d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/ d+ha D+ha/
[\[291b.4\]]D+ha las D+ha phyis/ D+har phyir pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ lI D+ha/ lI D+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ le h+mi/ li hwaH/ li h+maH/ cho ga de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ lI D+he/ li hA te/ li ha te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ li k+She/ li hA
[\[291b.5\]]thAM/ lI D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ li he/ li hwa he/ li h+ma he/ ling gi a tang la ha 'dren pa kho na ste/ li h+yA ta/ li h+yA stAM/ li h+yuH/ sogs dang / tang la'ang a ta mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis/ ha drangs pas/ li hI ta/ li hI yA thAM/ li hI ran sogs so/ /
[\[291b.6\]]loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ le D+hu/ lI D+hA ta/ lI D+hA+e/ lI ha n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ lI D+hi/ lI D+h+wa ta/ lI D+haM/ lI D+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ le hA ni/ le hA pa/ le hA ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang
[\[291b.7\]]po gsum la/ lI D+hAM/ li hA tAM/ li hA tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ le k+Sh+wa/ li hA thA/ lI D+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ le he/ le hA ba hi/ le hA ma hi/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a leT/ a leT/ a lI D+hAM/ a li ha na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]la/ a leDa/ a leT/ a lI D+haM/ a lI D+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a le hi/ a li hA/ a li h+ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a lI D+ha/ a li hA tAM/ a li ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a lI D+haH/ a li hA thAM/ a lI D+h+wa/ skyes
[\[292a.2\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ a li hi/ a li hwa hi/ a lih+ma hi/ lung gi a tang la/ sha la i ka u pa d+ha iT med pa la k+sa 'os/ ts+li k+sar bsgyur/ ha'i D+ha 'os/ ha D+ha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis  Sha ra bsgyur bas/ a li k+Sha ta/ a li k+Sha tAM/ a li
[\[292a.3\]]k+Sha na/ sogs dang / tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ du ha/ di ha/ li ha sogs kyis k+sa dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ a li k+Sha ta/ a lI D+ha/ gnyis tshig la/ k+si'i a tsa la 'os a phyis pas/ a li k+Sh+Da tAM/ mang tshig la a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na
[\[292a.4\]]bar byas pas/ a li k+Sha n+ta/ a li k+Sha tra/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ a li k+Sha thAH/ a li k+ta d+haH/ gnyis tshig la/ a li k+ShA thAM/ mang tshig la/ a li k+Sha d+hAM/ a lI D+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a li k+Shi/ a li k+ShA ba hi/ a li k+ShA ma hi/ liTa'i a
[\[292a.5\]]tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ li li ha/ li li ha tuH/ li li tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ li li hi tha/ li li D+ha/ li li hA thuH/ li li ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ li li ha/ li li hi ba/ li li hi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ li li he/ li li hA+e he/ li li hi re/
[\[292a.6\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ li li hi She/ li li hA the/ li li hi d+h+wi/ li li hi D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ li li he/ li li hi ba he/ li li hi ma he/ luT la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ ha'i D+ha/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta d+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu/ D+ha las D+ha phyis pas/ a tang la/
[\[292a.7\]]la D+hA/ le D+hA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ la D+hA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ li h+yA ta/ li h+yA stAM/ li h+yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ ling si tsa sogs kyis yon tan mi byed/ nya'i D+ha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka/ /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bas/ la k+ShI Sh+Ta/ la k+ShI yA stAM/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ ha'i D+ha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ le k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ le k+Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a
[\[292b.2\]]tang la/ a le k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a le k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /A r+Nu nya kun nas 'gebs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ U r+No teH/ bi b+hA ShA/ U r+No ti'i 'dam ka'o/ A+au+u r+No ti'i byings thams cad pa pa 'gro ba'i ming can ha la dang po can pha rol la 'phel
[\[292b.3\]]ba dang yon tan 'dam ka can du bya ste/ laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ U r+No ti/ U r+No ti/ gnyis tshig la/ U r+Na taH/ mang tshig la/ a tsa la sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/ I r+Nu ban+ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ U r+Nau
[\[292b.4\]]Shi/ U r+NoShi/ U r+Nu thaH/ U r+Nu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ U r+Nau mi/ U r+Nau mi/ U r+Nu ba/ U r+Nu ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ U r+Na te/ U r+Nu bA te/ U r+Nu ba te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ U r+Nu She/ U r+NA bA the/ U r+Nu d+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ U r+Nu be/ U r+Nu ba he/
[\[292b.5\]]U r+Nu ma ha/ lang gi a tang la/ U r+Nu yA ta/ U r+Nu yA tAM/ U r+Nu yuH/ sogs so/ tang la a ta mtha' ma yin pa yin pa sogs kyis sa'i luTa'i sa phyis/ a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/U r+Nu bI ta/ u r+Nu bA+e yA tAM/ U r+Nu bI ran/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i
[\[292b.6\]]skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ U r+NoM tu/ U r+No tu/ U r+Nu tA ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ U r+Nu tAM/ U r+Nu ba n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ U r+Nu hi/ U r+Nu tA ta/ U r+Nu taM/ U r+Nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ U r+Na bA Ni/ U r+Na
[\[292b.7\]]bA ba/ U r+Na bA ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ U r+Nu tAM/ U r+Nu pA tAM/ U r+Nu ba tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ U r+Nu Sha/ U r+Nu bA thAM/ U r+Nu d+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ U r+Nu bi/ U r+Na bA bai/ U r+Na bA ma hai/ gu No nya pri k+the/ a pr-i k+ta la yon tan no/ U r+No ti'i byings thams
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]cad pa a pr-i k+ta ste/ yi ge ha la gcig pa pa 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol 'phel ba yang na bar mi byed par yon tan kho na byed de/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ la ti pa ita kyi 'ang ngos i phyis mi ngo 'dis yon tan/ a tsa dang po'i aT
[\[293a.2\]]aT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/ au r+No ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ au r+Nu tAM/ A+au r+Nu ban/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ au r+NoH/ au r+Nu taM/ au r+Nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ au r+Na baM/ au r+Nu ba/ au r+Nu ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ au r+Nu ta/
[\[293a.3\]]o r+Nu bA tAM/ au r+Nu ba ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ au r+Nu thAH/ au r+Nu ba th-I/ au r+Nu d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ au r+Nu bi/ au r+Nu ba hi/ au r+Nu ma hi/ U r+No te rbi b+h+wa ShA/ A r+No ti'i gdam nga'o/ U r+No ti'i iT dang por yod pa'i si tsa ba ra smi pa da can pha rol la 'phel ba dang yon tan
[\[293a.4\]]gdam nga can du bya ste/ lung gi a tang gi 'phel ba byas pa'i phyogs la/ au r+NA bI ta/ au r+NA bi Sh+TaM/ au r+NA bi ShuH/ sogs dang / yon tan kyi phyogs la/ au r+Na bI ta/ au r+Na bi ShuM/ au r+Na bi ShuH/ bi b+hA Sho r+NoH/ U r+Nu'i yang na'o/ /U r+Nu'i pha rol gyi iT dang po can gyi rkyen gang yin kyang
[\[293a.5\]]yang na nga 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/ dgos pa ni yon tan dang 'phel ba gnyis mi byed pa'i don no/ /ngi ta kyi phyogs la a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyi u bar bsgyur bas/ au r+Nu bI ta/ au r+Nu bi Sh+TaM/ au r+Nu bi ShuH/ sogs so/ /tang la/ U r+Nu'i yang na 'os/ yon tan dang u bar bsgyur ba yang na bar
[\[293a.6\]]byas pas/ au r+Nu bi Sh+Ta/ au r+Nu bi ShA tAM/ au r+Nu bi Sha ta/ sogs sam/ au r+Nu bi Sh+Te/ au r+Nu bi ShA tAM/ au r+Nu bi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ U r+Nu te rA ma ni She ng+ha \u0f7f/ U r+Nu ti las A ma mi 'gyur ro/ /gong du r-i ts+tsha ma yin pa'i i tsa dang po lci ba ldan pa la liT pha rol la A ma sbyor
[\[293a.7\]]bar bshad kyang do'i dmigs bsal/ i tsa dang po lci ba ldan pa yin kyang U ma sbyor ba ma yin no/ /a dzA di r+d+wi tI ya s+ya/ a tsa dang po las gnyis pa'i 'o/ /a tsa dang por yod pa'i byings las gnyis pa de a tsa gar rung gcig dang ldan pa yin na/ liT sogs byings gnyis brjod
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]pa'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la a tsa dang po de gnyis mi brjod par cha shas hal srog ldan de gnyis brjod do/ /na na drAHsaM yo gA da yaH/ na dang rnams brtsegs pa'i dang po rnams ma yin no/ /na dang da dang ra yig rnams a tsa dang po'i pha rol hal a tsa ldan pa brtsegs pa'i dang po na yod pa
[\[293b.2\]]rnams ni liT sogs pha rol la gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ U r+Nu la/ liT/ a tsa dang po las gnyis pa'i 'os nu gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis ra gnyis su mi 'gyur/ 'phel ba dang yon tan dang u bar bsgyur ba sogs rkyen so so'i thob ltar bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[293b.3\]]la/ U r+Nu nA ba/ U r+Nu nu ba tu/ U r+Nu nu ba tuH/ U r+Nu nu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ U r+Nu na bi tha/ U r+Nu nu bi tha/ U r+Nu nu ba thuH/ U r+Nu ni ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ U r+Nu nA ba/ U r+Nu nA ba U r+Nu na bi ba/ U r+Nu nu bi ba/ U r+Nu na bi [\[]mas[\]]/ U r+Nu nu bi [\[]mas/[\] ]bde bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu
[\[293b.4\]]dang po gsum la/ U r+Nu nu be/ U r+Nu nu bA te/ U r+Nu nuM bi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ U r+Nu'i yang na 'os/ yon tan dang u ba yang na bar byas ba'o/ /U r+Nu nu bi She/ U r+Nu na bi She/ /U r+Nu nu/ Nal/ bA the/ U r+Nu na bi d+h+we/ U r+Nu na bi D+h+we/ U r+Nu nu bi d+h+we/ U r+Nu nu bi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ U r+Nu nu be/
[\[293b.5\]]U r+Nu na bi ba he/ U r+Nu nu bi ba he/ U r+Nu na ri ma he/ U r+Nu bi ma he/ luT la/ U r+Nu'i yang na 'os yon tan dang u ba yang na bar byas pas/ a tang la/ U r+Nu bi tA/ U r+Nu bi tA si/ sogs sam/ U r+Nu bi tA/ U r+Nu bi tA si/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ tang la yang U r+Nu bi tA/ U r+Nu bi
[\[293b.6\]]tA se/ sogs sam/ U r+Nu bi tA/ U r+Nu bi tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ U r+Nu yA ta/ U r+Nu yA stAM/ U r+Nu yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la bal dang pa'i iT/ yaU r+Nu'i yang na 'os yon tan dang / u ba yang na bar byas
[\[293b.7\]]pas/ U r+Nu bi ShI Sh+Ta/ U r+Na bi ShI yA stAM/ U rna bi ShI ran/ sogs sam/ U r+Nu di ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la'ang iT byin/ yon tan dang u yang na bar byas pas/ a tang la/ U r+Nu bi Sh+ya ti/ U r+Nu bi Sh+ya taH/ U r+Na bi Sh+ya n+ti/ sogs sam/ U r+Nu bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /ter la'ang /
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]U r+Na bi Sh+ya t+ye/ U r+Na bi Sh+ye te/ U r+Na bi Sh+ya n+te/ sogs sam/ U r+Nu bi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ w-ing gi a tang la/ au r+Na bi Sh+ya ta/ au r+Nu bi Sh+ya tAM/ au r+Na bi Sh+ya na/ sogs sam/ au r+Nu bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /tang la/ au r+Na bi Sh+ya ta/ au r+Na bi Sh+ya tAM/
[\[294a.2\]]au r+Na bi Sh+ya n+ta/ sogs sam/ au r+Nu bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Sh+Tu nya bstod pa la'o zhes pa la yang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ nu ru stu sha mya maH/ sarba b+hA tu ke/ /nu ru stu/ sha ma  yam las byings thams cad pa la'o/ /nu tha bstod pa ru sgra Sh+Ta nya'i byings kyi dang po'i Sha sar
[\[294a.3\]]bsgyur bas/ stu bstod pa/ sha mu nye bar zhi ba/ ya mu nye bar 'gog pa rnams las pha rol gyi byings thams cad pa hal dang po can ba 'gro ba'i ming can yin pa de la IT A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ Sh+Tu nya laT sbyar bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ mdo 'dis IT
[\[294a.4\]]yang na bar byas/ ITa'i phyogs la byings thams cad pa dang byings [\[]phyi[\]]da pa sogs kyis yon tan dang / IT med pa'i phyogs la/ uT kyis 'phel ba sogs byas pas/ sta bI ti/ stau ti/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ stu taH/ stu ba n+ti/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[294a.5\]]la/ sta bI Shi/ stau Shi/ stu thaH/ stu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sta bI mi/ stau mi/ stu baH/ stu maH/ tang la hal dang po can la bya ba lhag po med/ atsa dang po can rnams la atsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[294a.6\]]la/ stu te/ snu bA te/ stu ba te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ stu She/ stu bA the/ stu d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ stu nge/ stu ba he/ stum he/ ling gi a tang la bya ba lhag po med pas/ stu yA ta/ stu yA tAM/ stu yA/ sogs so/ /tang la a ta mtha' sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis
[\[294a.7\]]a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/ stu bI ta/ stu bI yA tAM/ stu bI ran/ sogs so/ /loT la laT ltar bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ sta bI tu/ stau tu/ stu tA ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ stu tAM/ stu ban+tu/ de bzhin du/ skyes
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/ stu hi/ stu tA ta/ stu taM/ stu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sta bA ni/ sta bA ba/ sta bA ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tu tAM/ stu bA tAM/ stu ba tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ stu Sh+wa/ stu bA thAM/ stu d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ stu bai/ sta bA ba hai/
[\[294b.2\]]sta sa' ma hai/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a stauta/ a sta bI ta/ a stu tAM/ a stu ba na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a stauH/ a sta bIH/ a stu taM a stu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sta baM/ a stu ba/ a stu ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a stu
[\[294b.3\]]ta/ a stu bA tAM/ a stu ba ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a stu thaH/ a stu bA thAM/ a stu d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a stu bi/ a stu ba hi/ a stu ma hi/ lung gi a tang la/ stu su d+hA nya rnams las pa ra smai pa da rnams la 'os iT byin/ si tsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis
[\[294b.4\]]'phel ba byas pas/ a stA pI ta/ a stA bi Sh+TAM/ a stA bi ShuH/ sogs so/ /tang la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sto Sh+Ta/ a sto ShA tAM/ a sto Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sto Sh+TAH/ a sto ShA thAM/
[\[294b.5\]]a sto d+h+waM/ a sto D+h+wa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sto Shi/ a sto Sh+wa hi/ a sto Sh+ma hi/ liT la byings gnyis brjod shar dang po sogs phyis bal dang po rnams la/ kr-i pr-i sr-i stu sru dru sogs kyis iT mi 'jug/ /Nal gnyis dang thal ma gtogs gzhan rnams la/ swa ny+dza brtsegs
[\[294b.6\]]d+ha las kyang ngos sa phyis/ pa dang po sogs kyis ki ta yang na bar byas pas/ ki ta kyi phyogs kyi atsa dang po rnams la/ atsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u ba dang / ki ta ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan bya ste/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tu Sh+DA ba/ tu Sh+Ta bu tuH/ tu Sh+TU ba tuH/ tu Sh+Ta buH/
[\[294b.7\]]tu Sh+Tu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tu Sh+To tha/ tu Sh+Ta ba thuH/ tu Sh+Tu ba thuH/ tu Sh+Ta ba/ tu Sh+Tu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu Sh+TA ba/ tu Sh+Ta pa/ tu Sh+To ba/ tu Sh+Tu ba/ tu Sh+Tu ba/ tu Sh+To ma/ tu Sh+Tu ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tu Sh+Ta be/ tu Sh+Tu be/ tu Sh+Ta bA te/ ta Sh+Tu bA te/ tu Sh+T+wa bi ri/
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]tu Sh+Tu bi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tu Sh+To She/ tu Sh+Tu She/ tu Sh+Ta bA the/ tu Sh+Tu bA the/ tu Sh+To d+hA+e/ tu Sh+Tu d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu Sh+Ta be/ tu Sh+Tu be/ tu Sh+To ba he/ tu Sh+Tu ba he/ tu Sh+To+u ma he/ tu Sh+Tu ma he/ 'grel bar lung drangs ba/ Du b+h+r-i Sh+Tu nyo:tA tA pi DA/ Tu b+h+r-i Sh+Tu nya
[\[295a.2\]]dag las ta dang po la iT yang na 'o/ Du b+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa dang Sh+Tu nya dag las pha rol gyi byings phyed pa ta yig dang po can la iT yang na 'gyur te/ luTa'i a tang la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ sta bi tA/ sta bi tA si/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ sto tA/ sto tA si/ sogs so/ /
[\[295a.3\]]de bzhin du/ tang la/ sta'i tA/ sta bi tA se/ sogs sam/ sto tA/ sto tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ stU yA ta/ stU yA dAM/ stU yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la yon tan byas pas/ sto ShI Sh+Ta/ sto ShI yA tAM/ sto ShI
[\[295a.4\]]ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ sto Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ tang la/ sto Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a sto Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a sto Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Tu k+Shu sgra la lo zhes pa la a tang rnams 'jug ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po
[\[295a.5\]]gsum la/ k+Shau ti/ k+Shu taH/ k+Shu ba n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ k+Shi Shi/ k+ShU thaH/ k+Shu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ k+Shau mi/ k+Shu baH/ k+Shu maH/ ling la/ k+Shu yA ta/ k+Shu yA tAM/ k+Shu yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ k+Shau tu/ k+Shu tA ta/ k+Shu tAM/ k+Shu ba n+tu/ skyes bu dbus
[\[295a.6\]]ma gsum la/ k+Shu hi/ k+Shu tA ta/ k+Shu taM/ k+Shu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ k+Sha bA ni/ k+Sha bA ba/ k+Sha bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a k+Shau ta/ a k+Shu tAM/ a k+Shu ban/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a k+ShauH/ a k+Shu taM/ a k+Shu taM/ a k+Shu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a k+Sha baM/ a k+Shu
[\[295a.7\]]ba/ a k+Shu ma/ lung la iT sbyar/ yon tan byas pas/ a k+Sha bI ta/ a k+Sha bi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la Na la gnyis dang thal ma gtogs sra ny+dza sogs kyis ki ta yang na bar byed de/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsu k+ShA ba/ tsu k+ShA ba tuH/ tsu k+Shu ba tuH/ tsu kA buH/ tsu k+Shu
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsu k+Sha bi tha/ tsu k+Sho tha/ tsu k+Sha bathuH/ tsu k+Shu bathuH/ tsu k+Sha ba/ tsu k+Shu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsu k+Sha ba/ tsu k+Sha ba/ tsu k+Sha bi ba/ tsu k+Shu bi ba/ tsu k+Sha bi ma/ tsu k+Shu bi ma/ luT la bal dang po'i yon tan byas pas/ k+Sha bi tA/ k+Sha bi tA si/
[\[295b.2\]]sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kr-ita la yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ k+ShU yA ta/ k+ShU yA stAM/ k+ShU yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ k+Sha bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a kA bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ru sgral 'o zhes la'ang a
[\[295b.3\]]tang rnams 'jug ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ nu ru sta sogs kyis AT sbyor ba dang 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ ra bI ta/ rau ti/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ ru taH/ ru ba n+ti/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da bI Shi/ rau Shi/ ru thaH/ ru tha/
[\[295b.4\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ra bI mi/ rau mi/ rubaH/ ru maH/ ling la/ ru yA ta/ ru yA tAM/ ru yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ra bI tu/ rau tu/ ru tA ta/ ru tAM/ ru ba n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ru hi/ ri tA ta/ ru taM/ ru ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ra bA
[\[295b.5\]]Ni/ ra bA ba/ ra bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ra bI ta/ a rau ta/ a ru tAM/ a ru ba na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ra bIH/ a rauH/ a ru taM/ a ru ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ra baM/ a ru ba/ a ru ma/ lung la/ bal dang po'i iT byin yon tan
[\[295b.6\]]byas pas/ a ra bI ta/ a ra bi k+ShAM/ a ra bi ShuH/ liT la Nal gnyis ma gtogs a tsa dang po rnams la/ a tsa la sh+mu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs bya ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ru ru ba/ ru ru ba tuH/ ru ru buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ru ru bi tha/ ru ru ba thaH/
[\[295b.7\]]ru ru ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ru rA ba/ ru ra ba/ ru ru bi ba/ ru ru bi ma/ luT la/ ru du nu su sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ ra bi tA/ ra bi tA si/ sogs sam/ ro tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ rU yA ta/
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]rU yA stAM/ rU yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang / ru du nu sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ ra bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ ro Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ra bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ro Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Nu bstod pa la 'o zhes pa
[\[296a.2\]]la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa ru dang khyad par cung zad kyang med de/ na bI ti/ nau ti/ nu taH/ ni ba n+ti/ sogs so/ ! /brU nya gsal bar brjod pa la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ bru ba IT/ brU las ITa'o/ /brU las pha
[\[296a.3\]]rol gyi byings thams cad pa hal dang po ba 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la IT A ga ma 'gyur te/ laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ mdo 'dis IT byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ bra bI ti/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ brU taH/

[\[296a.5\]]ba he/ brU ma he/ bru baH/ pa ny+tsA nA mA di ta A ho bru baH/ brU las dang po lnga rnams kyi ste brU'i A ha'o/ /brU nya las pha rol gyi laT bsgyur ba bar smai pa da rnams kyi ti pa sogs dang po lnga ni rim pa bzhin Na la la sogs pa lnga ru yang na 'gyur la/ bsgyur ba na zU 'ang A ha zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/
[\[296a.6\]]brUl/ laT/ la rim pa bzhin ti pa sogs lnga ru bsgyur/ mdo 'dis ti ba sogs lnga po rim bzhin Na la sogs lnga ru bsgyur/ brU'ang A har bsgyur bas/ Nal A tus/ u sa rnams la/ A ha/ A ha tuH/ A huH/ A ha s+thaH/ A ha'i tha'o/ A ha'i ha ni dz+ha la so sor bsdu ba pha rol
[\[296a.7\]]la tha yig tu 'gyur te/ brU la/ laT la sib/ brU las dang po lnga sogs kyis sib/ thal dang / brU A har bsgyur/ mdo 'dis/ ha tha/ kha ral tsa ra 'os/ tha tar bsgyur bas/ A t+tha/ gong bzhin bsgrubs pas/ thas a thus su bsgyur ba la/ A ha thuH/ Na la sogs su ma bsgyur
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]pa'i phyogs kyi dpe gong du brjod zin to/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ brU yA ta/ brU yA tAM/ brU yuH/ sogs dang / a ta mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i phyis/ a tsa la sh+ta byings brU sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/ bru bI ta/ bru bI yA tAM/ bru bI ran/ sogs so/ /
[\[296b.2\]]loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bra bI tu/ brU tA ta/ brU tA ta/ brU tAM/ bru ban+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ brU taM/ brU tA ta/ bU ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bra bA Ni/ bra bA ba/ bra bA ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ brU tAM/ bru bA tAM/ bru ba tI/ skyes bu
