[\[296b.4\]]a bra baM/ a brU ba/ a brU ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bru ta/ a brU bA tAM/ a brU ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a brU thAH/ a bru bA thAM/ a brU d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bru bi/ a brU ba hi/ a brU ma hi/ bru bo ba tsiH/ brU'i ba tsi'i/ brU'i ba tsi'o/ /rkyen byings phyed pa'i
[\[296b.5\]]ming can pha rol la mU'i ba tse zhes par bsgyur te/ a yig brjod pa'i don no/ brAl lung / mdo 'dis zU btsir bsgyur/ a s+ya ti/ bak+ti sogs kyis tsa li ang du bsgyur/ btsa'i um 'os/ u A ga ma byin/ ata las yon tan sogs kyis bsgrub bas pas/ a tang la a bo tsa ta/
[\[296b.6\]]a bo tsa tAM/ a bo tsa na/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ tang la a bo tsa ta/ a bo tsa tAM/ a bo tsa n+ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ brU btsar bsgyur ki ta ma yin pa rnams la/ gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa saM pra sA ra Na dang kita rnams la/ btsi so pi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra
[\[296b.7\]]Nar bsgyur bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ u bA tsa/ U tsa tuH/ U tsaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ u ba k+k+ra/ u ba tsi tha/ U tsa thAH/ U tsa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ u bA tsa/ u ba tsi/ U tsi ba/ U tsi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ U tse/ U
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]A te/ U tsi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ U tsi She/ U tsA the/ U tsi d+h+we/ U tsi D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ U tse/ U tsi ba he/ U tsi ma he/ luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os tsa ka ra bsgyur nas drangs pas/ a tang la/ b+tA/ bak+tA se/ sogs dang / tang
[\[297a.2\]]la/ bak+tA/ bak+tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra ra Na ra bsgyur bas/ u tsAta/ u ts+yA stAM/ u ts+yA suH/ sogs so/ /tang la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ ka tsa/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha bsgyur bas/ bak+ShI k+Ta/ bak+tI yA tAM/
[\[297a.3\]]bak+ShI ra na/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la 'ang tsu'i ku/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ a tang la/ ba k+Sh+yi ti/ bak+Sh+ya taH/ bak+Sh+ya n+ti/ sogs dang / /tang la/ ba k+Sh+ya te/ ba k+Sh+ya n+te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a ba k+Sh+ya ta/ a bak+Sh+ya tAM/ a bak+Sh+ya na/ sogs
[\[297a.4\]]dang / tang la/ a ba k+Sh+ya ta/ a ba k+She tAM/ a ba k+Sh+ya n+ta/ sogs so/ /i ti bA Nini bya ka ra Na s+ya sU tA da dAd la:samA p+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Ni'i mdo las a da la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na
[\[297a.5\]]gzhung 'brel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa 'jig pa ad la sogs pa rnams la/ laT sogs sbyor tshul spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas par rags pa rnams re zhig
[\[297a.6\]]rdzogs so// //da ni dzu ho ti la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ /dzu ho d+yA di b+h+yaHsh+luH/ dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams las sh+lu'o/ /byis hu sbyin pa la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni dzu ha til sogs pa rnams te/ /de rnams las pha rol gyi byed pa po la sha pa'o zhes pas sha pa ni sh+lu
[\[297a.7\]]zhes par bsgyur bar bya'o/ /shA+au/ shU la'o/ /sha pa shU ru bsgyur bas shU pha rol la byings a b+h+yAs med pa'i gnyis brjod par bya zhing shU'ang 'jig ste/ ! /hu sbyin pa dang bza' ba dag la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyar/ byed pa po la sha pa/ dzu ho te sogs kyis sha ba shUr
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]bsgyur/ mdo 'dis byings gnyis brjod cing shU 'ang 'jig /ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ha dz+ha/ a b+hA swa'i tsas 'ang 'os ha dz+har bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzu ho ti/ dzu hu taH/ dzu hwa ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzu ho Shi/ dzu hu tha:dzu dzu
[\[297b.2\]]hu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzu ho mi/ dzu hu baH/ dzu hu maH/ dzu hu'i bar gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ ling la/ dzu hu yA ta/ dzu hu yA tAM/ dzu hu yuH/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzu ho tu/ dz+ha a ta hu sh+nu dag gi sogs kyis a Na/ dzu hu tA ta/ dzu hu tAM/ dzu ho tu/
[\[297b.3\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzu hu d+hi/ dzu hu tA ta/ dzu hu taM/ dzu hu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzu ha bA ni/ dzu ha bA ba/ dzu ha bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dzu ho ta/ a dzu hu tAM/ a dzu ha buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dzu hoH/ a dzu hu taM/ a dzu hu ta/ skyes bu
[\[297b.4\]]phyi ma gsum la/ a dzu ha baM/ du dz+ha la las hi n+ti/ a dzu hu ma/ lung la si tsa la 'phel bar par smai ba da rnams la 'os/ /'phel ba byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hau ShI ta/ mi tsa a s+d+ya sta sogs kyis th+hi dzus/ dzus la 'ang ngos yon tan/ a hau Sh+TAM/ a hau ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[297b.5\]]gsum la/ a ho ShIH/ a hau Sh+TaM/ a hau Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hau ShaM/ a hau Sha/ a hau Sh+ma/ liT la/ b+hI hrI b+h+r-i hu bAM shU ba ts+tsa/ b+hI hrI b+h+r-i hu rnams kyi shU bzhin du yang do/ /nyi b+hI 'thigs pa/ hrI ngo tsha ba/ b+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa/ hu sbyin pa rnams kyi leT pha rol la A ma yang na sbyor te/
[\[297b.6\]]A ma la'ang shU bzhin gnyis brjod pa sogs bya ste/ A ma gyi phyogs la/ dzu ha bAM tsa kA ra/ dzu ha bAM ba b+hU ba/ dzu ha bA mA sa/ sogs dang / A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzu hA ba/ dzu hu ba tuH/ dzu hu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzu ha bi tha/ dzu ho tha/
[\[297b.7\]]dzu hu ba thuH/ dzu hu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzu hA ba/ dzu ha ba/ dzu hu bi ba/ dzu hu bi ma/ luT la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ho tA/ ho tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring byas pas/ hU yA ta/
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]hU yA stAM/ hU yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ho Sh+ya ti/ ho Sh+ya n+ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ho Sh+ya ta/ a ho Sh+ya tAM/ a ho Sh+ya na/ sogs so/ ! /nyi b+hI 'jigs pa a'o
[\[298a.2\]]zhes ba la'ang a tang rnams sbyor zhing sha ba shUr bsgyur ba sogs cho ga phal cher hu dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ bi b+he ti/ b+hi yon n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ b+hI'i yang na'o/ b+hI'i I yig ni byings thams cad ba hal dang po kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la i thung ngur yang na
[\[298a.3\]]bsgyur te/ skyes bu dang po gnyis tshig la/ bi b+hi taH/ bi b+hI taH/ mang tshig la a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis ya Nar bsgyur bas/ bi b+h+ya ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi b+he She/ bi b+hi thaH/ bi b+hithaH/ bi b+hi tha/ bi b+hI tha/ skyes bu
[\[298a.4\]]phyi ma gsum la/ bi b+hi mi/ bi b+hi baH/ bi b+hI baH/ bi b+hi maH/ bi b+hI maH/ ling la/ b+hI'i yang na 'os I thung ngur yang na bsgyur bas/ bi b+hi yA ta/ bi b+hi yA tAM/ bi b+hi yuH/ sogs sam/ bi b+hi yA ta/ bi b+hI yA tAM/ bi b+hI yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi b+he
[\[298a.5\]]tu/ bi b+hi tA ta/ bi b+hi tA ta/ bi b+hI tAM/ bi b+hI tAM/ bi b+h+ya tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi b+hi hi/ bi b+hI hi/ bi b+hi tA ta/ bi b+hI tA ta/ bi b+hi taM/ bi b+hi taM/ bi b+hi ta/ bi b+hI ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi b+ha yA ni/ bi b+ha yA ba/ bi b+ha yA ma/ de bzhin du/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[298a.6\]]la/ a bi b+he ta/ a bi b+hi tAM/ a bi b+hI tAM/ a bi b+h+yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bi b+heH/ a bi b+hi taM/ a bi b+hI taM/ a bi b+hi ta/ a bi b+hi ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bi b+ha yaM/ a bi b+hi ba/ a bi b+hI ba/ a bi b+hi ma/ a bi b+hI ma/ lung la/ si tsa la 'phel ba par smai ba
[\[298a.7\]]de rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+hai ShI ta/ a b+hai Sh+TAM/ a b+hai ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+hai ShIH/ a b+hai Sh+TaM/ a b+hai Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+hai ShaM/ a b+hai Sh+wa/ a b+hai Sh+ma/ liT la/ b+hI hrI sogs kyis A ma yang na bar byed de/ A ma
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]gyi phyogs la/ bi b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ bi b+ha yAM ba b+hU ba/ bi b+ha yA mA sa/ sogs dang / A ma ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi b+hA ya/ bi b+h+ya tuH/ bi b+h+yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi b+ha yi tha/ bi b+he tha/ bi b+h+ya thuH/ bi b+h+ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi b+hA ya/ bi
[\[298b.2\]]b+ha ya/ bi b+h+yi ba/ bi b+h+yi ma/ bi b+h+yi ma/ luT la byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ b+he tA/ b+he tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ b+hI yA ngata/ b+hI yA stAM/ b+hi yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la yon tan byas pas/ b+he Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a b+hi Sh+ya ta/
[\[298b.3\]]sogs so/ ! /hrI ngo tsha ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor zhing cho ga phal cher bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzi hri ti/ sha hrI taH/ dzi hri ya ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzi hre Shi/ dzu hrI thaH/ dza hrI tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi hrI
[\[298b.4\]]mi/ dzi hrI baH/ dzi hrI maH/ ling la/ dzi hrI yA ta/ dzi hrI yA tAM/ dzi hrI yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzi hre tu/ dzi hrI tA ta/ dzi hrI tAM/ dzi hri ya tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzi hrI hi/ dzi hrI tA ta/ dzi hrI taM/ dz+wi hrI taM/ dz+wi hrI ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi hra yA ni/
[\[298b.5\]]dzi hra yA ba/ dzi hra yA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dzi hre ta/ a dzi hrI tAM/ a dzi hra yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hrai ShAH/ a hraiSh+Ta/ a hrai Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dzaM hra yaM/ a dzi hri ba/ a dzi hrI ma/ lung la/ si tsa la 'phel ba byas
[\[298b.6\]]bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hai ShI ta/ a hrai Sh+TA+ai/ a hrai ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a hrai ShIH/ a hrai Sh+TaM/ a hrai Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hrai ShaM/ a hrai Sh+wa/ a hrai Sh+ma/ liT la/ A ma yang na bar byas pas/ dzi hra yAM tsa kA ra/ a hra lAM ba b+hU ba/ dzi hra
[\[298b.7\]]lA mAs/ sogs sam/ yang na A ma ma sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzi hrA ya/ dzi hri ya thuH/ dzi hri yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzi hra yi tha/ dzi hre tha/ dzi hi ya thuH/ dzi hri ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi hrA ya/ dzi hri ya/ dzi hri yi ba/ dzi hri yi ma/ luT la
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]yon tan byas pas/ hre tA/ hre tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ hrI yA ta/ hrI yA stAM/ hrI yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la yon tan byas pas/ hre Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a hre Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /br-I skyong ba dang rdzogs par
[\[299a.2\]]byed pa dag la'o zhes pa la yang a tang rnams sbyor te/ a rti pi bar+t+yo shu/ a rti pi pa rti dag gi 'ang ngo / /byings r-i 'gro ba dang pr-i skyong ba dag gi shU ru bsgyur ba pha rol la a b+h+yAs i ta du 'gyur te/ 'ba'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ la ti pa/ byed pa po la shang / dzu ho ti sogs
[\[299a.3\]]kyis sha ba shUr bsgyur/ shU la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis a b+h+yAs i ta/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas pi brti/ u do Sh+T+ya pU rba s+ya/ o Sh+Ti'i sngon ma yin pa'i uTa'o/ /byings mtha'i r-I ta ni o Sh+Ti ste dz+hi dzus su bsgyur ba'i us ma yin pa'i rkyen kang
[\[299a.4\]]'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la u ta du bsgyur te/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ pi pU rtaH/ mang tshig la/ bi pur ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pi pa r+Sh+wi/ pi pU r+thaH/ pi pU r+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pi pU rbaH/ pi pU rmaH/
[\[299a.5\]]ling la/ bi bU r+YAta/ pi pU r+yA twaM/ pi pU r+YAH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu  mdo 'dos rw-i u ta r-i'i a Na la sar pha rol 'os ra/ u pa ng+hA'i 'ang ngos ring po/ dang po gsum la/ pi pa rtu/ pi pU rtA ta/ pi pU rtAM/ pi pu ra tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pi pU rti/ pi pU rtA ta/ pi pU rtaM/ pi bU rta/
[\[299a.6\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pi parA Ni/ pi ba rA ba/ pi par rAm/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a pi baH/ a pi pU rtAM/ a pi pa ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a pi paH/ a pi pU rtaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a pi pa raM/ a pi bU rba/ a pi bA rma/ lung la ngal
[\[299a.7\]]dang po'i iT/ si tsa la 'phel ba par smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a p+wa r-I ta/ a pa ri Sh+TAM/ a pa ri ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can rnams la 'phel ba dang gzhan rnams la r-i ts+tsha ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pa pAr/
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]pa bar tuH/ pa pa ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pa pa ri tha/ pa pa thuH/ pa par/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba pA ra/ pa pa ra/ pa pa ri ba/ pa pa ri ma/ luT la/ b+h+r-i r-I ta dag las yang na 'os iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ ba ri tA/ ba ri tA si/ sogs sam/ ba rI tA/ pa
[\[299b.2\]]rI tA si/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ o Sh+Ta'i sngon ma ma yin pa'i a tu 'os/ r-I u tu/ r-i'i a nal ra pha rol los ru/ u pa ng+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ pU r+YA ta/ pU r+YA stAM/ pA r+YA suH/ l+r-iT la/ b+h+r-i r-I ta sogs kyis i Ta dang IT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ pa ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/
[\[299b.3\]]pa ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a pa rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a pa rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /pr-i skyong ba dang rdzogs par byed pa dag la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ prI dang cung zad mi 'dra bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pi pa rti/ pi pr-i taH/ pi pra ti/ skyes bu
[\[299b.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/ pi pa r+Shi/ pi pr-i thaH/ pi pr-i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pi pa rmi/ pi pr-i baH/ pi pr-i maH/ ling la/ pi pr-i yA ta/ pi pr-i yA tAM/ pi pr-i yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pi pa rtu/ pi pr-i tA ta/ pi pr-i tAM/ pi pra ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[299b.5\]]pi pr-i hi/ pi pr-i tA ta/ pi pr-i taM/ pi pr-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pi pa r+Sha Ni/ pi pa rA ba/ pi pa rA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a pi paH/ a pi pr-i tAM/ a pi pa ru/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a pi paH/ a pi pr-i taM/ a pi pr-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a pi pa raM/
[\[299b.6\]]a pi pr-i ba/ a pi pr-i ma/ lung la 'phel ba byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a pA r+ShIta/ a pA Sh+TAM/ a pA r+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a pA r+ShiH/ a pa r+Sh+TaM/ a pA r+Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a pA r+ShaM/ a pA r+Sha/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pa pA ra/ pa pra
[\[299b.7\]]tuH/ pa pruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pa pa tha/ pa pra thuH/ pa pra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pa pra ra/ pa pa ra/ pa pri ba/ pa pri ma/ luT la yon tan byas pas/ brtA/ brtA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ sha ya ka'i sogs kyis ring du bsgyur bas/ pri yA ta/ pri
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]yA tAM/ pri yA suH/ sogs so/ /l-iT la/ r-iT ha na sogs kyis iT sbyar bas/ ba ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l-ing la/ a pa ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /o tA ka gtong la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ shab shUr bsgyur ba sogs kyis
[\[300a.2\]]bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dza hA ti/ dza hA te Sh+tsa/ dza hA ti'i 'ang ngo / /g+hu'i mang can ma yin pa'i dza hA ti'i Ata ni byings thams cad pa hal dang po kang 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la i ta du yang na 'gyur ro/ /I ha l+ya g+hoH/ g+hu ma yin pa'i ha la la I'o/ /
[\[300a.3\]]g+hu'i ming can ma yin pa'i byings a d+h+ya sta'i ming can rnams dang rkyen sh+nA'i a+wa ta ni byings thams cad pa ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la I ru bsgyur bar bya ste/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ dza hA ti'i 'ang ngos ita dang mdo 'dis I yang na bar byas pas/ dza hi taH/ dza hI taH/ mang tshig
[\[300a.4\]]la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+nya a ta/ sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi Ata 'os A phyis pas/ dza ha ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza hi si/ dzi hi thaH/ dza hI thaH/ dza hi tha/ dza hI tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza hA mi/ dza hi baH/ dza hI baH/ dza hi maH/ dza hI maH/
[\[300a.5\]]lo po yi/ ya la dbyi'o/ /dza hA ti'i A ta ni byings thams cad pa ya yig dang po can pha rol la dbyi ste/ ling la/ dza h+yA ta/ dza h+yA tA/ dza h+yAH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza hA tu/ dza hI tA ta/ dza hI tA ta/ dza hi tAM/ dza hI tAM/ dza ha tu/ A tsa hau/ hil A 'ang
[\[300a.6\]]ngo / /loT bsgyur ba'i hi pha rol la dza hA tI'i yang na A nyid du gnas te/ loTa'i skyes bu dbus ma'i gcig tshig la/ dza hA hi/ dza hi hi/ dza hI hi/ dza hi tA ta/ dza hI tA ta/ ste gzugs lnga 'byung ngo / /gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ dza hi taM/ dza hI taM/ dza hI ta/ dza hi ta/ skyes bu phyi ma
[\[300a.7\]]gsum la/ dza hA ni/ dza hA ba/ dza hA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dza hA ta/ a dza hi tAM/ a dza hI tAM/ a dza hu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dza hA:/ a dza hi taM/ a dza hI taM/ a dza hi ta/ a dza hI ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dza hAM/ a dza hi ba/ a dza hI
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]ba/ a dza hi ma/ a dza hI ma/ lung la/ ya ma/ ra ma/ nam/ Ata mtha' sogs kyis sa ka dang iT byin pas/ a hA sI ta/ a hA sI Sh+TAM/ a hA si Sh+TAM/ a hA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod/ A ta las Na la au 'os/ rnal gnyis au/ iT la'ang Ata kyis dbyi ba sogs
[\[300b.2\]]byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza hau/ dza ha tuH/ dza huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza hA tha/ dza hi tha/ dza ha thuH/ dza ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza hau/ dza hi ba/ dza hi ma/ luT la/ hA tA/ hA tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ling la e 'os e ru bsgyur pas
[\[300b.3\]]te yAta/ he yA stAM/ he yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ hA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a hA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ri 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ r-i pa/ sha ba shUr bsgyur/ shU la 'ang ngos gnyis brjod/ a rti pi brti dag gi 'ang ngos/ a b+h+yA sa aM/ a
[\[300b.4\]]b+h+yA sa'i 'dra ba mang ma yin pa la 'os/ i ya ru bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ i ya rti/ i y+r-i taH/ i y+ra ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i ya r+Shi/ i y+rathaH/ i y+r-i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ i ya rme/ i y+r-i baH/ i y+r-i maH/
[\[300b.5\]]ling la/ i y+r-i yA ta/ i y+r-i yA tAM/ i y+r-i yuH/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ i ya rtu/ i y+r-i tA ta/ a y+r-i tAM/ i y+ra tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ i y+r-i hi/ i y+r-i tA ta/ i y+r-i taM/ i y+r-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ i ya rA Ni/
[\[300b.6\]]i ya rA ba/ i ya rA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ai yaH/ ai y+r-i tAM/ ai ya ruH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ai yaH/ ai y+r-i taM/ ai y+r-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ai ya raM/ ai y+r-i ba/ ai y+r-i ma/ lung la/ sa rti shwa sti a rti rnams las kyang ngos/ ts+li ang
[\[300b.7\]]du bsgyur/ r-i dr-i sha dag gis ang la yon tan byas/ a tsa dang po'i AT/ AT yas kyang ngos 'phel ba/ byings thams cad ba sogs kyis yon tan/ hal dI ba sogs kyis tar ras phyis/ pas/ A ra ta/ A ra tAM/ A ran/ sogs so/ /yang na r-i sr-i dag las ang yang na 'o zhes lung 'dren gyis ts+li si tsa ru bsgyur 'phel
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A r+ShI ta/ A r+Sh+Ti/ A r+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A r+ShIH/ A raSh+TaM/ A r+Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A r+ShaM/ A r+Sh+wa/ A r+Sh+ma/ liT la/ byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a ha 'os/ a b+h+yAs a/ r-i ts+tsha
[\[301a.2\]]ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la yon tan dang / Nal gnyis la 'phel ba byas/ a ka 'dra ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A ra/ A ra tuH/ a ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A ri tha/ A ra thuH/ A ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[301a.3\]]A ra/ A ri ba/ A ri ma/ luT la yon tan byas pas/ a rtA/ a rtA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ a rti brtsegs ba dang po dag gis yon tan nos yon tan byas pas/ a r+yA ta/ a r+yA stAM/ a r+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ r-ita han dag las s+ya la 'os iT byin/
[\[301a.4\]]byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ A ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Ni dzir gtsang ba dang gso ba dag la'o zhes pa la yang a tang rnams sbyor te/ Ni dzAM tra yA NAM gu NaHsh+lo/ Ni dza sogs gsum rnams kyis
[\[301a.5\]]shU la yon tan no/ /Ni dzi ra gtsang ba/ bi dzir tha dad par 'gyur pa/ bi Sh+l-i khyab pa gsum gyi a b+h+yAs sh+lu pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/ Ni dza la/ shapa/ dzu ho ti sogs kyis shapa sh+lur bsgyur/ sh+lu la 'os gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis a b+h+yA sa yon tan/ tsu'i ku sogs kyis bsgrubs
[\[301a.6\]]pas/ ne ne k+te/ bu ka mtha' sogs yon tan/ ne ni k+taH/ ne ni dza ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ne ne k+Shi/ ne ni k+thaH/ ne ni k+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ne ni dz+mi/ ne ni dz+ma/ ne ni dz+waH/ ling la/ ne ni dz+yA ta/ ne ni dz+yA tAM/ ne ni dz+yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ne ni k+tu/
[\[301a.7\]]ne ni k+t+ra ta/ ne ni k+tAM/ ne ni dza tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ne ni g+d+hi/ hu dz+hal la hi d+hi tsu'i ku/ ne ni k+tA ta/ ne ni k+taM/ ne ni k+ta/ nA b+h+ya sta s+yA tsi pi ti sA rba ng+hA tu ke/ byings thams cad pa a tsa pa 'gro ba la a b+h+ya sta'i ma yin no/ /byings thams cad pa a tsa dang po pa 'gro ba'i ming can pha
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]rol la a b+h+ya sta'i u pa d+hA yon tan du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ loTa'i skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ne ni dzA ni ne ni dzA ba/ ne ni dzA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ne nag /a ne ni ka /a ne ni k+tAM/ a ne ni dzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ne ne ga/ a ne ne ka/ a ne ni k+taM/
[\[301b.2\]]a ne ni k+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ne ni dzaM/ ne ni dz+wa/ ne ni dz+ma/ lung la ir 'gro ba yang na 'os/ ts+li ang dang si tsar yang na par bsgyur bas/ ang gi phyogs la/ a ni dza ta/ a ni dza tAM/ a ni dzan/ sogs dang / si tsa'i phyogs la/ ba da bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba
[\[301b.3\]]dang / dz+hal dang po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os/ si tsa dbyi ba dang / tsu'i ku/ khar ya tsar kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a nai k+thi ta/ a nai k+ShAM/ a nai k+tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a nai k+ShiH/ a nai k+taM/ a nai k+ta/ skyes bu
[\[301b.4\]]phyi ma gsum la/ a nai k+ShaM/ a nai k+Sh+wa/ a nai k+Sh+ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ni ni dza/ ni ne dza tuH/ ni ni dzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ni ne k+tha/ ni ne dzi tha/ ni ni dzu thuH/ ni ni dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ni ne dza/ ni ni dzi ba/ ni ni dzi ma/ luT la/ pu ka mtha' sogs
[\[301b.5\]]kyis yon tan bya pas/ ne k+tA/ ne k+tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ni dz+yA ta/ ni dz+yA stAM/ ni dz+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT/ phu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dza? ga? /khar la tsar 'os/ ga? ka? /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sra Shar bsgyur bas/ ne k+Sh+ya ti/
[\[301b.6\]]sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ne k+t+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /bi dzir tha dad par gyur pa la 'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis 'jug ste/ sha pa shUr bsgyur ba sogs cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i a tang ki skyes bu dang po gsum la/ be be k+ti/ be bi k+taH/ be
[\[301b.7\]]bi dza ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be be k+Shi/ be bi k+thaH/ be bi k+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be be dzI/ bi bi dz+mi/ bi bi dzraH/ bi bi dz+maH/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ be bi k+te/ be bi dzA te/ be bi dza te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be bi k+the/ bi bi dzA the/ bi bi g+d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]be bi dze/ be bi dz+wa he/ be bi dz+ma he/ ling gi a tang la/ be bi dz+yA ta/ be bi dz+yA tAM/ be bi dz+yuH/ sogs dang / tang la/ mtha' yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis drangs pas/ be bi dzI ta/ be bi dzI tAM/ be bi dzI ran/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po
[\[302a.2\]]gsum la/ be be k+tu/ be bi k+tA ta/ be bi k+tAM/ be bi dza tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be bi g+d+hi/ be bi k+tA ta/ be bi k+tA ta/ be bi k+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be be dzA ni/ be bi dzA ba/ be bi dzA ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ be bi k+tAM/ be bi dzA tAM/ be bi dza tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[302a.3\]]gsum la/ be bi k+Sh+wa/ be bi dzA thAM/ be bi dzA g+d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be bi dzai/ be bi dzA ba hai/ be bi dzA ma hai/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ byings thams cad a tsa pi ta la a b+h+ya sta'i ma yin nos yon tan mi byed/ a be be ga/ a be bi k+tAM/ a be bi dzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[302a.4\]]gsum la/ a be be ga/ a be be ka/ a be bi k+taM/ a be bi k+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a be bi dzaM/ a be bi dz+wa/ a be bi dz+ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a be bi k+ta/ a be bi dzA tAM/ a be bi dza ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a be bi k+thaH/ a be bi dzA thAM/ a be bi k+d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma
[\[302a.5\]]gsum la/ a be bi dzi/ a be bi dz+wa hi/ a be bi dz+ma hi/ lung gi a tang la/ ir 'gro ba la yang na 'os/ ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ ang gi phyogs la/ a bi dza ta/ a bi dza tAM/ a bi dza na/ sogs so/ /si tsa'i phyogs la/ bad bra dza sogs kyis
[\[302a.6\]]'phel ba/ dz+ha la dang po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa dbyi ba dang / tsu'i ku/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bai k+ShI ta/ a bai k+ShAM/ a bai k+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bai k+ShIH/ a bai k+taM/ a bai k+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma
[\[302a.7\]]gsum la/ a bai k+taM/ a bai k+Sh+wa/ a bai k+Sh+ma/ tang la ling si tsa dag la A t+ma ne ba da rnams la 'os 'phel ba dang yon tan gang yang mi byed/ dz+hal dang po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la'os si tsa dbyi ba dang / tsu'i ku/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]gsum la/ a bi k+ta/ a bi k+ShA tAM/ a bi k+Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bi k+ShAH/ a bi k+ShA thAM/ a bi g+d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bi k+Shi/ a bi k+Sh+wa hi/ a bi k+Sh+ma hi/ liT la/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi be dza/
[\[302b.2\]]bi bi dza tuH/ bi bi dzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi ba k+tha/ bi be dzi tha/ bi bi dza thuH/ bi bi dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi be dza/ bi bi dzi ba/ bi bi dzi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi bi dze/ bi bi dzA te/ bi bi dzi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi bi dzi She/ bi bi
[\[302b.3\]]dzA the/ bi bi dzi d+h+we/ bi bi dzi D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi bi dze/ bi bi dzi ba he/ bi bi dzi ma he/ luT la/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ tsu'i ku 'os dza ga/ khar la tsar 'os kar bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ be k+tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ be k+tA/ be k+tA se/ sogs
[\[302b.4\]]so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la 'dren pa kho na ste/ bi dz+yA ta/ bi dz+yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dza? ga khar la tsar 'os/ ga? ka?/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Shar bsgyur bas/ bi k+ShI Sh+Ta/ bi k+ShI yA stAM/ bi k+ShI ran/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ pu ka mtha' sogs
[\[302b.5\]]kyis yon tan/ tsu'i ku 'os dza? ga?/ /Shar la tsar/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis a tang la/ bak+Sh+ya taM/ sogs dang / tang la/ be k+Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a be k+Sh+yata/ sogs dang / tang la/ a be k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /bi Sh+li khyab pa la'o zhes
[\[302b.6\]]pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ sha pa shUr bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ni dza sogs gsum rnams kyis shUl yon tan nos/ a b+h+yAs yon tan ni byed pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ be be Sh+Ti/ bi be Sh+TaH/ be bi Sha ti/ skyes bu dbus ma/ gsum la/
[\[302b.7\]]be be k+Shi/ bi bi Sh+ThaH/ bi bi Sh+Tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be be Sh+mi/ be bi Sh+waH/ be bi Sh+maH/ ling la/ be bi Sh+yA ta/ be bi Sh+yA tAM/ be bi Sh+yAH/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ be be Sh+Tu/ be bi Sh+TA ta/ be bi Sh+TAM/ be bi Sha tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be bi D+D+hi/ hu dz+ha las hi d+hi/ mtha'i
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]dz+hal sogs ShaDa/ ShaTu la Sha Tu 'os/ d+ha D+ha/ bi bi Sh+TA ta/ bi biSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be bi ShA Ni/ be bi ShA ba/ be bi ShA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a be beDa/ a be beT/ a be bi Sh+ShAM/ a be bi ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a be
[\[303a.2\]]beDa/ a be biT/ a be biSh+TaM/ a be bi Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a be bi Sh+wa/ a be bi Sh+ma/ lung la/ l-i 'gro pa sogs kyis ts+li ang dang k+sar bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ ang gi phyogs la/ a bi Sha ta/ a bi Sha tAM/ a bi Sha na/ sogs dang / k+sa'i phyogs la/ sa
[\[303a.3\]]la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a bi k+Sha ta/ a bi k+Sha tAM/ a bi k+Sha na/ sogs so/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi be Sha/ bi bi Sha tuH/ bi bi ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi be Sh+Tha/ bi be Shi tha/ bi bi Sha thuH/ bi bi tha/ skyes
[\[303a.4\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi be Sha/ bi be Shi ba/ bi bi Shi ma/ luT la/ be Sh+TA/ be Sh+TA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ bi Sh+yA ta/ bi Sh+yA stAM/ bi Sh+yA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ pu ka mtha' sogs yon tan/ sa la Sha ng+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur
[\[303a.5\]]bas/ be k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a be k+Sh+ye ta/ sogs so/ ! /dzA na skye ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ sha pa sh+lur bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dza dza n+ti/ dza nas na kha nAM sa na dz+ha loH/ dza na sa na kha na rnams
[\[303a.6\]]kyis na dz+ha la dag la'o/ /dza na skye ba/ sa na dang khan kun nas gus pa rnams kyi Ti ni rkyen san dang dz+hal dang po ka da 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la A ta du 'gyur te/ gnyis tshig la/ dza dzA taH/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las a ta 'os/ dz+ha a ta gam ha na dza na sogs kyis u ba d+hA phyis/ sa tu'i
[\[303a.7\]]sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/ na? nya?/ dza nya 'dus pa dz+nya byas pas/ dza dz+nya ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza dza ni Shi/ IT dza na dag las d+ha la 'ang ngos/ iT/ dza dzA thamaH/ dza dzA tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza dza n+mi/ dza dza n+waH/ dza dza n+maH/ ling la/ ya la
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]'dam ka 'os/ Ti a ta? du yang na bar byas pas/ dza dzA yA ta/ dza dzA yA tAM/ dza dzA yuH/ sogs sam/ dza dza n+ya ta/ dza dza n+yA tAM/ dza dza n+yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza dza n+tu/ dza dzA tA ta/ dza dzA tAM/ dza dz+nya tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza dzA hi/ dza dzA tA ta/ dza dzA
[\[303b.2\]]taM/ dza dzA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza dza nA ni/ dza dza nA ba/ dza dza nA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dza dza na/ a dza dzA tAM/ a dza dz+nyuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dza dza na/ a dza dzA taM/ a dza dza ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dza dza naM/ dza dza nA/ a dza dza n+ma/
[\[303b.3\]]lung la iT byin pas/ a dza nI ta/ a dza no Sh+TAM/ a dza ni ShuH/ sogs so/ /l-iTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza dzA na/ dza dz+nya tuH/ dza dz+nyuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza dza ni tha/ dza dz+nyathuH/ dza dz+nya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza dzA na/ dza dz+nyi ba/ dza dz+nyi ma/ luT la/ bal dang po'i iT
[\[303b.4\]]byin bas/ dza ni tA/ dza ni tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ya la 'dab ka 'os/ A ra bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba gdam nga can du byas bas/ dzA yA ta/ dzA yA stAM/ dzA yA suH/ sogs sam/ dza n+yA ta/ dza n+yA stAM/ dza n+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ dza ni Sh+ya ti/
[\[303b.5\]]sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la'ang a dza ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Du dA nya sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ sha pa shU gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/ laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ da dA ti/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ sh+nA a
[\[303b.6\]]b+h+ya sta dag gi A ta 'os A phyis/ khar la tsar 'os da ta sogs byas bas/ da t+taH/ da da ti/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da dA si/ da t+thaH/ da t+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da dA mi/ da dwaH/ da dwaH/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da t+te/ da dA te/ da dA te/ skyes
[\[303b.7\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/ da t+se/ da dA tha/ da d+d+yA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da de/ da dwa he/ da d+ma he/ ling gi a tang la/ sh+nA a b+h+ya sta sogs kyis A phyis drangs pas/ da d+yA ta/ da d+yA tAM/ da d+yuH/ sogs dang / tang la mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/ sh+nA a b+h+ya sta sogs
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]kyis A phyis pas/ da dI ta/ da dI yA twaM/ da dI ran/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da dA tu/ da dA ta/ da t+tAM/ da da tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ de haM/ da t+tA ta/ da t+taM/ da t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da dA ni/ da dA ba/ da dA ma/ tang
[\[304a.2\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da t+t+waM/ da dA tAM/ da da tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da t+mA/ da dA thAM/ da d+d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da dai/ da dA ba hai/ da dA ma hai/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po/ g+hu as dag gi hi la e ta de a b+h+yAs dbyi ba'ang ngos bsgrubs pa'o/ gsum la/ a da dA ta/ a da t+tAM/
[\[304a.3\]]a da duH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a da dAH/ a da t+taM/ a da t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a da dAM/ a da dA/ a da d+ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a da t+ta/ a da dA taM/ a da da ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a da t+thAH/ a da dA thAM/ a da d+d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[304a.4\]]la/ a da di/ a da dwa hi/ a da d+ma hi/ lung gi a tang la/ ga ti/ s+thA/ g+hu/ pA/ b+hU rnams la sogs kyis si tsa phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dA ta/ a dA tAM/ a duH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dAH/ a dA tAM/ a dA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dAM/ a dA ba/ a dA
[\[304a.5\]]ma/ tang la/ s+thA/ g+hu dag gi ita 'ang ngos/ si tsa ki ta dang A i ta dz+ha la dang po rnams la/ gzugs thung ngu las sogs kyis si tsang byi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a di ta/ a di ShA tAM/ a di ShA ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a di thAH/ a di ShA thAM/ a di d+d+haM/
[\[304a.6\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a di Shi/ a di Sh+wa hi/ a di Sh+ma hi/ liT la/ Na la gnyis au dang / iT la'ang A ta kyis dbyi 'os/ A phyis pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da dau/ da da tuH/ da duH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da di tha/ da dA tha/ da da thuH/ da da/ skyes bu
[\[304a.7\]]phyi ma gsum la/ da dau/ da di ba/ da di ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da de/ da dA te/ da di re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da di Sha/ da dA the/ da di d+he/ da di D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da de/ da di ba he/ da di ma he/ luTa'i a tang la/ dA dA/ dA tA si/
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]sogs dang / tang la/ dA tA/ dA tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi e tang la/ ling la e 'os/ er bsgyur bas/ de yA ta/ de yA stAM/ de yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ dA yI Sh+Ta/ dA sI yA stAM/ dA sAM ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang bya ba gzhan med/ a tang la/ dA s+ya ti/ sogs
[\[304b.2\]]dang / tang la/ dA s+ya te/ sogs so/ de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a dA s+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a dA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Du d+tA nya 'dzin pa dang gso ba dag la'o zhes pa'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ sha ba sh+lur bsgyur bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig
[\[304b.3\]]tshig la/ da d+h+ra ti/ de d+ha sta thosh+tsa/ da d+ha'i ta tha dag la 'ang 'o/ /Du d+hA nya/ gnyis brjod a b+h+yA sa'i 'ang ngos d+ha sngon ma dar bsgyur bas/ da d+hA zhes pa sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi A ta dbyi 'os A byis/ da d+ha zhes pas pha rol tu ta yig dang tha yig dang 'ang sgras ya dang d+h+wa rnams byung na da de smar yang d+har
[\[304b.4\]]bsgyur bar bya ste/ laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig la/ d+ha t+taH/ skyes bu dang po'i mang tshig la/ da d+ha ti/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da d+hA si/ d+ha t+thaH/ d+ha t+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da d+hA mi/ da d+hA mi/ da t+t+wa mi/ da d+t+waH/ da t+t+maH/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[304b.5\]]t+ha t+te/ da d+hA te/ da ng+ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ d+ha t+se/ da d+hA the/ d+ha d+t+hA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da d+he/ da d+hA he/ da d+h+ma he/ ling gi ya tang la/ sh+nA sogs kyis A phyis bas/ da d+h+yA ta/ da d+h+yA tAM/ da d+h+yu \u0f7f/ sogs dang / tang la/ mtha' yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis/ sh+na sogs
[\[304b.6\]]A phyis bas/ da d+hI ta/ da d+hI tAM/ da d+hI ran/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da d+hA tu/ da d+hA ta/ da t+tAM/ da d+ha tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ d+he hi/ d+ha t+tA ta/ d+he t+taM/ d+ha t+ti/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da d+hA ni/ da d+hA pa/ da d+hA ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[304b.7\]]la/ d+ha t+taM/ da d+hA tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ d+ha t+s+ra/ da d+hA thAM/ da d+d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da d+ho/ da d+hA ba hai/ da d+hA ma hai/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a da d+hA ta/ a da d+hu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a da d+hA[\[]ma[\] ]a d+ha t+taM/ a d+ha t+ta/
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a da d+hAM/ a da d+h+wa/ a d+h+ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+ha t+ta/ a da d+hA tAM/ a da d+ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+ha t+thAH/ a da d+hA thAM/ a d+ha d+d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a da d+hi/ a da d+hA hi/ a da d+hA hi/
[\[305a.2\]]lung gi a tang la/ ga ti s+thA g+hu sogs kyis si tsa phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+hA ta/ a d+hA tAM/ a d+huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+hAH/ a d+hA taM/ a d+hA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+haM/ a d+hA ma/ tang la/ s+thA g+hu dag gi ita 'ang ngos/ si tsa kita dang A ir bskya
[\[305a.3\]]gzugs thung ngu la 'ang ngos/ si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+hi ta/ a d+hi ShA tAM/ a d+hi Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+hi thAH/ a d+hi thAM/ a d+hi d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+hi Shi/ a d+hi Sha hi/ a d+hi Sh+ma hi/ liT la/ iT la'ang A ta kyis dbyi 'os a phyas pas/ a tang
[\[305a.4\]]gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da d+hau/ da d+ha tuH/ da d+huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da d+hi tha/ da d+hA tha/ da d+hA thuH/ da d+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da d+hau/ da d+hi ba/ da d+hi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da d+hA+e/ da d+hA te/ da d+haM re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da d+hi She/ da
[\[305a.5\]]d+hA the/ da d+haM d+hA+e/ da d+hi D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da d+he/ da d+hi ba he/ da d+hi ma he/ luT la cho ga gzhan med pas/ a tang la/ d+hA tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ d+hA tA/ d+hA tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ ling la e 'os er bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/ d+he yA ta/
[\[305a.6\]]d+he yA staM/ d+he yA suH/ tang la/ d+hA sI Sh+Ta/ d+hA sI yA stAM/ d+hA sI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iTa'i a tang la/ d+hA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ d+hA s+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a te/ sogs dang / tang la/ a d+hA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! b+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa dang gso ba dag la'o zhes pa la'ang
[\[305a.7\]]a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ b+h+r-i nyA mi ta/ b+h+r-i nya rnams kyi a ta'o/ /b+h+r-i nya sogs te/ Du b+h+r-i nya/ 'dzin pa/ mAng tshad o hAng 'gro ba gsum gyi shU pha rol la a b+h+yA sa ita du bsgyur bar bya ste/ sha ba sh+lu gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis a b+h+yA sa ita du bsgyur ba sogs byas bas
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi b+ha rti/ bi b+h-i taH/ bi b+h+ra ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi b+ha r+Shi/ bi b+h+r-i thaH/ bi b+h+r-i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi b+ha rmi/ bi b+h+r-i baH/ bi b+h+r-i ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi b+h+r-I te/ bib+h+rA te/ be b+h+ra te/ skyes bu dbus ma/
[\[305b.2\]]gsum la/ bi b+h+r-i She/ bi b+h+rA the/ bi b+h+r-i d+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi b+h+re/ bi b+h+r-i ba he/ bi b+h+r-i ma he/ ling gi a tang la/ bi b+h+r-i yA ta/ bi b+h+r-i yA tAM/ bi b+h+r-i yuH/ sogs dang / tang la mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/ i ka gi a tsa la ya Na byas bas/ bi b+h+r-i ta/ bi b+h+rI
[\[305b.3\]]yA tAM/ bi b+h+rI ngan/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi b+ha rtu/ bi b+h+r-i tA ta/ bi b+h+r-i tAM/ bi b+h+ra tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi b+h+r-i hi/ bi b+h+r-i tA ta/ bi b+h+r-i taM/ bi b+h+r-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi b+ha rA Ni/ be b+ha rA ba/ bi b+ha rA ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po
[\[305b.4\]]gsum la/ bi b+h+r-i tAM/ bi b+h+rA tAM/ bi b+h+ra tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi b+h+r-i Sha/ bi b+h+rA thAM/ bi b+h+rA d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi b+ha rai/ di b+ha rA ba hai/ bi b+ha rA ma hai/ lang gi a tang gi skyes [\[]bu [\]]dang po gsum la/ a bi b+haH/ a bi b+h+r-i tAM/ a bi b+ha ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[305b.5\]]la/ a bi b+haH/ a bi b+h+r-i taM/ a bi b+h+r-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bi b+ha raM/ a bi b+h+ra ba/ a bi b+h+r-i ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bi b+h+r-i ta/ a bi b+h+rA tAM/ a bi b+h+ra ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bi b+h+r-i thaH/ a bi b+h+rA thAM/ a bi b+h+r-i d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/
[\[305b.6\]]a bi b+h+r-i/ a bi b+h+r-i ba hi/ a bi b+h+r-i ma hi/ lung gi a tang la si tsa ya 'phel ba bar smai ba da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+hA r+ShI ta/ a b+hA r+Sh+TaM/ a b+hA r+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+hA r+ShIH/ a b+hA r+Sh+TaM/ a b+hA r+Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[305b.7\]]la/ a b+hA r+ShaM/ a b+hA r+Sha/ a b+hA r+Sh+ma/ tang la/ r-i las kyang ngos si tsa kita yin pas 'phel ba dang yon tan sogs mi byed/ dz+hal dang po rnams la/ gzugs thung ngu las sos si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a b+hI ta/ a b+h-I ShA tAM/ a b+h+r-i Sha ta/ skyes bu
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]dbus ma gsum la/ a b+h+r-i thAH/ a b+h-i ShA thAM/ a b+h+r-i d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+h+r-i Shi/ a b+h+r-i Sha hi/ liT la/ b+hI hrI b+h+r-i hu rnams kyi sh+lu bzhin 'ang ngos/ a b+h+yAs ita dang A ma yang na bar byas pas/ A ma gyi phyogs la/ bi
[\[306a.2\]]b+ha rAM tsa kA ra/ bi b+ha rAM ba b+hU la/ bi b+ha rA mA sa/ sogs sam/ yang na byings gnyis brjod/ r-i a ta 'os a b+h+yA sa'i r-i a ta du bsgyur bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+hAr/ ba b+h+ra tuH/ ba b+h+ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+ha r+tha/ ba b+h+ra thuH/ ba b+h+ra/ skyes bu
[\[306a.3\]]phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+hAr/ ba b+har/ ba b+h+r-i ba/ ba b+h+r-i ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+h+re/ ba b+h+ra te/ ba b+h+r-i re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+h+r-i She/ ba b+h+ra the/ ba b+h+r-i d+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+h+r-i/ ba b+h+r-i ba he/ ba b+h+r-i ma he/ luT la/ b+h+r-i Sha Tu
[\[306a.4\]]sogs kyis lung 'dren kyi iT yang na bar byas pas/ a tang la/ b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ri tA si sogs sam/ b+ha rtA/ b+ha rtA si/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ tang la/ b+ha ri tA/ b+ha ti tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ sha la ka ling rnams
[\[306a.5\]]la ring 'os/ ring du bsgyur bas/ b+h+ri yA ta/ b+h+r-i yA stAM/ b+h+r-i yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ r-i las kyang ngos yon tan mi byed/ b+h+r-i ShI Sh+Ta/ b+h+r-i ShI yA stAM/ b+h+r-i ShI ran/ sogs so/ /y+r-iT la/ rita ha na dag las s+ya la 'os iT byin yon tan byas bas/ a tang la/ b+ha ri Sh+ya ti/
[\[306a.6\]]sogs dang / tang la/ b+ha ri Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a b+ha ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a b+ha ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /mAng tshad la ste sgra la'ang ngo zhes pa la tang rnams sbyor te/ sha pa sh+lu gnyis brjod/ b+h+r-i nya rnams kyi i ta 'os/ a b+h+yA sa
[\[306a.7\]]mi ta/ g+hu ma yin pa rnams kyis ha la la I 'os/ k+dita ha la dang po rnams la mtha' I/ a tsa dang po gsum la/ a tsa dang po rnams/ sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi A ta 'os A dbyi ba sogs byas bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ mi mI te/ mi mA te/ mi ma te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mi mI She/ mi
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]mA tha/ ma mA d+hA/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mi mi/ mi mI ba he/ mi mI ma he/ ling la/ mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/ sh+nA sogs kyis A phyis/ mi mI ta/ mi mI yA stAM/ mi mI ran/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ mi mI tAM/ mi mI tAM/ mi ma tAM/
[\[306b.2\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mi mI Sha/ mi mA thAM/ mi mI d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mi mai/ mi mA ba hai/ mi mA ma hai/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mi mI ta/ a mi mI tAM/ a mi ma ta/ a mi mA tAM/ a mi ma ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mi mI thAH/ a mi mA thAM/ a mi mI d+hAM/ skyes bu
[\[306b.3\]]phyi ma gsum la/ a mi me/ a mi mI ba hi/ a mi mI ma hi/ lung la si tsa'i sra 'dren pa kho na ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mA sta/ a mA sA tAM/ a mA sa ta/ skyes bu dbus gsum la/ a mA s+thAH/ a ma sA thAM/ a mA d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ma si/ a mA
[\[306b.4\]]swa hi/ a mA sma hi/ leT la/ iT la'ang A ta kyis dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ma me/ ma mA te/ ma mA re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ma mi She/ ma mA the/ ma mi d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma  d+ha la' dngos si tsa phyis/ gsum la/ ma me/ ma mi he/ ma
[\[306b.5\]]mi ma he/ luT la/ mA tA/ mA tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ mA sI Sh+Ta/ mA sI yA stAM/ mA sI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ mA s+ya te/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a mA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /o hAng 'gro ba la'o zhes ba la'ang tang rnams sbyor te/ sha pa sh+lu 'os/ byings gnyis
[\[306b.6\]]brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ ha dz+ha/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos dz+ha dza/ b+h+r-i nya rnams kyi ita 'os/ a b+h+yAs ita/ kang 'gro ba'i ming can hal dang po rnams la/ g+hu ma yin pas hal las I 'os/ mtha' I dang / a tsa dang po rnams la/ sh+nA a b+h+yA sta sogs kyis A phyis pas/ laTa'i skyes
[\[306b.7\]]bu dang po gsum la/ dzi hI te/ dza hA te/ dza ha te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzi hI She/ dzi hI the/ dzi hA d+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi he/ dzi hI ba he/ ling la/ mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/ sh+nA sogs kyis A phyis pas/ dzi hI ta/ dzi hI yA tAM/ ngi
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]hI ran/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzi hI tAM/ dzi hA tAM/ dzi ha tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/dzi hI Sha/ dzi hA thAM/ dzi hA ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi hai/ dzi hA ba hai/ dzi hA ba hai/ dzi hA ma hai/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dzi hI ta/ a
[\[307a.2\]]dzi hA tAM/ a dzi ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dzi hI thAH/ a dzi hA thAM/ a dzi hI d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dzi hi/ a dzi hI ba ti/ a dzi hI ma ti/ lung la/ si tsa'i sa 'dren ba kho na ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hA sta/ a hA sA tAM/ a hI sa ta/ skyes bu dbus
[\[307a.3\]]ma gsum la/ a hA s+thAH/ a hA sA thAM/ a hA d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hA si/ a hA swa hi/ a tA sma hi/ liT la/ gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ha dz+ha/ a b+hu sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ IT la 'ang A ta kyis dbyi 'os A phyis pas/
[\[307a.4\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza he/ dza hA te/ dza hi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza hi She/ dza hA the/ dza hi d+h+we/ dza hi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza he/ dza hi ba he/ dza hi ma he/ smon pa'i lang la/ hA sI Sh+Ta/ hA sI yA stAM/ hA sI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ hA s+ya te/
[\[307a.5\]]sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a hA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni bya ka ra Na s+ya sU trA ta hrA da yaHsa mA p+tAM/ zhes pa pA Ni ni bya ka ra Na'i mdo las hu la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so/ /de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga da ber
[\[307a.6\]]brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa shUr bsgyur ba dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams laT sogs sbyor ba'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni di bu
[\[307a.7\]]la sogs pa byed pa po'i don la sh+yan 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ di bu rtse ba dang mngon par 'dod pa dang / tha snyad dang / sdu gu dang / gsal ba dang / bstod pa dang / mdzes pa dang / 'gro ba rnams la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyor te/ di pA di b+h+yaH
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]sh+yan/ di ba la sogs pa rnams las sh+yan 'o/ /byings di bu la sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa kyi yul la sh+yan 'gyur te/ na dbyangs don dang shata kyi don no/ /di pa la sh+yan rjes 'brel phyis/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur
[\[307b.2\]]bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dI bya ti/ dI bya taH/ dI bya n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dI bya si/ dI bya thaH/ dI bya tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dI byA mi/ dI byA paH/ dI byA ma:/ ling la/ a ta las ya? i yA 'os ya i yar bsgyur/ ba? ya? dag gi bal la dbyi
[\[307b.3\]]ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dI bye ta/ dI bye tAM/ dI bye yumaH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dI byeH/ dI bye tAM/ dI bye ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dI bya yaM/ dI bye ba/ dI bye ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dI bya tu/ dI bya tA ta/ dI bya tAM/
[\[307b.4\]]dI bya n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dI bya/ dI bya tA ta/ dI bya taM/ dI bya ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dI bya ni/ dI bya ni/ dI byA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dI bya ta/ a dI bya tAM/ a dI byan/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dI byaH/ a dI bya taM/ a dI bya ta/
[\[307b.5\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dI byi/ a ta las hi 'os hi phyis/ a dI byA ba/ a dI byA ma/ lung la/ bal dang po'i iT byin/ bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a di bI ta/ a de bi Sh+TAM/ a de bi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la byings gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs
[\[307b.6\]]pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di de ba/ di di btuH/ di di buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ di de bi tha/ di de ba thuH/ di di ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ di de ba/ di di bi ba/ di di ba ma/ luT la/ iT byin pas/ de bi tA/ de bi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i
[\[307b.7\]]ling la/ u ba d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ dI bya ta/ dI byA stAM/ dI byA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ngal dang po'i iT dang / pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ de bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]'thag pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'dzug ste/ cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra bas/ laT la/ sI bya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ sI bye ti/ sogs so/ /ling la/ sI bye ta/ sogs so/ loT la/ sI bya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a sI bya ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[308a.2\]]lung la/ bal dang po'i iT dang / bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a se bI ta/ a se bI Sh+TAM/ a se bi ShuH/ sogs so/ /laT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ si She ba/ si Shi btuH/ si Shi buH/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[308a.3\]]gsum la/ si Shi bi tha/ si Shi ba thuH/ si Shi baH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ si Shi ba/ si Shi bi ba/ si Shi bi ma/ luT la/ iT dang yon tan byas pas/ se bi tA/ se bi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling / /u pa d+hA li'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ sI byA ta/ sI
[\[308a.4\]]byA stAM/ sI byA suH/ sogs so/ /l+riT la/ bal dang po'i iT dang / pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ se bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a se bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /nr-i tI lus po bskyod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT
[\[308a.5\]]la/ nr-i t+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ nr-i t+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ nr-i t+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a nr-i t+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ bal dang po'i eT dang / bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a na rtI ta/ a na rti Sh+TAM/ a na rti ShuH/ sogs so/
[\[308a.6\]]liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ na na rta/ na nr-i ta tuH/ na nr-i tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ na na rti/ na nr-i ta thuH/ na nr-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ na na rta/ na nr-i ti ba/ na nr-i ti ma/ luT la/ iT byin pas/ na rti tA si/ sogs
[\[308a.7\]]so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ nr-i t+yA ta/ nr-i t+yA stAM/ nr-i d+yA suH/ sogs so/ /se nya si tsi kr-i ta ts+r-i ta tsh-I da tr-i da nr-i taH/ kr-i ta ts+r-i ta tshw-i da tr-i da nr-i ta las si tsa ma yin pa'i sa la'o/ kr-i tI bcod pa/ ts-i dI 'tshe ba/ u tsh+r-i dir 'bar ba/ u tr-i dir 'tshe ba/ nr-i tAM lus bskyod pa rnams las
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]pha rol gyis tsam yin pa'i byings phyed pa su yig dang po can la iT yang 'gyur te/ l+r-ingaT iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ na rti Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ na r+t+s+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a na rti Sh+ya ta/ sogs so sam/ a na r+t+s+ya ta/ sogs
[\[308b.2\]]so/ ! /ta sI skyo ba la 'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor te/ b+h+rA sha/ b+h+lA sha/ kla mu/ kra mu/ tra sI sogs kyis sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ sogs sam/ tra s+ya ti/ sogs so/ ling la/ tra se ta/ sogs sam/ tra s+ye ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[308b.3\]]loT la/ tra sa tu/ sogs sam/ tra s+ya tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a tra sa ta/ sogs som/ a tra s+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la iT byin/ ba da bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/ a trA sI ta/ a trA si Sh+TAM/ a trA si ShuH/ sogs so/ liTal/ Nal gnyis ma yin
[\[308b.4\]]pa rnams la/ dzr-i  b+h+ra mu  tra sa rnams kyis yang na 'os/ a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ta trA sa/ ta tra sa tuH/ tre sa tuH/ ta tra suH/ tre suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ta tra si tha/ tre si tha/ trA+e tra sa thuH/ tre sa thuH/
[\[308b.5\]]ta tra sa/ tre sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ta trA sa/ ta tra sa/ ta tra si ba/ tre si ba/ ta tra si ma/ tre si ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ tra si tA/ sra si tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ tra s+yA staM/ tra s+yA su \u0f7f/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ bal dang po'i iT byin
[\[308b.6\]]bas/ tra si Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /l+ring la/ a tra si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dzr-I Sha lang tsho nyams pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyar te/ byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta r-i i ta/ r-i'i a na las ra pha rol los/ rA/ u ba p+hA'i 'ang ngo sa ring por bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ laT
[\[308b.7\]]la/ dzI r+Ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ dzI r+Yi ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ dzI r+Ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a dzI r+Ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ dzr-i sta m+b+hu/ mru tsu sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ ang gi phyogs la/ r-i dr-i sha dag gi ang la yon/
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]tan nos yon tan byas pas/ a dza ra ta/ a dza ra tAM/ a dza ra na/ sogs so/ /si tsa'i phyogs la/ iT byin/ si tsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis 'phel ba byas bas/ a dzA r-i ta/ a dzA ri Sh+TAM/ a dzA ri ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a ta
[\[309a.2\]]Na la gnyis la 'phel ba/ gzhan rnams la/ dzrAM/ b+h+ra bu/ tra sa rnams kyi yang na 'os/ a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba yang na ba dang / r-i ts+tsha ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza dzA ra/ dze ra tuH/ dza dza ra tuH/ dze ruH/ dza dza ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[309a.3\]]dze ri tha/ dza dza ri tha/ dze ra thuH/ dza dza ra thuH/ dze ra/ dza dza ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza dzA ra/ dza dza ra/ dze ri ba/ dza dza ri ba/ dze ri ma/ dza dza ri ma/ luT la/ br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ dza ri tU/ dza ri tA si/ sogs sam/ dza rI tA/ dza rI tA si/
[\[309a.4\]]sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta 'os/ i ta du bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ dzI r+YA ta/ dzIr+YA stAM/ dzI r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la br-i r-I ta sogs kyis iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ dza ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ dza rI Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing
[\[309a.5\]]la/ a dza ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a dza rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ o taHsh+ya ni/ yo ta kyi sh+ya na la'o/ /byings mtha'i o ta ni sh+yan pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ sho la sh+ya na/ mdo 'dis o ta phyis pas/ laT la/ sh+ya ti/
[\[309a.6\]]sogs dang / ling la/ sh+ye ta/ sogs so/ /laT la/ sh+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ shi ta nye ba'i yul ma yin pa la e tsa'i A ta 'os/ e A ta/ ng+heT shA tshA sA las gdam nga 'os si tsa dbyi ba dang / yam ram nam A ta rnams kyis saka
[\[309a.7\]]yang na 'os/ sa ka dang iT byin pas/ a shA sI ta/ a shA sISh+TaM/ a shA sI ShuH/ sogs dang / si tsa phyis pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a shAta/ a shA tAM/ a shuH/ Ata las sa sos dz+hi dzus/ tshig mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis pha rol gyi gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]shAH/ a shA taM/ a shA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a shA/ a shA ba/ a shA ma/ liT la/ Nal gnyis au/ /iT las kyang A ta kyi dbyi 'os/ a tA dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sha shau/ sha sha tuH/ sha shuH/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[309b.2\]]gsum la/ sha shi tha/ shA shA tha/ sha sha thuH sha sha /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shau /sha shi ba/ sha shi ma/ luT la/ shA tA/ shA tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ shA yA ta/ shA yA stAM/ shA yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ shA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a
[\[309b.3\]]shA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /cho ga cod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug cing tsho ga thams cad sho dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ tsh+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ tsh+yeta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ tsh+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a tsh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ sa ka dang iTa'i phyogs
[\[309b.4\]]la/ a tshA sI ta/ a tshA siSh+TAM/ a tshA si ShuH/ sogs dang / si tsa phyis pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tshA ta/ a tshA tAM/ a tshuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tshAH/ a tshA taM/ a tshA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tshAM/ a tshA ba/ a tshA ma/ liTa'i skyes

[\[309b.6\]]l+r-iT la/ tshA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a tshA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Sho mtha'i las la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa gnyis dang 'dra bas/ laT la/ s+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ s+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ s+ya tu/ sogs
[\[309b.7\]]dang / lang la/ a s+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ sa ka dang iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ a sA sI ta/ a sA si Sh+TAM/ a sA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /si tsa phyis pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sA ta/ a sA tAM/ a suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sAH/ a sA
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]taM/ a sA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sAM/ a sA ba/ a sA ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sa sau/ sa sa tuH/ sa suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa si tha/ sa sA tha/ sa sa thuH/ sa sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa sau/ sa si ba/
[\[310a.2\]]sa si ma/ luT la/ sA tA/ sA tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ling la e 'os/ er bsgyur bas/ se yA ta/ se yA stAM/ se yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ sA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a sA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /[\[]rdo [\]]gcod pa la'o zhes pa'ang ma
[\[310a.3\]]tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ t+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ d+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ t+ya tu/ sogs dang / /lang la/ a d+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ gA ti stA/ g+hu sogs kyis si tsa dbyi ba kho na ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dA ta/ a dA tAM/ a duH/ skyes bu
[\[310a.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/ a dAH/ a dA taM/ a tA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dAM/ a dA ba/ a dA ma/ liT 'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da dau/ da da tuH/ lung la/ 'dir a tA mtha' yin kyang / sa ka dang iT mi 'jug gsung / da duH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da di tha/ da dA
[\[310a.5\]]tha/ da da thuH/ da da/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da dau/ da di ba/ da di ma/ luT la/ dA tA/ dA tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ling la e'os/ er bsgyur bas/ de yA ta/ de yA stAM/ de yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a dA s+ya ta/
[\[310a.6\]]sogs so/ ! /rA ng+ha yang dag par grub pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ rA ng+h+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ rA ng+h+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ rA ng+h+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a rA ng+h+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ dz+ha la dang po rnams la/ dz+ha la las dz+ha la 'os
[\[310a.7\]]si tsa phyis/ khar la tsa ra sogs kyis bsgrubs bas/ a rA t+sI ta/ a rA t+hAM/ a rA t+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a rA t+sIH/ a rA t+taM/ a tA t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a rA t+saM/ a rA t+sA/ a rA t+sA/ rA ng+hau hi ng+sA yAM/ rA ng+hi la 'tshe ba la'o/ /rA ng+hi 'tshe ba don la 'jug ba na liTa'i Nal
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]gnyis ma gtogs gzhan rnams pha rol la a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang / er bsgyur ba sogs yang na bar byed la/ yang dag par grub pa'i don la ni mi dbyi'o/ /liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ra rA ng+ha/ ra rA ng+ha tuH/ re ng+ha tuH/ ra rA ng+huH/ re ng+huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ra rA ng+hi tha/ re ng+hi tha/
[\[310b.2\]]ra rA ng+ha thuH/ re ng+ha thuH/ ra rA ng+ha/ re ng+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ra rA ng+ha/ ra rA ng+hi ba/ re ng+hi ba/ ra rA ng+hi ma/ re ng+hi ma/ luT la/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ng+ha da byas pas/ rA ng+ng+hA/ rang+ng+hA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ rA ng+h+yA ta/ rA ng+ng+h+yA stAM/ rA ng+ng+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /
[\[310b.3\]]l+r-iT la/ khar la tsar 'os/ ng+ha ta ra bsgyur bas/ rA t+s+yA ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a rA t+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /sA ng+ha yang dag par grub par byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ l+riTa'i skabs a b+h+yA sa mi dbyi pa'i khyad par ma gtogs bya ba thams cad rA ng+ha dang 'dra ste/
[\[310b.4\]]laT la/ sA ng+h+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ sA ng+h+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ sA ng+h+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a sA ng+h+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sA t+sI ta/ a sA t+tAM/ a sA t+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sA t+sIH/ a sA ng+hi ma/ a sA t+ta/ skyes
[\[310b.5\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sA t+saM/ a sA t+s+ma/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sa sA ng+ha/ sa sA ng+ha tuH/ sa sA ng+huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa sA ng+hi tha/ sa sA t+tha/ sa sA ng+ha thuH/ sa sA ng+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa sA ng+ha/ sa sA ng+hi ba/ sa sA ng+hi ma/ luT la/ sAng+ng+hA/
[\[310b.6\]]sA ng+ng+hA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ sA ng+h+ya ta/ sA ng+h+yA stAM/ sA ng+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ sA t+s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a sA t+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /bya ng+ha snun pa la'o zhes pa'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ di ba sogs kyis sh+yan/ gra hi/ dz+yA  ba yi/ bya ng+hi
[\[310b.7\]]sogs kyis saM pra sA ta ta byas pas/ laT la/ bi ng+h+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ bi ng+h+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ bi ng+h+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a bi ng+h+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ba da bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba/ dz+ha la dang po rnams la/ dz+ha la las dz+ha la la'os/ si tsa
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]'jig /khar la tsar sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a byA t+sI ta/ a byA t+tAM/ a byA t+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a byA t+sIH/ a byA t+taM/ a byA t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a byA t+saM/ a byA t+sA/ a byA t+s+ma/ liT la/ kita
[\[311a.2\]]min pa rnams la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa saM pra sA ra Na dang / kita rnams la gra hi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ bi byA ng+ha/ bi bi ng+ha tuH/ bi bi ng+huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi bya ng+hi tha/ bi bya t+tha/ bi bi ng+ha thuH/ bi bi ng+hi/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi byA
[\[311a.3\]]ng+ha/ bi bya ng+ha/ bi bi ng+hi ba/ bi bi ng+hi ma/ luT la/ dz+haSha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ dz+hal sogs kyis ng+ha dar bsgyur bas/ bya t+d+hA/ bya ng+ng+hA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gra hi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na byas pas/ bi ng+h+yA ta/ bing+h+yA stAM/ pi ng+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ khar la tsar
[\[311a.4\]]'os/ ng+ha tar bsgyur bas/ bya t+s+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a bya t+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /pu Sha rgyas pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ pu Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ puSh+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ pu Sh+ya tuH/ sogs dang /
[\[311a.5\]]lang la/ a pu Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs kyi mdos/ ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/ a pu Sha ta/ a bu Sha tAM/ a pu Sha na/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pu po Sha/ pu pu Sha tuH/ pu pu
[\[311a.6\]]ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum pa/ pu po Shi tha/ pu poSh+tha/ pu pu Sha thuH/ pu pu Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pu po Sha/ pu pu Shi ba/ pu pu Shi ma/ luT la/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ Sha Tul Sha Tu 'os/ ta Tar bsgyur bas/ po Sh+TA/ po Sh+TA si/ sogs so/ /
[\[311a.7\]]smon pa'i ling la/ pu Sh+yA ta/ pu Sh+yA stAM/ pu Sh+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha byas pas/ po k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a po k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]sh+li Sha 'khyud pa la'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ sh+li Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ sh+li Sh+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ sh+li Sh+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a shI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ pu Sha sogs d+yu ta sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/ a sh+li Sha ta/
[\[311b.2\]]a sh+li Sha tAM/ a sh+li Sha ta/ sogs so/ /sh+li Sha a ling+ga ne/ sh+li Sha 'khyud pa la'o/ /sh+li Sha 'khyud pa'i don brjod pa na ts+li k+sa ra bsgyur bar bya ste/ ts+li k+sa ka phyis/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ a sh+li k+Sha ta/ a sh+li k+Sha tAM/ a sh+li k+Sha na/
[\[311b.3\]]sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ shi sh+le Sha/ shi sh+li Sha tuH/ shi sh+le Sha tuH/ shi sh+li ShuH/ shi sh+le ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shi sh+li Shi tha/ shi sh+le Sh+Tha/ shi sh+li Sha thuH/ shi sh+le Sha thuH/ shi sh+li Sha/ shi sh+le Sha/ skyes bu
[\[311b.4\]]phyi ma gsum la/ shi sh+le Sha/ shi sh+li Shi ba/ shi sh+le Shi ba/ shi sh+li Shi ma/ shi sh+le Shi ma/ luT la/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan dang / Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/ ta Tar bsgyur bas/ sh+le Sh+TA/ sh+le Sh+TA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ sh+li ShA ta/ sh+li ShA stAM/ sh+li Sh+yA suH/ sogs so/ /
[\[311b.5\]]l+r-iT la/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ sh+le k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sh+le Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ra ng+ha 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ ra ng+h+ya ti/ sogs
[\[311b.6\]]dang / ling la/ ra ng+h+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ ra ng+h+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a ra ng+h+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ puka mtha' sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur/ ra ng+hi dza b+ha dag gi a tsa la 'os/ num A ga ma byin pas/ a ran+ng+ha ta/ a ran+ng+ha tAM/ a ran+ng+han/ sogs so/ /liT la'ang gnyis brjod/ ra
[\[311b.7\]]ng+hi dza b+ha dag gi a tsa la 'os num byin pas/ ra ra n+ng+ha/ raran+ng+huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ raran+ng+hi tha/ ra ran+ng+ha thuH/ ra ra n+ng+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ra ran+ng+ha/ ra ran+ng+hi ba/ ra ran+ng+hi ma/ ra ng+hA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / /ra ng+ha la sogs pa ste/ ra ng+ha 'tshe
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]pa/ Na sha mi mthong ba/ tri pa tshim pa/ dr-i pa dga' ba/ dru ha 'tshe ba byed du 'jug par 'dod pa/ mu ha the tshom/ Sh+Nu ha skyug pa/ Sh+Ni ha dga' ba rnams las pha rol gyi byings phyed pa bal dang po can iT yang na 'gyur ro/ /ne T+ya li Ti ra ng+heH/ ra ng+hi'i liT ma yin pa'i
[\[312a.2\]]iT la ma yin no/ /gong du ra ng+hi dang dza b+ha dag la a tsa pha rol la num A ga ma ster bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal a tsa dang po yin kyang i Ta pha rol gyi iT ma yin pas/ iT pha rol la ra ng+hi la num 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ra ng+ha la/ luT sbyar bas/ ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang
[\[312a.3\]]ngos iT yang na bar byas/ mdo 'dis num A ka ma mi ster/ iTa'i phyogs la/ ra ng+hi tA/ ra ng+hi tA si/ sogs so/ /iT med pa'i phyogs la/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ dz+ha la sogs kyis ng+ha dar bsgyur bas/ ra ng+ng+hA/ ra ng+ng+hA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ra ng+h+yA ta/ ra ng+h+yA stAM/ ra ng+h+yA suH/ sogs
[\[312a.4\]]so/ /l+r-iT la/ ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / /iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ ra ng+hi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ khar la tsar 'os ng+ha tar bsgyur bas/ ra t+s+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ra ng+hiSh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ra t+s+ya ta/ sogs
[\[312a.5\]]so/ ! /tr-i pa tshim pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ tr-i bya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ tr-i pye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ tr-i pya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a tr-i pya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ puSha la sogs pas/ ts+li ang du bsgyur ba dang si tsa ra bsgyur pa yang na bar
[\[312a.6\]]byas pas/ ang gi phyogs la/ a tr-i pa taM/ a tr-i pa tA/ a tr-i pa na/ sogs dang / si tsa'i phyogs la/ ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngos/ iT yang na byar bya ste/ iTa'i phyogs la puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a tar+pIta/ a tar+pi Sh+TAM/ a ta rbi ShuH/ sogs
[\[312a.7\]]dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a nu dA N+ta'i'ang r-i ta u pa ng+hA'i a ma yang na 'os/ am yang na bar byed de/ am ma byin pa'o phyogs la/ si tsa la 'phel ba dang / dz+ha la dang po rnams la si tsa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tAr+p+tAM/ a tAr+p+suH/ skyes
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tAr+p+sIH/ a tA r+b+taM/ a tA r+b+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tA r+p+saM/ a tA r+p+s+wa/ a tAr+b+s+ma/ sogs so/ /am gyi phyogs la/ i ka gi a tsa la ya Na dang / de nas i tsa la 'phel ba/ dz+ha la dang po rnams la si tsa dbyi pa sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po
[\[312b.2\]]gsum la/ a trAp+sIta/ a trAp+tAM/ atrAMp+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ atrAp+sIH/ a trAb+haM/ a trAp+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a trap+saM/ a trAp+s+wa/ a trAp+s+ma/ sogs so/ /liT la/ gnyis brjod r-i'i a ta sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ta tar+pa/ ta tra
[\[312b.3\]]pa tuH/ ta tr-i puH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ta tarbi tha/ ta tar+p+tha/ ta tr-i pa thuH/ ta tr-i pa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ta tar+pa/ ta tr-i pi ba/ ta tr-i pi ma/ luT la/ ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngos iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ ta r+pi tA/ ta r+pi tA si/
[\[312b.4\]]sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ a nu dA t+ta'i 'ang r-i ta upa ng+hA'i am yang na bar byas pas/ tar+p+tA/ tar+p+tA si/ sogs sam/ trap+tA/ tra b+tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ tr-i byA ta/ tri pyA stAM/ tr-i pyA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang ra ng+ha sogs kyis iT yang na bar
[\[312b.5\]]byas/ iT med pa'i phyogs la am yang na bar byas pas/ tar+p+ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ tar+p+s+ya ti/ sogs sam/ yang na trap+s+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhi du/ l+r-ing la/ a ta rbi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ta r+p+s+ya ta/ sogs sam/ yang na a trap+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dr-i pa dga' ba
[\[312b.6\]]dang grol bar byed pa dag la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug cing / cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa tr-i pa dang 'dra ste khyad par cung zad tsam yang med do/ ! /mu ha rmongs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ mu h+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ mu h+ye ta/ sogs so/ /
