[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mu mo hi tha/ mu mu ha thuH/ mu mu ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mu mo ha/ mu mu ho pa/ mu mu hi ma/ luT la/ ra ng+ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngos/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ mo hi tA/ mo hi tA si/
[\[313a.2\]]sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ dru ha/ mu ha/ Sh+Nu ha/ Sh+Ni ha/ rnams kyis yang na'o/ /ha D+ha ru bsgyur ba dang g+ha ru bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ D+ha'i phyogs la/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yod tan/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ng+haD+ha/ D+ha las D+ha dbyi 'os
[\[313a.3\]]D+ha gong ma phyis pas/ mo D+hA/ mo D+ha si/ sogs dang / g+har bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ dz+ha la sogs kyis g+ha gar bsgyur bas/ mo g+ng+hA/ mo g+ng+hA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ mu h+yA ta/ mu h+yA stAM/ mu h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /
[\[313a.4\]]l+r-iT la/ ra ng+ha sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ mo hi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ha D+ha dang g+ha yang na bar byed de/ D+ha'i phyogs la sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka dang / g+ha'i phyogs la/ khar la tsar 'os/ g+ha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra
[\[313a.5\]]bsgyur bas sgrub tshul mi gcig kyang gzugs gcig pas/ mo k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la'ang a mo hi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a mo k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Na sha mi mthong ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ na sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ na sh+ye ta/
[\[313a.6\]]sogs so/ /loT la/ na sh+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a na sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ buSha sogs kyis ts+li ang du bsgyur bas/ a na sha ta/ an sha tAM/ a na shan/ sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs na/ na she ra ta e t+ba ma di bA/ na shi'i a ta e nyid du ang la yang na'o/ /ts+li
[\[313a.7\]]bsgyur ba'i ang pha rol la na shi'i a ta e nyid du yang na bsgyur te/ a ne sha ta/ a ne sha tAM/ a ne shan/ sogs so/ /liT la kita rnams la/ a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ na nA sha /ne sha tuH/ ne shuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ne shi tha/ ne sha thuH/
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]ne sha /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ na nA sha /ne shi ba/ ne shi ma/ ma sheHShA n+ta s+ya/ na shi'i Sha mtha'i 'o/ /brash+dza b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis na shi'i sha Shar bsgyur bas Sha mtha' can du gyur pa na/ de'i sngon du na Nar 'gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yi ge byung yang na Nar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ na sha /luTa'i rkyen can gyi
[\[313b.2\]]sngon du pra bzhag na Na ra mi 'gyur/ pra na Sh+TA lta bu'o/ /luT la ra ng+ha sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas iTa'i phyogs la/ na shi tA/ na shi tA si/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ mas+dzin sho rnuM ha li/ mas+dzi na sha dag gi hal la numa'o/ /Tu mas+dzi dag pa dang na sha dag la rkyen hal dang po
[\[313b.3\]]can ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rnams pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/ ma gnas don u brjod don no/ /na sha la/ luT/ brash+dza b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ mdo 'dis num byin/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/ ta Tar bsgyur bas/ naMSh+TA/ naM Sh+TA rau/ naM Sh+TA raH/ nAM Sh+TA si/ sogs dang / 'grel
[\[313b.4\]]par lung drangs pa/ na sherbA/ na shi'i yang na'o/ /na sha'i sha yig ni dz+hal so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge dang po can pha rol la yang na g+ha yig tu 'gyur te/ sha g+ha/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ dz+ha la sogs kyis g+ha gar bsgyur bas/ naM b+ng+h+ya/ naM g+ng+hA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ na sh+yA ta/ na sh+yA stAM/
[\[313b.5\]]na sh+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ra ng+ha sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ na shi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ mas+dzin sha dag gi hal la num 'os/ num A ga ma/ yardzin sha sogs kyis num A ga ma/ bras+dza sogs kyis sha Sha ra bsgyur ba dang / na sha'i
[\[313b.6\]]yang na 'os/ /g+har bsgyur ba yang na bar byed kyang sha'i phyogs la/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka dang / g+ha'i phyogs la/ khar la tsar 'os/ g+ha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ cho ga mi 'dra yang grub gzugs gcig pas/ naMk+Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a
[\[313b.7\]]na ra'i Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a naM k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ sha mA ma Sh+TA nAM dI r+g+haHsh+ya ni/ sha ma sogs brgyad rnams kyi sh+ya na la ring po'o/ /sha mu la sogs pa brgyad de sha mu dang da mu nye bar zhi ba/ ta mu 'dod pa/ shra mu dka' thub/ g+h+ra
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]mu mi gnas pa/ k+Sha mu Sha bzod pa/ kla mu dman pa/ ma dI dga' ba rnams kyi u pa ng+hA sh+yan pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ sha mu la sh+yan/ mdo 'dis ring por byas pas/ laT la/ shA mya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ shA mye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ shA mya tu/
[\[314a.2\]]sogs dang / lang la/ a shA mya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ a sha mI ta/ a sha mi Sh+TAM/ a sha mi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ ki ta rnams la a b+d+yA sa dbyi ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sha shA ma/ she ma tuH/ she muH/ skyes bu dbus
[\[314a.3\]]ma gsum la/ she mi tha/ she ma thuH/ she ma/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shA ma/ sha sha ma/ she mi ba/ she mi ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ sha mi tA/ sha mi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ sha myA ta/ sha myA stAM/ sha myA yuH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ sha mi
[\[314a.4\]]Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sha mya ta/ sogs so/ ! /kla mu dman pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ b+h+rA sha /b+h+lA sha /b+h+ra mu/ kra mu/ kla mu sogs kyis shab dang sh+yan yang na bar byas pas/ sh+yan gyi phyogs la/ sha ma sogs brgyad rnams kyi
[\[314a.5\]]sogs kyis ring po byas pas/ laT la/ kla ma ti/ sogs sam/ klA mya ti/ sogs so/ /ling la/ kla me ta/ sogs sam/ klA mye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ kla ma tu/ sogs sam/ klA mya tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a kla ma ta/ sogs sam/ a klA mya ti/ sogs so/ /
[\[314a.6\]]lung la eT byin pas/ a ka la mI ta/ a kla mi Sh+TAM/ a kla mi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa klA ma/ tsa kla ma tuH/ tsa kla muH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa kla mi tha/ tsa kla ma thuH/ tsa kla ma/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[314a.7\]]la/ tsa klA ma/ tsa kla ma/ tsa kla mi ba/ tsa kla mi ma/ luT la/ kla mi tA/ kla mi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ kla myA ta/ kla myA stAM/ kla myA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ bal dang po'i iT byin/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Shar bsgyur bsags kyis bsgrub pas
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]kla mi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a kla mi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /a su 'phen pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ a s+ya ti/ sogs so/ /loT la/ a s+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ A s+ya ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[314b.2\]]lung la/ a s+ya tu s+thu ka /a s+ya ti'i thu ka'o/ /a s+ya ti'i ts+li bsgyur bas ang pha rol la thuka A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjo don no/ /a s+ya ti/ ba k+ti khyA ti rnams las ang ngos/ ts+li ang du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis thu ka A ga ma byin pas/ A s+tha ta/ A s+tha tAM/ A s+tha
[\[314b.3\]]na/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A sa/ A sa tuH/ A suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A si tha/ A sa thuH/ A sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A sa/ A si ba/ A si ma/ luT la iT byin pas/
[\[314b.4\]]a si tA/ a si tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ a s+yA ta/ a s+yA stAM/ a s+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ a si Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ A si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ya su rab tu 'bad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams 'jug ste/ ya
[\[314b.5\]]so \u0f85 nu pa sarbA ta/ ya sa las nyer bsgyur med pa las so/ /ya su rab tu 'bad pa las nyer bsgyur sngon du sbyor na/ byed pa po'i don la sh+yan kho na 'gyur zhing sngon du nyer bsgyur med na shab dang sh+yan yang na bar bya ste/ laT la/ ya sa ti/ sogs sam/ ya s+ya ti/ sogs so/ /ling la/ ya
[\[314b.6\]]se ta/ sogs sam/ ya s+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ ya sa tu/ sogs sam/ ya s+ya tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a ya sa ta/ sogs sam/ a ya s+ya ta/ sogs so/ /nyer bsgyur sbyor na sh+yan kho na ste/ pra ya s+ya ti/ sogs so/ /saM ya sh+tsa/ sam ya sa las kyang ngo / /nyer
[\[314b.7\]]bsgyur sngon ma'i ya su las kyang sha pa dang sh+yan yang na bar bya ste/ saM ya sa ti/ yang dag bar 'bad par byed/ sogs sam/ saM ya s+ya ti/ sogs so/ /lung la iT byin pas/ a yA sI ta/ a yA si Sh+TAM/ rab tu 'bad bar byed/ a yA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ kita rnams la
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ya yA sa/ ye sa tuH/ ye suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ye si tha/ ye sa thuH/ ye sa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ya yA sa/ ya ya sa/ ye si ba/ ye si ma/ luT la/
[\[315a.2\]]iT byin pas/ ya si tA/ ya si tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ya s+yA ta/ ya s+yA stAM/ ya s+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ ya si Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ya si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /lu b+ha chags pa la'o zhes pa la'ang
[\[315a.3\]]a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ lu b+h+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ lu b+h+ye ta/ sogs dang / loT la/ lu b+h+ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a lu b+h+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a lo b+hI ta/ a lo b+hi Sh+TAM/ a lo b+hi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod
[\[315a.4\]]pa sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/ lu lo b+ha/ lu lu b+ha tuD+haH/ lu lu b+huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ lu lo b+hi tha/ lu lu b+ha thuH/ lu lu b+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ lu lo b+ha/ lu lu b+hi ba/ lu lu b+hi ma/ luT la/ i Shu/ sa ha la b+ha sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/
[\[315a.5\]]lo b+hi tA/ li b+hi ta saM/ sogs sam/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ dz+ha la sogs kyis b+ha bar bsgyur bas/ lo b+ng+hA/ lo b+ng+hA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ lu b+h+yA ta/ lu b+h+yA stAM/ lu b+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ li b+hi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de
[\[315a.6\]]bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a lo b+hi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /nyi mi dA ga sher ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ mi de rgu Na/ mi di'i yon tan no/ /nyi mi di'i rkyen sha 'gro ba pha rol la yon tan du bsgyur te/ laT la/ me d+ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ me d+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ me bya
[\[315a.7\]]tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a me d+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ pu Sha sogs kyis ts+li yang du bsgyur bas/ a mi da ta/ a mi da tAM/ a mi dan sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ mi me da/ mi mi da tuH/ mi mi duH/ skyes bu
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]dbus ma gsum la/ mi me di tha/ mi ma da thuH/ mi mi da/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mi med/ mi mi di pa/ mi mi di ma/ luT la/ iT byin puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ me di tA/ me di tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ mi d+yA ta/ mi d+yA stAM/ mi d+yA suH/ sogs
[\[315b.2\]]so/ /liT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ me di Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a me di Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ShUng srog chags rab tu skye ba la'o zhes pa la tang rnams sbyor te/ byings kyi dang po'i sa Sha/ di ba sogs kyis sh+yan sbyar bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang
[\[315b.3\]]po gsum la/ sU ya te/ sU ye te/ sU ya n+te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sU ya se/ sU ye the/ sU ya ng+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sU ye/ sU yA ba he/ sU yA ma he/ de bzhin du/ ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sU ye ta/ sU ye yA tAM/ sU ye ran/ skyes bu dbus
[\[315b.4\]]ma gsum la/ sU ye thAH/ sU ye yA thAM/ sU ye ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sU ye ya/ sU ye ba hi/ sU ye ma hi/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sU ya tAM/ sU ye tAM/ sU ya n+tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sU ya swa/ mtha' min pa sogs kyis mI yuTa'is byis a la yon tan/ sU ye thAM/
[\[315b.5\]]sU ya ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sU yai/ sU yA ba hai/ sU yA ma hai/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sU ya ta/ a sU ye tAM/ a sU yan+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sU ya thAH/ a sU ye thAMH/ a sU ya ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sU ye/ a sU yA ba hi/ a sU
[\[315b.6\]]yA na hi/ lung la/ swar ti sU ti su ya ti sogs kyis iT yang na bar bya ste/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ a sa biSh+Ta/ a sa bi ShA tAM/ a sa bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[315b.7\]]a so Sh+TA/ a so ShA tAM/ a so Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a so ShAH/ a so Sh+wa brAM/ a so ng+h+yaM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a soShi/ a soSh+wa hi/ a so Sh+ma hi/ liT la byings gnyis brjod/ a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyi u bar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrub pas/ skyes bu
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]dang po gsum la/ su Shu be/ su Shu bA te/ suShu bi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su Shu bi She/ su Shu bA the/ su Shu bi ng+hA+e/ su Shu bi D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su Shu be/ su Shu bi ba he/ su Shu bi ma he/ lugs la/ swa ra ti/ sU ti/ sU ya ti sogs kyis
[\[316a.2\]]iT yang na bar byas pas/ sa bi tA/ sa bi tA se/ sogs sam/ so tA/ so tA se/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ smon pa'i ling la/ iT yang na par byas pas/ sa bi ShI Sh+Ta/ sa pi ShI yA stAM/ sa bi ShI ran/ sogs sam/ so ShI Sh+Ta/ so ShI yA stAM/ so ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/
[\[316a.3\]]sa bi Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ so Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sa bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a se Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dIng zad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams 'jug ste/ laT la/ dI ya te/ sogs dang / ling la/ dI ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ dI ya tAM/ sogs dang / lang la/
[\[316a.4\]]a dI ya ta/ sogs so/ /mI nA ti mi no ti dI dAM l+ya pi tsa/ mI nA ti mi no ti/ dIng rnams kyi l+yab la'ang ngo / /mI nya 'tshe ba/ Du mi nya rab tu 'phen pa/ dIng zad pa rnams kyi mtha' kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen l+ya ba pha rol la A ta du bsgyur cing 'ang gi sgras Nal gnyis dang thal ma gtogs pa'i liT rnams dang / rkyen
[\[316a.5\]]sha 'gro ba ma yin pa pha rol la'ang A ta du bsgyur te/ dIng pa lung / mdo 'dis A ta tu bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dA sta/ a dA sA tAM/ a dA sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dA s+thAH/ a dA sA thA/ a dA ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dA si/ a dA swa hi/ a dA sma hi/
[\[316a.6\]]dI do yuT tsi kI ti/ dIng las a tse kra dra 'gro ba la yuTa'o/ /dIng las pha rol gyi a tsa kra nga 'gro ba'i ming can la yuT A ga ma 'gyur te/ liT la gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os/ a b+h+yA sa thung ngu / mdo 'dis yuT byin pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di dI ye/ di dI yA te/ di dI yi re/ skyes bu
[\[316a.7\]]dbus ma gsum la/ di dI yi She/ di dI yA the/ di dI yi ng+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ di dI ye/ di dI yi ba he/ di dI yi ma he/ luT la/ mI nA ti/ mi no ti/ dIng rnams kyis l+yab la'ang ngos A ta du bsgyur bas/ dA tA/ dA tA se/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ smon pa'i ling la/ dA sISh+Ta/ dA
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]sI yA stAM/ dA sI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang mI nA ti sogs kyis A ta du bsgyur bas/ dA s+ya te/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a dA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dza ni rab tu skye ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams 'jug ste/ dz+nyA dza no rdzA/ dz+nyA dzan dag gi dzA'o/ /dz+nyA khong du chud pa dang / dzan skye ba dag gi rkyen sha
[\[316b.2\]]'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la dzA zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ dzan la/ sh+yan/ mdo 'dis dzA ra bsgyur bas/ laT la/ dzA ya te/ sogs dang / ling la/ dzA yi ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ dzA ya tAM/ sogs dang / lang la/ a dzA ya ta/ sogs so/ /dza ni ba ng+h+yo sh+tsa/ dza ni pa ng+hi dag gi 'ang ngo / /dza ni skye ba
[\[316b.3\]]dang ba ng+hi dag gi ts+li bsgyur ba'i tsi Na dang kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen nya 'gro ba rnams la u pa ng+hA 'phel bar bsgyur ba ma yin te/ dzan la lung sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ la ta/ dI pa dzan bu ng+ha sogs kyis ts+li/ tsi Na ra bsgyur pa dang si tsar bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ tsi Na'i phyogs la mdo
[\[316b.4\]]'dis 'phel ba mi byed/ tsi Na las 'jig gos ta phyis/ a dza ni/ si tsa'i phyogs la iT byin pas/ a dza ni Sh+Ta/ gnyis tshig dang ma tshig la/ a dza ni ShA tAM/ a dza ni Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dza ni Sh+ThAH/ a dza ni ShA thAM/ a dza ni ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dza ni Shi/
[\[316b.5\]]a dza ni ShA hi/ a dza ni Sh+ma hi/ liT la/ gam han dzan sogs kyis u pa ng+hA phyis/ sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os/ na nyar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dza dz+nyi/ dza dz+nyA te/ dza dz+nyi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza dz+nyi Sha/ dza dz+nyA the/ dza dz+nyi ng+hA+e/ dza dz+nyi D+ny+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza dz+nyi/
[\[316b.6\]]dza dz+nye ba he/ dza dz+nyi ma he/ luT la iT byin pas/ dza ni tA/ dza ni tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dza ni ShI Sh+Ta/ dza ni ShI yA stAM/ dza ni Sh+Thi ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT byin pas/ dza ni Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la'ang iT byin pas/ a dza ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[316b.7\]]dI bI 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams sbyar te/ laT la/ dI pya te/ sogs dang / ling la/ dI bye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ dI pya tAM/ sogs dang / lang la/ a dI pya ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dI pa dza na bu ng+ha sogs kyis ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur ba dang si tsar
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/ a dI po'am/ a dI piSh+Ta/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a dI pi Sh+Ta tAM/ a dI pi Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dI pi Sh+TAH/ a dI pi ShA thAM/ a dI pi ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dI pi Shi/ a dI bi ShA
[\[317a.2\]]hi/ a dI pi Sh+ma hi/ liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di dI pe/ di dI pA te/ di dI pi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ di dI pi She/ di dI pA the/ di dI pi ng+hA+e/ di dI pi D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ di dI pe/ di dI pi ba he/ di dI pi ma he/
[\[317a.3\]]luT la iT byin pas/ dI pi tA/ dI pi tA se/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ smon pa'i ling la/ dI pi ShI Sh+Ta/ dI pi ShI yA stAM/ dI pi ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT byin pas/ dI pi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a dI pi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /pU rI tshim pa la'o zhes pa la'ang tang
[\[317a.4\]]rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ pUr+ya te/ sogs dang / ling la/ bUr+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ pUr+ya tAM/ sogs dang / lang la/ a pU r+Ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dI ba dzan bu ng+ha sogs kyis ts+li tsi Na dang si sa yang na bar byas pas/ a pU ri/ a pU ri Sh+Ta/ lhag ma
[\[317a.5\]]rnams la iT byin pas/ a pU ri ShA tAM/ a pU ri Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pu pU re/ pu pA rA te/ pu pU ri re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pu pU ri re/ pu pU rA the/ pu pU ri ng+hA+e/ pu pU ri D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[317a.6\]]la/ pu pU re/ pu pU ri ba he/ pu pU ri ma he/ luT la iT byin pas/ pU ri tA/ pU ri tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ pU ri ShISh+Ta/ pU ri ShI yA stAM/ pU ri ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ sU ri Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la a pU re Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /pa da 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tang
[\[317a.7\]]rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ pa d+ye te/ sogs dang / ling la/ pa d+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ pa r+ya tAM/ sogs dang / lang la/ a pa d+ya ta/ sogs so/ tsi Na te pa daH/ pad las ta la tsi Na'o/ /pa da las lung gi la bsgyur ba'i tang gi gcig tshig ta pha rol la ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur te/ pa da la/ lung la ta/
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]mdo 'dis ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur/ u pa ng+hA'i 'ang ngos/ 'phel ba/ tsi Na las 'jig gos ta phyis pas/ a pA di/ lhag ma rnams la/ dz+ha la dang po can la si tsa phyis/ khar la tsar sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a bat+thA tAM/ a pa t+sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[317b.2\]]la/ a pat+thAH/ a pat+sA thAM/ a pang+ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bat+si/ a pat+sA hi/ liT la a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pe de/ pe dA te/ be di re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pe di She/ pe tA the/ pe di ng+h+we/ pe di D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pe de/ pe di ba he/ pe di ma he/ luT la Shar la tsa ra 'os/ da
[\[317b.3\]]tar bsgyur bas/ pat+hA/ bat+ShA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la'ang pat+sISh+TA/ pat+sI yA stAM/ pat+sI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ pat+sA te/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a pat+s+yata/ sogs so/ ! /bung+ha khong du chud pa la'o zhes pa'ang ba tang rnams 'jug ste/ laT la/ bu ng+h+ya te/ sogs dang / ling la/ bu ng+h+ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ bu ng+h+ya tAM/ sogs dang /
[\[317b.4\]]lang la/ a bu ng+h+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dI pa dza na bu ng+ha sogs kyis ts+li tsa Na dang si tsa yang na bar byas/ tsi Na'i phyogs la buka sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a bo ng+hi/ si tsi'i phyogs la dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/ dz+haSha mtha' sogs kyis ta ng+ha/
[\[317b.5\]]dz+hal sogs kyis ng+ha da ra bsgyur bas/ a bu t+hA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a tsa gcig pa sogs ba b+ha ra bsgyur bas/ a ng+hut+sAtAM/ a b+hut+sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bu ng+ng+hAH/ a b+hu t+sA thAM/ a b+hu/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+hu t+si/ a b+hut+s+wa hi/ a b+hu t+sA hi/ liT la gnyis
[\[317b.6\]]brjod pa sogs kyis/ bu bu ng+he/ bu bu ng+hA te/ bu bu ng+hi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bu bu ng+hi She/ bu bu ng+hA the/ bu bu ng+hi ng+h+we/ bu bu ng+hi D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bu bu ng+he/ bu bu ng+hi pa he/ bu bu ng+hi ma he/ luT la/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ dz+haSha mtha' sogs kyis ta ng+ha/
[\[317b.7\]]dz+hal sogs kyis ng+ha dar bsgyur bas/ bo ng+b+hA/ bo ng+b+hA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ a tsa gcig pa sogs kyis ba b+ha/ Shar la tsar 'os ng+ha tar bsgyur bas/ bu t+sI Sh+Ta/ bu t+sI yA stAM/ bu t+sI ran/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-iT la/ b+ho t+s+ya te/ bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la'ang /
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]a b+ho t+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Na ha 'ching ba la'o zhes pa la yang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ Na'i na 'os Na na/ di ba sogs la sh+yan/ ha drangs pas laTa'i a tang la/ na h+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ na h+ya te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ na h+ye ta/ sogs dang /
[\[318a.2\]]tang la/ na h+ye/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ na h+ya tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ na h+ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a na h+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a na h+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ dz+hal dang po rnams la si tsa 'jig /na las ha'i ng+ha 'os/ ha ng+ha/ khar ya tsar sogs kyis
[\[318a.3\]]bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a nA t+sI ta/ a nA ng+ng+hAM/ a nA t+suH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a nAt+sID+haH/ a nA ng+ng+haM/ a nA ng+ng+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a nA t+saM/ a nA t+sA/ a nA t+s+ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a na ng+ng+ha/ a na t+sA tAM/ a na t+sa ta/
[\[318a.4\]]skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a na ng+ng+hAH/ a na t+sA thAM/ bad bradza sogs rtsis 'phel ba/ dz+haSha mtha' sogs kyis tang+ha/ dz+hal sogs kyis ng+ha nga / a na ng+ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a na t+si/ a na t+s+wa hi/ a na t+s+ma hi/ liT la gnyis brjod ki ta rnams la a b+h+ya sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur pa sogs kyi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum
[\[318a.5\]]la/ na nA ha/ ne ha tuH/ ne huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ne hi tha/ na na ng+ng+ha/ ne ha tha tuH/ ne ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ na nA ha/ na na ha/ ne hi ba/ ne hi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ne he/ ne hA te/ ne hi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ne hi Shi/ ne hA the/ ne hi ng+h+we/
[\[318a.6\]]ne hi D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ne he/ ne hi ba he/ ne hi ma ha/ luT la/ na las ha'i ng+ha'os/ ha ng+ha/ dz+haSha sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ dz+ha la sogs kyis ng+ha dar bsgyur pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ na ng+ng+hA/ na ng+ng+hA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ na ng+ng+hA/ na ng+ng+hA se/ smon pa'i ling
[\[318a.7\]]gi a tang la/ na h+yA ta/ na h+yA stAM/ na ng+hA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ na las ha'i ng+ha 'os/ ha ng+ha/ khar la tsa ra 'os ng+ha tar bsgyur bas/ nat+sISh+Ta/ nat+sI yA stAM/ nat+sI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang na las sogs kyis ha ng+ha/ khar la tsar du bsgyur pas/ a tang la/ na t+s+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]da t+s+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a na t+s+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a na t+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA ta di b+hAd yaHsa mA p+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i ma do las di bul sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// ! //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i
[\[318b.2\]]bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ di bu la sogs pa byed pa po la sh+yan 'jug pa rnams la laT sogs sbyor tshul spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rag pa rnams
[\[318b.3\]]re zhig rdzogs so// ! //da ni Shu nya la sogs pa rnams kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ ! Shu nya mngon par skye ba la'o zhes pas la laT sogs a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'gyur ro/ /sbA di b+h+yaHsh+nuH/ su la sogs pa rnams las sh+nu'o/ /Shu nya mngon par skye ba sogs ni su la sogs pa ste/ de rnams
[\[318b.4\]]las pha rol tu byed pa po'i don la sh+nu 'gyur te/ Shu nya la sh+nu/ sha shi ta kyi don byings kyi dang po'i Sha sa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su no ti/ su nu taH/ su nA n+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su no Shi/ su nu thaH/ su nu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[318b.5\]]la/ su no mi/ su nu baH/ su nAH/ su nu maH/ su n+maH/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su nu te/ su n+wA te/ su n+wa te/ skyes bu dbus ma  byings thams cad pa dang byings byed pa sogs kyi yon tan/ hu sh+nu dag gi byings thams cad la'ang ngos u bar bsgyur/ gsum la/ su nu She/ su n+wA the/ su nu
[\[318b.6\]]ng+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi  ba ma dag la 'di'i dbye ba'ang yang na 'os/ u dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas/ ma gsum la/ su n+we/ su nu ba he/ su nu ma he/ ling gi a tang la/ su nu yA ta/ su nu yA tAM/ su nu yuH/ sogs dang / tang la mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/ hu sh+nu dag gi byings thams cad ma
[\[318b.7\]]la 'os u bar bsgyur bas/ su n+wI ta/ su n+wI yA hAM/ su n+wI ran/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su no tu/ su nu tA ta/ su nu tAM/ su nA n+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su nu/ su nu tA ta/ su nu taM/ su nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su na bA ni/ su na bA ba/ su na bA ma/
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su nu tAM/ su nA twaM/ su n+wa tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su nu ShA/ su n+wA thAM/ su nu ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su na bai/ su na bA ba hai/ su na bA ma hai/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a su no ta/ a su nu tAM/ a su
[\[319a.2\]]n+wa na/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a su noH/ a su nu taM/ a su nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a su na baM/ a su nu ba/ a su n+wa/ a su nu ma/ a su n+ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a su nu ta/ a su n+wA tAM/ a su n+wa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a su nu thAH/
[\[319a.3\]]a su n+wA thAM/ a su nu ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a su ni/ a su nu ba hi/ a su n+wa hi/ a su nu ma hi/ a sun+sa hi/ lung gi a tar la/ ba ma sogs kyis yang na u phyis ba'o/ stu su ng+hu nya rnams la sogs kyis iT byin/ si tsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/ a sA bI ta/ a sA
[\[319a.4\]]bi Sh+TAM/ a sA bi ShuH/ sogs dang / tang la/ ru du su nu sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ a sa biSh+Ta/ a sa bi ShA tAM/ a sa bi Sha ta/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a soSh+Ta/ a so ShA tAM/ a so Sha ta/ skyes
[\[319a.5\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/ a soSh+ShAH/ a so ShA thAM/ a so ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a so Shi/ a so ShA hi/ a so Sh+ma hi/ liT la gnyis brjod/ a tsa dang po can rnams la/ a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su ShA ba/ su Shu ba tuH/
[\[319a.6\]]su Shu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su Sha bi tha/ su Shu ba thuH/ su Shu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su ShA ba/ su Sha bi ba/ su Shu bi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su Shu be/ su Shu bA the/ su Shu bi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ su Shu bi She/ su Shu bA
[\[319a.7\]]the/ su Shu bi ng+h+re/ su Shu bi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ su Shu be/ su Shu bi ba he/ su Shu bi ma he/ luT la/ ru du su nu sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis iT yang na par byas pas/ a tang la/ sa bi tA/ sa bi tA si/ sogs sam/ so tA/ so tA si/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ tang la/ sa bi tA/ sa bi tA
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]se/ sogs sam/ so tA/ so tA se/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling gi a tang la/ kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring po byas bas/ sU yA ta/ sU yA stAM/ sU yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ ru du su sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ sa bi ShI Sh+Ta/ sa bi ShI yA stAM/ sa bi ShI ran/ sogs
[\[319b.2\]]sam/ so ShI Sh+Ta/ so ShI yA stAM/ so ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang a tang la/ sa bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs som/ so Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /tang la/ sa pi Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ so Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a sa bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a so Sh+ya ta/ sogs
[\[319b.3\]]so/ /tang la/ a sa bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a so Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /su no teHs+ya sa noH/ su na ti'i s+ya sa na dag la'o/ nyer bsgyur sogs sa Shar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung yang su no ti'i sa yig s+ya dang san dag gi rkyen pha rol la Shar bsgyur ba ma yin te/ b+s+ris+Ta bi Sh+ya ti/
[\[319b.4\]]sogs so/ ! /Du mi nya rab tu 'phen pa la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa rnams la cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ mi no ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ mi nu te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ mi nu yA ta/ sogs dang /

[\[319b.6\]]ram nam a ta rnams kyis saka 'ang ngos/ sa ka A ga ma dang iT byin pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mA sI ta/ a mA si Sh+ShAM/ a mA si ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mA sIH/ a mA si Sh+TaM/ a mA si Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mA si ShaM/ a mA si ShA/ a mA si Sh+ma/

[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]la/ Nal gnyis dang thal la/ mI nA ti sogs kyis i A ta/ kita rnams la a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis ya Nar bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ma mau/ mi mya tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ma mi tha/ ma mA tha/ mi mya thuH/ mi mya/

[\[320b.1\]]gsum la/ a tse Shi/ a tse Sh+ma hi/ pi b+hA ShA tseH/ tsi'i 'dam ka'o/ /tsi nya'i l-iT san pha rol la gnyis brjod pa'i tsa ka bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste/ tsi nya la liT sbyar/ tsa kar bsgyur ba'i phyogs kyi a tang gi/ skyes bu dang po gnyis la/ tsi kA ya/ tsi kya tuH/

[\[320b.6\]]a tang la/ s+t+r-i No ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ s+t+r-i Nu te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ s+t+r-i Nu yA ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ s+t+r-i N+wI ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ s+t+r-i No tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ s+t+r-i Nu tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a s+t+r-i No ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a s+t+r-i Nu ta/
[\[320b.7\]]sogs so/ /lung gi a tang la/ si tsa la 'phel pa pa ra smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a stAr+ShI ha/ a stAr+Sh+TAM/ a s+t+rar+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a stA r+ShI+uH/ a stAr+Sh+TaM/ a stAr+Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a stAr+ShaM/ a stAr+Sha/ a
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]skAr+Sh+ma/ r-ita sh+tsa saM yo gA teH/ r-ita las kyang brtsegs pa dang po las so/ /brtsegs pa dang po'i r-i ta mtha' las kyang si tsa dang smon pa'i ling A t+ma ne pa da pha rol na yod pa las iT yang na 'gyur te/ st-i la lung gi tang rnams sbyar ba'i iT byin pa'i phyogs kyi skyes

[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]du ng+hA ba/ du ng+hu ba tuH/ du ng+hu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du ng+ho tha/ du ng+ha bi tha/ du ng+hu ba thuH/ du ng+ha ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ du ng+hA ba/ du ng+ha ba/ du ng+hu bi ba/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du ng+hu be/ du ng+hu bA te/ du ng+hu bi ra/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du ng+hu bi She/ du ng+hu
[\[322b.2\]]bA the/ du ng+hu bi ng+h+we/ du ng+hu bi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ du ng+hu be/ du ng+hu bi ba he/ du ng+hu bi ma he/ luT la/ swa ri ti/ sU ti sU ti sU ya ti ng+hU na Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ a tang la/ ng+ha bi tA/ ng+ha bi tA si/ sogs sam/ ng+ho tA/ ng+ho tA si/ sogs so/ /tang la/
[\[322b.3\]]ng+ha bi tA/ ng+ha bi tA se/ sogs sam/ ng+ho tA/ ng+ho tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ ng+hU yA ta/ ng+hU yA stAM/ ng+hU yA suH sogs so/ /tang la/ swa ra ti sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ ng+ha bi ShI Sh+Ta/ ng+ha bi ShI yA stAM/
[\[322b.4\]]ng+ha bi ShI ran/ sogs sam/ ng+ho ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ a tang la/ ng+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ ng+ho Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /tang la/ ng+ha bi Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ ng+ho Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a ng+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/
[\[322b.5\]]a ng+ho Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /tang la/ a ng+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ng+ho Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /hi 'gro ba la ste 'phel ba la'ang ngo zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ hi no ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ he nu yA ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ hi no tu/ sogs dang / lang la/
[\[322b.6\]]a hi no ta/ sogs so/ /hi nu mI nA/ he nu mI nA dag gi'o/ /hi 'gro ba las pha rol gyi sh+nu'i na dang / mInya 'tshe ba las pha rol gyi sh+nA'i na yig ni nyer bsgyur na Nar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na Na yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ pra hi No ti/ sogs so/ /lung la/ si tsa la 'phel ba par smai
[\[322b.7\]]pa da rnams la'os 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a hai ShI ta/ a hai Sh+TAM/ a hai ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a haiShIH/ a hai ShAM/ a hai Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a hai ShaM/ a hai Sh+wa/ a hai Sh+ma/ rab tu 'gro bar byed dam rab tu 'phel bar byed/ he ra tsa di/ ha'i tsang ma yin
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]pa la'o/ /tsang ma yin pa'i rkyen byings gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la hi 'gro pa'i ha phyi ma ni g+ha yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ hi la liT byings gnyis brjod ku ha dag gi tsu 'os a b+h+yA sa'i ha dz+ha/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos dz+ha dza/ mdo 'dis ha phyi ma g+har bsgyur
[\[323a.2\]]bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzig+hA ya dzi g+h+ya tuH/ dzi g+h+yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzi g+he tha/ dzi g+ha yi tha/ dzi g+h+ya thuH/ dza g+h+ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi g+hA ya/ dzi g+h+yi ba/ dzi g+h+yi ma/ luT la yon tan byas pas/ he tA/ he tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la kr-i ta ma
[\[323a.3\]]yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ hI yA ta/ hI yA stAM/ hi yA suH/ sogs dang / l+r-iT la byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ hi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a he Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /kr-i bi 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor
[\[323a.4\]]te/ ng+hin+bi kr-i N+b+yo ra tsa/ ng+hi n+bi  kr-i N+wi dag gi a'ang ngo / ng+hi bi srogs kr-i bi 'tshe ba dag la byed pa po'i don gyi sh+nu'i yul la u 'gyur zhing u pha rol la de gnyis kyi mtha'i ba yig kyang a yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ kr-ibi la u i ta 'gro ba'i byings la nu ma 'os/ num A ga ma/ ma gnas don u brjod
[\[323a.5\]]don/ mdo 'dis ba ar bsgyur/ ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis/ num gyi na u la drangs pas/ kr-i Nu zhes pa grub la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ kr-i No ti sogs dang / ling la/ kr-i Nu yA ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ kr-i No tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a kr-i No ta sogs te cho ga thams cad
[\[323a.6\]]sh+nu'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /lung la bal dang po'i iT byin/ iT 'gro ba'i byings la num 'os/ num A ga ma byin pas/ a kr-i N+wI ta/ a kr-i N+wi Sh+TAM/ a kr-i N+wi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la'ang num byin gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa kr-i N+wa/ tsa kr-i N+wa tuH/
[\[323a.7\]]tsa kr-i NuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tse kr-i N+wi tha/ tsa kr-i N+wa thuH/ tsa kr-i N+wa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kr-i N+wa/ tsa kr-i NI ba/ tsa kr-i N+wi ma/ luT la/ num dang iT byin pas/ kr-i N+wi tA/ kr-i N+wi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la num byin pas/ kr-i N+w+yA ta/ kr-i N+yA stAM/ kr-i N+ya suH/ sogs so/ /
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]sr-iT la/ kr-i N+wi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la'ang / a kr-i N+wi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ng+hi bi srog la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ ng+hi n+wi/ kr-i N+wi dag gi a'ang ngos/ sh+nu'i yul la u bra a/ ita 'gro ba'i byings la num 'os/ num A ga ma/ ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/
[\[323b.2\]]ng+hi nu zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ ng+hi no te/ sogs dang / ling la/ ng+hi nu yA ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ ng+hi no tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a ng+hi no ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ num dang iT byin pas/ a ng+hi n+wI ta/ a ng+hi n+waSh+TAM/ a ng+hi n+wi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ num
[\[323b.3\]]byin gnyis brjod pa sogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ di ng+hi n+wa/ di ng+hi n+wa tuH/ di ng+hi nUH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ di ng+hi n+wi tha/ di ng+hi n+wa thuH/ di ng+hi n+wa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ di ng+hi n+wa/ di ng+hi n+wi ba/ di ng+hi n+wi ma/ luT la/ ng+hi n+wi tA/ ng+hi n+wi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ng+hi n+w+yAta/
[\[323b.4\]]ng+hin+w+yA stAM/ ng+hi n+w+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ ng+hi n+wi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a ng+hi n+wi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dan+b+hu ngan g.yo ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ i tra 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da b+h+no ti/ da b+hU taH/ da b+hU ba n+ti/ skyes
[\[323b.5\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/ da b+h+no Shi/ da b+hU thaH/ da b+h+nu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da b+h+no mi/ da b+h+nu baH/ da b+h+nu maH/ ling la/ da b+h+nu yA ta/ da b+h+nu yA tAM/ da b+h+na yuH/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da b+h+no tu/ da b+h+nu tA ta/ da b+h+nu tAM/ da b+h+nu ban+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma  ats+ngal sh+nu byings sogs ts+tsi
[\[323b.6\]]u bar bsgyur/ gsum la/ da b+h+nu hi/ da b+h+nu tA ta/ da b+h+nu taM/ da b+h+nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da b+h+na bA ni/ da b+h+na bA ba/ da b+h+na bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a da b+h+no ta/ a da b+h+nu tAM/ a da b+h+nu ban/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a da b+h+noH/ a da b+h+nu taM/ a da b+h+nu ta/ skyes bu phyi
[\[323b.7\]]ma gsum la/ a da b+h+na baM/ a da b+h+nu ba/ a da b+h+nu ma/ lung la/ iT byin pas/ sha dam+b+hI ta/ a dam+b+hISh+TAM/ a dam+b+hi ShuH/ sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ shra n+thi gra n+thidam+b+hi b+h+yaH/ pa ro\u0f85pi l+li Ta ki dwa k+ta byaH/ shran+thi gran+thi dam+b+hi rnams las pha rol gyi liT ba 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams ka 'gro
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]bar brjod do/ /shran+tha grol bar byed pa/ gran+tha spel ba/ dan+thu ngan g.yo pa rnams las pha rol gyi liT bsgyur ba'i pa 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa rnams ka 'gro ba'i ming can du brjod par bya'o/ /yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ki ti li Ti dam+b+ha e taM bak+ta byaHliT ka 'gro ba
[\[324a.2\]]la dam+b+ha'i e nyid du brjod par bya'o/ /liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la/ dam+b+ha'i a b+h+yA sa dbyi zhing e nyid du brjod pa sogs yang na bar bya ste/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da dam+b+ha/ da dam+b+ha tuH/ da dam+b+huH/ dem+b+huH/ yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ shran+thi gran+thi dam+b+hAM tha na li yo
[\[324a.3\]]po bA/ shran+thi gran+thI dam+b+ha rnams kyi thal la yang na mi dbyi'o/ /shran+thi gran+thi dam+b+ha rnams kyi liT bsgyur ba'i thal pha rol la'ang a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da dam+b+hi tha/ dem+b+hi tha/ da dam+b+ha thuH/ dem+b+ha thuH/ da dam+b+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da dam+b+ha/
[\[324a.4\]]da dam+b+hi ba/ dem+b+hi ba/ dam+b+hi ma/ dem+b+hi ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ dam+b+hi tA/ dam+b+hi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ da b+h+yA ta/ de b+h+yA stI/ da b+h+yA suH/ l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ dam+b+hi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a dam+b+hi Sh+ya ta/ sogs
[\[324a.5\]]so/ ! /a shUng khyab pa la'o zhes pa la tang rnams 'jug ste/ a tsa dang po rnams la a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ laTa'i/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sh+nu te/ a sh+mu bA te/ a sh+nu ba te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sh+nu She/ a sh+nu bA the/ a sh+nu ng+h+we/ skyes bu
[\[324a.6\]]phyi ma gsum la/ a sh+nu be/ a sh+nu ba he/ a sh+nu ma he/ ling la mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis u bar bsgyur bas/ a sh+nu bI ta/ a sh+nu bI yA tAM/ a sh+nu bI ran/ sogs so/ /'o ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sh+nu tAM/ a sh+nu bA tAM/ a sh+nu ba tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sh+nu Sh+wa/ a sh+nu
[\[324a.7\]]bA the/ a sh+nu ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sh+na bai/ a sh+na pA ba hai/ a sh+na bA ma hai/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A sh+nu ta/ A sh+nu bA tA/ A sh+nu ba ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A sh+nu thAH/ A sh+nu pA thAM/ A sh+nu ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A sh+nu bi/ A sh+nu ba hi/ A sh+nu ma hi/
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]lung la U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ A shiSh+Ta/ A shiShA tAM/ A shi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /iT med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la'os si tsa phyis/ brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis shaSha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os/ ta Tar
[\[324b.2\]]bsgyur bas/ ASh+TA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ brash+tsa b+h+rAs+dza sogs kyis shaSha/ sa laSha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/ A k+ShA tAM/ A k+Sha ta/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A Sh+TAH/ a Sh+ThA thAM/
[\[324b.3\]]A D+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A k+Shi/ A k+Sh+wa hi/ A k+Sh+ma hi/ a sh+no te sh+tsa/ a sh+no ti'i 'ang ngo / /ash+no ti'i lang liT pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po'i a ta kyi 'os a b+h+yA sa ring por bsgyur ba'i pha rol tu nu ta A ga ma 'gyur te/ a shU la/ liT/ byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i
[\[324b.4\]]ng+ha sa sogs kyis Sha Da/ a ta kyi 'os ring por bsgyur/ mdo 'dis nuT A ga ma byin Ta gnas don u brjod don drangs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A na she /A na shA te/ A na shi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A na shi She/ a na k+She/ A na shA the/ A na shi ng+h+re/ A na shi D+h+we/ A na D+hA+e/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[324b.5\]]la/ A na she/ A na shi ba he/ A na shwa he/ A na shi ma he/ A na sh+ma he/ luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ a shi tA/ a shi tA se/ sogs sam/ a Sh+tha/ a Sh+DA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ a shi ShISh+Ta/ a shi ShI yA stAM/ a shi ShI ran/ sogs sam/
[\[324b.6\]]iT med pa'i phyogs la/ brash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka'os Sha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur bas/ a k+ShISh+Ti/ a k+ShI yA stAM/ a k+ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang a shi Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ a k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing
[\[324b.7\]]la/ A shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ A k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA t+sA da yaHsa mA p+tAHzhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las su la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ su la sogs pa byed pa po'i don gyi sha pa kyi yul la sh+nu 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// ! //da ni tung
[\[325a.2\]]la sogs pa rnams kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ ! /tud gzir ba la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ tu dA di b+h+yaHshaH/ tu da la sogs pa rnams las sha'o/ /byings tud la sogs pa rnams las pha rol tu shapra kyi yul la sha 'gyur te/ sha shi ta kyi don
[\[325a.3\]]no/ /laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tud ti/ tu da taH/ tudan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tu da si/ tud thaH/ tu da tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu dA mi/ tu dA paH/ tu dA maH/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tu da te/ tu de te/ tu dan+te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tu da se/
[\[325a.4\]]tu de the/ tu da ng+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu da/ tu dA ba he/ tu dA ma he/ ling gi a tang la/ a ta las yA i ya 'os yA suTa'i yA i y+rar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tu de ta/ tu de tAM/ tu de yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tu deH/ tu de taM/ tu de ta/ skyes
[\[325a.5\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu de yaM/ tu de ba/ tu de ma/ tang la mtha' min pa sogs kyis sra phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tu de ta/ tu de yA tAM/ tu de ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tu de thAH/ tu de yA thAM/ tu de ng+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu de ya/ tu de pa hi/ tu de ma hi/ loTa'i a tang gi skyes
[\[325a.6\]]bu dang po gsum la/ tu da tu/ tu da tA tu/ tu da tAM/ tu dan+tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tu da/ tu da tA ta/ tu da taM/ tu da ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu dA ni/ tu dA ba/ tu dA ma/ laTa'i tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tu da tAM/ tu de tAM/ tu dan+tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tudaswa/ tu de thAM/
[\[325a.7\]]tu da ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu da/ tu dA ba hi/ tu dA ma he/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tu da ta/ a tu da tAM/ a tu da naM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tu daH/ a tu da taM/ a tu da ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tu di/ a tu dA ba/ a tu dA ma/ tang gi skyes bu
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]dang po gsum la/ a tu da ta/ a tu de tAM/ a tu dan+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tu da thAH/ sha tu de thAM/ a tu da ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tu de/ a tu dA ba hi/ a tu dA ma hi/ lung gi a tang la/ bad bra dza sogs kyis 'phel ba/ dz+hal dang po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la'os/ si tsa

[\[325b.4\]]gsum la/ tu to di tha/ tu tot+tha/ tu tu da thuH/ tu tu da/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu to da/ tu tu da/ tu tu di ba/ tu tu di ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tu tu de/ tu tu dA te/ tu tu de re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tu tu di She/ tu tu di the/ tu tu di ng+h+we/ tu tu di D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tu tu de/
[\[325b.5\]]tu tu di ba hi/ tu tu di ma hi/ luT la buka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan khar la tsar sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ to t+tA/ to t+tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ to t+tA/ to t+tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ tu d+yA ta/ tu d+yA stAM/ tu d+yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ khar la tsa ra 'os da tar
[\[325b.6\]]bsgyur bas/ tut+sISh+Ta/ tut+sI yA stAM/ tu t+sI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan dang / khar la tsa ra 'os da tar bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ tot+s+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ to t+s+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a tot+s+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a tot+s+ya ta/ sogs
[\[325b.7\]]so/ ! /b+h+rasna 'chod pa la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ b+h+ras+dza la sha gra ti dz+yA ba yi bya ng+hi ba Sh+Ti bi tsa ti br-ish+tsa ti br-i tsha ti sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/ dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha 'os/ sad/ sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os da dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i a tang la/
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]b+h+r-idz+dza ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+h+r-idz+dza ta/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ b+h+r-idz+dze ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+h+r-idz+dzi ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ b+h+r-idza tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+h+r-idz+dza tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a b+h+r-idz+dza ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a b+h+r-idz+dza ta/
[\[326a.2\]]sogs so/ /lung la a tang gi /skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ brtsegs pa'i dang pa sa ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/ bra sh+tsab+h+ras+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ bad bra dze sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/ a b+h+rA k+ShI ta/ gnyis tshig
[\[326a.3\]]la/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ga sogs kyis sa phyis/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os/ si tsa phyis/ brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur bas/ a b+h+rA Sh+TAM/ mang tshig la brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag ga ka 'os Sha ka /
[\[326a.4\]]kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ a b+h+rA k+ShuH/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+h+rAk+ShIH/ a b+h+rASh+nyAM/ a b+h+rA Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+h+rAk+ShaM/ a b+h+rAk+Sh+ma/ tang la 'phel ba mi byed gzhan sngon ma ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu
[\[326a.5\]]dang po gsum la/ a b+h+raSh+Ta/ a b+h+rak+ShA tAM/ a b+h+ras ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a b+h+raSh+thAH/ a b+h+rak+ShA thAM/ a b+h+ra D+D+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a b+h+rak+Shi/ sa b+h+rak+ShA hi/ a b+h+ra k+Sh+ma hi/ b+h+ra s+dzo b+ha rdza n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ b+h+ra s+dza'i b+ha rdza yang na'o/ /b+h+ra s+dza'i byings phyed pa rnams pha rol la b+ha rdza zhes par yang na bsgyur
[\[326a.6\]]par bya ste/ b+ha s+dzal liT mdo 'dis b+ha rdzar bsgyur/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos b+ha ba/ dang po'i hal lhag po sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a dang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+ha rdza/ ba b+ha R+dza tuH/ ba b+ha rdzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+hardzi tha/ ba b+har+Sh+Tha/ ba b+ha rdza thuH/ ba b+ha rdza/ skyes
[\[326a.7\]]bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+ha rdza/ ba b+hardzi ba/ ba b+ha rdzi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+hardze/ ba b+hardzA te/ ba b+hardze re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+hardzi Sha/ ba b+hardzA the/ ba b+hardzi ng+h+we/ ba b+hardzi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os tha Sha/
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]ba b+hardze/ ba b+hardze ba he/ ba b+hardzi ma he/ b+h+ras+dza b+hardzar ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i ta la lhag po 'os/ ra sogs phyis/ a b+h+yA ma'i tsar 'os b+ha bar bsgyur dz+hal rnams kyi dza sha rnams sos/ sa?da?/ sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os da dzra ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
[\[326b.2\]]a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+h+radz+dza/ ba b+h+radz+dza tuH/ ba b+h+radz+dzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+h+radz+dzi tha/ ba b+h+raSh+Tha/ ba b+h+radz+dza thuH/ ba b+h+radz+dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+h+radz+dza/ ba b+h+radz+dzi ba/ ba b+h+radz+dzi ma/ de bzhin du/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba b+h+radz+dze/ bab+h+rAdz+dzA te/ ba b+h+radz+dzi te/ skyes bu
[\[326b.3\]]dbus ma gsum la/ ba b+h+radz+dzi She/ ba b+h+radz+dzA the/ ba b+h+radz+dzi ng+h+we/ ba b+h+radz+dzi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba b+h+radz+dze/ brtsegs pa dang po'i sa ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/ grash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ Sha Tu laSha Tu 'os dza Tha/ ba b+h+radz+dzi ba he/ ba b+h+radz+dzi ma he/ luT la/ b+h+ras+dza b+hardzar bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/ brash+tsaM b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/
[\[326b.4\]]ShaTu la Sha Tu 'os ta Ta ra bsgyur pas/ a tang la/ b+har+Sh+Ta/ b+har+Sh+Ta si/ sogs dang / tang la/ b+har+Sh+TA/ b+har+Sh+TA se/ sogs so/ /b+hardzar ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sa ka dag gi 'os/ sa phyis/ brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs dza Sha ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis a tang la/ b+h+raSh+TA/ b+haSh+TA si/ sogs dang /

[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]iT byin/ si tsa la 'phel ba bar smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a sA bI ta/ a sA biSh+TAM/ a sA bi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/ su ShA ba/ su Shu ba tuH/ su Shu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum

[\[329a.3\]]byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ sa pi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sa bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /o bra sh+tsu gcod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ laT la/ br-i sh+tsa ti/

[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]brash+tsa thuH/ ba brash+tsa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba brash+tsa/ ba brash+tsi ba/ ba bra sh+tsi ma/ luT la/ U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ brash+tsi tA/ brash+tsi tA si/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ brash+tsa/ b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ brtsegs pa'i
[\[329b.2\]]dang pos ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/ ShaTu la Sha Tu 'os/ ta Tar bsgyur bas/ braSh+TA/ braSh+TA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gra hi/ dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ br-i sh+ts+yA stAM/ br-i sh+ts+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar bya ste/ iTa'i

[\[329b.4\]]sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha kar bsgyur/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ sa Shar bsgyur bas/ brak+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a brash+tsi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a bra k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /r-i ts+tsha 'gro ba dang / dbang po dang / 'jig pa dang / lus kyi dngos po rnams la'o zhes
[\[329b.5\]]pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ r-its+tsha ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ r-i ts+tshe ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ r-its+tsha tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ Ar+ts+tsha ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ bal dang po'i iT byin pas/ Ar+ts+tshi ta/ A r+ts+tshiSh+TAM/ Ar+ts+tshi ShuH/ sogs so/ /l-iT la/ byings gnyis brjod r-ita kyi
[\[329b.6\]]a ta 'os r-i a/ dang po'i a ta kyi 'os ring por bsgyur/ de las ha la gnyis pa la nuT 'os/ nuT byin/ r-its+tsha r-i ta mtha' rnams kyi  a tsa dang po'i AT AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ 'os yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A na r+ts+tsha/ A na r+ts+tsha tuH/ A nar+ts+tshuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[329b.7\]]A nar+ts+tshi tha/ A na r+ts+tsha thuH/ A na r+ts+tsha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A na r+ts+tsha/ A na r+ts+tshi ba/ A na r+ts+tshi ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ r-i ts+tsh+yI tA/ r-i ts+tsh+yI tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ r-its+tsh+yA ta/ r-its+tsh+yA stAM/ r-its+tsh+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT byin pas/ r-its+tshi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]a rits+tsh+yA stAM/ sogs so/ /kr-I rnam par g.yeng ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ byings kyi r-I ta kyi ita 'os r-I ita du bsgyur/ r-i'i a Na la ra pha rol los ra sbyar bas/ laT la/ ki ra ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ ki re ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/
[\[330a.2\]]ki ra tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a ki ra ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ bal dang po'i iT/ si tsa la 'phel ba par smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a kA rI ta/ a kA riSh+TAM/ a kA ri ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a ta 'os r-i a/ ku ha dag gi
[\[330a.3\]]tsu 'os/ ka tsa/ Nal gnyis la 'phel ba dang / gzhan rnams la r-its+tsha ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa kA ra/ tsa ka ra tuH/ tsa ka ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa ka ri tha/ tsa ka ra thuH/ tsa ka ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kA ra/
[\[330a.4\]]tsa ka ra/ tsa ka ri ba/ tsa ka ri ma/ luT la/ br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ ka ri tA/ ka ri tA si/ sogs sam/ ka rI tA/ ka rI tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ byings kyi rIta kyi i ta 'os r-I ir du bsgyur/ u pa ng+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur
[\[330a.5\]]bas/ kIr+YA ta/ kI r+YA stAM/ kI r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+raT la/ br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na par byas/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ka ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ ka rI Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a kaM ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/
[\[330a.6\]]a ka rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /ki ra tau la ba ne/ ki ra ti la gcod par byed pa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur u pa las pha rol gyi ki ra ti la gcod par byed pa'i don la uT A ga ma 'gyur te/ u pa ski ra ti/ aDa b+h+yA sa bya bA ye\u0f85pi/ aT a b+h+yA sa dag par na yod kyang ngo / /u pa las pha rol gyi
[\[330a.7\]]ki ra ti la aT A ga ma dang a b+h+yA sa bar na yod kyang ka'i sngon du suT A ga ma 'gyur te/ aT bar na yod pa la/ u[\[] pA+au?[\]] ski ra ta/ nye bar gcod par byed/ a b+h+yA sa bar na yod pa la/ upe  nye bar gcod par byed/ tsasgA ra/ nye bar gcod/ lta bu'o/ /hi ng+sA yAM pra te sh+tsa/ 'tshe ba la/ pra ti las
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]kyang ngo / /kr-I 'tshe ba'i don la 'jug pa na ub dang bra ti pha rol las kyang suT A ga ma 'gyur te/ u pa ski ra ti/ pra ti ski ra ti/ sogs so/ ! /gr-I gsal bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ a tsi pi b+hA ShA/ a tsa la gang ma nga'o/ /rkyen a tsa dang po can pha rol la
[\[330b.2\]]gr-i'i ra? yig l+ra yig tu bsgyur ba dang / ra nyid du gnas pa 'dam ka can du bya ste/ gr-I la sha /nye bar 'tshe bar byed/ so sor 'tshe bar byed/ byings kyi r-Ita kyi ati 'os/ r-I i ta/ r-i'i a Na las ra pha rol los ra? byin/ mdo 'dis lar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/
[\[330b.3\]]laTal/ gi ra ti/ sogs sam/ gi la ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ gi re ta/ sogs sam/ gi le ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ gi ra tu/ sogs sam/ gi la tu/ sogs so/ /lang la/ a gi ra ta/ sogs sam/ a gi la ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ iT byin sitsa
[\[330b.4\]]la 'phel ba pa ra smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas/ a tsa la 'dam ka 'os/ ra? lar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ a gA rI ta/ a gA riSh+TAM/ a gA ri ShuH/ sogs sam/ a gA yI ta/ a gA liSh+TAMM/ a gA li ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la byings gnyis brjod/
[\[330b.5\]]r-i'i a ta 'os a b+h+yA sa'i r-i ata/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ dza ga /Nal gnyis la 'phel ba dang gzhan rnams la/ r-its+tsha ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza gA ra/ dza ga ra tuH/ dza ga ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza ga ri tha/ dza ga ra thuH/ dza
[\[330b.6\]]ga ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza gA ra/ dza ga ra/ dza ga ri ba/ dza ga ri ma/ yang na a tsa la 'dam ka 'os ra lar bsgyur bas/ dza gA la/ dza ga la tuH/ dza ga luH/ sogs so/ /luT la/ br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os iT dang IT yang na bar byas/ a tsa la 'dam ka'o/ /ra lar bsgyur
[\[330b.7\]]ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ ga ri tA/ ga ri tA si/ sogs sam/ ga li tA/ ga li tA si/ sogs so/ /ITa'i phyogs la/ ga rI tA/ ga rI tA si/ sogs sam/ ga lI tA/ ga lI tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ byings kyi r-Ita kyi ita 'os/ r-I ita/ r-i'i a Na la
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]ra pha rol las/ ra sbyar/ u pa ng+hA'i lang ngos/ ring por bsgyur bas/ gIr+YA ta/ gIr+YA stAM/ gIr+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ rIta las yang na 'os/ iT dang iT yang na bar byas/ a tsa la 'dam ka 'os ra lar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas  iT
[\[331a.2\]]byin pa'i phyogs la/ ga ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ ga li Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /ITa'i phyogs la/ ga rISh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ gi lI Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la iTa'i phyogs la/ a pa ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ga li Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /ITa'i phyogs la/ a ga rI
[\[331a.3\]]Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ga lI Sh+yata/ sogs so/ ! /tr-inA tshim pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ i ta 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ laT la/ tr-i pa ti/ sogs dang / /ling la/ tr-i pe ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ tr-i pe tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a tr-i pata/ sogs so/ /
[\[331a.4\]]'grel par lung drangs pa/ tr-in+pa tu m+pa tr-in+pa dam+b+ha gum+pa um+b+ha shu m+b+haM she bA num/ tr-in+patu m+pa tr-inA dam+b+ha gum+pa um+b+ha shum+b+ha rnams kyi sha la num yang na'o/ /byings tr-in+pa tshim pa/ tum+pa 'tshe ba/ dam+b+ha dang gum+pha mdud pa/ am+b+ha rdzogs pa/ shumA mdzes pa rnams kyi ma dang na dag ita 'gro ba
[\[331a.5\]]ma yin pa sogs kyis phyis pa'i pha rol tu rkyen sha byung na slar yang de rnams la num A gam yang na 'gyur te/ tr-in+pati/ tr-in+pa tu/ tr-i n+pa tu/ a tr-in+pa lang ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ iT byin pas/ a tr-in+piSh+TAM/ a dr-in+piShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ bying gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata/ kita rnams la
[\[331a.6\]]ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrub/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ta tr-in+pa/ ta tr-i pa tu/ ta traM puH/ skyes bu dbus gsum la/ ta t+paMn+pi tha/ ta traM pa thuH/ ta tr-i pa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ta tr-in+pa/ ta tr-i pi pa/ ta tr-i pi ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ tr-in+pi tA/ tr-in+pi tA si/
[\[331a.7\]]sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ tr-ipyA ta/ tr-i pyAstAM/ tr-i pyA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ iT byin pas/ tr-in+pi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a tr-i ni Sh+yata/ sogs so/ ! /spr-i sha kun tu reg pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]laT la/ spr-i sha ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ spr-i+-i she ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ sgr-i sha tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a spr-i shata/ sogs so/ /lung la/ kr-iSha/ mri sha /spr-i sha sogs kyis ts+lisi tsar yang na bsgyur te/ sitsa ra bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a nu tAN+ta'i 'ang r-i ta u pa ng+hA'i am yang
[\[331b.2\]]na 'os am yang na bar byed de/ am byin pa'i phyogs la/ brash+tsa b+h+rasnga sogs kyis shaSha/ dz+hal dang po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal 'os sitsa phyis/ Sha tu la ShaTu/ sogs dang / sa la ShaD+ha sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sbrA k+ShIta/ a smASh+TAM/ a s+t+rAk+ShuH/ skyes bu
[\[331b.3\]]dbus ma gsum la/ asprAk+ShIH/ a sprASh+TaM/ a sprASh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a sbrA k+Sha/ a sprAk+ShA/ a sprAk+Sh+ma/ am ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ gzhan tshog 'dra ba la/ bad bra sh+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas/ ra drangs bas/ ika shi a tsal ya Nar bsgyur/ de nas pad brash+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu
[\[331b.4\]]dang po gsum la/ aspArgI ta/ aspAr+ShAM/ a spAr+k+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a spAr+g+ShIH/ a spAr+ShAM/ asbAr+Sh+tsa/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ aspArkAM/ a spArkA/ a spAr+k+ShA/ yang na shal ika u ba ng+hA iT med pa la k+sa 'os/ tsI k+sar bsgyur/ brash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs sha Sha/ sal ShaD+hadag gi ka/
[\[331b.5\]]kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a spr-i k+Shata/ a spr-ik+Sha twaM/ a spr-i k+Shan/ sogs so/ /liT la byings gnyis brjod r-i'i ata 'os r-i ata/ shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/pasbar+sha/ pa spr-i sha tuH/ pa spr-i shuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[331b.6\]]la/ pa spa r+shi tha/ pa spar+ShA/ ba spr-i sha thuH/ pa spr-i sha/ /skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ paspa r+sha/ pa spr-i shi ba/ paspr-i shi ma/ luT la/ anu dAN+ta'i 'ang r-ita u ba ng+hA'i am lang na 'os/ am A ga ma yang na bar byas/ brash+tsa b+h+ras+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ Shatu la Sha Tu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
[\[331b.7\]]spraSh+Da'/ spraSh+DA si/ sogs sam/ spar+Sh+Da/ spar+Sh+TA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ spr-i sh+yAta/ spraM sh+yAstAM/ spr-i sh+yAsuH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ a nu dA t+ta'i'ang r-ita u pang+hA'i am yang na 'os/ am yang na par byas/ brash+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar/
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]bsgyur bas/ s+thak+Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ s+tharar+k+Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a spAr+k+Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ sogs so/ ! /cItI 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams spyor te/ laT la/ tsI ta ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ tsA te ta/ sogs
[\[332a.2\]]so/ /loT la/ ts+r-ita tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ ats+r-i ta ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ iT byin puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a tsi rtIta/ a tsa rtiSh+DA/ a tsartiShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod re'i a ta 'os ata du bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa tsa rta/
[\[332a.3\]]tsa ts+ri tatuH/ tsats+r-i tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa tsa rti tha/ tsa ts+r-i ta thuH/ tsa ts+r-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa tsa rta/ tsa ts+r-i ti ba/ tsa ts+r-i ti ma/ luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ tsa rtitA/ tsartitA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ts+rit+yAta/ nr-ing+yAstAM/ ts+rit+yAsu/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT
[\[332a.4\]]la kr-iT ts+r-ita sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas yon tan byas pas/ tsarti Sh+yati/ sogs sam/ tsar+t+h+ya ti/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ atsa rtiSh+yata/ sogs sam/ atsar+t+m+yata/ sogs so/ ! /prats+tsha shes par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams spyor te/ gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sAr
[\[332a.5\]]Nar bsgyur bas/ laT la/ br-its+tsha ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ br-its+tshe ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ braMts+tsha tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ abr-its+tshata/ sogs so/ /lung la/ brash+tsa sogs kyis Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka/ /kun nas bskyur ba sogs dang / dz+hal dang po rnams la/ dz+hal gyi dz+hal
[\[332a.6\]]la 'os si tsa phyis/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu/ bad brash+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a prAk+ShIta/ a prASh+TAM/ a prAk+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a prASh+TaH/ a prASh+TaM/ apraSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a prAk+ShaM/ aprAk+Sha/ a bAk+Sh+ma/ liT la gnyis brjod pa
[\[332a.7\]]sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pa prats+tsha/ pa prats+tshatuH/ pa prats+tshu tuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pa prats+tshi tha/ papraSh+Tha/ pa prats+tshathuH/ pa brats+tsha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pa prats+tsha/ pa prats+tshi ba/ ba prats+tshi ma/ luT la/ brash+tsa b+h+ra sA sogs kyis Sha/ Sha Tul Sha Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur bas/ praSh+TA/
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]pra Sh+TA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ bra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ pr-its+tsh+yA ta/ prits+tsh+yA stAM/ pr-its+tsh+yA su:/ sogs so/ w-iT la/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra snga sogs kyis Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ bra k+Sh+ya ti  sogs dang de
[\[332b.2\]]bzhin du/ l+ring la/ a prak+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /sr-idza rnam par bcad pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor re/ laT la/ sr-i dza ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ sr-i dze ta/ sogs so/ loT la/ sr-i dza tu/ sogs dang / yang la/ a sr-i dza ta/ sogs so/ lung la sr-i dzi dr-i sha dag gi
[\[332b.3\]]ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la dz+ha la la a ma 'os/ a ma A ga ma byin/ i ka gi a tsa la ya Na dang / bra sh+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha sogs kyis Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha dang / dz+ha la dang bo can rnams la/ dz+ha la las dz+ha la la 'os si tsa phyis/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs
[\[332b.4\]]kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a sra k+ShI ta/ a sra Sh+TAM/ a sra k+Shu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a srak+ShiH/ a sra Sh+TaM/ a sraSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a srak+ShaM/ a srak+ShA/ a sra k+Sh+ya/ liT la/ gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata 'os/ r-i ata du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu
[\[332b.5\]]dang po gsum la/ sa sardza/ sa sr-idza tuH/ sa sr-i dzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa sa rdzi tha/ sa sar+ShA/ sa sr-i dza thuH/ sa sr-i dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa sardza/ sa sr-i dza ba/ sa sr-i dzi ma/ luT la/ sr-i dzi dr-i sha dag gi ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la dz+ha la la a ma 'os a ma byin/ ika
[\[332b.6\]]gi yaN/ bra ts+tsa sogs kyis dza Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu sogs kyis/ sraSh+TA/ sraSh+TA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ sr-i dz+yAta/ sr-i dz+yA stAM/ sr-i dz+yA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ sr-idza dr-i sha dag gi ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la dz+ha la la a ma 'os/ a ma A ga ma byin/ i ka gi a tsa la yaN 'os
[\[332b.7\]]r-i ra ru bsgyur/ brash+tsa b+h+rastsa mr-idza/ sr-idza sogs kyis dza Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha bsgyur bas/ srak+Sh+ya ti/ srak+Sh+ya taH/ srak+Sh+ya n+ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sra k+Sh+yata/ a srak+Sh+ya tAM/ a srak+Sh+yan/ sogs so/ ! Tu ma sngo dag pa/
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]la'o zhes pa la'ang a rang rnams 'jug ste/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os/ srang / sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os da dzar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ madz+dza ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ madz+dze ta/ sogs so/ loT la/ madz+dza tu/ sogs dang / lang
[\[333a.2\]]la/ a madz+dza ta/ sogs so/ lung la/ brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka dag gi 'os sa phyis/ bad bra sh+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba/ mas+dzin sha dag gi ha la la num 'os nu ma byin/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dza ga/ Sha ra la tsa 'os/ ga ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba dang / dz+hal dang
[\[333a.3\]]po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os/ si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mAM k+ShI ta/ a mI k+tAM/ a mAMk+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mAM k+Shi/ a mAM k+ti/ a mAM k+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mAM k+ShaM/ a mAM k+Sh+wa/ ling la gnyis
[\[333a.4\]]brjod pa sogs kyas bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ma madz+dza/ ma madz+dza tuH/ ma madz+dzuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ma madz+dzi tha/ ma mAM k+tha/ ma madz+dza/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ma madz+dza/ ma madz+dzi ba/ ma madz+dzi ma/ luT la brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka dag gi 'os
[\[333a.5\]]sa phyis/[ (]mal+dzin[,]mas+dzin [)]sha dag gi ha la la nu ma 'os/ nu ma A ga ma byin/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dza ga/ khar la tsa ra 'os ga ka drangs pas/ maM k+tA/ maM k+tA ro/ maM k+tA raH/ maM k+tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ dz+ha sha la dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os/ sang / sa tu'i sha tsu la sha tsu 'os da dza ra bskyur bas/
[\[333a.6\]]madz+dz+ya ta/ madz+dz+yA stAM/ madz+h+ya suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyis phyis/ mas+dzi dr-i sha dag gi ha la la nu ma 'os/ num A ga ma byin/ tsu'i ku 'os dza pa/ khar la tsha ra 'os/ ga ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ maMk+Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/
[\[333a.7\]]wang li/ a ma k+Sh+yi ta/ sogs so/ ! bits+tsha 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ bits+tshi rA yo bA/ bets+tshi las A ya yang na'o/ gong du ku pU d+hU pa bits+tsha/ pa Na pa na rnams las A ya 'o zhes bshad kyang / bits+tsha las A ya yang na bar bya ste/ laT la/ bits+tsha ya ti/
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]sogs sam/ bits+tsha ti/ sogs so/ ling la/ bits+tsha ye ta/ sogs sam/ bits+tshe ta/ sogs so/ loT la/ bits+tsha ya tu/ sogs sam/ sogs so/ lang la/ a bits+tshA yata/ sogs sam/ a bits+tsha ta/ sogs so/ lung la iT byin kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a bits+tshA yIta/
[\[333b.2\]]a bits+tshA yi ShuH/ sogs sam/ a bits+tshA ta/ a bits+tshI Sh+TaM/ a bits+tshA Sh+TaH/ sogs so/ liT la/ A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kAs rkyen mtha' sogs kyis A ma sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ bits+tsA yAM tsa kA ra/ bits+tshA yAM ba b+hU ba/ bits+tshA yA mA sa/ sogs so/ A ya med pa'i
[\[333b.3\]]phyogs la gnyis brjod pas skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi bits+tsha/ bi bits+tsha tuH/ bi bits+tshuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi bi ts+tsha tha/ bi bits+tsha thuH/ bi bits+tshaH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi bits+tsha/ bi bits+tshi ba/ bi bits+tshi mi/ luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ bits+tshA yi tA/ bits+tshA yi tA si sogs
[\[333b.4\]]sam/ bits+tshi tA/ bits+tshi tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ bits+tshA y+YA ta/ bits+tshA y+YA stUM/ bits+tshA y+YA staM/ bits+tshA y+YA suH/ sogs sam/ bits+tsh+yA ta/ bits+tsh+yA staM/ bits+tsh+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-ita la iT byin pas/ bits+tshA yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ bi ts+tshA Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ a bits+tshA yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a bits+tshi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[333b.5\]]mr-i sha bzod pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ mr-i sha ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ mr-i she ta/ sogs so/ loT la/ mr-i sha tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a mr-i shata/ sogs so/ lung la/ kr-iSha/ mr-i sha/ spr-i sha sogs kyis ts+l-i si tsar yang na bsgyur te/ si tsa'i
[\[333b.6\]]phyogs la/ a nu dA t+ha'i r-ita u pa d+h+wa'i a ma yang na 'os/ a ma A ga ma yang na bar byed de/ a ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ dz+ha dang po rnams la dz+ha la sa dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu/ sogs dang / sa la Sha D+ha sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu

[\[334a.1\]]la/ a m+war+k+Shi ta/ a m+war+Sh+TAM/ a mU r+k+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mA r+k+ShI:/ a mAr+Sh+TaM/ a mAr+Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mAr+k+ShaM/a mArka/ a mAr+k+Sh+ma/ yang na/ shal ika u pa d+hA sogs kyis ts+li k+sar bsgyur/ bra sh+tsa sogs kyisasha Sha/ sa la ShaD+ha dag gi ka 'os/

[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]byas pas/ ang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a ru d+ha ta/ a ra d+ha tAM/ a ru d+ha na/ sogs dang / si tsar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ ba da bra sh+tsa sogs kyis 'phel ba byas/ rnam dbye dz+hal dang po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyis ta tha dag d+ha dang / dz+ha sha la dz+hal

[\[337b.3\]]la/ dz+hal dang po rnams la/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa phyis/ dz+ha Sha sogs kyi ta dang tha dag d+ha/ dz+ha sha la dz+hal rnams kyis dza sha 'os d+had/ dz+hal dang po ma yin pa rnams la khar la tsar 'os/ dz+ha ta ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ru t+d+ha/ a ru d+hA tAM/
[\[337b.4\]]a ru d+ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ru t+d+hAH/ a ru d+hA thAM/ a ru t+d+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ru d+hi/ a ru d+h+wi hi/ a nu t+h+ma hi/ liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ru ro d+ha/ ru ru d+ha tuH/ ru ru d+huH/ skyes bu dbus ma

[\[338a.1\]]sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a ro t+s+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang dang / a ro t+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /u tsh+r-i dir 'bar ba dang rtse ba dag la'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor te/ la Ta'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ la tipa/ ru d+ha sogs kyi sh+na ma byin

[\[341a.7\]]so/ /loT la/ laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ in+t+ngAM/ aMn+ng+hA tAM/ in+t+hatAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ an+h+hA/ in+d+hA thAM/ in+ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ in ng+he/ in ng+hA ba hi/ in ng+hA ma hai/ lang la gzhan cho ga
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]snga ma rnams dang 'dra/ a tsa dang po sogs kyis AT byin/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ain+ng+ha/ ai n+d+ha tAM/ ai+ain+ng+ha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ain+ng+hAH/ ain+ng+hA thAM/ a+wain+ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ain+d+hi/
[\[341b.2\]]ain+d+hA hi/ an+ng+hA hi/ lung la iT byin pas/ ain+ng+hiSh+Ta/ ain+r+hi ShA traM/ ain+ng+hI Shata/ liT la/ i tsa dang po sogs kyis Am sbyang bas/ in+ng+hAM tsakri/ in+ng+hAM ba b+hU ba/ ain+ng+ha' mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la/ in+d+hi dA/ -in+ng+hi tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la'ang iT
[\[341b.3\]]byin/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ in+ng+hiShISh+Ta/ in+ng+hiShI yA stAM/ iN+ng+hi ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ iT byin/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ in+ng+hi Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ ain+ng+hi Sh+yata/
[\[341b.4\]]sogs so/ ! /bi da rnam par dpyod ba la'o zhes pa la'ang tang rnams sbyor te/ sh+nam byin k+ngita rnams la/ sh+nA as dag gi ata kyi 'os a phyis/ khar la tsar dang / dz+har 'dra ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Thin+ti/ bin+bAte/
[\[341b.5\]]bin+da te/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bin+tA+e/ bin+dA the/ biMd+ng+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gum la/ bin+de/ ban+d+wa he/ bin+d+ma he/ lid la mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/ sh+na as dag gi ata kyi 'os na'i a phyis drangs pas/ bin+ng+hI ta/ bin+ng+hI

[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]di Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi bi de/ bi bi dA te/ bi bi di re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi bi de She/ bi bi dA the/ bi bi di d+hA+e/ bi bi di D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi bi de/ bi bi di ba he/ bi bi di ma he/ luT
[\[342a.2\]]la iT byin/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ be di tA/ be di tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la iT byin pas/ bi di ShISh+Ta/ bi di ShI yA stAM/ bi di ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l-i+uT la iT byin puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ bi di Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / de bzhin
[\[342a.3\]]du/ l+r-ing la/ a be di Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ i hi pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tru ng+hA da ya nas mAb+tAH/ zhes pa pA ci ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las ru ng+hal sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin
[\[342a.4\]]bris su bkod ba legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las ru ng+ha la sogs pa shapa kyi yul la sh+nam 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so/ /da ni ta nu la sogs pa rnams kyi cho ga bshad bar bya ste/ ta nu rgyas pa
[\[342a.5\]]la'o zhes pa la laT sogs a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la ta na la sogs pa la u 'os rkyen u pha rol du sbyor te/ laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ta no ti/ ta nu taH/ ta n+wan+ti/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ta no Shi/ ta nu thaH/

[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]gsum la/ ta nu/ ta nu tAta/ ta nu taM/ ta nu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ta na bA ni/ ta na bA ba/ ta na bA ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ta nu tAM ta n+wA tAM/ ta n+wa tAM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ta nu Sh+wa/ ta n+wa thAM/ ta nu ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ta na bai/ ta na bA ba hai/ ta na bA ma hai/

[\[342b.3\]]gsum la/ a ta nu ta/ a ta n+wAtAM/ a ta n+wata/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ta nu thAH/ a ta n+wA thAM/ a ta n+wA thAM/ a ta nu ng+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ta n+wi/ ata nu ba hi/ a ta n+wa hi/ a ta num hi/ atan+ma hi/ lung gi par smai pa da la iT byin/ hal dang po yang ba sogs
[\[342b.4\]]kyis 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ a tA nIta/ a tA ni Sh+TAM/ a tAni tuH/ sogs sam/ a ta nI ta/ sogs so/ /tang la/ ta nA di b+h+ya stathA soH/ ta na la sogs pa rnams las ta thAs dag la'o/ /tan la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi si tsa ni lung bsgyur pa'i ta dang
[\[342b.5\]]thAs dag pha rol la yang na dbyi ste/ tan la/ lung la ta/ mdo 'dis si tsa dbyi ba dang ma dbyi ba yang na bar byas/ si tsa phyis pa'i phyogs la/ a nu dAt+ta nye ba'i yul/ ban ti/ ta no ti la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan dz+nya la kra bra 'gro ba la dbyi 'os na phyis/ si tsam phyis pa'i phyogs

[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]ta thAs dag la 'os si tsa dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas/ phyis pa'i phyogs la/ anu dAt+ta nye ba'i yul sogs kyis Na yang phyis/ si tsa ma phyis pa'i phyogs dang gzhan rnams la iT byin pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Arta/ Ar+NaMSh+Ta/ Ar+NiShA tAM/ Ar+NiSha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Ar+thA ma/

[\[344b.5\]]ar+Ni tA/ ar+Ni tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ r-iN+yAta/ raM N+yA sdAM/ raM N+yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la/ iT byin/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ar+Ni ShISh+Ta/ ar+NiShI yA stAM/ ar+Ni ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ ar+NiSh+ya te/ sogs dang / tang la/

[\[344b.7\]]cad pa la ata kyi uta 'os/ uphang+hA'i a u dang a tsa dang po rnams la/ i ka gi a tsa la ya Nar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laTa'i a tang gi skyes bu dang bo gsum la/ ka ro ti/ ku ru taH/ kurban+taM/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ /ka ro Shi/ ku ngu thaH/ ku ru tha/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gcig tshig la/ ka re mi/ ni t+yaM
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]ka ro te/ ka ngo ti las rtag tu'o/ /ka ro ti las pha rol gyi rkyen u ni bam pha rol la rtag tu dbyi ste/ skyes bu phyi ma'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ kurbaH/ kurmaH/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ tang gi skyes bu dang po

[\[345a.3\]]dbyi ste/ ling gi a tang la/ kur+YAb/ kur+YAtAM/ kUr+YAH/ sogs so/ /tang la/ mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sI yuTa'i sa phyis/ ika gi a tsa la yaN bos ta Nar bsgyur bas/ kurbI ta/ kurbI yAtAM/ kurbI ran sogs so/ /loT la/
[\[345a.4\]]laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ka ro tu/ kuru tAta/ ku rutAM/ kurban+du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ku ru/ ku ru tA ta/ ku ru taM/ ku ru ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ka ra bA Ni/ ka ra bA pa/

[\[345a.6\]]pa hai/ ka ra bA ma hai/ lang gi a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ka ro ta/ a ku ru tAM/ a kurban/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ka roH/ a ku ru taM/ a ku ru ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a ka ra paM/ a kurba/ a kurma/
[\[345a.7\]]tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ku ru ta/ a kurbAtAM/ a kurba ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a ku ru thAH/ a kunA thAM/ a ku ru ng+hAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a kurbi/ a kurba hi/ a kurma hi/ lung gi a tang la/ si tsa
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]la 'phel ba da ra smai pa da rnams la 'os/ 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a kA r+ShI ta/ a kA r+ShAM/ a kA r+ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a kA r+ShIH/ a kA r+th+TaM/ a kA r+Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a kA r+ShaM/ a
[\[345b.2\]]kA r+Sh+wa/ a kA r+Sh+ma/ tang la dz+hal dang po rnams la gzugs thung ngu las kyang ngos si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a kr-i ta/ a kr-i ShA tAM/ a kr-i Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a kr-i thAH/ a
