[\[349b.4\]]sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ma phyis pas/ sku b+h+ya ta/ sku b+h+yA stAM/ sku b+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ sku m+b+hi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sku m+b+hi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /mI nya 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang
[\[349b.5\]]gnyis ka sbyor te/ laTa'i a tar la/ mI nA ti/ sogs so/ /lung la/ mI nI te/ dIng rnams kyis l+ya pa la'ang 'os/ A ta du bsgyur/ a tang la/ yam ram nam  Ata rnams kyis ka 'ang ngos/ sa ka dang i bra byin pas/ a mA sI ta/ a mA si Sh+TAM/ a mA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /
[\[349b.6\]]ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a mI nIta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ mI nA ti/ /min no ti/ dIng rnams kyis l+ya pa la'ang so/ /A ta du bsgyur/ a tang la/ yam ram nam A ta rnams kyis bka' ngos/ /saka dang a byin pas/ a mA sI ta/ a mA si Sh+TaM/ a mA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /
[\[349b.7\]]tang la sa 'dren pa kho na ste/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a mA sta/ a mA sA tAM/ a mA sa ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a mA s+thAH/ a mA sA thAM/ a mA d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a mA si/ a mA swa hi/ a mA sma hi/ liT la Nal gnyis dang thal la/ mI nA ti/ mi no ti
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]sogs kyi Ata du bsgyur nas gnyis brjod gzhan rnams la gnyis brjod thung ngu 'os/ thung ngur bsgyur/ a tsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis ya Nar bsgyur bas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ma mau/ mi mya tuH/ mi myuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum
[\[350a.2\]]la/ ma mi tha/ ma mA tha/ mi mya thuH/ mi mya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ma mau/ mi myi ba/ mi myi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ mi mye/ mi myA te/ mi myi re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ mi myi She/ mi myA the/ mi myi D+h+wi/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ mi myi/ mi myi ba he/ mi myi
[\[350a.3\]]ma he/ luT la/ mI nA ti/ mi no ti sogs kyis a ta du bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ mA tA/ mA tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ mA tA/ mA tA se/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ mI nA ti/ mi no ti sogs kyis A ta du bsgyur/ ling la e 'os/ de er bskyur bas/ me
[\[350a.4\]]yA ta/ me yA stAM/ me yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la A ta du bsgyur bas/ mA sI Sh+Ta/ mA sI yA stAM/ mA sI ran/ sogs so/ l-iT la'ang / mI nA ti/ mi no ti/ dIng rnams kyis l+ya pa la'ang ngos A ta du bsgyur bas/ a tang la/ mA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ mA s+ya te/
[\[350a.5\]]sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+ring gi a tang la/ a mA s+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a mA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /pU nya dag byed pa la'o zhes pa la a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ pA dI nAM hra swaH/ pU la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu'o/ /pU nya la sogs pa nyi shu po rnams kyi rkyen
[\[350a.6\]]sha 'gro ba pha rol la thung ngur bsgyur bar bya ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ pu nA ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ bu nI te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ pu nI yA ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ pu nI ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ pu nA tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ pu nI tAM/ sogs
[\[350a.7\]]so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a pu nA ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a pu nI ti/ sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ dwA dI nAM hra swaH/ ke tsi dwA/ pU la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu skabs 'gar yang na'o/ /pU la sogs pa rnams kyi shita pha rol la 'gal zhig tu thung ngur bsgyur ba
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]yang na par bya ste/ pu nA ti/ pU nA ti/ sogs so/ /lung gi a tang la iT byin/ si tsa 'phel ba par smai pa da rnams la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a pA bI ta/ a pA bi Sh+TAM/ a pA bi ShuH/ sogs so/ /tang la iT byin/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/
[\[350b.2\]]a pa bi Sh+Ta/ a pa bi ShA tAM/ a pa bi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /riT la gnyis brjod k+dita rnams la/ a tsa la shU byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bu pA ba/ bu pu ba tuH/ bu bu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pu pa bi tha/
[\[350b.3\]]pu pu ba thaH/ pu bu ba/ skyes su phyi ma gsum la/ pu bA ba/ bu ba ba/ bu bu bi ba/ bu bu bi ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pu bu de/ pu pu bA te/ pu pu bu re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pu pu bi She/ pu bu bA the/ pu bu bi D+h+we/ pu pu bi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pu pu be/ pu
[\[350b.4\]]pu bi ba he/ pu bu bu ma he/ luT la iT byin yon tan byas bas/ a tang la/ pa bi tA/ pa bi tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ pa bi tA/ pa bi tA la/ /sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ pU yA ta/ pU yA stAM/ bU yA suH/ sogs dang / tang la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ pa bi
[\[350b.5\]]ShiSh+Ta/ pa bi ShI yA stAM/ pa pi ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ pa bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ pa bi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+ring gi a tang la/ a pa bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a pa bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[350b.6\]]kr-i nya 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka sbyor te/ pU la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/ laTa'i a tang la/ kr-i NA ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ kr-i NI te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ kr-i NI yA ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ kr-i NI te/ sogs so/ /
[\[350b.7\]]loTa'i a tang la/ kr-i NA tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ kr-i NI tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a kr-i NA ta/ sogs so/ /tang la/ a kr-i NI ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi a tang la/ iT byin si tsa la 'phel ba pa ra smaM pad rnams la 'os/ 'phel ba byas pas/ a kA rI ta/ a kA ri Sh+TAM/
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]a kA ri ShuH/ tang la/ br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ a ka ri Sh+Ta/ a ka ri ShA tAM/ a ka ri Sha ta/ sogs sam/ a ka rI Sh+Ta/ a ka'i rI ShA tAM/ a ka rI Sha ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[351a.2\]]liT la gnyis brjod r-i'i a ta 'os/ r-i a ku ha dag gis tsu 'os/ ka tsa Na la gnyis la 'phel ba dang / gzhan rnams la/ r-its+tsa ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa kA ra/ tsa ka ra tuH/ tsa ka ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa ka ri
[\[351a.3\]]tha/ tsa ka ra thuH/ tsa ka ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa kA ra/ tsa ka ra/ tsa ka ri ba/ tsa ka ri ma/ tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsa ka re/ tsa ka rA te/ tsa ka ri re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa ka ri She/ tsa ka rA the/ tsa ka ri d+hA+e/ tsa ka ri D+h+re/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa ka re/ tsa ka ri ba he/
[\[351a.4\]]tsa ka ri ma he/ luT la br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na par byas pas/ a tang la/ ka ri tA/ ka ri tA si/ sogs sam/ ka rI tA/ ke rI tA si/ sogs so/ /tang la/ ka ri tA/ ka ri tA se/ sogs sam/ ka rI tA/ ka rI tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/
[\[351a.5\]]byings kyi rI ta gyi i ta 'os/ r-i i ta/ r-i'i a Na la ra pha rol los ra byin/ u bad+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ kI r+YA ta/ kIr+YAstaM/ kI r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /tang la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ ka rI Shi Sh+Ta/ ka rI Shi yA s+ThaM/ ka rI Shi ra na/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ br-i r-I ta las yang na
[\[351a.6\]]'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas/ yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ ka ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ ka rI Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /tang la/ ka ri Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ ka rI Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a ka ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ka rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs
[\[351a.7\]]so/ tang la/ a ka ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ka rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /d+hU nya 'gul ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka sor te/ pU la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu 'os/ thung ngur bsgyur bas/ laTa'i a tang la/ b+hu nA ti/ sogs dang / tang la/
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]hU nI te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ d+hu mI yA Ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ d+hu nI ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ d+hu nA tU/ sogs dang / tang la/ d+hu nI tI/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ a d+hu na ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a d+hu rI ta/ sogs so/ lung
[\[351b.2\]]la/ U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byed/ a tang la 'phel ba byas pas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ ad+hA bI ta/ ad+hA bi Sh+DAM/ a d+hA bu ShuH/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a d+hau ShA ta/ /ad+hau Sh+DAM/ ad+hau ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[351b.3\]]gsum la/ a d+hauShIH/ a d+hau Sh+TAM/ a N+hauSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+hau ShaM/ a d+hau ShA/ a d+hauSh+ma/ tang la yon tan byas pas/ ad+ha biSh+Ta/ a d+ha bi ShA tAM/ a d+ha bi Sha ta/ sogs sam/ iT med pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ad+hoSh+Ta/ a
[\[351b.4\]]ng+ho ShA tAM/ a ng+ho Sha ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a d+ho Sh+ThAH/ a d+ho ShA thAM/ a b+hau d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+ho Shi/ a d+ho Sh+wa hi/ a ng+ho Sh+wa he/ liT la/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du d+hA ba/ du d+hu ba tuH/
[\[351b.5\]]du d+hu buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ du d+hu bi tha/ du d+hu bA thuH/ du d+hu bi ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ du ng+hu ba/ du ng+hu bi ba/ du ng+hu bi ma/ rang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ du ng+hu pe/ du ng+hA bA te/ du ng+hU bir/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ /du ng+hu bi Shi/ du ng+hu bA the/ du ng+hu bi ng+he+u/
[\[351b.6\]]bu ng+h+yu bi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ du ng+hu pe/ du ng+hu bi ba he/ du ng+hu pi ma he/ luT la/ U ta 'gro ba sogs kyi iT yang na bar byas/ yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ ng+ha bi hA/ ng+ha bi hAsi/ sogs sam/ ng+ho tA/ ng+ho tA si/ sogs so/ /tang la/ ng+ha ba tA/ ng+ha pi tA se/
[\[351b.7\]]sogs sam/ d+ho tA/ d+ho tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ d+hU yA ta/ d+hU yA s+t+rAM/ d+hU yA suH/ sogs dang / bdag iT yang na bar byas pas/ d+ha bi ShI Sh+Ta/ d+ha bi ShI yA s+t+waM/ d+ha bi ShI ran/ sogs sam/ d+ho ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la'ang iT yang na bar
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]byas pas/ a tang la/ d+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ b+ho Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /tang la/ d+ha bi Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ d+hoSh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a d+ha bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a d+ho Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /tang la/ a d+ha bi Sh+ya ta/
[\[352a.2\]]sogs sam/ a d+ho Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /gra ha nye bar len pa la la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ gra ha dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur bas/ laT la/ gr-ih+Na ti/ gr-ih+Ni taH/ gr-ih+Na n+ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ gr-ih+NI yA ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i skyes bu dang po
[\[352a.3\]]gsum pa/ gr-ih+NA hu/ gr-ih+NI tAM/ gr-ih+Na n+tu/ ha laH/ shAH/ shAn dz+nyau/ ha la las sh+NA'i shA na tsa hi la'o/ /byings ha la mtha' can las pha rol gyi sh+nA ni loT bsgyur ba'i hi pha rol la shA ni tsa zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ gra ha la/ loT/ sh+nA gra hi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar
[\[352a.4\]]bsgyur/ la si pa/ si'i hing sogs kyis si pa hing / mdo 'dis/ sh+nA shA na tsa ri bsgyur/ tsa dbyangs don/ shra shi ta kyi don/ a ta las hi'i 'os/ hi phyis pas/ gr-i hA Na/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ gr-i h+NI taM/ gr-i h+NI ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ gr-i hwA ni/ gr-i h+NA
[\[352a.5\]]ba/ gr-ih+NA ma/ lang la/ a gr-i h+NA ta/ a gr-i h+NI tAM/ a gr-ih+Na na/ sogs so/ /gra hau \u0f85 li Ti dwir+g+haH/ gra ha las liT ma yin pa la ring po'o/ /gra ha las pha rol gyi liT ma yin pa'i byings phyed pa bal dang po can rnams la -iT ring por 'gyur te/ lung la/ a gra hI ta/
[\[352a.6\]]a gra hI Sh+TAM/ a gra hIShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la byings gnyis brjod Na la gnyis dang thal la/ gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a N+yAs saM pra sA ra Na dang gzhan rnams la gra hi sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ r-i'i a ta 'os r-i a ta/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ga dzar
[\[352a.7\]]bsgyur ba sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza grA ha/ dza gr-i ha tuH/ dza gr-i huH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza gra hi tha/ dza gr-i ha thuH/ dza gr-i ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza grA ha/ dza gra ha/ dza gr-i hi ba/ dza gr-i hi ma/ luT la bal dang po'i iT byin/ gra ha las/ liT ma
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]yin pa la ring bo 'os de ring por bsgyur bas/ gra hI dA/ gra hI tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na bsgyur bas/ gr-i h+yA ta/ gr-i h+ya stAM/ gr-i h+yA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ bal dang po sogs kyis iT/ gra ha la sa l-iT ma yin pa sogs kyis
[\[352b.2\]]ring por bsgyur pas/ gra hI Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a gra hI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /shr-I 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ pU la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/ laT la/ shr-i NA ti/ sogs dang / l-ing la/ shr-I NI
[\[352b.3\]]yA ta/ sogs so/ laT la/ shrI NA tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a shr-i NA ta/ sogs so/ lung la/ i Ta byin/ si tsa la 'phel ba sogs kyis 'phel ba byas pas/ a shA rI ta/ a shA ri Sh+TAM/ a shA ri ShuH/ sogs so/ shr-I dr-I/ brAM hra swo bA/ sh-I dr-I br-I rnams kyi thung ngu'o/
[\[352b.4\]]shrI 'tshe ba/ dr-I rnam par 'joms pa/ pr-I skyong bar byed pa rnams kyi liT bsgyur pa'i kang 'gro ba rnams pha rol la thung ngur yang na bsgyur te/ thung ngur bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ i ka gi a tsa la ya Na dang thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ r-i ts+tsha ti r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/
[\[352b.5\]]skyes bu dang po gi gsum la/ sha shA ra/ sha shra tuH/ sha shar tuH/ sha shUH/ sha sha ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sha sha ri tha/ sha shra thuH/ sha shar thuH/ sha shra/ sha shar/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shAr / sha sha ra/ sha shri ba/ sha sha ri pa/ sha shri ma/ sha sha
[\[352b.6\]]rim/ liT la/ br-i r-I ta dag las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ sha ri tA/ sha ri tA si/ sogs sam/ sha rI tA/ sha rI tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta 'os/ rI i ta/ u pang+hA'i 'ang ngos rong por bsgyur bas/ shI r+YA ta/
[\[352b.7\]]shI r+YA swAM/ shI r+YA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ br-i r-I ta dag las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na par byas pas/ sha ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ sha rI Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ling la/ a sha ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a sha rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dr-I rnam par
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]'joms ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ pU sogs kyis thung ngur bsgyur bas/ laT la/ dr-i NA ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ dr-i NI yA ta/ sogs dang / loT la/ dr-i NA tuH/ sogs dang / lang la/ a dr-i NA ta/ sogs so/ /lung
[\[353a.2\]]la/ iT byin 'phel ba byas pas/ a dA rI ta/ a dA ri Sh+TAM/ a dA ri ShuH/ sogs so/ liT la/ k+di ta rnams la/ shr-I dr-I pr-I rnams kyis thung ngur yang na bsgyur/ thung ngu'i phyogs la/ ya Na dang / ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/ r-i ts+tsha ti/ r-I ta rnams kyi 'os yon tan byas pas/
[\[353a.3\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/ da dA ra/ da dra tuH/ da da ra tuH/ da druH/ da da ruH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ da da ri tha/ da dra thuH/ da da ra thuH/ da dra/ da da ra/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da dA ra/ da da ra/ da dri ba/ da da ri ba/ da dri ma/ da da ri ma/ luT la/ br-i r-I ta dag
[\[353a.4\]]gi yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ da rI tA/ da rI tA si/ sogs sam/ da rI tA/ da rI tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ byings [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]r-I ta kyi i ta 'os/ r-I i ta u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ dI r+YA ta/ dI r+YA stAM/ dI rA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT
[\[353a.5\]]la/ br-i r-I Ta sogs kyis iT dang IT yang par byas pas/ da ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ da rI Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a da ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a da rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /pr-I skyong bar byed pa dang rdzogs par byed pa la'o zhes pa
[\[353a.6\]]la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ pU sogs kyi thung ngur bsgyur bas/ laT la/ braM NA ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ pr-i NI yA ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ pr-i Na tu/ sogs dang lang la/ a pr-i NA ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ iT byin 'phel ba byas pas/ a bA rI ta/ a bA'i Sh+TaM/
[\[353a.7\]]a bA ri ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ shr-I dr-Ipr-I rnams sogs kyis thung ngur yang na bsgyur/ thung ngu'i phyogs la/ yaN dang / ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pa pA ra/ pa pra tuH/ pa par tuH/ ba bruH/ pa pa ruH/ skyes bu dbus
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]ma gsum la/ pa pa ri tha/ pa pra thuH/ pa par thuH/ pa pra/ pa par/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ pa pA ra/ pa pa ra/ pa pr-i ba/ pa pa ri ba/ pa pri ma/ pa pa ri ma/ luT la/ br-i r-I Ta dag las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas bas/ ba ri tA/ ba ri tA si/ sogs sam/ pa
[\[353b.2\]]rI tA/ pa rI tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta 'os/ r-I i ta/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur pas/ pI r+YA ta/ pI r+YA stA/ pI r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ br-i r-I ta sogs kyis iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ ba ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/
[\[353b.3\]]ba rI Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ba r-i Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a ba rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /dz+yA lang tsho nyams pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ ha laH/ ha la rnams so/ /byings mtha' saM pra sA ra Na byas pa yin na de'i pha rol du rkyen ha la dang po/
[\[353b.4\]]can byung na ring bor bsgyur par bya ste/ dz+yA la sh+nA gri hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sAr Nar bsgyur pas/ dzi nA zhes pa la mdo 'dis ring por bsgyur/ de slar yang pU la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu 'os/ thung ngur bsgyur pas/ laT la/ dzi nA ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ dzi nI yA ta/
[\[353b.5\]]sogs so/ /loT la/ dzi nA tu/ sogs dang / la ba la/ a dzi nA ta/ sogs so/ lung la/ yaM sogs kyis sa ka dang iT byin pas/ a dz+yA sI ta/ a dz+yA sI Sh+TAM/ a dz+yA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la/ Na la gnyis dang thal la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a Sh+tA sa saM
[\[353b.6\]]bra sA ra Na dang gzhan k+di ta rnams la gra ha dz+yA sogs kyis gnyis ka saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur i ka gi a tsa ya Na byas pas/ skyes bu dang gsum la/ dzi dz+yau/ dzi dz+ya tuH/ dzi dz+yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzi dz+yI tha/ dzi dz+yI tha/ dzi dz+yA thuH/ dzi dz+ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi dz+yau/
[\[353b.7\]]dzi dz+yai ba/ dzi dz+yo ma/ luT la/ dz+yA tA/ dz+yA tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ gra ti dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sAr Nar bsgyur/ kr-i ta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur pas/ dzI yA ta/ dzI yA stAM/ dzI yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ dz+yA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a dz+yA
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]s+yata/ sogs so/ ! /br-I sgrib pa la'o zhes ba la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ pr-i NA ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ br-I NI yA ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ br-I NA tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a pr-i NA ta/ sogs so/ /lung la 'phel ba byas pas/ skyes bu dang po
[\[354a.2\]]gsum la/ a brai ShI ta/ a brai Sh+TA/ a brai ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a brai ShIH/ a brai Sh+TAM/ a braiSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a braiShaM/ a bre Sh+wa/ a brai Sh+sa/ liT la/ gnyis brjod 'phel ba dang yon tan sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi brA ya/ bi
[\[354a.3\]]bra ya tuH/ bi bra yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bi bra yi tha/ bi bre tha/ bi bra ya thuH/ bi bra ya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bi bra ya/ bi bra ya/ bi bra yi ma/ luT la yon tan byas pas/ bre tA/ bre tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ brI yA ta/ brI yA stAM/ brI yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/
[\[354a.4\]]yon tan byas pas/ bre Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la'ang de bzhin du yon tan byas pas/ a bre Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dz+nyA khong du chud pa la la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ dz+nyA dza na dag gi dzA 'os dzAr bsgyur bas/ laT la/ dzA nA ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ dzA nI yA ta/
[\[354a.5\]]sogs so/ /loT la/ dzA nA tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a dzA nA ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ yam ram nam sogs kyis sa ka dang iT byin pas/ adz+nyA sI ta/ a dz+nyA si Sh+TAM/ a dz+nyA si ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po
[\[354a.6\]]gsum la/ dza dz+nyau/ dza dz+nya tuH/ dza dz+nyuH/ skyes bu dbus gsum la/ dza dz+nyi tha/ dza dz+nyA tha/ dza dz+nya thuH/ dza dz+nya/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ da dz+nyau/ dza dz+nyi ba/ dza dz+nyi ma/ luT la/ dz+nyA tA/ dz+nyA tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la gzhan yang brtsegs pa sogs kyis er bsgyur ba dang mi
[\[354a.7\]]bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ dz+nyA yA ta/ dz+nyA yA stAM/ dz+nyA yA suH/ sogs sam/ dz+nye yA ta/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ dz+nyA s+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a dz+nyA s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /shra n+b+ra grol par byed pa dang / so sor dga' bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ i ta
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ laT la/ shra th+n+ra ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ shra th+nI yA ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ shra th+nA tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a shra th+nA ta/ sogs so/ /lung la iT byin pas/ a shra n+thI ta/ a shra n+thi kh+TAM/ a shra n+thi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liTa'i
[\[354b.2\]]skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ sha shra n+tha/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ shra n+thi gro n+th+yaH/ ke ti li Ti se ti tha yi tsa e twaM ke tsi dwA/ shra n+thi gran+thi dag gi liT ka 'gro ba dang tha li iT dang bcas pa la e nyid 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/ /shra n+tha dang / gran+tha dag gi liT bsgyur pa ka 'gro ba'i
[\[354b.3\]]ming can rnams dang tha la iT dang bcas pa rnams pha rol la a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba dang e nyid du bsgyur ba sogs 'ga' zhig tu yang na par bya ste/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ shre tha tuH/ sha shra n+tha tuH/ shre thuH/ sha shra n+thAH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ shre
[\[354b.4\]]thi tha/ sha shran+thi tha/ shre tha thuH/ sha shra n+tha thuH/ shre tha/ sha shran+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sha shra n+tha/ shre thi ba/ sha shran+thi ba/ shre thi ma/ sha shra n+thi ma/ luT la iT byin pas/ shra n+thi tA/ shra n+thi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ i ta 'gro ba ma yin pa
[\[354b.5\]]sogs kyis na phyis pas/ shra th+yA ta/ shra th+yA s+dzAM/ shra th+ya suH/ sogs so/ /l+raT la iT byin pas/ shra n+thi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+ring la/ a shran+thi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /gran+tha spel ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa
[\[354b.6\]]shran+tha dang 'dra'o/ ! /ku Sha nges par 'gugs pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/ kuSh+NA ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ kuSh+NI yA ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ kuSh+NA tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a ku Sh+NA ta/ sogs so/ /ni raHku Sh+laH/ nir las
[\[354b.7\]]ku Sha las so/ /nyer bsgyur nir sngon ma'i ku Sha las pha rol gyi byings phyed pa bal dang po can la iT yang na 'gyur te/ lung la iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ nir ko ShI ta/ nir ko Shi Sh+TAM/ nir ko Shi ShuH/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ shal i ka u bab+hA
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]sogs kyis cI'i kAr bsgyur/ ShaD+ha dag gi ka 'os/ Sha ka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur bas/ nir ku k+Sha tA/ ni ra ku k+Sha tAM/ ni ra ku k+Sha na/ sogs so/ /nir sngon du med na iT rtag tu 'gyur ta/ a ko ShI ta/ a ko Shi Sh+TAM/ sogs so/ /
[\[355a.2\]]liT la gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi cu 'os/ ka tsar bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsu ko Sha/ tsa ku Sha tuH/ tsu ku ShuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsu ko She tha/ tsu ku Sha thuH/ tsu ku Sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsu ko Sha/ tsu ku Shi ba/ tsu k+Na Shi ma/ luT la iT byin yon
[\[355a.3\]]tan byas pas/ ko Shi tA/ ko Shi tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ kuSh+yA ta/ kuSh+yAstAM/ kuSh+yA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ la dang po'i iT byin/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ko Shi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ wang la/ a ko Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs
[\[355a.4\]]so/ ! /a sha zas la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ /laT la/ a sh+nA ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ a sh+mI yA ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ a sh+nA tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ A sh+nA ta/ sogs so/ lung la iT byin pas/ A shI ta/
[\[355a.5\]]A shi Sh+TAM/ A shi ShaH/ sogs so/ /liT la gnyis brjod/ a ka 'dra ba la ring po byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ A sha/ A sha tuH/ A shuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A shi tha/ A sha thuH/ A sha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ A sha /A shi ba/ A shi ma/ luT la/ iT byin pas/ a shi ta/
[\[355a.6\]]a shi tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ /a sh+yA ta/ a sh+yA stA/ a sh+yA suH/ sogs so/ l-iT la iT byin pas/ a shi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ A shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /br-i yang dag bar gus pa la'o zhes ba la tang rnams sbyor te/ laT la/
[\[355a.7\]]br-i NI te/ sogs dang / ling la/ br-i NI ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ br-i NI tAM/ sogs dang / lang la/ a br-i NI ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ br-i r-I ta las yang na 'os/ iT dang I ta yang na par byas bas/ a ba ri Sh+Ta/ a ba ri ShA tAM/ a ba ri Sha ta/ sogs so/ a ba rI Sh+Ta/
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]sogs so/ /'grel par br-i la pha rol gyi lung dang / smon pa'i ling la yang na iT mi 'jug go zhes pa bshad pas/ i ta ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ dz+hal dang po rnams la/ gzugs thung ngu las kyang ngos/ si tsa phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a br-i ta/ a br-i ShA tAM/ a br-i Sha
[\[355b.2\]]ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a br-i thAH/ a br-i ShA thAM/ a br-i d+h+raM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a braM Sha/ a br-i Sh+ma hi/ liT la gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba bre/ ba bre te/ ba bri re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba br-i She/ ba brA the/ ba brid+hA+e/ skyes bu
[\[355b.3\]]phyi ma gsum la/ ba bre/ ba br-i ba he/ ba br-i ma he/ luT la br-i rAM ta las yang 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas/ ba ri tA/ ba ri tA se/ sogs sam/ pa rI tA/ pa rI tA se/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ iT byin pas/ ba ri ShI Sh+Ta/ ba ri ShI yA stAM/ ba ri ShI ran/ sogs dang / yar
[\[355b.4\]]na iT ma byin pas/ br-i ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la br-i rAM ta las yang na 'os/ iT dang IT yang na bar byas pas/ pa r-i Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ parI Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a pa ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a pa rI Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA kar Na s+ya lU
[\[355b.5\]]trA N+yA da yaH/ samA b+haM/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kar Na'i mdo las krI la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod la legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba
[\[355b.6\]]las krI la sogs pa byed pa po'i don ma sha pa kyi yul la sh+nA 'jug pa rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni tsu ra la sogs pa rnams kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ ! tsu ra rku ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ sa t+yA pa
[\[355b.7\]]pA sha rI pa pI NA tU la Sh+kho ka se nA lo ma twa tsa ba r+Na tsa rma tsU r+Na cu rA di b+h+yo Ni tsa/ sa t+yA pa bden pa/ pA sha zhags pa/ rU pa gzugs/ bI NA sgra brnyan/ tU la phra mo/ sh+lo ka tshigs bcad/ se na sde/ lo ma spu/ twa tsa pags pa/ bar+Na mdog/ tsa rma pags pa/ tsU r+Na phye ba/ tsu ra
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]la sogs pa rnams la sa Ni tsa'o/ /sa t+yA pa la sogs pa rtags de rnams dang / byings tsu ra la sogs pa rnams las rang don la Ni tsa pha rol tu 'gyur te/ tsa dbyangs don dang Na 'phel ba'i don no/ /tsu ra la/ Ni tsa pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas
[\[356a.2\]]tso ri zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ byed pa po la sha pa byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis mtshams sbyar bas/ laT la/ tso ra ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ tso ra ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ tso ra ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a tso ra
[\[356a.3\]]ya ta/ sogs so/ /Ni tsa sh+tsa/ Ni tsa las kyang ngo / /Ni tsa'i mtha' las kyang byed pa po la sems dang ldan pa 'bras bu thob pa'i don la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'jug ste/ laT la/ tso ra ya te/ sogs dang / ling la/ tso ra ya ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ tso ra ya tAM/ sogs dang /
[\[356a.4\]]lang la/ a tso ra ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ tso ril/ lung tsI byin/ Ni shri sogs kyis tsI tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po sogs kyis ra phyis/ yang ba'i ring po 'os/ a b+h+yA sa ring bor bsgyur/ Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os/ u sad+hA thung
[\[356a.5\]]ngur bsgyur/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa'ang phyis pas/ a tang gi skyes pu dang po gsum la/ a tsU tsu ra ta/ a tsU tsu ra tAM/ a tsU tsu ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsU tsu raH/ a tsU tsu ra taM/ a tsU tsu ra ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsU tsu ra raM/ a tsU tsu rA ba/ a tsU tsu rA

[\[356a.7\]]sogs so/ luT la/ iT byin/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yod tan byas bas/ tso ra yi tA/ tso ra yi tA si/ sogs dang / Ni tsa las kyang ngos/ tang la/ tso ra yi tA/ tso ra yi tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling pa la/ Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni tsa phyis bas/ tso r+YA ta/ tso r+YA stAM/
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]tsa r+YA suH/ sogs dang / Ni tsa las kyang ngos tang rnams sbyor na/ bal dang po'i iT byin yon tan byas pas/ tso ra yi ShI Sh+Ta/ tso ra yi ShI yA staM/ tso ra yi ShI ra na/ sogs so/ /l-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ tso ra ya Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / Ni tsa la'ang ngos/ tang la/ tso ri yi Sh+ya te/ sogs

[\[356b.5\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsu tso ra/ tsu tsu ri ba/ tsu tsu ri ma/ luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ tso ri tA/ tsi ri tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ tsU r+YA ta/ tsU r+YA stAM/ tsU r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ tsor Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang /
[\[356b.6\]]de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a tso ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /kr-i ta kun nas sgrog pa la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ u ba ng+hA yA sh+tsa/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngo / /byings kyi a pa d+hA'i r-i yig kyang rkyen pha rol la a ta du 'gyur te/ kr-i ta la sa Ni tsa mdo 'dis r-i ita/ r-i'i a Na la ra pha rol los nga sbyar/
[\[356b.7\]]u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ kIrti zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ kIrta ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ kIrta ye ta/ sogs dang / loT la/ kIrta ya tu/ sogs so/ lang la/ a kI rta ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ Ni shr-i sogs kyi tsI tsa ra du bsgyur/ tsang la'ang
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]ngos/ kir gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po sogs kyis ra phyis/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/ Ni tsa phyis pas/ a tsi kIrta ta/ a tsi kIrta tAM/ a tsi lakIrta na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ kIrta yAM tsa kAr/ kI rta yAM ba b+hU ba/ kI rta yA mA sa/ sogs so/ luT la iT
[\[357a.2\]]byin yon tan byas pas/ kIrta yi tA/ kIrta yI tA saM/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/ kIr+t+yA ta/ kIr+t+yA stAM/ kIr+t+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ kIrta yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a kIrta yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[357a.3\]]sogs so/ ! /ga Na grangs la'o zhes pa la a tang rnams sbyor te/ Ni tsa byin/ a ta kyi dbyi 'os byings mtha'i a phyis/ a phyis pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis 'phel ba mi byed/ sha pa la yon tan byas pas/ laT la/ ga Na ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ ga Na ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT
[\[357a.4\]]la/ ga Na ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a ga Na ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ I tsa ga NaH/ ga Na'i I 'ang ngo / /Ni tsang dang bcas pa pha rol la ga Na'i a b+h+yA sa'i I yang na ste/ Ni shri sogs kyis tsA tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os
[\[357a.5\]]ga dza mdo 'dis Ir yang na bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/ Ni tsa phyis pas/ dzI ga Na ta/ dzI ga Na tAM/ dzI ga Na na/ sogs sam/ dza ga Na ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ A ma sbyar bas/ ga Na yAM tsa kA ra/ ga Na yAM ba b+hU ba/ ga Na yA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin yon tan
[\[357a.6\]]byas pas/ ga Na yi tA/ ga Na yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/ ga N+yA ta/ ga N+yA stAM/ skabs 'dir aT phyis ba yin pas Ni tsar la/ sa na bzhin gyi bya ba mi 'jug go/ /ga r+b+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ iT bin yon tan byas pas/ ga Na yiSh+ya taM/
[\[357a.7\]]sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a ga Na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ka tha dag gi rgyun la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis/ a phyis pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis 'phel ba mi byed/ sha ba la yon tan byas pas/ laT la/ ka tha ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ ka tha
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]ye ta/ sogs so/ /loT la/ ka tha ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ a ka tha ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ka tho \u0f85b+h+yA sa s+ya I twaM ko tse dwA/ ka tha'i a b+h+yA sa'i i nyid 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/ /Ni tsang dag pha rol la ka tha'i a b+h+yA sa'i I nyid skabs 'ga' zhig tu yang
[\[357b.2\]]nA bar bya ste/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'ang ngos byings gnyis brjod/ lung 'dren 'di'i Ir bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas/ Ni'i i ta med pa la 'os/ Ni tsa phyis pas/ a tsI ga tha ta/ a tsI ka tha tAM/ a tsI ka tha na/ sogs sam/ a tsa ka tha ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[357b.3\]]liT la Am sbyar bas/ ka tha yAM tsa kAr/ ka tha yAM ba b+hU ba/ ka tha yA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a ka tha yi tA/ a ka tha yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ ka th+yA ta/ ka th+yA stAM/ ka th+yA suH/ skabs 'dir a ka byis pa yin
[\[357b.4\]]pas Ni tsar pas na bzhin gyi bya ba mi byed do/ /sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas bas/ ka tha yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ka tha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /aM ka 'gro ba dang mtshan nyid dag la'o zhes pa la 'ang a tang rnams sbyor te/ a ta kyi dbyi 'os byings mtha'i
[\[357b.5\]]a phyis bas/ laT la/ aM ka ya ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ aM ka ya te/ sogs so/ /loT la/ aM ka ya tu/ sogs dang / lang la/ AM ka ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ 'grel par aM ka'i tsang pha rol la a tsa gnyis mi [(]brtong[,]brtod [)]par ka gnyis brjod ba'am yang na Ni tsa dang
[\[357b.6\]]bcas ba gnyis brjod do zhes bshad pas ka gnyis brjod pa'i phyogs la/ AM tsa ka ta/ AM tsa ka tAM/ AM tsa ka na/ sogs dang / Ni tsa dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pa'i phyogs la yang Na'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyi ma phyis pas/ AM tsi ka ta/ AM tsi ka tAM/ AM tshi ka na/ sogs so/ /
[\[357b.7\]]liT la A ma sbyar bas/ aM ka yAM ba b+hU ba/ aM ka yAM tsa kA ra/ aM ka yA mAs/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ aM ka yi tA/ aM ka yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/ aM kyA ta/ aM kyA stAM/ aM kyA suH/
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ iT byin yon tan byas pas/ aM ka yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ AM ka yi Sh+yata/ sogs so/ /'grel par/ AM ka'i mtha'i a Ni tsa pha rol la yang na yi dbyi'o zhes bshad pas/ a ma phyis pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro
[\[358a.2\]]ba la'o zhes pas 'phel ba byas pas/ aM kA Ni tsa zhes grub pa la/ a rti hrI ts+lI rI krU yI k+Sh+mA y+YA tAM pu k+Nau/ a rti hrI ts+lI rI krU yI k+Sh+mA yI  AM ta rnams kyi Ni la pu ka'o/ /a rti te/ r-i 'gro ba/ hI do tsha ba/ ts+lI 'gro ba/ rIng nyan pa/ krU yI s+tha/ k+Sh+mA yI rnam par 'dar pa rnams rang byings sA ta mgra' can
[\[358a.3\]]rnams la Ni tsa pha rol la bu ka A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don no/ /i kA Ni la/ mdo 'dis pu ka byin pas/ aM kA pi zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ aM kA pa yi ti/ sogs dang / ling la/ aM kA pa ye ta/ sogs dang / loT la/ aM kA pa ya tu/
[\[358a.4\]]sogs so/ /lang la/ AM kA ba ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la ka gnyis brjod Na'i iT med pa la 'os/ Ni na phyis pra tsad la drangs pas/ AM tsa kA pa ta/ AM tsa kA ba tAM/ AM tsa kA pa na sogs te/ skabs 'dir pu ka bar na yod pas Ni tsa gnyis mi brjod pas yang na bar mi byed do/ /liT
[\[358a.5\]]la Am sbyar bas/ aM kA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ aM kA pa yAM ba b+hU ba/ aM kA pa yA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ aM kA pa yi tA/ aM kA pa yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/ aM kA pyAta/ aM kA byA stAM/ aM kA pyA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT
[\[358a.6\]]la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ aM kA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ AM kA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ar+tha slong ba la'o zhes pa la'ang a tang dang tang gnyis ka 'jug ste/ a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ laTa'i a tang la/ a r+tha ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/
[\[358a.7\]]a [\[]r+tha[\]] ya te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang la/ a r+tha ye ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a r+tha ye ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ a r+tha ya tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ a r+tha ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ A r+tha ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ A r+tha ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]la/ 'grel par a r+tha'i tsang pha rol la tha nyid gnyis brjod pa'am/ yang na tha Ni tsa dang bcas pa gnyis brjod do zhes bshad pas/ tha nyid gnyis brjod pa'i phyogs kyi a tang la/ A rta tha ta/ A rta tha tAM/ A rta tha na/ sogs dang / tang la/ A rta tha ta/ A rta the tAM/ a rta tha n+ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[358b.2\]]Ni tsa dang bcas pa la gnyis brjod pa'i phyogs kyi a tang la/ A rti tha ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ A rti tha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ a r+tha yAM tsa kA ra/ a r+tha yAM ba b+hU ba/ a r+tha yA mA sa/ a r+tha yAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/
[\[358b.3\]]a r+tha yi tA/ a r+tha yi tA si/ sogs dang / tang la/ a r+tha yi tA/ a r+tha yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/ Ni'i iT med pa la'os/ Ni phyis bas/ a r+th+yA ta/ a r+th+yA stAM/ a r+th+yAsuH/ sogs dang / tang la iT byin pas/ ar+tha yi ShI Sh+Ta/ a r+tha yi ShI lA s+t+rAM/ a r+tha yi
[\[358b.4\]]Shi ran/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ ar+tha yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ A r+tha yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+ring gi a tang la/ A r+tha yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ A r+tha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /yang 'grel par a r+tha'i a yang
[\[358b.5\]]Ni tsa pha rol la yang na ming dbyi'o zhes bshad bas/ a ma phyis pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas/ a rti hrI ts+li rI krU yi k+Sh+mA yI A ta rnams kyi Ni la pu ka 'os/ pu ka A ga ma byin/ sha pa la yon tan byas pas/ laTa'i a tang la/ a r+tha pa ya ti/ sogs
[\[358b.6\]]dang / tang la/ a r+tha pa ya te/ sogs so/ /ling gi a tang / ar+thA pa ye ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a r+thA pa ye ta/ sogs so/ /loTa'i a tang la/ a r+thA pa ya tu/ sogs dang / tang la/ a r+thA pa ya tAM/ sogs so/ /lang gi a tang la/ A r+thA pa ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/
[\[358b.7\]]A r+thA pa ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ pu ka bar na yod pas Ni gnyis mi ba rdzong tha gnyis brjod pas/ a tang la/ A rta thA pa ta/ A rta thA pa tAM/ A rta thA pa na/ sogs dang / tang la/ A rta thA pa ta/ A rta thA pa tAM/ A rta thA pa n+ta/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ a r+thA pa yAM tsa kA
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]ra/ a r+thA pa yAM ba b+hU ba/ a r+thA pa yA mA sa/ a r+thA pa yAM tsa kre/ sogs dang / luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a tang la/ a r+thA pa yi tA/ a r+thA pa yi tA si/ sogs so/ /tang la/ a r+thA pa yi tA/ a r+thA pa yi tA se/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling gi a tang la/
[\[359a.2\]]Ni phyis pas/ a r+thA pyA ta/ a r+thA pyA stAM/ a r+thA pyA suH/ sogs dang / tang la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a r+thA pa yi ShI Sh+Ta/ ar+thA pa yi ShI yA stAM/ a r+thA pa yi ShI ran/ sogs so/ /l+r-iTa'i a tang la/ a r+thA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ a r+thA pa yi Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /
[\[359a.3\]]de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ A r+thA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / tang la/ A r+thA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU drA ts+tsu rA da yaH/ sa mA b+hAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kar Na'i mdo las tsur la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan
[\[359a.4\]]bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ tsu ra la sogs ba rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //
[\[359a.5\]]de ltar b+hU la sogs pa byings sde tshan bcu la rnam dbye brgyad dang brgyad cu'am/ la yig sde tshan bcu sbyar ba'i bya ba byed tshul gyi rnam 'gyur rags pa rnams bshad zin nas/ da ni byings byings su bsgrub pa dang / ming byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen mtha' can gyi bya ba rnams bshad par
[\[359a.6\]]bya ste/ de yang dang po Ni tsa ni/ he tu ma ti tsA he tuH/ rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu med pa las kyang ngo / /rgyu dang bcas pa ste rang gi dgos don gyi bya ba rang gis byed pa'am/ gzhan zhig byed du 'jug ba'i don dang rgyu med pa ste/ gzhan gyi bya ba zhig rang gis byed pa'am/ gzhan zhig byed du
[\[359a.7\]]'jug pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang byings las pha rol tu Ni tsa 'gyur te/ kr-i la Ni tsa/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la'o zhes pas 'phel ba byas/ kA ri zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ kAr yiMti/ kAriM yar ta/ kA ra yo tu/ a kA ra yiM te/ sogs dang / lung la Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a ta 'os r-i a/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA thung ngu 'os/ u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur/ a ka ma phyis pa la yang bal tsang pha rol las na bzhin nos/ a b+h+yA sa'i a i yang ba'i ring po 'oMs/ de ring por bsgyur/
[\[359b.2\]]Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/ Ni tsa phyis ra drangs pas/ a tsI ka ra ta/ a tsI ka ra tAM/ a tsI ka ra na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ kA ra yAM ba b+hU ba/ kA ra yAM tsa kA ra/ ka ra yA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ kA ra yi tA/ kA ra yi tA si/ sogs so/ /sman
[\[359b.3\]]pa'i ling la Ni iT med pa la 'os Ni i tsa phyis pas/ kA r+YA ta/ kA r+YA stAM/ kA r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ kA ra yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a kA ra yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /tsu ra la rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu med pa la'ang ngos/
[\[359b.4\]]Ni tsa sbyar/ bu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ tso ri zhes grub pa la leT sogs sbyar bas/ tso ri yaM te/ tso ra yi ta/ tso ra yo tu/ a tso ri ye ta/ lung la/ nA gA+o pi shA spri di tAM/ a ka phyis ba dang shA su r-i ta 'gro ba rnams kyi ma yin no/ /byings kyi mtha' nas a ka so sor
[\[359b.5\]]bsdu ba'i yi ge phyis ba dang / shA su rjes su bstod ba dang / byings r-i ta 'gro ba rnams kyi tsang pha rol na yod pa'i Ni la u bad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba ma yin no zhes bas u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba mi thob kyang / 'grel pa ra tsur la sogs pa rnams ni rtag tu Ni tsa'i mtha' can yin pas a ka phyis
[\[359b.6\]]ba yin kyang tsang pha rol la u pa dU thung dur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byed do zhes bshad pas/ thung ngur bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ Ni shri sogs kyis tsI tsang / tsang la 'os gnyis brjod u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/ a tsu tsur ta/ a tsu
[\[359b.7\]]tsu ra tAM/ a tsu tsu ra na/ sogs dang / yang na gzhan cho ga rnams 'dra ba la u pa d+hA thung ngur ma bsgyur bas/ a tsu tso ra ta/ a tsu tso ra tAM/ a tsu tso ra na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ tso ra yAM ba b+hU ba/ tso ra yAM tsa kA ra/ tso ra yA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ tso ra
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]yi tA/ tsor yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni tsa phyis pas/ tso r+Ya ta/ tso r+YA stAM/ tso r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /liT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ tso ra yi mya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a tso ra yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /shA su
[\[360a.2\]]rjes su bstod pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu med pa la'ang ngos Ni tsa sbyar bas/ shA si zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ shA saM ya ti/ shA si ye ta/ shA sa yi tu/ a shA sa ya ta/ lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ a ka
[\[360a.3\]]phyis pa shA su ri ta 'gro ba rnams kyi ma yin no/ /u pa d+hA thung ngur mi bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a sha shA sa ta/ a sha shA sa tAM/ a sha shA sa na/ sogs so/ /liT la/ A ma sbyor bas/ shA sa yAM ba b+hU ba/ shA sa yAM tsa kA ra/ shA sa yA mA sa/ sogs so/ /
[\[360a.4\]]luT la iT byin yon tan byas bas/ shA sa yi tA/ shA sa yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/ shA s+yA ta/ shA s+yA stAM/ shA s+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ shA sa yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a
[\[360a.5\]]shAs yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /D+hau kr-i 'gro ba la'o zhes ba la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa byin/ rjes 'brel phyis pas/ D+ho ki zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ D+hau ki ya ti/ D+ho ka ya ta/ D+hau ka ye tu/ a D+hau ka yi ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsa du bsgyur/
[\[360a.6\]]tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngu dang a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ D+haDa aka phyis pa shA sa r-i ta 'gro ba sogs kyis u pa ng+hA thung ngur mi bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a Du D+hau ke ta/ uDa D+hau ka na tAM/ a Du D+hau ka na/ sogs so/ /liT la/ A ma sbyar bas/ D+hau ka yAM
[\[360a.7\]]tsa kAr/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ D+hau ka yi tA/ D+ho ka yi tA si/ sogs dang / smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ D+hau kyA ta/ D+hau kyA s+yAM/ D+hau kyA suH/ sogs so/ /l+riT la in byin yon tan byas pas/ D+hau ka yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]bzhun du/ l+r-ing la/ a D+hau ka yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la 'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas ba sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba dang a tsa'i a ya sogs kyis/ shwa yi zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ shwA ya ya ti/
[\[360b.2\]]shwA ya ye ta/ shwA yi ya tu/ a shwA ya ya ta/ sogs so/ /Nau tsa saM shrA ngoH/ /Ni la'ang sa na tsang dag la'o/ /shwa ya ti Ni la'ang sa na tsang dag pha rol la sa pra sAr nar yang Na bsgyur te/ lung la saM pra sA ra Ni'i phyogs la/ shwi Ni tsa ces pa la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang / mdo 'di+es saM pra
[\[360b.3\]]sA ra Nar bsgyur/ shu Ni tsang tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/ yang ba'i ring po 'os/ de ring por bsgyur/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba/ e tsa sogs kyis au A bar bsgyur/ Ni tsang la u pad+hA'i thung ngu 'os/ u pad+hA thung ngur bsgyur/ de nas Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis
[\[360b.4\]]pas/ a shU sha ba ta/ a shU sha ba tAM/ a shU sha ba na/ sogs dang / saM pra sA ra Na ma byas pa'i phyogs la/ tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po sogs kyis ba phyis/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis pas/ a shi shwa ya ta/ a shi shwa ya tAM/ a shi shwa ya na/ sogs
[\[360b.5\]]so/ /liT la/ A ma sbyar bas/ shwA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ shwU ye yi tA/ shwA ya yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni phyis bas/ shwA y+YA ta/ shwA y+YA stAM/ shwA y+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+riT la iT byin yon tan
[\[360b.6\]]byas bas/ shrA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a shwA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /sta m+wU skri ba pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ sta m+b+hi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ sta m+b+ha ya ti/ sta m+b+ha ye ta/ sta mA b+ha ya tu/ a sta m+ha ya ta/
[\[360b.7\]]sogs so/ /sta m+b+hu si bu sa hAM tsa di/ sta m+b+tu si bus ha rnams kyi tsang la'o/ /sta m+b+hu sgrib pa/ Shi bu thags kyi rgyu/ Sha ha bzod pa rnams kyi nyer bsgyur sa Shar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan tsa na sngon du byung yang tsang la pha rol la Shar bsgyur ba ma yin te/ lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis sats+li tsang /
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ Ni'i iT med ba la 'os Ni phyis/ a ba sngon/ mdo 'dis Sha ra mi bsgyur/ a bA ta sta m+b+ha ta/ a bA ta sta m+b+ha tAM/ a bA ta sta m+b+ha na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ stam+b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT
[\[361a.2\]]la iT byin bas/ sta m+b+ha yi tA/ sta m+b+ha yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la Ni phyis bas/ sta m+b+hA ta/ staM m+b+hA stAM/ sta m+b+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ sta m+b+ha yi Sh+yA ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sta m+b+ha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Shi bu thags kyi
[\[361a.3\]]rgyu la'o zhes ba la'ang rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ sa bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ se ba ya ti/ se ba ya ta/ se ba ya tu/ a se ba ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/
[\[361a.4\]]tsang la 'os ngos byings gnyis brjod/ yang ba'i ring po 'os ring por bsgyur/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa phyi ma Sha/ Ni la tsang la u bad+ha'i thung ngu 'os/ u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur / Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/ Ni phyis/ pa ri sngon/ sta m+b+hU si bu sogs kyis sa Sha ra mi
[\[361a.5\]]bsgyur/ mtshams sbyar bas/ par+Ya sI Shi ba ta/ bar+Ya sI Shi ba tAM/ bar+Ya sI Shi ba na/ sogs so/ /liT la/ A ma sbyar bas/ se ba yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / luT la iT byin pas/ se pa yi tA/ se ba yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/
[\[361a.6\]]se byA ta/ se byA stAM/ se byA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ iT byin yon tan byas pas/ se ba yi ng+hu ti/ sogs so/ l+r-ing la/ a se ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Sha ha bzod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ u bang+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/ sA hi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/
[\[361a.7\]]sA he ya ti/ sA ha ya tu/ a sA he ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ Ni shrisogs kyis ts+li tsang / tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/ a ka ma phyis pa la yang ba la yang ba la tsang pa rol la san bzhin nos/ a i yang ba'i ring po 'os de ring po/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa phyi ma
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]la/ Ni bcar la u pa d+hA'i zung du 'os/ thung ngur bsgyur/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni tsha phyis/ bi sngon/ stam+b+hu shA su sa ha sogs kyis sa Shar mi bsgyur te/ bya sI Sha ta ta / bya sI Sha ha tAM/ bya sI Sha ha na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ sA ha yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la
[\[361b.2\]]iT byin pas/ sa hi tA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ sA h+yA ta/ sA h+yA stA/ sA h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l-iT la/ iT byin yon tan byas pas/ sA ha yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a sA ha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /tsa kA sr-i sgra smad pa la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas
[\[361b.3\]]pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar bas/ tsa kA si zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ tsa kA si ya ti/ tsa kA sa ye ta/ tsa kI sa ya tu/ tsa kI sa ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang / tsang la 'os tsa gnyis brjod/ a ka ma phyis pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san
[\[361b.4\]]bzhin nos/ a i yang ba'i ring po 'os de ring por bsgyur/ a ka phyis pa shA su ri ta 'gros ba sogs kyis u bang+hA thung ngur mi bsgyur/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/ Ni phyis pas/ a tsI tsa kA sa ta/ a tsI tsa kA sa twaM/ a tsI tsa kA sa na/ sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ su b+hA to ra
[\[361b.5\]]ni kA tsa sh+tsa sa nA t+ka tsi dwA/ sub kyi byings dang a tsa gcig ma yin pa'i san bzhin 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/ /sub kyi byings rnams dang byings a tsa gcig ma yin pa rnams kyi Ni tsang pha rol las na bzhin gyi bya ba skabs 'ga' zhig tu yang na bar bya ste/ lung la gzhan cho ga sngon ma dang 'dra
[\[361b.6\]]ba la/ ir bsgyur ba sogs ma byas pas/ a tsa tsa kA sa ta/ a tsa tsa kA sa tAM/ a tsa tsa kA san/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar pas/ tsa kAs yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / luT la iT byin bas/ tsa kA sa yi ta/ tsa kA sa yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ Ni'i iT
[\[361b.7\]]med pa la'o sa Ni phyis pas/ tsa kA s+yA ta/ tsa kA s+yA stAM/ tsa kA s+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT pa iT byin pas/ tsa kA sa yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a tsa kA sa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /u n+di gshir ba la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar bas
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]u nI zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ un+di ya ti/ u n+di ye ta/ an+da ye tu/ aun+da ye ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis tsI tsang / tsang la 'os da Ni dang bcas ba gnyis brjod/ a tsa dang po'i a+wa Ta/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba
[\[362a.2\]]byas/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ aun+dI da ta/ aun+di da tAM/ aun+di da na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar pas/ un+da yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la in byin pas/ un+da yi tA/ un+da yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis
[\[362a.3\]]bas/ u n+d+yA ta/ u n+d+yAstaM/ un+d+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ u n+da yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ aun+da yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /u b+nga lugs la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar bas/ u b+ngi zhes grub pa la/
[\[362a.4\]]la sogs sbyang bas/ u b+dza ya ti/ u b+dza ya ta/ u b+dza ya tu/ au b+dza ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang / tsang la 'os dza Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ aub+dzi dza ta/ au b+dzi dza traM/ au b+dzi dza na/ sogs so/ /
[\[362a.5\]]liT la A ma sbyar bas/ u b+dza yAM tsa kAr/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ ub+dza yi tA/ ub+dza yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med ba la'os/ Ni phyis pas/ ub+dz+yA ta/ ub+dz+yAstAM/ u b+dz+yasuH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ ub+dza
[\[362a.6\]]yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ aub+dza yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /a rtsa mchod pa la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa spyar bas/ a rtsi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ a rtsa ya ti/ a rtsa ye ta/ a rtsa ya tu/ a rtsa ya ta/ sogs dang /
[\[362a.7\]]lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis tsa Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT med ba la 'os Ni phyi ma phyis pas/ A rtsi tsa tA/ A rtsi tsa tAM/ A rtsi tsa na/ sogs so/ /liT la/ A ma sbyar bas/ a rtsa yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ a rtsa yi tA/ a rtsa yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/ Ni phyis pas/ a r+ts+yA ta/ a r+ts+yA stAM/ a r+ts+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ iT byin pas/ a rtsa yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ A rtsa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /drai nyal ba la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ drA yi zhes
[\[362b.2\]]grub ba la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  drA ya ya ti/ ling  drA ya ya ta/ laT  drA ya ya tu/ a drA ya ya ta/ sogs so/ lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os drA gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ ha la dang po sogs kyis ra phyis Ni'i iT med pa la 'os/ Ni phyis pas/ a da dra
[\[362b.3\]]ya ta/ a da dra ya tAM/ a da dra yan/ sogs so/ /liT la Am sbyar bas/ drA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ drA ya yi tA/ drA ya yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i lang la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ drA y+YA ta/ drA y+YA stAM/ drA y+YA suH/ sogs so/
[\[362b.4\]]Ni la tsa pa la u ba ng+nA'i thung ngu'os thung ngur bsgyur/ l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ drA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a drA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ra b+ha rtsom pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ ra b+he rashA ts+li ToH/ ra b+hi'i sha liT dag ma yin pa'i
[\[362b.5\]]a tsa la'o/ /ra b+hi'i sha phyis ba'i atsa dang liT bsgyur ba'i atsa dang po can ma yin pa'i rkyen atsa dang po can pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/ num byin/ ma gnas don u brjod don rnams phyis pas/ ra m+b+ho zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ ram+b+hi ya ti/ ram+b+hi ye ta/[ \[]loT[\]]ram+b+ha ya tu/
[\[362b.6\]]a ra m+b+ha yi ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ 'grel par tsang pa rol la ram+b+ha gnyis brjod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pas/ gnyis mi brjod/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a ram+b+ha ta/ a ram+b+ha tAM/ a ram+b+ha na/ sogs so/ /liT la Am sbyar bas/ ram+b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la
[\[362b.7\]]iT byin pas/ ram+b+ha yi tA/ ram+b+ha yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ ram+b+h+yA ta/ ram+b+h+yA stAM/ ram+b+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ ram+b+ha yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ram+b+ha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Du la b+ha Sha thob pa
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ la b+he sh+tsa/ la b+ha'i 'ang ngo / /la b+hi'i 'ang sha phyis pa dang / liT bsgyur ba'i a tsa dang po ma yin pas rkyen atsa dang po can pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/ num rjes 'brel phyis/ lam+b+hi zhes grub
[\[363a.2\]]pa la/ laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT  lam+b+ha ya ti/ loT lam+b+ha ye ta/ lam+b+ha ya tu/ lang  a la m+b+ha ya ta/ sogs so/ /'grel bar lam+b+ha'i 'ang tsang pha rol la gnyis brjod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pas/ gnyis mi brjod Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ sha lam+b+ha ta/ a la m+b+ha tAM/ a la m+b+ha na/
[\[363a.3\]]sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ lam+b+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ lam+b+ha yi tA/ lam+b+ha yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon ba'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ lam+b+h+yA ta/ lam+b+h+yA stAM/ lam+b+h+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin bas/ lam+b+ha yi
[\[363a.4\]]Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a lam+b+ha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /hi 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa byin/ e tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba e tsa sogs kyis A yar bsgyur bas/ hA yi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  hA ya ya ti/ hA
[\[363a.5\]]ya ya ta/ ling  hA yA ya tu/ loT  a hA ya ya ta/ lang  sogs so/ /lung la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang / tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ yang ba'i ring po Ni'i iT med pa la phyis pas/ a dzI ha ya ta/ a dzI hA yA tAM/ a dzI ha yan/ sogs so/ /liT la/ A ma sbyar bas/
[\[363a.6\]]hA ya yAM tsa ka ra/ sogs so/ /luT la/ iT byin pas/ hA ya yi tA/ hA ya yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ hA y+YA ta/ hA y+YA stAM/ hA y+YA suH/ /sogs so/ /Ni la tsang la u bar+hA+e'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ hA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs
[\[363a.7\]]dang / l+r-ing la/ a hA la yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /U na yongs su nyams pa la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ U ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ U na ya ti/ U na ye ta/ U na ya tu/ A+au na ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ non ya ti d+h+wa na ya t+yi la ba
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]rgya rda ya ti b+h+yAH/ U na ya ti d+h+wa na ya ti i la ya ti a rda ya ti rnams las ma yin no/ /U na yongs su nyams pa/ ng+h+wan s+tha/ e la dang a rda 'gro ba rnams Ni tsa'i mtha' can pha rol las ts+li tsang du bsgyur ba ma yin te/ tsI si tsar bsgyur iT byin bas/ au ba yI ta/ au na yi swAM/ au na yi ShuH/
[\[363b.2\]]sogs so/ /'grel par skabs 'ga' zhig tu sdeb sbyor sogs kyi dgos pa yod na tsang du bsgyur bar bshad pas/ tsang du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la Ni tsa dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ au naM na ta/ au ni na tAM/ au ni na na/ sogs so/ /liT la Am sbyar
[\[363b.3\]]bas/ U na yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ U na yi tA/ U na yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni phyis pas/ U n+yA ta/ U n+yA stAM/ U n+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ U na yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ au na yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[363b.4\]]sogs so/ ! /d+h+wa na sgra la'o zhes pa la 'ang Ni tsa sbyar/ d+h+ra ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  d+h+wa ni la ti/ ling  d+h+wa ni ye ta/ loT  d+h+wa na ya tu/ lang  a ng+h+wa na ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ ts+li tsang dang si tsa yang na bar byas pas/ si tsa'i phyogs la aTi byin pas/ a ng+hA na yI ta/ ang+ha na yi Sh+TAM/ a ng+h+wa na
[\[363b.5\]]yi ShuH/ sogs so/ /tsang gi phyogs la byings gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po sogs kyis ba phyis/ /a ka ma phyis pa ba la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos ir bsgyur/ /ni'i iT med pa la'os/ Ni phyis pas/ a di d+h+wa na ta/ a ding+h+wa na tAM/ a di ng+h+wa na na/ sogs so/ /liT la
[\[363b.6\]]A ma sbyar bas/ d+h+wa na yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ d+h+wan yi tA/ d+h+wa na yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/ d+h+wa n+yA ta/ d+h+wa n+yA swAM/ d+h+wa n+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ d+h+ra na yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la'ang iT byin yon tan
[\[363b.7\]]byas pas/ a d+h+wa na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ai la 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ e li zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ e la ya Ni/ ling  e la ye ta/ loT  e la ya tu/ lang  ai li ye ta/ sogs so/ /ts+li si tsa dang tsang yang na bar byas pas/ si tsa'i phyogs la iT byin pas/
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]ai la yI ta/ ai la yi Sh+TAM/ ai la yi ShuH/ sogs dang / tsang gi phyogs la/ la Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ Ni phyis pas/ ai li la ta/ sogs so/ liT la A ma sbyar bas/ e la yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ e la yi tA/ sogs so/
[\[364a.2\]]smon pa'i ling la/ Ni iT med pa la'os Ni phyis pas/ e l+yA ta/ e l+yA stAM/ e l+yA suH/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ e la yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la'ang iT byin bas/ e la yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /a rda 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas
[\[364a.3\]]pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar ba'i a rdi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ a rdi ya ti/ ling / a rda ye ta/ loT/ a rda ya tu/ lang / A rdi ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la ts+li si tsa dang tsang yang na bar byas pas/ si tsa'i phyogs la iT byin pas/ A rda yI ta/ A rda yi Sh+TAM/ A rda yi muH/ sogs dang / tsang gi
[\[364a.4\]]phyogs la da Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni phyis pas/ A rdi da ta/ A rdi da tAM/ A rdi da na/ sogs so/ /liT la/ A ma sbyar bas/ A rda yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / luT la iT byin pas/ a rda yi tA/ a rda yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la
[\[364a.5\]]Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis bas/ a r+d+yA ha/ a r+d+yA stAM/ a r+d+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ a rda yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+ring la/ A rda yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /smr-i kun tu klog pa la'o zhes pa la/ rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/
[\[364a.6\]]a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ smA ri zhes grub pa la/ laT la sogs ba sbyar bas/ laT/ smA ra ya taM/ ling / smA ra ye ta/ loT/ smA ra ya tu/ lang / a smA ra ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ a d+s+m+r-i dr-i twa ra bra tha mra da s+t+r-i spa shAM/ smr-i dr-i twa ra pra tha mra da s+t+r-i spa sha rnams kyi a ta'o/ /smr-i kun tu klog ba
[\[364a.7\]]dr-i rnam par 'dzoms pa/ nyi twa ra kun tu mgyogs pa/ pra thar ba tu bshad pa/ mra da nye da pa/ s+t+r-i nya kun tu 'gebs pa/ sba sha rab tu gsher ba rnams kyi Ni dang bcas pa tsang pha rol la a b+h+yA sa a ta du bsgyur la ir bsgyur ba ma yin te/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]gnyis brjod mdo 'dis ir mi bsgyur/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a saM sma ra ta/ a sa smar tAM/ a sa smar na/ sogs so/ liT la A ma sbyar bas/ sma ra yAM tsa kAr/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ smA ra yi tA/ smA ra yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la
[\[364b.2\]]Ni'i iT med ba la 'os Ni phyis pas/ smA r+YA ta/ smA r+YA stAM/ smA r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /Ni la tsang la u pad+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ smA ra yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+ring la/ a smA ra yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dr-i rnam par 'dzoms pa la'o zhes pa
[\[364b.3\]]la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ dA ri zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT/ dA ri ya ti/ ling / dA ri ya ta/ lang / dA ra ya tu/ a dI ri yaT/ sogs so/ /lung la ts+li tsa da du bsgyur/ smr-i dr-i sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa a ta/ Ni'i iT med pa
[\[364b.4\]]la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a da da ra ta/ a da dA tAM/ a da da ra na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ dA ra yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ dA ra yi tA/ dA ra yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ dA r+YA ta/ dA r+YA s+t+waM/
[\[364b.5\]]dA r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /NAM la tsang la sogs kyis thung ngur bsgyur/ l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ dA ra yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a dAr yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /nyi twa ra kun tu mgyogs pa la la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ twa ri zhes grub pa la laT la sogs
[\[364b.6\]]pa sbyar pas/ laT/ twa ra ya ti/ ling / twa ra ye ta/ loT/ twa ra ya tu/ lang / a twa ra ya ta/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ ts+li tsang gnyis brjod/ smr-i dr-i dwa ra sogs kyis ir mi bsgyur/ Ni ri iT med pa la 'os/ Ni phyis pas/ a ta twa ra ta/ a ta dA ra tAM/ a ta twa ra na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ twa ra yAM tsa
[\[364b.7\]]kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ twa ra yi tA/ twa ra yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni'i iT med pa la 'osaNi phyis pas/ twa r+YA ta/ twa r+YA stAM/ twa r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ twa ra yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a twa ra yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]pra tha rab tu bshad pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ pra thi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  pra thi yar ti/ ling  pra tha ye ta/ loT pra tha ya tu/ lang  a pra tha ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la ts+li tsang du bsgyur/ smr-i dr-i twa ra pra tha sogs kyis ir mi bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os
[\[365a.2\]]Ni phyis pas/ a pa pra tha ta/ a pa pra tha tAM/ a pa pra tha na/ sogs so/ /liT laA ma sbyar bas/ pra tha yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ pra tha yi tA/ pra tha yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/ pra th+yA ta/ pra th+yAstAM/ pra th+yA suH/ sogs so/ /
[\[365a.3\]]l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ pra tha yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a pra tha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /mrad nyed pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu bcas ba sogs kyis Ni sbyar bas/ mra di zhes pa la laT sogs sbyor te/ laT  mra da ya nyi/ ling  mra da ye ta/ loT mra da ya tu/ lang  a mra
[\[365a.4\]]da ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la tsang gnyis brjod/ smr-i dr-i twar pra tha mra da sogs kyis i ra mi bsgyur Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis bas/ a ma mra da ta/ a ma mra da tAM/ a ma mra da na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar/ mra da yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ mra da yi
[\[365a.5\]]tA/ mra da yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i lingal/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ mra d+yA ta/ mra d+yA stAM/ mra d+yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ mra da yi bya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a mra da yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /s+t+r-i nya kun nas 'gebs pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas
[\[365a.6\]]ba sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la'os 'phel ba byas pas/ stA ri zhes grub pa la liT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  s+t+rar ya ti/ ling  stAr ye ta/ loT  star ya tu/ lang  a stAr ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ts+li tsang du bsgyur gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs
[\[365a.7\]]kyis sa phyis/ sm-i d-i sogs kyis ir mi bsgyur/ Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a ta star ta/ a te star tAM/ a ta star na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ stA ra yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la/
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]iT byin pas/ sar yi tA/ stAr yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/ stA r+YA ta/ stA r+YA stAM/ stA r+YA suH/ sogs so/ /l+riT la iT byin pas/ stA ra yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a stA ra yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /sba sha rab tu gsher ba la'o zhes pa la
[\[365b.2\]]Ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ spA shi zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ spA sha ya ti/ ling spA sha ye ta/ loT  spA sha ya tu/ ling  a spA sha ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la ts+li tsang gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis su phyis/ smri dri sogs
[\[365b.3\]]kyis id mi bsgyur/ Ni la tsar la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a pa spa sha ta/ a pa spa sha twaM/ a ba spa sha na/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ sbA sha yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ spA sha yi tA/ spA
[\[365b.4\]]sha yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la Ni phyis pas/ spA sh+yA ta/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ spA sha yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / l+r-ing la/ a spA sha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /beSh+Ta dkris pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar bas/ beSh+Ti zhes srub pa la laT sogs
[\[365b.5\]]sbyar bas/ laT  beSh+Ta ya te/ ling  beSh+Tu ye te/ loT  beSh+Ta ya tu/ lang  a beSh+Ta ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ bib+hA ShA be Sh+TeH/ be Sh+Ti'i 'dam ka'o/ /beSh+Ti'i Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la a b+h+yA sa a ta du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba gdam ngag can du bya ste/ aT du bsgyur ba'i
[\[365b.6\]]phyogs la/ a ba beSh+Ta ta/ a ba beSh+Ta ta/ a beSh+Ta na/ sogs dang / aT du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/ a bi beSh+Ta ta/ a bi beSh+Ta tAM/ a bi beSh+Ta na/ sogs so/ lhag ma rnams la/ laT  beSh+Ta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  beSh+Ta yi tA/ smon pa'i
[\[365b.7\]]ling  beSh+T+ya ta/ l+r-iT beSh+Ta yi Sh+T+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a beSh+Ta yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /b+h+rA dzr-i 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ b+h+rA dza zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  b+h+rA dza ya ti/ ling  b+h+rA dza ye ta/ loT b+h+rA dza ya tu/ lang  a b+h+rA dza ya ta/
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]sogs so/ /lung la/ b+h+rA dzaM b+h+rAs b+hA Sha di badzI ba mI la bI DA ma n+ya ta ra stAM/ b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa b+hA Sha dI pa dzI ba mIl pIT rnams kyi yang na'o/ /b+hA dzrai dang b+h+rA sr-i 'bar ba/ b+hA Sha brjod pa/ dI pa 'bar ba/ dzI ba srog 'tsho ba/ mI la sbyor ba/ pIT kun du 'thibs pa rnams
[\[366a.2\]]kyi Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol u pa d+hA thung ngur yang nra bsgyur te/ thung ngur bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/ Ni shri sogs kyis ts+li tsang gnyis brjod/ thung ngur bsgyur ra phyis/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ b+ha ba a ka ma phyis pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos/ a i/ mdo 'dis
[\[366a.3\]]u pa d+hA thung ngu / Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a bi b+h+ra dza ta/ a bib+h+ra dza tAM/ a bi b+h+ra dza na/ sogs dang / thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a bi b+h+rA dza ta/ a bi b+h+rA dza tAM/ a bi b+h+rA dza na/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams la/ liT  b+h+rA dza yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  b+h+rA
[\[366a.4\]]dza yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  b+h+rA dz+yA ta/ liT  b+h+rA dza yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a b+h+rA dza yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /b+h+rA sa 'bar pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar ngas b+h+rA si zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  b+h+rA sa ya ti/ ling  b+h+rA sa ye ta/ loT  b+h+rA sa ya tu/ lang  a b+h+rA sa ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/
[\[366a.5\]]b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa sogs kyi mdos/ u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a ba b+h+rA sa ta/ sogs sam/ a bi b+h+rA sa ta/ sogs so/ /la yig phye ma rnams la/ ling  b+h+rAs yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  b+h+rAs yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  b+h+rA s+yA ta/ l+r-iT b+h+rA sa yi Sh+ya ti/ ling  a b+h+rA
[\[366a.6\]]sa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ! /b+hA Sha brjod pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ de la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  b+h+rA Sha yi ti/ ling  b+h+rA Sha ye ta/ loT  b+hA Sha ya tu/ lang  b+h+rA Sha ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sha sogs kyis u pad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar
[\[366a.7\]]byas pas/ a bi b+ha Sha ta/ sogs sam/ a bi b+h+rA Sha ta/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la/ liT  b+hA Sha yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  b+h+rA Sha yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  b+hA Sh+yA ta/ l+r-iT  b+hA Sha yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a b+hA Sha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dI pa 'bar pa la Ni tsa dang laT sogs sbyar bas/
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]laT  dI pa ya ti/ ling  dI pa ye ta/ loT  dI pa ya tu/ lang  a dI ba ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sha sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/ a di di ba ta/ sogs sam/ a di dI pa ta/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la/ laT  dI ba yAM
[\[366b.2\]]tsa kA ra/ luT  dI pa yi twa/ smon ling  dI byA ta/ l+r-iT  dI ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dI pa yi Sh+yA ta/ sogs so/ ! /dzI ba srog 'tsho ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar nas laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dzI ba ya ti/ ling  dzI ba ya ta/ loT  dzI ba ya tu/ lang  a dzI ba ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ b+h+rA dza b+h+rA
[\[366b.3\]]sha sogs kyis u bad+hA thung ngur bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a dzi dzi ba ta/ sogs sam/ a dzi dzI ba ta/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la/ liT  dzI ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dzI ba yi tA/ smon ling  dzI byA ta/ l+r-iT  dzI pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dzI ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[366b.4\]]mI la sbyor ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar nas laT la sogs pa rnams sbyar bas/ laT  mI la ya ti/ ling  mI la ye ta/ loT  mI la ya tu/ lang  a mI laya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa sogs kyis u ba d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/ a mi mi
[\[366b.5\]]la ta/ sogs sam/ a mi mi la ta/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la/ liT  mI la yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  mI la yi tA/ smon ling  mI l+yA ta/ l+riT  mI la yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a mI la yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /pIT kun du 'thibs pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa
[\[366b.6\]]sbyar/ pI dri zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  pI Da ya ti/ liT  pIT ye ta/ loT  pI Da ya tu/ lang  a pI Di ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ b+h+rA dza b+h+rA sa sogs kyis u pa d+hU thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a bi bi Da ta/ sogs sam/ a pi
[\[366b.7\]]pI Da ta/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la/ liT  pI Da yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  pI Da yi tA/ smon ling  pI D+yA ta/ smon ling  pI D+yA ta/ l+r-iT  pI Da yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a pI Da yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ka Na sgra la'i zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ kA Ni
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  kA Na ya tI/ ling  kA Na ya ta/ leT  kA Na ya tu/ laT a kA Na ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ ka Na ra Na b+ha Na shra Na hA+e ny+la pa lu pa lu Tha he ShAM tsa/ ka Na ra Na ba Na b+ha Na shra Na hwe nya la pa lu pa lu Tha hA i Sha rnams
[\[367a.2\]]kyi 'ang ngo / /ka Na ra Na ba Na b+ha Na rnams sgra/ sha Na 'tshed pa/ hwe nya 'dren pa/ la pa yongs su brjod pa/ lu pha sbed pa/ lu Tha srub pa/ o hA ka gtong ba/ i Shu 'dod pa rnams kyi 'ang Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar bya ste/ thung ngur bsgyur
[\[367a.3\]]ba'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba 'jug cing / thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba'ang mi 'jug ste/ a tsI ka Na ta/ sogs sam/ a tsa kA Na ta/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams la/ liT  kA Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  kA Na yi tA/ smon ling  kA N+yA ta/ l+r-iT  kA Na yi Sh+ya ti/
[\[367a.4\]]l+r-ing  a kA Na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ra Na sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i 'phel pa 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ rA Ni zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  rA Na ya ti/ ling  rA Na ye ta/ loT  rA Na ya tu/ lang  a rA Na ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ ka ra Na sogs kyi
[\[367a.5\]]mdos/ u pad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/ a rI ra Na ta/ sogs sam/ a ra rA Na ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  rA Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  rA Na yi ta/ smon ling  rA N+yA ta/ l+r-iT  rA Na yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a rA Na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[367a.6\]]pa Na s+tha la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ bA Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT  bA Na ya ti/ ling  bA Na ya ta/ loT  bA Na ya ta/ lang  a bA Na ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a bI ba
[\[367a.7\]]Na ta/ sogs sam/ a ba bA Na ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  bA Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  bA Na yi tA/ smon ling  bA N+yA ta/ l+r-iT  bA Na yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing a bA Na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /b+ha Na sbra la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ u pa d+hA'i 'os
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]'phel ba byas/ b+hA Ni zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT  b+hA Na ya ti/ ling  b+hA Na ya ta/ loT  b+hA Na ya tu/ lang  a b+hA Na ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a bI b+ha Na ta/ sogs sam/ a
[\[367b.2\]]ba b+hA Na ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs phyi ma rnams la/ liT  b+hA Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  b+hA Na yi tA/ smon ling  b+hA N+yAti/ l+r-iT b+hA Na yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a b+hA Na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ shra Na 'tshed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ shra Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar
[\[367b.3\]]bas/ laT  shrA Na ya ti/ ling  shrA Na ye ta/ loT  shrA Na ya tu/ lang  a shrA Na ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u bad+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang Na bar byas pas/ a shI shra Na ta/ sogs sam/ a sha shrA Na ta/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams
[\[367b.4\]]la/ liT  shrA Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  shrA Na yi tA/ smon ling  shrA N+yA ta/ l-iT  shrA Na yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a shrA Na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /twe nya'i dper brjod 'og tu 'chad la/ ! /la ba yongs su brjod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ lA pi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  lA
[\[367b.5\]]pa ya ti/ ling  lA pa ye ta/ loT  lA pa ya tu/ lang  a lA pa ya te/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/ a lI la pa ta/ sogs sam/ a la lA ba ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin/
[\[367b.6\]]liT  lA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  lA pa yi tA/ smon ling  lA byA ta/ l+r-iT  lA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+ring  a lA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /lu ba sbed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ lo pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  lo pa ya ti/ ling  lo pa
[\[367b.7\]]ye ta/ loT  lo pa ya tu/ lang  a lo pa ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a lU la pa ta/ sogs sam/ a lu lo pa ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  lo pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  lo pa
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]yi tA/ smon ling  lo byA ta/ l+r-iT  lo pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a lo ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /luT srub ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa yon tan byas pas/ lo thi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT  lo Tha ya ti/ ling  lo Tha ye ta/ loT  lo Tha ya tu/ lang  a lo Tha ya ta/
[\[368a.2\]]sogs dang / lung la/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a lU la Tha ta/ sogs sam/ a li'o Tha ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin/ liT  lo Tha yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  lo Tha yi tA/ smon ling  lo Th+yA ta/ l+r-iH lo Tha yi
[\[368a.3\]]Sh+ya ta/ ling  a lo Tha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /o hA ka gtong ba la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa a rti hri ts+lI rI/ sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/ hA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  hA pa ya ti/ ling  hA pa ye ta/ loT  tA ba ya tu/ laT  a hA pa ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/
[\[368a.4\]]ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u bang+hA thung ngur bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas pas/ a dzI ha pa ta/ sogs sam/ a dza tA pa ta/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams la/ liT  hrA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  hA pa yi tA/ smon ling  hA byA ta/ l+r-iT  hA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a hA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/
[\[368a.5\]]i Shu 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar yon tan byas pas/ laT  e Sha ya ti/ ling  e Sha ye ta/ loT  e Sha ya tu/ lang  ai Sha ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ a tsa dang po'i AT/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byed dgos pas u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur bas rjes mi mdon kyang / Sha
[\[368a.6\]]Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas u pa d+hU thung ngur bsgyur pa'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba 'jug pas yang ba'i ring po dang / thung ngur ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la ring por mi bsgyur bas/ ai ShI Sha ta/ sogs sam/ ai Shi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  e Sha
[\[368a.7\]]yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  e Sha yi tA/ smon ling  e Sh+ya ta/ l+r-iT e Sha yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  ai Sha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /kr-i ta yongs su sgrog pa la'o zhes pa la rgyu dang bcas pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ u pang+hA'i 'ang ngos i ta du bsgyur/ r-i'i a Na lar pha rol los ra/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]bsgyur bas/ kIrti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  kI rta ya ti/ ling  kI rta ye ta/ loT kIrta ya tu/ lang  a kIrta ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ u r-i ta/ ra'i ri ta'o/ /byings kyi u pa d+hA'i r-i yig ni tsang dang bcas pa'i Ni pha rol la i ta dang yon tan sogs mi byed par yang na r-i ta
[\[368b.2\]]nyid du gnas te/ a tsI kr-i ta da/ sogs sam/ yang na i ta du bsgyur bas/ a tsI kI rta ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  kI rta yAM tsa kA ra/ laT kI rta yi tA/ smon ling  kI r+t+yAti/ l+riT  kI rta yi Sh+ya ti/ l+ring a kI rta yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /bri tu yod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa
[\[368b.3\]]sbyar/ 'grel par skabs 'gar u bang+hA'i i ta du mi bsgyur zhes bshad pas/ ri i ta du mi bsgyur/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ brti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  brta ya ti/ ling  brta ye ta/ l+r-iT  brta ya tu/ lang  a brta ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la
[\[368b.4\]]r-i'i r-i ta 'os/ r-i ta nyid du gnas ba dang yon tan yang na bar byas/ yon tan byas pa'i phyogs la san bzhin gyi bya ba mi 'jug /Ni'i iT med pa la phyis bas/ a bI br-i ta ta/ sogs sam/ a ba brta ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  brta yAM ca kA ra/ luT  brta
[\[368b.5\]]yi tA/ smon ling  bar+t+yA ta/ l+r-iT  brta yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a brta yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /mr-i dzu Sha dag pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ mr-i dzi ri 'phel ba la 'os 'phel byas pas/ mA rdzi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  mA rdzas ya ti/ ling  mA rdza ye ta/ loT mArdza ya tu/ lang  a mA rdza
[\[368b.6\]]ya Ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ r-i'i r-i ta 'os/ u bad+hA r-i nyid du gnas pa'am 'phel ba yang na bar byas/ 'phel ba'i phyogs las na bzhin gyi bya ba mi 'jug Ni phyis pas/ a mI mr-i ja ta/ sogs sam/ a ma mA rdza ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  mA rdza yAM tsa
[\[368b.7\]]kA ra/ luT  mA rdza yi tA/ smon ling  mA r+dz+yA ta/ l+riT  mA rdza yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-iT  a mA rdza yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa byin/ u pa d+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ swA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  swA pa ya ti/ ling  swA pa ye ta/ loT  swA pa ya tu/
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]lang  a swA pa ya ta/ sogs so/ lung la/ swA pe shA di/ swA pi'i tsar la'o/ /swa pa Ni mtha' can ni ts+li bsgyur bas tsang pha rol la si pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur te/ swa pi la tsang / Ni la tsang la u pad+hA'i thung ngu 'os thur ngur bsgyur/ mdo 'dis saM pra sAr Na/ tsang la 'os gnyis brjod/ yang ba'o
[\[369a.2\]]ring po kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a sU Shu ba ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin/ liT  swA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  swA pa yi tA/ smon ling  swA byA ta/ l+r-iT  swA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a swA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[369a.3\]]sho phra mor byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ sha 'gro na ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la e tsa'i u ta 'os e tsa A ta ngu bsgyur/ shA Ni zhes pa la/ shA nA sA hwA byA be paM yu ka /shA tshA sA hwA byA be pA rnams kyi yu ka'o/ /sho phra mor byed pa/ tshe gcod pa/ Sho mtha'i las/ he nya
[\[369a.4\]]'dren pa/ bye nya kun nas sbrib pa/ be nya thags kyi rgyu/ pA ba t+yang ba rnams kyi Ni pha rol la yu ka A gam 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don no/ /shA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  shA ya ya ti/ ling  shA ya ye ta/ loT  shA ya ya tu/ lang  a shA ya ya ta/
