[\[369a.5\]]sogs so/ /lung la/ gnyis brjod Ni la tsang la u ba d+hA'i 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/ a sha sha ya ta/ sogs so/ liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  shA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  shA ya yi tA/ smon ling  shA y+YA ta/ l+r-iT  shA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a shA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /de
[\[369a.6\]]bzhin du/ tsho gcod pa la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa e tsa A ta yu ka A ga ma byin pas/ tshA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  tshA ya ya ti/ ling  tshA ya ye ta/ loT  tshA ya ya tu/ lang  a tshA ya ya ta/ lung  a tsa tsha ya ta/ liT  tshA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  tshA ya yi tA/ smon ling  tsha
[\[369a.7\]]y+YA ta/ l+r-iT  tshA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a tshA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Sho mtha'i las la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa e tsa A ta yu ka ma byin pas/ sA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  sA ya ya ti/ ling  sA ya ye ta/ loT  sA ya ya tu/ lang  a sA ya ya ta/ lung  a sa sa
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]ya ta/ liT swa ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  sA ya yi tA/ smon ling  sA y+YA ta/ l+r-iT  sA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a sA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /hA+e nya 'dren pa la'o zhes pa la chi tsa e tsa/ A ta/ yu ka A ga ma byin pas/ hwA yi ne sa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  hwA ya ya ti/ ling  hwA ya ye ta/
[\[369b.2\]]loT  hwA ya ya tu/ lang  a hwA ya ya ta/ ling la/ hwaH si pra sA ra NaM/ hwA'i saM pra sA ra Na'o/ hwI'i Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la rtag tu saM bra snar Na ra bsgyur te/ hwA yi tsang Ni la tsang u bad+yA'i thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ mdo 'dis saM pra sAr Na gnyis brjod lang ba'i ring po/ /'grel par
[\[369b.3\]]saM pra sAr Na'i pha rol la la yu ka A ga ma dbyi'o zhes bshad pas yu ka phyis/ a tsa liny+ni ta la 'os 'phel ba/ e tsa'i a yu sogs kyis au A ba/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis/ ka Na ra Na sogs kyis u bad+hA thung ngur bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur pa yang na bar byas pas/ a dzu hA ba ta/
[\[369b.4\]]sogs sam/ a dzU ha ba ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  hwA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  hwA ya yi tA/ smon ling  hwA y+YA ta/ l+r-iT  hwA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing  a hwA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /bye nya kun nas sgrib pa la/ Ni tsa e tsa'i A ta/ yu ka A ga ma byin bas/ bya yi zhes grub ba
[\[369b.5\]]la laT sogs sbyar bas/ l+raT  byA ya ya ti/ l+ring  byA ya ye ta/ loT  byA ya ya tu/ lang  a byA ya ya ta/ lung  a ba byA ya ta/ liT  byA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT byA ya yi tA/ smon ling  byA y+YA ta/ l+r-iT  bya ya yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a byA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /be nya thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa
[\[369b.6\]]e tsa  A ta  yu ka A ga ma byin pas/ bA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  bA ya yi hi/ ling  bA ya ye ta/ loT  bA ya ya tu/ lang  a bA ya ya ta/ lung  a ba ba ya ta/ liT  bA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  bA ya yi tA/ smon ling  bA y+YA ta/ l+riT  bA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a bA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs
[\[369b.7\]]so/ ! /de bzhin du/ pA btung ba la Ni tsa sbyar yu ka A ga ma byin pas/ bA yi zhes ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  bA ya ya ti/ ling  pA ya ye ta/ loT  pA ya ya tu/ lang  a bA ya ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ lo paHpi ba te rI tswA b+h+yAs s+ya/ pe ba ti'i dbyi zhing a b+h+yA sa'i I ta 'ang ngo / /Ni dang
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la pi ba ti'i u pad+hA dbyi zhing a b+h+yA sa'i 'ang I ta du bsgyur bar bya ste/ pA ye la tsang lung gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni phyis/ mdo 'dis u pa d+hA phyis a b+h+yA sa'ang I ta du bsgyur bas/ a pI pya ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la
[\[370a.2\]]liT  pA ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  pA ya yi tA/ smon ling  pA y+YA ta/ l+r-iT  pA ya yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a pA ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ri 'gro pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ arti hrI ts+lI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ aR+pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  aR+pa
[\[370a.3\]]ya ti/ ling aR+pa ye ta/ loT  aR+pa ya tu/ lang  AR+pa ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ aR+pi la tsang tsang la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a ta 'os/ de a uT dang 'phel ba byas Ni'i iT med pa la'os Ni phyis pas/ AR+pa ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  aR+pa yAM tsa kA ra/
[\[370a.4\]]luT  aR+pa yi tA/ smon ling  aR+p+yAta/ l+riT  aR+payi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-iT  aR+pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  AR+pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /hrI ngo tsha ba la'o zhes pa la/ Ni tsa a rti hri sogs kyis pu ka A gam byin/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ hre pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  hre ba ya ti/ l+r-ing  hre pa ye ta/
[\[370a.5\]]loT  hre pa ya tu/ lang  a hre pa ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ gnyis brjod/ Ni la tsang la u pa d+hA thung ngu / Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a dzi hri ba ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  hre pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  hre pa yi tA/ smon ling  hre byA ta/ l+r-iT  hre pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a hre
[\[370a.6\]]pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ts+lI 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ts+li pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  ts+la pa ya ti/ ling  ts+le pa ye ta/ loT tsA+e pa ya tu/ lang  a ts+le pa ya ta/ lung  a tsi ts+li pa ta/ liT  ts+le pa yAM tsa kA
[\[370a.7\]]ra/ luT  ts+le pa yi tA/ smon ling  ts+le pyA ta/ l+r-iT  a ts+le pa yi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing  a ts+le pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /rId nyan ba la'o zhes la/ Ni tsa a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ re pi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  re pa ya ti/ liT  re ba ye ta/
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]loT  re pa ya tu/ lang  a re pa ya ta/ lung  a ri ri pa ta/ liT  re pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  re pa yi tA/ smon long  re pyA ta/ l+r-iT  re ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  re pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /kru ya sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin/ ba ya dag gi bal la dbyi 'os ya phyis/ pu ka
[\[370b.2\]]mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ kro p-i zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  kro ba ya ti/ ling  kro pa ya ti/ long  kro ba ya tu/ lang  a kro pa ya ta/ lung  a tsu kru pa ta/ liT kro pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  kro pa yi tA/ smon ling  kro pyA ta/ l-iT  krau pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a kro pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs
[\[370b.3\]]so/ ! /k+Sh+mA yI rnam par 'dar ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ pA ya dag gi pa la la dbyi 'os ya phyis pas/ k+Sh+mA pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  k+Sh+mA ba ya ti/ ling  k+Sh+mA pa ye ta/ loT  k+Sh+mA pa ya tu/ lang  a k+Sh+mA ba ya ta/ lung  a tsa k+Sh+mA ba ta/ liT  k+Sh+mA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  k+Sh+mA pa yi tA/
[\[370b.4\]]smon ling  k+Sh+mA pyA ta/ l+r-iT  k+Sh+mA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a k+Sh+mA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Sh+ThA 'gro ba las dog pa la Ni tsa/ arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/ s+thA pi zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  s+thA pa ya ti/ ling  s+thA pa ya ta/ loT  s+thA ba ya tu/ lang  a s+thA pa ya ta/ sogs
[\[370b.5\]]dang / lung la/ tiSh+Tha te ri ti/ ti Sh+tha ti'i i ta'o/ /Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la ta Sh+thi ti'i u pad+hA i ta du bsgyur te/ s+thA pi la tsang / mdo 'dis i ta du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ tha ta ku ni nas bsgyur ba la sogs kyis sa Sha/
[\[370b.6\]]ma Tu la Sha Tu 'os tha Tha/ Ni'i iT med ba la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a tiSh+Thi pa ta/ sogs dang / liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  s+thA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  s+thA ba yi tA/ smon ling  s+thA pyA ta/ l+r-iT  s+thA pa ya Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a s+thA ba Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /g+h+rA dri nye bar len pa la'o zhes pa la/
[\[370b.7\]]Ni tsa a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/ g+h+rA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  g+h+rA pa ya ti/ ling  g+h+rA ba ye ta/ loT  g+h+rA pa ya tu/ lang  a g+h+rA pa ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ dzi g+h+ra te rbA/ dzi g+h+ra ti'i yang na'o/ /Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la dzi g+h+ra ti'i u pa d+hU i ta
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]du yang na bsgyur te/ a dzi g+h+ri pa ta/ sogs sam/ a dza gra pa ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT g+h+rA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ laT  g+h+rA pa yi tA/ smon ling  g+h+rA pyA ta/ l+r-iT  g+h+rA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a g+h+rA pa yi Sh+ya tra/ sogs so/ ! /bA sbyong ba la'o zhes ba la/
[\[371a.2\]]Ni tsa  'grel par lung drangs pa/ bA te r+Nau lu gA ga mo ni t+yaM/ pA ti'i Ni ya lu ka A ga ma rtag tu'o/ /bA ti'i Ni pha rol la lu ka A ga ma rtag tu 'gyur te/ u brjod don ka gnas don rnams phyis pas/ pA li zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT  pA la ya ti/ ling  pA la ye ta/
[\[371a.3\]]loT  pA la ya tu/ lang  a pA la ya ta/ lung  a pa pa la ta/ liT  pA la yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  pA la yi tA/ smon ling  pA l+yA ta/ l+r-iT  pA layi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a pA la yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /pA 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ po bing+hU na ne dzu ka /pA'i rnam par g.yo ba la dzu ka'o/ /bA'i Ni tsa
[\[371a.4\]]pha rol la rnam par g.yo ba la 'jug pa'i don la jug A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don yin pas rjes 'bral phyis pas/ bA dzi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  bA dza ya ti/ ling  bA dza ye ta/ loT  bA dza ya tu/ lang  a bA dza ya ta/ lung  a ba ba dza ta/ l+r-iT  bA dza yAM tsa
[\[371a.5\]]kA ra/ luT  bA dza yi tA/ smon ling  bA dz+yA ta/ l+r-iT  bA dza yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a bA dza yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / rnam par g.yo ba'i don min na dzu ka mi 'gyur te/ a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka byin pas/ laT  bA ba ya ti/ luT  a ba bapa ta/ sogs so/ ! /d+hU nya 'gul ba la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa 'grel
[\[371a.6\]]pa la lung drangs pa/ d+hU nya prI nyo nu ka ke tsa dwA/ d+hU nya prI nya dag gi nu ka 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/ /d+hU nya 'gul ba dang prI nya tshim pa dag gi Ni tsa pha rol la nu ka sA ga ma skabs 'gar yang na 'gyur te/ nu ka sbyar pa'i phyogs la/ laT  d+hU na ya ti/ ling  d+hU na ye ta/ loT  d+hU na ya tu/ lang  a d+hU na ya ta/
[\[371a.7\]]lung  a du d+hu na ta/ liT  d+hU na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  d+hU na yi tA/ smon ling  ng+hU n+yA ta/ l+r-iT  d+hU na yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a d+hU na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / nu ka ma byin pa'i phyogs la 'phel ba byas pas/ d+hA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  d+hA ba ya ti/ ling  d+hA ba ye ta/ loT  d+hA ba ya tu/
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]lang  a drA ba ya ta/ lung  a du d+ha ba ta/ liT  d+hA pa yI tsa kA ra/ luT  d+hA pa yi tA/ smon ling  d+hA byA ta/ l+r-iT  b+hA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a d+hA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /prI nya tshim pa la Ni tsa/ d+hA nya prI nya dag gi nu ka 'ga' zhig tu yang na 'os/ nu ka sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ laT  brI Na ya ti/ ling  prI Na ye ta/
[\[371b.2\]]loT  prI Na yi tu/ lang  a prI Na ya ta/ lung  a prI Na ta/ liT  prI Na yAM tsa ka ra/ luT  prI Na yi tA/ smon ling  prI N+yA ta/ l+riT  prI Na yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a prI Na Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / nu ka med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ prA yi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar
[\[371b.3\]]pas/ laT  brA ya ya ti/ lung  a pi pra ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /lIng sbyor bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ bi b+hA ShA lI ya teH/ lI ya ti'i 'dam ka'o/ /lI ya ti'i mtha' Ni tsa dang l+ya pa pha rol la A ta du yang na bsgyur bar bya ste/ A ta du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A gam sbyar
[\[371b.4\]]bas/ lA bi zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  lA pa ya ti/ ling  lA pa ye ta/ loT  lA pa ya tu/ lang  a lA pa ya ta/ lung  a la la pa ta/ liT/ lA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  lA pa yi tA/ smon ling  lA pyA ta/ l+r-iT  lA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a lA yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lI l+yo rnu ka lu kA ba n+ya
[\[371b.5\]]ta ra s+yaM/ lI lI dag gi nu ka dag yang na'o/ /lI chung ngur gyur pa dang lI sbyor bar byed pa dag gi snum pa byug pa'i don la rim pa bzhin nu ka dang lu ka A ga ma dag yang na 'gyur te/ laT  lI na ya ti/ lung  a li li na ta/ sogs dang / 'grel par lung drangs pas/ pa laM b+ha nA b+hi b+ha ba pU dzA
[\[371b.6\]]su li yo ni t+ya mA twa ma shi ti bA ts+yaM/ 'jig pa sngon byung mchod pa rnams lalI dag gi sha 'gro ba ma yin pa la A nyid rtag tu brjod do/ /lIng sbyor ba dang lI chung ngur gyur pa dag gi 'jig pa dang sngon byung ba dang mchod pa rnams kyi don dang sbyar ba na sha 'gro ba ma yin pa'i rkyen gang byung yang A nyid du
[\[371b.7\]]rtag tu brjod bar bya ste/ laT  lA pa ya ti/ lIng dang lI gnyis ka bsgrub lugs dang gzugs gnyis ka 'dra ste A ta ngu bsgyur nas bu ka byin pa'o/ /lung  a la la pa ta/ sogs so/ /li yaH saM mAn na shA lI nI ka ra Na yo sh+tsa/ lI las kun nas gus pa dad gnod pa dag la yang na'o/ /lI Ni tsa'i mtha' cad las
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]kun nas gus pa dang gnod pa byed pa dang rab tu thob pa la yang laT sogs A t+ma ne pa da rnams 'gyur te/ dza TA b+hi rA lA pa ya te/ sh+ye no brti kA mu l+lA pa ya te/ ka s+ShA mu l+lA pa ya te/ sogs so/ ! /nyi b+hI 'jigs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ bi b+he te r+he tu b+ha ye/ bi b+he ti'i
[\[372a.2\]]'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o/ /'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa las bi b+hi ti'i mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du yang na bsgyur ro/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ ra la pa tsa na rnams pa kun nas gus par 'dod/ khras co ka la gnod pa byed par 'dod/ khyod su thob ral 'dod/ pra yo dza k+ShAd+b+ha yaM tsa bA ts+yaM/ 'jigs pa'i sbyor ba las kyang brjod do/ /'jigs
[\[372a.3\]]pa'i rgyur ma zad 'jigs pa skyong ba las kyang bi b+he ti'i Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du yang na bsgyur ro/ /b+hI smyo r+he tu b+ha ye/ b+hI smi dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o/ /b+hI dang Sh+maM cung zad rgod pa dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa la tang rnams sbyor te/ bi b+he ti'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os A ta du bsgyur/
[\[372a.4\]]artihA sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/ b+hA bi zhes grub pa la/ mdo 'dis laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  ba pa ya te/ ling  b+hA pa ye ta/ loT  b+hA pa ya tAM/ lang  a b+hA ba ya ta/ lung  a ba b+ha pa ta/ liT  b+hA ba yAM tsa kre/ luT  b+hA pa yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  b+hA pa yi ShI Sh+Ta/ /l+r-iT  b+hA
[\[372a.5\]]pa yi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  a b+hA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ yang na/ b+hi yo he tu b+ha ye Shu ka /b+hI'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la Shu ka'o/ /b+hI'i Ni tsa pha rol la 'jigs pa'i rgyu la Shu ka A ga ma 'gyur te/ Shu ka byin pas/ laT  b+hI Sha ya te/ luT  a b+hi Sha te/ sogs so/ ! /Sh+mi cung zad rgod pa la'o zhes pa la
[\[372a.6\]]Ni tsa sbyar/ ni t+yaM sma ya teH/ sma ya ti'i rtag tu'o/ /'jigs pa'i rgyu dang sbyor ba na/ sma ya ti'i mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du rtag tu 'gyur te/ I A ta/ i rta hrI sogs kyis bu ka A ga ma byin pas/ smA pi zhes grub pa la/ b+hI smi dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os laT sogs dang rnams sbyar
[\[372a.7\]]pas/ laT  smA pa ya te/ ling  smA pa ye ta/ loT  smA pa ya tAM/ lang  a smA pa ya ta/ lung  a sI Sh+ma pa ta/ liT  smA pa yAM tsa kre/ luT  smA pa yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  smA pa yi ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  smA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a smA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /s+pha yI 'phel ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ smA yoHbaH/ smA
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]yI'i pa'o/ /s+phA yi zhes pa'i mtha'i ya yi ga ni Ni tsa pha rol la ba yig tu bsgyur par bya ste/ mdo 'dis par bsgyur pas/ s+phA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  s+phA ba ya ti/ ling  s+phA ba ye ta/ loT  s+phA ba ya tu/ lang  a s+phA ba ya ta/ lung  a si s+phA ba ta/ liT  s+phA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  s+phA
[\[372b.2\]]pa yi tA/ smon ling  s+phA byA ta/ l+riT  s+phA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a s+phA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /shad+l-i 'jigs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ sha de ra ga tau taH/ sha di'i 'gro ba ma yin pa la ta'o/ /shA di'i mtha'i da yig ni ba lang lta bu 'gro ba ma yin pa brjod pa'i don la Ni tsa pha rol la ta yig tu bsgyur par bya ste/
[\[372b.3\]]shA ti zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ liT  shA ta ya ti/ ling  shA ta ye ta/ loT  shA ta ya tu/ lang  a shA ta ya ta/ lung  a shI sha ta ta/ liT  shA ta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  shA ta yi tA/ smon ling  shA t+yA ta/ l+riT  shA ta yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a shA ta yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / 'gro ba yin na da tar mi 'gyur bas/
[\[372b.4\]]laT  a shA da ya ti/ lung  a shI da sha ta/ sogs so/ /tshig grogs dang sbyar pa'i dper brjod ni/ pha lA ni shA ta ya ti/ gAHshA da ya ti go pA la kaH/ ! /ru ha skye ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ ru haH po\u0f85n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ ru ha'i ba yang na'o/ /ru ha zhes pa'i mtha'i ha yig ni Ni tsa pha rol la pa yig tu yang na
[\[372b.5\]]ba sar te/ ro bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  ro pa ya ti/ ling  ro ba ye ta/ loT  ro/ 'bras bu rnams 'khebs par byed/ ba lang rnams 'ded par byed phyugs rdzi/ pa ya tu/ lang  a ro pa ya ta/ lung  a rU ru pa ta/ liT  ro pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  ro pa yi tA/ smon ling  ro byA ta/ l+r-iT  ro pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a ro pa yi
[\[372b.6\]]Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ yang na bar ma bsgyur pas/ laT  ro ha ya ti/ lung  a rU ru ha ta/ sogs so/ ! /krI rdzas brdze pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ krIng dzI nAM Nau/ krI ing dzi rnams kyi Ni la'o/ /krI nya rdzas brje ba/ ing klog pa/ dzi rgyal ba rnams kyi mtha' Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du bsgyur te/ a rti hrI sogs
[\[372b.7\]]kyis bu ga byin pas/ kA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  krA pa ya ti/ ling  krA pa ye ta/ loT  krA pa ya tu/ lang  a krA pa ya ta/ lung  a tsi krA pa ta/ liT  krA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  krA pa yi tA/ smon ling  krA pyA ta/ l+r-iT  krA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a krA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /a d+hi sngon ma'i ing klog pa la
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]Ni tsa/ krI ing sogs kyis mtha' a+wa ta/ arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma/ i ka gi a tsa la ya Nar bsgyur pas/ a d+h+yA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  a d+h+yA pa ye ta/ loT  a d+h+yA pa ya tu/ lang  a d+h+yA pa ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ Nau tsa saM sh+tsa ngoH/
[\[373a.2\]]Ni la'ang sa na car dag la'o/ /Ni tsa dang bcas pa'i san dang tsang dag pha rol la'ang ing gi gAng du yang na bsgyur te/ gAng du bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/ a d+h+yA dzI ga pa ta/ sogs dang / ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a d+hi sngon ma'i A pi la tsang / A i ru log /de gnyis brjod a tsa dang po sogs kyis aT/
[\[373a.3\]]AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis ai A ya/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a d+h+yA yi pa ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  a d+h+yA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  a d+h+yA payi tA/ smon pa'i ling  a d+h+yA pyA ta/ l+r-iT  a d+h+yA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  ad+h+yA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/
[\[373a.4\]]dzi rgyal ba la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa/ krI ing dzi sogs kyi mtha' A ta a rti hI sogs kyis bu ka mtha' A gam byin pas/ dzA pa zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dzA pa ya ti/ ling  dzA pa ye ta/ loT  dzA pa ye tu/ lang  a dzA pa ya ta/ lung  a dzI dza pa ta/ leT  dzA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dzA ba yi tA/ smon ling  dzA
[\[373a.5\]]pyA ta/ l+r-iT  dzA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dzA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Shi d+ha yang dag par mnyes pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ sid+h+ya te ra bA ra lau ki ke /sid+h+ya ti'i 'jig rten pha rol nyid ma yin pa la'o/ /sid+h+ya ti'i i yig 'jig rten pha rol gyi don nyid ma yin pa la Ni pha rol la A ta du bsgyur bar bya ste/ sA d+hi
[\[373a.6\]]zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  sA d+ha ya ti/ ling  sA d+ha ye ta/ loT  sA d+ha ya tu/ lang  a sA d+ha ya ta/ lung  a sA sa d+ha ta/ laT  sA d+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  sA d+ha yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  sA d+h+yA ta/ l+r-iT  sA d+ha yi Sh+ya ti/ l+ring  a sA d+ha ya Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ laT  yang na se d+ha ya ti/ lung  a sI si d+ha ta/
[\[373a.7\]]sogs so/ /de dag tshig grogs dang bcas pa'i dper brjod ni/ rA dza sA d+ha ya ti/ rgyal po mnyes bar 'dod/ ku ruHsed+ha ya ti/ bla ma mnyes par 'dod/ ! tsi nya sogs pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ tsi s+phu ra r+No/ tsi spur dag gi Ni la'o/ tsi nya dang spu ra dag gi Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du yang na bsgyur te/ A ta du bsgyur pa'i
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]phyogs la/ arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/ tsA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  tsA pa ya ti/ ling  tsA pA ye ta/ loT  tsA pa ya tu/ lang  a tsA pa ya ta/ lung  a tsI tsa pa ta/ liT tsA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT tsA pa yi tA/ smon ling  tsA pyA ta/ l+r-iT  tsA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a tsA pa yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[373b.2\]]sogs sam/ yang na a tsa'i ny+ni ta la'os 'phel ba byas pas/ laT  tsA ya ya ti/ lung  a tsI tsa ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /spu ra 'phro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ tsi spur dag gi Ni la 'os/ A ta du bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur pa yang na par byas bsaA ta du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ spA ri zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  spA
[\[373b.3\]]ra ya ti/ ling  spAr ye ta/ loT  spAr ya tu/ lang  a spA ra ya ta/ lung  a pu spA ra ta/ liT  spAr yI tsa kA ra/ luT  spAr yi tA/ smon ling  spAr r+YA ta/ l+r-iT  spAr yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a spAr yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ A ta ngu ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ laT  spor ya ti/ lung  a pu spur ta/ sogs so/ ! /be nya thags kyi rgyu
[\[373b.4\]]la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ pra dza ni pI ya teH/ bI ya ti'i rab tu skye ba la'o/ /bI ya ti'i rab tu skye ba'i don la 'jug pa na Ni tsa pha rol la A ta du bsgyur te/ pu ka byin bas/ bA pe zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  bA pa ya ti/ ling  bA ba ye ta/ loT  bA pa ya tu/ lung  a bA ba ya ta/ lung  a bI ba pa ta/ loT bA pa
[\[373b.5\]]yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  pA pa yi tA/ smon long  bA byA ta/ l-iT/ bA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ yang na shi ta ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la e tsa'i A ta 'os e tsa A ta/ shA tshA sogs kyis yu ka A ga ma byin/ bA yi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT  bA la ya ti/ lung  a bI ba ya ta/ sogs
[\[373b.6\]]so/ ! /ShU nya ba stod pa la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ a tsa'i ny+Ni ta la 'os 'phel ba byas/ stA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT  stA ba ya ti/ ling  stA ba ya ta/ loT  stA ba ya tu/ lang  a stA ba ya ta/ lung  a Shu Sh+Ta ba ta/ liT  stA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  stA pa ye ta/ smon ling  stA byA ta/ l+r-iT  stA ba yi Sh+ya ti/
[\[373b.7\]]l+ring  a stA pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /b+hU yod pa la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa/ 'phel ba byas pas/ b+hA pi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ b+hA ba la ti/ ling  b+hA ba ye ta/ loT  b+hA ba ya tu/ lang  a b+hA ba ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ oHbu ya Na dz+ya ba re/ u'i pu ya Na dzi a pha rol la'o/ /san pha byings
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]gnyis brjod pa'i a b+ha sa'i a yig ni pu ste pa sde dang yan so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang dza yig dang a yig dang a yig rnams gang rung zhig pha rol yod na i yig tu bsgyur te/ skabs 'dir a ka ma phyis ba la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos/ san dang 'dra ba'i bya ba
[\[374a.2\]]'jug pas/ u ir bsgyur/ yang ba'i ring po 'os de ring por bsgyur/ Ni phyis pas/ a bI b+ha bta/ sogs dang / la yig lhag ma rnams la/ liT  b+hA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  b+hA ba yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  b+hA byA ta/ l+r-iT  b+hA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a b+hA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /yu sre ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/
[\[374a.3\]]'phel pa byas/ yA bi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  yA ba ya ti/ ling  yA ba ye ta/ loT  yA ba ya tu/ lang  a yA ba ya ta/ lung la/ a ka ma phyis pa sogs kyis sa na bzhin gyi bya ba 'jug bas/ u i dang de ring por bsgyur bas/ a yI ya ba ta/ sogs dang / liT sogs lhag ma
[\[374a.4\]]rnams la/ liT  yA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  yA ba yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  yA byA ta/ l+riT  yA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing  a yA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ! dzi 'go ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ dzA bi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dzA ba ya ti/ ling  dzA ba ye ta/ loT  dzA ba ya tu/ lang  a
[\[374a.5\]]ba ya ta/ lung  a dzI dza ba ta/ liT  dzA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dzA ba yi ta/ smon ling  dzA byA ta/ l+r-iT  dzA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dzA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /sru 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ swA pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  spA ba ya ti/ ling  srA ba ye ta/ loT  srA ba ya
[\[374a.6\]]tu/ lung  a sra ba ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ sra ba ti shr-i No ti dra ba ti bra ba ti bla ba tI nAM bA/ sra ba ti shr-i No ti dra ba ti bra ba ti bla ba ti bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na'o/ /sru 'gro ba/ shru nya na pa/ dru 'gro ba sru dang blung dang byung rnams 'gro ba rnams kyi san dang Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la a
[\[374a.7\]]b+h+yAs ir yang na bsgyur te/ a si sra ba ta/ sogs so/ a su sra ba ta/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams la/ liT  srA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  srA ba yi tA/ smon ling  srA byA ta/ l+r-iT  srA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a srA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ shru thos pa la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ shrA
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]pi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  shA ba ya ti/ ling  shrA ba ye ta/ loT shA pa ya tu/ sogs dang / lung la/ ir yang na bsgyur pas/ a shi shra ba ta/ sogs sam/ a shu shra ba ta/ sogs sam/ a shu shra ba ta/ sogs so/ /liT  sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  shrA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT shrA ba
[\[374b.2\]]yi tA/ smon ling  shrA byA ta/ l+r-iT  shA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+ring  a shA pa ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ drA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ l+r-iT  drA ba ya te/ ling  drA ba ye ta/ loT  drA ba ya tu/ l-ing  a drA ba ya ta/ lung la/ i ra yang na bsgyur bas/ a di dra ba ta/ sogs sam/
[\[374b.3\]]a du dra ba ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  drA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT drA ba yi tA/ smon ling  drA ba ta/ l+r-iT  drA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a drA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /bru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ prA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT  pA ba ya ti/ ling  prA ba yi ta/ loT  prA ba ya tu/
[\[374b.4\]]lang  a pA ba ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ ir yang na bsgyur bas/ a pi pra ba ta/ sogs sam/ a pu pra ba ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  brA ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  bru ba yi tA/ smon ling  brA byA ta/ smon ling  brA byA ta/ l+r-iT  prA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a brA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /p+lu 'gro ba la Ni tsa
[\[374b.5\]]sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ p+lA bi zhes pa la sogs sbyar pas/ laT  p+lA ba ya ti/ ling  p+lA ba ye ta/ loT  p+lA ba ya tu/ lang  a p+lA ba ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ ir yang na bsgyur bas/ a pi p+la ba ta/ sogs sam/ a pu bla ba ta/ sogs so/ /liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  prA ba yAM
[\[374b.6\]]tsa kA ra/ luT  p+lA ba yi tA/ smon ling  blA byA ta/ l+r-iT  p+lA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a p+lU ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /byung 'gro ba la'o zhes ba la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ byA bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  byA ba ya ti/ ling  byA ba ye ta/ laT  byA ba ya tu/ lang  a byA ba ya ta/ lung la/ sir yang
[\[374b.7\]]na bar byas pas/ a bi bya ba ta/ sogs sam/ a bu bya ba ta/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  bya ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  byA ba yi ta/ smon ling  byA byA ta/ l+riT  byA ba yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a byA ba yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /gu hU kun nas sgrib pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ go ha'i u
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]pa d+hA'i U ta 'os ring po bsgyur bas/ gU ti zhes grub pa la laT la sogs pa rnams sbyar bas/ laT  gU ha ya ti/ ling  gU ha ye ta/ loT  gU ha ya tu/ lang  a gU ha ya ta/ lung  a dzU gu ha ta/ liT  gU ha yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  gU ha yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  gU h+yA ta/ l+r-iT  gU ha yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing
[\[375a.2\]]gU ha yi /sogs so/ ! /du Sha nyon mongs ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ do Sho Nau/ do Sha'i Ni la'o/ /du Sha'i u pad+hA'i u ni Ni pha rol la U ru 'gyur te/ dU Shi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dU Sha yi ti/ ling  dU Sha ye ta/ loT  dU Sha ya tu/ lang  a dU Sha ya ta/ lung  a du dU Sha ta/
[\[375a.3\]]liT  dU Sha yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dU Sha yi tA/ smon ling  dU Sh+yA ta/ l+r-iT  dU Sha yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dU Sha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / bA tsi t+ta bi rA be/ /sems nyon mongs pa la yang na'o/ /du Sha'i u pad+hA'i u yig ni sems nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa na Ni pha rol la U ra yang na 'gyur te/ U ra bsgyur ba'i cho ga
[\[375a.4\]]bstan zin la/ ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  do Sha ya ti/ lung  a dU du Sha ta/ sogs so/ ! /d+haT byed pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ mi tAM hra swaH/ ma 'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu'o/ /g+ha Ta la sogs pa ma 'gro ba'i ming can rnams kyi u pad+hA Ni tsa
[\[375a.5\]]pha rol la thung ngur bsgyur te/ laT  g+ha Ta ya ti/ ling  g+ha Ta ye ta/ loT  g+ha Ta ya tu/ lang  a g+ha Ta ya ta/ lung  a dzI g+ha Ta ta/ liT  g+ha Ta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  g+ha Ta yi tA/ smon ling  g+ha n+yA ta/ l+r-iT  g+ha Ta yi Sh+ya ti/ l+ring  a g+ha Ta yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ bya tha sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pas g.yo ba
[\[375a.6\]]dga' 'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar u pad+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pa slar thung ngur bsgyur bas/ bya thi la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  bya tha ya ti/ ling  bya tha ya ta/ loT  bya tha ya tu/ lang  a bya tha ya ta/ lung  a bI bya tha ta/ liT  bya tha yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  bya tha li tA/ smon ling  bya th+ya ta/ l+r-iT  bya tha yi Sh+ya ti/
[\[375a.7\]]l+ring  a bya tha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dza nI skye ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ dza nI dzrI Shu k+na sa rany+dzo ma m+tA sh+tsa/ dza nI dzr-I Shu k+nas  rany+dza'i 'ang ma mtha' 'o/ /dza ni skye ba/ dzr-I Sh+ya lang tsho nyams pa/ k+nas sgra/ rany+dza tshos rnams kyi 'ang Ni tsa pha rol la ma mtha' can du ming 'dogs byed de/ dgos pa ni ma
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu 'os u pa drA thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ laT  dza na ya ti/ ling  dza na ye ta/ loT  dza na ya tu/ lang  a dza na ya ta/ lung  a dzI dza na te/ liT  dza na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dza na yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  dza n+yA ta/ l+r-iT  dza na yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dza ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dzri Sha lang tsho nyams pa la Ni tsa/ a tsa'i
[\[375b.2\]]ny+ni ta la 'os 'phel ba/ dza nI  dzrI Sha k+na sa  rany+dza'i 'ang ma mtha' 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ dza ri zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dza ra ya ti/ ling  dza ra ye ta/ loT  dza ra ya tu/ lang / a dza ra ya ta/ lung  a dzI dza ra ta/ liT  dza ra yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dza ra yi tA/ smon long  dza rlA ta/ l+r-iT  dza ra yi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  a dza ra yi
[\[375b.3\]]Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /k+na sa sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ k+na si zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ k+na si zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  k+na sa ya ti/ ling  k+na sa ye ta/ loT  k+na sa ya tu/ lang  a k+na sa ya ta/ lung  a tsI k+nas ta/ liT  k+nas yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  k+na nas yi tA/ smon ling  k+na s+yA ta/ l+r-iT  k+na sa yi
[\[375b.4\]]Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  ak+nas yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /rany+dza chis la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ rany+dzi la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT rany+dza ya ti/ ling  rany+dza ye ta/ loT ra ny+dza ya tu/ lang  a rany+dza ya ta/ lung  a rI ra ny+dza ta/ liT  rany+dza yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  rany+dza yi tA/ smon ling  rany+dz+yA ta/ l+r-iT  rany+dza yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a rany+dza yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[375b.5\]]sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs ba/ rany+dze r+Nau mr-i ga ras Ne na lo paH/ rany+dza'i Ni la ri dgas kyi mdog lan dbyi'o/ /rany+dza'i Ni tsa pha rol la ri dgas kyi mdog la 'jug ban na dbyi ste/ laT  ra dza ya ti/ lung  ba rI ra dza ta/ sogs so/ ! /dz+nya khong du chud pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ laT  dz+nyA pa ya ti/ lung  a dzI dz+nyA
[\[375b.6\]]ba ta/ sogs dang / mAr Na to Sha Na ni shA ma ne Shu dz+nya/ 'chi ba dang dga' ba dang rno par byed pa rnams la dz+nya'o/ /'chi ba la sogs pa don 'di rnams la 'jug pa na dz+nyA ma 'gro ba'i ming can te/ dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ dz+nya la Ni tsa a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin/ mdo 'dis su
[\[375b.7\]]pa d+hA thung ngur 'gyur bas/ dz+ha bi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar/ laT  dz+ha pa ya ti/ ling  dz+nyi pa ye ta/ loT  dz+nya pa ya tu/ lung  a dz+nya pa ya ta/ lung  a dzI dz+nya ba ta/ liT  dz+nya pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dz+nya pa yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  dz+nya pyA ta/ l+r-iT  dz+nya pa yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dz+nya pa yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /don de rnams 'jug pa'i tshig grogs
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ saM dz+nya pa ya ti shA trun/ bidz+nya pa ya ti rA dzA naM/ dz+nya pa ya ti sha s+t+raM lta bu'o/ ! /dz+wa la 'bar ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ dz+wa la hwa la h+ma ra na mo \u0f85 nu ba sargA ta pA glA spA pa T+wa ma sh+tsa/ nyer bsgyur med pa las/ dz+wa la/ hwa la  hA la na ma dang glA /snA pa na ba ma'i 'ang ngo / /nyer bsgyur
[\[376a.2\]]sngon du med pa la/ dz+wa la 'bar ba/ hwa la dang h+ma la g.yo ba/ Na ma sgra de zla bo rnams kun du 'chi bar 'dod/ mye la po rnams dges par 'dod/ mtshon cha rab du rno bar byed par 'dod/ rnams dang / glA lus rnam par nyams pa/ snAgatsang ba/ ba na slong ba/ Tu bam skyug pa rnams kyang ma 'gro ba'i ming can te/ dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don
[\[376a.3\]]te/ laT  dz+wa la ya ti/ ling  dzA la ye ta/ loT  dz+wa la ya tu/ lang  a dz+wa la ya ta/ lung  a dzI dz+wa ya ta/ liT  dz+wa la yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dz+wa la yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  dz+wa l+yA ta/ l+r-iT  dz+wa la ya Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dz+wa la yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ hwa la g.yo ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ thung ngur bsgyur/ hwa li zhes pa la laT sogs
[\[376a.4\]]sbyar bas/ laT hwa la ya ti/ phud  a dzI hwa la ta/ sogs so/ /h+ma la g.yo ba la Ni tsa sbyar thung ngur bsgyur/ h+ma'i zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  h+ma la ya ti/ lung  a dzI h+ma la ta/ sogs so/ /Na ma sgra la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur/ laT  na ma ya ti/ lung  a nI na ma ta/ sogs so/ ! /glA lus rnam par
[\[376a.5\]]nyams pa la/ Ni tsa sbyar/ pu ka A ga ma byin thung ngur bsgyur bas/ laT  glA ba ya ti/ lung  a dzI gla ba ta/ sogs so/ ! /Sh+NA gtsang ba la 'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma thung ngur bsgyur/ sna bi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  snapa ya ti/ lung  a sI Sh+Na pa ta/ sogs so/ ! /ba na slong
[\[376a.6\]]ba la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur/ ba ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  ba na ya te/ lung  a bI ba na ta/ sogs so/ ! /thu ba ma skyug ba la Ni tsa thung ngur bsgyur pas/ ba mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyang bas/ laT  ba ma ya ti/ lung  a bI ba ma ta/ sogs so/ /nyer bsgyur yod na thung ngur mi bsgyur te  laT  pA dz+wA
[\[376a.7\]]la ya ti/ lung  brA dzI dz+wa la ta/ sogs so/ ! /ka mu mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ na ka mya mi tsa maH/ ka ma am tsam gyi ma yin no/ /ka mu mdzes pa/ a mi nad/ tsa ma za ba rnams mtha' can ma yin te/ dgos pa ni thung ngur mi bsgyur ba'i don te/ u pad+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/ kA mi zhes pa la
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]mdo 'dis thung ngur mi bsgyur laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  kA ma ya ti/ lang  kA ma ye ta/ loT  kA ma ya tu/ lang  a kA ma ya ta/ lung  a tsI ka ma ta/ liT  kA ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  kA ma li tA/ smon ling  kA mya ta/ l+r-iT  kA ma yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a kA ma yi s+ya ti/ sogs so/ ! /a mi na da la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa
[\[376b.2\]]'phel ba byas/ A mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  A ma ya ti/ ling  A ma ye ta/ loT  A ma ya tu/ lang  A ma ya ta/ lung la/ ma Ni dang bcas ba gnyis brjod pas/ A mi ma ta/ sogs dang / liT sogs lhag ma rnams la/ liT  A ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  A ma yi tA/ smon ling  A myA ta/
[\[376b.3\]]l+r-iT  A ma yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  A ma yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /tsa ma za ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/ tsA mi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  tsA ma ya ti/ ling  tsA ma ye ta/ loT  tsA ma ya tu/ lang  a tsA ma yA ta/ lung  a tsI tsa ma ta/ liT tsA ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  tsA ma yi tA/ smon ling  tsA myA ta/ l+r-iT  tsA ma
[\[376b.4\]]yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a tsA ma yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs/ ! /sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas bas/ laT  shA ma ya ti/ ling  a shI sha ma ta/ sogs so/ /sha mo \u0f85 da rnya ne mi ta/ sha mu'i mi mthong ba lam 'gro ba'o/ /sha mu mi mthong ba'i don la 'jug ba nam 'gro ba'i ming can te dgos pa ni thung
[\[376b.5\]]ngur bsgyur ba'i don te/ mdo 'dis thung ngur bsgyur/ sha mi zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  sha ma ya ti/ ling  sha ma ye ta/ loT  sha ma ya tu/ lang  a sha ma ya tu/ lung  a shI sha ma ta/ liT  sha ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  sha ma yi tA/ smon ling  sha myA ta/ l+y-iT  sha ma yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a sha ma yi Sh+ya ta/
[\[376b.6\]]sogs so/ ! /ya mu nye bar ni ba la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/ laT  yA ma ya ti/ ling  yA ma ye ta/ loT  yA ma ya tu/ lang  a yA ma ya ta/ lung  a yAM ya ma ta/ liT  yA ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  yA ma yi tA/ smon ling  yA myA ta/ l+r-iT  yA ma yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a yA ma yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / ya mo nya pa ri be Sha Ne/ ya
[\[376b.7\]]mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin ba la'o/ /ya mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin ba 'am 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/ dgos pa ni thung ngur bsgyur ba'i don no/ /laT  ya ma ya ti/ lung  a yI ya ma ta/ /sogs so/ ! /s+kha dir rko ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyang / u pa d+ha'i 'os 'phel ba byas/ s+khA bi zhes ba la laT
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]sogs sbyar bas/ laT  s+khA da ya ti/ ling  s+khA da ye ta/ loT  s+khA da ya tu/ lang  a s+kha da ya ta/ lung  a tsI s+kha da ta/ liT  s+khA da yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  s+khA da yi tA/ smon ling  s+khA d+yA ta/ l+r-iT  s+khA da yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a s+khA da ya Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / s+khA dir ba ba ri b+h+yAM tsa/ s+kha di'i a ba dang ba ri dag las kyang
[\[377a.2\]]ngo / /a ba dang pa ri dag las pha rol gyi s+kha di'i 'ang 'gro ba'i ming can te/ thung ngur bsgyur bas/ a ba s+kha da ya ti/ ba ri s+kha da ya ti/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ so pha sarga s+kha deHpha Ni sh+tsa mi t+ko tsa dwA/ nyer bsgyur dang bcas pa'i s+kha di dang pha Na dag gi ma 'gro ba 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/ nyer bsgyur gang
[\[377a.3\]]ring zhig sngon na yod pa'i s+kha di ra dang pha Na gnyis ni skabs 'ga' zhig tu ma 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bar bya ste/ pra s+kha da ya ti/ pra s+khA da ya ti/ sogs so/ ! /pha Na s+kha la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/ phA Ni zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  phA Na ya ti/ ling phA Na ye ta /
[\[377a.4\]]loT  phA Na ya tu/ lang  a phA Na ya ta/ lung a bI pha Na ta/ liT  phA Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  phA Na yi tA/ smon ling  phA N+ya ta/ l+r-iT  phA Na yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a phA Na yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / nyer bsgyur sngon du byung na nyer bsgyur dang bcas pa'i s+kha di dang pha Na dag sogs kyi lung 'dren gyi mi ta du yang na bar
[\[377a.5\]]byas pas/ pra pha Na ya ti/ sogs sam/ pra pha Na ya ti/ sogs so/ ! /i Na 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa/ Nau gi mir bod+ha ne/ khong du chud pa ma yin pa la Ni la ga mi'o/ /khong du chud pa'i don ma yin pa la Ni tsa pha rol la i Na ni ga mi zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ i brjod don yin pas
[\[377a.6\]]phyis ma Ni tsa'i i la drangs pas/ ga mi zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  ga ma ya ti/ ling ga ma ye ta/ loT  ga ma ya tu/ lang  a ga ma ya ta/ lung  a dzI ga ma ta/ liT  ga ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  ga ma yi tA/ smon ling  ga myA ta/ l+r-iT  ga ma yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a ga ma yi Sh+ya ta/ khong du chud pa'i
[\[377a.7\]]don la 'jug pa nag ru mi 'gyur te/ a tsa'i ny+Ni ta la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ a yi zhes khru ba pa la laT sogs sbyar/ A ya ya ti/ sogs dang / lung la/ A yi/ tsang byings gnyis brjod/ a tsa dang po sogs kyis A Ta/ A Ta las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ e tsa'i a ya sogs kyis A ya
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]Ni la tsang la sogs kyis u ba d+hA thung ngur bsgyur Ni'i iT mid pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ A ya ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /han 'tshe ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ ha na sto \u0f85 tsi N+Na loH/ tsi Na dang cal dag ma yin pa la han gyi ta'o/ /tsi Na dang Na la ma yin pa'i nya Na 'gro ba'i rkyen pha rol la han gyi mtha' ta yig tu 'gyur
[\[377b.2\]]te/ ha n+ti'i ha'i nya na 'gro ba'ang ngos/ ha g+ha mdo 'dis na ta 'phel ba byas/ g+hA ti zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  g+hA ta ya ta/ ling  g+hA ta ye ta/ loT  g+hA ta ya tu/ lang  a g+hA taya ta/ lung a dzI g+ha ta ta/ liT  g+hA ta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  g+hA ta yi tA/ smon long  g+hA t+yA ta/ l+r-iT  g+hA ta yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a g+hA
[\[377b.3\]]ta yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /I r+Sh+ya phrag dog gi don la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ I r+Sh+yi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ lang  I r+Sh+ya ya ti/ ling  I r+Sh+ya ye ta/ loT  i r+Sh+yA ya tu/ lang  ai r+Sh+ya ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ I r+Sh+yi la/ tsang Sha Ni dang bcas ba gnyis brjod/ a tsa dang po sogs kyis A ta
[\[377b.4\]]'phel ba byas/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni Ni phyis pas/ ai r+Shi Sh+yata/ sogs sam/ yang na/ I r+Sh+ya te/ s+t+raM tI ya s+ya dwe/ I r+Sh+ya ti'i gsum pa'i gnyis so/ /I r+Sh+ya ti'i Ni dang bcas pa'i tsang pha rol la ha la brtsegs pa'i gsum pa de nyid yang na gnyis brjod de/ brtsegs pa'i gsum pa ya nyid
[\[377b.5\]]gnyis brjod pas/ ai r+Sh+yi ya ta/ sogs so/ /la yig lhag ma rnams la/ liT  I r+Sh+ya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  i r+Sh+ya yi tA/ smon ling  I r+Sh+ya ta/ l+r-iT  I r+Sh+ya yi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  air+Sh+ya yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /ai ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU hrA ta Ni dza n+DAHsamA b+hAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las Ni tsa mtha' can rnams
[\[377b.6\]]rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs ha la las yas rnams kyi yam lang d+y-i 'os ya gong ma phyis/ zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu'i dran pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las Ni tsa'i mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga rags pa rnams
[\[377b.7\]]re zhig rdzogs so// ! //gnyis pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen san gyi 'jug yul rnams bshad par bya ste/ d+hA toHkarma NaHsa mA na ka r+t+r-i kA di ts+tshA yAM bA/ byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa po mnyam pa las yang na'o/ /byings las pha rol tu bya ba'i las dang 'dod pa'i don byed pa po mnyam
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]ba ste/ byed pa po dang bcas pa rtogs par byed pa'i don las na yang na 'gyur te/ a da za ba/ sun sbyar/ lung san dag la g+ha sl-i 'os g+ha sl-ir bsgyur l-i phyis/ san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ g+ha dz+ha ab+h+ya sa'i tsa ra 'ang 'os/ dz+ha dza/ san la i ta
[\[378a.2\]]'os/ ir bsgyur/ khar la tsa ra 'os sra ta ru bsgyur bas/ dzi g+ha t+sa zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ byed pa po la sha ba/ rjes 'brel phyis nas/ a ta la yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/ laT  dzi g+ha t+sa ti/ ling  dzi g+ha t+se ta/ loT  dzi g+ha t+sa tu/
[\[378a.3\]]lang  a dzi g+ha t+sa ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ iT byin/ a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a dzi g+hat+si ta/ a dzi g+ha t+si Sh+TAM/ a dzi g+ha t+si ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la kA sa sogs kyis A ma sbyar/ a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis bas/ dzi g+ha t+sAM tsa kA ra/ dzi g+ha t+sAM ba b+sU  rba bar 'dod/ ba/ dzi g+ha t+sA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT
[\[378a.4\]]la iT byin a phyis bas/ dzi g+ha t+si tA/ dzi g+ha t+si tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dzi g+ha t+s+ya ta/ dzi g+hat+s+ya staM/ dzi g+ha t+s+ya suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ iT byin a phyis pas/ dzi g+ha t+si Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+ring la/ a dzi g+ha t+si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dI da zad pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar gnyis
[\[378a.5\]]brjod thung ngur bsgyur pas/ di dI Sha zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  di da She te/ ling  di dI She ta/ loT  dri dI Sha tAM/ lang  a di dI Sha te/ lung  a di dI Shi Sh+Ta /liT  di dI ShI tsa kre/ luT  di di ShI tA/ smon ling  di dI Shi ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  di dI Shi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  a di dI Sha Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / 'grel bar lung
[\[378a.6\]]drangs pa/ dIngaHsa n+yA t+saM ke tsi dwa/ ding gi san la A nyid 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o/ /dIng gis rna pha rol la a nyid du bsgyur ba skabs 'gar yang na bar bya ste/ A ta du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ a b+h+yA sa thung ngur bsgyur/ san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur bas/ ri dAs zhes pa la laT sogs
[\[378a.7\]]sbyar bas/ laT  di dIs te/ ling  di dA se ta/ loT  di dI sa tI/ lang  a di dA sa ta/ lung  a di dA siSh+Ta/ liT di dA sAM tsa kre/ luT  di dA si tA/ smon ling  di dA si ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  di dA si Sh+ya te/ ling  a di dA si Sh+ya ta/ l-ing  a di dA siSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /d+yu ta 'bar la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ san yang dag la 'os gnyis
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]brjod/ d+yu ta dang swa po dag gi saM pra sA ra Na 'os/ a b+h+yas saM pra sAr Nar bsgyur/ bal dang po'i iT byin bas/ di d+yu ta i san zhes pa la/ ra lo byu pa d+hA r+d+ha lA de saM sh+tsa/ u i u pa d+hA ha la dang po dang ra la las san 'ang ngo / /byings ha la dang po can i yig dang u yig gang rung zhig u pa ng+hA na yod pa
[\[378b.2\]]dang byings ra yig dang la yig mtha' can las pha rol gyi san iT dang bcas pa'ang ka 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bya ste/ kita kyi phyogs la yon tan mi byed/ ki ta ma yin pa'i phyogs la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ di d+yA ti Sha 'am/ di d+yo ti Sha/ zhes pa grub pa la laT sogs tang
[\[378b.3\]]rnams sbyar bas/ di d+yu ti Sha te/ laT  do d+yo ti Sha te/ di d+yu ti Sha ta/ ling  di d+yo ti She ta/ di d+yu ti Sha tAM/ loT  di d+yo ti Sha tAM/ a di d+yu ti Sha ta/ lang  a di d+yo ti Sha ta/ a di d+yu ti Shi Sh+Ta/ lung  a di d+yo ti Shi Sh+Ta/ di d+yu ti ShAM tsa kre/ liT  di d+yo te ShAM tsa kre/ di d+yu ti Shi tA/ luT  di d+yu ti Shi tA/ di d+yu ti ShI Shi Sh+Ta/ smon ling  di d+yo ti
[\[378b.4\]]Shi ShI Sh+Ta/ di d+yu ti Shi Sh+ya te/ l+r-iT  do d+yo ti Shi Sh+ya te/ a di d+yu ti Shi Sh+ya ta/ l+ring  a di d+yo ti Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /u ts+tse chag pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ 'grel par u ts+tshi'i tsha iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod ces byung bas/ tshig gnyis brjod/ a b+h+ya sa'i tsar 'ang ngos tsha tsar bsgyur bas/ u
[\[378b.5\]]tsi ts+tsha Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  u tsi ts+tshi Sha ti/ ling  u tsi ts+tshi She ta/ loT  u tsits+tshi Sha tu/ lang  au tsa ts+tshi Sha ta/ lung  au tsi ts+tshi tI ta/ liT  u tsi ts+tshi ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT  u tsi ts+tshi Sh-i tA/ smon ling  u tsi ts+tshi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-iT  u tsi ts+tshi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing au tsi ts+tshi Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ing glog pa la Ni dang san sbyar
[\[378b.6\]]Ni la'ang san tsar dag la 'os yang na i gAng du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ gu ha dag gi tsu 'os/ gA dzA thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ san la i ta 'os/ de i ta ngal dang po'i i ta byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan/ arti hI sogs kyis pug  A ga ma byin/ e tsa'i a ya/ ad+hi sngon du bzhag pas
[\[378b.7\]]a d+hi dzi gA ba yi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT  a d+h+ya dzi gA pa yi Sha ti/ ling  a d+hi dzi gA pa yi She ta/ loT  a d+hi dza gA pa yi Sha tu/ lang  a d+h+ya dzi gA pa yi Sha ta/ lung  a d+h+ya dzi gA pa yi ShI ta/ liT  a d+h+yA dzi gA pa yi ShI tsa kA ra/ luT  a dz+hi dzi gA pa yi Shi tA/ smon pa'i ling  a d+hi dzi gA pa yi Sh+yA ta/ liT  a d+hi
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]dzi gA pa yi Shi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a d+h+ya dzi sA ba yi Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / gAng du ma bsgyur pa'i phyogs la/ krI ing dzi rnams kyi Ni la 'os/ A nga bsgyur/ a rti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin/ san yang dag la 'os pa Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/ bal dang po'i iT byin/ byings
[\[379a.2\]]thams cad ba sogs kyis yon tan e tsa'i pa ya sogs dang a d+hi sngon du bzhag pas/ ad+h+yA pi pa yi Sha/ zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar pas/ laT  a d+h+ya pi pa yi Sha ti/ lung  a d+h+yA pi pa yi ShI ta/ sogs so/ ! /Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa la Ni dang sa na/ Ni la'ang sa na
[\[379a.3\]]tsang dag la 'os saM pra sA Na rayang na bsgyur te/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ laT  shi shwa ya yi Sha ti/ lung  a shi shwa la yi ShI ta/ sogs dang / bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ laT  shu shA ba yi Sha ti/ lung  a shu sha ba yi ShI ta/ sogs dang / yang Ni tsa med pa byings nyid la sa na sbyar na/ iT byin
[\[379a.4\]]yon tan byas pas/ laT  shi shwa yi Sha ti/ lung  a shi shwa ya ShI ta/ sogs so/ ! /hwe nya 'gran pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa san sbyar/ shi ta ma yin pa nye ba'i yul sogs kyis e tsa A ta/ hwA'i saM pra sA ra Na 'os/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzu sA ba yi Sha
[\[379a.5\]]zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dzu hA ba yi Sha ti/ ling  dzu hA ba yi She ta/ loT  dzu hA ba ya Sha tu/ lang  a dzu hA ba yi Sha ta/ lung  a dzu hA ba yi ShI ta/ liT  dzu hA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dzu hA ba yi Shi tA/ smon ling  dzu hA ba yi Sh+yA ta/ l+r-iT  dzu hA ba yi Shi Sh+ya tu/ l+r-ing  a dzu hA ba yi Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so//
[\[379a.6\]]a ni srog la'o zhes pa las na/ bal dang po'i iT byin/ san yang dag la'os/ na iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod bas/ a ni ni Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT  a ni ni Sha ti/ ling  a ni ni She ta/ loT  a ni ni Sha tu/ lang  A ni ni Sha ta/ lung  A ni ni ShI ta/ liT  a ni ni
[\[379a.7\]]ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT  a ni ni Shi tA/ smon ling  a ni ni Sh+ya ta/ l+r-iT  a ni ni Shi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a ni ni Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /u b+hau sA b+h+yA sa s+ya/ sa la a b+h+ya sa'i gnyis dag gi'o/ /a ni ti'i san pha rol la nyer bsgyur na Na bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na a b+h+yA sa dang u pa d+hA'i na yig gnyis ka Na
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ swA ni ni Sha ti/ sogs so/ ! /br-i tu 'jug pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ ha la n+tA ts+tsa/ hal mtha' las kyang ngo / byings mtha' ha la so sor bsdu ba yin pa u pang+hA na i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yong pa de'i pha rol gyi san iT med pa ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can te/ 'dir at+yA
[\[379b.2\]]rnams la/ br-i ta rnams las bzhi rnams las sogs iT mi 'jug /gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a ta/ de san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis ki ta yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed/ bi bri t+sa zhes grub pa la laT sogs a tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  bi br-it+sa ti/ ling  bi br-i t+si ta/ loT  bi
[\[379b.3\]]br-it+sa tu/ lang  a bi br-it+si ta/ lung  a bi br-i t+sI ta/ liT  bi br-i t+sI tsa kA ra/ luT  bi br-i t+si tA/ smon ling  bi br-i t+s+yA ta/ l+r-iT  bi br-i t+si Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a bi br-i t+si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /tang rnams la ba la dang po'i iT byin yon tan byas/ bi brti Sha/ zhes pa laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  bi brti Sha te/ ling  bi br-i rti
[\[379b.4\]]She ta/ loT  bri brti Sha tAM/ lang  a bi brti Sha ta/ lung  a bi brti Shi Sh+Ta/ liT  bi brti ShAM tsa kri/ luT  bi brti Shi tA/ smon ling  bi brti ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  bi brti Shi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  a bi brti Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /nr-i ti lus bskyod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ kr-ita  tsw-i ti nr-i ta tr-i ta nr-i ta sogs kyis iT yang na bar
[\[379b.5\]]byas/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ san ki ta yin pas yon tan sogs mi byed/ iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ni nr-i t+sa ti/ laT  ni na rti Sha ti/ ni nr-i t+se/ ling  ni na rti Sha ta/ ni nr-i t+sa tu/ loT  ni na rti Sha tu/ a ni nr-i t+sa ta/ lang  a ni na rti Sha ta/ a ni nr-i t+sI ta/ lung  a
[\[379b.6\]]ni na rti ShI ta/ ni nr-i t+sAM tsa kA ra/ liT  ni na rti ShAM tsa kA ra/ ni nr-i t+sI tA/ luT  ni na rti Shi tA/ ni nr-i t+s+ya ta/ smon pa' ling  ni na rti Sh+yA ta/ ni na rti Sh+ya ti/ l+r-iT  ni na rti Shi Sh+ya ti/ a ni nr-i t+si Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a ni na rti Sha Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /tr-I rkyal bar byed pa dang sgrol bar byed pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT  sa ni bA sa
[\[379b.7\]]la iT yang na'o/ /br-ing br-i nya dag dang byings r-I ta mtha' rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur ro/ /i ko dz+nya la/ i ka las dz+nya la la'o/ /byings i ka so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge'i mtha' can las pha rol gyi san dz+ha la dang po can te iT med pa de ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can du bya ste/ iT
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]med pa'i phyogs la mdo 'dis san ki ta yin pas yon tan dang 'phel ba mi byed/ byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta 'os r-I ita du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod r-I'i a Na pha rol lo sar byin/ u pad+hA'i 'ang ngos ring bor bsgyur bas/ ti tI r+Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  ti
[\[380a.2\]]tI r+Sha ti/ ling  ti tI r+She ta/ loT  ti tI r+Sha tu/ lang  a ti tI r+Shi ta/ lung  a ti tI r+ShI ta/ liT  ti tI r+ShI tsa kA ra/ luT  ti tI r+ShI trA/ smon ling  ti tI r+Sha Sh+ya ta/ l+r-iT ti tIr+Sha Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a ti tI r+Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / iTa'i phyogs la b-i r-I ta dag las yang na 'os iT dang IT yang na bar byas gnyis brjod/ r-I'i a ta dang
[\[380a.3\]]san la iT/ byings thams cad ba sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  ti ta ri Sha ti/ lung  a ti ta ri ShI ta/ liT  ti ta ri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT ti ta rI Sha ti/ lung  a ti ta rI ShI ta/ liT  a ti ta rI ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! bring kun nas gus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ a dz+nyA na ba/
[\[380a.4\]]mAM sa ni/ a tsa han gam rnams kyi san la'o/ /byings a tsa'i mtha' can rnams kyi mtha' dang han gam dag gi u pa d+hA rnams na pha rol la ring bor bsgyur te/ br-i br-Ir bsgyur/ san la iT yang na 'os iT yang na bar byas/ iT med pa'i phyogs la san ki ta yin pas/ oSh+Ti'i dang po
[\[380a.5\]]ma yin pa'i a tu 'os/ r-I ta  u ta du bsgyur/ rI'i a Na la ra pha rol lo sar sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ bu dU r+Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  bu bU bU r+Sha ta/ ling  bu bU r+She ta/ loT  bu bU r+Sha tu/ lang  a bu bU r+Sha ta/ lung  a bu bU r+ShI ta/ liT  bu bU r+ShAM
[\[380a.6\]]tsa kA ra/ luT  bu bU r+Shi tA/ smon ling  bu bU r+ShA ta/ l+r-iT  bu bU r+Shi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a bu bU r+Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / iTa'i phyogs la/ br-i rI sogs kyis iT dang IT yang na bar byas/ gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a ta dang sa nas la i ta/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  bi bir
[\[380a.7\]]Sha ta/ lung  a bi ba ri ShA ta/ liT  bi b.ri ShA tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT  bi ba ri ShA ti/ lung  a bi ba rI ShI ta/ liT  bi ba rI ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /Du kr-i nya byed pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ a ca ha na gam rnams kyi sa na la 'os ring por bsgyur/ byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta/ r-I'i a Na la ra pha
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]rol gnyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ saM sngon du bzhag /ka ro ti'i saM pa ri u pa sogs kyi mdos ka'i sngon du suT A gam byin/ 'grel par skabs 'dir iT yang na bar mi byed de iT mi ster ba kho na'o zhes bshad pas iT mi 'jug /saM tsi skI r+ShA zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/
[\[380b.2\]]laT  saM tsi skA+e r+Sha ti/ ling  saM tsi skI r+Sha ta/ loT  saM tsi skI r+Sha tu/ lang  sa ma tsi skI r+Sha ta/ lung  sa ma tsi skI r+ShI ta/ liT  saM tsi skAM r+ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT  saM tsi skI r+ShI tA/ smon ling  saM tsi skI r+Shi ta/ l+r-iT  saM tsi skI r+Shi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  sam tsi skI r+Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /d+hA gya gyu la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ a tsa han gam rnams
[\[380b.3\]]kyis na la 'os ring por bsgyur/ san la iT yang na 'os iT yang na bar byed de/ iT med pa'i phyogs la/ o Sh+Ti sngon ma ma yin ba'i u ta du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod r-i'i a Na lar pha rol u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ du d+hU r+Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT  du
[\[380b.4\]]d+hU r+ShA ti/ lung  a du d+hU r+ShI ta/ liT  du d+hU r+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ laT  di t+yA ri Sha ti/ lung  a di d+hA ri ShI ta/ liT  di d+hA ri ShA tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /dzi rgyal ba la'o zhes pa la san/ dzi'i san liT dag la 'os dza gar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pas/ laT  dzi gaM
[\[380b.5\]]ti/ ling  dzi gi She ta/ loT  dzi gi Sha tu/ lang  a dzi gi Sha ta/ lung  a dzi gi ShI ta/ liT  dzi gi ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT dzi gi Sh+yA tA/ smon ling  dzi gi Sh+yA ta/ l+r-iT  dzi gi Shi Sh+yA ti/ l+r-ing  a dzi gi Sh+yaM Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /tsi nya sogs pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ tsi'i 'dam ka 'os tsa/ ra bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur
[\[380b.6\]]ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ laT  tsi ki Sha ti/ lung  a tsi ki ShI ta/ liT  tsi ki ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT  tsi tsi ShA ti/ lung  a tsi tsi ShI ta/ l-iT  tsi tsi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /ha na 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la san/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ dz+nya dza/ san
[\[380b.7\]]la iT 'os i ta du bsgyur/ a tsa ha na gam rnams kyis na la'os ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  dzi b+hA n+sa ti/ a b+h+yA sa las kyang ngom ta b+ha/ ling  dzi g+hA n+se ta/ loT  dzi g+hA n+sa tu/ lang  a dzi g+hA n+sa ta/ lung  a dzi g+hA n+sI ta/ liT  dzi g+hA n+sI tsa kA ra/ luT dzi g+hA n+si tA/ smon ling  dzi g+hA n+sA ta/ l+r-iT  dzi g+hA n+si Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dzi g+hA n+si Sh+ya ta/
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]sogs so/ ! /iN 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ sa ni tsa/ san la 'ang ngo / /i Na'i san pha rol la 'ang rtogs pa'i don la 'jug pa ma yin na ga mi zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste i brjod don no/ /ga mi ru bsgyur/ a tsa ha na gam rnams kyis na la 'os u pang+hA ring por
[\[381a.2\]]bsgyur iT byin pas/ laT  dzi gA mi Sha ti/ liT  dzi gA mi She ta/ loT  dzi gA mi Sha tu/ lang  a dzi gA mi Sha ta/ lung  a dzi gA mi ShI ta/ liT  dzi gA mi ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dzi gA mi Shi tA/ smon ling  dzi gA mi Sh+yA ta/ l+r-iT  dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ti/ a dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / rtogs pa'i don yin na ga mi ru mi
[\[381a.3\]]bsgyur/ 'grel par a tsa gcig pa dang po la san nyid gnyis brjod do zhes byung bas/ sa gnyis brjod/ san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa gnyis Sha/ pra ti sngon du bzhag pas/ laT  pra tI Shi Sha ti/ ling  pra tI Shi She ta/ loT  pra trI Shi Sha tu/ lang  a pra tai
[\[381a.4\]]Shi Sha ta/ lung  a pra ti Shi ShI ta/ liT  pra tI Shi ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT  pra tI Shi Shi tA/ smon ling  pra tI Shi Sh+yA ta/ l+r-iT  pra tI Shi Shi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a pra tI Shi Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /i ka dran pa la'o zhes pa la'ang cho ga dang gzugs thams cad i Na dang 'dra ste khyad par cung zad tsam yang med do/ ! /ing
[\[381a.5\]]klog pa la'o zhes pa la san/ id sh+tsa/ ing gi 'ang ngo / /ing gi 'ang san pha rol la ga mi ru bsgyur bar bya ste/ ga mi ru bsgyur gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ga dza/ san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur/ a tsa ha na gam rnams kyis na la 'os u pa d+hA ring por bsgyur bas/ dzi gA mi Sha zhes
[\[381a.6\]]grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  dzi gA mi Sha te/ ling  dzi gA mi ShaM ta/ loT  dzi gA mi Sha tAM/ lang  a dzi gA mi Sha ta/ lung  a dzi gA mi Sha Sh+Ta/ liT  dzi gA mi ShAM tsa kra/ luT  a dzi gA mi Shi tA/ smon ling  dza gA mi Shi ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing  a dzi gA mi Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[381a.7\]]I r+Sh+ya 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa dang san sbyar/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ I r+Sh+ya teH/ sa no bA hwi dwaM/ I r+Sh+ya ti las san nyid gnyis yang na'o/ /I r+Sh+yA ti las pha rol gyi san nyid yang na gnyis brjod par bya ste/ san gnyis brjod/ san la i ta 'os gong ma i ta du bsgyur/
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]I r+Sh+yi Shi Sha/ zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  I r+Sh+yi Shi ma ti/ lung  I r+Sh+ye ShiShI ta/ liT  I r+Sh+yi Shi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / yang na/ I r+Sh+ya ti'i gsum pa'i gnyis sos ya Ni dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/ I r+Sh+yi yi Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  I r+Sh+yi yi Sha ti/
[\[381b.2\]]lung  I r+Sh+yi yi ShI ta/ liT  I r+Sh+yi yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /b+hU yod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ sa ni gra ha gu ho sh+tsa/ gra ha gu ha dag gi 'ang san la'o/ /gra ha nye bar len pa dang / gu hU kun nas sgrib pa dang 'ang sgras byings mtha' u ka so sor bsdu ba rnams las pha rol gyi san la
[\[381b.3\]]iT mi 'gyur te/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ bu g+hA Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  bu b+hU Sha ti/ lung  a bu b+hA ShI ta/ liT  bu b+hU ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ hu byin pa la san sbyar/ mdo 'dis iT mi 'jug/ a tsa ha na gam rnams kyis na
[\[381b.4\]]la 'os ring por bsgyur gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzu hU Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dzu hU Sha ti/ lung  a dzu hU ShI ta/ liT  dzu hU ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /gu hU kun nas sgrib pa la'o zhes ba la san gnyis brjod ku ha dag gi tsu ha'i D+ha 'os/ ha D+ha  a tsa
[\[381b.5\]]gcig pa'i b+ha Sha mtha' sogs kyis ga g+ha/ sa la Sha N+ha ngag gi ka 'os/ D+ha ka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur/ dzu g+hu k+Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dzu g+hu k+Sha ti/ lung  a dzu g+hu k+ShI ta/ liT  dzu g+hu k+ShaM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /gra ha nye bar len pa la san sbyar/ ru
[\[381b.6\]]da bid mu Sha gra hi swa bi bra tshAHsaM sh+tsa/ rud  bid  mu Sha gra hi  swa bi pra tsha las san 'ang ngo / /ru da mchi ma 'dzag pa/ bid shes pa/ mu Sha rku ba/ gra ha nye bar len pa/ swa pi nya la ba/ bra ts+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams las pha rol gyi kr-i ta sogs kyi rkyen k+t+wa dang san yang ka 'gro ba'i ming can
[\[381b.7\]]te/ san ki ta yin pas/ gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM sra sA raN bsgyur/ gnyis brjod r-i'i a ta dang / san la i ta ha'i D+ha 'os/ ha D+ha/ a tsa gcig ba'i b+ha Sha mtha' sogs kyis/ ga g+ha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gi ka /kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha ra bsgyur  dzi g+h+r-i k+Sha zhes grub pa la laT
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]sogs sbyar bas/ laT  dzi g+h+r-i k+Sha ti/ lung  a dzi g+h+r-i k+ShI ta/ liT  dzi g+h-I k+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /nyi Sha ba nyal ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san ki ta yin pas/ btsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis/ su Shu p+sa zhes grub pa la laT
[\[382a.2\]]sogs sbyar bas/ laT  su Shu p+sa ti/ lung  a su Shu p+sI ta/ liT  a su Shu p+hAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /Sh+mir cung zad rgod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ smi pUr raM dzU a shI sa ni/ smi pUr r-i a ny+dzU a sha rnams kyi san la'o /Sh+mir cung zad rgod pa/ bUd dag pa/ r-i 'gro ba/ a ny+dzU gsal ba/
[\[382a.3\]]a sha zas rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT 'gyur te/ iT byin byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan dang / gnyis brjod sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ siSh+ma yi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  si Sh+ma yi Sha te/ lung  asi Sh+ma yi Shi Sh+Ta/ liT  si Sh+ma
[\[382a.4\]]yi ShAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /pUng dag pa la'o zhes pa la san/ iT byin yon tan bas e tsa'i a ya gnyis brjod/ u'i pu ya Na dzi a pha rol los/ u ir bsgyur ba sogs kyis po pa bi Sha zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  pi pa bi Sha te/ lung  a pi ba bi Shi Sh+Ta/
[\[382a.5\]]liT  pi ba bi ShAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /r-i 'gro ba la san/ yon tan rA iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/ a ri ri Sha zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  a ri ri Sha ti/ lung  A ri ri ShI ta/ liT  A ri ri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /a ny+dzU gsal ba dang 'tshab par byed pa dang
[\[382a.6\]]'gro ba rnams la'o zhes ba la san sbyar/ iT byin/ dza iT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pas/ any+dzi dzi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT  a h+dzi dzi ShI ta/ lung  any+dzi dzi ShI ta/ liT  a ny+dzi dzi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /a sha zas la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin/ sha iT dang
[\[382a.7\]]bcas pa gnyis brjod/ a shi shi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT a shi shi Sha ti/ lung  A shi shi ShI ta/ liT  ashi shi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /kr-I nya 'tshe ba la'o zhes ba la san sbyar/ kir sh+tsa bany+tsa b+h+yaH/ kr-i las kyang lnga rnams las so/ /kr-I la sogs pa lnga ste/ kr-I nya
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]'tshe ba/ gr-I mid pa/ dr-I rnam par 'joms pa/ ng+g+rIM nya 'dzin pa/ prats+tsha shes par 'dod pa rnams las kyang san la iT 'gyur te/ mdo 'dis iT byin yon tan byas/ gnyis brjod r-i'i a ta/ san la i ta 'os i ta du bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tsi ka ri Sha zhes grub ba la laT sogs sbyar bas/
[\[382b.2\]]laT tsi ka ri Sha ti/ lung  a tsi ka ri ShI ta/ liT  tsi ka ri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ gr-I med pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin pas/ laT  dzi ga ri Sha ti/ lung  a dzi ga ri ShI ta/ liT  dzi ga ri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /dr-I rnam par 'joms pa la san sbyar iT byin/ yon tan
[\[382b.3\]]sogs kyis/ di da ri Sha/ zhes pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  di da ri Sha te/ lung  a di da ri Shi ShU/ liT  di da ri ShAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /d+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa la san sbyar iT byin/ di d+ha ri Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  di d+ha ri Sha te/ lung  a di d+ha ri Shi Sh+Ta/
[\[382b.4\]]liT  di ng+ha ri ShAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /'grel par de rnams r-I ha mtha' yin kyangaIT ring po mi 'gyur zhes byung bas IT mi 'jug go/ ! /pra ts+tsha shes par 'dod pa la san/ ru da bi daM sogs kyi mdos san ki ta yin pas/ ki ta pha rol la gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na ra bsgyur/ gnyis
[\[382b.5\]]brjod san la ita/ mdo 'dis iT byin/ pi pr-i ts+tsha Sha/ zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  pi pr-i ts+tshi Sha ti/ lung  a bi pr-i ts+tshi ShI ta/ liT  pi pr-i ts+tsha ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /d+hU nya g.yo ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT mi 'jug gnyis brjod pas/ du d+hU Sha/ zhes pa la laT
[\[382b.6\]]sogs sbyar bas/ laT  du d+hU Sha ti/ lung  a du d+hU ShI ta/ liT  du d+hU ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /di bu rtse ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ bal dang po'i iT pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas/ di de bi Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  di de bi Sha ti/ lung  a di de bi ShI ta/
[\[382b.7\]]liT  di de bi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /Shi bu thags kyi rgyu la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin gnyis brjod/ sa Sha ra mi 'gyur yon tan byas/ si se bi Sha/ zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  si se bi Sha ti/ lung  a si se bi ShI ta/ liT   si se bi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /ri tU 'phel
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ sanI ban+ta r+t+ha b+n+ra s+dza da m+bU shri sbr-i yU r+Nu b+ha ra dz+nyA paM sa nAM/ I pa mtha' dang r-id+ha b+h+ra s+dza dmU shri sbr-i yu U r+Nu b+tar dz+nyA pi san rnams kyi san la'o/ /su pa kyi byings mo rkyen a+wi pa mtha' can rnams dang / r-i dU 'phel ba/ b+h+ra sbra 'tshed pa/ dam+b+hu ngan
[\[383a.2\]]g.yo ba/ shri gus pa/ sbr-i sgra/ yu sre pa/ U r+Nu nya kun nas 'gebs pa/ b+har ste/ Du b+h+r-ita 'dzin pa/ dz+nyA khong du chud pa/ Sha Na sbyin pa rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur te/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan/ d+ha aT dang bcas pa gnyis brjod/
[\[383a.3\]]a b+h+yA sa'i tsang la ba ngos/ d+ha dar bsgyur/ a dzi d+hi Sha/ zhes grub pa la phaT sogs sbyar bas laT  a dzi d+hi Sha ti/ lung  A rdi d+hi ShI ta/ liT  a rdi d+hiShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ A pa dz+nyA p+Y+ri d+hA mI ta/ A pa  dz+nyA bi r-i b+ha rnams kyi I ta'o/ /A p-I khyab pa/ dz+nyA long du nu da
[\[383a.4\]]pa/ r-i d+hu 'phel pa rnams kyi iT med pa'i pha rol la a tsa I ta du 'gyur zhing a b+h+yA sa'ang dbyi ste/ u pad+hA'i 'ang ngos/ r-i ita/ mdo 'dis/ de IT du bsgyur/ r-i'i a Na lar pha rol la lo sa ra byin/ a b+h+yA sa phyis/ khar la tsa ra 'os d+ha tar bsgyur bas/ I tA zhes grub pa la laT sogs
[\[383a.5\]]sbyar bas/ laT I r+t+sa ti/ ling  I r+t+se ta/ laT  A r+t+sa tu/ lang  ai r+t+sa ta/ lung  ai r+t+sA ta/ I r+t+sAM tsa kA ra/ luT  I r+t+sI ta/ smon ling  I r+t+sA ta/ l+riT  I r+t+sa Sh+yati/ l+r-ing  ai r+t+sa Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /b+h+ra swA 'ched pa la'o zhes pa la san/ iTa'i phyogs la/ b+h+ra l+dza'i b+hardza yang na 'os/ b+ha rdzar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur
[\[383a.6\]]ba yang na bar byas gnyis brjod/ san la ita 'os i ta du bsgyur bas/ laT  bi b+h+ra s+dza Sha ta/ lung  a bi b+h+ra s+dzi ShI ta/ liT  bi b+h+ra s+dzi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT  bi b+ha rdzi Sha ti/ lung  a bi b+ha rdzi ShI ta/ liT  bi b+ha rdzi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /iT med pa'i phyogs la/ b+h+ra s+dzi b+hardza ra bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur
[\[383a.7\]]ba yang na bar byed/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis phyis/ bra shA b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis dza Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha sogs kyis Sha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ pi b+h+ra k+Sha zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyang bas/
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]laT  bi b+h+ra k+Sha ti/ ling  a bi b+h+ra k+ShI ta/ liT  pi b+h+ra k+ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / b+ha rdza bsgyur ba'i phyogs la gzhan cho ga 'dra bal/ su k+Sha'i steng du drangs pas/ laT  bi b+ha rka ti/ lung  a bi b+ha r+k+ShI ta/ liT  bi b+ha r+k+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /da swU dan g.yo ba la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ I pa mtha' r-i d+hU
[\[383b.2\]]sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ laT  di dam+hi Sha ti/ lung  a di da m+b+hi ShI ta/ liT  di da m+b+hi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ dom+b+ha its+tsha/ dam+b+ha'i i ta'ang ngo / /iT med pa'i san pha rol la dam+b+ha'i a tsa ita du bsgyur zhing 'ang gi sgras tsang yang na I ta
[\[383b.3\]]du 'gyur la a b+h+yA sa'ang dbyi ste/ ha la mtha' las kyang ngos san kita yin pas/ ke ta pha rol la i ta 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ma phyis/ mdo 'dis i ta dang a+wi ta yang na bar byas/ a b+h+yA sa phyis/ a tsa gcig ba b+ha Sha sogs kyis da d+ha/ khar la tsar 'os/ b+ha par bsgyur
[\[383b.4\]]bas/ laT  d+hi b+sa ti/ lung  a d+hi p+sI ta/ liT  d+hi b+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs som/ laT  d+hI p+sa ti/ lung  a d+hI p+sI ta/ liT  d+hI p+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /shr-i gum pa la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ I pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ laT shi shra yi Sha ti/ lung  a
[\[383b.5\]]shi shra yi ShI ta/ liT shi shra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa hin gam rnams kyi san la 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  shi shrI Sha ti/ lung  a shi shrI ShI ta/ liT  shi shI ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /spraM sgra la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ I pa mtha' sogs kyis
[\[383b.6\]]iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ laT  si swa ri Sha ti/ lung  a si swa ri ShI ta/ liT  si swa ri ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa han gam sogs kyis ring po/ /o Sh+Ti'i sngon ma me yin pa'i u ta 'os r-i u ta/ r-i'i a Na la ra/
[\[383b.7\]]gnyis brjod/ u pad+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  su sbU r+Sha ti/ lung  a su swU r+ShI ta/ liT  su swU r+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /yu sre ba la'o zhes pa la san/ I pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la yon tan dang / pu ya Na dzi a pha rol la u'i
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]'os/ ab+h+ya sa'i u ir bsgyur bas/ laT  yi ya bi Sha ti/ lung  a yi ya bi ShI ta/ liT yi ya bi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa han ga ma sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  yu yU Sha ta/ lung  a yu yU ShI ta/ liT yu yU ShAM tsa kA ra/
[\[384a.2\]]sogs so/ ! /U r+Nu nya kun nas 'gebs pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ I ba mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ laT U r+Nu na bi Sha ti/ lung  a r+Nu na'i ShI ta/ liT  U r+Nu na bi ShAM tsa ku ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ a tsa ha na ga ma
[\[384a.3\]]sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ laT U r+NU nU Sha ti/ lung  au r+NA nU ShI ta/ liT  U r+Nu nU ShAM tsa ku ra/ sogs so/ b+h+r-i nya 'dzin pa la san/ a+wi pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la yon tan byas pas/ laT  bi b+ha ri Sha ti/ lung  a bi b+ha ri ShI ta/ liT  bi b+ha ri ShAM tsa k+Sha
[\[384a.4\]]ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ au Sh+Tu'i sngon ma ma yin pas u ta 'os/ r-i u ta/ ra'i a Na la ra pha rol gnyis brjod/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/ b+ha ba u pad+hA'i 'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ laT bu b+hU r+ShA ti/ lung  a bu b+hU rI ta/ liT  bu b+hU r+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[384a.5\]]dz+nyA khongs su chud pa la Ni tsa/ arti hrI sogs kyis pu ka A ga ma byin pas/ dz+nyA pi la san sbyar/ I pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ laT dzi dz+nyA pa yi Sha ti/ lung  o dzi dz+nyA pa yi ShI ta/ liT  dzi dz+nyA pa yi ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/
[\[384a.6\]]Ni tsa iT med pa la 'os Ni tsa phyis/ A pa dz+nyA pi/ r-i d+ha rnams kyi Ita 'os a tsa Ita dang a b+h+yAs phyis pas/ laT dz+nyI p+sa ti/ lung  a dz+nyI b+sA ti/ liT dz+nyI p+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /Sha Na sin pa la san/ I pa mtha' sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ laT sis
[\[384a.7\]]ni Sha ti/ lung  a pi sa ni ShI ta/ liT si sa ni ShA tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /iT med pa'i phyogs la/ dza na kha nas rnams kyis na dz+ha la dag la 'os/ mtha' A ta du bsgyur/ laT si sA sa ti/ lung  a si sA sI ta/ laT si sA sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /ta nu rgyas ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]'grel bar lung drangs pa/ ta ni pa ti da ri drA b+h+yaHsa nI D+wA/ ta ni pa ti  da ri drwa rnams las san la iT yang na'o/ /ta nu rgyas pa/ pa t+l-i lhung ba/ da r-i drA ngan 'gro rnams las pha rol gyi san la iT yang na 'gyur te/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ laT ti ta ni Sha ti/ lung  a ti ta ni
[\[384b.2\]]ShI ta/ liT  ti ta ni ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ta no ti rbi b+hA ShA/ ta no ti'i 'dam ka'o/ /ta no ti'i u pa d+hA iT med pa'i san pha rol la ring por bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can te/ laT  ti tA na te/ lung  ti tA n+sI ta/ liT  ti tA n+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ ti ta n+sa ti/
[\[384b.3\]]a ti ta n+sI ta/ ti ta n+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /'grel par/ ta na tu las the tshom la 'jug pa la'ang san 'gyur ro zhes bshad de/ bsgrub tshul dang gzugs snga ma rnams dang 'bra'o/ /mr-ing srog gtong ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ a tsa ha na gam sogs kyis ring por bsgyur/
[\[384b.4\]]o Sh+Ti'i sngon ma ma yin pa'i u ta 'os/ r-i u ta r-i'i aN lar pha rol/ gnyis brjod/ u pad+hA'i'ang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ laT mu mUr+Sha ti/ lung  a mu mU r+ShI ta/ liT mu mU r+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /patI lhung ba la'o zhes pa las na sbyar/ ta nu pa ti da ri drA sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis
[\[384b.5\]]iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ laT  pi pa ti Sha ti/ lung  a pi pa ti ShI ta/ liT pi pa ti ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT ma byin ba'i phyogs la/ sa ni mI mA g+hu rab+ha la b+ha sha ka pa ta pa dA ma tsa i sha /san la mI mA g+hu ra b+ha lab+ha sha ka pa ta pa da rnams kyi a tsa'i i sha'o/ /iT
[\[384b.6\]]med pa'i san pha rol la mAng gus pa/ mI nya 'tshed pa g+hu'i ming can rnams dang / ra ba rtsom pa/ DU la b+ha Sha thob pa/ sha kl-i nus pa/ ba t+l-i lhung ba/ pa da 'gro ba rnams kyi a tsa i shar 'gyur zhing a b+h+yA sa'ang dbyi ste/ a tsa i sar bsgyur/ brtsegs ba'i dang po sra ka sogs kyis sa phyis/
[\[384b.7\]]a b+h+yAs lang phyes pas/ laT  pit+sa ti/ lung  a pit+sI ta/ liT  pit+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /da ri drA ngan 'gro la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ ta nu pa ti da ri drA sogs kyi lung 'dren gyis iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la/ iT la'ang a+waT kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ laT  di da ri di Sha ti/
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]lung  a di da ri dri Sh-I ta/ liT  di da ri dri ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ laT  di da ri drA sa ti/ lung  a di da ri drA sI ta/ liT di da ri drA sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /mI nya 'tshe da pa la san/ san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is dang a b+h+yA sa phyis/ sa'i byings
[\[385a.2\]]phyed pa la 'os/ sa tar bsgyur bas/ laT mi t+sa ti/ lung  a mi t+sI ta/ liT mi t+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /mA dgus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is su bsgyur/ a b+h+yA sa phyis/ sa'i byings phyed pa la'os/ sa tar bsgyur bas/ mi t+sa zhes grub pa la laT
[\[385a.3\]]sogs tar rnams sbyar bas/ laT mi t+sa te/ lung  a mi t+si Sh+Ta/ liT  mi t+sAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /Du dA nya sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ /na pa mI mA g+hu sogs kyis a b+h+yAs phyis nas a tsa is su bsgyur/ sa'i byings phyed pa la 'os sa tar bsgyur bas/ laT  di t+sa ti/ lung  a di t+sI
[\[385a.4\]]ta/ liT  di t+sI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /Dub+hA ta 'dzin pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar sngon ma bzhin bsgrubs pas/ laT  d+hi t+sa ti/ lung  a b+hi t+sI ta/ loT b+hi t+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /rab+ha rtsom pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is su bsgyur zhing a b+h+yAs phyis/
[\[385a.5\]]brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis sa phyis/ khar la tsa ra 'os b+ha par bsgyur/ rip+sa zhes grub ba la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT  ri p+sa ta/ lung  a rip+si Sh+Ta/ liT  rip+sAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ Du la b+ha Sha thob pa la san sbyar bas/ laT li p+sa ti/ lung  a li p+si Sh+Ta/
[\[385a.6\]]liT  li p+sAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /sha k-I nus pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is dang a b+h+yA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis sa phyis/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis san gyi saSha ra bsgyur bas/ laT shi k+Sha ti/ lung  a shi k+ShI ta/ laT shi k+ShAM tsa
[\[385a.7\]]kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /bad 'gro ba la'i zhes pa la san sbyar/ san la mI mA sogs kyis a tsa is dang a b+h+yA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang pos ka sogs kyis sa phyis/ khar la tsar 'os da tar bsgyur/ pit+sa zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT pit+sa te/ a
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]pit+si Sh+Ta/ liT  pit+sAM sAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /A p-I khyab ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ A pa dz+nyA pi ri d+ha rnams kyi I ta 'os/ a tsa I ta dang a b+h+yA sa phyis pas/ laT  I p+sa ti/ lung  ai p+sI ta/ liT  I p+sAMM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /dA d+ha yang dag par grub pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ 'grel
[\[385b.2\]]par lung drangs pa/ rad+ho he d+se yAM sa nI s+yA ts+ya/ ra d+ha'i 'tshe ba la san i sar brjod do/ /rad+ha 'tshe ba'i don la 'jug pa na san pha rol la a tsa i sar bsgyur zhing a b+h+yA sa dbyi ste/ a tsa i sar bsgyur a b+h+yA sa phyis/ brtsegs pa'i dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ khar la tsa ra 'os d+ha tar
[\[385b.3\]]bsgyur bas/ pra ti r-i t+sa ti/ laT  sogs so/ /'tshe ba'i don min na is su mi 'gyur bas/ gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT A ri rA t+sa ti/ lung  A ri rA t+sI ta/ liT  A ri rA t+sAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /mu ts+l-i gro ba la la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ mu tso nya ka rma s+ya gu No pA/ mu
[\[385b.4\]]tsa'i la sam/ so sor 'tshe bar 'dod/ yin pa'i yon tan la yang na'o/ /mu tsa'i las kyi don la sbyar ba ma yin pa 'dod pa kho na'i don la 'jug pa na iT kun du 'grub par 'dod/ med ba'i san pha rol la u pad+mA yon tan du yang na bsgyur zhing bsgyur ba na a b+h+yAs yang dbyi ste/ yon tan a Sh+yAs phyis/
[\[385b.5\]]tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur bas/ laT  mo ti/ lung  a mo k+ShI ta/ liT  mo k+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / las kyi don yin na yon tan mi byed pas/ laT mu mu k+Sha ti/ lung  a mu mu k+ShI ta/ liT  mu mu k+ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /s+phu ra 'phro ba la byo zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ tsi nya sbyar dag gi Ni la yang na
[\[385b.6\]]nyos A ta du bsgyur bas/ spA ri zhes pa las na gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+hA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos pha pa iT byin pas/ laT  pu spAr yi ShA ti/ lung  a pu spAr yi ShI ta/ liT pu s+yA ra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / yang A ta du ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la yon tan
[\[385b.7\]]byas pas/ laT pu s+pho ra yi Sha ti/ lung  a pu s+pho ra yi ShI ta/ liT pu s+pho ra yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs dang / ! /k+Shu sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ k+ShA bi zhes pa la san dang iT gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po lhag po dang / ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ka tsar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]laT tsu k+ShA ba yi Sha ti/ lung a tsu k+ShA ba yi ShI ta/ liT  tsu k+ShA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /pU dag pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas pA bi zhes ba la san dang iT gnyis brjod/ u'i pu ya Na dzi a pha rol la 'os u ra bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/
[\[386a.2\]]laT  pi pA ba yi Sha ti/ luT  a pi pA ba yi ShI ta/ liT  pi pA ba yi ShI ta/ liT  pi pA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /b+hU yod pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/ b+hA bi zhes pa la san dang iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ u'i pu ya Na dzi a pha rol la 'os u ir bsgyur bas/ laT pri b+hA ba yi Sha ti/ lung  bi b+hA pa yi ShI ta/
[\[386a.3\]]liT  bi b+hA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /yu bsre ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas pas/ yA bi zhes pa la san dang iT/ gnyis brjod/ u'i pu yan sogs kyis u ir bsgyur bas/ laT yi yA ba yi Sha ti/ lung  a yi yA ba yi ShI ta/ liT  yi yA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs
[\[386a.4\]]so/ ! /de bzhin du/ ru sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa'i mtha' can la san dang iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ u'i pu yaN sogs kyis u ir bsgyur pas/ laT  ri rA ba yi Sha ti/ lung  a ri rA ba yi ShI ta/ liT ri rA ba yi ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /de dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ lU nya gcod
[\[386a.5\]]pa la/ laT  li lA ba yi Sha ti/ lung  a li lA ba yi ShI ta/ liT  li yA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /dzu 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT dzi dzA ba yi Sha ti/ lung  a dzi dzA ba yi ShI ta/ liT  dzi dzA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /Nu bstod pa la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ nA bi zhes pa la san
[\[386a.6\]]dang aT sbyar/ gnyis brjod sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT  nu nA ba yi Sha ti/ lung  a nu nA ba yi ShI ta/ liT nu nA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /sru 'gro ba la Ni tsa sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ srA bi zhes grub pa la san dang iT sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ sra ba ti/ shr-i Ni ti/ dra ba ti/ pra ba
[\[386a.7\]]ti/ pA ba ti/ bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na 'os/ a b+h+yA sa ir bsgyur bas/ laT  si srA ba yi Sha ti/ ling  a si srA ba yi ShAM ta/ liT  si srA ba yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /ru tsa 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la san sbyar iT byin/ u i u ba d+hA ha la dang po dang ral las san 'ang ngos/ san iT dang
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]bcas ba ki ta du yang na bar byas pas/ kita kyi phyogs la yon tan med/ ki ta ma yin pa'i phyogs la/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas bas/ laT  ru ro tsi Sha ti/ lung  a ru ro tsiShI ta/ liT ru ro tsi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT  ru rutsi Sha ti/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ li kha ri mo
[\[386b.2\]]'dri ba la'o zhes ba la san sbyar iT byin/ san ki ta du yang na bar byas pas/ laT  li le khi Sha ti/ lung  a li le khi ShI ta/ liT  li le khi ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs sam/ laT  li li khi Sha ti/ lung  a li li khi ShI ta/ liT  li li khi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /ru dar mchi ma 'dzag pa la'o zhes pa la
[\[386b.3\]]san dang iT/ rud bid mu Sha sogs kyis san iT dang bcas pa ki ta yin pas yon tan mi byed/ laT ru ru di Sha ti/ lung  a ru ru di ShI ta/ liT  ru ru di ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ bi da shes pa la/ laT  bi bi di Sha ti/ lung  a bi bi di ShI ta/ liT  bi bi di ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /
[\[386b.4\]]mu Sha rkub la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin/ ki ta yin pas yon tan mi byed/ laT  mu mu Shi Sha ti/ lung  a mu mu Shi ShA ta/ liT  mu mu Shi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /Sh+Tu nya bstod pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ stau ti N+yauHa b+h+yA sa s+ya/ stau ti dang Ni dag gi a b+h+ya sa'i
[\[386b.5\]]'o/ /taM ti dang byings Ni tsa mtha' can gyi sa yig ni a b+h+yAs in so sor bsdu ba'i pha rol la Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ mdo 'dis sa Shar bsgyur/ /Sha Tu la Sha ru 'os/ ta Ta a tsa ha na gam sogs kyis ring bor bsgyur bas/ laT tu Sh+TU Sha ti/ lung  tu Sh+Tu ShI ta/ liT  tu Sh+TU ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs
