[\[386b.6\]]so/ ! /nyi Sh+wa ba nyal ba la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa u ba ng+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas/ swA pi zhes ba la san sbyar/ iT byin/ gnyis brjod/ d+yu ti swA pi dag gi saM bra sA ra Na 'os/ a b+h+yA sa saM bra sAr Nar bsgyur/ stau ti dang Ni dag gi a b+h+yA sa'i 'os sa Shar bsgyur bas/ laT su Sh+wA pa yi
[\[386b.7\]]Sh+ya ti/ lung  a su ShA pa yi ShI ta/ liT suShA pa yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /nyi Sh+wa da mi gsal ba'i sgra la'o zhes pa la Ni tsa sbyar/ pu ka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas/ swe di zhes pa la san dang iT/ saHswi di swa di sa hA nAM tsa/ swi di swa dis ha rnams kyis 'ang ngo / /swi di mi gsal
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]ba'i sgra/ swa di ro myang ga sa ha bzod pa rnams kyi sa yig ni a b+h+yA sa in so sor bsdu ba dang Ni tsa'i mtha' yin kyang Shar mi bsgyur bas yig tu gnas te/ gnyis brjod/ hal dang po lhag po 'os/ ba phyis/ mdo 'dis sa Shar mi bsgyur bas/ laT  si swe da yi Sha ti/ lung  a
[\[387a.2\]]si swe da yi Sh+wi ta/ liT si swe da yi ShI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /swa da ro myang ba la/ Ni tsa u bad+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ swA di zhes pa la san iT byin/ gnyis brjod pa phyis/ san la i ta 'os a ti du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis sa Sha ra mi bsgyur bas/ laT si swA da yi Sha ti/ lung  a si swA da yi
[\[387a.3\]]ShI ta/ liT si swA da yi ShAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /sa ha bzod pa la Ni tsa 'phel ba byas/ sA he zhes pa la san sbyar/ iT byin/ gnyis brjod/ san la ita 'os i ta du bsgyur/ mdo 'dis sa Shar mi bsgyur bas/ laT si swA ha yi Sha ti/ lung  a si sA ha yi ShI ta/ liT si sA da yi ShAM tsa kA ra/
[\[387a.4\]]sogs so/ ! /'grel par rang don la byin pa'i san gyi mtha' la 'ang dgos pa yod san sbyor ro zhes bshad pas/ gu pU sbed pa la gu pa ti dza ki ta rnams la san 'os/ san gnyis brjod pa sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ dzu gu p+sa zhes pa la byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa po mnyam
[\[387a.5\]]pa las yang na 'os/ slar yang san byin/ gnyis brjod zin yin pas slar mi brjod/ bal dang po'i iT kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ dzu gu p+si Sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT dzu gu p+si Sha ti/ ling  dzu gu p+si Shi ta/ loT  dzu gu p+si Shi tu/ lang  a dzu gu p+si Sha ta/
[\[387a.6\]]lung  a dzu gu p+si ShI ta/ liT  dzu gup+si ShAM tsa kA ra/ luT dzu gu p+si Shi tA/ smon ling  dzu gu p+si Sh+yA ta/ l+r-iT  dzu gu p+si Shi Sh+yA ti/ l+r-ing  a dzu gu p+si Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /i tipA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU tA t+sa na n+taHsa mA p+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las san mtha' can rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos
[\[387a.7\]]chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las san gyi mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga rags pa rnams ri zhig rdzogs so// //gsum pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen yang gi 'jug yul rnams bshad
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]par bya ste/ d+hA to re kA tso ha lA deHkri yA sa ma b+hi hA re yang / byings a tsa gcig pa ha la dang po las bya ba yang dag par sdud pa la yang ngo / /ru tsa 'bar ba dang shu tsa mya ngan gnyis ma yin pa'i byings a tsa gcig pa ha la dang po can las bya ba yang dag pas sdud pa ste shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don la yang
[\[387b.2\]]pha rol tu 'gyur te/ nga yig ni san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod pa'i don no/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ sU tsi sU tri mU d+yaT r+t+ya shU r+No ti b+h+yo yang / sU tsi/ sU tri mU tri aT ti a rti a sha U r+No ti rnams las yang ngo / /sU tsa phra ma/ sU tra bar tu grol ba/ mU tra rab tu 'dzag pa/ aT 'gro ba/
[\[387b.3\]]r-i 'gro ba/ a sha zas/ U r+Shu nya 'gebs pa rnams las shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don la yang 'gyur ro/ /ni t+yaM kau Ti mye ga tau/ 'gro ba la 'khyog po kho na la'o/ /'gro ba'i don gyi byings las shin tu ba dang yang yang gi don ma yin pa'i 'khyog por 'gro ba kho na'i don la 'jug pa na yang pha rol tu
[\[387b.4\]]'gyur ro/ /lu pas nga tsa ra dza pa dza b+ha da ha da sha grI b+s+ye b+hA ba ga rtA yAM/ lu pa sa ra tsa ra dza pa dza b+ha da had sha gr-i rnams las smad pa nyid la'o/ /lu p-I gcod pa/ Sha d-I rnam par 'gro ba/ tsar 'gro ba/ dza pa yid/ dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa/ da ha thal bar byed pa/ da sha mche ba/ g-I gsal
[\[387b.5\]]bar byed pa rnams las smad pa nyid la 'jug pa la yang 'gyur te bya ba yang dag par bsdu ba tsam la ni ma yin no/ ! /swu tsa phram byed pa la'o zhes pa la yang ba san yang dag la 'os gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur bas/ su sU tsa/ yang zhes pa la/ gu no yang lu koH/ yang 'jig
[\[387b.6\]]pa dag la yon tan no/ /yang gi rkyen 'jig pa dang mi 'jig pa dag pha rol la'ang a b+h+yAs yon tan du bsgyur te/ mdo 'dis yon tan byas pas/ so sU ts+ya zhes grub pa la/ laT sogs tang rnams sbyor te/ byed pa po la shab a ta las yon tan la'os gnyis dag gi gcig sngon ma'i gzugs su
[\[387b.7\]]bsgyur bas/ laT  so sU ts+ya te/ ling  so sU ts+ye ta/ liT so sU ts+ya tAM/ lang  a so sU ts+ya te/ sogs dang / lung la/ ya s+ya ha laH/ ya'i ha la las so/ /byings mtha' ha la las pha rol gyi ya'i byings phyed pa pha rol la dbyi bar bya ste/ mdo 'dis ya phyis/ byings phyed pa'i ba la dang po la iT 'os
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]iT byin pas/ a so sU tsi Sh+Ta/ a so sU tsi ShA tAM/ a so sU tsi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ kA sa sogs kyi A ma sbyar/ ya'i ha la las 'os ya phyis pas/ so sU tsAM tsa kre/ so sU tsAM ba b+hU ba/ so sU tsAM mA sa/ sogs so/ /la yig phyi ma rnams la bal dang po'i
[\[388a.2\]]iT byin/ ya'i ha la las sos/ ya phyis pas/ luT so sU tsi tA/ smon ling  so sU tsi ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  so sU tsi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  a so sU tsi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /mU tra rab tu 'dzag pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ yang 'jig ba dag la yon tan nos yon tan byas
[\[388a.3\]]bas/ laT  mo mA t+ya te/ ling  mo mU t+ye ta/ loT  mo mU t+r+ya tAM/ ling  a mo mU t+r+ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la bal dang po'i iT byin/ ya'i ha la las sos/ ya phyis pas/ a mo mU tri Sh+Ta/ sogs dang / liT la A ma sbyar/ ya'i ha la las sos ya phyis pas/ mo mU tAMM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /
[\[388a.4\]]lhag ma rnams la iT byin ya phyis pas/ luT  mo mU tri tA/ smon ling  mo mU tri ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  mo mU tri Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  a mo mU tri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /aT 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ san yang dag la 'os/ Ta ra byangs bcas gnyis brjod/ dI r+b+ho \u0f85 ki taH/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pa'i ring po'o/
[\[388a.5\]]a b+h+yA sa ka 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin pa'i rkyen ya ka dang yang dang yang 'jig pa rnams pha rol la ring por bsgyur te/ mdo 'dis Ta ring por bsgyur/ a ta kyi dbyi 'os Ta phyi ma'i a phyis pas/ aTA T+ya zhes grub pa la laT sogs tang rnams sbyar bas/ laT a DA T+ya te/ ling  a DA T+ye ta/ loT  a
[\[388a.6\]]DA T+ya tAM/ lang  A TA N+ya te/ sogs dang / lung la iT byin/ ya'i ha la las so a ya phyis pas/ A TA Ti Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar ya phyis pas/ a nA DAM tsa kre sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la iT byin ya'i hal la 'os ya phyis pas/ luT  a TA Ti tA/
[\[388a.7\]]smon ling  a TA Ti ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  a TA Ti Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  A TA Ti Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /a sha zas la'o zhes pa la yang phyis/ shang byangs bcas gnyis brjod/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pas ring po 'os de ring por bsgyur bas/ a shA sh+ya zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyar te/ laT  a
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]shA sh+ya te/ ling  a shA sh+yi ta/ loT  a shA sh+ya tAM/ ling A shA sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung pa/ iT byin ya'i hal las sos/ ya phyis pas/ A shA shi Sh+Ta/ sogs dang / liT la A ma sbyar/ ya'i hal las so so ya phyis pas/ a shA shAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /lhag ma
[\[388b.2\]]rnams la/ luT  a shA shi tA/ smon ling  a shA shi shISh+Ta/ l+r-iT  a shA shiSh+ya te/ l+r-ing  A shA shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /r-i 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ ya di tsa/ yang la'ang ngo / /r-i 'gro ba dang brtsegs pa dang po'i r-i'ang yang pha rol la yon tan du 'gyur te/ san yang
[\[388b.3\]]dag la 'os/ r-i gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa dag la yon tan nos a b+h+yA sa yon tan dang / mdo 'dis r-i phyi ma yon tan byas pas/ ar ar yang zhes pa la rim par drangs/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pa'i ring po 'os ring por bsgyur bas/ a rAr+Ya zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar
[\[388b.4\]]bas/ laT  a rAr+Ya te/ ling  a rAr+Ye ta/ loT  a rAr+Ya tAM/ lang  A rAr+Ya te/ sogs dang / lung la iT byin/ ya'i hal las sos ya phyis pas/ A rA ri Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ liT la A ma byin ya phyis pas/ a rA rAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ luT  a rA ri hA /
[\[388b.5\]]smon ling  a rA riShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  a rA ri Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  A rA riSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /U r+Nunya 'gebs pa la yang Nu gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  U r+No nU ya te/ lang  U r+No nU ye ta/ loT  U r+No nU ya tAM/ lang  au r+No nU ya ta sogs so/ /lung
[\[388b.6\]]la iT byin aT kyi dbyi 'os ya'i a phyis pas/ au r+No nU yi Sh+Ta/ de bzhin du/ a phyis pas lhag ma rnams la/ liT U rno nU yAM tsa kre/ luT  U r+No nU yi tA/ smon ling  U r+No nU yi ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  U r+No nU yi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  au r+No nU yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /g+hu bu nya sbyin pa la yang byin/
[\[388b.7\]]g+hu mA s+thA/ gA bA sogs kyis a tsa IT du bsgyur te/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  de dI ya te/ ling  de dI ye ta/ loT  de dI ya tAM/ lang  a de dI ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la iT byin a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ a de dI yi Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]sbyar a phyis pas/ de dI yAM tsa kre/ sogs dang / lhag ma rnams la/ luT de dI yi tA/ smon ling / de dI yi ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  de dI yi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing  a de dI yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ Du r+hA nya 'dzin pa la yang / A I ta du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa
[\[389a.2\]]sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  de d+hI ya te/ lung  a di d+hI yiSh+Ta/ liT  ded+hI yAM tsa kre/ luT  de d+hI yi tA/ sogs so/ ! /mAng gus pa la'o zhes pa la yang / A Ita/ gnyis brjod/ yon tan byas pas/ laT  me mI ya te/ lung  a me mI yi Sh+Ta/ liT  me mI yAM tsa kre/ luT  me mI yi tA/
[\[389a.3\]]sogs so/ ! /Sh+TA 'gro ba las ldog pa la yang / A I ta du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ shar dang po sogs kyis sa phyis/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos tha ta/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os tha thar bsgyur ba sogs kyis
[\[389a.4\]]bsgrubs pas/ laT  te Sh+ThI ya te/ lung  a te Sh+ThI yi Sh+Ta/ liT te Sh+ThI yAM tsa kre/ luT  te Sh+ThI yi Sh+Ta/ sogs so/ ! /gai sgra la'o zhes pa la yang / sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa la e tsa'i A ta 'os/ e tsa A ta/ g+hu mA s+ThA gA sogs kyis I ta du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu
[\[389a.5\]]dang yon tan byas pas/ laT  dze gI ya te/ lung  a dze gI yi Sh+Ta/ liT  dze gI yAM tsa kre/ luT  dzi gI yi tA/ sogs so/ ! /o hA ka gtong ba la yang sbyar/ g+hu sogs kyis A AM/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ yon tan byas pas/ laT dze hi ya ti/
[\[389a.6\]]lung  a dze hI yi Sh+Ta/ liT  dze hA yAM tsa kre/ luT  dzi hI yi tA/ sogs so/ ! /Sho mtha'i las la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa sogs kyis e tsa A ta/ g+hu sogs kyis i ta/ gnyis brjod yon tan dang kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis Shar bsgyur bas/ laT  se
[\[389a.7\]]ShI ya te/ lung  a sI ShI yi Sh+Ta/ liT  se Shi AM tsa kre/ luT se ShI yi tA/ sogs so/ ! /Tu o shwi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa la yang / shwi'i 'dam ka 'os/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ laT sho shU ya te/ lung  a
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]sho shU yi Sh+Ta/ liT  sho shU yAM tsa kre/ luT  sho shU yi tA/ sogs dang / ma bsgyur ba'o phyogs la/ laT  she shI ya te/ lung  a she shI yiSh+Ta/ liT  she shwI yAM tsa kre/ she shwI yi tA/ sogs so/ ! /smr-i dran pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa
[\[389b.2\]]yon tan/ ha la dang po lhag po sogs kyis ma dang ra phyis/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pa'i ring po 'os ring por bsgyur/ yang la'ang ngos yon tan byas pas/ laT sA sma r+Ya te/ lung  a sA sma ri Sh+Ta/ liT sA sma rA tsa kre/ luT  sA sma ri tA/ sogs so/ ! /Du kr-inya byed pa la'o zhes pa la yang / r-i ta kyi rIng 'os
[\[389b.3\]]ring du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ r+ra phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT tse krI ya te/ lung  a tse krI yi Sh+Ta/ liT  tse krI yAM tsa kra/ luT tse krI yi tA/ sogs so/ /sam sngon du byung na ka'i sngon du suT byin pas/ laT sAM tse skrI ya te/
[\[389b.4\]]sogs so/ ! /Shi tsa srung ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT se si ts+ya te/ lung  a se si tsi Sh+Ta/ liT se si tsI tsa kre/ luT sa si tsi tA / sogs so/ /si tso ya di/ si tsa'i yang la'o/ /si tsa'i sa yig ni nyer bsgyur dang a b+h+yA sa/ sa
[\[389b.5\]]Shar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung yang / yang pha rol la Shar mi 'gyur te/ a b+h+yA sa'i dper brjod bstan zin la/ nyer bsgyur la ni se si ts+ya te/ sogs so/ ! /bra dza 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la yang / gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po sogs kyi sar phyis/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur
[\[389b.6\]]bas/ laT bA pra dz+ya te/ lung  a pA pra dzi Sh+Ta/ liT  bA pra dzI tsa kre/ luT bA bra dzi tA/ sogs so/ ! /grI gsal ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang / gro ya ngi / gr-I'i yang la'o/ /gr-i'i ra yig ni yang pha rol la la yig tu bsgyur bar bya ste/ byings kyi r-I ta kyi i ta 'os r-I iT/ r-i'i a Na lar pha rol los du/
[\[389b.7\]]mdo 'dis r+ra l+rar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu dang / yang 'jig ba sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  dze gi l+ya te/ lung  a dze gi li Sh+Ta/ liT  dze gi lAM tsa kre/ luT dze gi li tA/ sogs so/ ! /lu p-I gcod pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]yon tan byas pas/ laT  lo lu pya te/ lung  a lo lu puSh+Ta/ liT  lo lu pAM tsa kre/ luT  lo lu pi tA/ sogs so/ ! /ku 'bar ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ na ka ba te r+Ya ngi / na ka ba te'i yang la ma yin no/ ka ba ti'i a b+h+yA sa'i ka yig ni yang pha rol la tsa yig tu bsgyur ba
[\[390a.2\]]ma yin te/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs yon tan/ mdo 'dis ka tsa ra mi bsgyur/ laT  ko kU ya te/ lung  a ko kU yiSh+Ta/ liT  ko kU yAM tsa kre/ luT  ko kU yi tA/ sogs so/ 'grel bar skabs 'gar bsgyur ba'ang yod do zhes bshad pas/ laT  tso kU ya te/ sogs so/! /pany+tsu
[\[390a.3\]]'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ nI gwany+tsu sraM su d+h+waM su ka sa pa ta pa da skan+dAM/ many+tsu  sraM su [ \[]d+ny+waM [\]]su ka sa/ pa ta pa da skan+da rnams kyi nI ka'o/ pany+tsu 'gro ba/ sraM su dang / d+h+waM su 'og tu lhung ba/ ka sa 'gro ba/ la d+l-i lhung ba/ pa da 'gro ba/ skan+da 'gro ba rnams kyi yang gi rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la
[\[390a.4\]]ab+h+yA sa la nI ka A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don no/ gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis nI ka A ga ma/ glo bur ba kita yin pas a b+h+ya sa ring por bsgyur/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis ngita pha rol lan phyis pas/ laT  ba nI pats+ya te/ lung  a ba nI ba tsi Sh+Ta/ liT  ba nI ba tsI tsa kre/ luT  ba nI ba tsi tA/ sogs so/
[\[390a.5\]]! sraM su 'og tu lhung ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis nI ka A ga ma byin/ ka 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan las a b+hA sa ring por mi 'gyur du phyis/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ laT  sa nI sra s+ya te/ lung  a sa nI sra siSh+Ta/ liT  sa nI sra sAM tsa kre/ luT  sa ni sra sa si tA/
[\[390a.6\]]sogs so/ ! /ya mu nye bar 'gog pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ nu ga to\u0f85 nu nA si kAn+ta s+ya/ rjes su sna ldan mtha' can gyi a ti gya nu ga'o/ byings rjes su sna ldan gyi mtha' can u pa d+hA ata yin pa'i a b+h+yAs la yang rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la nuka A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas
[\[390a.7\]]don dang a brjod pa'i don no/ gnyis brjod hal dang so lhag po sogs kyis mra phyis/ mdo 'dis nu A ga ma byin/ pr-i Sho da ra sogs kyis nang ngor byas/ kita kyi rgyu mtshan las ring por mi 'gyur bas/ laT  yaM ya mya te/ lung  a yaM ya miSh+Ta/ liT  yaM ya mAM tsa kre/ luT  yaM ya mi tA/ sogs
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]so/ !/ Tu ba mu skyug pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ ma phyis mdo 'dis nu ka A ga ma byin/ na'i 'ang tshig mtha' min pa'i dz+nyal la nang ro/ kita la ring por mi bsgyur/ laT  baM ba mya te/ lung  a baM ba miSh+Ta/ liT  baM ba mAM tsa kre/ luT  baM ba mi tA/ sogs so/ ! /ta nu rgyas ba la'o zhes pa
[\[390b.2\]]la/ yang gnyis brjod/ nu phyis/ mdo 'dis nuka A ga ma ring po mi byed/ laT  tan+ta n+ya te/ lung  atan+ta ni Sh+Ta/ liT  tan+ta nI tsa kre/ luT  tan+ta ni tA/ sogs so/ /rjes su sna ldan gyi mtha' yin kyang u pa d+hA ata yin na nuka mi 'gyur te/ b+hA ma khro ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ a b+h+ya
[\[390b.3\]]sa bi tsara'ang ngos/ b+ha ga thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ kita min pa sogs kyis slar yang ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  bA b+hA mya te/ lung / a bA b+hA miSh+Ta/ liT  bA b+hA mAM tsa kre/ luT  bA b+hU mi tA/ sogs so/ dzan skye ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang / yal 'dam ka 'os mtha' ata du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam
[\[390b.4\]]ka can du byed/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ rjes su ldan mtha' can gyis ta kyi nu ka A ga ma byin pas/ laT  dzaM dzan+ya te/ lung  a dzaM dza nAM niSh+Ta/ liT  dzaM dza nAM tsa kre/ luT  dzaM dza ni tA/ sogs dang / ata du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ kita ma yin pa sogs kyis slar ring
[\[390b.5\]]por bsgyur bas/ laT  dzA dzA ya te/ lung  a dzA dzA yiSh+Ta/ liT  dzA dzA yAM tsa kre/ luT  dzA dzA yi tA/ sogs so/ ! /Sha na sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang / a la 'dam ka 'os/ Ata du bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka byas/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la rjes su sna ldan sogs kyis nu ka'i byin pas/ laT  saM sa
[\[390b.6\]]n+ya te/ lung  a saM sa nISh+Ta/ liT  saM sa nI tsA kre/ luT  saM sa ni tA/ sogs dang / Ata du bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ laT  sA sA ya te/ lung  a sA sA yiSh+Ta/ liT  sA sA yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ kha na rko ba la/ laT  tsi kha n+ya te/ lung  a tsi kha niSh+Ta/ liT  tsi kha nAM tsa kre/ luT  tsi kha ni tA/
[\[390b.7\]]sogs sam/ laT  tsA khA ya te/ lung  a tsA khA yiSh+Ta/ liT  tsa khA yAM tsakre/ luT  tsA khA yi tA/ sogs so/ ! han 'tshe ba la/ yang / gnyis brjod/ nu phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ rjes su sda ldan mtha'i sogs kyis nuka A ga ma/ a b+h+yA las kyang ngos ha g+har bsgyur
[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]ba sogs kyis/ laT  dzaM g+ha n+ya te/ lung  adzi g+ha ni Sh+TA/ liT  dzik+ha nI tsa kre/ luT  dzig+ha ni tA/ sogs so/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ ha n+teHhid+la yAM ya ngi g+hI b+hA bo bak+ta byaH/ ha n+ti'i 'tshe ba la yang la g+hI nyid du brjod do/ han+ti'i yang pha rol la 'tshe ba'i don la g+hI zhes par bsgyur bar bya
[\[391a.2\]]ste/ ha na/ g+hI ru bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ na phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  dza g+hi ya te/ lung  a dze g+h+wA gi yiShA/ liT  dzeg+h+wI yAM tsa kre/ luT  dze g+h+wI yi tA/ sogs so/ ! /dza ba yid la'o zhes pa la yang
[\[391a.3\]]sbyar/ dza pa dzi b+ha da ha da sha b+hany+dza pa shAM tsa/ dza pa  dzab+ha  da ha da sha  b+hany+dza pa sha rnams kyi 'ang ngo / dza pa yid/ dzab+ha lus rnam par nyams pa/ da ha thal bar byed pa/ da sha mche ba/ b+hany+dzu kun du nyed pa/ pa sha 'chad pa rnams kyi a b+h+yA sa la'ang yang rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la nuka A ga
[\[391a.4\]]ma 'gyur te/ gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis nuka A ga ma byin pas/ laT  dzaM dza pya te/ lung  a dzaM dza piSh+Ta/ liT  dzaM dza pAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa la/ yang gnyis brjod/ nuka byin pas/ laT  dzaM dza b+h+ya te/ lung  a dzaM dza b+hiSh+Ta/ liT  dzaM dza b+hAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[391a.5\]]da ha thal bar byed pa la/ yang sbyar nuka byin pas/ laT  di da h+ya to/ lung  a daM da hiSh+Ta/ liT  daM da hAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /da sha mche ba la/ yang gnyis brjod/ nu ka byin pas/ laT  daM da sh+ya te/ lung  a di da Shi Sh+Ta/ liT daM da shAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /b+t+wany+dzu nyed pa la yang / iT 'gro ba ma yin pa
[\[391a.6\]]sogs kyis na phyis/ gnyis brjod/ nuka A ga ma byin bas/ laT  baM b+ha dz+ya ti/ lung  a baM b+ha dzi Sh+Ta/ liT  baM b+ha dzAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /pa sha 'ching ba la/ yang gnyis brjod/ nuka A ga ma byin pas/ laT  paM pa shu te/ lung  a paM pa shiSh+Ta/ liT  paM pa shA tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /tso la g.yo ba la'o/
[\[391a.7\]]zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ sa tsa yAn+ta s+yA b+h+yA sa s+ya nu gwA/ la tsa ya'i mtha'i a b+h+yA sa'i nuka yang na'o/ byings tsha yig dang la yig dang ya yig rnams kyi mtha' can gyi a b+h+yA sa la yang rkyen gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la nuka A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ nuka byin pa'i
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]phyogs la/ laT  tsi tsa l+ya te/ lung  a tsaM tsa liSh+Ta/ liT  tsaM tsa lAM tsa kre/ sogs dang / nuka ma byin pa'i phyogs la kita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bskyur bas/ laT  tsA tsa l+ya te/ lung  a tsA tsa liSh+Ta/ liT/ tsA tsa lAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ many+tsa khri la'o zhes pa la/ yang / ita 'gro ba ma
[\[391b.2\]]yin pa sogs kyis na phyis/ lung 'dren 'dis a b+h+yA sa la nuka yang na bar byas pas/ laT  maM ma ts+ya te/ lung  a maM ma tsiSh+Ta/ liT  maM ma tsI tsa kre/ sogs sam/ laT  mA ma ts+ya te/ lung  a mA ma tsiSh+Ta/ liT  mA ma tsI tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /da ya sbyin pa la nuka yang na bar byas pas/ laT  daM da y+Ya te/ lung  a
[\[391b.3\]]daM da yiSh+Ta/ liT  daM da yAM tsa kre/ sogs sam/ laT  dA da y+Ya te/ lung a dA da yiSh+Ta/ liT  dA da yAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! tsa ra 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ tsa ra pha lo tsa/ tsa ra pha la dag gi 'ang ngo / /tsa ra dang pa la dag gi a b+h+yA sa ata la yang 'jig pa dang gnas pa dag pha rol la nuka A ga ma
[\[391b.4\]]'gyur te/ ut+pa ra s+yAtaH/ ata las pha rol gyi uta'o/ tsa ra dang phal dag gi a b+h+yA sa ata las pha rol gyi a ni yang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag pha rol la uta du bsgyur te/ gnyis brjod/ mdo 'dis a uta/ mdo snga mas nuka A ma byin/ ha la las sos ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  tsaM
[\[391b.5\]]tsUr+Ya te/ lung  a tsaM tsU riSh+Ta/ liT  tsaM tsU rAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /phal rdzogs pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar cho ga tsa ra dar 'dra bar bsgrubs bas/ laT  paM phu l+ya te/ lung  a paM phu liSh+Ta/ liT  paM phulAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /nr-i ti lus bskyod pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ rI gr-i du pa d+ha s+ya tsa/
[\[391b.6\]]r-ita u pa ng+hA'i'ang rIka'o/ /byings r-ita u pa d+hA na yod pa'i a b+h+ya sa la'ang yang rkyen 'jig pa dang gnas pa dag pha rol la rIka A ga ma 'gyur te ka gnas don no/ k+Shu b+h+wA di Shu tsa/ k+Shu b+hA la sogs pa rnams la'ang ngo / k+Shu b+ha khro ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rtsa tshig gis ma zin na'ang gzugs
[\[391b.7\]]legs shing brjod bde ba rnams su bya'o san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata 'os r-i ata mdo snga ma'i rIka A ga ma byin/ mdo 'dis na Nar mi bsgyur bar/ laT  na rI nr-i t+ya te/ lung  an rI nr-i tiSh+Ta/ liT  na rI nr-i tAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /gra ha nye bar len pa la/ yang sbyar/ gra hi
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod r-i'i ata/ r-ita u pad+hA'i 'ang rIka 'os/ rIka A ga ma byin pas/ laT  dza rI gr-i h+yaM te/ lung  a dza rI kr-i hiSh+Ta/ liT  dza rI gr-i haM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /kr-i pU nus pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ kr-i pa'i ra la phos r-i l-ir bskyur
[\[392a.2\]]gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata 'grel par l-i u pa d+hA can la lI ka A ga ma 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ lIka byin pas/ laT  tsa lI kl-i pya te/ lung  a tsa lI kl-i piSh+Ta/ liT  tsalI kl-i pAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /braSh+tsu gcod pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang / gra hi dz+wA+e sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod
[\[392a.3\]]r-i'i ata/ 'grel par hal brtsegs pa'i sngon ma'i r-ita la'ang rIka A ga ma 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ rIka byin/ laT  ba rI pr-i b+h+ya te/ lung  a ba bI br-i sh+tsISh+Ta/ liT  pa rI br-i sh+tsAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ prats+tsa shes par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sAr
[\[392a.4\]]Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ r-i li ata/ r-Ika A ga ma byin pas/ laT  pa rI pr-i ts+n+ya he/ lung  a pa rI p-i ts+tshiSh+Ta/ liT  pa rI pr-i ts+tshaM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /nyi Sh+wa pa nyal ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ swa pi s+ya mi bye nyAM ya ngi / swa pa  s+ya ma  byenya rnams kyi yang la'o/ Sha pa nyal ba/ s+ya mi rnam par rtog
[\[392a.5\]]pa/ byenya kun nas sgrib pa rnams kyi yang pha rol la saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur te/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  so su bya te/ lung  a so su piSh+Ta/ liT  so su pAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ s+ya mal/ yang sbyar/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod yon
[\[392a.6\]]tan byas pas/ laT  se si mya te/ lung  a se si miSh+Ta/ liT  se si mAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /byenya kun nas sgrib pa la/ yang sbyar/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/ krita min pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  ba pI ya ti/ lung  a be ba yiSh+Ta/ laT  be bI yAM
[\[392a.7\]]tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /ba sha mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ na pa shaH/ pa sha'i ma yin no/ yang pha rol lab sha'i saM prasAr Nar bsgyur ba ma yin te/ gnyis brjod ki ta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  bA ba sh+ya te/ lung  a bA ba shiSh+Ta/ liT  bA ba shI tsa kre/ sogs so/ /
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]! tsi nya gsog pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ tsU yaHkI/ tsi'i kI'o/ ci nya'i yang pha rol la kI zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ tsi kIr bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT  tse kI ya te/ lung a tse kI yiSh+Ta/ liT  tse kI
[\[392b.2\]]yAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /g+hA dri nye bar len pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ Id+h+yA d+hA+o:/ g+hA d+h+s+wa dag gi Ita'o/ yang pha rol pa/ g+h+yA dar/ d+h+m+ra dag gi mtha' Ita du bsgyur bar bya ste/ mtha' Ita du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ra phyis/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas
[\[392b.3\]]pas/ laT  dze g+hI a te/ lung  a dze g+h+yI yiSh+Ta/ liT  dze g+h+yI yAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ d+h+yA sgra dang me kun nas sbyor ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ mdo 'dis mtha' Ita du bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ ma phyis/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ d+ha da/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis
[\[392b.4\]]yon tan byas pas/ laT  de D+h+yI ya te/ lung a de d+h+me yiSh+Ta/ liT  de d+h+yI yAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /shIng nyal ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ a yang kI ti/ kA nga 'gro ba la a yang ngo / rkyen pa yig dang bo ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la shing gi mtha' a yang du bsgyur te/ da dbyangs 'gog pa'i
[\[392b.5\]]don dang ya'i a brjod don no/ I a yang du bsgyur/ kita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  shA shay+Ya te/ lung  a shA sha yiSh+Ta/ liT  shA sha yAM tsa kre/ sogs so/ ! /D+hA+au kr-i 'gro ba pa'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os/ au Ur bsgyur/ yang 'jig pa sogs
[\[392b.6\]]kyis de slar yon tan/ a g+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang 'os/ D+ha Dar bsgyur bas/ laT  Do D+ho kya te/ ling  Do D+ho kye ta/ loT  Do D+hau kya tAM/ lang  aDo D+hau kya ta/ lung  a Do D+hau kiSh+Ta/ liT  Do D+hau kAMtsa kre/ luT  Do D+hau ki tA/ smod ling  Do D+hau ki ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT  Do D+hau ki Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing / a Do D+hau ki Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU
[\[392b.7\]]trAta ya dan+tAHsamA p+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las yang gi mtha' rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni bya ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las yang
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]rkyen gyi mtha' can rnams kyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni yang rkyen 'jig pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ ya ngonya tsi tsa/ yang gi a tsa la yang ngo / yang gi rkyen ni rkyen a tsa dad pa can pha rol dang gzhan
[\[393a.2\]]yang mang po la 'jig go zhes pa ni spyir btang ba'o/ rkyen phyis kyang rkyen gyi bya ba gnyis brjod pa sogs ni mi gnas pa ma yin no/ yang gi rkyen gnas pa thams cad la laT sogs ata ma ne pa da rnams sbyor zhing / yang rkyen 'jig pa thams cad la laT sogs par smai par rnams sbyor te/
[\[393a.3\]]yang 'jig pa las shapa kyang rtag tu 'jig go/ /ya ngo bA/ yang las yang na'o/ yang 'jig pa las pha rol gyi byings thams cad pa ha la dang po pa 'gro ba'i ming can la Ita A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ b+hu yod pa la/ yang / san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang
[\[393a.4\]]'jig//thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ yang 'jig pa dag gi yon tan nos a b+h+yas yon tan/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ b+ha ba/ la ti pa/ mdo 'dis IT yang na bar byas yon tan byas pas/ bo b+ha bI ti 'am/ yang na bo b+ho ti/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig sogs thams cad la/ b+hU/ bo b+hUr bsgyur
[\[393a.5\]]pa'i bang chog 'dra/ la tas su bsgyur bas/ bo tU taH/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os/ dz+ha ata du bsgyur/ a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyi u bar bsgyur bas/ bo b+hU ba ti/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bo b+ha bI Shi/ bo b+ho Shi/ bo b+hU thaH/ bo b+hU tha/ skyes bu phyi
[\[393a.6\]]ma gsum la/ bo b+ha bI mi/ bo b+ho mi/ bo b+hU baH/ bo b+hU maH/ ling gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bo b+hU yAta/ bo b+hU yA tAM/ bo b+hU yuH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bo b+hU yAH/ bo b+hU yA tAM/ bo b+hU yA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bo b+hU yAM/ bo b+hU yA ba/ bo b+hU yA ma/ loTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/
[\[393a.7\]]bo b+ha bI tu/ bo b+ho tu/ bo b+hU tA ta/ bo b+hU tAM/ bo b+hU ba tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bo b+hU ti/ bo b+hU tA ta/ bo b+hU tAM/ bo b+hU ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bo b+ha bI ni/ bo b+ha bA ba/ ba b+ha bA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bo b+ha bIta/ a bo b+ho ta/ a bo b+hU tAM/ a bo b+hU buH/ si tsa a b+h+ya stsa sogs kyis dz+hi dzus/
[\[393b\]]
[\[393b.1\]]skyes byung bus ma gsum la/ a bo b+ha bIH/ a bo b+hoH/ a bo b+hU taM/ a bo b+hA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bo g+ha bi/ a bo b+hU ba/ a bo b+hU ma/ lung la/ gA ti s+thA b+hU sA b+hu sogs kyi si tsa phyis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a po b+hU ta/ a bo b+hU tAM/ a bo b+ha bu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a
[\[393b.2\]]bo b+hUH/ a bo b+hU taM/ a bo b+hU ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a be b+hU baM/ a bo b+hU ba/ a bo b+hU ma/ liT la kas sogs kyis A ma sbyar bas/ bo b+ha bAM tsa kA ra/ bo b+hi pAM ba b+hU ba/ bo b+ha bA mA sa/ sogs dar/ 'grel par skabs 'ga' zhig tu yang 'jig  si tsa a th+ya sta sogs kyis dz+hiM dzul / dzus la'ang ngos yon tan/
[\[393b.3\]]pa la A ma mi sbyor ba yang srid do zhes byung bas/ A ma ma sbyar ba'i  b+hU'i lung liT dag la b+hu'i buka 'os buka A ga ma/ phyogs la/ a tsa dang po rnams la/ b+hU'i lung liT dag buka 'os buka A ga ma byin pas/ skyes bu dang gsum la/ bo b+hU ba/ bo b+hU btuH/ bo b+hU buH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bo b+hU bi tha/
[\[393b.4\]]bo b+hU ba thuH/ bo b+hU ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bo b+hU pa/ bo b+hU bi ba/ bo b+hU bi ma/ yang na buka ma byin par tsa pa gnyis la 'phel ba dang / thal la yon tan gzhan rnams la/ a tsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyi u bar bsgyur bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bo b+hA ba/ bo b+hU ba tuH/ bo b+hU buH/ skyes bu dbus
[\[393b.5\]]ma gsum la/ bo b+ha bi tha/ bo b+hU ba thuH/ bo b+hu ba/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bo b+hA ba/ bo b+ha ba/ bo b+hu bi ba/ bo b+hu bi ma/ luT la iT byin yon tan byas pas/ bo b+ha bi tI/ bo b+ha bi tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ bo b+hU yA ta/ bo b+hU yA stAM/ bo b+hU yA suH/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin yon tan byas
[\[393b.6\]]pas/ bo b+ha biSh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a bo b+ha biSh+yata/ sogs so/ ! /pany+tsu 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ pany+tsu  sraM su  d+hAM su/ b+h+raM su sogs kyis nIka A ga ma byin/ yang gi atsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/ ba nI nga ny+tsa zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar
[\[393b.7\]]bas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ yang las yang na 'os iT yang na par byas/ IT med pa'i phyogs la/ tsu'i bu byas pas/ ba nI baM tsI ti/ pa nI bi k+ti/ gnyis tshig la ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis/ tsu'i ku 'os tsa kar bsgyur bas/ pa nI baM k+taH/ mang tshig la/ a
[\[394a\]]
[\[394a.1\]]b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+nya ata du bsgyur bas/ ba nI baM tsa ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba nI baM tsI Shi/ ba nI baM k+Shi/ ba nI bak+thaH/ ba nI bak+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba nI baM tsI mi/ ba nI baMts+mi/ ba nI baM tswaH/ ba nI baM tsa maH/ liT la
[\[394a.2\]]ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ baha nI ba ts+yata/ ba nI ba ts+yA tAM/ ba nI bi ts+yuH/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ba nI baM tsI tu/ ba nI bok+tu/ ba nI baMk+tA ta/ ba nI bak+tAM/ ba nI ba tsa tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ba nI bag+d+hi/ ba nI
[\[394a.3\]]bak+tA ta/ ba nI bak+taM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ba nI baM tsA ni/ ba nI baM tsA ba/ ba nI baM tsA ma/ de bzhin du/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a ba nI baM ts+tsi ta/ a ba nI banra/ i dkyi 'ang ngos i phyis ha la dI ba sogs kyis ta phyis/ brtsegs pa'i mtha' dbyi 'os tsa phyis/ a ba nI bak+tAM/ a ba nI ba tsuH/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[394a.4\]]gsum la/ a ba nI bi tsI:/ a pa nI ba na/ a ba nI bak+taM/ a ba nI bak+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ang nI baM tsi/ a ba nI btsA/ a ba nI bats+ma/ lung la iT sbyar bas/ a ba nI baM tsI ta/ a ba nI baM tsiSh+TaM/ a ba nI baM tsi ShuH/ sogs so/ liT la kAs sogs kyi A ma  si tsa a b+h+ya sta logs kyis dz+hi dzus/
[\[394a.5\]]sbyar bas/ ba nI baM tsi k+Shar/ sogs so/ luT la iT byin pas/ ba nI bi tsi tA/ ba nI baM tsi tA si/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ ba nI ba ts+yata/ ba nI ba ts+ya stAM/ ba nI ba ts+yI suH/ l-iT la iT byin pas/ ba ni baM tsi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a
[\[394a.6\]]ba nI baM tsi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ga m+l-i 'gro ba la/ yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyi nuka A ga ma byin/ kuha dag gi tsu/ na nga ror byas/ yang phyis pas/ dzi ga ma zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ yang las yang na 'os IT yang na bar
[\[394a.7\]]byas pas/ dzi ga mI ti/ dzi gaM ti/ gnyis tshig la/ rjes su sna ldan nye ba'i yul sogs kyis ma phyis pas [ \[] [\] ]mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os/ dz+ha ata/ ga ma ha na sogs kyis yang na u ba d+hA phyis bas/ dzi ga ma ti/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzi ga mI Shi/
[\[394b\]]
[\[394b.1\]]dzi gaM si/ dzaM ga thaH/ dzi ga tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi ga mi mi/ dza ga n+mi/ dzi ga n+wa/ dzi ga n+ma/ ling la/ dzi ga mya ta/ dzi ga myA tAM/ dzi ga myuH/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzaM ga mI tu/ dzaM gaM tu/ dzaM ga tA ta/ dzi ga tAM/ dzaM ga ma tu/ dzi g+ma tu/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[394b.2\]]gsum la/ dzaM ga hi/ dzaM ga tA ta/ dzaM ga taM/ dzaM ga ta/ skyes bu phyi ma/ ba ma dag la'ang ngos mra na/ gsum la/ dzaM ga mA ni/ dzaM ga mA pa/ dzaM ga mA ma/ de bzhin du/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dzaM ga mA ta/ a dzaM ga ma/ a dzaM ga tAM/ a dzaM ga muH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dza ga mIH/ a dzaM ga ma/
[\[394b.3\]]a dzaM ga taM/ a dzaM ga ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dzaM ga maM/ a dzaM ga n+wa/ a dzaM gan+ma sogs so/ /lung la iT byin pas/ a dzaM ga mI ta/ a dzaM ga maSh+DaM/ a dzaM mi ShuH/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ dzaM ga mAM tsa kA ra sogs so/ /luT la iT byin bas/ dzaM ga mi tA/ dzaM ga
[\[394b.4\]]mi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dzaM ga myA ta/ dzaM ga myA stAM/ dzaM ga myA suH sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin pas/ dzaM ga mi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a dzaM ga mi Sh+yata/ sogs so/ ! /ha na 'tshe ba la'o zhes pa la yang / gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar
[\[394b.5\]]'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyis nuka A ga ma/ de ra ror byas/ a b+h+ya sta las a ta 'os/ ha g+har bsgyur bas/ dzaM g+ha na/ zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ yang las yang na 'os/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ dzaM g+ha nI ti/ dzaM gan+ti/ gnyis
[\[394b.6\]]tshig la/ rjes su sna ldan nye ba'i yul sogs kyis na phyis pas/ dzaMg+ha taH/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata'os/ dza a ta/ ga ma ha na sogs kyis u pa d+hA yang na phyis pas/ dzaM g+ha na ti/ dzaM g+ha ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzaM ga nI Sha/ dzaM b+ha n+si/
[\[394b.7\]]dzaM g+ha thaH/ dzaM g+ha tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzaM g+ha nI mi/ dzaM g+ha nI mi/ dzaM g+ha n+waH/ dzaM g+ha n+maH/ ling la/ dzaM g+ha n+yata/ dzaM g+ha n+yA tAM/ dzi g+ha n+yA suH/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzaM g+ha nI tu/ dzaM g+ha n+tu/ dzaM g+ha tA ta/ dzaM g+ha tAM/ dzaM g+ha na tu/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[395a\]]
[\[395a.1\]]gsum la/ dzi g+ha hi/ dzi ga tA tA/ dzi g+ha ti/ dzi g+ha ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzi g+ha nA ni/ dzaMg+ha nA ba/ dzaM g+ha nA ma/ de bzhin du/ lar gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dzi g+ha nI ta/ a dzi g+ha na/ a dzi g+ha tAM/ a dzi g+ha nuH/ a dzi b+hUH/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dzi g+ha niH/ a dzi g+ha na/ a
[\[395a.2\]]dzi g+ha taM/ a dzi g+ha ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dzi g+ha naM/ a dzi g+ha n+wa/ a dzi g+ha n+ma/ lung la iT byin pas/ a dzi g+ha nIta/ a dzi g+ha ni Sh+N+waM/ a dzi g+ha ni Shu:/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar bas/ dzi g+ha nAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ dzi g+ha ni tA/ dzi g+ha ni tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i
[\[395a.3\]]ling la/ dzi g+ha n+ya ta/ dzi g+ha n+ya staM/ dzi g+ha n+yA su:/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la iT byin bas/ dzi g+ha ni Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a dzi g+ha ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /tsa ra 'gro ra la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ tsa ra pha la dag gi 'ang ngos/ nuka A ga ma byin/ ata las pha rol gyi uta
[\[395a.4\]]'os uta du bsgyur/ yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/ tsi tsur zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ yang las yang na 'os/ IT yang na bar byas/ yon tan mi byed bas/ tsaM tsu rI ti/ tsaM tsU rti/ gnyis tshig la ha la las kyang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ tsaM tsU rta:/
[\[395a.5\]]mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os/ dz+nya ata du bsgyur bas/ tsi tsu ra ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs bas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsi tsu rI Shi/ tsaM tsU rI/ tsi tsU r+tha:/ tsi tsU r+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsi tsu rI mi/ ha la las kyang ngos ring por bsgyur/ tsi tsU rmi/ tsi tsU rba:/ tsi tsU rma:/ ling la ha la
[\[395a.6\]]las kyang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ tsi tsU r+YA ta/ tsi tsU r+Yuta/ tsaM tsUr+YuH/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsi tsu rI tu/ tsi tsU rtu/ tsi tsU rtA ta/ tsi tsU rtaM/ tsi tsu rta tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsi tsU r+t+hi/ tsi tsU rtA ta/ tsi tsU rtaM/ tsi tsU rta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum
[\[395a.7\]]la/ tsi tsu rA Ni/ tsi tsu rA ba/ tsi tsu rA ma/ de bzhin du lang ga skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tsi tsu rIta/ a tsi tsu:/ a tsi tsU rtA/ a tsi tsu r+ya:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsi tsU rI:/ a tsi tsu:/ a tsi tsU rtaM/ a tsi tsU rta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsi tsu raM/ a tsi tsU rba/ a tsi tsU rma/ lung la iT byin pas/
[\[395b\]]
[\[395b.1\]]a tsi tsu rI ta/ a tsi tsu ri Sh+TaM/ a tsi tsu ri Shu:/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar/ tsi tsu rI tsa kA ra sogs so/ /luT la iT byin pas/ tsi tsu ri tA/ tsi tsu ri tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ ha la las kyang ngos ring por bsgyur bas/ tsi tsU r+Ya ta/ tsi tsU r+YA stAM/ tsi tsU r+YA su:/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la
[\[395b.2\]]iT byin pas/ tsi tsu ri Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a tsi tsu ri sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /kha na rko ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gi tsu 'os/ kha tsha/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsa ra 'ang ngos/ tsha tsa/ rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyis nuka I ga ma byin/ yang gi a tsa la
[\[395b.3\]]'ang ngos ya phyis pas/ tsi kha na/ zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ yang las yang na 'os/ IT yang na bar byas pas/ tsi kha nI ti/ tsi kha n+ti/ gnyis tshig la/ dza na kha na/ sa na sogs kyis Ti Ata du bsgyur bas/ tsi khA ta:/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las aT 'os
[\[395b.4\]]dz+ha ata du bsgyur/ ga ma ha na kha na sogs kyis u ba d+hA yang na phyis pas/ tsi kha na ti/ tsi kh+na ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsi kha nI Shi/ tsi kha n+si/ tsi khA tha:/ tsi khA tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsi kha nI mi/ tsi kha n+mi/ tsi kha n+wa:/ tsi kha n+ma/ ling la/ tsi
[\[395b.5\]]kha n+yAta/ tsi kha n+yA tAM/ tsi kha n+yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ tsi kha nI tu/ tsi kha n+tu/ tsi khA tA ta/ tsi khA tAM/ tsi kha na tu/ tsi kh+na tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsi khA hi/ tsi khA tA ta/ tsi khA taM/ tsi khA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsi kha nA ni/ tsi kha nA ba/ tsi kha nA ma/ de bzhin
[\[395b.6\]]du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tsi kha nI ta/ a tsi kha na/ a tsi khA tAM/ a tsi kha nu:/ a tsi kh+nu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsi kha nI:/ a tsi kha na/ a tsi kha taM/ a tsi kA ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsi kha naM/ a tsi kha n+wa/ a tsi kha n+ma/ la yig lhag ma rnams la rim pa bzhin
[\[395b.7\]]lung  a tsi nI ta/ liT  tsi kha nAM tsi ka ra/ luT  tsi kha ni tA/ smon ling  tsi kha n+yA ta/ l+r-iT  tsi kha ni Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a tsi kha na Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /di bu rtse ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang byin/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/ yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos/ yang phyis/ de di ba ces grub pa la laT
[\[396a\]]
[\[396a.1\]]sogs sbyar/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ yang las yang na 'os/ IT yang na bar byas pas/ ITa'i phyogs la/ de di bI ti/ IT med pa'i phyogs la/ tshwo:/ shU Tha nu nA si ke tsa/ tsha ba dag gi rjes su sna ldan la'ang shra U Sh+ra dag go/ /byings mtha'i tsha yig dang ba
[\[396a.2\]]yig ni kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen kwa dang / rjes su sna ldan dang / dz+ha la dang po ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la rim pa bzhin tshu shra dang bra U Tha zhes par bsgyur bar bya'o/ 'grel par lu ba drangs pa/ yang lu ki shU thau bA dz+ha li ba ka re/ yang 'jig pa la shra U Tha dag dz+ha la dang ba yig la yang na'o/ byings
[\[396a.3\]]mtha'i tsha yig dang ba yig dag yang 'jig pa na/ k+ngita ma yin kyang dz+ha la dang po can dang ba yig pha rol la rim pa bzhin shra U Tha dag tu yang na 'gyur te/ U Thar bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ ika gi atsa la ya Na dang / de nas yon tan/ U Tha ra ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ ba ya dag gis pa la la dbyi
[\[396a.4\]]'os ba phyis yon tan byas pas/ de d+yo ti/ de de ti/ gnyis tshig la/ U Tha ra bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba yang na bar byas/ ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ ba ya dag gi ba la la dbyi 'os ba phyis pas/ de d+hU ta:/ de di ta:/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+nya ata du bsgyur bas/ de di ba ti/ de rnams dang
[\[396a.5\]]'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ de di bI Shi/ de di Shi/ de de Shi/ de d+yA tha/ de di tha:/ de di tha:/ de d+yU tha/ de di tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ de di bI mi/ de d+yo mi/ de de mi/ de d+yA ba:/ de d+yU ma:/ de di ma:/ ling la/ de di byA tAM/ de di byu:sogs so/ loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas
[\[396a.6\]]skyes bu dang po gsum la/ de di thI tu/ de d+yo tu/ de de tu/ de d+yU tAM/ de di tAM/ de di ba tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ de d+yU ti/ de d+yU tA ta/ de d+yU taM/ de di taM/ de d+yU ta/ de di ta:/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ de di bI naM/ de di bA ba/ de di bA ma/ de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a de di bIta/ a de d+yod/ a de de ta/
[\[396a.7\]]a de d+yU tAM/ a de di tAM/ a de di pu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a de di bI:/ a de d+yo:/ a de de:/ a de d+yU to/ a de de taM/ a de d+yU ta/ a de di ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a de di baM/ a de d+yU ba/ a de di ba/ a de d+yU ma/ lung la iT byin pas/ a de di bIta/ sogs dang / de bzhin du/ la yig/
[\[396b\]]
[\[396b.1\]]lhag ma rnams la/ liT  de di bAM tsa kA ra/ luT  de di bi tA/ smon ling  de dI byA ta/ l+r-iT  de di bi Sh+ya taM/ l+r-ing  a de di pi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! bi tsha 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/ yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/ be bi tsha zhes pa la laT sogs
[\[396b.2\]]sbyar/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ yang las yang na 'os Ita yang na bar byas/ IT med pa'i phyogs la/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+ja sogs kyis tsha'am sha Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Ta/ yon tan byas pas/ be bi tshI ti/ be biSh+Ti/ gnyis tshig la/ pra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+tha sogs kyis tsha 'am sha Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha
[\[396b.3\]]Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur bas/ be biSh+Ta:/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+yA sta las ata 'os dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/ be bi tsha ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be bitshI Shi/ be bi k+Shi/ be biSh+Tha:/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be bitshI mi/ be bi sh+ma:/ be bi shwa:/ be+e bi tshwa:/ be bi
[\[396b.4\]]sh+ma:/ ling la/ bi bi tsh+yA ta/ be bi tsh+yA tAM/ be bi tsh+yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bi bi tshI tu/ be biSh+DaM/ be biSh+DaM/ be bi tsha tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be bi b+hi/ be biSh+DA ta/ be biSh+TaM/ be biSh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be bi tshA ni/ be bi tshA pa/ be
[\[396b.5\]]bi tshA ma/ de bzhin du/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a be bi tshi ta/ a be beT/ a be biSh+TAM/ a be bi tshu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a be bi tshI:/ a be biT/ a be biSh+TaM/ a be biSh+Ta:/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a be bi tshi/ a be bi shwa/ a be bi tshwa/ a be bi sh+ma/ la yig lhag ma rnams
[\[396b.6\]]la/ lung  a be bi tshIta/ liT be bi tshI tsa kA ra/ luT  be bi tshi tA/ smon ling  be bi tsh+yA ta/ l+r-iT/ be bi tshi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a be bi tshi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! yu bsre ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan byas/ yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/ yo yu zhes pa
[\[396b.7\]]la laT sogs sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ yang las yang na 'os IT yang na bar byas/ yon tan byas pas/ yo ya bI ti/ yo yo ti/ gnyis tshig la/ yo yu ta:/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+ha a ta du bsgyur/ a tsa la sh+mu byings sogs kyis u bar bskyar bas/ yo
[\[397a\]]
[\[397a.1\]]yu ba ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrub pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yo ya bI Shi/ yo yo Shi/ yo yu thaH/ yo yu tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ yo ya bI mi/ yo yo mi/ yo yu ba:/ yo yu ma:/ ling la kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ yo yU yAta/
[\[397a.2\]]yo yU yA tAM/ yo yU yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ yo ya bI tu/ yo yo tu/ yo yu tA ta/ yo yu tAM/ yo yu ba tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ yo yu hi/ yo yu tA ta/ yo yu taM/ yo yu ta/ yo yA bA ni/ yo ya bA ba/ yo ya bA ma/ de bzhin
[\[397a.3\]]du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a yo ya bIta/ a yo yota/ a yo yu tAM/ a yo ya bu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a yo ya bA:/ a yo yo:/ a yo yu tAM/ a yo yu ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a yo ya baM/ a yo yu ba/ a yo yu ma/ la yig lhag ma rnams la/ lung  a
[\[397a.4\]]yo ya bI ta/ liT  yo ya bAM tsa kA ra/ luT  yo ya bi tA/ smon pa'i ling  yo yU yAta/ l+r-iT  yo ya bi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a yo ya bi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /o hA ka gtong ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os thung ngur bsgyur/ ku ha da ga gi tsu/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos/ dz+ha dza/ ka 'gro ba ma
[\[397a.5\]]yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur/ yang gi atsa la'ang ngos ya phyis pas/ dzA hA/ zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ IT yang bar byas/ ITa'i phyogs la IT mtshams sbyar bas/ dzA hi ti/ dzA hA ti/ gnyis tshig la/ g+hu min pas ha la la I 'os/
[\[397a.6\]]A Ir bsgyur bas/ dzA hA ta:/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata'o/ dz+ha a ta/ sh+nA a b+h+ya sta dag gi ata kyi 'os a phyis pas/ dzA ha ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzA he Shi/ dzA hA si/ dzA hI tha:/ dzA hI tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzA he mi/ dzA hA mi/
[\[397a.7\]]dzA hI ba:/ dzA hI ma:/ ling la ya la dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ dzA h+yA ta/ dzA h+yA tAM/ dzA h+yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la laT ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzA he tu/ dzA hA tA/ dzA hI tA ta/ dzA hI tAM/ dzA ha tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dzA hI hi/ dzA hI tA ta/ dzA hI tAM/ dzA hI ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzA
[\[397b\]]
[\[397b.1\]]hA ni/ dzA hA ba/ dzA hA ma/ de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dzA ti ta/ a dA hA ta/ a dzA hI tAM/ a dzA hu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dzA hi:/ a dzA tAH/ a dzA hI taM/ a dzA hI ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a dzA hAM/ a dzA hI ba/ a dzA hI ma/ la yig lhag ma rnams la/ lung  a dzA hiSh+Ta/ liT  dzA
[\[397b.2\]]hAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dzA hi tA/ smon ling  dzA h+yA ta/ l+r-iT dzA hi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dzA hi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! daM sha mche ba la'o zhes pa la/ yang / gnyis brjod/ dza ba/ dza b+ha sogs kyis nu ka A ga ma byin/ yang phyis pas/ daM daM sha zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ IT yang na bar byas/ ITa'i
[\[397b.3\]]phyogs la na phyis pas/ daM da shI ti/ daM daM Sh+Ti/ gnyis tshig la/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis/ bra sh+tsa b+h+ra s+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ Sha Tu la Sha Tu 'os ta Tar bsgyur bas/ daM daSh+Ta:/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/ daM da sha ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs
[\[397b.4\]]pas/ skyes dbus ma gsum la/ daM da shi Shi/ daM daM k+Shi/ daM daM Sh+Tha:/ daM da Sh+Tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ daM da shI mi/ daM daM sh+mi/ daM da shwa:/ daM da sh+ma:/ ling la iT 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis drangs pas/ daM da sh+yA ta/ daM da sh+yA tAM/ daM da sh+yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la laT ltar bsgrubs bas/ daM da shI
[\[397b.5\]]tu/ daM daM Sh+Tu/ daM da Sh+TA ta/ daM da Sh+TAM/ daM da sha tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ daM da D+ny+ha/ daM da Sh+TA ta/ daM daM Sh+TaM/ daM daM Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ daM daM shA ni/ daM daM shU ba/ daM daM shA ma/ de bzhin du/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a daM da shi ta/ a daM da na/ a daM da Sh+TAM/ a daM da shu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[397b.6\]]a daM da shI:/ a da dan/ a daM daSh+TaM/ a daM da Sh+Ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a daM daM shi/ a daM da shwa/ a daM da sh+ma/ la yig phyi ma rnams la/ lung  a daM daM shI ta/ liT  daM daM shAM tsa kA ra/ luT  daM daM sh+yI tA/ smon ling / daM da sh+yA ta/ l+r-iT  daM daM shi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a daM daM shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! nyi Sha ba nyal ba la'o
[\[397b.7\]]zhes pa la yang sbyar/ sA pi s+ya mi dag gi yang la 'os saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ gnyis brjod/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/ yang gi a tsa la 'ang ngos yang phyis pas/ so Shu pa ces pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ skyes bu dar po'i tshig la/ IT yang na bar byas bas/ so Shu pI ti/
[\[398a\]]
[\[398a.1\]]so Sho b+ti/ gnyis tshig la/ so Shu b+ha:/ mang tshig la dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/ so Shu pa ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ so Shu pI Shi/ so Sho p+li/ so Shu p+tha:/ so Shu p+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ so Shu pI mi/ so Shu p+mi/ so Shu p+ba:/ so Shu p+ma:/ ling la/ so
[\[398a.2\]]Shu pyA ta/ so Shu pyA tAM/ so Shu pyuH/ sogs so/ /loT la laT ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ so Shu bI tu/ so Shu p+tu/ so Shu b+tA ta/ so Shu p+tAM/ so Shu ba tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ so Shu b+hi/ so Shu p+tA ta/ so Shu p+taM/ so Shu p+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ so Shu pA ni/ so Shu pA ba/ so Shu pA ma/ de bzhin
[\[398a.3\]]du/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a so Shu pI ta/ a so Sho ba/ a so Shu p+tAM/ a so Shu bu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a so Shu pI:/ a so Sho ba/ a so Shu p+taM/ a so Shu p+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a so Shu paM/ a so Shu p+wa/ a so Shu p+ma/ lhag ma rnams la/ lung  a so Shu pIta/ liT  so Shu bAM tsa kA ra/
[\[398a.4\]]luT  so Shu bi tA/ smon ling / so Shu byA ta/ l+r-iT  so Shu pi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a so Shu pi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /yang na saM pra sA ra Nar ma bsgyur ba'i phyogs la/ ka 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis a b+h+yA sa ring por bsgyur bas/ sA swa pI ti/ sA swa p+ti/ sogs cho ga snga ma dang dang 'dra'o/ ! /b+hi dir 'joms pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang
[\[398a.5\]]sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsar 'ang ngos b+ha ba/ yang 'jig pa sogs kyis yon tan/ yang gi a tsa la'ang ngos yang phyis pas/ be b+hid ces pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ iT yang na bar byas pas/ be b+hi dI ti/ be b+he t+ti/ gnyis tshig la/ kha ra la tsa ra 'os da tar
[\[398a.6\]]bsgyur bas/ be b+hi t+ta:/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata 'os/ a ta du bsgyur bas/ be b+hi da ti/ de bzhin du/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be b+hi dI Shi/ be b+he t+si/ be b+hi t+tha:/ be b+hi t+tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be b+hi bI mi/ be b+hi d+mi/ be b+hi dA:/ be b+hi d+ma:/ ling la/ be b+hi d+yA ta/ be b+hi d+yA tAM/ be b+hi d+yu:/ sogs
[\[398a.7\]]so/ /loT la laT ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ be b+hi dI tu/ be b+hi N+tu/ be b+hi t+tA ta/ be b+hi t+tAM/ be b+he ta tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ be b+hi d+d+hi/ be b+hit+tA ta/ be b+hi t+taM/ be b+hi t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ be b+hi dA ni/ be b+hi dA ba/ be b+hi dA ma/ de bzhin du/ lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a be b+hi dI ta/ a
[\[398b\]]
[\[398b.1\]]be b+he ta/ a be b+hi t+tAM/ a be b+hi du:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a be b+hi dI:/ a be b+hi ta/ a be b+hi t+taM/ a be b+hi t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a be b+hi daM/ a be b+hi dwo/ a be b+hi d+ma/ na b+hA tu lo ba A r+d+ha d+hA tu ke/ byings phyis pa'i byings phyed pa la ma yin no/ yang phyis pa lta bu byings kyi cha shas phyis pa'i pha
[\[398b.2\]]rol tu byings phyed/ dz+hi dzus  pa yon tan dang / 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can byung yang byings de la 'phel ba dang yon tan sogs mi byed de/ la yig lhag ma rnams la/ lung  a be b+hi dI ta/ liT  be b+hi dI tsa kA ra/ luT  be b+hi di tA/ smon pa'i ling  be b+hi d+yA ta/ l+r-iT  be b+hi di Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a be b+hi di Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /br-i tu 'jug pa la'o
[\[398b.3\]]zhes pa la/ yang sbyar/ gnyis brjod/ ta phyis/ ru gri kau tsa lu ki/ 'jig pa la ru ka rig dag kyang ngo / /byings r-i ta u pad+hA na yod pa'i a b+h+yA sa la yang 'jig pa pha rol la ru ka A ga ma dang rig A ga ma dang 'ang gi sgras rIka A ga ma rnams 'gyur te/ glo bur ba de rnams kyi ka gnas don dang ruka gi u
[\[398b.4\]]brjod pa'i don te/ bar+b+r-i ta 'am/ ba ri br-i ta'am/ ba ri br-ita/ ces pa gsum po gang rung sgrub pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la IT yang na bar byas pas/ bar+b+r-i tI ti/ barba r+t+ti/ gnyis tshig la/ bar+b+r-i t+ta:/ mang tshig la/ dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/ bar+b+r-i ta ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar
[\[398b.5\]]bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bar+b+r-i tI Shi/ barba r+t+si/ bar+b+r-i t+tha:/ bar+b+r-i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bar+b+r-i tI mi/ barba r+t+mi/ bar+b+r-i twa:/ bar+b+r-i t+ma:/ ling la/ bar+b+r-i t+yA ta/ bar+b+r-i t+yA tAM/ bar+b+r-i t+yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la laT ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ bar+b+r-i rtI tu/ ba bar+t+ta/ bar+b+r-i t+tA ta/ bar+b+r-i t+tAM/
[\[398b.6\]]bar+b+r-i ta tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ bar+b+r-i t+t+hi/ bar+b+r-i t+taMta/ ba r+b+r-i t+taM/ bar+b+r-i t+ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ bar+b+r-i tA ni/ bar+b+r-i tA ba/ bar+b+r-i tA ma/ de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a bar+b+r-i tI ta/ a barba:/ a bar+b+r-i tAM/ a bar+b+r-i tu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a bar+b+r-i tI:/ a barba:/ a bar+b+r-i t+taM/ a bar+b+r-i t+ta/
[\[398b.7\]]skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a bar+b+r-i tAM/ a bar+b+r-i twa/ a bar+b+r-i t+ma/ lhag ma rnams la/ lung  a bar+b+r-i tI ta/ liT  bar+b+r-i tAM tsa kA ra/ luT  bar+b+r-i ti tA/ smon ling  bar+b+r-i t+yA ta/ l+r-iT  bar+b+r-i ti Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a bar+b+r-i rti Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /yang na/ dz+hi dzus/ ba ri br-i tI ti/ ba ri bar+t+ti/ sogs so/ /ba rI br-i tI ti/ ba rI bar+t+ti/ sogs te/ A ga
[\[399a\]]
[\[399a.1\]]ma mi 'dra ba'i khyad par tsam ma gtogs cho ga gzhan rnams 'dra'o/ ! /gr-i d+hu mngon par 'dod pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang gnyis brjod/ r-i'i a ta/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ 'jig pa la ru ka rika dag kyang ngos/ ruka A ga ma byin/ yang phyis pas/ dza r+b+r-i d+ha/ zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ skyes bu
[\[399a.2\]]dang po'i gcig tshig la/ I ba yang na bar byas pas/ d+har 'dra ba dz+har rnams kyi 'os d+ha phyis/ dza r+g+r-i d+hI ti/ dzarga r+d+hi/ gnyis tshig la/ dz+ha Sha mtha' sogs kyis tad+ha/ dz+ha sha las dz+ha la rnams kyi dza sha 'os d+ha dar bsgyur bas/ dza r+g+r-id+d+ha:/ mang tshig la/ dz+ha ata du bsgyur bas/ dzar+g+ra d+ha ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dbus ma
[\[399a.3\]]gsum la/ dzar+g+r-i d+hI Shi/ dzarga d+har+d+h+mi/ dzar+g+r-i d+d+ha:/ dzanr-i t+t+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dza r+n+r-i d+hI mi/ dzarga r+d+h+mi/ dza r+g+r-i dA:/ dzar+g+r-i d+h+ma:/ ling la/ dzar+g+r-i d+h+yA ta/ dzar+g+r-i d+h+yA tAM/ dzar+g+r-i r+d+h+yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dzar+g+r-i d+hI tu/ dzarga r+d+hu/ dzar+g+r-i d+d+hA ta/ dzar+g+r-i d+ha tu/ skyes bu
[\[399a.4\]]dbus ma gsum la/ dza r+g+r-i d+d+hI/ dzar+g+r-i d+d+hA ta/ dzar+g+r-i d+d+hi/ dzar+g+r-i d+d+ha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dzar+g+r-i d+hA ni/ dza r+g+r-i d+hA ba/ dzargi d+hA ma/ de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a dzar+g+r-i d+hI ta/ a dzarga:/ a dzar+g+r-i d+t+hAM/ a dzar+g+r-i d+hu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a dzar+g+r-i d+hI:/ a dzarga:/ a dzar+g+r-i d+t+hAM/ a dzar+g+r-i d+t+ha/ skyes bu
[\[399a.5\]]phyi ma gsum la/ a dzar+g+r-i d+haM/ a dzar+g+r-id+h+ma/ a dzar+g+r-i d+h+ma/ lhag ma rnams la/ lung  a dzar+g+r-i d+hI ta/ liT  dzar+g+r-i d+hAM tsa kA ra/ luT  dzar+g+r-i d+hi tA/ smon ling  dzar+g+r-i d+h+yA ta/ l+r-iT  dzar+g+r-i d+hi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a dzar+g+r-i d+hi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /yang na rika 'am rIka A ga ma sbyar bas/ dza ri gr-i d+hI ti/ dza ri gar+d+hi/ sogs sam/ dza rI gr-i d+hI ti/ dza rI gar+d+hi/
[\[399a.6\]]sogs so/ ! /Du kr-inya byed pa la'o zhes pa la/ yang gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ ri ta/ sh+tsa/ r-i ta las kyang ngo / byings r-ita mtha' can las kyang yang 'jig pa pha rol la a b+h+yAs la ruka dang rig dang rIka A ga ma rnams 'gyur te/ mdo 'dis ruka A ga ma byin/ yang gi a tsa la'ang
[\[399a.7\]]ngos yang phyis pas/ tsar+k+r-i zhes pa la laT sogs sbyor te/ skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a+ngiT yang na bar byas pas/ tsarka rI ti/ tsarka rti/ gnyis tshig la/ tsir+k+r-i ta:/ mang tshig la/ a b+h+ya sta las ata yos/ dz+ha ata/ ika gi atsa la ya Na byas pas/ tsar+k+ra ti/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs pas skyes
[\[399b\]]
[\[399b.1\]]bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsarka rli Shi/ tsarki r+Sha/ tsar+k+r-itha:/ tsar+k+r-i tha/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsarka rI mi/ tsarka rmi/ tsar+k+r-i pa:/ leng la/ tsar+k+r-i yAta/ tsar+k+r-i yA tAM/ tsar+k+r-i yu:/ sogs so/ /loT la laTa'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ tsarka r-I tu/ tsarka rtu/ tsar+k+r-i tA ta/ tsar+k+r-i tAM/ tsar+k+ra tu/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/
[\[399b.2\]]tsar+k+r-i hi/ tsar+k+r-i nA ta/ tsar+k+r-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsarka rA Ni/ tsarka rA ba/ tsarka rA ma/ de bzhin du lang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a tsarka rI ta/ a tsarka Sha la tsar+k+r-i tAM/ a tsarka tu:/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a tsarka rI:/ a tsar+k+ra:/ a tsar+k+r-i taM/ a tsar+k+r-i ta/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsarka ri/ a tsar+k+r-i ba/ a tsar+k+r-i ma/ lhag
[\[399b.3\]]ma rnams la/ lung  a tsar+k+ri ta/ liT  tsar+k+r-I tsa kA ra/ luT  tsar+k+ri tA/ smon ling  tsar+k+ri thA ta/ l+r-iT  tsar+k+ri Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a tsar+k+r-i Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /ri ka dar rI ka gnyis kyang glo bur ba'i khyad par ma gtogs laT sogs dang phrad pa'i cho ga 'dra ste/ tsa ri ka rI ti/ tsa ri karti/ sogs som/ tsa rI ka rA ti/ tsa rI karti/ sogs so/ /i ti bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na
[\[399b.4\]]liT byin gi ka gi a tsa la ya Sha da A ma sbyAng yig gi a tsa la ya Na/ s+ya sU trA ta  sha yig ling rnams la ring 'os r-i lIng du bsgyur/ yang lu gan+nA:sa mA b+hA:/ zhes pa pA Ni ni b+hA ka ra Na'i mdo las yang 'jig pa'i mtha' rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs
[\[399b.5\]]zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ yang 'jig pa'i mtha' can gyi cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //gsum pa ming byings su bsgrubs pa'i kya tsa'i 'jug yul dang cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ supa A rma na:kya tsha/ su pa
[\[399b.6\]]yas bar dag nyid la kyatsa'o/ byings ming du bsgrubs zin supa 'jug pa'i yul la bdag nyid 'dod pa'i don la ming de nyid slar byings su bsgrubs ba'i rkyen kyatsa yang na 'gyur te/ tsa yig dbyangs 'gog pa'i don dang / ka yig kyatsa la'ang ngos don no/ kya tsi tsa/ kyatsa la'ang ngo / rkyen kyatsa pha rol la rtags
[\[399b.7\]]mtha'i a yig ni Ita du bsgyur te/ bu dra zhes pa'i rtags la/ kyatsa sbyar/ rjes 'brel phyis/ mdo 'dis a Ita du bsgyur bas/ pu trI ya zhes grub pa la laT sogs sbyor te/ byed pa po la sha pa/ ata las yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su bsgyur pas/ laT  phu
[\[400a\]]
[\[400a.1\]]trI ya ti/ ling  putrI ya ta/ loT  pu trI ya tu/ lang  a putrI ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la iT byin/ a ta kyi dbyi 'os a phyis bas/ a pu trI yI ta/ sogs so/ /liT la A ma sbyar a phyis bas/ putrAM yAM tsa kA ra/ but+nyi yAM ba b+hU ba/ pu trI yA mA sa/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin a phyis pas/ bu trI yi tA/ bu trI
[\[400a.2\]]yi tA si/ sogs so/ /bu 'dod par byed/ smon pa'i ling la a phyis bas/ bu trI y+YA stAM/ putrI y+YAsuH/ sogs so/ /l+riT la iT byin a phyis pas/ bu trI yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a pu trI yi Sh+yata/ sogs so/ ! /go zhes ba'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar/ ya'i rkyen la ba'i mtha' can nos a bar bsgyur bas/ ga
[\[400a.3\]]bya zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT  ga bya ti/ lung  ug byita/ liT  ga byAMtsa kA ra/ luT  ga byi tA/ smon ling  ga byA ta/ sogs so/ ! /yang byings phyed rnams la kya'i 'dam ka 'os yang na la phyis pas/ lung  ag bIta/ liT  ga bAM tsa ka ra/ phuT  ga bi tA/ smon lung  ga byA ta /l+r-iT  ga bi byAta/ l+r-iT  ga bi Sh+ya ti/ l+r-ing  a ga biSh+yata/ sogs sam/ a ga
[\[400a.4\]]byI ta/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ nau shes pa'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar/ ya'i rkyen la pa'i mtha'  kya'i 'dam ka 'os y+ra/ can nos/ A bar bsgyur bas/ na bya/ zhes ba la laT sogs sbyar/ laT  nAbya ti/ anA byIta/ lung  anA bIta/ nA byAM tsa kAr/ liT  nA bAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /twa ta ces pa'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar bas/ twa ng+ya zhes
[\[400a.5\]]pi la lags sogs sbyar/ laT  tA ng+ya ti/ a twa d+yItA/ lung a tA dI ta/ twa r+yAM tsa kA ra/ liT  tA dAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du mad ces pa la kya tsa sbyar bas/ laT  ma ng+ya ti/ a ma ng+yI ta/ lung  a ma ngIta/ ma d+yI tsa kA ra/ liT  ma dAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /yaSh+mad ces pa la kyatsa sbyar bas/ laT  yuSh+ma ng+ya ti/ a yuSh+ma d+yIta/ lung  a
[\[400a.6\]]yuSh+ma dita/ yushaMSh+ma ng+y+naM tsa kA ra/ liT  yuSh+ma  khyod 'dod par byed/ dAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ laT  asma ng+ya ti/ Asma ng+yIta/ lung  A smad+yI ta/ asma ng+yAM tsa kA ra/ liT asma  bdag 'dod par byed/ dA tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /gi ra zhes ba'i rtags la kya tsa/ hal las kyang ngos u pang+hA ring por bsgyur bas/ khyod 'dod par byed/
[\[400a.7\]]laT  gIr+Ya ti/ smra bar 'dod/ agIr+YI ta/ lung  a gIrIta/ gIr+YAM tsa kA ra/ liT  gI rAtsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /deb ces bdag 'dod par byed/ bal rtags kyatsa/ hal las kyang ngos u ba ng+hA ring bor bsgyur bas/ laT  drI bya ti/ mtho ris 'dod/ a dI byI ta/ lung  a dI bIta/ dI byAM tsa kA ra/ liT  dI pAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /a das zhes pa'i rtags
[\[400b\]]
[\[400b.1\]]la kyatsa sbyar bas/ laT  a das+ya ti/ de 'dod bar byed/ A da s+yI ta/ lung  A da sIta/ a da s+yAM tsa kA ra/ liT  a dasAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /kar+t+r-i zhes pa'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar/ raMta kyi rIng 'os rIng du bsgyur bas/ laT  ka r+t+rI ya ti/ byed par 'dod/ lung  a kar+t+rI yI ta/ liT  kar+t+rI yAM tsa kA ra / sogs so/ ! /gArga zhes pa'i rtags la kya tsa sbyar/ kya tsa
[\[400b.2\]]las 'ang ngos IT du bsgyur bas/ phaT  gArgI ya ti/ lung  a gArgI yI ta/ liT  gArga'i yA tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /naHkye/ na'i kya la'o/ /rkyen/ kyatsa/ kyang / kyaSha rnams pha rol la rtags na mtha' can gyi na yig ni tshig mtha' dang 'dra bar dbyi ste/ rA dza na la kya tsa sbyar/ mdo 'dis na phyis/ kya tsal 'ang ngos I ta du bsgyur bas/ laT  rIdzA ya
[\[400b.3\]]ti/ rgyal por 'dod/ lung  a rI dzI yI ta/ liT  rIdzI yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /btsa zhes ba'i rtags la kyatsa sbyar bas/ laT  bac+yatI/ a bats+yita/ lung  a btsIta/ ba ts+yIta/ bats+yAM tsa kA ra/ leT ba tsI tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /ka bi zhes pa'i rtags la kyatsa sbyar/ kr-itam yin ba sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ laT  ka bI ya ti/ lung  a ka bA+e yI ta/
[\[400b.4\]]liT  ka pI yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ ! /sa mi ng+ha zhes ba'i rtags la kyatsa sbyar bas/ laT  sa mi ng+h+ya ti/ sbyin sreg gi shing 'dod/ brjod par 'dod/ sogs dang / kya s+ya bi b+hA ShA kya'i 'dam ka'o/ /rtags hal mtha' can las pha rol gyi kya tsa dang / kyang dang / kya Sha rnams ni byings phyed pa pha rol la yang na dbyi ste/ a sa mi d+h+yIta/ lung  a sa
[\[400b.5\]]mib+dIta/ saM mi ng+h+yAM tsa kA ra/ liT  sa mi ng+h+raM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /namAnU bya ye b+h+yAH/ kyatsa/ ma mtha' dang mi zad ba rnams las kya tsa ma yin no/ /rtags ma mtha' can rnams dang mi zad pa rnams las rkyen kya tsa 'gyur ba ma yin te/ma mtha' can la/ ki mi ts+tsha ti/ mi zad pa la/ utse+e+u ri tsa ti/ sogs so/ /a sha nA yod n+ya
[\[400b.6\]]ng+hanA yA bu b+hukA pi bA sA gar+ng+he Shu/ a shanA ya/ u da n+ya ng+ha nA ya rnams ltogs bskom pa 'dod pa rnams la'o/ /a shanA ya/ u da n+ya/ ng+nya nA ya rnams/ ltogs pa/ skom pa/ 'dod pa rnams brjod pa la kya tsa'i mtha' can tshig phrad du bya ste/ a sha nA  ci 'dod par byed/ ya ti/ u da n+ya tho 'dod par byed/ ti/ ng+ha nA ya ti/ sogs
[\[400b.7\]]so/ /ltogs pa sogs kyi don ma yin na kya tsa la'ang ngos I ta du bsgyur bas/ a sha nI ya ti/ khyab par 'dod/ u da kI ya ti/ chu 'dod bar byed/ ng+ha nI yati/ nor 'dod par byed/ sogs so/ /a shwak+ShI ra braMSha la ba NA mArma brI tau kya tsi/ a shwa  k+thor  br-iSha  la paN rnams kyi kya tsal bdag nyid dga' ba la'o/ /a shwa la
[\[401a\]]
[\[401a.1\]]sogs pa rtags de rnams la kya tsa pha rol la bdag nyid dga' ba'i 'dod ba'i don la 'jug pa na suka A ga ma 'gyur te/ ka gnas don u brjod don no/ /a shwa s+ya ti baDa ba/ /k+ShI ras+ya ti bA la/ br-i Sha s+ya ti gauH/ la ba Na s+ya t+yuSh+TaH/ sogs so/ /'grel par rtags a tsa ngi mtha' can las kya tsa pha rol la
[\[401a.2\]]'dod pa'o don la suka dang a suka A ga ma yang na 'gyur zhing glo bur ba de gnyis kyis 'ang Shar mi 'gyur zhes bshad pas/ da ng+hi s+ya ti/ da ng+h+yas+ya ti/ sogs sam/ rgod ma rta 'dod par byed/ byis pa ngos 'dod par byed/ ba glang 'dod par byed/ rnga mo tshA 'dod par byed/ yang na A ga ma ma byin kr-i tam yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ dang+hI
[\[401a.3\]]pa ti/ sogs so/ /bzhi pa kA mya tsa'i 'jug yul bshad pa ni/ kA myats+tsha kA mya tsa'ang ngo / rtags las bdag nyid 'dod ba'i don la zho 'dod/ /kya tsar ma zad kA mya tsa yang 'gyur te tsa dbyangs don no/ ! /bu tu zhes pa'i rtags la kA myatsa sbyar bas/ laT  pu tra kA mya ti/ ling  pu tra kA myeta/ liT  loT pu trakA mya tu/ lang / a pu trakA mya ta/ lung a pu
[\[401a.4\]]zho 'dod/ trakA myIta/ liT bu tra kAmyAM tsa kAr/ luT pu trakA myi tA/ smon leng pu trakA myAta/ liT putra kA myi Sh+ya ti/ l+rong a pu trakA miSh+yata/ sogs so/ ! de bzhin du/ ya shas zhes pa'i rtags la kA mya tsa sbyar bas/ laT ya shaskA mya ti/ lung a su 'dod par byed/ ya shaskA myita/ liT yang shaskA myAM tsa kA/ sogs so/ /
[\[401a.5\]]de bzhin du/ serbeSha zhes pa'i rtags lakA myatsa sbyar bas/ laT sarbi Sh+kA myahal las yam rnams kyi yam la dbye 'os ya byis /te/ sogs so/ ! /ki ma la kA myatsa sbyar bas/ laT kiM kA mya tsa sbyar bas/ laT kiM kA mya ti/ sogs so/ de bzhin du/ laT sraHkA mya te/ grags ba 'dod/ sogs so/ /u pa mAnA dA tsA re/ nye bar 'jal ba las kun spyod pa la'o/ /
[\[401a.6\]]rtags las nye bar 'jal ba'i kun spyod kyi don la'ang mar gsar bdod/ kyatsa pha rol tu 'gyur te/ bu tra mi bA ca ra ti/ zhes pa'i don la kya tsa sbyar/ kya tsal 'ang ngos Ita du bsgyur bas/ ci 'dod par byad/ putrIya ti mA Na ba kaM/ de bzhin mtho ris 'dod par byed/ du/ biSh+Nu ya ti dwi dzaH/ sogs so/ ang+hi ka raNAts+tsa/ lhag par byed
[\[401a.7\]]pa las kyang ngo / /ming la khang pa lta bu gzhi las lhag par byed ba'i nye bar 'jal ba'i kun spyod pa'i las bu bzhin du kun du spyod par byed/ kyang kyatsa 'gyur ta/ pra sAdAH/ ibAtsAr bu bzhin du sbyor bar byed bram ze'i bye'u/ tiku T+yaM/ khang chur la khang bzang bzhin spyod bar byed khyab 'jug bzhin spyod bar byed gnyis skyes/ zhes pa'i don
[\[401b\]]
[\[401b.1\]]la/ bra sAdI ya ti kun+yaM/ khang chung la khang bzang bzhin sbyong par byed/ sogs so/ /kartuHkyang sa lo pash+tsa/ byed pa po las kyang ste sa dbyi ba 'ang ngo / /ming las byed pa po la nye bar 'jal ba'i kun spyod pa'i don la kyang 'gyur zhing kyang gi rkyen pha rol la rtags mtha'i sa'ang yang na dbyi ste/ nga yig tang rnams
[\[401b.2\]]sbyor ba'i do dang / ka bya'i 'dam ka 'os spyi don no/ ! /pa yas zhes pa'i rtags la kyang sbyar sa dbye ba dang mi dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ sa phyis pa'i phyogs la/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ laTapa yA ya te/ 'o ma bzhin sbyong par byed/ ling nga yA yi ta/ loT pa yA
[\[401b.3\]]ya tAM/ lang a pa yA ya ta/ lung a pa yA yiSh+Ta/ liT pa yA yAM tsa kre/ luT pa yA yi tA/ smon ling ba yA yi ShI Sh+Ta/ l+r-iT ba yA yi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing a ba yA yi Sh+yata/ sogs dang / sa mi dbyi ba'i phyogs la/ laT pa ya s+ya te/ lung a pa ya s+yiSh+Ta/ lung a pa ya siSh+Ta/ liT pa ya s+yI tsa kri/
[\[401b.4\]]zhiT pa ya sAM tsakre/ de bzhin du/ ku mA rI zhes pa la kyang / kyang mA ni na dag la'ang ngos/ mo rkyen dI pa phyis kraMta ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas /ku mA rA ya ti b-i+ung+hA/ sogs so/ /o dza so nyab+sa ra so ni t+yaM/ o dzas ab+sa ras dag gi rtag tu'o/ /o dzas dang ab+sa ras
[\[401b.5\]]dag gis yig kyang pha rol la rtag tu dbyi ste/ sa phyis kr-itam yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ odzAya te du rba laH/ ap+sArAya te kurU pa/ sogs so/ /su pU rba s+ya man so ni t+yaM/ su sngon  gzhon nu ma bzhin sbyong par byed rgan mo/ ma'i ma nas kyi rtag tu'o/ /nyer bsgyur su sngon ma'i nams kyis yig ni kyang pha rol la
[\[401b.6\]]rtag tu dbyi ste/ sa byis/ kr-i tam yin pa sogs kyis ring bor bsgyur bas/ su ma nA ya te duSh+Ta ma naH/ shugs can du rlom ste snyobs ngan/ chu byung mar rlom ste gzugs nga nas/ sogs so/ /AtsA reg l+ma klI ba ho N+heb+h+yaHkwip+bA/ gal+ma/ kwI ba/ ho D+ha rnams las kun spyod ba la kwi ba yang na'o/ /gal+ma/ klI ga hoD+ha rnams las kun spyod pa'i don
[\[401b.7\]]'akyang 'gyur zhing kwi ba'ang 'gyur te/ kwi ba kyi mtha' la yid zad du rlom ste bsam nag pa'am bsam ngan pa/ aT sogs hang rnams sbyor ro/ /gal+ma la/ kwi pa sbyar/ kwi pa yongs rdzogs phyis/ byings thams cad pa rnams la/ shab ata las yon tan la'o dang / byings phyed pa rnams la bal dang bo'i iT dang liT
[\[402a\]]
[\[402a.1\]]la Am sbyar a takyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ laT gal+ma te/ ling gal+me ta/ loTag+matA/ lang a gal+mata/ lung a gal+miSh+Ta/ liT gal+m+waMtsa kre/ guT gal+mi tA/ smin ling gal+mi ShISh+ta/ /l+r-iT gal+mi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ir  a gal+mi Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / yang na kyang sbyar ring por bsgyur bas/ gal+mA ya te/
[\[402a.2\]]sogs so/ de bzhin du/ klAM ba te/ sogs sam/ klI bA ya te/ ho D+ja te/ haD+ha ya te/ sogs so/ de rnams tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dber brjod ni/ /gal+ma te tIk+Sh+NaH/ 'jam bor rlom ste tsu ba po/ klI ba te pu ru ShaH/ ma ning bzhin spyod par byed smyes pa/ hoD+ha te baN+DitaH/ blun pa bzhin skyod bar byed mkhas ba/ 'grel par gal+ma sogs su ma zad
[\[402a.3\]]rtags thams cad la kun sbyod pa'i don la 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ kr-iSh+Na ti/ nag por zhin spyod par byed/ swa ti/ bdag bzhin spyod par byed/ de ba ti/ lha bzhin spyod par byed/ sogs mtha' yas so/ /b+h+raM shA di b+h+yo b+hu bya tswe rla pash+tsa ha laH/ b+h+raM sha la sogs pa rnams las gyur pa la tswi ma yin pa las hal dbyi ba'ang ngo / /
[\[402a.4\]]b+h-i sha la sogs pa rnams las shin tu ba ma yin ba shin tu bar gyur pa lta bu gsar byung gi don tswi byin pa'i mtha' ma yin pa la don de dag la kyang 'gyur zhing / /kyang pha rol la rtags de rnams kyi mtha'i hal rnams kyang dbyi ste/ b+h+raMshA ya ste/ zhin du spyod par byed/ un+ma nA ya te/ mtho bar sems bar byed/ sogs te/ b+h+r-i
[\[402a.5\]]sha sogs ni/ b+h+r-i sh+ka/ shin tu/ un+ma nas/ mtho bar sems/ shI g+hA/ myur pa/ paN+Di ta/ mkhas pa/ ut+su ka/ rtsol ba/ ab+hi ma nas/ mngon smom/ durma nas/ yid mi bde ba n-i bta/ mi ba dang / shu tsi/ gtsang ba/ mI la/ sngon bo/ badzra/ rdorje/ phe Na/ lpug brtsas/ bshang ba/ ha ri ta/ ljang gu/ ma dra/ zab dbyangs/ sogs so/ 'grel par de rnams la gsar byung gi
[\[402a.6\]]don la kwi ba kyang yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ b+h+r-i sha te/ sogs so/ /lo hi tI ngi NA dz+b+yaHkya Sha/ lo hi ta la sogs pa dang DA tsa rnams las kyaSha'o/ lo hi ta la sogs pa rnams dang DA tsa'i mtha' rnams las gsar byung gi don la kya Sha kya Sha 'gyur te/ Sha yig/kyaSha las yang na 'os don dang / ka yig kya'i 'dam
[\[402a.7\]]ka 'os spyi don no/ /bA kyaShaHkya Sha yas yang na'o/ /kya Sha'i mtha' las laT sogs tang rnams 'gyur shing yang na a tang rnams kyang 'gyur te/ shin du dmar bar byed/ lo hi tA ye ti/ laT lo hitA ya ta/ lo hi NA yeta/ ling lo hi tA yaT ha/ lo hi tA ye ha/ lo hi tA yang tu/ loT lo hi NA nyAM/ a lo hi tA ya ta/ lang a lo hi dA ya ta/
[\[402b\]]
[\[402b.1\]]a lo hi tA yI ta/ lung a lo hi tA yiSh+Ta/ lo hi tA yAM tsa kA ra/ liT lo hi tA yAM tsa kri/ lo hi tA yi tA si  luT lo hi tA yi tA se/ lo hi tA y+YA ta/ smon ling lo hi tA yiShASh+Ta/ lo hi tA yi Sh+yati/ l+r-iT lo hi tA yi Sh+ya te/ a lo hi tA yi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing a lo hi ta yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ tsarmA ya ti/ bags ba byed/ tsarmA ya tai/
[\[402b.2\]]sogs dang / DA tsa'i mtha' la/ paT pa T+wa ya ti/ shin tu lam ba lam ba byed/ paT paT+wa ya ti/ sogs so/ /kaSh+TA ya karma Ne/ kaSh+Ta la las la'o/ /kaSh+Ta la mi dge ba ched du byed pa'i las kyi don la kyang 'gyur te/ kaSh+TA ya te/ tshegs kyi ched du 'gro/ sogs so/ /sa tra kak+Sha kak+Ta kraMtsh+rag ha ne b+h+yaH/ pA pa tsi kIr+ShA yAM/ sa tra kak+Sha kaSh+Ta
[\[402b.3\]]kraM tsh+ra ga han rnams las sdig ba byed par 'dod pa la'o/ satra/ kak+Sha/ kaSh+Ta/ kr-i tsh+ra/ ga ha na rnams las sdig pa byed par 'gro bar 'dod pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ sa trA ya te/ rgyur nam tshul la 'gro/ kak+ShA ya te/ rtswa'i ched du 'asro/ kak+TA ya te/ tshegs kyi ched du 'gro/ kr-i tsh+rA ya te/ ga ha nA ya ti/ thigs po la 'gro/ sogs so/ /karma No ro
[\[402b.4\]]man+tha ta po b+h+yAM brti tsa roH/ rom n+tha dang ta pas ngag la g.yo ba'i las la 'jug ba la'o/ /ro man+tha las 'gram ba g.yo ba'i don la 'jug pa dang ta pas g.yo ba'i don la 'jug pa las kyang 'gyur te/ ro man+thA ya te gau/ /ba lang skyugs bldad byed/ ta pa s+ya te/ /dka' thub la 'gro/ sogs te/ 'grel par ta pas kyang gi mtha' can
[\[402b.5\]]la a tad rnams 'jug par bshad do/ /bASh+poSh+ma b+h+yaM mu dwa ma ne/ bASh+pa USh+ma dag las steng du 'phyur ba la'o/ /bASh+pa USh+ma dag las steng du 'phyur ba'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ bASh+bA ya te/ rlung 'gyur bar byed/ USh+mA ya te/ drod 'phyur bar byed/ sogs so/ /phe nAts+tsa/ phe na las kyang ngo / phen las kyang steng du 'phyur ba'i don la
[\[402b.6\]]kyang 'gyur te/ phe nA ya te/ lbu ba 'phyur bar byed/ sogs so/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ /ng+hU mAb+wA/ ng+hU ma las yang na'o/ /ng+hU ma las steng du 'phyur ba'i don la kyang 'gyur zhing yang na laT sogs a dang rnams sbyor te/ /ng+hU mA ya te/ du ba 'phyur bar byed/ sogs so/ /sha b+de be+er ka la hA b+hA ka N+Tham ng+h+ye b+h+yaH
[\[402b.7\]]kar Ne/ shap+da be+er ka la ha a b+h+ra ka N+Tha ma b+h+ya rnams las byed pa la'o/ /shap+da la sogs pa 'di rnams las byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ shap+hA ya te/ sbra byed do/ /be+e rA ya te/ 'khon byed do/ /ka la hA ya te/ 'khrug ba byed do/ /a b+h+rA ya te/ sprin byed do/ /kaN+thA ya te/ mthin pa byed do/ ma ng+h+yA ya te/ dbus khyed do/ /sogs so/ /su di na ngu rdi
[\[403a\]]
[\[403a.1\]]na nI hA re b+ny+ya sh+tsa/ su di na du rdi na nI hA ra rnams las kyang ngo / /su di na la sogs pa 'di rnams las kyang byed ba'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ su de nA ya te/ nyi ma bzang po byed/ du rdin ya tre/ yul ngan byed/ nI hA rA ya te/ khug rna byed/ sogs so/ /su khA di b+h+yaHkar+t+r-i bde nAyAM/ su kha la sogs pa rnams las rig par byed
[\[403a.2\]]pa la'o/ /su kha la sogs ba rnams las rig par byed pa'am/ myong bar byed pa'am/ thob par byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ su khA ya te/ bde ba myong bar byed/ duHkhA ya ta/ sdug bsngal myong bar byed/ sogs te/ su kha lang sogs pa rnams ni/ su khra/ bdab duHkhya/ sdug bsngal/ tr-i pra/ khrag zhi mchod spyin/ kr-its+tsa/ dka' ba/ a gra/ mchog
[\[403a.3\]]a lI ka/ rdzun nam mi bden pa/ kr-i pa Na/ rta dang mdab dang seng sna dang nyon mongs ba dang ral gri/ a ru Na/ dmar skya/ ka ru Na/ snying rje/ soD+ha/ dar ma/ bra dI pa/ mar me'am rab gsal/ ma dra/ zab dbyangs/ sogs so/ /na mo ba ri sh+tsi trang kyatsa/ na mas ba ri bas tsi trang la kyatsa'o/ /na mas/ ba ri bas gnyis la gus par byed pa dang / tsi tra ba las ngo mtshar
[\[403a.4\]]par byed pa'i don la kya tsa 'gyur te /tsi trang gi nga yig tang rnams sbyor ba'i don no/ /nam s+ya ti de pAn/ lha rnams la phyag byed/ ba ri ba s+ya ti gu rUn/ bla ma rnams la mcho ba tu byed/ tsi trI ya te twaM/ khyod la ngo mtshar bar byed/ sogs so/ /puts+tsha dud sa ne/ /puts+tsha las u ta las 'phen pa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur uta sngon ma'i puts+tshal 'phen par byed
[\[403a.5\]]pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ ut+puts+tsha ya te/ rjam steng du g.yob par byed/ sogs so/ /par+Yud sha ne tsa/ pa ri uta las kyang khyab pa la'o/ /nyer bsgyur ba ri dang uta sngon ma'i puts+tsha las khyab par byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ ba ri puts+tsha ya te/ rngam yongs su rgyas par byed/ ut+buts+tsha ya te/ rnga ma rgyas par byed/ sogs so/ /'grel par
[\[403a.6\]]lung drangs pa/ b+hAN+NAt+sa mA tsa ya ne/ b+hAN+Da las sam las gsog par byed pa la'o/ /sam snga ma'i b+hAN+Da las gsog par byed pa'i don la kyang 'gyur te/ saM g+hAN+NAya te/ snod du gsog par byed/ sogs so/ tsi b.rAd rdza ne ba ri ng+hA ne pA/ tsi bar las bor bsdud pa la yang na'o/ /sam sngon ma'i tsi bar las gzhan gyis bor ba
[\[403a.7\]]slar sdud par byed pa'i don la kyang yang na 'gyur te/ tsi ba rA ya te b+hik+ShuH/ lhan bsdud mar byed slong / muN+Da mi shra sh+lak+Sh+Na la pa Na bra ta bas+t+ra ha lakr-i ta dU ste b+m+yo Ni tsa/ muN+Da skra/ misha/ sres pa/ sh+lak+Sh+Na/ mtshan nyid legs pa/ la ba Na/ tshwa/ prata/ gtsad ma/ bas+t+ra/ gos/ hal/ tho dang / kr-i ta/ gco dag/ tUsta/ thag rnams las Ni tsa'o/ /muD+Da
[\[403b\]]
[\[403b.1\]]la sogs pa 'di rnams las byed pa'i don la Ni tsa 'gyur te/ NA biSh+Tha pat+p+rA ti pa di kas+ya/ ming gi Ni la iSh+Tha bzhin no/ /ming la Ni tsa sbyar ba ming gi Ti dbyi ba sogs de phan gyi rkyen i Tha na dang 'dra bar sgrub ste/ i Sh+Than gyi skabs kyi cho ga thams cad 'jug ste/ muN+Da la Ni tsa/ mdo 'dis a phyis bas/ muN+Di
[\[403b.2\]]zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT  muN+Da ya ti/ ling muN+Da ye ta/ loT muN+Da ya tu/ lang a muN+Da ya ha/ sogs so/ lung la/ Ni shrI dru sogs kyis ts+li tsang du bskyur/ tsang la 'os mu gnyis brjod/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a mu mu N+Data/ a mu mu N+DatAM/ a mu mu N+Dan/ sogs so/ /liT la
[\[403b.3\]]kAs sogs kyis Am sbyar/ muN+Da yAtsa kA ra/ muN+Da yAM ba b+hU ba/ muN+Da yA mAs/ sogs so/ luT la iT phyin pas/ muN+Da yi tA/ muN+Da yi tA si/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ Ni iT med pa la phyis/ muN+yAta/ muN+d+yAs+h+rAM/ muN+d+yAsuH/ sogs so/ /liT la iT byin pas/ muN+Da yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs dang / de bzhin du
[\[403b.4\]]l+r-ing la/ a muN+Da yi Sh+ya ta sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ mi shral Ni tsa sbyar bas/ mi shra ya ti/ sogs dang / lung latsI tsad du bsgyur/ mi gnyis brjod/ iT med pa la Ni phyis pas/ a mi mi shrata/ sogs dang / liT la Am sbyar bas/ mi shra yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ luT mi shra yi tA/ smon ling mi
[\[403b.5\]]sh+r+yAta/ l+r-iT mi shra yi Sh+ya ti/ l+ring a mi sha yi Sh+yata/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ shAk+Sh+Na la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ laT shA k+Sh+Na ya ti/ lung a sha sh+lak+Sh+Na ta/ liT sh+la k+Sh+Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT sh+lak+Sh+Na yi tA/ smon ling sh+la g+Sh+N+yata/ sogs so/ /la ba Na la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ laT la ba Na ya ti/ lung a la la ba Na ta/ liT la ba Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT la
[\[403b.6\]]ba Na yi tA/ smon long  la baN+yA ta/ sogs so/ /bra ta ba Ni tsa sbyar bas/ laT bra ta ya ti/ lung ab bra ta ta/ leT bra ta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT bra ta yi tA/ smon lung bra d+yA ta/ sogs so/ bas+t+ral Ni tsa sbyar bas/ laT bas+t+ra ya ti/ lung a bstata/ liT bas+t+ra yAM tsa kA ra/ luT bsta yi tA/ smon ling bskyu ta/ sogs so/ /hal la
[\[403b.7\]]Ni tsa sbyar bas/ laT hal ya ti/ lung a dzaha la ta/ liT hal yAM tsa kA ra/ luT ha la yi tA/ smon ling ha l+yAta/ sogs so/ /kr-i ta la N-i tsa sbyar bas/ laT  kr-i ta ya ti/ lung a tsI kyaMta ta/ Ni la tsang ba san bzhin sogs kyis a i/ yang ba'i ring po/ /liT kr-ita yAM tsa kA ra/ luT kraM ta yi tA/ smon pa'i ling kr-i ng+yA ta/ sogs so/ /tUsta la Ni tsa sbyar/
[\[404a\]]
