[\[404a.1\]]laT tU ste ye ti/ lung a tu tUsta tA/ liT tu sta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT tUsta yi tA/ smon ling tra s+ny+yata/ sogs so/ /sa t+ya zhes pa'i rtags la/ sa t+ya pa bA sha/ rU pa sogs kyis Ni tsa sbyar/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ ar+tha be das t+yAnA mA bu ka/ ar+tha/ bed sat+ya rnams kyi A bu ka'o/ ar+tha/ bed/ sa t+ya rnams kyi mthar
[\[404a.2\]]Ni tsa pha rol la A puka A ga ma 'gyur te ka gnas don u brjod don no/ /sat+yApi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT sa ng+yA pa ya ti/ bdan pa byed/ lung a sa s+ng+yapa ta/ liT sa t+yA bAM tsa kA ra/ luT sa t+yapi tA/ smin ling  sa t+yAng+ha ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ ar+tha la/ laT ar+thA pa ya ti/ don byed/ lung a rta tha pa ta/ 'brel par ar+tha'i tsad pa
[\[404a.3\]]rol la tha nyid gnyis brjod ba' ma zhes sogs dong tu dwangs ba bzhin/ liT ar+thA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT ar+thA pa yi tA/ smon ling ar+thA pyata/ sogs so/ /be da la/ laT  be dA pa ya ti/ rig par byed/ lung a bi be da bta/ luT bedI pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT be dA ba yi tA/ smin ling be dA byAta/ sogs so/ /bA sha zhes ba la Ni tsa sbyar/ ming gi Nil i Sh+Tha na
[\[404a.4\]]bzhin nos/ a phyis pas/ pA shi zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ laT pA sha ya ti/ zhabs ba byed/ lung a ba ba shata/ liT pA sha yAMtsa k+nga ra/ luT pA sha yi tA/ smon ling bA sh+yAta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ rU la pa/ laT rU ba ya ti/ gzugs byed/ lung  a ru ru ba ta/ liT rU pa yAM tsa kA ra// luT  rU ba yi trA/ smon ba'i ling  rA pyA ta sogs
[\[404a.5\]]so/ /bI NA la/ laT  bI Na ya ti/ tha snyan byed/ lung  a bi bi Na ta/ liT bI Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT  bI Na yi tA/ smon ling  bI N+yA ta/ sogs so/ /tU la la/ laT  tU la ya ti/ phra mor byed/ lung a tu t+lul ta/ liT tU la yAM tsa kA ra/ luT tUl yi tA/ smon ling tU l+yAta/ sogs so/ /shA+o ka la/ laT sh+lo ka ya ti/ tshigs bcad byed/ lung a shu sh+lu kata ShiT sh+lo
[\[404a.6\]]ka yAM tsa kA ra/ laT sh+loka yi tA/ smon pa'i ling  sh+lo kyAta sogs so/ /senA la/ laT se rnA ya ti/ lde byed do/ /lung a si sin ta/ liT sen yA tsa kA ra/ luT se na yi tA/ smon pa'i ling sen+yA ta/ sogs so/ /lo ma la/ laT lo ma ya ti/ sgra byed/ lung a lu lu mata/ liT lo ma yAM tsa kA ra/ luT lo ma yi tA/ smon ba'i ling  lo myAta/ sogs so/ /twa tsa la/ laT twatsa
[\[404a.7\]]ya ta/ lag pa brgyad/ lung a ta zhwatsA te/ liT tra tsa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT twa tsa yi tA/ smon ling twa ts+yAta/ sogs so/ /bar+Na la/ laT bar+Na ya ti/ mdog byed/ khung a bar+Na ta/ liT ba r+Na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT bar+Na yi tA/ smon ming  bar+N+ya ta/ sogs so/ /tsa rma la/ laT tsa rma ya ti/ bags ba byed/ lung a tsa tsa rmata/ luT tsa rma yi tA /smon ling tsa rmyAta/ sogs so/ tsUr+Na
[\[404b\]]
[\[404b.1\]]la/ laTatsUr+Na ya ti/ phye mar byad/ lung a tsutsu r+Nata/ liT tsUr+NayAM tsa kA ra/ luT tsU r+Na yi tA/ smon ling tsu r+N+yA ta/ sogs so/ /'grel bar/ shin tu byed pa'i don la yang Ni tsa 'gyur bar bshad bas/ hasta la Ni tsa sbyar/ laT ha sta ya ti/ lag bar shin s+ya byed/ lung a dza ha sta ta/ liT ha sta yAM tsa kA ra/ luT ha sta yi tA/ smon ling ha s+d+yata/ sogs so/ /
[\[404b.2\]]ShaN+Tha la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ laT ShaSh+Tha ya ti/ drug byed/ lung a Sha Sha Sh+Thata/ liT ShaSh+ThA thAM tsa kA ra/ luT ShaSh+Tha yi tA/ smon ling ShaSh+yAta/ sogs so/ /ka bi la Ni tsa/ ming gi Ni la iSh+Than bzhin nos Ti byis pas/ laT ka ba ya ti/ snyan ngag byed/ lung a tsI ka bta/ aka ma phyis pa sogs kyis sad bzhin i tar ring por byas/ liT ka ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT ka pha
[\[404b.3\]]yi tA/ smon ling ka byA ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ paDu la/ laT baT ya tri/ mkhas par byed/ lung u bI paT ta/ liT baDa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT paT yi tA/ smon ling pa T+yAta/ sogs so/ /yang 'grel bar/ ming las bshad ba'i don la yang Ni tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ g+ha ta la Ni tsa sbyar/ laT g+hata ya ti/ lung a dzag+hata ta/
[\[404b.4\]]liT g+hata yAM tsa kA ra/ luT g+ha ta yi tA/ smon ling g+hat+yAta/ sogs te tshig grogs dang sbyar ba'i dper brjod ni/ g+ha ta ya ti sha drUn/ dbra rnams gsod bar bshad/ de bzhin du ban+ng+ha la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ laT ban+ng+nya ya ti/ lung a ba ban+s+hata/ liTaMban+ng+nya yAM tsa kA ra/ luT pan+ng+ha yi tA/ smon ling ban+ng+hAta/ sogs te/ ban+b+ha ya ti tsauraH/ chom rkun 'ching bar byed/
[\[404b.5\]]U D+hi zhes ba'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/ Ti byis pas/ laT u D+ha ya ti/ thob par byed/ sogs dang / lung la skabs 'dir 'grel bar D+ha nyid Ni tsa dang bcas pa gnyis brjod pa dang / yang na D+ha dang po ha bsgyur ba yin pas a ng+h+yA sa nyid du log nas bya ba byed pa yang na bar bshad pas/ a Di D+ha ta/ sogs sam/ yang
[\[404b.6\]]na/ odziD+nyata/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ liT U D+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ luT UD+ha yi tA/ smon ling U D+h+yAta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du UD+ha la Ni tsa sbyar bas/ laT UD+ha ya ti/ thob nas byed/ auDa D+hata/ lung audzaD+ha ta/ liT U D+ha yAM tsa kA ra/ luT U D+ha yi tA/ smon ling UD+h+yA ta/ sogs so/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/
[\[404b.7\]]bra kr-i t+yai shA tsa br-ing+ng+hibu gA ga mau/ rang bzhin a tsa gcig ba la 'phel ba dang buka A ga ma'o/ rtags Ti phyis ba sogs ma yin ba'i a tsa gcig pa la Ni tsa pha rol la 'phel ba byed cing buka a+ngag ma yang 'gyur te/ swa zhes pa'i rtags laNi tsa byin/ lung 'dren 'dis 'phel ba dang bu ka A ga ma byin pas/ laT swA pa ya
[\[405a\]]
[\[405a.1\]]tI| luT a sa swA bta/ liT swA pa yAMtsa kA ra/ luT swA ya yi tA/ smon ling swApyAta/ sogs so/ /e NI zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/ ming gi Ni la iSh+Tha bzhin nos mi rkyen phyis pas/ laT e na ya ti/ lung e+e Na Na ta/ liT an yAM tsa kA ra/ luT e Na yi tA/ smon pa'i ling e
[\[405a.2\]]t+s+yAta/ sogs  bdag byed/ so/ /pr-i thu la Ni tsaTaM phyis/ r-ita kyir 'os r-i rar bsgyur pas/ laT pra tha ya ti/ lung a pa pra thata/ liT  pra tha yAMtsa kA ra/ luT pra tha yi tA/ smon ling pra th+yAta/ sogs so/ /s+thU la ri dgas mo bzhin spyod/ zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/ ming gi Ni la iSh+Tha bzhin nos Ti
[\[405a.3\]]yaN dang bcas pa phyis nas yon tan byas pas/ laT sbra ba ya ti/ lung as+tha bta/ liT s+tha  yangs par byed/ ba yAM tsa kA ra/ luT s+tha ba yi tA/ smon ling s+tha byAta/ sogs so/ /pri ya zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/ iSh+Tha bzhin nos/ pri ya braru bsgyur/ rang bzhin a tsa gcig pa sogs kyi
[\[405a.4\]]lung 'dren gyis 'phel ba dang puka byin bas/ laT  prA sbom par byed/ pa ya ti/ lung a ba pra bta/ liT bra pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT brApa yi tA/ smon khing brApyAta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du s+tha ri zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/ iSh+Tha bzhin nos s+thari/ s+tha ru bsgyur/ 'phel ba dang puka byin pas/ laT s+thA
[\[405a.5\]]pa ya ti/ lung a ta s+tha pa ta/ liT s+thA pa yAM tsa kA ra/ luT s+thA pa yi tA/ dga' bar byed/ smon ling s+thA byA ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ sAng+hu zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/ ming gi Ni la iSh+Tha bzhin nos/ sA ng+hu/ sA ng+har bsgyur Ti phyis pas/ laT sA ng+ha ya taM/ lung a sa sa ng+nyata/ liT sAng+ha yAMtsa kA ra/
[\[405a.6\]]brtan par byed/ luT sA ng+nya yi tA/ smon lung sAng+h+yAta/ sogs so/ /yu ba zhes pa'i rtags la Ni tsa/ iSh+Tha bzhin nos yu ba/ ka nar bsgyur 'phel ba mi byed pas/ laT ka na ya ti/ lung atsa ka na ta/ liT ka na yAM tsa kA ra/ luT ka na yi tA/ smon pa'i ling ka  legs pa/ n+yAta/ sogs so/ /sra dza bin zhes
[\[405a.7\]]pa'i rtags la Ni tsa iSh+Tha bzhin nos/ bin rkyen phyis pas/ laT sra dza ya ti/ 'phred ldan/ lung a sa sra dzata/ liT sra dza yAM tsa kA ra/ luT sra dza yi tA/ smon ling sra dz+yata/ gzhon pa/ sogs so/ /i sha mata ces pa'i rtags la Ni tsa sbyar/ iSh+Tha bzhin nos/ ma tu pa kyi rjes phyis pas/ laT i sha
[\[405b\]]
[\[405b.1\]]ya ti/ lung ai sha sha ta/ biT e sha yAM tsa kA ra/luT e sha yi tA/ smon ling e sh+yAta/ sogs so/ /shwetA shwA shwa ta ra ga loTi tA hwa ra kAka NAM man+ta ka lo pash+tsa/shwe ta/ a shwa/ a shwa tar/ ga loDi/ a hwa ra/ kA ka rnams kyi mtha' dbyi'o/ /shwe ta la sogs pa 'di rnams las rang
[\[405b.2\]]dpal ldan/ don la Ni tsa 'gyur zhing Ni tsa pha rol la rtags 'di rnams kyi mtha' yang dbyi bar bya ste/ laT shweta ya ti/ lung a shi shwi tata/ liT shwa ta yAM tsa kA  dkar po/ rta/ rta mchog /mnga' thang can/ kun du nod pa/ bya rog/ ra/ luT shwe ta yi tA/ smon ling shwet+yAta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/
[\[405b.3\]]laT a shwa ya ti/ lung A sha shwata/ liT a shwayAM tsa kA ra /luT a shwa yi tA/ smon lung a sh+w+yata/ sogs so/ /laT a shwa ta ra ya ti/ kayang A sha shwa ta ra ta/ liT a shwa ta ra yAMtsa kA ra/ luT a shwa ta ra yi tA/ smon ling a shwa tar+YAta/ sogs so/ /laT ga loDa ya hi/ lung a dza
[\[405b.4\]]galuDa ta/ liT ga loDa yAM tsa kA ra/ lun ga loDa yi tA/ smon ling ga lo D+h+yAta/ sogs so/ /laT A hwar ya ti/ lung A dza hwa rata/ liT A hwa ra yAM tsa kA ra/ luT A hwa ra yi tA/ smon ling ahwar+YAta/ sogs so/ /laT kA ka ya ti/ lung a tsa ka kata/ liT kwa ka yAM tsa kA ra/ luT kA ka yi tA/ smon
[\[405b.5\]]ling kA kyAta/ sogs so/ /kaN+DA di b+h+yo yaka/ /kaN+Du la sogs pa rnams la ya ka'o/ /kaN+DU la sogs pa rnams las pha rol du byed pa'i don la ya ka 'gyur te/ ka kita kyi don to/ /kaN+DU sogs nga 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams la yaka gi mtha' las laT sogs tang dang a tang gnyis ka
[\[405b.6\]]'jug la/ nga 'gro ba rnams la tang kho na sbyor ro/ /kaN+DUya ti/ laT kaN+DU ya te/ a kaN+DU yIta/ lung a kaN+DU yiSh+Da/ kaN+Du yAM tsa kA ra/ liT kaNU yAM tsa kre/ kaNU yi tA si/ luT kaN+DU yi tA se/ kaN+DU y+YAta /smon ling kaN+DU yi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /kaN+DU sogs ni/ kaN+DU/ ban+dU/ a
[\[405b.7\]]sU| kwu Nita/ ma nying / hraM NIng / sa khra go/ beng / nAng / beT/ lAT/ ti ras/ mi snang ba/ i yas/ u ras/ thang / ku su b+ha/ le brgan rtsi/ ma gang+ha/ dbus 'gyur 'chang / me ng+ha/ yid gzhungs pa/ b+hi Shadza/ sman/ triSh+Du b+ha/ gsum sngags/ a nar/ ar ra/ sa mar/ uSh+Ni ha/ i Shu b+ha/
[\[406a\]]
[\[406a.1\]]ur Na/ tu ra Na/ b+ha ra Na/ e lA/ be lA/ ke lA/ khe la/ leT/ loT/ su kha/ duHkha/ sogs so/ /kyadzan+tAt+san/ kya tsa'i mtha' las sana'o/ /ming la kya tsa sbyar bas kya tsa'i mtha' las 'dod pa'i don la san pha rol tu 'gyur te/ putrI ya la san sbyar
[\[406a.2\]]bal dang po'i iT byin/ 'grel par ming  sug smel/ dus/ rtse ba/ rtsed mo/ gi byings rnams  bde ba/ sdug bsngal/ ni gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan can pha rol la rang nyid gang 'dod gnyis brjod par bshad pas/ dper na/ pu dang ti dang yi gsum gang rung gcig gnyis brjod pas/
[\[406a.3\]]pu pu trI yiSha ti/ sogs sam/ pu titrI yi Sha ti/ sogs sam/ yang na pu trI yi yi Sha ti/ sogs so/ /yang 'grel par ming de atsa dang po yin na atsa de gnyis mi brjod kyi a tsa'i rjes kyi hal dbyangs bcas gang rung gnyis brjod do zhes bshad pas/ a shwi ya la san

[\[406a.5\]]par lung drangs pa/ kaN+D+wA de s+t+r-i ti ya s+yab/ kaN+DU la sogs pa rnams kyi gsum  dbang phyug bzhin  spyod par 'dod/ pa nyid do/ /kaN+DU la sogs pa yaka bi mtha' la'ang san 'gyur zhing de rnams kyi gsum pa nyid  dbang po bzhin spyod par 'dod/ gnyis brjod par bya ste/ ka N+DU ya la san sbyar/ iT

[\[406a.7\]]byA kar Na s+ya sU trAn+lA ma ng+hA ta baHsamAp+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kar Na'i mdo las ming gi bying rnams rdzogs so/ /de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing

[\[406b.1\]]rta zhes bya ba las/ ming byings su bsgrub pa'i cho ga rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor tshul gyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ a nu b.rA b+h+yAM kr-inyaH/ a nu parA dag las kr-inya las so/ /nyer bsgyur a nu dang pa rla dag las pha rol gyi
[\[406b.2\]]kr-inya las 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i byed pa po la laT sogs par sme pa da rnams sbyor te/ anuka ro ti/ pa rA ka ro ti sogs so/ /a b+hipra t+yati b+h+yaHk+ShipaH/ ab+hi/pra ti/ a ti rnams las k+Shib las so/ /a b+hi/ prati/ a ti rnams las pha ro gyi k+Shi pa las 'bras bu dang ldan

[\[407a.1\]]las so/ /bung+ha la sogs pa 'di rnams Ni tsa'i mtha' can las 'bras bu ldan pa thob pa'i don la par sme+e pa da rnams sbyor te/ bong+ha ya ti/ yong+ha ya ti/ nA sha ya ti/ dzA na ya ti/ ang+hisngon/ ang+h+yA ba ya ti/ kri ing sogs kyis Ata dang / arti sogs kyis bu/ /b+r+ja ba ya ti/

[\[407b.1\]]la 'jug pa la'o/ /bye pa po dang bya ba du ma las gcig la byed pa gcig gis 'jug pa'i don la At+ma ne pa da rnams 'gyur te/ bya tib+ha ba te/ bya ti ste/ sh+naas zhes pas/ na ga ti hing+sAr+theb+h+yaH/ 'tshe ba dang 'gro ba'i don las ma yin no/ /byed pa dang bya ba du ma las gcig la byed pa gcig

[\[408b\]]
[\[408b.1\]]tu snyon pa dang nges par bshad pa'i don la 'jug pa las kyang sbrA las tang rnams 'gyur te/ naM t+yaM mA tiSh+Tha te/ tiSh+Tha te ka n+yAts+tsha tre b+h+yaH/ sogs so/ /u donya nUr+ng+ha karma Ni/ uta las steng ma yin pa'i las la'o/ /uta las pha rol gyi s+thA las steng ma yin pa'i las la 'jug pa na tang

[\[408b.6\]]b+h+yAM ta pa/ uta bi dag las ta pa las so/ /uta dang bi dag las ta pa la las med  dge slong bram ze'i khyim la nye bar gnas/ pa la 'jug pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ ut+ta pa te/ bi ta pa ta/ sogs so/ /A ngo ya ma ha naH/ Ang la yam han las  zas kyi dus su nye bar gnas/ so/ /Ang las
[\[408b.7\]]pha rol gyi yam dang han las las med pa dang rang gi yan lag gi bya ba la 'jug pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ Ats+tshate/ sbyin par byed/ A ha te/ snun par byed/ shin tu gdung bar byed/ rnam par gdung bar byed/ A yats+tsha te bA daM/ rkang pa la snun par byed/ Aha te UraM/ brla la snun bar byed/ sogs so/ /lung
[\[409a\]]
[\[409a.1\]]la| hanaHsi tsa/ han las si tsa'o/ /han las pha rol gyi si tsa ni At+ma ne ba da rnams pha rol la ka 'gro ba'i ming can no/ /kita pha rol la rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyis na phyis/ dz+hal dang bo can rnams la gzugs thung ngu las sos si tsa'ang phyis pas/ A ha ta/ A
[\[409a.2\]]ha sA tAM/ A ha sA ta sogs sam/ yang na/ At+ma ne pa de Sh+wa n+ya ta ras+yAM/ At+ma ne pa da rnams la yang na'o/ /lung bsgyur ba'i At+ma ne pad rnams pha rol la han ni bang+ha zhes par yang na bsgyur bar bya ste/ bang+har bsgyur ba'i phyogs la iT byin pas/ Ab ng+hiSh+Da/ A ba ng+hiShAdAM/ A bang+hi
[\[409a.3\]]Shata/ sogs so/ /yamash+tsa /yam las 'ang ngo / /yam las pha rol gyi sitsa 'ang At+ma ne pad rnams pha rol la ka 'gro ba'i ming can te/ ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la rjes su sna ldan phyis/ dz+hal dang po can rnams la gzugs thung du sogs kyis si tsa'ang phyis pas/ A ya ta/
[\[409a.4\]]A ya sA tAM/ A ya sa ta/ sogs so/ /sa mog mr-i chi pra tshi swa ra t+yarti shru bi di b+h+yaH/ sam las/ gam/ r-i tshi/ pra tshi/ swar ti/ arti/ shru/ bi di rnams las so/ /sam las pha rol gyi gam la sogs pa 'di rnams las At+ma ne pa da rnams 'gyur te/ saMgats+tsha te/ lung la/ bA ga
[\[409a.5\]]maH/ gam las yang na'o/ /gam las pha rol gyi si tsa dang smon pa'i ling At+ma ne pad can ni ka 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bar bya ste/ ka 'gro ba'i phyogs la rjes su sna ldan mtha' sogs kyis ma phyis/ dz+hal dang po rnams la gzugs thung ngu sogs  yang dag par 'gro par byed/ kyis si tsa'ang
[\[409a.6\]]phyis bas/ sam gta/ sa ma gsA tAM/ sam gas ta/ sogs dang / ka 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyogs lam mi dbyi bas/ sa ma gaMsta/ sam gaM sA tAM/ sam gaM sa ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du smon pa'i ling la/ saM gsISh+Ta sogs sam/ saM gaM sISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[409a.7\]]samr-its+tsha te/ saM pr-its+tshate/ kun du 'dri bar byed/ saM swar te/ kun du sgrog par byed/ saM sngon ma'i r-ing ta hu sogs kyis gnyis brjod shang 'jig/ /arti/ pi parti sogs kyis ab+h+yAs i/ ab+h+yAsa'i 'dra ba ma yin pa sogs kyis i ya/ sa mi y+r-i te/ kun tu 'gro bar byed/ sh+Tu shru shr-i/ saM shr-i Nu te/ yang dag par nyan par byed/ yang dag par gnas par byed/
[\[409b\]]
[\[409b.1\]]saMbit+te/ sogs so/ /bit+terbi b+hA ShA/ bit+ti las gdam nga'o/ /bid las pha rol gyi dz+ha ad du bsgyur zhing ru ka A gam yang na 'gyur te/ saMbidra te/ sogs sam/ saM bi da te/ sogs so/ /'grel bar saM las pha rol gyi dr-i sha las kyang tang rnams 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ saM pa sh+ya te/
[\[409b.2\]]kun du rig par byed/ sogs so/ /ni sa mu pa bi p+h+yohwaH/ ni sam u pa bi rnams las hwA las so/ /ni  sam  u pa  bi rnams las pha rol gyi hwA las tang rnams 'gyur te/ ni hwa ya te/ saMhwa ya te/ u ba hwa ya te/ pihwa ya te/ sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs  yang dag par lta bar byed
[\[409b.3\]]pa| u pa sargA s+ya t+yu ho bA/ nyer bsgyur las a s+ya ti U ha las yang na'o/ /nyer bsgyur rnams las pha rol gyi a s+ya ti dang / Uha dag las tang rnams yang na  nges par 'dren par byed/ kun nas 'dren bar byed/ nye lang 'dren par byed/ rnam par 'dren par byed/ 'gyur te/ ni raM s+ya te/ sa mUha te/ sogs
[\[409b.4\]]dang| yang na/ ni ra s+ya ti/ sa mUha ti/ sogs so/ /u bas rgAng+ng+h+ra swa U ha teH/ nyer bsgyur las Uha ti'i thung ngu'o/ /nyer bsgyur sngon ma'i U ha ti'i u pang+hA ni rkyen ya thog ma ka nga 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la thung ngur bsgyur te/ smon pa'i  mi 'phen par byed/ tshogs bar byed dam 'dus par byed/
[\[409b.5\]]ling la/ sa mu h+yAta/ sogs so/ /sbar+D+hA yA mA ngaH/ 'gran pa las Ang las so/ /'gran pa rtogs par byed pa la Ang las pha rol gyi hwA las tang rnams 'gyur te/ mal+lo mal+la mA hwa ya te/ sogs so/ /gan+ng+hanA ba k+She paN se ba na sA ha si kya pra ti yat+na pra ka tha no pa yo ge kr-i nyaH/ smod pa dang / gnod
[\[409b.6\]]pa dang bsten pa dang / lhan cig ba dang 'bad pa dang / gtam dang nye bar sbyor ba rnams la kr-inya las so/ /smod pa sogs don 'di rnams la 'jug pa na kr-inya  gyad dar gyad 'dren par byed/ las At+ma ne pa da rnams 'gyur te/ sU tsa aya mi ya mu tU ru te/ sh+ye no brti kA ma pa ku ru te/ gaN kAn
[\[409b.7\]]pra ku ru te/ tshogs pa la gus par byed/ pa rA kan+yAM pra kuru te/ gzhan gyi bu mo dang lhan cig byed/ e ng+ho da ka s+yo bsku ru te/ chu 'phel ba'i bya ba la 'bad bar byed/ dzan bA ngAn bra ku ru te/ skye bo rnams smra bar byed/ brgya la nye bar byed/ sha taM/ phram 'di 'di la byed/ khras bye'u co ka la gnod pa byed dam khras sdong bu la gnod pa byed
[\[410a\]]
[\[410a.1\]]pra ku ru te/ sogs so/ /a ng+heHpra ha sa ne/ a ng+hi las nus pa la'o/ /ang+hi las pha rol gyi kr-inya las nus pa rtogs par byed pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ dai ng+yA na b+hi ku ru tebiSh+NuH/ baiHshab+da karma NaH/ bi las sgra'i las las so/ /bi las pha rol gyi kr-inya las sgra'i las
[\[410a.2\]]rtogs par byed pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ swarAn bi kuru te bi praH/ akarma kAts+tsa/ las med pa las kyang ngo / /las med pa las kyang bi las pha rol gyi kraMnya las tang rnams  lha min rnams khyed nus khyab 'jug gi/ 'gyur te/ bA yurba ku ru te//sogs so/ /saMmAn not+saM dza n+nga tsAr+Ya kar Na dz+nyAn b+h+r-iti bi ga Na na byaye Shuni yaH/ nI
[\[410a.3\]]las yang dag par gus pa dang / khro ba dang / bram ze dbyangs 'don bar byed/ mchod pa byed pa dang / sgrub pa shes pa dang / yon dang gla rnams la'o/ /nI las yang dag par gus pa sogs  rlung rnam par byed/ don 'di rnams rtogs par byed pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ shAs+t+ran ya te/ maNi
[\[410a.4\]]ba ka mu ba ngA na na ya te/ shatru nu pa na ya te/ de bA nu pa na ya te/ byA karu Ne na ya te/ brda sprod pa 'dren bar byed/ shataMn ya te/ shataM na ya te ngAnaH/ sogs so/ /kar+t+r-is+thetsA sha rI re karma Ni/ byed pa po'i gnas su lus can ma yin pa'i  bstan bcos 'dren bar byed/ yang dag bar gus pa'i don/
[\[410a.5\]]bram ze'i khye'u la nye bar byin/ khros pa/ dgra bo rnams khrid par byed/ mchod pa/ lha rnams nye ba'i 'dren/ sgrub shes pa/ las la'o/ /yon/ brgya 'dren par byed/ gla/ brgya drangs nas sbyin/ byed pa po'i gnas su gang gi bya ba'i las lus can ma yin pa rtogs par byed pa la nI las tang rnams 'gyur te/ krong+haM bi na yate/ sogs
[\[410a.6\]]so| /b+h+r-in+ti sargatA ya ne Shu ka maH/ 'jug pa dang / spro ba dang / bstan pa rnams las kram las so/ /'jug pa dang / spro ba dang / bstan pa rnams rtogs par byed pa la kram las tang rnams 'gyur te/ r-ik+Sh+wo s+ya kra ma te bung+ng+hiH/ kram ta byA kar NA ng+h+ya ya nAm/ pradz+nye shAs+t+rA  khro ba 'dul bar byed/
[\[410a.7\]]Nipra kam te/ mkhas pa la bstan bcos rnams ston par byed/ sogs so/ /u pa pa rAb+h+yAM/ /u pa par dag las so/ /u pa dang / parA dag las pha rol gyi kram las tang rnams 'gyur te/ blo 'jug bar byed/ brda sprod pa bklags pa la spro bar byed/ u pa kra ma te/ nye bar rkang pa skyong bar byed/
[\[410b\]]
[\[410b.1\]]parA kram te/ Adau ng+gamane/ Ang las 'gyed pa la'o/ /Ang las pha rol gyi kram las steng du 'od zer 'gyed ba la 'jug pan tang rnams 'gyur te/ A kra ma te sUr+YaH/ beHpA ngA bi har te/ bi las rkang pa gas pa la'o/ /pi las pha rol gyi kram las rkang pa gas pa rtogs
[\[410b.2\]]gzhan du rkang ba skyong bar byed/ par byed pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ bi kra ma te bAdaH/ sogs so/ /pro pAb+h+yamAram+b+he/ pra u pa dag las rtsom pa la'o/ /pra dang u  nyi ma 'od zer 'gyed par byed/ bdag las pha rol gyi kram las bya ba rtsom pa la 'jug pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ pra kra ma te b+hok+tuM/ u
[\[410b.3\]]ba kram te b+hok+tuM/ sogs so/ /'grel par nyer bsgyur med pa la kram las rkang ba 'gas bar byed/ tang rnams yang na 'gyur ro zhes byur bas/ kra ma te/ sogs sam/ kra ma ti/ sogs so/ /a pa h+nabe dz+nyaH/ brdzun la dz+nyA las so/ /mi shes pa shes zer ba lta bu 'ardzun rtogs  thas la rab tu 'jug pa byed
[\[410b.4\]]zas la nye bar 'jug par byed/ par byed pa la dz+nyAlas tang rnams 'gyur te/ sha ta mu pa dzA nI te/ sogs so/ /a karma kAts+tsa/ las med pa las kyang ngo / /las med pa las kyang dz+nyA las tang rnams 'gyur te/ sarbi Sho dzAnI te/ saM prati b+h+yA mnA b+ng+yAne/ saM pra ti dag las dran pa ma yin ba la'o/ /
[\[410b.5\]]sam dang bra ti dag las pha rol gyi dz+nyA las dran pa ma yin pa la 'jug pa na  brgya tham pa shes/ tang rnams 'gyur te/ saMdzAnI te/ pra ti dzA nI te/sogs so/ /b+hA sa no pa saMb+hAShA dz+nya na ya t+na bi ma t+yu pa maM tra NeShu padaH/ mar gsar shes/ bad las gsal ba dang nye bar 'dun pa dang shes pa dang 'bad
[\[410b.6\]]pa dang blo gros tha dang pa dang nye bar bsngags pa rnams la'o/ /bad las gsal ba sogs don 'di rnams rtogs par  kun du shes/ /so sor shes/ byed pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ shAs+t+ra pra ba da ta/ karma kadA nu bad te/ nye bar 'dun pa/ pA Ni ni rbad te/ ko nya smin k+Shetre bad te/ ga he bi bad te/ blo gros tha dad pa
[\[410b.7\]]slob ma la rnam par smras/ bi bad te shiSh+yAH/ nye bar bsngags/ sogs so/ /byAk+tabA tsIs muts+tsA ra Ne/ gsal bar lhan cig brjod pa la'o/ /bad las tshig  bstan bcos rab tu gsal bar smras/ gsal ba/ las byed pa la rjes su smras/ pA Ne pa klog par byed/ shes pa/ gang zhing du smras  'bad pa/ khyim du tha dad par smras/
[\[411a\]]
[\[411a.1\]]gsal bar lhan cig tu brjod pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ saM pra ba da te gra myaH/ sogs so/ /ano rakarma kAta/ a nu las las med pa las so/ /a nu las pha rol gyi bad las bya ba'i las med pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ a nu bad te ka Tha ka lA pa s+ya/ sogs so/ /
[\[411a.2\]]bib+hA ShA bi pra lA pe/ bi pra brjod pa la gdam nga'o/ /bi pra brjod pa ste bi  grong du kun nas rab tu smra/ dang bra gnyis sbrel gyi pha rol gyi bad las tang dang e tang 'dam ka can du bya ste/ bi pra bad te mauhUrtAH/ sogs sam/ bi pra bad ti mauhUrtAH/ gtam gyi tshogs rjes su tha dad par byed/ sogs
[\[411a.3\]]so| /abAng+g+raH/ a ba las gr-i las so/ /a ba las pha rol gyi gr-I las tang rnams 'gyur te/ ab gi ra te/ sogs so/ /sa ma pra tidz+nyA ne/ sam las dam bca' ba la'o/ /yud tsam rnam par rab tu smra/ yud tsam rnam par rab tu smra/ sam les pha rol gyi gr-I las dam bca' la 'jug
[\[411a.4\]]pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ sha taM saM gir te/ sogs so/ /ud sh+tsaraHsa karma kAtra/ kun nas gsal bar byed/ uta las tsa ra las las dang bcas pa las so/ /utalas pha rol gyi tsa ra las las dang bcas pa las tang rnams 'gyur te/ ge ha muts+tsa ra ti/ samast-i tI yA yu k+tAta/ sam
[\[411a.5\]]las gsum pa sbyor ba la'o/ /brgya tham pa dam bca' bar byed/ sam las pha rol gyi tsar las rnam dbye gsum pa'i mtha' can dang sbyor ba la tang rnams 'gyur te/ a shwe na saM tsar te/ sogs so/ /dA Na sh+tsa sA tsets+tsa tu r+th+yar+the/ dA Na las gal te  khyim du spyod par byed/ bzhi pa'i don la'o/ /sam
[\[411a.6\]]las pha rol gyi dAN las gal te gsum pa'i mtha' de'ang bzhi pa'i don la 'jug pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ dAs+yAsaM prayats+tsha tepuSh+pa mA lAM/ sogs so/ rtas yang dag par 'gro bar byed/ u pA ng+ya maHswa ka ra Ne/ u pa las yam las rang gi bya ba la'o/ /u pa las pha rol gyi yam
[\[411a.7\]]las rang gi bya ba ste/ bag ma len pa la 'jug pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ kAn+yA mu pa yats+tsa te/ bu mo nye bar sbyin par byed/ bran mos me tog gi phreng ba sbyin par byed/ sogs so/ /pib+hASho pa ya ma ne/ u pa yam las 'dam ka'o/ /u pa sngon ma'i yam las tang dang bcas pa'i si tsa ka 'gro ba'i
[\[411b\]]
[\[411b.1\]]ming can du yang na bya ste/ kita kyi phyogs la rjes su sna ldan mtha'i sogs kyis ma phyis/ dz+nyal dang po rnams la gzugs thung ngu sogs kyis si tsa'ang 'jig /kita ma yin pa'i phyogs las 'dren pa kho na ste/ u pA yata/ upA ya sAtAM/ u pA ya sa ta/ sogs sam/ u pA yaM
[\[411b.2\]]ta| upA yaM sAtAM/ u pA yaM sa ta/ sogs so/ /rA maHsItAmu pA ya ta/ dz+nyA shrUsmr-i dr-i shAMs naH/ dz+nyA shrU smr-idr-i sha rnams kyi san las so/ /dz+nyA la sogs pa 'di rnams san mtha' can las tang rnams 'gyur te/ dzadz+nyAs te ng+harmaM/ shu shU Sha te gu rUn/ susmUr+Sha te mi traM/ di dr-i k+Sha te dzan b+hU
[\[411b.3\]]mI/ sogs so/ /a nor+dz+nyaH/ a nu las dz+nyA las so/ /dga' byed kyis sA tA bag mar blangs/ a ni sngon ma'i dz+nyA san mtha' can las kyang tang rnams 'gyur te/ anu dzi dz+nyAs te putraM/ sogs so/ /chos shes par 'dod/ bla ma rnams la nyan par 'dod/ oSh+Ti'i sngon min ba'i/ grogs dran par 'dod/
[\[411b.4\]]skye yul lta bar 'dod/ 'di la tsan+d+ra par anu snga mas dz+nyAsan mtha' can la tang rnams mi 'jug par bshad 'dug cing / 'dir 'jug par bshad nas rgya 'grel  bu rjes su shes bar 'dod/ du dper brjod kyang gnang bas cung zad mi mthun no/ /brat+yAng b+h+yAM shru baH/ pra ti Ang dag las shru las so/ /pra
[\[411b.5\]]ti dang Ang dag las pha rol gyi shrU san mtha' can las tang rnams 'gyur ba ma yin te/ pra ti shushrUShati/A shu shrUSha ti/ sogs so/ /yathAMpA ThaM/ ji ltar bklags pa la'o/ /bya ba'i don la tang rnams ji ltar bklags pa bzhin 'gyur te/ brta te/ bar+ng+ha te/ sogs so/ /b+hA bA
[\[411b.6\]]s+ya so/ dngos po dang bya ba dag las so/ /dngos po dang de'i bya ba las kyi don la tang rnams  so sor nyan par 'dod/ kun nas nyan par byed/ 'gyur te/ b+ha ba te/ pa tsa te/ ku ru te kaShaM/ sogs so/ /pro pA b+h+yAM yu dze ra yadz+nyapA treShu/ pra u pa dag las  'dug par byed/ 'phel bar byed/ yu dzi las
[\[411b.7\]]mchod sbyin gyi snod ma yin pa la'o/ /pra dang u pa dag las pha rol gyi yu dzi las mchod sbyin gyi snod ma yin pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ thob par byed/ 'tshed par byed/ relde byed/ pra yuMk+te/ rab tu sbyor bar byed/ u pa yuMk+te/ nye bar spyor bar byed/ sogs so/ /samaHk+Sh+Nu baH/ sam las k+ShU la'o//
[\[412a\]]
[\[412a.1\]]sam las pha rol gyi k+Sh+Nu las tang rnams 'gyur te/ saMk+Sh+nute sha s+t+raM/ sogs so/ /b+hudzanyan ba ne/ b+hu dza las skyong ba ma yin pa la'o/ /b+hu dza las skyong ba ma yin pa la tang rnams 'gyur te/ o danaM b+huM k+te/ sogs so/ /skyong ba yin na a tang rnams sbyar bas /b+hu nak+ti
[\[412a.2\]]pr-i thi rAdzA/ sogs so/ /NaHpha la btAHkarta re/ Ni las  mtshon cha kun du rno bar byed/ 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la'o/ /Ni tsa'i mtha' can las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la tang rnams 'gyur te/ kA ra ya te/ zas za bar byed/ hA ra ya te/ sogs so/ /pA The bi b+hA Shi tAta/ bklags
[\[412a.3\]]sa skyong bar byed rgyal po/ pa rnam par bshad pa las so/ /bklags pa rnam par bshad pa las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la ta pa rnams 'gyur te/ pa tsa te/ ku ru te/ sogs so/ /gr-ing+hi baMts+yoHpra  byed du 'jug/ laM b+ha ne/ 'phrog tu 'jug/ gr-ing+hi pa ny+tsi dag las rab tu thob pa la'o/ /gr-i
[\[412a.4\]]ng+hi dang pany+tsi dag Ni mtha' can las rab tu thob pa la 'jug pa na tang rnams 'gyur te/ baTuMgar+ng+ha ya te/ mA Nab kaM bany+tsa ya te/ sogs so/ 'chod par byed/ byed do/ mi th+yo pa pA ngAta kr-i nyo nyab+h+yA se/ ma th+yA nye ba'i tshig las kr-inya las yang yang la'o/ /mith+yA'i sgra nye ba'i kr-inya Ni mtha' can las
[\[412a.5\]]yang yang la 'jug pan tang rnams 'gyur te/ pa daM mi th+yA kA ra ya te/ sogs so/ /slob ma 'dod par byed/ bram ze'i khye'u sru bar byed/ a pAdwa daH/ a pa las pa da las so/ /a pa las pha rol gyi pa da las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la tang rnams 'gyur te/ a pa bang te/ sogs so/ /
[\[412a.6\]]sa mu dAng b+h+yo ya monyagran+the/ sam uta Ad  gnas log la byed du 'jug/ rnams las yam las gzhung ma yin pa la'o/ /sam uta ang rnams las pha rol gyi ya ma las gzhung ma yin pa'i yul la 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la tang rnams 'gyur te/ skur pa 'debs par byed/ brIhIn saM
[\[412a.7\]]yats+tsa te/ b+hAta mung+Yats+tsote/ khur bdegs bar byed/ radz+dzu mA yats+tsa te/ thag pa kun du bdegs par byed/ sogs so/ /a nu pa sargAta dz+nyaH/ nyer bsgyur med pa las dz+nyA las so/ /nyer bsgyur sngon na med pa'i dz+nyA las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la tang rnams 'gyur te/ gAMdzA  'bru rnams sbyin bar byed
[\[412b\]]
[\[412b.1\]]nI te/ sogs so/ /bib+hA Sho pa pA den pra ti ya mA ne/ nye ba'i tshig rtogs pa la gdam nga'o/ /nye ba'i tshig rtogs pa'i 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la tang dang a tang rnams 'dam ka can du bya ste/ swa yadz+nyaM yAdza te/ swa ya dz+nye ya dza ti/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA kar Na s+ya sU tAng+h+yA
[\[412b.2\]]ba lang rnams shes par byed/ tU pa sarga yogAHsamAp+tAH/ zhes bap+nga Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor ba rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni  rang nyid mchog sbyin sbyin par byed/ byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod
[\[412b.3\]]sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor tshul/ nyer bsgyur la brten nas At+ma ne bad dang par smai pa da sbyor tshul gyi dbye ba sogs pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni dngos po dang las kyi skabs su
[\[412b.4\]]dgos pa'i rkyen sogs kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ b+h+wa ba karmaNi/ dngos po dang las las so/ /byings las dngos bo dang las kyi don la laT sogs At+ma ne ba da rnams rtag tu 'gyur zhing At+ma ne pad rnams kyi'ang skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig kho na rtag tu 'gyur te/ de yang byings kyi
[\[412b.5\]]sngan du nyer bsgyur med pa'i dbang du byas pa yin la/ nyer bsgyur sngon du byung na der ma des te/ laT sogs At+ma ne ba da dgu po rnams thams cad 'jug cing der ma zad byings las med pa rnams las can du 'gyur ba dang las can las med du 'gyur ba sogs nyer bsgyur stobs che ba'i dbang
[\[412b.6\]]gis mtha' yas so/ /sarba ng+hA tu ke ya ka/ byings thams cad pa rnams las ya ka'o/ /byings las dang bcas pa rnams la las kyi don dang / byings las med pa rnams la dngos bo'i don du rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams pha rol la rkyen yaka 'gyur te ka yon tan 'gog pa'i don no/ ! /
[\[412b.7\]]b+hU la yaka sbyar bas/ b+hU ya zhes pa la laT/ ling  loT  lang rnams kyi At+ma ne pa da'i skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig rnams sbyar bas/ b+hU ya te/ b+hU ya ta/ b+hU ya tAM/ ab+hU yata sogs te/ a nu b+hU ya te A nan+da sh+tse+e tre Na twa yA/ nag pa zla ba'i khyod kyis dga' ba rjes su thog a nu ng+hU
[\[413a\]]
[\[413a.1\]]ya te Anan+tash+tse tre Na mA yA/ nyer bsgyur sngon du byA na At+ma ne pa da thams cad sbyor te/ anu b+hU ya te/ a nu b+hUye te/ anu b+hA yan+he/ sogs so/ /byings phyed pa rnams la ya ka mi 'gyur bas/ lung la/ tsiN b+hA ba karma NoH/ dngos po dang las dag la tsi Na'o/ /
[\[413a.2\]]nag pa zla ba'i bdag gis dga' ba rjes su thob/ dngos po dang las kyi don la lung bsgyur bas ta pha rol la ts+lini tsi Nar 'gyur te/ b+hUl  lung  lung la ts+li 'os ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur la ta/ atsa'i nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas/ tsiN las 'dzig gos ta phyis pas/ ab+hAbi/ nyer bsgyur gong
[\[413a.3\]]du byung na tang rnams thams cad sbyor bas/ a nu b+hA bi/ gnyis tshig sogs la/ s+yasitsa sI yuT tA si Shub+hA bkarma No ru bde se ha na gra ha dr-i shAM tsa N+wa di DA/ dngos po dang las dag las nye ba'i yul dang han gra ha dr-i sha rnams kyis s+ya/ sitsaH sI yuTaH tAsi rnams la tsiN
[\[413a.4\]]bzhin iT yang na'o/ dngos po dang las kyi don la nye ba'i yul te byings atsa mtha' can iT 'jug pa rnams dang graha la ciN bzhin iT la 'phel ba dang yang na bar byed la/ byings atsa mtha' can iT mi 'jug pa rnams dang han dang dr-i sha dag la iT yang na bar 'gyur zhing iT
[\[413a.5\]]sbyin pa'i phyogs la tsiN bzhin 'phel ba rtag tu byed de/ de'ang rkyen s+ya dang si tsa dang sI yuT dang / tA si rnams gang rung pha rol na yod pa la ste/ b+hU atsa mtha' can iT can yin pas/ tsiN bzhin 'phel ba yang na bar byas pas/ 'phel ba'i phyogs la/ anrab+hA bi ShA tAM/ an+wa b+hA
[\[413a.6\]]biSha ta/ sogs dang / 'phel ba ma byas pa'i phyogs pa/ an+wa b+habi ShAtAM/ an+wa ng+ha bi Sha ta/ sogs so/ liT pa/ lung liT dag la bu ka 'os bu ka phyin pas/ bab+hU be/ nyer bsgyur sngon du ma bzhag na/ bab+hU bAte/ bab+hU bi re/ sogs so/ /luT la/ iT tsiN bzhin
[\[413a.7\]]yang na byas pas/ b+hA bi tA'am/ yang na/ b+hA bi tA/ nyer bsgyur sdon du byung na/ anu b+hA bi tArau/ a nub+hA bi tAraH/ sogs sam/ a nu b+ha bitA/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ smon pa'i ling la/ a nu b+hAbi ShISh+w+Ta/ a nu g+hA bi ShI yA stAM/ a nu b+hA yi ShI yuH/ sogs dang /
[\[413b\]]
[\[413b.1\]]yang na/ a nu b+harba ShASh+Ta/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+raT la/ b+hApi Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ b+ha ba'i Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ anu b+hAbi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ a nu b+habi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Sh+Tunya la yaka sbyar/ kr-iTam yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur
[\[413b.2\]]bas | laT stU ya te/ ling stU ye ta/ lon stU yatAM/ lang a s+thu ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ gcig chig ts+liN tser bsgyur bas/ astAbi/ gzhan rnams la iT yang na bar byas pas/ a stA bi ShA tAM/ asnA bi Sha ta/ sogs sam/ asto ShAtAM/ a sto Sha ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[413b.3\]]liT la/ tuSh+Du be/ tuSh+Du bA te/ tuSh+Du bi re/ sogs so/ /luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ stA bi tA/ sogs sam/ sto tA/ sogs so/ de bzhin du/ smon pa'i ling la/ stA bi ShISh+Ta/ sogs sam/ g+to ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ stA bi Sh+ya te/ sogs
[\[413b.4\]]sam| sto Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ /l+r-ing la/ astAbi Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ asto Sha ta sogs so/ ! /smr-i dran pa la'o zhes pa la yaka spyang / arti dang brtsegs pa dang po sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ laT smar+Ya te/ ling smar+Ye ta/ loT smar+Ya tAM/ lang a smar+Ya ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[413b.5\]]lung la/ a smA ti/ asma' riShA tAM/ sogs sam/ yang na/ asmr-iShAt+laM/ sogs so/ /liT la/ sasma re/ sasma rA te/ sasma ri re/ sogs so/ /luT la iT yang na bar byas pas/ smA ri tA/ sogs sam/ smartA/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ iT
[\[413b.6\]]yang na bar byas pas/ smAr ShITaM/ sogs sam/ smraMShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /l+r-iT la/ smA ri Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ smar+Sh+ya te/ sogs so/ de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ asmA ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs sam/ asmar+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /kr-inya la ya ka sbyar/ sha ya ka ling rnams la ring 'os
[\[413b.7\]]r-i ring du bsgyur/ kr-ita ma yin pa sogs kyis ring por bsgyur bas/ kIr+Ya zhes pa la byings thams cad pa rnams sbyar bas/ laT kIr+Ya te/ ling kIr+Ye ta/ loT k+ngir+Ya tAM/ lang a kIr+YAta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ gcig tshig la/ a kA ri/ gzhan rnams la iT yang na bar byas pas/ a
[\[414a\]]
[\[414a.1\]]kA ri ShA tAM/ sogs sam/ a kraM bA tAM/ sogs so/ /liT la/ tsa kre/ tsakrAte/ sogs so/ luT la/ k+Shari tA/ sogs sam/ kartA/ sogs so/ smon pa'i ling la iT yang na bar byas pas/ kAri ShISh+ta/ sogs sam/ kr-i ShISh+Ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[414a.2\]]l+r-iT la'ang iT yang na par byas pas/ kAri Sh+ya te/ sogs sam/ kar+Sh+yate/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du l+r-ing la/ a kAri Sh+yata/ sogs sam/ akar+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /sraMs la yaka sbyar/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ laT sre s+ya te /ling sra s+ye ta/
[\[414a.3\]]loT sra s+ya tAM/ lang a sra s+ya ta/ sogs so/ lung gi gcig tshig la/ a sra si/ lhag ma rnams la iT byin pas/ a sraM si ShA tAM/ a sraM si Sha ta/ sogs so/ /l-iT la na phyis pas/ sa sra se/ sa sra sA te/ sa sra si re/ sa sra si She/ sogs so/ /luT la iT byin
[\[414a.4\]]pas| sraM sitA/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la/ smon ling sraMsiShASh+Ti/ l-iT sraM si Sh+ya te/ l-iT sraM si Sh+ya te/ l-ing a sraM si Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /nang+hi la yaku sbyar i ta 'gro ba sogs kyi nu ma byin pas/ nan+ng+h+ya te/ nan+ng+h+ya ta/ nan+ng+h+ra hAM/ a na n+ng+h+ya ta /sogs so/ /lung la/ a na n+ng+hi/ a
[\[414a.5\]]nan+ng+hiShA tAM/ a nan+D+hiSha ta/ sogs so/ liT la/ nan n+ng+he/ nanan+ng+hA te/ sogs so/ lhag ma rnams la/ luT nan+ng+hitA/ smon ling nan+ng+hIShISh+Ta/ l+r-iT nan+ng+hiSh+ya te/ l-ing anan+ng+hiSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ya dzal ya ka sbyar/ ba tsi swa pa sogs kyis si pra sAr Nar bsgyur bas/ laT idz+ya te/
[\[414a.6\]]ling i dz+yita/ loT i dz+ya tAM/ lang  ai dz+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ gcig tshig la ts+li tsi Nar bskyur bas/ a yA dzi/ gnyis tshig sogs la/ dz+hal dang po sogs kyis si tsa dbyi ba dang / brash+tsa b+ha s+dza sogs kyis dza Shar bsgyur ba sogs byas bas/ a ya k+ShAtAM/ a ya k+Sha
[\[414a.7\]]ta | sogs so/ /liT la gnyis rnams kyi sogs kyis a b+h+yas saM pra sAr Nar bsgyur/ btsi sa pi sogs kyis phyi ma yang saM pra sAr Na byas pas/ I dze/ IdzAti/ sogs so/ /luT la/ brash+tsa b+h+ras+h+ra sogs kyis dza Sha/ ShaTu la bcu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ yal+TA/
[\[414b\]]
[\[414b.1\]]ya Sh+TA ro/ sogs so/ /smon pa'i ling la/ dza Sha/ sa la Sha D+ha dag gis ka kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ ak+ShISh+Ta/ yak+ShI yAstAM/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ l+r-iT dang l+r-ing la/ yak+Sh+ya te/ a yak+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /shIng la ya ka/ ka 'gro ba la a
[\[414b.2\]]yang ngos a yang du bsgyur bas/ laT shay+Ya te/ ling shay+Ye ta/ loT shay+Ya tAM/ lang u sha y+Ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung gi gcig tshig la/ ts+li tsi Nar bsgyur bas/ a shAyi/ gnyis tshig sogs la/ iT byin/ ciN bzhin yang na bar byas pas/ a shA yi ShA tAM/ sogs sam/
[\[414b.3\]]a sha yi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ shish+ye/ shi sh+ya te/ sogs so/ /luT la/ iT byin ciN bzhin yang na bar byas pas/ shAyitA/ sogs sam/ sha yi tA/ sogs so/ /de bzhin du/ lhag ma rnams la/ shA yi ShISh+Ta/ smon pa'i ling sha yi ShISh+Ta/ sha yi Sh+yate/ l+r-iT shwa
[\[414b.4\]]yi Sh+ya te/ a shA yi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing a sha yi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ta nu la ya ka sbyar/ ta no te r+Ya ki/ ta no ti'i ya ka la'o/ /yaka pha rol la ta no ti'i mtha' Ata du yang na bsgyur te/ tA ya te/ laT ta n+ya te/ tA ye ta/ ling ta n+ye ta/ tA ya tAM/ loT tA n+yatAM/ a tA ya ta/ lang a ta n+ya ta/
[\[414b.5\]]sogs so/ /lung la/ a tA ni/ a ta ni ShAtAM/ sogs so/ /liT la/ ab+h+ya sa dbyi ba sogs kyis/ te ni/ tenAte/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ luT ta ni tA/ smon ling ta niShISh+ta/ l+r-ing ta ni Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing a ta ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /dzan la ya ka/ ya la 'dam ka 'os/
[\[414b.6\]]mtha' A ta du bsgyur pa dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du byas pas/ dzAya te/ laT dza ni ti/ dzAye ta/ liT dza n+yeta/ dzAya tAM/ loT dza n+ya tAM/ a dzA ya ta/ lang adza n+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la 'phel ba mi byed pas/ a dza ni/ a dza ni ShA tAM/ a dza ni Sha ta/ sogs so/ l-iT la gnyis
[\[414b.7\]]brjod | gam han dzan sogs kyis u pang+hA phyis/ stu'i sha tsu 'os na nyar bsgyur bas/ dzadz+nyA/ dzadz+nyI te/ dzadz+nyi re /sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la iT byin pas/ luT dza ni tA/ smon ling dza ni ShISh+Ta/ l+r-iT dza ni Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing a dza ni Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ta pa la yaka sbyar bas/ laT ta pya
[\[415a\]]
[\[415a.1\]]te/ ling ta pye ta/ loT ta pyatAM/ lang a ta bya ta/ sogs so/ /ta po nyanu ta pe tsa/ ta pa'i anu ta pa'i 'ang ngo / /ta pa dang a nu sngon ma'i ta pa'i'ang pha rol gyi c+li ni ci Nir mi bsgyur te/ dz+hal las dz+hal la 'os si tsa dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a nu tap+ta/ a nu
[\[415a.2\]]tap+sA tAM/ a nu ta b+sata/ sogs so/ /liT la/ te pe/ te pA te/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ luT ta p+tA /smon ling tap+sISh+Ta/ l+r-iT tap+s+ya te/ l+r-ing a ta b+s+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /Du dA nya la ya ka /g+humAs+thA sogs kyis Ita du bsgyur bas/ dI ye te/ dI ye ta/ dI ya tAM/ a dI ya ta/

[\[415a.7\]]phyogs la cin bzhin gyi cho ga byas pas/ a g+hA ni ShA tAM/ a g+hA ni Sha ta/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la rjes su sna ldan mtha' sogs kyis na phyis pas/ a ha sA taM/ a ha sa ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ dza g+h+ne/ dzag+h+nA te/ dza g+h+ni re/ sogs so/ /lhag ma
[\[415b\]]
[\[415b.1\]]rnams la/ g+hAn tA/ luT han+tA/ g+hA ni ShISh+Ta/ smon ling haM sISh+Ta/ g+hA niSh+ya te/ l+r-iT ha ni Sh+ya te/ a g+hA ni Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing a ha niSh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /gra ha la ya ka sbyar/ gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ laT gr-ih+ya te/ ling gr-i h+ye ta/ loT gr-i h+ya tAM/ lang a gr-i h+ya ta/

[\[416a\]]
[\[416a.1\]]so/ /liT la/ de me/ de mA te/ de mi ri/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la iT byin pas/ luT dmi tA/ smon ling da mi ShISh+Ta/ l+r-iT da mi Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing a dmi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /ka mu la/ laT ka mya te/ ling ka mye ta/ loT ka myatAM/ lang a ka mya ta/ sogs so/ /

[\[416a.6\]]dzA gA ri tA/ luT dzA ga ri tA/ dzA gA ri ShIShA/ smon ling dzA ga ri ShISh+Ta/ dzAgA ri Sh+ya te/ l+r-iT dzAg ri Sh+ya te/ adzA gA ri Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing a dzA ga ri Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /b+hany+dzU la yaka/ /ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis bas/ lan b+hadz+ya te/ ling b+hadz+yeta/ loT b+hadz+ya tAM/ lang a b+ha dz+ya ta/ sogs so/ /
[\[416a.7\]]lung la/ b+haM dze sh+tsi Ni/ b+haMdzi'i tsiN la'o/ /b+hany+dzi'i na yig ni tsiN pha rol la yang na dbyi ste/ a b+hAdzi/ a b+hany+dzi/ gnyis tshig sogs la iT byin pas/ a b+hany+dzi ShA tAM/ sogs so/ /liT lan phyis pas/ ba b+hadze/ ba b+hadzA te/ ba b+hadzI re/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la iT
[\[416b\]]
[\[416b.1\]]byin pas/ luT b+hany+dzi tA/ smin ling b+hany+dzi ShISh+Ta/ l+r-iT b+hany+dzi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing a b+hany+dzi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /la b+ha la yeka sbyar bas/ laT la b+h+ya te/ ling la b+h+ye ta/ loT la b+h+yatAM/ lang a la b+h+yata/ sogs so/ /bib+hAShA tsiNaN mu loH/ tsiN Na mul dag la yang na'o/ /tsiN dang Na mul dag pha rol la b+ha la
[\[416b.2\]]num A ga ma yang na 'gyur te/ a lab+hi/ alAb+hi/ gnyis tshig sogs la khar la tsar 'os b+ha par bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ a lab+sAtAM/ a lap+sAta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ le b+he/ leb+hAti/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la khar la tsar 'os b+ha par bsgyur bas/ luT lab/
[\[416b.3\]]smon ling lap+sIShaT/ l+r-iT lap+s+yate/ l+r-iT a la p+s+yata/ sogs so/ /'grel par nyer bsgyur sngon du byung na la b+ha la tsiN dang Na mul pha rol la num rtag tu 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ prA laM b+hi/ sogs so/ /karma bat+ka rma NA tu l+ya kri yaH/ bya ba'i las mnyam pa las can no/ /bya ba
[\[416b.4\]]mnyam pa ste gang bya ba'i las kyi dngos po de byed pa po'i rtsol ba chen po mi dgos par bde blag tu 'grub pa de ni byed pa po dang bcas pa'i las zhes zer te/ dper na/ b+hing+ya te kASh+ThaM swa ya me/ zhes pa lta bu ste las su bya ba nyid la byed pa bo'i don yang tshad ba lta bu'o/ /laT b+hi ng+ya te/ ling b+hi

[\[416b.6\]]yaka sbyar bas/ laT pa ts+ya te/ ling pa ts+ye ta/ loT pa ts+ya tAM/ lang a pa ts+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la /apA tsi / a pak+ShA tAM/ a pak+Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ pe tse/ be tsA te/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ luT pa k+tA/ smon ling pak+ShISh+Ta/ l+r-iT pak+Sh+ya ta/ l+r-ing a bak+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[416b.7\]]sr-idza la yaka sbyar bas / laT sr-i dz+ya te/ ling sr-idz+ye ta/ loT sr-idz+ya tAM/ lang a sr-idz+ya ta/ sogs so/ /lung la/ a sardzi/ a sr-ikaSh+nga taM/ a sr-i k+Shata/ sogs so/ /liT la/ sa sr-i dze/ sa sr-idzA te/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ luT sar+Sh+TA/ smon ling sr-ik+ShISh+Ta/ l+r-in sar+k+Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing asar+k+Sh+ya ta/
[\[417a\]]
[\[417a.1\]]sogs so/ /kuShi rany+joHprA tsA+e sh+yan+pa ra smai ba daM tsa/ ku Shi rany+ja dag la shar pa rnams kyi sh+yan te pa ra sme+e pa da'ang ngo / /kuShi dang rany+dza dag la gang byed pa po dang bcas pa'i las kyi don la shar phyogs kyi slob dpon rnams sh+yan sbyor bar 'dod cing laT sogs pa ra sme+e pa da
[\[417a.2\]]rnams kyang yang na 'gyur te/ ku Sh+ya ti/ laT kuSh+ha te/ kuSh+yeta/ ling ku Sh+ye ta/ ku Sh+ya tu / loT ku Sh+yatAM/ a ku Sh+yata/ lang a ku Sh+ya ta/ sogs dang / lung la/ a ko Shi/ a ko ShiShA tAM/ a ko Shi Sha ta/ sogs so/ /l-iT la/ tsu ku She/ tsu ku ShA te/ tsu ku ShA ri/ sogs so/ ! /
[\[417a.3\]]lhag ma rnams la/ luT ko ShitA/ smon ling ko Shi ShISh+Ta/ l+r-iT ko Shi Sh+ya te/ l+r-ing a ko Shi Sh+ya ta/ sogs so/ ! /de bzhin du/ rany+dzal sh+yan ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ ra dz+ya ti/ ra dz+ya te/ sogs so/ /lung la/ a raMk+ShAtAM/ a raM k+Sha ta/ sogs so/ /liT la/ ra
[\[417a.4\]]rany+dze/ ra rany+dzA te/ sogs so/ /lhag ma rnams la/ luT raM k+tA/ smon ling raM k+ShISh+Ta /l+r-iT raM k+Sh+ya te /l+r-ing a raM k+Sh+D+ya ta /sogs so/ /a tsaHkarma karta ri/ a tsa las las byed pa la'o/ /byings a tsa mthar can la pha rol gyi ts+li ni byed pa po dang bcas pa'i las la sbyar ba na lung gi ta pha rol la ci Nar
[\[417a.5\]]yang na 'gyur te/ a kA ri'am/ yang na gzugs thung du sogs kyis si tsa phyis pas /akr-i ta/ na ru ng+haH/ rung+ha las ma yin no/ /ru ng+ha las pha rol gyi ts+li ni byed pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi don la tsi Nar 'gyur ba ma yin te /ts+li si tsar 'gyur/ dz+hal las dz+hal 'os /sitsa phyis/ dz+haSha
[\[417a.6\]]sogs kyis ta ng+ha/ dz+hal sogs kyis ng+ha dar bsgyur bas/ a ru ng+d+ha/ sogs so/ /'grel par byings las gnyis pa pa tsa dang du ha dag la ts+li tsi Nar yang na mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas /a pa k+ta a ng+hu g+ng+ha/ sogs so/ /na du hasnu ha na mAM yak+ciNo+o/ ngu ha/ snu ha nam rnams kyi ya ka tsiN
[\[417a.7\]]dag ma yin no/ /du ha dang / snu ha dang na ma la dngos po dang las sogs kyi don la yaka dang ts+li ci Nar bsgyur ba sogs mi byed de/ ng+hug+d+he/ snu ha te/ na ma te /sogs so/ /Ni shran+thi gan+thi brU nyAt+ma ne pa ngA karma kA NI ya ka tsi No+o na/ Ni  shran+thi  gran+thi  brUnya rnams ka At+ma ne pa da ste las las yaka
[\[417b\]]
[\[417b.1\]]cin dag ma yin no/ /byings Ni tsa'i mtha' rnams dang / shran+tha dang grar+tha dang brUnya rnams la las kyi don la ya ka dang tsin 'gyur ba ma yin zhing laT sogs At+ma ne pa da rnams sbyor te/ kA ra ya te/ shraSh+T+hI te/ gra th+nI te/ brU te/ sogs so/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ kr-I gr-I shrinya b+hU ShAr+the
[\[417b.2\]]b+h+yaHsan n+nyAts+tsa ya ka tsi No+o na/ kr-I g+r+'-i shrinya/ rgyan gyi don rnams dang san mtha' la'ang ya ka tsi Na dag ma yin no/ /kr-I dang / gr-I dang / shr-i nya dang byings rgyan gyi don can rnams dang / byings san mtha' can rnams las kyang ya ka dang tsi Na dag 'gyur ba ma yin te/ kI ra te/ gI ra te/ shra ya te/ taM sa te/
[\[417b.3\]]tsi kIr+Sha te/ sogs so/ /byings las med pa dang / las dang bcas ba'i dbye ba 'grel par tshigs bcad byung ba ni/ ji skad tu/ ladz+dzA sat+tAs+thi ti dzA gar NaM brang+ng+hi k+Sha ya b+ha ya b+ha yadzI bi ta ma raM/ sha ya na kriDArutsi dIp+k+yar+thaM ng+hAtu ba NaM ta ma karma ka mAhuH/ de bod skad du bskyur na/ ngo tsha yod  rgyan byed/
[\[417b.4\]]pa gnas pa mel tshe dang / /'phel bzang ba 'jig pa 'tsho ba dang / /nyal dang rtsed mo 'dod dang 'bar ba'i don/ /byings kyi tshogs rnams las med par bshad do/ /zhes pa ste/ nyer bsgyur sdon na med pa'i dbang du byas nas/ ngo tsha ba la sogs pa don tshan bcu gnyis po de rnams
[\[417b.5\]]kyi don can gyi byings ni las med pa yin la/ gzhan rnams ni las dang bcas pa'i byings zhes bya'o/ /i ti pANi byA kar Nas+ya sU trAng+b+hA ba karma naHsa mAp+hAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kar Na'i mdo las dngos po dang las rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos
[\[417b.6\]]chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dran pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las dngos po dang las kyi don gyi rkyen dang cho ga sogs rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so/ /da ni laT la sogs pa rnams kyi 'jug
[\[417b.7\]]yul thun mong du bshad pa rnams bstan par bya ste/ a b+hidz+nyA ba tsa ne l+r-iT/ dngos su shes pa'i brjod pa la l+r-iTa'o/ /dngos su shes pa'i brjod pa de ring ma yin pa byung ba'i sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iT 'gyur te/ bal la l+r-iT sa'i byings phyed pa la 'os sa tar bsgyur/ sma ra si kr-iShA ma thudA yAM
[\[418a\]]
[\[418a.1\]]bad+s+yamaH/ na ya di/ yata la ma yin no/ /dngos su shes pa dran pa'i brjod par gyur pa'i de ring ba yin pa byung ba'i don la yata kyi sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ a b+hi dzAnA si kr-iSh+Na ya dwa zhe\u0f85b+huMdz+ma hi/ bi b+hAShA sA kAMk+She/ de 'dod pa la yang na'o/ /bya ba'i bar de 'dod pa
[\[418a.2\]]dran nam nag po bcom brlag rnams su sdad/ la dran pa brjod pa sbyor ba la yata yod med gang yin kyang l+r-iT yang na 'gyur te/ l+r-iT sma ra si de ba dat+ta ba ne bat+s+yA maH/ lang smar si de ba dat+ta ba na ya ba sAm/ b+hUdzAl lang / dngos por shes sam nag po gang nags su zos pa/ pa ronyak+She leT/ lkog tu gyur pa la liT 'o/ /
[\[418a.3\]]lkog tu gyur pa bsgrub pa'i yul la de ring ma yin pa byung ba brjod pa la liT 'gyur te/ rA mo rA dz+yaM tsa kA ra/ dran nam lhas byin nags su sdad ba/ dran nam lhas byin nags su sdad pa/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ut+ma phuru She be+etsi t+t+yA ba ronyak+ShaM/ sems nyams pa las pa ronya k+Sha'i skyes bu dang po'o/ /
[\[418a.4\]]lkog tu gyur pa'i byung ba brjod pa'i sems nyams pa'i don la liTa'i skyes bu dang po  dga' byed kyis rgyal srid byas so/ /'gyur te/ sup+tonyahaM ki la bi la lA pa/ l-iT 'grel par smad pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang liT 'gyur ro shes byung bas/ nA haM ka ling+haM dza gA ma/ liT ha sha shA to rling+tsa/ ha sha
[\[418a.5\]]shwata dag las ling 'ang ngo / /ha dang sha shwata kyi sgra sbyor ba las ling gi yul la lang 'gyur zhing liT yang 'gyur te/ lang  hA  bdag nyal bas cal col sgras so/ /ka ro ta/ liT ha tsa kA ra/ lang  sha shwa da ka rota/ liT sha shwats+tsa kA ra/ pra sh+ne  bdag rtsod ldan la mi 'gro/ tsA san na kA le/ yang dag par
[\[418a.6\]]dri ba la'ang sdod pa'i dus la'o/ /yang dag par dri ba'i don la'ang gnas pa'am sdod pa'i dus rtogs par byed pa la lang 'gyur zhing liTa'ang 'gyur te/ lang A  ngo mtshar bar byas/ gats+tsata kiM/ liT dza gA  rnying pa byas/ ma ka/ l+r-iT sme/ smal l+r-iTa'o/ /sma'i sgra sbyor ba la l+r-iTa'i yul la laT
[\[418a.7\]]'gyur te/ ya dza tisma yu ng+hiSh+Thir/ g.yul ngor gnas kyi mchod sbyin byas/ a pa ronyak+She ca/ lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa la'ang ngo / /lkog tu gyur pa'i don brjod pa ma yin pa la'ang sma'i sgra  cil 'gro bar byed/ sbyor ba la laT 'gyur te/ brulIT/ brabI ti sma dra h+mA/ tshangs brjod par byed/ na no+o pr-iSh+Ta pra ti ba
[\[418b\]]
[\[418b.1\]]tsa ne/ na nu la dri ba so song brjod pa la'o/ /na nu sbyor ba la dri pa so sor brjod pa'i don la 'jug pa la laT 'gyur te/ na nu karo ti ba b+hoH/ na n+worbib+hA ShA/ na nu dag las yang na'o/ /mi zad pa na dang nu dag dang sbyor ba las byung ba'i don la laT yang na 'gyur te/ a haM na ka ro mi/ laT a
[\[418b.2\]]haMnA kAr+ShaM/ lung luT a haM nu ka ro mi/ lung a haM n+wa kArmi/ bu ri lub+hAsme/ sma ma yin pa la pur la lung 'ang ngo / /khyab bdag gi snga dus byas/ sma'i sgra yod pa ma yin pa'i pur sbyor ba las byung ba brjod pa la laT 'gyur zhing lung yang 'gyur te/ ba san+ti ha purAtshA trAH/ a bAt+su bdag gis ma byas
[\[418b.3\]]raM ha purA tshA trAH/ sma sbyor ba yin  bdag gi ba res par byas/ na lung mi 'gyur te/ luT yadza ti sma pu r+Sha/ yA bat+purA ni ba ta yo rlaT/ yA bta pu rA dag las nges chig la laTa'o/ /yA bta dang pu rA dag dang sbyor ba la nges pa'i chig gi ngon la 'byung  pas  sngon 'dir slob ma bsdad/ lung pa brjod pa
[\[418b.4\]]la laT 'gyur te/ yA pang+ng+huMk+te/ laT pu rA b+huM k+te/ bi b+hA ShA kadA kan+yoH/ ka dA kar+hi dag  sngon mchod sbyin byas/ las yang na'o/ /ka dA dang kar+hi sgra sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur gyi don la laT yang na 'gyur te/ laT ka dA b+huM k+te/ l+r-iT kA dA b+ho k+Sh+ye te/ laT kar+ha k+he/ l+r-iT  kar+hi b+hok+Sh+ya te/ laT  kar+ha b+huM k+he/ l+r-iT  kar+hi b+ho k+Shu te/ kim br-it+teli b+sA yAM/ kim
[\[418b.5\]]'jug pa las 'dod pa  gang za bar 'gyur/ sngar thos/ la'o/ /ki+-i 'jug pa ste kim nyid dang kim rkyen mtha' can rnams dang sbyor ba las 'dod pa rtogs par byed 'byung 'gyur la laT 'gyur te/ kim pi  ci la za bar 'gyur/ praM b+ho dza yi si/ ci la za bar byed/ laT  ka ta ra bipraM b+ho dza ya si/ sogs
[\[418b.6\]]sam| l+riT b+hodz+yi Sh+ya te pi praM ki ma/ lip+sAsAn sing+ng+hau tsa/ 'dod pa can 'grub pa la'ang ngo / /gang 'dod pa'i don de 'grung pa'i 'byung 'gyur brjod pa la'ang laT 'gyur te/ laT  yonyan+na da tA ti/ l+r-iT yo nyan+na dA s+ya ti/ loT r+tham k+ShaNe tsa/ b+hudza Ni/ ci za par 'dod bram ze/ loTa'i don gyi mtshan nyid la'o/
[\[418b.7\]]ci za bar 'dod bram ze/ loTa'i don can gyi 'byung 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid brjod pa la'ang laT 'gyur te/ laTakr-iSh+NaHb+huM k+te/ nag po za par shog/ loT kr-iSh+Na b+huMk+hAM/ brta mAn sAmI pye brtamAn  gang zas sbyin bar 'gyur/ bdwA/ da ltar ba nye ba la da ltar ba bzhin yang na'o/ /da ltar ba nye ba'i yul de 'das nas
[\[419a\]]
[\[419a.1\]]yun ring po song ba ma yin pa dang ma 'ongs pa yun ring po ma yin 'das ma 'ongs gnyis ka la da ltar ba bzhin du laT sogs da ltar ba'i rkyen rnams yang na 'gyur te/ laT kadA gats+tsha ti/ lang ya dA gats+tsha ti/ yang na/ lung kangA gats+tshata/ l+r-iT ya drwa ga mi Sh+ya ti/ A shaMsA yAMb+hA ta bats+tsa/
[\[419a.2\]]the tshom la  'das pa bzhin yang na'o/ /bya ba the tshom can yin na ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar ba'i don la'ang 'das pa'i rkyen rnams yang na 'gyur te/ lung de benA bar+ShIta/ yang na/ luT de be na bar+Thati/ ci la yong / gang la 'gro /l+r-iT de ben par+Shi Sh+ya te/ caM la yong / gang la 'gro bar byed/ k+Shipra btsa ne l+r-iT/
[\[419a.3\]]mgyogs par brjod pa la l+r-iTa'o/ /ma phyogs par brjod pa rtogs par byed pa'i 'byung 'gyur la l+r-iT nyid 'gyur te/ l+r-iT A yA s+ya ti shI g+h+raM/ lhas char 'bebs sam 'beb sar 'gyur/ lha sa char phab/ A shaM sAb tsa ni  lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur/ ling / the tshom brjod pa la linga'o/ /the tshom brjod pa'i
[\[419a.4\]]'byung 'gyur rtogs par byed pa la ling nyid 'gyur te/ gurU peAta/ 'grel par uta dang a pi dag sbyor ba la  thob par 'gyur 'bral la/ ling gi yul la l+r-ing 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ uta b+ho k+Sh+ye/ a pya b+ho k+Sh+ye/ gar+hA yAM lanyaDa pi dzA tA+oH/ a pi dzA tu dag las smod pa la laTa'o/
[\[419a.5\]]a pi dang r+ShA tu dag dang sbyor ba la smad  u bsdom ma'i iN 'gro ba la ling / bla ma'i nye bar 'gyur/ pa rtogs pa la dus gsum ka la laT 'gyur te/ laT a pi dzA yAM t+ya dza si/ laT dzA tu gA Ni kA  l+r-ing gi iT/ shin tu tha/ zas kyang / mAd t+se/ bib+hA ShA ka tham lip+tsa/ ka tham la ling 'ang yang na'o/ /ka thi
[\[419a.6\]]gyi sgra sbyor ba las smad pa rtogs par byed pa la laT 'gyur zhing ling 'ang yang na 'gyur te/ ling ka thaM ng+harma \u0f7et+ya dzeH/ laT kathaM ng+harmaM t+ya dza si/ 'grel  man 'am yang 'bor bar byed/ nam zhig smad tshong ma len bar byed/ par ka thaM gyi sgra yod pa la smad pa rtogs par byed pa la 'byung 'gyur la l+r-ing rtag tu 'gyur te/
[\[419a.7\]]ka tha nAm ta tra b+ha bA na ng+ha rmaM at+ya k+Sh+yata/ laT ji ltar ming de la khyod chos bor bar 'argyur/ kim brit+te ling l+r-iTo+o/ ki ma  ji ltar chos bor ba/ 'jug pa la ling l+r-iT dag go/ /ki ma 'jug pa ste kiM nyid dang kiM rkyen mtha' can dang spyor ba la smang pa rtogs par byed pa la ling dang l+r-iT dag 'gyur te/ ka ta ro b+hapAn
[\[419b\]]
[\[419b.1\]]ni de ta/ ling ka ta ro b+ha bA na ni di Sh+ya ti/ kim ki lA s+h+yar+the Shu l+r-iT/ kim kil yod pa'i don rnams la l+r-iTa'o/ /kim ki la'i sgra dang yod pa'i don rnams la dus gsum ka la l+r-iT 'gyar te/ kiM ki la t+paM shU drA n+naM b+ho k+Sh+ya se/ asti shUdrIM ga mi k+Sh+ya si/ b+ha ba ting bUdrIM ga mi k+Sh+ya si/ bi ng+ya te shru drI ga mi k+Sh+yar
[\[419b.2\]]tsi khyod smyad par byed/ ti/ dzAtu ya ngo rling / dzAtu yang dag las ling ngo / /dzAtu dang yang dag sbyor ba las smad pa la dus gsum ka la ling 'gyur te/ dzA tu ta tra b+ha bAn shU draM yA dza  ci drag khyod dmangs rigs zas za bar 'gyur/ l+riT yeta/ yat+ta tra twi  yod pa dmangs rigs mol 'gro bar 'gyur/ shUdraM yA dza ye ta/
[\[419b.3\]]ya dA ya r+yor+Yo ge tsa/ /ya tA ya di ga gi sbyor bal 'ang ngo / /ya dA dang ya di sgra sbyor ba la'ang smod ba rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur te/ ya dA twaM shU draM  nam zhig der khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/ yA dza yeta/ ya di twaM shUdraM yA dza yeta/ yats+tsa ya tra yoH/ gang der khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/
[\[419b.4\]]ya ts+tsa ya tra dag gi'o/ /yats+tsa dang yatra dag gi sbyong ba la'ang smad pa rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur te/ yats+tsa ta tra b+ha bAn br-i ShalaM yA dza yeta/ ya tra ta tra hwaM br-i Sha laM  gang tshe khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/ gang tshe khyod dmangs rigs mchod sbyin byed/ yA dza yita/ tsitrI kar Ne tsa/ ngo mtshar bar byed pa
[\[419b.5\]]la'ang ngo / /yats+tsa dang ya tra dag yod pa la ngo mtshar ba rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur te/ gang yang der khyod dmangs rigs la mchong sbyin byed/ gang du der khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/ yats+tsa twaM shUdraM yA dza yeta/ ya tra twaM shU draM yA dza ye ta/ she She l+r-iDa ya dau/ lhag ma dang ya dim yin pa la l+r-iTa'o/ /
[\[419b.6\]]lhag ma ste yats+tsa dang ya tra dag dang ya di sbyor ba ma yin pa las gzhan du ngo mtshar ba rtogs par byed pa la l+r-iT 'gyur te/ ash+tsAr+YAM an+ng+ha nAm kr-iSh+Na dra k+Sh+ya ti/ Ash+tsar+YaM  gang yang khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/ gang du khyod dmangs rigs la mchod sbyin byed/ bang+hi ro nA ma shash+da shro Sh+ya ti/ u ta byoHsa mar+tha
[\[419b.7\]]yo rling / uta a bi dag las legs pa'i don la linga'o/ /uta dang a pi sbyor ba las legs pa'i don rtogs par byed pa  ngo mtshar long ba zhes bya ba nag po lta bar byed/ ngo mtshar 'on pa zhes bya ba sgra nyan bar byed/ la ling 'gyur te/ uta ha n+yA ta de+e t+yaM ha ri/ 'phrog byed kyis lha min 'dzoms par byed  a pi ha n+yata te+e t+yaM ha
[\[420a\]]
[\[420a.1\]]ri| ling ni mi t+tekr-iyA ti pat+to+o g+hU tenya ni t+yaM l+r-ing / ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba dang byung ba la'ang l+r-ing rtag tu'o/ /ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba dang byung ba'i dus rtogs par byed pa la l+r-ing rtag tu 'gyur te/ ka mo me nyab+ho k+Sh+yata b+ha bAn/ saM b+hA ba nenya la mi ti tse t+si h+nyA pra yi ge/
[\[420a.2\]]srid pa la a laM zhes pa gal te grub par mi sbyor ro/ /srid pa rtogs par byed pa la alaM zhes pas don gyi yul la gal te a laM nyid kyi sgra grub par mi sbyor ba la ling mi 'gyur te/ a pi gi ri shir sAb+hiMd+yata/ bib+nyA ShAng+hA to+osaM b+hA ba na ba ninya ya di/ byings la  khyod kyis bdag gi las skyong bar mdzod/ srid pa brjod pa la yang mi yin pa la yang
[\[420a.3\]]na'o/ /byings la srid pa brjod pa rtogs par byed pa la ya de'i sgra sbyor ba ma yin pa la ling 'gyur zhing yang na l+r-iT 'gyur te/ ling b+huny+dzIta b+ha bAn/ l+r-iT b+ho k+Sh+ya te b+ha bA na/ he tu he tu mato rling / ri bo yang ma gos 'bugs nus/ rgyu dang rgyu can dag la ling 'o/ /rgyu dang rgyu can dag byung ba'i bya ba la 'jug pa rtogs par
[\[420a.4\]]byed pa la ling 'gyur zhing yang na l+r-iT 'gyur te/ bung+ng+hA ya na meta su khaM yA yAta/ bung+ng+hA yan meta su khaM yA s+ya ti/ khyod kyis zas/ za bar 'gyur khyod kyis/ its+tshA r+thiShu ling lo To+o/ 'dod pa'i don rnams la ling loT dag go/ /byings las 'dod pa'i don rnams rtogs par byed pa la ling dang loT
[\[420a.5\]]dag 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas la phyag byas pas bde ba thob/ sangs rgyas la phyag byas pas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ b+huM dzI ta b+ha bAn/ b+huMk+tAM b+ha bAn/ ling tsa/ ling tsa/ ling 'ang ngo / /byed po dang lhan cig pa'i las kyi don rtogs par byed pa'i 'dod pa'i don la'ang ling 'gyur te/ b+huM dzI ta yats+tsha ti/ its+tshar+the
[\[420a.6\]]ng+h+yo bi b+hAShA brta mA ne/ 'dod pa'i don rnams las da ltar bal yang na'o/ /'dod pa'i don rnams rtogs par phyed  khyod za bar 'gyur/ pa las da ltar bal laT 'gyur bar ma zad ling 'ang yang na 'gyur te/ b+ha bAn its+tsheta/ b+habAn its+tsha ti/ pre+e ShA nu dz+nyA prAp+ta kA leShu kraMt+yA g+tsa/ zos nas byin/
[\[420a.7\]]spring bskul rjes su shes pa dus la bab pa rnams la kr-ita rnams kyang ngo / /spring bskul rjes su shes pa dus la bab pa rnams la loT 'gyur zhing kr-iT sogs kyi rkyen rnams kyang 'gyur te/ grA maM gats+tsha tu/ grong du song shig/ khyod 'dod pa 'byod/ kartu ma ts+tsha du/ 'dod par phyis shig/ e ba kuru/ de ltar gyis shig/
[\[420b\]]
[\[420b.1\]]kaT ku ru/ ar+he kr-it+ya tr-i tsash+tsa/ 'os pa la kr-ita traM tsa'ang ngo / /'os ba rtogs par byed pa la l-ing 'gyur zhing kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen t-i tsa'ang 'gyur te/ twaM kan+yAM baheH/ sha ki lihu/ nus pa la ling 'ang ngo / /nus pa rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur zhing kraMta sogs kyi rkyen 'ang
[\[420b.2\]]rtsA lhas gyis shig/ 'gyur te/ twaM b+hA raM ba heH/ samuts+tsha yenya n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ tshogs pa la yang na'/ /tshogs pa'am 'dus pa rtogs par byed pa la  khyod la bu mo 'os/ loT 'gyur zhing yang na kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen rnams kyang 'gyur ro/ /sa muts+tsha ye sA mAn+ya ba tsa na s+ya/ tshogs pa mnyam
[\[420b.3\]]par brjod pa'i 'o/ /tshogs  khyod la khur 'os/ pa mnyam par brjod pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang loT 'gyur zhing gzhan yang laT sogs mang po 'gyur te/ loT yA hi/ laT yAta/ lung a yA sIta/ l+r-iT yA s+ya ti/ 'grel par/ gnyis gnyis bldabs pa sogs la loT mi 'jug pa
[\[420b.4\]]rnams la laT sor ro zhes byung bas/ pun punaHpi ba ti/ pun punaHkhA da ti/ pu na pun swasti/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byAkar Na s+ya sU trA ta  thob par shog/ thob par byed/ thob zin/ thob par 'gyur/ kAlA r+tha brtAHsamAp+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las dus kyi
[\[420b.5\]]don gyi 'jug pa rnams rdzogs  slar nas slar 'thung bar byed/ slar nas slar bzar bar byed/ slar yang slar yang bde legs su gyur cig/ so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA kar Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs
[\[420b.6\]]bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las laT sogs 'das ma 'ongs da ltar ba sogs kyi dus kyi khyad par gyi don la 'jug yul rags pa rnams bshad zin te/ 'grel par ji skad du/ d+t+ratU nA man n+ta tA ts+tsa nA nA r+tha twAts+tsa sarba thA/ a pi ng+hA tu ma sha kya mi t+ya la mA khyA ta khyA ta khyA pa ne/ byings
[\[420b.7\]]rnams kyang ni mtha' yas nyid/ /sna tshogs don nyid thams cad du/ /byings rnams mngon gsal nus ji bzhin/ /kun bshad rdzogs par bshad pa'o/ /zhes kyang byung bas/ byings re res don mang po dang / byings mang po don re rel 'jug pa sogs mtha' yas la/ de
[\[421a\]]
[\[421a.1\]]rnams kyi don gsal bar brjod dgos ba rnams rang gi nus pa dang 'tsham pa kun nas bshad pa'i don rnams tshang bar bshad zin no zhes pa ste/ de ltar brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pANini byA kar Na'i mdo slob dpon chen porA ma tsan+d+ras mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i
[\[421a.2\]]go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las/ laT sogs sde tshan bcu bam ti sogs brgya brgyad cu ste rnam dbye sde tshan phyi ma rnams byings la sbyor tshul sogs zhib mor bstan pa kun bshad pa'i rab tu bya ba rnams re zhig rdzogs so/ /
[\[421a.3\]]@##/ /bla ma dang chos skyong srung ma'i tshogs la sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar byings tshig tu bsgrub pa kun nas bshad pa'i cho ga rnams bstan zin nas/ da ni byings ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen kr-ita la sogs pa rnams kyi 'jug yul cho ga dper brjod sogs bshad par bya
[\[421a.4\]]ste| ng+hA toH/ byings las so/ /'chad 'gyur kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen ta bya la sogs pa 'di rnams byed sa las pha rol tu 'gyur te byings ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o/ /ta tro pa pa daM sap+ta mIs+thaM/ de la bdun pa gnas pa nye ba'i tshig go/ /kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen can de'i sngon du byur ba'i bdun pa
[\[421a.5\]]gnas pa ste rnam dbye bdun pa'i don brjod pa'i tshig de la nye ba'i tshig gi ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /bA sarU ponyas+t+ri yAM/ bud med ma yin pa gzugs mtshungs pa min pa yang na'o/ /bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen ma yin pa rkyen dmigs bsal can dang / bsgrubs zin gyi gzugs
[\[421a.6\]]mtshungs pa ma yin pa'i spyir btang gi rkyen ni dmigs bsal gyi yul la'ang yang na 'gyur ro/ /kr-it+yAHprAng N+wu laH/ NUl las sngon ma kr-ita'o/ /'og nas 'byung pa'i rkyen N+wul las sngon ma'i rkyen gang yin pa de rnams dang der ma zad byings ming du byed pa'i rkyen 'chad 'gyur thams cad la kr-ita
[\[421a.7\]]khyi ming can zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /karta ri kraMta/ byed pa po lakr-ita'o/ /byed pa po ste byed pa can dang bya ba'i don la bying las rkyen kr-ita kyi ming can rnams 'gyur ro zhes pa spyir btang ba'o/ /ta yo reb kr-i t+yak+ta khalar+thAH/ kr-ita k+ta khal dag don de dag nyid la'o/ /gong du rkyen kr-ita kyi ming
[\[421b\]]
[\[421b.1\]]can rnams byed pa po'i don la 'gyur bar bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal kr-ita kyi ming can yin kyang rkyen k+ta dang khal gnyis ni don de dag nyid de dngos po dang las kyi don nyid la 'gyur gyis byed pa po'i don la 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /ta byat+ta byA nI yaraH/ ta byata/ ta bya anI yar rnams so/ /k+ta dang
[\[421b.2\]]khal du ma zad byings las bya ba'i don las pha rol du dngos po dang las dag la/ ta byata dang ta bya dang / a nI yar rnams 'gyur te/ ta byata'i tra yig ni rigs mtshon pa'i don dang anI yar gyi ra yig dbyangs 'gog pa'i don no/ /i ng+ha 'phel pa la ta byata dang ta bya anI yar rnams sbyar/ ta
[\[421b.3\]]bya gnyis la byings phyed pa sogs kyis bal dang po'i iT byin/ ma ning la su am du bsgyur ba sogs bya phas/ a ng+hita byaM/ eng+ha nI yaM/ 'grel bar dngos po'i don gyi rkyen can rnams la su sogs gcig tshig kho na 'jug cing rtags kyang ma ning nyid do zhes kyang byung ngo / /de bzhin du
[\[421b.4\]]cinya gsog pa la ta bya a nI yar sbyar/ byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ tabya  tse ta  'phel bar byas/ byaHtwayAng+tarmaH/ tsa ya nI yaHtwa yAng+harmaH/ bseHta byata/ ba si las ta byata'o/ /bsi las byed pa po'i don la ta byata 'gyur ro/ /karta ri Nits+tsa/
[\[421b.5\]]byed pa po la Na 'gro ba'ang ngo / /ta byata byed pa po'i don la sbyor ba na ta byata la Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes bya ste dgos pa ni 'phel ba byed pa'i don no/ /khyod kyis chos gsog par byas/ bas nges par gnas pa la mdo sngon ma'i ta bya ta sbyar/ mdo 'dis 'phel ba byas pas/ bA s+hA byaH/ 'grel bar
[\[421b.6\]]lung drangs pa/ karma karta ri ke lim/ las dang byed pa po la ke li ma'o/ /las dang byed pa po dag la ke li ma 'gyur te/ pa tsa 'tshed pa la ke li ma sbyar/ ka yon tan 'gog pa'i don yin pas phyis/ tsa drangs pas/ pa tse li mAHtaN+Du lAH/ kr-i t+ya tsaH/ sdod par byed dang ma gnas par byed/
[\[421b.7\]]kr-ita a tsa'i 'o/ nyed bsgyur na Nar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen atsa'i pha rol gyi na yig ni Na yig tu bskyur te/ pra sngon ma'i yA thob ba la a nI yar sbyar/ mdo 'dis Nar bskyur bas/ 'bras 'tshod par byed/ pra yANIyaM/ rab tu thob bar byas/ Nerbi b+hAShA/ Ni
[\[422a\]]
[\[422a.1\]]las yang na'o/ /nyer bsgyur na Nar 'gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi pha rol gyi byings Ni tsa'i mtha' can las pha rol gyi kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen atsa las pha rol gyi na yig ni Nar bsgyur ba dang mi bsgyur ba 'dam ka can du bya ste /yA Ni mtha' can la anI yar sbyar bas/ pra yA pa
[\[422a.2\]]NI yaM/ pra yA pa nI yaM/ hal sh+tsedzu pa ng+hAta/ ha la las kyang i tsa u pa ng+hA las so/ /byings hal dang po i tsa u pa ng+hA can la pha rol gyi kraMta sogs kyi rkyen a tsa las pha rol gyi na yig ni nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na Nar yang na bsgyur te/ ku pa khro ba la anI yar puka mtha'
[\[422a.3\]]rab tu thob par 'dod pa byas/ sogs kyis yon tan byas/ mdo 'dis Nar yang na bsgyur bas/ pra ko pa NIyaM/ pra ko panI yaM/ i dzA deH/ sa nu maH/ i tsa dang po las num dang bcas pa'i'o/ /byings i tsa dang po sogs la num dang bcas pa yin kyang a tsa las pha rol gyi kr-ita kyi
[\[422a.4\]]na yig ni nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon ma la Nar bsgyur te /i khi 'gro ba la a na'i yar ita 'go ba  rab tu khro bar byas/ sogs kyis num/ pra sdon/ mdo 'dis na Nar bsgyur bas/ pren+kha NI yaM/ na b+hA b+hU pU ka mi ga mi byA yI be pAM/ b+hA  b+hU pU  kami  ga mi  pyA yI  be pa rnams kyi ma yin
[\[422a.5\]]no/ /b+hA 'bar ba/ b+hU yod pa/ pUnya dag pa/ ka mu mdzes pa/ gam+l-i 'gro ba /o pyA yI 'phel ba/ be pr-i g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol gyi atsa las pha rol po'i krita sogs kyi na yig  song zhig/ Nar bsgyur ba ma yin te/ byings de rnams la anI yar sbyar bas /prab+hA nI
[\[422a.6\]]yaM /prab+ha ba nI yaM/ /bra pa pa nI yaM/ pra ka ma nIya/ prag ma nI yaM/ pra byA yanI yaM/ brabe pa nI yaM/ 'grel par/ b+hA la ba sogs Nitsa'i mtha' can la'ang Nar mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ pra b+hA pa nI yaM/ sogs so/ /yang 'grel par khyA la sogs pa'i pha rab tu 'bar bar byas/ rab tu yod/
[\[422a.7\]]rab tu dag par byas/ rab tu mdzes bar byas/ rab tu 'gro bar byas/ rab tu 'phel bar byas/ rab tu g.yo bar byas/ rol la'ang Nar mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ pra khyA nI yaM/ rab tu smra bar byas/ pra snA  rab tu 'bar bar 'dod/ nI yaM/ rab tu 'khru bar byas/ pradA nI brAh+ma NaH/ rab tu sbyin gnas bram ze/ yang 'grel
[\[422b\]]
[\[422b.1\]]par/ pUnya las yang na Nar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ pra pa bi NI yaM yo maH/ sogs so/ /kr-it+ya l+Yu To ba hulaM/ mang po la kr-ita l+YuTa'o/ /bya ba sogs don mang po la kr-ita kyi ming can gyi rkyen l+YuT 'gyur te/ dper brjod 'og tu 'chad do/ /a tso yata/ a tsa las ya ta'o/ /byings
[\[422b.2\]]a tsa mtha' can rnams las pha rol du bya ba'i don la  rab tu dag zhib / ya ta 'gyur te/ tsinya gsog pa dang dzi rgyal ba la yata/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ tseyaM pu N+yaM twa yA/ dze yaM ma yA/ sogs so/ /'grel par byings dang po a tsa mtha' can
[\[422b.3\]]rjes su hal mthar 'gyur ba la'ang ya ta 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ dA la san sbyar/ mA g+hur b+ha la b+ha sogs kyis a tsa i sar bsgyur/ a b+h+yA sa phyis/ sa'i byings phyed  khyed kyis bsod nams gsog par bya/ bdag gis rgyal bar bya/ pa la 'os sa tar bsgyur bas/ det+sa zhes pa la ya ta
[\[422b.4\]]sbyar ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis bas/ di t+s+yaM/ I d+yati/ ya ta la Ita'o/ /byings Ata mtha' can ni rkyen yata pha rol la Ita du bsgyur bar bya ste/ dA sbyin pa/ dz+nyA khong du chud pa/ pA btung ba rnams la yata/ mdo 'dis A Ita/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/
[\[422b.5\]]de yaM/ dz+nyeyaM/ pe yaM/ sogs so/ /sbyin bya/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ta ki shasaM tsa ti ya ti dza ni b+h+yash+tsa yata/ ta ki  sha si  tsa ti  ya ti/ dza ni rnams las kyang yata'o/ /byings 'di rnams las kyang bya ba'i don la yata 'gyur re/ ta kyaM/ sha s+yaM/ tsa t+yaM/ ya t+yaM/ dza n+yaM/ 'grel
[\[422b.6\]]sbyin bya/ shes bya/ btung bya/ par lung drangs pa/ ha no bA yata/ han las yang na'o/ /han 'tshe ba las yata yang na 'gyur ro/ /yang 'grel par lung drangs pa/ ba ng+ha'ang ngo / /han gyi pha rol du yata byin na han  rgod bya/ 'tshe bya/ slong bya/ 'bad bya/ skye bya/ nyid pang+ha
[\[422b.7\]]zhes par 'gyur te/ han la lung 'dren snga ma'i yata byin lung 'dren 'dis han ba ng+har bsgyur bas/ ba ng+h+yaM/ 'tshe ba bya/ por du pa ng+hAta/ ata u pa ng+hA las bu las so/ /byings u ba ng+hA ata yin papu ste mtha' na pa sde'i yi ge gang rung zhig yod pa las yata 'gyur te/ la b+ha thob pa
[\[423a\]]
[\[423a.1\]]dza pa bzlas pa/ ra pa smrab rnams la mdo 'dis yata sbyar/ drangs pas/ la b+h+yaM/ dza pyaM/ ra pyaM/ sogs so/ /A ngonya pi/ Ang las kyang ngo / /nyer bsgyur Ang las pha rol gyi la b+ha thob pa las rkyen ya dang po pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/ ma gnas
[\[423a.2\]]don u brjod don no/ /A la m+ng+h+yaM gauH/ u pA ta shaM sA yaM/ u pa las the tshom la'o/ /thob bya/ bzlas bya/ smra bya/ nyer bsgyur u pa las pha rol gyi la b+ha las the tshom rtogs par bya ba la num A ga ma 'gyur te/ u pa la m+b+h+yaM/ sha ki sa hosh+tsa/ sha ki  sa ha dag las kyang
[\[423a.3\]]ngo / /sha klo nus  kun nas thob bya ba lang / pa dang Sha ha bzod pa dag las kyang yata 'gyur te/ shakyaM/ sah+yaM/ ga da ma da tsar ya mash+tsA nu pa sarge/ nyer bsgyur med pa la ga dam da tsa ra yam las kyang ngo / /nyer bsgyur sdon thob bam nye bar/ na med pa'i gad gsal bar brjod pa/ mdI dag pa/ tsa ra
[\[423a.4\]]g.yo ba/ ya mu nye bar 'gog ba rnams las kyang yata 'gyur te/ ga ng+yaM/ mang+yaM/ tsar+YaM/ ya myaM/ nus pa/ bzod bya/ tsa re rA ditsA gu rau/ tsa ri'i Ang las kyang bla ma ma yin pa las so/ /Ang las pha rol gyi tsa ra las kyang bla ma brjod pa ma yin pa la yata 'gyur te/ Atsa r+YaM de shaH/ bla
[\[423a.5\]]ma yin na N+ya sbyar u pa ng+hA'i 'os 'phel ba rkang pa ste tshig lhug pa'i med/ myos 'gyur chang / spyod pa/ 'gog bya/ byas pas/ AtsA r+YaH/ a ba ng+yapaN+ya bradz+yA gah+yapa Ni ta byA ni ro b+he ShuH/ a pa ng+ya  pa N+ya  bradz+ya rnams smad bya/ btsong bya/ 'gog pa med pa rnams la'o/ /nanya sngon ma'i bad smra  yul kun du spyod pa/
[\[423a.6\]]za/ pa na tha snyad/ bra dza 'gro ba rnams la yata sbyar bas/ a bang+yaM/ paN+yaM/ pra dz+yaM rnams rim pa bzhin/ slob dpon/ smad bya/ bcod bya/ 'gog pa med pa rnams brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /ba h+yaM ka ra NaM/ bah+yaM byed pa la'o/ /baha thob la ya ta sbyar bas/ ba h+yaM zhes pa byed pa po brjod pa
[\[423a.7\]]la tshig phrad du bya ste/ bah+yaM shakaTaM/ shing rta byed/ kha na ma tho ba/ zong / 'gro bya/ ar+YaHs+hA mi bai sh+ya yoH/ ar+YaHjo bo dang rje'u rigs dag la'o/ /r-i 'gro ba la yata sbyar bas ar+YaHzhes pa ni jo bo dang rje' rigs dag brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /r-i tu ma t+yu pa sar+YA/ u pa sar+YA zla
[\[423b\]]
[\[423b.1\]]mtshan can ma la'o/ /u pa snga ma'i sr-i 'gro ba la yata sbyar bas/ u pa sar+YA zhes pa bud med zla mtshan can ma brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /a dzar+YaM sang+ga taM/ a dzar+YaM yad dag song ba la'o/ /na nya snga ma'i dzrI lang tsho nyams pa la yata sbyar bas/ a dzar+Ya/ zhes pa yang dag par song ba
[\[423b.2\]]brjod pa la tshig phrad du bya'o/ /ri ha lo r+N+yata/ r-i dang hal las N+yata'o/ /byings r-i mtha' can dang hal mtha' can las bya ba'i don la N+yata 'gyur te/ Na yig 'phel ba'i don dang ta dbyangs don no/ /kr-inya byed ba/ hr-inya 'tshe ba dag la mdo 'dis N+yata sbyar/ dar yol ba'am na tshod song pa/ a tsa'i 'ang
[\[423b.3\]]nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ kAr+YaM/ hAr+YaM/ sogs so/ /han 'tshe ba laN+yata/ tsiN dang Nal ma yin pa la han gyi ta 'os/ nata/ han+ta'i nyaN 'gro ba la 'os ha g+ha/ upa ng+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ g+hA d+yaM/ tsa dzoHku g+hi N+ya toH/ tsa dza dag gi g+hi N+yata dag la
[\[423b.4\]]ku'o/ /byings mtha'i tsa yig dang dza yig  dgos bya/ 'phrog bya/ dag ni rkyen g+ha 'gro ba rnams dang N+yata pha rol la grangs mthun pa'i ka sder bsgyur te/ btsa 'tshed pa la/ r-i dang hal sogs kyis N+yata/ mdo 'dis tsaka  'tshe bya  u pang+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas bas/ pAkyaM/ de
[\[423b.5\]]bzhin du/ ru dzal N+yata mdo 'dis dza ga/ bug mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ ro gyaM/ na kwAdeH/ ku dang po'i ma yin no/ /ku steka sde dang po na yod pa'i mtha'i tsa dza dag ni g+hita dang N+yata pha rol la ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin te/ gardza sgra'i don la'o zhes pa la N+yata/ mdo  btso bya/
[\[423b.6\]]'dis dza gar mi 'gyur/ gar+dz+yaM/ sogs so/ /a dzi bra dz+yosh+tsa/ a ji bra dzi dag gi  na dab/ 'ang ngo / /a dza 'phen pa/ bra dza 'gro ba dag dang 'ang sgras badza 'gro ba rnams kyi'ang ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin te/ u pang+ngA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ Adz+yaM/ brAdz+yaM/ bAdz+yaM/ bany+tserga
[\[423b.7\]]tau/ pany+tsi'i 'gro ba la'o/ /sgra sgrog bany+tsi'i 'gro ba'i don brjod pa na ka sder mi 'gyur te/ bany+tsuM/ 'gro bya/ 'gro ba'i don ma yin na 'gyur te/ baM kyaM kASh+ThAM/ shing skyog po'am 'khyogs pa/ N+ya A ba sh+ya ke /N+ya la lhag par la'o/ /N+ya pha rol la lhag par bya ba la  mad/ 'gro bya/ 'jug pa
[\[424a\]]
[\[424a.1\]]na tsa dza dag ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin te/ a ba sh+yapA ts+yi/ sogs so/ /ya dza yA tsa ru tsa pra ba tsa rtsash+tsa/ yadza  yAtsa  ru tsa  pra btsa  r-i tsa'i 'ang ngo / /yadza lha mchod pa/ yAtsa slong ba/ rutsa 'bar ba/ pra sngon ma'i ba tsa brjod pa/ r-itsa mchod pa rnams kyi'ang N+ya
[\[424a.2\]]pha rol la ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin te/ yAdz+yaM/ yA ts+yaM/ lhag par 'tshed/ rots+yaM/ pra bAts+yaM/ artsAM/ 'grel bar t+ya dza lang tsho nyams pa dang pUdza mchod pa dag gi 'ang N+ya pha rol la ka sder 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bshad pas/ t+yAdz+yaM/ pU dz+yaM/ ba tso nyasha b+nga saMdz+nya yAM/ ba tsa'i sgra'i
[\[424a.3\]]ming ma yin la'o/ /ba tsa'i sgra'i  mchod bya/ slong bya/ ming ste brjod  'bar bya/ rab tu brjod bya/ mchod bya/ pa'i don ma yin pa la ka sder mi 'gyur te/ bAts+yaM/ brjod pa'i don la ka sder 'gyur bas/ bAkyaM/ pra yo dz+ya ni yo  rgan po/ mchod bya/ dz+yo+o shakyAr+tha/ pra yo dz+ya ni yo dz+ya dag
[\[424a.4\]]nus pa'i don la'o/ /pra dang ni sngon ma'i yu dzir sbyor ba la N+yata sbyar bas/ pra yo dz+ya dang ni yodz+ya dag nus pa'i don brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /nus pa'i don  mi smra ba/ min na dza gar bsgyur bas/ pra yo gyaM/ brjod bya/ ni yo gyaM/ 'grel pa/ b+hu dza'i 'ang za ba'i don la ka sder mi 'gyur ro
[\[424a.5\]]zhes pa shad pas/ b+hodz+ya man+naM/ za ba'i don min na ka sder 'gyur te/ b+ho gyaM/ orA ba sh+ya ke/ u las nges ba can la'o/ /byings u yig mtha' can las gdon mi za ba'am nges pa can gyi  rab tu sbyor bya/ nges par sbyor bya/ dngos po rtogs par byed pa'i don la N+yata 'gyur te/ lUnya
[\[424a.6\]]gcod pa la N+yata/ bza' bya bas/ a tsa'i 'ang nya Na 'gro ba la 'os 'phel ba/ skyong bya/ ya'i rkyen la ba'i mtha' can nos au A bar bsgyur bas/ a ba sh+ya lA byaM/ sogs so/ /A su yu ba pir bi la pi tra pi tsa mash+tsa/ Asu  yu  ba pi  ra pi  la pi  tra pi  tsam las kyang ngo / /Ang
[\[424a.7\]]snga ma'i Shunya mngon par skye ba/ yu spel ba/ Tu ba ba sa bon 'debs pa/ rab dang la pa gsal bar brjod pa/ tra pUSha ngo tsha ba/ tsa mu za ba  nges par gcad bya/ rnams las kyang N+yata 'gyur te/ A sA byaM/ kun du skye bar bya/ yA byaM/ spel bar bya/ pA pyaM/ gdab par bya/ rA pyaM/ gsal bar brjod pa lA
[\[424b\]]
[\[424b.1\]]pyaM| trApyaM/ tsA myaM/ dam+b+heshatsa/ dam+b+hi las kyang ngo / /da m+b+hi las N+yata 'gyur zhing na'ang dbyi ste/ dA b+h+yaM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ b+hadz+dzay+Ya dzAn mAM ya dwA/ b+hadza  dza ya  yadza  A na ma rnams kyi yata yang na'o/ /b+ha dza bsten pa/ dza ya dang ya dza lha mchod pa Ang sngon ma'i na ma
[\[424b.2\]]khrel yod/ bza' bya/ rab tu 'dud pa rnams las N+yad 'gyur zhing yang na yata 'gyur te/ tshul 'chos pa/ N+yata kyi phyogs la u pa ng+hA'i 'os 'phel ba byas pas/ N+yata  b+hA dz+yaM/ yata b+ha dz+yaM/ r+t+yata  dzA y+YaM/ yata  dzay+Ya/ N+yata  yA dz+yaM/ yaT  ya dz+yaM/ N+yata  AnA myaM/ yata  An myaM/ A nA y+Yonya ni t+ye/ A
[\[424b.3\]]nA y+Ya mi rtag pa la'o/ /Ang sngon ma'i nInya 'dren pa la N+yata sbyar bas/ A na y+Ya mi rtag pa ste lho phyogs kyi me brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /gzhan du/ A ne yaM/ pra  brten bya/ NA y+YonyasaM  mchod bya/ matau/ pra  mchod bya | NA y+YaHyang dag  kun nas 'dud pa/ par 'dod pa ma yin pa
[\[424b.4\]]la'o/ /pra sngon ma'i NInya 'dren pa la N+yata sbyar bas/ tsor  pra NA y+YaH/ lho'i me/ zhes pa ni yang dag par 'dod pa ma yin pa brjod pa la tshig phrad du  drang bar bya/ bya ste/ yang dag par 'dod pa ma yin pa las gzhan du/ pra Ne yaMsA ng+huH/ pAy+Ya sAn+tsA y+Ya ni kA y+Ya mA na ha bi rni bAs sA
[\[424b.5\]]mi ng+he nIShuH/ bA y+Ya  sAn+nA y+Ya  ni kA y+Ya  ng+hAy+Ya rnams nga  chom rkun/ rgyal dang / sreg rdzas dang / gnas dang / yam shing rnams la'o/ /pA btung ba/ sam sngon ma'i NI thob pa/ ni snga ma'i tsinya gsog pa/ ng+heT  legs po rab tu 'dren/ btung ba rnams la N+yata sbyar bas/ pA y+Ya/
[\[424b.6\]]sAn+na y+Ya/ ni kA y+Ya/ ng+hA y+Ya rnams ni rim pa bzhin/ nga rgyal dang / sreg rdzas dang / gnas dang yam shing rnams brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /don de rnams las gzhan du yata sbyar bas/ pe yaM/ san+ne yaM/ ni tse yaM/ ng+he yaM/ kra tau kuN+Da pA y+Ya saMtsA yau/ kuN+Da pA y+Ya/ sany+tsa y+Ya  de rgyal/
[\[424b.7\]]mar gyi khyad par/ gnas ris/ yam shing / dag mchod sbyin la'o/ /kuN+Da sngon ma'i phA btung ba dang saM sngon ma'i tsinya gsog ba dag la N+yata sbyar bas/ kuN+Da pA y+Ya dang / zhi ba 'thung / btung ba/ kun nas 'dren pa/ nges par gsog pa/ btung ba/ mchod sbyin/ sany+tsA y+Ya dag mchod sbyin mngon par brjod
[\[425a\]]
[\[425a.1\]]pa la tshig phrad du bya'o/ /a mA ba s+ya ta ra s+yaM/ a mA ba se yang na'o/ /a mA sngon ma'i bas nges par gnas pa la N+yata 'gyur zhing 'phel ba yang na bar bya ste/ a mA bA s+yA/ a mA ba s+yA/ pa daHsu pi kyap+tsa/ su pa la bad las kyang pa 'ang ngo / su pa las pha rol
[\[425a.2\]]gyi bad smra ba la yata 'gyur zhing kyapa kyang 'gyur te/ kyapa kyi pa tu ka A ga ma'i don dang / ka yig ka nga 'gro ba sogs kyi don te/ bra h+nA snga ma'i bad la kyapa/ ba tsi swa pi ya dza la sogs  gnam stong / pa rnams kyi ka 'gro ba la 'os/ /saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur/ a las yon tan nos
[\[425a.3\]]mtshams sbyar bas/ bra h+mo d+yaM/ yang na yata sbyar/ brah+ma ba d+yaM/ b+hu bo b+hA be/ b+hU las dngos po la'o/ /su pa las pha rol gyi b+hU yod pa la dngos po brjod pa la kyapa 'gyur te/ brah+ma b+hU yaM ga ta/ supa las pha rol min na yata sbyar bas/ b+ha byaM/ ha na sta tsa/ ha na las ta'ang
[\[425a.4\]]ngo / /tshangs pa'i brjod pa/ nyer bsgyur sngon na med pa'i  tshangs pa'i brjod pa/ su pa las pha rol gyi han 'tshe ba la dngos po brjod pa la kyapa 'gyur zhing na'ang tar bsgyur bar bya ste/ tshangs par gyur pa rtogs/ DAb  brah+ma ha d+yA/ e tistu shA sbr-i dr-i dzA ShaH kyapa/ legs ldan/ e ti stu shAs/ br-i dr-i
[\[425a.5\]]dzuSha las kyapa'o/ /e ti ste/ iN 'gro ba  Sh+Tunya bstod pa/ shA su rjes su ston pa/ br-inya sgrib pa/ dr-ing ma gus pa/ dzu Sh-i dga' ba rnams las kyang kyapa 'gyur ro/ hra swa s+ya pi ti kr-i ti tu ka/ /tshangs bcom ma/ thung ngu'i pa 'gro ba la kr-ita la tu ka'o/ /byings atsa thung ngu'i mtha'
