[\[425a.6\]]can la kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen pa 'gro ba pha rol du byung na tu ka A ga ma 'gyur te/ -iN dang stu la kyapa mdo 'dis tu ka byin pas/ i h+yaM/ stu t+yaM/ shA su la kyapa/ shAs kyi ang ha la dag la ita 'os/ A ita du bsgyur/ iN la Sha 'os sa Shar bsgyur bas/ shi Sh+yaH/ pr-inya
[\[425a.7\]]dang dr-i nga la kyapa/ tuka A ga ma byin pas/ pr-i t+yaH/ sgrib pa/ A dr-i t+yaH/ kun du ma gus pa/ dzuSha la kyapa sbyar bas/ 'di ltar/ bstod pa/ dzu Sh+yaH/ dga' ba/ shaM si gu hi du hi b+h+yo bA/ shaM si/ gu hi/ du hi rnams las yang na'o/ shi su bstod pa/ du ha 'jo ba/ slob ma/ gu hU
[\[425b\]]
[\[425b.1\]]nas sgrib pa rnams las kyapa yang na 'gyur te/ ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ sha s+yaM/ du h+yaM/ gu h+yaM/ yang na yata sbyar bas/ shi s+yaM/ do h+yaM/ go h+yaM/ Ang pU rbA da dze sh+tsa saM dz+nyA yAM/ Ang sngon ma las a dzi las kyang ming la'o/ Ang sngon ma'i a dza 'phen
[\[425b.2\]]pa la kyapa sbyar bas/ A dz+yi zhes pa'ang ming brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /r-i du pa d+hAts+tsA kl-i bi ts+r-i taH/ lo tog/ ba bzhon ma/ gsang ba/ n+ny-Ita u pa d+hA las  bstod pa/ 'jo ba/ gsang ba/ kyang kl-i pa dang ts+r-ita ma yin pa las so/ /byings r-ita u pa d+hA las kyang kl-i pU nus pa dang ts+r-i tI 'tshed pa dag
[\[425b.3\]]ma yin pa la kyapa/ mar/ 'gyur te/ dr-i tu 'jug pa la kyapa sbyar bas/ dr-i t+yaM/ kl-i pU dang ts+r-i tI la N+yata sbyar bas/ saM kal+b+yaM/ bi tsar+t+yaM/ pA Nau sr-i dze r+N+yata/ pA Ni la sr-i dza las N+yata'o/ pA Ni sngon ma'i sr-i dza rnam par bcad pa las N+yata 'gyur te/ tsa dza sogs kyis gar bsgyur/ phu ka
[\[425b.4\]]mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ pA Ni sa rgyA ra dz+dzuH/ sa ma ba purbA ts+tsa/ 'jug pa/ saM a ba sngon ma las kyang ngo / kun du rtogs pa/ rnam par dpyod pa/ nyer bsgyur saM a pa sngon ma'i sr-idza las kyang N+yata 'gyur te/ sa ma ba sargyaM/ Itsa khanaH/ kha na'i I'ang ngo / kha nu 'joms pa la
[\[425b.5\]]kyapa 'gyur zhing na I ru bsgyur te/ lag pas bsgril thag pa/ kha na la kyapa/ na Ir bsgyur/ a las yon tan byas pas/ khe yaM/ b+h+r-i nyo ny+ra saM dz+nyA yAM/ b+h+r-inya las ming ma yin pa la'o/ b+h+r-inya 'dzin pa la gang / legs par kun tu rnam par bcad/ zag gi ming ma yin pa la kyapa 'gyur te/
[\[425b.6\]]thung ngu sogs kyis tuka byin pas/ b+h+r-i t+yaM/ ming ma yin na N+yata sbyar 'phel ba byas pas/ b+hAr+YA/ saM b+h+r-inyo bA/ saM b+h+r-inya/ 'joms pa/ las yang na'o/ /saM sngon ma'i b+h+r-inya las kyapa yang na 'gyur zhing yang na N+yata 'gyur te/ saM b+h+r-i t+yaH/ saM b+hAr+YaH/ sr-i dze rbi b+hA ShA/ sr-i dzi'i 'dam ka'o/
[\[425b.7\]]sr-idza rnam par bcad pa la kyapa dang  gla rdan/ N+yata 'dam ka can du bya ste/ kyapa sr-i dz+yaH/ rnam par bcad pa/ N+yota/ sAr+dz+yA/ rA dza sU ya sUr+Ya mr-i Sho d+ya ru ts+ya ku pya kr-iSh+Ta pa ts+yA bya th+yA/ rA dza sUya/ sUr+Ya/ mr-iSho d+ya/ ru ts+ya/ ku pya/ kr-iSh+Ta pa ts+ya/ bsags pa/ rgyal rigs legs pa/ a bya th+ya rnams so/ rA dza
[\[426a\]]
[\[426a.1\]]sngon ma'i Shu ded pa/ sr-i 'gro ba/ mr-i Sha sngon ma'i ba da brjod pa/ ru tsa 'bar ba/ ku pa khro ba/ kr-iSh+Ta sngon ma'i pa tsa 'tshed pa/ nanya sngon ma'i bya tha sdug bsngal ba rnams las kyapa sbyar bas/ rA dza sU ya/ sUr+Ya/ mr-i Sho d+ya/ ru ts+ya/ ku pya/ kr-iSh+Ta pa ts+ya/ a bya
[\[426a.2\]]th+ya rnams rim pa bzhin/ rgyal po khrus byed do/ /nyi ma/ mi bden par byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /khro bar byed do/ /blangs nas btso bar bya'o/ /nad med par bya'o zhes pa rnams  rgyal po khrus byed do/ /nyi ma/ mi bden par byed do/ /gsal ba byed do/ /khro bar bya'o/ /blangs nas btso bar bya'o/ /
[\[426a.3\]]nad med par bya'o/ /brjod pa la tshig phrad du bya'o/ /b+hi d+yo d+h+h+yau na de/ b+had+ya/ ad+h+h+ya dag chu bo la'o/ /b+hi dir 'joms pa dang / udz+dz+ha gtong ba dag la kyapa sbyar bas/ b+hi d+ya dang / ud+t+h+ya dag chu bo'i ming brjod pa la tshig phrad du bya'o/ /pu Sh+ya sid+t+h+yau na k+Sha tre/ pu Sh+ya dang sid+h+ya dag skar ma la'o/ /pu Sha
[\[426a.4\]]rgyas pa dang Shi d+hU bstan bcos dag la kyapa sbyar bas/ pu Sh+ya/ si d+h+ya dag skar ma brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /bi pU ya bi nI ya dzi t+ya muny+dzakalka ha li Shu/ bi pU ya/ binI ya/ tshu bo/ chu bo/ dze t+ya rnams muny+dza snyigs pa ma thong ba rnams la'o/ bi snga ma'i pUng dag pa dang NInya thob pa/ dzi rgyal ba
[\[426a.5\]]rnams la kyapa sbyar bas/ bipU ya/ binI ya/ rgyal/ rgyu skar/ dzi t+ya rnams rtswa muny+dza'i ska rags dang / snyigs ma dang / thong ba rnams brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /pra t+ya bi b+h+yAM gra heHts+tshan+da si/ pra ti a pi dag las gra hi las sdeb sbyor la'o/ pra ti dang a pi dag las pha rol gyi gra ha nye bar
[\[426a.6\]]len pa/ rtswa muny+dza'i ska rags/ snyog ma'am 'dres pa'am snyigs ma/ thong ba can/ las sdeb sbyor la kyapa 'gyur te/ gra hi dz+ya sogs kyis saM pra sAr Nar bsgyur bas/ pra ti gr-i h+yaM/ a pi gr-i h+yaM/ pa dA swai ri pA h+yA pa k+She Shu tsa/ tshig rang dbang min pa phyi rol phyogs rnams la'ang ngo / tshig dang / rang
[\[426a.7\]]dbang min pa dang / phyi rol dang / phyogs rnams kyi don brjod pa la'ang gra ha las kyapa 'gyur te/ a pa gr-i h+ya pa daM/ tshig mtshams ma sbyar ba/ so sor 'dzin/ 'dzin kyang / gr-i h+yaHa swai ri/ rang dbang min pa bzung / grA ma gr-i h+yA sen/ grong gi phyi rol na dmag/ rwa ma gr-i h+yaH/ dga' byed kyi phyogs/
[\[426b\]]
[\[426b.1\]]bi b+hA ShA kr-i br-i ShoH/ kr-i br-iSha dag las 'dam ka'o/ /kr-inya byed dang / br-i Shu bkru ba dag las kyapa dang N+yata 'dam ka can du bya ste/ kyapa  kr-i t+yaM/ n+yata  kAr+Ya/ kyapa  br-i Sh+yaM/ N+yata  bar+Sh+yaM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ prai ShA ti sarga prA p+ta ka leShu kr-i t+ya sh+tsa/ rab tu 'dod pa skye ba thob pa'i dus
[\[426b.2\]]rnams la kr-ita'ang ngo / rab tu thob pa'i dus dang skye ba'am klog pa dang thob pa'i dus rnams brjod pa la'ang kr-ita kyi ming can gyi  bya ba'am dgos pa'am 'bras bu'am 'phrin las/ khrus bya/ rkyen rnams 'gyur te/ pra sngon ma'i iShu 'dod pa dang / ad+hi sngon ma'i ing klog pa dang / pra snga ma'i
[\[426b.3\]]a bl-i khyab pa rnams la snga phyi gnyis la k+ta dang bar pa la yata sbyar bas/ pre Shi ta twaM/ a d+h+ye yaM/ prA p+ta te kA laH/ b+ha bya ge ya pra ba tsa nI yo pa s+thA nI a dze n+yA p+lA byA pA t+yAH/ p+ha bya  ge ya  pra ba tsa nI ya/ u pa s+thA ni ya  dzan+yA  p+lA byA  pA t+yA rnams so/ /b+hU yod pa dang gai sgra la yata dang /
[\[426b.4\]]pra sngon ma'i pa tsa brjod pa dang / u pa snga ma'i s+thA gnas pa dag la a  khyod rab tu 'dod nas/ klog bya/ khyod kyis thob pa'i dus/ nI yar dang / dzan skye ba dang / p+lu 'gro ba dang / pa t+li lhung pa gsum la N+yata rnams sbyar bas/ b+ha bya/ gi ya/ pra ba tsa nI yaH/ u pa s+thA nI ya/ dzA n+yA/ blA byA/
[\[426b.5\]]pA t+yA rnams kyang tshig phrad du bya'o/ /'grel par lung drangs pa/ sha ki ling tsa/ nus pa la ling 'ang ngo / /nus pa rtogs par byed pa la ling 'gyur zhing / kr-ita kyi rkyen rnams kyang 'gyur te/ ba ha la a nI yar  yod pa/ bsgrags pa/ gsungs rab/ nye gnas/ skye ba/ 'gro bya/
[\[426b.6\]]lhung bya/ sbyar bas/ ba ha nI yaH/ i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU t+r+'a t+k+r-i taHsamA p+taH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las kr-ita rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod
[\[426b.7\]]pa legs bshad nor  thob nus/ bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen gyi nang nas gtso che ba dngos po dang las kyi don la 'jug pa'i rkyen rnams kyi 'jug yul cho ga dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni byed pa po'i don gyi rkyen rnams
[\[427a\]]
[\[427a.1\]]kyi cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ N+wul tr-i tsau/ N+wul tr-i tsa dag go/ /byings las byed pa po ste byed pa can dang bya ba'i don la N+wul dang tr-itsa 'gyur te/ N+wul gyi la dang tr-itsa'i dbyangs don/ Na 'phel ba sogs kyi don no/ kr-inya la N+wul/ a tsa'i'ang nyaN 'gro ba la sogs 'phel
[\[427a.2\]]ba/ rjes 'brel la phyis nas/ yu bu dag gi a na a ka dag gos bu a kar bsgyur bas/ kA ra kaH/ kr-inya la tr-itsa/ byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas/ su sbyin bas/ kartA/ de bzhin du/ NInya thob pa la N+wul dang tr-itsa gnyis sbyar bas/ N+wul nA+e ya kaH/ ne tA/ tr-itsa/
[\[427a.3\]]kuT la N+wul dang tr-itsa/ N+wul la yon tan/ tr-itsa la ba la dang po'i iT/ kuT sogs kyi kita  byed pa/ yin pas yon tan mi byed/ N+wul/ koT kaH/ tr-itsa su  kuTi tA/ Du dAnya la/ N+wul/ byed po/ dang tr-itsa N+wul gyi phyogs la/ tsiN kr-ita dag la Ata las yu ka 'os yuka/ 'dren par byed/
[\[427a.4\]]A ga ma byin pas/ N+wul dA ya kaH/ tr-itsa su dA tA/ sha mu dang dmu la N+wul dang titsa ma mtha' sogs kyis 'phel pa mi byed/ iT byin pas/ kyu byed/ N+wul/ sha ma kaH/ tr-itsa/ sha mi tA/ N+wul/ da ma kaH/ tr-itsa  da ni tA/ sogs so/ /'grel par las kyi don la'ang N+wul 'gyur ro zhes byung
[\[427a.5\]]bas/ hr-inya la N+wul sbyar 'phel/ sbyin pa byed/ ba byas pas/ pa da hA ra kaH/ na n+di gra hi pa tsA di b+h+yo l+yu Ni bya tsa/ na n+di gra hi pa tsa la sogs pa rnams las l+lu Ni ni atsa zhi bar byed/ rnams so/ zhi bar byed/ byed pa po'i don la nan+da la sogs pa rnams la l+Yu dang / l+la hi la sogs pa rnams
[\[427a.6\]]la Ni ni dang / pa tsa la sogs pa rnams la atsa rnams 'gyur te/ rkang pas byed/ l+Yu'i la rtags don dang / Ni ni na'i i brjod don dang Na 'phel ba'i don/ a tsa'i tsa dbyangs don no/ nan+da dga' ba/ pa sa gnas pa/ ma da dga' ba/ dU Sha sun 'byin byed pa/ sA d+ha 'grub pa/ shu
[\[427a.7\]]b+ha mdzes pa/ br-i d+ha 'phel ba/ Sha ha bzod pa/ ta pa gdung pa/ dzalpa bzlas pa rnams la l+Yu la phyis/ yu a nar bsgyur bas/ nan+da naH/ dga' byed/ ba sa naH/ gnas byed/ ma da naH/ myos byed/ dU Sha NaH/ sun 'byin/ sA d+ha naH/ sgrub byed/ sho b+ha naH/ mdzes byed/ bar+d+ha naH/ 'phel byed/
[\[427b\]]
[\[427b.1\]]sa ha naH/ ta pa naH/ dzalpa na/ sogs so/ /gra ha dang / s+thA la Ni ni gra ha la 'phel ba dang / s+thA la Ata la puka 'os puka byin pas/ grA hrI/ s+thA pI/ sogs so/ /pa tsa dang di pu tse ba la atsa byin pas/ pa tsaH/ de baH/ sogs so/ /ya ngonya tsi tsi ti ya ngo luka/ /yang
[\[427b.2\]]bzod byed/ gdung byed/ smra byed/ las atsa ste yang 'ang 'jig go/ /byings yang gi mtha' can la'ang a tsa 'gyur te atsa pha rol la yang  'dzin par byed/ gnas par byed/ yang 'jig go/ /NI dang lU yang rkyen bcas/ 'tshed par byed/ lha/ ne nI ya dang lo lU ya la atsa byin yang 'jig/ /
[\[427b.3\]]yang phyis pa'i rjes yin pas yon tan mi byed/ snga ma la atsa gcig ma yin pa sogs kyis yan dang / phyi ma la atsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis u bar bsgyur bas/ ne n+yaH/ lo lu baH/ sogs so/ /'grel par u mtha' can las yang rkyen yang na mi 'jig go zhes bshad
[\[427b.4\]]pas/ yang na yang rkyen ma phyis pa ata kyi dbyi 'os a phyis pas/ ro rU yaH/ sogs so/ /tsa ri tsa li pa ti pa dI nAM bA twi twa ma pyA k+tsA b+h+y+ra sa se/ tsa ri  tsa li  shin tu 'dren par byed/ shin tu gcod par byed/ pa ti/ ba di rnams kyi gnyis nyid yang na ste a b+h+yA sa'i A k+tsa 'ang ngo / tsa ra dang tsa
[\[427b.5\]]la g.yo ba/ pa da lhung ba/ ba da brjod pa rnams kyi atsa pha rol la/ shin tu smra bar byed/ yang na gnyis brjod cing gnyis brjod pa na a b+h+ya sa'i Ak+tsa A ga ma 'gyur te/ a brjod don tsa khyad don ka gnas don no/ byings de rnams la atsa gnyis brjod Ak+tsa A ga ma byin pas/ tsa
[\[427b.6\]]rA tsa raH/ tsa lA tsa laH/ pa tA pa taH/ pa dA pa daH/ sogs sam yang na gnyis ma brjod na/ tsa raH/ tsa laH/ pa taH/ pa daH/ sogs so/ /'grel par/ kr-inya la dngos po'i don la ka 'gyur te/ ka pha rol la gnyis brjod pa'ang ngo zhes bshad pas/ kr-i la ka gnyis brjod/
[\[427b.7\]]'gro bar byed/ g.yo bar byed/ lhung bar byed/ smra bar byed/ ri'i ata/ ku ha dag gi tsu/ kra kita  'gro bar byed/ g.yo bar byed/ ltung bar byed/ sga bar byed/ kyi don yin pas kra phyis/ ika gi atsa la yaN sbyar pas/ tsa kraM/ bya ba/ yang na atsa sbyar bas/ ka raH/ byed pa/ rA treHkr-i ti bi b+hA
[\[428a\]]
[\[428a.1\]]ShA/ rA tri'i kr-ita la gdam nga'o/ ming kr-ita rkyen can pha rol la rA tril mu ma A ga ma ster ba dang mi ster ba yang na bar byas pas/ rA triM tsaraH/ rA tritsa raH/ sogs so/ /i gu pa d+hadz+nyA prI ki raHkaH/ i ka u pad+hAX dang dz+nyA phrI kr-I las ka'o/ /byings ika u pa
[\[428a.2\]]d+hAn yod pa dang dz+nya khong du chud pa/ prInya tshim pa/ kr-i rnam par g.yeng ba rnams las ka 'gyur te/ kra ki ta kyi don no/ i ka u pa d+hA la bi snga ma'i k+Shipa  mtshan mo spyod pa/ 'phel pa la ka byin pas/ pi k+Shi paH/ dz+nyA la ka/ iT la'ang Ata kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ dz+nyaHprI la ka/
[\[428a.3\]]atsa la sh+nu byings sogs kyis i yar bsgyur bas/ pri yaH/ uta snga ma'i kr-I la ka//byings kyi r-Ita kyi ita 'os r-I ita/ r-i'i aN la ra pha rol los ra byin pas/ u t+ki raH/ 'grel par kr-I mid pa/ rnam g.yeng / la'ang ka 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ giraH/ shes/ A[:]
[\[428a.4\]]ta sh+tso pa sarge/ Ata las kyang nyer bsgyur la'o/ dga' ba/ nyer bsgyur gang rung sngon nas yod pa'i byings Ata mtha' can las kyang ka 'gyur te/ pras+thaH/ su daH/ pra dz+nyaH/ 'thor ba/ a b+hi dz+nyaH/ sogs so/ pA g+hA d+h+mA d+heT dr-i shaHshaH/ pA  g+h+ra  d+h+mA  d+heT  dr-i sha las  mid par byed/
[\[428a.5\]]sha'o/ /pA btung ba/ g+hA dri nye bar len pa/ d+h+mA sgra/ d+heT btung ba/ dr-i shir lta ba rnams las sha pha rol tu 'gyur te/ sha yig shita kyi don no/ bre/ legs sbyin/ shes rab/ mngon par shes pa/ pA g+h+na sogs kyis pi ba sogs su bsgyur bas/ ut+pi baH/ udz+dzi g+h+raH/ bi d+ha maH/
[\[428a.6\]]ud+d+ha yaH/ ut+pa sh+yaH/ sogs so/ a nu pas rgA l+li m+pa pon+da d+hA ri pA ri ded+thu de dzi tse ti sA ti sA hi b+h+ya sh+tsa/ zher bsgyur med pa las li m+pa/ bin+da  d+hA ri  pA ri  de bi  u de dzi tse ti  sA hi rnams las kyang ngo / /li pi byug pa dang / pi di cha shas la  steng 'thung / steng snom/ rnam par gdung /
[\[428a.7\]]shin tu 'thung / steng du blta/ ita 'gro ba sogs kyis nu ma dang / d+h+r-inya 'dzin pa/ pr-i dga' ba/ bi da shes pa/ uta sngon ma'i/ e dzr-i 'baRa ba/ tsi tI ming / sa ta mdo'i byings/ Sha ha bzod pa rnams Ni tsa'i mtha' can/ d+hA ra sogs nyer bsgyur sngon na med las sha 'gyur te/ yon
[\[428b\]]
[\[428b.1\]]tan bya/ bas/ li m+paH/ bin+daH/ pA ra yaH/ pe da yaH/ u de dza yaH/ tsa ta yaH/ sA ta yaH/ sA ha yaH/ da dA ti da d+hA t+yorbi b+hA ShA/ da dA ti/ da d+hA ti dag las 'dam ka'o/ /Du dA nya sbyin pa dang / Du d+hAnya 'dzin pa dag las sha 'gyur la sha pha rol la yang na sh+pu bzhin
[\[428b.2\]]gnyis kyang  th+yug pa byed/ cha shas byed/ 'dzin 'dod byed/ dga' bar byed/ shes par byed/ shin tu 'bar bar byed/ shes par byed/ mdo byed dam gzhung byed/ bzod pa byed/ brjod de/ dwanya dang d+hAnya la sha gnyis brjod/ a b+h+ya sta dag gi 'os a phyis pas/ dngaH/ da ng+haH/ yang na Ata las uka byin pas/ dA
[\[428b.3\]]ya:/ d+hA ya:/ lta bu'o/ dz+wa lwa di b+h+yo Na:a n+ya ta ra s+yaM/ dz+wa la sogs pa rnams la Na yang na'o/ dz+wal 'bar ba nas kab kyi bar dz+wal la sogs pa ste byings de rnams la Na yang na 'gyur te/ Na 'phel ba sogs kyi don no/ /sbyin par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ dz+wA la:/ tsA la:/ sogs dang /
[\[428b.4\]]sbyin par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ yang na atsa sbyar bas/ dzA la:/ tsa la:/ sogs so/ sh+yA d+h+ya shru saM s+r+wa tIN pa sA ba hr-i liha sh+liSha shwa sh+tsa/ sh+yA  Ata  bya d+ha  A shru  saM sru  a t+liN  a ba sA  a ba hr-i  li ha  sh+liSha shwas las kyang ngo / /'bar ba/ g.yo ba/ sh+yaing 'gro ba'i sh+yA dang /
[\[428b.5\]]byings Ata mtha' can rnams dang bya d+ha 'tshog pa/ 'bar ba/ g.yog  Ang sngon ma'i shru thos pa/ saM sngon ma'i sru 'gro ba/ a ti snga ma'i in 'gro ba/ a ba snga ma'i Sho mtha'i las dang / hr-inya 'tshe ba/ liha ro myang ba/ sh+li Sha 'khyung pa/ shwas srog rnams las kyang Na 'gyur te/ etsa rnams
[\[428b.6\]]sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa sogs kyis Ata du bsgyur/ Ata las uka ster ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ sh+yA ya:/ dA ya:/ pyA d+ha:/ A shwA ba:/ saM srA ba:/ a t+yA ya:/ a ba sA ya:/ a ba hA ra:/ le ha:/ sh+leSha:/ shwAs:/ du n+yor nu pa sarba/ nyer bsgyur med
[\[428b.7\]]pa la du nI dag las so/ /nyer bsgyur sngon na med pa'i Tu du nye par gdung ba dang / NInya 'dren pa dag las Na 'gyur  zil nga'am ba mo/ sbyin pa/ nang / kun nas thos pa/ yang dag pa la 'gro ba/ shin tu 'grog/ mtha' dag/ kun 'phrog/ ro myang ba/ 'khyud pa/ dbugs 'byung / te/ dA ba:/ nags tsha la/
[\[429a\]]
[\[429a.1\]]nA ya:/ pi b+hA ShA gra ha:/ gra ha las 'dam ka'o/ gra ha las Na yang na 'gyur te/ graha:/ dza la tshar:/ yang na atsa sbyar bas/ graha:sUr+YA di:/ ge he ka:/ khang pa la ka'o/ gra ha las khang pa brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/ gra hi dz+yA sogs kyis saM phra sA Nar bsgyur
[\[429a.2\]]bas/ 'dren pa'am khrid/ gr-iha:/ shalpi ni Sh+wun/ bzo bo la Sh+wu na no/ /nr-i tI lus bskyod pa/ chu srin 'dzin khri/ chu na rgyu ba/ kha nu 'joms pa/ gza' ste nyi ma la sogs pa/ rany+dza rnams las bzo bo brjod pa la Sh+wun 'gyur te/ na dbyangs don/ Sha Shi ta la dI Sha'i don/ yu pu dag gi an a ka
[\[429a.3\]]dag gos bu a kar bsgyur bas/ khab bam khad pa'am khyim/ narta ka:/ kha na ka:/ ta dza ka:/ btso blag mkhan/ ga:thaka:/ gA la tha kan 'o/ gai sgra la'o zhes pa la sha 'gro ba nye ba'i yul ma yin pa sogs kyis etsa Ata du bsgyur bas gA las tha kan 'gyur te/ gA tha ka:/ N+yu T+tsa/
[\[429a.4\]]N+yu Ta lang ngo / gA las N+yuT 'ang 'gyur te/ Ta Tita kyi/ gar mkhan/ rkos mkhan/ tshig phrad la na phyis/ don dang Na 'phel ba'i don/ yu a nar bsgyur Ata las yuka A ga ma byin pas/ gA ya na:/ ha sh+tsa prI hi kA la yo:/ hA las kyang 'bru dang dus/ blu mkhan nam tshigs bcad mkhan
[\[429a.5\]]dag la'o/ o hAka gtong ba las 'bru dang dus dag brjod la N+yuta 'gyur te/ hA ya na:/ nA ma brI ha ya:/ hA ya na:sa m+pa t+sa ra:/ pru sr-i lwa:sa ma p+hi hA re bun/ pru sr-i lU las/ glu mkhan ma/ mnyam pa'i byed pa la bun 'o/ prung dang sr-i 'gro ba/ lUnya gcod pa rnams sa mnyam
[\[429a.6\]]pa'i byed pa brjod pa la bun 'gyur te/ na dbyangs don bu a kar bsgyur bas/ 'bru/ zhes bya ba'i 'bru/ zhes bya ba'i 'bru/ 'dor byed de lo'o/ pra ba ka:/ sa ra kaH/ la ba ka:/ A shi She tsa/ smon pa la'ang ngo / /byings las smon pa rtogs par byed pa la'ang bun 'gyur te/ dzI ba srog 'tsho ba/ nan+da
[\[429a.7\]]dga' ba la bun sbyar bas/ dzIb ka:/ 'tsho bar shog/ nan+da ka:/ dga' bar shog// sogs so/ k+titsa k+tau tsa saM dz+nyA yAM/ khrus mkhan/ phor bzo ba/ 'dreg mkhan/ ming la k+titsa dang k+ta dag kyang ngo / /byings las ming gi don brjod pa la k+titsa dang k+ta dag 'gyur ro/ ti tu tra ta thA si su sa ra ka
[\[429b\]]
[\[429b.1\]]se shu tsa/ ti tu tra ta[: ]thA si su[: ]sar[: ]ka sa rnams la'ang ngo / kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen ti la sogs pa 'di rnams la iT 'gyur ba ma yin no/ b+hU yod pa la mdo sngon mas k+ti tsa byin/ tsa dbyangs don kra yon tan 'gog pa'i don mdo 'dis iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ b+hU hiH/ de bzhin du
[\[429b.2\]]srog chags mang la nas skye ba la k+titsa sbyar bas/ sU taH/ sogs so/ /a nu nA si kas+ya shwi dz+ha loH/ rjes su sna ldan gyi dz+hal kang 'gro ba la kwing dag la'o/ /byings rjes su sna ldan mtha' can gyi u pa d+hA ni kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen dz+h+yal dang po kang 'gro ba'i ming  'byor ba/ can dang kwipa
[\[429b.3\]]rnams pha rol la ring por 'gyur ro/ skye ba/ nak+ti tsi dIr+g+ha sh+tsa/ k+titsa la ring po'ang ma yin no/ gong du k+dita dz+hal dang po la rjes su sna ldan mtha' can gyi u pa d+hA ring por bsgyur ba bshad kyang de'i dmigs bsal rkyen k+titsa pha rol la ban sogs dang tan sogs iT med pa rnams kyis
[\[429b.4\]]u pa d+hA ring por bsgyur ba dang na dbyi ba sogs mi byed de/ ya mu nye bar 'gog pa/ ba nu slong ba/ ta nu rgyas pa rnams la k+titsa sbyar bas/ yaM ti/ baM ti/ taM ti/ sogs so/ sa naHk+ti tsi lo pa sh+tsA n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ san gyi k+titsa la yang na dbyi'o/ san te Sha nu sbyin pa'i na yig dpyi ba dang
[\[429b.5\]]A ta du bsgyur ba sogs k+titsa pha rol la yang na pya ste/ sA tiH/ sa yiH/ san+tiH/ karma N+ya Na/ las las aNa'o/ bya ba'i las gang yin/ 'gog pa/ slong ba/ rgyas pa/ pa de las pha rol du bya ba'i don la aN 'gyur te/ kum+b+ha kA ra:/ kAN+Da lA baH/ sogs so/ hwA bA ma sh+tsa/ hwA bA
[\[429b.6\]]mA las kyang ngo / hwenya 'dren benya thags kyi rgyu'i etsa/ sbyin pa/ sbyin pa/ Ata du bsgyur pas hwA dag dang mAng tshad rnams las kyang aN 'gyur te/ Ata las yuka A ga ma byin pas/ swarga hwA yaH/ taM tu bA yaH/ bum pa byed pa ste rdza mkhan/ tsher ma brngab/ d+hA n+ya mA yaH/ A tonya nu pa
[\[429b.7\]]sarge kaH/ Ata las nyer bsgyur med pa la ka'o/ las las pha rol gyi byings Ata mtha' las nyer bsgyur med pa la ka 'gyur te/ dA sbyin pa la ka/ iT las kyang Ata kyi dbyi 'os A phyis pas/ mtho ris su 'dren/ thags kyi rgyu/ go da:/ ba lang sbyin/ 'gru'i tshad de bya'o/ zhos sbyin/ kan+pa la
[\[430a\]]
[\[430a.1\]]daH/ su bis+thAH/ su pa la s+thA las so/ su pa mtha' las pha rol gyi s+thA gnas pa las ka 'gyur te/ aN 'gyur ba ma yin no/ sa ma s+thAH/ ba na s+thAH/ a m+thA mA go b+hA mi sa byA ba dwi tri ku she ku shaM kwaM gu many+dza puny+dzi pa ra me bar+hi di bya g+ni b+h+yeHs+thAH/ a m+pa  a mA  go  b+hU mi  sa pyA pa
[\[430a.2\]]dwi tri  ku  she ku  shaM ku  aM gu  many+dzi  puny+dza  par me  bar+hi  di bi  ag+ni rnams las s+thI'i'o/ a m+pa la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi  mnyam gnas/ nags gnas/ s+thI sa yig ni Sha yig tu 'gyur te/ de rnams sngon ma'i s+thA la ka// A phyis mdo 'dis sa Sha/ Sha TU la kha Tu 'os/
[\[430a.3\]]tha Thar bsgyur bas/ a mA Sh+ThaH/ A mA Sh+ThaH/ goSh+ThaH/ b+hU mi Sh+ThaH/ sa byA pa Sh+ThaH/ dwiSh+ThaH/ triSh+ThaH/ kuSh+ThaH/ shekuSh+ThaH/ aM guSh+ThaH/ puny+dzaSh+ThaH/ pa ra meSh+ThaH/ bar+hiSh+ThaH/ di biSh+ThaH/ a g+niSh+ThaH/ tun+da sho ka yoH/ pa ri mr-i dzA pha nu ngoH/ pa ri mr-i dza dang a pa
[\[430a.4\]]nu da dag las le lo dang mya  ma gnas/ ma lang gnas/ sa gnas/ g.yas gnas/ gnyis gnas/ gsum gnas/ ngan gnas/ gcub gnas/ phur bu gnas/ mthe bong gnas/ le brgan nam btsod/ dpung pa/ mchog gnas/ rma bya/ lha gnas/ me gnas/ ngan ngag la'o/ pa ri mr-i dza dang a pa nu da dag las rim pa bzhin
[\[430a.5\]]le lo dang mya ngan dag brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/ pa ri mr-i dzaH/ a la saH/ a pa nu daH/ shokA/ mU la bi b+hu dzA de sh+tsa/ bi b+hu dza la sogs pa rnams las kyang rtsa pa la'o/ pi b+hu dza la sogs pa rnams las kyang rtsa pa brjod pa la ka 'gyur te/ bi b+hu dzaH/ ku mu daM/ pre dA dz+nyaH/ pra las
[\[430a.6\]]dA dz+nya las so/ pra snga ma'i dA sbyin pa dang dz+nyA shes pa las ka  le lo/ 'gyur te/ pra daH/ mya ngan/ pra dz+nyAH/ gA poSh+Ta ka/ gA pA dag las Taka'o/ supa las pha rol gyi gai sgra dang pA btung ba dag las Ta ka 'gyur te/ ka kita kyi don da Ta dI pa kyi don no// ku mu da'i rtsa ba/ bak+t+ra gaH/ sa ma gaH/
[\[430a.7\]]sU ra paH/ chang 'thung ba/ shi d+hu paH/ ha ra te ra nu d+ya ma ne tsa/ ha ta ti las nus  rab sbyin/ shes rab/ pa ma yin pa la'ang ngo / ha ra ti ste hr-inya 'tshe ba las nus pa ma yin pa'i don la atsa 'gyur te/ aM sha ha raH/ cha shas 'phrog/ nus pa yin na Na sbyar  zhal nas gsung / snyan mchog gi g+pu
[\[430b\]]
[\[430b.1\]]bas/ b+hA ra hA raH/ shak+ti lAM ga la ku sha ya Sh+Ti to ma ra g+ha Ta nu Shu gra heH/ shak+ti  lAM ga la  kur sha  yaSh+Ti  to ma ra  g+ha Ta  da TI  d+ha nu rnams la gra hi las so/ shak+ti la sogs pa 'di rnams snga ma'i gra ha las atsa 'gyur te/ shak+ti gra haH/ lAM ga la gra haH/ ku sha gra haH/
[\[430b.2\]]khur 'phrog/ yaSh+Ti gra haH/ to ma ra gra haH/ g+ha Ta gra haH/ da Ti gra haH/ d+ha nu gra haH/ ba ya si tsa/ na tshod la'o/ na tshod brjod pa dang 'di la pa'i hr-inya la atsa 'gyur te/ ka ba tsa ha raHku mA raH/ 'grel par ngang tshul brjod pa la Ang  mdung 'dzin/ gshol mdza' 'dzin/ ku sha 'dzin/
[\[430b.3\]]dbyug pa 'dzin/ dgra sta 'dzin/ sAng 'dzin/ gzhu 'dzin/ sngon ma'i hr-inya las a tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ pha lA ha raH/ yang 'grel par bdun pa'i rjes  go cha phrogs so gzhon nu yis/ gnas pa la'ang atsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ sta m+b+he sngon ma'i ra mu la
[\[430b.4\]]a tsa byin pas/ sta m+b+he ra maH/ ha stiH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ a d+hi ka ra ne she teH/ she ti las lhag par byed pa la'o/ me tog phrogs pa/ shIng nyal ba las lhag par bya ba rtogs par byed pa la a tsa 'gyur te/ kha sha yaH/ u dar sha yaH/ sogs so/ gi rau she te r+DaH/
[\[430b.5\]]gi ra lang she ti las Da'o/ blang po che/ gi ra las pha rol gyi shIng las Da 'gyur te/ Ti'i 'os Ti phyis/ de'i khyad don gyis Da phyis pas/ gi ra shaH/ tse reSh+ThaH/ tsa ri las Ta'o/ su pa las pha rol gyi tsa ra g.yo ba la  nam mkha' la nyal/ brang la nyal/ Ta 'gyur te/ Tu Tita d+ha sogs kyi
[\[430b.6\]]dIpa kyi don no/ ku ru tsa raH/ b+hik+ShA se nA dA ye Shu tsa/ b+hik+ShA  se nA  dA ya rnams la'ang ngo / /b+hi k+ShA la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi pha rol gyi tsa  ri nyal/ ra las kyang Ta 'gyur te/ b+hi k+ShA tsa raH/ se nA tsa raH/ dA ya tsa raH/ pu raHa gra tonya gre Shu sa rte/ pu raH/ a gra taH/ a gre rnams las rti las
[\[430b.7\]]so/ sgra ngan du 'gro ba/ pu ra sogs 'di rnams las pha rol gyi sr-i 'gro ba laT 'gyur te/ pu raHsa raH/ sngon du 'gro ba/ a gra taHsaraH/ sngon du 'gro ba/ a gre sa raH/ rtser 'gro ba/ slong du 'gro/ sde spyod pa/ blangs te sbyod pa/ pU rbe kar+t+r-i/ pUrba la byed pa las so/ pU rba las pha rol gyi sr-i las byed pa po'i
[\[431a\]]
[\[431a.1\]]tshig laT 'gyur te/ pUrba sa raH/ kr-i nyo he tu tIts+tshA l+yA nu lo mye Shu/ kr-inya las rgyu dang de'i ngang tshul dang rjes su mthun pa rnams la'o/ kr-inya las rgyu'i byed pa po dang de'i ngang tshul rtogs par byed pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i byed pa po rnams laT 'gyur te/ bid+yA sha skaraH/ rgyu'i byed pa/
[\[431a.2\]]shrAd+h+nyA ka raH/ ngang tshul/ sngon du 'gro bar byed/ ba tsa na ka raH/ rjes su mthun/ sogs so/ kr-i ka mi kaM sa kun m+b+ha pA tra ku shar+NI Sh+wa na pya ya s+ya/ kr-i/ ka mi/ kaM sa/ kum+b+ha  pA tra  ku shA  kar+NI rnams la mi zad pa ma yin pa'i 'o/ /mi zad pa ma yin pa'i rnam par bcad  rig pas grags par byed/
[\[431a.3\]]dad pa byed/ pa ni kr-i la sogs pa 'di rnams  smra bar byed/ pha rol la sa nyid du 'gyur gyis gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ dper brjod gong du bshad pa'i bi d+yA shaHyi rnam bcad kr-i pha rol la sar bsgyur ba lta bu'o/ di bA bi b+hA ni shA brab+hA b+ha sar+n+tA na n+tA di ba hu nA n+di kiM li pi li pi ba li b+ha k+ti kar+t+r-i tsi tra k+She tra saM khyA dzaM
[\[431a.4\]]g+ha bA gwa ngar+Ya d+ta d+d+ha nu ra ru Sh+Shu/ di bA  bi b+hA  ni shA  pra b+hA  b+has  an+ta  a nan+ta  A di  ba hu  nAn+di/ ki  li pi  li po  ba li  b+hak+ti  kar+t+r-i  tsi tra  k+She tra  saM khyA  dzaM g+ha  bA hu  u ras  yad  ta da  d+ha nus  a rus rnams la'o/ /di bA la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya las Ta
[\[431a.5\]]'gyur te/ di bA ka raH/ nas/ nyin mo/ mtshan mo/ nyin mo/ mtha'/ mtha' yas/ dang po/ mang po/ dga' ba/ ci/ byug pa/ legs pa/ stobs/ bus pa/ byed pa/ ri mo/ shing / grangs/ parla/ dpung pa/ brang / gang / do/ gzhu/ sdug bsngal/ a ru ska raH'i bar ro/ 'grel par/ keM/ yad  tad  ba hu rnams las pha
[\[431a.6\]]rol gyi kr-i las  nyin byed/ yang na a tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ kiM ka raH/ ya t+ka raH/ ta t+ka raH/ ba hu ka raH/ karma Ni b+h+r-i tau/ karma na las g.yog la'o/ rnam na las pha rol gyi kr-inya las g.yog po brjod pa laT 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal byed/ karma ka raH/ b+h+r-i twiH/ na shab+da sh+lo ka ke la ha
[\[431a.7\]]gA thA bai ra tsA Tu sU tra man+t+ra pa de Shu/ shab+da  sgra/ sh+lo ka/tshigs bcad/ ci byed/ gang byed/ de byed/ mang po byed/ ka la ha  'khrug pa/ gA thA  smra ba/ bai ra  dgra/ tsA Tu/ brdzun/ sU tra  mdo/ man+t+ra  sngags/ tshig  pa da rnams la ma yin no/ shab+dan la sogs pa 'di  las byed de/ g.yog go/ rnams las pha rol kyi kr-inya
[\[431b\]]
[\[431b.1\]]las Ta 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de rnams las pha rol gyi kr-i la a na sbyar bas/ shab+da kA raH/ nas/ pa da kA raHyi bar ro/ sta m+ba sha kr-i tI ri na/ sta m+ba sha kr-i ti dag la i na 'o/ sta mA dang / sha kr-ita dag las pha rol gyi kr-inya la rim pa bzhin 'bru dang be'u brjod pa la in 'gyur te/ na dbyangs don yon
[\[431b.2\]]tan byas pas/ sta m+ba ka riH/ drI hiH/ sha kr-i t+ka riH/ bat+saH/ ha ra/ sgra byed/ tshig byed/ teHdr-i ti nA tha yoHpa shau/ ha ra ti las dr-i ti/ nA tha dag las phyugs la'o/ dr-i ti/ nA tha dag gi pha rol las ha ra ti ste hr-inya las phyugs kyi byed pa po la in 'gyur te/ dr-i ti  ha ti/ pa shuH/
[\[431b.3\]]nA tha ha riH/ sdong po byed ste/ 'bru/ lan cig byed pa ste/ be'u'am ma hes gshin pa/ pa shuH/ pha le gra hi rA t+ma b+ha ri sh+tsa/ pha le gra hiH/ A t+ma m+b+ha ri'ang ngo / pha le sngon ma'i gra ha dang / A t+maM snga ma'i b+h+r-inya la in sbyar bas/ pha le gra hiHdang / A t+ma m+b+ha riH/ bags ldan gyi ri dgas/ phyugs/
[\[431b.4\]]'dam seng / dag tshig phrad do/ ku k+Shi m+b+ha riHtsa/ ku k+Shi m+b+ha riH'ang ngo / ku k+ShiM snga ma'i  phyugs/ b+h+r-inya las in sbyar bas/ kuk+Shi m+b+ha riHzhes pa'ang tshig phrad do/ e dzeHkha sha /e dzi las kha sha'o/ su pa las pha rol  'bras bu 'dzin/ bdag 'dzin/ gyi e dzi las kha sha 'gyur te/ sha
[\[431b.5\]]shita kyi don dang / khra mu ma gyi don no/ a ru r+d+wi Sha da dza n+ta s+ya mu ma/ sdug bsngal dang mi mthun pa la atsa mtha'i mu ma'o/ lto 'ger ba/ kha 'gro ba'i rkyen can gyi tshig pha rol la de sngon ma'i rtags a tsa mtha' can la sdug bsngal dang mi mthun pa dag gi don la mu ma A ga ma 'gyur te/ ma gnas don
[\[431b.6\]]dang u brjod don no/ dza na snga ma'i e dzi la mdo snga ma'i kha sha yon tan/ mdo 'dis mu ma A ga ma byin pas/ dza na me dza ya:/ bA ta shu nI til srA d+d+he Sh+wa dza d+he Ta tu da dza hA ti b+h+yaHkha sha  bA ta  shu nI  til  srA d+d+hA rnams la a dza/ d+heT  tud  dza hA ti rnams las kha sha'o/ bA ta snga ma'i a dza
[\[431b.7\]]shu nI sngon ma'i/ d+heT ti la snga ma'i  tud  srA d+d+hA sngon ma'i hA ka rnams las kha sha 'gyur te/ mu ma A ga ma byin pas/ skye bo g.yo ba/ bA ta ma dzaH/ rlung ltar 'gro bar dgas/ shu niM d+ha yaH/ khyi mo la 'thung ba/ til n+tu daH/ til brdung / shi zas 'dor ba/ srAd+d+haM dza haH/ sha 'gro ba la sh+lu bzhin banyis brjod pa'o//
[\[432a\]]
[\[432a.1\]]khi t+ya na bya ya se/ mi zad pa ma yin pa'i kha 'gro ba la'o/ rkyen kha 'gro ba can pha rol la de'i sngon ma'i rtags de la muM A ga ma 'gyur zhing gal te rtags de'i mtha' a tsa ring po yin na thung ngur bsgyur te/ dper brjod gong du bstan pa'i mu ma rnams dang / shu nI dang shrAd+h+nyA'i
[\[432a.2\]]mtha' thung ngur bsgyur ba lta bu'o/ nA si kA stan yor+d+h+mA d+he ToH/ nA si kA dang / stan dag las d+h+mA dang d+heT dag las so/ nA si kA sngon ma'i d+h+mA dang sta na sngon ma'i d+heT dag las kyang kha sha 'gyur te/ nA si kan+d+ha maH/ sta nan+d+ha yaH/ nA DI muSh+T+yo sh+tsa/ nA DI  muSh+TI dag las kyang ngo / nA DI dang / muSh+Ti
[\[432a.3\]]dag gi pha rol gyi d+h+mA dang d+heT dag las kyang kha sha 'gyur te/ nA Din+d+ha maH/ nA DIn+d+ha yaH/ nA DIn+d+ha yaH/ muSh+Ti n+d+ha maH/ muSh+Ti n+d+ha yaH/ u di kU le ru dzi ba hoH/ kU/ g+hA pA d+h+ma sogs kyis shita la d+ha mar bsgyur/ sna zhig/ nu ma 'thung ba/ la la uta ru dzi ba ha dag las so/ k+du la las pha rol gyi
[\[432a.4\]]uta sngon ma'i du dzi dang ba ha dag las kha sha 'gyur te/ kU la mu dru dzaH/ rtsa zhig lu tshur zhig  kU la mu dwa haH/ ba hA/ rtsa 'thung / khu tshur 'thung / b+h+ri li haH/ ba ha/ a b+h+ra la li ha las so/ ba ha dag a b+h+ra dag las pha rol gyi li ha las kha sha 'gyur te/ ba haM li haHgoH/ a b+h+raM li haH/ bA yuH/ pa ri mA
[\[432a.5\]]ne pa tsaH/ tshad la pa tsa las so/ /tshad 'jal bar/ rigs shin tu nad can/ rigs mtho thob pa/ byed pa las pha rol gyi pa tsa las kha sha 'gyur te/ dro NaM pa tsA s+tha li/ pra s+thaM pa tsA/ mi tan khe tsa/ mi tan kha la'ang ngo / mi ta dang na kha  thob pa ro myang ba ste ba lang / sprin nam lhang tsher/ rlung / dag las
[\[432a.6\]]pha rol gyi pa tsa la'ang kha sha 'gyur te/ mi taM pa tsaH/ brAh+ma NI/ na khaM pa tsA/ ya bA gUH/ a sUr+Ya la lAT yor+d+r-i shata po/ a sUr+Ya dang la  bre po che gang 'tshod par byed/ bre gang 'tshod/ lAT dag la dr-i sha ta pa dag las so/ /a sUr+Ya dang la lAT dag las pha rol gyi rim pa bzhin dr-i sha dang ta pa
[\[432a.7\]]dag las kha sha 'gyur te/ a sUrmaM pa sh+yaH/ bram ze mo/ thug pa'am tshod ma/ mu kha/ gdong nyi ma la mi lta/ la lA TaM ta paHsUr+YaH/ dpral ba gdung byed de nyi ma/ u graM pa sh+ye ram+ma da pA Nin+d+ha mA sh+tsa/ u graM  pa sh+ya  i ram+ma da  pA Nin+d+ha ma rnams kyang ngo / /u gra sngon ma'i dr-i sha dang / ir
[\[432b\]]
[\[432b.1\]]sngon ma'i ma da dang / pA Ni snga ma'i d+h+mA rnams la kha sha sbyar bas/ u graM pa sh+ya/ iram+ma da/ pAnin+d+ha ma rnams kyang tshig phrad do/ 'grel par/ ka ra las pha rol gyi d+h+mA las kyang kha sha 'gyur bar bshad pas/ ka ran+d+ha maH/ pri ya ba she ba daHkha tsa/ pri ya  ba sha ya ba da las kha tsa'o/ /
[\[432b.2\]]pre ya dang ba sha dag las pha rol gyi ba da las kha tsa 'gyur te/ drags shugs blta/ chang la dga' ba/ lag pa zhib/ tsa dbyangs don/ kha khita kyi don no/ /gri yaM ba daH/ ba sham+ba daH/ 'grel par su pa las pha rol  phyed bste khag ba/ gyi ga ma las kha tsa 'gyur par bshad pas/ p+hu dzi ga maH/
[\[432b.3\]]bi hA yas:pi hatsa/ yihA ya sa'i bi ha'ang ngo / bi hA yas las pha rol gyi gam las kha tsa 'gyur zhing bi ha yas kyang bi ha zhes par bsgyur bar bya ste/ dga' ba brjod ba/ legs pa brjod pa/ bi haM ga maH/ 'grel par yang na kha tsa la nga 'gro ba bzhin rjes su sna ldan dbyi'o zhes  lag 'gro
[\[432b.4\]]bshad pas/ b+hu dzi gaH/ bi haM gaH/ sogs so/ dwi Sha par yaHtA piH/ dwi Sha pa ra dag la tA pi las so/ dwi Sha dang pa pa dag las pha rol gyi ta pa Nitsa'i mtha' can la kha tsa 'gyur ro/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba ste 'dab chags so/ kha tsi hra swaH/ kha tsa la thung ngu'o/ kha tsa pha rol la Ni tsa las
[\[432b.5\]]byung ba'i u pa  las 'gro/ mkha' 'gro/ d+hA bud med brjod pa ma yin pa thung ngur 'gyur te/ dwi Sha dang pa ra snga ma'i tA pi la mdo snga mas kha tsa Ni iT med pa la phyis/ mdo 'dis u pa d+hA thung ngur bsgyur bas/ dwi ShaM ta paH/ bud med yin na/ dwi sha tI tA paH/ bA tsi ya mo pra te/
[\[432b.6\]]brtul zhugs la bA tsa las ya ma la'o/ mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs la 'jug pa na dA tsa las pha rol gyi ya mu la kha tsa 'gyur ro/ bA tsaM ya ma pu raM da rau tsa/ bA tsaM ya ma pu raM da ra dag kyang ngo / dgra brdung / pha rol brdung / bA tsa snga ma'i ya mu dang pu ra snga ma'i dr-i la  mi mthun ba mo brdung /
[\[432b.7\]]kha tsa sbyar bas/ bA tsi ya ma/ mi smra ba ngag bsdams pa'am smra bcad/ grong 'jom te/ dbang po lo/ pu raM da ra dag tshig phrad do/ sarbe sa haH/ sarba las ha las so/ sarba snga ma'i sa ha las kha tsa 'gyur te/ sarbaM sa haH/ sngon bzod/ 'grel ba ra b+ha ga snga ma'i dr-i las kyang kha tsa 'gyur bar
[\[433a\]]
[\[433a.1\]]bshad pas/ b+ha gaM da raH/ sarba kU lA b+h+ra ka r+Yi She Shu ka ShaH/ sarba kU la a b+h+ra ka ri Sha rnams la ka Sha las so/ sarba la sogs pa 'di gsum las pha rol gyi ka Sha las kha tsa 'gyur te/ sarbaM ka ShaH/ kha laH/ kU laM ka ShaH/ na dzIH/ a b+h+raM ka ShaH/ gi riH/ ka rI ShaM
[\[433a.2\]]ka ShaH/ pAt+yA/ me d+ha rti b+ha ye Shu kr-inyaH/ mtshan ma 'joms/ me d+ha ri ti b+ha ya rnams la kr-inya las so/ mi d+ha ri ti/ b+ha ya rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya las kha tsa 'gyur te/ me d+haM ka raH/ r-i ti ng+ka raH/ b+ha  kun la 'tshe ste ngan pa/ yaM ka raH/ chu klung / a b+ha yaM ka raH/ ri po/ k+She ma bri ya ma
[\[433a.3\]]dre tsa/ rlung  k+She ma  pri ya  ma bral 'ang ngo / k+She ma  pre ya  ma dra rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya las kha tsa 'gyur zhing aNa'ang 'gyur te/ k+She maM ka raH/ k+She maM kA raH/ blo gros byed/ bden byed/ pri yaM ka raH/ 'jigs byed/ ma druM ka/ mi 'jigs pa byed raH/ ma dra kA raH/
[\[433a.4\]]A shi te b+hu paH/ ka ra Na b+hA ba yoH/ A shi ta la  b+hU las byed dang dngos po dag las so/ /A shi ta las pha rol gyi b+hU las byed pa dang dngos  bde bar byed/ po dag la 'jug pa la kha tsa 'gyur te/ dga' bar byed/ a la mA shi daM b+ha ba o da naH/ su kha nA shi tiM b+ha baM/ zab dbyangs byed/
[\[433a.5\]]saM dz+nyA AMb+h+r-i tr-I br-i ji d+hA ris hi ta pi da maH/ b+h+r-i  tr-I  br-i  dzi  d+hA ri  sa hi  ta pi  da ma las ming la'o/ /supa las pha rol gyi byings 'di rnams las ming la kha tsa 'gyur te/ bi shwam+b+ha raH/ ra thaM ta raM/ pa ti m+ba rA/ sha truny+dza yaH/ ba sun+d+ha raH/ khyod zas kyi nus pa brgyad cu/ khyod la bde ba brgyad cu/
[\[433a.6\]]sha tru n+sa haH/ sha dru n+ha paH/ a ri n+da maH/ ga ma sh+tsa/ ga ma las kyang ngo / supa las pha rol gyi gam las kyang ming la kha tsa 'gyur te/ p+lurbaM gamaH/ pan+thAnaH/ hr-i da yaM ga mAH/ sna tshogs 'dzin/ shing rta sgrol ba/ khyod 'dam pa/ dgra las rgyal ba/ nor 'dzin/ bA tsaH/ an+tA n+t+ya tA d+h+wo ra spA ra khA nan+de Shu DaH/ an+ta
[\[433a.7\]]dgra bzod pa/ dgra brdung ba/ dgra 'dul ba/ an+t+ya ta/ ad+h+wa/ u ras/ pA ra  kha  a nan+ta rnams la Da'o/ /an+ta sogs rtags 'di rnams  sngon du 'gro ba/ lam/ snying la 'bab pa/ las pha rol gyi gam laDa 'gyur te/ Ti 'os/ Ti phyis/ de'i khyad/ tshig/ don gyi Da phyis pas/ an+ta gaH/ mthar 'gro/
[\[433b\]]
[\[433b.1\]]an+d+ya ta gaH/ a d+h+wa gaH/ u ra gaH/ pA ra gaH/ kha gaH/ a nan+ta gaH/ u rasaHsa lo pash+tsa/ u rasa'i sa dbyi ba'ang ngo / /gam pha rol la u ras kyi sa dbyi ste/ dper brjod bshad zin to/ sarba pan+ha yo sh+tsa/ sarba  pan+nadag la'ang ngo / sarba dang pan+na dag las pha rol gyi
[\[433b.2\]]shin tu 'gro/ lam 'gro/ lto 'gro/ pha rol 'gro/ mkha' la 'gro/ mtha' yas 'gro/ gam las kyang Da 'gyur te/ sarba gaH/ pan+na gaH/ 'grel par  u ras pha rol gyi gam las yang na kha tsa 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ u raM ga maH/ su du ro\u0f85 d+hi ka ra Ne/ su du ra dag las lhag par byed
[\[433b.3\]]pa la'o/ /su dang dur dag las pha rol gyi gam las lhag par byed pa la Da 'gyur te/ sugaH/ durgaH/ thams cad du 'gro/ rkang mi 'gro/ 'grel par de rnams su ma zad gzhan yang mang po las pha rol gyi ga ma la Da 'gyur  lto 'gro/ ro zhes bshad pas/ nirgaH/ sarba tra gaH/ tu ragaH/
[\[433b.4\]]grA ma gaH/ sogs so/ /a shi Shi ha naH/ smon pa la han las so/ su pa las  bde 'gro/ 'gro dka'/ pha rol gyi ha na las smon pa brjod pa la Da 'gyur te/ sha trU haH/ kle shA pa haH/ ta mo\u0f85pa haH/ du:kha pa haH/ sogs so/ /lak+Sha Ne dzA  mi 'gro ba/ kun du 'gro/ mgyogs 'gro/
[\[433b.5\]]grong 'gro/ yA pa t+yoSh+Taka/ dzA ya dang pa yi dag la mtshan nyid la'o/ dzA ya dang pa ti dag las pha rol gyi han las mtshan nyid la 'jug pa na Taka 'gyur te/ dgra bo 'joms/ a ba sngon ma'i han/ nyon mongs 'joms/ mun pa 'joms/ sdug bsngal 'joms/ kra kita kyi don Ta dI pa kyi don no/ /gam han
[\[433b.6\]]sogs kyis u pa d+hA phyis/ han+ta'i ha'i g+ha 'os ha g+har bsgyur bas/ dzA yA g+h+no nA/ pa ti g+h+ni s+t+rI/ a ma nu Sh+ya kar+t+r-i ke tsa/ byed pa po mi ma yin pa la'ang ngo / byed pa po mi ma yin pa'i byed pa bo rtogs par byed pa la su pa las pha rol gyi han la Taka 'gyur te/ sh+leSh+ma g+h+naM/ tr-i ka Tu kaM/
[\[433b.7\]]pit+ta b+h+naM/ mkhris pa 'joms/ g+h+r-i taM/ mar/ bA ta g+h+naM/ rlung 'joms/ chung ma 'joms pa ste skyes pa/ bad ga 'joms ma ste bud med/ tai laM/ til mar/ pA Ni g+ha tA Da g+hau shi lpi ni/ pA ni g+ha/ tA Da g+ha dag bzo po la'o/ pA Ni dang tra Da snga ma'i han la Taka sbyar bas/ pA Ni  peg rdog bzo ba  g+ha dang / bad kan 'joms/ tsha ba gsum/
[\[434a\]]
[\[434a.1\]]tADa g+ha dag chig phrad do/ 'grel par/ rA dza snga ma'i han las Taka sbyar bas/ rA dza ga/ zhes pa'ang tshig phrad do zhes pa'ang byung ngo / A D+h+ya su b+ha ga s+thU la pa li tan g+hA n+t+ha pri ye Shu ts+w+ya r+the Sha tswau kr-inyaHka ra Ne khyun/ u D+h+ya  su b+ha ga  s+thU la  pa li ta  nag+na/ an+d+ha pri ya
[\[434a.2\]]rnams la tswi'i  grog bzo ba/ don la tswi med pa la kr-inya las byed pa la khyuna'o/ /A D+h+ya la sogs  rgyal po 'joms/ pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya gsar byung gi don la tswi ma byinapa la byed pa dang byed pa po la khyun 'gyur te/ na dbyangs don kha khi ta la mum gyi don yu a na ra bsgyur bas/
[\[434a.3\]]A D+h+yaM ka ra NaM/ su g+ha gaM kar NaM/ s+thU laM ka ra NaM/ ba li taM ka ra NaM/ nag+naM ka ra NaM/ an+d+haM ka ra NaM/ pri yaM ka ra NaM/ karta ri b+hu baH/ khiSh+Nu tsa khu ka nyau/ byed pa pau la b+hU las khiSh+Nu tsa khu ka nya dag go/ /A D+h+ya la sogs pa rnams las pha rol gyi b+hU las gsar byung gi don la tswi ma byin pa
[\[434a.4\]]phyug bor byed/ skal ba bzang por byed/ sbom por byed/ sgra dkar byed/ gcer bu byed/ long ba byed/ dga' bar byed/ la byed pa po la khiSh+Nutsa dang khu kanya dag 'gyur te/ tsa dbyangs don nya 'phel don dang / khra gnyis/ mu ma gyi don yon tan byas pas/ A D+h+yaM b+ha bi Sh+Nu/ A D+h+yaM b+hA bu kaH/ nas/
[\[434a.5\]]bri yaM p+ha niSh+NuH/ pri yang b+hA bu kaH'i pa ra ro/ sat+sU dwi Sha dru ha du ha yu dza bi da b+hi da tshi da dzi n+yaHkwi pa/ sata  sU  dwi Sha  dru ha  du ha  yu dza  bi da  b+hi da tshi da  dzi  nI la kI pa'o/ /supa dang nyer bsgyur snga ma las sa ta ste/ Sha na kun nas gus pa/ ShU srog  phyug por gyur/ chags mnga'
[\[434a.6\]]nas skye ba/ dga' bar gyur/ dwi Sha mi mdza' ba/ dru ha ra na pa/ du ha 'jo ba/ yu dzir sbyor ba/ bi da shes pa/ b+hi dir rnam par 'joms pa/ tshi dir dum bur byed pa/ dzi rgyal ba/ nI thob pa rnams la kI pa 'gyur te/ pa tu la A ga ma'i don/ ka kita kyi don i brjod don/ bra yang dbyi ste/ su
[\[434a.7\]]tsi Sha na 'am/ gtsang ba/ yang na na phyis/ tuka byin pas/ u pa ni Shata/ nye bar gus/ aN+Da sUH/ sgong skyes/ dwiT/ mi mthun pa/ d+huT/ ngan pa/ go d+tu ka/ ba lang 'jo/ su yuka/ bde ba sbyor/ pra b+hita/ rab tu rnam par 'jo ste/ pra ts+tshi ta/ gnyis byas/ mi tra dzita/ grogs rgyal/ grA
[\[434b\]]
[\[434b.1\]]ma NIH/ 'grel par grA ma dang a gra dag las pha rol gyi nI'i na Nar bsgyur bar bshad pas na Nar bsgyur ba'o/ /b+ha dzo N+wiH/ b+ha dza las N+wi'o/ supa las pha rol gyi b+ha dza las N+wi 'gyur te/ Na 'phel don/ i brjod don pa yang phyis pas/ ar+d+ha b+hAka/ pA da b+hAka /tshan+da si sa haH/
[\[434b.2\]]grong sde'i phra ma mkhan/ sdeb sbyor las ha las so/ /sdeb sbyor la sa ha las kyang N+wi 'gyur te/ pra sAT/ prasAT/ a ne ba heH/ kwipa/ a na ba hi las kwi pa'o/ /a na snga ma'i ba ha la kwi pa 'gyur te/ saM pra sA ra Na'ang bya zhing bar tu Da rkyen yang  phyed cha/ rkang pa'i cha/ sbyor te/ a na
[\[434b.3\]]Duha/ zhes pa la su byin pas/ a na DA na/ dza nas na kha na kra ma ga mo biT/ dzan  san  rab tu bzod pa/ khan/ kra ma  ga ma las biTa'o/ supa dang nyer bsgyur las pha rol gyi byings 'di rnams la biT 'gyur te/ Ta dwI pa don bi'o 'os bi dbyi'o/ tshanA si/ sdeb sbyor la'o/ /
[\[434b.4\]]sdeb sbyor las biT dang bin pha rol/ glang khyu ba/ la rjes su sna ldan rnams Ata du 'gyur te/ byings de rnams la biT rjes su sna ldan rnams A mtshams sbyar biT phyis pas/ a dzAH/ go ShAH/ kU pa khAH/ u dad+hi krAH/ a gre gAH/ sa no te ranaH/ sa no ti'i na med pa'i 'o/ /sngon
[\[434b.5\]]ma'i rtags sam nyer bsgyur sa Shar bsgyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can la sa no ti'i na med pa'i sa ni Shar bsgyur te/ dper brjod gong du bstan pa'i goShAHlta bu'o/ /du haH/ ka pag+ha sh+tsa/ skye med/ ba lang byin/ khron pa 'bru/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs/ rtser 'gro/ du ha las ka pa ste g+ha'ang ngo / /supa las pha
[\[434b.6\]]rol gyi dU ha las kapa 'gyur zhing ha'ang g+har 'gyur te/ pa dbyangs don/ ka kita kyi don/ kA ma dug+hA/ maM tre shwe ba ho k+tha shaspu ro DA sho N+win/ sngags la shwe tapa ha/ uk+tha shas pu ro DA sha las N+win no/ /shwe tapa ha la sogs pa de rnams la N+win sbyar bas/ shwe ta bAH/ uk+tha shAH/ pu ro DAH/
[\[434b.7\]]rnams sngags brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /A to ma nin kwa ni pa ba ni pa sh+tsa/ Ata las ma nin  'dod 'jo/ kwa nipa pa nipa rnams kyang ngo / supa las pha rol gyi byings Ata mtha' can la bya ba'i don la/ ma nin dang / kwa nipa dang / ba nIpa rnams 'gyur te/ rkyen de gsum/ Da ba'i rkyen/
[\[435a\]]
[\[435a.1\]]gyi pa gnyis dang na dbyangs don/ i gsum brjod don/ ka kita kyi don te/ tA ba nin/ su dA mA/ legs byin/ kwa ni pa/ su dA bA/ legs byin/ ka nIpa/ b+hu ri dA bA/ sogs so/ /'grel par rkyen de rnams Ata mtha' ma yin pa gzhan yang mang po la 'jug go zhes bshad
[\[435a.2\]]pas/ su gan+b+ha/ sogs so/ kwi p+tsa/ kwi pa'ang ngo / supa las pha rol dang supa med pa dang nyer bsgyur  saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa la thams cad gnas pa'i zhes sogs kyis/ sa sbyin nam gser sbyin/ sngon na yod pa dang med pa gang la'ang byings thams cad la bya ba'i don la kwipa 'gyur te/ u khA srata/
[\[435a.3\]]bde 'gro/ par+Na d+h+wata/ sa srAT/ bi rAT/ sogs mtha' yas so/ an+teH/ a n+ti'i 'o/ /an srog gi na yig rtags sam nyer bsgyur rgyu mtshan can sngon du byung na Nar 'gyur te/ prAN/ kwi pa byin pa'i rjes so/ artsi shu tsi ru tsi tsi hu sr-i pi tsha di tsh+r-i di b+h+ya is/ artsiH yal ga lhung /
[\[435a.4\]]shu tsiH lo ma lhung / kun mdzes/ rnam mdzes/ ru tsiH tsi huH sr-i piH tsha diH tsh+r-i di rnams las isa'o/ /byings de rnams las bya ba'i don la is 'gyur te/ artsiH/ sho tsiH/ ro tsiH/ tse hiH/ srog chags/ sarbiH/ tsha diH/ tsha rdiH/ d+ha narti tsak+Shing pr-I pa pi tra pi dza ni ya dze rus/ d+hanaH artiH
[\[435a.5\]]tsak+ShingaH pr-IH ba pi  tra piH dzan  yadza las usa'o/ /byings de rnams la us 'gyur te/ d+ha nuH/ a ruH/ tsa k+ShuH/ pa ruH/ ba puH/ tra puH/ dza nuH/ ya dzuH/ mchod pa/ dag pa/ 'bar ba/ khro ba/ sarba d+hA tu b+h+ya s+t+ran/ mar gsar/ skyugs pa/ byings thams cad las trana'o/ /b+hU la sogs pa byings
[\[435a.6\]]thams cad las tran 'gyur te/ tse traM/ pa traM/ sogs so/ /'grel par is man tran/ gzhu/ 'gro ba/ mig/ skyong ba/ lus/ ngo tsha/ skyes/ mchod pa/ kwipa rnams pha rol la tshAd la sogs pas thung ngur 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ tsha diH/ tshad+mA/ tsha t+t+waM/ sogs so/ dz+wa ra twa ra sr-i bya
[\[435a.7\]]bi mdA mu pa d+hA yAsh+tsa/ dz+waraH 'dri ba/ snod dam 'dab ma/ twaraH sr-i biH a biH mapa rnams kyi u pa d+hA'i 'ang ngo / rkyen kIpa dang dz+hal dang po kang 'gro ba pha rol la tshwar dang twar gnyis kyi upa d+hA'i ba dbyangs bcas dang srib dang ab gnyis  skyugs pa/ gya gyu  sdug bsngal/ kyi mtha'i ba dang / ma ba'i
[\[435b\]]
[\[435b.1\]]mtha'i ba u pa d+hA'i a dang bcas pa rnams U zhes par 'gyur te/ dz+war dang tAral kwipa/ kwil yongs rdzogs phyis/ mdo 'dis Ur bsgyur bas/ su  dzUH/ au  dzU rau/ su tUH/ au  tU rau/ sr-ib la kwipa/ kwipa phyis/ ba U/ i ka gi atsa la yaN byas pas/ su  sUH/ au  sru pau/ ab
[\[435b.2\]]ka kwipa/ kwipa phyis/ ba U/ 'grel par Ur bsgyur na 'phel pa byed par bshad pas 'phel ba byas pas/ au zhes grub/ dzan sngon du bzhag /dza nauH/ 'bar ba/ dzanA bau/ mgyogs/ mabal kwipa/ kwipa phyis/ ba a bcas U mra drangs pas/ su mUH/ 'gro  o  mu bau/
[\[435b.3\]]rA l+lo paH/ ra las dbyi'o/ /kwipa dang dz+hal dang po kang 'gro ba pha rol la ra las pha rol gyi tsh+ra bra dag dbyi zhing ra'ang Ur 'gyur te/ mUr+tsha dang d+hurbi dag  skyes bu srung / la kwipa phyis/ tsha dang ba yang phyis/ U 'dra ba la ring por bsgyur bas/ su  mU:/ 'ching / au  ng+hUH/ 'ching ba dag/
[\[435b.4\]]ga maHkwau/ gam gyi kwi la'o/ kwipa pha rol la gam gyi ma dbyi zhing tuka A gam yang 'gyur te/ aM ga gta/ sogs so/ /'grel par/ yam/ man/ tan rnams kyi'ang kwipa la rjes su sna ldan dbyi zhing tuka A gam 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ chags pa/ rgyas pa/ yata/ mata/
[\[435b.5\]]tata/ sogs so/ /yang 'grel par/ kwipa pha rol la/ yam  gam  man  tan rnams  yan lag 'gro/ kyi rjes su sna ldan upa d+h+wa dang bcas pa Ur 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ a gre yUH/ a gre gUH/ a gre mUH/ a gre tUH/ su pya dzA tau Ni ni sta ts+tshI l+ye/ supa la  mchod pa/ gus ba/
[\[435b.6\]]rgyal ba rigs ma yin pa la de'i dang tshul la Nini'o/ supa las pha rol las rigs brjod pa can ma yin pa'i bya ba'i don la de'i dang tshul rtogs par byed pa la Ni ni 'gyur te/ na'i i brjod don Na  rtags mchod/ rtsa 'gro/ mchog shes/ rtse rgyas/ Nita gyi don no/ eb dang uSh+Na sngon ma'i ba da dang
[\[435b.7\]]b+h+ya dza na Ni ni byin pas/ e ba m+pA dI/ de bzhin gsung / uSh+Na b+ho dzi/ zas dron mo/ ma naH/ man las so/ /supa las pha rol gyi man las dang tshul ma yin pa la Ni ni 'gyur te/ pa Tu mA nI/ mkhas par sems/ At+ma ne khash+tsa/ bdag nyid la kha sha'o/ /supa las pha rol gyi man las
[\[436a\]]
[\[436a.1\]]bdag nyid kyi yul la kha sha 'gyur zhing Ni ni yang 'gyur te/ kha sha'i phyogs la sha 'gro ba la yaka dang mum byin pas/ paN+Di ta ma n+yaH/ paN+Di ta mA nI/ i tse kA tso\u0f85mra pra t+ya ya bats+tsa/ i tsa[: ]atsa gcig pa'i rkyen am bzhin 'ang ngo / /kha 'gro ba'i rkyen can pha rol
[\[436a.2\]]la de'i sngon ma'i rtags de itsa so sor bsdu ba gcig po yin na mum la cho ga'ang rnam dbye gnyis pa'i am bzhin bya ste/ go dang stI sngon ma'i  mkhas par rlom/ man la kha sha sbyar bas/ gAM ma n+yaH/ s+t+rIM mA n+yaH/ b+hU te ya dzaH/ byung ba la yadza las so/ supa las pha rol gyi
[\[436a.3\]]yadza las byung ba'i byed pa rtogs par byed pa la Ni ni 'gyur te/ ag+ni Sh+To ma yA dzI/ karma Ni ha naH/ las la han las so/ supa las pha rol gyi han las las kyi don la Ni ni 'gyur te/ ba lang sems/ bud med sems/ han+ti'i ha'i g+ha dang / han gyi ta sogs kyis na tar bsgyur
[\[436a.4\]]bas/ pi tr-i g+hA tI/ brah+ma b+h+ru Na br-i te ShuH/ brah+ma[: ]b+h+ru Na[: ]me'i mchod sbyin byas/ br-ita rnams las so/ brah+ma[: ]b+h+ru Na[: ]br-ita rnams las pha rol gyi han las byung ba la kwipa 'gyur te/ brah+ma hA/ b+h+ru Na hA/ br-i ta hA/ su karma pA pa ma tra pu N+ye ShuHkr-inyaH/ su karma[: ]pA pha[: ]ma tra[: ]pu N+ya
[\[436a.5\]]pha gsod/ rnams la kr-inya las so/ /su karma la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi kr-inya la byung ba rtogs par byed la kwipa 'gyur te/ tuka A ga ma byin pas/ tshangs 'joms/ su karma kr-ita/ khru ba/ sgang yol/ pA pa kr-ita/ ma tra krita/ pur+N+ya kr-ita/ dr-i sheHkwa nipa/ dr-isha las kwa nipa 'o/ /
[\[436a.6\]]dr-isha las byung ba la kwa nipa 'gyur te/ pa pita don/ ka kita don i brjod don no/ pA ra dr-i shwA/ rA dza ni karma Ne/ rA dza na la las so/ /rA dzan las pha rol gyi kr-inya dang yu d+ha las  las bzang byas/ sdig pa byas/ byas tsam/ bsod nams byas/ 'khrug pa'i las la byung ba kwa nipa
[\[436a.7\]]'gyur te/ rA dzA kr-i twa/ rgyal pos byas/ rA dza yu d+h+wA/ rgyal 'khrugs/ 'grel par sa ha  pha rol blta/ las pha rol gyi kr-inya dang yu d+ha las kyang kwa nipa 'jug par bshad pas/ sa ha kr-i twA/ mnyam du byas/ sa ha yu d+h+wA/ mnyam du 'khrugs/ sap+ta myAM dza ner+DaH/ bdun pa la dza ni las Da'o/
[\[436b\]]
[\[436b.1\]]supa rnam dbye bdun pa'i don can las pha rol gyi dza ni las Da 'gyur te/ Da Ti dbyi ba'i don no/ /aM bu sngon ma'i dzan la Da/ aM bu dzaM/ pany+tsa myA ma dza tau/ lnga pa la rigs min pa la'o/ /supa lnga pa'i don can las pha rol gyi dzan las rigs brjod pa ma yin pa laDa 'gyur te/ pad+ma
[\[436b.2\]]dzaH/ u pa sarge tsa saM dz+nyA yAM/ nyer bsgyur la'ang ming la'o/ /nyer bsgyur las pha rol gyi dzan las ming laDa 'gyur te/ chu las skyes/ pra dzA/ su dzaH/ su ya dzo dwa ni pa/ su ya dza dag las dwa ni pa'o/ su dang yadza dag las byung ba la dwa ni pa 'gyur te/ pa  pad+ma las skyes/
[\[436b.3\]]tuka gi don i brjod don du ngita don to/ su twA/ ya dz+wA/ k+ta k+ta pa tU ni Sh+ThA/ k+ta dang k+ta ba tu dag NiSh+ThA'o/ rkyen k+ta dang k+ta btu dag  skye dgu/ legs skyes/ la ni Sh+ThA zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ de gnyis las k+ta ni byung ba brjod pa'i dngos po dang las kyi don la 'gyur zhing k+ta ba tu ni
[\[436b.4\]]byed pa po brjod pa la 'gyur la/ rkyen 'di  dag par byas/ mchod pa byas/ gnyis kyi ka kita kyi don dang / u suTa'i don to/ snA dang stu la k+ta sbyar bas/ snA taM ma yaH/ stu taM bud+d+haH/ twa yA kr-inya la k+ta ba tu sbyar bas/ biSh+NuHbiSh+NaM kr-i ta bAn/ ni Sh+ThA yAM N+ya dar+the/ N+yata kyi don la ni Sh+ThA'o/ /
[\[436b.5\]]gong du bshad pa'i rkyen N+yata 'jug pa'i don rnams la'ang niSh+ThA'i ming can gnyis 'gyur ro zhes pa spyir btang ngo / k+Shi yo dIrgA+Ata/ k+ShI'i ring po las so/ /bdag gis khrus byas/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas bstod/ niSh+ThA'i rkyen pha rol la  khyab 'jug gis khyab par byed/ k+ShI'i i ring por bsgyur zhing ring po'i
[\[436b.6\]]pha rol la k+ta dang k+ta ba tu'i ta'ang nar bsgyur te/ k+ShI Na bAn/ k+ShI naH/ sh+r+yu kaHki ti/ shri uka las ka 'gro ba la'o/ byings shri dang gzhan yang byings atsa gcig pa rnams dang byings uka mtha' can las pha rol gyi kr-ita sogs kyi rkyen ka 'gro ba rnams la iT mi 'gyur te/ shri taH/
[\[436b.7\]]shri ta bA na/ gus pa byed/ b+hU taH/ byung / b+hU ta bAn/ zad par byed/ zad/ 'grel par niSh+ThA pha rol la U r+Nu'i thung ngur 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ ur+Nu taH/ bkab/ ra dA b+h+yAM ni Sh+ThA ta naHpUrba s+ya tsa ngaH/ ra da dag las niSh+ThA'i ta na ste snga ma'i da'i 'ang ngo / byings mtha' ra yig dang  gus pa bas/
[\[437a\]]
[\[437a.1\]]da dag las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA'i ta nar 'gyur zhing de'i snga ma'i da'ang nar 'gyur te/ shr-I lak+ta sbyar byings kyi r-Ita kyi ita 'os/ r-I ita/ r-i'i aN la ra pha rol los ru/ hal sogs kyis ring po mdo 'dis ta nar bsgyur bas/ shIr+NaH/ b+hi dir la k+ta mdo 'dis ta dang da
[\[437a.2\]]gnyis ka nar bsgyur bas/ b+hin+naH/ saM yo gA de rA to d+hA tor+Ya N+wa taH/ byings Ata mtha' yaN can las brtsegs pa dang po las so/ byings Ata mtha' can u pad+hA na yaN so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge yod pa brtsegs pa dang po las kyang pha  'tshe par byas/ rol gyi niSh+ThA'i ta nar bsgyur te/
[\[437a.3\]]drANaH/ glAnaH/ sogs so/ /rnam 'joms/ l+rA di b+h+ya sh+tsa/ lU la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo / lU la sogs pa rnams las kyang pha rol gyi niSh+ThA'i ta nar bsgyur te/ lU naH/ dzInaH/ rgas/ 'grel par du gu dag gi niSh+ThA pha rol la ring por 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ pU naH/ gU naH/ k+ta o dita sh+tsa/
[\[437a.4\]]smad par bya/ dga' zad/ ota 'gro ba las kyang ngo / /byings ota 'gro ba rnams las kyang niSh+ThA'i ta nar bsgyur te/ b+hu dzo gya gyu la k+ta tsu'i ku mdo 'dis ta nar bsgyur bas/ bcad/ dz+yI pa k+ta/ gra hidz+t+ra sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Na/ b+h+ya g+naH/ o hAka la mdo 'dis ta na/ g+hu mA s+thA sogs  phyin/ kyis Ita du bsgyur
[\[437a.5\]]pra sngon/ pra hI NaH/ s+w+wA da yo\u0f85nu ditaH/ sU la sogs pa rnams uta 'gro ba ma yin no/ sdu la sogs pa ste/ ShUng srog chags mnga' nas skye ba/ dUng gdung ba/ dIng zad pa/ mIng 'tshe ba/ rIng nyan pa/ g.yo byas/ lIng 'khyud pa/ brIng sgrib pa rnams uta 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin zhing ota
[\[437a.6\]]rab tu btang / 'gro ba bzhin ni Sh+Tha'i ta nar bsgyur te/ sU naH/ dU naH/ bI naH/ mI naH/ rI NaH/ lI naH/ brI NaH/ sU na bAn/ sogs so/ s+phA yaHs+phI ni Sh+ThA yAM/ niSh+ThA la sgra yI'i spI'o/ /niSh+ThA pha rol la s+phA yI ni s+phI zhes par 'gyur te/ s+phI taH/ 'grel par yang na s+phA zhes par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/
[\[437a.7\]]s+phAtaH/ 'phel/ dra ba mUrti spa r+sha yoHsh+yaH/ khu ba'i  skyes/ gdung / zad/ 'tshe ba byas/ nyan/ 'khyud/ sgrib/ skyes zin/ gong bu dang reg pa dag la sh+yA'i'o/ khu ba'i gong bu reg pa dag brjod pa la sh+yA'i niSh+ThA pha rol la saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur te/ 'phel/ shI to bA yuH/ bsil ba'i rlung / sh+yonya sA r+she/ sh+yA
[\[437b\]]
[\[437b.1\]]las reg pa ma yin pa la'o/ sh+yA las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA'i ta yig reg pa brjod pa ma yin pa la nar 'gyur te/ sh+ya la k+ta/ mdo snga mas saM pra sA raN/ mdo 'dis ta nar bsgyur bas/ shI naM g+h+r-i taM/ pra tish+tsa pra ti las kyang ngo / /pra ti las pha rol gyi sh+yA'i niSh+ThA pha rol la saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/
[\[437b.2\]]pra ti shI naM/ pra ti shI na bAn/ bi b+hA ShA b+h+ya ba pUrba s+ya/ a b+hi a ba snga ma'i yang na'o/ /a b+hi dang a ba snga ma'i sh+yA'i niSh+ThA pha rol la saM pra sA ra Nar yang na 'gyur te/ a b+hi shI naM/ a b+hi sh+yA naM/ mar gyi gong bu/ a ba shI naM/ a ba sh+yA naM/ any+tso\u0f85na bA dA ne/ byung khungs ma yin pa la any+tsa las so/ /byung /
[\[437b.3\]]gong bu so sor/ khungs brjod pa dang 'brel ba ma yin pa la any+tsa las niSh+ThA'i ta nar 'gyur te/ tsu'i ku ita 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyis na phyis pas/ a g+naH/ di bo\u0f85  bkol ba/ bi dzi gI ShA yAM/ di ba las kun du gong bu/ rgyal ba ma yin pa la'o/ di pa las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA'i ta yig rgyal
[\[437b.4\]]ba brjod pa ma yin pa la nar bsgyur te/ di ba la k+ta/ tsha ba dag gi rjes su sna ldan la'ang sha UTha dag gos/ bra Ur bsgyur/ ika gi a tsa la  mchod/ ya Nar bsgyur bas/ d+yU naH/ rgyal ba brjod pa yin na ta nar bsgyur bas/ d+yU tAH/ nirbA No\u0f85bA te/ rlung ma yin pa la nirbA Na'o/ nir
[\[437b.5\]]snga ma'i bA 'gro ba la k+ta sbyar bas/ nirbA Na zhes pa rlung brjod pa ma yin pa la tshig phrad do/ rlung yin na ta nar ma bsgyur bas/ bA daH/ shu Sha kaH/ shuSha las ka'o/ shuSha las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA'i ta kar bsgyur te/ shuSha kaH/ ba tso baH/ gsal ba/ pa tsa las ba'o/ /paca las pha rol gyi niSh+ShA'i
[\[437b.6\]]ta bar bsgyur te/ tsu'i kur bsgyur bas/ me/ pa kwaH/ k+ShA yo maH/ k+Shai las ma'o/ k+Shai las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA'i ta mar bsgyur te/ rlung / k+ShA maH/ k+ShA ma bAn/ pras+t+yo\u0f85n+ya ra ta s+yAM/ pras+t+yA las yang na'o/ pra s+t+yA las pha rol  skams/ gyi niSh+ThA'i ta mar yang na 'gyur te/ pra stI maH/ pra stI taH/ s+t+yaHpra bUrba
[\[437b.7\]]s+ya/ pra sngon ma'i s+t+yA'i 'o/ pra sngon ma'i  smin/ s+t+yA'i niSh+ThA pha rol la saM pra sAr Nar 'gyur te/ dper brjod bstan zin to/ k+Shi ba kr-i/ zad/ shol+lA g+hAH/ k+Shi ba/ rgyas pa/ kr-i sha/ phra mo/ nus pa/ ul+lA g+ha sogs pa rnams so/ k+Shepa dang / kr-i sha dang / rab tu chogs/ ul+la g+ha rnams
[\[438a\]]
[\[438a.1\]]k+ta'i ta tshig phrad las a yig tu byas pa'o/ A di tash+tsa/ Ata 'gro ba las kyang ngo / byings Ata 'gro ba las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA la iT 'gyur ba ma yin no/ ti tsa/ ta la'ang ngo / kr-ita kyi rkyen ta dang po can pha rol la tsa ra dang pha la dag gi u pa d+hA'i a uta du 'gyur te/
[\[438a.2\]]pra sngon ma'i pa lA la k+ta mdo snga mas iT mi 'gyur/ mdo 'dis u pa ng+hA uta tshig phrad las ta lar bsgyur bas/ pra phul+laH/ nu da bi don+da trAg+h+rA b+h+yo\u0f85n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ nud  bid[: ]un+nga[: ]trA[: ]g+h+rI rnams las yang na'o/ /nud la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA'i ta nar yang na
[\[438a.3\]]'gyur te/ nun+naH/ nut+tAH/ bin+naH/ bit+taH/ un+naH/ ut+taH/ trA NaH/ trA taH/ g+h+ra caH/ g+h+rA taH/ hrI NaH/ hrI taH/ rab tu rgyas/ shwi di to niSh+ThA yAM/ shwi ita 'gro ba las niSh+ThA la'o/ /shwi dang byings ita 'gro ba rnams las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA la iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ gong du un+di la
[\[438a.4\]]iT ma byin pa  nges/ bzhin no/ shes/ na ng+t+yA  klas/ glas/ khyA pr-i  'khrungs/ mU r+tshi ma dI/ dri blang / ng+h+yA  khyA  ngo tsha/ pr-I  mU r+tshi  mang rnams kyi ma yin no/ d+h+yA la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi pha rol la niSh+ThA'i ta nar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ d+h+yA taH/ khyA taH/ pUrtaH/ bskyabs sam gang ba/ mUr+ng+d+haH/ mang+taH/ myos/
[\[438a.5\]]bit+to b+ho ga pri tA ta yoH/ longs spyod dang rab tu grags pa dag la bit+taH'o/ /bita shes pa lak+ta byin pas/ bit+taHzhes pa longs spyod dang rab tu grags pa dag brjod pa la tshig phrad de/ bit+taHpra tI taH/ bit+taM d+ha naM/ r-i Na mA d+ha mar+N+ye/ sems/ da shad/ oSh+Ta'i sngon ma yin pa'i uta/ rmongs/ ra las dbyi 'os/ phyis/
[\[438a.6\]]r-i NaM bu lon lhag pa la'o/ r-i 'gro ba la k+ta sbyar bas/ r-i NaM zhes pa lhag pa'i bu lon brjod pa la tshig phrad de/ A d+ha ma r+NaM/ iT niSh+ThA yAM/ niSh+ThA la iTa'o/ nir snga ma'i ku Sha las pa  grags pa rig/ nor rig/ rol gyi niSh+ThA la iT 'gyur te/ niTh+ku Shi taH/ bas ti k+Shu d+ho riT/ pas ti[: ]k+Shu d+ha dag
[\[438a.7\]]las iTa'o/ ba sa ti dang k+Shu d+ha dag las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA dang k+tA dag la iT rtag tu 'gyur te/ pa tsa swa pi sogs kyis  bu lon khyer ba/ saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur pas/ uShi taH/ gnas  k+Shu di taH/ ltogs/ any+tse pU dzA yAM/ any+tsa la mchod pa la'o/ /phrogs/ any+tsa las mchod pa'i don la NiSh+ThA dang k+t+wa
[\[438b\]]
[\[438b.1\]]dag la aT 'gyur te/ any+tsi taHde baH/ kli shaHniSh+Tha yoH/ kli sha las niSh+ThA la'o/ kli sha las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA la iT yang na 'gyur te/ kli shi taH/ kliSh+TaH/ 'grel par/ bam dang dza pi dang / bi dang Ang snga ma'i shwas las niSh+ThA la iT yang na 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ ba mi taH/ ban+ta/
[\[438b.2\]]tra bi taH/ dzab+taH/ bi shwa si taH/ lha mchod/ bi shwastaH/ A shwa si taH/ A shwasta/ pU du sh+tsa/ pUng las kyang ngo / pUng las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA dang k+t+wA dag la iT  brash+tsa b+has+dza sogs kyis sha Sha/ yang na 'gyur ro/ pUngaHk+t+wa tsa/ pUng las k+t+wA'ang ngo / /pUng las pha rol gyi iT dang bcas pa'i niSh+ThA dang  skyugs/
[\[438b.3\]]zlas  k+t+rA'ang ka 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin te/ mdo snga mas iT yang na bar byas/ iTa'i phyogs la mdo 'dis yon tan byas pas/ pa bitaH/ pU taH/ niSh+ThA shIng swi di mi di k+ShI di d+h-I ShaH/ shIng[: ]swi di[: ]mi di[: ]k+Sh+wi di[: ]d+h+r-i Sha las niSh+ThA'o/ /shIng sogs 'di rnams las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA iT dang
[\[438b.4\]]bcas pa ka 'gro ba ma yin te/ iT byin yon tan byas pas/ sha yitaH/ swe di taH/ me di taH/ k+Sh+we di taH/ d+har+Shi taH/ A di karma Ni k+taH/ dag pa'am gtsang ma/ karta ri tsa/ dang po'i las la k+ta ste byed pa po la'ang ngo / dang po'i las te bya ba rtsom pa la 'jug pa'i las dang byed pa po dag la'ang
[\[438b.5\]]k+ta 'gyur ro/ bi b+hA ShA b+hA bA di karma NoH/ dngos po dang dang po'i las/ nyal/ gsher ba/ grogs/ la yang na'o/ dngos po dang dang po'i las dag gi don du byin pa'i niSh+ThA la iT yang na 'gyur te/ pra swe di t+yaH/ pra swin+na/ me di taH/ min+na/ sogs so/ /mr-i Sha sti tik+ShAyAM/ mr-i Sha las bzod pa
[\[438b.6\]]la'o/ /mr-i Sha las bzod pa la 'jug pa na iT dang bcas pa'i niSh+ThA ka 'gro ba'i ming can ma yin te/ mar+Shi taH/ u du pa d+hAng+b+hA bA di karma Ni ra n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ uta u pad+tA las dngos po dang dang po'i  rab tu gsher/ las dag grogs/ la yang na'o/ /byings uta u pa d+hA las dngos po dang
[\[438b.7\]]dang po'i las kyi don du byin pa'i niSh+ThA iT dang bcas pa ka 'gro ba'i ming can yang ste/ bzod pa byas/ pra d+yo ti taH/ rab gsal/ pra d+yu ti taH/ sogs so/ no pa d+hA t+tha phAn+dA dwA/ na upa d+hA tha pha mtha' las yang na'o/ /byings na upa d+hA tha dang pa'i mtha' can las pha rol gyi niSh+ThA iT
[\[439a\]]
[\[439a.1\]]dang bcas pa ka 'gro ba'i ming can yang na ste/ man+thi taH/ ma thi taH/ guM phi taH/ gu phi taH/ sogs so/ /niSh+ThA y+waM seT+wi/ iT dang bcas pa'i niSh+ThA la'o/ /iT dang bcas pa'i ni Sh+ThA pha rol la Ni tsa dbyi ste/ b+hA betaH/ b+hA bita bAn sogs so/ A ni karma Ni/ dang po'i
[\[439a.2\]]las la'o/ sha kli la dang po'i las kyi don du byin pa'i niSh+ThA la iT  srubs/ yang na mi 'gyur  skyod/ skyod/ te/ shak+taH/ sha ki taH/ k+Shub+da swAM ta d+h+waM ta la g+na m+li Ta bi rib+d+ha phAM Ta bA D+hA ni man+tha ma nasta maHsak+tA bis+yaSh+Tha swa ra nA A sa b+h+r-i she Shu/ k+Shu b+da[: ]byung / swAM ta[: ]d+h+waM ta[: ]lag+na[: ]m+li Ta[: ]bi rib+d+ha  phAMT  bA D+hA
[\[439a.3\]]rnams srub pa/ yid/ mun pa/ yang dag par sbyor ba/ mi gsal ba'i sgra/ dbyangs rnyi ba/ myur ba rnams la'o/ /k+Shu/ nus/ ba g.yo ba/ swan dar d+h+wan sgra/ la gi yang dag par sbyor ba/ m+le tsha mi gsal ba'i sgra/ br-i re br-i sgra/ phAMT 'gro ba/ bA hu rab tu bya ba rnams la k+ta sbyar bas/ k+Shub+da/ swAM ta/
[\[439a.4\]]d+h+wAM ta/ lag+na/ m+liT/ di ri b+d+ha/ phAM Ta/ bA D+ha rnams rim pa bzhin/ srub pa/ yid/ mun/ yang dag par sbyor ba/ mi gsal ba'i sgra/ dbyangs/ rnyi ba/ myur ba rnams brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /d+h+r-i Sha sha shI bai ya te/ d+h+r-i Sha  sha saM sbubs che ba la'o/ /sbubs che ba ste spobs pa mtho ba brjod pa la
[\[439a.5\]]d+h+r-iSha dang sha shi dag las niSh+ThA la iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ dr-iSh+TaH/ bi sha sh+taH/ dr-iD+haHs+thU la ba la yoH/ dr-i D+ha sbom pa dang stobs ldan dag pa'o/ /dr-i hi 'bar ba la k+ta sbyar bas/ dr-i D+ha zhes pa sdom pa dang stobs ldan dag brjod pa la tshig phrad do/ /pa ri br-iD+haH/ pa ri br-iD+ha'o/ pa ri sngon ma'i bri hi 'phel
[\[439a.6\]]pa la k+ta sbyar bas/ pa ri br-iD+haHzhes pa jo bo brjod pa la  mi nyan pa/ rnam par 'tshe ba/ tshig phrad do/ /kr-i tshu ga ha na yoHkaShaH/ dka' ba dang zab pa dag las kaSha las so/ /dka' ba dang zab pa dag brjod pa la kaSha las niSh+ThA la iT mi 'gyur te/ kaSh+To\u0f85g+niH/ kaSh+TaHparba taH/ g+hu Shi ra bi shab+da na/ g+hu
[\[439a.7\]]Shi las sgra'i khyad par ma yin pa la'o/ /g+hu Shi las sgra'i khyad par ma yin pa la niSh+ThA la IT mi 'gyur te/ g+huSh+TA radz+dzuH/ thag pa/ sgra'i khyad par la iT byin pas/ a ba g+hu Shi taM/ bA kya mA ha/ tshig smras pa/ ardeHsaM ni bib+h+yaH/ ardi'i saM ni bi rnams  me/ ri bo/ las so/ /saM[: ]ni  bi rnams
[\[439b\]]
[\[439b.1\]]las a rdo las ni Sh+ThA la iT mi 'gyur te/ sa mar+N+NaH/ n+yar+N+NaH/ byar+NaH/ a b+he sh+tsA bi dUr+Ye/ a b+hi las kyang mi ring ba la'o/ /a b+hi las kyang a rda las mi ring ba la 'jug pa na ni Sh+ThA la iT mi 'gyur te/ a b+h+ya r+N+NaH/ Ne ra ng+h+ya pa ne br-it+taM/ Ni'i klog pa la br-it+taM'o/ /br-i ta Ni tsa'i mtha' can las k+ta sbyar
[\[439b.2\]]bas br-it+taM zhes pa klog pa la 'jug pa na tshig mnyam bar zos/ nges par zos/ lhag par zos/ phrad do/ /bA dAn+ta shAn+ta pUr+Na dASh+Ta spaSh+Ta tshan+na dz+nya p+tAH/ dA n+ta  shAn+ta  pUr+Na[: ]dASh+Ta  spaSh+Ta  tshan+na dz+nyap+ta rnams so/ /da mu dang  lhag par nye bar za/ sha mu zhi ba/ pU rI tshil pa/ da su nye bar 'jog pa/ sba sha snod/ tsha da sgrib
[\[439b.3\]]pa/ dz+nya nges sbyor rnams Ni tsa'i mtha' can la k+tA sbyar bas/ dAn+ta sogs yang na tshig phrad do/ /yang na iT byin pas/ da mi taH/ dul ba/ zhi ba/ gang ba/ mche ba/ bsal ba/ sgrib pa/ nges sbyor/ sha mi taH/ pU ri taH/ da si taH/ spashi taH/ sha di taH/ dz+nyAnaHsogs so/ /ru Sh+ya ma twa ra saM g+hu ShA swa nAM/
[\[439b.4\]]ru Sha[: ]a ma[: ]twa ra[: ]saM g+hu Sha[: ]A swan rnams kyi'o/ /ruSha la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi pha rol gyi niSh+ThA la iT yang na mi 'gyur te/ ruSh+TaH/ aMtaH/ tUr+NaH/ saMg+hu Sh+TaH/ A swaM taH/ yang na iT byin pas/ ru Shi taH/ a mi taH/ twa ri taH/ saMg+hu Shi taH/ A swA ni taH/ hr-i Sherlo ma su/ hr-i Sha
[\[439b.5\]]la ba spu la'o/ /hr-iSha las ni Sh+ThA la ba spu brjod pa la iT yang na mi 'gyur te/ hr-iSh+TaH/ hr-i Shi taH/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ khros pa/ nad pa/ mgyogs pa/ kun nas bsgrags/ kun tu bsgrags/ pismi ta pra ti g+hAta yosh+tsa/ bismi ta dang bra tig+hA ta dag kyang ngo / /bi sngon ma'i Sh+ming cung zad rgod pa dang /
[\[439b.6\]]dra ti snga ma'i han 'tshe ba dag la k+ta sbyar bas/ bi smi ta dang / pra ti g+hA ta/ ba spu'am mgu ba/ zhes pa dag kyang tshig phrad do/ /a ba tsi tash+tsa/ apa tsi ta'ang ngo / /nanya sngon ma'i ba tsa la ta sbyar pas/ a pa tsi ta zhes pa'ang tshig phrad do/ /byA yaHpIH/ pyA yI'i pI'o/ /niSh+ThA pha rol la pyA yI'i
[\[439b.7\]]pI zhes par 'gyur te/ o pyA yi la k+ta/ rnam par dgong / so sor 'joms/ mdo 'dis pIr bsgyur ota 'gro ba sogs kyis ta nar bsgyur bas/ pI naM mu khaM/ bzhin rgyas pa/ 'grel par nyer bsgyur sngon du byung na  ma btsos/ pIr mi bsgyur bar bshad de/ prasngon ma'i pyA yI la k+ta ba ya dag gi pa la
[\[440a\]]
[\[440a.1\]]daphyi 'os ya phyis/ ota 'gro ba sogs kyis ta nar bsgyur bas/ pra pyA naM/ sogs so/ Ad pUrba s+yA n+d+hu d+ha soH/ Ang sngon ma'i khron pa dang bzhod dag la'o/ /Ang sngon ma'i phyA yI niSh+ThA pha rol la khron pa dang bzhod dag la 'jug pa na pIr 'gyur te/ A pI no\u0f85n+d+hUH/
[\[440a.2\]]A pI namU ng+haH/ d+ya ti s+yi ti mIs+thA mit+ka ti/ d+ya ti[: ]s+ya ti[: ]mA[: ]s+thA rnams ka 'gro ba la ita'o/ rab 'phel/ d+ya ti ste do gnyis su byed pa/ s+ya ti ste Sho mtha'i las/ mAng gus pa s+thA gnas pa rnams kyi mtha' ta dang po ka 'gro ba pha rol la ita du bsgyur te/ di tAH/ si taH/ mitaH/ khron pa rgyu rgyas pa/
[\[440a.3\]]bzhod rgyas pa/ s+thi taH/ shA tsho\u0f85an+ya ra s+yAM/ shA tshA dag gi yang na'o/ /sho phra mor byed pa dang tsho gcod pa dag gi iT du yang na bsgyur te/ shi taH/ shA taH/ tshitaH/ tshAtaH/ 'grel par sh+yaid 'gro ba'i ita du 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ sh+yitaH/ dum bur byas/ mtha'i las byas/ gus/ dad+hA
[\[440a.4\]]her+hiH/ gnas/ dad+hA ti'i hi'o/ /ta dang po ka 'gro ba pha rol la dad+hA ti ni hi zhes par bsgyur te/ hi taH/ do dar+g+hoH/ g+hu'i da'i da ta 'o/ /ta dang  phra mor byas/ bcad zin/ po ka 'gro ba pha rol la g+hU'i ming can gyi dA ni dad ces par 'gyur zhing / songs/ yang na thAM zhes par 'gyur te/ kiM
[\[440a.5\]]dat+taH/ kiMthAn+taH/ atsa u pa sargAtaH/ nyer bsgyur atsa las ta'o/ nyer bsgyur atsa mtha'  bzung / can pha rol gyi dAnyani ta dang po ka 'gro ba pha rol la ta zhes par 'gyur te/ ta'i srog a brjod don no/ /pra a pa sngon ma'i dAnya la k+ta mdo 'dis tar bsgyur bas/ prat+taH/ a bat+taH/ sogs
[\[440a.6\]]ci byin/ so/ /'grel bar yang na dad du bsgyur bar bshad pas/ a ba dat+taM/ pra dat+taM/ sudat+taM/ sogs so/ /dasti/ dA'i ta la'o/ /nyer bsgyur ika so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' can ni dA bsgyur ba'i ta pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ ni dang su snga ma'i dA la k+ta byin/ nyer bsgyur  rab byin/ kun byin/
[\[440a.7\]]atsa las ta 'os/ dA ta/ mdo 'dis ring por bsgyur pas/ kun byin/ rab byin/ legs byin/ nI t+taM/ des byin/ sU t+taM/ legs byin/ legs so/ /d+heT btung ba/ gai sgra/ bA btung pa rnams la/ k+ta[: ]g+hU mA s+thA sogs kyis ir bsgyur pas/ d+hI taM/ btung / gI taM/ glu/ pI taM/ btung / sogs so/ /
[\[440b\]]
[\[440b.1\]]dzan/ san/ khan rnams la k+ta/ dzan/ san/ khan rnams kyi dz+hal la'os TiAta du bsgyur bas/ dzA taM/ sA taM/ bA taM/ a do dzag+d+hil+ya p+hi ki ti/ l+ya pa ta ka 'gro ba la ata kyi dzag+d+hi'o/ /k+t+wA bsgyur ba'i l+yapa dang ta dang ka 'gro ba pha rol la ang za ba ni dzag+ng+hi zhes par 'gyur te/ ad za ba la
[\[440b.2\]]k+ta/ mdo 'dis ad dzag+d+hi ru bsgyur/ i brjod don/ dz+haSha sogs kyis tad+ha/ dz+har 'dra ba la dz+har rnams kyi'os  skyes/ byin/ rkos/ d+ha gong ma phyis pas/ dzag+ng+haH/ bA kro sha dai n+ya yoH/ khros tshig dang 'o brgyal ba dag la yang na'o/ /k+Shi zad pa'i niSh+ThA pha rol la khros tshig dang 'o brgyal ba dag
[\[440b.3\]]la 'jug pa na ring por yang ba bsgyur te/ k+ShI Ni ma na na/ k+Shi NaM ma ne na/ k+ShI NA yuH/ k+Shi NA yuH/ ni na dI b+h+yAM snA te kau sha le/ ni na dI dag las snA ti'i dge ba'i  zos/ dngos po la'o/ /ni dang na dI dag las pha rol gyi s+n+wa ti'i sa yig ni dge ba'i dngos po brjod pa la Shar 'gyur te/ niSh+ThA taH/ nadISh+ThAtaH/
[\[440b.4\]]gat+yA r+thA karma ne\u0f85d+hA re tsa/ 'gro ba'i las dang las  zad par sems/ med pa la/ che zad/ gzhi la'ang ngo / /'gro ba'i las dang las med pa dag la bya ba'i don las gzhi la k+ta 'gyur te byed pa po la yang ngo / i da me ShAM yAtaH/ i ha te A sitaH/ sh+li Sha shIng s+thA sa bas dzan ru  bas dag/ chu klung dag pa/
[\[440b.5\]]ha dz+w-I b+h+yaH/ sh+liSha shIng  s+thA As  bas[: ]dzan[: ]ruha[: ]dz+w-I rnams las so/ /sh+li Sha la sogs pa 'di rnams las byed pa po la k+ta 'gyur ta/ A sh+liSh+TaH/ ad+hi sha yi taH/ u pas+thitaH/ u pA si taH/ anU Shi taH/ 'dis 'di la 'gro/ de 'di la sdod pa/ a nu dzAtaH/ A ru D+haH/ a nu dzIr+NaH/ A hA rA r+thAta/
[\[440b.6\]]zas kyi don las so/ /zas kyi don las gzhi la k+ta 'gyur te/ i da meShAMb+hu k+taM/ i da me ShAM pI taM/ nyI taHk+taH/ nya 'gro ba las k+ta'o/ /'byor ba'am 'brel pa/ lhag par nyal/ nye bar gnas/ nye bar yod/ rjes su gnas/ byings nya 'gro ba rnams  rjes su skyes/ gzhon pa'am gnas pa'am 'jog pa/ rjes su rgas pa/
[\[440b.7\]]las da ltar ba la k+ta 'gyur te/ nyi k+Sh+wid bsher ba la k+ta sbyar bas/ 'dis 'di rnams zos/ 'dis 'di rnams btung / k+Sh+wiN+NaH/ bsher bar byed/ sogs so/ ma ti but+d+hi pU dzA r+the b+h+ya sh+tsa/ ma ti  bud+hi  pU dza las don las kyang ngo / man  bud+ha  pU dza rnams las de'i don brjod pa la da ltar ba la'ang k+ta 'gyur te/ rA
[\[441a\]]
[\[441a.1\]]dz+nyI ma taH/ iSh+Ta bung+ng+haH/ de ba pU dzitaH/ na bun+sa ke b+hA be k+taH/ dngos po la ma ning la k+ta'o/ byings las dngos po brjod pa ma ning gi rtags su 'gyur pa la k+ta 'gyur te/ ha si taM/ dzalpi taM/ sogs so/ /liTaHkAn dzrA/ liTa'i kA na tsa yang na'o/ /bya ba'i don la liTa'i kA na tsa zhes
[\[441a.2\]]rgyal po'i ShA+o gros/ sangs rgyas par 'dod/ lha mchod/ par yang na 'gyur te/ tsa dbyangs don kra kita kyi don no/ /kr-i la l-iT gnyis brjod r-i ata/ kuha dag gi tsu/ liT kA na tsar bskyur/ bgad dam bzhad/ bzlas/ ika gi a tsa la yaNar bsgyur bas/ tsa krANaH/ sogs so/ /kwa su sh+tsa/ kwa su'ang
[\[441a.3\]]ngo / /bya ba'i don la liT kra su zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ u num gyi don dang ka kita kyi don no/ /tsa kr-i bAn/ u pa shu shrU bAn/ dzag+mi bAn/ sogs so/ /ba swe kA dzAd+g+ha sAM/ atsa gcig pa Ata g+has rnams kyi ba su la'o/ /byings atsa gcig byas/ pa rnams dang Ata mtha' rnams dang
[\[441a.4\]]g+has rnams kyi pha rol gyi ba su ste/ liT bsgyur bas kwa su la iT 'gyur te/ ad za/ A di pAn/ zos/ byas/ nye bar nyan/ r-i 'gro  A ri bAn/ song / song / dA  da di bAn/ byin/ d+hA  da d+hi bAn/ zin/ ad g+ha sl-ir bskyur ro/ /dzak+Shi bAn/ zas/ sogs so/ /bi b+hA ShA ga ma ha na bid bi shAM/ gam han bid bi sha rnams kyi
[\[441a.5\]]yang na'o/ /gam la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi pha rol gyi kwa su la iT yang na 'gyur te/ dzag+mi bAn/ song / dza ga m+wAn/ dzag+h+ni bAn/ song / dza g+na n+wAn/ bi bi di bAn/ shes/ bi bi dwAn/ bi bi shwAn/ 'grel par dr-i sha'i pha rol gyi kwa su la'ang iT yang na bar bshad pas/ da dr-i shi bAn/ da dr-i
[\[441a.6\]]shwAn/ dA shwAn sA hwA nI ya bAn tsa/ dA swAn[: ]sA hwAn[: ]I ya bAn 'ang ngo / /dA sha mi mthong ba/ Shaha bzod pa/ iN 'gro ba rnams la liT kwa sur bsgyur bas/ dA swAn/ sA hwAn/ bsdad/ bsdad/ i ya bAn rnams tshig phrad do/ /laTaHsha tr-i shA na tsau sa mA nAd+hi ka ra Ne/ mnyam pa'i lhag  bltas/
[\[441a.7\]]par byed pa la Ta'i sha tr-i dang shA na tsa dag go/ /mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa'i don la mang po la laT sha tr-i dang shA na tsa dag tu 'gyur te/ sha gnyis shid kyi don tsa  mi mthong / bzod/ dbyangs don r-i/ song / num gyi don no/ btsa la/ laT/ laT sha tr-i ru bsgyur/ byed pa po la shapa/ ata kyi
[\[441b\]]
[\[441b.1\]]yon tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol kyi gzugs/ pa tsan/ A ne muka/ A na la mu ka'o/ ata mtha' can la pha rol du A na ste/ shA na tsa byung na muka A ga ma 'gyur te/ pa tsa la laT sha pa/ laT shA na tsar bsgyur/ mdo 'dis mu ka byin pas/ pa tsa m+danaH/ de
[\[441b.2\]]bzhin du/ br-i tu 'jug pa la/ brta mA naH/ sogs so/ /'tshed par byed/ lak+Sha Na he twoHkri yA yAH/ mtshan nyid kyi rgyu'i bya ba la'o/ /mtshan nyid kyi rgyu'i bya ba rtogs par byed pa la laT sha tr-i dang sha na tsa dag tu 'gyur te/ pra pI yan/ rab tu btung bar byed/ pra pI ya mAnaH/ I  'tshed par byed/
[\[441b.3\]]dA saH/ As las Ita'o/ 'jug par byad dam da ltar ba/ As nye bar sdod pa las pha rol gyi laT bsgyur ba'i shAn tsa'i A ni Ita du bsgyur te/ A sI naH/ bi deHsha turba suH/ bi di las shA tr-i yi ba su'o/ bid shes pa las pha rol gyi  prA yata mtha' can la laT sha tr-i dang sha na tsar bsgyur ba'o/ /
[\[441b.4\]]laT bsgyur ba'i sha tr-i ni yang na pa su zhes par bsgyur te/ bi dan/ bi dwAn/ tau sata/ de dag sa ta'o/ /sha tr-i dang shAn tsa dag las sata ces  sdod par byed/ ming 'dogs byed do/ l+r-iTaHsa dwA/ l+r-iTa'i sata yang na'o/ /l+r-iT 'ang sata ste sha tr-i dang shAn tsa dag tu mang po la yang na bsgyur te/
[\[441b.5\]]kr-inya la l+r-iT/ s+ya ta dag sogs kyis s+ya byin/ shes par byed dam rig par byed/ bal dang po'i iT mdo 'dis l+r-iT sata du bsgyur bas/ ka ri d+h+yAn/ ka ri Sh+ya mA na/ sogs so/ /pU d+Ya dzoH shA nan/ pUng ya dza dag la shA nan 'o/ pUng dag pa dang yadza lha mchod pa dag las pha rol gyi laT ni shA
[\[441b.6\]]nan zhes par bsgyur te/ na rjes ma dbyangs don/ pA ba mA naH/ ya dza mA naH/ ti ts+tshA l+ya ba yo ba tsa na shak+ti Shu shA na tsa/ de'i ngang tshul dang na tshod  rtsed par 'gyur/ brjod pa dang stobs rnams la shAn tsa'o/ de'i dang tshul dang na tshod brjod pa dang stobs rnams rtogs par byed pa la laT shAn tsar bsgyur
[\[441b.7\]]te/ ka tI ha nr-i t+ya mA naH/ 'di na gar byed pa du/ dag par byed/ mchod par byed/ ka tI ha dza lpa mA naH/ 'di na smra bar byed pa du/ ka tI ha kaN+TuM g+h+nA naH/ 'di na 'tsher ma 'joms pa du/ ing d+hAr+YoHsha tru kr-i tsh+ri Ni/ ing D+h+r-i dag las dgra dang dka' ba dag la'o/ /ing klog pa dang d+h+r-inya 'dzin pa dag las rim pa
[\[442a\]]
[\[442a.1\]]bzhin dgra dang dka' ba dag rtogs par byed pa la laT sha tr-i ru 'gyur te/ a d+hI yan/ ng+ha ran/ sogs so/ /A kwe sta ts+tshI la tad+d+hA rma ta t+sA d+hu kA ri Shu/ de'i ngang tshul de'i chos de legs pa bya ba rnams la kwipa nas brtsams de'o/ /kwipa nas brtsams te tr-i tsa'i bar gyi rkyen de
[\[442a.2\]]rnams de'i dang tshul dang de'i chos dang de legs pa dang bya ba rnams kyi don la 'jug go zhes  klog par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ pa spyir btang pa'o/ /a laM kr-inya ni rA kr-inya dza not+pa tson+ma da ru ts+ya pa tra pa gr-i tu br-i d+hu sa ha tsa ra iSh+Nu tsaH/ a laM kr-inya  ni rA kr-inya  dza na[: ]ut+pa ta[: ]ut+pa tsa[: ]un+ma da[: ]ru tsi[: ]a pa
[\[442a.3\]]tra pa[: ]pr-i tu[: ]br-i d+hu[: ]sa ha tsa ra las iSh+Nu tsa'o/ /a laM dang / ni rA sngon ma'i kr-inya dang / dza na dang / uta sngon ma'i pa ta dang / pa tsa dang / ma da rnams dang / ru tsa dang / a pa sngon ma'i tra pUSha dang / br-i tu dang / bi d+hi dang / sa ha dang tsa ra rnams las iSh+Nu tsa 'gyur te/ a laM ka ra
[\[442a.4\]]r-i Sh+NuH/ ni rA ka r-iSh+NuH/ pra dza ni Sh+NuH/ ut+pa tiSh+NuH/ ut+pa tsiSh+NuH/ un+ma diSh+NuH/ ro tsiSh+NuH/ a pa tra piSh+NuH/ brtiSh+NuH/ bar+t+hiSh+NuH/ sa hiSh+NuH/ tsa ri Sh+NuH/ b+hu ba sh+tsa/ ng+hU las kyang ngo / /b+hU las iSh+Nu tsa 'gyur zhing gyang sgras gzhan la'ang 'gyur te/ b+ha biSh+NuH/ b+h+rA dziSh+NuH/ sogs so/ /NaH
[\[442a.5\]]rgyan byed/ ngan byed/ rab skyes sam skye dgu/ mtho ba nas lhung / shin tu 'tshod/ smyon pa/ 'od zer/ khrel yod/ tshan+da si/ 'jug pa/ 'phel ba/ bzod pa/ spyod pa/ Ni las sdeb sbyor la'o/ /byings Ni tsa'i mtha' can las sdeb sbyor la iSh+Nu tsa 'gyur te/ kar yiSh+NuH/ byung / 'tshod/ glA dzis+tha sh+tsa k+s+nuH/
[\[442a.6\]]glA dzi s+thA las kyang k+s+nu'o/ /glA[: ]dzi[: ]s+thA rnams las kyang k+s+nu 'gyur zhing kyang sgras b+hU la 'ang 'gyur te/ glA snuH/ dziSh+NuH/ s+thA snuH/ gnas pa/ b+hU Sh+NuH/ hra si gr-i d+hi d+h+r-i Shi k+She pek+nuH/ tra si[: ]gr-i d+hi[: ]d+h+r-iShi[: ]k+She ba las k+nu'o/ /tra si la sogs pa 'di rnams byas/ las k+nu 'gyur te/ tra snuH/ gr-i rnUH/
[\[442a.7\]]g+h+raSh+NuH/ su cong ngam spyi brtol/ k+Shis+NuH/ 'dor ba/ 'grel par/ m+lA[: ]k+Shi[: ]pa tsa[: ]pa ri mr-i dza rnams  nad/ rgyal ba/ tshig phrad la Ita mi 'gyur ro/ /byung ba/ las kyang snu 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ m+lA snuH/ nad/ k+SheSh+NuH/ zad/ pak+Sh+Nu/ 'tshod/ pa ri mik+Sh+NuH/ yongs dag/ tsA la  skrag pa/ 'dod pa
[\[442b\]]
[\[442b.1\]]shab+hAN+hA karma kA t+yu tsa/ /'gro ba dang sgra'i don las las med pa las yutsa'o/ tsal la sogs pa g.yo pa'am 'gro ba dang du sogs sgra'i don las med pa las ngang tshul sogs la yutsa 'gyur te/ yu a nar bsgyur bas/ tsa la naH/ tso panaH/ ba ra NaH/ shab+danaH/ a nu dA t+teta sh+tsa ha
[\[442b.2\]]lA deH/ a nu dAt+ta 'gro ba las kyang hal dang po la'o/ /byings tang a tang gnyis las tang 'jug pa nga yig ma gtogs pa'i a nu dAt+ta 'gro ba hal dang po can las ngang tshul sogs la yutsa 'gyur te/ badz+hanaH/ sogs so/ /g.yo ba/ skrag pa/ sgra/ la Sha pa da pa ta s+th+wa b+hU br-i Sha ha na
[\[442b.3\]]ka ma gam shrI b+h+ya u kanya/ la Sha[: ]pa da[: ]s+thA[: ]b+hU[: ]br-iSha[: ]han  kam[: ]gam[: ]shr-I rnams las u kanya'o/ /laSha la sogs pa 'di rnams las ngang tshul sogs la u kanya 'gyur te/ a pa lA Shu kaH/ 'phel ba/ u pa pAdu kaH/ pra pAtu kaH/ u pa snyA yu kaH/ pra b+h+rabu kaH/ bU r+Shu kaH/
[\[442b.4\]]A g+hA tu kaH/ kA mu kaH/ A gA mu kaH/ pra shA ru kaH/ dzalpa b+hik+Shu ku T+Ta luN+Da br-ingaHShA kan/ dzalpa[: ]b+hik+Shu[: ]kuT+Ta[: ]liN+Da[: ]pring laShA kana'o/ /dzalpa la sogs pa 'di rnams la ngang tshul sogs la ShA  kun mdzes/ nye bar 'gro'am rdzus skyes/ rab tu lhung ba/ nye gnas/ rab byung / char/
[\[442b.5\]]kun 'joms/ 'dod can/ kun 'gro/ rab 'tsho/ kan 'gyur ta/ na dbyangs don/ Sha dISha'i don no/ /dzalpA kaH/ b+hik+ShA kaH/ kuN+TA kaH/ luN+Ta kaH/ bdA kaH/ spr-i hi gr-i hi pa ti da yi ni pra tan+d+ra shrad+d+hA g+h+ya A lutsa/ spr-i hi[: ]gr-i hi  pa ti  da yi[: ]ni dra  tan+d+ra[: ]shrad+d+hA rnams las A lutsa'o/ /spr-i hi la
[\[442b.6\]]sogs pa 'di rnams la ngang tshul sogs dang ldan pa'i don la'ang A lutsa 'gyur te/ spri ha yA luH/ smra ga slong ba/ brdung ba/ 'dre ldog/ spr-i ha ya luH/ gus pa/ pa ta yA luH/ da yA luH/ nidrA luH/ tan+d+rA luH/ shrang+d+hA luH/ dA ng+heT si shad sa do ruH/ dA[: ]ng+heT[: ]si  shad  sad las ru'o/ /dA la
[\[442b.7\]]sogs pa 'di rnams las ngang tshul sogs la ru 'gyur te/ dA ruH/ sbyin pa/ ng+hA ruH/ btung ba/ 'dod ldan/ se ruH/ 'ching ba/ khyim ldan nam 'dzin chags can/ gdung ldan/ brtse ldan/ gnyid can/ snyom las can/ dad ldan/ sha druH/ 'jig pa/ sa druH/ 'jog sr-ig+ha sa daHka ma ra tsa/ sr-i[: ]g+has[:]
[\[443a\]]
[\[443a.1\]]ang las k+ma ra tsa'o/ sr-i[: ]g+has[: ]ad rnams las k+ma ra tsa 'gyur te/ sr-i ma raH/ g+hasma raH/ at+ma raH/ b+hany+dza b+hA sa mi do g+hu ratsa/ b+hany+dza  b+hAs  mid las g+hu ratsa'o/ /b+hany+dza[: ]b+hAs[: ]mid rnams la'ang ngang tshul sogs la g+hu ratsa 'gyur te/ b+had+gu raH/ b+ha su raH/ me du raH/ pi di
[\[443a.2\]]b+hi di tshi deHku ratsa/ bi di[: ]b+hi di[: ]tshi di las ku ratsa'o/ bi di[: ]b+hi di[: ]tshi di rnams la[: ]'gro bar mdzod/ za phod/ bza' phod/ ku ratsa 'gyur te/ bi du raH/ b+hi du raH/ tshi du raH/ iN na shi dzi sa rti b+h+yaHkwa ra ba/ iN[: ]na shi[: ]dzi[: ]sr-i rnams  shing la'o/ /bong ba dkar po/ 'od zer/ tshil can nam snum can/
[\[443a.3\]]la kwa rapa'o/ /iN sogs 'di rnams las kwa rab 'gyur te/ i twa raH/ na shwa raH/ dzi twa raH/ sr-i twa raH/ ya dza dza pad ha da sho ya daH/ mkhas pa/ 'joms byed dam rdo rje/ dgra lta'am gcod byed/ yadza  dza pa[: ]da ha da sha las yang las so/ yadza la sogs pa 'di rnams yang gi rkyen mtha' can
[\[443a.4\]]las Uka 'gyur te/ yA ya dzU kaH/ dzaM dza pU kaH/ 'gro ba/ tu ka/ 'jig pa/ dmag rgyal ba/ tu ka/ 'gro ba/ daM dahU kaH/ daM nga shU kaH/ na mi kam+pi smya dza sa ka ma hiM sa dI po raH/ na mi[: ]kam+pi[: ]smi[: ]a dzas[: ]kam[: ]hiM sa[: ]dI pa las ra'o/ /na mi la sogs pa 'di rnams la ra 'gyur te/
