[\[443a.5\]]na mraH/ kam+p+raH/ sme raM/ yang yang mchod/ yang yang bzlas/ a dza sraM/ ka mra/ hriM sraH/ dI praH/ sa nA shaM sa b+hik+Sha uH/ yang yang sreg/ yang yang za/ san[: ]A[: ]shaM sa[: ]b+hik+Sha las u'o/ /byings san gyi rkyen can dang A shaM sa dang / b+hik+Sha la u 'gyur te/ tsi kIr+ShuH/ A shan+suH/ 'dod pa/
[\[443a.6\]]'dud pa'am gug pa/ g.yo ba'am 'dar ba/ 'dzum pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa/ mdzes pa'am chags pa/ 'tshe ba'am sdig can/ sgron me'am 'od can/ b+hik+Shu/ bin+du rits+tshuH/ bin+duHits+tshuH'o/ /bi di dang i Shu la u sbyar bas/ bin+duHdang its+tshu dag tshig phrad do/ /sa hi tsa la hi beHki ki nau/ sa hi[: ]byed 'dod/ tsa li/ ba hi rnams
[\[443a.7\]]las ki kin dag go/ /sa hi sogs yang gi mtha' can la ki dang kin dag 'gyur te/ sA sa hiH/ yang yang bzod/ slong ba'i ngang tshul can te dge slong ngo / tsA tsa liH/ yang yang g.yo/ bA ba hiH/ yang yang thob/ thig le/ 'dod pa/ bA pa tiH/ pA ba ti'o/ pad yang rkyen can la ki dang kin sbyar bas/ bA pa
[\[443b\]]
[\[443b.1\]]tiHzhes pa tshig phrad do/ swa pi tr-i po na dzing / swa pi[: ]tr-i pa las na dzing ngo / sA pi dang / tr-i pa dag la na dzing 'gyur te/ da dang i 'gro'o/ sA p+naku/ tr-ip+naka/ shr-I ban+h+yo rA ruH/ shr-I ban+da dag las A ru'o/ /shr-I dang ban+di dag las A ru 'gyur te/ sha rA ruH/ ban+dA ruH/ b+hi yaHkru klu kan kru
[\[443b.2\]]yang yang 'gro/ ka naH/ b+hI las[: ]kru[: ]klu kan[: ]kru kan rnams so/ /b+h+wi las ngang tshul sogs la kru dang klu kan dang kru kan rnams 'gyur te/ b+hI ruH/ b+hI luka/ nyal/ tshim/ b+hI ru kaH/ s+the sha b+hA sa pi sa ka so ba ra tsa/ s+thA I sha[: ]b+hA sa[: ]pi sa[: ]kas las ba ratsa'o/ /'tsher/ gus pa/ s+thA la sogs pa 'di
[\[443b.3\]]rnams las ba ra tsa 'gyur te/ s+thA b.raH/ I shwa raH/ b+hA swa raH/ pe swa raH/ ya sh+tsa yang / yA las kyang yang la'o/ /yA thob pa yang  'jig pa/ gi rkyen can las  'jig pa/ kyang bar tsa 'gyur te/ yA yA ba raH/ b+h+rA dza b+hA sad+hU rbi d+yu to rdzi pr-I dzur+g+ra bstubaHkwipa/ b+h+yA dza[: ]b+hA sa[: ]d+hU ra bi t+yuta[:]
[\[443b.4\]]urdzi[: ]pr-I dzur[: ]gra bstu las kwi pa'o/ gnas pa/ dbang phyug/ gsal pa/ phye ma/ b+h+rA dza la sogs pa 'di rnams las ngang tshul sogs la kwipa 'gyur te/ b+h+rAT/ b+tAH/ ng+huH/ bit+yuta/ Urka/ pUH/ dzUH/ yang yang thob/ gra bstuta/ kwi b+ba ci pra tsh+yA yata stu ka Ta pru dzu shrI NAM dI r+g+ha sh+tsa/ ba tsi[: ]pra tshi[: ]A
[\[443b.5\]]ya ta stu[: ]ka Ta pru[: ]dzu[: ]shrI rnams kwi pa la ring po'ang ngo / ba tsi la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi kwipa pha rol la saM bra sA ra Nar mi 'gyur zhing ring por  'tshod pa/ gsal ba/ sa gzhi/ rnam gsal/ sbyin pa/ skyong ba/ nad/ 'gyur te/ bAka/ bstod/ prAT/ A ya tastUH/ ka Ta prUH/ dzUH/ shrIH/ t+yu ti ka mi dzu ho tI nAM
[\[443b.6\]]dwe tsa/ d+hu ti[: ]ga mi[: ]dzu ho ti rnams kyi gnyis kyang ngo / d+yu ti dang ga mi dang dzu ho ti rnams kyi kwipa pha rol la gnyis kyang brjod par bya ste/ di d+yu ta/ dza gta/ dzu ho te rdA+er+g+hash+tsa/ dzu ho ti'i ring po'ang ngo / /dzu ho ti'i  ngag/ dri ba/ bstod pa thob/ rtsA lhas so/ /song / dpal/ kwipa pha rol la mtha'
[\[443b.7\]]ring por 'ang 'gyur te/ hu la kwipa mdo snga mas gnyis brjod 'dis ring por bsgyur bas/ dzu hUH/ byin/ b+hU baHsaMdz+nyAn+h+ra rayoH/ ming gi phyi  gsal ba/ so pa/ ma las b+hU las so/ /ming dang nyer bsgyur dag las pha rol gyi d+hU las kwipa 'gyur te/ mi d+ta b+hUH/ grogs yod/ pra ti b+hUH/ so sor gyur
[\[444a\]]
[\[444a.1\]]bi pra saM b+h+yo DA saM dz+nyA yAM/ bi pra saM rnams las ming ma yin pa la Du'o/ bi pra saM rnams las pha rol gyi b+hU las ming ma yin pa la Du 'gyur te/ Ti'i 'os Ti phyis pas/ bi b+huH/ pra b+huH/ sraM b+huH/ dA m+nI sha sa yu yu dzastunyu da si si tsa mi ha pa ta daM sha na haHka ra Ne/ dwa ba[: ]nI[:]
[\[444a.2\]]sha sa[: ]yu[: ]yu dza[: ]stu[: ]tud[: ]si[: ]sitsa[: ]mi ha[: ]pa ta[: ]daM sha[: ]na ha las byed pa la'o/ /dA pa la sogs pa 'di rnams las bya ba'i don la tran 'gyur te/ dA traM/ ne traM/ sha s+t+raM/ yo traM/ khyab bdag/ mnga' bdag/ legs byung / yok+t+raM/ sto traM/ to t+h+raM/ se traM/ sek+t+raM/ meD+h+raM/ pat+t+raM/ daM Sh+hA/
[\[444a.3\]]naMD+h+raH/ arti lU d+hU sU kha nas ha tsa ra i traH/ arti[: ]lU[: ]d+hU[: ]sU[: ]kha na[: ]sa ha[: ]tsa ra las i tra'o/ /r-i 'gro ba la sogs pa 'di rnams  gcod/ 'dren byed dam mig gam dar/ 'tshe byed dam mtshon cha/ 'gres ba/ las bya ba'i  sbyor byed/ bstod pa/ gzir ba/ 'ching byed/ 'thor byed/ 'khrud ba/ snod dam 'dam ma/ mtsha'/
[\[444a.4\]]'ching byed/ don la i tra 'gyur te/ a ri traM/ la pi traM/ sa bi traM/ kha ni traM/ sa hi traM/ tsa ri traM/ pu baHsaM dz+nyA yAM/ pU las ming la'o/ /pUng las ming la iT 'gyur te/ pa bi traM/ i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU t+yA t+kA ra ka da yaHsa mA p+tAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las byed
[\[444a.5\]]pa la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so/ /'gro ba/ gcod pa/ skyes/ rkob/ bzod pa/ 'gro ba/ //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung  dag pa/ 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing
[\[444a.6\]]rta zhes bya ba las kr-ita la sogs pa'i nang nas byed pa po la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams kyi 'jug yul cho ga dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni brtag pa'i rkyen uN la sogs pa rnams kyi 'jug yul sogs zur tsam bshad par bya ste/ u
[\[444a.7\]]NA da yo ba hu laM/ u Na la sogs pa rnams mang po la'o/ /dus gsum ga la 'jug pa'i ming du bsgrub pa'i rkyen ni un la sogs pa ste rkyen de rnams ni bya ba'i don sogs la mang po la 'jug go zhes spyir btang ba'o/ /kr-i bA pA dzi mi swad sA d+h+ya shU b+h+ya uN/ kr-i[: ]bA[: ]pA[: ]dzi[: ]mi[:]
[\[444b\]]
[\[444b.1\]]swa da[: ]sA d+hi[: ]a shU rnams las uNa'o/ /kr-i byed pa/ bA 'gro ba/ pA btung ba/ dzi rgyal ba[: ]Du minya rab tu 'phel pa/ sa da ro myang ba/ sAd+ha yang dag par grub pa/ a shU khyab pa rnams las uN 'gyur te/ kA ruH/ bA yuH/ pA yuH/ dzA yuH/ mA yuH/ swA duH/ sA d+huH/
[\[444b.2\]]A shuH/ ga me DeH/ ga ma las Do'o/ /gam+l-i 'gro pa las Do 'gyur te/ Ti'i 'os Ti phyis pas/ gauH/ glA nu di b+h+yAM Dau/ glA nu da dag las Dau'o/ /glai dga' ba zad pa dang nud ded pa dag la Dau 'gyur te/ glauH/ nauH/ bzo bo/ rlung / bshad lam/ rgyal ba/ 'phel pa/ byang ba/ legs pa/
[\[444b.3\]]khyab pa/ si ta ni ga mi sa si sa ts+ya bi d+hAnya/ kru sha b+h+ya stun/ si[: ]ta ni[: ]ga mi[: ]sa si[: ]sa tsi[: ]go las Nita/ ba lang / a bi[: ]d+hAnya[: ]kru sha rnams las tuna'o/ /si 'ching ba/ ta nu rgyas pa/ ga m+l-i 'gro ba/ zla ba/ gru/ sa si kun nas 'gro ba/ sa tsi 'dres pa/ a bi srung ba/ d+hAnya 'dzin
[\[444b.4\]]pa/ kru sha du ba la ste bod pa la'ang ngo rnams las tun 'gyur te/ se tuH/ tan+tuH/ gan+tuH/ sastuH/ sak+tuH/ o tuH/ d+hA tuH/ byings sam khams sam dbyings/ s+thoSh+TuH/ a bi tr-I s+t+w-I taM tri b+h+yaHI/ ab tr-I[: ]s+t+r-I[: ]taM tri rnams las I'o/ /apa srung ba/ tr-I sgrol ba/ s+t+r-Inya 'gebs pa/
[\[444b.5\]]tan+t+rI s+tha kun nas gdung ba rnams la I 'gyur te/ a bIH/ 'ching ba/ rgyud dam srang bu/ 'gro ba/ mnyam pa/ rtsam pa/ sri pi a bi ma bzhes sogs kyis pa yig uT/ ce spyang / ta rIH/ sta rIH/ tan+t+rI/ la k+She rmuT tsa/ lak+Sha la muTa'ang ngo / /lak+Sha las I 'gyur zhing muT A ga ma'ang 'gyur te/
[\[444b.6\]]la k+Sh+h+yiH/ s+t+yA ya te r+D+raT/ s+t+yA ya ti las D+ra Ta'o/ /sbyong ba/ s+t+yai sgra dang kun nas 'dus pa laD+ra Ta 'gyur te/ Ta phyis/ dI pa byin pas/ s+t+rIH/ dzr-I bi shi b+h+yAM dz+ha ta/ dzr-i[: ]sgrol ba/ 'gebs/ sgra brnyan/ pi shi dag las dz+hata'o/ dzr-I dang bi shi dag las dz+nyata 'gyur te/ ta de'i dus don dz+ha'i an+ta 'os/
[\[444b.7\]]dpal lam phun sum tshogs pa/ dz+ha an+tar bsgyur bas/ dza ran+taH/ rgas pa/ be shan+taH/ cha shas/ gaN+Di maN+Di dza ni naM di b+h+yash+tsa/ bud med/ gaN+Di[: ]maN+Di[: ]dza ni[: ]nan+di rnams las kyang ngo / /gaN+Da la sogs pa 'di rnams Ni tsa'i mtha' can las kyang dz+ha ta 'gyur te/ Ni tsa/ gaN+Da yan+taH/ maN+Da
[\[445a\]]
[\[445a.1\]]yan+taH/ dza na ya taH/ nan+da yan+taH/ shru dak+Shi m+p+r-i hi gr-i hi dr-i dzi b+h+ya A pyaH/ shra[: ]dak+Shi[: ]sbr-i hi  gr-i hi  dr-i dzi rnams las A pya'o/ /shru la sogs pa 'di rnams las A pya 'gyur te/ shra bA pyaH/ Ni tsa/ dak+Sha yA byaH/ spr-i hA b+h+yaH/ gr-i hA pyaH/ da rA pyaH/ dza yA pyaH/
[\[445a.2\]]'grel par lung drangs pa/ sta ni dU Shi ga di hr-i d+b+h+yo N+yan+te b+h+ya it+nuH/ sta ni[: ]bU Shi[: ]ga di[: ]hr-id rnams las Ni mtha' las it+nu'o/ /sta ni la sogs pa 'di rnams Ni tsa'i mtha' can las it+nu 'gyur  thos pa/ te mita bzhin  mkhas pa/ 'dod pa/ nyer len/ rnam 'joms/ rgyal ba/
[\[445a.3\]]'phel ba mi byed do/ /sta na yi tUH/ dU Sha yi t+nuH/ ga da yit+nuH/ hr-i da yit+nuH/ kr-I gr-I s+t+r-I dzA gr-i d+b+ha:kwin/ kr-I[:]gr-I[: ]s+t+r-I[: ]dzA gr-i rnams las kwena'o/ /kr-I la sogs pa 'di rnams las kwin 'gyur te/ kIrbiH/ gIrbiH/ stIrbiH/ dzA gr-i biH/ 'grel par ji skad du/ an+yA s+yu
[\[445a.4\]]Na da yaHun la sogs  bzhod dam nu ma/ sdug bsngal/ smra ba/ mdza' bo'am sems mthun/ pa gzhan yang ngo / uN la sogs pa 'dir bshad pa ni rags bsdus tsam yin la/ rgyas par gzhan  'tshe ba/ gsal ba/ 'gebs pa/ gnyid song ba/ yang 'byung bas de dag tu ltos zhes
[\[445a.5\]]pa 'phangs pa'o/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU d+hA du Na du yaHsa mA b+hAH/ zhes pa pA Ni ni byA kA ra Na'i mdo las uN la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin
[\[445a.6\]]bris su bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las dus gsum ga la 'jug pa un la sogs pa'i cho ga rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //da ni bya ba'i rkyen la sogs pa rnams bshad par bya ste/ tu mun N+wu lau kri yA yAM kri yAr+thA yaM/ bya ba dang bya
[\[445a.7\]]ba'i don la tu mun N+wul dag go/ /byings las bya ba dang bya ba'i don brjod pa la tu mun dang N+wul dag 'gyur te/ duSh+NuM/ nad/ bu aka dar+sha kaH/ mthong bar byed/ sa mAn kar+t+r-i ke Shu tu mun/ byed pa po mnyam pa la tu mun no/ byed pa po mnyam pa brjod pa'i bya ba'i don la tu mun 'gyur
[\[445b\]]
[\[445b.1\]]te/ its+tsha ti b+hok+tuM/ sha ka d+h+r-i Sha dz+nyA g+nyA g+ha Ta ra b+ha la b+ha ka ma sa hArtA s+t+yar+the Shu tu mun/ sha ka  d+h+r-iSha/ dz+nyA  glAT  ra b+ha  la b+ha  kra ma  sa ha  ar+ha yod pa'i don rnams la tu mun na'o/ /sha ka la sogs pa 'di rnams nye ba'i tshig la yod pa las bya ba'i don la tu mun 'gyur
[\[445b.2\]]te/ za bar 'dod/ shak+no ti b+ho k+tuM/ dza na ti b+hok+tuM/ sogs so/ /kA la sa ma ya pe lA suHtu mun/ kA la  sa ma ya  ba la rnams la tu mun no/ /kA la  sa ma ya  bel rnams nye pa'i tshig la tu mun 'gyur te/ kA la b+hok+tuM/ sa ma ya b+hok+tuM/ be la b+hok+tuM/ b+h+rA ba pa tsa nA sh+tsa/ dngos
[\[445b.3\]]po brjod pa la'ang ngo / /za nus bar byed/ za shes par byed/ 'byung 'gyur gyi don la 'jug pa las dngos po brjod pa la tu mun 'gyur te/ pA kaH/ pA k+tUM/ t+ya k+tuM/ t+yA gaH/ sogs so/ /pa da ru dza bi sha spr-i sho b+h+hanya/ za ba'i dus/ za pa'i dam tshig/ za ba'i tshod/ pa da  ru dza  bi sha
[\[445b.4\]]spr-i sha las g+hanya'o/ /pa da la sogs pa 'di rnams las dus gsum gal g+hanya 'gyur te/ pA daH/ ro gaH/ be shaH/ spar+sha/ smin pa'am tshes pa/ gtor ba/ byA d+hi mat+sa ba le Shu tsa/ byA d+hi dang / mat+s+ya dang ba la rnams la'ang ngo / byA d+gi dang / mat+s+ya dang / ba la rnams brjod pa dang
[\[445b.5\]]gzhan yang nyer bsgyur sngon ma can mang po la g+hanya 'gyur te/ byA d+hi bi she ShaH/ bi sAraH/ rkang pa/ nad/ cha byad/ reg pa/ mat+s+yaH/ sA raH/ ba laM/ pra sA raH/ su sA raH/ sogs so/ i kaHkA she/ i ka gi kA sha la'o/ nyer bsgyur ika so sor bsdu ba'i mtha' can ni kA sha
[\[445b.6\]]g+hanya'i rkyen can pha rol la ring por bsgyur bar bya ste/ nI kar shaH/ nad kyi khyad par/ rnam 'gro ste/ a nU kA shaH/ sogs so/ ha'o/ snying po ste/ stobs/ rab 'gro/ legs 'gro/ ika mtha' min na mi 'gyur te/ pra kA shaH/ er tsa/ i las atsa'o/ /byings i yig mtha' can
[\[445b.7\]]pas dngos po la g+hanya 'gyur ba ma yin gyi atsa nyid do/ /ngos gsal/ dza yaH/ rgyal ba/ rjes gsal/ tsa yaH/ gsog pa/ r-I do ra pa/ rIta dang u las a pa'o/ byings r-Ita mtha' can dang u yig gi  rab gsal/ mtha' can rnams las a pa 'gyur te/ kr-I  ka raH/ lag pa/
[\[446a\]]
[\[446a.1\]]gr-i  gi raH/ yu  ya baH/ pU  pa baH/ ing sh+tsa/ ing las kyang ngo / ing klog pa las kyang g+hanya 'gyur te/ u pA d+h+yA yaH/ u pA d+h+yA yI/ pra tha ne bi ra shab+de/ rgyas pa la bi las sgra ma yin pa la'o/ /rgyas pa mngon par brjod pa las bi las pha rol gyi s+t+r-i
[\[446a.2\]]las sgra ma yin pa  sbyar dug/ la g+hanya  nas/ dag byed/ 'gyur te/ pa Ta s+ya bistA raH/ sgra yin na atsa sbyar bas/ pA kya mya bi stA raH/ mkhan mo/ g+hanya po sh+tsa/ g+hanya a pa dag las kyang ngo / /g+hanya dang a pa dag pha rol la ad za ba ni g+ha sl-ir 'gyur ro/ /g+hA saH/ u pa
[\[446a.3\]]sargenyadaH/ ad las nyer bsgyur las so/ /nyer bsgyur sngon ma'i ad las  snam bu zhes rgyas/ a pa 'gyur te/ pra sngon na ma'i  dag rgyas pa/ a da la mdo 'dis a pa/ mdo snga mas ad g+ha sl-ir bsgyur bas/ pra g+ha saH/ sa mu do dzaHpa shu Sha/ saM ud las mdza la phyugs la'o/ /zas/
[\[446a.4\]]saM dang ud pha rol gyi adza las phyugs brjod pa'i yul la a pa 'gyur te/ sa ma dzaH/ u da dzaH/ phyugs min na g+hanya sbyar bas/ sa mA dzo brAh+ma Na naM/ sogs so/ /ha na sh+tsa bang+haH/ ha na gyi bad+ha 'ang ngo / /rab tu bza' ma/ nyer bsgyur med pa'i han la a pa 'gyur zhing as pha rol la han
[\[446a.5\]]nyid ba d+ta zhes par 'gyur te/ ba ng+haH/ yang na g+hanya sbyar bas/ g+phAtaH/ phyugs tshogs/ phyugs 'ded/ karma bya ti tA re Na tsa s+t+ri yAM/ bram ze rnams kyi tshogs/ las phan tshun byed pa la Na tsa ste bud med la'o/ /bya ba'i las phan tshun byed pa la Na tsa 'gyur zhing bud med kyi rtags su'ang yang na
[\[446a.6\]]'gyur ro/ /Na tsa s+t+ri yA mnya/ 'tshe ba/ Na tsa las bud med la  'tshe ba/ anya'o/ /Na tsa'i mtha' can las bud med brjod pa la anya 'gyur ro/ /na karma pya te hA re/ las phan tshun byed pa la ma yin no/ /gong du bud med du brjod pa la Na tsa'i mtha' la anya 'jug par bshad
[\[446a.7\]]kyang de'i dmigs bsal Na tsa de las phan tshun byed pa'i don du byin pa yin anya mi 'gyur te/ bi Ang a ba sngon ma'i ha sa la/ Na tsa/ mdo 'dis anya mi 'gyur dI pa byin pas/ byA ba hA sI/ bkang / i b+hi baM d+tau b+ha ba a nu Na/ mngon par khyab pa'i dngos po la i nu Na'o/ mngon
[\[446b\]]
[\[446b.1\]]par khyab pa'i dngos po brjod pa la i nuN 'gyur te/ saM rA bi NaM/ a Ni nu Na/ i nu Na las aNa'o/ /i nu Na'i rkyen can las rang don la aN 'gyur te/ hI pa/ su rA ba NI/ u pa sargA ta kha lu b+ha nyoH/ nyer bsgyur las 'a lu d+ha nya la'o/ /nyer bsgyur sngon ma'i la b+ha las kha lu dang b+hanya
[\[446b.2\]]dag pha rol la nu ma A ga ma 'gyur te/ pra laMb+haH/ skras mngon par khyab/ na su du r+b+h+yAM/ su dur dag las ma yin no/ /su dang dur las pha rol gyi la b+ha la nu ma  sgras mngon par khyab ma/ 'gyur ba ma yin te/ su la b+haH/ durla b+haH/ spur ti s+phu la t+yo r+g+ha nye/ s+phur ti/ s+phu la ti dag gi g+hanya
[\[446b.3\]]la'o/ /s+phu ra ti dang s+phul ti dag gi atsa  rab tu thob pa/ g+hanya pha rol la Ata 'gyur te/ spA raH/ spA laH/ ni bA pa tsa ti sha ri ro pa sa mAd+hA ne ShA de sh+tsa kaH/ nges par gnas pa dang / me dang / bzang po thob/ ngan pa thob/ lus dang / lci ba'i phung po rnams la dang po'i tsa'ang ka'o/ /
[\[446b.4\]]tsi nya gsog pa la g+hanya 'gyur zhing nges par gnas pa dang / me dang lus lci ba'i phung po dag brjod pa la tsa'ang dkar 'gyur te/ kA yaH/ g+ha nyi tsa g+hA Sha ka ra Na yoH/ dngos po dang byed pa dag g+hanya la'ang ngo / /dngos po dang byed pa'i don du 'jug bzhin pa'i g+hanya pha rol la'ang rany+dza'i na dbyi
[\[446b.5\]]ste/ rA gaH/ spa doHdza be/ spa daHmgyogs pa la'o/ /span+pi g.yo ba la g+hanya sbyar bas/ spa daHzhes pa mgyogs  sku ma lus/ par 'gro ba la tshig phrad do/ D+wi taHk+t+r-iH/ Du 'gro ba la k+t+ri'o/ /byings Du 'gro ba rnams las bya ba'i don la k+t+ri 'gyur ro/ /k+t+reHma ma ni t+yaM/ k+t+ri las ma ma
[\[446b.6\]]chags ba/ rtag tu'o/ k+t+re'i rkyen mtha' la rtag tu ma ma 'gyur te/ Du kr-inya dang Du pa tsa Sha la mdo  mgyogs 'gro/ sngon mas kyAbyin/ mdo 'dis rkyen mtha' la'ang mam sbyar bas/ kraM twi mi/ pak+t+ri maM/ sogs so/ T+wi tonya thu tsa/ Tu 'gro ba las a thu tsa'o/ /byings Tu 'gro ba rnams las bya ba
[\[446b.7\]]sogs kyi don la a thu tsa 'gyur te/ Tu 'dr-i dang / Tu o shwi la a thu tsa byin pas/ be pa druH/ 'dang ba/ shra ya thuH/ 'phel ba/ sogs so/ /ya dza yA tsa ya ta bi tshar k+Sho nang / bcos pa/ bcos ma/ ya dza/ yA tsa[: ]yata[: ]bi tsha[: ]rak+Sha las nang 'o/ ya dza la sogs pa 'di rnams las bya
[\[447a\]]
[\[447a.1\]]ba sogs la nang 'gyur te/ padz+nyaH/ yA ts+nyA/ yat+naH/ bi sh+naH/ rak+Sh+NaH/ u pa sarge g+toHkiH/ nyer bsgyur las g+hu las ki'o/ nyer bsgyur las g+hu las ki'o/ nyer bsgyur las pha rol gyi byings g+hu'i ming can rnams las ki 'gyur te/ A diH/ ni ng+hiH/ bi ng+hiH/ bi ng+hiH/ pra Ni ng+hiH/ u pa ng+hiH/ pa ri ng+hiH/
[\[447a.2\]]swa po na na/ swa pa las na na'o/ swa pa las bya  na tshod sbyin/ slong ba/ 'gro ba/ skyob pa/ ba'i don la na na 'gyur te/ swa p+naH/ s+t+ri yAM k+tin/ bud med la k+tina'o/ /bud med kyi rtags la'ang dngos po dang byed pa po la k+tin/ tho ma'am dang po/ gter/ chog/ sman 'am/ lus sam lhag ma/ 'gyim pa/
[\[447a.3\]]'gyur te/ kr-i tiH/ bung+hiH/ smr-i tiH/ sogs so/ 'grel par/ glA[: ]hA[: ]dz+yA[: ]twa ra rnams las ni 'gyur ro zhes  rmi lam/ byung bas/ glA niH/ hA niH/ dz+yA niH/ tur+NiH/ yang 'grel par r-I mtha' las kyang ni 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ kIr+NIH/ gAr+NiH/ sogs so/ U
[\[447a.4\]]ti yU ta dzU ti/ mkhas/ blo gros/ dran pa/ sA ti he ti kIrta yaH/ U ti[: ]yU ti[: ]dzU ti[: ]sU hi[: ]he ti[: ]kIrti rnams so/ ab[: ]ya[: ]dzu[: ]dga' ba zad/ stong pa/ rgas ga/ mgyogs pa  dz+wa ra twa ra zhes sogs kyis/ sA[: ]hi[: ]khr-I rnams la k+ti phyin pas/ U ti la[: ]'tshe ba/ gsal ba/ sogs pa 'di rnams
[\[447a.5\]]kyang tshig phrad do/ /pra dza ya dza b+h+yAM kya pa/ bra dza ya dza dag las  skyong ba/ 'dres/ 'gro ba/ mtha'i las/ 'gro ba/ grags pa/ kya pa'o/ /bradza dang yadza dag las bya ba sogs la kya pa 'gyur te/ bra dz+yA/ i dz+ya/ lha mchod/ saM dz+nyA yAM sa ma dza ni Sha da ni pa ta ma na bi da Shu nya shing b+h+r-i nyi NaH/ sa ma dza[: ]ni Sha da[:]
[\[447a.6\]]ni pa ta[: ]man[: ]bid[: ]Shunya[: ]shIng[: ]b+h+r-inya[: ]iN rnams las ming la'o/ /sa ma dza la sogs pa 'di rnams las ming dang dngos po dag la kya pa 'gyur te/ sa ma dz+yA/ ni Sha d+yA/ 'gro ba/ pa tsa swa pi sogs kyis saM pra swA raN/ ni pa t+ya/ ma n+tA/ ba d+yA/ su t+yA/ dag pa/ sha y+YA/ nyal ba/ b+h+r-i t+yA  kla rna
[\[447a.7\]]i t+yA/ 'gro ba/ kr-i nyo sha tsa/ kr-inya las sha tsa'o/ /kr-inya las dngos po la sha tsa 'gyur te/ tsa dbyangs don sha shita kyi don sha 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan las yag gong po/ ngos par za/ sha yaka sogs kyis ring du bsgyur bas/ nges lhung / nga rgyal/ rig pa/ tug A ga ma/ gang 'gro ba la a yang ngos I a yang /
[\[447b\]]
[\[447b.1\]]kri yaH/ yang na kya pa byin pas/ k+r+w-I t+yA/ pa ri tsar+YA pari sar+YA/ pa ri tsar+YA/ ba ri sar+YA'o/ pa ri sngon ma'i tsa ra dang sr-i la ya sbyar bas/ pa ri tsar+Ya dang / pa ri sar+YU zhes pa dag tshig phrad do/ aHprat+ya yAta/ rkyen las a'o/ /san sogs kyi byings rkyen mtha' can las a 'gyur
[\[447b.2\]]byed pa/ te/ dzA ga rA/ tsikIrlA/ byed pa/ sogs so/ /gu ro sh+tsa ha laH/ lci ba las kyang hal las so/ /byings kyi yi ge thog ma lci ba  yongs su spyod/ yongs su 'gro/ las pha rol gyi hal mtha' can las dngos po la a 'gyur te/ I hA/ I k+ShA/ Shid+d+h+wi dA di b+h+yo\u0f85nga / Sha 'gro ba
[\[447b.3\]]gnyid gsar pa/ byed 'dod/ dang b+hid la sogs pa rnams las anga'o/ /byings Sha 'gro ba rnams dang b+hid la sogs pa rnams las bud med la ang 'gyur te/ Sha 'gro ba la/ mr-i dzA/ dza rA/ ba tsA/ sogs dang / b+hid sogs la/ byed pa/ lta ba/ b+hi dA/ tshi dA/ bi dA/ k+Shi pA/
[\[447b.4\]]gu hA/ me d+hA/ sogs so/ /tsi n+ti pU dzi ka thi kum+pi tsa rtsa sh+tsa/ tsin+ti[: ]pU dzi[: ]ku thi[: ]kum+bi[: ]tsa rtsa las kyang ngo / tsin+ta la sogs pa 'di rnams las kyang dngos po la ang 'gyur te/ dag ma/ rgad mo/ 'tshed ma/ tsin+t+wA/ pU dzA/ ka thA/ kum+ba/ tsa rtsa/ A/ phyed ma/ tshad ma/ rig ma/ 'dod ma/
[\[447b.5\]]gsang ba'am sbed ma/ yid gzhungs/ ta sh+tso pa sarge/ Ata las kyang nyer bsgyur la'o/ /nyer bsgyur sngon ma'i byings Ata mtha' can las kyang ang 'gyur te/ san+Th+NA/ saM s+thA/ bra dA/ sogs so/ N+ya sa shran+tho yu tsa/ yid bzhin/ mchod pa/ gtam/ sbra ma/ mchod pa/ Ni[: ]As[: ]shran+tha las yutsa'o/ /
[\[447b.6\]]byings Ni tsa'i mtha' can rnams dang As dang shran+tha rnams las yu tsa 'gyur te/ kA ra NA/ A sa nA/ shra n+tA nA/ pa reHpA/ pa ri las yang na'o/ /kun 'dzin/ yang dag gnas/ rab sbyin/ pa ri sngon ma'i i Shu las yu tsa yang na 'gyur te/ par+Ye Sha NaH/ yang na k+ti byin pas/ pa rI Sh+TiH/ N+wu la ba hu laM/
[\[447b.7\]]mang po la NU la'o/ /bud med kyi rtags la dngos po dang byed pa sogs mang  byed 'dod/ gdan/ lhod ba/ po la NU la 'gyur te/ A si kA/ gnas pa/ shA yi kA/ nyal ma/ sogs so/ /'grel par yi ge rnams las rang don la kA ra  yongs su 'tshol/ 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas/ yongs la'o/ a yig/ A kA raH/
[\[448a\]]
[\[448a.1\]]i kA raHdbyangs dang / ka kA raH/ kha kA raH/ ga kA raH/ sogs so/ /yang 'grel par ra yig la yang na i pha 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ re phaH/ ra kA raH/ a dzA di b+h+yaHinya/ a tsa dang po la ita'o/ /byings a ca dang po rnams las dngos po sogs la inya
[\[448a.2\]]'gyur te/ i yig/ A dziH/ A diH/ ka yig/ kha yig/ ga yig/ sogs so/ /ba pA di b+h+yaHiN/ ba pa la sogs pa rnams las iNa'o/ ba pa la sogs  ra yig/ pa rnams las dngos po sogs la iN 'gyur te/ bA pi/ bA siH/ sogs so/ kr-i ShA di b+h+yaHika /kr-iSha
[\[448a.3\]]la sogs pa rnams  'phel pa/ bza' ba/ las ika'o/ /kr-iSha la sogs pa rnams las dngos po la ika 'gyur te/ kr-i ShiH/ gi riH/ ka riH/ bi b+hA ShA khyA nA pa ri prA sh+na yo rinya/ bshad pa dang yongs su 'dri pa dag las  sa bon 'debs/ sdod/ inya yang na'o/ /bshad pa dang yongs su
[\[448a.4\]]'dri ba dag rtogs par byed pa la bud med kyi dngos po la inya yang na 'gyur te/ kA twaM kA riHkA ma kAr+ShI/ yang na NUl sbyar  rkos/ ri bo/ 'tshe ba/ bas/ kA twAM kA+ai ri kA kI ma kA r+ShI/ A kro she na ny+ya niH/ khros tshig la nanya la a ni'o/ /khros tshig rtogs par byed pa la dgag pa'i nanya sngon ma'i
[\[448a.5\]]byings las a ni 'gyur te/ a dza na ni/ sogs so/ l+yuT tsa/ l+yuT 'ang  ci khyod tshig le'ur byas pa byed dam/ ngo / /byings las bya ba'i don la mang po la l+yuT  ci khyod tshig le'u byas pa byed dam/ 'gyur te ma ning gi rtags so/ /dz+nyA naM/ mA naM/ pramA NaM/ ga ma naM/ b+ho dza naM/ sogs so/ /bA yau/ yu
[\[448a.6\]]la yang na'o/ yu ste l+yuT pha  mi shes pa'am skye med/ rol la a dza ni bi zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ ba ya naM/ a dza naM/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ Sh+Thi buShi bor+l+yun+yu pa d+hA dI r+g+ho bA/ Sh+Thi bu dang Shi bu dag gi l+yuT la u pa d+hA  ye shes/ gus pa/ rab gus/ 'gro ba/ zas/ ring por yang na'o/ /Sh+ThI bu dang Shi
[\[448a.7\]]bu dag gi u pa d+hA l+yuT pha rol la ring por yang na 'gyur te/ Sh+Th+Ti ba naM/ 'dor ba/ sI ba naM/ bstan pa/ 'phel pa/ yang na puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ Sh+The ba naM/ 'dor ba/ se ba naM/ bstan pa/ puM si saMdz+nyA yAM g+haH/ skyes pa la ming la g+ha'o/ skyes pa'i rtags la bya ba dang ming
[\[448b\]]
[\[448b.1\]]la'ang g+ha 'gyur te/ pakaH/ go tsa raH/ sany+tsa raH/ tshA deHg+he\u0f85 d+b+yu pa sarga s+ya/ tshA di'i g+ha la nyer bsgyur gnyis med pa'i 'o/ /nyer bsgyur nyis sbrel sogs sngon na med pa'i tshA di g+ha pha rol la thung dur 'gyur te/ bra tsha raH/ nyer bsgyur gnyis yod na mi 'gyur bas/ sa mu bra tsha daH/ ba ha bra
[\[448b.2\]]dza bya dzA ba Na ni ga mA sh+tsa/ 'tsher pa/ spyod yul/ kun spyod/ ba ha  bra dza  bya dza  a ba Na  ni ga ma rnams kyang ngo / ba ha thob baM/ bradza 'gro ba/ bya dza bu lon/ a pa byab ba/ ni snga ma'i gam+l-i rnams la g+ha sbyar bas/ khebs/ ba haH/ bra dzaH/ bya dzaH/ a pa NaH/ zun nas nye bar 'gebs so/ /
[\[448b.3\]]ni ga maHrnams tshig phrad do/ /kha no g+ha tsa/ kha nas g+ha'ang ngo / khan las bya ba'i don la g+ha 'gyur zhing g+hanya 'ang 'gyur te/ A kha naH/ A khA naH/ I Sha duHsu Shu kha la/ I Sha ta  dur  su rnams la kha la'o/ /I  thob pa/ 'gro ba/ bu lon/ khyab pa/ Shata dang / dur dang / su rnams las
[\[448b.4\]]pha rol gyi byings la bya ba'i don la khal 'gyur te/ I kha t+ka raH/ duH ka raH/ su ka raH/ sogs so/ /kar+t+r-i karma No sh+tsa b+hU kr-i nyoH/ kun nas rko ba/ byed pa po dang las dag las kyang b+hU kr-inya la'o/ I Sha  dur  su rnams snga ma'i byed pa po dang las dag gi pha rol gyi b+hU dang kr-inya dag las kyang
[\[448b.5\]]khal 'gyur te/ I Sha dA D+yaM b+ha baM/ du rA D+h+yaM b+ha baM/ cung zad byed/ dka' ba byed/ sla ba byed/ swA D+h+yaM b+ha baM/ I Sha dA D+h+yaM ka raH/ du rA D+h+yaM ka raH/ swA D+h+yaM ka raH/ A to yu tsa/ A ta las yu tsa'o/ /I Shata[: ]dur[: ]su rnams las pha rol gyi bya ba'i don las byings Ata mtha' can la yutsa 'gyur gyis
[\[448b.6\]]kha 'gro ba sogs kyis mu ma byin/ cung zad phyug bar 'gyur/ dga' bas phyug par 'gyur/ sla bas phyug par 'gyur/ cung zad phyug par byed/ sla bas phyug par byed/ kha la 'gyur ba ma yin te/ I Sha twA naH/ duHbA naH/ su pA naH/ shA si yu d+hi dr-i shi d+h+r-i Shi mr-i Shi b+h+ya sh+tsa/ shA si[: ]yu d+h+wi[: ]dr-i shi[: ]d+h+r-i Shi
[\[448b.7\]]mr-i Shi rnams las kyang ngo / I Shata  dur[; ]su rnams las pha rol gyi shA si la sogs pa 'di rnams las kyang yutsa 'gyur te/ su shA sa naH/ legs par bstan pa/ su yo d+ha naH/ legs par 'thab/ cung zad 'thung / 'thung dka'/ 'thung sla/ su dar+sha naH/ legs bar mthong / su d+ha r+Sha NaH/ legs par 'thung /
[\[449a\]]
[\[449a.1\]]su mar+Sha r+ShaH/ a li kha lA+oHpra ti She d+he g+dA/ a laM  kha lu dag las dgag pa la k+t+wA'o/ a laM dang kha lu dag dgag pa'i don la sbyor ba la k+h+wA 'gyur te/ a laM kr-i twA/ kha lu kr-i twA/ sa mA na kar+t+r-i ka yo pUr+b+yA kyA le/ mnyam pa'i byed pa po dag gi sngon ma'i dus la'o/ /mnyam
[\[449a.2\]]leg par bzod dam shin tu bzod/ pa'i byed pa po dag gi bya ba dag la gang snga ma'i dus brjod pa la g+hA 'gyur te/ g+hu k+hA brA dza ti/ pi twA bra dza ti/ k+ShI skan+da s+ya n+doH/ skan+da s+yan+da dag gi k+t+wA la'o/ rgyan byed/ skan+da  nges par byed/ dang s+yan+da dag gi na yig k+t+wA pha rol la dbyi ba ma yin te/ khar la tsar/ dz+har 'dra ba la dz+har
[\[449a.3\]]rnams kyi 'os ta gong ma phyis pas/ skan+t+wA/ s+yan+t+wA/ s+yan+dU la U ta 'gro ba sogs kyis yang na iT byin pas/ zos nas 'gro/ 'thungs nas 'gro/ s+yan+di twA/ mri Da mr-i d+ha gu d+ha ku Sha ba da ba saHk+t+wA/ mr-i Da[; ]mr-i d+ha[; ]gu ng+ha  ku Sha[; ]kli sha[; ]ba da[; ]bas las k+t+wA'o/ /mr-iDa la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol
[\[449a.4\]]gyi g+t+wA iT dang bcas pa'ang ka  bskams nas/ zegs nas/ 'gro ba'i ming can te/ mr-i Di twA/ mr-i t+hi twA/ ku d+hi twA/ ku Sh-i twA/ kli shak+t+wA/ mya ngan/ kliSh+DA/ zegs nas/ bad dang bas dag la ba tsi swa pi sogs kyis saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur bas/ u di twA/ u Shi twA/ no pa d+hA twA phAn+tA dwA/ na u pa d+h+wa
[\[449a.5\]]las tha pha'i mtha' las yang na'o/ byings shran+tha dang gu n+pha lta bu u pa d+hA na na yig  bdus nas/ phyug po/ gangs sbal/ 'phug nas/ u 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar/ yod pa mtha' na tha yig dang pha yig yod pa de las pha rol gyi k+t+wA iT dang bcas  smra nas/ bsdad nas/ pa ka 'gro ba'i ming can du yang
[\[449a.6\]]na bya ste/ shra thi twA/ mdo las tshes pa/ sha n+thi twA/ gu phi twA/ gu n+pi twA/ sogs so/ /bany+tsi luny+tsa r-i tash+tsa/ bany+tsi  luny+tsi  r-ita las kyang ngo / /bany+tsi dang luny+tsi dang r-ita rnams las kyang pha rol gyi k+t+wA iT dang bcas pa ka 'gro ba'i ming can yeng na ste/ ba tsi twA/ phyin nas/ bany+tsi twA/ lu tsi twA/ nyed pa/ luny+tsi twA/ r-i ti twA/
[\[449a.7\]]dz+har 'dra ba sogs kyis ta phyis/ r-itwA/ dbang phyug/ tshogs pa/ tr-i Shi mr-i Shi kr-i sheHkA sh+ya pa s+ya/ tr-i Shi  mr-i Shi  kr-i shi las kA sh+ya pa'i'o/ /tr-i Shi la sogs pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi k+h+yA iT dang bcas pa ka 'gro ba'i ming can du yang na bar sngon gyi drang srong kA sh+ya ba  nyi ma'i pha' ming yin gsung / dbang phyug
[\[449b\]]
[\[449b.1\]]'dod de/ tra Shi twA/ trA raShi twA/ mr-i Shi twA/ mar+Shi twA/ kr-i shi twA/ kar+shi twA/ dzr-I pra sh+tsoHk+t+wI/ dzr-I  bra sh+tsa dag las k+t+wA la'o/ /dzr-IX dang brash+tsa dag las pha rol gyi k+t+wA la rtag tu iT 'gyur te/ dza ri twA/ bra sh+tsi twA/ u di to bA/ uta 'gro ba la yang na'o/ /byings uta 'gro ba las pha
[\[449b.2\]]rol gyi k+t+wA la iT  skom pa/ yang na 'gyur  bzod pa/ te/ sha mu dang  phra mo  dmul k+t+wA iT yang na bar byas/ iT med pa'i phyogs la rjes su sna ldan sogs kyi Ata du bsgyur ba sogs kyis/ rgas nas/ sha mitwA/ shA twA/ bcod pa/ da mi twA/ dA twA/ kra ma sh+tsak+tI/ kra ma gyi'ang k+t+wA la'o/ kram gyi u pa d+hA iT med pa'i
[\[449b.3\]]k+t+wA la ring por yang na 'gyur te/ krA n+tA/ kran+tA/ iT yod na ring por mi 'gyur te/ kra mi twA/ pU da sh+tsa/ pUng las kyang ngo / /pUng las pha rol gyi k+t+wA la iT yang na 'gyur te/ pa bi twA/ zhi ba/ bU twA/ tul ga dzAn+ta naM shAM bi b+hA ShA/ dza mtha' naM sha rnams kyi yang na'o/ /byings dza
[\[449b.4\]]mtha' can rnams dang ni sha'i na yig k+tA  rkang pa brgyangs/ pha rol la yang na dbyi ste/ b+hany+dz+ra la/ rkang pa brkyangs/ b+ha k+t+wA/ b+haMk+t+wA/ naSh+T+wA/ naMSh+T+rA/ sogs so/ /dza hA te sh+tsa hi k+t+wi/ dza hA ti'i  dag nas/ dag pa/ k+t+wA la hi'o/ dza hA ti ste o hAng 'gro zhes pa 'dis k+t+wA pha rol la hi zhes par
[\[449b.5\]]'gyur te/ hitwA/ samA se\u0f85 na nya pUrbe k+t+wo l+ya pa/ tshig sdud la nanya sngon du med pa la k+t+wA'i l+ya pa'o/ 'dzings nas/ ma mthong / nanya'i tshig sdud sngon na med pa la bsdu ba'i mtha' la k+t+wA l+ya ba tu 'gyur te/ pa tuka A ga ma'i don la khyad don no/ /pra kr-i t+ya/ nanya yod na/
[\[449b.6\]]a kr-i twA/ phyin nas/ sogs so/ /pA l+ya pi/ l+ya pa la yang na'o/ snga bshad pa'i rjes su sna ldan dbyi pa rnams k+t+wA bsgyur ba'i l+ya pa pha rol la yang na bar bya ste/ A ga t+ya/ A ga mya/ pra Na t+ya/ sogs so/ /na l+ya pi/ rang bzhin/ l+ya pa la ma
[\[449b.7\]]ma byas/ yin no/ /k+t+wA bsgyur ba'i l+ya pa pha rol la g+hu mA s+thA sogs Ir bsgyur ba ma yin te/ bid+hA ya/ rnam 'chang / bra dA ya/ rab sbyin/ pra s+thA ya/ rab gnas/ sogs so/ /yongs nas/ mIng la  rab tu 'dud pa/ k+t+wA l+ya pa/ mI nA ti sogs kyis Ata du bsgyur bas/
[\[450a\]]
[\[450a.1\]]nI mA ya/ sogs so/ /l+ya pi la g+hu pUrbAta/ l+ya pa las yang ba sngon ma las so/ yang ba sngon ma can gyi Ni tsa'i mtha' ni l+ya pa pha rol la a yar 'gyur te/ Ni tsa  big Na y+YaH/ bi b+hA ShA y+YaH/ a ya yang na'o/ a p+l-i
[\[450a.2\]]Ni tsa'i mtha' can  nges par 'tshe/ ni l+ya pa pha rol la a yar yang na 'gyur te/ prA ba y+Ya/ prA pya/ Ni iT med pa la phyis pa'o/ /'grel par k+Shi l+ya pa pha rol la ring por yang na 'gyur ro  rnam par 'tshogs 'dod/ rab tu 'dud 'dod/ zhes bshad pas/ pra k+Shi ya/ pra k+Shi t+ya/
[\[450a.3\]]ma ya te ri da n+ya ta ra s+yAM/ ma ya ti'i ita yang na'o/ ma ya ti ste mA+eng 'tshe ba'i A  rab tu byab pa/ ni l+ya pa pha rol la ita du 'gyur te/ a ba mi t+ya/ a ba mA ya/ l+ya pi tsa/ l+ya pa la 'ang ngo / pe nya'i l+ya pa pha rol la saM pra sA ra Nar bsgyur  rab tu zad/
[\[450a.4\]]pa ma yin te/ pra bA ya/ bi b+hA ShA pa re/ pa ri las yang na'o/ /pa ri las pha rol gyi byenya'i l+ya pa pha rol la saM pra sU ra Nar 'gyur te/ kun nam 'tshes/ pa ri bI ya/ pa ri byA ya/ A b+hI k+Sh+t+ye Na mu l+tsa/ yang yang la Na mul 'ang ngo / /byed pa po gcig gis bya
[\[450a.5\]]ba sna ma la yang yangagi  rab tu rgyud/ khyad par la 'jug pa na k+t+wA 'gyur zhing Na mul 'ang 'gyur te/ b+huk+t+wA b+hu k+t+wA pra dza ti/ b+ho dzaM b+ho dzaM pra dza ti/ sogs so/ /karma N+ya k+to she kr-inyaHkha munya/ yongs su sgril/ las las kr-inya la sbyor ba la kha munya'o/ las las pha rol gyi kr-inya las spyo ba rtogs
[\[450a.6\]]par byed pa la kha mun 'gyur te/ kha mu ma gyi don dang nya 'phel ba'i don no/ tsau raM kA ri/ spyo ba ma  zos shing zos nas 'gro bar byed/ yin na k+t+wA sbyar bas/ sA t+hu kr-i twA stau ti/ swA du mi Na mul/ zhim pa la Na mula'o/ /zhim pa'i don can gyi tshig las pha rol gyi kr-inya Na mul 'gyur te/
[\[450a.7\]]swA du kA raM b+hu k+te/ zhim par byas te zas/ yang na k+t+wA sbyar bas/ rku ba'i las byed/ swA du kr-i twA p+hu k+te/ zhim par byas zas/ a n+ya thi baM ka tha mi t+thaM b+h+ya sh+tsa/ legs so byas nas bstod/ a n+ya thA  e baM  ka thaM  i t+thaM rnams las kyang ngo / /a n+ya thA/ ka thaM/ i t+thaM rnams dang gzhan yang mang po'i
[\[450b\]]
[\[450b.1\]]pha rol gyi kr-inya la Na mul 'gyur te/ a n+ya thA kA raM b+hu k+te/ e baM kA raM b+hu k+te/ ka thaM kA raM b+hu k+te/ i t+thaM b+hu k+te/ sogs so/ /dzI bA dwi deH/ dzI ba las pi di las so/ /dzI ba las pha rol gyi bi dir thos pa la Na mul 'gyur te/ dzI ba bedaHb+huk+te/ ni mU las la yoHka Sha/ ni mUl
[\[450b.2\]]sa la dag la ka Sha las so/ /rnam pa gzhan du byas te zas/ de ltar byas nas zas/ ci ltar byas nas zas/ 'di ltar byas nas zas/ ni mU la dang sal dag las pha rol gyi ka Sha las Na mul 'gyur te/ ni mUl la kA ShaM/ sa la kA ShaM/ shu Sh+ka tsU r+Na  'tsho ba thob nas zas/ ru k+She Shu pi ShaH/ shuSh+ka  tsur+Na  rA
[\[450b.3\]]k+Sha rnams la pi Sha las so/ /shaSh+ka  cur+Na  rUk+Sha rnams las pha rol gyi rim pa Sha la Na mul 'gyur te/ shuSh+ka pe ShaM/ tsUr+Na pe ShaM/ rU k+Sha be ShaM/ sa mU lA kr-i ta dzI be Shu ha na kr-inya  nges par rtsa ba nas 'tshe/ gra haH/ sa mu la  A kr-i ta/ dzI ba rnams la han kr-inya
[\[450b.4\]]gra ha las so/ /sa mU la  A kr-i ta/ dzI ba rnams las pha rol gyi rim pa bzhin han kr-inya gra ha rnams  skam po theg/ zhib par theg/ gyong mo theg/ las Na mul 'gyur te/ sa mU la b+hA taM/ A kr-ita kA raM/ dzI ba grA haM/ ha sta ka ra yoHbrti gra hA b+h+yAM/ ha sta  ka ra dag la brti
[\[450b.5\]]gra ha dag las so/ /hasta dang ka ra dag las pha rol gyi brti dang gra ha las Na mul 'gyur te/ hasta grA haM/ ka ra grA haM/ hasta brtaM/ ka ra brtaM/ swe pu ShaH/ sra la  de rtsa ba 'joms/ kun nas byed pa byas/ srog 'dzin par byed/ bu Sha las so/ /swa las pha rol gyi pu Sha
[\[450b.6\]]las Na mul 'gyur te/ swa po ShaM/ u pa mA ne karma Ni tsa/ nye bar 'jal ba la las la'o/ nye/ lag pas bzung / lag pa bzung / lag pa bzung / bar 'jal ba las byed pa dang las las kyang Na mul 'gyur te/ ratwA ni d+hA yaM/ u pa daM sha s+t+r-i tI yAM/ gsum pa la u ba daM sha las
[\[450b.7\]]so/ /gsum pa'i/ rang rgyal ba/ mtha' nye ba'i tshig las pha rol gyi u pa daM sha las Na mul 'gyur te/ mU la ke no ba daM sha b+hUM k+te/ rtsa ba can gyis nye bar za bar byed/ A pa dA ne pa rI p+sA yAM/ byung khungs  Ata las yuka/ rin po che bzhin nges par 'dzin/ la yongs su myur ba la'o/ /byung
[\[451a\]]
[\[451a.1\]]khungs te lnga ba'i mtha' nye ba'i tshig la ches myur ba'i don rtogs par byed pa'i bya ba'i don la Na mul 'gyur te/ sha yA yAH/ nyal ba las langs/ ut+thA yaM/ dwi tI yAM tsa/ gnyis par la'ang ngo / /gnyis pa'i mtha' can nye ba'i tshig las kyang myur ba rtogs par byed pa la
[\[451a.2\]]bya ba'i don la Na mul 'gyur te/ yaSh+TiM gra haM yu d+h+ya n+ta/ a bya ye ya thA b+hi bri yA khyA ne kr-inyaHk+t+rA Na mu lau/ uta snga ma'i t+thA la Da mul sug A ga ma/ uta la t+thA n+ta m+hU sogs kyis phyis/ gang mi zad pa la mngon par dga' ba brjod pa la kr-inya las k+t+wA dang Na mul dag go/ /gang mi zad pa nye ba'i
[\[451a.3\]]gsal shing bzung nas 'bab bar byed/ tshig las mngon par dga' pa brjod ba'i don rtogs par byed pa'i bya ba la k+t+wA dang Da mul 'gyur te/ u r+ts+tsai kr-i t+ya pri yAM bru te/ uts+tsai kr-i twA pri yAM prU te/ u ts+tsai kA raM pri yI prU te/ sogs so/ /i ti pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na s+ya sU trA t+k+r-i tA da ya sA mA b+hUH/
[\[451a.4\]]zhes pa bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mdo las kr-ita la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod ba'i bstan bcos chen po bA Ni ni byA ka ra Na  dga' ba brjod de mtho bar byas/ dga' ba brjod de mtho bar byas/ gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod
[\[451a.5\]]pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las kr-ita la sogs pa byings las ming du bsgrub ba'i cho ga spyir btang dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //'grel ba'i mjug tu sbyar byang dang shis pa brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
[\[451a.6\]]byung ba ni/ pra kr-i A kau mA tI se yi rA ma tsan+d+ra pra kA shi tA/ a sa twa tsasta mo brtU tA ts+tsa ko ra bri yA tsi ri/ bod skad du/ rab byed shin tu gsal ba de 'di yang / /dga' byed zla bas rab tu gsal bar byas/ /bden med brjod pa mtha' ma 'ching byed de/ /dpyod ldan dam pa rtag tu
[\[451a.7\]]dga' bar byed/ /ces so/ /gnyis par shis pa brjod pa ni/ A tsAr+Ya bA tu b+ha ga bA na shi Sh+yaM pA tu bi nA ya kaH/ /ni rbi g+hI s+yA ts+tsa sarba tra bA Ni nI ya pra sA da taH/ /bod skad du/ slob dpon srung bar mdzod cig bcom ldan 'das/ /slob ma srung bar mdzod cig rnam par 'dren/ /
[\[451b\]]
[\[451b.1\]]thams cad du yang gags yod ma yin pa/ /drang srong bA Ni ni yi bka' drin las/ /mang+ga laM le kha kA nAM tsa bA tha kA nAM tsa mang+ga laM/ /mang+ga laM sarba b+hU gA naM b+hU mi b+hU pa ti mang+ga laM/ /'dri pa rnams kyang bkra shis shing / /klog pa rnams kyang bkra shis pa/ /srog chags thams cad bkra shis shing / /sa dang sa
[\[451b.2\]]bdag bkra shis/ /ces pa'o/ /de ltar brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po brgyad kyi nang tshan de rnams kyi nang nas kyang go don cho ga sogs phul du phyin pa mdor na sgra'i gtsug lag thams cad kyi phyi mo lta bur gyur pa'o skol gyi ston pa mnyam med shAkya'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud
[\[451b.3\]]sogs su lung bstan pa'i bram ze chen po pA Ni ni la 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis dngos su rtsal pa/ pA Ni ni byA ka ra gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs reg zig tu bkod pa legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rang cag gangs ri'i khrod pa
[\[451b.4\]]rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dam pa 'phags pa phyag na pad+mo nyid gsum ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs pa don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po dag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho 'jigs med go cha thub bstan lang tsho'i sde tshangs sras
[\[451b.5\]]bzhad pa'i rdo rjes mnyam pa med pa'i thugs rje'i  zer gyis bskyangs shing / paN+Di ta mched la gser dngul zho grangs brgya phrag du ma sogs ci 'dod kyi yo byad mtha' dag 'bad med du stsal te/ bka' 'bangs la'ang khyod kyis gzhung bod skad du bsgyur ba dang / 'grel ba'i go don dper
[\[451b.6\]]brjod zin bris su 'debs pa sogs gyis shig ces bka'i gnang ba thob par brten/ dam pa gang de'i gzhal du med pa'i bka' drin las brda sprod pa'i ring lugs cung zad tsam sbyangs pa bka' 'bangs kyis tha chung sa gtsang stod 'dar gyi sa'i char se'i rigs las skyes pa ngag dbang phun
[\[451b.7\]]tshogs lhun grub bam/ ming gzhan tshe dbang rab brtan rdo rje bod pa'i rmongs brtul snyom las pas/ 'phags yul ku ru k+She trar bram ze gtsang ma'i rigs su 'khrungs pa gnas lnga rig pa'i ma hA paN+Di ta pa la b+ha dra dang / paN+Di ta go ku la nA tha mi shra mched kyi drung du gzhung gi sgra sgrub dang go don
[\[452a\]]
[\[452a.1\]]dper brjod sogs legs par nyan te gzhung bod skad du bsgyur/ slob dpon chen po rA ma tsa n+d+ras mdzad pa'i 'grel ba pra kri ya ste rab tu bya ba zhes pa gzhir bzhag/ /kun bshad sogs cho ga rtogs dka' ba rnams slob dpon mkhas pa'i gsung rgyun gyis zur brgyan te cung zad rgyas
[\[452a.2\]]par byas/ rtogs sla ba rnams nyung ngur byas te/ me mkha' rgya mtsho la 'das lo drug cu skor bcu dang nya ga cum cu rtsa gnyis bsre ba rna 'phyang zhes pas pho khyi lo rang lo  rtsa bsgrub kyi mchan bu zhib pa  btab yod/ nyer lngar sleb pa chu stong zla ba'i yar tshes dge bar 'go brtsams/ kun ldan zhes pa lcags byi nag pa zla
[\[452a.3\]]ba'i dmar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gsum pa ba she'i 'grub sbyor gyi dus dge bar chos grwa chen po dpal ldan 'bras spungs kyi rang shag rgyud steng sbyil por sbyang ba 'dis kyang bstan pa dang sems can yongs la phan par gyur cig/ /ces pa 'di la bdag nyid blo gros kyi na tshod shin tu gzhon pas 'gyur ma dag
[\[452a.4\]]pa dang / dper brjod go don sogs la 'gal 'khrul snang na bla ma mchog dang mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis bzod par mdzod la tshul bzhin 'chos par mdzod du gsol/ dge 'dis dpal stug gsang ba kun 'dus rin chen gser gyis gzhi 'dzin/ /mtha' yas gdul bya skabs gsum yongs kyi gnyen
[\[452a.5\]]gcig dpal ldan ngag gi dbang / /blo gros bzang po'i nyi zlas rang 'khyud rgya chen shes bya'i mkha' la khyab/ /mtsho ltar zab 'das mkhyen pa'i dpal mnga' ji srid bar du brtan pa dang / /'grang yas skye dgu'i legs byas kyis bskrun lugs zung khrims kyi gdugs dkar po/ /phul byung khyon yangs 'dod dgu'i
[\[452a.6\]]dpal ster yid bzhin nor bu'i tog gis spras/ /nam yang 'gog med mkha' la rab bteg phan dang bde ba'i grib bsil gang / /bstan dang 'gro ba'i mi mthun gdung sel mchog tu lhag par mdzes gyur cig/ /tshul 'dir log rtog rdul gyis nyer bsgribs nas/ /gzhung don dga' ma'i bzhin ras mi gsal na/ /
[\[452a.7\]]mkhas mchog dam pa'i spyan sngar mi 'chab pas/ /dpyad gsum dag pas byi dor mdzad du gsol/ /gang gi rig tshul gang+ga'i yab gcig las/ /nyer 'ongs legs tshogs rab dngas dal 'gro yis/ /yid can rmongs pa'i dri ma kun bkrus nas/ /kun mkhyen rin chen rgya mtshor 'jug par shog/ //
